title: Amangidwa Atapezeka ndi Nyanga ya Njovu ku Chikwawa
news: Apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa amanga bambo wa zaka 40 zakubadwa, pomuganizira kuti wapezeka ndi mnyanga ya njovu yolemerera pafupipafupi ma kilogalamu khumi (10). Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Dickson Matemba watsimikizaza nkhaniyi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Woganiziridwayu Edward Kachala anagwidwa pa 21 June anthu ena atatsina khutu apolisi kuti mkuluyu akutsatsa malondawa. “Tamangadi a Kachala anthu ena atatiuza kuti iwowa akugulitsa nyanga ya njovu yolemera 10kilograms. Ma CID athu ndi akuluakeulu ena a nthambi yowona za nkhalango anakwanitsa kuchita kafukufuku ndi kumanga mkuluyu. Tiwatengera ku khothi posachedwapa kuti akayankhe mlanduwu,” anatero a Matemba. Padakalipano apolisi ayamikira anthu a m’bomalo pokhala patsogolo kuwatsina khutu zokhudza anthu amena akupalamula milandu yosiyanasiyana m’bomalo. A Kachala amachokera m’mudzi mwa Chituwi mfumu yaikulu Ngabu m’boma lomwelo la Chikwawa.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Walengeza kuti Lucia ndi Wolemekezeka
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasayinira kalata yolengeza kuti Lucia dos Santos wa m’dziko la Portugal tsopano ndi wolemekezeka. Sister Lucia dos Santos Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Lucia ndi anzake ena awiri Francisco komanso Yasinta adawonekeredwa ndi Amayi Maria pa nthawi yomwe adali kuweta nkhosa ku Fatima m’dziko la Portugal m’chaka cha 1917. Iwo sadawonekeredwe ndi Amayi Maria kamodzi kokha koma izi zidapitirira kwa miyezi yokwana isanu. Powaonekera anawa, Amayi Maria adawulura zinthu zingapo: za kufunika komapemphera makamaka mapemphero a Kolona, za kufunika kokhala anthu odzimana, za kutha kwa nkhondo yoyamba ya dziko lonse la pansi (World War I), kukula kwa ulamuliro wa chi communist m’dziko la Russia ndi za mavuto ochuluka omwe akhristu adzakhale akukumana nawo mu zaka za kutsogolo kaamba ka chikhulupiliro chawo. Lucia pamodzi ndi asuweni ake Francisko ndi Yasinta Francisco ndi Yasinta atamwalira m’chaka cha 1919, Lucia adapitirira kusunga uthenga wa Amayi Maria ndipo kenako adalowa moyo wa m’chipani cha mu mpingo ndi kukhala sisitere. Iye adamwalira pa 13 February m’chaka cha 2005. Pamene munthu watchulidwa wolemekezeka (Venerable), amayembekezeka pambuyo pake kukhala wodala (Blessed) asadakhale woyera (Saint).
author: judith sonkho

title: Amayi aku Immigration Athandiza Malo Osamalira Ana Aang’ono
news: Amayi ochokera ku nthambi ya boma yowona zolowa ndi kutuluka mdziko muno ya Immigration m’boma la Mangochi apereka thandizo la katundu wosiyanasiyana kwa ana aang’ono omwe amalandira chisamaliro chawo ku malo a Open Arms Infant Home ku Namiyasi m’boma la Mangochi. Poyankhula pamene anali mlendo wolemekezeka ku mwambo wopereka thandizoli mayi Benadette Kalumo amene ndi mkazi wa mkulu wa nthambi ya Immigration m’dziko muno, anayamikira chidwi chomwe amayi ogwira ntchito ku Immigration-wa awonetsa pochita posonkhanitsa ndalama ndi kugulira thandizo lomwe akapereka ku malowa. Mayi Kalumo kupereka wina mwa katunduyo kwa a Mwaliwa Iwo anati zomwe amayiwa achita ndi madalitso aakulu ochokera kwa Mulungu. “Zimenezi ndi zabwino kwambiri ndi chifukwa chake ndinabwera kudzakhala nawo pano. Tipemphe anthu ena amene ali ndi kuthekera kuti ayesetse ndi chuma chawo kumathadniza anthu amene ali osowa chifukwa akatero Mulungu adzawadalitsa,” anatero mayi Kalumo. Zina mwa zinthu zomwe amayiwa apereka ku malowa ndi monga Sugar, SOBO squash, ma diaper, sopo, ufa ndi zina zambiri. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa akulu-akulu a ku malowa a Fred Mwaliwa anati zomwe amayi ogwira ntchito ku Immigration-wa achita, ndi zinthu zotamandika kwambiri kaamba koti malowa amasowa zambiri pa chisamaliro cha wana. “Ana amenewa amasowa matini 48 a mkaka wa lactogen 1 komanso matini 40 a lactogen 2 pa mwezi umodzi kuti tiwasamale. Pano zinthu zikuvuta kwambiri kuposera pachiyambi maka chifukwanso cha mliri wa COVID-19 zomwe zinachititsa kuti thandizo lomwe timapeza lichepe. Katundu wabwerayu ndiye kuti watichepetsera budget yathu. Pamenepa ndiye kuti mwezi onse wa July sitigula kanthu,” anatero a Mwaliwa. Malo a Open Arms Infant Home amasamala ana ongobadwa kumene mpaka zaka ziwiri omwe makolo awo anamwalira kapena omwe anatayidwa ndi makolo awo, komanso ana omwe makolo awo ndi amisala.
author: judith sonkho

title: Atupele Muluzi Sanaganizebe Zopikisana Nawo ku ‘Convention’
news: Mtsogoleri wakale wa chipani cha United Democratic Front (UDF) Atupele Muluzi wati sanapange chiganizo ngati adzapikisane nawo pa mpando wa utsogoleri wa chipanicho pa msonkhano waukulu wa chipanichi. Muluzi yemwe mwezi wa May chaka chatha analengeza kuti wasiya ndale ndipo wayamba bizinesi, amayankhula izi la Mulungu ku Mangochi pamene anali mlendo wolemekezeka pa mwambo wokondwelera kuti chipani cha UDF chakwanitsa zaka 30 kuchokera pomwe chinakhazikitsidwa mdziko muno. Muluzi: Ndilengeza kutsogoloku Iye wati adakalingalirabe za nkhaniyi ndipo akapanga chiganizo adzalengeza. “Ine ndadzipereka kuti tipititse patsogolo chipani chathu. Convention imalora munthu aliyense kupikisana nawo pa mpando uliwonse kuphatikizapo wa president ndiye ndilengeza kutsogoloku,” anatero Muluzi. Poyankhula pa nkhani zokhudza tsikuli Muluzi anati chipani cha UDF chinachita zitukuko zochuluka mu nthawi ya ulamuliro wake monga kubweretsa maphunziro aulere, kumanga misewu, zipatala, kubweretsa lamya za m’manja komanso zina. Poyankhulapo pamene iye amanena kuti sadzapikisana nawo pa msonkhano waukulu wa chipanichi, mtsogoleri wa chipani cha UDF mayi Lilian Patel adzudzula anthu ena omwe akuti akubweretsa chisokonezo m’chipanicho. Muluzi kugawana mfundo ndi Patel pa msonkhanowo “Pali anthu ena amene akuchita ngati kuti iwowo ndiye eni ake a UDF pamene ife tonse ndife amodzi. UDF is a democratic party ndiye tisamanyozane ayi. Ine nditengera chipani chimenechi ku convention koma sindikapikisana nawo komanso sindili ku mbali ya aliyense ndiye amene akufuna atha kubwera kudzapikisana nawo,” anatero mayi Patel. Chipani cha UDF chinalamulira dziko lino kuchokera m’chaka cha 1994 mpaka mchaka cha 2004 pamene chimatsogoleredwa ndi Dr. Bakili Muluzi ndipo ndi chipanichomwe chinabweretsa ulamuliro wa zipani zambiri mdziko muno kuchoka ku ulamuliro wa chipani chimodzi cha Malawi Congress (MCP) chomwe pa nthawiyo chimkatsogoleredwa ndi malemu Dr. Hastings Kamuzu Banda.
author: judith sonkho

title: PRISAM Yati Iyamba Kubwereketsa Ndalama Kwa Mamembala Ake
news: Bungwe loyang’anira sukulu zomwe si za boma mdziko muno la Private Schools Association of Malawi (PRISAM) lati liyamba ndondomeko yopereka ngongole ku sukulu zomwe ndi mamembala a bungweli ndi cholinga choti ntchito za sukuluzi zipite patsogolo. A Ntafya ndi ena mwa akuluakulu a PRISAM Wapampando wabungweli a Amon Ntafya anena izi loweruka mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pamene amakhazikitsa bungweli mu mzindawo pomwe amakumana ndi sukulu zomwe si za boma zomwe zikufuna kulowa mu bungweli za mu mzinda komanso m’boma la Lilongwe. Iwo ati sukulu zomwe si za boma zikukumana ndi mavuto aakulu a chuma omwe akulanso kwambiri kaamba ka namondwe wa Freddy yemwe anakhudza maboma ambiri a chigawo chakumwera ndipo ndi kofunika kuti sukuluzi zipeze ndalama zothandizira kuti ntchito zake ziyambireno kuyenda bwino. “Ndife oyima patokha pa nkhani ya chuma chifukwa timadalira ophunzira. Ndiye pamene namondwe wa Freddy komanso matenda a Kolera zinatigwera, pali mavuto ambiri a chuma ndiye tikuwauza eni sukulu zomwe si za boma kuno ku Lilongwe kuti alowe m’bungweli chifukwa pompano tikhazikitsa ndondomeko yobwereketsa ndalama ija amati SACCO pakati pa sukulu zomwe si za boma kuti sukulu zambiri zikonze mavuto amenewo,” anatero a Ntafya. Mamembala a bungwe la PRISAM pambuyo pa msonkhano wawo ku LIlongwe Mwazina pa tsikuli akuluakulu a bungweli anakambirana ndi akuluakulu a sukuluzi pa zokonzekera zokhudza mayeso a boma a chaka chino a sitandade 8, fomu 2 komanso fomu 4 ndipo pa nkhaniyi a Ntafya analangiza sukuluzi kuti zipewe kuchita zachinyengo pa mayesowa. Wapampandoyu wati akufunitsitsa kuwona sukulu zomwe si za boma zikupindula kudzera mu bungweli osati kupsinjika momwe zakhala zikuyendera ndi mabungwe ena a sukuluzi. Iwo ati posachedwapa akhalanso akukhazikitsa bungweli m’chigawo chakumpoto kwa dziko lino. Poyankhulapo yemwe wasankhidwa kukhala wapampando wa bungweli m’chigawo chapakati a Chimwemwe Kumwenda ati awonetsetsa kuti sukulu zambiri zilowe mu bungweli powonetsa ubwino omwe sukulu zimene zili bungweli zikupeza. Iwo ati agwira bwino ntchito limodzi ndi unduna wa zamaphunziro komanso bungwe lolembetsa mayeso a boma mdziko muno la Malawi National Examinations Board (MANEB) pofuna kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za maphunziro msukulu zomwe zili mamembala a bungweli.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wayamikira Bungwe Loteteza Ana mu Mpingo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walimbikitsa bungwe la mu mpingo wa Katolika lolimbana ndi m’chitidwe wochitira nkhanza ana kuti lipitirize kugwira ntchito yake yabwino. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican pa nkumano wake ndi mamembala a bungweli lomwe limatchedwa kuti Pontifical Commission for the Protection of Minors. Iye wati ntchito younika ndi kukonza ndondomeko zoyenera kutsatidwa poteteza ana ku nkhanza ikuyenera kupitirira. Papa Francisco wati ndi kofunika kuchilimika pa ntchitoyi kaamba koti kungakhale kovuta kumawalalikira anthu za chikondi cha Mulungu ngati mpingo ungamalephere kuteteza ana ku m’chitidwe oyipawu. Iye wati ndi tchimo lalikulu pa maso pa Mulungu kulekerera kapena kutseka maso ndi kumachita ngati kuti nkhaniyi ndi nkhambakamwa chabe ndipo wati tchimo lake ndi lofanana ndi la awo omwe amachita nkhanzazi. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wati atsogoleri a mpingo amene sakuchitapo kanthu pothana ndi m’chitidwewu akupalamula mlandu waukulu pa maso pa Mulungu. Bungwe lothana ndi nkhanza zokhudza ana, Pontifical Commission for the Protection of Minors adalikhazikitsa m’chaka cha 2014 ndipo mwa zina limawunika malipoti ochokera kwa a episkopi a mpingowu pa nkhaniyi m’maiko osiyana-siyana.
author: judith sonkho

title: United Purpose Ilimbikitsa Atolankhani Kumemeza Anthu Za Katemera
news: Bungwe la United Purpose m’boma la Dedza lalimbikitsa atolankhani kuti atenge udindo ozindikiritsa anthu za kufunika kolandira katemera wa matenda a Covid-19 ndi Kolera. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu ku bungweli a Gift Munthali ndi omwe ayalankhula izi lachitatu kwa atolankhani ndi awulutsi a nyumba zofalitsa nkhani zosiyanasiyana m’boma la Dedza. Iwo ati kudzera mu kuwulutsa mawu ndi kulemba nkhani, anthu a m’bomali angathe kuzindikiritsidwa bwino kufunikira kolandira katemera pamene zikusonyeza kuti anthu ambiri a m’bomalo sanalandire katemera wa Covid-19. “Tagwira ntchito kuno ku Dedza kwakanthawi ndithu ndipo tawona kuti pakufunika kugwira ntchito ndi atolankhani chifukwa ndi anthu ochepa okha amene analandira katemerayu kuno ku Dedza, mwina tili pa 20 percent kupita pansi,” anatero a Munthali. Poyankhulapo mneneri wa chipatala cha Dedza, Mwayi Liyabunya wati ntchito imene bungwe la United Purpose likugwira, ithandiza kuti anthu ambiri m’bomalo alandire katemera wa Covid-19 komanso wa Kolera, zimene zingachepetse kufala kwa matendawa. Iwo anati, “Project imeneyi ya bungwe la United Purpose ndi yofunika kwambiri chifukwa ikuthandizira kuti anthu ambiri afikiridwe ndi katemera komanso mauthenga okhudza Covid-19 ndi Kolera.” Iwo anati akufunitsitsa kuti agwire ntchito ndi atolankhani pofuna kufikitsa patali mauthenga okhudza nkhaniyi.
author: judith sonkho

title: MACRA Yakhazikitsa Ntchito Yopereka Mayina ku Misewu, Nambala ku Nyumba M’boma la Kasungu
news: Bungwe loyang’anira ntchito zofalitsa mauthenga komanso za mtengatenga ndi mtokoma la Malawi Communications Regulatory Authority (MACRA) lakhazikitsa ntchito yopereka mayina ku misewu komanso nambala ku nyumba m’boma la Kasungu. Poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi mneneri wa bungweli a Zadziko Mankhambo ati ndondomekoyi ndi yofunika kwambiri kaamba koti imachepetsa ntchito yofotokozera malo amene munthu akupezeka. Iwo amayankhula izi lachinayi pambuyo pa mkumano omwe anakonzera akuluakulu a tawuni ya Kasungu kuphatikizapo anthu okhudzidwa ndi nkhaniyi monga apolisi, a ESCOM, a Water Board ndi ena. “Ndondomekoyi ndi yofunika kwambiri chifukwa zimachepetsa ntchito ya mafotokozedwe ngati akufuna chithandizo chilichonse chifukwa amangotchula kuti ndili mu nyumba yakuti, mu nsewu wakuti. Tinagula makina amene misewu yomwe ikutchulidwayi izisindikizidwa mu makina amenewo kuti olo kupita pa google map uzipeza malo amene ukuwafunawo mosavuta,” anatero a Mankhambo. Poyankhulapo mkulu wa tawuni ya Kasungu, a Isaac Mkandawire ati ntchitoyi ithandiza anthu a mtawuniyi maka pa nthawi yomwe akumana ndi vuto kuti atahndizidwe mwamsanga ndi mosavuta. “Ndi ntchito yofunika kwambiri kuti tikwanitse kufikira anthu mosavuta monga nkhani zozimitsa moto, chitetezo ndi zina,” anatsindika motero a Mkandawire. Padakalipano bungwe la MACRA latsiriza kale ndondomekoyi m’maboma onse a m’chigawo chakumpoto ndipo chomwe chatsala ndi kuyika zikwangwana kaamba koti ntchito yopereka mayina ku misewuyo inachitika kale. Bungweli likatsiriza ntchitoyi m’chigawo chapakati, lipitanso m’chigawo chakumwera kuti akagwirenso ntchito ngati yomweyi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Mawu a Mulungu Amapereka Tanthauzo Lenileni la Mavuto
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Mau a Mulungu amapereka tanthauzo lenileni la mavuto omwe anthu amawaona m’moyo wawo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican, pa mkumano wake ndi mamembala a bungwe la Baibulo la Pontifical Biblical Commission lomwe lidapatsidwa ntchito yochita kafukufuku mu Baibulo kuti lipeze tanthauzo la mavuto ndi matenda. Iye wafotokoza kuti pamene anthu ali mu mavuto monga matenda pali zinthu ziwiri zomwe zingathe kuchitika: kutaya mtima ndipo osaonanso chabwino chilichonse m’moyo uno kapena kukhala nthawi yokula m’moyo wa uzimu. Papa Francisco wati mawu a Mulungu opezeka mu Baibulo amathandiza anthu okhulupirira kuti nthawi ya mavuto monga matenda ikhale nthawi yokula m’moyo wa uzimu ndi kukhala pafupi komanso kumudziwa Mulungu. Iye wati mu nthawi ya mavuto mtanda wa Yesu Khristu umawulula chikondi cha Mulungu pa anthu ake. Koma si pokhapo iye wati machiritso ku matenda osiyana-siyana amawululanso chikondi cha Mulungu makamaka kuti Mulungu amakhala pafupi ndi anthu ake. Bungwe la Pontifical Biblical Commission kapena kuti Pontificia Commissio Biblica m’chilatini ndi bungwe la a Papa lomwe limateteza Mau a Mulungu ndi kuonetsetsa kuti Mau a Mulungu akutanthauziridwa moyenerera.
author: judith sonkho

title: Mkhalakale pa Ndale Adzudzula Zitopotopo ku DPP
news: Anthu akupitilira kudzudzula chipani chotsutsa boma cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) ponena kuti zina mwa ziganizo zomwe chikupanga, zikusokoneza tsogolo la chipanichi. Mkhalakale pa ndale Humphreys Mvula wati kubwezeretsedwa pa udindo ndi bwalo la milandu kwa gavanala wa chipanichi mchigawo chakumwera, a Charles Mchacha, ndi chizindikiro kuti ku chipani cha DPP kwalowa chisawawa. Mvula amathilira ndemanga pa zomwe khoti lachita pobwezeretsa a Mchacha paudindo wake atachotsedwa ati kaamba kotsutsana ndi ganizo loti a Peter Mutharika adzayimire chipanichi pa chisankho cha 2025. Mchacha: Tipitiriza kupereka ulemu kwa apulezidenti athu “Sanawachotse motsata malamulo a chipani chawo ndi chifukwa chake khoti lawona kuti abwezeretsedwe. Mmene zateremu ubale wawo ndi president wawo wasokonekera basi sanagagwire ntchito yawo momasuka,” anatero a Mvula. Padakali pano a Charles Mchacha omwenso ndi phungu wa nyumba ya malamulo mdera la kumadzulo m’boma la Thyolo ati alibe mangawa aliwonse ndi utsogoleri wa chipanichi. “Sindimatha kubwenza choyipa koma kumuwunikira munthu kuti asadzachitenso choipacho. Ndikutsimikizira anthu onse kuti ndigwira ntchito mwabwino kwambiri komanso tipitiriza kupereka ulemu kwa apulezidenti a chipani chathu a Mutharika,” anatero a Mchacha. Masiku apitawa chipani cha DPP chinachotsa pa udindo a Mchacha ndipo mmalo mwake anayika a Thompson Kamangira pa udindowu zomwe sizinakondweretse a Mchacha omwe anakatenga chiletso ku bwalo la milandu chomwe chachititsa kuti iwo abwelere pa udindowu.
author: judith sonkho

title: Nduna Ipempha Wailesi Zidzilipira Bwino Antchito Ake
news: Nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani mdziko muno a Moses Kunkuyu apempha wailesi za mdziko muno kuti zidzilipira bwino ogwira ntchito ake ndi cholinga choti adzitha kugwira bwino ntchito zawo. Ndunayi yanena izi lero pa mwambo woganizira za kufunika kwa wailesi mdziko muno omwe unachitikira ku nyumba yowulutsa mawu ya YONECO FM mu mzinda wa Zomba. Kunkuyu: Tiyeni tilipire bwino antchito athu Iwo ati ngati ogwira ntchito salandira malipiro abwino zimachititsa kuti asamagwire bwino ntchito zawo. “Ndipemphe wailesi zonse mdziko muno kuti tipereke malipiro abwino kwa ogwira ntchito athu kuti adzitha kugwira ntchito zawo bwino,” anatero a Kunkuyu. Iwo anapitiriza ndi kupempha boma kuti lithandize wailesi mdziko muno maka pa chuma kuti zidzitha kupanga mapologalamu osiyanasiyana okweza chitukuko cha dziko. Potsiriza iwo alimbikitsanso wailesizi kuti zipitilire kupereka uthenga oyenera kudzera mmapologalamu awo osiyanasiyana kuti adzitha kugwirizana ndi zomwe zikuchitika mdziko muno. Dziko lonse lapansi limaganizira za wailesi pa 13 February chaka ndi chaka.
author: judith sonkho

title: Ambuye Stima Adzudzula Kulowetsa Ndale Pa Thandizo La Okhudzidwa Ndi Namondwe
news: Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi, Ambuye Montfort Stima apempha atsogoleri a zipani za ndale kuti apewe kulowetsa ndale pa ntchito yopereka thandizo kwa anthu amene akhudzidwa ndi namondwe wa Freddy. Ambuye Stima anena izi kudzera mu kalata yomwe alemba yomwe mwa zina ikupempha anthu akufuna kwabwino kuti athandize anthu oposa 11 sauzande a maboma a mu dayosiziyo omwe akhudzidwa ndi zotsatira za namondweyu. Ambuye Stima: Sikoyenera kumagwiritsa ntchito zomwe tikuwapatsa anthuwa ngati chopangira kampeni Iwo ati pali anthu ena omwe akutengerapo mwayi omakakachita kampeni pa nthawi imene akupereka thandizo kwa anthuwa, zomwe ndi zosayenera. “Zikatere ena amafua kutengerapo mwayi ndi kuyamba kupanga kampeni. Takumana ndi vutoli lomwe ndi chipsinjo cha aMalawi onse ndiye sikoyenera kumagwiritsa ntchito zomwe tikuwapatsa anthuwa ngati chopangira kampeni,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Ambuye Stima adzudzulanso anthu ena omwe akumapita m’malo osungira anthuwa ndi kumakalandira nawo thandizo ngakhale kuti iwo sanakhudziwe ndi vutoli, zomwe ati ndi kuba. Iwo anati, “Tamva kale kuti anthu ena omwe sanakhudzidwe akumakalandira nawo chakudya ndi kumakagona kunyumba. Zimenezi zikuwonetsa kuti aMalawi takula ndi makhalidwe oyipa, khalidwe la kuba. Ena akumabanso zinthu zimene anthu akuvutikawa akulandira.” Mwazina, Ambuye Stima alangizanso anthu kuti apewe kugwiritsa ntchito madzi osasamalirika omwe adza kaamba ka kusefukira kwa madzi. “Mvula imeneyi yagwetsa nyumba ndi zimbudzi komanso madzi alowa m’ma septic tank zomwe zikutanthauza kuti madzi omwe alipo ndi owonongeka. Zimenezi zitha kupagitsa kuti matenda a Kolera apitilire ndiye makolo awonetsetse kuti ana awo sakugwiritsa ntchito madzi oyipawa komanso makolowo asagwiritse ntchito madziwa pochapa, kumwa ndi zina. Madzi amene ngakhale akuwoneka ngati abwino ndi ofunika azitenthetsedwa,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Padakalipano maboma onse atatu omwe amapanga dayosizi ya Mangochi a Balaka, Mangochi ndi Machinga ndi akhudzidwa ndi namondwe wa Freddy pamene ena ataya miyoyo, ena nyumba zawo zagwa ndipo ena mbewu komanso ziweto zawo zakokoloka.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wapepesa Dziko la Ecuador Lomwe Lakhudzidwa ndi Chivomerezi
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya chivomerezi m’dziko la Ecuador. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa wafotokoza za chisoni chake pakumva za ngozi ya chivomerezi m’dera la m’chigawo cha kumwera kwa m’dziko la Ecuador chomwe chagwedezanso dera la ku mpoto kwa dziko la Peru. Chivomerezicho chagwetsanso nyumba zochuluka Iye wati kudzera m’mapemphero ali pafupi ndi anthu onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi. “Ndikupepesa anamfedwa onse ndipo ndikuyikiza mizimu ya anthu onse omwe afa m’manja mwa Mulungu kuti Mulungu alandire mizimu yawo mu ufumu wake. Ndikufuniranso onse omwe avulala kuchira kwa msanga,” watero Papa Francisko. Malipoti ochokera m’dzikolo afotokoza kuti anthu oposa 16 afa pomwe ena omwe akwiririka sadapezekebe ndipo anthu oposa 381 avulala. Ngozi za chivomerezi zimachitika pafupipafupi m’dzikolo. Chivomerezi cha m’chaka cha 2016 chidapha anthu oposa 600. Masiku apitawa Papa Francisco adatumiza uthenga wopepesa kwa anthu a m’dziko la Malawi potsatira namondwe wotchedwa Freddy yemwe waphetsa anthu 476 ndi kuwonongetsa nyumba ndi katundu wa nkhaninkhani.
author: judith sonkho

title: ISAMA Yapempha Boma Litsekule Sukulu Zomwe Sizinakhudzidwe ndi Namondwe
news: Bungwe loyendetsa sukulu zoyima pazokha la Independent Schools Association of Malawi (ISAMA) lapempha boma kuti lilingalire zopereka chilorezo kuti sukulu za m’chigawo chakumwera kwa dziko lino zomwe sizinakhudzidwe ndi namondwe wa Freddy, zipitilire kupereka maphunziro. Wapampando wa bungweli a Wycliff Chimwendo anena izi pamene amathilirapo ndemanga pa ganizo la boma lotseka sukulu zonse za maboma khumi a chigawo chakumwera kuti zidzayambenso kupereka maphunziro teremu ya mawa ponena kuti sukulu zambiri m’mabomawa zakhudzidwa ndi namondweyu. Chimwendo: Ana adzalemba mayeso ofanana Iwo ati zikhala zovuta kwambiri kuti sukulu za chigawochi zibweretse sabata zomwe saphunzira potengera kuti sukulu-zi zinayambanso zayima kwa sabata ziwiri kumayambiliro a teremu ino kaamba ka mliri wa Kolera. A Chimwendo ati sukulu za chigawo chakumwera sizikukhala ndi nthawi yokwanira yophunzira koma sukuluzi zidzalemba mayeso ofanana ndi sukulu zina zomwe zikuphunzira mokwanira za zigawo zakumpoto ndi pakati. “Ngati mukukumbukira bwino, kumayambiliro kwa teremu ino tinakhala sabata ziwiri tisanatsekulire chifukwa cha mliri wa Kolera. Zimene zija zinakhudza maboma a chigawo cha kumwera. Izinso zikubwera zikukhudza maboma omwewo chonsecho maboma a chigawo chapakati ndi kumpoto akuphunzira bwinobwino ndipo atsiriza masabata onse a teremu ino. Ana adzalemba mayeso ake ofanana posatengera kuti aphunzira masabata onse kapena ayi zomwe ife tikuwona kuti palibe chilungamo ayi,” anadandaula motero a Chimwendo. Pamenepa iwo ati anakadandaulira kale akuluakulu a unduna wa zamaphunziro ndipo undunawu walonjeza bungweli kuti liyendera sukulu zonse m’chigawochi pofuna kuwona zomwe sizinakhudzidwe ndi namondweyu komanso zomwe sizikusunga anthu omwe akhudzidwa.
author: judith sonkho

title: Aepiskopi aku Zambia Apepesa Dziko la Malawi
news: Bungwe la aepiskopi a mpingo wa Katolika mdziko la Zambia la Zambian Conference of Catholic Bishops (ZCCB) lapepesa dziko la Malawi kaamba ka namondwe wa Freddy yemwe waphetsa anthu ochuluka ndi kuvulaza ena ambiri. Izi zadziwika kudzera mu kalata yomwe bungweli lalembera bungwe la aepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi ndipo yasainidwa ndi wapampando wa bungwe la aepiskopi mdziko la Zambia, Ambuye Ignatius Chama. Aepiskopi-wa ati ayesetsa kuthandiza komanso kupemphelera dziko la Malawi ndi anthu onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi namondweyu. “Tikulira nanu limodzi ndipo landirani kupepesa kwathu kwa inu komanso mabanja omwe aferedwa. Tikupempheleranso anthu amene avulala, kusowetsedwa pokhala ndi onse omwe ataya katundu wawo kuti atonthozedwe ndi Mulungu komanso athandizidwe ndi anthu akufuna kwabwino,” yatero kalatayo. Padakalipano bungwe la mgwirizano wa mabungwe a aepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mchigawo chakumvuma kwa Africa la Association of Member Episcopal Conferences in Eastern Africa (AMECEA), lapempha mayiko omwe ndi mamembala a bungweli kuti athandize dziko la Malawi pa nthawi yovutayi. Malinga ndi kalata yomwe yasainidwa ndi wapampando wa bungweli Ambuye Charles Kasonde omwe ndi episkopi wa dayosizi ya Solwezi mdziko la Zambia, mabungwe a aepiskopi m’maikowa akuyenera kuti apeze njira zothandizira pa vutoli potsatira kalata yomwe bungwe la aepiksopi aku Malawi analemba pa 14 March yopempha thandizo. “Anthu oposa 250 amwalira, ena oposa 600 avulala pamene mabanja ena zikwizikwi akusowa pokhala. Pofuna kuwonetsa umodzi wathu, tiyeni tipeze njira zosiyanasiyana zoti tithandizire abale athuwa amene akudutsa mu nyengo yovuta,” yatero kalatayo. Iwo ati ndi olimbikitsika kuti mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko, mayiko ndi mabungwe aku America ndi ku ulaya, kuphatikizapo mabungwe amu mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse monga Trocaire, ayambapo kale kuthandiza pa ngoziyi ndipo apempha anthu akfuna kwabwino komanso makampani m’maiko a mchigawochi kuti nawo atengepo mbali. Mu bungweli muli mayiko asanu ndi anayi omwe ndi a Eritrea, Ethiopia, Kenya, Malawi, South Sudan, Sudan, Tanzania, Zambia ndi Uganda. Padakalipano chiwerengero cha anthu amene afa kaamba ka namondwe wa Freddy chafika pa 438, anthu 918 avulala ndipo ena 282 akusowa. Namondweyu wakhudza maboma 12 a m’chigawo chakumwera ndi kumvuma kwa dziko la Malawi komwe wakhudza mabanja okwana 79, 602 omwe ndi anthu 345, 183 ndipo malo okwana 505 ndi omwe akusungira anthuwa.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wapempha Maiko, Mabungwe Athandize Dziko La Malawi
news: Gawo lochepa chabe lomwe namondwe wa Freddy waononga ku Malawi Iye wati kudzera m’mapemphero, ali pafupi ndi anthu onse a dziko la Malawi makamaka omwe abale awo afa pa ngoziyi komanso onse omwe nyumba ndi katundu wawo waonongeka.
author: judith sonkho

title: Abambo a Katolika Akhala ndi Mkumano Wawo Oyamba ku Ntcheu
news: Bungwe la aepiskopi a mpingo wa Katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) lalengeza za chikonzero cha msonkhano waukulu woyamba wa bungwe la abambo mu mpingowu la Catholic Men Organisation (CMO). Malinga ndi kalata yomwe likululi latulutsa, mkumanowu udzakhalako loweruka pa 18 March 2023 ku parishi ya Ntcheu mu dayosizi ya Dedza ndipo amene adzatsogolere nsembe ya Misa pa tsikuli ndi Vicar General wa dayosiziyo Monsignor John Chithonje. Bambo Chaima: Tikufuna kuyatsa moto wa utumiki mwa abambo. Izi zikudza aepiskopiwa atavomereza bungweli kukhala la mu mpingowu kudzera pa msonkhano wawo omwe anachita mwezi wa June mchaka cha 2022 ndipo pa msonkhano omwewo anavomerezanso Yosefe Woyera- mwamuna wa Maria kukhala nkhoswe ya bungweli. Poyankhulapo pa nkhaniyi mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la ECM, bambo Alfred Chaima ati bungweli likhala patsogolo pa ntchito yolimbikitsa abambo mu mpingo wa katolika kuti azitenga nawo mbali mu magawo osiyana siyana mu mpingowu. “Tikufuna kuyatsa moto wa utumiki mwa abambo. Tikufuna akhale msanamira za mpingo. Takonza kuti msonkhanowu uchitike loweruka kuti chikhale chaka chapaderadera ndipo chisasakanikirane ndi zochitika za lamulungu,” anatero bambo Chaima. Iwo ati kutenga mbali kwa abambo m’magawo osiyanasiyana kungathandize kutukula mpingo. Malinga ndi dongosolo la mwambowu, palibe episkopi amene akapezeke ku mwambowu ndipo bambo Chaima ati izi zili chomwechi kaamba koti aepiskopi onse akhala akupita ku Rome mdziko la Italy komwe ndi ku likulu la mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse kukakumana ndi a Papa.
author: judith sonkho

title: Apempha Mabungwe Athandize Boma Pokweza Maphunziro Msukulu za Ukachenjede
news: M’modzi mwa akatswiri pa nkhani za maphunziro Dr. Steve Sharra wapempha boma komanso makampani kuti awonjezere thandizo la ndalama zomwe amapereka ku sukulu za ukachenjede za mdziko muno pofuna kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za maphunziro msukuluzi. Dr. Sharra ayankhula izi potsatira zotsatira za kafukufuku wa bungwe la Webometrics yemwe wawonetsa kuti sukulu za ukachejede za dziko lino sizili mu mndandanda wa sukulu 100 zochita bwino muno mu Africa. Sharra: Si za chilendo Iwo ati kafukufuku-yu waonetseratu kuti maphunziro mdziko muno ndi otsika. “Si za chilendo izizi chifukwa nthawi zonse kungatuluke kafukufuku sukulu zathu sizimapezeka pa mndandanda umenewu. Vuto lalikulu ndi loti sukulu zathu zilibe ma website omwe timayenera kuyikapo zinthu zomwe tikupanga chifukwa kukhala ndi website kokhako ndi ndalama zambiri. Mumayeneranso mupeze anthu angapo oti adziyendetsa ndiye mukamapanga zinthu zanu zija mkumayika pamenepo kuti athu ena a m’maiko ena adziwona zomwe mukuchita. Mukatero mumapita patsogolo,” anatero Dr. Sharra. Iwo ati mabungwe komanso makampani omwe si a boma akuyenera athandize boma popereka thandizo la ndalama pofuna kutukula maphunziro mdziko muno. “Boma limavutika kuti lipange zimenezi pa lokha chifukwa ndalama ndi zochepa. Makampani komanso mabungwe atalowelerapo kupereka ndalama zothandizira sukulu zathu zinthu zitha kusintha,” anatsindika Dr. Sharra. Malinga ndi zotsatira za kafukufuku amene bungwe la Webometrics linachita, Chancellor College ndi yomwe ili yoyamba ya mdziko muno pa mndandandawu ikupezeka pa nambala 196, yachiwiri ndi Mzuzu University pa nambala 273 ndipo yachitatu ndi Kamuzu College of Health Sciences (KUHeS) pa nambala 358. Sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Livingstonia ndi yachinayi kuno ku Malawi koma pa nambala 456 pa dziko lonse, Lilongwe University of Agriculture and Natural Resources (LUANAR) ili pa nambal 476 ndipo Malawi University of Business and Applied Sciences (MUBAS) ili pa nambala 587 pa dziko lonse.
author: judith sonkho

title: Mvula Yamphamvu Yawononga Nyumba M’boma La Kasungu
news: Pamene nyengo ya mvula ikupitilira m’madera ambiri m’dziko muno, mvula yamphamvu yomwe yagwa usiku wathawu yawononga ndi kugwetsa nyumba zoposa zana limodzi m’dera la Sub TA Nthunduwala m’boma la Kasungu. Zina mwa nyumba zomwe zagwa mderalo Mfumu yaikulu Nthunduwala yatsimikiza za nkhaniyi poyankhulana ndi Radio Maria Malawi ndipo ati izi zachitika potsatira kusefukira kwa mtsinje wa Mavumbwe omwe umachokera mu nkhalango yotetezedwa ya Kasungu ndi kukathira mu mtsinje wa Lusa m’deralo. Iwo ati kuti midzi yomwe yakhudzidwa kwambiri ndi ya gulupu Nthunduwala, Zyambuli, Msalanyama komanso Bonya ndipo pali kuthekera koti mvula ikapitilira, midzi yomwe yayandikira mtsinjewu monga Chaminga, Chinzanda Chiwembe ndi Nkhulika ikhudzidwanso.  Pakadali pano mkulu wa nthambi yowona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi m’boma la Kasungu, a Tiwonge Msowoya atiuza kuti sanalandire lipoti lokhudza nkhaniyi koma atitsimikizira kuti akalandira lipotilo achitapo kanthu msanga pothandiza anthu omwe akhuzidwawo. Nthambi yowona za nyengo ndi kusintha kwa nyengo yachenjeza kuti mvula ya mphepo yowononga ifika m’dziko muno kuyambira lachisanu m’maboma ambiri a m’chigawo chakumwera ndipo apempha anthu omwe akukhala m’madera a kufupi ndi mitsinje komwe kumasefukira madzi kuti achoke msanga.
author: judith sonkho

title: Nduna Ipempha Anthu Aneneze Ochita Za Chinyengo Pogulitsa Chimanga ku ADMARC
news: Nduna yowona za malimidwe mdziko muno a Sam Kawale apempha anthu kuti akhale ndi udindo woneneza aliyense yemwe akuchita m’chitidwe wa chinyengo pa ntchito yogulitsa chimanga m’misika ya Agricultural Development and Marketing Corporation (ADMARC). Ndunayi yanena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pamene imafuna kudziwa njira zomwe boma lakhazikitsa pofuna kuthana ndi m’chitidwe wogulitsa chimanga kwa mavenda, omwe malinga ndi mphekesera, wakula m’misika ya Admarc. Anthu panja pa ADMARC kudikira kuti agule chimanga Ndunayi yapempha aliyense yemwe akugula chimanga ku ADMARC kuti akawona chokayikitsa chilichonse m’misikayi atsine khutu apolice kapena kukawaneneza ku bungwe lothana ndi m’chitidwe wa ziphuphu ndi katangale m’dziko muno la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB). “Titakhala kuti tonse tikutsatira ndondomeko bwinobwino kumagulitsa 25kg si bwenzi tikudandaula. Udindo owonetsetsa zimenezi uli mwa mafumu komaso ifeyo eni ake ogulafe chifukwa timachita kudziwa kuti uyu ndi venda koma timangokhala chete osakanena ku polisi palibe chingachitike,” anatero a Kawale. Iwo anati kulekelera m’chitidwewu ukuchitika kumatanthauzanso kuti munthuyo akutenga nawo mbali pochita za katangale kaamba koti akungoyang’anira mchitidwewu.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Walandira Makalata a Kazembe Watsopano wa Dziko la Mozambique ku Vatican
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walandira makalata a ukazembe kuchokera kwa kazembe watsopano woyimira dziko la Mozambique ku Vatican. Papa kulandira makalatawo kuchokera kwa a Domingos Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican, kazembe watsopanoyu ndi a Raúl Manuel Domingos omwe adaperekezedwa ku mwambowu ndi banja lawo. Pambuyo polandira makalatawa Papa Francisco adachita zokambirana ndi a Domingos m’kachipinda komata ndipo kenako awiriwa adasinthana mphatso. Papa pambuyo pa zokambirana zawo ndi a Domingos Atatha nkumano wake ndi Papa Francisco, kazembeyu adachitanso zokambirana ndi mlembi wamkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Cardinal Pietro Parolin komanso mlembi wa mkulu wa mu ofesi yowona za ubale wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika ndi maiko ena komanso ma bungwe osiyanasiyana, Archbishop Paul Richard Gallagher. Likulu la mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse la pansi lomwe ndi dziko loima pa lokha, lili pa ubale wa ukazembe ndi maiko 183.
author: judith sonkho

title: Otumikira Radio Maria Malawi ku Limbe Studio Achita M’bindikiro
news: Otumikira ku studio yaing’ono ya Radio Maria Malawi ya Limbe mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre, awapempha kuti moyo wawo ndi makhalidwe awo zidzigwirizana ndi uthenga omwe amakhala akufalitsa pamene akuwulutsa mawu pa wayilesi. Bambo John Enoch Kaliwamba, aku arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, ayankhula izi pambuyo pa m’bindikiro wa masiku awiri wa otumikira ku studio-yi umene unachitikira ku tchalitchi cha Our lady of the Eucharist chomwe chikupezeka mu mzinda Wa Blantyre. Otumikira ku studio ya Limbe pambuyo pa m’bindikiro Bambo Kaliwamba ati utumiki umayenda bwino ngati yemwe akufalitsa uthenga wabwino akuwonetsanso moyo wabwino. “Iyi ndi ntchito yosizyana ndi zina zonse munthu umayenera ulalikenso ndi moyo wako kuti zimene ukulalika zija anthu aziwona kuti ukuzichitanso ndiye uthenga umamveka bwino kwambiri. Ndiye mavolontiya pamene akupanga mapologalamu pa radio Maria Malawi moyo wawo udziwonetsa kuti ali mwa Yesu Khristu osangokhala oyankhula chabe ayi,” anatero bambo Kaliwamba. Poyankhulapo m’modiz mwa otumikira ku studio ya Limbe ya Radio Maria Malawi, a Elizabeth Malunga ati m’bindikirowu uwathandiza kuti pamene akutumikira Mulungu kudzera ku wailesiyi, moyo wawo udzifanana ndi zomwe akulalikira. “M’bindikiro umenewu watithandiza kutitsekula maso pa m’mene tizitumikilira Mulungu chifukwa bambo Kaliwamba atiuza kuti tikuyenera kukhala otekeseka pa utumiki wathu tisangotumikira Mulungu kuti anthu atwione ayi ndipo ndife anthu osinthika tsopano,” anatero a Malunga. M’bindikirowu unachitika lachisanu ndi loweruka ndipo unasonkhanitsa otumikira studio-yi okwana khumi ndi atatu.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Achinyamata Azichitira Umboni Chikhristu Chawo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walimbikitsa achinyamata a m’dziko la Britain kuti azichitira umboni chikhristu chao. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi mu uthenga wake kwa achinyamatawa omwe akuchita msonkhano wawo waukulu m’dzikolo. Mu uthengawu omwe wasayinidwa ndi mlembi wamkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika, Cardinal Pietro, Papa Francisco wauza achinyamatawa kuti monga akhristu, iwo akuyenera kumachita zinthu zosiyana ndi awo omwe samakhulupilira za Yesu Khristu. Iye wawatsimikizira kuti ali nawo pafupi kudzera m’mapemphero ndipo wati ndi pemphero lake kuti Mulungu awapatse madalitso ochuluka kudzera mu nkumano wawo. Papa Francisco wati akuyembekeza kuti kudzera mu miyambo yosiyanasiyana ya mapemphero yomwe ichitike iwathandiza kudzamitsa moyo wao wa uzimu ndi chikhulupiriro mwa Mulungu. Iye wati achinyamata akuyenera kukhala a changu poyankha kuyitana kwa Mulungu monga Amayi Maria adachitira. Papa Francisco wati achinyamata akuyenera kukhalanso anthu odziwa kupatsa, opilira, odziwa kukhululuka, okhulupirika, okonda kupemphera, olimbikira kuchita zabwino nthawi zonse ndi okonda anthu osauka. Iye watsiriza ndi kuyikiza achinyamata onse a m’dziko la Britain m’manja mwa Amayi Maria a ku malo oyera a Walsingham. Ena mwa alendo olemekezeka ku nkumanowu ndi Cardinal Luis Antonio Tagle yemwe ndu mkulu wa ofesi yaikulu ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican yowona za Chibalalitso cha mpingo.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Mzimu woyera Ndi Wofunika Pofalitsa Mthenga wa Chipumulutso
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Mzimu Woyera ndi bwenzi lenileni pa ntchito yofalitsa Uthenga wa Chipulumutso. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lero ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican. Patsikuli iye anasinkhasinkha mau opezeka mu Uthenga Wabwino monga adalembera Mateyu Woyera mutu wa 28 ndime ya 19 oti pitani ndi kukawalalikira anthu ndi kuwabatiza m’dzina la Atate ndi la Mwana ndi Mzimu Woyera. Iye wati monga Yesu Khristu adachitira pa nthawiyo akuchitanso chimodzimodzi kwa atumiki ake m’masiku ano ndi cholinga ndi choti anthu atalalikiridwa Uthenga Wabwino amudziwe ndi kumutsata Yesu’yo. Iye watsindika ntchito yaikulu ndi yotamandika yomwe Mzimu Woyera adagwira pakati pa akhristu oyamba aja maka pothandiza kuthetsa mavuto osiyana-siyana. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wati akhristu a lero akuyenera kumapempha chithandizo cha Mzimu Woyera pa mavuto osiyana-siyana omwe Mpingo ukukumana nao mmasiku ano a makono.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Malamulo a Mpingo wa Katolika Ndi Ogwirizana ndi Uthenga wa Chipulumutso
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati pali mgwirizano wa ukulu pakati pa malamulo a Mpingo wa Katolika ndi uthenga wa chipulumutso. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican pa nkumano wake ndi ansembe omwe amaweruza milandu yokhudza malamulo a mpingo wa Katolika. Iye wafotokoza kuti malamulo a mpingo otchedwa Canon Law sangakhalepo popanda kukamba za uthenga wa chipulumutso womwe Mpingo umalalika. Koma si pokhapo iye wati kungakhalenso kovuta kugwira ntchito yofalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso ndi kuifikitsa pake penipeni popanda malamulo a mpingowa. Iye walimbikitsa ansembewa kuti azikonda ntchito yao yoweruza milandu yokhudza malamulo a Mpingo ndipo pobwerekera mau a Papa Benedicto wa 16, Papa Francisco wati malamulo a Mpingo alipo pofuna kuonetsera akhristu chikondi, law is the condition of love. Iye wamaliza ndi kutsindika za kufunika komayendera limodzi ndi Mpingo wonse pamene akugwira ntchito yao. Mwa nkhani zina zomwe bwalo lalikulu loweruza milandu la ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika lodziwika kuti Roman Rota limaweruza ndi milandu yokhudza m’banja ndipo bwaloli limalandira milandu yosiyana-siyana kuchokera m’maiko osiyana-siyana.
author: judith sonkho

title: Tchalitchi cha Parishi ya Namitembo Chatsekedwa
news: Parishi ya Namitembo mu dayosizi ya Zomba yatsekedwa potsatira kusamvana komwe kunalipo pakati pa akhristu ndi ansembe pa parishiyo. Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za dayosiziyo Ambuye George Desmond Tambala omwenso ndi arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, atsimikiza za nkhaniyi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Ambuye Tambala: Tidzafunika kuti tikachidalitsenso tchalitchicho Iwo ati akhristu a parishiyi dzulo analetsa kuti Misa ya phulusa ichitike ndipo kwa nthawi yaitali akhristuwa akhala akukana kupereka zinthu zothandizira kuti chipembedzo chiyende bwino ngati mbali imodzi yolimbikitsira mpingo wodzidalira. “Nkhaniyi ndi yapakanthawi mwina miyezi inayi yapitayo. Iwo amafuna kuti ansembe amene ali kumeneko achoke chifukwa akhala akuwauza akhristu kuti adzigula zinthu zothandizira pa chipembedzo monga tonse tikudziwira za mpingo wodzidalira koma anthuwa akhala akukana ndiye ife tinawona kuti palibe chomwe ansembe alakwa ndipo palibe chifukwa chowachotserako. Tsopano dzulo, abale athuwo anapita ku tcahlitchilo kukaletsa kuti Misa isachitike zomwe zili zolakwika kwambiri ndiye Misa yakenso kukhala ya Phulusa zomwe zikutanthauza kuti amafuna kahristu kumeneko asayambe nyengo ya Lenti,” anatero Ambuye Tambala. Pamenepa Ambuye Tambala ati ayimitsa zochitika za pa tchalitchi lokhali koma mapemphero adzichitikabe m’matchalitchi ena omwe ali pansi pa parishiyi ndipo ati parishiyi idzatsekulidwanso pokhapokha episkopi adzachitenso mwambo wodalitsa tchalitchilo pambuyo pa kuthetsa kusamvana kwa mbali ziwirizi. Iwo anati, “Tatseka centre imeneyo yokha kuti sipadzichitikanso Misa koma m’matchalitchi ena Misa zidzichitikabe. Tizatsekulanso parishiyi pokhapokha tikazakambirana nawo ndipo asoyeza kuti amvetsa. Kutsekula kwake tidzafunika kuti tikachidalitsenso tchalitchicho chifukwa zomwe zachitikazi ndi zonyazitsa nyumba ya Mulungu.” Padakalipano iwo ati ansembe apitilira kukhala pa parishiyo ndipo awonetsetsa kuti chitetezo chawo chikhale chokhwima polumikizana ndi apolisi. Pamenepa Ambuye Tambala alangiza akhristu kuti apeze njira zoyenera zomwe zingathandize kuthetsa kusamvana komwe kungapezeke pakati pa iwo ndi ansembe awo.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wakhumudwa Ndi Kumangidwa Kwa Episkopi Mdziko La Nicaragua
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi kumangidwa kwa episkopi wa mpingowu m’dziko la Nicaragua, pa zifukwa za ndale. Poyankhula ku nyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace, Papa sanabise za kukhumudwa kwake pakumva za kumangidwa kwa episkopiyu Ambuye Rolando Álvarez. Bishop Alvarez Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa kumva kuti episkopiyu yemwe amamukonda kwambiri walamulidwa kukakhala ku ndende kwa zaka 26 koma si pokhapo, iye wati ndi wodandaulanso kuti anthu ena 222 kuphatikizapo ansembe ndi asemino alamulidwa kuti achoke m’dzikolo ati kaamba kofuna kuwukira dzikolo. Papa wapempha atsogoleri m’dzikolo kuti atsekule mitima yawo ndi kuchilimika pa ntchito yothetsa mavuto a m’dzikolo polimbikitsa mtendere, chilungamo komanso kukakambirana. Pamenepa iye wati akupemphelera onse omwe alamulidwa kuchoka m’dzikolo kupita m’dziko la America ndi ena onse omwe akuzunzidwa m’dzikolo pa zifukwa za ndale. Ulamuliro wa dzikolo omwe ndi wa nkhanza pansi pa President Daniel Ortega udamanga ndi kutsekera mu ndende anthu ankhaninkhani maka pamene dzikolo limakonzekera kuchita chisankho m’chaka cha 2001. Boma la dziko la Nicaragua lakhala likudzudzula mpingo wa Katolika m’dzikolo ponena kuti ndi umene wakhala ukolezera ziwonetsero zosonyeza kusakondwa ndi ulamuliro wa dzikolo. Mwa zina boma la dzikolo lidatsekera mu ndende ansembe, kulamula a mishonare kuti achoke, kutseka wayilesi za chi Katolika komanso kutseka sukulu ya ukachenjede ya mpingowu.
author: judith sonkho

title: Ophunzira Anjatidwa Atapezeka ndi Mankhwala a Chipatala
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dedza amanga asungwana awiri powaganizira kuti apezeka ndi mankhwala a chipatala popanda chilorezo.  Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Beatrice Jefita wati awiriwa Ivy Nkhata wa zaka 20 komanso Olivia Mazinga wa zaka 23 ndi ophunzira a pa St. John’s Institute for Health omwe anatumizidwa pa chipatala cha boma la Dedza kuti akachite maphunziro a ntchito yawo kwa miyezi itatu ndipo anabwelera ku sukulu pa 4 February chaka chino. Iye wati anthu ena anatsina khutu apolisi kuti awiriwa ali ndi mankhwala a chipatala ndipo atafufuza anapeza awiriwa ndi mankhwala ochuluka ndipo anawamanga pomwepo. “Tawapeza ndi mankhwala monga Amoxillin, Panado, Diclofenac, Brufen, Abendazole, Promethazine, Amitriptyline, Ciploflaxin, Getacin ndi ena,” anatero Sergeant Jefita. Padakalipano awiriwa akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu komwe akayankhe mlandu wopezeka ndi mankhwala a chipatala popanda chilorezo. Ivy amachokera ku Euthini mdera la mfumu yaikulu Chindi m’boma la Mzimba ndipo Olivia amachokera kwa Samama mdera la mfumu yaikulu Mponda m’boma la Mangochi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wathokoza Amayi Maria Kaamba Ka Ulendo Wopambana waku DRC, South Sudan
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wathokoza Amayi Maria kaamba ka ulendo wake wopambana wokacheza m’maiko a Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) ndi South Sudan. Atangofika pa bwalo la ndege la Fiumicino ku Rome pa ulendo wake wopambana wochokera m’maiko a DRC ndi South Sudan, Papa Francisco anapita ku tchalitchi chachikulu cha Amayi Maria chotchedwa Basilica of Saint Mary Major kapena kuti Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore mu chitaliyana. Papa kupemphera pambuyo pa ulendo wake waku DRC Malinga ndi ofesi yofalitsa nkhani ku Vatican, ali mu tchalitchili Papa Francisco anathokoza Amayi Maria kaamba komuteteza pa ulendo wake wosayiwalika ndipo wopambana wokacheza m’maiko a Democratic Republic of Congo ndi South Sudan. Zadziwika kuti iye anachita mapemphero pafupi ndi chithunzi cha Amayi Maria dzina lake Maria Salus Populi Romani kutanthauza kuti mtetezi ndi moyo wabwino wa anthu a mu mzinda wa Rome. Lolemba sabata yatha kutangotsala tsiku limodzi kuti ayambe ulendo wokacheza m’maiko a ku Africa Papa Francisco adapitanso ku tchalitchili kukapemphera ndi kupempha chitetezo cha Amayi Maria. Aka si koyamba kuti Papa Francisco apemphe chitetezo cha Amayi Maria. Nthawi zonse asananyamuke kupita ku maiko ena amapita ku tchalitchili kukapemphera ndi kupempha chitetezo ndipo akabwerako amachitanso chimodzimodzi kukathokoza.
author: judith sonkho

title: Chakwera Wasankha Nduna Zatsopano Zocheperako
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wasankha nduna zake zatsopano zomwe zilipo 23 ndi achiwiri kwa nduna okwana anayi. Malinga ndi chikalata chomwe chasayinidwa ndi mlembi wamkulu wa boma mayi Colleen Zamba, ena mwa omwe achotsedwa pa mndandanda wa kale wa ndunazi ndi monga a Gospel Kazako, a Timothy Mtambo, a Eisenhower Mkaka, a Mark Katsonga komanso mayi Patricia Kaliati. Nkhope zatsopano pa mndandandawu ndi a Moses Kumkuyu omwe asankhidwa kukhala nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani, a Ken Zikhale Ng’oma omwe asankhidwa kukhala nduna yowona za chitetezo cha mdziko, a Simplex Chithyola omwe ndi nduna yowona za malonda ndi mafakitale, komanso a Uchizi Mkandawire omwe asankhidwa kukhala nduna yowona za masewero ndi achinyamata. Nkhope zatsopano pa mndandanda wa achiwiri kwa nduna ndi a Owen Chomanika omwe asankhidwa kukhala wachiwiri kwa nduna yowona za maboma aang’ono, mgwirizano wa mdziko ndi za chikhalidwe komanso a Liana Kakhobwe Chapota omwe ndi wachiwiri kwa nduna yowona za madzi ndi ukhondo. Padakalipano mayi Monica Chang’anamuno asankhidwa kukhala nduna yowona za migodi, a Deus Gumba asankhidwa kukhala nduna yowona za malo, mayi Madalitso Kambauwa Wirima asankhidwa kukhala nduna yowona za maphunziro, a Micheal Usi asankhidwa kukhala nduna za chilengedwe ndi kusintha kwa nyengo, a Richard Chimwendo Banda asankhidwa kukhala nduna yowona za maboma aang’ono,mgwirizano komanso za chikhalidwe, mayi Vera Kamtukule asankhidwa kukhala nduna yowona zokopa anthu, mayi Jean Sendeza asankhidwa kukhala nduna yowona za kusasiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo, mayi Agnes Nyalonje asankhidwa kukhala nduna yowona za ntchito ndipo maunduna ena onse ali monga analili poyamba.
author: judith sonkho

title: Uthenga Wa Msonkho Ukhale Mziyankhulo Zomveka – Kumwenda
news: Bungwe lotolera msonkho mdziko muno alipempha kuti lilimbikitse ntchito yofotokozera anthu nkhani zokhudza misonkho kudzera mu ziyankhulo zomwe a Malawi ambiri amayankhula. Pempholi labwera pamene bungwe la Malawi Revenue Authority (MRA) limakumbukira tsiku loganizira nkhani za msonkho pa dziko lonse pa mwambo omwe unachitikira mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Poyankhula pa mwambowu wapampando wa bungweli Vizenge Kumwenda anati ngakhale akuyamikira bungweli kuti lakwanitsa kutolera ndalama zoposa muyezo omwe boma linawapatsa, pali mbali zina zomwe zikusawutsa ntchito yotolera msonkho monga kusamvetsa kwa anthu za udindo wawo popereka msonkho komanso kuzemvetsa katundu ochokera kunja mu zipata za bungweli. Bizwick: Zatipatsa chilimbikitso Motero a Kumwenda ati chofunika ndi kulimbikitsa mtundu wa anthu kudziwa kufunika kupereka msonkho ku boma maka pomwe ana ali aang’ono. “Ndili okondwa kaamba koti MRA inayambitsa phunziro lapadera lokhudza nkhani za msonkho msukulu za mdziko muno zomwe zithandize m’bado ukubwerawo kudziwa nkhani za misonkho komanso mpikisanowu omwe sukulu za sekondale za m’mizinda ikulu ikulu ya Blantyre ndi Lilongwe akuchita popikisana mafunso okhuza msonkho, ndi othandiza kwambiri. Ndipemphe kuti mpikisanowu upitilire m’sukulu zonse za mdziko muno ndi cholinga choti ophunzira azilimbikira phunziroli,” anatero a Kumwenda Naye mkulu wa bungweli a John Biziwick anati ndi okondwa kaamba koti ogwira ntchito ku bungweli akulimbikira ntchito monga kukwanitsa kutolera ndalama za nkhani nkhani ngakhale dziko lino likukumana ndi mavuto a zachuma ndipo anati apitiriza kupeza njira zosiyanasiyana zomwe zingapititse patsogolo ukadaulo wotolera ndalama za misonkho. Pa mwambowu ena mwa ogwira ntchito ku bungweli analandira ma satifiketi osonyeza kuti agwira ntchito yotamandika mu zaka zomwe akhala akutumikira ku bungweli. Bungwe la MRA lakwanitsa kutolera ndalama zikwana 1.14 trillion-kwacha zomwe ndi zoposera mulingo omwe boma kudzera ku unduna wa za chuma linawapatsa.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Anthu Kukonza Ubale Wawo ndi Mulungu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati tsiku lililonse ndi mwayi wa ukulu wofunika kuwugwiritsa ntchito pokonza ubale ndi Mulungu. Iye amayankhula izi kwa anthu omwe adasonkhanamu Hall ya Papa Paulo wa 6 komanso ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Iye wati Yesu Khristu anabwera pansi pano kudzalalikira Uthenga wa Chipulumutso kwa anthu osauka, ophsinjika ndi ena ndipo zonsezi adazichita mokondwa ndi modzipereka. Papa Francisco wati Yesu Khristu adawonetseratu kuti Uthenga wa Chipulumutso si chinthu chomwe munthu akungoyenera kungosunga koma akuyenera kugawana ndi ena ndipo akuyenera kuchita izi mokondwa monga adali kuchitira Yesu Khristu. Iye wati Uthenga wa Chipulumutso wa Yesu Khristu ndi uthenga womwe ukuyenera kuperekedwa kwa ena mokondwa chifukwa ndi uthenga womwe ukuyenera kumasula anthu ku magoli osiyana-siyana. Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kumayamika Mulungu kaamba ka mphatso ya mtengo wa patali ya chikhululukiro koma yomwe ndi ya ulere. Iye watsiriza ndi kunena kuti Mulungu ndi tate wa chifundo yemwe nthawi zonse amakhala wokonzeka kukhululukira onse omwe amafika pa maso pake modzikhuthula ndi kupempha chiyanjano.
author: judith sonkho

title: Ambuye Stima Adandaula ndi Chikunja Msukulu za Katolika
news: Lachinayi m’mawa episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi Ambuye Montfort Stima anayendera mwadzidzidzi sukulu za St. Augustine 1, 2 ndi 3 zomwe zikupezeka pa tawuni ya Mangochi. Malinga ndi Ambuye Stima, cholinga choyendera sukuluyi chinali chofuna kuwona momwe sukuluzi zikuchitira pa kayendetsedwe kake potsatira mgwirizano omwe unachitika pakati pa mipingo ya chikhristu ndi chipembedzo cha chisilamu mu mwezi wa June m’chaka cha 2021 potengera zipolowe zomwe zinabuka m’chaka cha 2020 pa nkhani yokhudza chovala hijab. Bishop Stima kuyendera St. Augustine 1 Mwazina, mu mgwirizanowu munali nkhani zakuti ophunzira adziloredwa komanso asakakamizidwe kuvala hijab pa nthawi ya maphunziro, mphunzitsi wamkulu adzikhala wa chipembedzo chomwe chikuyendetsa sukuluyo, sukulu idzikhala ndi zizindikiro zosonyeza mwini wa sukuluyo komanso kuti pazipempheredwa mapemphero a chipembedzo chomwe chikuyendetsa sukuluyo. Poyankhula atatsiriza kuyendera sukuluzi iwo ati ndi okhumudwa kuti sukuluzi zilibe zizindikiro zosonyeza kuti ndi za mpingo wa Katolika. Iwo anati ali ndi zomvetsanso chisoni kuti ophunzira msukulu-zi akuyamba maphunziro opanda kuchita mapemphero zomwe sizikusiyanitsa sukulu za mpingowu ndi zina zachikunja. Ambuye Stima (kumanja) bambo Namame (pakati) komanso a Masamba “Sukulu zathu zimadziwika ndi zikwangwani zolembedwa bwino zosonyeza umwini wathu, mu ofesi mwa ahedi mukhale chithunzi cha a Papa kapena bishop, m’makalasi monse mukhale mitanda komanso pa sukulupo pazipempheredwa tsiku ndi tsiku. Koma apa ndawona kuti m’sukulu zonse mulibe zimenezi. Nkhawa yanga ndi yakuti ngati zimenezi zikuchitika msukulu zomwe zili pafupi ndi ine ndiye kulili bwanji sukulu zomwe zili kutali, mwinatu kumeneko ndi zachikunja zokhazokha,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Poyankhulapo mphunzitsi wamkulu pa sukulu ya St. Augustine 2 a Phillimon Imwa anati izi zachitika kaamba ka kungolekelera chabe ndipo anati akonza zinthuzi mwansanga. Imwa: Tikonza ndipo zikhala m’malo mwake “Tinangotayilira chabe koma lero lomwe ndikumana ndi a komiti ndipo kuyambira mawa tikhala kuti tayamba kupemphera pa nzere komanso zina zonse za mitanda ndi zina tikonza zikhala m’malo mwake,” anatero a Imwa. Koma wachiwiri kwa wachiwiri kwa mphunzitsi wamkulu pa sukulu ya St. Augustine 3 mayi Mary Kachoka akuti vutoli ladza kaamba ka kusowa kwa mgwirizano pakati pa aphunzitsi ndi anthu a midzi yozungulira. Iwo anati, “Sukulu yathuyi ndiye simawonekadi kuti ndi ya Katolika chifukwa cha kusowa kwa ubale wabwino pakati pa ife aphunzitsi ndi anthu a kudera. Koma tsopano tikonza ndipo zonse ziyamba kuyenda bwino.” Mkulu owona za maphunziro mu dayosizi ya Mangochi a Felix Masamba anati vutoli ladza kaamba ka kusinthasintha kwa aphunzitsi aakulu omwenso akuti samapereka kwa aphunzitsi anzawo mauthenga omwe alandira kuchoka ku mpingo. Ena mwa aphunzitsi a pa St. Augustine 3 omwe anali nawo pa mkumanowo “Mahedi akumasinthasintha ndiye zikuwonekanso kuti tikakhala nawo m’mikumano kuwauza zochota samapita ndi kukawauza aphunzitsi anzawo zomwe takambirana,” anatero a Masamba. Dayosizi ya Mangochi yomwe imapangidwa ndi maboma a Mangochi, Balaka ndi mbali ina ya boma la Machinga, ili ndi sukulu za pulaimale zoposa 270 komanso za sekondale zoposa 30.
author: judith sonkho

title: Bungwe la Tobacco Commission Lati Alimi Apindula Koposa Chaka Chino
news: Ngati njira imodzi yowonetsetsa kuti alimi a fodya apindula chaka chino ndi ulimi wawo, bungwe loyang’anira ulimi ndi malonda a fodya m’dziko muno la Tobacco commission (TC) lakangalika kuyenda m’madera osiyanasiyana kukumana ndi magulu okhudzidwa pa nkhani ya malonda a fodya pomwe masiku otsekulira misika ya fodya akuyandikira. Bungweli lati lili ndi chiyembekezo choti alimi a fodya m’dziko muno apeza phindu lochuluka pa malonda awo a chaka chino. Mlimi kuwonetsa fodya wake Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za bungweli a Telephorus Chigwenembe wati bungweli pano lili m’kati mochititsa mikumano ndi adindo osiyanasiyana okhudzidwa ndi nkhaniyi kuphatikizapo alimi eni ake pofuna kukhazikitsa mtengo woyambira maka polingalira ndalama zochuluka zomwe alimiwa alowetsa mu ulimi wa chaka chino, potsatira kukwera mtengo kwa zipangizo za ulimi. A Chigwenembe anati, “Alimiwa amagwira ntchito yaikulu pokonza minda mwawo, kusamala mbewu mpaka kukolora, zomwe zikuwonetseratu kuti mulimi sagona pantchito yake. Kuwonjezera pamenepo zipangizo za ulimi zakwera mtengo kwambiri chaka chino feteleza, mbewu, mankhwala ndi zina mwazipangizo zomwe alimiwa amagwiritsa ntchito pa ulimi wawo. Ndiye padakalipano takangalika kuyenda madera osiyanasiyana pamodzi ndi bungwe la Aret pofuna kudziwonera tokha ndalama zomwe alimiwa alowetsa minda mwao munyengo ya ulimi ya chaka chino. Poyankhulapo katswiri pa nkhani za Ulimi m’dziko muno a Lenard Chimwaza ati adindo ndi atengambali omwe amayendetsa zaulimi ndi malonda a fodya akuyenera kuwonetsetsa kuti fodya chaka chino sakugulidwa pa mitengo yotsika kaamba koti zipangizo zaulimi zakwera mitengo kwambiri. Ndikukhulupilira kuti mikumano yomwe bungwe la Tobacco Commission likuchititsa m’madera osiyanasiyana ithandiza kuyankha nkhawa za alimiwa. Tikupempha bungweli kuti likhale ndi chidwi chomvetsera ndalama zomwe alimiwa alowetsa pofuna kuwonetsetsa kuti mitengo yomwe ingakhazikitsidwe ikhale yokomera ndi kupindulitsa alimiwa,” anatero a Chimwaza. Zotsatira za kawuniwuni woyamba wofufuza kuchuluka kwa fodya yemwe walimidwa chaka chino zikuyembekezeka kutulutsidwa m’sabata zikudzazi zomwe zithandizire kupereka chithunzithunzi cha kuchuluka kwa fodya yemwe walimidwa chaka chino m’dziko muno.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Amayi, Asungwana AKuyenera Kutetezedwa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati asungwana ndi amayi akuyenera kutetezedwa. Iye amayankhula izi lachinayi m’mawa ku nyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace kwa nthumwi za ku msonkhano wokambirana za kufunika kwa mgwirizano pakati pa amayi a zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana, Women Building a Culture of Encounter Interreligiously. Kupatula kuwateteza, iye watsindika za kufunika kochilimika potukula miyoyo yawo. Papa Francisco wayamikira amayi omwe akuchita nawo msonkhanowu kaamba ka kudzipereka kwawo pa ntchito yowonetsetsa kuti amayi sakuponderezedwa, powonetsa chidwi pa nkhani yolimbikitsa mtendere komanso ngakhale udindo wa amayi mu zipembedzo zosiyana-siyana. Iye wati zimenezi ndi zochititsa chidwi kaamba koti si chinthu cha pafupi kusonkhanitsa pamodzi amayi a zipembedzo zoposa khumi ndi kumakambirana nkhani ngati izi. Msonkhanowu omwe udayamba lachitatu pa 25 January wafika ku mapeto lachisanu pa 27 January. Bungwe la amayi a mpingo wa Katolika la World Union of Catholic Women’s Organisations (WUCWO) ndi lomwe lidakonza msonkhanowu mogwirizana ndi ofesi yaikulu ku Vatican yowona za ubale wa mpingo wa Katolika ndi zipembedzo zina ya Dicastery for Interreligious Dialogue.
author: judith sonkho

title: BOMA LIPEMPHA KHONSOLO YA BOMA LA MANGOCHI KUCHOTSA DZALA LOMWE LILI PASUKULU YA ST AUGUSTINE 3.
news:
A Bande kuyendera mjigo pasukulu ya St Augustine 3 Mjigo omwe ophunzira apasukulu ya St Augustine 3 amagwiritsa ntchito Dzala lomwe lili pafupi ndi Sukulu ya St Augustine 3 Wachiwiri wa nduna yowona za madzi ndi ukhondo a John Bande apempha khonsolo ya boma la Mangochi kuti ichotse mwansanga dzala lomwe lili pafupi ndi sukulu ya St. Augustine 3 m’bomalo.
A Bande ayankhula izi lolemba pa ulendo wawo oyendera sukulu zosiyanasiyana ndi kuwona nkhani za ukhondo ngati njira imodzi yolimbana ndi matenda a Kolera.
Iwo ati ndi okhumudwa kwambiri kuwona kuti pafupi ndi sukuluyi pali dzala lalikulu komanso kuti pa sukuluyi ophunzira akumwa madzi a pa Mjigo zomwe ati zikupereka chiwopsezo ku miyoyo ya ophunzira pa sukuluyi ku matenda a Kolera komanso ena odza kaamba kosowa ukhondo wabwino.
‘Pano pa St Augustine 3 zinthu sizili bwino, madzi omwe akumwa ana athu siabwino chifukwa madzi ammipopi alibe akudalira a pa mjigo komanso wawandikana ndi dzala lomwe lakhala zaka ndi zaka lomwe lingathe kuononga miyoyo ya ana athu ndiye tikusiya nkhaniyi mmanja mwa komiti yapasukulu pano. Tikupemphanso ofesi ya Khonsolo ya boma la Mangochi kuti lichotse dzala limeneli mwansanga.’ Anatero a Bande
Poyankhapo mkulu woyang’anira nkhani zamaphunziro mu khonsolo ya boma la Mangochi a Rabson Kawalala ati ndi okhumudwa kwambiri ndi mmene zinthu zilili pa sukuluyi ndipo walonjeza kuti ayesetsa kuti akonze malowa mwansanga.
‘Leroli tiyesetsa kuti tikhale pansi ndipo tichotse zimenezi, ndipo tiyesetsa kukhazikitsa njira zoti izi zisadzachitikenso. Sukuluyi ikukumana ndimavuto enanso monga anthu amaonongera mmakalasi pena kuchotsanso zitseko chifukwa sulkuluyi siyili mumpanda‘ Anatero a Kawalala
Naye Mayor wa khonsolo ya tawuni ya Mangochi Khansala Imani Chisuse wati ayesetsa kukonza pa malowa pochotsa zinyalala zonse ndi kupeza malo ena otayirako zinyalalazi.
‘Tavomerezana nazo zomwe atiuza ndipo mawa tichotsa, tili ndi malo ena omwe tinagula koma sitinakonzeko ndiye mwina ntaya ukakhala kumeneko.’ Anatero Meyayu. Unduna owona zamadzi ndi ukhondo ukuyendera sukulu zosiyanasiyana za m’boma la Mangochi ngati njira imodzi yofuna kulimbana ndi matenda a Kolera omwe ati avuta kwambiri m’bomalo.
Pofika lamulungu anthu oposa 5,000 ndi omwe apezeka ndipo 93 ndi omwe amwalira ndi matenda a Kolera m’bomalo.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Watsindika za Kufunika Kwa Mgwirizano Pakati pa Mayiko
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kwa mgwirizano pakati pa maiko. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lolemba ku Vatican pa mkumano wake ndi a kazembe oyimira maiko awo ku Vatican. Kumayambiliro a chaka chilichonse, Papa amachita mkumano ndi a kazembe oyimira maiko awo ku Vatican ndipo amayankhulapo pa nkhani zikulu-zikulu zokhudza dziko lonse la pansi, state of the world address. Poyankhula kunyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace, iye watsindika za kufunika kwa mgwirizano pakati pa maiko ngati njira yothanirana ndi nkhondo komanso mikangano yopanda pake pakati pa maiko. Iye watchula monga nkhondo pakati pa maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine komanso kusamvana pakati pa maiko a Israel ndi Palestina osaiwala mikangano m’maiko osiyana-siyana ku Africa. Papa Francisco sanabise mawu podzudzula m’chitidwe wopha anthu ngati chilango pa milandu yosiyanasiyana, ndipo wati m’chitidwewu ukuyenera kuthetsedwa. Iye wayankhula ndi kudzudzulanso m’chitidwe wochotsa pakati omwe wati ndi oyipa kwambiri. Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwanso ndi kukula kwa m’chitidwe wopanga zida zoopsa za nyukiliya omwe wati ukuyika miyoyo ya anthu ambiri pa chiopsezo. Pamenepa iye wati maiko akuyenera kuchilimika polimbikitsa mtendere. Papa Francisco wapempha maiko kuti alimbikitse maphunziro pakati pa akazi ndi amuna popanda kukondera kwina kulikonse ndipo wati ndi kulakwa kulamula kuti akazi sakuyenera kupita ku sukulu monga zikuchitikira m’dziko la Afghanistan. Iye watsiriza ndi kuyankhulapo pa za kufunika kothandiza anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana komanso watsindika za kufunika kosamala chilengedwe. Likulu la mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse lomwe ndi dziko loyima pa lokha, liri pa ubale wa ukazembe ndi maiko 183.
author: judith sonkho

title: Boma Lipempha Anthu aku Mangochi Agwiritse Ntchito Madzi Otetezeka Popewa Kolera
news: Boma lapempha anthu a m’boma la Mangochi kuti adzimwa madzi otetezeka omwe bungwe la Southern Region Water Board likupereka m’bomalo ndi cholinga chofuna kupewa matenda a Kolera omwe akuti avuta kwambiri m’bomalo. Wachiwiri kwa nduna yowona za madzi ndi ukhondo a John Bande anena izi pambuyo poyendera zina mwa ntchito zomwe bungwe lopereka madzi la Southern Region Water Board likugwira m’bomalo. Bande (kumanja) kufotokozera za ukhondo pa madzi Poyendera ntchitozi, iwo anayenderanso ina mwa mijigo ina ndipo anapempha a bungwe la SRWB kuti atunge ndi kuyeza madziwa zomwe zinawonetsa kuti madziwa ndi osatetezeka. “Kuno kuli madzi osiyanasiyana ndiye madzi ena si abwino moti anthu akuyenera kumamwa madzi aku water board chifukwa ndi omwe ali oyenera; muli mankhwala okwanira komanso ndi madzi amene ali abwino kwambiri,” anatero a Bande. Iwo ati ndizokhumudwitsa kuona kuti anthu ambiri m’bomali amadalira madzi a mmijigo kapena zitsime zomwe ndi zosatetezeka pomwe madzi abwino komanso otsika mtengo alipo.   Poyankhulapo mkulu wa bungweli m’boma la Mangochi a Duncan Chambamba anati bungwe lawo ndi lokonzeka kupereka madzi abwino kwa wina aliyense amene angafune kukhala ndi madzi abwino apampope. Madzi athu si odhula ayi. Kumangilira madzi m’manyumba ndi kwa ulere koma kulipira ndiye kumatengera momwe akugwiritsira madziwo,” anatero a Chambamba. Iwo anati anthu omwe sangakwanitse kukhala ndi madzi mnyumba mwawo angathe kugwirizana ndi kupita kukapempha k bungweli kuti liwapatse kiosk.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Akupemphelera Amayi M’maiko a Russia, Ukraine
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati akupemphelera amayi a m’maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine omwe ana awo adafa ku nkhondo pakati pa maiko awiriwa. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lamulungu ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican pambuyo potsogolera kunena pemphero la Uthenga wa Mnjelo kwa Amayi Maria ndipo wapempha anthu onse kuti azichitanso chimodzimodzi makamaka popemphera kuti nkhondoyi yomwe yaphetsa ndi kusautsa anthu ankhaninkhani ithe. Nkhondo pakati pa maiko awiriwa yomwe tsopano yatha pafupifupi chaka yabweretsa mavuto a nkhaninkhani pakati pa anthu a m’dziko la Ukraine monga kusowa kwa chakudya, madzi a ukhondo, kusowa kwa magetsi, chisamaliro chabwino cha ku chipatala koma si pokhapo nkhondoyi yabweretsanso mavuto a njala m’maiko ena komanso kukwera kwa mitengo ya zakudya monga buledi maka m’maiko omwe amadalira ufa wa tirigu wochokera m’dziko la Ukraine. Kuyambira pa chiyambi Papa Francisco wakhala akudzudzula nkhondo pakati pa maiko awiriwa ndipo wakhala akutumiza thandizo losiyanasiyana lopita kwa anthu a m’dziko la Ukraine monga zipangizo za m’chipatala komanso galimoto za mtundu wa ambulance.
author: judith sonkho

title: Chipani cha MCP Chakana za Chikalata Chosankha Nduna
news: Chipani cha Malawi Congress (MCP) chatsutsa za chikalata china chomwe chikuwonetsa mayina a anthu omwe chipanichi chikuwavomereza kuti mtsogoleri wa dziko lino awayike m’maunduna osiyanasiyana. Mneneri wa chipanichi m’busa Maurice Munthali wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti chikalatachi sichinachokere ku chipanichi. Gawo limodzi la chikalata chomwe chikuyenda m’masamba a mchezo Iwo ati chipanichi chilibe mphamvu yolowelera pa ntchito yosankha maunduna kaamba koti malamulo a dziko lino amapereka mphamvu zotere kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko yekha. “Ife chikalata chimenecho sitikuchidziwa ndipo chachokera kwa anthu osalifunira zabwino dziko komanso chipanic chathu. Ife ngati a chipani tilibe mphamvu zosankha nduna chifukwa imeneyo ndi ntchito ya mtsogoleri wa dziko,” anatero a Munthali. Padakalipano a Munthali ati ndi kofunika kuti magulu a zachitetezo agwire ntchito yawo yofufuza ndi kumanga onse omwe akukhudzidwa ndi chikalatachi. Masiku ochepa apitawa m’masamba apa mchezo pa intaneti anadzadza ndi chikalata chosonyeza kuti wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino watula pansi udindo wake chomwe akuluakulu a boma anati ndi cha bodza ndipo apolisi ati akufufuza za nkhaniyi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Yesu Anabwera Kudzachotsa M’dima Pakati Pa Anthu – Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Yesu Khristu adabwera pansi pano kudzachotsa m’dima pakati pa anthu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa  wayankhula izi lachisanu pa Misa ya chaka cha Epifania yomwe adatsogolera ku Vatican. Malinga ndi kalendala ya chipembedzo ya mpingo wa Katolika, lachisanu pa 6 January 2023 ndi  tsiku la chaka cha Epifania. Mu malaliko ake pa Misa ya chakachi yomwe adatsogolera mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica, Papa wati Yesu Khristu adabwera pansi pano kudzachotsa m’dima pakati pa anthu ndi kubweretsa kuwala. Iye wati ndi kofunika kuti monga a nzeru a ku m’mawa aja omwe sadatope kufunafuna mwana Yesu mpaka atamupeza, akhristu akuyeneranso kumafunafuna Yesu Khristu yemwe ndi kuwala kwa dziko la pansi. Papa Francisco wati nthawi zina pamene anthu azingwa ndi zolemetsa za dziko la pansi amafunafuna Mulungu komanso pali nthawi zina pamene anthu amazinamiza pofunafuna chisangalalo mu zinthu za dziko la pansi. Iye watsindika kuti ndi Yesu Khristu yekha amene angathe kuthetsa njala yosiyanasiyana yomwe anthu amakhala nayo. Papa Francisco wati popanda kuyika Yesu Khristu patsogolo palibe chomwe chingayende. Pochita chaka cha Epifania, akhristu amakondwelera kuti Mulungu adadziwonetsa kwa anthu ake kudzera mwa mwana wake m’modzi yekha yemwe adadzabadwa pakati pa anthu. Koma si pokhapo, pochita chakachi akhristu amalingalira ulendo wa a nzeru a ku m’mawa omwe adapita kukapembedza mwana Yesu atatenga mphatso zawo za mtengo wa patali.
author: judith sonkho

title: Maboma 15 Ali Pa Chiwopsezo Cha Kusefukira Kwa Madzi
news: Nthambi yowona za nyengo ndi kusintha kwa nyengo yati maboma khumi ndi asanu a mdziko muno ali pa chiwopsezo cha ngozi ya kusefukira kwa madzi. Mkulu wofalitsa mauthenga ku nthambiyi a Yobu Kachiwanda awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti izi zili chomwechi kaamba ka mvula yamphamvu yomwe ikuyembekezeka kugwa kuyambira lero lachisanu pa 6 mpaka mawa loweruka pa 7 January 2023. Maboma-wa ndi a Mulanje, Chikwawa, Neno, Mwanza, Blantyre, Ntcheu, Dedza, Lilongwe, Mchinji, Zomba, Mangochi, Salima, Likoma, Chitipa ndi Karonga. “Tikuyembekezera kuti kugwa mvula yambiri kuyambira lero pa 6 mpaka pa 7 January 2023 ndiye mvula imeneyi ndi yomwe ili ndi kuthekera kobweretsa vuto la kusefukira kwa madzi m’maboma amene tatchulawa,” anatero a Kachiwanda. Padakalipano nthambiyi yalangiza anthu kuti akhale osamala popewa kukhala malo a ngozi komanso kuwoloka mitsinje ndi malo onse omwe akudutsa madzi, pofuna kupewa ngozi zomwe zimadza kaamba ka kusefukira kwa madzi.
author: judith sonkho

title: ‘Malemu Papa Benedicto wa 16 Adali Bwenzi Lenileni la Yesu’
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati malemu Papa Benedicto wa 16 adali bwenzi lenileni la Yesu Khristu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa Francisco wayankhula izi lachinayi ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican pa Misa yotsanzikana ndi malemu Papa Benedicto wa 16. Mu malaliko ake, Papa Francisco anati malemu Papa Benedicto wa 16 adali bwenzi lenileni lokhulupirika la Yesu Khristu ndipo wati pa chifukwa ichi ndi pemphero lake kuti akondwere kosatha mu ufumu wa Mulungu. Malemu Papa Benedict wa 16 (kumanzere) ndi Papa Francisko Papa Francisco anakhazikika pa mawu otsiriza omwe Ambuye Yesu adayankhula akuti, “Atate m’manja mwanu ndipereka mzimu wanga.” Iye anati mauwa akupereka chithunzithunzi cha moyo wonse wa Ambuye Yesu pansi pano omwe udali wodalira Atate ake nthawi zonse komanso wothandiza anthu mu njira zosiyanasiyana pa kuwachiza ku nthenda zosiyana-siyana, kuwadalitsa, kuwadzodza, kuwachitira chifundo ndi zina. Papa Francisco anati zomwe adachita Ambuye Yesu ali pansi pano ndi zomwe mkhristu wina aliyense akuyenera kutsanzira. Iye anati m’busa wabwino akuyenera kukhala wokhulupirika pochita mapemphero tsiku ndi tsiku ngakhale akumane ndi zokhoma za mtundu uliwonse komanso pa nthawi yomweyo akuyenera kumapemphelera mbumba ya Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati Papa Benedicto wa 16 adachita zonse bwino polondola mapazi a Yesu Khristu chinthu chomwe wati mkhristu aliyense akuyenera kutsanzira. Pa Misa’yi padali ansembe pafupifupi 4000, ma cardinal 130, a episkopi, asisitere, a bulazala, asemino, a Katekisiti komanso akhristu eni ake ankhaninkhani ochokera mbali zosiyana-siyana za dziko la pansi. Nawo atsogoleri a maiko, a kazembe oyimira maiko awo ku Vatican ndi akuluakulu ogwira ntchito zosiyana-siyana anali nawonso pa mwambowo.
author: judith sonkho

title: Achipatala Atatu Ayimitsidwa Ntchito Atapezeka Ndi Mankhwala Popanda Chilorezo
news: Akuluakulu atatu ogwira ntchito pa chipatala chachikulu cha boma la Phalombe, awayimitsa kaye pa ntchito atapezeka ndi mankhwala komanso katundu wina wa chipatalacho opanda chilorezo. Wofalitsa nkhani pa chipatalacho Daniel Chiromo, watsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo wati anthuwa apezeka ndi katunduyu pamene amatuluka pa chipata cha chipatalacho. Chipatala cha boma la Phalombe Iye wati anthuwa apezeka ndi majakiseni, chitini cha mkaka komanso botolo la mankhwala a madzi. “Tinakhazikitsa lamulo lakuti aliyense ogwira ntchito kuno akamatuluka adzichitidwa chipikisheni posatengera udindo wake. Patsikuli, m’modzi anapezeka ndi majakiseni okwana 100, wina anapezeka ndi chitin cha mkaka ndipo wina anapezeka ndi botolo la mankhwala a madzi; ndikukhulupilira kuti anapempha kuti akapatse mwana koma mwina chifukwa analibe chikalata chomuvomereza kutero,” anatero a Chiromo. Mkulu woyankhulira chipatalayu wati padakalipano anthu atatuwa ayamba ayimitsidwa kaye pa ntchito ndi cholinga choti awafufuze bwino lomwe.
author: judith sonkho

title: MLS Sikukhutira Ndi Lipoti Lokhudza Kumangidwa Kwa Mayi Chizuma
news: Bungwe la Malawi Law Society lati silikukhutira ndi lipoti lomwe latulutsa komiti yapadera yomwe inakhazikitsidwa ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko lino kuti ifufuze za kumangidwa kwa mkulu wa bungwe la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) mayi Martha Chizuma. Mlembi wamkulu wa bungweli a Chrispin Ngunde awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti chinthu chomwe komitiyi yatulutsa, si lipoti lokwanira kaamba koti muli ma gawo ena omwe sanawonetsedwe. Ngunde: Lipotilo lituluke lonse Pamenepa iwo auza mtsogoleri wa dziko lino komanso akuluakulu amene anali mu komitiyi kuti atulutse lipoti lonse lokwanira monga likuyenera kukhalira ngati akufuna kuti anthu akhale ndi chikhulupiliro mwa iwo. “Lipoti lomwe atipatsa likungowoneka kuyambira tsamba 50 kupita kutsogolo nanga tsamba 1 mpaka 49 ali kuti? Ndiye tikufuna apulezidenti alamule kuti lipotilo lituluke lonse chifukwa lomwe atipatsali si lipoti koma ndi gawo la lipoti. Mwina masamba omwe palibewo ndi momwe muli nkhani zofunikira,” anatero a Ngunde. Poyankhulaponso pa nkhaniyi katswiri pa nkhani zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno a Humphreys Mvula ati ndi zodabwitsa kuti lipotili silikupereka tsatanetsatane wa za omwe analamula kuti mayi Chizuma amangidwe. “Lipoti inde latuluka tiyamikire koma silikuwonetsa kuti anthu eni eni amene anatuma apolisi kuti amange mayi Chizuma ndi ati. Anthu akufuna adziwe ngati pali akuluakulu ena a m’boma kuphatikizapo nduna ngati zikukhudzidwa ndi kumangidwaku,” anatero a Mvula. M’bandakucha wa pa 6 December chaka chatha, apolisi anakamanga mayi Chizuma ku nyumba kwawo ndipo anawatengera ku polisi ya Namitete komwe anatuluka patadutsa maola angapo anthu ochuluka atayankhula mosakhutira ndi kumangidwa kwa mayiwa.
author: judith sonkho

title: MANEB Yawonjezera Masiku Olipira Mayeso
news: Bungwe loyendetsa mayeso mdziko muno la Malawi National Examinations Board (MANEB) lawonjezera masiku olipirira ndalama ya mayeso a boma a m’chaka cha 2023. Mneneri wa bungweli a Mayamiko Chiwaya atsimikiza za nkhaniyi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi ndipo ati masikuwa awonjezeredwa mpaka pa 31 December chaka chino. Chiwaya: Ophunzira ena sanakwanitse kulipira mu nthawiyi Iwo ati kutsatira njira ya makono ya E-payment, ophunzira ena ochepa analephera kupereka ndalamayi mu nthawi yomwe inayikidwa. “Ndi zoona tawonjezera masiku kuchoka pa 18 December kufika pa 31 December. Tinawona kuti ophunzira ambiri a sitandade 8, fomu 2 ndi fomu 4 sanakwanitse kupereka ndalama za mayeso chifukwanso cha mavuto a zachuma momwe alili mdziko muno,” anatero mayi Chiwaya. Komabe mayi Chiwaya ati okhawo amene analembetsa maina awo mu kaundula wa mayeso a m’chaka cha 2023 ndi omwe akuyenera kulipira ndalama ya mayeso nthawi yowonjezerayi ndipo kuti palibe ophunzira atsopano omwe ayikidwe mu ndondomeko ya mayeso mu nthawi yowonjezerayi. Zimenezi zikudza magulu osiyanasiyana atadandaula ndi kuchepa kwa nthawi yolipilira ndalama za mayeso ati ponena kuti bungwe la MANEB latulutsa mochedwa zotsatira za mayeso a fomu 4 a chaka chino zomwe zilepheretse ophunzira omwe sanachite bwino pa mayesowa, kuti abwerenze.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Adalemba Kale Kalata Yotula Pansi Udindo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati adalemba kale kalata yofotokoza kuti angathe kutula pansi udindo wake atakhala kuti wadwalika kwambiri. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican kwa atolankhani a nyuzipepala ya ABC ya m’dziko la Spain. Poyankhula kunyumba yake ya Casa Santa Marta ku Vatican, Papa Francisco wati chimodzi mwa zinthu zoyambirira kuchita atangosankhidwa kukhala Papa m’chaka cha 2013 chidali kulemberatu kalata yofotokoza kuti angathe kutula pansi udindo wake atakhala kuti wadwalika ndipo kuti akukanika kugwira ntchito ngati mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse. Iye wafotokoza kuti atalemba kalatayi ndi kusayinira adayipereka kwa yemwe adali mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika pa nthawiyo, Cardinal Tarcisio Bertone ndipo wati akukhulupilira kuti mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika padakali pano, Cardinal Pietro Parolin akusunga kalata imeneyi. Papa Francisco wayankhula izi poyankha atolankhaniwa omwe adafuna kudziwa ngati pali malamulo okhazikika owunikira anthu pa zomwe zingachitike atakhala kuti Papa wadwalika kwambiri kapena kuvulala kumene pa ngozi ndi kulepheretsa Papa’yo kugwira ntchito yake yomwe adasankhidwira. Iye wati potengera zomwe zakhala zikuchitika m’mbuyomu malamulo alipo. M’mbuyomu Papa Francisco adayamikirapo Papa Benedicto wa 16 wopuma kaamba kotula pansi udindo wake atawona kuti kaamba ka ukalamba kudali kovuta kukwaniritsa ntchito zosiyana-siyana zokhudza mpando wa u Papa.
author: judith sonkho

title: Ambuye Mpako Alimbikitsa A Malawi Achikatolika ku South Africa
news: Arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Pretoria mdziko la South Africa Ambuye Anthony Mpako ati ali ndi malingaliro oti azitsogolera mwambo wa nsembe ya Ukaristia kamodzi pa chaka, ya akhristu a Katolika ochokera ku Malawi amene akukhala mdzikolo. Mpako: Ndakondwera kupemphera nawo limodzi Iwo ayankhula izi pambuyo pa mwambo wa nsembe ya Misa ya bungwe la Malawian Catholic Community in South Africa yomwe anatsogolera lamulungu lapitali ku parish ya Holy Rosary mu arkidayosiziyo. Ambuye Mpako ati ndi khumbo lawo kuti pa mwambo uli wonse umene azitsogolera, padzikhala episkopi m’modzi wochokera ku Malawi yemwe azitsogolera naye limodzi Misa ndipo ati akambirana ndi bungwe la aepiskopi a mpingo wa Katolika ku Malawi la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) za nkhaniyi. “Anthuwa ndi olimbikira pa chikhristu chawo ndipo ndakondwera kwambiri kupemphera nawo limodzi. Ndili ndi maloto oti kutsogoloku tidzikhala ndi bishop m’modzi wa ku Malawi pa Misa ngati zimenezi. Ndikambirana nawo mabishop aku Malawi pa nkhani imeneyi,” anatero AMbuye Mpako. Pa mwambowu Ambuye Mpako akhazikitsa parish ya Holy Rosary kukhala likulu la akhristu a mpingo wa Katolika ochokera mdziko la Malawi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Anthu Ena Asanu Amangidwa Mokhudzana ndi Imfa ya Mwana wa Chialbino
news: Apolisi amanga anthu ena asanu powaganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi imfa ya msungwana wina wa khungu la chi albino m’boma la Kasungu. Walemba kalatayo – Kalaya Malinga ndi kalata yomwe m’neneri wa apolisi mdziko muno Peter Kalaya walemba, apolisi akwanitsanso kupeza mkono wa msungwanayu omwe unadulidwa pa tsiku lomwe anaphedwalo. Anthuwa ndi bambo ake omupeza msungwanayu a Mosten Mumba, mfumu ina yomwe dzina lake ndi Charles Chipeta, Kennedy Zimba, Elton Sambo komanso Jeremiah Nkhoma. Kumangidwa kwa anthuwa kwafikitsa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe amangidwa mokhudzana ndi nkhaniyi kufika pa asanu ndi atatu (8) kaamba koti pa 1 November apolisi anamanganso anthu ena atatu omwe ndi kuphatikizapo agogo ake aakazi a msungwanayo.
author: judith sonkho

title: Anthu Asanu Avulala Bomba Litaphulika ku Dzaleka
news: Anthu asanu avulala bomba litaphulika ku malo osungira anthu othawa kwawo a Dzaleka m’boma la Dowa. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha ati izi zachitika cha m’ma 7 koloko usiku wathawu pafupi ndi msika wa ku maloko. Iye wati pa nthawiyi akuluakulu awiri a mzika za dziko la Burundi zomwe zikupezeka ku malowa amacheza; ndipo munthu wina yemwe akumuganizira kuti ndi mzika ya mdziko la Rwanda, anafika ndi kuyatsa bombalo ndi kuwaponyera. “Butoyi Fedeli wa zaka 54 yemwe ndi mtsogoleri wa anthu aku Burundi omwe akukhala ku malowa ndi mlembi wake Bruni Ndaishime amacheza panja pa ofesi yawo ndipo anawona munthu wina akuyatsa machesi ndi kuwaponyera chinthu china chomwe sichikudziwika chomwe akuchiganizira kuti ndi bomba ndipo chinaphulika ndi kupanga phokoso lochuluka,” anatero M’bumpha. Kutsatira izi, awiriwo anavulala kwambiri ndipo anatengeredwa ku chipatala cha Dzaleka komwe anawatumiza ku chipatala chachikulu cha boma la Dowa. Anthu enanso atatu kuphatikizapo mwana wa zaka 11 omwe amadutsa pa malowa pa nthawiyi akhudzidwanso ndi chiwembuchi ndipo nawo agonekedwa pa chipatala chomwecho cha boma la Dowa.
