Padakalipano, apolisi amanga Umoton John Peter yemwe ndi mzika ya dziko la Rwanda, wa mtundu wa anthu wa Hutu mdzikolo pomuganizira kuti ndi yemwe wachita chiwembuchi kaamba koti anatchulidwa ndi ovulazidwawo. Iye akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa kuti akayankhe mlandu wovulaza anthu.
author: judith sonkho

title: ‘Advent Imathandiza Akhristu Kumvetsa Za Yesu Khristu’
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati nyengo ya Adventi imathandiza akhristu kumvetsa bwino za Yesu Khristu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lamulungu ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican. Iye anakhazikika pa Uthenga Wabwino wa tsiku lamulungu lachitatu mu nyengo ya Adventi omwe ukufotokoza nkhani ya Yohane M’batizi yemwe adali mu ndende ndipo adali wodabwa ngati Yesu Khristu adalidi mesiya amene anthu amamuyembekeza, ndi chifukwa chake Yohane’yo adatuma ophunzira ake kuti akafufuze ndi kupeza choona. Kudzera mwa ophunzira ake, Yohane adadziwa kuti Yesu Khristu adalidi mesiya yemwe anthu amamuyembekeza. Pamenepa Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika komafunafuna Yesu Khristu nthawi zonse ndi cholinga chofuna kumudziwa bwino. Pa tsikuli Papa Francisco anadalitsa zithunzi za mwana Yesu zomwe ana ndi makolo awo adabweretsa pokonzekera Christmas.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Amayi Maria ndi Chitsimikizo cha Chikondi cha Mulungu kwa Anthu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Amayi Maria amawonetsa akhristu kuti Mulungu amakhala pafupi ndi anthu ake. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco wayankhula izi lolemba ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican pa Misa ya chaka cha Amayi Maria a ku Guadalupe. Poyankhula pa Misa ya chakachi yomwe adatsogolera mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica ku Vatican, Papa Francisco wati Amayi Maria ndi chizindikiro kwa akhristu kuti Mulungu amakhala pafupi ndi anthu ake nthawi zonse. Iye wati polora kuti mwana wake abadwe pansi pano kudzera mwa Amayi Maria, Mulungu adasonyeza kuti nthawi zonse amafuna kukhala pafupi ndi anthu ake ndipo waonjezera kuti kudzera mwa mwana wake Yesu Khristu, Mulungu adakhazikika pakati pa anthu ake. Papa wati pobwera pansi pano kudzapulumutsa mtundu wa anthu, Yesu Khristu adasonyeza kuti ndi m’bale weniweni wa anthu onse makamaka anthu ophysinjidwa, anthu osauka ndi anthu omwe akuzunzidwa kaamba ka chikhulupiriro chao mwa Mulungu. Iye watsiriza ndi kupempha a Katolika onse makamaka a ku Latin America kuti atenge Amayi Maria kukhala chitsanzo chawo pokhala anthu osamalirana wina ndi mzake osaiwala anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana.
author: judith sonkho

title: Ambuye Tambala Apempha Asistere Athandize Ana Oyendayenda
news: Arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, Ambuye George Desimond Tambala apempha zipani za mu mpingo wa katolika kuti zichitepo kanthu pa vuto la kuchuluka kwa ana oyendayenda m’misewu ya m’matauni a mdziko muno. Ambuye Tambala ati ndi koyenera kuchitapo kanthu powawongolera anawa mu njira ya chikhristu kuti mpingo ndi dziko lipindule pokhala ndi mzika zodalirika. Iwo amayankhula izi loweruka ku St. Patrick’s parish pa mwambo wa malumbiro akunthawi zonse a Sister Georgina Gwaza a chipani cha Missionary Sisters of Immaculate Conception (MIC) komanso Sister Leontine Lang omwe amachita chaka chakuti akwanitsa zaka 60 akutumikira ngati sisitere m’chipanichi. “Tili ndi ana oyenda munsewu amene asisteri a White Sisters akuwathandiza koma sakukwanitsa chifukwa achuluka kwambiri. Asisteri a zipani zina tikuyenera titengepo gawo pa zimenezi,” anatero Ambuye Tambala. Poyankhulapo Sister Georgina Gwaza anathokoza Mulungu kaamba kowathandiza kufika pomwe ali padakalipano. “Sindimayembekezera kuti ndingafike pano. Koma ndikudziwa kuti si china ayi koma ndi mapemphero basi amene andithandiza kuti ndifike pano,” anatero Sister Gwaza. Sister Gwaza omwe amagwira ntchito ya unamwino anati ali ndi chidwi chofuna kutengapo gawo pa ntchito yosamalira ana oyendayenda m’mizinda ya dziko lino.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Ndi Zotheka Kuthetsa Njala Pa Dziko Lonse
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi zotheka kuthetsa njala pa dziko la pansi. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi ku Vatican pa mkumano wake ndi nthumwi za sukulu ina yomwe imasula atsogoleri a chipembedzo cha chi Yuda m’dziko la Argentina yodziwika kuti Seminario Rabinico Latino Americano. Iye wayankhula izi polingalira kuti ndalama za nkhaninkhani zikugwiritsidwa ntchito pogula zida za nkhondo pamene anthu ochuluka akufa ndi njala kaamba kosowa chakudya. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wati ndi chifukwa chake ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri ndi nkhondo ya pakati pa maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine komanso nkhondo zina zomwe zikuchitika m’maiko osiyana-siyana. Iye wati akuganiza ndipo akukhulupirira kuti ngati maiko ataleka kupanga zida za nkhondo kwa chaka chimodzi chokha, njala pa dziko lonse la pansi ingathe kutheratu. Papa Francisco wati koma ngati anthu okhulupirira akhristu akuyenera kulimbikitsa chimvano ndi ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu. Iye watsiriza ndi kunena kuti akhristu akuyenera kudzudzula kusowa kwa chilungamo popeza chilungamo ndi chikhulupiriro zimayendera limodzi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Chipembedzo Chiwunikidwenso – Ambuye Msusa
news: Arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Blantyre, Ambuye Thomas Luke Msusa awuza bungwe lomwe limawona za chipembedzo mu arkidayosiziyo kuti liwunikenso ndi kukonza zinthu zolakwika zomwe akhristu amachita pa nthawi ya chipembedzo. Msusa: Chipembedzo chathu chisasakanikirane ndi zinthu zina Iwo anati pali zinthu zambiri zomwe ndi zolakwika zimene zimachitika pa nthawi ya chipembedzo zimene akhristu azitenga kukhala chizolowezi koma zomwe ndi zopanda tanthauzo lililonse mu mpingo wa Katolika. Ambuye Msusa anapereka chitsanzo cha zomwe amayi amachita zonyamula dengu, lichero, miphika ndi zina nthawi yomwerenga mawu ikayandikira, komanso kuyimba nyimbo pa nthawi yomwe akhristu angotsiriza kumene kulandira ukaristia. “Tiyeni tiwonwtsetse kuti chipembedzo chathu chisasakanikirane ndi zinthu zina zopanda pake. Pa nsembe ya ukaristia timachedwa mwina kufika maola anayi chifukwa talowetsa zina zomwe sizimayenera kukhalamo. Tiyeni tichotse zimenezi. Mwachitsanzo tikalandira ukaristia tikuyenera tikhale chete kwa mphindi zingapo zosinkhasintha aliyense payekha tisanayimbe nyimbo yothokozera,” anatero Ambuye Msusa. Poyankhulapo pa nkhaniyi wapampando wa bungwe la akhristu eni ake a Peter Nzolima ati kukonza zinthu zolakwikazi kuthandiza kuti mpingo udziyendera limodzi ndipo pasamakhaale kuchita zinthu zosiyana pa nthawi ya chipembedzo. “Ifenso takhala tikuchititsa misonkhano m’madinale onse a muno mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre momwe timafotokozera za kusiyana komwe kulipo pa nkhani ya kapembedzedwa m’maparishi omwe akupezeka mu arkidayosizi ino,” anatero a Mzolima. Pamenepa a Mzolima ati akhala pansi ndi magulu okhudzidwa ndi kuwunikanso ndondomeko zoyenera kutsatidwa m’maparishi onse amu arkidayosiziyo.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wasankha Mkulu wa PMS Watsopano
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha president watsopano wa bungwe la Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) pa dziko lonse la pansi. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wasankha bambo Emilio Nappa pa udindo wa ukuluwu. Polengeza za nkhaniyi likulu la mpingo wa Katolika lati kupatula kukhala president wa bungweli, Papa wasankhanso bambo Nappa kukhala mlembi wothandiza a Cardinal oyang’anira ofesi yaikulu ya a Papa yoyang’anira za Chibalalitso cha mpingo. Potsatiranso kusankhidwaku bambo Nappa tsopano ndi Archbishop wongosankhidwa kapena kuti Archbishop – elect m’chingerezi. Bambo Nappa omwe adabadwa pa 9 August m’chaka cha 1972 ku Naples m’dziko la Italy, adadzodzedwa kukhala wansembe pa 28 June m’chaka cha 1997. Iwo ali ndi doctorate mu phunziro la za uMulungu (Theology) yomwe adapeza kuchokera ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Pontifical Gregorian University m’chaka cha 2004. Mwa zina bambo Nappa agwirapo ntchito ngati mphunzitsi wa phunziro la Fundamental Theology ku sukulu ya ukachenjede. Padakali pano iwo akugwira ntchito ku Vatican ku ofesi yoyang’anira ndi kulangiza a Papa pa nkhani za chuma.
author: judith sonkho

title: Nthambi ya Ndende Yati Siyinawuzidwe Zotulutsa Mayi Kunje
news: Nthambi ya ndende mdziko muno yati sinalandire chikalata chowalamula kuti atulutse m’ndende komishonala wakale wa bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno mayi Linda Kunje. Malinga ndi kalata yomwe Radio Maria Malawi yawona, nduna yowona za chitetezo cha mdziko, mayi Jean Sendeza awuza mkulu wa ndende mdziko muno kuti atulutse mayi Kunje ngati m’modzi mwa akayidi omwe akhululukiridwa mu nyengo ya Khilisimasi ya chaka chino ndipo mneneri wa undunawo a Maureen Nkhoma atsimikiza za chikalatachi. Kalata yomwe undunawo walembera nthambi ya ndende Koma poyankhula ndi wailesi ino mneneri wa nthambi ya ndende a Chimwemwe Shaba ati sakudziwapo kanthu pa nkhaniyi kaamba koti sanalandire kalatayi. Komabe a Shaba ati kupatula ndondomeko zomwe zimatsatidwa kuti akayidi akhululukiridwe, mtsogoleri wa dziko lino ali ndi mphamvu yotulutsa m’ndende anthu omwe wafuna kutero. Shaba: Sitinalandire kalata yomwe mukuyinenayo “Ndikovuta kuyikapo mlomo chifukwa sitinalandire kalata yomwe mukuyinenayo. Tikafuna kutulutsa mnthu timatengera munthu amene wagwira theka la ukayidi wake, amene wakhala akuwonetsa makhalidwe abwino, amene anapalamula mlandu waung’ono kwambiri komanso a president ali ndi mphamvu zotulutsa aliyense m’ndende posatengera zonse zomwe tatchulazi,” anatero a Shaba. Pa 31 August chaka chino mayi Kunje kuphatikizapo dalaivala wawo a John Tewesa analamulidwa kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa chaka ndi theka aliyense, atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu olowelera mdipiti wa galimoto za mtsogoleri wa dziko lino m’chaka cha 2020 pa nthawi imene ankachoka ku Zomba kupita ku Blantyre.
author: judith sonkho

title: Anthu Okwiya Atentha Polisi, Kupha Munthu ku Zomba
news: Anthu okwiya ku Chipini m’boma la Zomba atentha polisi komanso kupha m’modzi mwa anthu ena ku deralo. Mneneri wa apolisi m’chigawo chakumvuma kwa dziko lino a Joseph Sauka atsimikiza za nkhaniyi koma anati tiwapatse nthawi kuti afufuze bwino ndi kufotokoza zambiri za nkhaniyi. Koma m’modzi mwa anthu ku deralo, watitsina khutu kuti apolisi aku deralo dzulo anamanga munthu wina yemwe amaganiziridwa kuti waba mankhwala ndipo munthuyo wamwalira ali m’chitolokosi cha apolisi. Lero akuti ndi pomwe achibale a malemuyo anapita kunyumba kwa m’modzi mwa anthu a mderalo amene analondolera apolisi kukamanga malemuyo ndipo anthuwa amenya ndi kupha mkuluyo ndipo pambuyo pake ndi pamene atentha polisiyo. “Abale ake a munthu amene wamwalira ali ku polisiyo anapita kwawo kwa amene anaperekeza apolisi kuti amange malemuyo. Anayamba kumuthamangitsa ndiye atamugwira ndi pamene amumenya, kumuwotcha mpaka wafa,” anafotokoza motero munthuyo. Munthuyu watiuza kuti apolisi a ku deralo omwe alipo atatu athawa kale ku deralo ndipo padakalipano akuluakulu a polisi afika ku deralo kukafufuza bwino za nkhaniyi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Atsogolera Miyambo Ikuluikulu Ya Nyengo Ya Christmas
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco atsogolera miyambo ikuluikulu ya nyengo ya Christmas. Malipoti a Vatican Radio ati izi zili chomwechi malinga ndi mlozo wa miyambo ikuluikulu omwe likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika latulutsa. Papa pa Christmas ya zaka za m’mbuyomu Zadziwika kuti miyambo ikuluikuluyi idzayamba pa 24 December ndi Misa ya usiku ya Christmas mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica ku Vatican nthawi ya 7:30. Ndipo lamulungu pa 25 December nthawi ya 12 koloko masana Papa Francisco adzapereka uthenga ndi madalitso ake ku mzinda wa Rome komanso ku dziko lonse la pansi zodziwika m’chilatini kuti Urbi et orbi. Pa 31 December nthawi ya 5 koloko madzulo mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica ku Vatican, Papa Francisco adzatsogolera mapemphero a madzulo oyamika Mulungu otchedwa Te Deum m’chilatini. Ndipo pa 1 January 2023, Papa Francisco adzatsogolera Misa ya chaka cha Amayi Maria Amayi a Mulungu mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica nthawi ya 10 koloko m’mawa. Pa 6 January Papa Francisco adzatsogolera Misa ya chaka cha Epiphania mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica nthawi ya 10 koloko m’mawa. Pomaliza pa 8 January 2023, Papa Francisco adzatsogolera Misa mu tchalichi chotchedwa Sistine Chapel nthawi ya 9:30 m’mawa ndipo pa mwambowu adzapereka Sakramenti la Ubatizo kwa ana.
author: judith sonkho

title: Apolisi Apulumutsa Anthu Khumi Omwe Amafuna Kuzembetsedwa
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mwanza apulumutsa amalawi ena okwana khumi amene amafuna kuzembetsedwa ndi anthu ena omwe sakudziwika. Mneneri wa apolisi ku Mwanza Edwin Kaunda wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti anthu ena anatsina khutu apolisi kuti pali galimoto ina yomwe yaimitsidwa pa Neno Turn-off mu nsewu wa Neno-Mpatamanga ndipo apolisi atatsatira nkhaniyi anakapezamo anthu khumi omwe ndi a m’boma la Mzimba. Anthuwa atafunsidwa akuti anafotokoza kuti anatengedwa pa Mzimba boma ndi mkulu wina yemwe sakumudziwa ndipo anawauza kuti akuwatengera ku dziko la South Africa. Mwa anthu khumi-wa, asanu ndi amayi ndipo padakalipano apolisiwa amanga a Stallone Chakalamba a zaka 28 zakubadwa omwe amayendetsa galimoto yomwe inanyamula anthuwa. Chakalamba yemwe amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mchere mfumu yaikulu Kapeni m’boma la Blantyre, akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa komwe akayankhe mlandu wozembetsa anthu. Padakalipano apolisiwa alangiza anthu mdziko muno kuti apewe kutengeka ndi anthu omwe amawanamiza kuti awapezera ntchito ku maiko ena ponena kuti pali anthu  ochuluka omwe ndi mzika za dziko lino omwe akuvutika ku maiko ena kaamba ka nkhani ngati zimenezi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Akacheza ku DRC, South Sudan Chaka Cha Mawa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kukacheza m’maiko a Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) ndi South Sudan kumayambiliro a chaka cha mawa. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa akacheza m’maikowa kuyambira pa 31 January mpaka 5 February. Ngati njira yofuna kuwonetsa kufunika kwa umodzi wa mipingo ya chikhristu pogwira ntchito limodzi yolimbikitsa bata ndi mtendere, Papa Francisco adzapita m’maiko awiriwa limodzi ndi mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Anglican ku Canterbury m’dziko la Britain Archbishop Justin Welby. Kwa nthawi yaitali Papa Francisco wakhala wokhudzidwa komanso wakhala akudzudzula ziwembu zosiyana-siyana zomwe zakhala zikuchitika m’dziko la Democratic Republic of Congo. Iye wakhalanso akulimbikitsa mtendere m’dziko la South Sudan; ndi chifukwa chake m’chaka cha 2019 adayitana atsogoleri a ku South Sudan ku Vatican ndipo ku mapeto a zokambirana zao iye adagwada ndi kuphyophyona mapazi awo ngati chizindikiro cha kudzichepetsa pofuna kuphunzitsa atsogoleri za kufunika kodzichepetsa ndi kulolerana. Ulendo wokacheza m’maiko awiriwa umayenera kuchitika chaka chino mwezi wa July koma ulendowu adayamba awuyimitsa kaye kaamba koti pa nthawiyo Papa Francisco amavutika kwambiri ndi mwendo makamaka bondo.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Amayi Sangakhale Ansembe
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati ndi zosatheka kudzodza amayi kukhala ansembe mu mpingo wa Katolika. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican kwa atolankhani a magazini ina ya m’dziko la America. Iye wati izi zili chomwechi potengera kuti Yesu Khristu adapereka mphamvu za ulamuliro ndi utumiki pa Petulo Woyera yemwe malinga ndi Mpingo wa Katolika ndiye adapatsidwa mphamvu zokhala Papa woyamba. Komabe, Papa Francisco wati pali ntchito zambiri zomwe amayi angagwire monga kuwerenga malembo oyera ndi kuthandizira pa guwa pongotchula ntchito zochepa. Iye watinso zawonetsa kale kuti amayi angathenso kugwira bwino ntchito zina koposa amuna ndipo ndi chifukwa chake wati wasankha amayi ambiri kukhala m’ma udindo akuluakulu mu ma ofesi a ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican. Masiku apitawa, Papa Francisco adasankha Dr. Raffaella Giuliani kukhala mlembi wa ofesi yowona zinthu zoyera ndi mbiri ya kale, Pontifical Commission for Sacred Archaeology komanso Professor Antonella Sciarrone Alibrandi kukhala wachiwiri kwa mlembi wa ofesi yowona za chikhalidwe ndi maphunziro, Dicastery for Culture and Education.
author: judith sonkho

title: MANEB Yatulutsa Zotsatira Za Mayeso A Fomu 4
news: Bungwe lowona za mayeso mdziko muno la Malawi National Examinations Board (MANEB) latulutsa zotsatira za mayeso a fomu 4 a chaka chino. Malinga ndi zotsatirazo, mwa ophunzira okwana 147,977 omwe analemba mayesowa, ophunzira 86,477 ndi omwe apambana kuyimira 58.44 percent. Mwa ophunzira aamuna okwana 77, 845 omwe analemba mayesowa, ophunzira 49,682 ndi omwe apambana kuyimira 63.82 percent ndipo mwa ophunzira aakazi okwana 70,102 omwe analemba mayesowa, ophunzira 36,795 ndi omwe apambana kuyimira 52.47 percent. Malinga ndi bungwe la MANEB, sukulu khumi zomwe zachita bwino kwambiri pokhala ndi ophunizra ambiri opeza distinction pa mayesowa ndi za St. Kizito Seminary (53.54%), Marist Secondary (51.86%), Nankhunda Seminary (47.37%), Lilongwe Islamic (44.79%), Dedza Secondary (37.82%), St. Mary’s Secondary (34.40%), Loyola Jesuit (32.36%), Lilongwe Girls Secondary (29.89%), Maranatha Boys (28.53%) komanso Wasambo Boys High School (28.41%). Maboma khumi omwe achita bwino kwambiri pa mayesowa ndi a Zomba Urban (68.43%), Likoma (66.67%), Dowa (65.67%), Phalombe (64.45%), Mzuzu City (63.71%), Dedza (63.11%), Karonga (61.87%), Mulanje (61.12%), Ntchisi (60.98%) komanso Nkhatabay (60.20%).
author: judith sonkho

title: Dayosizi ya Dedza Yatseka Chipatala cha Nsipe
news: Dayosizi ya mpingo wa Katolika ya Dedza yatseka chipatala chake cha Nsipe Mission m’boma la Ntcheu. Mkulu wofalitsa nkhani mu dayosiziyo bambo Sosten Office ati dayosiziyo yachita izi ngati njira imodzi yofuna kupereka chitetezo kwa ogwira ntchito ake pa chipatalachi. Mbali imodzi ya chipatala cha Nsipe Iwo ati pakhala pali kusamvana pa nkhani ya malo pomwe anthu a midzi yozugulira chipatalachi akhala akulowa m’malo a parish ya Nsipe pomalima komanso kumanga nyumba. “Izi zinayamba kuchitika m’chaka cha 2018 ndipo mpungwepungwewu wafika poyipa kwambiri m’chaka cha 2021 ndipo ndikuyakhula pano ena ali ku bwalo la milandu kuyankha milandu yosiyanasiyana; yobvula anthu ogwira ntchito komanso kupereka chiwopsezo,” anatero bambo Office. Bambo Office ati padakalipano ogwira ntchito ena ameyedwa ndi kuvulazidwa ndipo agonekedwa ku chipatala Kudzera m’chikalata chomwe dayosizi ya Dedza yatulutsa, ngati izi zipitilire ndiye kuti dayosiziyo akuti itsekanso sukulu za Nsipe Primary komanso Nsipe Community Day Secondary. Posachedwapa Vicar General wa dayosiziyo Monsignor John Chithonje anapita ku parishiyo komwe analangiza akhristu a parishiyo omwe ambiri mwa iwo ndi a midzi yomwe ikulowelera malo a mpingowa, kuti adekhe ndi kukambirana bwino ndi akuluakulu a mpingo za nkhaniyi pofuna kuthetsa mpungwepungwewu.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati World Cup Ithandize Kubweretsa Umodzi Pakati pa Anthu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati ndi pemphero lake kuti masewero a mpira wa miyendo pa dziko lonse a FIFA World Cup omwe akuchitikira m’dziko la Qatar, athandize kulimbikitsa chimvano ndi umodzi pakati pa anthu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lachitatu ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican.  Iye wati kupatula kusangalatsa anthu, masewero a mpira-wa alinso ndi kuthekera kolimbikitsa ubale wabwino ndi mtendere pa dziko la pansi. Pamenepa, iye wapereka mafuno abwino kwa onse omwe akutenga nawo mbali pa masewerowa osaiwala masapota onse. Masewero a mpirawa amasonkhanitsa pamodzi matimu a mpira wa miyendo zaka zinayi zilizonse. Masewero oyamba adachitika koyamba m’chaka cha 1930 koma masewerowa sadachitike m’chaka cha 1942 ndi 1946 kaamba ka nkhondo yachiwiri ya dziko lonse la pansi (Second World War). Timu ya mpira ya dziko la France ndi yomwe ikuteteza chikhochi potsatira kupambana kwake m’chaka cha 2018 pa masewero omwe adachitikira m’dziko la Russia.
author: judith sonkho

title: DPP Sikugwirizana ndi Kugawidwanso Kwa Madera a Aphungu
news: Chipani chotsutsa boma mdziko muno cha Democratic Progessive (DPP) chati sichikugwirizana ndi ganizo lowonjezera madera a aphungu a nyumba ya malamulo mdziko muno. Namalomba: Dziko lathu ndi losauka kwambiri M’neneri wa chipanichi a Shadrick Namalomba awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti dziko la Malawi ndi limodzi mwa mayiko ang’ono muno mu Africa lomwenso likuvutika kwambiri pa nkhani za chuma. Iwo ati kuwonjezera maderawa kuwonjezeranso ndalama zomwe boma lidziwononga polipira aphungu-wa komanso zinthu zina. “Dziko lathu ndi losauka kwambiri malinga ndi bungwe la World Bank ndipo sitikuyenera kuchulukitsa madera chifukwa kupanga zimenezo kukutanthauza kuti aphungunso achuluka ndiye kuti aMalawi akuyeneranso kupereka ndalama zochuluka zolipira aphungu atsopano amenewa,” anatero a Namalomba. Koma poyankhanpo pa za nkhaniyi wofalitsa nkhani za bungwe MEC, a Sangwani Mwafulirwa ati bungweli lakhala likukumana ndi zipani zonse mu ndondomeko younikanso malire a maderawa koma chipani cha DPP sichinadandaule kalikonse. Lachisanu lapitali nyumba ya malamulo yavomereza pempho la bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno lowonjezera madera a aphungu kuchoka pa 193 kufika pa 229.
author: judith sonkho

title: CDEDI Ikufuna Zamba Achotsedwe Ntchito
news: Bungwe la Centre for Democracy and Economic Development Initiatives (CDEDI) lati atsogoleri a ndale ndi omwe akukolezera mchitidwe wa katangale ndi ziphuphu mdziko muno. Namiwa: Zikutipatsa mafunso ochuluka Mkulu wa bungweli a Slyvester Namiwa ndi omwe anena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi potsatira chikalata chomwe bungweli latulutsa chopempha mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera kuti achotse pa mpando mlembi wamkulu mu ofesi ya pulezidenti ndi nduna, mayi Colleen Zamba. Iwo ati kutsatira zomwe wanena yemwe anali wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa kampani yowona za mafuta a galimoto mdziko muno ya National Oil Company of Malawi (NOCMA) mayi Hellen Buluma, zawonetseratu poyera kuti adindo mdziko muno akuba ndi kusakaza ndalama za nkhani nkhani zomwe zikanatha kuthandiza pokweza chuma cha dziko lino. “Titamva mbali ya mayi Buluma, a Malawi amafunanso atamva mbali ya mayi Zamba koma mwadala sanapiteko zomwe zikutipatsa mafunso ochuluka ndiye kuti mwina akudziwapo kanthu choncho sakuyeneranso kukhala pa udindo umenewu. Akanakhala m’maiko ena bwenzi atatula pansi udindo pawokha,” anatero a Namiwa. Lachitatu, mayi Buluma anakawonekera ku komiti ya nyumba ya malamulo yowona za anthu olembedwa ntchito m’boma ya Public Appointments Committee (PAC) komwe anafotokoza zambiri zokhudza kusiya kwawo kwa ntchito ku NOCMA pomwe mwazina afotokoza kuti mayi Zamba omwenso ndi wapampando wa board ya bungwe la NOCMA amawakakamiza kuti adzigwira ntchito ndi makampani ena pobweretsa mafuta mdziko muno mosatsata ndondomeko zoyenera. Patsikuli, mayi Zamba amayembekezeka kukawonekeranso ku komitiyi koma iwo sanapiteko. Koma poyankhulapo pa nkhaniyi m’neneri wa pulezidenti a Anthony Kasunda ati pakadali pano mtsogoleri  wa dziko lino sanakhalepo pansi ndi kuwunika za nkhaniyi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wasankha Mkulu Watsopano Wa Mpingo Wa Katolika Waku M’mawa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha mkulu wa ofesi yomwe imayang’anira mpingo wa Katolika wa ku m’mawa. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wasankha Archbishop Claudio Gugerotti kukhala mkulu wa ofesi’yi. Papa Francisko ndi Archbishop Gugerotti Archbishop Gugerotti yemwe padakali pano akutsiriza ntchito yake yokhala kazembe woyimira likulu la mpingo wa Katolika ku Britain alowa m’malo mwa Cardinal Leonardo Sandri yemwe adali mkulu wa ofesi yoyang’anira mpingo wa Katolika wa ku m’mawa. Cardinal Sandri akupuma pa udindowu atakwanitsa zaka 79 za kubadwa mwa malamulo ake oyikika akuyenera tsopano kupuma pa udindowu. Archbishop Gugerotti yemwe adabadwa m’chaka cha 1955 ku Verona m’dziko la Italy adadzodzedwa kukhala wansembe m’chaka cha 1982. Padakali pano Archbishop Gugerotti ndi mphunzitsi ku sukulu za ukachenjede zingapo monga Pontifical Gregorian University ndi Pontifical Oriental Institute.
author: judith sonkho

title: Sister Maida a Chipani cha SBVM Amwalira
news: Sister Esther Maida a chipani cha Servants of the Blessed Virgin Mary (SBVM), amwalira. Malemu Sister Maida Malinga ndi uthenga omwe chipani cha SBVM chatulutsa, Sister Maida amwalira m’mawa wa lero ku chipatala cha Nguludi m’boma la Chiradzulu. Sister Maida anabadwa pa 19 October, 1954 m’mudzi mwa Mkumbira mfumu yaikulu Kumtumanji mu parishi ya Katamba mu dayosizi ya Zomba ndipo analowa m’chipanichi m’chaka cha 1973. Mwambo woyika m’manda thupi la malemuwa uchitika lachinayi ku likulu la chipanichi ku Mary View ku Nguludi m’boma la Chiradzulu. Mzimu wa Sister Esther Maida uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: judith sonkho

title: ‘Mpopera Ukuchepetsa Matenda a Malungo’
news: Bungwe la World Vision Malawi lati ntchito ya Mpopera yathandiza kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akudwala matenda a malungo m’maboma atatu omwe ntchitoyi ikugwirika. Mkulu woyang’anira ntchito ya Mpopera ku bungweli mdziko muno Dr. Bizwick Mwale anena izi m’boma la Balaka pambuyo poyendera momwe ntchitoyi ikuyendera m’bomalo. Iwo anati ntchitoyi yomwe ikugwiridwa m’maboma a Balaka, Mangochi ndi Nkhatabay ikuyenda bwino ngakhale ikukumana ndi vuto la kusowa kwa mafuta a galimoto mdziko muno ndipo ayamikira mafumu kaamba kothandizira kuti ntchitoyi iyende bwino. “Tikukumana ndi vuto la kusowa kwa mafuta a galimoto makamaka diesel komabe sikuti zatilepheretsa kugwira ntchito yathu ayi. Ntchitoyi ikuyenda bwino kwambiri ndipo kwa zaka zitatu zomwe takhala tikugwira ntchitoyi tawona kuti anthu ameen akupita mzipatala kukalembetsa matenda a malungo akuchepa komanso mankhwala a LAA afika popanga expire mzipatalamu chifukwa anthu ambiri sakupita ndi kumakapatsidwa zomwe zikusonyeza kuti Mpoperawu ukuthandiza,” anatero Dr. Mwale. Poyankhulapo Senior Chief Inkosi Chamthunya ya m’boma la Balaka yayamikira anthu a mdera lake kaamba kowonetsa chidwi pa ndondomeko ya Mpopera ya chaka chino. “M’mbuyomu anthu amanamizana kuti Mpopera ukubweretsa matenda achilendo pamene ena amati akapopera mankhwalawa ndiye kuti abambo sazilowa mnyumba koma pano anazindikira kuti nzabodza atawona ubwino omwe anthu omwe anapoperetsa mankhwala, akukumana nawo moti pano anthu akumachita kuwayitanira kuti mukamaliza kumeneko mubwerenso kuno mudzapopere chifukwa ngakhale msikidzi zikumafa,” anatero Inkosi Chamthunya. Bungwe la World Vision Malawi likugwira ntchito yopopera mnyumba za anthu mankhwala opha udzudzu woyambitsa malungo m’maboma a Mangochi, Machinga ndi Balaka ndi thandizo la ndalama kuchokera ku Global Fund.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wayamikira Bungwe Lina Potukula Zaumoyo Ku Africa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wayamikira bungwe lina la mpingo wa Katolika la m’dziko la Italy kaamba kodzipereka pothandiza anthu pa nkhani za umoyo ku maiko a ku Africa. Papa Francisco wayankhula izi pa mkumano wake ndi ma dotolo a bungwe la mpingo wa Katolika la m’dziko la Italy lodziwika kuti University College for Aspiring Missionary Doctors ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati bungweli likugwira ntchito yotamandika maka powonetsetsa kuti zomwe mpingo wa Katolika umaphunzitsa zidziwoneka ndi maso pothandiza anthu pa nkhani za umoyo. Papa Francisco wati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti amayi ambiri amamwalira pa nthawi yobereka komanso ana ambiri amamwalira kaamba kosowa chisamaliro chokwanira koma pa nthawi yomweyo maiko ena amaononga ndalama za nkhaninkhani pogula zida zoopysa za nkhondo. Pamenepa iye wayamikira bungweli ndipo walimbikitsa onse ogwira ntchito ku bungweli kuti apitirize pa ntchito yao yabwino yosamalira miyoyo ya anthu. Bungwe la University College for Aspiring Missionary Doctors adalikhazikitsa m’chaka cha 1950 ndipo likupezeka m’maiko awa Angola, Ethiopia, Mozambique, South Sudan, Sierra Leone, Tanzania ndi Uganda.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Amupatsa Umzika Wa Mzinda Wa Asti Ku Italy
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco amupatsa ulemu wapadera wokhala mzika ya mzinda wa Asti m’dziko la Italy. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walandira ulemu wapaderawu lamulungu kuchokera kwa mfumu kapena kuti mayor wa mzinda wa Asti, Maurizio Rasero. Papa Francisko ndi Mayor wa mzinda wa Asti Rasero wafotokoza kuti wapereka ulemu wa paderawu kaamba ka kudzipereka kwa Papa Francisco polimbikitsa mtendere komanso ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu. Pambuyo polandira ulemu wa paderawu, Papa Francisco adakumananso ndi akuluakulu ena ogwira ntchito zosiyana-siyana mu mzindawu. Papa Francisko ndi msuwani wawo ku Asti Kenako Papa Francisco adapita ku Cathedral ya mu mzindawu kukachita Misa. Papa Francisco adali mu mzinda wa Asti wopezeka m’chigawo cha ku mpoto kwa dziko la Italy komwe mwa zina adali nawo pa chikondwerero choti msuwani wake wakwanitsa zaka 90 za kubadwa.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Imfa Ya Anthu Ochuluka Mdziko La Turkey
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa wati ndi wa chisoni chachikulu kaamba ka anthu omwe afa komanso kuvulala ndi bomba lomwe laphulika m’dziko la Turkey. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi mu uthenga wake wopepesa kwa anthu a m’dzikolo. Uthengawu wasayinidwa ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika, Cardinal Pietro Parolin. Iye wati akupepesa ma banja komanso abwenzi a anthu omwe afa ndipo wati ali nao limodzi kudzera m’mapemphero pa nthawi yovutayi. Malipoti akusonyeza kuti bombali lomwe lidaphulika lamulungu lapitali nthawi ya ku masana, pa malo ena omwe anthu amachitapo ntchito za malonda mu mzinda wa Instanbul, lapha anthu 6 komanso kuvulaza anthu 81. Zadziwika kuti mayi wina yemwe ndi mzika ya dziko la Syria wagwidwa pomuganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi chiwembuchi. Kuwonjezera apo, anthu ena 47 agwidwanso powaganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi chiwembuchi. Padakali pano, palibe gulu lililonse lomwe labwera poyera ndi kunena kuti ndi lomwe lachita izi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Khonsolo ya Dedza Yatsekulira Chipatala cha Magomero
news: Khonsolo ya boma la Dedza yati kumangidwa kwa zipatala zatsopano m’bomalo kuthandiza kuchepetsa mavuto omwe analipo okhudza za umoyo. Wapampando wa khonsoloyi khansala Francis Chimpikizo anena izi lolemba pa mwambo wopereka chipatala chaching’ono cha Magomero mdera la mfumu yaikulu Chilikumwendo m’bomalo. Iwo anati kumangidwa kwa chipatalachi kuthandiza kuchepetsa mitunda imene odwala amayenda kuti akapeze chithandizo komanso zithandizira kuchepetsa kuchuluka kwa odwala pa chipatala chachikulu cha boma la Dedza. “Tikusangalala kuti zipatala zikuchulukira chifukwa kudzadzana komwe kumachitika ku chipagtala chathu chachikulu kwachepanso,” anatero a Chimpikizo. Padakalipano chipatalachi chilibe ogwira ntchito komanso zipangizo zogwilira ntchito koma a Chimpikizo atsimikizira anthu a mderali kuti khonsoloyo yaika kale padera ndalama zokwana 15-million-kwacha zoti zithandizire pogula zipangizozi. Poyankhulapo phungu wa deralo a Auzious Chidobvu wapempha anthu a mderalo kuti apewe kuba ndi kuwononga zipangizo za chipatalachi kuti chipitilire kutumikira anthu moyenera. “Tithokoze a bwanamkubwa potilingalira kuti tilandire chipatalachi. Ndi kofunika kuti ife eni ake aku dera kuno tichisamalire chipatalachi posawononga katundu wa chipatalachi,” anatero a Chidobvu. Chipatalachi chinayamba kumangidwa m’chaka cha 2017 kudzera ku thumba la District Development Fund ndipo ndalama zoposa 110-million-kwacha ndi zomwe zagwiritsidwa ntchito pomanga chipatalachi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Walandira Makalata a Kazembe wa Dziko la Netherlands ku Vatican
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walandira makalata a ukazembe kuchokera kwa kazembe watsopano woyimira dziko la Netherlands ku Vatican. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, mwambowu wachitika ku likulu la mpingo wa ku Vatican. Papa ndi kazembe watsopanoyo Awiriwa akambirana nkhani zosiyana-siyana zokomera mbali ziwirizi ndipo pambuyo pake, awiriwa adasinthana mphatso. Kenako kazembe watsopanoyu adachitanso zokambirana ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika, Cardinal Pietro Parolin komanso mlembi wamkulu mu ofesi yowona za ubale wa mpingo wa Katolika ndi maiko ena, Archbishop Paul Gallagher. Likulu la mpingo wa Katolika lomwe ndi dziko loyima pa lokha, lili pa ubale wa ukazembe ndi maiko 183.
author: judith sonkho

title: ‘Anthu Pafupifupi 200 Sauzande Ali Ndi Nthenda Ya Shuga Mdziko Muno’
news: Dziko la Malawi lagwirizana ndi dziko lonse pochita mwambo wokumbukira matenda a shunga (diabetes). Kuno ku Malawi, mwambowu wachitika pa 14 November, 2022 m’dera la Senior Chief Njombwa m’boma la Kasungu. Mlendo wolemekezeka pa mwambowu anali nduna ya zaumoyo mayi Khumbize Kandodo Chiponda. Chiponda: Ena amachita kubadwa nayo Poyankhula pa mwambowu, mayi Chiponda apempha anthu mdziko muno kuti agwirane manja polimbana ndi nthenda ya shunga yomwe akuti padakalipano ili mwa anthu oposa 200 sauzande a mdziko muno. “5% ya anthu mdziko muno yomwe ndi anthu pafupifupi 200 sauzande ndi omwe ali ndi nthenda ya shuga. Nthendayi sitimapatsirana koma ena amachita kubadwa nayo choncho ndi kofunika kumalimbikitsana kuti ngakhale mankhwala oyichiza palibe koma ena alipo omwe umati ukwamwa umatha kukhala ndi moyo kwa nthawi yaitali ngatinso akutsatira malangizo pa nkhani ya zakudya,” anatero mayi Chiponda. Poyankhulapo   woyimira bungwe lowona za umoyo pa dziko lonse la World Health Organization (WHO) kuno ku Malawi, Dr. Kimambo Neema Rusibamayila anayamikira dziko la Malawi kaamba kochilimika pa ntchito yolimbana ndi nthenda ya shunga. Naye president wa bungwe la anthu odwala nthenda ya shuga mdziko muno la Diabetes Association of Malawi, a Clement Mandala apempha boma kuti lichilimike popereka thandizo loyenera kwa anthu omwe ali ndi matendawa. Mwambowu omwe unachitika pa mutu woti Kupeza thandizo msanga ngati muli ndi matenda a shuga, kuti titeteze tsogolo, unachitikira pa sukulu ya Chinkhoma m’bomalo ndipo unabweretsa pamodzi anthu osiyanasiyana monga a mipingo, a ndale mafumu ndiponso ogwira ntchito za boma. Tsikuli linakhazikitsidwa ndi cholinga chofuna kulimbikitsana ndiponso kulangiza anthu momwe angapewere nthendayi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Anthu AKhale Okhulupirika kwa Mulungu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati anthu akuyenera kukhala okhulupirika kwa Mulungu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa Francisco wayankhula izi lamulungu ku likulu la mpingo wa Katolika ku Vatican. Iye wati chimodzi mwa zizindikiro zokhala anthu okhulupirika kwa Mulungu ndiye kuyesetsa kupeza nthawi ndi kumapemphera ngakhale pomwe pali zambiri zotangwanitsa. Papa Francisco wati popemphera kawiri-kawiri akhristu amawonetsa kukhulupirika kwawo kwa Mulungu. Pamenepa iye wati chizindikiro china chosonyeza kukhala okhulupirika kwa Mulungu ndiye kuyesetsa kuchita bwino nthawi zonse maka kudzera mu kutumikira ena pogwira ntchito za chifundo ndipo nthawi zonse posawonetsa kutopa kulikonse. Pomaliza Papa Francisco wati akhristu amawonetsa kukhulupirika kwawo kwa Mulungu pokhala anthu opilira angakhale mu nyengo zovuta. Iye wamaliza ndi kupempha uneneri wa Amayi Maria kuti azithandiza akhristu kukhala anthu opilira monga Amayi Maria adawonetsa kupilira kwawo ngakhale adakumana ndi mavuto osiyana-siyana.
author: judith sonkho

title: Radio Maria Malawi Yatsiriza Kubwenza Ngongole ya MACRA
news: Radio Maria Malawi ili pa mndandanda wa wailesi zisanu ndi imodzi zomwe zakwanitsa kubwenza ngongole ya chiphaso ku bungwe loyang’anira ntchito zowulutsa mawu mdziko muno la Malawi Communications Regulatory Authority (MACRA). Malinga ndi chikalata chomwe bungwe la MACRA latulutsa lero ndipo chasayinidwa ndi mkulu wa bungweli a Daudi Suleman, Radio Maria Malawi yatsiriza kubwenza ngongole ya 15-million-kwacha yomwe inali nayo ku bungweli.  Wailesi zina zomwenso zatsiriza kubwenza ngongole zawo ndi za Radio Alinafe, Radio Tigabane, Pentecostal Life FM, Living Waters Radio komanso Blantyre Synod Radio zomwe zinapatsidwa malire pa 13 November kuti zikhale zitabwenza ndalamayi. Komabe kalatayi yati wailesi ya Calvary Family ili ndi ngongole ya ndalama zokwana 11-million-kwacha zoti ipereke pasanafike pa 21 November chaka chino. Pa 4 November chaka chino, bungwe la MACRA linawopseza wailesi zokwana zisanu ndi ziwiri kuti zitsekedwa ngati sizitsiriza kubwenza ngongole za chiphaso choyendetsera wailesizo pofika pa 13 November chaka chino.
author: judith sonkho

title: Ogwira Ntchito Ku NRB Anjatidwa Pomuganizira Kuti Amachita Zachinyengo
news: Apolisi ku mangochi amanga m’modzi mwa ogwira ntchito ku nthambi yowona za ziphaso za unzika ya National Registration Bureau (NRB) pomuganizira kuti amagwiritsa ntchito udindo wake molakwika. Mneneri wa apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Amina Daudi wati mkuluyu Kizito Matambo yemwe ndi wa zaka 47 zakubadwa wamangidwa lamulungu, anthu ena lachisanu atakadandaula ku polisi kuti mkuluyu amafuna ndalama zokwana 10 sauzande kwacha kuti awapangire chiphaso cha unzika. Wanjatidwa – Matambo “Pa 11 November munthu wina anapita kukapangitsa chiphaso ndiye mkuluyu anamuuza kuti pakufunika ndalama yokwana 10 sauzande kwacha. Munthu uja ananenelera mpka ndalama ija inafika pa 6 sauzande kwacha. Kenako munthu uja anakadandaula kwa makhansala omwe anadzatidziwitsa ndipo tamumanga dzulo,” anatero mayi Daudi. Padakalipano mkuluyu akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu komwe akayankhe mlandu wochita zachinyengo komanso ogwiritsa ntchito ofesi yake molakwika. Kumangidwa kwa mkuluyu kukudza patangopita sabata imodzi makhansala a bomalo atatseka ofesiyi ponena kuti simagwira ntchito yake moyenera. Lachiwiri sabata yatha wachiwiri kwa nduna yowona za maboma aang’ono mdziko muno mayi Halima Daudi analowelerapo pa nkhaniyi ndi kutsekulanso ofesiyi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Walangiza Ansembe Akhale Okonda Kupemphera
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ansembe amene samapemphera ndi operewera pa utumiki wawo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican pa mkumano wake ndi ansembe a ku Latin America omwe ntchito yawo ndi yosula asemino. Pa chifukwa ichi iye watsindika za kufunika koti asemino aziphunzitsidwa bwino za kufunika kwa mapemphero m’moyo wa wansembe. Papa Francisco wati wansembe amene samapemphera ndi osakwanira pa mlingo wa unsembe. Iye watchulapo zinthu zingapo zomwe wati ndi zofunika kwambiri. Poyamba Papa Francisco wati wansembe akuyenera kukhala pa ubale weniweni ndi Mulungu kudzera m’mapemphero ndipo wati wansembe akuyenera kukhala pa ubale wabwino ndi episkopi wake ponena kuti episkopi ndi tate wa ansembe. Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika-yu watinso ansembe okhaokha akuyenera kumakhalitsana bwino ndipo wadzudzula khalidwe la miseche pakati pa ansembe. Potsiriza iye wati ansembe akuyenera kukhalanso pa ubale wabwino ndi akhristu awo mu ma parish osiyana-siyana. Papa Francisco watsiriza ndi kulangiza ansembewa omwe ntchito yawo ndi kusula a semino kuti apewe kukakamira zinthu zomwe sizingathandize a semino m’moyo wawo wa mtsogolo ngati ansembe ponena kuti zilipo zinthu zina zomwe zaka za m’mbuyomu zidali zothandiza koma masiku ano zinthu zomwezo ndi zokanika kaamba koti zinthu tsopano zidasintha.
author: judith sonkho

title: PIL Yabweretsa Ma Lita 1 Million A Dizilo
news: Mafuta a galimoto a mtundu wa dizilo okwanira ma lita 1 million afika mdziko muno kudzera pa sitima ya pa njanji mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Potsikimiza za nkhaniyi, mkulu wa bungwe logula mafuta a galimoto kuchokera ku maiko akunja la Petroleum Importers Limited (PIL) a Martin Msimuko ati mafuta ena ochuluka ali mu njira kubwera mdziko muno. Sitima yomwe yabweretsa mafutawo Iye wati bungwe lawo lagulanso mafuta a petrol omwe akhale akulowa mdziko muno masiku akudzawa. “Ndizoona diesel ameneyu tamutenga ku Nacala komanso sabata yathayi tabweretsa 1.9 million litres diesel ndi ena 1 million a petro. Tikuyembekezera kuti tibweretsanso ena okwana 4 million azibwera masabata akudzawa,” anatero a Msimuko. Mafuta a galimoto makamaka a mtundu wa petrol akhala akusowa zomwe zachititsa kuti mitengo ya zinthu zosiyanasiyana ikwere. Kusowa kwa mafutaku, mwa zina akuti kwadza potsatira kusowa kwa ndalama za kunja.
author: judith sonkho

title: Dayosizi ya Mangochi Ikondwelera Kuti Yakwanitsa Zaka 50 Chaka Cha Mawa
news: Dayosizi ya Mangochi yati chaka cha mawa ikhala ikukondwelera kuti yakwanitsa zaka 50 chiyikhazikitsireni. Mlembi wa zautumiki mu dayosiziyo bambo Medrick Mlava ati mwambo waukulu wotsekulira chakachi uchitika pa 10 December chaka chino ku Mangochi Cathedral mu dayosiziyo komwenso adzalengeze tsiku lenileni lomwe chakachi chidzachitike mchaka cha 2023. Bambo Mlava: Tikhalanso ndi maulendo aku malo oyenera osiyanasiyana Iwo ati chakachi chikondweleredwa pa mutu woti; Zaka 50 za dayosizi ya Mangochi, kuzamitsa moyo wa uzimu, utumiki ndi kudzidalira; ndipo komiti yapadera yoyendetsa chakachi yakhazikitsidwa kale yomwe ikutsogoleredwa ndi Vicar General wa dayosiziyo bambo Davie Mambo. “Ndi zoonadi kuno ku dayosizi ya Mangochi chaka cha mawa tidzakhala ndi chikondwelero chimenechi ndipo aepiskopi athu Ambuye Montfort Stima alemba kalata yofotokozera bwino za nkhani imeneyi. Iwo asankha a Vicar General athu bambo Mambo kuti akhale wapampando wa chaka chimenechi,” anatero bambo Mlava. Iwo ati mkatikati mwa chakachi, mukhala zochitika zosiyanasiyana zokonzekeretsa akhristu za chikondwelerochi ndipo apempha akhristu kuti achulutse mapemphero kuti chakachi chidzayende bwino. “Tikhala ndi ma jubilee osiyanasiyana monga jubilee ya achinyamata, a mabanja, amayi, ovutika ndi ma jubilee ena. Tikhala ndi maulendo aku malo oyenera osiyanasiyana mu dayosizi yathu yomwe ino, kunja kwa dayosizi ngakhalenso kunja kwa dziko lino,” anatero bambo Mlava. Bambo Mlava ati episkopi wa dayosiziyo, ambuye Montfort Stima agwiritsanso ntchito chikondwelerochi pofuna kumva kuchokera kwa akhristu momwe akufunira kuti mpingo udziyendera komanso kudziwa chiwerengero cha akhristu mu dayosiziyo powerenga m’modzi modzi zomwe zithandizire kudziwa ngati dayosiziyo ikukula kapena ayi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Bambo Wina Wafa Akukumba Golide ku Ntcheu
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 64 zakubadwa wa m’boma la Ntcheu, wamwalira chipupa cha dzenje limene amakumba chitamugwera. Mneneri wa apolisi m’bomalo Rabecca Ndiwate wati bamboyu wamwalira ku mtsinje wa Likudzi, komwe amakasaka miyala yamtengo wapatali ya golide. Iwo ati izi zachitika m’mudzi mwa Banda mfumu yaikulu Tsikulamowa m’bomalo. “Bamboyu ndi Haswell Yona ndipo patsikuli anapita ku mtsinje wa Likudzi kukakumba golide koma ali mkati mokumba dzenjelo linagumuka. Anthu anakadziwitsa apolisi yathu pa Senzani ndipo achipatala cha Manjawira atapita ndi kuyeza thupilo, anapeza kuti amwalira kaamba kobanika,” anatero mayi Ndiwate. Padakalipano apolisiwa apempha anthu m’bomalo kuti apewe m’chitidwe oyika miyoyo yawo pa chiwopsezo.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wadalitsa Chifanizo Cha Munthu Wovutika
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wadalitsa chifanizo chosema chomwe chizikumbutsa anthu mavuto omwe anthu omwe alibe nyumba yokhalamo amakumana nawo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, mwambowu wachitika lachitatu ku likulu la mpingo wa Katolika ku Vatican. Chifanizo cha munthu osauka chomwe Papa wadalitsa Mwambowu wachitika pano pomwe mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse ukukonzekera tsiku loganizira ndi kupempherera anthu osauka lomwe ndi lamulungu likudzali pa 13 November lomwenso ndi lamulungu la 33 pa chaka mu mpingo. Chifanizochi, sculpture m’chingerezi chapangidwa ndi Timothy Schmalz wa m’dziko la Canada ndipo  chikuwonetsa munthu wosowa malo okhala yemwe wagona ndi kufunda bulangete pa malo osatetezeka komanso bulangetelo likukokedwa ndi mbalame. Cholinga china cha chifanizochi ndi kuti anthu akadziwa mavuto a anthu osowa pokhala azichitapo kanthu pochepetsa mavutowo monga kuwapezera anthuwo malo okhala. Papa Francisco ndi yemwe adakhazikitsa tsiku loganizira anthu osauka m’chaka cha 2016 kudzera mu kalata yake yotchedwa Misericordia et Misera, Mercy and Misery yomwe idali yokondwelera kutha kwa Chaka cha Chifundo cha Mulungu, Extraordinary Jubilee Year of Mercy.
author: judith sonkho

title: Bungwe La Light to Care Lamanga Chipinda Cha Anthu Odwala Mwa Kayakaya Pa Chipatala Cha Kasungu
news: Mkulu wa zaumoyo m’boma la Kasungu, Dr. Emmanuel Golombe wayamikira ntchito yomwe bungwe la Light to Care Malawi yagwira pomanga chipinda cha anthu odwala mwakayakaya pa chipatala cha Kasungu. Iwo amayankhula izi lachitatu pa chipatalachi pomwe bungweli limapereka chipinda cha High Dependent Unit chomwe chamangidwa pa chipatalachi. Dr. Golombe anati chipinda chimenechi ndi chofunika kwambiri popeza kuti odwalika mwakayakaya onse adzigonekedwa pa chipatalachi. “Chipatala cha Kasungu ndi chipatala cha pakanthawi ndithu chomwe chinatsekulidwa ndi mtsogoleri wakale wa dziko lino malemu Dr. Hastings Kamuzu Banda m’chaka cha 1967 koma chitsekulireni nthawi imeneyo chipatalachi chinalibe malo ngati amenewa,” anatero Dr. Golombe. Poyankhulapo Dr. Annie Phoya yemwe ndi wapampando wa board ya bungwe la Light to Care Malawi anati ndi okondwa powona kuti ntchitoyi yatha ndipo izi zikutanthauza kuti anthu odwalika tsopano adzigonekedwa mu chipindachi. “Tachita izi powona momwe nthenda ya Coronavirus inazunzira anthu a m’boma lino omwe amasowa powagoneka akakhala kuti akudikira thandizo la mankhwala. Izi zimachititsa kuti odwalawa aziwatumiza ku Kamuzu Central Hospital mu mzinda wa Lilongwe komwe ambiri mwai wo amafera mu njira asanafike,” anatero Dr. Phoya. A Phoya anati bungwe lawo lagwiritsa ntchito ndalama zokwana 100,000 US Dollars pa ntchitoyi ndipo ati ndalamazi zagwiritsidwa ntchito pophunzitsira anthu oti adzigwira ntchito m’chipindachi, kukonzera malo osungiramo Oxygen, kugulira zida zipangizo za oxygen, mabedi ndinso kukonzera mazenela a malowa. Dr. Phoya ati maboma asanu omwe ndi Rumphi, Kasungu, Salima, Mangochi ndi Mulanje ndi omwe apindula ndi thandizoli.
author: judith sonkho

title: Anthu Asanu Anjatidwa Kaamba Koba, Kuwononga Katundu Wa Eni
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa akusunga m’chitolokosi chawo anthu asanu kaamba kowaganizira kuti aba ndi kuwononga katundu wosiyanasiyana m’nyumba ya mayi wina yemwe akumuganizira kuti anapha mwana wake masiku apitawa. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha wati anthuwa agwidwa usiku wa p a9 November 2022 pa chipikisheni chomwe apolisi anachita m’mudzi mwa Mikolo m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Msakambewa m’bomalo. Izi zachitika potsatira chipolowe chomwe chinachitika m’mudziwu pa 4 November chaka chino pomwe anthu ena anagumula nyumba ziwiri potsatira imfa ya mwana wa zaka ziwiri yemwe akuganiziridwa kuti anaphedwa ndi mayi wake. Oganiziridwawa ndi Daniel Alfred wa zaka 22, Christopher Chipeta wa zaka 20, Joseph Alfred wa zaka 20, Alfred Labson Kamazinje wa zaka 19 ndi Khalidwe Raphael wa zaka 35; onsewa a m’mudzi mwa Mikolo m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Msakambewa m’bomalo. Pakadali pano anthuwa ali m’manja mwa apolisi kudikira kuti akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu komwe akayankhe mlanduwu.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Imfa Ya Mkulu Wa Mpingo Wa Orthodox ku Cyprus
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya Archbishop wa mpingo wa Orthodox m’dziko la Cyprus, Archbishop Chrysostomos wachiwiri . Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lero ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican. Papa Francisko ndi Archbishop Chrysostomos wachiwiri  Iye wati ndi wa chisoni chachikulu kaamba ka imfayi makamaka pokumbukira kuti Archbishop’ yu adali munthu wokonda mtendere komanso yemwe adali kulimbikitsa kukambirana ngati njira yofuna kuthetsa kusamvana kulikonse pakati pa anthu. Papa Francisco wati Archbishop Chrysostomos wachiwiri adali munthu wa masomphenya ndipo wati akukumbukira bwino za mkumano wawo m’dziko la Cyprus mwezi wa December chaka chatha pomwe iye adakacheza m’dzikolo. Iye wati akukumbukiranso kuti Archbishop’yu adali nawo pa mwambo wa maliro a Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri ku Vatican komanso pa mwambo womukhazika Papa Benedicto wa 16 pa mpando wa u Papa m’chaka cha 2005. Archbishop Chrysostomos wachiwiri, yemwe adali mkulu wa mpingo wa Orthodox m’dziko la Cyprus wamwalira ndi nthenda ya cancer lolemba sabata ino pa 7 November ali ndi zaka 81.
author: judith sonkho

title: Ambuye Stima Alangiza Atsikana Apewe Kutenga Pathupi Adakali Achichepere
news: Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi, Ambuye Montfort Stima alimbikitsa atsikana mdziko muno kuti apewe kutenga pathupi adakali achichepere. Ambuye Stima anena izi lachiwiri ku Mangochi pa mwambo omwe wailesi ya kanena ya mpingo wa Katolika ya Luntha mogwirizana ndi mabungwe ena inakonza pofuna kulimbikitsa maphunziro a atsikana ndi kuthetsa nkhanza zosiyanasiyana zomwe amayi amakumana nazo. Ambuye Stima: Asathamangire zinthu za m’banja Iwo anati ndi kofunika kuti atsikana asathamangire kulowa m’banja koma kulimbikira pa maphunziro kuti adzakhale mzika zodalirika za mdziko muno. “Tikuyenera kuwaphunzitsa ana athu kuti adikire kaye asathamangire zinthu za m’banja. Zimene zija ndi za akuluakulu ndiye iwonso adikire akafika zaka 18 kupita kutsogolo chifukwa akapanda kudikira ndi mmene akumapezeka atenga mimba adakali ana,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Iwo anadzudzula zikhalidwe zina za anthu zomwe akuti zikuthandizira kuti ana adzitenga pathupi adakali achichepere. “Akapita ku chinamwali amakawaphunzitsa zinthu zoyipa zoti asamaope amuna ndi zina. Ife nafenso ngati mpingo tili ndi mabuku athu ndipo timawauza atsatire zomwe tikuwaphunzitsa chifukwa akatsatira zachikunjazo ziwapezetsa mavuto,” anapitiriza motero Ambuye Stima. Poyankhulapo pa nkhaniyi nduna yowona za kusasiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo, chitukuko cha m’madera komanso chisamaliro cha wathu, mayi Patricia Kaliati ati ndi kofunika kugwirana manja pothetsa m’chitidwewu omwe akuti unakhazikika pakati pa anthu mdziko muno.
author: judith sonkho

title: Ofesi ya NRB ku Mangochi Yatsekulidwa
news: Wachiwiri kwa nduna yowona za maboma aang’ono mdziko muno mayi Halima Daudi, atsekula ofesi ya nthambi yowona za ziphaso za unzika ya National Registration Bureau (NRB) ya m’boma la Mangochi yomwe makhansala a m’bomalo anatseka lachitatu sabata yatha pa nkhani zokhudza kusayenda bwino kwa ntchito za ofesiyi. Poyankhula pa nthawi yomwe amatsekula ofesiyi, mayi Daudi auza ogwira ntchito ku nthambiyi kuti ziphaso zonse zomwe zili mu ofesiyi zikhale zitaperekedwa kwa eni ake pofika mawa. Nduna itangotsekula kumene ofesiyo Iwo awopseza kuti ogwira ntchito ku nthambiyi amene apezeke akuchita chinyengo pofuna kupangira munthu chiphaso cha unzika, adzamangidwa. “Pano pamamvekanso nkhani zokhudza katangale kuti ogwira ntchito akumakakamiza anthu kuti awapatse ndalama ngati akufuna kuti ajambulitse kapena atenge chiphaso chawo cha unzika ndiye ndawachenjeza kuti aliyense amene atapezeke akupanga zimenezo apolisi agwira ntchito. Iwowa aalembedwa ntchito ndipo timawalipira ndalama choncho palibe chifukwa choti azifunanso ndalama kuchokera kwa anthu,” anatero mayi Daudi. Mayi Daudi (avala cha chikasu) kuyankhula kwa ogwira ntchito atangotsekula kumene ofesiyo Poyankhulapo wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa khonsolo ya boma la Mangochi, khansala Hassan Chikuta wati ndi okondwa kuti zomwe amafuna zatheka ndipo akuyembekezera kusintha kuchoka ku nthambiyi. Ndunayi inali limodzi ndi mlangizi wa president pa nkhani za mafumu a Moses Kumkuyu komanso wachiwiri kwa mlangizi wa president pa nkhani za chipembedzo Sheikh Hashim Abasi. Padakalipano malipoti akusonyeza kuti yemwe anali mkulu wa nthambi ya NRB m’bomalo wachotsedwa pa malowa ndipo adzikagwira ntchito ku Machinga.
author: judith sonkho

title: Polisi ya Bvumbwe Yatsekulidwanso
news: Nthambi ya polisi yatsekulanso polisi ya Bvumbwe m’boma la Thyolo. Poyankhula potsekulanso polisiyi, mkulu wa apolisi m’chigawo chakum’mwera chakum’mawa kwa dziko lino Commissioner Richard Luhanga, wapempha apolisi omwe adzigwira ntchito pa malowa kuti adzigwira ntchito yawo motsata malamulo kuti apewe mavuto ngati omwe anawonongetsa polisiyi m’mbuyomu. A Luhanga kusayinira mgwirizano  potsekulira polisiyo Polisi ya Bvumbwe inatsekedwa m’mwezi wa January chaka chino potsatira mpungwepungwe omwe unadza munthu wina atafa ali m’manja mwa apolisi ndipo mpungwepungwewu ndi omwe unachititsa kuti polisiyi itenthedwe ndipo anthu awiri anaphedwa. “Polisi ya Bvumbwe imatumikira dera lalikulu kwambiri imakafika ku Mapelera ku East Bank mbali inayi malire ndi Limbe kwinaku kukafika mpaka ku Ndata. Choncho dera lonseli linali pa mavuto aakulu chifukwa cha kusowa kwa polisi imeneyi,” anatero Commissioner Luhanga. Poyankhulapo mfumu yaikulu ya derali, Inkosi Bvumbwe yati yayika ndondomeko zapadera zothandiza anthu kumvetsa kufunika kwa polisi komanso kutsata malamulo pomwe akufuna chilungamo kudzera ku polisi. “Pa nthawi imene tinalibe polisi kuno, anthu angapo aphedwa, katundu wa anthu kubedwa ndiye tatengerapo phunziro,” inatero Inkosi Bvumbwe.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wapempha Mapemphero Apadera Opemphelera Ana Ovutika
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha mapemphero opempherera ana onse omwe akuvutika mu njira zosiyana-siyana pa dziko lonse la pansi. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa Francisco wapereka pempholi posinkhasinkha cholinga cha mapemphero ake mwezi uno wa November. Papa kupemphelera mwana Iye wati ndi udindo wa munthu aliyense kutengapo gawo pa kusamalira ana onse osowa chisamaliro. Papa Francisco wati pali ana a nkhaninkhani omwe akukakamizidwa kusanduka a kapolo kaamba kosalabadiridwa. Iye wati chinthu chomwe anthu akuyenera kumakumbukira ndi chakuti iwonso ndi ana a Mulungu ndipo olengedwa mu chifaniziro cha Mulungu. “Ana omwe salabadiridwa, omwe saapita ku sukulu, omwe salandira chisamaliro cha ku chipatala, ana osowa chisamaliro cha makolo amawonetsa poyera kulephera kwa anthu onse achikulire powasamalira ndipo kulira kwawo kumamveka kwa Mulungu,” anatero Papa Francisko. Iye wati kudzera mu chikondi chomwe ana angawonetseredwe, kudzakhala kosavuta kuti anawa azindikire kuti Mulungu ndi chikondi ndipo kuti amawakonda. Malinga ndi bungwe la UNICEF, ana pafupifupi 1 billion ali mu mavuto osiyana-siyana osowa maphunziro, chisamaliro cha ku chipatala, malo okhala, chakudya, madzi a ukhondo ndi zina. Bungweli lati ana pafupifupi 153 million ndi amasiye.
author: judith sonkho

title: Boma Lati Likhwimitsa Chitetezo M’malo Osungira Nyama Zakutchire
news: Unduna wa zokopa alendo, chikhalidwe ndi nyama zakutchire wati ukhwimitsa chitetezo mmalo osungira nyama za kutchire pofuna kuti nyamazi zitetezeke. Wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa nthambi yowona za chilengedwe ku undunawu a Davis Kalima anena izi lachisanu ku Liwonde m’boma la Machinga pambuyo pa maphunziro a alenje a boma okwana 30 a m’malo osungira nyama zakutchire a Liwonde, Majete ndi Nkhotakota. Iwo ati undunawu upitiriza kuphunzitsa komanso kulemba ntchito alenje ochuluka kuti nyama za mu nkhalangozi zitetezeke. “Tili ndi mapulani oti tilembenso ntchito anthu ena okwana 100 oti adzikapereka chitetezo mu nkhalango zitatu zimenezi za Majete, Liwonde ndi Nkhotakota. Tikufuna kuti nyama zitetezeke,” anatero a Kalima. Poyankhulapo mkulu woyimira bungwe la African Parks lomwe limayang’anira nkhalangozi, a Samuel Kamoto ati bungwe lawo ndi lodzipereka potukula ntchito zoteteza nyama zachilengedwe. “Tinapanga invest ndalama zoposa 20 billion dollars mu ntchito imeneyi yoteteza nyama zakutchire ndipo ife tipitiriza kutero chifukwa zimenezi ndi zomwe zimakopa alendo pambuyo pake dziko limapeza ndalama za kunja,” anatero a Kamoto.
author: judith sonkho

title: Bungwe la GIZ Lalimbikitsa Boma Liyike Chidwi Pa Magetsi A Mphamvu Ya Dzuwa
news: Bungwe la mdziko la Germany la GIZ lalangiza boma kuti liyike chidwi chake pa ntchito yopanga magetsi kuchokera ku mphamvu ya dzuwa. Mkulu wa bungweli mdziko muno Alan Walsch wanena izi lachinayi pa chipatala cha Kadango mdera la mfumu yaikulu Namabvi m’boma la Mangochi pa mwambo wopereka zipangizo za magetsi a mphamvu ya dzuwa omwe bungweli layika pa chipatalacho ndi malo ena asanu ndi awiri. Walsch: Kuno ku Malawi kumakhala dzuwa lochuluka kwambiri Iye wati dziko la Malawi limakhala ndi dzuwa lochuluka lomwe litha kugwiritsidwa ntchito popangira magetsi mosayembekezera magetsi a bungwe la ESCOM omwe padakalipano ndi osadalirika. “Kuno ku Malawi kumakhala dzuwa lochuluka kwambiri kusiyanitsa ndi mayiko ena komwe dzuwa ndi losowa ndipo kuti tipange zimenezi sizingatheke. Tikuyenera tsopano ngati dziko, tilimbikitse za magetsi amenewa chifukwa ndi odalirika kwambiri,” anatero a Walsch. Poyankhulapo mkulu owona za madyedwe abwino ku khonsolo ya boma la Mangochi, a Charles Lomoni omwe anayimira bwanamkubwa wa bomali pa mwambowo, anayamikira bungwe la GIZ kaamba kobweretsa chitukukochi pa chipatalachi ponena kuti zithandizira kukweza ntchito za umoyo m’bomalo. “Ndife okondwa kwambiri chifukwa cha chitukuko chimenechi. Izi ndi zinthu zimene zili zosowa ndithu ndipo tikuwapempha kuti apitirize kutithaniza ife a m’boma lino la Mangochi. Koma tipemphe ogwira ntchito pano komanso anthu ozungulira chipatala chimenechi kuti akhale ndi umwini posamalira zinthu zimenezi,” anatero a Lomoni. Lomoni ndi Gondwe (kumanzere) kulandira katunduyo kuchokera kwa Walsch ndi ena Mkulu woyendetsa chipatala cha Kadango mayi Emma Gondwe anati kubwera kwa magetsi ochokera ku mphamvu ya dzuwa-wa kwathandiza kuti uchembere uyambe kuyenda bwino pa chipatalacho kusiyana ndi m’mbuyomu komanso kuti kwapereka chilimbikitso kwa ogwira ntchito pa malowa. “M’mbuyomu timawuza amayi oyembekezera kuti akamabwera kudzachira adzitenga torch kapena kandulo koma padakalipano imeneyo ndi mbiri yakale chifukwa pano ngakhale magetsi a ESCOM azime, ife timakhala tili m’magetsi chifukwa cha solar imeneyi ndipo pano tasiya kudalira magetsi a ESCOM chifukwa mayunitsi tinagula kalekale pano tikumagwiritsa ntchito solar yomweyi,” anatero mayi Gondwe. Chipatala cha Kadango chimathandiza anthu oposa 15,895 ndipo padakalipano kutsatira kubwera kwa magetsi a mphamvu ya dzuwa-wa, chipatalachi chikumalandira amayi oposa 50 omwe akumazachilira pa chipatalacho mwezi uliwonse. Bungwe la GIZ kudzera mu project yotchedwa Energising Development (EnDev) ndi thandizo lochoka ku dziko la Iceland layika makina a magetsi ochokera ku mphamvu za dzuwa omwe mphamvu yake ndi 40Kwh, m’malo asanu ndi atatu m’boma la Mangochi omwe ndi sukulu zinayi komanso zipatala zinayi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Mafumu ku Machinga Akana Ndondomeko Yothandiza Anthu Omwe Akhudzidwa Ndi Njala
news: Mafumu a m’boma la Machinga akana ndondomeko ya nthambi ya boma yowona ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi yofuna kupereka chimanga kwa mabanja omwe akhudzidwa ndi kusowa kwa chakudya m’bomalo. M’modzi mwa mafumuwa Senior Chief Nyambi yati mafumuwa sakugwirizana ndi chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akuyenera kulandira thandizoli kaamba koti ndi chochepa kwambiri kuyerekeza ndi anthu omwe akuvutika ndi njala m’bomalo. Mafumuwa akana izi pa mkumano omwe nthambi ya DoDMA inakonzera mafumu, makhansala komanso aphungu akunyumba ya malamulo a m’bomalo ndi cholinga chowafotokozera za ndondomekoyi. Iwo ati akufuna kuti nthambiyi ikhalenso pansi ndi kuwonjezera chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akuyembekezera kulandira thandizo la chakudyachi. “Tikayerekeza ndi anthu omwe akuvutika ndi njala m’boma lino la Machinga, nambala yomwe aperekayo yachepa kwambiri. Chaka chatha kuno ambiri sanakolore chifukwa mvula sinabwere bwino. Madera ambiri anthu alibe chakudya,” inatero Senior Chief Nyambi. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa akuluakulu ku nthambi yowona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi omwe anakapereka ndondomekoyi ku machinga a Ephord Kachigwada anati akhala pansi ndi akuluakulu a khonsoloyo lolemba likudzali kuti akambiranenso za nkhaniyi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Papa Wadzudzula Mchitidwe Wopha Anthu Omwe Apha Anthu Anzawo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati m’chitidwe wopha ena kaamba koti adapha anzawo kapena chifukwa choti apalamula milandu ikuluikulu, ndi m’chitidwe woyipa ndipo ukuyenera kuthetsedwa. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi dzulo m’dziko la Bahrain pa tsiku loyamba la ulendo wake wa masiku anayi wocheza m’dzikolo pamene anachita mkumano ndi atsogoleri a ndale a dzikolo, atsogoleri a mabungwe omwe si a boma komanso akazembe oyimira maiko awo m’dziko la Bahrain. Papa kuyankhula kwa akuluakulu a dziko la Bahrain Iye wati m’chitidwewu ndi woyipa ndipo ukuyenera kuthetsedwa ponena kuti Mulungu ndi amene amapereka mphatso ya moyo ndipo kuti ndi Mulungu mwini wake yekhayo amenenso ali ndi mphamvu yotenga moyowo. Iye watsindika za kufunika kulolerana, kulemekezana, komanso za kufunika kwa ufulu wa chipembedzo. Papa Francisco wati ali m’dzikolo ndi cholinga chofuna kulalikira za kufunika kwa mtendere. Mwazina, Papa Francisco akhala nawo pa msonkhano wolimbikitsa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu, Bahrain Forum for Dialogue: East and West for Human Coexistence ndipo kenako achita mkumano ndi akuluakulu a chipembedzo cha chisilamu.
author: judith sonkho

title: Anthu 450 Akudwala Kolera Pa Chipatala Cha Koche ku Mangochi
news: Chipatala cha mpingo wa Katolika cha Koche m’boma la Mangochi, chadandaula kaamba ka kuchuluka kwa anthu omwe akugonekedwa pa chipatalacho kaamba ka nthenda ya Kolera. Yemwe akugwirizira udindo wa mkulu woyendetsa chipatalachi, Sister Cecilia Namuthuwa ati padakalipano chipatalachi chili ndi anthu okwana 450 omwe agonekedwa kaamba ka nthendayi zomwe ati zikusokoneza magwiridwe ntchito a chipatalachi. Ena mwa odwala kulandira thandizo pa chipatalacho pansi pa mtengo Iwo ati padakalipano anthuwa akuthandiziridwa pansi pa mitengo kaamba koti malo osamalira anthuwa ndi ochepa ndipo apempha magulu osiyanasiyana kuti athandize chipatalachi ndi mabedi komanso ma tent kuphatikizapo ogwira ntchito okwanira kuti akwanitse kulimbana ndi mliriwu.  “Dzulo lokha usiku talandira anthu oposa 30 amene tawagoneka ndipo m’modzi wamwalira usikuwu. Zikutivuta kwambiri chifukwa ogwira ntchito ndi ochepa ndiye kuti omwewo athandize odwala matenda a nthawi zonse, omwewo athandize odwala Kolera sizikutheka bwino bwino. Odwalawa panopa akungogona pa mchenga chifukwa tilibe ma tent, ma drip tikungokoleka pa mitengo ndipo ena angogwirizira drip m’manja mwawo chifukwa tilibe ma drip stand. Anthu atatithandiza ndi ma drip stand, ma tent komanso ogwira ntchito ena ndikukhulupilira kuti titha kuyesetsa kulimbana nthendayi,” anatero Sister Namuthuwa. Poyankhulapo pa nkhaniyi, bambo mfumu a Parishi ya Koche, bambo Paul Rappozo omwe anapita kukapemphelera odwala pa chipatalachi, alangiza anthu mdziko muno kuti azitsatira ndondomeko zopewera nthendayi ndipo alimbikitsa odwalawa kuti asataye mtima. Bambo Rappozo kudalitsa malo omwe odwala Kolera akulandilira thandizo la mankhwala pa chipatala cha Koche “Tikudziwa kuti palibenso kwina komwe tingathawire. Ndi Yesu yekha amene angatithandize ndipo ife tili ndi chikhulupiliro kuti Ambuye alowelerapo ndi kuchiza anthu amenewa amene akhudzidwa ndi mliriwu komanso kupereka mphamvu zochuluka kwa ogwira ntchito pano,” anatero bambo Rappozo. Anthu okwana asanu ndi anayi ndi omwe afa ndi nthendayi pa chipatalacho kuchokera pa 19 October pomwe panagonekedwa anthu atatu oyamba kaamba ka nthendayi.
author: judith sonkho

title: Anjatidwa Atapezeka Ndi Matumba 6 A Chamba M’boma La Nkhotakota
news: Apolisi m’boma la Nkhotakota akusunga m’chitokosi mnyamata wa zaka 21 kaamba komuganizira kuti wapezeka ndi matumba a chamba popanda chiphaso chomuvomereza kutero. Ali ndi matumba ake a chamba Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Paul Malimwe wati pa 31 October chaka chino, apolisi anatsinidwa khutu ndi anthu akufuna kwabwino kuti mkuluyu Sean Ali wanyamula matumba a chamba pogwiritsa ntchito galimoto ya mtundu wa Scania truck nambala yake BX 9229 yomwe imachokera ku Dwangwa kulowera ku salima mu nsewu waukulu wa M5. Apolisi atachita kalondolondo, anagwira galimotolo ndipo atachita chipikisheni anapeza matumba asanu ndi imodzi ndiponso majumbo 19 a chamba. Atamufunsa iye anati ali ndi chiphaso chovomerezeka chochitira malondawa koma atamupempha kuti atulutse zikalatazo mkuluyu analephera kutulutsa zomwe zinachititsa kuti amumange. Pakadali pano woganiziridwayu ali m’manja mwa apolisi kudikira kuti akawonekere ku bwalo la milandu komwe akayankhe mlandu wopezeka ndi chamba popanda chilorezo. Sean Ali amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kawawa mdera la mfumu yaikulu Chitera m’boma la Chiradzulu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Amuna Awiri Adzipha Pozikhweza M’boma la Nkhatabay
news: Abambo awiri adzipha podzikhweza ku Chintheche m’boma la Nkhatabay. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sergeant Kondwani James, malemuwa ndi a Thom Mphande a zaka 69 komanso a ndi a Andrew Siame a zaka 45 zakubadwa. Mneneri wa apolisiyu wati a Thom Mphande adzipha podzimangilira kaamba koti amakanganirana malo ndi achibale awo pomwe a Siame adzipha kaamba kakusagwirizana pakati pa iwo ndi mkazi wawo. apolice mbomali alangiza Anthu kuti apewe kuchotsa moyo wawo pakakhala kusamvana pakati pawo. Matupi a anthuwa anatengeredwa ku chipatala cha Chintheche komwe zatsimikizika kuti anthuwa afa kaamba kobanika ndi chingwe. Pamenepa apolisi m’bomalo alangiza anthu kuti akafunse maganizo ku malo osiyanasiyana ngati akumana ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana osati kudzipha. A Mphande anali ochokera m’mudzi mwa Mpalawezi m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Malanda m’boma la Nkhatabay ndipo a Andrew Siame anali ochokera a m’mudzi mwa Muyepa mfumu yaikulu Kanyenda m’boma la Nkhotakota
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati ndi Wokhudzidwa ndi Imfa ya Anthu Ochuluka Mdziko la South Korea
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya anthu ochuluka m’dziko la South Korea. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican, potsatira imfa ya anthu ochuluka omwe afa pa mwambo wa chisangalalo china mu mzinda wa Seoul m’dziko la South Korea ku mapeto a sabata yangotha kumeneyi. Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri makamaka chifukwa ambiri omwe afa ndi achinyamata. Papa Francisco wati wayikiza m’mapemphero onse omwe afa komanso wati akufunira onse omwe avulazidwa kuchira mwa msanga. Malipoti akuti anthu oposa 153 afa ndipo anthu oposa 82 avulala potsatira mpungwepungwe omwe unabuka pa chisangalalo china mu mzinda wa Seoul ku South Korea ndipo akuti ambiri mwa anthuwa adafa kaamba ka kubanika. Padakali pano a episkopi a mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la South Korea apempha boma kuti lifufuze ndi kupeza chenicheni chomwe chidachitika kuti anthu ochuluka chotere afe ndi kuvulala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadandaula Kaamba Ka Chiwembu Cha Mdziko La Somalia
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya anthu ochuluka omwe aphedwa pa chiwembu m’dziko la Somalia. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lamulungu ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican, poyankhula kwa anthu omwe adasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso poyankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wailesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Malo amene achitidwa chiwembu mdziko la Somalia Iye wati wayikiza m’mapemphero anthu onse omwe afa komanso kuvulala ndipo wati ndi pemphero lake kuti Mulungu awayendere mwa pa dera onse omwe achita za upanduzi powalengera mtima watsopano. Malipoti akusonyeza kuti loweruka lapitali anthu 100 aphedwa ndipo anthu oposa 300 avulala potsatira kuphulika kwa ma bomba pa galimoto ziwiri mu mzinda wa Mogadishu m’dziko la Somalia. Gulu la Al-Shabab lomwe limatumikira gulu la Al-Qaeda lati ndi lomwe lachita za upanduzi. Atayendera malo omwe kwachitika chiwembuchi, mtsogoleri wa dziko la Somalia, Hassan Sheikh Mohamud wati pali chiyembekezo chakuti chiwerengero cha anthu omwe afa ndi kuvulala chikwera. Masiku apitawa, iye adalonjeza kuti athana ndi magulu a za uchifwamba m’dzikolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lipempha Mafumu Athandize Pothetsa Mchitidwe Wozembetsa Anthu
news: Nduna yowona za maboma aang’ono mdziko muno Professor Blessings Chinsinga wapempha mafumu kuti agwirane manja ndi boma pothetsa mchitidwe wozembetsa anthu kupita nawo m’maiko a kunja omwe akuti wakula kwambiri. Chinsinga: Mchitidwewu ndi waukulu kwambiri Professor Chinsinga amayankhula izi lachiwiri kwa mfumu yaikulu Mwase m’boma la Kasungu pa mwambo wokhazikitsa mfumuyi kukhala Senior Chief. Iwo anati zimenezi zikuchitika kwambiri m’maboma omwe ali m’malire a dziko lino ndi maiko ena ndipo iwo akukhulupilira kuti mafumu atatengapo mbali pa m’chitidwewu, ukhoza kuchepa. “Mchitidwewu ndi waukulu kwambiri kuno ku Malawi ndiye tikufuna kuti mafumu akhale tcheru kudziwitsa anthu awo kuti atithandize pothetsa mchitidwe umenewu. Akawona zimenezi zikuchitika akuyenera adziwitse apolisi mwachangu chifukwa anthu ambiri akachoka mdziko muno, timakhala ndi anthu ochepa oti atithandize pa chitukuko cha dziko lino,” anatero Professor Chinsinga. Ndunayi yadandaulanso ndi mchitidwe wa anthu ena mdziko muno ogulitsa malo kwa anthu obwera monga mzika za mdziko la Rwanda, Burundi ndi ena zomwe aknati zitha kuchititsa kuti kutsogolo kuno eni nthaka adzasowe malo. Poyankhulapo imodzi mwa mafumu akuluakulu m’boma la Kasungu Senior Chief Lukwa anati kumbali yawo mafumu ayesetsa polimbana ndi m’chitidwewu. “Zoonadi kuti ku Malawi kuno anthu akumapita kunja kukagwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana ndipo ifeyo mafumu tikumalekeleradi kuti anthu athu adzipita m’maiko ena. Ife tiyesetsa kuti tithandize pobweretsa kusintha pa nkhaniyi,” anatero Senior Chief Lukwa. Pamwambowu panafika mafumu, ogwira ntchito za boma, a ndale ndi anthu ochuluka omwe anadzachitira umboni kukwezedwa kwa mfumuyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Mkumano ndi Aepiskopi a Mdziko la Madagascar
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wachita mkumano ndi a episkopi a m’dziko la Madagascar. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, mkumanowu wachitika lachinayi ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Papa Francisko ndi aepiskopi a mpingo wa Katolika mdziko la Madagascar Aepiskopiwa anaperekezedwa ndi gulu la asisitere komanso ansembe a m’dziko la Madagascar. Mkumano ngati umenewu wa pakati pa Papa ndi a episkopi a dziko lililonse omwe malinga ndi malamulo a mpingo wa Katolika (Canon Law) umayenera kuchitika zaka zisanu zilizonse, umadziwika m’chilatini kuti ad limina Apostol rum. Poyankhula pa mwambowu, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kolimbikitsa ubale wabwino pakati pa atumiki a Mulungu. Iye wati atumiki a Mulungu akuyenera kukhala chitsanzo kwa ena pomakondana, kulemekezana ndi kumathandizana. Papa Francisco watsiriza ndi kunena kuti atumiki a Mulungu akuyenera kukhala chizindikiro cha chiyembekezo kwa anthu omwe akuwatumikira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mpingo Uganizira Anthu Osauka Pa 13 November
news: Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko muno wati akhristu a mpingowu, adzachita mwambo woganizira ndi kupemphelera anthu osauka pa 13 November chaka chino. Tsikuli limaganiziridwa chaka chilichonse lamulungu la 33 mu nyengo ya pa chaka ndipo chaka chino tsikuli liganiziridwa pa mutu woti “Chifukwa cha inu Khristu, adasankha kukhala wosauka,” For your sake Christ became poor, mawu ochokera mu kalata yachiwiri ya Paulo Woyera kwa Akorinto; mutu 8 ndime ya 9. Kalata yomwe yasayinidwa ndi mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la a episkopi a mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko muno, bambo Alfred Chaima, yapempha akhristu kuti akonzekere bwino zatsikuli. “Papa Francisco akutsindika za kufunika koti munthu aliyense akhale ndi udindo wochitapo kanthu ndi kuthandiza anthu osauka ndipo pa chifukwa ichi malimana kaya kuti miphakati ikuyenera kufufuza ndi kuthandiza anthu osauka m’madera awo,” yatero kalatayo. Kalatayi yati tchalitchi cha Saint William (Mpale) yomwe ndi nthambi ya Saint Francis Parish mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe ndi chomwe chasankhidwa kuti kudzachitikire mwambo waukulu pa tsikuli m’dziko muno. Papa Francisco ndi yemwe adakhazikitsa tsiku loganizira anthu osauka m’chaka cha 2016 kudzera mu kalata yake yotchedwa Misericordia et Misera (Mercy and Misery) yomwe idali yokondwelera kutha kwa Chaka cha Chifundo cha Mulungu, Extraordinary Jubilee Year of Mercy.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Alandira Makalata a Kazembe wa Dziko la Bahrain ku Vatican
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco walandira makalata a ukazembe kuchokera kwa kazembe watsopano woyimira dziko Bahrain ku Vatican, a Muhammad Abdul Ghaffar. Papa Francisko ndi kazembe wa dziko la Bahrain ku Vatican Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, mwambowu wachitika lachinayi ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Awiriwa akambirana nkhani zosiyanasiyana zokomera mbali ziwirizi ndipo pambuyo pa zokambirana zawo m’kachipinda komata, atsogoleri awiriwa adasinthana mphatso. Papa wapereka kwa kazembe-yu zina mwa zolembalemba zake monga kalata yake yofotokoza za kufunika kwa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu yotchedwa Fratelli Tutti komanso mendulo yokondwelera zaka khumi ali pa mpando wa u Papa. Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kukacheza m’dziko la Bahrain kuyambira pa 3 mpaka pa 6 November chaka chino. Akadzafika m’dzikolo, iye akakhala nawo pa msonkhano wolimbikitsa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu, Bahrain Forum for Dialogue: East and West for Human Coexistence. Iye akhala Papa woyamba kukacheza m’dziko la Bahrain.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mbava Zaba Ndalama, Kupha Mlonda pa Standard Bank ku Kasungu
news: Mbava zapha mlonda wa kampani ya UK Security Guard Service ndi kuba ndalama zankhaninkhani pa banki ya Standard m’boma la Kasungu, usiku wathawu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Kasungu, Sub Inspector Joseph Kachikho, malemuwa ndi a Ladison Banda a zaka 65 ndipo anali a m’mudzi mwa Suza m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Kaomba m’boma la Kasungu. Pakadali pano apolisi akhazikitsa ntchito yosakasaka anthuwo koma kuchuluka kwa ndalama zomwe zabedwazo sikunadziwike. “Ndizoonadi kuti a Banda amwalira atachitidwa chipongwe ndi akuba omwe anafika pa malo pomwe iwo amagwira ntchito pa Standard Bank m’boma lino la Kasungu. Akubawa anathyola ku bankiyi ndi kuba kuphatikizapo kupha mlondayu. Pamenepa iwo apempha kampani zosiyanasiyana m’bomalo kuti ayike chitetezo chokhwima m’malo awo ogwira ntchito ndi cholinga chofuna kupewa mavuto ngati amenewa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadzudzula Chiwembu Chomwe Chachitika pa Chipatala cha Katolika ku DRC
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wadzudzula za uchifwamba zomwe anthu ena achita pa chipatala china cha mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC). Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wadzudzula chiwembuchi chomwe chaphetsa anthu angapo kuphatikizapo sisitere m’modzi. Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri ndi za uchifwamba zomwe zachulukira m’dzikolo ndipo wati wayikiza m’mapemphero onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi chiwembuchi. Papa Francisco wapempha anthu onse m’dzikolo kuti achilimike polimbikitsa mtendere. Malipoti akusonyeza kuti anthu ena omwe sakudziwika adapita pa chipatala china cha mpingowu m’mudzi wotchedwa Maboya ku dera la North Kivu ndi kupha anthu angapo ndipo m’modzi wa anthuwa ndi sisitere. Zigawengazi akuti zinabanso mankhwala pa chipatalacho ndipo kenako anatentha chipatalacho. Papa Francisco amayembekezeka kukacheza m’dziko la DRC mwezi wa July chaka chino koma adakanika kaamba ka vuto la bondo ndipo pali chiyembekezo kuti ulendo ukhalapo mtsogolo muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Alangiza Ansembe Apewe Kusunga, Kuwonera Zithunzi Zolaula
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walangiza asemino ndi ansembe kuti apewe kusunga komanso kuwonera zithunzi zolawula. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican pa mkumano wake ndi asemino komanso ansembe omwe akuchita maphunziro awo ku Rome m’dziko la Italy. Iye wati kusunga ndi kuwonera zithunzi zolaula kumawononga moyo wa uzimu komanso unsembe. Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolikayu wachenjeza asemino ndi ansembe zakufunika kopewa nthawi zonse mayesero osungira ndi kuwonera zithunzi zolaula. Papa Francisco wati munthu amene mu mtima mwake muli Ambuye Yesu sangasangalale kumalandira, kumasungira ndi kumawonera zithunzi zolaula ndipo wati pamene asemino kapena ansembe alandira zithunzi zotere akuyenera kudzichotseratu mu lamya zawo. Iye wapitiriza kunena kuti waganiza zoyankhulapo pa nkhani imeneyi kaamba koti akudziwa kuti kulandira, kusungira ndi kuwonera zithunzi zolaula ndi nkhani yomwe yakhudza akhristu eni ake komanso ngakhale atumiki a Mulungu amene. Katekisimu wa mpingo wa Katolika amafotokoza za kuyipa kwa m’chitidwe wosungira ndi kumawonera zithunzi zolaula ponena kuti zithunzi zolaula mwa zina zimanyazitsa ulemelero wa munthu komanso zimawononga ubale pakati pa anthu omwe ali m’banja.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe La MRA Lapyola Mlingo Wa Ndalama Zomwe Limatolera
news: Bungwe lotolera nsonkho mdziko muno la Malawi Revenue Authority (MRA) lati latolera ndalama zochuluka kudzera ku misonkho yosiyanasiyana yomwe boma linakhazikitsa. Poyankhula kwa olemba nkhani lachitatu mu mzinda wa Blantyre pamene bungweli limafokoza mmene ntchito yotolera ndalama za misonkho m’miyezi itatu yomwe imapanga gawo la chaka cha boma. Bizwick: Zatipatsa chilimbikitso Mkulu oyendetsa bungweli John Biziwick anati bungwe lake lakwanitsa kupyola mulingo wa ndalama zomwe anapatsidwa kaamba ka mgwirizano wabwino ndinso kudzipereka kwa anthu ogwira ku bungweli. Iye anati pa miyezi ya July mpaka September, anapeza ndalama zokwana 393.79-billion-kwacha poyerekeza ndi mulingo omwe anayerekeza oti apeze 386.58 billion kwacha. “Zimenezi zatipatsa chilimbikitso chakuti ngakhale dzikoli likukumana ndi mavuto maka a kusowa kwa ndalama za kunja omwe asokoneza mbali ya malonda maka a pakati pa mayiko, ife takwanitsa kutolera ndalama zochuluka. Mwa misonkho yomwe yabweretsa ndalama zochuluka ndi msonkho omwe ogwira ntchito amapereka kudzera ku malipiro awo. Umenewu ndi omwe watsogola pochulukitsa ndalama, kutsatira ndi misonkho ina ngati yomwe amalonda amapereka,” anatero a Bizwick. Koma a Bizwick anati ngakhale izi zili chomwechi, bungwe la MRA linakumana ndi mavuto angapo omwe alepheretsa kufikira mulingo waukulu; monga mchitidwe wozembetsa katundu olowa mdziko muno pozemba zipata zolowera mdziko muno. Pamenepa iwo ati bungweli lili mkati moyitanitsa tindenge ting’onoting’ono tomwe timawuluka m’mwamba ndi kumayang’ana mmene anthu akuyendera m’malire a dziko lino komanso iwo ati akugwira ntchitotu limodzi ndi magulu a chitetezo ndinso anthu a m’madera omwe mchitidwe wozembetsa katundu ukuchitika. Bungweli latinso lili mkati moyambitsa ndondomeko yoyika mapepala a zidindo za bungweli pa katundu ngati fodya, ufa wa tirigu ndinso zinthu zina zomwe zimachokera kunja ndipo zili mbali imodzi yozembetsedwa posalipira msonkho. Bungweli latinso lili ndi chikhulupiliro choti chikamatha chaka cha boma cha 2022 mpaka March 2023, akhala atakwanitsa kutolera ndalama zoposa 15 trillion-kwacha ngati mlingo omwe boma likuyembekezera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mayi Ataya Khanda M’boma la Kasungu
