Ch. Nkwabwino kutamanda Chauta
MAU ACHIWIRI 1 Akorinto 15:54-58
Mau a m’Kalata yoyamba ya Paulo Woyera kwa Akorinto
Tiyamike Mulungu amene amatipambanitsa mwa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu.
Tsono thupi lotha kuwolali likadzasanduka losatha kuwola, ndipo thupi lotha kufali likadzasanduka losatha kufa, pamenepo zidzachitikadi zimene Malembo adanena kuti,
“Imfa yagonjetsedwa kwathunthu.”
“Iwe imfa, kupambana kwako kuli kuti?
Iwe imfa, ululu wako uli kuti?”
Ululu wake wa imfa ndi uchimo, ndipo chimene chimapatsa uchimo mphamvu, ndi Malamulo. Koma tiyamike Mulungu amene amatipambanitsa mwa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu.
Tsono abale anga okondedwa, limbikani, khalani osagwedezeka, gwirani ntchito ya Ambuye mwachangu masiku onse, podziwa kuti ntchito zimene mumagwirira Ambuye sizili zopanda phindu.
Mau a Ambuye. Tithokoze Mulungu
Nyimbo ya Mthenga Woyera
Aleluya. Pakati pa anthu mumawala monga momwe zimaonekera nyenyezi pa dziko lapansi pakuwauza mau opatsa moyo. Aleluya.
MTHENGA WOYERA Luka 6:39-45
Mau a Mthenga Woyera monga adalembera Luka
Pajatu pakamwa pamalankhula zimene zadzaza mu mtima.
Yesu adawapheranso fanizo, adati, “Kodi wakhungu nkutsogolera wakhungu mnzake? Nanga onse awiri sadzagwa m’dzenje kodi? Wophunzira saposa mphunzitsi wake, koma aliyense pamene watsiriza maphunziro ake, adzafanafana ndi mphunzitsi wake.
“Umaoneranji kachitsotso kamene kali m’maso mwa mnzako, koma osaganizako za chimtengo chimene chili m’maso mwako momwe? Ungamuuze bwanji mbale wako kuti, “Mbale wanga, taima ntakuchotsa kachitsotso kali m’maso mwakoka,” pamene iweyo sukuchiwona chimtengo chimene chili m’maso mwako momwe? Iwe wachiphamaso, yamba wachotsa chimtengo m’maso mwako, pamenepo ndiye udzatha kupenya bwino nkukachotsa kachitsotso kamene kali m’maso mwa mbale wako.”
“Mtengo wabwino sungabale zipatso zoipa, kapenanso mtengo woipa kubala zipatso zabwino. Mtengo uliwonse umadziwika ndi zipatso zake. Sathyola nkhuyu pa minga, kapenanso mphesa pa mtula. Munthu wabwino amatulutsa zabwino m’chuma chabwino cha mumtima mwake. Nayenso munthu woipa amatulutsa zoipa m’chuma choipa cha mumtima mwake. Pajatu pakamwa pamalankhula zimene zadzaza mu mtima.”
Mthenga wa Ambuye. Ulemu kwa Inu Ambuye Yesu Khristu.
ULALIKI
Abale ndi alongo okondedwa mwa Ambuye.
Lero ndi lamulungu la nambala 8 m’nyengo ya pachaka. Mutu wa nsonkhano wathu wa mapemphero lero tautenga pa Luka 6:42: Yamba wachotsa chimtengo m’maso mwako usanachotse kachitsotso m’maso mwa nzako. Lero Mulungu akufuna kutiphunzitsa kuti tisamaweruze ena mwankhanza poti nafenso ndife ochimwa oyenera kuweruzidwa. Mau Oyamba ndi a mu Mthenga wabwino akugwirizana pa mfundo yakuti tizichenjera pa zolankhula zathu makamaka pamene tikuweruza ena. Mau amene amachokera pakamwa pathu amaonetseratu khalidwe lathu labwino kapena loipa makamaka lomaweruza ena pamene ifenso tili ochimwa koposa. Timakonda kulankhula zolakwa za ena pamene zolakwa zathu zili zoopsa kuposa za enawo.
Mawu Oyamba Mphunzitsi akutichenjeza kuti tisamale ndi pakamwa pathu chifukwa khalidwe lathu limaonekera makamaka pa zimene timalankhula poti zimene timalankhula zimafumira mu mtima mwathu. Kawirikawiri mavuto athu amaonekera kudzera muzolankhula zathu. Ngakhale zinsinsi zathu zimadziwika chifukwa cha pakamwa pathu. Mapulani a munthu wakuba amaonekera kudzera pakamwa pake. Munthu wa ndewu, munthu wonama, munthu wadama, zonse zimaonekera kudzera muzolankhula zathu. Pakamwa pathu ndi papang’ono kwambiri koma ndi pamphamvu kwambiri. Timadziulula kuti ndife anthu otani kudzera muzolankhula zathu. Zolankhula zathu, zitha kutiulula kuti ndife anthu abwino kapena oyipa. Lilime limapanga zithu zoopsa kwambiri ngakhale liri laling’ono kwambiri. Zolankhula zathu zitha kuyatsa moto wachidani pakati pathu kapenanso kudzimitsa moto wachidani pakati pathu. Pakamwa pathu patha kulankhula zomanga kapena zopasula, zonyoza kapena zolemekeza. Choncho pafunika kumadziweruza tokha tisanalankule nkumaona ngati zolankhula zathuzo zibweretsa nkhondo kapena mtendere. Mphunzitsi akutiuza momveka kuti, “Munthu akagwedeza sefa, zinyatsi zimatsalira momwemo. Chimodzimodzinso zolakwa za munthu zimaoneka iye akamalankhula” (Mphunzitsi 27:4).
Mthenga Wabwino lero, sukukambanso zokonda adani athu monga tidamvera sabata yatha. Lero Yesu akukamba zokonda wina aliyense posawaweruza ena ngati kuti ifeyo ndife anthu olungama. Aliyense amazidziwa bwino yekha. Choncho, sibwino kuweruza ena pamene nafenso tiri anthu osalungama pamaso pa Mulungu amene amaona zonse za mu mtima mwa munthu.
Mu Mthenga Wabwino walero, Yesu akutidzudzula chifukwa cha khalidwe la uchiphamaso. Timakonda kuonkhetsa machimo a anthu ena ndikuwayika pambalambanda pamene machimo athu oyipanso koposa tawabisa. Ambuye Yesu akutiuza momveka kuti, “Umaoneranji kachitsotso kamene kali m’maso mwa mnzako, koma osaganizako za chimtengo chimene chili m’maso mwako momwe?… Iwe wachiphamaso, yamba wachotsa chimtengo m’maso mwako, pamenepo ndiye udzatha kupenya bwino nkukachotsa kachitsotso kamene kali m’maso mwa mbale wako” (Luka 6:41-42).
Kankhani aka mwina katha kutithandiza kumvetsa bwino phunziro lakupewa kuweruza ena mwankhanza. Mayi wina adapita naye mdzukulu wake kwa mmwenye wina dzina lake Indira Gandih. Mayiyu adali ndi pempho. Adamuuza Gandih kuti adali okhudzidwa kwambiri ndi shuga wambiri amene mdzukulu wakeyo amakonda kumabwira chifukwa akanatha kumuononga m’thupi mwake. Koma akamulangiza, mdzukulu wakeyo samasintha khalidwe lakelo. “Muuzeni mdzukulu wangayu kuti asiye kudya shuga wambiri” mayiyo adatero. Gandih adayankha kuti, “Mumubweretse kuti ndidzamulangize sabata ya mawa.” Adabwerera ku nyumba ndipo sabata ija itatha adapitanso kwa Gandih. Zodabwitsa ndi zakuti, Gandih amangoyankha kuti, “m’bweretseni sabata ya mawa.” Amayankha choncho mpaka panapita masabata anayi. Kenaka sabata yachisanu, Gandih adamuuza mdzukulu uja kuti, “mtsikana iwe usamadye shuga wambiri, udzadwala naye.” Gogo uja zidamunyansa chifukwa samayembekezera kuti Gandih angayankhe mwa mphwayi choncho. Adawayembekezeretsa kwa ma sabata anayi koma malangizo ake osagwira mtima. Gogo uja atamudandaulira Gandih, iye adayankha kuti, “Inenso zidanditengera nthawi yaitali kuti ndisiye kudya shuga wambiri.” Gandih adayankha choncho chifukwa chiyani? Iye adayankha choncho chifukwa samafuna kukhala munthu wa uchiphamaso poweruza ena mwankhanza pa zinthu zimene iye yemwe nthawi ina zinali kumuvuta.
Mwa inu ndi ine muli makhalidwe ena amene takhala tikulimbana nawo kuti achoke kwa nthawi yayitali koma sitimadziweruza mwankhanza. Koma timafulumira kuweruza ena kuti asinthe nsangansanga pa zinthu mwina zazing’ono kuposa za ife. Pa nkhani ya kuweruza ena tikuona kuti chiphamaso chimatenga mbali yayikulu kwambiri. Mwachitsanzo kholo limene limakonda kumwa mowa mwauchidakwa limaweruza mwana wake kuti asamamwe mowa. Kholo limene limakonda chiwerewere limaweruza ana ake kuti asamachite chiwerewere ndi zina zotero.
Mawu akuti “uchiphamaso”, hypocrisy mu Chingelezi, kapena hupokrite’s mu Chigiliki, amatanthauza kuti munthu amene amavala chinyau kapena tinene kuti munthu amene amachita zinthu ngati munthu wina koma asali iyeyo. Izi ndi zimene timachita nthawi iliyonse pamene tikuweruza ena mwankhanza.
Kodi nanga ponena kuti tisamaweruze ena, Ambuye Yesu amafuna kuti tisamalangize anzathu pamene akusochera poti ifenso ndife olakwa? Ai, sichoncho ayi. Kulangiza ena amene akusochera sikuthanthauza kuti ifeyo ndife olungama kuposa iwowo ayi. Tonse ndife ochimwa koma titha kuthandizana mwachikondi ndi mwaubale kuti tikhale anthu abwino. Kuweruza kumaonekera pamene ifeyo tikhala ndi nkhanza polangiza ena ndikudzionetsa ngati kuti ifeyo ndiye abwino kapena oyera mtima kuposa enawo. Chimene Ambuye Yesu akutiphunzitsa lero ndi chakuti tiziyamba tadziweruza tokha tisanaweruze anthu ena. Tiziyamba tadzisuzumira mu mtima mwathumo tisanayambe kulankhula zoyipa za ena. Paja akulu amati, pamene tikuloza chala chimodzi munthu wina kuti ngolakwa, zala zitatu zimaloza ife. Tikamayamba kudziyang’anira tokha pagalasi tisanaweruze ena, zotsatira zake ndikuti tidzakhala anthu osinthika ndipo tidzabereka zipatso zabwino ndiponso zokhalitsa.
Kuti tipewe kuweruza ena tiyenera kukhala anthu odzichepetsa. Kawirikawiri khalidwe lonyada ndi limene limatipangitsa kuti tiziweruza ena mwankhanza pa zinthu zomwezo zimene timachitanso ifeyo mwina moyipanso koposa enawo. Nkhondo yayikulu pa nkhani yakuweruza ena yagona polimbana ndi khalidwe lathu lonyadalo. Ndi chizolowezi cha inu ndi ine kuti timakonda kusuzumira m’moyo wa wina tisanazuzumire m’moyo mwathu. Zolakwa za ena timaziika poyera pamene zathu tazibisa kapena kuziika kumbuyo. Timakhala ndi maso akuthwa kwambiri ngati a mbalame ija yotchedwa nkhwazi imene imaona patali zedi poyang’anitsitsa zolakwa za ena ndipo timakhala akhungu poyang’ana zolakwa zathu.
Ngwazo wathu lero ukhale wopempha Mulungu kuti atipatse chaulere chomalondera lilime lathu kuti mau amene amachokera pakamwa pathu azikhala abwino. Tionetsetse kuti zokamba zathu zikhale zodzetsa mtendere ndiponso zopewa kuweruza ena. Tizichita monga anali kuchitira oyera ena, nthawi zonse iwowo amadziona kuti anali ochimwa kuposa ena ndipo samalodza chala ena kuti ngolakwa. Amen.
Ine ndimvera Mulungu mmodzi yekha…
Mapemphero a Akhristu
Abale, tikhale a mtima umodzi ndi Ambuye Yesu popereka kwa Mulungu mapemphero athu opempherera anthu onse:
1. Atate, mulimbikitse atsogoleri a Mpingo kuti asenze udindo wao mwachangu polondoloza anthu awo ku chipulumutso chosatha.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
2. Atate, muchirikize aphunzitsi achikhristu pa ntchito yawo, aziwongolera nzeru ndi mitima ya achinyamata mwa njira yokomera Inu.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
3. Atate, mudalitse mabanja achikhristu kuti eni ake akhale ogwirizana, azitsogolera ana awo pa njira yachikhulupiriro ndi ya chikondi.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
4. Atate, mutithandize ife tomwe kuti tikhale a mtima umodzi ndi Mwana wanu Yesu Khristu, pa ntchito zathu zonse zotumikira Mpingo wanu.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
Atate, popereka kwa Inu mapemphero athuwa, tikuyamika chifundo chanu chofuna kusonkhanitsa anthu onse mu Ufumu wanu. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.
PEMPHERO LOPEREKERA
Inu Mulungu,
amene mumatipatsa mphatso zoti tipereke ku dzina lanu,
ndipo mumalandira nsembe yathu
ngati chizindikiro cha khumbo lathu,
loti tikutumikireni modzipereka;
tikupempha chifundo chanu,
kuti zimene mwatipatsa ngati zotiyenerera,
zitithandizenso kulandira mphoto ya moyo wosatha.
Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu,
NYIMBO YOLANDIRIRA
Cf. Salimo 13: 6
Ndidzaimbira Chauta, popeza kuti wandichitira zabwino.
Imbirani dzina la Chauta Wakumwambamwamba nyimbo za masalimo.
Kapena: Mateyo 28: 2
Inetu ndili nanu masiku onse, mpaka kutha kwake kwa dziko lino lapansi.
PEMPHERO LOTHOKOZERA
Ambuye,
titalandira mphatso za chipulumutso chanu
tikupempha chifundo chanu
kuti kudzera m’sakramenti ili
lomwe mwatidyetsa m’nyengo ino,
tithe kugawana nawo moyo wosatha.
Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.
PEMPHERO LOTSIRIZA (Pa msonkhano wamapemphero)
Atate, Mwana wanu adatipatula kuti tikabale zipatso, zipatso zake zokhalitsa. Musalole kuti tilekane naye, popeza kuti popanda Iye kutiwongolera ndi kutilimbikitsa sitingathe kuchita kanthu. Koma mutithandize kuyenda m’chikondi chake masiku onse, tizikhala mwa Iye ndipo Iyenso mwa ife, ndipo motero moyo wathu udzabala zipatso zambiri zokukomerani. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.

title: Dziko la Mozambique Lithandiza Anthu Okhudzidwa Ndi Namondwe Wa Anna Ku Nsanje
news: Mkulu wa nthambi ya ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi mdziko la Mozambique a Luisa Meque apereka thandizo la chakudya ku mabanja omwe anakhudzidwa ndi namondwe wa Anna m’boma la Nsanje. Mayi Meque komanso akuluakulu ena a dzikolo anayendera misasa monga ya Nyamithithi, M’membe komanso Bangula. Poyankhula pambuyo popereka thandizoli mayi Meque ati achita izi podzindikira kuti kuti anthu ena omwe ali m’misasayi ndi ndi mzika za dziko la Mozambique. Pamenepa iwo apempha anthu amene agwire ntchito yopereka thandizoli kuti agawe zinthuzi mwachilungamo posatengera umzika wa munthuyo. Poyankhulapo mkulu wa nthambi yowona ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi kuno Malawi, Dr. Charles Kalemba anayamikira boma la dziko la Mozambique poganizira za mavuto omwe anthu a m’boma la Nsanje akukumana nawo ndipo apempha mzika za m’maiko awiriwa zomwe zikukhala m’misasayi kuti zidzikhala mwa bata ndi mtendere. Mabanja okwana 3, 000 omwe akukhala m’misasa yosiyana siyana ndi omwe akuyembekezeka kulandira thandizo la zakudya zomwe boma la dziko la Mozambique lapereka.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Malawi Ikuphonyana Ndi Ndalama Za Chamba – CRA
news: Bungwe lowona za chamba chovomerezeka mdziko muno la Cannabis Regulatory Authority (CRA) lati boma likutaya ndalama za nkhani nkhani chifukwa cha malamulo ena okhwima oyendetsera ulimi wa chamba mdziko muno. Kadzamira: Pali nzeru pamenepo? Wapampando wa bungweli a Boniface Kadzamira ndi omwe anena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi yomwe imafuna kudziwa zambiri pamene bungweli lapempha boma kuti lifewetseko ena mwa malamulo ochitira ulimi wa chamba mdziko muno poyamba kulora anthu kuchita ulimi wa chamba cha lokolo. Iwo ati boma likuyenera kudzindikira kuti litha kupindula kwambiri ndi ulimi wa chamba cha lokolo chomwe anthu amalima mozembera boma m’madera osiyanasiyana mdziko muno, ponena kuti ena mwa mayiko omwe amagulitsa chamba chochokera mdziko muno akupindula nacho kwambiri. “Msika umodzi okha akuti atha kumatigula 100 tones pa mwezi nanga titapeza misika ingapo. Mayiko ena anadzatenga mbewu ya chamba cha kwathu kuno ndipo akupindula nayo koma ife eni ake a mbewu tikuti chamba ichi ayi, pali nzeru pamenepo?” anadabwa a Kadzamira. Iwo ati kupatula kupereka chuma ku boma, chambachi chitha kuthandiza anthu kuti apeze ntchito zosiyanasiyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ubale Wa Phungu Ndi Khansala Usokonekera Kaamba Ka Chitukuko
news: Kunali mpungwepungwe ku khonsolo ya boma la Chikwawa pakati pa phungu wa ku nyumba ya malamulo wa dera la kuzambwe m’boma la Chikwawa, mayi Susan Dossi ndi Khansala wa Chimwanjale m’dera lomweli, Alexander Wotchi, pamene adindo awiriwa anasemphana maganizo pa nkhani ya chitukuko cha m’dera lawo. Awiriwa omwe ons endi a chipani chimodzi cha UTM, anakangana pa nkhani yokhudzana ndi ndalama za chitukuko za m’thumba la Governance Enabled Service Delivery (GESD),. Dossi: Nanenso ndinali wodabwa Dossi anati ndalama za GESD n’zoyenera kuti zigwire ntchito pa zitukuko za ndalama zambiri monga kumangira nyumba yogona atsikana pa sukulu ya sekondale ya Chang’ambika. Kumbali inayi, Wotchi akuti pachiyambi, anagwirizana kuti ndalamazi amangire chipinda chophunziriramo pa sukulu ya pulayimale ya Kubalalika. Komatu Dossi anati zomwe akuchita Khansala Wotchi, ndi kusokoneza chabe. “Tinagwirizana pa ADC kuti ndalama za GESD tipangire zitukuko zazikuluzikulu, ndiye nanenso ndinali wodabwa nditawuzidwa kuti a khansala apita kukanena kuti ndalamazi amangire chipinda chophunziliramo pa Kubalalika,” anatero mayi Dossi. Tinafuna kuyankhula ndi khansala Alexander Wotchi, koma anati adali wokwiya kwambiri ndipo anapempha nthawi yokwanira kuti ayankhulepo kumbali yake. Ndi chachidziwikire kuti mkangano womwe uli pakati pa adindo awiriwa, ukhala ndi zotsatira zoipa ngakhale zitukuko ziwirizi ndi zopindulira ophunzira wa kumudzi. Pajatu akulu anati; ‘Njovu zikamamenyana, umavutika ndi udzu.’
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Alimbikitsa Ophunzira Akometse Dziko Lapansi
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walimbikitsa ophunzira a m’sukulu za ukachenjede kuti athandize pa ntchito yokometsa dziko la pansi. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lachinayi pomwe amacheza ndi ophunzira a m’sukulu za ukanjede ku United States of America ndi ku South America kudzera pa makina a intaneti. M’mawu ake iye walimbikitsa ophunzira a m’sukulu za ukachenjede kuti athandize pa ntchito yokometsa dziko la pansi makamaka popeza njira zothandiza kukometsa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu. Papa Francisco wayankhulaponso pa nkhani zingapo monga zakufunika kwa maphunziro, za kufunika kosamala chilengedwe, za chilungamo pa kayendetsedwe ka chuma ndi za anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana. Kumbali yawo ophunzirawa alankhulapo pa za kusiyana kwakukulu komwe kulipo pakati pa anthu olemera ndi osauka, za mavuto omwe anthu akukumana nawo kaamba ka kuwonongeka kwa chilengedwe ndi zina. Mchezowu unakonzedwa ndi sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Loyola ku United States of America ndi Pontifical Commission for Latin America.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu 6 Anjatidwa Kaamba ka Milandu ya Kuba mu Mzinda wa Lilongwe
news: Apolisi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe amanga anthu asanu ndi m’modzi (6) kaamba kowaganizira kuti akhala akuba m’madera osiyanasiyana a mu mzindawu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Hastings Chigalu, apolisi akwanitsa kupeza katundu wobedwa yemwe ndi wa ndalama zoposa 7 million kwacha. Anthu omwe anjatidwawo ndi katundu yemwe wapezekayo Wina mwa katunduyu ndi monga kanema wa mtundu wa plasma, mabatile a galimoto komanso a solar zomwe azipeza kwa Biwi, Malangalanga,mu depot ya Lilongwe ndiposo ku Mchezi. Oganiziridwawa ndi a John Moyo a zaka 28 a m’mudzi mwa Chiluzi mfumu yaikulu Makwangwala m’boma la Ntcheu, a Shadrick Maluwa a zaka 18 a m’mudzi mwa Kaombe mfumu yaikulu Bvumbwe m’boma la Thyolo, a Kachepa Lackson a zaka 21 a m’mudzi mwa Majenesa mfumu yaikulu Jalasi m’boma la Mangochi, a Willard Mataka a zaka 37 a m’mudzi mwa Kalanguluka mfumu yaikulu Chimutu m’boma la Lilongwe, a Alex Banda a zaka 17 wa m’mudzi mwa Chonde mfumu yaikulu Mthiramanja m’boma la Mulanje ndi a Bright Leonard a zaka 17 a m’mudzi mwa Kasaphira mfumu yaikulu Kaphuka m’boma la Dedza. Anthuwa akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu komwe akayankhe mlandu wa kuba. Pakadali pano apolisi apempha anthu a mu mzindawu omwe anaberedwa katundu ngati ameneyu kuti apite ku polisi ya Lilongwe kukawona wina mwa katunduyu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu a M’dera la Sub T/A Mkutumula ku Ntcheu Adandaula ndi Vuto la Nsewu
news: Pamene vuto lokhala ndi misewu yabwino ikukulirabe m’dziko muno ikupitilirabe, anthu a ku Banda m’dera la Sub T/A Mkutumula m’boma la Ntcheu adandaula ndi vuto la nsewu wa ku deralo ponena kuti wawonongeka kwambiri. Malinga ndi m’modzi mwa anthu aku derali a Stanley Tengani, vutoli ndi la pakanthawi zomwe zikupsinja anthu a deralo.  Poyankhulapo khansala wa deralo mu ward ya Bilira, Samson Naluso wati vutoli akulidziwa ndipo wakhala m’modzi mwa anthu a deralo omwe akhala akufunitsitsa nsewuwo utakonzedwa koma vutoli silikukonzedwa. Malinga ndi khansala Naluso, nsewuwo ndi waukulu ndipo  ukufunika  ndalama zambiri zomwe ngakhale khonsolo ya boma la Ntcheu singakwanitse kudzera mu ndalama za thumba la District Development Fund (DDF). Msewu wa ku Banda ndi ofunika kwambiri kwa anthu ozungulira deralo kaamba koti  umalumikizitsa anthu ochita malonda m’maboma a Ntcheu ndi Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu Akhale Oleza Mtima – Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha akhristu kuti adzikhala oleza mtima ndi kupewa kubwenzera zoyipa. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi laMulungu ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Iye amathirira ndemanga pa Uthenga Wabwino womwe unawerengedwa pa tsiku laMulungu womwe mwa zina ukuti: Muzikonda adani anu, muziŵachitira zabwino amene amadana nanu. Muziŵafunira madalitso amene amakutembererani, muziŵapempherera amene amakuvutitsani. Papa Francisco wati chikhristu chenicheni chagona pakhululukira ena angakhale pa zinthu zowawa ndi zopweteka. Iye wati kuwumitsa mtima posafuna kukhululuka sizigwirizana ndi moyo wa chikhristu. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kupempha akhristu kuti azipempha chithandizo cha Mzimu Woyera chowathandiza kukhala anthu odziwa kukhululuka.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Akufufuzabe Mayi Yemwe Anakokoloka Ndi Madzi Pa Mulatho Wa Chikuli Ku Mulanje
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mulanje ati akufufuzabe mayi wina wotchedwa Rejoice Gama wa zaka 26 yemwe anakokoloka  pa mlatho wa mtsinje wa Chikuli lachitatu sabata ino. Malingana ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku Mulanje Sub Inspector Grecium Ngwira, mayiyu pamodzi ndi abambo ena awiri anakwera galimoto pa malo ochitira malonda a Chitakale kumalowera ku Limbe kudzera mu nsewu wa Robert Mugabe omwe umatchedwanso kuti Midima. Galimoto yomwe inakokolokayo Galimotoyi itafika pa mlatho wa Chikuli, woyendetsa galimotoyi amawoloka pa mlathowu ngakhale madzi ochuluka anali akuyenda pamwamba pa mlathowu, zomwe zinachititsa kuti galimotoyo iyambe kukokoloka. Powona izi anthu atatuwo anatuluka mu galimotomo kuti apulumutse miyoyo yawo, ndipo abambo awiriwo anakwanitsa kusambira ndi kupulumuka koma mayiyo analephera kusambira ndipo madzi anamukokolola. Padakali pano ntchito yosakasaka mayiyo ili mkati. Padakalipano apolisi ku Mulanje, apempha anthu kuti adzikhala tcheru nthawi ino ya dzinja, posamawoloka mitsinje ikadzadza, komanso apempha oyendetsa  galimoto kuti asamadelere madzi oyenda a mvula chifukwa amatha kukokolola chinthu cholemera, monga mmene anakokololera galimotoyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ECM Ipereka Thandizo Kwa Mabanja Okhudzidwa Ndi Namondwe Wa Anna Ku Chikwawa
news: Bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) lakhazikitsa ntchito yopereka chithandizo kwa mabanja omwe anakhudzidwa ndi Namondwe wa Ana, m’dziko muno. Mwambo wokhazikitsa ntchitoyi wachitika Lachinayi pa 17 February, 2022 pa msasa wa Tomali kwa mfumu yayikulu Lundu m’boma la Chikwawa. Maepiskopi pa mwambowo Poyankhula atatsirizaa kupereka zinthu monga ufa, mchere, shuga, ndowa za pulasitiki mabulangete, Wapampando wa ma Bishop Akatolika m’dziko muno, Wolemekezeka Ambuye George Desmond Tambala ati achita izi pofuna kuwonetsa kuti ali nawo limodzi anthu okhudzidwawa. Komabe Ambuye Tambala alangiza boma kuti atengerepo phunziro pa zovuta za namondweyu kuti liyambe kuwunika njira zothandiza kumanga ntchito za chitukuko zolimba ndi zokhalitsa. “Pobwera kuno timafuna kupereka uthenga wakuti tili nawo limodzi abale athuwa m’mavuto awo,” anatero Ambuye George Desmond Tambala. Ambuye Martin Mtumbuka kupereka thandizo kwa m’modzi mwa anthuwo Ambuye Tambala anapitiriza kuti malingana ndi namondwe amene wakhudza dziko lonse, n’koyenera ngati dziko kusinkhasinkha ndi kupeza njira zoyenera zothana ndi mavuto akusefukira kwa madzi maka pomanga zinthu zolimba. “Taona kuti misewu  ikuduka ndipo milatho ikupasukanso zomwe tikuyenera kusinkhasinkha za kulimba kwa zinthu zomwe timapanga,”  anatero Ambuye Tambala. M’mawu awo, Paramount Chief Lundu adandaula ponena kuti vuto la kusefukira kwa madzi ndi lalikulu ku Chigwa chonse cha Mtsinje wa Shire. “Zinthu zambiri zawonongeka monga nyumba, mbewu ngakhale miyoyo ya anthu kuyambira ku Thabwa mpaka ku Nsanje,” anatero Paramount Chief Lundu. Bungwe la ECM likupereka chithandizochi ndi thandizo la ndalama kuchokera ku mabungwe osiyanasiyana monga Caritas, CADECOM kuphatikizapo magulu ndi akhristu okhudzika kudzera m’zopereka za m’tchalitchi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ansembe Amasowa Mapemphero Apadera
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati popanda mapemphero komanso abwenzi ndi kovuta kukwaniritsa malonjezo a unsembe. Papa Francisco walankhula izi lachinayi potsekulira msonkhano wokambirana za moyo wa unsembe ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Poyankhula kwa nthumwi za ku msonkhanowu, Papa wati popanda mapemphero komanso kukhala pafupi ndi abwenzi, ndi kovuta kukwaniritsa malonjezo a unsembe ndipo watsimikizira nthumwi za ku msonkhanowu kuti izi si za m’mabuku kapena zongomva koma zomwe iye wakumana nazo m’moyo wake omwe ngati wansembe. Papa Francisco wati wansembe akuyenera kuzikika mu moyo wa mapemphero kuti akhale pa ubale weniweni ndi Mulungu. Koma si pokhapo iye wawonjezeranso kuti wansembe akuyenera kukhala pafupi ndi a  episkopi ake, ansembe anzake komanso anthu omwe akuwatumikira kuti ulendowu ukhale opepuka. Iye wati popanda izi unsembe udzangosanduka ngati ntchito chabe pomwe sizikuyenera kukhala choncho. Papa Francisco wakumbutsa ansembe kuti kudzera mu chiitanidwe chao ngati ansembe cholinga ndi choti kudzera mu unsembe wo akhale anthu oyera ndipo izi zikukhudza maitanidwe onse omwe anthu amasankha m’moyo wao. Iye wati ansembe ambiri agwa mu mavuto kaamba kosazikika m’moyo wa mapemphero. Papa Francisco wati akhristu akufuna ansembe omwe ndi abusa enieni monga Ambuye Yesu osati ansembe omwe asandutsa unsembe kukhala ngati ntchito yongolembedwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo wa Zaka 60 Akagwira Ukayidi wa Zaka 21 Kaamba Kogwililira
news: Bwalo la Senior Resident Magistrate m’boma la Mangochi lalamula mkulu wina wa zaka 60 kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka 21 pa mlandu wogwililira msungwana wa zaka khumi ndi chimodzi (11). Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku Monkeybay, Sergeant Alice Sichali wati bwaloli linamva kuchokera kwa woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Elias Chitsulo kuti msungwanayu yemwe ndi wa zaka 11, amakhala ndi mchemwali wake ndipo pa 7 November chaka chatha, mchemwali wakeyo anapita kukawona makolo awo kusiya msungwanayu yekha. Apa ndi pomwe mkuluyu Phara Pius anapezerapo mwayi ndi kumugwililira, ndi kumuwopseza kuti akawulura, amupha. Sichali: Mwanayo anayamba kusamva bwino mthupi mwake “Patapita masiku ochepa, mwanayu anayamba kusamva bwino mthupi mwake zomwe zinachititsa kuti alembere kalata mchemwali wakeyo kumufotokozera za nkhaniyo zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkuluyu amangidwe. Zotsatira za chipatala cha Monkeybay zinatsimikiza kuti msungwanayu anagwiliridwadi,” anatero Sergeant Sichali. Atawonekera mu bwalo la milandu, mkuluyu anawukana mlanduwu zomwe zinachititsa kuti mbali ya boma ibweretse mboni zinayi zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkuluyu apezeke wolakwa. Popereka chigamulo chake Senior Resident Magistrate Rodrick Michongwe analamula mkuluyu kuti akagwire ukayidi wa kalavula gaga kwa zaka 21 kuti ena atengerepo phunziro ati kaamba koti milandu ya mtunduwu ikuchulukira mderalo. Ku Monkeybay komweko bwalo la First Grade Magistrate lalamula a Sydney Jackson Mckenzie kuti akagwire ukayidi kwa zaka 12 pa mlandu wogwililira mwana wawo wompeza wa zaka 17 zakubadwa. Bwaloli linamva kuchokera kwa woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Elias Chitsulo kuti bamboyu anagona koyamba ndi msungwanayu mwezi wa September chaka chatha, mayi ake atapita kotunga madzi ndipo kenako chinasanduka chizolowezi. Mwezi wa December, ndi pomwe mayiyo anawona zizindikiro zoti mwanayu ali ndi pathupi ndipo atamufunsa ndi pomwe ananena kuti mwini pa thupipo ndi bambo ake omupezawo. Mu bwalo la milandu a Sydney anaukana mlanduwu zomwe zinachititsa mbali ya boma kuti ibweretse mboni zinayi zomwe zinachititsa kuti bamboyu apezeke wolakwa. Popereka chigamulo chake First Grade Magistrate Mtunduwatha Mpasu anati wapereka chilango cha mtunduwu kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Mackenzie amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mwatakata mdera la mfumu yaikulu Chimwala m’boma la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati ndi Wokhudzidwa ndi Imfa ya Cardinal Magistris
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya Cardinal Luigi de Magistris wa m’dziko la Italy. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi mu uthenga wake wopepesa potsatira imfayi. Papa Francisko (kumanja) ndi malemu Cardinal de Magistris Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri ndi imfayi ndipo wati ali pafupi ndi anamfedwa onse komanso mpingo wonse wa katolika mu Archdiocese ya Cagliari pa nthawi yovutayi. Iye wayamikira Cardinal Luigi kaamba koti adali wodzipereka kwathunthu potumikira Mpingo ndi Mulungu kudzera mu ntchito zosiyana-siyana zomwe adapatsidwa ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Papa Francisco watsiriza uthengawu ndi kupemphera kuti kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria Mulungu alandire mzimu wa mtumiki wake mu ufumu wake. Cardinal Luigi yemwe adabadwa pa 23 February m’chaka cha 1926 wamwalira lachitatu pa 16 February ali ndi zaka 95. Iye adadzodzedwa kukhala wansembe pa 12 April m’chaka cha 1952 ndipo adasankhidwa kukhala Cardinal ndi Papa Francisco pa 14 February m’chaka cha 2015. Mzimu wa Cardinal Luigi de Magistris uuse mu mtendere wosatha!
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ayamikira Papa Kaamba Kolimbikitsa Umodzi wa Mitundu ya Anthu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco amuyamikira kaamba kolimbikitsa umodzi pakati pa zipembedzo zosiyana-siyana. Lachitatu atsogoleri a anthu a mtundu wa chiyuda a m’dziko la Britain anali nawo mu Hall ya Papa Paulo wa 6 ku Vatican. Papa pa mkumano wake ndi anthuwo Pambuyo pa zoyankhula zake kwa anthu mu Hall’yi Papa Francisco anakumana ndi akuluakuluwa. Pa mkumanowu iwo ayamikira Papa Francisco kaamba kolimbikitsa umodzi pakati pa anthu a zipembedzo zosiyana-siyana komanso kaamba kolankhulapo pa m’chitidwe woipa womawasala ayuda, antisemitism. Ndipo ngati njira yofuna kuonetsa kuthokoza kwao pa ntchito yomwe Papa’yu akugwira yolimbikitsa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu a zipembedzo zosiyana-siyana komanso kaamba kolankhula ndi kudzudzula m’chitidwe wowasala ayuda, iwo apereka mphatso ya bukhu, History of the Great Synagogue. Ku mapeto a nkumanowu Papa Francisco anapempha atsogoleriwa kuti azimupemphelera pomwe nayenso walonjeza kuti aziwapemphelera. Dziko la Britain liri ndi anthu a mtundu wa chiyuda pafupifupi 400,000.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CADECOM Ikhazikitsa Ntchito Yodzala Mitengo
news: Bungwe la zachitukuko mu mpingo wa katolika la Catholic Development Commission in Malawi (CADECOM) lati mabungwe ali ndi udindo waukulu wophunzitsa anthu zakufunika kosamalira zachilengedwe. Ambuye Stima kudzala mtengo wawo Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za bungweli mu dayosizi ya Mangochi, a Peter Nthenda ndi omwe ayankhula izi pa mwambo wokhazikitsa ntchito yobzala mitengo omwe unachitikira m’mudzi mwa Kunene mfumu yayikulu Kalembo m’boma la Balaka. Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi, Ambuye Montfort Stima ndi omwe anatsogolera ntchitoyi. Iwo ati dziko la Malawi chaka ndi chaka limadzala mitengo yochuluka koma anthu amawononga mitengoyi zomwe zikuwonetsa kuti anthuwa samadziwa zomwe akuchita. “Anthu akuyenera aphunzitsidwe kusamalira mitengo chifukwa ngakhale a bishop anena pano kuti takhala tikudza mitego yochuluka koma yonseyo siyikuwoneka chifukwa ikangokula pang’ono anthu omwewa akumadzadulanso,” anatero a Nthenda. Pamenepa a Nthenda anati bungwe lawo lili ndi malingaliro odzala mitengo yokwana 15 sauzande mu nyengo ya mvula ya chaka chino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa ndi Kuphedwa Kwa Wansembe ku DRC
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wa chisoni chachikulu kaamba ka kuphedwa kwa bambo Richard Masivi, wansembe yemwe amatumikira m’dziko la Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC). Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi lero ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican.  Malemu bambo Masivi anachita kuphedwa Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri ndi imfayi ndipo wati wayikiza mzimu wa bambo Masivi m’manja mwa Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati ndi pemphero lake kuti imfa ya wansembeyu ithandize kulimbikitsa ansembe anzawo ndi akhristu omwe kutumikira modzipereka ndi modziyiwala. Bambo Masivi a zaka 36 adapezeka atafa mu galimoto yawo potsatira kuwomberedwa ndi anthu ena a mfuti pomwe amachokera ku Misa pa 2 February pakati pa dera la Kirumba ndi Mighobwe ku North Kivu. Pa tsiku lomweli anthu pafupifupi 50 adaphedwa pa malo ena osungira anthu othawa kwao ku dera la Ituri. Padakali pano kafukufuku wokhudza kuphedwa kwa wansembeyu, ali mkati.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walengeza Mutu wa Tsiku Loganizira Anthu Okalamba
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walengeza mutu wa chaka chino wa pa tsiku loganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba. Kwa nthawi yachiwiri tsopano mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse udzaganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba pa tsiku laMulungu lachinayi la mwezi wa July, tsiku lomwe liri pafupi ndi chaka cha Joachim ndi Anna Oyera, agogo a Ambuye Yesu. Zadziwika kuti chaka chino Mpingo wa Katolika uganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba pa mutu woti “Mu ukalamba wawo adzabereka zipatso,” Salimo mutu 92 ndime ya 15. Papa kucheza ndi m’modzi mwa anthu achikulire Pa 31 January chaka chatha Papa Francisco adalengeza kuti waganiza zokhazikitsa tsiku loganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba. Pokhazikitsa za tsikuli iye anati Mpingo wa Katolika uziganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba laMulungu lachinayi la mwezi wa July chaka chilichonse. Papa Francisco adafotokoza kuti kawiri-kawiri akuluakulu amayiwalidwa ngakhale kuti iwo ndi kasupe wa luntha. Iye adapitirira kufotokoza kuti amakhulupirira kuti ukalamba ndi madalitso aakulu ochokera kwa Mulungu kotero ndi koyenera kumakumbukira ndi kulemekeza anthu achikulire ndi okalamba. Papa Francisco wakhala akulankhulanso za kufunika koti anthu achikulire ndi okalamba ndi ofunika chisamaliro. Koma si pokhapo iye wakhalanso akunena kuti chiitanidwe chao ndi choti agawane ndi ana awo, zidzukulu zao mphatso ya chikhulupiriro chao mwa Mulungu. Tsiku loganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba ndi lodziwika m’chingerezi kuti World Day for Grandparents and the Elderly.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watulutsa Mndandanda wa Miyambo Yomwe Atsogolere Mwezi wa March
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kutsogolera miyambo ikuluikulu ya mapemphero mwezi wa March. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio ofesi yofalitsa mauthenga ku likulu la mpingowu yati lachitatu pa 2 March nthawi ya 4:30 madzulo Papa Francisco adzatsogolera mwambo wolapa mu tchalitchi cha Anselm Woyera ndipo kenako pa tsiku lomweli nthawi ya 5 koloko madzulo Papa’yu adzatsogolera Misa ya phulusa mu tchalitchi cha chikulu cha Sabina Woyera. Lachisanu pa 4 March nthawi ya 10:30 m’mawa Papa Francisco adzachita nkumano ndi ma Cardinal, Ordinary Public Consistory pofuna kuunika ndi kuvomereza kafukufuku yemwe amachitika wa anthu oyenera kuti Mpingo uwatchule kukhala oyera. Ndipo pa 25 March nthawi ya 5 koloko madzulo Papa’yu adzatsogolera mwambo wolapa, penitential celebration mu tchalitchi cha chikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica. Ofesi yofalitsa ma uthenga ku Vatican yati Papa Francisco wapempha ma Cardinal ndi akuluakulu a ma ofesi osiyana-siyana ku Vatican kuti kuyambira laMulungu pa 6 March mpaka lachisanu pa 11 March idzakhale sabata ya mbindikiro aliyense payekhapayekha. Nyengo ya Lenti yomwe chaka chino ikuyamba pa 2 March ndi ulendo wa masiku 40, Quadragesima muchilatini, nthawi yowirikiza mapemphero, kudzilanga ndi kuthandiza anthu osowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sister Chiomba a Chipani cha SBVM Amwalira
news: Aku likulu la chipani cha asisiteri cha Atumiki a Maria Virgo Woyera, Servants of the Blessed Virgin Mary (SBVM) alengeza za imfa ya Sister Rosaria Gertrude Chiomba, a chipanichi. Malinga ndi mlembi wamkulu wa chipanichi Sister Georgina Sapangwa, Sister Chiomba amwalira dzulo atadwala nthenda ya kuthamanga kwa magazi komanso chifukwa cha ukalamba. Malemu Sister Chiomba Sister Chiomba anabadwa pa 24th August 1932 m’mudzi mwa Chiomba, mfumu yaikulu Dambe mu parish ya Neno. Iwo anachita malumbiro oyamba mchaka cha 1953 ndipo amwalira atatumikira Mulungu kwa zaka 69 ndipo zaka 90 zakubadwa. Sister Chiomba atumikira malo monga ku Providence,  Limbe, Namulenga, Balaka, Pirimiti, Mzama, Chikwawa, Thondwe, Bembeke, Mwanza, Deafblind, ndi Mary View Nursing home komwe amwalirira. Mzimu wa Sister Rosaria Gertrude Chiomba uwuse mu mtendere wosatha. Mwambo woyika m’manda thupi la malemu Sister Chiomba uchitika mawa ku likulu la chipanichi ku Mary View, ku Nguludi m’boma la Chiradzulu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ESCOM Yadzudzula Antchito Ake Ochita Chinyengo Pokonza Magetsi
news: Kampani yopereka magetsi mdziko muno ya Electricity Supply Corporation of Malawi (ESCOM) yadzudzula mchitidwe wa antchito ake ena omwe akulamula anthu kupereka ndalama kuti awakonzere vuto la magetsi ku dera kwawo. Mneneri wa kampaniyi a Innocent Chitosi ndi omwe anena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pamene amayankhapo pa madandaulo omwe alipo okhudzana ndi nkhaniyi. Chitosi: Tinawalemba kuti adzigwira ntchito imeneyoyo Iwo ati kukonza magetsi pamene avuta, ndi ntchito ya kampaniyi choncho palibe munthu amene akuyenera kukakamizidwa kuti alipire ndalama kuti ntchitoyo igwiridwe. “Kukonza pamene pali vuto ndi ntchito yathu imeneyo ndipo ndimadabwa ndikamamva Madera ena akuti kuno magetsi akavuta timasonkherana ndalama kaya mwina 30 sauzande kuti a ESCOM abwere adzatikonzere magetsi. Anthu amenewo ntchito yomwe tinawalemba kuti adzigwira ndi imeneyoyo ndiye palibe chifukwa choti apatsidwenso ndalama,” anatsindika a Chitosi. Pamenepa a Chitosi apempha anthu mdziko muno kuti adzikanena ku maofesi a kampaniyi za anthu omwe akumachita chinyengo pa ntchitoyi. “Vuto lomwe limakhalapo ndi lakuti anthu amangodandaula chonchi koma kuwauza kuti atchuleni anthuwa amakanika ndiye tiwapemphe kuti akawapeza anthu oterowo azizanena kwa ife ku maofesi athu kapena kuyimba lamya  ku nambala zathu zachinsinsi kuti anthu amenewo alandire chilango,” anatero a Chitosi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wagawa Bungwe Loteteza Chikhulupiliro cha Mpingo wa Katolika
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wagawa pawiri bungwe lolimbikitsa ndi kuteteza chikhulupiriro cha Mpingo wa Katolika. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco wachita izi popitiriza ntchito yake yowunika momwe ma ofesi osiyana-siyana a ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican agwirira ntchitokudzera m’kalata yake yotchedwa “Fidem servare” (preserving the faith). Izi zikutanthauza kuti bungweli tsopano likhala ndi nthambi ziwiri ndi alembi akeake: nthambi yoona zomwe Mpingo umakhulupirira ndi kuphunzitsa ndipo nthambi yoona kuti zomwe Mpingo umakhulupirira ndi kuphunzitsazo zikutsatidwadi. Kuwonjezera apa Cardinal yemwe azing’anira bungweli (Cardinal Prefect) akhala ndi achiwiri ake awiri. Papa Francisco wati wachita izi pofuna kupititsa pa patsogolo ntchito yaikulu ya bungweli yomwe ndi kulimbikitsa ndi kuteteza chikhulupiriro cha Mpingo wa Katolika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ECM Yalengeza za Imfa ya Bambo Byrne
news: Likulu la mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno lalengeza za imfa ya bambo mfumu a parishi ya Mtengowanthenga mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, bambo Patrick Byrne. Malinga ndi kalata yomwe yasayinidwa ndi mlembi wa bungwe la maepiskopi mdziko muno bambo Henry Saindi, bambo Byrne omwe anali a chipani cha Missionary Society of St. Patricks, amwalira mwadzidzidzi dzulo (lamulungu) usiku kumudzi kwawo ku Blessington, Co Wicklow mdziko la Ireland.  Malinga ndi kalatayi, pa nthawi ya imfayi, iwo anali atakonzeka kale kuti adzibwelera kuno ku Malawi lero pa 24 January 2022, atatsiriza tchuthi chawo chomwe anayamba mwezi wa November chaka chatha. Bambo Patrick Byrne anabadwa pa 27 February 1948 mdera lotchedwa Blessington mdziko la Ireland. Iwo analowa mchipani cha Misionary Society of St. Patricks m’mwezi wa September mchaka cha 1969 ndipo anadzodzedwa unsembe pa 12 June 1976 ndi arkiepsiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Elphin, Ambuye Dominic Conway. Atalandira unsembe, iwo anasankhidwa kukatumikira ku dayosizi ya Chikwawa mdziko la Malawi komwe anatumikira kwa zaka zambiri asanatumizidwe ku arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Mchaka cha 2002 bambo Byrne anasankhidwa kukhala Assistant Regional Superior wa chigawo chakumwera kwa Africa ndipo amakhala mdziko la South Africa. Mchaka cha 2008, iwo anabwelera kuno ku Malawi ndipo anasankhidwa kukhala bambo mfumu wa parishi ya Mtengowanthenga mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe komwe akhala akutumikira kufikira pano pomwe atisiya. Dongosolo lonse lokhudza mwambo wa maliro a bambowa lilengezedwabe. Mzimu wa bambo Patrick Byrne uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Phungu Wayamikira Wailesi Ya Kudera Pobzala Mitengo
news: Pamene dziko la Malawi lili mu nyengo yobzala mitengo m’nyengo ino ya mvula, phungu wa dera la kumpoto m’boma la Chikwawa, Owen Chomanika wayamikira wailesi ya kudera ya Nyungwe FM kaamba kotsogolera ntchito yobzala mitengo m’bomalo. Phunguyu wanena izi loweruka ku Thabwa pa mwambo wobzala mitengowu omwe wailesi ya Nyungwe ya m’bomali inakonza mogwirizana ndi mzika za bomalo kuti abzale mitengo m’mapiri a Chikwawa ndi mphepete mwa msewu wa M1 wa Blantyre-Chikwawa m’dera la mfumu yayikulu Mulilima. Chomanika kudzala mtengo wake Pamenepa a Chomanika anati, wailesi za kumadera ndi zofunika kwambiri pa chitukuko cha dziko la Malawi ndipo anati awonetsetsa kuti akuthandizana ndi magulu onse pa ntchito za chitukuko. Iwo anati, mitengo ndi yofunika kwambiri pa ntchito zina zaulimi monga ulimi wa njuchi, pambali pobwezeretsa chilengedwe. “Tithandizana nanu kuti tibzale mitengoyi, chifukwatu ngakhale ulimi wa njuchi utha kutheka chifukwa chakuti mitengo ilipo,” anatero a Chomanika. Poyankhulapo, mkulu woyang’anira za mapologalamu ku wailesi ya Nyungwe, a Stanford Titani Khulera anati zomwe wailesi yawo yachita ndi chimodzi mwa zitukuko za ku dera popeza wailesiyi imagwira ntchito limodzi ndi anthu akumadera. “Kubzala mitengo kapena kusamalira zachilengedwe ndi chitukuko chimene tikuyenera kuti ife tichigwire,” anatero a Khulera. Mwambo wobzala mitengowu, unachitika pa mutu woti; ‘Kubwezeretsa Chigwa chobiriwira.’
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Anthu Adzikonda Kuwerenga Baibulo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha akhristu kuti adzikonda kuwerenga Baibulo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi dzulo ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican, m’malaliko ake pa Misa yomwe anatsogolera mu tchalichi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica. Iye wati pamene akhristu akonda kuwerenga Mawu a Mulungu amakhala anthu osinthika komanso anthu odzadzidwa ndi chimwemwe mu mtima mwao. Papa Francisco wati malaliko akuyenera kumakhala owunikiridwa ndi Mzimu Woyera komanso okhudza miyoyo ya anthu makamaka zomwe anthu amakumana nazo tsiku ndi tsiku. Pamenepa iye wayamikira onse omwe ntchito yao ndi yolalikira komanso kuphunzitsa anthu Mau a Mulungu komanso wati ndi kofunika kumapempherera anthuwa kuti aziwunikiridwa ndi Mzimu Woyera nthawi zonse. Papa Francisco adakhazikitsa laMulungu la Mau a Mulungu m’chaka cha 2020. Patsikuli Mpingo umaganizira njira zosiyanasiyana zofalitsira Mau a Mulungu opezeka mu Baibulo komanso kulimbikitsa anthu kuti azikhala ndi chidwi chowerenga Baibulo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wafa Atamira mu Mtsinje ku Kasungu
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 49 zakubadwa Stephan Chidzaye, wafa atamira mu mtsinje wa Lusa m’boma la Kasungu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Joseph Kachikho, izi zachitika m’mudzi mwa Nkhungwi mfumu yaikulu Kawamba m’bomalo pomwe bamboyu ndi mwana wake anapita ku mtsinjewo ndi cholinga chokaweza nsomba. Ali komweko, anaganiza zokapha nsombazo mbali ina zomwe zinachititsa kuti aganize zowoloka mtsinjewo ndipo atafika pakati anakumana ndi madzi a mphamvu omwe awatenga. Thupi lawo linapezeka tsiku lotsatira mu mtsinjewu ndipo achipatala atapima thupilo anatsimikiza kuti malemuyu wafa chifukwa chobanika. Malemu Stephan Chidzaye anali wa m’mudzi mwa Nkhungwi mfumu yaikulu Kawamba m’boma la Kasungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe La Red Cross Lati Liwonetsetsa Kuti Anthu Okhudzidwa Ndi Madzi Osefukira Ku Chikwawa Akutetezedwa
news: Bungwe la Malawi Red Cross Society lati liwonetsetsa kuti mabanja amene anakhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya madzi osefukira ku Chikwawa, akulandira chisamaliro ndi chitetezo chokwanira. Malinga ndi kafukufuku yemwe bungweli lachita, mabanja oposera 3 sauzande ndi omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi ndipo ena mwa iwo akukhala m’misasa ku malo osiyanasiyana. Madzi osefukira akhudza mabanja ochuluka ku Chikwawa Poyankhula, m’modzi mwa akuluakulu a bungweli, mayi Cecilia Banda, ati anthu amene akukhala ku misasa awayika m’magulu malingana ndi zaka zawo, ulumali omwe ali nawo, amuna kapena akazi kudzanso kupezeka kwa chakudya kuti alandire chisamaliro choyenera. “Kudzera mu kafukufuku wathu, tikufuna kuti makomiti owona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi adziwe njira zoyenerera kuyika mu ndondomeko zawo maluso ena othandizira okhudzidwawa  molondola,” anatero mayi  Banda. Ena mwa madera amene akhudzidwa kwambiri ndi madzi osefukirawa ndi ozungulira midzi ya kwa Jombo kwa mfumu yayikulu Ngabu, Maseya, Katunga ndi Kasisi. Mabanja okwana 3,333 ochokera mwa nyakwawa khumi ndi zisanu ndi imodzi ochokera mwa mafumu akuluakulu asanu ndi m’modzi ndi omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya madzi osefukirawa m’boma la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Mkumano Ndi Nthumwi Za Mipingo Yachikhristu Ku Finland
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachita mkumano ndi nthumwi za mipingo ya chikhristu zochokera m’dziko la Finland. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, mkumanowu wachitika lolemba ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Papa pa mkumano wake ndi nthumwizo M’mawu ake kwa nthumwizi, iye watsindika za kufunika koyenda chitsogolo polimbikitsa umodzi wa mipingo ya chikhristu. Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kuyendera limodzi ndi kugwirana manja ndi kuthandizana kukhala pafupi ndi Mulungu. Iye wati pali zambiri zomwe akhristu a mipingo yosiyanasiyana angachite pofuna kulimbikitsa ubale wabwino pakati pao monga pogwira ntchito za chifundo zomwe wati sizongothandiza kukhala pafupi ndi anthu osauka komanso ndi zothandiza kulimbikitsa ubale pakati pa mipingo. Papa Francisco watchula zikondwerero ziwiri zomwe zichitike m’chaka cha 2025 zokhudza umodzi wa mipingo ya chikhristu. Poyamba kuti papita zaka 1700 chichitikireni msonkhano wa ku Nicea komanso zaka 500 za Lutheran Augsburg confession. 18 January mpaka 25 January ndi sabata yopempherera umodzi wa mipingo ya chikhristu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Banja Lanjatidwa Kaamba Kogula, Kugulitsa Fetereza Wotsika Mtengo
news: Apolisi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe amanga bambo wina ndi mkazi wake powaganizira kuti amagulitsa fetereza wa mu ndondomeko ya boma ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi pa polisi ya Lingadzi, Sub Inspector Salome Zgambo, izi zachitika  anthu akufuna kwabwino atatsina khutu apolisi. Fetereza yemwe anthuwo amagula ndi kugulitsa Malinga ndi a Zgambo, banjali lakhala likugula fetelezayu pogwiritsa ntchito ziphaso za unzika za anthu ena ndipo a njinga za kabaza ndi omwe amakawagulira. Iwo akagula fetelezayu amamuyika mu sitolo yawo ndipo amagulitsa alimi ozungulira deralo pa mitengo yokwera. Pakadali pano apolisi apeza matumba 25 a feteleza wa mtundu wa NPK ndiponso matumba 12 a mtundu wa Urea. Mkuluyu Maxwell Piseni wa zaka 50 ndi mkazi wake Jean Allan Piseni wa zaka 43, amangidwa lolemba kwa Mtsiriza mu mzindawu. Awiriwa amachokera m’mudzi mwa Chimkonda mfumu yaikulu Mpando m’boma la Ntcheu ndipo akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku khothi komwe akayankhe mlanduwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mphunzitsi Wina Ku Chikwawa Wafa Atamwa Kachasu
news: Mphunzitsi wina wa zaka 30 zakubadwa yemwe amagwira ntchito pa sukulu ya pulayimale ya Pende m’boma la Chikwawa wafa atamwa kachasu wopanda kudyera. Mneneri wa polisi ya m’bomali Seargent Dickson Matemba watsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo wati malemuwa ndi a Wilson Muleza, omwe amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mologeni kwa mfumu yayikulu Katunga m’bomalo. Malinga ndi mphunzitsi wamkulu pa sukulu ya Pende, a Elias Mathews, malemuwo anapita kukamwa mowa wa kachasu asanadye chilichonse m’mudzi mwa Pende pa 16 January, 2022. “Achibale a malemuwo anaganiza zokawawona m’mawa wa tsiku lotsatira, pa 17 January 2022 ndipo atagogoda anadabwa kuti m’bale wawo sakuyankha.Pamenepa, iwo anangoganiza zongolowa mnyumbamo momwe anapeza m’bale wawoyo atakomoka,” anatero a Mathews. Achibalewa anadziwitsa apolisi omwe anafika ku maloko ndi kutengera mphunzitsiyo ku chipatala cha Chikwawa komwe achipatala  anatsimikiza kuti wamwalira. Zotsatira za chipatala zasonyeza kuti mkuluyu wafa kaamba ka mowa. Padakali pano apolisi m’bomali achenjeza anthu kuti apewe kumwa mowa asanadye kalikonse kuti apewe mavuto ngati omwe achitikawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Imfa Zodza Kaamba Ka Madzi Zikhumudwitsa Apolisi Ku Kasungu
news: Mwana wa miyezi khumi (10) wafa atagwera mu chidebe cha madzi m’boma la Kasungu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Joseph Kachikho, zomwe zachitikazi ndi zodandaulitsa kaamba koti imfa zodza kaamba ka madzi zikuchulukira m’bomalo. Sub Inspector Kachikho ati izi zachitika m’mudzi wa Kondwani  mfumu yaikulu Chidzuma pomwe mayi wa malemuyu amagwira ntchito zapakhomo. Malemu Trevor Banda anali atakomoka pomwe mayi wake anazindikira za ngoziyi ndipo atathamangira naye ku chipatala, adotolo anatsimikiza kuti mwanayu wafa  chifukwa chobanika. Ndipo mu nkhani yangati yomweyi, anthu awiri afa atamira m’madzi  m’malo osiyana m’boma lomwelo la Kasungu. Malinga ndi apolisi,mnyamata wa zaka khumi, Mwale Black wafa atamira mu mtsinje wa Bua. Iye anali wa m’mudzi mwa Chimbalame mfumu yaikulu Santhe m’bomalo. Pomwe bambo  wina yemwe sakudziwika kwawo wapezekanso atafa mu mtsinje wa Dwangwa m’mudzi mwa Kaliwombo mfumu yaikulu Wimbe m’bomalo. Pakadali pano apolisi  m’boma la Kasungu ati ndi okhumudwa ndi kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha imfa zomwe zikudza chifukwa cha madzi ndipo alangiza anthu kuti mu nyengo ino ya mvula  apewe kuwoloka mitsinje yodzadza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Adzipha Pothawa Mlandu Wogwilira
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 51 wadzipha pambuyo pogwidwa ndi mkazi wake akugona ndi mwana wake womupeza wa zaka 12 m’boma la Kasungu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Joseph Kachikho, izi zachitika masana a pa 15 January 2022 mu nkhalango ya Zithani Juma m’bomalo. Malemuyu Evance Mtyako Nkunika pa 14 January chaka chomwe chino anagwidwa  ndi mkazi wake akugwirira mwana wake wa zaka 12 zomwe sizinakondweretse mkaziyu. Bamboyu atawona kuti zake zada anasowa pa nyumbapo kufikira tsiku lotsatira pomwe thupi lake linapezeka mu mtengo wina mu nkhalangoyi yomwe ili mdera la mfumu ya ndodo Kaluluma m’bomalo, atadzimangilira. Achipatala atafika pamalowo anatsimikiza kuti malemuwa afa chifukwa chobanika. Malemu Evance Mtyako Nkunika anali wa m’mudzi mwa wa Zithani mfumu yaikulu Kaluluma m’boma la Kasungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ana Anayi Amira Mu Mtsinje Wa Linengwe M’boma La Ntcheu
news: Ana anayi (4) afa atamira mu mtsinje wa Linengwe m’boma la Ntcheu. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Rabecca Kwisongole wati anawa ndi Thomas Sozolinyo wa zaka khumi, Mac Sozolinyo wa zaka 7, Mac Evance wa zaka 11 ndi George Zakeyu wa zaka 12. Izi zachitika m’mudzi mwa Mlambwaza  mfumu yaikulu Makwangwala m’bomalo pomwe anawa anatengana kupita ku mtsinjewu ndi cholinga choti akasambe ndipo atayamba kusamba anawa anatengedwa ndi madziwo zomwe zinachititsa kuti  amire. Anthu a kufupi ndi deralo atafika pa malowo anapeza matupi a anawo akuyandama. Achipatala cha Bilira atafika anatsimikiza kuti anawa amwalira chifukwa cha kubanika. Pakadali pano apolisi achenjeza makolo kuti mu nthawi ino ya mvula asamalore ana awo kupita ku mtsinje okha kuwopa ngozi za mgtunduwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chiwerengero Cha Ngozi Za Pansewu Chatsika Mu Mzinda Wa Lilongwe
news: Chiwerengero cha ngozi za pa nsewu mu mzinda wa Lilongwe akuti chatsika ndi 38.16 percent m’chaka changothachi poyerekeza ndi chaka cha 2020. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe, Inspector Hastings Chigalu wati izi zachitika kaamba ka kuchilimika kwa apolisi m’misewu yozungulira mzindawu. Chigalu: Takwanitsa kuchepetsa ngozi zapansewu Malinga ndi a Chigalu, chiwerengero cha ngozi zomwe zachitika ndi chokwana 531 pomwe m’chaka cha 2020 chiwerengerochi chinali pa 2,476. Chiwerengero cha milandu chatsika ndi 4.34 perecent kuphatikizapo milandu yophana yomwe chaka changothachi yatsika kuchoka pa 102 kufika pa 75 ndipo chiwerengero cha milandu ya umbanda chatsika kuchoka pa 224 kufika pa 216. Koma apolisiwa adandaula ndi milandu yogwilirira yomwe chaka changothachi yakwera kuchoka pa 139 kufika pa 141. Pakadali pano apolicewa ayamikira ubale wabwino omwe ulipo ndi anthu a mu mzindawu omwe akutui wathandizira kuti ntchito yawo idziyenda bwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Bata Mdziko la Sudan
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha bata ndi mtendere m’dziko la Sudan. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, pempholi ladza pano pomwe anthu m’dzikolo akuchita ziwonetsero zosonyeza kusakondwa ndi boma la asilikali. Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi mpungwepungwe omwe ukuchitika m’dzikolo ndipo wapempha kuti pakuyenera kupezeka njira yofuna kuthetsera mavutowo. Pempho la Papa Francisco ladza pano pomwenso bungwe la United Nations likufuna kuyamba zokambirana ndi boma la asilikali komanso nthumwi zoyimira anthu wamba. Koma anthu ena omwe akutsogolera kuchita ziwonetserozi akana chilinganizochi. Anthu okwana 62 aphedwa tsopano pa ziwonetsero zomwe anthu akhala akuchita zosonyeza kusakondwa ndi zomwe adachita asilikali polanda boma mwezi wa October chaka chatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mavuto AKhudza Maiko Onse pa Dziko Lapansi
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati mavuto omwe akhudza dziko la pansi, si a dziko limodzi koma maiko onse. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lolemba pa mkumano wake ndi a kazembe oyimira maiko awo ku Vatican. Poyambirira penipeni iye wauza a kazembewa kuti cholinga chachikulu pamene akugwira ntchito yawo chikuyenera kukhala kuthandiza kuthetsa mikangano ndi kulimbikitsa umodzi pakati pa maiko. Kenaka Papa Francisco wakamba za mliri wa Coronavirus omwe wati wasokoneza ntchito zosiyanasiyana kotero ndi kofunika kuti maiko achilimike pothetsa mliriwu maka poonetsetsa kuti munthu aliyense ali ndi zipangizo zozitetezera komanso kuwonetsetsa kuti anthu ali ndi mwayi wolandira katemera wa nthendayi. Kuchoka apo, iye wathirirapo ndemanga pa ma ulendo ake opita ku maiko a Iraq, Budapest, Slovakia, Cyprus ndi Greece mu chaka chapitachi. Papa’yu wati kudzera mu maulendowa, amadziwonera yekha ndi kumva za mavuto a anthu  ngakhale chiyembekezo chawo. Iye wakamba za mavuto a kusintha kwa nyengo komanso za anthu othawa kwao pa zifukwa zosiyanasiyana zomwe zikufunika kuziunika bwino ndikupeza njira zothetsera mavutowa. Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi mavuto a m’maiko osiyanasiyana koma makamaka ku South Sudan komanso Sudan, Ethiopia, Syria, Lebanon, Ukraine, Yemen, Myanmar osaiwala kusamvana pakati pa dziko la Israel ndi ma Palestina. Iye wati pakuyenera kupezeka njira zothetsera kusamvana mmaikowa. Papa Francisco wakambaponso za kufunika kolimbikitsa maphunziro komanso kuti anthu azikhala ndi mwayi wolembedwa ntchito ngati njira zothanirana ndi umphawi wadzaoneni m’maiko ambiri. Iye wamaliza ndi kupempha mgwirizano pakati pa maiko onse ponena kuti mavuto a dziko limodzi mwa njira ina amakhudzanso maiko ena. Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse lomwe ndi dziko loyima palokha, Vatican City State liri pa ubale wa ukazembe ndi maiko 185.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bwanamkubwa Wa Khonsolo Ya Phalombe Athetsa Komiti Yolemba Anthu Ntchito
news: Kusamvana kwabuka ku khonsolo ya Phalombe pomwe bwanamkubwa wa bomali Rhodrick Mateauma walemba kalata kulembera Komiti yolemba anthu ntchito ku khonsoloyo kuti ileke kugwira ntchito zake Lolemba sabata ino pofika nthawi yoweruka kuntchito. Walemba kalatayo – Mateauma Kalatayi yomwe Radio Maria Malawi yawona, siyinafotokoze chifukwa chirichonse chomwe ganizoli lapangiridwa. Atafunsidwa, bwanamkubwayu anakana kuyankhulapo zambiri pa kalatayi ponena kuti nkhani yonseyi ikakambidwa ku ofesi kwawo. Ndipo poyankha kalatayo, wapampando wa Komiti yolemba anthu ntchito ku khonsoloyo Isaac Lumbani Nkambule wafunsa bwanamkubwa wawo kuti apereke zifukwa zomveka bwino zomwe akuthetsera komitiyi. “Ndife odabwa chifukwa cha chiganizochi. Ndalemba kalata powayankha kalata yawo yomwe anandilembera koma ndawafunsa kuti afotokoze bwino zifukwa zomwe akuthetsera komiti yathu,” anatero a Nkambule. Komitiyi ikukayikira kuti ikuthetsedwa kaamba koti inakana kulemba ntchito munthu yemwe bwanamkubwayi amafuna kuti alembedwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Ngozi Ya Moto Ku America
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya anthu ochuluka potsatira ngozi ya moto pa nyumba ina yokhala anthu ku New York m’dziko la America. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi mu uthenga wake wopepesa potsatira imfa ya anthuwa. A nthambi yowona za moto kupulumutsa anthu pa ngoziyo Mu uthengawu Papa Francisco wati ndi wachisoni chachikulu kaamba ka imfa ya anthu ochuluka komanso kuti ena mwa anthuwa ndi ana. Iye wati ali pafupi ndi onse omwe abale awo afa pangoziyi ndipo wati waikiza mizimu ya anthuwa m’manja mwa Mulungu. Malipoti ati laMulungu lapitali m’mawa moto woopysa unabuka pa nyumba ina yaitali kwambiri yosanjikizana ndipo anthu 19 afa kuphatikizapo ana asanu ndi anayi (9). Zadziwika kuti ngozi yaikulu chotereyi sinachitikepo kwa zaka 30 zapitazi mu mzinda wa New York.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa ndi Zipolowe za Mdziko la Kazakhstan
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi zipolowe zomwe zakhala zikuchitika m’dziko la Kazakhstan. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi laMulungu ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Iye wati ndi wachisoni chachikulu kaamba ka anthu ambiri omwe afa pa zipolowe za m’dzikolo ndipo wati waikiza mizimu ya anthuwa m’manja mwa Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati ndi chikhulupiriro chake kuti mavuto a m’dzikolo atha pochita zokambirana. Iye wamaliza ndi kuikiza anthu a m’dzikolo m’manja mwa Amayi Maria, Mfumukazi ya Mtendere. Malipoti akuti anthu 150 afa pa zipolowezi ndipo anthu oposa 4,000 amangidwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Aba 1.3 Million Kwacha Ponamiza Anthu za Ntchito yaku Polisi
news: Bambo wa zaka 55 ali m’manja mwa apolisi kaamba komuganizira kuti wabera achinyamata a m’boma la Ntchisi ndalama zoposa 1.3 million kwacha ponena kuti awapezera ntchito ku nthambi ya apolisi mdziko muno ya Malawi Police Service (MPS). Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mchigawo chapakati chakumvuma Inspector Harry Namwaza, mkuluyu ndi Lameck Nkhoma wa m’mudzi mwa  Khuni mfumu yaikulu Kalumo m’boma la Ntchisi. Iye akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa komwe akayankhe mlandu opeza ndalama mwachinyengo ponamiza anthu. Pakadali pano apolisi akufufuza zambiri za nkhaniyi kuti agwire ena mwa anthu omwe akukhuzidwanso ndi nkhaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anjatidwa Kamba Kogulitsa Feteleza Wotsika Mtengo Kwa Mavenda
news: Mkulu  woyang’anira ADMARC ya Malomo m’boma la Ntchisi ali manja mwa apolisi kamba komuganizira kuti amagulitsa feteleza wotsika mtengo kwa anthu ochita malonda (mavenda). Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Ntchisi Sergeant Yohane Tasowana, izi zachitika potsatira chipikisheni chomwe apolisi m’chigawo cha pakati kum’mawa anachita, atamva mphekesera zoti mavenda  ambiri ndi omwe akugula feteleza wotsika mtengo m’misika yambiri m’bomalo. Apolisi anayenda m’misika yosiyanasiyana yomwe alimi akuguliramo zipangizo  zotsika mtengo Affordable Input Program (AIP). Potsatira chipikisheni-chi mavenda 28 amangidwa  kamba kopezeka ndi ziphaso za unzika zokwana 53 za anthu ena zokwana. Kumangidwa kwa ochita malondawa ndi komwe kwathandizira kuti mkulu woyang’anira ADMARC ya Malomo a Hastings Mthiko amangidwe. Kumangidwa kwa a Mthiko omwe ndi a zaka 48 zakubadwa, kwafikitsa chiwerengero cha anthu omangidwa  pa nkhaniyi kufika pa 29. A Hastings Mthiko amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mbuyedziko mfumu yaikulu Kalumo m’boma la Ntchisi. Iwo akawonekera ku khothi posachedwapa komwe akayankhe mlanduwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wina Wanjatidwa Pomuganizira Kuti Wapha Munthu
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 28  ali m’manja mwa apolisi kaamba komuganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi imfa ya a Hezekiah Phiri omwe anaphedwa pa 27 December chaka chatha m’boma la Kasungu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Joseph Kachikho, mkuluyu Denis Theu wamangidwa potsatira kafukufuku wa apolisi yemwe akuwonetsa kuti oganiziridwawa anachitadi za upanduzi. Denis Theu amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mphongwe, mfumu yaikulu Lukwa m’boma la Kasungu. Iye akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku khothi komwe akayankhe mlandu wakupha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mapemphero Amathandiza Kutsekula Mitima ya Akhristu
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati mapemphero amathandiza kutsekula mitima ya akhristu ndi kuthandiza kuti akhale pa ubale weniweni ndi Mulungu. Papa wanena izi kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Iye anakhazikika pa Uthenga Wabwino omwe unawerengedwa pa tsiku la chaka cha Ubatizo wa Ambuye Yesu omwe ukufotokoza za Ubatizo wa Ambuye Yesu mu mtsinje wa Yorodani ndi Yohane M’batizi. Papa Francisco wati ndi ku mtsinje wa Yorodani kumene ntchito ya Ambuye Yesu yofuna kupulumutsa mtundu wa anthu idayambira. Iye wati kudzera mu Ubatizo mu mtsinje wa Yorodani, Ambuye Yesu adaonetsa kudzichepetsa kwao komanso kufunitsitsa kwao kukhala pafupi ndi anthu omwe adafuna kuwapulumutsa. Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika komapemphera nthawi zonse monga Uthenga Wabwino ukufotokozera kuti polandira Ubatizo Ambuye Yesu anali kupemphera. Iye wati monga Yesu Khristu adali pa ubale weniweni ndi Atate ake kudzera m’mapemphero akhristu akuyenera kuchita chimodzimodzi pokhala anthu okonda kupemphera pafupifupi. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kukumbutsa akhristu za kufunika komakumbukira tsiku la Ubatizo ponena kuti limeneli ndi tsiku lalikulu m’moyo wa mkhristu aliyense.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Achinyamata Likufuna Msukwa Atule Pansi Udindo
news: Bungwe lina la achinyamata lotchedwa Mzuzu Youth Anti-Corruption Movement lati likufuna kuti nduna yowona za malo mdziko muno a Kezzie Msukwa atule pansi udindo wawo kaamba ka nkhani yomwe akuganiziridwa kuti akukhudzidwa ndi nkhani za katangale zokhudza malo mu mzinda wa Lilongwe komanso ku Salima. Wapampando wa bungweli Mathews Kajani wanena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi potsatira chikalata chomwe bungweli latulutsa pa nkhaniyi. Akuganiziridwa kuti akukhudzidwa ndi katangale pa nkhani za malo – Msukwa Iwo ati potengera udindo omwe a Msukwa ali nawo, nkhaniyi ikupereka chithunzithunzi choyipa cha akuluakulu a boma omwe amayenera kukhala patsogolo pa ntchito yolimbana ndi katangale mdziko muno. “Ndife okhudzidwa kwambiri ndi nkhani imeneyi ndipo tikufuna kuti a Msukwa mwa ulemu wawo atule okha pansi udindo kapena mtsogoleri wa dziko lino awachotse pa udindowu monga anachitira ndi nduna zina zija chifukwa zomwe a Msukwa achitazi ndi zopereka chithunzithunzi choyipa cha boma la Tonse Alliance lomwe linalonjeza kudzathana ndi katangale mdziko muno,” anatero a Kajani. Padakalipano a Msukwa komanso mtsogoleri wa dziko lino sanayankhepo kanthu pa nkhaniyi. Koma poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa akatswiri pa nkhani za ndale a Enerst Thindwa ati zomwe zikuchitikazi zikusonyeza kuti boma lilibe chidwi pa ntchito yothetsa katangale mdziko muno. “Ndi zodabwitsa kuti a Msukwa sakuchotsedwa udindo chifukwa chani pomwe nduna zina m’mbuyomu zinachotsedwapo. Kuyimitsa munthu pa ntchito sizitanthauza kuti ndi olakwa koma kupereka mpata kuti kafukufuku achitike,” anatero a Thindwa. Mwapadera iwo adzudzula khalidwe la anthu a ndale mdziko muno omwe samafuna kutula pansi udindo pawokha koma kudikira kuti achotsedwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wauza AKhristu Alalike Mthenga wa Chipulumutso Kudzera M’moyo Wawo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walimbikitsa akhristu kuti adzilalika za uthenga wa chipulumutso wa Yesu Khristu kudzera m’moyo wawo wa tsiku ndi tsiku. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi mu uthenga wake wa chaka chino wa chibalalitso cha Mpingo. Chaka chino mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse udzachita chaka cha chibalalitso cha Mpingo pa 23 October. Mwezi wa October ndi mwezi wa chibalalitso cha Mpingo pomwe akhristu a Mpingowu amasinkhasinkha za udindo womwe ali nao wothandiza kufalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso kudzera mu njira zosiyanasiyana. “Mudzakhala mboni zanga, You shall be my witnesses” ndi mutu wa uthenga wa Papa Francisco wa chibalalitso cha Mpingo wa chaka chino. Mu uthengawu, Papa Francisco akusinkhasinkha za mitu itatu yofunikira kwambiri kwa akhristu. Mutu woyamba ndi woti mkhristu aliyense wobatizidwa akuyitanidwa kuti achitire umboni uthenga wa chipulumutso wa Yesu Khristu. Iye wati monga Yesu Khristu adaliri mboni ya Atate ake pansi pano, mkhristu aliyense payekhapayekha akuyitanidwa kukhala mboni ya Yesu Khristu komanso kulalika za Yesu Khristu molumikizana ndi akhristu ena m’malo mwa Mpingo wonse. Mutu wachiwiri ndi woti akhristu ali ndi udindo wolalika uthenga wa chipulumutso mpaka kumalekezero a dziko la pansi kuti anthu amene sadamulandirebe Yesu Khristu atero. Mfundo yachitatu ndi yomaliza ndi yokhudza kulandira Mzimu Woyera. Papa Francisco wafotokoza kuti ndi Mzimu Woyera yemwe adathandiza kuchotsa mantha omwe Apostoli oyamba aja adali nawo. Iye wati pogwira ntchito yolalika uthenga wa chipulumutso akhristu akuyenera kuwunikiridwa ndi Mzimu Woyera komanso kulimbitsidwa ndi mapemphero. Papa Francisco sadayiwale kukumbutsa a Katolika za zikondwerero zikuluzikulu zomwe zichitike chaka chino. Poyamba kuti papita zaka 400 chikhazikitsireni bungwe lothandiza kufalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso, Sacred Congregation for the Propagation of the Faith lomwe likudziwika bwino masiku ano kuti Congregation for the Evangelization of Peoples. Chikondwerero china ndi cha zaka 200 za bungwe lothandiza kufalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso lodziwika kuti Society for the Propagation of the Faith lomwe adayambitsa ndi mayi wina wa ku France Pauline Jaricot amenenso Mpingo umukhazikitse kukhala wodala chaka chino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akuba Aba Katundu wa 800 Sauzande Kwacha ku Seminale ya St. Peters
news: Anthu omwe sakudziwika, athyola ndi kuba katundu osiyanasiyana ku sukulu yaikulu yosulira ansembe ya St. Peters mu dayosizi ya Zomba. Malinga ndi mkulu wa seminaleyi bambo Anthony Kadyampakeni, akubawa omwe ananyamula zikwanje, anafika pa sukuluyi usiku wa lachinayi ndipo analipo oposa makumi awiri (20). Bambo Kadyampakeni: Anamanga ndi kuvulaza alonda Iwo ati akubawa anathyola ofesi ya mkulu wa seminaleyo komanso ya mlembi wa seminaleyo ndipo anakwanitsa kulowa m’galimoto ya wansembe wina yemwe amatumikira pa sukuluyo ndi kubamo zinthu zosiyanasiyana. “Akubawa anakwanitsa kumanga ndi kuvulaza alonda kenaka anapita ndi kuthyola ofesi ya a secretary ndi kuba computer komanso laptop ndipo kenaka analowanso mu ofesi yanga ndi kuba laptop. Anakwanitsanso kulowa m’galimoto ya bambo Bonongwe omwe amatumikiranso pompano ndi kuba zinthu zina ndi zina. Katundu yemwe atibera akukwana ndalama zoposa K800,000,” anatero bambo Kadyampakeni. Iwo anapitiriza kunena kuti anayitana apolisi koma m’mene amafika anapeza akubawa atathawira ku malo komwe kumakhala asistere a chipani cha Atumiki a Maria Virgo Wodala. Apolisiwa atathamangira kumeneko, akubawa akuti anathawa ndipo sanabe kanthu. Iwo ati apolisi awatsimikizira kuti ayesetsa kufufuza ndi kugwira anthu amene achita za upanduzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Apereka Mafuno Abwino a Khilisimasi ku Mipingo Ina
news: Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wa mafuno abwino a Christmas kwa akhristu a mpingo wa katolika wa ku m’mawa ndi mpingo wa Orthodox, omwe akuchita chikondwerero cha Christmas lero. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wafunira mafuno abwino a mtendere komanso chimwemwe pomwe mipingoyi ikuchita chikondwererochi. Mipingoyi ikuchita chikondwerero cha Christmas lero pa 7 January. Akhristu a mpingo wa Orthodox kuchita chikondwelero chawo Pamene mipingo yambiri ya chikhristu imachita chikondwerero cha Christmas pa 25 December, akhristu a Mpingo wa Katolika wa ku m’mawa, Eastern Rite Catholics ndi Mpingo wa Orthodox akuchita chikondwerero cha Christmas lero pa 7 January. Pa chifukwa ichi Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wa mafuno abwino a mtendere komanso chimwemwe ku mipingoyi pamene ikuchita chikondwererochi. “Landirani mafuno abwino a mtendere ochokera kwa ine. Ambuye Yesu wobadwa mwa Amayi Maria awunikire ma banja onse komanso magulu osiyanasiyana. Ndikukufunirani zabwino zonse,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawu. Mpingo wa Katolika wa ku m’mawa komanso Mpingo wa Orthodox ukuchita chikondwerero cha Christmas lero pogwiritsa ntchito kalendala ya Julian yomwe inapangidwa ndi Julius Caesar m’chaka cha 46 B.C Ambuye Yesu asanabadwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mzika yaku Rwanda Ipereka Chindapusa Kaamba Kozembetsa Makala
news: Bwalo la milandu la First Grade Magistrate m’boma la Dowa lalamula mzika ina ya mdziko la Rwanda kuti ipereke chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 400 sauzande kwacha itapezeka yolakwa pa mlandu wozembetsa matumba a makala okwana 18. Bwaloli linamva kuchokera kwa woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Christopher Daluni kuti mkuluyu Masunzo Venus anamangidwa pa 30 December chaka chatha pa sukulu ya pulaimale ya Mponda m’bomalo.  Iye anati mkuluyu anatenga matumbawa pa galimoto ina ya mtundu wa Mazda Bongo nambala yake CZ 4963. Atawonekera ku bwaloli mkuluyu anawuvomera mlanduwu omwe ndi wopezeka ndi zinthu za mu nkhalango komanso kuzembetsa zinthu za mu nkhalango opanda chilorezo. Popereka chigamulo chake oweruza milandu Amran Phiri analamula mkuluyu kuti apereke chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 200 sauzande pa mlandu uliwonse, kulephera apo akakhale ku ndende kwa miyezi makumi awiri. Padakalipano makalawo atengedwa ndi boma ndipo galimotoyo ibwezedwa kwa eni ake pambuyo popereka chindapusachi. Masunzo Venus amachokera ku Chigali mdziko la Rwanda koma amakhala ku malo osungira anthu othawa kwawo a Dzaleka m’boma la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Alimbikitsa za Kufunika Kosamalira Anthu Odwala
news: 11 February ndi chaka cha Amayi Maria a ku Lourdes ndipo pa tsiku lomweli Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse udzakhala ukuganizira mwa njira ya padera odwala onse. Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, latulutsa uthenga wa Papa Francisco wa pa tsiku loganizira anthu odwala. Papa pa umodzi mwa maulendo ake oyendera anthu odwala “Mukhale a chifundo monga atate anu a kumwamba ali a chifundo” ndi mutu wa uthenga wa Papa Francisco wa pa tsiku loganizira anthu odwala chaka chino. Mu uthengawu, iye watsindika za kufunika kolimbikitsa ndi kupititsa patsogolo ntchito yosamalira anthu odwala komanso za kufunika kolimbikitsa anthu omwe amasamalira anthu odwala. Papa Francisco wafotokoza kuti akuzindikira kuti pali anthu ambiri omwe sakutha kufikira chithandizo cha mankhwala a ku chipatala komanso ambiri sakufikiridwa ndi anthu owalimbikitsa m’moyo wawo wa uzimu pamene akudwala. Pamenepa iye wati ntchito yosamalira anthu odwala ndi yofunika kwambiri kaamba koti angakhale Ambuye Yesu amene ali pansi pano adawafikira anthu odwala ankhaninkhani ndi kuwachiza komanso kuwalimbitsa m’moyo wao wa uzimu. Papa Francisco wayamikira onse ogwira ntchito za chipatala komanso anthu ndi magulu osiyanasiyana omwe akukangalika kugwira ntchito yothandiza anthu odwala. Chaka chino zochitikachitika za pa tsiku loganizira anthu odwala zidzachitikira mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica ku Vatican. Papa Yohane Paulo wachiwiri Woyera ndi yemwe adakhazikitsa tsiku loganizira anthu odwala pa dziko lonse m’chaka cha 1992.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Makhansala Atseka Ofesi Za Khonsolo ku Mangochi
news: Makhansala ena atseka ofesi za akuluakulu a khonsolo ya municipal ya Mangochi ati pofuna kukakamiza boma kuti lichititse chisankho cha Mayor wa khonsoloyo. Ofesizi ndi za mkulu wa khonsoloyo, yemwe akugwirizira udindo wa Mayor wa khonsoloyo komanso mkulu owona zachuma ku khonsoloyo. M’modzi mwa makhansalawa a Wellington Mangulenje awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti makhansala omwe ali pansi pa municipality ya Mangochi ndi okwiya kaamba koti boma lapereka chiganizo choti wapampando wa khonsoloyo apitirize kukhala pa udindowu ngakhale kuti khonsoloyo inasintha kuchoka pa tawuni ndi kufika pa municipality. Nkhoma: Alipowa akuyenera atsirize kaye teremu yawo Iwo ati ndi odabwa kuti chisankho cha mayor wa khonsoloyo chimayenera kuchitika pamodzi ndi zisankho za ma mayor a mizinda ina mdziko muno koma sizinachitike. “Malamulo amati munthu akuyenera kukhala Mayor pokhapokha ngati wasankhidwa ndi makhansala anzake osati kungosankhidwa ndi munthu wina wapadera ayi. Ife titsekula maofesi amenewa pokhapokha akuluakulu a boma akatiyankha zomveka pa nkhani imeneyi chifukwa chomwe tikufuna ife ndi chisankho bas kuti tikhale ndi Mayor wosankhidwa movomerezeka ndi malamulo a dziko lino,” anatero a Mangulenje. Komabe iwo anapitiriza ponena kuti amene ali pa udindowu padakalipano nawonso ali ndi ufulu wopikisana nawo pa chisankhochi. “Anthu amvetsetse. Sikuti mmene tikuti tikufuna chisankho ndiye kuti amene alipowa asayime nawo ayi. Nawonso ali ndi ufulu wopikisana nawo,” anatero a Mangulenje. Koma poyankhulapo, mkulu wa khonsolo ya municipal ya Mangochi a Abubakar Nkhoma ati malinga ndi chikonzero cha ku unduna owona za maboma aang’ono, chisankho cha mayor chidzachitika kumapeto kwa chaka cha 2022 pomwe anthu omwe ali m’maudindo padakalipano teremu yawo ya zaka ziwiri ndi theka idzafike kumapeto. “Ife unduna unatiuza kuti amene alipowa apitirize kufikira pomwe atatsirizire zaka zawo ziwiri ndi theka kuchokera pomwe anasankhidwa ndipo pamenepa ndi pomwe tisakumvana ndi makhansala enawa,” anatero a Nkhoma. Pamenepa a Nkhoma ati kutseka kwa ofesi zawo kwakhudza kwambiri ntchito za khonsoloyi pa katoleredwe ka ndalama komanso zinthu zina. Komabe iwo ati akhala akuchita zokambirana ndi makhansala okwiyawa ndi cholinga choti kusamvanaku kuthe ndi kutsekulanso maofesiwa kuti ayambirenso kugwira ntchito.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Makolo Awonetse Chikondi Kwa Ana Awo -Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi khumbo lake kuti ana awonetseredwe chikondi ndi makolo awo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco wanena izi lero poyankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana mu Hall ya Papa Paulo wa 6 komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Iye wafotokoza kuti udindo wa ukulu wa makolo ndiye kupereka chisamaliro kwa ana awo. Papa wati makolo amene samadziwa za udindo omwe ali nawo pa ana awo ndi osakwanira kutchulidwa makolo. Pamwambowu, iye walimbikitsa mabanja omwe ali ndi kuthekera kolera ana ena osowa chisamaliro  pambali pa ana awo kudzera mu njira ya adoption kuti atero mosakaika. Papa Francisco wadzudzula m’chitidwe wa anthu ena oyika mtima wawo kwambiri pa ziweto monga agalu ndi a mphaka m’malo mobereka ana ndi kumawasamalira kapena kupereka chisamaliro kwa ana osowa chisamaliro. Iye watsiriza ndi kuyikiza ana a masiye onse m’mapemphero kuti atetezedwe kudzera mu uneneri wa Yosefe Woyera ndipo wati kudzera mu uneneri wa woyera-yu, makolo onse omwe akufuna kukhala ndi ana alandire mphatso ya ana m’mabanja awo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wauza Akhristu Apemphelere Anthu Ovutika Kaamba ka Chikhulupiliro Chawo
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha mapemphero opemphelera anthu omwe akuzunzika kaamba ka chikhulupiriro chawo molingana ndi chipembedzo chawo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wapereka pempholi posinkhasinkha za cholinga cha mapemphero ake mwezi uno wa January. Iye wati pozindikira za ufulu omwe anthu ali nawo pa nkhani ya zipembedzo, ndi kofunika kuthetsa mavuto osiyanasiyana komanso nkhanza zomwe anthu akuchitiridwa kaamba ka chikhulupiriro chawo molingana ndi chipembedzo chawo. “Tingalole bwanji kuti mmasiku a makono ano anthu azizunzidwa kaamba ka chikhulupiriro chao,” wafunsa motero Papa Francisco. Iye wati ndi chinthu chosamveka kuzunza anthu kaamba ka chikhulupiliro chawo komanso wati kutero ndi chizindikiro cha kusowa kwa umunthu Malinga ndi malipoti, anthu oposa 646 million akukhala m’maiko momwe anthu alibe ufulu wopembedza m’mene amafunira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Maranatha Yalonjeza Mphotho Kwa ophunzira Ochita bwino pa Mayeso a JCE
news: Potsatira kuchita bwino pa mayeso a chaka chino a ophunzira a fomu 2 omwe unduna wa maphunziro ndi bungwe Malawi National Examinations Board (MANEB) atulutsa, mkulu oyendetsa sukulu ya Maranatha, Enerst Kaonga walonjeza kuti achita mwambo wapadera wothokoza ophunzira onse omwe akhonza kuposa anzawo msukuluzi, ndi ndalama zankhaninkhani. Poyankhula ndi olemba nkhani mu mzinda wa Blantyre, iye anati ndi okondwa ndi zotsatira za mayesowa zomwe sukulu yake ya asungwana yakhonzetsa ophunzira onse 97 omwe analemba mayesowa mdipo mtsikana m’modzi Esther Chavula wakhonza moposa onse popeza grade A pa phunziro lililonse. Iye wati msungwanayu akuyembekezeka kulandira ndalama zokwana 500 sauzande kwacha ngati njira imodzi yolimbikitsa ophunzira kuchita bwino pa mayeso a boma. “Ndili ndi chimwemwe kwambiri maka potengera kuti wakhonza bwino ndi mtsikana Esther zomwe ndi zolimbikitsa ku maphunziro atsikana komanso kukhala mwana wathu wa Maranatha. Komanso sindikutanthauza kuti alandire mphotho ndi Esther yekha ayi, anzake enanso omwe achita bwino alandira mphatso msukulu zathu za anyamata ndi asungwana ana achita bwino kwambiri pa mayesowa poyerekeza ndi mmene mayesowa anavutira,” anatero a Kaonga. Iye wati phwandoli likuyenera kuchitika akatsegulira sukulu mwezi wa January ndi cholinga choti ophunzira a kalasi zina adzachitire umboni za kufunika kolimbikira maphunziro. “Ndikuthokoza kwambiri unduna wa za maphunziro ndinso bungwe la MANEB kaamba koyendetsa bwino mayeso komanso kuonetsetsa kuti nkhani za chinyengo polemba mayeso zatha. Izi zikupereka chikhulupiriro kaamba koti aphunzitsi ndinso ophunzira eni ake akulimbikira pa ntchito yawo yophunzitsa bwino, kumaliza silabasi mwachangu komanso ophunzira eni ake kuwerenga mwakathithi,” anayamikira motero a Kaonga. Malingana ndi bungwe la MANEB, ophunzira aakazi okwana 63, 513 atsikana omwe analemba mayeso a JCE, omwe akhonza mayeso ndi 45,346 chomwe ndi chiwerengero chochuluka kwambiri. Pamene anyamata 66, 415 omwe analemba mayeso 53, 407 apambana mayesowa kuyimirira 80 percent.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Ngozi ya Gas Mdziko la Italy
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya kuphulika kwa gas pa malo ena ku Sicily m’dziko la Italy. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi mu uthenga wake omwe watumizira anthu a ku deralo. Nyumba komanso katundu zawonongeka pa ngoziyi Mu uthengawu, Papa Francisco wapempha Archbishop Alessandro Damiano wa Archdiocese ya Agrigento komwe kukupezeka malo angoziwa kuti amuperekere uthenga wake wopepesa komanso wosonyeza kukhudzidwa kwake kaamba ka ngoziyi ndipo watsimikizira anthu ku deralo kuti ali nao pafupi. Papa Francisco wapepesa ma banja onse omwe abale awo afa ndipo wathokoza onse omwe akuyetsetsa kuthandiza anthu opysinjika mu njira zosiyanasiyana. Ngoziyi yomwe yachitika loweruka lapitali yaphetsa anthu asanu ndi awiri komanso kuwononga nyumba zomwe zachititsa kuti anthu pafupifupi 100 asowe malo okhala. Padakali pano ntchito yothandiza onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi ili mkati.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: YONECO Yapempha Boma Lichotse Ndale pa Ngongole za NEEF
