news: Bungwe la Youth Net and Counselling (YONECO) lapempha boma kuti lichotse ndale pamwayi wa ngongole zomwe boma limapereka kudzera ku bungwe la National Economic Empowerment Fund (NEEF). Mkulu wa bungweli a Mcbain Mkandawire ndi omwe anena izi lachitatu pamene gulu la aphungu akunyumba ya malamulo lachizimayi, linakayendera ndi kuona mmene bungweli likugwilira ntchito zake. Mkandawire: Ndale zichoke pa ngongole zimenezi Iwo ati nkhani za ngongole zomwe zimayenera kuti zidzipindulira achinyamata, zalowa ndale kwambiri zomwe zikudzetsa mavuto akulu pofuna kuthandiza achinyamata. “Ndale zichoke mu ngongole zimenezi. Ayendetse anthu oyima pawokha chifukwa nkhani ya ngongole ndi yabwino koma mmene zikukhalira sizikuyenda bwino,” anatero a Mkandawire. Poyankhulapo sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo mayi Catherine Gotani Hara ati amva za dandauloli ndipo akayipereka nkhaniyi ku nyumba ya malamulo. “Ife ngati komiti ya aphungu achizimayi timapereka malipoti ammene tagwilira ntchito zathu ndiye zimenezi tikayika mu lipoti lathulo,” anatero mayi Hara.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Akumwa Madzi Oyipa M’boma la Zomba
news: Anthu omwe amalandira madzi a bungwe la Southern Region Water Board adandaula kamba kolandira madzi osakhala bwino kwa masiku anayi tsopano. Anthu osiyanasiyana m’boma la Zomba ati vutoli likupereka nkhawa kuti litha kubweretsa mavuto pa umoyo wawo. Makwangwala: Vutoli litha posachedwapa “Tikumwa madzi owoneka ngati mkodzo wa ng’ombe. Madzi owoneka ngati matope komanso okhala ndi mchenga m’menemo zomwe zikutipatsa chikayiko kuti mwina ndi zowopsa ku miyoyo yathu,” anatero m’modzi mwa anthuwo. Poyankhapo za vutoli wofalitsa nkhani ku bungweli a Rita Makwangwala ati madzi omwe anthuwa akulandira alibe vuto lililonse pa moyo wa munthu ndipo walonjeza kuti vutoli litha posachedwa. “Talandiradi madandaulo ochuluka pa nkhaniyi koma vutoli labwera chifukwa komwe timatenga madzi ku dam la mulunguzi tasintha pa intake. Dam lija laphwera chifukwa cha kudula kwambiri mitengo zomwe zatipangitsa kuti tisinthe potulutsira madziwa. ZImenezi zachititsa kuti madziwa adziwoneka chonchi koma ndi abwinobwino si oyipa ayi. Vuto limeneli tikulikonza ndipo litha posachedwapa,” anatero mayi Makwangwala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Immigration Yagwira Mzika Zinayi za Mdziko la DRC
news: Nthambi yowona zolowa ndi kutuluka ya Immigration and Citizenship Services yagwira mzika zinayi za mdziko la Congo komanso ziwiri za dziko lino powaganizira kuti aphwanya malamulo a nthambiyi. Wofalitsa nkhani ku nthambiyi mchigawo chakumpoto Sergeant Francis Chitambuli wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti mzika ziwiri za dziko lino-zo azimanga poziganizira kuti ndi zomwe zinathandizira mzika za mdziko la Congo kulowa mdziko muno. Iwo ati anthuwa awagwira dzulo ndipo alandanso minibus yomwe inanyamula anthuwa yomwe imachokera m’boma la Karonga kupita ku Mzuzu. “Anthu amenewa anasankha kulowa mdziko muno opanda zikalata zowayenereza ngakhale zimenezi zili m’malamulo a dziko lino ndipo ndi chifukwa chake tawamanga,” atero a Chitambuli. Iwo ati anthu awiri omwe agwidwawo akayankha mlandu wothandizira mzika za m’mayiko ena kulowa mdziko muno opanda chilorezo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: NRAM Yakhumudwa ndi Kuchepa kwa Oyimbira Mpira ku AFCON
news: Bungwe la anthu oyimbira mpira wa miyendo mdziko muno la National Referees Association of Malawi (NRAM) lati ndi lokhuzidwa ndi kusiyidwa kwa oyimbira ena omwe amayenera kukatenga nawo mbali ku mpikisano wa AFCON chaka cha mawa mdziko la Cameroon. Kalichero: Si kuti alibe zowayenereza Mlembi wa bungweli a Chris Kalichero ati anthu oyimbira mpira ambiri dziko muno akhala akuyimbira m’mipikisano yosiyanasiyana ndipo ndi zodabwitsa kuti asiyidwa pa mndandandawu. Oyimbira mpira asanu komanso othandizira kuyimbira khumi, ndi omwe asiyidwa kuti asakatenge nawo mbali ku mpikisanowu chaka chamawa. Komabe a Kalichero ati kusiyidwa kwa anthuwa sikukuthanthauza kuti alibe zowayenereza kukayimbira mpira ku mpikisanowu. “Ndife okhumudwa inde koma si kuti anthuwa alibe zowayenereza. Zangochitika kuti mwina tsoka lawagwera,” atero a Kalichero.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Malungo Akuphabe Anthu Ochuluka
news: Unduna wa zaumoyo wati nthenda ya malungo ikupitilira kupereka chiwopsezo ku miyoyo ya anthu mdziko muno. Wachiwiri kwa mkulu woyendetsa ntchito mu undunawu yemwenso ndi mkulu woyang’anira ntchito yolimbana ndi matenda a malungo mdziko muno, Dr. Micheal Kayange ndi omwe anena izi lero mu mzinda wa Mzuzu, potsekulira ntchito yopereka maneti odzitetezera ku udzudzu woyambitsa nthenda ya Malungo m’maboma a mchigawo chakumpoto. Dr. Kayange: Anthu ochuluka akupitilirabe kumwalira ndi malungo Iwo ati anthu oposa 6 million ndi omwe akumapezeka ndi nthendayi pamene anthu 2,300 ndi omwe akumwalira ndi nthendayi chaka chilichonse. “Anthu ochuluka akupitilirabe kumwalira ndi malungo ndipo ife ngati unduna tayika chidwi chathu pa nthendayi kuti itheretu mdziko muno,” anatero Dr. Kayange. Pamenepa a Kayange ati manetiwa aperekedwa kwa anthu akumidzi kaamba koti ndi omwe amakhudzidwa kwambiri ndi nthendayi. “Tawonanso kuti anthu ambiri akutawuni amapezako ti ndalama mosavuta kusiyana ndi anthu akumudzi omwe kupeza kwawo ndi kovuta choncho anthu akumudzi ndi omwe apindule kaye ndi ndondomeko imeneyi yogawa maneti,” anatero Dr. Kayange. Malinag ndi Dr. Kayange undunawu unapereka kale manetuwa m’maboma a mchigawo chakumwera ndi pakati ndipo tsopano atsiriza ndi maboma omwe akupezeka mchigawo chakumpoto.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mankhwala Akupitilira Kusowa Mzipatala
news: Vuto la kusowa kwa mankhwala mzipatala za boma mdziko muno likupitilirabe pomwe odwala akuwuzidwa kuti adzikagula ku sitolo zomwe si za boma. Chikumbe: Ndi kovuta kutchula tsiku limene vutoli litathe M’neneri mu unduna wa zaumoyo a Adrian Chikumbe atsimikiza za vutoli ndipo ati sanganene za tsiku lomwe vuto lilingathe. Iwo ati izi zili chomwechi kaamba koti mankhwala akukwera mtengo ndipo pali mavuto ambiri omwe bomali kukumana nawo. “Ndi kovuta kutchula kuti vuto limeneli litha liti chifukwa pali zifukwa zochulukirapo zomwe zikubweretsa vuto limeneli. Mwachitsanzo ife mankhwala timawoda ku India ndiye paja kumeneko pakatipa kunavuta mliri wa COVID-19 ndiye ma factory ambiri anatsekedwa ndipo panopa angoyambiranso kumene,” anatero a Chikumbe. Iwo akambanso za vuto la kuchepa kwa ndalama ku nthambi yomwe imagula mankhwala mdziko muno ya Central Medical Stores ngati chinthu china chomwe chikudzetsa vuto la kusowa kwa mankhwala mzipatala za mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mavuto a Mdziko la Ukraine Angathe Pochita Zokambirana
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati mavuto a za ndale m’dziko la Ukraine angathe pochita zokambirana osati nkhondo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lamulungu ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican polankhula laMulungu kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Iye wati akupemphera kuti kudzera mu nyengo ya Christmas, bata ndi mtendere zifikire anthu a m’dzikolo. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wapempha maiko ndi ma bungwe kuti athandize kuti bata ndi mtendere zibwererenso m’dzikolo. Iye wanenetsa kuti palibe chabwino chomwe chingabwere kudzera mukumenyana. Dziko la Ukraine ladzudzula dziko la Russia kaamba kosonkhanitea ailikali ake ku malire a maiko awiriwa. Nduna za chuma za m’maiko asanu ndi awiri olemera kwambiri pa dziko lapansi achenjeza za mavuto owopsa omwe angadze pakati pa maiko awiriwa ngati nkhondo itabuka. Naye mtsogoleri wa dziko la America Joe Biden wachenjeza mtsogoleri wa dziko la Russia Vladimir Putin kuti asayesere dala kuyambitsa nkhondo ndi dziko la Ukraine.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Maranatha Yati Ipitiriza Kuthandiza Ophunzira Okhonza Bwino Msukulu Zonse
news: Sukulu yoyima payokha ya Maranatha Academy yati yakhutira ndi luso la ophunzira omwe anakathandiza pophunzitsa anzawo m’sukulu zake. Sukuluyi yomwe chaka chino inapereka mphoto kwa ana awiri omwe anakhonza mayeso a fomu 4 ndi ma point asanu ndi imodzi (6) kuchokera ku sukuluyi komanso sukulu ya anyamata ya Likuni, inaperekanso mwayi kwa ophunzirawa ndinso anzawo ena kuti athandize kuphunzitsa anzawo kwa miyezi isanu pamene akhala akulandira ndalama ngati malipiro. Kaonga: Sitili pa mpikisano ndi sukuli iliyonse Malinga ndi mwini sukuluyi Enerst Kaonga, ganizoli labereka zipatso kaamba koti ophunzirawa atha kupeza zosowa zawo pa maphunziro a ukachenjede ngati makina a kompyuta komanso ndalama zoyambira. Iye wati kupatula izi sukulu yake ipitiriza kulimbikitsa ophunzira omwe amachita bwino pa mayeso a boma. “Ife timakhulupilira kuti sitili pa mpikisano ndi sukulu iliyonse koma kulimbikitsa maphunziro apamwamba mdziko muno,” anatero a Kaonga. Ndipo pothilirapo ndemanga pa ntchito yamwe sukuluyi inachita, mphunzitsi wamkulu wa sukulu ya Likuni Boys, Alfred Mphandamkoko anayamikira sukulu ya Maranatha pothandiza ophunzira wawo ndi ndalama zokwana 500 sauzande zomwe akuti zinathandiza kwambiri mnyamatayu. Iwo anati sukulu yawo yomwe ili ndi ana ochita kusankhidwa ndi boma, ena mwa iwo amakhala ochokera ku mabanja osauka ndipo anati ndi kofunika kuti sukulu zoyima pazokha ngati Maranatha zitamalimbikitsa ndi kuthandiza ophunzira ngakhale ochokera msukulu za boma ndi mipingo kaamba koti ali ndi cholinga chimodzi chomwe ndi kupereka maphunziro abwino kwa ana. “Mwachitsanzo ophunzira apasukulu yathu akutha kulimbikitsika pa maphunziro awo kamba ka zomwe anzathu a Maranatha anachita  kupereka mwayi olemba ntchito ophunzirawa pamene akudikira kukapitiriza maphunziro awo a ukachenjede ku sukulu zomwe awasankhira,” anatero a Mphandamkoko.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Wapolisi Wafa Galimoto Itamuwomba pa Chipolowe
news: Wapolisi yemwe amagwira ntchito ku polisi yaing’ono ya Ngabu ku Chikwawa, wafa pa ngozi ya galimoto. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku Chikwawa, Sergeant Dickson Matemba watsimikiza kuti malemuwa ndi a Grecian Chipeta a zaka 49, omwe afa pa chipwirikiti, galimoto ina yomwe imabwelera m’mbuyo itawagunda ndi kuwaponda. Wafa pa chipwirikiticho-Chipeta Matemba wati, a Chipeta anali m’modzi mwa apolisi omwe amakhazikitsa bata pa chipwirikiti chomwe chinabuka ku famu ya Gwirawekha Cattle Ranch, kwa Ngabu komwe ogwira ntchito kumeneko amachita ziwonetsero zosagwirizana ndi ndalama zomwe amayenera kulandira akapuma pa ntchito, pension pa chingerezi. Kudzera mu chipwirikitichi, m’modzi mwa madalaivala a kampaniyo anaganiza zothawitsa galimoto kuwopa ochita ziwonetserowa, kuphwanya galimotolo. Woyendetsa galimotoyu a Rahim Issa a zaka 25, omwe kwawo ndi kwa Thobwa kwa mfumu yayikulu Ngabu m’boma la Chikwawa, lomwe ndi la mtundu wa Toyota Land cruiser, nambala yake ndi CK 4141 anayendetsa chobwelera m’mbuyo, apa ndi pomwe anagunda malemuwa ndipo galimotolo linayenda pa thupi lawo. Matemba wati, a Chipeta anathamangira nawo ku chipatala cha boma la Chikwawa komwe anamwalira akulandira thandizo la mankhwala. Ndipo zotsatira za ku chipatala zasonyeza kuti malemuwa afa kaamba kovulalira mkati ndi mabala a m’mutu. A Grecian Chipeta amachokera m’mudzi mwa  Longwekamanga kwa mfumu yayikulu Mbelwa m’boma la Mzimba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Maiko Atekeseke Pothandiza Anthu Othawa Kwawo
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati nkhani ya anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana ndi yokhudza dziko lonse la pansi. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lero pa chilumba cha Lesbos m’dziko la Greece pamene amakumana ndi anthu othawa kwawo omwe akupezeka pa chilumbachi. Papa kukumana ndi anthu othawa kwawo pa chilumba cha Lesbos mdziko la Greece Iye watsindika za kufunika koti maiko ayike chidwi pa nkhani zikulu-zikulu zomwe zikupitirira kukhudza maiko osiyana-siyana monga nkhani za anthu othawa kwao pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana angakhale nkhani ya mliri wa Coronavirus. Papa Francisco wathokoza anthu ndi ma bungwe omwe usana ndi usiku akuyetsetsa kuthandiza anthu osiyana-siyana omwe ali mu mavuto ndi cholinga choti ulemerero wa munthu aliyense ukhale wolemekezedwa. Iye watsiriza ndi kupempha anthu onse kuti azitsanzira Amayi Maria pa kuyendera ndi kufikira ena komanso kubweretsa chimwemwe m’moyo wa ena.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la CCJP Layamba Ntchito Zothetsa Nkhanza ku Chikwawa
news: Bungwe la chilungamo ndi mtendere mu mpingo wa katolika la Catholic Commission for Justice and Peace (CCJP) mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa, yayamba ntchito zatsopano zolimbana ndi nkhanza. Mlembi wa bungwe la CCJP mu dayosiziyi, a Lewis Nsiyadungu awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti bungweli layambitsa ntchitoyi ngati njira imodzi yothana ndi nkhanza zochitira amayi kudzera mu ntchito yomanga ngalande ya ulimi wa nthilira ku chigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire. A Nsiyadungu anayankhula izi lachisanu mdera la mfumu yaikulu Ndakwera m’boma la Chikwawa pa mwambo waukulu woganizira masiku 16 othetsa nkhanza m’bomali. Iwo ati pamene ntchito yomanga ngalande ya ulimi wa nthilira ili m’kati ku chigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire, pali kuthekera koti amayi ambiri azilandira nkhanza zosiyanasiyana m’malo awo a ntchito. Kuwonjezera apo, a Nsiyadungu ati bungwe lawo lalandira madandaulo ochuluka okhudza nkhanza za m’banja, abambo kuchitira amayi. Malingana ndi a Nsiyadungu, abambo ambiri akusiya akazi awo popanda chisamaliro ndi kukwatira mkazi wina zomwe nkhanza zochitira amayi ndi ana. “Nkhanza zambiri zimene tikulandira ku CCJP ndi zokhudza nkhanza za m’banja zomwe abambo amachitira akazi awo,” anatero a Nsiyadungu. Pothilirapo ndemanga, mlangizi wamkulu woyang’anira kuti pasakhale kusiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo m’boma la Chikwawa, mayi Victoria Nkasala, ati chaka chino alandira milandu yochuluka yokhudza nkhanza za m’banja. Pamenepa, iwo ati kuwulura za nkhanza zili zonse ndi njira yokhayo yothandiza kuthetsa nkhanza za m’banja. “Amayi ambiri akulandira nkhanza m’banja chifukwa choti abambo amasiya akazi awo popanda chisamaliro ndi kukwatira wina, ndipo izi zimachititsa kuti ana nawo azizunzika,” anatero mayi Nkasala. Masiku 16 oganizira zothetsa nkhanza anayamba pa 25 November, 2021 ndipo adzafika kumapeto pa 10 December, 2021. Mutu wa chaka chino woganizira za masiku 16 oganizira zothetsa nkhazawa ndi woti; ‘Tonse, limodzi tithetsa nkhanza pakati pa amayi ndi atsikana, tichitepo kanthu.’
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ng’ona Yapha Mkulu Wina ku Chikwawa
news: Mkulu wina wa zaka 68 wafa atagwidwa ndi ng’ona ku Chikwawa. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku Chikwawa, Sergeant Dickson Matemba, wati malemuyu ndi Major Matchado, yemwe anagwidwa ndi ng’onayi pamene amafuna kuwoloka mtsinje wina pafupi ndi mtsinje wa Shire pamene amapita ku munda wake pa 2 December, 2021. Pamenepa Matemba wati anthu akufuna kwabwino analimbana ndi chilombocho ndi kupulumutsa mkuluyu ndipo anamutengera ku chipatala cha boma la Chikwawa komwe anamwalira akulandira chithandizo cha mankhwala. Madotolo pa chipatalachi anatsimikiza kuti Matchado wamwalira kaamba koti anataya magazi ochuluka. Padakali pano, apolisi achenjeza anthu kuti apewe kuwoloka mitsinje yomwe ili ndi ng’ona. Major Matchado amachokera m’mudzi mwa Namila kwa mfumu yayikulu Mulilima m’boma la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Amisiri A Zamagetsi Akhale Ndi Ziphaso Zovomerezeka’
news: Bungwe lowona mphamvu za mbwezera la Malawi Energy Regulatory Authority (MERA) lati amisili olumikiza za magetsi akuyenera kukhala okhawo omwe ali ndi ziphatso zogwililira ntchitoyi. Khonje: Anthu olembetsedwa ndi ovomerezeka ndi ochepa M’neneri ku bungweli, mayi Fitina Khonje ndi omwe anena izi m’boma la Dedza pa maphunziro a tsiku limodzi a momwe amasiliwa angalembetsere ziphaso zogwilira ntchitoyi. Iwo ati anthu ambiri ndi amisiri olumikiza magetsi mdziko muno, koma alibe ziphaso zoyenera kugwirira ntchitoyi zimene zimavuta kuwapeza ngati ntchitoyo sanayigwire bwino, zomwenso zikumayika miyoyo ya anthu ndi katundu pa chiwopsezo. “Kaundula wathu akusonyeza kuti anthu ogwira ntchito za magetsi ndi ambiri koma kaundula wathu yemweyo akusonyezanso kuti anthu olembetsedwa ndi ovomerezeka ndi ochepa. Zimenezi sizoyenera ndipo ndi zotsutsana ndi malamulo a dziko lino. Munthu wotereyo akapezeka akuyenera kuyimbidwa mlandu komanso atha kukakhala ku ndende kwa miyezi isanu ndi umodzi,” anatero mayi Khonje. Polankhulapo wapampando wa amisiri a zamagetsi m’boma la Dedza, a Christopher Magomo ati athandiza amisiri ena kuti akhale olembetsedwa ndi bungweli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wafika Mdziko la Cyprus
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wafika m’dziko la Cyprus. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco wafika m’dzikolo lero poyamba pa ulendo wake wa masiku asanu, wocheza m’maiko a Cyprus ndi Greece. Papa Francisko atangofika mdziko la Cyprus Ndege yomwe Papa Francisco ndi akuluakulu ena a ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican kuphatikizapo gulu la atolankhani anakwera ya ITA Airways, inatera pa bwalo la ndege la Lanarca mu mzinda wa Nicosia m’dziko la Cyprus nthawi ya 3 koloko masana. Pa bwaloli Papa Francisco analandiridwa ndi akuluakulu a boma la dziko la Cyprus, maepiskopi a Mpingo wa Katolika ndi anthu osiyana-siyana. Anthu a nkhaninkhani anandanda m’misewu kuti awone Papa Francisco. Papa Francisco wakumana komanso walankhula kwa ansembe, asisitere, a bulazala, a dikoni ndi a katekisiti a m’dziko la Cyprus. Iye wakumananso ndi kulandiridwa mwa njira ya padera ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko la Cyprus ku nyumba ya chifumu ya mtsogoleri wa dzikolo. Pambuyo pa mkumano wake ndi mtsogoleri wa dzikolo, Papa Francisco walankhula kwa akuluakulu a boma, a kazembe oyimira maiko awo m’dziko la Cyprus, osaiwala atsogoleri a ma bungwe omenyera ufulu wa anthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mtengo wa Mafuta Sungatsike Posachedwa – MERA
news: Bungwe lowona za mafuta ndi mphamvu za m’bwezera la Malawi Energy Regulatory Authority (MERA) lati ngakhale mitengo ya mafuta yayamba kutsika ku mayiko ena, sizingatheke kuti dziko lino litsitsenso kaamba koti mitengoyi siyinakhazikike. Khonje: Kutsikaku kudzatikhudza koma si lero ayi Mkulu wofalitsa nkhani ku bungweli mayi Fitina Khonje ayankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi mu mzinda wa Blantyre potsatira zomwe anthu akhala akufunsa bungweri kuti lichitepo kanthu potsatira kutsika kwa mtengo wa mafuta osasungunula ku misika ya kunja kwa dziko lino. Iwo ati pali mfundo zingapo zomwe zimachititsa kuti mafuta atsike kapena akwere zomwe padakalipano sizinayambe kwuoneka. “Mafuta akatsika kumeneko lero kunonso sangatsike lero lomwe chifukwa mafuta omwe tikugulitsa lero sitinagulenso lero lomwe. Kuchoka pomwe tinakweza mu October muja, mafutawa akhala akukwera nthawi yonseyi. Kutsikaku kudzatikhudza koma si lero ayi,” anatero mayi Khonje. Mayi Khonje anapitirizanso ponena kuti ndalama za mu thumba lomwe limathandiza kuti mitengo ya mafuta isamakwere, zinatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapereka Mafuno Abwino Kwa Mtsogoleri Wa Mpingo Wa Orthodox ku Constantinople
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wa mafuno abwino kwa mkulu wa Mpingo wa Orthodox ku Constantinople. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco watumiza uthengawu lero pa tsiku la chaka cha Andrea Woyera, mpositoli, yemwe ndi nkhoswe ya Mpingo wa Orthodox wa ku Constantinople. Papa Francisko pa mkumano wake wa m’mbuyomu ndi Batholomew 1 Pa tsikuli Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wa mafuno abwino kwa Patriarch Bartholomew 1 yemwe ndi mkulu wa Mpingo wa Orthodox wa ku Constantinople. Iye wafunira zabwino zonse Mpingowu ndipo wafotokoza kuti ali pafupi ndi Mpingo wonse wa Orthodox wa ku Constantinople pa chaka chimenechi. Papa Francisco wati ndi wokondwa kaamba ka ubale wabwino womwe ulipo pakati pa Mpingo wa Katolika womwe likulu lake liri ku Rome ndi Mpingo wa Orthodox wa ku Constantinople. Iye wati ndi chikhulupiriro chake kuti ubale umenewu upitirira kukomerakomera. Ngati njira yolimbikitsa ubale pakati pa Mpingo wa Katolika ndi Mpingo wa Orthodox wa ku Constantinople Papa Francisco watumizanso nthumwi zake ku Constantinople ku chikondwerero cha Andrea Woyera, Mpositoli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Red Cross Yapereka Thandizo Kwa Anthu Omwe Akhudzidwa Ndi Mvula Ku Chikwawa
news: Bungwe la Malawi Red Cross Society lapereka thandizo kwa mabanja oposera 200 omwe anakhudzidwa ndi mphepo ya mkuntho kwa mfumu yayikulu Mulilima m’boma la Chikwawa. Mwambo wopereka katunduyu unachitika lachitatu pa 24 November, 2021 m’dera la nyakwawa Medilamu kwa mfumu yayikulu Mulilima m’bomalo. Ena mwa anthu omwe apindula ndi thandizolo Polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi, mkulu yemwe amalumikizitsa nthambi yomwe imayang’anira ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi ku bungwe la Red Cross, mayi Lekani Nyangulu ati bungwe lawo lachita izi pofuna kuwapatsa anthuwa chisamaliro cha malo okhala mu nyengo ino yamvula. Malingana ndi mayi Nyangulu omwe ndi mlumikizitsi ku nthambi yomwe imayang’anira ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi ku bungwe la Red Cross, bungwe lawo lapereka thandizoli kaamba koti analandira malipoti kuchokera ku nthambi yowona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi ya Department of Disaster Management Affairs (DoDMA) komanso khonsolo ya boma la Chikwawa. Iwo ati apereka mabulangete awiri, komanso zipangizo zofolera nyumba zomwe mwa zina ndi nyundo, misomali, zingwe, mawaya omangira nyumba ndi zina zambiri ku banja lililonse lomwe linakhudzidwa ndi mvula ya mphamvu komanso mphepo yankuntho yomwe inachitika pa 13 November chaka chino. “Tapereka zipangizozi ku mabanjawa kuti apeze malo okhala pamene tili mu nyengo ino ya mvula,” anatero a Nyangulu. Polankhulapo m’modzi mwa anthu omwe alandira thandizoli a Dickson Thako, ati thandizoli liwathandiza kwambiri makamaka pokonzanso nyumba zawo. “Zinthu zimene ndalandira zindithandiza kumangira nyumba poti ndinalibe pokhala,” anatero a Thako. Mabanja okwana 654 anakhudzidwa ndi mphepo ya mkuntho komanso mvula yamphamvu m’boma la Chikwawa yomwe inachitika pa 13 November, 2021. Bungwe la Malawi Red Cross Society likuyembekezereka kufikira mabanja okwana 202 omwe nyumba zawo zinawonongeka kotheratu m’boma la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Pulojekiti Ya Post Cyclone IDAI Ikuthandiza Anthu Omwe Anakhudzidwa Ndi Namondwe Wa Idai
news: Boma lati likudzipereka pa ntchito yothana ndi mavuto omwe anadza kaamba ka mphepo ya namondwe wa Idai ya m’chaka cha 2019. Mkulu owona za kafukufuku ku pulojekiti ya Post Cyclone Idai, a Bernard Sakwata ndi omwe anena izi ku khonsolo ya boma la Chikwawa lachisanu pa 26 November 2021. Mphepo ya Cyclone Idai inadzetsa vuto ili A Sakwata awuza mthumwi za ku nthambi za boma ndi mabungwe osiyanasiyana kuti ayambitsa ntchito yobwezeretsanso zinthu zomwe zinawonongeka ndi namondweyu. Iwo ati nthambi yawo ikuyika chidwi chake pa ntchito yokonzekeretsa miyoyo yomwe inavulala kaamba ka Namondwe wa Idai yemwe anawomba m’chaka cha 2019. Mphepo ya namondwe wa Idai inawononga zinthu zambiri m’dziko muno ndipo anthu okwana 60 anataya miyoyo yawo ndipo ena okwana 672 anavulala mosiyanasiyana. Malingana ndi ndi a Sakwata, ntchito za Post Cyclone Idai akuzigwira pansi pa bungwe loona zangozi zongwa mwadzidzidzi la DoDMA, ati agwira ntchitoyi m’maboma a Chikwawa ndi Nsanje kufikira m’chaka cha 2023. Iwo ati mwa zina, ntchitoyi ikonzanso ntchito za ulimi, za misewu ndi zomangamanga, za madzi aukhondo kuphatikizapo nyumba yowunika za nyengo ku Makande kwa Ngabu. “Tigwira ntchito yobwezeretsanso miyoyo yomwe inavulala chifukwa cha Cyclone Idai ku Chikwawa ndi ku Nsanje m’magawo ambiri kuphatikizapo kumanga nyumba ya chitsanzo yomwe imalimba ndi mphepo ya mkuntho,” anatero a Sakwata. Mphepo ya namondwe ya Cyclone Idai ya m’chaka cha 2019 inakhudza maboma okwana 15 mwa maboma okwana 28 a m’dziko muno, ndipo pulojekiti ya Post Cyclone Idai ikugwira ntchito yobwezeretsa miyoyo yomwe inavulala m’maboma a Chikwawa, Nsanje, Mulanje, Phalombe ndi Zomba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Magulu A Banki M’khonde Azikambirana Zothana Ndi Nkhanza – YONECO
news: Bungwe lomwe limamenyera ufulu wa achinyamata la Youth Net and Counselling (YONECO), lapempha magulu a amayi a Banki M’khonde kuti azikambirana nkhani zokhudza nkhanza. Wapereka langizoli ndi mlangizi woyang’anira bungwe la YONECO ku Chikwawa, mayi Mable Makondetsa. ndipo izi zikudza pamene dziko lino lili mu nyengo ya masiku 16 oganizira nkhanza. Pamenepa, a Makondetsa ati pambali poyika chidwi pa nkhani za chuma, maguluwa akuyenera kumakambirana nkhani zothetsa nkhanza m’mabanja awo. Poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi, Mlangizi Woyang’anira bungwe la YONECO ku Chikwawa Mayi Mable Makondetsa anati amayi ali ndi kuthekera kothana ndi m’chitidwe wochitirana nkhanza za m’banja kudzera m’maguluwa. Makondetsa anati nkhani ya chuma ndi imodzi mwa njira zambiri zomwe zimayambitsa nkhanza za abambo kuchitira akazi awo m’banja. “Ife a YONECO timayenda m’magulu ambiri kuphatikizapo magulu a Banki M’khonde, omwe tikuwapempha kuti azikambirana nkhani zokhudza nkhanza chifukwa mavuto ambiri okhudza nkhanza za m’banja amabwera kaamba ka ndalama,” anatero mayi Makondetsa. Boma la Chikwawa kudzakhala ndi mwambo waukulu woganizira za tsiku lolimbana ndi nkhanza pa 3 December chaka chino cha 2021 pa bwalo la zamasewero la sukulu ya pulayimale ya Ndakwera pa mutu woti; ‘Tonse limodzi tithetse nkhanza kwa amayi ndi atsikana m’Malawi, tichitepo kanthu.’
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wina Wanjatidwa Pomuganizira Kuti Wagwilira Wantchito Wake
news: Apolisi ku Chikwawa akusunga m’chitokosi a Andisen Tembo, a zaka 57 a m’mudzi mwa Sadulo ku Dyeratu kwa mfumu yayikulu Katunga kaamba kowaganizira kuti agwilira mzakazi wawo. M’neneri wa apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Dickson Matemba awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti a Tembo anagwirira msungwayu yemwe ndi wa zaka 18 zakubadwa usiku wa pa 24 November chaka chino ku chipinda cha wantchito wawoyu ndipo anamunyengerera ndi ndalama zokwana 10 sauzande kwacha kuti asaulure. M’mawa wa tsiku lotsatira, msungwanayu anawulura kwa azakhali ake omwe nawo anakadandaula ku polisi ndipo anamutengera ku chipatala komwe madotolo anatsimikiza kuti msungwanayu wagonedwadi. A Tembo anawonekera ku khoti lolemba pa 29 November, 2021 pa mlandu wogwilira omwe ndi wotsutsana ndi gawo 132 la bukhu loweruzira milandu. Pamenepa, bwalo la mlandu la Chikwawa First Grade Magistrate linakana kupereka belo kwa Andisen Tembo. Ndipo yemwe akumva mlanduwu, First Grade Magistrate Gladstone Chilundu wati mlanduwu udzabwereranso m’bwaloli lolemba pa 6 December, 2021.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Atatu Afa Galimoto Itawomba Mtengo M’boma la Ntcheu
news:
Anthu atatu afa ndipo m’modzi wavulala pangozi yomwe yachitika m’mawa wa lero m’boma la Ntcheu.
Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu, Sub Inspector Rabecca Kwisongole, ngoziyi yachitika pa Kanzingeni mfumu yaikulu Kwataine m’bomalo mu nsewu waukulu wa Balaka – Ntcheu. Pa nthawiyi galimoto ya mtundu wa Isuzu KB double cabin nambala yake MAMARO2 yomwe imachokera mtunda wa Balaka kulowera ku Ntcheu itanyamula anthu atatu ndipo imayendetsedwa ndi a Nawazi Mogra.
Itafika pamalo a ngoziwa oyendetsayu analephera kuyiwongolera bwino zomwe zinachititsa kuti ilunjike kutchire komwe inakawomba mtengo.
Anthu atatu omwe anakwera nawo galimotoyi omwe ndi a Magret Mtimoni a zaka 18, a Thoko Matewere a zaka 18 onsewa a m’mudzi mwa Eneya ndi a Bright Kaliati a zaka 25 a m’mudzi mwa Kandota onsewa a m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Kwataine m’boma la Ntcheu, ndi omwe afa pa ngoziyo.
Padakalipano woyendetsa galimotoyi wavulala ndipo akulandira thandizo la mankhwala pa chipatala chomwechi cha Ntcheu.
Apolisi m’bomalo alangiza oyendetsa galimoto kuti adzitsatira malamulo ndiponso zikwangwani zomwe zinayikidwa m’misewu pofuna kupewa ngozi za mtunduwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsindika za Kufunika Kwa Chilungamo
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kokhazikika pa chilungamo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lachisanu ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican pa mkumano wake ndi mamembala a sukulu ya pamwamba yolimbikitsa chilankhulo ndi zolembalemba, za ku Sweden. Iye wati ndi kofunika kuti sukuluyi ipitirize kulimbikitsa kuyendera limodzi pa nkhani zosiyana-siyana ndi kuwonetsetsa kuti choona chikukhazikika pakati pa anthu. Papa Francisco wati akuzindikira kuti mwa njira ina mliri wa coronavirus walepheretsa kusonkhanitsa anthu pamodzi ndi kugawana maganizo ndi nzeru pa nkhani zosiyana-siyana zothandiza kutukula miyoyo yao. Iye wati pali chiopysezo kuti zoterezi zitapitirira zitha kuchititsa kuti anthu asaonenso kufunika kobwera pamodzi ndi kugawana maganizo ndi nzeru pa nkhani zosiyana-siyana. Komabe iye wati ndi kofunika kuphunzitsa anthu za kufunika komanga ma ubale abwino pakati pa anthu ndi kulimbikitsa anthu kufunika komasonkhana ndi kugawana nzeru ndi maganizo pa nkhani zosiyana-siyana monga kalata yake yolimbitsa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu, Fratelli tutti ikufotokozera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akagwira Ukayidi Kwa Zaka 60 Kaamba Kogwilira Atsikana Awiri
news: Bwalo lalikulu la milandu (High Court) m’boma la Zomba lalamula mkulu wina wa zaka 45 zakubadwa kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka 60 kaamba kogwilira atsikana awiri a zaka 11 ndi 12, nthawi imodzi. Bwaloli linamva kuti mkuluyu Isaac Byson anapalamula mlanduwu pa 11 June chaka chino ndipo atawagona anawa, anawapatsa ndalama zokwana 500-kwacha kuti agawane. Mayi wa anawo atadabwa ndi ndalamayo anawafunsa anawa omwe anawulura za nkhaniyi ndipo mayiyu anakanena ku polisi. Atawonekera ku bwalo la First Grade Magistrate, mkuluyu anawukana mlanduwu zomwe zinachititsa kuti mbali ya boma ibweretse mboni zitatu zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkuluyu apezeke wolakwa. Potengera kukula kwa mlanduwu, nkhaniyi inatengeredwa ku bwalo lalikulu la milandu kuti likapereke chilango. Ndipo kumeneko ndi komwe Justice Mzondi Mvula anapereka chilango cha mtunduwu. Isaac Byson amachokera m’mudzi mwa Bwese mfumu yaikulu Phambala m’boma la Ntcheu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Yosefe Woyera Ndi Chitsanzo Polimbikitsa Akhristu
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Yosefe Woyera ndi chitsanzo polimbikitsa akhristu m’moyo wao. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi lero ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Iye wati pano pomwe dziko la pansi likudutsa m’mavuto osiyana-siyana Yosefe Woyera angathandize kulimbikitsa ndi kuwunikira akhristu pamene akudutsa mu nyengo zovutazi. Papa Francisco wati ngakhale kuti chaka cha Yosefe Woyera chikupita ku mapeto, zingachitire ubwino akhristu ngati atakhala ndi nthawi yosinkhasinkha za moyo wa Yosefe Woyera. Iye wati moyo wa Yosefe Woyera ungathandize kulimbikitsa, kutonthoza ndi kuwunikira akhristu pamene mu nyengo zovuta. Papa Francisco wati Yosefe Woyera akuphunzitsa akhristu kuti pofuna kuyanja pa maso pa Mulungu, akhristu akuyenera kudekha ndi kusankha zinthu zokhazo zofunika ndi zokomera Mulungu. Kudzera mu kalata yake yotchedwa Patris corde m’chilatini kutanthauza ndi mtima wa utate Papa Francisco adalengeza kuti kuyambira pa 8 December 2020 mpaka pa 8 December 2021 Mpingo ukhale ukusinkhasinkha ndi kukondwelera moyo wa Yosefe Woyera nkhoswe ya Mpingo wonse wa Katolika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kalindo Watuluka M’chipani cha UTM
news: Mkulu wa achinyamata mchipani cha UTM, a Bon Kalindo atuluka m’chipanicho. A Kalindo omwenso amatchuka ndi dzina loti Winiko pa zisudzo, alengeza izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe anachititsa lero ku Dorvic Hotel mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Walengeza za kutuluka mchipani cha UTM- Kalindo Iwo ati sangapitirize kugwira ntchito ndi chipani cha UTM chomwe chili mu mgwirizano wa Tonse omwe ukulephera kukwaniritsa zomwe unalonjeza a Malawi. Pochoka, iye wasiya ku hotela komweko galimoto yomwe anapatsidwa ndipo amagwiritsa ntchito pa udindo wakewu ku chipanicho. Koma polankhulapo pa izi, m’modzi mwa anthu omwe amalankhulapo pa nkhani za ndale m’dziko muno a George Phiri ati monga m’Malawi aliyense a Bon Kalindo ali ndi ufulu wolowa kapena kutuluka chipani chilichonse. Iwo ati izi zimachitika ngati atsogoleri omwe adayikidwa pa udindo sakukwaniritsa zomwe adalonjeza anthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha Mabungwe Afikire Sukulu za Mkombaphala ndi Ndondomeko ya Phala
news: Nthambi yowona za chisamaliro cha wanthu m’boma la Zomba, yapempha mabungwe omwe si aboma kuti pamene akupereka ufa wa Phala ku sukulu za pulayimale adzikumbukiranso kuthandiza sukulu za mkomba phala. Mkulu wa nthambiyi a Christopher Ndaona ndi omwe anena izi lachiwiri ku 9 Miles mdera la mfumu yaikulu Mwambo m’bomalo pamene bungwe la Partners in-Action for Sustainable Development (PASD) limayambitsa ntchito yopereka mpunga m’sukulu za mkomba-phala ndi cholinga choti adziphikira phala ana a msukulu za mkombaphala za mdera la Zomba Likangala. Iwo ayamikira bungweli kaamba koganizira ana a msukulu za mkomba-phala ponena kuti zimenezi zilimbikitsa anawa pa maphunziro komanso akula ndi moyo wa thanzi. Polankhulanso pa mwambowu mkulu wa bungwe la Partners In- Action Sustainable Development (PASD), a Amos Chiyenda ati bungweli lachita izi pofuna kuwonjezera chiwerengero cha ana ophunzira msukuluzi komanso kuti adzikhala a thanzi. Polankhulaponso pa mwambowu phungu wa derali mayi Abigail Bongwe apempha mabungwe omwe si a boma kuti athandize ana a msukulu za mkombaphala zomwe zikupezeka mdera lake ndi cholinga choti maphunziro apite patsogolo ndipo apemphanso mabungwe  osiyanasiyana kuti atengerepo chitsanzo pa zomwe bungwe la PASD lachita.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la MIA Lapempha Atsgoleri a Zipembedzo Achilimike Pothetsa Nkhanza
news: Bungwe la Malawi Interfaith Association (MIA) lati atsogoleri a zipembezo ndi ofunika pa ntchito yothana ndi nkhanza kwa ana. M’modzi wa akulu akulu a bungweri a Osman Chunga ati bungwe lawo kudzera mwa atsogoleri a zipembedzo, likufuna kuthana ndi vuto la kukula kwa nkhanza zochitira ana lomwe akuti lakula m’boma la Thyolo. Iwo amayankhula izi pa msokhano wozindikitsa atsogoleri a mipingo ndi zipembezo zambiri za mchitidwewu komanso kuwafotokozera momwe angatengere mbali pa ntchitoyi.  “Tabwera kudzagwira ntchito imeneyi titawona mavuto ena omwe analipo m’boma lino la Thyolo ndipo tikukhulupilira kuti mavutowa atha kudzera mwa atsogoleri a mipingo omwe tawayitana lerowa,” anatero a Chunga. Poyankhulanso, m’modzi wa mwa atsogoleri omwe achita nawo maphunzirowa, m’busa Kennedy Kagwa wa mpingo wa Agape Life Church International wati mpingo uli ndi udindo wozindikitsa anthu za kuyipa kwa mchitidwe ozunza ana. “Atsogoleri a zipembedzo ndife ofunika kwambiri pa nkhani imeneyi chifukwa anthu a nkhanzawo timapemphera nawo limodzi komanso ana ochitiridwa nkhanzawo amabwewra ku matchalitchi athu choncho kupereka uthengawu kwa mbali zonsezi ndi kosavuta,” anatero a Kagwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ICEIDA Ipereka Njinga 570 Zothandizira Pa Ntchito Za Umoyo
news: Unduna owona za umoyo wayamikira boma la dziko la Iceland kaamba koyika chidwi pothandiza pa ntchito za umoyo mdziko muno mu njira zosiyanasiyana. Mlembi mu undunawu a Dr. Charles Mwansambo ndi omwe alankhula izi lachiwiri m’boma la Mangochi, pamene boma la dziko la Iceland limapereka njinga za kapalasa zokwana 570 zomwe zithandize ogwira ntchito za umoyo m’madera akumidzi m’boma la Mangochi. Iwo ati ndi okondwa kuti dziko la Iceland labwera ndi thandizoli pomwe anthu ogwira ntchito za umoyo m’madera akumidzi mdziko muno, akukumana ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana maka pa mayendedwe. “Zipatala kuti zigwire ntchito pamafunika antchito monga ma HSA. Koma pokhapo ndi posakwanira chifukwa kumidzi ngati kuno kumafunika mayendedwe kuti akafikire anthu amene akusowa thandizo,” anatero Dr. Mwansambo. Poyankhulapo mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za bungwe la ICEIDA mdziko muno mayi Inga Dora Petursdottir ati ndi cholinga cha dziko la Iceland kutukula miyoyo ya anthu mdziko muno ponena kuti akudziwa bwino lomwe mavuto omwe anthu akumidzi amakumana nawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mpingo Wa Katolika Si Chipani Cha Ndale
news: Pa mkumano wake ku mapeto a sabata yangothayi ndi atolankhani a nyumba zofalitsa nkhani zosiyana-siyana koma omwe akugwirira ntchito yawo ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican, Papa Francisco wati Mpingo wa Katolika si chipani cha ndale. Iye wauza atolankhaniwa kuti akuyenera kumakumbukira nthawi zonse kuti Mpingo wa Katolika si chipani ndale kapena gulu la ndale lokhala ndi mbali ziwiri zotsutsana kapena kampani yaikulu yochita malonda yoyendetsedwa ndi ma bwana. “Mpingo wa Katolika si chipani cha ndale chokhala ndi mbali ziwiri zotsutsana. Mpingo wa Katolika si kampani yaikulu yochita malonda yoyendetsedwa ndi ma bwana omwe pafupifupi amakhala pansi ndi kumafufuza njira zopititsira patsogolo malonda a kampani yao,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wauza atolankhaniwa kuti udindo wa ukulu wa Mpingo ndiye kufalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso wa Yesu Khristu kwa anthu a mitundu yosiyanasiyana ndi cholinga choti anthuwo atalalikiridwa uthenga wa chipulumutso amudziwe Yesu Khristu. Papa Francisco waonjezeranso kuti Mpingo ndi chida chowaonetsera anthu chifundo cha Mulungu. Iye watsiriza ndi kunena kuti Mpingo umapangidwa ndi anthu ochimwa amayi ndi abambo omwe tsiku ndi tsiku saatopa kuunikirana kuti aziyenda m’njira zolungama.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi Mtsogoleri Wa Dziko La Croatia
news: Lolemba m’mawa Papa Francisco analandira mlendo wolemekezeka ku nyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace. Mlendo wolemekezekayu ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko la Croatia, Zoran Milanović. Mu zokambirana zao atsogoleri awiriwa ati ndi okondwa ndi ubale wabwino womwe ulipo pakati pa maiko a Vatican ndi Croatia ndipo ati ndi chikhulupiriro chao kuti ubalewu upitirira kukomerakomera. Iwo anakambirananso nkhani zosiyana-siyana kuphatikizapo ya anthu a m’dziko la Croatia opezeka ku Bosnia ndi Herzegovina. Pambuyo pa zokambirana zao atsogoleri awiriwa anasinthana mphatso. Kenaka President Milanović anachita zokambirana ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika, Vatican Secretary of State Cardinal Pietro Parolin komanso mlembi wa mkulu wa mu ofesi yoona za ubale wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ndi maiko ena, Vatican Secretary for Relations with States, Archbishop Paul Richard Gallagher. Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika lidakhazikitsa ubale wa ukazembe, ndi dziko la Croatia pa 8 February m’chaka cha 1992.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Flames Yagonja ndi Mozambique, Queens Yafanana Mphamvu ndi Uganda
news: Timu ya mpira wa miyendo ya Malawi the Flames yagonja ndi timu ya mdziko la Mozambique ndi chigoli chimodzi kwa chilowere pa masewero ake otsiriza odzigulira malo mu mpikisano wa pa dziko lonse  wa Word Cup Qualifications. Masewerowa adachitikira mdziko la Benin mu mzinda wa Catonou pa bwalo la zamasewero la Matheu Kerekou. Zateremu ndiye kuti Flames yamatsiriza pa nambala yachinayi mu gululi kaamba koti ndi uomwe ili ndi ma points ochepetsetsa omwe ndi atatu. Pamene izi zili chomwechi, timu ya mpira wa manja ya dziko lino, Malawi Queens yalepherana ndi timu ya dziko la Uganda pogoletsana ma basiketi 44 kwa 44, mu mpikisano wa African Netball Championship. Masewero-wa anaseweredwa pa bwalo la za masewero la Wanderers Sports Club ku Namibia komwe mpikisano-wu umachitikira. Awa anali masewero otsiriza a timu ya dziko lino mu mpikisano wa African Netball Championship wa chaka chino. Malinga ndi zotsatirazi timu ya dziko lino-yi yatsiriza pa nambala yachitatu ku mpikisano-wu, ndipo timu ya dziko la South Africa ndi yomwe yakhala katswiri wa mpikisano-wu itapambana masewero onse amu mpikisanowu pomwe timu ya Uganda yatsiriza pa nambala yachiwiri. Timu ya dziko lino-yi yasewera masewero asanu ndi atatu ndipo yakwanitsa kupambana masewero asanu ndi amodzi, kufananitsa mphamvu amodzi komanso kugonja amodzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Akhristu Awonetse Chikondi kwa Odwala
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wapempha a Katolika kuti adzipereke powonetsa chikondi kwa anthu odwala ndi ovutika monga Yesu Khristu anali kuchitira. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi lachisanu pa Misa yomwe anatsogolera pa chipatala cha Agostino Gemelli mu mzinda wa Rome m’dziko la Italy. Iye wati popereka chisamaliro kwa anthu odwala ndi ovutika akhristu amalalika za chikondi cha Yesu Khristu. Papa Francisco wati kusamalira anthu odwala ndi ovutika ndi ulaliki wa mphamvu. Iye wati a Katolika akuyenera kuphunzira kuchokera ku Mtima Woyerayera wa Ambuye Yesu kuti athe kufikira anthu ena ndi kuwawonetsera chikondi. Chaka chino sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Catholic University of the Sacred Heart ikukondwerera zaka 60 za gawo lina la sukuluyi lophunzitsa za chipatala, Faculty of Medicine and Surgery. Mu mwezi wa July chaka chonchino Papa Francisco adagonekedwa pa chipatala cha Agostino Gemelli kwa masiku 11 potsatira opareshoni ya m’mimba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Atentha Banja Lake Ku Thyolo
news: Mwana wa zaka zitatu wafa ndipo mayi ake a zaka 19, ali mu ululu owopsa pomwe mamuna wake anathira mafuta a galimoto ndi kuyatsa awiriwo atasemphana maganizo m’banja. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku chigawo chakummwera cha ku mvuma kwa dziko lino Rhodrick Maida, watsimikiza izi ponena kuti bambo yemwe wachita izi, Ulemu Blazio wa zaka 20 nayenso anapsa ndi motowo kaamba koti pamene amathira mafuta kwa nkazi ndi mwana wakeyo nayenso mafuta anamugwera. Padakali pano mwana wawo, Chancy wamwalira ndipo mayi ake agonekedwa m’chipatala cha boma la Thyolo. Pamenepa apolisi apempha anthu kuti adzitsatira njira zabwino zothetsera kusagwirizana m’banja monga kupita kwa ankhoswe, kwa akulu-akulu a ku malo omwe amapempherako ngakhale kupita ku ofesi ya chinsisi yomwe imapezeka m’mapolisi osiyana siyana mdziko muno pofuna kupewa zinthu ngati izi. Bamboyu akuyembekezera kukayankha mulandu wakupha akatuluka mchipatala momwe amugoneka kaamba ka mabala a moto omwe anayatsawo. Banjalali limachokera m’mudzi mwa Tembenu mdera la mfumu yaikulu Mchiramwera, m’boma la Thyolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ana Awiri Afa Atapsa Ndi Moto
news: Ana awiri m’boma la Mulanje, afa atapsa ndi moto pomwe anayatsa machesi omwe amaseweretsa pa mtolo udzu. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku Mulanje Sub-Inspector Grecium Ngwira wati anawa analipo atatu ndipo m’modzi anathawira kutali motowo utayamba ndipo awiriwo sanathawire kutali zomwe zinapangitsa kuti apse komanso kufa ndi motowo pa malo omwewo. Nyumba yomwe yapsayo Ngwira wati motowo unafalikira kupita ku nyumba yapafupi ndipo yapseratu kuphatikiza katundu wa m’nyumbamo. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisiyu wati izi zimachitika makolo a anawa atatalikira. Pamenepa polisi apempha makolo kuti adzikhala tcheru ndi kumawonetsetsa malo komanso zomwe ana akuseweretsa powopa ngozi ngati zimenezi. Malemuwo ndi Manuel Thonje wa zaka zinayi komanso Praise Fransa wa zaka zitatu ndipo amachokera m’mudzi mwa mfumu yaikulu Tombodiya m’boma la Mulanje.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ofuna Kugulitsa Munthu Agamulidwa Zaka 12 ku Ndende
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Mangochi lalamula abambo awiri omwe ndi a Raffick Anussa komanso Anussa Wilson kuti akakhale k undende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka 12 atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu wofuna kugulitsa mnyamata wina m’bomalo. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sub Inspector Blessings Madikhula anawuza bwalolo, kuti awiriwa anapalamula mulanduwu pa 6 October chaka chino. A Madikhula anati  awiriwa anatenga mnyamata yemwe ndi wa zaka zinayi kupita naye kwa mkulu wina a Jawadu Bernad yemwe amachita malonda pa msika wa Namwera ndi cholinga chofuna kumugulitsa pa mtengo wa 500 sauzande kwacha. Pamenepa khumutchayo anatsina khutu apolisi omwe sanachedwe koma kumanga njondazo. Popereka chigamulo chake Senior Resident Rodrick Michongwe anati anthuwa akuyenera kukakhala ku ndende kwa zaka khumi ndi ziwiri kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Amuna awiriwa amachokera m’mudzi mwa Sailesi mfumu yayikulu Katuli m’boma lomwelo la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akacheza Ku Greece, Cyprus Mwezi Wa December
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kukacheza m’maiko a Cyprus ndi Greece. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kukacheza m’maikowa kumayambiriro a mwezi wa December. Papa Francisco achita ulendowu atayitanidwa ndi maepiskopi a Mpingo wa Katolika komanso atsogoleri a maiko’wa Ofesi yofalitsa ma uthenga ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican yati kuyambira pa 2 mpaka pa 4 December Papa Francisco adzakhala akucheza ku Cyprus makamaka mu mzinda wa ukulu wa dzikolo wa Nicosia. Pokacheza m’dziko la Cyprus, Papa Francisco akutsatira mapazi a Papa Benedicto wa 16 wopuma yemwe adakacheza m’dziko la Cyprus m’chaka cha 2010. Ndipo pa ulendo wake wokacheza m’dziko la Greece aka kakhala kachiwiri kuti Papa Francisco akacheze pa chilumba cha Lesbos m’dziko la Greece popeza adakachezanso pa chilumbachi m’chaka cha 2016. Chikhalireni pa mpando wa u Papa, Papa Francisco wayenda ma ulendo 34 kunja kwa dziko la Italy komanso wacheza kale m’maiko 54. Mwa zina maulendowa amathandiza kulimbitsa akhristu m’moyo wawo wa uzimu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Malawi Queens Yatsiriza Pa Nambala Yachiwiri Mu Mpikisano wa Pent Series
news: Timu ya mpira wa manja ya dziko lino Malawi Queens yatsiriza bwino ulendo wake wa mu mpkisano wa Pent Series pomwe lero yagonjetsa timu ya dziko la Kenya ndi zigoli 55 kwa 34.  Malinga ndi zotsatirazi, timu ya dziko lino-yi yakhala pa nambala yachiwiri itambana masewero anayi pa masewero asanu omwe yasewera mu mpikisano-wu, omwe umachitikira m’dziko la Namibia. Timu ya dziko la Uganda ndi yomwe yakhala akatswiri a mpikisano wa Pent Series wa chaka chino itapambana masewero onse asanu omwe yasewera mu mpikisano-wu. Timu ya dziko lino-yi ikuyembekezeka kutenga nawo-nso mbari mu mpikisano wa African Netball Cup, omwe uyambe posachedwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nthambi ya Ndende Ikufuna Kusintha Dzina
news: Nthambi yowona za ndende mdziko muno ya Malawi Prison Service yati posachedwapa ikhala ikusintha dzinali ndipo iyamba kutchedwa kuti Malawi Correctional Service. Wofalitsa nkhani ku nthambiyi a Chimwemwe Shawa anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pomwe imafuna kudziwa zina mwa zifukwa zomwe zadzetsa kusintha kwa dzina-ku. Shaba: Mayiko ena anasintha kale Iwo ati nthambiyi ikugwira ntchito yosintha akayidi makhalidwe awo, kuwalimbikitsa pa nkhani ya sukulu komanso kuwaphunzitsa luso losiyanasiyana ngati momwe zimachitira ndende za m’maiko ena omwenso amagwiritsa dzina latsopanoli. “Mayiko ena anasintha kalekale kutenga dzina limeneli. Panopa mutha kuwona kuti ndende zathu kuno ku Malawi tikumapereka mpata wa maphunziro mpaka akayidi ena akumachita bwino pa mayeso awo. Tikumaperekanso mwayi wa luso losiyanasiyana, mmene ndende za m’maiko ena zimachitiranso,” anatero a Shaba. Pamenepa iwo anati kusinthaku kuthandizanso kuti anthu absinthe kaganizidwe kawo pa mmene amayiwonera ndende ponena kuti anthu amaganiza kuti ndi malo oti munthu akazanzike. A Shaba apempha anthu kuti avomere dzinali ndi kulilandira kuti likhale pakati pawo pamene ndende za mdziko muno zikugwira ntchito yosintha miyoyo ya akayidi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MOAM Yawopseza Kuti Ichita Sitaraka Potsutsana ndi Mitengo ya Toll gate
news: Bungwe la eni a minibus mdziko muno la Minibus Owners Association of Malawi (MOAM) lawopseza kuti liyamba sitiraka lolemba likudzali ati pofuna kukakamiza boma kuti litsitse mitengo yomwe galimoto zikuyenera kumalipira pamene zikudutsa pa Tollgate. Kamange: Mitengo yakwera kwambiri Mlembi wamkulu wa bungweli a Coxley Kamange awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti mitengoyi ndi yokwera kwambiri potengera mmene a minibus amapezera ndalama pa bizinesi yawo. Iwo ati sakwanitsa kuti adzipereka ndalamazi sitiraka imeneyi idzatha pokha pokha boma litachitapo kanthu. “Mitengo yakwera kwambiri ndipo ife sitingakwanitse potengera mmene bizinesi ikuyendera mdziko muno. Ndiye taganiza kuti tipange sitiraka imeneyi kufikira titayankhidwa zomveka,” atero a Kamange. Bungwe la Roads Fund Administration lamanga malo oti galimoto zidzilipira zikamadutsa omwe pachingerezi akutchulidwa kuti Toll gate. Malowa amangidwa pa Chiingeni m’boma la Ntcheu komanso pa Kalinyeka m’boma la Dedza mu nsewu wa M1. Bungweli lalengeza kuti malo a Chingeni atsekulidwa lolemba likudzali pomwe malo apa Dedza adzatsekulidwabe kaamba koti akumangidwabe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu A Mdera La Gulupu Mphungu Ku Chikwawa Ali Pa Chiwopsezo Cha Kolera
news: Anthu okhala mdera la gulupu Mphungu kwa mfumu yayikulu Ngabu m’boma la Chikwawa, ati ali pa chiopsezo chotenga matenda otsekula m’mimba kaamba kosowa madzi a ukhondo. Radio Maria Malawi yapeza kuti madzi omwe amatuluka m’mijigo yambiri amakhala a mchere ndipo mijigo inawonongeka zomwe zimakakamiza anthuwa kumwa madzi a m’zitsime limodzi ndi ziweto. Malinga ndi a gulupu Mpheza, anthu kumeneku amayenda mitunda itali itali kukapeza madzi, ndipo pena amamwa ndi madzi limodzi ndi ziweto zomwe zikuchititsa kuti miyoyo yawo ikhale pa chiwopsezo chotenga matenda. “Dera la Mphungu ndi lalikulu kwambiri koma madzi abwino kulibe. Mijigo yathu madzi ake ndi a mchere ndipo ina inawonongeka kale kale,” anatero a gulupu Mpheza. Nawo mayi Alice Noah, akwa nyakwawa Chiyani m’derali, awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti kupeza madzi a ukhondo ndi vuto lalikulu lomwe limayika miyoyo yawo pa chiswe. “Timalawira kupita kukatunga madzi m’bandakucha, ndipo nthawi zina timakumana ndi zigawenga. Madzi kwathu kuno ndi chipsinjo,” anatero Mai Noah. Poyankhapo pa za vutoli, phungu wa kunyumba ya malamulo mdera la Chikwawa Mkombedzi, yemwenso ndi wachiwiri kwa nduna ya za malo, mayi Abida Mia ati akudziwa za vutoli ndipo anachita changu ponena kuti wayamba kale kukumba mijigo ku midzi ina. Phunguyu wati wayika kale padera ndalama zokwana 1.5 miliyoni Kwacha zokonzetsera mijigo yomwe inawonongeka m’deralo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walangiza Akhristu Kuchita Zomwe Yesu Anali Kuchita
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati kukhulupirira Yesu Khristu kumatanthauza kuchita zomwe Yesu Khristu’yo adali kuchita. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi lero ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Iye wati kukhulupirira Yesu Khristu kumatanthauza kusiya makhalidwe oipa monga umbombo ndi kusalabadira ubwino wa anthu ena. Iye wafotokoza tanthauzo la mawu oti kutsogoleredwa ndi Mzimu Woyera monga kalata ya Paulo Woyera yolembera a Galatiya ikunenera. Papa Francisco wati kutsogoleredwa ndi Mzimu Woyera kumayamba pa tsiku la Ubatizo ndipo kumafika pa mapeto pomwe munthu amwalira. Iye wati kutsogoleredwa ndi Mzimu Woyera kumabweretsa masomphenya m’moyo wa mkhristu. Papa Francisco wati pamene mkhristu atsogoleredwa ndi Mzimu Woyera amapewa kuweruza ena mopanda chikondi. Iye watsiriza ndi kunena kuti kutsogoleredwa ndi Mzimu Woyera kumathandiza mkhristu kukhala wodekha ndi wodzadzidwa ndi chimwemwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Atatu Afa, Atatu Akusowa Bwato Litamira ku Chikwawa
news: Anthu atatu afa ndipo enanso atatu ena akupitilira kusowa bwato limene anakwera litagudubuzika mu mtsinje wa Shire m’boma la Chikwawa. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Dickson Matemba wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti ngoziyi yachitika pa 2 November chaka chino pa doko la Jeyi lomwe limadziwika bwino kuti Dzilozo. Matemba wati bwatolo lomwe limayendetsedwa ndi mnyamata wa zaka 12, munali anthu okwana asanu ndi anayi (9). Padakali pano matupi a omwalira awiri apezeka, koma anthu okwiya anagwira woyendetsa bwatolo, Isaac Matchiti ndi kumutema kenaka kutentha thupi lake. Apolisi m’bomali ati ntchito ikupilira yofufuza matupi a anthu ena otsala, koma iwo adzudzula zomwe achita anthu okwiya pakupha woyendetsa bwatolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Maiko Achilimike Posamalira Chilengedwe
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha maiko kuti achilimike posamalira chilengedwe. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa Francisco walankhula izi kudzera mwa mlembi wamkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika Cardinal Pietro Parolin, mu uthenga wake ku msonkhano wokambirana za kusintha kwa nyengo omwe ukuchitikira ku Glasgow m’dziko la Scotland. Papa Francisko kusonyeza chitsanzo cha kusamalira chilengedwe pothilira mtengo Iye wati nthawi yakwana yoti maiko akambirane mfundo zomwe zingathandize mibado ya kutsogolo pa nkhani yosamalira chilengedwe. Iye wati nthumwi ku msonkhanowu zili ndi udindo waukulu wopereka uthenga ku dziko lonse kuti nthawi yakwana tsopano yokwaniritsa mfundo zomwe msonkhanowu ungamange. Papa Francisco wati ndi udindo wa msonkhanowu kupeza njira zothandiza kuteteza anthu osaukitsitsa omwe akuvutika kwambiri ndi mavuto odza kaamba kakusintha kwa nyengo. Iye wati akuzindikira bwino kuti kukwaniritsa zimenezi si ntchito ya pafupi popeza pambali pa mavuto a kusintha kwa nyengo palinso mavuto ena odza kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus. Komabe Papa Francisco wati ndi zotheka kuthetsa mavuto onsewa ngati patakhala chimvano pakati pa maiko. Iye wati likulu ka Mpingo wa Katolika liyetsetsa kuchilimika kuti pokwana chaka cha 2050 mavuto ambiri omwe alipo padakali pano pa nkhani ya kusintha kwa nyengo idzakhale mbiri ya kale kudzera mukuphunzitsa achinyamata za kufunika kosamala chilengedwe, kulimbikitsa chikhalidwe chatsopano pa nkhani yosamala chilengedwe pongotchula zochepa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: World Vision Yadandaula Ndi Anthu Okana Kupoperetsa Mnyumba Mankhwala Opha Udzudzu
news: Bungwe la World Vision kuno ku Malawi ladandaula ndi anthu ena m’boma la Mangochi, omwe akukana kuti nyumba zawo zipoperedwe mankhwala opha udzudzu woyambitsa malungo. Mkulu woyendetsa ndondomekoyi yomwe akuyitcha Indoor Residual Spraying (IRS), m’boma la Mangochi mayi Confidence Mkungula ndi omwe anena izi pambuyo poyendera ena mwa madera omwe mukugwiridwa ntchiytoyi m’bomalo. Achinyamata omwe akugwira ntchito yopopera mankhawalawo Iwo ati mwa madera 17 a m’boma la Mangochi momwe mukugwiridwa ntchitoyi, m’madera okwana anayi ndi momwe bungweli likukumana ndi mavuto a mtunduwu. Malinga ndi mayi Mkungula, kuchokera pa 25 October pomwe ntchitoyi inayamba kufika pano, bungweli lakwanitsa kupopera nyumba zokwana 69, 954 mwa nyumba zokwana 336, 257 zomwe zikuyenera kupoperedwa pasanathe masiku 36 kuchokera pomwe ntchitoyi inayamba, zomwe zikutanthauza kuti 20.8% ya ntchitoyi ndi yomwe yagwiridwa. Iwo ati anthu ena akumakana kuti nyumba zawo zipoperedwe mankhwalawa kaamba ka zikhulupiliro, chipembedzo komanso zina, zomwe zikuyika miyoyo yawo pa chiwopsezo chotenga matenda a malungo. “Anthu ena ali ndi zikhulupiliro zawo, ena mipingo yomwe amapemphera imawaletsa kutero paja ena ngakhale adwale samapita ku chipatala, ena akumaganiza kuti zikukhudzana ndi katemera wa COVID-19,” anatero mayi Mkungula. Piringu: Anthu opezeka ndi malungo akuchepa Polankhulapo, bwanamkubwa wa boma la Mangochi, Dr. Raphael Piringu apempha anthu kuti asanyalanyaze pamene anthu opopera mankhwalawa afika m’madera mwawo ponena kuti ndi zothandiza kwambiri. Mwachitsanzo, iwo anati chiyambireni ndondomekoyi zaka zingapo zapitazo, anthu amene akutenga matenda a malungo, akhala akuchepa m’bomalo zomwe zikuchititsa kuti boma lisawononge ndalama zambiri pa mankhwala a malungo. “Anthu amene akupezeka ndi malungo ndi ochepa ngakhale imfa zachepanso ndi 60%. Pamenepa ndiye kuti ndalama zomwe boma likanamagulira mankhwala a malungo zikupulumutsidwa,” anatero Dr. Piringu. Padakalipano, bungwe la World Vision lati likugwira ntchito limodzi ndi mafumu komanso atsogoleri a zipembedzo powadzindikiritsa ubwino wa kupopera mankhwalawa ndi cholinga choti nawo afotokozere bwino anthu awo ndi kumvetsa za nkhaniyi kuti anthu onse a m’bomalo akhale otetezeka ku nthenda ya malungo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kulowetsa Ndale Pa Chitukuko Kukukhudza Miyoyo Ya Anthu pa Chuma- CFSC
news: Bungwe la Centre for Social Concern lati kulowetsa ndale pa ntchito za chitukuko, kukukhudza miyoyo ya anthu pa chuma. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu ku bungweli a Bernard Mphepo anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pamene bungweli likufuna kuyamba project yodzindikiritsa anthu ubwino wolondoloza chuma chawo. Mphepo: Zimenezi zikulepheretsa kuti zitukuko ziyende bwino Iwo ati chikhalidwe chosiya ntchito za chitukuko zomwe adindo omwe anachoka pa udindowo anayamba komanso kusowa kwa ubale wabwino pakati pa phungu waku nyumba ya malamulo ndi khansala wake komanso adindo ena ku dera kukusokoneza ntchito za chitukuko m’madera ambiri mdziko muno. “Chakhala chili chikhalidwe chathu kuti phungu akagonja pa chisankho, phungu yemwe wapambana uja safuna kupitiriza chitukuko chomwe anachiyamba. Phungu akamamuwona khansala amamuwona kuti ali ndi kuthekera komulanda udindo wake chimodzimodzinso khansala amamuwona phungu wake mu njira ina. Zimenezi ndi zomwe zikulepheretsa kuti zitukuko ziyende bwino komanso mu nthawi yake,” anatero a Mphepo. Pamenepa a Mphepo alangizanso aphungu akunyumba ya malamulo kuti adzigwiritsa ntchito anthu ovomerezeka ndi malamulo a dziko lino pa kayendetsedwe ka thumba la Constituency Development Fund (CDF) osati kugwiritsa ntchito anthu a ndale monga aphungu ambiri amachitira. Padakalipano bungwe la Centre for Social Concern ndi chithandizo kuchokera ku GIZ, layamba project yolimbana ndi mliri wa COVID-19 powonetsetsa kuti nkhani zachuma zikuchitika poyera, m’boma la Mangochi. Malinga ndi a Mphepo, project-yi yomwe ndi ya miyezi iwiri (November-December) ithandiza mzika za m’bomalo kukahala ndi chidwi polondoloza chuma chawo. Iwo ati akukhulupilira kuti pamapeto pa ndondomekoyi anthu a m’madera a mafumu aakulu Bwananyambi komanso Chiunda komwe kugwiridwe ntchitoyi, akhala ndi kuthekera kolondoloza chuma chawo chomwe chimachoka ku boma komanso ku khonsolo ya bomalo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Radio Maria Malawi Ikulingalira Zokhazikitsa Studio Ku Dayosizi ya Chikwawa
news: Radio Maria Malawi yati ili ndi malingaliro okhazikitsa studio yake yaing’ono mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa. A Director a wailesiyi bambo Joseph Kimu anena izi pa mkumano wawo ndi abwenzi a wailesiyi ochokera mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa omwe anafika ku likulu la wailesiyi m’boma la Mangochi. Iwo anati posachedwapa akonza ulendo wokakumana ndi episkopi wa dayosiziyo, Ambuye Peter Musikuwa ndi cholinga chokakambirana nawo za nkhaniyi komanso zina zokhudza kayendetsedwe ka wailesiyi. Bambo Kimu: Tikukonza dongosolo “Tikukonza dongosolo loti tidzakawonane ndi Ambuye ngati tingayambe dongosolo kuti kukhale studio yakeyake ndi cholinga choti asamadalire studio yaku Blantyre ayi koma akhale oyima pawokha. Zimenezi tizikonza bwinobwino mchaka cha 2022,” anatero bambo Kimu. Pa mkumanowu m’modzi mwa abwenziwa anadandaulanso za vuto la kusamveka bwino kwa Radio Maria Malawi m’maboma omwe ali kumsi kwa mtsinje wa Shire. Ndipo poyankhapo pa nkhaniyi bambo Kimu anati pali malingaliro oyika transmitter pa malo ena m’boma la Thyolo yomwe idzathandizire kuti anthu a ku Nsanje ndi Chikwawa ayambe kumvera bwino wailesiyi. “Tili nayo kale frequency imene timayilipilira ngakhale sitinayike transmitter yake. Imeneyi ili mbali za ku Thyolo. Oyezawo anatiuza kuti titayika pamenepopo transmitter ndiye kuti madera aku Chikwawa ndi Nsanje amene akulephera kumvera Radio Maria adzayimvera bwino lomwe,” anatero bambo Kimu. Iwo anati zida zonse zofunika zilipo koma kuti ntchitoyi itheke pakusowekera ndalama zokwana 25 million kwacha. Bambo Kimu anati, “Tower tinagula kale tinasungitsa kwa mkhristu wina ku Blantyre. Zida zonse zilipo kale, zomwe zikusowa ndi ndalama zokwana 25 million kuti tsopano tikamange transmitter imeneyi.” Padakalipano Radio Maria Malawi ili ndi ma studio ake aang’ono m’madayosizi a Mzuzu, Lilongwe, Dedza, Zomba komanso Blantyre ndipo komwe kulibe ma studio-wa ndi ku madayosizi a Karonga ndi Chikwawa omwe ali kumathero a dziko lino. Radio Maria Malawi ili ndi ma transmitter asanu ndi atatu omwe ali ku Mpingwe, Zomba, Monkeybay, Namwera, Dedza, Mzuzu, Lilongwe komanso ku Dowa. Kupatula ku Thyolo, wailesiyi ilinso ndi malingaliro oyika ma transmitter ku Dwangwa komanso ku Karonga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha Makolo Atenge Gawo Polimbikitsa Maphunziro a Ana Ovutikitsitsa
news: Wachiwiri wapampando woyang’anira dera la Ngongonda, ku Chitedze mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, a Angelo Mtikuthira, alimbikitsa akhristu kuti adzitengapo gawo polimbikitsa maphunziro a ana ovutikitsitsa m’dziko muno. A Mtikuthira ayakhula izi loweruka pambuyo polandira thandizo la zipangizo zophuzilira zomwe nthambi yowona za maphunziro mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe yapereka, kwa ana ovutikitsitsa okwana 45 a m’derali. Iwo alimbikitsanso akhristuwa kuti akhale odzidalira posawerengera thandizo losiyanasiyana lochokera ku mabungwe komanso maiko ena zomwe ati zitha kuthandizira kusula tsogolo labwino la ana ovutikitsitsa mdziko muno. “Anthu eni ake tikhale patsogolo kuthandiza ana athu pa zosoweka zawo. Ifeyo tikuyenera kuyambapo kuti ena ofuna adzigibwera pambuyo ndi thandizo lawo lomwe akufuna kutipatsa,” anatero a Mtikhutira. Polankhulapo ena mwa ana omwe alandira thandizo la zipangizo zophunzilirazi, Paulo Piyasoni komanso Mphatso Paska anati ndi okondwa kwambiri kaamba ka thandizolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alamulidwa Zaka 21 Kaamba Kogwilira Mwana wa Chaka Chimodzi
news: Bwalo la milandu la m’boma la Mangochi lalamula a James George kuti akagwire ukayidi kwa zaka 21 kaamba kogwilira mwana wawo wamkazi womupeza wa chaka chimodzi ndi miyezi iwiri. Malinga ndi woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sergeant Anthony Mchiswe, pa 6 September chaka chino, mkazi wa bamboyu adasiya mwanayo akugona ndi kupita ku mtsinje kukatunga madzi ndipo pobwelera anamva kwa m`bale wawo kuti anawona amuna awo akumusambitsa mwanayo koma amatuluka magazi ku malo ake obisika. Nkhaniyi inakasiyidwa ku polisi ya Masuku ndipo zotsatira za kuchipatala zinatsimikiza kuti mwanayu anagwiridwadi. Mkuluyu anawukana mlanduwu zomwe zinachititsa mbali ya boma kuti ibweretse mboni zinayi zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkuluyu apezeke wolakwa. Popereka chigamulo chake Senior Resident Rodrick Michongwe analamula mkuluyu kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kuti ena atengerepo phunziro ponena kuti milandu ya mtunduwu ikuchulukira m’bomalo. A James George amachokera mudzi mwa Namaningawa ya mfumu yayikulu Bwananyambi m`boma la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wathandiza Dziko La Syria ndi Ndalama
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapereka thandizo la ndalama ku dziko la Syria. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, mkulu wa bungwe la ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ku Vatican lomwe limayang’ana ntchito za Mpingo wa Katolika wa ku m’mawa, Cardinal Leonardo Sandri yemwe akucheza m’dziko la Syria ndi yemwe walengeza kwa maepiskopi a Mpingo’wu m’dzikolo za thandizo la ndalama pafupifupi 150 million Kwacha zomwe Papa Francisco wapereka zoti zigwire ntchito yothandizira anthu osaukitsitsa. Cardinal Sandri walengezanso kuti mwezi wa March chaka mawa, akuluakulu a ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ku Vatican ndi mabungwe a Mpingo’wu omwe amapereka zithandizo zosiyana-siyana adzakhala ali m’dzikolo kuti awone m’mene angathandizire dzikolo pa ntchito yothandiza anthu osauka pofuna kuti Mpingo udziyendera limodzi ngakhale pa nkhani za chitukuko. Iye watsimikizira Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la Syria kuti Papa Francisco ali nawo pafupi poganizira kuti dziko la Syria lakhala likudutsa m’mavuto osiyana-siyana kuphatikizapo nkhondo. Cardinal Sandri wati Sinodi ya maepiskopi a Mpingo wa Katolika yomwe Papa Francisco adatsekulira ndi mwayi wa ukulu kuti Mpingo ukhale ukusinkhasinkha ndi kudziyeretsa kuti usanduke watsopano mu zochitika zake. Cardinal Sandri ali m’dziko la Syria kwa masiku asanu ndi anayi (9).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Layamikira a Zipembedzo Polimbana ndi Nkhanza
news: Boma layamikira akuluakulu a zipembedzo mdziko muno kamba ka chidwi chomwe ali nacho chofuna kuthana ndi mchitidwe wa nkhaza omwe amayi komanso ana amakumana nawo. Mlembi wamkulu mu unduna owona kuti pasakhale kusiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo, chisamaliro cha anthu ndi chitukuko cha m’madera, mayi Roselyn Makhumula anena izi lachinayi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pa mkumano wa mabungwe a zipembedzo omwe cholinga chake ndi kulimbikitsa atsogoleri a mipingo za kufunika kophunzitsa anthu za kuyipa kochitira nkhanza amayi komanso ana. Mayi Makhumula ati a mipingo ali ndi udindo waukulu ndipo ati ali ndi kuthekera kofikira anthu ochuluka kumadera osiyanasiyana a dziko lino. “Tinaganiza zokumana ndi akuluakulu a zipembedzo chifukwa choti iwowa amakhala pafupi ndi anthu ndipo anthu amawakhulupilira mu zambiri choncho sikungakhale kovuta kuti nawonso awafikire anthu omwe amawatumikira ndi uthenga wokhudza kuthetsa kuchitirana nkhanza,” anatero mayi Makhumula. Polankhulapo mkulu wa bungwe la Malawi Council of Churches, bishop Fanuel Magangani anati akudzindikira za udindo wawo pa ntchitoyi. “Mu umodzi muli mphamvu ndipo tonse tabwera pamodzi kuti tilimbane ndi nkhondo imeneyi,” anatero bishop Magangani.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Atatu Afa Atawombedwa Ndi Mphenzi ku Mangochi
news: Anthu atatu afa atawombedwa ndi mphenzi mdera la Masuku m’boma la Mangochi. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi, anthuwa ndi mayi ndi mwana wake komanso bambo wina wa nyumba yoyandikana nayo. Anthuwa ndi a Mussah Dickson, a zaka 25 zakubadwa ochokera m’mudzi mwa Bula mfumu yaikulu Nsamala m’boma la Balaka, a Aisha Wyson, a zaka 28 zakubadwa ndi Sainet Wyson yemwe ndi mwana wa mayiwa wa zaka 8 zakubadwa onse ochokera m’mudzi mwa Masuku mfumu yayikulu Bwananyambi m’boma la Mangochi. Iye wati mphenziyi inawomba anthuwa pamene amacheza pakhonde mvula ikugwa ndipo anthuwa anavulala kwambiri. Itachitika ngoziyi, anthuwa anawatengera ku chipatala cha Mulibwanji komwe zinatsimikizika kuti afa kaamba ka nyetsi yochokera ku chiphaliwalicho.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

MTHENGA WOYERA Marko 10:35-45
Mau a Mthenga Woyera monga adalembera Marko
Mwana wa Munthu adabwera osati kuti ena adzamtumikire ai,
koma kuti Iyeyo adzatumikire anthu ndi kupereka moyo wake
kuti aombole anthu ochuluka.”
Yakobo ndi Yohane, ana aja a Zebedeo, adadzauza Yesu kuti, “Aphunzitsi, ife timati bwanji titakupemphani kanthu, mutichitire.” Yesu adaŵafunsa kuti, “Inuyo mukufuna kuti ndikuchitireni chiyani?” Iwo adati, “Timafuna kuti pamene mudzakhale mu ulemerero wanu, mudzatiike wina ku dzanja lanu lamanja, wina ku dzanja lanu lamanzere.” Koma Yesu adati, “Simukudziŵa zimene mukupempha. Kodi inu mungathe kumwa nao chikho chamasautso chimene ndikudzamwera Ine? Kodi inu mungathe kulandira nao ubatizo wa mavuto umene ndikudzalandira Ine?” Iwo aja adayankha kuti, “Inde, tingathe.” Apo Yesu adati, “Chabwino, chikho chimene Ine ndikudzamwacho, inunso mudzamwa nao, ndipo ubatizo umene Ine ndikudzalandirawo, inunso mudzalandira nao. Koma Ineyo si udindo wanga kusankha munthu kuti akhale ku dzanja langa lamanja, kapena ku dzanja langa lamanzere. Mulungu ndiye adzapereke malo ameneŵa kwa omwe Iye mwini adaŵakonzera.”
Pamene khumi ena aja adamva zimenezi, adapsera mtima Yakoboyo ndi Yohaneyo. Koma Yesu adaŵaitana ophunzira akewo, naŵauza kuti, “Mukudziŵa kuti pakati pa anthu akunja, anthu amene amati ngolamulira, amadyera anthu ao masuku pa mutu. Akuluakulu aonso amaonetsadi mphamvu zao pa anthu ao. Koma pakati pa inu zisamatero ai. Aliyense wofuna kukhala mkulu pakati panu, azikhala mtumiki wanu. Ndipo aliyense wofuna kukhala mtsogoleri pakati panu, azikhala kapolo wa onse. Chitani monga m’mene adachitira Mwana wa Munthu: adabwera osati kuti ena adzamtumikire ai, koma kuti Iyeyo adzatumikire anthu ndi kupereka moyo wake kuti aombole anthu ochuluka.”
Mthenga wa Ambuye. Ulemu kwa Inu Ambuye Yesu Khristu.
ULALIKI
Okondedwa abale ndi alongo mwa Ambuye.
Lero ndi Lamulungu la nambala 29 pa chaka chachipembedzo. Mawu Oyamba ndi a mu Mthenga Wabwino akugwirizana pa mutu wa khalidwe labwino ndi lokoma lakutumikira ena osati khalidwe loipa, lodzikonda ndi lonyansa lofuna kutumikiridwa. Chifukwa cha ichi tasankha kuti mutu wa mapemphero athu lero ukhale wakuti: Kutumikira osati kutumikiridwa.
Tikumbutsane kuti Yesu ndi ophunzira ake ali paulendo wopita ku Yerusalem. Kumeneko akulu ansembe ndi aphunzitsi a malamulo akamukwapula, kumuseka, kumuseweretsa, kumuthira malovu, kumuzunza ndikumupha pomukhomera pamtanda, koma patapita masiku atatu, Yesu adzauka kwa akufa.
Ku Yerusalemu, Yesu nali kupita ku chikondwerero cha Pasaka. Kwa Ayuda, kunali lamulo lokhwima kwambiri lakuti mwamuna aliyense anayenera kuyenda ulendo wokapemphera ku Yerusalemu katatu pachaka. Akazi ndi amayi oyembekezera samakakamizidwa kupita. Mwina chifukwa ulendo wake udali wautali kwambiri. Ku Yerusalemu kumachitika chaka cha Pasaka, Pentekosite ndiponso chaka cha Teberenakulo. Anthu oposa 200,000 amayenda ulendo umenewo katatu pachaka kupita kukapemphera ku Yerusalemu.
Choncho, leronso Mthenga wa Marko ukutifotokozera za Ambuye Yesu ndi ophunzira awiri amene akufuna kukhala ndi maudindo pakati pa anzao. Mu Mthenga wa Mateyo, pempho lofuna kukhala paudindo wapamwamba mu ufumu wa Yesu akupempha si Yakobe ndi Yohane ayi, koma akulipereka ndi mayi awo Salome (Mateyo 20:20-23). Yesu akunenetsa kuti amene akufuna kukhala wamkulu ayenera kukhala wotumikira onse ndikutenga khalidwe lakapolo. Tisaiwaletu kuti zonsezitu zikuchitika paulendo wopita ku Yerusalemu.
Lero Yakobe ndi Yohane ana a Zebedeo ali ndi pempho kwa Ambuye Yesu. Iwo adati, “Aphunzitsi, ife timati bwanji titakupemphani kanthu, mutichitire.” Yesu adaŵafunsa kuti, “Inuyo mukufuna kuti ndikuchitireni chiyani?” Iwo adati, “Timafuna kuti pamene mudzakhale mu ulemerero wanu, mudzatiike wina ku dzanja lanu lamanja, wina ku dzanja lanu lamanzere” (Marko 10: 35-37).
Mongofuna kuseleula, apa titha kuyerekeza kuti Yakobe ndi Yohane amapempha Yesu cheke chotsegula cha pay cash ndipo malo amene timalemba ndalama paja, palembedwe kuti, ulemerero wakumwamba wa Yakobe ndi Yohane. Kudzanja lamanja ndi dzanja lamanzere. Osayina kukhala Yesu.
Tikamvetsetsa bwinobwino, tikuona kuti, Yesu sakukana pempho la Yakobe ndi Yohane ayi, koma akuwayankha powauza zochita zoti iwo eni ayenera kutsatira kuti alandire cheke chimenechi. Yesu akuwayankha kuti, “Kodi inu mungathe kumwa nao chikho chamasautso chimene ndikudzamwera Ine? Kodi inu mungathe kulandira nao ubatizo wa mavuto umene ndikudzalandira Ine?” Iwo aja adayankha kuti, “Inde, tingathe” (Marko 10:38-39). Ubatizo umene Yesu akunena apa, si Ubatizo umene wansembe adatitsira madzi pamphumi pathu ayi, koma akutanthauza kudzipereka kwathunthu potumikira ena osati kutumikiridwa.
Zodabwitsa kwambiri ndizakuti ophunzira a Yesu, tikuona kuti sakumvetsetsabe zimene Yesu wakhala akuwaphunzitsa nthawi yonseyi. Iwo akuganizabe kuti kuyenda ndi Yesu amene amachiritsa anthu odwala, anthu akhungu, agonthi, kuukitsa anthu akufa monga mtsikana uja ndi Lazalo uja, kukuthanthauza kuti zabwino zonse ziyenera kukhala zawo. Mwachidule tinene kuti Yakobe ndi Yohane akufuna moyo wodzdza ndi zinthu zofewa zokhazokha. Samamvetsetsabe kuti, palibe chipulumutso cha tchipi kapena palibe chipulumutso chotola!! Yesu sakuwabisira mawu ayi, akuwauza ophunzira ake kuti, “Aliyense wofuna kukhala mkulu pakati panu, azikhala mtumiki wanu. Ndipo aliyense wofuna kukhala mtsogoleri pakati panu, azikhala kapolo wa onse. Chitani monga m’mene adachitira Mwana wa Munthu: adabwera osati kuti ena adzamtumikire ai, koma kuti Iyeyo adzatumikire anthu ndi kupereka moyo wake kuti aombole anthu ochuluka” Marko 10:43-45.
Mwachidule, ophunzira a Yesu akungoona mwa Yesu zinthu izi: mphamvu, ufumu, kupambana ndi ulemerero. Koma Yesu akuwauza kuti, “Chitani monga m’mene adachitira Mwana wa Munthu: adabwera osati kuti ena adzamtumikire ai, koma kuti Iyeyo adzatumikire anthu” (Marko 10:45). Choncho, chitsanzo chathu chachikulu pakutumikira ena ndiye Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu.
Yesu akutiphunzitsa ife tomwe kuti, tiyenera kukhala otumikira monga akapolo, tikatero tidzakhala ndi chimwemwe chosatha chakumwamba. Chuma, ulemerero, mphamvu ndi zosangalatsa zapansi pano sizingatipatse chisangalalo chamuyaya. Chimwemwe chamuyaya timachipeza pamene tikhala otumikira anzathu.
Monga Yakobe ndi Yohane sakumvetsetsa kuti mphamvu, ufumu ndiponso ulemerero sizingawapatse chipulumutso chosatha, koma kukhala otumikira ena, nafenso lero tiyeni tipezepo phunziro lakuti, tiyenera kukhala ngati Ambuye Yesu potumikira anzathu, posambitsa mapazi a anzathu popanda kuyembekezera kanthu. Kwa Ayuda, kusambitsa mapazi inali ntchito ya kapolo. Nafenso tiyenera kukhala ndi mtima wa kapolo podzichepetsa potumikira anzathu. “Iyeyu anali ndi umulungu chikhalire, komabe sadayese kuti kulingana ndi Mulungu ndi chinthu choti achigwiritsitse. Koma adadzitsitsa kotheratu pakudzitengera umphawi wa kapolo, ndi kukhala munthu wonga anthu onse. Ali munthu choncho adadzichepetsa, adakhala womvera mpaka imfa, imfa yake yapamtanda” (Afilipi 2:6-8).
Ife lero titha kuwanena Yakobe ndi Yohane kuti anali okula mtima kapena odzikonda chifukwa amadzisankhira okha malo a pamwamba. Komatu maganizo a anyamata awiriwa akujambula bwino kwabasi maganizo amene amakhala mu mtima mwa inu ndi ine ofuna nthawi zonse kuti zabwino zonse zizikhala zathu. Akujambula bwinobwino maganizo amene amabweretsa mavuto mu mpingo pamene anthu safunanso kutumikira koma kutumikiridwa. Zotsatira zake zimakhala kukanganirana maudindo mpaka kudana, kuipitsirana mbili kapena kuphana kumene. Tayesani kusuzumira m’madayosezimo, m’zipani za ansembe, asisitere ndi abrazalazo, m’mabungwe a mu mpingowo ndipo mukazipeza zonsezi zili mbwerekete. Mmalo motumikira Mulungu ndi anthu, timakhala otanganidwa zedi kukanganirana maudindo, chuma ndi ulemerero wa padziko lapansi pano. Mmalo motanganidwa ndi kulalika, kupemphera, kuthandiza anthu osauka ndi kusamalira akhristu powagawira masakramenti ndikuwaphunzitsa, timakhala otanganidwa ndikufunafuna mipando ndi zosangalatsa za padziko lapansi pano. Maganizo a Yakobe ndi Yohane akujambula bwino kwabasi maganizo omwe amakhala pakati pa anthu mu zipani zosiyansiyana za ndale kapena malo osiyanasiyana kumene timagwira ntchito m’boma kapena m’mabungwe osakhala a boma ndi m’makampani. Kodi ndi malo ati komwe anthu ake sakanganirana maudindo, ulemerero, chuma ndi zina mpakana kuchitirana chipongwe? Kodi ndi malo ati komwe sachitirana nsanje chifukwa chakuti wina akudalitsidwa kuposa iwo?
Ngwazo wathu lero ukhale wodzisuzumira mu mtima mwathu ndikudzifunsa kuti, “kodi khalidwe langa pakati pa anzanga ndilofuna kutumikira Mulungu ndi anthu ena kapena ayi?” Ambuye Yesu akutiuza kuti tisenze mtanda wathu osati tivale Ufumu. Tikhale otsiriza osati oyambirira. Tikhale otumikira ena makamaka anthu osauka osati kukhala mabwana otumikiridwa ayi. Amen.
Ine ndimvera Mulungu mmodzi yekha…
Mapemphero a Akhristu
Abale, pamodzi ndi mapemphero athuwa tipereke kwa Mulungu zowawa ndi zovuta zamitundumitundu zimene anthu amapeza m’dziko lino lapansi:
1. Atsogoleri a Mpingo atumikire akhristu ao modzichepetsa ndi mosadziwerengera, ndipo asaope kumva zowawa ndi kutaya moyo wao womwe chifukwa cha iwo.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
2. Akhristu amene akuzunzidwa chifukwa cha chokhulupirira Mulungu, aonetse kulimba mtima, podziwa kuti mphotho yao idzakhala yaikulu kumwamba.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
3. Anthu odwala ndi ena onse amene akuvutika m’mitima mwao apeze mphamvu zopirira mavuto, polingalira za kuzunzidwa kwa Yesu Khristu Mpulumutsi.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
4. Ife tomwe tiyesetse kuiwala zowawa ndi zovuta zathu poganizira kusauka kwa anzathu, ndipo tiwathandize m’zowawa zao potsata chitsanzo chimene Ambuye adatisiyira.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
Atate, tkupereka kwa Inu mapemphero athu amenewa, podziwa kuti mudzatimvera chifundo ndi kutithandiza pa nthawi yake. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu. Amen.
PEMPHERO LOPEREKERA
Inu Ambuye,
Tikukupemphani,
mutipatse mtima wolemekeza moonadi mphatso zanu
kuti kudzera mu mphamvu yoyeretsa ya chaulere chanu,
tithe kuyeretsedwa ndi misteri
zimene tikukondwerera pano.
Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.
NYIMBO YOLANDIRIRA Cf. Salimo 32: 18-19
Chauta amayang’ana anthu omumvera,
ndi odalira chikondi chake chosasinthika.
Iye amachita izi kuti awapulumutse ku imfa,
ndikuwasungira moyo anthuwo panthawi ya njala.
Kapena: Marko 10: 45
Mwana wa munthu adabwera kuti adzapereke moyo wake
kuti awombole anthu ochuluka.
PEMPHERO LOTHOKOZERA
Inu Ambuye,
lolani kuti popindula
ndi nsembe ya kumwamba taiperekayi,
tithandizidwe ndi zimene mukutipatsa panthawi ino,
ndi kukhala okonzeka kulandira mphatso zamuyaya.
Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.
PEMPHERO LOTSIRIZA (Pa msonkhano wamapemphero)
Atate, Mwana wanu adadza pansi pano kudzatumikira anthu ndi kupereka moyo wake kuti awaombole. Mutithandize ife atumiki anu kuti tikhale nawo mtima womwewo. Nafenso tizitumikira anzathu modziiwala ndi mwachifundo, pakuwathandiza m’zosowa zao, osaopa kuwasaukira ndi kupereka moyo wathu womwe. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.
