title: Wogwira Ntchito Zachipatala Akagwira Ukayidi wa Zaka 19 pa Mlandu Wogwilira Wodwala
news: Bwalo la milandu la Senior Resident Magistrate m’boma la Mangochi lalamula bambo wina wogwira ntchito pa chipatala cha Mangochi kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka 19 kamba komupedza olakwa pa mulandu wogwilira mayi wina wa zaka 20 zakubadwa. Bwaloli linamva kudzera kwa woyimira boma pa mulandu Inspector Amos Mwase, kuti izi zinachitika pa 8 August chaka chino pomwe bambo-yu George Gwangwala yemwe ndi wa zaka 31 zakubadwa anagwilira mayiyu atamuitanira ku chipinda china pa chipatalapo kuti amuthandize pa zamatenda omwe amadwala. Mayiyo akuti atafika m’chipindapo ndi pomwe wazachipatalayo anayamba kumugwilira. Mayiyu atamutengera ku chipatala cha Mangochi ndi komwe anatsimikiza kuti anagwililiridwa. Atawonekera ku bwalo la milandu nkuluyu anawukana mulanduwu kufikira pomwe boma linabweretsa mboni zinayi zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkulu-yu apezeke olakwa. A Gwangwala akuti anapempha bwalolo kuti liwapatse chilango chofewa kaamba koti mwakolo awo anawononga ndalama zochuluka powalipilira ku sukulu ya zachipatala. Koma popereka chigamulo chake Senior Resident Magistrate Rodrick Michongwe wati wapereka chilango cha mtunduwu kuti ena atengerepo phunziro ponenanso kuti mchitidwewu uli ndi kuthekera koyipitsa mbiri ya ogwira ntchito zachipatala. A George Gwangwala amachokera m’mudzi wa Heleman m’dera la mfumu yaukulu Khwethemule m’boma la Thyolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walangiza Azachipatala Aleke Mchitidwe Wochotsa Pathupi
news: M’mawu ake kwa anthu ogwira ntchito za chipatala a m’dziko la Italy, Papa Francisco wabwereza kunena kuti kuchotsa pathupi ndi kupha kotero iye wapempha anthuwa kuti azitsata malamulo pogwira ntchito yawo. Papa Francisco wati ndi kofunika kuti anthuwa adziteteza moyo wa anthu omwe sangathe kudzilankhulira kapena kudziteteza. Iye wakamba za kufunika koti anthu ogwira ntchito za chipatala azikhala pafupi ndi amayi oyembekezera ndi kumawazindikiritsa kuti palibe phindu lililonse lobwera pa kuchotsa pathupi. Papa’yu wati ndi kofunika kuti anthu ogwira ntchito za chipatala azigwira ntchito yao mokomera onse ponena kuti angakhale anthu achikulire amene nao akuyenera kulandira chisamaliro monga munthu wina aliyense popeza nao ndi ofunika. Anthu ogwira ntchito za chipatalawa omwe alipo 150 akuchita msonkhano wao wa nambala 42 mu mzinda wa Rome m’dziko la Italy.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Chikhristu Chimapewa Tsankho
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati chikhristu chikuyenera kuthandiza anthu kukhala omasuka kulandira ena posayang’anira komwe akuchokera. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi dzulo ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Iye wati chikhristu chikuyenera kuthandiza akhristu kupewa kumangoyang’ana zawo zokha. Papa Francisco wati ndi zotheka kulandira chikhristu ndipo pa nthawi yomweyo ndi kumalemekezanso chikhalidwe. Iye wati kukhala mkhristu sizikutanthauza kuti anthu asiye kulemekeza chikhalidwe chawo. Papa Francisco wati ndi zolakwika kuti powalalikira anthu za Uthenga wa Chipulumutso anthu a ku madera ena amakakamizidwa kusiya zonse zokhudza chikhalidwe chao kuphatikizapo zinthu zabwino zomwe, zinthu zomwe iye wati sizinathandize kuti Mpingo ukhale wolemera ndi zikhalidwe za anthu zosiyana-siyana. Iye wati kalata ya Paulo Woyera yolembera a Galatiya ikufotokoza bwino za kufunika kolemekeza chimene anthu ali, the duty of respecting “the cultural origin of every person,” leading to an openness to all peoples and cultures of all times.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Torch Trust for the Blind Lapereka Maphunziro Kwa Osawona
news: Bungwe lina lomenyera ufulu wa anthu osawona la Torch Trust for the Blind lapempha anthu omwe ali ndi ulumali osawona kuti asamaziyang’anire pansi kaamba koti nawo ali ndi kuthekera kochita ntchito zosiyanasiyana. Mkulu wa bungweli kuno ku Malawi, a Stanley Moyo ayankhula izi lachitatu pa maphunziro omwe anakonzera magulu a anthu okhala ndi ulumali wosaona okwana khumi a m’boma la Chikwawa. Iwo ati bungwe lawo linakonza maphunzirowa ndi cholinga chowapatsa mphamvu anthu omwe ali ndi ulumali osawona kuti adzikwanitsa kuchita ntchito zosiyanasiyana zotukula miyoyo yawo. Pamenepa a Moyo apempha mafumu, mabungwe ena kuphatikizapo boma kuti azitenga gawo lalikulu pothandiza anthu a ulumali otere. “Timawapempha abale athuwa kuti akamakhala asamaziyang’anire pansi chifukwa nawonso angathe kugwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana monga kulima, uphunzitsi ndi zina,” anatero a Moyo. Pothilirapo ndemanga, wapampando wa gulu la Ndakwera Fellowship Centre, a Anderson Stanford Ofesi, ati sibwino kuti anthu amaulumali osaiyanasiyana azidziyanga’anira pansi. Kuwonjezera apo, a Ofesi apempha boma, mabungwe ndi magulu osiyanasiyana kuti aziwaganizira anthuwa pa ntchito za chitukuko zomwe zingapindulire anthu amaulumaliwa. “Ife tikupempha kuti pakakhala ntchito za chitukuko monga za ntukula pakhomo, azitiganizira ife anthu osawona,” anatero a Ofesi. M’mawu awo, mayi Aida Maya ati maphunzirowa awathandiza kwambiri kupeza luso ndi upangiri pa momwe angamakhalire limodzi ndi anzawo. “Maphunziro amenewa atithandiza kwambiri chifukwa mbuyomu sitinachitepo maphunziro ngati amenewa, izi zitithandiza kuti tizitha kulumikizana bwino ndi anthu ena,” anatero mayi Maya. Bungwe la Torch Trust for the Blind linakhazikitsidwa m’chaka cha 1993 ndi cholinga chofuna kuthandiza anthu osawona ndi mabuku a anthu osawona kuti nawonso adzitha kulemba ndi kuwerenga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Francisko Wavomereza za Mirakuli ya Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wavomereza za murakuli womwe ukuyenereza Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba kukhala wodala. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco wavomereza izi lero ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican pa maso pa bungwe lomwe limaona za anthu oyera mu Mpingo. Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba ayamba kutchedwa wodala posachedwapa Kudzera mu murakuli umenewu ndiye kuti posachedwapa Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba azitchulidwa “wodala.” Malipoti akulongosola za msungwana wina wa zaka 11 yemwe anadwala mwa kayakaya koma zatsimikizika kuti kudzera mu uneneri wa Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba, msungwanayu anachira mosayembekezereka. M’mene zateromu ndiye kuti Papa Francisco alengeza za tsiku la mwambo wokhazikitsa Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba kukhala wodala. Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba yemwe dzina lake la Ubatizo ndi Albino Luciani anabadwa pa 17 October m’chaka cha 1912 m’dziko la Italy ndipo anamwalira mwadzidzidzi pa 28 September m’chaka cha 1978 atangokhala Papa kwa masiku 33. Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba amadziwika kwambiri chifukwa cha msangala wake ndi chifukwa chake anthu amamutchula kuti “the smiling Pope.”
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sing’anga Akagwira Ukayidi kwa Zaka 16 pa Mlandu Wogwilira
news: Bwalo la milandu la Liwonde Senior Resident lalamula sing’anga wina kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavulagaga kwa zaka 16 pa mlandu wogwilira. Bwalo la milandu kudzera mwa woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Inspector Cliff Kalawa wochokera ku polisi ya Ntaja, linamva kuti mu mwezi wa June chaka chino, mkuluyu Mustafa Madetsa Khumbadzi yemwe ndi sing’anga komanso amakhala moyandikana ndi makolo a msungwanayo, adayamba kumufunsira msungwanayo yemwe ndi wa zaka 13 zakubadwa ndipo mu mwezi wa July, mkuluyu anayamba kugonana ndi msungwanayo. Pa 12 September cha mma 8 koloko ya madzulo, msungwanayu anasowa pakhomo pakwao ndipo makolo atafunsa mchemwali wake ndi yemwe anawulura kuti wapiti kwa sing’anga-yo komwe anayitanidwa. Makolowo atafika ku nyumba kwa mkuluyu, mwanayo anali ali mnyumba mwa mkuluyu ndipo iye atawona makolo a msungawanayo anathawa. Msungwanayo anatengeredwa ku chipatala komwe atamupima anamupeza kuti ali ndi pathupi pa miyezi iwiri ndipo atafunsidwa anawulura kuti mimbayo ndi ya sing’angayo zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkuluyo amangidwe. Mu bwaloli, mkuluyu anawukana mlanduwo zomwe zinachititsa mbali ya boma kuti ibwere ndi mboni zinayi zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkuluyu apezeke wolakwa. Mkuluyu anapempha bwalolo kuti limupatse chilango chofewerako kaamba koti amasamalira banja lake komanso amadwaladwala kaamba ka ngozi yapansewu yomwe inamuchitikira. Koma popereka chigamulo chake, Senior Resident Magistrate Muhammad Chande anagwirizana ndi woyimira boma pa mlanduwu milandu ya mtunduwu ikuchulukira m’bomalo komanso kuti msungwanayo ndi wachichepele ndipo si woyenera kukhala ndi pathupi. Ndipo pamenepa iye analamula mkuluyu kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavulagaga kwa zaka 16. A Mustafa Madetsa amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mwawa mfumu yayikulu Mlomba m’boma la Machinga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Asisteri a Chipani cha Charity Aphunzitse Anthu Zachifundo
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha asisitere a chipani cha Sisters of Charity kuti aziphunzitsa anthu kukhala a chifundo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi pa nkumano wake ndi asisiterewa ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Asisteri a chipani cha Charity Iye wati asisiterewa akuyenera kukhala zitsanzo zabwino maka pophunzitsa anthu kuchitira chifundo anthu osauka. Iye wauza asisiterewa kuti aziphunzitsa anthu ndi moyo wao pa zakufunika komvetsera ndi kuchitira chifundo anthu osauka. Papa Francisco wauza asisiterewa kuti pano pomwe msonkhano wa Sinodi ya ma episkopi a Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse uli mkati, naonso ali ndi mbali yoti achite ngati amayi mu Mpingo wa Katolika. Iye wakambapo za Maria ndi Marita mu Baibulo kuti mwa njira ina nao anali ophunzira a Ambuye Yesu ndipo kuti nao anali ndi gawo pothandiza kufalitsa Uthenga wa Chipulumutso. Papa Francisco wati ngati anthu obatizidwa, asisiterewa akuyenera kugwira ntchito pothandiza kufalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso kuti ufikire anthu komanso ma gawo a moyo osiyanasiyana kudzera mu kumvetsera komanso kukhudzidwa ndi zochitika m’moyo wa anthu. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kutsindika za kufunika komvetsera ndi kuchitapo kanthu pothandiza anthu osauka. Sisters of Charity ali ku Rome kuchita msonkhano wao wa nambala 21.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Holy Nation Lipempha Akhristu Asamalire Atumiki Achikulire
news: Bungwe la zachifundo la Holy Nation lapempha akhristu kuti adzitekeseka posamalira ansembe omwe ndi achikulire. Mkulu wa bungweli m’chigawo cha kum’mwera kwa dziko lino, a Evans Tobias Phiri anena izi lolemba pamene anayendera m’modzi mwa ansembe achikulire mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre, bambo Benito Masuwa. Ena mwa mamembala a bungwe la Holy Nation kucheza ndi bambo Masuwa Iwo ati akhristu ali ndi udindo owonetsetsa kuti atumiki a Mulungu omwe ndi achikulire komanso odwala, akulandira chisamaliro choyenera. “Ndi udindo wa ife tonse kumasamala ansembe komanso atumiki ena omwe ndi achikulire komanso odwala chifukwa anthu amenewa amasowa chisamaliro chathu,” anatero a Phiri. Poyankhulapo atalandira thandizoli, bambo Benito Masuwa ayamikira mabungwe a mu mpingo omwe akudzipereka pa ntchito yothandiza ansembe achikulire ndi odwala ndipo apempha magulu ena onse mu mpingowu kuti atenge chitsanzo pa zomwe gulu la Holy Nation lachita. Wina mwa katundu yemwe bungweli lapereka pa ulendowu ndi monga Sugar okwana makilogram 25, mafuta ophikira, mazira, nkhuku, zakumwa zosiyana siyana, soup ndi zina zambiri. Bungwe la Holy Nation linakhazikitsidwa m’chaka cha 2018 ndi cholinga chochita ndi kulimbikitsa ntchito zachifundo monga kusamalira atumiki a Mulungu monga ansembe ndi asisitere.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Imfa Ya Cardinal Dos Santos Wa M’dziko La Mozambique
news: Potsatira imfa ya Cardinal Alexandre dos Santos wa m’dziko la Mozambique, Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wopepesa kwa onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi imfayi makamaka akhristu a ku archdiocese ya Maputo. Papa pa mkumano wake wotsiriza ndi Cardinal Dos Santos Iye wati Cardinal dos Santos anali munthu wosatopa potumikira Mulungu ndipo pa chifukwa ichi Papa Francisco wati akupemphera kuti Mulungu alandire mzimu wa Cardinal’yu mu ufumu wake. Papa Francisco wamaliza uthengawu popereka madalitso ake a upositoli kwa onse omwe akulira kaamba ka imfayi. Cardinal dos Santos yemwe anabadwa pa 18 March m’chaka cha 1924 ku Zavala mu Diocese ya Inhambane anamwalira pa 29 September. Iye anali mbadwa yoyamba ya dziko la Mozambique kukhala wansembe, episkopi komanso Cardinal. Mzimu wa Cardinal Alexandre dos Santos uwuse mu mtendere wosatha
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘President Chakwera ndi Wokhudzidwa ndi Mavuto a Mdziko Muno’
news: Mneneri wa kunyumba ya boma a Anthony Kasunda ati mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera ndi wokhudzidwa ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana omwe anthu mdziko muno akukumana nawo. Kasunda: Si ntchito ya tsiku limodzi A Kasunda alankhula izi lero pa msonkhano wa atolankhani ku nyumba ya boma mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iwo ati mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu sakugona tulo poyetsetsa kuthana ndi mavutowa. “President Chakwera ndi munthu wokhudzidwa kwambiri mavuto omwe anthu akukumana nao ndipo akuyetsetsa kuti anthu avuuke m’mavutowa ngakhale kuti iyi si ntchito ya tsiku limodzi,” anatero a Kasunda. A Kasunda ati pali zinthu zambiri zomwe zakhala zikulakwika mdziko muno m’mbuyomu zomwe zathandizira kuti mavutowa akule padakalipano potchulapo nkhani ya kusabwenza ngongole za boma mwazina.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mpingo Udziyendera Limodzi
news: Papa Francisco dzulo watsekulira msonkhano wa Sinodi ya maepiskopi a Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse ndi Misa yomwe anatsogolera mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica ku Vatican. M’mawu ake, iye wati pali mawu atatu ofunika kuwaganizira maka pano pomwe msonkhano wa Sinodi wayambika omwe ndi kukumana, kumvetsera ndi kusinkhasinkha. Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera poyamba kukhala anthu okonzeka kukumana ndi kumakambirana ndi anzao kuti potero athe kuphunzira zambiri. Kachiwiri akhristu akuyenera kukhala okonzeka kumvetsera osati ndi makutu okha komanso kumvetsera ndi mtima ndipo pomaliza akhristu akuyenera kumasinkhasinkha kuti choncho athe kuchita zokhazo zomwe ndi zosangalatsa Mulungu. Pamenepa iye wati pochita msonkhano wa Sinodi Mpingo ukufuna kusinkhasinkha kudzera mukupemphera ndi kuwerenga Mau a Mulungu opezeka mu Baibulo kuti Mpingo uthe kudziwa zomwe Mulungu akufuna ndi njira yomwe Mpingo ukuyenera kutsata pa nkhani zosiyana-siyana za Mpingo. Msonkhano wa Sinodi ya ma episkopi a Mpingowu womwe ukhale ukuchitika kwa zaka ziwiri zikubwerazi wagawidwa mzigawo zitatu. Pa Misa yotsekulira msonkhano wa Sinodiyi panali akhristu eniake kuchokera ku maiko osiyana-siyana, a semino, a bulazala, a sisitere, ansembe, ma episkopi komanso ma Cardinal.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wadzipha Podziponya Kunsi kwa Galimoto M’boma La Ntcheu
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 25 zakubadwa yemwe dzina lake ndi Samson Wailesi, wadzipha pomwa mankhwala kenaka ndi kudziponyera ku galimoto yomwe imayenda mu nsewu waukulu wa M1 kwa Kampepuza m’boma la Ntcheu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Rebecca Kwisongole, izi zachitika loweruka pa 9 October 2021 m’mudzi mwa Kampepuza mfumu yaikulu Champiti m’bomalo pomwe bamboyu anatsatira mkazi wake ku derali, mkaziyu atathawa ku Liwonde komwe awiriwa amakhala potsatira mkangano m’banja lawo. Izi zachitika pomwe bamboyu amapempha mkazi wakeyu kuti apite limodzi koma mkazi wakeyo anakanitsitsa zomwe zinachititsa kuti malemuyu amenye mkaziyu molapitsa ndi kumuvula. Pamenepa malemuyu anaganiza zomwa mankhwala ophera tizirombo kenaka ndi kudziponya ku galimoto yomwe imangodziyendera. Atamutengera ku chipatala cha boma la Ntcheu, a chipatala anatsimikiza kuti wamwalira kaamba ka mankhwalawo. Pakadali pano mkazi wa bamboyu akulandira thandizo la mankhwala pa chipatala chomwechi cha Ntcheu. Malemu Samson Wailesi anali wa m’mudzi mwa Kaiya mfumu yaikulu Ganya m’boma la Ntcheu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: LAMULUNGU LA 27 PA CHAKA
news:
Tsono zimene Mulungu wazilumikiza pamodzi, munthu asazilekanitse
Chaka B
Psalter Week III
Liturgical Vestment: G
3 October 2021
NYIMBO YOLOWERA Cf. Estere 4: 17
Inu Mulungu, ndinu amene muwongolera zinthu zonse
ndipo palibe chilichonse chimene chingalimbane nanu.
Ndinu amene mudalenga thambo la m’mwamba
ndi dziko lapansi ndi zodabwitsa zonse zokhalamo,
ndinu mwini wa zolengedwa zonse.
PEMPHERO LOYAMBIRIRA
Inu Mulungu wamphamvuzonse ndi wamuyaya,
amene mwachifundo chanu chodzaza,
mumapambana zokhumba ndi zokonda
za amene amayang’ana kwa Inu,
mutionetse chifundo chanu pokhululuka
zimene nthumanzi imadana nazo
ndi kutipatsa zimene timaopa kuzipempha.
Mwa Yesu Khristu,
Ambuye ndi Mulungu wathu,
amene ali ndi moyo ndi ufumu
limodzi nanu ndi Mzimu Woyera,

MAU OYAMBA Genesesi 2:18-24
Mau a m’Buku la Genesesi
Adzakhala thupi limodzi
Pambuyo pake Chauta adati, “Sibwino kuti munthuyu akhale yekha. Ndipanga mnzake woti azimthandiza.” Chauta adatenga dothi naumba nyama zonse ndi mbalame zonse, nabwera nazo kwa Adamu* kuti azitche maina. Mwakuti maina amene Adamu adazitcha, maina ake ndi omwewo. Adamu adazitcha maina nyama zonse, mbalame ndi zamoyo zonse zakuthengo. Komabe panalibe mnzake woti azimthandiza. Tsono Chauta adagonetsa Adamu tulo tofanato, ndipo ali m’tulo choncho, Mulungu adamchotsako nthiti, natsekapo ndi mnofu pamalopo. Chauta Mulungu adapanga mkazi ndi nthiti imene adaichotsa kwa Adamu uja, ndipo mkaziyo Mulungu adabwera naye kwa iye.
Adamu adati,
“Uyutu ndiye ndi fupa lochokera ku mafupa anga,
mnofu wochokera ku mnofu wanga.
Adzatchedwa Mkazi,
chifukwa watengedwa kwa Mwamuna.”
Nchifukwa chake mwamuna amasiya atate ndi amai, ndipo amaphatikana ndi mkazi wake, choncho awiriwo amakhala thupi limodzi. Mwamunayo ndi mkazi wake uja, onse anali maliseche, komabe sankachita manyazi.
Mau a Ambuye. Tithokoze Mulungu.

MAU ACHIWIRI Ahebri 2:9-11
Mau a m’Kalata kwa Ahebri
Amene amayeretsa anthuyo, ndiponso anthu amene amayeretsedwawo, onse Tate wao ndi m’modzi.
Komatu tikuwona kuti Yesu, amene pa kanthawi pang’ono adaasanduka wochepera kwa angelo, adalandira mphotho ya ulemerero ndi ulemu chifukwa adamva zowawa za imfa. Zidatero chifukwa mwa kukoma mtima kwake Mulungu adaafuna kuti afere anthu onse.
Paja Mulungu amene ndi Mlengi wa zonse ndipo zonse zimalinga kwa Iye, adafuna kufikitsa ana ake ambiri ku ulemerero. Tsono kudaamuyenera kuti mwa njira ya zowawa, amsandutse Yesu mtsogoleri wangwiro wowatsogolera ku chipulumutso.
Amene amayeretsa anthuyo, ndiponso anthu amene amayeretsedwawo, onse Tate wao ndi mmodzi. Nchifukwa chake Yesu sachita manyazi kuwatchula abale ake.
Mau a Ambuye. Tithokoze Mulungu

Aleluya. Timakondana, Mulungu amakhala mwa ife, ndipo chikondi chake chafika pake penipeni mwa ife. Aleluya.
MTHENGA WOYERA Marko 10:2-16
Mau a Mthenga Woyera monga adalembera Marko
Tsono zimene Mulungu wazilumikiza pamodzi, munthu asazilekanitse.
Tsono kudafika Afarisi ena, namufunsa kuti, “Kodi nkololedwa kuti munthu asudzule mkazi wake?” Pomufunsa chonchi ankangofuna pomupezera chifukwa. Koma Yesu poyankha adati, “Kodi Mose adakulamulani zotani?” Iwo adati, “Mose adalola kuti munthu azilembera mkazi wake kalata yachisudzulo kenaka nkumuchotsa.” Yesu adati, “Mose adaakulemberani lamulo limeneli chifukwa cha kukanika kwanuku. Komatu pachiyambi paja, pamene Mulungu adalenga zonse, adawalenga anthu, wina wamwamuna wina wamkazi. Nchifukwa chake mwamuna azisiya atate ndi amai, nakaphatikizana ndi mkazi wake, ndipo awiriwo adzasanduka thupi limodzi. Choncho tsopano salinso awiri, koma thupi limodzi. Tsono zimene Mulungu wazilumikiza pamodzi, munthu asazilekanitse.”
Pamene adalowanso m’nyumba, ophunzira adamufunsanso Yesu za nkhani yomweyi. Iye adawauza kuti, “Aliyense amene asudzula mkazi wake nakwatira wina, akuchita chigololo, ndipo akumchimwira mkazi wakeyo. Chimodzimodzinso ngati mkazi asudzula mwamuna wake, kenaka nkukwatiwa ndi wina, nayenso akuchita chigololo.”
Anthu ena ankabwera ndi ana kwa Yesu kuti awakhudze ndi kuwadalitsa, ophunzira ake nkumawazazira. Yesu ataona zimenezi, adakalipa nawauza kuti, “Alekeni anawa azibwera kwa Ine, musawaletse. Paja Ufumu wa Mulungu ndi wa anthu otere. Ndithu ndikunenetsa kuti yemwe salandira Ufumu wa Mulungu ngati mwana, ameneyo sadzalowamo.” Atatero adayamba kuwafungata anawo, nawasanjika manja ndi kuwadalitsa.
Mthenga wa Ambuye. Ulemu kwa Inu Ambuye Yesu Khristu.
ULALIKI
Okondedwa abale ndi alongo mwa Ambuye.
Lero ndi Lamulungu la nambala 27 pa chaka chachipembedzo. Lero titha kulitchula kuti, ndi Lamulungu la Mabanja chifukwa mau a Mulungu oyamba ndi a mu Mthenga Wabwino akukamba za chiyambi ndi ulemerero wa banja. Chifukwa cha ichi ife tasankha mutu wa mapemphero athu a lero kuchokera m’mau a mu Mthenga Wabwino pamene Ambuye Yesu akunena kuti: “Tsono zimene Mulungu wazilumikiza pamodzi, munthu asazilekanitse” (Marko 10:9).
Mu Mthenga Wabwino tikuona kuti Yesu akuchokera ku Kafarano ndipo ali paulendo wopita ku Yudeya kudzera ku Yordani. Lero Yesu akuyankha mafunso kuchokera kwa Afarisi okhudza za ukwati. Sabata la mawa Yesu adzakamba za chuma. Afarisi akumufunsa Yesu kuti, “Kodi nkololedwa kuti munthu asudzule mkazi wake? Pomufunsa chonchi ankangofuna pomupezera chifukwa” (Marko 10:2).
Funso limeneli litha kukhala lotidabwitsa ife lero. Koma malingana ndi malamulo a Ayuda, kusudzula mkazi wako chinali chinthu chovomerezeka ndithu. Timawerenga m’buku la Deuteronomo kuti, “Tiyese kuti munthu wakwatira mkazi, pambuyo pake nkunena kuti mkaziyo sakumfuna, chifukwa choti wampeza cholakwa. Alembe kalata yachisudzulo, ndi kumpatsa mkaziyo pamanja, namchotsa pakhomo pake. Mkaziyo akakwatiwa ndi mwamuna wina, ndipo pambuyo pake winayonso nkunena kuti sakumfuna, angathe kumlemberanso kalata yachisudzulo nkumpatsa” (Deuteronomo 24:1-3).
Kalata yosudzula mkazi idapezeka ku Galilea “Dead Sea Scrolls” ndipo idalembedwa chonchi:
“Ine Wiliyamu mwana wa a Kamphuno.
Ndikulembera kalatayi iwe Jojina mwana wa a Gama.
Uli ndi ufulu wokwatiwa ndi M’yuda wina aliyense amene wakukonda.”
Ichi chinali chitsimikizo chakuti kwa Ayuda sunali mulandu kuthetsa banja. Choncho, lero tikuona Afarisi akumutapa dala mkamwa Yesu chifukwa malamulo amawadziwa akuti panalibe vuto kuthetsa banja ndipo ankafuna kumuona Yesu kuti ayankha chiyani ndipo ankafunanso kuti amuchititse manyazi pa gulu. Apa zikuonekeratu kuti adakonzekeratu kuti akangoyankha zosiyana ndi malamulo awo ochokera mu buku la Torah, amupezere chifukwa ndipo amuzenge mlandu umene chilango chake ndikumupha basi.
Kwa Ayuda, mkazi adalibe mphamvu m’banja pamaso pa mwamuna wake. Ndipo mphamvu zosudzulana zimakhala ndi mwamuna yekha. Mwamuna adali ndi mphamvu zothetsa banja ngakhale apeze kachifukwa kakang’ono kwambiri. Mkazi adalibe mphamvu yosudzula mwamuna wake ngakhale alakwe chachikulu cha mtundu wanji. Choncho, mkazi m’banja adali ngati kapolo wopanda ufulu. Motero mbiri ikutiuza kuti azibambo a chiyuda nthawi zina anali kuchita pemphero ili pofuna kuthokoza Mulungu: “Ndikukuthokozani Mulungu kuti simunandilenge kukhala munthu wamkazi.”
Chifukwa chachikulu ndipo chomveka bwino kwa Ayudawa sichinali kugwidwa chigololo kokha ayi, koma padalinso zifukwa zina monga izi:
1. Ngati mkazi waphwanya mbale yodyera nsima.
2. Ngati mkazi walankhula ndi mlendo wamwamuna.
3. Ngati mkazi walankhula ndi makolo kapena mbale wa mwamuna wake mopanda ulemu ndipo mwamuna wakeyo wamva.
4. Ngati mkazi ali wokonda kulankhulalankhula.
M’mau oyamba tikuona kuti Mlembi wa buku la Genesesi akutiuza za mmene Mulungu adalengera banja loyamba. Iye adalenga mwamuna ndi mkazi ngati thupi limodzi. “Nchifukwa chake mwamuna amasiya atate ndi amai, ndipo amaphatikana ndi mkazi wake, choncho awiriwo amakhala thupi limodzi” (Genesis 2:24). Komanso m’mau a mu Mthenga Wabwino tamvanso mau omwewa pamene Ambuye Yesu akunena kuti, “Komatu pachiyambi paja, pamene Mulungu adalenga zonse, adawalenga anthu, wina wamwamuna wina wamkazi. Nchifukwa chake mwamuna azisiya atate ndi amai, nakaphatikizana ndi mkazi wake, ndipo awiriwo adzasanduka thupi limodzi. Choncho tsopano salinso awiri, koma thupi limodzi. Tsono zimene Mulungu wazilumikiza pamodzi, munthu asazilekanitse” (Marko 10:7-9).Kuchokera pa mau amenewa tikupezapo mau atatu amene tikhoza kuwayerekeza ndi mafuwa atatu amene amayenera kumanga banja lililonse:
1. KUSIYA
2. KUPHATHANA
3. THUPI LIMODZI
Azimayi atha kumvetsa bwino nkhani ya mafuwa atatu. Ngati fuwa limodzi lisweka kapena lisowa, mphika wa chakudya sungathe kukhazikika pa mafuwa awiri kapena limodzi. Motero kuti banja lilimbe, pafunika kuti mwamuna kapena mkazi asiyiretu makolo, abale ndi anzake onse ndikuphathana ndi mkazi kapena mwamuna wake yekha basi. Onse awiri ayenera kusiya zibwenzi zawo zakale ndipo chikondi choyamba ndi chopambana chiyenera kupita kwa mwamuna kapena mkazi wawo. Pamene m’banja alamulira apongozi kapena abale kapena anthu ena posati mkazi ndi mwamuna okha, zinthu zimasokonekera chifukwa fuwa limodzi la KUSIYA lasweka.
Mwamuna ndi mkazi ayenera kumagawana maganizo awo pokambirana, pocheza limodzi, popitira ku zisangalalo ndi misonkhano yosiyansiyana limodzi. Payenera kukhala umodzi wozama zedi pakati pa iwo wosabisilana kanthu. Maganizo ndi mitima yawo ziyenera kukhala zolumikizana kwathunthu. Tingayerekeze kuphatana kwa mwamuna ndi mkazi ndi monga momwe zimachitikira pamene timata stampa pa pakalata. Tikaganiza zomatula stampa ija, china chake chimang’ambika, stampa kapena kalata. Pamene palibe umodzi m’banja, moyo wa m’banja umang’ambika. Poteropo fuwa limodzi la KUPHATHANA limasweka ndipo banja limavuta ngakhale kuti anthuwo akukhala limodzi m’banja. Zimakhala ngati sipolo za njanje zomwe zimakhala moyandikana tiyerekeze kuchokera ku Mchinji mpaka ku Nsanje, koma osaphathana ayi. Anthu oterewo ndi amene timati ndi okwatiwa, kapena okwatira koma sali pa banja.
Mwamuna ndi mkazi ayenera kukhala okhulupirika wina kwa mnzake polemekeza banja lawo chifukwa ndi loyera. Mulungu adalenga banja m’munda mwa Edeni muja ndipo Ambuye Yesu adalisandutsa banja kukhala Sakramenti. Mwamuna ndi mkazi onse awiri adzapulumuka podziyeretsa kudzera m’banja mwawo. Choncho pamene mwamuna kapena mkazi azembera mnzake wa banja ndikukagona ndi mwamuna kapena mkazi wina ndiye kuti akuphwanya fuwa lachitatu la kukhala THUPI LIMODZI. Chifukwa chakuti kudzera mu sakramenti la ukwati, mwamuna ndi mkazi amasanduka thupi limodzi, choncho sangathe kukagona ndi mkazi kapena mwamuna wina. Mwamuna kapena mkazi ayenera kudziwa kuti matupi awo si awonso ayi: Thupi la mkazi mwiniwake ndi mwamuna wake ndipo thupi la mwamuna mwini wake ndi mkazi wake. Choncho kugona ndi akazi kapena amuna ena kuli ngati kuba thupi la mwini wake mkazi kapena mwamuna ndi kukaligulitsa ku thupi lina. Choncho zimene Mulungu wazilumikizanitsa, munthu asazilekanitse ayi. Mchifukwa chake ku Mpingo wa Katolika banja ndi chipangano chosatha mpaka imfa kuwalekanitsa awiriwo. Ndipo anthu awiri aja akamadalitsitsa banja lawo samanena kuti, “ine ndikukutenga ndipo ndidzakukonda kuyambira tsiku lakuti mpakana tsiku lakuti” ayi.
Potsatira maphunzitso okhudza moyo wabanja amene tapereka mwachidule pamwambapa, zikuonekeratu kuti zibwenzi ndi mitala si zinthu zololedwa m’banja la chikhristu chifukwa zonsezo zimasweratu mafuwa atatu onse aja. Nchifukwa chake mpofunika kwambiri kuti mwamuna ndi mkazi azipemphera kwambiri kuti zinthu zambiri zimene zikumaononga mabanja ambiri masiku ano azizipewa. Paja pali mau akuti, “banja lopemphera pamodzi, limakhala pamodzi.” Tisaiwale kuti banja ndiye maziko a mpingo komanso a dziko. Augustine woyera adanena mau a mphamvu akuti, “banja ndi kampingo ka malo.”
Nchifukwa chake mabanja ayenera kupereka zitsanzo zabwino kwa ana awo. Akulu adati, “Chonona chimafumira ku dzira.” “Make mbuuu ana mbuuu.” Ngati mayi ndi bambo akhala ogwirizana m’banja, ana nawonso amakhala olereredwa bwino ndipo amakhala ana amakhalidwe abwino. Masiku ano mabanja analowa “China”. Bambo amayendera yawo nawonso mayi amayendera yawo. Bambo adaleka kupemphera kalekale. Mayi nawonso adaleka kupita ku tchalitchi. Onse amayendera payerepayere. Palibe kulemekezana monga thupi limodzi.
Ngwazo wathu lero ukupita makamaka kwa amene ali pa banja. Tiyeni tiwerengenso mau oyamba aja makamaka pa Genesis 2:24 ndipo tisinkhesinkhe za mafuwa atatu aja. Kodi mafuwa onse alipobe m’banjamo kapena onse adasweka kalekale? Nanga tikuchitapo chiyani kuti moyo wathu wa m’mbanja ukhale chithunzithunzi cha banja loyamba lija la Adamu ndi Eva m’munda uja wa Edeni? Tisaiwale kuti sitiyenera kuzilekanitsa zomwe Mulungu adazimanga pamodzi AMEN.
Ine ndimvera Mulungu mmodzi yekha…
Mapemphero a Akhristu
Abale, Yesu sachita manyazi kutitcha abale ake. Tiyeni tsono, pamodzi naye, tipemphe Atate athu akumwamba kuti atsire madalitso awo pa anthu onse:
1. Tipempherere Eklezia, Mpingo wa Mulungu, kuti apitirize nthcito yake yochirikiza ndi yokometsa mabanja onse.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
2. Tipempherere akulu onse olamulira maiko, kuti ateteze mabanja a anthu, ndipo awathandize kutukula miyoyo yao.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
3. Tipempherere mabanja onse, kuti eni ake adziwe kukhulupirirana ndi kupirirana pa moyo wao onse, monga Mulungu afunaira.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
4. Tidzipempherere ife tomwe tili muno kuti tithandizane podzetsa mtendere ndi kuyanjana pakati pa anthu onse.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
Atate, tikukupemphani zonsezi ndi mtima wokhulupirira Inu, pakuti mudatipatsa Mwana wanu kuti atitsogolere ku ulemerero wosatha. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu. Amen.
PEMPHERO LOPEREKERA
Inu Mulungu wachifundo,
Inu Ambuye,
tikukupemphani,
kuti mulandire zopereka izi,
zomwe mudakhazikitsa ndi ulamuliro wanu;
ndipo kudzera m’misteri zoyera,
zimene tikuzikondwerera
ngati ntchito yathu yopambana,
mwachifundo chanu,
mukwaniritse ntchito yanu yoyera
imene mudaiyamba kuti mutipulumutse.
Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.
NYIMBO YOLANDIRIRA Maliro 3: 25
Chauta ndi wabwino kwa amene amamudalira,
kwa onse amene amafuna kuchita zimene Iye afuna.
Kapena: Cf. 1 Akorinto 10: 17
Ngakhale tiri ambiri, ndife thupi limodzi
chifukwa timagawana,
Buledi m’modzi ndi Chikho chimodzi.
PEMPHERO LOTHOKOZERA
tikukupemphani kuti mutidyetse
ndi kutipatsa mphamvu
kudzera m’Sakramenti limene talandira,

tifanane ndi Yesu Khristu amene tamulandira.
Mwa Yesu Khristu yemweyo, Ambuye athu.
PEMPHERO LOTSIRIZA (Pa msonkhano wamapemphero)
Atate, mwa chiwongolero chanu mudapanga mwamuna ndi mkazi mofanana nanu, ndipo m’mitima mwao chikondi choti akhale amodzi pa moyo wa banja. Muthandize anthu onse kuzindikira ulemerero wa ukwati, kuti akhale okhulupirika ndi okondana m’mbanja mwao monga Inu Atate muli wokhulupirika ndi wa chikondi chosasinthika. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.

title: Papa Wadzudzula Mchitidwe Wochotsa Pakati
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wati mchitidwe wochotsa pakati ndi woyipa kaamba koti umanyazitsa ulemelero wa munthu. Papap wanena izi polankhula ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican pa mkumano wake ndi mamembala a bungwe la a Papa lomwe limalimbikitsa za kufunika kosamala moyo wa munthu aliyense lodziwika kuti Pontifical Academy for Life. Pa mkumanowu, iye wadzudzulanso m’chitidwe wochotsa moyo wa anthu omwe adwalika kwambiri wodziwika kuti euthanasia kapena kuti mercy killing. Papa Francisco wati m’chitidwe wosalabadira ulemelero wa munthu ndi omwe ukuchititsanso kuti anthu achikulire ndi okalamba asamalabadiridwe. Iye wati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti masiku ano anthu achikulire ndi okalamba sakulemekezedwa ndipo kuti ambiri akumangowonedwa ngati chipsinjo. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wati sukulu za ukachenjede komanso zipatala za Mpingo wa Katolika zikuyenera kupitiriza kuphunzitsa anthu za ulemerero wa munthu aliyense komanso kulimbikitsa anthu za kufunika koteteza moyo nthawi zonse. Sabata imeneyi bungwe la a Papa lomwe limalimbikitsa za kufunika kosamala moyo wa munthu aliyense, Pontifical Academy for Life likuchita msonkhano wake ku Rome.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Malawi Ikuchita Bwino Polimbana Ndi Mchitidwe Wozembetsa Anthu’
news: Unduna owona za chitetezo cha mdziko wati dziko la Malawi likuchita bwino pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mchitidwe wozembetsa anthu. Wachiwiri kwa mlembi mu undunawu mayi Patricia Liabuba ndi omwe anena izi lachiwiri m’boma la Mangochi potsekulira maphunziro a masiku awiri okhudza kalembedwe ka nkhani zozembetsa anthu, kwa atolankhani a nyumba zofalitsa nkhani zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno. Atolankhani omwe anali nawo pa mkumanowo Iwo ati dziko lino lili pa mndandanda wachiwiri, pambuyo pa mayiko omwe akuchita bwino kwambiri pa ntchitoyi ndipo padakalipano boma lili mkati mokonza mavuto omwe alipo omwe akulepheretsa kuti dziko lino kuti lifike pachimake polimbana ndi mchitidwewu. “Dziko la America limachita kafukufuku chaka nci chaka ndipo pano ifeyo tili pa tear 2 zomwe zikutanthauza kuti tikuyesetsa. Anatidzudzula nkhani yosasamalira anthu omwe azembetsedwa pambuyo powapulumutsa. Padakalipano tamanga malo osungirako anthuwa ku Blantyre ndi Lilongwe ndipo timanga ena ku Mzuzu,” anatero mayi Liabuba. Iwo anatinso boma lili mkati mokonza dongosolo lakuti anthu amene apulumutsidwa ku mchitidwe wozembetsa anthu adzithandizidwa ndi ndalama zoyambira bizinesi ndi cholinga choti azithandizika pa moyo wawo wa tsiku ndi tsiku kuti zimenezi zisadzawachitikirenso. Polankhulapo mkulu wa bungwe lomwe lakonza maphunziro a atolankhaniwa la Global Hope Mobilization (GLOHOMO) a Caleb Thole ati kudzera mu project yotchedwa Tigwirane Manja, bungwe lawo ligwira ntchito ndi boma pofuna kuwonetsetsa kuti mchitidwe wozembetsa anthu watheratu mdziko muno. “Project imeneyi ndi ya zaka ziwiri ndipo tikhala tikulimbana ndi mchitidwe umenewu. Tikhala tikuthandizira pa milandu ya mtunduwu kupeza maloya komanso tikhala tikukumana ndi oweruza milandu kuti adziwonetsetsa zilango zomwe adzipereka kwa anthu omwe apezeka kuti akhudzidwa ndi mchitidwewu,” anatero a Thole.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Akufufuza Kuwomberedwa za Kwa Ophunzira ku Madisi
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa akufufuza chomwe chachititsa kuti mlonda wina wa bungwe la Agricultural and Marketing Corporation (ADMARC) awombere mnyamata wa zaka 15 yemwe ndi wophunzira pa sukulu ya sekondale ya Madisi m’bomalo. Malinga ndi wachiwiri wa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’chigawo chapakati chakummawa, Inspector Henry Mnjere wati izi zachitika usiku wa pa 26 mwezi uno pomwe mlondayu anawombera mnyamtayu Yamikani Alawe pa mwendo wake wakumanzere ndi kumuvulaza kwambiri. Izi zinachitika potsatira chipwirikiti chomwe chinabwera chifukwa cha mnyamatayu yemwe mwezi wa January chaka chino anachotsedwa sukulu ndipo pa tsikuli anapita kukasokoneza pa sukulupo. Akuluakulu anamugwira mnyamatayu ndipo anawapulumuka akupita naye ku polisi ndipo akuthawa ndi pomwe anawomberedwa ndi mlondayu. Apolisi ati akuchita kafukufuku pa nkhaniyi. Pakadali pano mnyamatayu akulandira thandizo la mankhwala pa chipatala cha Madisi m’boma lomwelo la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mfumu Tengani Yaku Nsanje Ikufuna Madera a Aphungu Awonjezeredwe
news: Mfumu yayikulu Tengani ya m’boma la Nsanje yati ikufuna m’bomalo mukhale madera ambiri a aphungu a kunyumba ya malamulo, kuti zitukuko zifalikire ponseponse. Mfumuyi yalankhula izi kumathero kwa sabata yathayi, kutsatira mkumano wa akuluakulu a bomalo ndi bungwe loyendetsa zisankho m’dziko muno la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC). Iyo yati zitukuko zingafalikire madera ambiri pokhapokha patakhala aphungu a kunyumba ya malamulo ochulukanso m’boma la Nsanje. Mfumuyi inawonjezera kuti ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti mafumu atatu akuyang’anira zitukuko kuchokera ku dera la phungu m’modzi yekha, kulekana ndi ena amene ndalama za m’thumba la chitukuko cha m’dera, pa chingerezi, Constituency Development Fund (CDF), zimapita ku dera la mfumu yaikulu imodzi yokha. “Ifeyo kuno ku Nsanje tikufuna aphungu ambiri, chifukwa tikachulukidwa ndi aphunguwa ndiye kuti ndalama za CDF zibweranso zambiri ndipo zitukukonso zikhala zambiri,” inatero mfumu Tengani. Ndipo pogwirizana ndi Gogochaloyu, phungu wa kunyumba ya malamulo wa dera la Nsanje Lalanje, Ramuzani Juma Muhammad wati ali ndi mafumu atatu, kotero ndalama za thumba la chitukuko zimakhala zosakwanira ku madera onse a mafumu atatuwa. Pamenepa, phunguyu wati ndi zosatheka kufikira madera onse a zitukuko, Area Development Committee (ADC) mofanana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Ngozi Ya Phala La Moto Mdziko La Spain
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya phala la moto la pansi pa chilumba china cha mdziko la Spain. Papap wanena izi polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri ndi ngoziyi yomwe yachititsa kuti anthu ambiri asowe malo okhala atathawa m’nyumba zao. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wapempha mapemphero kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria, Our Lady of the Snows, opempherera anthu onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi. Ngoziyi yaononga katundu wosiyanasiyana komanso yasokoneza nkhani ya mayendedwe pa chilumbachi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Wati Boma Lake Litukula Ntchito Za Mtengatenga
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino, Dr. Lazarus Chakwera lachisanu anali m’boma la Nsanje komwe anakagwira ntchito zachitukuko. Ali m’bomalo, a Chakwera anayendera ntchito ya msewu wa pakati pa boma la Nsanje ndi Maraka, njanji yolumikiza chigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire ndi boma la Thyolo kudzanso mlatho wa Mtayamoyo. Poyankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana kwa Tengani m’bomalo, a Chakwera anati misewu ndi njanji ndi zofunika kwambiri pa ntchito za mtengatenga ndi malonda. A Chakwera atsimikizira anthu okhala m’boma la Nsanje kuti msewu wa Nsanje – Maraka ndi wofunikira pa chitukuko cha dziko lino. Iwo ati ndi onyadira kuti ntchito yomanga msewuwu ikuyenda bwino mwakuti pomafika kumapeto kwa chaka chino, ukhala utatha. Mtsogoleriyu anawuluranso kuti kuchedwa kwa ntchitoyi ndi chifukwa choti boma lake linali lisanamalize kulipira ndalama zokwana 3.9 biliyoni kwacha ku kampani yomwe imamanga msewuwu, ya China Railway 20 bureau (CR20). Pamenepa, iwo ati msewu umenwu ukadzatha, udzalumukizitsa Lilongwe ndi Maputo, mwakuti dziko la Zambia lidzagwiritsanso ntchito nsewu omwewu ndi kutukula ntchito za mtengatenga ndi malonda m’dziko muno. “Ntchitoyi ikadzatha, dzikoli lilumikizana bwino, mayendedwe akhala abwino, malonda akhala wabwino, katundu akhala wotchipirako akamabwera ku Malawi kuno,” anatero a Chakwera. Pamenepa Dr. Chakwera anachita machawi ponena kuti njira ya Sena Corridor ndi yayifupi pofanizira ndi ya Nacala Corridor. Pa njanji, mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu watsimikizira anthu aku Nsanje kuti ndi khumbokhumbo la boma lake kuwona njanji ikugwiranso ntchito.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mpingo Ukhale Wokonzeka Kulandira Munthu Aliyense
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Mpingo ukuyenera kukhala wokonzeka kulandira munthu aliyense ndi manja awiri. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi dzulo ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Papa wanena izi polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican komanso ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Iye wati tsankho ndi kugawikana sizikuyenera kupeza malo pakati pa akhristu popeza zimenezi ndi ntchito za satana. Papa Francisco wati Mpingo ukuyenera kuchita chotheka kuti tsankho komanso kugawikana zisazike mizu pakati pa anthu. Iye wati monga Ambuye Yesu akulankhulira mu Uthenga Wabwino wa pa tsiku laMulungu la 26 mu nyengo ya pa chaka, si bwino kuchita kaduka ndi awo omwe akuthandiza kukhazikitsa ufumu wa Mulungu. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kudzudzula khalidwe lomaweruza anthu ena powaganizira kuti iwo ndiye ochimwitsitsa ndi osayenera kugwira ntchito yokhazikitsa ufumu wa Mulungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: LAMULUNGU LA 26 PA CHAKA
news:
Tileke makhalidwe akaduka ndi akudzikonda
Chaka B
Psalter Week II
Liturgical Vestment: G
26 September 2021
NYIMBO YOLOWERA Daniele 3: 31, 29, 30, 43, 42
Pa zonse zimene mudachita,
kuweruza kwanu kunali kolungama.
Pazochita zathu zonse tidachimwa kwambiri,
sitidamvere malamulo anu.
Mutisamale moleza mtima,
moonetsa chifundo chanu chachikulu.
PEMPHERO LOYAMBIRIRA
Inu Mulungu,
amene mumaonetsa mphamvu zanu zodabwitsa,
makamaka pakukhululuka ndi pakumva chisoni,
tikukupemphani
kuti mutsitse chaulere chanu chochuluka pa ife,
ndipo muwathandize amene akuchita changu
kukwaniritsa zomwe mudalonjeza,
kuti akhale am’mlowammalo
a chuma chanu chakumwamba.
Mwa Yesu Khristu,
Ambuye ndi Mulungu wathu,
amene ali ndi moyo ndi ufumu
limodzi nanu ndi Mzimu Woyera,
tsopano ndi panthawi zosatha.
MAU OYAMBA Numeri 11:25-29
Mau a m’Buku la Numeri
“Kodi ukuchita nsanje chifukwa cha ine?
Ndikadakondwa anthu onse a Chauta akadakhala aneneri.
Tsono Chauta adatsika mu mtambo nayamba kulankhula ndi Mose. Ndipo adatengako mzimu umene unali pa Moseyo nauika pa akuluakulu makumi asanu ndi awiriwo. Anthuwo atalandira mzimu uja, adayamba kulosa. Koma sadapitirire kulosako.
Anthu awiri adatsalira m’mahema, wina anali Elidadi, wina Meladi, ndipo mzimu udakhala pa iwowo. Anali nao m’gulu la olembedwa aja, koma sadapite nao ku chihema chamsonkhano, motero ankalosera m’mahema. Ndiye mnyamata wina adathamanga nakauza Mose kuti, “Elidadi ndi Meladi akulosa kumahemaku.” Apo Yoswa, mwana wa Nuni, mtumiki wa Mose, mmodzi mwa anthu ake osankhidwa aja, adati, “Mbuyanga Mose, aletseni amenewo.” Koma Mose adamuuza kuti, “Kodi ukuchita nsanje chifukwa cha ine? Ndikadakondwa anthu onse a Chauta akadakhala aneneri, ndipo Chauta akadaika mzimu wake pa iwo.”
Mau a Ambuye. Tithokoze Mulungu.
Nyimbo ya Salimo Salimo 19:8.10.12-14
Ch. Malangizo a Chauta amasangalatsa mtima.
Malangizo a Chauta ndi olungama,
amasangalatsa mtima.
Malamulo a Chauta ndi olungama,
amapatsa mtima womvetsa.
Ch. Malangizo a Chauta amasangalatsa mtima.
Zonsezi nzoyenera kuzikhumbira kupambana golide,
ngakhale golide wambiri wamtengowapatali,
nzotsekemera kupambana uchi,
ngakhale uchi wozuna kwambiri.
Ch. Malangizo a Chauta amasangalatsa mtima.
Nanga ndani angathe kudziwa zolakwa zake?
Inu Chauta, mundichotsere zolakwa zanga zobisika.
Musalole kuti ine mtumiki wanu ndizichimwa dala,
kulakwa koteroku ndisakutsate.
Tsono ndidzakhala wangwiro
wopanda mlandu wa uchimo waukulu.
Ch. Malangizo a Chauta amasangalatsa mtima.
Mau anga ndi maganizo anga avomerezeke pamaso panu,
Inu Chauta, thanthwe langa ndi mpulumutsi wanga.
Ch. Malangizo a Chauta amasangalatsa mtima.
MAU ACHIWIRI Yakobe 5:1-6
Mau a m’Kalata ya Yakobe
Chuma chanu chaola, ndipo njenjete zadya zovala zanu.
Mverani tsono, inu anthu achumanu. Lirani ndi kufuula chifukwa cha zovuta zimene zikudzakugwerani. Chuma chanu chaola, ndipo njenjete zadya zovala zanu. Golide wanu ndi siliva zachita dzimbiri, ndipo dzimbirilo lidzakhala mboni yokutsutsani. Lidzaononga thupi lanu ngati moto. Mwadziwunjikira chuma pa masiku ano amene ali otsiriza. Antchito okolola m’minda mwanu simudaŵalipire. Ndalama zamalipirozo zikulira mokutsutsani. Ndipo kufuula kwa okololawo kwamveka m’makutu a Chauta Mphambe. Mwakhala mukuchita maphwando, ndipo mwalidyera dziko lino lapansi. Mwadzinenepetsa pa tsiku lopha anthu. Mwamuweruza kuti ngwolakwa ndipo mwamupha munthu wolungama, iye osalimbalimba.
Mau a Ambuye. Tithokoze Mulungu
Nyimbo ya Mthenga Woyera
Aleluya. Mau anuwo ngoona zedi, Ambuye, mutipatule ndi mau anu kuti tikhale anthu anu. Aleluya.
MTHENGA WOYERA Marko 9:38-43.45.47-48
Mau a Mthenga Woyera monga adalembera Marko
Wosatsutsana nafe, ndi wogwirizana nafe ameneyo.
Yohane adauza Yesu kuti, “Aphunzitsi, ife tinaona munthu wina akutulutsa mizimu yoipa potchula dzina lanu, ndiye ife tinayesa kumletsa chifukwa sayenda nafe.” Koma Yesu adati, “Musamletse ai, chifukwa munthu sangati atachita zamphamvu m’dzina langa, nthawi yomweyo nkundinyoza. Chifukwa wosatsutsana nafe, ndi wogwirizana nafe ameneyo. Aliyense amene akupatsani chikho cha madzi chifukwa chakuti ndinu ake a Khristu, ndithu ndikunenetsa kuti ameneyo sadzalephera kulandira mphotho yake.”
“Aliyense wochimwitsa ngakhale mmodzi mwa ana okhulupirira Inewa, ameneyo kukadakhala kwabwino koposa kuti ammangirire chimwala cha mphero m’khosi ndi kukamuponya m’nyanja. Tsono ngati dzanja lako likuchimwitsa, lidule. Ndi bwino kuti ukalowe ku moyo wosatha uli woduka dzanja, kupambana kuti ukaloÁe uli ndi manja onse aÁiri ku Gehena, kwa moto wosazimika.” “Ngati phazi lako likuchimwitsa, lidule. Ndi bwino kuti ukaloÁe ku moyo wosatha uli woduka phazi, kupambana kuti ukaponyedwe ku Gehena uli ndi miyendo yonse iwiri.”
“Ndipo ngati diso lako likuchimwitsa, likolowole. Ndi bwino kuti ukalowe mu Ufumu wa Mulungu uli ndi diso limodzi lokha, kupambana kuti akakuponye ku Gehena uli ndi maso onse awiri. Kumeneko mphutsi zoÁazunza sizifa, moto wakenso wowatentha suzima.”
Mthenga wa Ambuye. Ulemu kwa Inu Ambuye Yesu Khristu.
ULALIKI
Okondedwa abale ndi alongo mwa Ambuye.
Lero ndi Lamulungu la nambala 26 pa chaka chachipembedzo. Mutu wa msonkhano wa mapemphero athu lero tasankha wakuti: Tileke makhalidwe akaduka ndi akudzikonda. Mutu umenewu ukuunikiridwa ndi mau onse atatu amene tawerenga lero.
M’mau oyamba tikuona kuti ana a Israele, ali m’chipululu cha Sinai ndipo akumudandaulira Mose kuti, bola akadakhala ku Egiputo konko poti amadya ndi kukhuta ndipo ngakhale amavutika m’njira zosiyanasiyana koma mbali ina amasangalala. Apa tikuona Mose akumudandaulira Mulungu kuti ntchito yamuchulukira ndipo akupempha Mulunguyo kuti amuthandize kusamalira anthu aja. Choncho Chauta adatsika mu thambo nayamba kulankhula ndi Mose. Chauta adauza Mose kuti apite akatenge akuluakulu makumi asanu ndi awiri ndipo akakumane ku hema. Malo amenewo adali malo amene anthu amapemphereramo, malo amene amakomana ndi Chauta. Ndipo tikumva kuti, “Ndipo adatengako mzimu umene unali pa Moseyo nauika pa akuluakulu makumi asanu ndi awiriwo. Anthuwo atalandira mzimu uja, adayamba kulosa. Koma sadapitirire kulosako” (Numeri 11:15).
Tikumva kuti mzimuwo udabweradi mu hemamo. Anthu awiri Elidadi ndi Meladi amene sadapite nao ku chihema cha msonkhano kuja mzimu uja udawatsikiranso ndipo ankalosera m’mahema. Koma Yoswa, mmodzi mwa osankhidwa aja amenenso adayenera kulowa mmalo mwa Mose ataona zimenezi, adachita nsanje ndipo sizidamusangalatse. Adamuuza Mose kuti, “Mbuyanga Mose, aletseni amenewo” (Numeri 11:28). Koma Mose adamudzudzula Yoswa kuti, “Kodi ukuchita nsanje chifukwa cha ine? Ndikadakondwa anthu onse a Chauta akadakhala aneneri, ndipo Chauta akadaika mzimu wake pa iwo” (Numeri 11:29).
Mfundo yaikulu imene tikuipeza mmau oyambawa ndi yakuti, sitiyenera kuchitira nsanje, kapena kaduka, kapena kutchingira anzathu amene akutha kupanga zinthu zimene ife timachita kapena tikulephera kuzichita. Kaya ndife audindo, sitiyenera kupondereza anzathu amene Mulungu adawadalitsa ndi mphatso zosiyanasiyana zimene zimatukula miyoyo yawo ndi ya anthu ena. Kaya ndi ku Mpingo, kaya ndi kulimana, akuluakulu a Mpingo asadane ndi anzao amene akuoneka kuti ali ndi mphatso zoposa iwo. Kaya ndi m’boma bwana asapondereze wantchito wake chifukwa chakuti wantchitoyo akuoneka kuti Mulungu adamudalitsa ndi mphatso zosiyanasiyana zimene bwanayo alibe. Zimachititsa chisoni kwambiri pamene anthu a bere limodzi ayamba kuchitirana nsanje chifukwa chakuti mbale wawo wina Mulungu akumudalitsa kuposa iwo. Matenda a nsanje, kaduka ndikudzikonda ndi oopsa kwambiri kuposa mliri wa COVID-19. Coronavirus ya mlili wa nsanje ndi kudzikonda ndi wakalekale kuyambira ana awiri aamuna oyamba a Adamu ndi Eva aja otchedwa Abele ndi Kaini. Kaini adapha mbale wake Abele chifukwa chomuchitira nsanje kuti msembe zake zimavomerezedwa ndi Mulungu kuposa za iye. Munthu wodwala matenda a nsanje ndikudzikonda amavutika mu mtima kwambiri munthu wina akamachita bwino kuposa iye. Mmalo mokondwera pamene wina wadalistidwa, iye amamva kuwawa motero maganizo ake onse amakhala ofuna kumuononga mnzakeyo munjira ya mtundu uliwonse. Amachita chotheka kuthimitsa nyale ya winayo kuti asaonekenso opambana kapena odalitsidwa ayi. Munthu wansanje amakhala ngati munthu amene akuyenda ndi chitini cha penti yakuda kuti akapeza wina amene akumuposa amupake thupi lonse kuti mnzakeyo akamaoneka wakuda kwambiri ndi wonyansa ndiye kuti iyeyo aoneka woyera ndi wokongola. Komatu akulu adati, “Madalitso salandana” kapenanso “Madalitso sasochera.”
M’mau achiwiri, Yakobe akudzudzula mopanda mantha anthu olemera amene amapondereza anthu osauka. Tawerenga kuti, “Mverani tsono, inu anthu achumanu. Lirani ndi kufuula chifukwa cha zovuta zimene zikudzakugwerani. Chuma chanu chaola, ndipo njenjete zadya zovala zanu. Golide wanu ndi siliva zachita dzimbiri, ndipo dzimbirilo lidzakhala mboni yokutsutsani. Lidzaononga thupi lanu ngati moto” (Yakobe 5:1-3). Apa Yakobe sakulankhula monyengerera ayi. Tifune tisafune, chuma chapansi pano chili ndi chiyambi komanso mathero ake. Poteropo sikuti chuma nchoipa ayi, koma ngati sitichenjera pamene Mulungu watidalitsa ndi chuma, timasochera. Tikapusa, satana amatipangitsa kuti tizidalira chumacho kuposa mwini wake wa chumacho amene ali Mulungu. Koma nthawi yake imafika imene chumacho timaola ndiponso ifeyo timaola nacho limodzi. Nthawi imafika imene njenjete zimadya chumacho, ndipo ifenso njenjetezo zimatidya pamodzi ndi chuma chathucho. Imafika nthawi imene chuma chathucho pamodzi ndi ife tomwe timachita dzimbiri. Zoonadi akulu sadaname pamene adanena kuti, “Chuma chili ngati mchira wa khoswe, sichichedwa kupululuka!!” Ali kuti anthu olemera kwambiri aja? Ali kuti anthu amene amadalira kwambiri chuma chawo aja kuposa Mulungu, mwini chuma chonse?
M’mau achiwiriwa, Yakobe akuchenjeza anthu onse amene amapeza chuma m’njira zoipa zotsutsana ndi chilungamo komanso malamulo a Mulungu. Pa chuma chathu chilichonse tiyenera kufufuza ngati sitinachipeze mwakatangale kapena powabera anthu osauka. Zomwe timaona pakati pathu ndi zakuti anthu olemera amalemererabe ndipo osauka nkumasaukirabe. Anthu olemera amenewa amangoganizira za moyo wao wokha basi ndipo alibe nazo ntchito za moyo wa anthu osauka. Amawadyera anthu osauka masuku pamutu. Ku mabwalo a milandu, anthu olemera amalipira oweruza kuti aweruze anthu osauka mopanda chilungamo. Paja akulu adati, “Ndalama ikayankhula, chilungamo chimakhala chete.” Koma kodi chilungamocho chidzakhala chete mpaka muyaya? Ayi ndithu, Mulungu amamva kulira kwa anthu osauka ndipo patalike, pafupike imafika nthawi pamene chilungamocho chimafwamphuka nkukalipa nkukhala kumbali ya anthu osauka aja.
Yakobe akupitirira kudzudzulanso anthu olemera pa mmene amaponderezera antchito awo. Tawerenga kuti, “Mwadziwunjikira chuma pa masiku ano amene ali otsiriza. Antchito okolola m’minda mwanu simudaŵalipire. Ndalama zamalipirozo zikulira mokutsutsani. Ndipo kufuula kwa okololawo kwamveka m’makutu a Chauta Mphambe” (Yakobe 5:4). Zidzudzulo zonsezi zikukhudza aliyense mwa ife anthu a lero mu njira zosiyanasiyana. Chofunika nkukhala otsekula mitima yathu ndikuona mmene chidzudzulo chilichonse chikutikhudzira. Pa Chingerezi pali mwambi wakuti, if the cap fits, wear it. Tanthauzo lake ndiye kuti, “Ngati kachipewa kakukukwanira, kavale!!”
Mu Mthenga Wabwino, Yesu ndi ophunzira ake ali paulendo wopita ku Yerusalemu. Katatu konse Yesu akuwauza ophunzira ake za zomwe zikamuchitikire ku Yerusalemu. Anthu akamupha koma patapita masiku atatu, Iye akauka kwa akufa. Nthawi zonse pamene Ambuye Yesu akuwauza ophunzira ake zimenezi, ophunzirawo amalephera kumvetsetsa zomwe Ambuye Yesu amatanthauza.
Mwachidule: Poyamba Petro akumuitanira Ambuye Yesu pambali ndikumuuza kuti zimenezi sizingatheke kuti akazunzike, ndipo Yesu akumutchula Petro kuti Satana.
Kachiwiri, ophunzira aja akukambirana za maudindo omwe akagawane akakafika ku Yerusalemu chifukwa amaganiza kuti Yesu akukamulonga ufumu. Koma Yesu akuwauza kuti ngati wina akufuna kukhala wamkulu, adzisandutse wamng’ono ndiponso wotumikira onse. Akhale wodzichepetsa ngati mwan.
Kachitatu, tikumva Yakobe ndi Yohane akupempha Yesu kuti akawapatse malo aulemerero mu ufumu wake. Apa tikuona kuti ophunzira a Yesu akulephera kumvetsetsa ngakhale mpang’ono pomwe tanthauzo lokhala ophunzira ake ndi kumutsata Iye. Leronso inu ndi ine mu njira zambiri timalephera kumvetsa kuti kutsogolera ena kumathanthauza kuwatumikira osati kuwapondereza ayi.
M’njira pamene adali paulendo wopita ku Yerusalemu, Yesu akuchiritsa anthu awiri ku Betsaida ndi ku Jeriko. Gonthi ndiponso osaona. Kudzera m’mirakuli imeneyi, Ambuye Yesu akufuna kutsekula maso a ophunzira aja za tanthauzo la ulendo wao wopita ku Yerusalemu koma ophunzira ake adalepherabe kumvetsa zimenezi.
Mthenga Wabwino umene tawerenga lero, zikuonetsabe kuti ophunzira a Yesu sadaphunzirebe kanthu kenakake kuchokera kwa Yesu. Maganizo awo ndi odzikonda basi. Akungoganizabe za maudindo. Iwo akufuna kuti wina asapeze nao zabwino kuchokera kwa Yesu koma iwo okha basi. Tikumva Yohane akuuza Ambuye Yesu kuti, “Aphunzitsi, ife tinaona munthu wina akutulutsa mizimu yoipa potchula dzina lanu, ndiye ife tinayesa kumletsa chifukwa sayenda nafe” (Marko 9:28).
Yesu akulankhula mwachimvekere kuti aliyense amene amachita zinthu zabwino m’dzina lake ndiye kuti siotsutsana naye ayi. Tawerenga kuti, “Koma Yesu adati, Musamletse ai, chifukwa munthu sangati atachita zamphamvu m’dzina langa, nthawi yomweyo nkundinyoza. Chifukwa wosatsutsana nafe, ndi wogwirizana nafe ameneyo. Aliyense amene akupatsani chikho cha madzi chifukwa chakuti ndinu ake a Khristu, ndithu ndikunenetsa kuti ameneyo sadzalephera kulandira mphotho yake” (Marko 9:39-41).
Monga Mose adadzudzula Yoswa m’mau oyamba aja, chimodzimodzinso mu Mthenga Wabwino Yesu akudzudzula Yohane chifukwa cha nsanje yake pofuna kuti zabwino zonse zikhale zawo.
Potsiriza, tiyeni mwachidule tionenso phunziro limene tikutenga kuchokera ku mau amene Ambuye Yesu akunena pamene akutiuza kuti, “Tsono ngati dzanja lako likuchimwitsa, lidule. Ndi bwino kuti ukalowe ku moyo wosatha uli woduka dzanja, kupambana kuti ukalowe uli ndi manja onse awiri ku Gehena, kwa moto wosazimika” (Marko 9:43).
Ambuye Yesu sikuti akunena kuti tiduledi nkono kapena lilime, kapena tichotse diso ayi. Zikanakhala choncho ndiye kuti anthu ambiri tilibe ziwalo zosiyanasiyana. Zikanakhala zomvetsa chisoni komanso zochititsa manyazi kwabasi. Yesu akutanthauza kuti tiyenera kudana ndi makhalidwe athu onse oyipa amene angatilepheretse kukalowa mu Ufumu wa Kumwamba. Tiyenera kuchita ngati kudula kwathunthu makhalidwe amene amatichititsa kuti tizikonda kuba, kupha, kuchita chigololo, kuchita misehe ndikuononga mbiri ya anthu ena, kuonera kapena kutumizirana zithunzi zoipa ndi zolaula ndi zina zotero.
Ngwazo wathu mlungu umenewu ukhale kuyankha mafunso ngati awa: Kodi ndimakondwera abale anga, anzanga, ogwira nawo ntchito, atumiki anzanga kapena anthu ena akamachita bwino kuposa ineyo? Kodi nsanje, kaduka ndikudzikonda sizinazike mizu yozama mwa ine? Kodi chuma changa ndinachipeza mu njira yanji? Kodi sindipondereza anthu osauka? Kodi antchito anga ndimawapondereza kapena ayi? Kodi ndimatha kulamulira ziwalo zanga posalola kuti ndikonde uchimo kapena ziwalo zangazo ndizimene zimandilamulira mpaka kundisandutsa kapolo? Kodi mwa ine chiwalo chimene chimandizunza kuposa zina ndi chiti ndipo ndikuchitapo chiyani kuchilamulira chiwalo chimenecho? Amen.
Ine ndimvera Mulungu mmodzi yekha…
Mapemphero a Akhristu
Abale, tikweze mapemphero anthu kwa Mulungu amene afuna kupulumutsa anthu ake akhale oyera mtima monga Inu nomwe Atate muli oyera.
1. Atate, musaleke kuyeretsa ndi kuwongolera Mpingo wanu kuti anthu ake akhale oyera mtima monga Inu nomwe Atate muli oyera.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
2. Atate, mupatse atsogoleri onse mtima wodzichepetsa, kuti asenze udindo wao modziiwala, potsata ubwino wa anthu onse.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
3. Atate, mufewetse mitima ya anthu opata kuti asaumirire chuma, koma adziwe kuthandiz anzaoamene ali m’mavuto.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
10
4. Atate, mutithandize ife tomwe kuleka maganizo akunyada ndi akudzikonda, kuti mayendedwe athu akhale ogwirizana ndi Mthenga Wabwino.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
Atate achifundo, muunike m’mitima ya anthu onse, muwaongolere ndi Mzimu wanu Woyera, kuti azindikire chipulumutso chanu. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu. Amen.
PEMPHERO LOPEREKERA
Inu Mulungu wachifundo,
tikukupemphani,
mulandire nsembe yathuyi
kuti kudzera mwa iyo,
zipata za kasupe wa madalitso onse,
zikhale zotsekuka kwa ife.
Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.
NYIMBO YOLANDIRIRA Cf. Salimo 119: 49-50
Kumbukirani mau anu aja kwa ine mtumiki wanu Ambuye,
mau amene amandipatsa chiyembekezo.
Chimene chimandisangalatsa m’masautso anga nchakuti,
malonjezo anu amandipatsa moyo.
Kapena: 1 Yohane 3: 16
Tazindikira chikondi tsopano,
pakuona kuti Khristu adapereka moyo wake chifukwa cha ife.
Choncho ifenso, tiyenera kupereka moyo wathu
chifukwa cha abale athu.
PEMPHERO LOTHOKOZERA
Inu Ambuye,
lolani kuti misteri ya kumwambayi
itisandutse atsopano mu mzimu ndi m’thupi,
kuti choncho tikhale amlowammalo a Khristu
mu ulemerero wake, Iye amene timalumikizana naye
m’kusauka kwake pamene tilalika za imfa yake,
Iye amene ali ndi moyo ndi ufumu panthawi zosatha.
PEMPHERO LOTSIRIZA (Pa msonkhano wamapemphero)
Atate, timalephera kukutumikirani moyenera chifukwa timadzikonda udyo. Mwina m’malo mothandiza anzathu, timawafooketsa, osawapatsa chitsanzo chabwino. Mutithandize kuyenda modzichepetsa pamaso panu kuti tipewe zoipa ndi zochimwitsa. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.
