title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Imfa Ya Cardinal Savino Wa Mdziko La Venezuela
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya Cardinal Urosa Savino wa m’dziko la Venezuela. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa Francisco walankhula izi mu uthenga wake wopepesa potsatira imfayi. Malemu Cardinal Urosa Savino Potsatira imfa ya Cardinal Urosa Savino yemwe wamwalira lachinayi, Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wopepesa kwa Cardinal Baltazar Enrique Porras Cardozo, Archbishop wa Archdiocese ya Mérida yemwenso ndi mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za archdiocese ya Caracas m’dziko la Venezuela komanso uthenga wopepesawu wapita kwa anamfedwa onse. Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfayi kaamba koti Cardinal Savino anali mtumiki wokhulupirika ndiponso wodzipereka. “Anali m’busa wodzipereka yemwe kwa zaka zambiri adapereka moyo wake kwathunthu potumikira Mulungu mokhulupirika,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati wayikiza m’mapemphero mzimu wa malemu Cardinal Savino kuti Mulungu alandire mzimu wake mu ufumu wake. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kupereka madalitso ake upositoli kwa onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi imfayi. Archbishop Savino yemwe adali Archbishop wopuma wa Archdiocese ya Caracas m’dziko la Venezuela wamwalira lachinayi pa 23 September ali ndi zaka 79 ndipo mwambo woyika maliro wachitika lachisanu pa 24 September. Cardinal Savino wayikidwa mu Cathedral ya Saint Anne mu mzinda wa Caracas mdzikolo. Mwa zina anthu m’dziko la Venezuela adzakumbukira malemuyu kaamba ka ntchito yolimbikitsa kuthetsa mavuto a za ndale m’dzikolo kudzera mukuchita zokambirana. Ndi imfa imeneyi mpingo wa katolika tsopano uli ndi ma Cardinal 218. Mwa ma Cardinal amenewa, 121 ndi osaposera zaka 80 zomwe zikutanthauza kuti malamulo akuwalora kusankha Papa watsopano kutakhala kosowekera kutero ndipo ma Cardinal 97 ndi oposera zaka 80 ndipo awa malamulo sakuwalora kusankha nawo Papa watsopano.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wanjatidwa Kaamba Kovala Unifolomu ya Apolisi
news: Apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu amanga a Yelofasi Horace a zaka 35 kaamba kopezeka atavala uniform ya apolisi. Yelofasi mu unifolomu ya apolisi Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu Sub Inspector Rebecca Kwisongole, izi zachitika lachisanu potsatira chipikisheni chomwe anachita pa msika wa Kampepuza m’bomalo pomwe iwo anawapeza atavala unifolomu-yi. Pakadali pano iwo akusungidwa m’chitokosi cha apolisi, podikira kuti akawonekere ku khothi ndi kukayankha mlanduwu. Mkuluyu amachokera m’mudzi wa Dzoole mfumu yaikulu Kwataine m’boma lomweli la Ntcheu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Feteleza Asapyole Mtengo Wa 27 Sauzande Kwacha – Unduna
news: Unduna wa zaulimi watemetsa nkhwangwa pa mwala kuti sulora amalonda omwe ali ndi malingaliro oti agulitse feteleza pa mtengo wokwera wa 40 sauzande kwacha mu nyengo ya ulimi yomwe ikudzayi. Mneneri mu unduna wa zaulimi mdziko muno, Grecian Lungu wati undunawu sunasinthe ganizo lake loti makampani onse omwe akufuna kugwira ntchito ndi undunawu akuyenera kutsatira pempho la boma kuti feteleza asakwere moposera mtengo omwe boma lakhazikitsa kaamba koti ilo lachita kafukufuku wokwanira pa momwe mitengo ikuyendera pa dziko lonse kuphatikizapo mayiko oyandikana nawo. Lungu: Tapeza amalonda ena Iye wati ndi zodabwitsa kuti kampani zina zikuti zigulitsa mtengo wa 40 sauzande kaamba koti potengera mtengo omwe boma lakhazikitsa, sangapeze phindu, lomwe ndi bodza. “Ngati unduna wathu kufikira pano sitinatulutse m’ndandanda wa kampani zomwe zingagwire ntchito yogulitsa zipangizo za ulimi ndi boma ndiye tikudabwa kuti ena akunena kuti ali ndi mitengo yawo. Ngati unduna padakali pano tapeza a malonda ena omwe atsimikiza kuti atha kutibweretsera feteleza pa mtengo osapyola 25 sauzande kwacha mzigawo zonse za mdziko muno ndiye ife ndi okonzeka kugwira ntchito ndi amalonda ena atsopano omwe tingamvane chimodzi,” anatero Lungu. Iye wati undunawu uli ndi chiyembekezo chakuti alimi ayamba kugula feteleza wotsika mtengoyu nthawi yabwino kaamba koti kudzera ku makampani a boma monga ADMARC ndinso SFFRFM, ali kale ndi feteleza woyambira, m’malo ake osungiramo katundu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mayi Apezeka ndi Matumba Awiri a Chamba
news: Apolisi ku Monkeybay m’boma la Mangochi, amanga mayi wina wa zaka 40, atapezeka ndi matumba awiri a chamba, olemera makilogram 50 lililonse. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyo- Sichali Wofalitsa nkhani za polisi ya Monkeybay, Sergeant Alice Sichali wati mayiyu, Msudzo Chizumba wapezeka ndi chambachi pa roadblock ya Mtakataka pamene anakwera galimoto yosalembetsedwa ya mtundu wa Sienta. Pa nthawiyi mayiyu amachokera ku Golomoti ndipo padakalipano akusungidwa m’chitolokosi cha polisi ya Monkeybay. Sergeant Sichali wati mayiyu akuyembekezeka kukayankha mlandu wopezeka ndi chamba popanda chilorezo zomwe ndi zotsutsana ndi gawo 42(a) komanso gawo 19 (1) la bukhu loteteza mankhwala ozunguza bongo. Chizumba amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mbawa mdera la mfumu yaikulu Mazengera m’boma la Lilongwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Amayi a M’bungwe la CWO ku Blantyre Akambirana Zoteteza Banja
news: Arkidayosezi ya Blantyre ya mpingo wa katolika yayamikira amayi a mpingowu kaamba kowonetsa chidwi posinkhasinkha ziwopsezo zomwe mabanja achikhristu akukumana nazo. Mlembi wa zautumiki mu arkidayoseziyi, bambo Alfred Chaima alankhula izi lachinayi ku Namtipwiri Pastoral Centre kwa Bvumbwe m’boma la Thyolo pa mwambo wa nsembe ya Ukaristia yotsegulira msonkhano waukulu wa pachaka wa bungwe la amayi a chikatolika la Catholic Women Organization (CWO) mu arkidayoseziyi. Bambo Chaima ndi ena mwa akuluakulu a bungwe la CWO Iwo ati ndi okondwa kuti amayiwa pa msonkhanowu asankha kuti akambirane ziphinjo zomwe mabanja achikhristu akukumana nazo zomwe anati zikuwonetseratu kuti amayiwa akutha kuyendera limodzi ndi mpingowu womwe ukuchita chaka cha Yosefe Woyera komanso mabanja. “Ndikuziona kuti nzofunikira kwambiri kaamba koti mutu umenewu akuwusinkhasinkha sikuti angopeka koma ukuchokera pa Mateyo mutu 2:13-23. Zikusonyeza kuti amayiwa akuyenda limodzi ndi mpingo paja ndi a Papa Francisko amene atipempha kuti kuyambira December, 2020 mpaka chaka chino tikhale kuti tikuphunzira kuchokera m’moyo wa Yosefe Woyera. Ife tikuganiza kuti mutu umenewu azimayi atawugwiritsitsa komanso kuphunzira kuchokera kwa Yosefe woyera komanso zomwe banjali linatha kukwaniritsa, ifenso titha kuzikwaniritsa,” anatero bambo Chaima. Pamenepa iwo ati kusinkhasinkhaku kuthandizira kuti mabanja achikhristu akhale amoyo kaamba koti banja ndi maziko enieni a mpingo. “Ife banja timalilemekeza kwambiri mu mpingo kaamba koti ndi kumene kuli mpingo woyambilira, ndi kumenenso kuli mautumiki osiyanasiyana ndiye pamene akunena kuti pali ziwopsezo zosiyanasiyana za makono mwachitsanzo mwina umphawi, kusakhulupirika kwa ena m’banja komanso zinthu zina zowononga banja monga kukwatirana amuna kapena akazi okhaokha, iwowa akalingalira ndi kusinkhasinkha zimenezi atenga udindo woteteza banja,” anapitiriza motero bambo Chaima. Polankhulapo wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa bungwe la amayi ac hikatolika mu arkidayosezi ya Blantyre, mayi Joyce Phambala ati pa masiku anayiwa, pakhala kusinkhasinkha m’magawo osiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo moyo wa banja la Chikhristu. “Ife amayi a ku Blantyre, msonkhanowu tawukonza pa mutu oti ‘Kusamalira mabanja achikhristu amene ali pa ziwopsezo zosiyanasiyana potengera zitsanzo za Yosefe Woyera, ndipo nthawi yonse tikhale kuno zimene tiphunzire ndi monga kudziwa za chibalalitso cha mpingo, tikhalanso ndi m’bindikiro omwe tisinkhesinkhe za mutu wathu uja pokhuzana ndi zomwe mabanja akukumana nazo komanso tiphunzira zokhudza Legio ya Maria, tiwonanso uthenga wa Papa Fransisko ndi kumvanso zambiri za matenda omwe ali pakati pathu a COVID-19 ndiponso za katemera osiyanasiyana akuperekedwa ku nthendayi,” anatsindika mayi Phambala. Mwazina, msonkhanowu wabweretsa pamodzi nthumwi zochokera m’madinale asanu ndi atatu opezeka mu arkidayosezi ya Blantyre omwe ndi a Thyolo, Mulanje, Phalombe, Nguludi, Limbe, Blantyre, Lunzu ndi Mwanza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu A Parishi Ya Mithungu Ku Phalombe Ayamba Kumvetsa Za Chibalalitso
news: Parish ya Mithungu mu arkidayosezi ya Blantyre yati ndi yokondwa kuti akhristu ake tsopano ayamba kumvetsa za chibalalitso cha mpingo Bambo mfumu a Parishiyi bambo Lazarus Zulani alankhula izi ku parishiyi m’boma la Phalombe pambuyo pa phwando la mayimbidwe lomwe linakonzedwa ngati mbali ya zochitikachitika za chibalalitso cha mpingo pomwe parishiyi idasankhidwa ndi arkiepiskopi Thomas Luke Msusa, kuti itsogolere chibalalitso cha mpingo cha chaka chino mu arkidayoseziyo. Ena mwa akhristu aku Mithungu parishi Bambo Zulani ati ndi zosangalatsa kuti akhristu tsopano ayamba kumvetsa zomwe akuyenera kuchita pa chibalalitso cha mpingo pomwe anati zipatso zake zayamba kale kuwoneka ponena kuti zithandiziranso parishiyi pa mfundo yodzidalira kaamba koti ndi parishi yatsopano mu arkidayoseziyi. “Ndine wokondwa powona kuti akhristu athu tsopano ayamba kumvetsa za chibalalitso cha mpingo ndipo ndi chifukwa chake lero takonza phwando ili la makwaya kuti nawonso aphunzitsane makamaka pa mutu wa chaka chino woti “ife sitingaleke kulankhula pa zomwe tidaziona ndi kuzimva” ndipo chosangalatsa nchakuti kwaya zonse za mparish yathu zinabwera kudzatenga nawo mbali pa phwandoli,” anatero bambo Zulani. “Nzosangalatsanso kuwona kuti zipatso zake zayamba kale kuwoneka zomwe zikuonetseratu kuti akhristuwa akudzindikira udindo wawo pa chibalalitso cha mpingo. Izinso kwa ife ngati parish yatsopano ndi zotilimbikitsa kaamba koti zithandizira pa mfundo ya mpingo wodzidalira makamaka posamalira parishi yathu pa zosowa zake,” anapitiriza motero bambo Zulani. Mmawu ake David Wasili yemwe ndi wapampando wa makwaya mu parishiyi wayamikira kwayazi potenga mbali pa phwandoli. “Ndine wosangalala kuti kwaya zambiri zatenga nawo mbali pa phwandoli ndipo ifenso tinawonetsetsa kuti pakhale nyimbo yopeka yomwe ndi yogwirizana ndi mutu wa chibalalitso cha chaka chino kuti kulalika kwathu kuyambire pamenepa kudzera mu nyimbozi,” anatero a Wasili. Pa phwandoli kwaya zomwe zinachita bwino pa mayimbidwewa ndi monga St. Andrews Michesi yomwe inali pa nambala yoyamba, yachiwiri yake St. Daniel Comboni Migowi pomwe yachitatu ndiya St. Paul Ngozi. Kumbali ya kwaya za amayi, kwaya yoyamba inali ya St. Anna Michesi, yachiwiri yake ndi St. Catherine Namphende ndipo yachitatu ndi St. Tereza Migowi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Msonkhano wa akuluakulu a PMS M’madayosezi Uthandiza Kukonzekera Zochitika za Mtsogolo’
news: Msonkhano wa akuluakulu oyendetsa ntchito za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa a Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) ati uthandiza kukonzekera bwino zochitika zosiyanasiyana zomwe zikhale zikuchitika mu mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno m’miyezi yomwe ikudzayi. Mkulu mu ofesiyi mdziko muno bambo Vincent Mwakhwawa alankhula izi lachwiri potsekulira mkumano wa masiku atatu wa akuluakulu oyendetsa ntchito za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa ochokera m’madayosezi onse asanu ndi atatu mdziko muno. Msonkhanowu omwe wayamba lachiwiri ukuchitikira ku Bangula mu dayosezi ya Chikwawa. Akuluakulu a PMS m’madayosezi pa msonkhanowo Bambo Mwakhwawa ati msonkhanowu ndi wofunika kwambiri kaamba koti akuluakuluwa apereka chithunzithunzi cha momwe zinthu zikuyendera m’madayosezi awo zomwe anati zithandiziranso kuti pakhale kukonzekera bwino pa zochitikachitika zomwe zikhalepo mu mpingo monga Chibalalitso komanso Chaka cha Utumiki wa ana mu mpingo pa tsiku la Epifania. “Cholinga chake ndi choti tikambirane mmene zinthu zikuyendera m’madayosezi onse komanso ifeyo ngati ku National Office tiperekanso momwe zinthu ziyendere masiku akubwerawa pa zochitikachitika zosiyanasiyana zomwe ziyambe mwezi wa October ndi chibalalitso cha mpingo komanso tilinso ndi chaka chija cha Epifania chomwe timve mmene arkdayosezi ya Blantyre ikukonzekera mwambowu chifukwa ndi yomwe yasankhidwa kutsogolera chaka chimenechi mchaka cha 2022 koma kukhazikitsa kwake kuchitika mu November chaka chino,” anatero bambo Mwakhwawa. Iwo atinso pa mkumanowu ukambirananso ndi kukonza ndondomeko ya zochitikachitika za chaka cha mawa cha 2022 kaamba koti mchakachi mudzakhala zikondwelero zosiyanasiyana. “Tikhala tikukondwelera zaka 400, komanso zaka 200 za bungwe lofalitsa chikhulupiliro osayiwalanso zaka 100 za PMS. Sipokhapo ayi, lachinayi tiyenderanso ena mwa mapulojekiti omwe PMS yakhala ikugwira kunoko ku Chikwawa tisayiwale kuti izi ndi ndalama zomwe timalandira kuchokera kwa a Papa Fransisko kuti tigwire ntchito za chifundo,” anapitiriza mlotero bambo Mwakhwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Asisiteri awiri a Pachibale Akondwelera Zaka 60, 25 Za Utumiki
news: Loweruka pa 18 September 2021 ndi tsiku losayiwalika kwa asisiteri awiri a pachibale omwe amakondwelera kuti akwanitsa zaka 60 komanso zaka 25 akutumikira Mulungu ngati asisiteri a chipani cha atumiki a Maria Virgo Woyera kapena kuti Servants of the Blessed Virgin Mary (SBVM) pa chingerezi. Mwambowu unachitikira ku St. Mary’s Nzama parishi m’boma la Ntcheu mu dayosizi ya Dedza komwe ndi kumudzi kwa asisiteriwa, pambuyo pa mwambo waukulu omwe unachitika sabata yapitayo ku likulu la chipani cha SBVM ku Nguludi m’boma la Chiradzulu. Sister Mary (kumanzere) komanso Sister Agness Chagomerana Asisiteriwa ndi Sister Mary Evelyn Chagomerana omwe akwanitsa zaka 60 mu utumiki ndiponso Sister Agness Pasikale Chagomerana omwe akwanitsa zaka 25 akutumikira Mulungu kudzera mu usisiteri. Amene anatsogolera mwambowu ndi bambo Innocent Kanyumbu omwe ndi bambo mfumu a parishi ya Nzama, mothandizana ndi bambo Remigius Kasawa omwe ndi bambo mfumu a St. Teresa Tsangano parishi. M’mawu awo, bambo Kanyumbu alimbikitsa asisiteriwa kuti apitirize kutumikira Mulungu mwa toto moyo. Bambowa apempha atumikiwa kuti alimbikitse chikondi pakati pawo kuti ntchito yawo yotumikira Mulungu ipitirire kuyenda bwino. Poyankhulapo wapampando wa parishiyi a Edwin Seba Moyo anathokoza banja la a Chagomerana kaamba ka mphatso ya atumiki awiriwa ku mpingo. Iwo apempha makolo kuti alimbikitse ana awo aakazi kuti nawonso adzatumikire Mulungu ngati asisiteri. Sister Mary Evelyn Chagomerana anati ndi okondwa kaamba ka tsikuli lomwe iwo eni akulephera kulifotokoza chifukwa cha Chimwemwe chodzadza tsaya. Kuonjezera pa chikondwererochi, akhristu a parishiyi amakondwereranso kuti parishi yawo yakwanitsa zaka 120 chiyikhazikitsireni. St. Mary’s Nzama parishi inakhazikitsidwa m’chaka cha 1901 ndi ansembe a chizungu a Montfort Missionary ndipo ndi parishi yoyamba mu mbiri ya mpingo wa katolika m’dziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la CCJP Lipereka Upangiri Wokhudza Nkhanza Za M’banja
news: Ngati njira imodzi yothandizana ndi boma pa ntchito yolimbikitsa anthu za kusasiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo, bungwe la chilungamo ndi mtendere mu mpingo wa katolika la Catholic Commission for Justice and Peace (CCJP) mu dayosizi ya Dedza, layamba ntchito yophunzitsa mabanja m’magulu  ndi cholinga chofuna kuwazindikiritsa za kuyipa kochitirana nkhaza. Ena mwa mabanja omwe anali nawo pa mkumanowo Poyankhulapo lachisanu pambuyo pa maphunziro a masiku atatu omwe bungweli linakonzera mabanja makumi awiri a mdera la mfumu yaikulu Ganya m’boma la Ntcheu, mkulu woyanganira ntchito ku bungweli mu dayosize ya Dedza, a Lawrence Puliti ati maphunzirowa anali ofunika kwambiri kwa anthuwa kaamba koti apititsa patsogolo ntchitoyi. Iwo ati iwo monga bungwe la mpingo wa katolika, amadziwa kufunikira kwa banja ponena kuti munthu aliyense amachokera m’banja ndipo kuti kuphunzitsa banja ndiwo maziko a chitukuko cha dziko. Poyankhulapo banja la bambo ndi mayi Venias Laiton, anati maphunzirowa awatsekula m’maso kaamba koti azindikira zina zambiri zomwe amazichita kaamba ka kusadziwa. Banjali lati likhala ndi ntchito yofikira ena ndi kuwathandiza powazindikiritsa nkhani za nkhanza zomwe anthu amachitirana pakati pa mayi ndi bambo. A Naomi Agabu ndi mkulu mu ofesi yowona kuti pasakhale kusiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo m’boma la Ntcheu ndipo nawo anati ofesi yawo ipitiriza kugwira ntchito ndi mabungwe osiyanasiyana ndi cholinga chothetsa nkhaza zomwe anthu akuchitirana makamaka zokhuza amayi ndi ana. Iwo ati nkhaza zambiri zimachitika kamba koti ambiri mwa iwo amachita zimenezo chifukwa cha kusadziwa. Zina mwa nkhaza zomwe zikuchitika m’boma la Ntcheu ndi monga bambo kugonana ndi mwana wake obala yekha, nkhaza za pachuma kuphatikizapo nkhaza za m’malingaliro zomwe zikudzetsa imfa zodzipha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mkumano Wa Kawuniwuni Ubweretsa Poyera Mavuto M’boma La Ntcheu
news: Potsatira mavuto osiyanasiyana omwe achinyamata akukumana nawo m’madera ena m’boma la Ntcheu, bungwe la zaumoyo mu mpingo wakatolika la Catholic Health Commission mu dayosizi ya Dedza kudzera mupulojekiti ya Nza’tonse, lachiwiri linakonza mkumano wa kawuniwuni ndi cholinga chofuna kumva nkhawa za achinyamata. Mkumanowu unachitikira ku Mwalaoyera mdera la mfumu yaikulu Ganya m’boma la Ntcheu ndipo unasonkhanitsa magulu okhudzidwa a anthu monga a ndale, mafumu, a chipatala, achinyamata, apolisi ndiponso atsogoleri a mipingo. Poyankhulapo mlangizi wazaumoyo kuchokera ku Catholic Health Commission a Harold Chilikutali anati mkumanowu unali ofunika kaamba koti wabweretsa poyera ena mwa mavuto omwe amanga nthenje ku derali omwe akukhudza achinyamata ndiponso anthu onse. Iwo anati achinyamata a ku derali kudzera mu ntchitoyi azindikira maufulu awo kuphatikizapo nkhani za uchembere ndi ubereki wabwino. M’mawu ake, m’modzi mwa anamwino omwe anali nawo pa mkumanowu kuchokera pa chipatala cha Ntcheu, a Getrude Namtapa anati achinyamata ambiri amachita manyazi kutenga njira zolera zomwe zotsatira zake ambiri mwa iwo akutenga mimba zosakonzekera ndiponso matenda opatsirana pogonana. M’modzi mwa mafumu aku derali, gulupu Sanjani anagwirizana ndi dotoloyu koma anawonjezera kuti zina zikuchitika chifukwa choti ogwira m’zipatala ena samasuka ndi achinyamata. Mfumuyi inamaliza ndi kunena kuti nthawi zambiri ku chipatala kumakhala kopanda zipangizo zodzitetezera zomwe zimalimbikitsa kuti achinyamata kuti atenge matenda. Ena mwa mavuto omwe achulukira pakati pa achinyamata ku derali ndi monga kutenga mimba zosakonzekera kuphatikizapo matenda opatsirana pogonana. Bungwe la Catholic Health Commission kudzera mu pulojekiti ya Nza’tonse likugwira ntchito yopereka upangiri kwa achinyamata a zaka zapakati pa 10 ndi 24 pa nkhani zokhuza uchembere, ubereki wabwino ndiponso ufulu wawo. Ntchitoyi ikugwirika ndi thandizo la ndalama kuchokera ku KFW kudzera ku Dan ndi Norwegian church aid.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: TSIKU LAMULUNGU LA 25 PA CHAKA
news:
Pajatu pamene pali kaduka ndi kudzikonda, pomweponso pali chisokonezo ndi ntchito yoipa ya mtundu uliwonse.
Chaka B
Psalter Week II
Liturgical Vestment: G
19 September 2021
NYIMBO YOLOWERA
Ine Ndine Mpulumutsi wa anthu onse, atero Ambuye.
Iwo akandiitana m’mavuto awo, ndidzawamvera:
ndipo ndidzakhala Mulungu wao mpaka muyaya.
PEMPHERO LOYAMBIRIRA
Inu Mulungu,
amene mudakhazikitsa malamulo anu onse oyera,
pa lamulo la kukonda Inu ndi anzathu,
tikukupemphani, kuti posunga malamulo anuwa,
tiyenere kulandira moyo wosatha.
Mwa Yesu Khristu,
Ambuye ndi Mulungu wathu,
amene ali ndi moyo ndi ufumu
limodzi nanu ndi Mzimu Woyera,
tsopano ndi panthawi zosatha. Amen.
MAU OYAMBA Luntha 2:12.17-20
Mau a m’Buku la Luntha
Timpereke ku imfa yochititsa manyazi.
Tsono timukhalizire munthu wolungama, popeza kuti amativutitsa, ndipo amatsutsana ndi ntchito zathu. Amatidzudzula chifukwa chopandulira malamulo, amatinenea kuti timanyoza mwambo. Tiyeni tione ngati mau ake ndi owona, tione zimene zidzamufikire pakutha pa moyo wake.
Ngati wolungamayo ndi mwanadi wa Mulungu, Mulungu adzamuthandiza, adzampulumutsa kwa adani ake.
Timuyese pakumutsutsa ndi kumunyoza, kuti tione ngati ndi ofatsa, ngati ndi wodziwa kupirira. Timpereke ku imfa yochititsa manyazi, paja iye akuti Mulungu adzamteteza.
Mau a Ambuye. Tithokoze Mulungu.
Nyimbo ya Salimo Salimo 54:3-6.8
Ch. Ambuye ndiwo amachirikiza moyo wanga.
Anthu onyada andiwukira,
anthu ankhalwe amafunafuna moyo wanga,
iwo saganizako za Inu Mulungu.
Ch. Ambuye ndiwo amachirikiza moyo wanga.
Komatu, Mulungu ndiye amandithandiza,
Ambuye ndiwo amachirikiza moyo wanga.
Adzawabwezera adani anga zoipa.
Aonongeni, Inu Ambuye,
chifukwa cha kukhulupirika kwanu.
Ch. Ambuye ndiwo amachirikiza moyo wanga.
Ndidzapereka nsembe kwa Inu mwaufulu.
Ndidzatamanda dzina lanu, Inu Chauta,
popeza kuti ndinu abwino.
Ch. Ambuye ndiwo amachirikiza moyo wanga.
MAU ACHIWIRI Yakobe 3:16-4:3
Mau a m’Kalata ya Yakobe
Ndipo chilungamo ndiye chipatso cha mbeu zimene anthu odzetsa mtendere amafesa mu mtendere.
Pajatu pamene pali kaduka ndi kudzikonda, pomweponso pali chisokonezo ndi ntchito yoipa ya mtundu uliwonse. Koma nzeru zochokera Kumwamba, poyamba nzangwiro, kuwonjeza apo nzamtendere, zofatsa ndi zomvera bwino. Ndi za chifundo chambiri, ndipo zipatso zake zabwino nzochuluka. Nzeruzo sizikondera kapena kuchita chiphamaso. Ndipo chilungamo ndiye chipatso cha mbeu zimene anthu odzetsa mtendere amafesa mu mtendere.
Kodi nkhondo zimachokera kuti? Kukangana pakati panu kumachokera kuti? Kodi suja zimachokera ku zilakolako zanu zathupi, zimene zimachita nkhondo mwa inu? Mumalakalaka zinthu, koma zimakusoŵani, nchifukwa chake mumapha munthu. Mumasirira zinthu, koma simungathe kuzipeza, nchifukwa chake mumamenyana, nkumachita nkhondo. Mulibe zinthuzo chifukwa simupempha kwa Mulungu. Ndipo ngakhale mupemphe, simulandira, chifukwa mumapempha molakwa. Zimene mumapempha, mumafuna kungozimwazira pa zokukondweretsani basi.
Mau a Ambuye. Tithokoze Mulungu
Nyimbo ya Mthenga Woyera
Aleluya. Mulungu adakuitanani kudzera mu Uthenga Wabwino kuti mulandire nao ulemerero wa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu. Aleluya.
MTHENGA WOYERA Marko 9:30-37
Mau a Mthenga Woyera monga adalembera Marko
“Ngati wina afuna kukhala wamkulu, adzisandutse wamng’ono, wotumikira onse.”
Atachoka kumeneko, Yesu ndi ophunzira ake ankadutsa m’dziko la Galileya. Koma Iye sadafune kuti anthu adziŵe, chifukwa ankaphunzitsa ophunzira ake. Ankaŵauza kuti, “Mwana wa Munthu akudzaperekedwa kwa anthu, ndipo iwowo adzamupha. Koma atamupha, Iye adzauka patapita masiku atatu.” Ophunzira ake sadamvetse mau ameneŵa , komabe ankaopa kumufunsa.
Yesu ndi ophunzira ake adafika ku Kapernao. Ataloŵa m’nyumba, Iye adaŵafunsa kuti, “Kodi panjira paja mumatsutsana zotani?” Ophunzirawo adangoti chete. Ndiye kuti zimene ankatsutsana panjirapo zinali zakuti wamkulu ndani pakati pao. Yesu adakhala pansi, naŵaitana ophunzira khumi ndi aŵiri aja. Ndipo adaŵauza kuti, “Ngati wina afuna kukhala wamkulu, adzisandutse wamng’ono, wotumikira onse.” Atatero adatenga mwana, namkhazika pakati pao nkumufungata, naŵauza kuti, “Aliyense wolandira bwino mwana wonga ngati uyu chifukwa cha Ine, ndiye kuti akulandira bwino Ine amene. Ndipo wondilandira Ine bwino, ndiye kuti akulandira bwino osati Ineyo, koma Atate amene adandituma.”
Mthenga wa Ambuye. Ulemu kwa Inu Ambuye Yesu Khristu.
ULALIKI
Okondedwa abale ndi alongo mwa Ambuye.
Lero ndi Lamulungu la nambala 25 pa chaka chachipembedzo. Tikaphatikiza mau onse atatu amene tawerenga tikupezamo maphunziro angapo. Koma ife phunziro limodzi limene talisankha chifukwa likuchita ngati kuomba nkota m’mau onsewa, ndi limene likupezeka pa mau achiwiri ochokera m’kalata ya Yakobe Woyera akuti, “Pajatu pamene pali kaduka ndi kudzikonda, pomweponso pali chisokonezo ndi ntchito yoipa ya mtundu uliwonse” (Yakobe 3:16). Tatero chifukwa tikuona kuti m’mau oyamba munthu wabwino ndi wolungama akuzunzidwa ndi anthu oipa chifukwa cha nsanje ndi kudzikonda kwao. M’mau achiwiri, Yakobe akunenetsa kuti nkhondo, zidani ndi zinthu zoipa zambiri zimachitika chifukwa cha kaduka ndi kudzikonda zomwe zimayamba zaphikidwa mu mtima mwathu. Ndipo mu Mthenga Wabwino tikuona kuti ophunzira a Ambuye Yesu panjira anali kutsutsana zakuti wamkulu ndani pakati pawo.
Mau oyamba alero a m’buku la Luntha, akutiuza kuti, munthu weniweni wokhulupirira, amene amamanga moyo wake m’chikhulupiriro mwa Mulungu, amene amapereka zitsanzo zabwino kwa anthu anzake, amene amakhala wachikondi ndi wachilungamo, nthawi zina amakomana ndi mavuto. Chifukwa chakuti moyo wake umakhala wowala ndipo chifukwa cha chimenechi anthu okonda kuchita zoipa zimawayansa ndipo amadana naye. Motero amapangana zothana naye pomuzunza, kumuonongera mbiri yake kapenanso kumupha. Chifukwa cha chilungamo ndi ubwino wake, anthu ena samamumvetsa ndipo amatsutsana naye kuti akhale chete.
Chomwe chimachitika pakati pa munthu wabwino ndi anthu oyipa tingachiyerekeze ndi zomwe zimachitika pakati pa dzuwa ndi munthu wodwala maso. Inu mutha kundivomerereza kuti munthu amene akudwala maso amamva ululu woopsa akayesera kuyang’ana kudzuwa. Choncho zochita za munthu wabwino zimachita ngati kuthobwa m’maso mwa anthu a nsanje ndi oyipa chifukwa zimachita ngati kuwawereuza ndikuyika pa mbalambanda kuipa kwawo. Monga momwe dzuwa lowala limadzetsa ululu m’maso mwa munthu wodwala maso, momwemonso chilungamo ndi ubwino wa munthu wolungama zimadzetsa ululu m’moyo mwa anthu oyipa ndipo zotsatira zake ndi nkhanza zomuchitira munthu wabwino uja pofuna kuthimitsa kuwala kwake kuja. Tawerenga kuti, “Tsono timukhalizire munthu wolungama, popeza kuti amativutitsa, ndipo amatsutsana ndi ntchito zathu. Amatidzudzula chifukwa chopandulira malamulo, amatineneza kuti timanyoza mwambo. Tiyeni tione ngati mau ake ndi owona, tione zimene zidzamufikire pakutha pa moyo wake” (Luntha 2:12).
Buku la Luntha lidalembedwa ndi m’Yuda wina panthawi ya ulamuliro wa mfumu Alexander ndipo panthawi imeneyi kunali anthu olemera kwambiri. Anthu olemerewa ankakhala m’moyo wosangalala kwambiri podyerera chuma chao. Sankalabadira za chikhulupiriro chao mwa Mulungu. Sankalabadiranso za anthu osauka. Munthu owadzudzula ndi mawu kapena ndi moyo wake wabwino amasanduka mdani wawo monga zimachitikiranso pakati pathu lero mu mpingo kapenanso padziko. Alipo anthu ena pakati pathu mu mpingo ndiponso pa dziko amene cholakwa chawo kuti azipezeka m’mavuto amene akukomana nawo si china ayi, koma kuti anafunitsitsa kuchita za chilungamo ndipo amaoneka abwino kapena opambana kuposa ena. Azimayi ena chifukwa cha chilungamo chawo pokana kugona ndi a bwana awo ku ntchito akulephera kukwezedwa pa ntchito ndikupatsidwa mwayi wosiyanasiyana ku ntchito kwawo. Azimayi ndi ndi azibambo ena chifukwa chofunitsitsa kukhala a chilungamo pokana katangale, pokana kuipitsa ena ndi zoipa zina, lero ali pa mavuto oopsa. Tsono tchimo la anthu ena amene akuzunzidwa ndi anthu anzawo oipa ndi lakuti amalimbikira kuchita zabwino basi kapenanso chifukwa chakuti amawaposa pa zinthu zina. Palibenso china ayi.
M’mau achiwiri, Yakobe akudzudzula makhalidwe onse oyipa amene amatilekanitsa ndi chikondi cha Mulungu. Tawerenga kuti, “Koma nzeru zochokera Kumwamba, poyamba nzangwiro, kuwonjeza apo nzamtendere, zofatsa ndi zomvera bwino. Ndi za chifundo chambiri, ndipo zipatso zake zabwino nzochuluka. Nzeruzo sizikondera kapena kuchita chiphamaso. Ndipo chilungamo ndiye chipatso cha mbeu zimene anthu odzetsa mtendere amafesa mu mtendere” (Yakobe 3:17-18). Dyera la mtundu uliwonse, kaduka, chilakolako choipa cha mtundu uliwonse, ndiponso chuma, zonsezi ndi zopanda pake chifukwa zimadzetsa chisokonezo pakati pa anthu. Poteropo sitikufuna kunena kuti chuma nchoipa ayi. Koma chomwe tikufuna kunena nchakuti chuma chimakhala choipa malinga ndi njira imene tayigwiritsa ntchito kuti tichipeze chumacho komanso mmene tikuchigwiritsira ntchito chumacho. Chuma nchabwino chifukwa popanda chuma sitikanadya, sitikanavala, sitikanamanga nyumba zokhala, zopempherera ndi zophunzirira. Mwachidule tinganene kuti zinthu zambiri kuti zitheke pamasoweka chuma. Koma pa chuma chilichonse, tiyeni titsogoleredwe ndi chikhulupiriro chathu mwa Mulungu momwe Khristu adatiphunzitsira.
Yakobe akupitirira kutilangiza kuti tiziulonda mtima wathuwo chifukwa m’menemo ndi m’mene mumaphikidwa zabwino komanso zoipa zonse. Tawerenga kuti, “Kodi nkhondo zimachokera kuti? Kukangana pakati panu kumachokera kuti? Kodi suja zimachokera ku zilakolako zanu zathupi, zimene zimachita nkhondo mwa inu? Mumalakalaka zinthu, koma zimakusoŵani, nchifukwa chake mumapha munthu. Mumasirira zinthu, koma simungathe kuzipeza, nchifukwa chake mumamenyana, nkumachita nkhondo. Mulibe zinthuzo chifukwa simupempha kwa Mulungu” (Yakobe 4:1-2). Choncho, nkhondo zonse pakati pathu zokanganirana chuma, maudindo ndi zina, zimayamba zamenyedwa kaye mu mtima mwathu ndipo kenako zikafika pa mpondachimera mu mtimamo ndiye zimatulukira kunja nkusanduka mfuti, mipaliro, zikwanje ndi mau olasa mtima pofuna kuononga onse amene timadana nawo. Chikondi komanso mapemphero ndi zinthu zomwe zingadzimitse moto wa mkwiyo ndi kusakhulukira umene umayaka m’mitima mwathumo kuti usakaononge anthu osalakwa.
M’mau a mu Mthenga Wabwino lero tikumva kuti Yesu tsopano wafika mu mzinda wa Kapernao. Kapernao ndi mzinda umene udali pafupi kwambiri ndi mzinda wa Galilea umene Yesu ankaukonda kwambiri kufalitsa Mthenga Wabwino. Kwa iwo amene adayenda ulendo woyera wopita ku malo oyera monga ku Yerusalemu ndi malo ena ku Israel, ndikhulupirira kuti akukumbukira bwino za nyanja ya Galilea komanso za mzinda wa Kapernao.
Yesu akuyenda ulendo wake wotsiriza kuchokera ku Galilea kupita ku Yerusalemu pamodzi ndi ophunzira ake. Ku Yerusalemu, Yesu akuwauza ophunzira ake kuti Ayuda akamupha ndikumupachika pa mtanda ndipo tsiku lachitatu adzauka kwa akufa. Aka ndi kachiwiri kamene Yesu akuwauza ophunzira ake za zomwe zidzamuchitikira ku Yerusalemu ndipo za kuuka kwake kwa akufa. Koma mpaka pano ophunzira ake sakumvetsabe zimene Yesu akuwauza chifukwa maganizo awo ndi osiyana ndi maganizo a Ambuye Yesu. Iwo adzamvetsetsa zimene Ambuye Yesu akuwauzazi pamene zidzachitikadi ku Yerusalemu.
Tinganene moseleula kuti padakali pano ophunzira a Ambuye Yesu ndi otanganidwa ndi kugawana maudindo a unduna wa za chuma, za maphunziro, za chitetezo cha dziko, za ubale wa maiko akunja, wa za mavuto okudza mwadzidzidzi, za wachiwiri kwa Ambuye Yesu (vice president) ndi maunduna ena ambiri. Izi amaganiza choncho chifukwa amaganiza kuti ulendo wao waku Yerusalemu adayenera kukamulonga Yesu Ufumu wa Ayuda. Nchifukwa chake ophunzira aja akukambirana za wamkulu ndani pakati pao.
Yesu ndi Mesiya ndipo ophunzira ake adali ndi chikhulupiriro chakuti akakafika ku Yerusalemu, akakhala mfumu ndipo iwo akakhala nduna. Koma zodabwitsa ndi zakuti, Ambuye Yesu akuwayankha zosiyana ndi zimene iwo amaganiza. “Ngati wina afuna kukhala wamkulu, adzisandutse wamng’ono, wotumikira onse” (Marko 9:35). Yesu akutiuza kuti aliyense akhale ngati mwana amene adamunyamula m’manja mwake. Tawerenga kuti. “Atatero adatenga mwana, namkhazika pakati pao nkumufungata, naŵauza kuti, “Aliyense wolandira bwino mwana wonga ngati uyu chifukwa cha Ine, ndiye kuti akulandira bwino Ine amene. Ndipo wondilandira Ine bwino, ndiye kuti akulandira bwino osati Ineyo, koma Atate amene adandituma” (Marko 9:36-37). Choncho, Ambuye Yesu akuwaonetsa ophunzira ake kuti Iyeyo ali pakati pao ngati otumikira osati ngati otumikiridwa ayi. Ili ndi khalidwe limene ifenso tiyenera kukhala nalo. Tiyenera kukhala anthu otumikira ena osati ngati mabwana otumikiridwa ayi.
Ambuye Yesu akupitiriza kuwaphunzitsa ophunzira ake za mazunzo amene adzakomana nawo ku Yerusalemu koma iwo sakumvetsa kuti zomwe akuwauzazo ziyenera kumchitikiradi. Tawerenga kuti, “Mwana wa Munthu akudzaperekedwa kwa anthu, ndipo iwowo adzamupha. Koma atamupha, Iye adzauka patapita masiku atatu” (Marko 9:31). Chifukwa chiyani ophunzira ake sankamvetsa zimenezi? Monga tidaona sabata latha lija, ophunzira ake ankaona kuti Yesu adabwera kudzagonjetsa mafumu onse ndi kutenga maulamuliro onse a dziko lapansi. Sankayembekezera kuti Mulungu angatume Mesiya wolonjezedwa uja padziko lapansi nkudzazunzidwa ndipo pamapeto pake ndikuphedwa, imfa yake ya pamtanda, imfa yochititsa manyazi, imfa yomvetsa chisoni. Choncho uthenga wa lero, ophunzira a Yesu akudziganizira za tsogolo lao pamene Ambuye Yesu adzalamulira dziko lapansi monga mmene iwo amagnizira. Akuyamba kuchita ngati kampeni nkumadzifunsa kuti, kodi wamkulu ndani pakati pao?
Pofuna kuti phunziro lake lilowe bwinobwino mu mtima mwa ophunzira ake, Ambuye Yesu adatenga chitsanzo cha mwana. Tawerenga kuti, “Atatero adatenga mwana, namkhazika pakati pao nkumufungata, naŵauza kuti,” Aliyense wolandira bwino mwana wonga ngati uyu chifukwa cha Ine, ndiye kuti akulandira bwino Ine amene. Ndipo wondilandira Ine bwino, ndiye kuti akulandira bwino osati Ineyo, koma Atate amene adandituma” (Marko 9:36-37). Kodi tikupezapo phunziro lanji pa mwana ameneyu, amene Ambuye Yesu adamunyamula? Ponena zoona mwana amakhala opanda kalikonse m’moyo mwake, amadalira makolo ake pa zonse zosoweka pa moyo wake wa tsiku ndi tsiku. Mwana amakhala wodzichepetsa. Nafenso tiyenera kukhala ngati mwana, tikhale odzichepetsa ndikudalira Mulungu yekha pa moyo wathu. Kukhala ngati mwana sitikufuna kunena kuti kukhala wazibwana ayi, koma kukhala odzichepeta ngati mwana ngakhale pamene tili ndi maudindo akuluakulu mu mpingo ndiponso padziko. Tisiye kunyada kwathu, tisiye kudzikonda kwathu, tisiye kupondereza anthu amene tikuwatsogolera, tisiye kaduka, tisiye nsanje, tisiye kubera anthu osauka ndi amasiye. Tiyenera kukhala odzichepetsa monga mwana. Ndipo tidziwe kuti zomwe timachitira anthu ang’onoang’ono, anthu ovutika, anthu osauka, timachitiranso Mulungu.Tiyenera kukhala anthu otumikira ena makamaka anthu amene ndi onyozeka pakati pathu.
Ngwazo wathu lero potsata mau a Mulungu amene tawerenga ukhale woyankha mafunso awa: Kodi mu mtima mwanga muli anthu angati amene ndimawada osati chifukwa adandilakwira ayi, koma chifukwa chakuti chilungamo chawo, ubwino wawo, kupambana kwawo ndi ntchito zawo zabwino zimandipweteka mtima chifukwa cha nsanje ndi kaduka? Kodi mu mtima mwanga mukuchitika nkhondo za mtundu wanji zomwe zikaphulikira kunja kwanga ziononga anthu osalakwa? Ndipo postiriza, kodi moyo wanga m’banja, ku mphakati, ku tchalitchi, ku parish, ku mabungwe a mpingo, ku ntchito ndi kwina kulikonse, umasakasaka kutumikira ena kapena kutumikiridwa? Amen. Ine ndimvera Mulungu mmodzi yekha…
Mapemphero a Akhristu
Abale, monga ana amadalira chifundo cha bambo ndi mai, ifenso tsopano tipereke mapemphero athu kwa Atate athu a Kumwamba:
1. Tipempherere akhristu onse, kuti avomere kutumikira Mpingo wa Yesu Khristu, osamangoganiza zao zokha.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
2. Tipempherere atsogoleri onse, kuti asenze udindo wao mosamala ndi modzichepetsa mtima.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
3. Tipempherere anthu opata, kuti asanyadire chuma chao, koma akumbukire kuthandiza anzao m’zosowa zao.
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
4. Tidzipempherere ife tomwe kuti tikhale ofatsa ndi a mtima wodzichepetsa monga Yesu analiri pa moyo wao wonse
Tikupemphani, mutivomereze.
Atate, polandira mapemphero athuwa, muwamvere chifundo ana anu onse amene ali m’mavuto. Mwana Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu. Amen.
PEMPHERO LOPEREKERA
Inu Ambuye,
tikukupemphani kuti
mulandire mokondwa,
zopereka za anthu anu
kuti zimene amamvera modzipereka ndi chikhulupiriro,
azimvetse kudzera m’misteri za kumwambazi.
Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.
NYIMBO YOLANDIRIRA Salimo 119: 4-5
Inu Chauta, mwapereka malamulo anu
ndipo mwalamula kuti atsatidwe kwathunthu.
Ndikadakonda kuti njira zanga
zikhale zokhulupirika pakumvera malamulo anu.
Kapena: Yohane 10: 14
Mbusa Wabwino ndine.
Nkhosa zanga zimandidziwa,
ndipo izozo ineyo zimandidziwa.
PEMPHERO LOTHOKOZERA
Inu Ambuye,
mwachifundo chanu,
muwadzutse iwo amene mwawasandutsa atsopano,
ndi sakramentili kuti choncho tilandire
zabwino za chipulumutso chanu
m’misteri ya moyo wathu.
Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.
PEMPHERO LOTSIRIZA (Pa msonkhano wamapemphero)
Atate, pobwera pansi pano Mwana wanu adadzichepetsa kwambiri natumikira anthu mpaka kupereka moyo wake, kuti aombole anthu ambiri. Muchotse m’mitima mwathu maganizoa kaduka ndi a kudzikonda kuti nafenso tizitumikira anzathu modziiwala ndi modzichepetsa powatsogolera m’njira ya chipulumutso. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.

title: Alimi Avutika ndi Kukwera Mtengo Kwa Fetereza wa Sabuside – Katswiri
news: M’modzi mwa anthu omwe amalankhulapo pa zinthu zosiyana-siyana mdziko muno wati alimi ang’ono ang’ono avutika kaamba ka kukwera mtengo kwa feteleza wa sabuside. Alimi monga awa akuyenera kupereka ndalama zambiri kuti apeze feteleza Katswiri’yu, Latimu Matenje walankhula izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi potsatira chikalata chomwe unduna wa zamalimidwe watulutsa lachinayi chomwe chafotokoza kuti mu ulimi wa chaka chino, feteleza otsika mtengo adzigulitsidwa pa mtengo wa 7,500-kwacha pa thumba lililonse lolemera ma kilogalamu 50, kuchoka pa 4,495-kwacha yomwe fetelezayu amagulitsidwa chaka chatha. Matenje wati alimi ena anali atakonza kale ndondomeko ya chuma chomwe agwiritse ntchito pa ulimi wa chaka chino, choncho kulengeza za kukwera mtengo-ku mwezi uno wa September, kuli ndi kuthekera kosokoneza dongosolo lawo pa ndalama zomwe anasungira. Pa nkhani yoti undunawu wachotsa anthu 44,000 omwe akuwaganizira kuti ndi anthu ogwira ntchito m’boma, katswiriyu wati ngati boma silinagwire ntchitoyi modekha, likhonza kuchotsa alimi ang’ono ang’ono omwe amayenera kupindula ndi ndondomekoyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha Mabungwe Olimbikitsa Achinyamata M’boma La Ntcheu Abwere Pamodzi
news: Ngati njira imodzi yowonetsetsa kuti achinyamata akufikiridwa ndi mauthenga oyenerera pa nkhani yokhudza umoyo wawo, bungwe la zaumoyo mu mpingo wa katolika la Catholic Health Commission mu dayosizi ya Dedza, lachinayi linali ndi msonkhano ndi mabungwe okhudzidwa omwe amagwira ntchito zolimbikitsa achinyamata m’boma la Ntcheu pa nkhani zokhudza uchembere wabwino, ubereki ndiponso maufulu awo. Mkumanowu unachitikira ku Ntcheu ndipo unabweretsa pamodzi mabungwe monga a YONECO, PSI, FPAM, Save the Children kuphatikizapo akulu akulu a boma a zaumoyo ochokera pa chipatala cha Ntcheu. Poyankhulapo mlangizi wa zaumoyo kuchokera ku bungwe la Catholic Health Commission mu dayosizi ya Dedza, a Grey Chanansi anati kukumana ngati uku ndi kothandiza ndi cholinga choti mabungwewa adzifikira achinyamata a m’bomali ndi liwu limodzi podziwa kuti onsewa cholinga chawo ndi chimodzi chomwe ndi kulimbikitsa achinyamata ndi maupangiri osiyanasiyana okhudza miyoyo yawo. Iwo anati mabungwewa akuyenera kukhala ndi liwu limodzi akamafikira achinyamatawa popewa kuwasokoneza. M’mawu ake wofalitsa nkhani zaumoyo pa chipatala cha Ntcheu, mayi Stella Kawalala ayamikira ntchito yomwe mabungwewa akugwira pothandiza achinyamata m’magawo osiyanasiyana okhudza  nkhani za umoyo. Mayi Kawalala anapitiriza ponena kuti mabungwewa athandiza kukweza miyoyo ya achinyamata m’bomalo pokhala odzidalira pa chuma ndipo apempha m’gwirizanowu kuti upitilire. Bungwe la za umoyo mu mpingo wa katolika la Catholic Health Commission kudzera mu pulojekiti ya Nza’tonse ndi lomwe linakonza mkumanowu. Bungweli likugwira ntchito yopereka upangiri kwa achinyamata a zaka za pakati pa 10 ndi 24 m’boma la Ntcheu pa nkhani yokhudza miyoyo yawo makamaka pa za uchembere wabwino, ubereki ndiponso maufulu awo. Ntchitoyi ikugwiridwa ndi thandizo la ndalama kuchokera ku kfw kudzera ku Danish ndi Norwegian Church Aid.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Atsogoleri A Mabungwe Mu Mpingo Azindikire Za Udindo Wawo
news: Papa Francisco wakumbutsa atsogoleri a mabungwe a akhristu eniake za ntchito yayikulu yomwe ali nayo mu mpingo yomwe ndi kutumikira. Iye walangiza atsogoleriwa kuti si bwino kumafunafuna maudindo mu mpingo pa zifukwa zolakwika monga kufuna kutchuka ndi mphamvu. Papa Francisco wati pozindikira kuti mutu umodzi susenza denga, utumiki mu mpingo ndi wosowa kudalirana komanso kulumikizana ndi ena kuti zinthu zidziyenda bwino. Iye sadayiwale kulankhulapo za kufunika kokhulupirika ku utumiki wawo ndi za kufunika kokhulupirika kwa Mulungu ndi kupewa kuchita zinthu zina zomwe ndi zosemphana kapena zomwe zinyazitsa utumiki wawo kwa Mulungu. Papa Francisco watsiriza ndi kunena kuti mabungwe a mu mpingo akuyenera kuyendetsedwa ngati mabungwe a mpingo osati ngati mabungwe a munthu m’modzi kotero iye wadzudzula atsogoleri a mabungwe a mu mpingo omwe amasankhiratu anthu odzalowa m’malo mwawo ngati kuti mabungwewa ndi awo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu 14 Sauzande Akupindula Ndi Mtukula Pakhomo M’boma La Ntcheu
news: Boma lati likulingalira zowonjezera ndalama komanso chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akupindula nawo mu ndondomeko ya mtukula pakhomo pomwe gawo la ndondomekoyi lomwe lilipo padakalipano likuyembekezeka kutha chaka chino. Ena mwa anthu omwe apindula ndi mtukula pakhomo Bwanamkubwa wa boma la Ntcheu, Francis Matewere wanena izi lachitatu pamene amayendera anthu omwe apindula ndi ndondomekoyi kwa Gochi ku Tsangano m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Mpando m’bomalo. A Matewere anawonjezera kuti kudzera mu kuyendera anthuwa, awona zipatso za ndondomekoyi yomwe idayamba m’chaka cha 2018 ndi anthu 14 thousand omwe akupindula nawo mu ntchitoyi m’boma la Ntcheu. Polankhulapo m’modzi mwa omwe akupindula ndi ndondomekoyi, mayi Margret Chelewani ayamikira boma kaamba ka pologalamuyi ponena kuti yakwanitsa kutukula miyoyo yawo pomwe ati akukwanitsa tsopano kuthandiza banja lawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Avulaza Mwana Wake M’boma La Kasungu
news: Apolisi m’boma la Kasungu amanga bambo wa zaka 21 zakubadwa kaamba komuganizira kuti wavulaza mwana wake malo obisika. Malinga ndi wachiwiri wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Miracle Mkozi, bamboyu Masau Zambira wapalamula mlanduwu lolemba m’mudzi mwa Nkulala mfumu yayikulu Mphomwa m’bomalo pomwe mwana ovulazidwayu amamenyana ndi anzake pomuganizira kuti anaba galimoto yoseweretsa. Woganiziridwawa omwe ndi bambo a mwanayu, atamva izi sizinawasangalatse ndipo anamutengera mwanayu ku nyumba komwe anamumenya ndi khasu pa malo obisika. Potsatira kumenyedwaku, mwanayu anavulala kwambiri zomwe zinachititsa kuti anthu akufuna kwabwino amutengere ku chipatala komwe walandira thandizo la mankhwala. Apolisi atamva za nkhaniyi, anagwira mkuluyu ndi kumutsekera m’chitokosi chawo ndipo akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku khothi ndi kukayankha mlandu ovulaza munthu zomwe ndi zosemphana ndi gawo 241 loyendetsera malamulo m’dziko muno. Masau Zambira amachokera m’mudzi mwa Chapinga mfumu yaikulu Chilooko m’boma la Ntchisi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Kuchotsa Pathupi Ndi Kupha
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati kuchotsa pakati ndi kupha. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa Francisco walankhula izi lachitatu kwa atolankhani mu ndege pa ulendo wake wochokera m’dziko la Slovakia kupita ku Rome m’dziko la Italy. Iye watsindika kuti kuchotsa pakati ndi kupha chifukwa pamene munthu wa mayi wayima, moyo wa mwana watsopano umakhala wayamba kotero palibenso kukuluwika kulikonse pa nkhani imeneyi kuti aliyense yemwe achotsa pakati ndiye kuti wapha munthu. Pa nkhani ya Ukaristia iye wauza atolankhani kuti chiyambireni kutumikira ngati wansembe sanakanizepo munthu kulandira Ukaristia. “Ayi, sindinakanizepo munthu aliyense kulandira Ukaristia,” watero Papa Francisco Iye wati ansembe omwe ndi abusa akuyenera kusonyeza kuti ndi abusadi pokhala anthu a chifundo pogwira ntchito yawo. Papa Francisco wati wati pomwe pali kuthekera koti ena amadzipatula posayenda limodzi ndi mpingo wonse kwa ka nthawi kochepa, ansembe akuyenera kukumbukira kuti angakhale anthu omwe adzipatulawo naonso ndi ana a Mulungu kotero ndi kofunika kukhala nao pafupi ndi kumawamvetsera ndi kupewa kuwatayiratu anthu amenewa. Iye wati ansembe akuyenera kudziwa chochita pa nkhani ya Ukaristia ndi anthu amenewa mowunikiridwa ndi chifundo chomwe Mulungu amaonetsera anthu ake nthawi zonse. Papa Francisco wati monga Mulungu amakhala pafupi ndi anthu ake ndi kuwaonetsa chifundo anthu ake, ansembe akuyenera kuchita chimodzimodzi ndi akhristu awo ndipo wati ansembe ndi ma episkopi akuyenera kupewa ndale zilizonse pa nkhani ya Ukaristia.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsiriza Ulendo Wake wa M’maiko a Hungary, Slovakia
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wafika ku Rome m’dziko la Italy kuchokera m’dziko la Slovakia. Papa kufika pa bwalo la ndege ku Rome mdziko la Italy Zateremu ndiye kuti Papa Francisco watsiriza ulendo wake wokacheza m’maiko a Hungary ndi Slovakia omwe unayamba laMulungu pa 12 September. Ali m’dziko la Hungary, Papa Francisco adachita zokambirana ndi ma episkopi a m’dzikolo, atsogoleri a mipingo ya chikhristu, akuluakulu a chipembedzo cha chi Yuda komanso kutsogolera Misa yotsekera msonkhano wa Ukaristia wodziwika kuti International Eucharistic Congress. Iye anali m’dziko la Hungary kwa ma ola asanu ndi awiri kenaka Papa Francisco anapita m’dziko la Slovakia. Ali m’dzikolo mwa zina iye adachita zokambirana ndi mtsogoleri wa dzikolo, kulankhula kwa atsogoleri a ndale, ma episkopi, ansembe, asisitere ndi a bulazala osaiwala achinyamata, a kazembe oimira maiko awo m’dziko la Slovakia, ma bungwe omenyera ufulu wa anthu komanso kuchita Misa ku malo oyera otchedwa Sastin. Mawu omwe adatsogolera ulendowu ndi oti “limodzi ndi Amayi Maria komanso Yosefe popita kwa Ambuye Yesu.” Ulendowu unali wa nambala 34 kunja kwa dziko la Italy komanso ndi ulendowu umenewu ndiye kuti Papa Francisco wacheza m’maiko 54 chikhalireni pa udindo wa u Papa. Maulendo a Papa ku maiko osiyana-siyana amathandiza kulimbitsa anthu m’moyo wawo wa uzimu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Anjata Anthu Anayi Powaganizira Kuti Aba 20 Billion Za Kampani Ya AHL
news: Apolisi mdziko muno amanga anthu anayi powaganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi kubedwa kwa ndalama zokwana 20 billion kwacha ku kampani ya Auction Holdings Limited (AHL). Mneneri wa apolisi mdziko muno James Kadadzera watsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo wati atatu mwa anthuwa ndi ogwira ntchito akale a kampaniyi komanso mkulu wina ochita za malonda. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyo – Kadadzera Iye wati anthuwa akuganiziridwa kuti anapalamula mlanduwu kuyambira mchaka cha 2012 mpaka 2017 ku Malawi Leaf Limited yomwe ndi nthambi ya AHL. Anthuwa ndi a Jimmy Kasamale omwe anali mkulu wa nthambiyi, a Francis Madona omwe anali mkulu owona zachuma ku nthambiyi komanso a Evans Rodney Douglas Matabwa omwe anali mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za nthambiyi pamene mkulu wochita malondayo ndi a Arthur Madikhula omwe ndi mwini wake wa kampani ya Master Freight Shipping, Mauzi Contractors komanso kampani ya Global Tobacco. Kadadzera wati anthuwa omwe padakalipano akusungidwa pa polisi ya Lilongwe, akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu kuti akayankhe mlandu wa kuba, kussayinira zinthu zabodza, kugwiritsa ntchito ofesi yawo molakwika, kuzimbayitsa ndalama komanso kusasamala pa ntchito, mwazina. Kampani ya AHL ikukumana ndi mavuto a zachuma kaamba koti inataya ndalama zokwana 42 billion kwacha mchaka cha 2017. Mwezi wa July chaka chino, kampaniyi inalengeza za mapulani ake ofuna kuchotsa ntchito anthu okwana 500 koma padakalipano mapulaniwa ayamba ayimitsidwa kaamba koti kampaniyi ati ilibe ndalama zolipilira anthu amene achotsedwe ntchitowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CUNIMA Ithandiza Chipatala Cha Nguludi Ndi Zipangizo Zopewera COVID-19
news: Sukulu ya ukachejede ya mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno Catholic University of Malawi (CUNIMA) yati ikudzindikira za kufunika kogwirana manja ndi chipatala cha St. Joseph Nguludi polimbana ndi mliri wa COVID-19. Registrar wa sukuluyi a Francis Nkhoma alankhula izi lachiwiri ku chipatalachi pa mwambo wopereka katundu wosiyanasiyana wothandizira pa ntchito yolimbana ndi nthenda ya COVID-19 pa chipatalachi yemwe ndi wa ndalama zosachepera 2.5 million kwacha. A Nkhoma kupereka katunduyo kwa anamwino pa chipatalacho A Nkhoma ati sukuluyi inaganizira zothandiza chipatalachi kaamba koti ophunzira ndi aphunzitsi pa sukuluyi amadalira chipatalachi pomwe adwala choncho anati ndi kofunika kugwirana nacho manja pa zinthu zomwe zikusoweka pa chipatalachi pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliriwu. “Ifeyo chiyambire mchaka cha 2006 pomwe tinali ndi ophunzira oyambilira ku sukuluyi mpaka pano takhala tikudalira chipatala ichi cha Nguludi choncho ngati sukulu tinawona kuti ndi kofunika tichitepo kanthu pa chipatalachi. M’mbuyomu, sukuluyi yakhala ikuthandizirapo m’magawo osiyanasiyana monga kuthandiza anthu omwe akhala akukhudzidwa ndi ngozi za kusefukira kwa madzi monga ku Chikwawa ndi Phalombe ndiye lero tinawona kuti tithandizenso malo ano ndi zinthu zomwe zingathandizire polimbana ndi nthenda ya COVID-19” anatero a Nkhoma. Pamenepa iwo ati sukuluyi yathandiza chipatalachi ndi katundu monga zipangizo zosungira mpweya (Oxygen Cylinders) ndi katundu wina wodzitetezera ku nthendayi makamaka kwa ogwira ntchito pa chipatalachi pomwe akusamalira anthu odwala matenda osiyanasiyana. “Katundu yemwe tikupereka lero ndi wa ndalama zosachepera 2.5 Million Kwacha ndipo pamenepa tapereka katundu monga zosungira mpweya ma Oxygen Cylinders pa chingerezi omwenso tikukhulupilira kuti athandiziranso odwala ku nthenda zina ngati mphumu ndi zina, komanso tapereka ma glove, magawoni ndi katundu wina yemwe ogwira ntchito pa chipatalachi azigwiritsa ntchito pomwe akusamalira odwala mthendayi ndi nthenda zina zomwe tikukhulupilira kuti tayeserapo kuchepetsa ena mwa mavuto omwe chipatalachi chikukumana nawo makamaka pa zipangizo za tsiku ndi tsiku zogwiritsa ntchito,” anapitiriza motero a Nkhoma. Polankhulapo m’modzi mwa akuluakulu pa chipatalachi mayi Maggie Khumbanyiwa ayamikira akuluakulu oyendetsa sukuluyi kaamba ka thandizoli lomwe anati liwathandiza pa ntchito yawo yosamalira odwala ku nthendayi komanso matenda ena omwe munthu amasowa mpweya othandizira. “Ife ndi onyadira zedi kuti tathandizidwa ndi katunduyi yemwe ndi wofunika kwambiri polimbana ndi nthenda ya Covid 19 Kamba koti imfa zambiri zikumabwera kamba kosowa mpweya ndiye macylinder 4 atipasawa athandiza kwambiri kwa odwala athu omwe akusoweka mpweya kamba koti chipatala chathu chagonekapo odwala mthendayi osachepera 20 ngakhale pakadali pano palibe odwala wagonekedwa ku nthendayi komanso zipangizo zozitetezeranso mzofunikanso kwa ogwira ntchito athu pamene akusamalira odwalawo,” anatero mayi Khumbanyiwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CCJP Ikufuna Amayi Atetezedwe Ku Nkhanza
news: Bungwe la chilungamo ndi mtendere mu mpingo wa katolika la Catholic Commission for Justice and Peace (CCJP) mu dayosizi ya Dedza lati amayi akuyenera kutetezedwa ku nkhanza zosiyanasiyana zimene akukumana nazo. Puliti: Amayi ambiri akukumana ndi nkhanza Mkulu wa bungweli mu dayosiziyi a Lawrence Puliti amalankhula izi pamene bungweli lakhazikitsa ndondomeko zofuna kuthana ndi nkhanza zimene amayi akukumana nazo m’boma la Dedza. Iwo ati amayi ambiri a m’bomali akukumana ndi nkhanza zochuluka zomwe ndi zofunika kudzithetsa. ‘‘Amayi ambiri m’boma la Dedza akukumana ndi nkhanza monga kumenyedwa, kulandidwa katundu komanso kusapeza chilungamo pa kaweruzidwe ka milandu imene amayiwa amakasuma,’’ anatero a Puliti. Pofuna kuwonetsetsa kuti amayi akudziwa bwino za maufulu awo bungweli lati lakhazikitsa alangizi akumidzi omwe azithandiza anthu amene achitridwa nkhanza kuti apeze chilungamo mosavuta. ‘‘Tizitenga oweruza milandu kupita nawo kumidzi kumene amayi achitiridwa nkhanza kuti anthu adzitha kupeza chilungamo pafupi. Amayi amene sangathe kulankhula tiziwabweretsera owayimira pa mirandu,’’ anapitiriza motero a Puliti. Ntchitoyi yomwe ndi ya zaka zitatu akuyigwira ndi ndalama zokwana 161million kwacha ndi thandizo lochokera ku MESERIO lomwe ndi bungwe la maepiskopi a m’dziko la Germany.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mkhristu Wamangira Mpingo Zimbudzi Zamakono Ku Chikwawa
news: Mkhristu wina wochita malonda m’boma la Chikwawa, wapereka zimbudzi zamakono ndi zipangizo zothandiza kupereka ukhondo pa Cathedral ya mpingo wa katolika ya St. Michael’s mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa. Popereka thandizoli loweruka, a Thomas Kayiya anati achita izi pofuna kulimbikitsa ntchito za ukhondo popeza anthu ochuluka amasonkhana pa malowa pakakhala miyambo ikuluikulu. Banja la a Kayiya kuyima pa chimodzi mwa zimbudzi zomwe amanga “Chimene chinandichititsa kuti ndichite zimenezi n’chakuti ndidawona kuti pano panalibe zimbudzi za madzi, podziwa kuti pano pamabwera anthu ochuluka komanso olemekezeka,” anatero a Kayiya. Ndipo m’mawu ake pambuyo polandira zimbudzizi, episkopi wa mpingo wa katolika mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa, Ambuye Peter Musikuwa ati pamene mpingo ukulimbikitsa kudzidalira, akhristu ali ndi udindo wotukula mpingowu. “Akhristu tili ndi udindo osenza magawo osiyansiyana popereka gawo lina la chuma chathu potukula mpingo wodzidalira,” anatero Ambuye Musikuwa. Ndipo pa mwambowu, akhristu ena omwe anagwira ntchito zothandiza mpingo analandira ma satifiketi a ulemu kuyimira akhristu ochuluka amene akuthandiza mpingo. Ena mwa akhristuwa ndi monga a Clement Khembo, mayi Flora Kaphamtengo ndi mayi Mary Mangwiza Manyusa, kungotchulapo ochepa chabe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Abwenzi A Radio Maria Malawi Alimbikitsa Ubale Wawo
news: Abwenzi a Radio Maria Malawi a mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre ndi dayosizi ya Chikwawa anachitira limodzi mkumano wawo waukulu wapadera, lamulungu pa 12 September, 2021. Mkumanowu omwe unasonkhanitsa nthumwi zochokera ku ma dayosizi awiriwa wachitika lamulungu ku tchalitchi la St. Tereza ku parishi ya Nguludi yomwe ili mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre. A Majawa kulankhula kwa abwenzi omwe anasonkhana pa tsikulo Malinga ndi apampando a abwenziwa ku dayosizi ya Chikwawa, a Clement Majawa komanso arkidayosizi ya Blantyre a James Ng’omba, cholinga chochitira mkumanowu limodzi chinali kulimbikitsana kuthandiza transimita ya Mpingwe, kukonzekera Mariatona ndi zisankho za magulu awiriwa. Wapampando wa abwenzi a Radio Maria Malawi mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa, a Clement Majawa atsimikizira abwenzi a wayilesiyi kuti muli zaulere zochuluka kudzera mu kuthandiza Radio Maria Malawi. “Palibe munthu yemwe anasauka chifukwa chothandiza mpingo. Tikamathandiza Radio Maria Malawi timalandira zaulere zambiri,” anatero a Majawa. Ndipo pothilirapo ndemanga, wapampando wa abwenziwa mu akidayosizi ya Blantyre, a James Ng’omba anati msonkhano wa pakati pa madayosizi awiriwa walimbikitsa ubale wawo. “Ndipemphe abwenzi anzanga a kuno ku arkidayosizi ya Blantyre ndi abwenzi a dayosizi ya Chikwawa kuti ubale umenewu upitilire,” anatero a Ng’omba. Abwenzi a dayosizi ya Chikwawa anagwira ntchito limodzi ndi anzawo a ku arkidayosizi ya Blantyre asanayime pawokha pa 6 July, 2019.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhristu Aziyika Maso Awo Pa Mtanda Woyera
news: Popitiriza kucheza kwake m’dziko la Slovakia, Papa Francisco lero anatsogolera Misa pogwiritsa ntchito Byzantine Rite ku dera lotchedwa Prešov. M’malaliko ake pa Misa’yi pa tsiku lomwe mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse umachita chaka cholemekeza Mtanda Woyera, iye wapempha a Katolika m’dziko la Slovakia kuti aziyika maso awo pa mtanda. Papa Francisco wati akhristu amalalika za Yesu wopachikidwa pa mtanda. Iye wati mtanda omwe udali chinthu chochititsa manyazi, udaulula za chikondi cha Mulungu ndipo wawonjezeranso kuti mtanda omwe udasanduka mtengo wa imfa pambuyo pake udasanduka mtengo wa moyo. Papa Francisco wati mu mtanda akhristu akuyenera kuwonamo ulemelero wa Mulungu. Iye wati munthu yemwe achitira umboni mtanda woyera alibe nthawi yowona munthu mzake ngati m’dani. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti chikhristu chomwe sichiona ulemerero wa mtanda woyera ndi cha kufa. Mwa zina zomwe Papa Francisco wachita lero ndi kuyendera malo ochitira mibindikiro omwe amayendetsedwa ndi ansembe a chipani cha ma Jesuit komanso iye walankhula ndi kucheza ndi achinyamata a m’dzikoli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Ku Chikwawa Agwira Ng’ombe ‘Zobedwa’
news: Apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa agwira ng’ombe zisanu ndi zitatu zophedwa, ndi zina ziwiri zamoyo zomwe akuziganizira kuti ndi zobedwa. Izi zinachitika usiku wa lachiwiri pa 14 September, 2021 pa tchire lina la pamudzi wa Gola m’dera la mfumu yayikulu Chapananga. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyo – Matemba Malingana ndi m’neneri wa Polisi ku Chikwawa, Sergeant Dickson Matemba, anthu akufuna kwabwino anatsina khutu apolisi yaing’ono ya Gola kuti anthuwa ndi odabwa ndi galimoto yomwe inali pa tchire lina m’deralo. Apolisiwa atamva izi, anathamangira ku maloko nthawi yomweyo koma anapeza galimotoyo atayithawitsa. A Matemba ati zitachitika izi, apolisiwa anadziwitsa mwansanga anzawo a ku polisi ya Chapananga kuti agwire galimotoyo. Iwo awonjezera kuti, apolisi ya Chapananga anayesera kuyimitsa galimoyo koma woyendetsa sanayime, zomwe zinachititsa kuti apolisiwa ayambe kuthamangitsa galimotoyo mpaka pa msika wa Mthumba m’bomalo. Pamenepa eni galimotoyo, anayisiya pamalopo ndi kuthawa teyala la galimotoyo litaphulika ndipo apolisiwa atachita chipikisheni galimotoyo, anapeza kuti muli ng’ombe zakufa. Padakali pano, ng’ombezo ndi galimoto yomwe nambala yake ndi BT 758 akuyisunga ku polisi ya Chikwawa, pamene kafukufuku ali m’kati kuti agwire oganiziridwa mlanduwa. Ndipo alimi ena awiri ochokera kwa Gola, komwe akuganizira kuti ndi komwe kwabedwa ng’ombezo anafika pa polisi ya Chikwawa ndi kuzindikira ziwetozo kuti ndi zawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ogwira Ntchito ku Post Office Akunyanyala Ntchito
news: Ogwira ntchito ku nthambi ya boma ya Malawi Posts Corporation akunyanyala ntchito pofuna kukakamiza akuluakulu a nthambiyo kuti akonze mavuto omwe ogwira ntchito-wa akukumana nawo. Mtsogoleri wa gululi a William Chipoka awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti ogwira ntchito akumalandira malipiro awo mochedwa komanso kuti nthambiyo inasiya kupereka ndalama za chithandizo cha ku chipatala cha antchito ake komanso za pension. Ogwira ntchito ku Post Office pamene akunyanyala ntchito Iwo ati asiya kunyanyala ntchito-ku pokhapokha akuluakulu a nthambiyi akakonza mavutowa. “Malipiro athu akumachedwa kwambiri. Tikumatha miyezi itatu kapena iwiri tisanalandire. Panopa tikufuna atitsimikizire kuti malipiro athu tidzilandira malire pa 25 mwezi uliwonse monga momwe amalmulo a ntchito yathu amanenera,” anatero a Chipoka. Koma polankhulapo mneneri wa Malawi Posts Corporation mayi Ida Mkolimbo ati akuluakulu a nthambiyi akuwunikira za mavutowa omwe ena mwa iwo ayamba kale kukonzedwa. “Mavuto akunenawo ndi owonadi koma padakalipano malipiro awo a mwezi wa August alandira kale. mavuto ena akukambawo ndi a kalekale sanayambe lero ndipo akuluakulu athu akuwunika za mavutowo ndi cholinga choti apeze mayankho okhazikika choncho adekhe,” anatero mayi Mkolimbo. Iwo anapitiriza kunena kuti padakalipano ma Post Office ena ndi otsegula ndipo ayambiranso kugwira ntchito zawo kaamba koti amvetsetsa mmene akuluakuluwa awayankhira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Sanaganizepo Zotula Pansi Udindo Wake
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati sanayambe waganizapo zotula pansi udindo wa u Papa. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi ku Vatican masiku apitawa kwa mtolankhani wa wayilesi yotchedwa COPE ya m’dziko la Spain. Papa Francisko pamene amacheza ndi Harrera Iye amayankha funso la mtolankhaniyu yemwe anafuna kumva ngati Papa Francisco anamva za mphekesera zomwe zinalipo pa nthawi yomwe amadwala kuti iye atula pansi udindo wake ngati Papa. Ndipo poyankhapo pa nkhaniyi, Papa Francisco wati anamva kuti panali manong’onong’o amenewa koma iye wati palibe olo tsiku limodzi lomwe anayamba waganizapo zotula pansi udindowu. Iye wawonjezera kuti izi si za chilendo popeza aka si koyamba kuti pakhale manong’onong’o oterewa. Papa Francisco wati kawiri-kawiri pamene Papa wadwala, nkhani ngati izi zimatuluka kotero sanadabwe nazo. Iye wauza mtolankhaniyu kuti pano ali bwino kwambiri ndipo akutha kudya zakudya zomwe samatha kukwanitsa kudya asanamuchite opareshoni ya m’mimba. Poyankhapo pa za funso la mtolankhaniyu yemwe anafuna kudziwa kuti kodi Papa Francisco akufuna kuti anthu adzamukumbukire bwanji, iye wati akufuna anthu adzamukumbukire ngati munthu wochimwa yemwe adayetsetsa kuchita bwino pa maso pa Mulungu. Iye walankhula ndi mtolankhaniyu nkhani zosiyana-siyana monga mavuto a m’dziko la Afghanistan, nkhani zokhudza likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ndi dziko la China pongotchula zochepa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Awiri Afa Pa Ngozi Yapansewu Ku Ntcheu
news: Anthu awiri afa ndipo ena anayi avulala modetsa nkhawa pa ngozi yomwe yachitika lero m’boma la Ntcheu. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Hestings Chigalu wati ngoziyi yachitika pa malo ena otchedwa Mthandizi mu nsewu wa Ntcheu – Balaka. Ngozi yomwe yachitika lero ku Ntcheu Iye wati mayi yemwe amayendetsa galimoto ya mtundu wa Toyota Lactis, anaphonya nsewu ndi kupita mbali ina komwe anakawomba galimoto ya MRA yomwe imachokera mbali ina ya nsewuwo. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za chipatala cha Ntcheu, mayi Stella Kawalala, anthu awiri omwe afa pa ngoziyi ndi mwana wam’muna wa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi (6) komanso mayi wa zaka 32 zakubadwa. Iwo ati anthu anayi omwe agonekedwa pa chipatalachi ndi amayi awiri, mwana m’modzi wa zaka khumi komanso bambo m’modzi. Mwezi wa August, m’boma la Ntcheu mwachitika ngozi zokwana khumi ndi ziwiri (12) zomwe khumi mwa izi zatenga miyoyo ya anthu ndipo anthu 31 ndi omwe afa pa ngozi-zi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mnyamata wa Zaka 18 Alamulidwa Kukakhala Ku Ndende Zaka 18 Pa Mlandu Wogwilira
news: Bwalo loyamba la milandu m’boma la Ntcheu lalamula mnyamata wa zaka 18 zakubadwa kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka 14 kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu ogwililira msungwana wa zaka 14 ndi kumupatsa pathupi. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Inspector Sammie Liwonde anawuza bwaloli kuti mkuluyu anapalamula mlanduwu kuyambira mwezi wa June mpaka August chaka chino m’mudzi mwa Bula pomwe iye amakhala ndi mtsikanayu ngati banja. Nkhaniyi akuti siyinakondweretse mayi a mtsikanayu zomwe zinachititsa kuti akanene ku polisi. Popereka chigamulo chake oweruza milanduku bwaloli, First Grade Magistrate Chimdima Phiri analamula kuti mnyamatayu yemwe akungodziwika ndi dzina loti Jana, akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka khumi ndi zinayi (14). Jana ndi wa m’mudzi mwa Bula mfumu yaikulu Kwataine m’boma lomwelo la Ntcheu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha Abambo a Parishi ya Njuli Adzipereke Potukula Mpingo
news: Abambo a mu parish ya Njuli mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre, awapempha kuti adzipereke pogwira ntchito yotukula mpingo komanso mabanja awo. Misa ya abambo idzachitikira m’tchalitchili-Njuli Bambo mfumu a parishiyi, bambo Cosmas Kinile ndi omwe apereka pempholi loweruka pa Misa ya a bambo a mu parishiyi. Iwo ati nthawi yakwana yoti a bambo agwire ntchito zotukula mpingo ndi m banja awo potsanzira Yosefe Woyera. Naye mlembi wa bungweli mu parishi’yi a Emmanuel Chikopa anati kukhazikitsidwa kwa bungwe la a bambo kuthandiza kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za mpingo. Misayi inali yokonzekera mwambo wokhazikitsa bungwe la a bambo a mu parishiyi omwe udzachitike pa 19 mwezi uno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Okwiya Apha Munthu Pomuganizira Kuti Waba Ng’ombe
news: Anthu ena okwiya m’boma la Nsanje atentha ndi kupha mkulu wina pomuganizira kuti anaba ng’ombe. M’neneri wa apolisi m’bomalo, Sub-Inspector Agnes Zalakoma watsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo wati woganiziridwayu ndi Allan Chinandilonda wa zaka 32. Munthu amene watenthedwayo Sub-Inspector Zalakoma wati malemuyu anawonedwa akumanga ng’ombe pa tchire la pa mudzi wa Khamu m’dera la mfumu yayikulu Ngabu m’bomalo ndipo anthu ozungulira anamemezana kumugwira, kumumenya kenaka ndi kumutentha. M’neneriyu wati apolisi ndi a chipatala adapita kumaloko komwe achipatala adatsimikiza za imfa yomwe ati yadza kaamba kopsa ndi moto. Pamenepa, apolisi a m’bomali apempha anthu kuti asamatengere malamulo m’manja mwawo pamene apeza munthu yemwe akumuganizira kuti wapalamula mlandu ndipo iwo ati akufufuzabe amene achita zimenezi. Malemuyu, Allan Chinandilonda wa zaka 32, amachokera pa mudzi wa Chinandilonda m’dera la mfumu yayikulu Ngabu m’boma la Nsanje.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsindika Za Kufunika Komvetsera Mawu A Mulungu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko watsindika za kufunika komvetsera bwino mawu a Mulungu pofuna kukhala anthu osinthika mtima. Iye walankhula izi kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Iye anakhazikika pa Uthenga Wabwino wa pa tsiku lamulungu la 23 mu nyengo ya pa chaka omwe ukufotokoza umo momwe Ambuye Yesu adachizira munthu wosamva ndi wosalankhula. Papa Francisco wafotokoza kuti monga Ambuye Yesu adachiza munthu wosamva ndi wosalankhula uja ndi bwino kuti akhristu azipempha Ambuye Yesu kuti achize mitima yao kuti izitha kulandira Uthenga wa Chipulumutso ndi kukhala anthu osinthika. Iye wati ngakhale kuti akhristu amamvetsera pafupifupi Mau a Mulungu koma zimaoneka kuti Mau a Mulungu’yo saagwira ntchito m’mitima ya akhristu ambiri popeza mitima ya akhristu ambiri ndi yotsekeka. Papa Francisco watsiriza ndi kupemphelera mitima ya akhristu kuti ikhale yotsekuka ndi kulandira uthenga wa chipulumutso.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Red Cross Yapempha Mafumu, A Zipembedzo Alimbikitse Anthu Kulandira Katemera wa COVID-19
news: Bungwe la Malawi Red Cross Society linakonza maphunziro a tsiku limodzi a mafumu ndi atsogoleri a mipingo a m’boma la Ntcheu ndi cholinga chowazindikiritsa za kufunika koti nawo atenge gawo polimbikitsa anthu a madera awo kulandira katemera wa COVID-19. Mawu ake mkulu wa za umoyo ku bungwe la Malawi Red Cross Society a Daniel Kapokosola Banda ati atsogoleriwa ali ndi kuthekera kolimbikitsa anthu awo kaamba koti amakhala nawo pafupi zomwe zimathandizira kuti uthenga woperekedwa ndi mfumu kapena mtsogoleri wa mpingo anthu awulandire mosavuta. Poyankhulapo m’malo mwa mafumu anzawo Inkosi Kwataine inati ku dera lake, nkhani ya katemera wa COVID-19 anthu anayilandira ndi manja awiri ngakhale kuti poyamba kunali mabodza osaneneka. Iwo ati anasonkhanitsa mafumu ang’onoang’ono kuwadziwitsa za kufunika kolimbitsa anthu m’deralo kuti akalandire katemerayu. Padali pano anthu oposa 7,400 ndi omwe alandira katemera wa COVID-19 m’boma la Ntcheu ndipo mwa mafumu aakulu asanu ndi anayi omwe akupezeka m’bomalo, chiwerengero cha anthu ambiri omwe alandira katemerayu chikuchokera kwa mfumu yaikulu Kwataine. Boma la Malawi kudzera ku unduna wa zaumoyo, likuyembekezereka kupereka katemerayu  kwa anthu oposa 11 million mdziko muno. Padakalipano anthu oposa 400,000 alandira kale katemerayu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Parish Ya Ntcheu Ilimbikitsa Makolo Kuchita Chinamwali cha Chikhristu
news: Akuluakulu oyendetsa ntchito za parishi ya Ntcheu mu dayosizi ya Dedza, loweruka anali ndi mkumano wa alangizi ochokera m’matchalitchi onse a m’parishiyi ndi cholinga chowazindikiritsa za kufunika kolimbikitsa makolo kuchita mwambo wa chinamwali potsatira njira chikhristu pamene atsikana atha msinkhu. Poyankhulapo a gulupa a Venacio Felix Bayani omwe anatsogolera msonkhanowu anati cholinga cha mkumanowu chinali kulimbikitsa alangizi ndiponso kuwazindikiritsa kuti ali ndi udindo wofotokozera makolo a matchalitchi awo za kufunika kotsatira mwambo wa chikhristu pomwe ana awo aakazi atha msinkhu. Iwo anati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti makolo ena amatumiza ana awo ku chinamwali cha chikunja zomwe sizikuyenera kutero ngati akhristu ndipo apempha makolo kuti apewe kuchita miyambo ya chikunja. M’mawu ake, m’modzi mwa alangiziwa yemwenso ndi wapampando wa alangizi pa Center ya Ntcheu a Lucklin Frank Buleya anati mkumanowu unali wofunika kaamba koti uthandizira kuti ntchito yawo ya ulangizi iyende bwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Abambo Aku Limbe Cathedral Ayendera Anzawo Aku Nsanama
news: Parish ya St. Martin de Pores Nsanama mu dayosezi ya Mangochi yati kuyenderana kwa abambo achikatolika a m’madayosezi osiyanasiyana kungathandizire kupititsa patsogolo utumiki wa abambo mu mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno. Bambo mfumu a parishiyi, bambo Mathew Likambale alankhula izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi pomwe bungwe la umodzi wa abambo lochokera ku Limbe Cathedral mu arkidayosezi ya Blantyre linakacheza ndi abambo anzawo aku parishiyi. Abambo aku parishi ya Nsanama ndi anzawo aku Limbe Cathedral Bambo Likambale ati kufika kwa abambowa ku parishiyi kwathandizira kuti agawane nzeru za momwe magulu oterewa akuyendera zomwe anati zawapatsa mphamvu zoti apitirize ntchito yokhazikitsa mabungwe oterewa ku maparish ena mu dayosezi ya Mangochi kamba koti parishiyi ndi yomwe ikutsogolera ntchitoyi. “Ndife okondwa kuwona kuti abambo aku Limbe Cathedral mu arkidayosezi ya Blantyre atiyendera kaamba koti ifenso kwathu kuno tinakhazikitsa bungwe loteleri lomwenso tikutsogolera ntchito yokhazikitsa mabungwe oterewa m’maparish amu dayosezi ya Mangochi. Choncho kubwera kwa anzathuwa kwathandizira kuti tigawane nzeru za momwe tingapititsire patsogolo utumiki oterewu mu mpingo. Mwachitsanzo, kuno ku Nsanama abambo athu akudzipereka kwambiri kugwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana monga za chipembedzo ndi zina zotero kulekana ndi m’mbuyomu pomwe amayi okha amagwira ntchitozi,” anatero bambo Likambale. Pamenepa iwo ati ndi kofunika kuti mikumano yotereyi ilimbikitsidwe mu mpingowu ndi cholinga choti utumiki wa abambo ufike ponseponse ndi kuthandizira ntchito za mpingo. “Kukumana kotere n’kofunika kukulimbikitsa chifukwa kuthandizira kuti abambowa agawane nzeru za momwe mabungwe otere akuyendera m’madayosezi awo komanso ndi zothandizira kulimbikitsa ubale wawo zomwe ndi zopindulira mpingo kaamba koti mabungwe oterewa apezeka ponseponse nd ikukopa abambo ochuluka kutumikira mpingo kumadera komwe ali,” anapitiriza motero bambo Likambale. Nayenso wapampando wa bungwe la umodzi wa abambo ku Limbe Cathedral a Patrick Mwanaposo anati pa ulendowu aphunzira zambiri kuchokera kwa abambo anzawo. “Ife titakhazikitsa bungweli ku parish yathu chaka chatha, tinawona kuti ndi kofunika tibwere ku Nsanama kaamba koti tinamva kale kuti bungwe lotereli kumeneko lidayamba pakanthawi ndiponso ndi la mphamvu kwambiri choncho tadziwonera tokha ndipo taphunzira zambiri kwa anzathuwa,” anatero a Mwanaposo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Monsignor Tamani Apempha Makolo Alimbikitse Ana Kuchita Zachifundo
news: Vicar General wa arkidayosizi ya Blantyre, monsignor Boniface Tamani apempha makolo kuti athandize ana kunvetsetsa udindo wawo kwa ana anzawo pochita za chifundo. Iwo amayankhula izi lachisanu pambuyo potsogolera bungwe la utumwi wa la mu arkidayosiziyo pomwe amakathandiza ana anzawo ku parish ya Neno. Monsignor Tamani kupereka katundu kwa ana ovutika ku Neno Monsignor Tamani ati ndi kofunika kwambiri kulimbikitsa ana kuchita za chifundo adakali achichepere kaamba koti zimathandiza ana kukula ndi mtima wachikondi kwa anzawo. ‘’Mtengo timawongola ukadali waung’ono. Pomwe anawa akadali achichepere ndi kofunika kwambiri kuwaphunzitsa kuchita zachifundo chifukwa moyo umenewo azikula nawo, pa kutero tikhala kuti tikubzala chikondi mwa anawa ndie kuti tidzapeza kuti ngakhale zopereka kumene zaku nsembe sazidzawonapo vuto. Makolo tiyeni tiwathandize anawa kukula ndi mtima wopereka chifukwa potero tidzakoloranso zipatso zabwino ku uzimu komanso ku thupi,” anatero monsignor Tamani. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa ana omwe analandira nawo thandizoli Praise Raphael anati ndi okondwa kaamba ka thandizoli chifukwa lichepetsa mavuto ena omwe anali nawo. “Choyamba ndikuthokoza chifukwa cha chithandizochi komanso ndaphunzira kuti kuchita zachifundo ndi kwabwino chifukwa yemwe alibe, akalandira chithandizo mavuto ake amachepa. Ndaphunziranso chikondi kuti tidzikondana ife ana chifukwa amakuthandiza utavutika sumamudziwa,” anatero Praise. Zina mwa zomwe anawa anapereka kwa ana anzawo ndi monga sugar, sopo, ufa komanso zovala ndipo zinthuzi adasonkha ndi ana amu arkidayosiziyo kupyolera mwa makolo ndi atsogoleri awo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa ndi Ngozi ya Mvula, Mphepo Mdziko la America
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya mphepo komanso mvula yomwe yachitika mdziko la America. Papa wanena izi lamulungu polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Iye wati ali pafupi ndi anthu onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi ndipo akuwapemphelera. “Ndikupemphelera onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi komanso ndayikiza m’mapemphero mizimu ya anthu omwe afa pa ngoziyi. Mulungu alandire mizimu ya onse omwe atisiya ndi kuthandiza onse omwe padakali pano ali m’mavuto kaamba ka ngoziyi,” watero Papa Francisco. Mphepo ndi mvula yowopysayi yodziwika kuti Ida yaphetsa anthu oposa 50 ku New Jersey, New York ndi ku Louisiana. Kuwonjezera apo, mphepo ndi mvulayi yawononga katundu wa nkhaninkhani komanso yabweretsa madzi osefukira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamikira Bungwe La Arche Foundation Pothandiza Anthu Ovutika
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wayamikira bungwe la Arche Foundation kaamba kothandiza ana komanso anthu ovutika. Papa walankhula izi pa mkumano wake ndi mamembala a bungweli mu Hall ya Papa Clement pafupi ndi nyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace. Iye wati kugawira ena zosowa zawo kumathandiza anthuwo kuti ayambenso mwa tsopano, kubweretsa ufulu komanso kumabwezeretsa ulemerero wawo. Papa Francisco wayamikira bungweli lomwe kwa zaka makumi atatu lakhala likuthandiza amayi ndi ana kuchoka mu nkhanza zosiyana-siyana. Iye wayamikiranso bungweli pothandiza amayi othawa m’maiko ena pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana. Mwa njira yapadera iye wayamikiranso bambo Giuseppe Bettoni yemwe adali nawonso pa mwambowu ndipo ndi yemwe adayambitsa bungweli ku Milan m’dziko la Italy m’chaka cha 1991. Pomaliza Papa Francisco anadalitsa onse omwe anali nawo pa mwambowu komanso kufunira zabwino zonse bungweli pano pomwe likukonzekera kutsekulira nyumba yosamalirako anthu mu mzinda wa Rome.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Bambo Mlangizi Wa Asilikali A Nkhondo ku Vatican
news: Likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse lalengeza kuti lachitatu pa 1 September, Papa Francisco wasankha bambo mlangizi wa asilikali a nkhondo a ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Mlangizi watsopano wa asilikali a nkhondo ku Vatican – bambo Reichlin Bambo mlangiziwa omwe ndi a zaka 50 ndi bambo Kolumban Reichlin omwe ndi wansembe wa chipani cha Benedicto Woyera ndipo zadziwika kuti ayamba ntchitoyi mwezi wa mawa. Gulu la asilikali a nkhondowa lodziwika kuti Pontifical Swiss Guards lidayamba pa 22 January m’chaka cha 1506 ndi Papa Julius wachiwiri ndi cholinga chofuna kuteteza Papa yemwe alipo pa nthawiyo komanso kupereka chitetezo ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican. Asilikaliwa amachokera ku Switzerland ndipo ndi chifukwa chake amatchulidwa kuti Swiss Guards ndipo amakhala atamaliza maphunziro a ntchito ya usilikali kwawoko. Msilikaliyu amayenera kukhala m’nyamata yemwe ndi m’katolika, wophunzira bwino ndipo wa zaka za pakati pa 19 ndi 30. Pambali poteteza Papa, iwo amaperekanso ulemu wa chisilikali, guard of honour m’chingerezi kwa alendo olemekezeka monga atsogoleri a maiko omwe amakacheza ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika. Likulu la mpingo wa katolika lodziwika kuti Vatican City State ndi dziko loyima pa lokha monga maiko ena onse ndipo liri ndi banki, timu ya masewero a mpira wa miyendo, post office yomwe imasindikiza ma passport, nyimbo ya fuko kapena kuti national anthem komanso mbendera ya dziko; pongotchula zochepa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhutira Ndi Zokonzekera za Epifania
news: Ofesi yowna za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa ya Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yati ndi yokhutira ndi mmene zokonzekera zozatsegulira Misa yokonzekera chaka cha Epifania pa 14 September 2021 zikuyendera ku parish ya St. Michaels Bangwe mu arkdayosiziyo. Parish ya Bangwe ndi yomwe idasakhidwa kuti itsogolere misa ya Epifania ya m’chaka cha 2022 mdziko muno. Akuluakulu omwe akuyendetsa zokonzekera za mwambowo Poyankhula pambuyo poyendera zokonzekerazi, m’modzi wa akuluakulu ku ofesiyi a Macdonad Kapichi ati akhristu aku parishiyi akusonyeza chidwi pa zokonzekerazi, ndipo ali ndi chikhulupiliro kuti mwambowu udzakhala wosangalatsa kwambiri. “Nditha kutsimikiza kuti zokonzekera zimenezi zikuyenda bwino ndawona ndithu chidwi chimene chilipo maka kumbalinso ya ana eniwake m’mene akuchitira, akusonyeza mtima uja oti nafe tingathe choncho ndikutha kuwona kuti mwambo umenewu udzakhala wochititsa chidwi ndithu,” anatero a Kapichi. M’mawu awo Catechist Paul Gusto a m’parishiyi ati malinga ndi mgwirizano omwe ulipo kumbali zonse zokhudzidwa, sakuwonapo vuto lomwe lingadzalepheretse kuti mwambowu udzakhale wosangalatsa. “Tonse tikugwilira ntchito pamodzi chifukwa cholinga chathu ndi chimodzi kufuna kuti mwambo umenewu udzakhale wapamwamba kwambiri moti zokonzekera zonse zikuyenda bwino ndithu,’’ anatero Catechist Gusto.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Akusaka Achiwembu Omwe Apha Bambo Wina M’boma La Ntcheu
news: Apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu akusakasaka anthu achifwamba omwe apha bambo wina m’mudzi mwa Kanyemba m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Kwataine m’bomalo. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu Sub Inspector Rabecca Kwisongole, malemuyu Maloya Chimbiya usiku wa pa 31 August chaka chino, atacheza ndi achibale ake, anapita kukagona m’nyumba yake yomwe amakhalamo yekha. Kutacha tsiku lotsatira, anthu anapeza chitseko cha nyumba ya mkuluyu chili chokhoma koma thupi lake linapezeka m’munda wina lili ndi mabala. Thupi la malemuyu atalitengera ku chipatala cha Ntcheu, a chipatala anatsimikiza kuti bamboyu wamwalira kaamba komenyedwa. Pakadali pano apolisi akusakasaka anthu achiwembuwa, ndipo apempha anthu omwe angadziwe komwe kuli zigawengazi kuti awatsine khutu. Malemu Maloya Chimbiya omwe ndi a zaka 58, anali a m’mudzi mwa Kanyemba mfumu yaikulu Kwataine m’boma lomwelo la Ntcheu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mfumu Yaikulu Makhwira ku Chikwawa Yatentha Masimba
news: Mfumu yaikulu Makhwira ya m’boma la Chikwawa, yatseka ndi kutentha masimba onse omwe amasungabe anamwali nthawi ya tchuti cha sukulu itatha kale. Mfumuyi yauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti sikoyenera kupitilira kuvinira anamwaliwa m’nthawi ino yomwe sukulu zatsekulidwa. Iyo yati ndi udindo wa mafumu komanso adindo kuteteza mafulu a ana kuphatikizapo ufulu wa maphunziro. Ana kutuluka ku simba “Ine sindilora kuti ana adzikhala ku simba nthawi ya sukulu, ana onse akuyenera kukhala ku sukulu ndipo izi ndi zomwe ndikufuna,” inatero a mfumu Makhwira. Polankhulapo mkulu wa apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa, Assistant Commissioner Alex Simenti wayamikira ganizo la mfumu yaikulu Makhwira ponena kuti kupitilira kusunga anamwali ku simba ndi kuwaphera ufulu wa maphunziro. Assistant Commissioner Simenti wati ku sukulu komwe ana angaphunzire chikhalidwe choyenera. “Tithokoze kuti a gogo athu Makhwira anatseka ma simba amenewa. Tipemphe amene tili ndi masimba amenewa tisawaphere ana ufulu wa maphunziro,” anatero a Simenti. Ngakhale mfumu Makhwira yachita izi m’dera lake, zinthu sizili chomwechi ndi dera la mfumu yayikulu Sitola ya m’boma la Machinga. Kumeneku, Radio Maria Malawi yapeza kuti zinamwali zili mkati m’midzi ina monga Kalonjere, Adija ndi Nantuma ndipo apolisi ku Liwonde alamula mafumuwa kuti awotche masimba ndi kutulutsa anamwali onse. Malingana ndi wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi m’bomalo, Sergeant Ngwashape Msume, mfumu yayikulu Sitola yatsimikizira apolisi kuti ilamula angaliba m’dera lake kuti awotche ma tsimba onse sabata ino isanathe. Zinamwali za anyamata ndi asungwana zimachitika ndi cholinga choti ana adzikula ndi mwambo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dayosizi Ya Karonga Ikhazikitsa Chipani Chotumikira Mayiko Ena
news: Dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Karonga m’dziko muno ikhala  yoyamba kukhazikitsa chipani cha ansembe ndi akhristu eniake omwe adzikatumikira kunja kwa dziko lino.
