Mlembi wa a episkopi a dayosizi ya Karonga, bambo Joseph Sikwese ndi omwe afotokoza izi pomwe wayilesi’yi imafuna kumva tsatanetsatane wa nkhaniyi potsatira kalata yomwe dayosiziyi idalemba yolengeza za chikonzero chokhazikitsa chipanichi. Wayambitsa chipanicho – Bishop Martin Mtumbuka Bambo Sikwese ati  zikhala chomwechi pozindikira udindo omwe akhristu ali nawo wolalikira ena za Yesu Khristu. M’mawu awo, bambo Sikwese atsimikiza za chikonzero chomwe chilipo chokhazikitsa chipani chotychedwa Missio Ad Gentes of Saint John Paul ll. Ntchito yaikulu ya chipanichi ikhala umishonale malinga ndi udindo omwe akhristu ali nawo kudzera mu Sakramenti la Ubatizo. Mu chipani chimenechi mukhala ansembe komanso akhristu eniake omwe azipita kunja kwa dayosiziyi kukalalikira. Akhristu eniake omwe ndi a chikhulupiriro cholimba komanso omwe ali ndi kuthekera kogawana ndi ena chikhulupiriro chawo mosayembekezera malipiro ndi omwe angathe kulowa mu chipanichi. Si kale kwambiri pomwe dayosiziyi idalengezanso kuti ikhala dayosizi yoyamba kudzodza dikoni wa ku nthawi zonse, permanent deacon.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwana Aliyense Ndi Mphatso Yochokera Kwa Mulungu – Papa
news: Kudzera mu uthenga wa pa kanema wa posachedwapa womwe cholinga chake ndi kulimbikitsa amayi onse oyembekezera, Papa Francisco wati mwana aliyense ndi mphatso yochokera kwa Mulungu. Iye wati kudzera mwa amayi, Mulungu amapereka moyo watsopano ku dziko la pansi. “Kwa amayi onse oyembekezera ndati mudziwe kuti ndinu chida chodabwitsa komanso cha mtengo wa patali chomwe Mulungu amagwiritsa ntchito popereka mphatso ya moyo wa tsopano ku dziko la pansi,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawu. Iye wanenanso kuti kwa ma banja omwe sangathe kukhala ndi mphatso ya ana mwayi ulipo wokhala makolo kudzera mu njira ya adoption. Papa Francisco wati polera ndi kusamalira ana amasiye kapena ana omwe makolo awo sangathe kuwasamala anawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana ndi umboni wa chikhristu chenicheni. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti kudzera m’ma banja Mulungu amasonyeza poyera chikondi chake kwa anthu ake. Uthenga wa pa kanemawu ndi chilinganizo cha likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika, Vatican, pofuna kuthandiza anthu kumvetsa za cholinga cha moyo wa banja pokonzekera msonkhano wa ukulu wa ma banja, World Meeting of Families. Pa 19 March chaka chonchino, Papa Francisco adatsekulira chaka cha ma banja cha Amoris Laetitia m’chilatini kapena kuti Ubwino wa Chikondi M’banja. M’mawu ake potsekulira chaka chimenechi, iye adapempha a Katolika pa dziko lonse kuti athandize kulimbikitsa ndi kuteteza moyo wa banja. Iye adatsindikanso za kufunika komakhala pafupi ndi anthu omwe ali m’banja ndi kumawalimbikitsa pamene akumana ndi mavuto komanso kugawana nao chimwemwe chao. Papa Francisco adati ndi kofunika kulimbikitsa ndi kuteteza moyo wa banja pakati pa mamuna ndi mkazi ku ziopysezo zosiyana-siyana ponena kuti moyo wa banja ndi misteri ya chikondi. Chaka cha ma banja cha Amoris Laetitia chidzafika ku mapeto pa 26 June 2022 ndi msonkhano wa ma banja a pa dziko lonse ku Rome.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PMS Malawi Yaphunzira Zambiri Kuchokera Ku Mayiko Ena
news: Ofesi yowona za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa mdziko muno ya Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) yati yaphunzira zambiri za momwe maiko ena a muno mu Africa akuchitira popititsa patsogolo utumwi wa ana mu mpingo. Mkulu wa mu ofesiyi mdziko muno bambo Vincent Mwakhwawa alankhula izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi pambuyo pa msonkhano wa tsiku limodzi wa atsogoleri oyang’anira mabungwe a utumwi wa ana ochokera m’maiko a mu Africa omwe amalankhula chingerezi omwe umachitikira kudzera makina a computer. Mwakhwawa: Anzathu akupeza njira zatsopano Bambo Mwakhwawa omwenso amayendetsa msonkhanowu, ati wakhala wa phindu ku dziko lino la Malawi kamba koti aphunzira njira zomwe anzawo akugwiritsa ntchito pa utumwi wa ana pomwe mmayikowa akhudzidwa ndi mliri wa Coronavirus omwe ukulepheretsa kusonkhanitsa ana pamodzi. “Nzosangalatsa kuti anzathu akhala akupeza njira zatsopano zomwe angathandizire ana pomwe mmayikowa muli mibindikiro yoletsa anthu kuyendayenda (lock down) komabe mwachitsanzo ku Zimbabwe tamva kuti anayambitsa maphunziro operekedwa pa makina a intaneti ngati momwe zimachitira sukulu za ukachejede kwathu kuno koma awa ndi ana choncho mzosangalatsa komanso mmaiko enanso akutha kuphunzitsa ana kudzera ku lamya za makolo awo kuti ndi mliriwu zinthu zisayimiretu,” anatero bambo Mwakhwawa. Pamenepa iwo ati ayetsetsa kuwunikira bwino mfundo zomwe zatuluka mu msonkhanowu ngati ndi kotheka kuti dziko lino lidzisatire potumikira anawa. “Tachita chidwi ndi zomwe dziko la Liberia lafotokoza kudzera mwa Sr. Maureen komanso Fr. John Clement Kombo makamaka ponena kuti patsiku loganizira mwana waku Africa (Day of African Child) iwowa akuti amalikondwelera mwapaderadera kamba koti amakhala ndi misa pomwe anawa amapatsidwa mwayi wonse wotsogolera zochitikachitika za patsikuli komanso tamvanso kuti mu nyengo ya Lent anawa amasonkhetsa ndalama zomwe zimathandizira kulipilira ana osowa pa Maphunziro awo mpaka ndalama zokwana 39,000 Liberian dollars zomwe tikuona kuti titagwirizananso kuno ndi akuluakulu komanso aphunzitsi a anawa nafenso titha kumachitapo kanthu kamba koti ana ena amatha kutiyimbira ku ofesi kuti akusowa fizi ndiye mzoti tikhala tikuziganizira kamba koti mdziko muno pali ambiri angathe kuthandiza komanso palinso ena osowa,” anapitiriza motero bambo Mwakhwawa. Pa msonkhanowu nalonso dziko la Malawi linafotokozera zimenenso likuchita zomwe mzotamandika zedi kamba koti kupatula dziko la Tanzania komanso Sierra Leone, nalonso lakhala likugwiritsa ntchito Radio Maria Malawi ndi Luntha TV zomwe zathandizira kwambiri kufikira ana ndi mapulogalamu osiyanasiyana. Mwazina mayiko omwe anatenga nawo mbali pa mkumanowu ndi a Malawi, Liberia, Nigeria, Sierra Leone, Zimbabwe,Zambia, Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Ghana, Namibia ndi South Africa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Parish Ya Bvumbwe Yakonzeka Kutsogolera Misa Ya Utumwi Wa Ana Chaka Chino
news: Parish ya Bvumbwe yomwe nkhoswe yake ndi Amaritiri aku Uganda mu arkidayosezi ya Blantyre yati ndi yokondwa kuti yasankhidwa kudzatsogolera Misa ya utumwi wa ana pa 23 October, 2021 mu arkidayoseziyo. Sister Olga Kalande omwe akutumikira m’parishiyi alankhula izi pa msonkhano woyamba omwe unakonzedwa ndi ofesi yowona za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa ya Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) mu arkidayoseziyo ndi cholinga chowazindikiritsa momwe angayendetsere Misa ya ana okhaokha ya chaka chino. Sister Kalande ati ndi okondwa kuti arkidayoseziyo yasankha parishiyi kuti idzatsogolere misayi choncho iwo ati ayambapo kukonzekeretsa ana m’magawo osiyanasiyana pa chipembedzo ndi cholinga choti zonse zidzayende bwino pa tsikuli. Iwo atinso alimbikitsidwanso kaamba koti parish zina zopezeka mu dinale ya Thyolo zagwirana nawo manja ndi parishiyi pokonzekera zochitikachitika za mwambowu. “Ndife okondwa ndipo udindo umenewu tawulandira mokondwera moti tikunena pano tayamba kukonzekeretsa ana athu ngati kwayala komanso a Payomo ndipo chosangalatsa ndi choti maparish ozungulira tayamba kuyendera limodzi ndipo iwonso akutithandiza m’mene akhala akuchitira miyambo yotereyi kwawoko zomwe tikukhulupilira kuti zitithandiza pa kukonzekera kwathu kuti zonse zidzayende bwino,” anatero Sister Kalande. Polankhulanso Catechist Elia Jenala omwe ndi m’modzi mwa akuluakulu oyang’anira utumwi wa ana mu arkkidayosezi ya Blantyre anati ndi okondwa kuti Parish ya Bvumbwe yayambapo kale kukonzekera mwambowu. “Ndine wokondwa kuti chinthuchi akhristuwa achilandira ndithu ndipo ndife onyadira kuti ayambapo kugawana zoyenera kuchita pa tsikuli ndi ana awo komanso maparish ena mu dinale ya Thyolo zomwe zikupereka chilimbikitso kuti tsikuli mwambowu udzayenda bwino,” anatero Catechist Jenala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Maepiskopi Kuti Maparishi Awo Akhale Malo Ophunzitsa Akhristu Kutumikira Anzawo
news: M’mawu ake kwa maepiskopi makumi awiri a m’dziko la Italy omwe akutumikira ku ma dera a ku midzi ndipo padakali pano akuchita msonkhano wao mu mzinda wa Benevento, Papa Francisco walimbikitsa ma episkopi’wa kuti ma parishi awo akhale malo ophunzitsa akhristu kutumikira anzao. Iye wapemphanso maepiskopi’wa kuti adzilimbikitsa chifundo ndi chiyembekezo m’ma parishi awo. Papa Francisco wati ndi khumbo lake kuti msonkhanowo uthandize kuyambanso zinthu mwa tsopano. Iye wati msonkhanowo uli ndi kuthekera kolimbikitsa umodzi ndi ubale wabwino pakati pawo ndi kuthandiza kugwirana manja pofuna kuthana ndi mavuto osiyana-siyana. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kuyamikira ma episkopi’wa kaamba ka ganizo lao lochita msonkhanowo. Ma episkopi’wa omwe akuchita msonkhanowu ndi ochokera ku ma diocese a Piedmont, Umbria, Lazio, Abruzzo, Molise, Campania, Puglia, Basilicata ndi Calabria.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akuluakulu Awiri a Khonsolo ya Chikwawa Anjatidwa
news: Apolisi amanga akuluakulu awiri ku khonsolo ya boma la Nsanje powaganizira kuti sanayendetse bwino chuma cha khonsoloyi. Kumangidwa kwa akuluakulu awiriwa kwadza, patangodutsa maola ochepa, mkulu wa bungwe lothana ndi katangale la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) a Martha Chizuma, ndi mlembi mu unduna wa maboma a aang’ono ndi chitukuko cha madera akumidzi a Charles Kalemba, anakumana ndi mafumu, mabungwe omwe sali a boma ndi akuluakulu a nthambi za boma, pa nkhani za katangale m’bomalo. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sub-inspector Agnes Zalakoma watsimikiza za nkhaniyi. Sub-inspector Zalakoma watchula awiriwa kuti ndi mkulu woyang’anira zogulagula pa khonsoloyi, a George Mitambo ndi mkulu wa zomangamanga pa khonsoloyi, a MacLean Kachali. Iye wati awiriwa akaonekera ku bwalo la mlandu posachedwa. A Mitambo a zaka 43, amachokera pa mudzi wa Mlenga m’dera la mfumu yaikulu mwambo m’boma la Zomba, ndipo a Kachali ali ndi zaka 37 omwe amachokera pa mudzi wa Mwazisi dera la mfumu yaikulu Chikulamayembe m’ boma la Rumphi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ADMARC Iwopseza Ochita Chinyengo Ku Misika Yake
news: Bungwe logula ndi kugulitsa mbewu mdziko muno la Agricultural Development and Marketing Corporation (ADMARC) lawopseza kuti lithana ndi onse amene angapezeke kuti akuchita zachinyengo ku misika yake. Wapampando wa komiti yoyang’anira bungweli a Alexander Kusamba Dzonzi alankhula izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi potsatira madandaulo omwe bungweli lalandira omwe akusonyeza kuti ena mwa ogwira ntchito ku misika yake akukhuzidwa ndi mchitidwe wa chinyengo pogula chimanga kwa mavenda m’malo mwa alimi eni ake. Dzonzi: Talandira madandaulo osiyanasiyana A Dzonzi ati bungwe lawo likufufuza za madandaulo-wa ndipo aliyense yemwe apezeke kuti ndi olakwa, malamulo azagwira ntchito pa iye. “Talandira madandaulo osiyanasiyana omwe ena mwa iwo akuti ogwira ntchito ku misika yathu akumalandira K1000 pa thumba lirilonse kwa mavenda ndi cholinga choti agulitse chimanga chawo komanso ena adandaulapo zoti chimanga chawo chikafika ku msika wathu chikumachepa mulingo wake mwina ndi makilo awiri ndi ena ambiri ndiye zimenezi tikufufuza koma tikuzindikiradi kuti zimenezi zitha kukhaladi zoona kaamba koti munthu ndi munthu komanso tikuzindikira kuti anthu oterewa anazolowera makhalidwe a kale ogula chimanga kwa mavenda ndi ena a ndale m’malo mwa mlimi weniweni. Tinenetse kuti ngati wantchito wathu apezekadi kuti wachita zimenezi tidzamuchotsa ntchito,” anawopseza motero a Kusamba Dzonzi. Iwo atinso pa msika uliwonse adakhazikitsa komiti yomwe ikupangidwa ndi anthu a midzi yozungulira msikawo choncho ndi kofunika kuti anthu oterewa akhale oyambilira kuteteza zochitika za msikawo ndi cholinga choti alimi eni ake apindule ndi bungweli pogulitsa chimanga chawo. “Pa msika uliwonse pali komiti ya msikawo yomwe ndi yopangidwa ndi anthu akumidzi komweko ndipo iwo cholinga chawo ndi kuwonetsetsa kuti malonda pa msikawo akuyenda bwino. Mwa njira ina, iwowa ndi maso a ADMARC kuti adziwonetsetsa kuti akugulitsa pa nthawi ino chimanga chawo ndi alimi a kudera lomwelo. Choncho amenewa atithandize koma akapezeka kuti amachita nawo zachinyengo poyamba ofisala wathu tidzamchotsa ntchito ndipo a komitiwa tidzawapereka kwa apolisi kuti agwire ntchito yawo,” anapitiriza a Dzonzi. Mwazina misika ya ADMARC poyamba idatseguliridwa mchigawo chakumwera pa 30 June, 2021 ndipo idatseguliridwanso mzigawo zapakati ndi kumpoto pa 28 July, 2021 komwe alimi akugulitsa chimanga chawo pa mtengo wovomerezeka ndi boma wa 150 Kwacha pa kilogalamu imodzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walangiza Akhristu Asiye Kudandaula, Kunamizira Ena Za Mavuto Awo
news: M’mawu ake lamulungu kwa akhristu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti, Papa Francisco wati kudandaula ndi kunamizira ena pa mavuto omwe anthu akukumana nawo m’moyo wawo ndi kungotaya nthawi chabe. Iye wati m’malo modandaula ndi kunamizira ena pa zovuta ndi matsoka ndi bwino kuti aliyense adzikhala chete kuwunika moyo wake ndi kuwona pomwe akukhonza komanso pomwe akulakwitsa ndi kuyetsetsa kuchitapo kanthu pa zomwe zikulakwitsazo. “Tikati chete ndi kudziwunika m’mitima mwathu mowona mtima ndi motsogoleredwa ndi Mulungu tingathe kuona kuti takhala tikulakwa pomadandaula ndi kunamizira ena pa mavuto a m’moyo wathu,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati kawiri-kawiri anthu amawadandaula anzawo, abale awo ngakhale atsogoleri awo ndi kumanena kuti mavuto omwe akukumana nawo m’moyo wawo ndi chifukwa cha iwowo. Papa Francisco wati ndi zosavuta kuwada anthu ena kaamba ka mavuto amene munthuyo akukumana nawo. Iye walangiza akhristu kuti azipewa kudandaula ndi kunamizira anthu ena pa mavuto awo popeza kawiri-kawiri mavuto ambiri amayambira m’mitima ya akhristu eniake omwewo. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti kudandaula kumabala mkwiyo ndi kunyinyirika zinthu zomwe wati zimaononga kotheratu ubale wathu ndi Mulungu. Iye wapemphera kuti Amayi Maria azithandiza akhristu kudana ndi khalidwe lomangodandaula ndi kunamizira ena pa mavuto omwe amakumana nawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Maranatha Ikufuna Malo Atsopano Ku Chiradzulu
news: Sukuluyi za Maranatha yomwe ndi imodzi mwa sukulu zoyima pa zokha yati ikufuna kukhazikitsa malo ake atsopano ku Njuli m’boma la Chiradzulu. Mkulu woyendetsa sukuluyi Enerst Kaonga ndi yemwe waulula za malingalirowa potsatira kuchita bwino kwa sukulu yake yomwe akuti yakwanitsa kupambanitsa ophunzira opita ku sukulu za ukachenjede okwana 172 pa mayeso apitawa. Ophunzira ku Maranatha Iye wati ndi wosangalala kaamba koti sukuluyi  yakwanitsa kusankhitsa ophunzira ochuluka chotere ngakhale chaka chapitachi kunali mavuto ochuluka kuphatikizapo kuvuta kwa mayeso a fomu folo. “Mukudziwa kuti sukulu ya Maranatha yakumana ndi mavuto ngati kusokonezedwa ndi anthu ena a nsanje ndi kaduka omwe anachititsa kuti malo athu a Matindi atsekedwe chikhalirecho tinalipira malowa kwa zaka khumi, ndi chifukwa pano tili ndi ganizo lokhala ndi malo athu athu ku Njuli m’boma la Chiradzulu,” anatero Kaonga. Iye anapitiriza kuti, “Tangoganizirani pa ophunzira omwe asankhidwawa, 92 ndi anyamata pomwe 80 ndi atsikana zomwe ndi zosangalatsa kwambiri pakati pa sukulu yathu komanso makolo omwe amatipatsa ana.” Mwa ana asankhidwawa, 31 apita ku Mzuzu university, 24 ku LUANAR, 51 MUBAS komanso 35 apita ku Kamuzu University of Health Sciences. Padakali pano sukulu ya Maranatha yabwelera ku malo ake a Matindi omwe mbuyomu anachoka kupita ku Luchenza bwalo la milandu litalowererapo pa mpungwe pungwe omwe unalipo ndi mwini malowa zomwe wati zithandiza kuti ichite bwino kwambiri kaamba koti ophunzirawa ali malo omwe adawazolowera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Parishi Ya Konzalendo Idzatsogolera Chibalalitso Ku Chikwawa
news: Ofesi yowona za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa, yati mwambo wa chibalalitso cha mpingo mu dayosiziyo udzachitikira ku parishi ya Konzalendo. Izi zadziwika pamene Radio Maria Malawi imafuna kudziwa kuchokera kwa mkulu owona za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa mu dayosiziyi bambo Ignasio Yohane, momwe dayosizi yawo yakonzekera za chibalalitso cha mpingo cha chaka chino. Bambo Yohane: Tiyamba kuwaphunzitsa posachedwa Pamenepa, bambo Yohane ati pofuna kuwakonzekeretsa bwino akhristu a parishiyi, ofesi yawo ikhala ikupereka maphunziro kwa mabungwe ndi magulu osiyanasiyana kuyambira mwezi wa September. “Kuno ku dayosizi ya Chikwawa takonza kuti chibalalitso cha mpingo chikachitikire ku parishi ya Konzalendo. Anthu a parishi imeneyi tikhala nawo mu misonkhano yowadziwitsa tsikuli lisanakwane,” anatero bambo Yohane. Ndipo poyankhulapo, wapampando wa parishi ya The Good Shepherd – Konzalendo, a Steven Muwela anati iwo ali ndi chimwemwe chifukwa ndi koyamba kuti mwambo waukulu ngati uwu, udzachitikire ku parishi yawo. “Ifeyo tachilandira bwino kwambiri titamva kuti Chabalalitso cha Mpingo chidzachitikira ku parishi yathu chifukwa zochitikachitika zambiri timangozionera m’maparishi ena,” anatero a Muwela. Mpingo wa Katolika ukuchita Chibalalitso cha Mpingo chaka chino pa mutu wakuti; ‘Ife ndiye sitingaleke kuyankhula zomwe tidaziwona ndi kuzimva,’ mawu omwe akupempha akhristu kuti agawane ndi ena mphamvu ya chifundo cha Mulungu chomwe alandira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Episkopi Watsopano Wa Diocese Ya Tortona M’dziko La Italy
news: Lamulungu pa 29 August 2021, likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, lalengeza za kusankhidwa kwa Monsignor Guido Marini kukhala episkopi, wa diocese ya Tortona ku mpoto kwa dziko la Italy. Monsignor Guido Marini Papa Francisco ndi yemwe wasankha Monsignor Marini pa udindo wa ukuluwu. Kwa nthawi yaitali, Monsignor Marini yemwe ndi wansembe wochokera ku Archdiocese ya Genoa m’dziko la Italy wakhala ali mkulu woyendetsa miyambo ya mapemphero ya a Papa. Monsignor Marini adabadwa ku Genoa pa 31 January m’chaka cha 1965 ndipo adadzodzedwa kukhala wansembe pa 4 February m’chaka cha 1989. Iye ndi katakwe wa malamulo a mpingo wa katolika, Canon Law komanso Civil Law.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lapempha Achinyamata Atenge Gawo Pa Masomphenya a Malawi 2063
news: Nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani, a Gospel Kazako akhazikitsa ntchito ya masomphenya a chitukuko a 2063, kudzera mu zikwangwani zosiyanasiyana. Poyankhula atangokhazikitsa ntchitoyi ku Thabwa m’boma la Chikwawa, nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani, a Gospel Kazako ati anthu akuyenera kukhala osintha kaganizidwe pokhala ndi chiyembekezo chosintha zinthu. Chimodzi mwa zikwangwani zomwe zayikidwa m’boma la Chikwawa Pamenepa a Kazako ati, ngati boma lingakhale ndi mapulani ofooka, anthu amapitilira kukhala obwelera mbuyo pa ntchito za chitukuko. Iwo ati achinyamata akuyenera kutenga mbali yayikulu pa masomphenyawa, popeza akupanga gawo lalikulu la chiwerengero cha a Malawi omwe adzapindule ndi masomphenyawa. “Chiyembekezo chathu ndi chakuti anthu ayamba kumasintha maganizidwe ndipo ayamba kudziwa kuti zitukuko izi ndi zawo,” anatero a Kazako Poyankhulapo mfumu yaikulu ya mtundu wachi sena, Paramount Chief Lundu ati apitiriza kuwuza anthu onse kufunika kogwirana manja ndi boma kuti masomphenyawa akwaniritsidwe. “Ine ndayilandira ntchitoyi ndipo ndipitiriza kuwuza mafumu kuti tigwirane manja ndi boma pokwaniritsa masomphenyawa,” inatero mfumu yayikulu Lundu. Ntchito ya masomphenya a chitukuko a Malawi 2063, ndi imodzi mwa ntchito zikuluzikulu za chitukuko kum’mwera kwa Africa. Ntchitoyi ayikhazikitsa ku Chikwawa chifukwa ndi komwe kuli zitukuko za misewu ndi njanji zolumikizana ndi dziko la Mozambique, zomwe zidzalimbikitse ntchito za mafakitale ndi malonda. Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino, a Lazarus Chakwera anakhazikitsa ntchito ya masomphenya a chitukuko a Malawi 2063 pa 19 January 2021, kulowa m’malo mwa masomphenya a Vision 2020.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la CASIDE Likufuna Kuchepetsa Ziphinjo kwa Amayi, Atsikana
news: Bungwe la Centre for Advancement of Sustainable Development (CASIDE) lati lidzipereka powonetsetsa kuti amayi ndi atsikana akutetezedwa ku ziphinjo zomwe amakumana nazo pa moyo wawo wa tsiku ndi tsiku. Mkulu wa bungweli a Peter Pangani alankhula izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi pambuyo pa maphunziro a tsiku limodzi omwe anakonzera ena mwa amayi ndi atsikana ochokera m’madera a Kachere ndi Makhetha mu mzinda wa Blantyre omwe cholinga chake chinali kuwazindikiritsa za chipangizo chamakono chomwe angathe kugwiritsa ntchito pa nthawi yosamba chomwe akuchitchula kuti Menstruation Cup pachingerezi. A Pangani ati bungweli labwera ndi chipangizochi ndi cholinga choti chithandizire kuchepetsa ziphinjo zomwe anthuwa amakumana nazo zomwe anati zimawalepheretsa kutumikira komanso kugwira ntchito zawo momasuka. Amayi kuwonetsa chipangizo chomwe alandira “Bungwe lathu limawona mbali zosiyanasiyana koma mbali yomwe tikuwona kwambiri ndi yokhudza atsikana ndi amayi makamaka poyang’anira ziphinjo zomwe anthuwa amakumana nazo choncho tinakonza maphunziro oterewa kwa amayi ndi atsikana a m’madera a Makhetha ndi Kachere ngati mbali yoyetsererako pulojekitiyi, kaamba koti madera amenewa kuli anthu ochuluka komanso ndi kosavuta kutsatira bwino lomwe za chipangizochi chifukwa choti chakonzedwa kuti chithandizire amayiwa pozisamalira bwino pa nthawi yomwe akusamba,” anatero a Pangani. Iwo anapitiriza kunena kuti chipangizochi ndi chabwino kaamba koti amayiwa atha kuchigwiritsa ntchito kwa nthawi yaitali. “Ndifotokozenso kuti chipangizochi n’chosavuta kuchigwiritsa ntchito komanso n’chokhalitsa ngati chitasamalidwa bwino kaamba koti atha kuchigwiritsa ntchito kwa zaka zosachepera khumi zomwe zikuwonetsa kuti ndalama zawo zidzigwira ntchito zina kusiyana ndi njira zomwe akugwiritsa panopa zomwenso ndi zokwera mtengo chifukwa choti zimagulidwa mwezi ndi mwezi choncho pakadali pano tifikira anthu osachepera 100 a m’madera awiriwa omwe alandire chipangizochi mwaulere ndipo tikuyembekezereka kuononga ndalama zosachepera 6million Kwacha zomwe tikugwilira limodzi ndi abwenzi athu a mdziko la Australia a Cova Project,” anapitiriza motero a Pangani. Pothilirapo ndemanga pa za chipangizochi, Eluby Shaba yemwe amapereka maphunzirowa wati kugwiritsa chipangizochi kwabwera pa nthawi yabwino kaamba koti kuthandizira amayiwa kukhala ozisamalira nthawi zonse. “Chipangizochi chithandizira ife azimayi kukhala ozisamalira nthawi zonse koposaposa zithandizira ifeyo kuti tidzigwira ntchito zathu momasuka kaamba koti njira zomwe takhala tikuzigwiritsa nthawi yonseyi zakhala zisakudalilika kwenikweni ndipo zimapereka nkhawa kumene, ndine wokondweranso kuti azimayiwa maphunzirowa awalandira ndi chidwi moti ndi chiyembekedzo changa choti zomwe aphunzirazi akagawana ndi anzawo kumadera komwe achokera,” anatero mayi Shaba. Nayenso m’modzi mwa anthu omwe anachita nawo maphunzirowa Chifundo Bwezani yemwe amachokera ku Makhetha wati maphunzirowa awatsegula m’maso kaamba koti athandizidwa ku ena mwa ziphinjo zomwe amakumana nazo ngati atsikana. “Maphunzirowa akhala a phindu kwa ife kamba koti bungweli latithandizanso kutipatsa chipangizochi chomwe chitithandize kwambiri ifeyo ngati akazi pokhala ozisamalira komanso aukhondo nthawi zonse,” anatero mayi Bwezani.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Nthumwi Yake ku Chikondwerero cha Ludmilla Woyera
news: Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika, lalengeza kuti Papa Francisco wasankha Cardinal Christoph Schonborn kukhala nthumwi yake yapadera, ku chikondwelero choti papita zaka 1,100 kuchokera pomwe Ludmilla Woyera adaphedwa ku Bohemia ku Czech Republic kaamba ka chikhulupiriro chake. Chikondwererochi chichitika m’madera ambiri ku Czech Republic koma chikondwelero chachikulu chidzachitika pa 18 September 2021 mu mzinda wa Tetin pafupi ndi ku Prague komwe Ludmilla Woyera yemwe ndi m’malitiri adaphedwera chifukwa cha chikhulupiriro chake zaka 1,100 zapitazo. Ludmila Woyera adabadwa m’banja la chifumu m’chaka cha 859 ku dera lotchedwa Lusatia lomwe liri komwe maiko a Poland, Germany ndi Czech Republic achita malire. Pambuyo pa ubatizo wake Ludmilla Woyera anali mkhristu wodziwika kwambiri yemwe adathandiza kuphunzitsa ndi kufalitsa chikhristu ku dera limenelo. Iye adaphedwa pa 15 September m’chaka cha 921. Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera adamuika Ludmilla Woyera pa mndandanda wa anthu oyera omwe adafera chikhulupiriro chao, Roman Martyrology.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Chipembedzo Chikuyenera Kukhala Phata Lenileni La Chikhulupiriro Cha Akhristu
news: Pano pomwe ansembe ndi akhristu eni ake a m’dziko la Italy asonkhana mu mzinda wa Cremona ku mpoto kwa dzikolo pa msonkhano wokambirana za chipembedzo 71st National Liturgical Week, Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wake kwa nthumwizi. Iye watumiza uthengawu kudzera mwa mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika, Vatican Secretary of State Cardinal Pietro Parolin. Mu uthengawu Papa Francisco wati chipembedzo chikuyenera kukhala phata leni-leni la chikhulupiriro cha akhristu ndipo waonjezeranso kuti mibindikiro yomwe inalipo chaka chatha kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus ikuyenera kuthandiza nthumwizi kuunikanso za kufunika kosonkhana tsiku laMulungu ndi kuchita mapemphero. Koma si pokhapo iye wati ndi kofunika kuti nthumwi ku msonkhanowu ziunike njira zosiyana-siyana zomwe anthu angathe kupempherera maka potengera zomwe zidachitika chaka chatha pomwe anthu amakanika kusonkhana kuti apemphere limodzi. Papa Francisco wati akuyamika Mulungu kuti msonkhanowu chaka chino ukuchitika pa maso ndi pa maso pamene msonkhano wa ngati womwewu udalephereka chaka chatha kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus. Pomaliza iye wafunira zabwino zonse nthumwi za ku msonkhanowu komanso watsimikizira nthumwizi za mapemphero ake. Msonkhanowu ukuchitika pa mutu woti “pomwe awiri kapena atatu asonkhana mu dzina langa ine ndili pomwepo” ndipo wakonzedwa ndi Centre for Liturgical Action.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kwatswiri Wa Za Malamulo Wauza Apolisi Agwire Ntchito Yawo Mwa Ukadaulo
news: Katswiri wa zamalamulo wati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti wopalamula milandu m’dziko akupitilirabe kumwalira ali m’manja mwa apolisi. Katswiri wa zamalamulo ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Chancellor, a Edge Kanyongolo ndiwo anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pothilirapo ndemanga pa imfa ya Boniface Tchipa yemwe anamwalira ali m’manja mwa apolisi kwa Chapananga m’boma la Chikwawa. Kanyongolo: Apolisi azidziwitsa achibale Tchipa limodzi ndi anzake ena awiri, amawaganizira kuti adapalamula mlandu wakuba ndalama zokwana 1.8 Million Kwacha m’nyumba ya wochita malonda wina m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Chapananga, m’boma la Chikwawa. A Kanyongolo ati apolisi akuyenera kugwira ntchito yawo mwa ukadaulo podziwitsa anthu chachilendo chilichonse chomwe chachitika ndi ku polisi. Iwo adati mwachitsanzo, munthu akamwalira ali m’manja mwa apolisi akuyenera kudziwitsa anthu kupyolera m’mikumano ndi atsogoleri ngati mafumu kapena atsogoleri a mipingo za zomwe zachitika. “Zikachitika munthu kumwalira ali m’manja mwa apolisi, apolisiwa athamange nthawi yomweyo kukadziwitsa achibale za zimene zachitika,” adatero a Kanyongolo. Komabe katswiri wa za malamuloyu adati ndi zolakwika pa malamulo anthu kutengera malamulo m’manja mwawo, kaya kutentha nyumba kaya kuthamangitsa apolisi zomwe sizingathe pokhapokha ngati apolisi atamagwira ntchito limodzi ndi magulu onse okhudzidwa ku midzi. Nkhani ngati yomweyi idachitikanso m’mbuyomu ku Lilongwe pamene woganiziridwa mlandu wina, Blair Lule adafera m’chitokosi cha apolisi podikira kuyankha mlandu ku khoti.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Woganiziridwa Mlandu Wakuba Wamwalira Ali M’manja Mwa Apolisi Ku Chikwawa
news: Munthu wina yemwe akumuganizira pa mlandu wakuba ndalama wamwalira ali m’manja mwa apolisi ku Chikwawa, lamulungu madzulo. Malemuyu amadziwika ndi dzina loti Boniface Tchika, wa zaka 30, yemwe amachokera m’mudzi wa Kalu kwa mfumu yayikulu Chapananga m’boma la Chikwawa. Kadadzera: Talandira lipoti Pa nthawi yopalamula mlanduyi, Tchika anali ndi anzake ena awiri omwe akuwaganizira kuti anaba ndalama zokwana 1.8 miliyoni Kwacha kwa wochita malonda wina. Ndipo Lamulungu madzulo, kunali chipwirikiti kutsatira imfa ya Tchika pamene achibale a malemuyu adayamba kuwononga polisi yaing’ono ya Chapananga komanso kuthamangitsa apolisi pa malowa. Anthu okhala pafupi ndi Polisi yaing’ono ya Chapananga, komwe woganiziridwa mlanduyu amachokera, akuti apolisi anamenya modetsa nkhawa mkuluyu zomwe zinachititsa kuti amwalire. Koma mneneri wa apolisi m’dziko muno, a James Kadadzera, ati sanganeneretu chomwe chadzetsa imfa ya mkuluyu kufikira zotsatira za ku chipatala zitatuluka, zomwe adzazipereke kwa mtundu wa Amalawi. “Ndalandira lipoti lochokera ku polisi ya ku Chikwawa yomwe ikuwonetsa kuti woganiziridwa mlanduyu wamwalira ku chipatala cha Chikwawa atadandaula kuphwanya kwa mthupi,” adatero a Kadadzera. Pamenepa a Kadadzera adawonjezera kuti thupi la malemuyu alitengera ku chipatala cha Queen Elizabeth ku Blantyre kuti akalipime kuti adziwe chomwe chapha mkuluyu, ndipo apa ndi pamene adzawone tsogolo la nkhaniyi. Komabe mneneri wa apolisiyu wapempha anthu m’dziko muno kuti apewe kutengera malamulo m’mmanja mwawo popeza anthu otere akapezeka, adzazengedwa mlandu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la CHC Lawuza Makolo Adzimasukirana ndi Ana Awo
news: Bungwe lowona za umoyo mu mpingo wa katolika la Catholic Health Commission mu dayosizi ya Dedza, lati makolo ali ndi udindo wofotokozera achinyamata zokhudza moyo wawo posayang’anira kuti ndi ana kapena achibale awo. Mlangizi wa zaumoyo ku bungweli mayi Roselyn Sulumba ndi omwe anena izi lachiwiri pa maphunziro omwe bungweli linakonzera alangizi a mabanja a chitsanzo ochokera maparish onse ozungulira boma la Ntcheu. Anthu omwe anatenga nawo mbali pa maphunzirowo Iwo anati makolo ambiri amalephera kulangiza ana awo pa nkhani zokhudza uchembere wabwino poganiza kuti awalawula, zomwe zimachititsa kuti amvere mabodza osawathandiza kuchokera kwa anthu ena. Poyankhulapo banja la bambo ndi mayi Prescott ndi Salome Chafulumira kuchokera ku mphepozinayi yomwe ndi nthambi ya Ntcheu parishi anati kusamasukirana ana pa nkhani zogonana kumawayika pa anawa chiopsezo zomwe zimakhudza miyoyo yawo kutsogolo. Maphunzirowa anali a tsiku limodzi ndipo anachitikira m’maparishi awiri omwe ndi Ntcheu ndi Nsipe. Mabanjawa anasankhidwa kuchokera m’mdera awo kuyimira mabanja ena onse ndi cholinga choti nawonso aphunzitse anzawo. Bungwe la Catholic Health Commission kudzera m’projekiti ya Nza’tonse lakhala likugwira ntchito yozindikiritsa achinyamata m’boma la Ntcheu pa nkhani za ubereki, uchembere wabwino ndiponso kuwazindikiritsa za ufulu wawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhristu Akuyenera Kukhala Pafupi Ndi Yesu Khristu Kudzera Mu Ukaristia
news: Polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti, Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kukhala pafupi ndi Yesu Khristu kudzera mu Sakramenti la Ukaristia. Mu zolankhula zake, Papa anakhazikika pa Uthenga Wabwino omwe wawerengedwa pa tsiku lamulungu la 21 mu nyengo ya pa chaka. Iye wati mu Uthenga wa pa tsikuli zikuwoneka poyera kuti si anthu onse adaulandira uthenga wa Ambuye Yesu woti thupi lake ndi chakudya chenicheni ndiponso kuti magazi ake ndi chakumwa chenicheni, ndi chifukwa chake anthu ena adayamba kuchoka. Papa Francisco wati powona zinthu ngati izi, Ambuye Yesu adafunsa ophunzira khumi ndi awiri aja ngati nawo anali kulingalira zochoka ndipo ndi Simon Petro adananena mwa mve mve mve kuti maganizo ochoka anali kutali ndi iwo popeza Yesu Khristu ndiye mau opatsa moyo. Iye wati ponena kuti thupi lake ndiye chakudya chenicheni komanso magazi ake ndiye chakumwa chenicheni, Yesu Khristu anali kunenanso za buledi ndi vinyo zomwe pa Misa zimasunduka thupi ndi magazi ake. Pamenepa Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kokhala pa ubale weniweni ndi Yesu Khristu kudzera mu Sakramenti la Ukaristia. Iye wamaliza ndi kupempha uneneri wa Amayi Maria kuti azithandiza akhristu kuchitira umboni wa zomwe akhulupirira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Seminale ya Nankhunda Yapempha Makolo Alimbikitse Ana Awo za Unsembe
news: Makolo a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno awapempha kuti alimbikitse ana kutsatira moyo wotumikira Mulungu ngati wansembe. M’modzi mwa aphunzitsi ku seminale yaing’ono ya Child Jesus -Nankhunda mu dayosizi ya Zomba, bambo Ignatius Chilunda ndi omwe anena izi lero pa mwambo wa nsembe ya Misa ku Zomba Cathedral mu dayosiziyo pomwenso ansembe ena ophunzitsa pa semianleyi anapita m’maparish osiyanasiyana a mu dayosiziyo kukagwiranso ntchito ngati yomweyi. Mbali imodzi ya seminale ya Nankhunda Iwo ati pali zinthu zosiyanasiyana zomwe zikuchitika masiku ano zomwe zikulepheretsa achinyamata ambiri kupita ku utumiki, choncho makolo akuyenera kutenga mbali yaikulu pothandizana ndi mpingo kulimbikitsa ana awo powawunikira kufunika kopita ku unsembe. “Ndi udindo wathu ngati ansembe kuyenda m’maparish osiyanasiyana kulimbikitsa makolo powazindikiritsanso kuti umodzi mwa utumiki wawo ndi kuthandiza mpingo kuti upeze atsogoleri ngati ansembe,” anatero bambo Chilunda. Iwo anapitilira kunena kuti kuyambira mchaka cha 2020, Nankhunda Seminary inawonjezera chiwerengero cha ana omwe amatenga ndi kukayamba form 1 pa seminary-yi, ndipo ali ndi chiyembekezo chakuti pakutha pa zaka zinayi sukuluyi idzidzakhala ndi ophunzira okwana 400, ngati njira imodzi yofuna kulimbikitsa maphunziro komanso kuwonjezera chiwerengero cha ansembe mdziko muno. Pofuna kukwaniritsa izi, sukuluyi akuti inakonza ndondomeko zosiyanasiyana zokonzanso seminaryi. Mwa zina, bambo Chilunda ati sukuluyi yakonza ndondomeko zolimbikitsa ulimi osiyanasiyana monga wa nthochi ndi nanazi zomwe amagulitsa ndi kumapeza thandizo la sukuluyi, komanso kuwonjezera kumanga malo osiyanasiyana ndi zina zambiri. Iwo anati zina mwa zinthuzi anayamba kale komabe akusowa zambiri choncho apempha akhristu akufuna kwabwino kuti athandizepo kudzera mu njira zosiyanasiyana ndi cholinga choti sukuluyi ikwaniritse zolinga zake. “Tikufuna kumanga malo ogona, kuwonjezera malo odyera opemphelera, choncho iyi ndi ntchito yaikulu ndithu, tikupempha akhristu osiyanasiyana kuti ngati angathe pomwe tikugwira ntchito imeneyi atigwire dzanja potithandiza ndi zinthu zosiyanasiyana kuti ntchitoyi iyende bwino,” anatero bamboo Chilunda. Pa 4 September chaka chino, achinyamata omwe akufuna kupita kukayamba maphunziro awo ku sukuluyi, akhala akulemba mayeso okalowera mu fomu 1 m’madera osiyanasiyana omwe akhazikitsidwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Akusakasaka Anthu Osadziwika Omwe Apha Bambo Wina ku Kasungu
news: Apolisi m’boma la Kasungu akusakasaka munthu yemwe wapha bambo wina wa zaka 28 zakubadwa. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyo – Mkozi Malinga ndi wachiwiri wa mneneri wa apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Miracle Mkozi, malemuyu Stephano Banda yemwe amagwira ntchito ya kabaza wa njinga ya moto, anasowa pa 18 August chaka chino pomwe anthu ena osadziwika anamutenga kupita naye ku malo osadziwika kufikira tsiku lotsatira pomwe thupi lake linapezeka lili ndi mabala okhaokha m’mudzi wa Liwonde mfumu yaikulu Chilowamatambe m’bomalo. Thupilo anapita nalo pa chipatala cha boma la Kasungu komwe achipatala atalipima, anatsimikiza kuti malemuyu afa kaamba kovulala kwambiri m’mutu. Pakadalipano apolisi m’bomalo akhazikitsa ntchito yosakasaka anthu omwe achita chiwembuchi, ndipo apempha anthu omwe angadziwe komwe kuli anthu achifwambawa kuti akanene ku polisi yomwe ali nayo pafupi. Malemu Stephano Banda anali wa m’mudzi mwa Kafulu mfumu yaikulu Wimbe m’boma la Kasungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chipani cha Sacramentine Chilandira Asisiteri 7 Atsopano
news: Loweruka pa 21 August, 2021 ndi tsiku losayiwalika kwa asisiteri a chipani cha Sacramentine, pomwe alandira mphatso ya asisiteri asanu ndi awiri m’chipanichi. Poyankhulapo pa mwambo wa malumbiro oyamba-wa mkulu woyimira chipanichi kuno ku Malawi, Sister Florence M’meta athokoza Mulungu kaamba ka mphatso ya atumikiwa ku chipachichi ndipo alangiza asisiteri atsopanowa kuti atumikire Mulungu mwa toto moyo. Asisteri omwe achita malumbiro awo oyamba pa tsikuli Iwo anati ntchito yotumikira Mulungu imafunika kudzikhuthula pa chilichonse chomwe munthu akuchita. M’mawu awo, bambo Lawrence Kudzingo omwe ndi bambo mfumu pa parishi ya Ntcheu mu dayosizi ya Dedza, alimbikitsa asisiteriwa kuti adzikonda kupemphera kuti ntchito yawo yotumikira Mulungu iyende bwino. Ena mwa asisiteriwa omwe anayankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi, Sister Elizabeth Kadyamowa ndiponso Sister Doreen Chathyoka anati ndi okondwa chifukwa choti Mulungu wawachitira zazikulu pokwaniritsa khumbo lawo lomwe akhala akulifuna kwa nthawi yaitali. M’modzi mwa makolo omwe anadzachitira umboni malumbiro a atumikiwa a Paul Kadyamowa kuchokera ku parishi ya St. Anthony mu dayosizi ya Zomba, anati ndi okondwa kaamba koti Mulungu wakwaniritsa khumbo la anawa, ndipo apempha makolo ena kuti atengerepo chitsanzo chabwinochi chomwe makolo a atumikiwa achita polora ana awo kuti atumikire Mulungu kudzera mu usisiteri. Ena mwa asisiteri atsopanowa omwe achita malumbiro awo oyamba pa tsikuli ndi Sister Lucy Ogola, Sister Veronica Kavata ndi Sister Cecilia Muasa  kuchokera mdziko la Kenya ndiponso Sister Elizabeth Kadyamowa, Sister Mary Ng’ambi, Sister Doreen Chathyoka ndi Sister Catherine Bondo a kuno ku Malawi. Chipani cha asisteri cha Sacramentine kuno ku Malawi chikupezeka m’madayosizi awiri omwe ndi Dedza ndi Mangochi. Ku Dedza chikupezeka ku parishi ya Ntcheu pomwe ku Mangochi chikupezeka maparishi atatu omwe ndi Namwera, Ulongwe ndi Monkeybay.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwana Wafa Atamira M’madzi M’boma la Chikwawa
news: Khanda la miyezi makumi awiri, lafa litamira m’madzi m’boma la Chikwawa. Ngoziyi yachitika pa 19 August, 2021 ku dera lina lochitirako za ulimi lotchedwa Makungu chakuvuma kwa bomali. Mwanayu ndi Petro Dickson, yemwe amakhala m’mudzi mwa Ndombo, kwa mfumu yayikulu Makhwira m’boma lomwelo la Chikwawa. M’neneri wa apolisi ku Chikwawa, Dickson Matemba watiuza kuti mayi ake a mwanayu adamusiya yekha akusewera mbali ina ya munda wake, mayiyu n’kumagwira ntchito zina zakumunda. Pamenepa, mwanayu adakwawa ndi kugwera mu ngalande yomwe idali ndi m’madzi ochuluka. Apolisi atadziwitsidwa za nkhaniyi, adathamangira ku maloko motsagana ndi a chipatala chaching’ono cha Makhwira. Apa ndi pomwe achipatalawa adatsimikiza kuti malemuyu wamwalira kaamba kobanika. Padakali pano, apolisi a m’bomali achenjeza makolo kuti apewe khalidwe losiya ana akusewera okha pafupi ndi madzi, kuti apewe ngozi ngati zimenezi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Anthu Za Kufunika Kobayitsa Katemera Wa COVID-19
news: Mogwirizana ndi maepiskopi a Mpingo wa Katolika ku North komanso ku South America, Papa Francisco kudzera mu uthenga wa pa kanema, walimbikitsa anthu za kufunika kobayitsa katemera wa nthenda ya COVID-19. Iye wati munthu aliyense yemwe akubayitsa katemerayu akuwonetsa kuwukonda moyo wake komanso kaamba koti nthendayi ndi yopatsirana, pobayitsa katemerayu anthuwa akuwonetsa chikondi chomwe ali nacho pa anthu ena makamaka awo omwe miyoyo yawo ili pa chiwopsezo kwambiri. Mu uthengawu, Papa Francisco wayamikira anthu a zofufuzafufuza ndi a za sayansi poyesetsa kupeza katemerayu mwa msanga kuti miyoyo ya anthu ambiri itetezeke. Iye wati ndi mphamvu ya Mulungu kudzera mwa anthu a zofufuzafufuza ndi a za sayansi kuti tsopano katemera wa nthendayi alipo. Papa wati ngati katemerayu atafikira munthu aliyense chiyembekezo chilipo kuti nthendayi ingathe kutha. Ena omwe alumikizana ndi Papa Francisco polimbikitsa za kufunika kobayitsa katemerayu osati kukakamiza anthu ndi Archbishop Jose Gomez yemwe ndi president wa bungwe la maepiskopi a Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la America la United States Conference of Catholic Bishops, Cardinal Claudio Hummes wa ku Brazil pongotchula ochepa. Pa 14 January 2021 Papa Francisco limodzi ndi Papa wopuma Benedicto wa 16, adalandira gawo loyamba la katemerayu ndipo patatha sabata zitatu adalandira gawo lachiwiri la katemerayu. Anthu pafupi 800 omwe amakhala ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican lomwe ndi dziko laling’ono kwambiri pa dziko lonse la pansi adalandira katemerayu komanso anthu pafupi 4000 ogwira ntchito ku Vatican limodzi ndi ma banja awo adalandiranso katemerayu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ECM Yalengeza Za Chikondwelero Cha Zaka 100 Za Legio Ya Maria
news: Mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno walengeza za chikondwerero cha zaka 100 za bungwe la Legio ya Maria pa dziko lonse lapansi pomwe bungweli linakhazikitsidwa ndi Frank Duff pa 7 September mchaka cha 1921 ku Dublin mdziko la Ireland. Mlembi wa bungwe la maepiskopi mdziko muno, bambo Henry Saindi ndi omwe atsimikizira izi Radio Maria Malawi pomwe bungwe la maepiskopiwa latulutsa kalata yofotozera za chikondwererochi chomwe chikuyamba pa 7 September 2021 ndipo chidzafika kumapeto mchaka cha 2022. Bambo Saindi ati maepiskopi a mpingowu akufunira chikondwelero chopambana kwa a Legio onse ndi akhristu ena onse ac hikatolika kaamba koti bungweli limagwira ntchito yaikulu mu mpingowu.  “Ndi zoonadi kuti chaka chino kulowa mchaka cha 2022, bungwe la Legio lomwe akhristu amalidziwa bwino kaamba ka ntchito zake, lakwanitsa zaka 100 chilikhazikitsireni muyambitsi wake Frank Duff ku Ireland. Ndikunena kuti ndi chikondwelero chachikulu kaamba koti a Legio onse pa dziko lonse lapansi kuphatikiza kuno ku Malawi, ayenera kukondwera kuti bungwe lawo lakhala likugwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana mu mpingo wa katolika m’zaka 100 zapitazi. Ndingonenapo kuti bungweli linafika mchaka cha 1940 ndi Edel Quinn zomwe zikutanthauzanso kuti ayi papita zaka zochuluka ndithu,” anatero bambo Saindi. Iwo ati pomwe mamembala a bungweli akonza zochitikachitika zosiyanasiyana zoperekeza ku chikondwelerochi mabishopu a mpingowu akuyembekezera kuti anthuwa achita zimenezi posatira ndondomeko zonse zomwe boma linakhazikitsa zothandizira kupewa nthenda ya COVID-19. “Chimene mabishopu akulimbikitsa ndi choti pakhale miyambo yosiyanasiyana kaya ndi mapemphero komanso zina zonse zomwe mamembala a bungweli azikonza pofuna kukondwelera chakachi kuti zimenezi zichitike ndithu ndipo mu September chaka chino ku Dublin kudzakhala mwambo wa nsembe ya Ukaristia yokhazikitsa chikondwelerochi ndipo a Legio onse akupemphedwa kudzasatira mwambowu koma kuchoka apo kuno ku Malawi tidzakhala ndi mwambo wokhazikitsa chikondwelerochi choncho mkofunika pochita izi njira zomwe boma linakhazikitsa pofuna kupewa mthenda ya Covid 19 zisatiridwe mokhulupirika ndi aliyense,” anapitiriza motero bambo Saindi. M’mawu ake mtsogoleri wa bungweli ku Senatus ya Maula mu arkidayosezi ya Lilongwe, Dr. Mary Shaba ati ndi okondwa kuti mpingo walengeza za chakachi. “Ifeyo ngati a Legio ndife okondwa kaamba ka chikondwelerochi chifukwa chakuti chafika pa nthawi yake pomwe tikukondweleranso zikondwelero zina monga cha Yosefe woyera, chaka cha mabanja komanso mtsikana wina wachichepere yemwe analimbikitsa kuti anthu azipemphera koposaposa nthawi ya chibalalitso cha mpingo kaamba koti izinso zikugwirizana ndi ntchito yathu yofalitsa uthenga wabwino kaamba koti ife timafikira anthu onse pa banja choncho ife takonzeka zedi pa chikondwelerochi,” anatero Dr. Shaba. Pali chiyembekedzo chakuti mwambo wokhazikitsa chikondwelerochi kuno ku Malawi udzachitika pa 16 October, 2021 ku Maula Cathedral mu arkidayosezi ya Lilongwe. Mwa zina, dziko la Malawi liri ndi ma Likulu awiri omwe amatchulidwa kuti Senatus ndipo ndi a Blantyre yomwe mtsogoleri wake ndi mayi Florence Musasa komanso ya Maula yomwe Dr. Mary Shaba akuyitsogolera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ECM Yatsindika Kufunika Kokondwelera Njira Zamakono Zofalitsira Mauthenga
news: Bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika m’dziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) latsindika za kufunika kuti akhristu akondwelere njira zamakono zofalitsira mauthenga. Bungweli lanena izi kudzera m’kalata yomwe yasayinidwa ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa bungweli, bambo Henry Saindi. Kudzera mkalata’yi maepiskopi’wa akumbutsa a Katolika onse kuti lamulungu pa 29 August mpingo wa katolika m’dziko muno ukondwelera za kufunika kwa njira za makono zofalitsira mauthenga. Asayina chikalatacho-Bambo Saindi Kalatayi yati mliri wa coronavirus omwe wakhala ukulepheretsa anthu kusonkhana m’matchalitchi monga momwe amachitira mliriwu kulibe, wawonetsa poyera kufunika kwa njira za makono pofalitsa Uthenga wa Chipulumutso ndi kugawana mauthenga osiyana-siyana kotero ndi koyenera kukondwerera ndi kuthokoza Mulungu kaamba ka mphatso ya njira za makono zimenezi zofalitsira ma uthenga. Kalata ikukumbutsa a Katolika onse kuti chopereka chonse cha pa tsiku lamulungu limeneli ndi choti chithandizire pa ntchito zofalitsa ma uthenga mu Mpingo’wu. Chaka chilichonse mpingo wa katolika umakhala ndi tsiku loganizira njira zamakono zofalitsira ma uthenga, World Day of Social Communications. Mpingo wa katolika udakondwerera tsikuli lamulungu pa 16 May, 2021 pa mutu woti Bwerani  Mudzaone (Come and See) omwe ndi mawu a Phillipo m’positoli opezeka mu Uthenga Wabwino monga adalembera Yohane mutu 1 ndime ya 46. Papa Francisco adasankha mutuwu pozindikira kuti kufalitsa mauthenga kumasowa kulumikizana ndi anthu kuti anthu omwe akusoweka kumva uthengawo awumve bwinobwino. Iye adafotokozanso kuti kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus omwe wachititsa kuti anthu asiye kukhala m’magulu njira yabwino yoti anthu ndi kulumikizana bwino pa nthawiyi, ndi kudzera m’mauthenga osiyana-siyana kudzera mu njira za makono zofalitsira mauthenga. Papa Paulo wa 6 ndi yemwe adakhazikitsa tsikuli m’chaka cha 1967 ndi cholinga chofuna kuti Mpingo uziganizira njira za makono zofalitsira uthenga wa chipulumutso monga kalata yotchedwa Gaudium et Spes ya Vatican Council II imanenera za mpingo mu nyengo ya makono, the Church in the modern world.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Kuphedwa Kwa Asisitere Awiri M’dziko La South Sudan
news: Potsatira kuphedwa kwa asisitere awiri a chipani cha Mtima Woyerayera wa Ambuye Yesu m’dziko la South Sudan lamulungu lapitali, Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wopepesa ku chipani cha ma sisitere’wa komanso mabanja awo. Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wopepesawu kudzera mwa mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika, Cardinal Pietro Parolin. Kudzera mu uthengawu, Papa Francisco wati ndi wogwidwa ndi chisoni chachikulu ndipo wati akupepesa chipani cha asisitere’wa ndi achibale onse. Iye wapempha Mulungu kuti alandire mizimu ya asisitere’wa m’manja mwake komanso kuti afungatire anamfedwa ndi anzawo onse pa nthawi yovutayi. Papa Francisco wati ndi chikhulupiriro chake kuti imfa ya asisitere’wa ithandiza pa ntchito yolimbikitsa mtendere ndi kukhululukirana m’dzikolo. Sister Mary Abud, Sister Regina Roba ndi anthu ena atatu aphedwa lamulungu lapitali ndi anthu a chifwamba ku malire a dziko la South Sudan ndi Uganda pomwe amachokera ku mapemphero.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mphunzitsi Wanjatidwa Kaamba Kogwilira Mwana Wa Sukulu
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dedza amanga mphunzitsi wa zaka 27 yemwe amaphunzitsa pa Dedza  Roman Catholic   Primary School, pomuganizira kuti wagwilira msungwana wa zaka 15 zakubadwa ndi kumupatsa pathupi. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Cassimu Manda, mphunzitsiyu Collings Chikaphonya wakhala akugona ndi mwanayu kuyambira chaka chatha pomwe iye anali standard 8 kufikira chaka chino pomwe wapezeka kuti ndi woyembekezera. Nkhaniyi yadziwika kaamba koti mtsikanayu atawona kuti ali ndi pathupi anafotokozera mphunzitsiyu zomwe sizinamukomere ndipo anakanitsitsa ndi kuyamba kumamuopseza. Izi zinachititsa kuti mtsikanayu akafotokozere anthu ena omwe anatengera nkhaniyi ku ofesi yowona za chisamaliro cha anthu (social welfare) m’bomalo. Mkulu waku ofesiyi anafotokozera apolisi omwe anatsatira nkhaniyi ndi kumanga mkuluyu. Pakadali pano oganiziridayu akusungidwa m’chitokosi cha apolisi pomwe akuyembekezera kukawonekera ku khothi ndi kukayankha mlandu ogwirira mwana zomwe ndi zosemphana ndi gawo 138 ndime yoyamba ya malamulo a dziko lino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sukulu Ya Maranatha Yapeza Malo Ena Ku Thyolo
news: Sukulu yoyima payokha ya Maranatha yati maphunziro ku sukulu yake ya anyamata okhaokha ayambiranso sabata ya mawa itapeza malo atsopano ku Luchenza mboma la Thyolo Mkulu wa sukuluyi a Enerst Kaonga alankhula izi lolemba pa msonkhano wa atolankhani mu mzinda wa Blantyre omwe unakonzedwa ndi cholinga chofotokozera mmene zinthu ziliri ku imodzi mwa sukulu zake yomwe ili ku Matindi m’boma la Blantyre, pomwe sukuluyi inasekedwa ndi ma sheriff masiku apitawa. Kaonga: Ana athu ayambiranso kuphunzira A Kaonga ati ngakhale nkhaniyi ili ku bwalo la milandu, ndi koyenera kuti maphunziro apamwamba apitilirebe kuperekedwa kwa ana ake choncho sukuluyi yapeza malo atsopano omwe m’buyomu panalinso sukulu yomwe imkadziwika bwino ndi dzina loti ASTEPI ku Luchenza mboma la Thyolo. “Nditsimikizire kuti ana athu akuyambanso maphunziro awo kaamba koti tapeza malo atsopano pomwe panali sukulu ya Astepi ku Luchenza. Ndi malo abwino zedi oyenera maphunziro ndipo chosangalatsa ndi chakuti malowa akuposa malo omwe timagwiritsa ntchito aku Matindi choncho ngati ena amaona ngati tibwerera mbuyo pa nkhani ya maphunziro amenewo akunama kaamba koti Maranatha ndi Maranatha basi,” anatero a Kaonga. Pamenepa iwo atsimikizira makolo onse kuti asadere nkhawa kaamba ka nkhaniyi ndipo atumizebe ana awo kuti akasulidwe mwapamwamba. “Makolo asadere nkhawa kaamba ka zomwe zachitikazi ndipo tinenetse kuti ife sitikuopa kaamba koti ndalama zonse za lenti tinalipira kale ndipo malisiti ake aliponso zomwenso ndi ndalama zosachepera 240, 000 million kwacha ndipo ndi zomvetsa chisoni kwa ife kuti tawoneka ngati anthu osalipira lenti, mbiri yathu yayipa zedi komanso ndalama zawonongeka ndi zosachepera 1 billion kwacha komabe izi sizikutibwenza mbuyo kaamba koti tipitirizabe kuchita bwino ngati mmene takhala tikuchitira m’mbuyomu,” anapitiriza motero a Kaonga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwambo Wokhazikitsa Episkopi waku Dedza Wanunkhira
news: Zokonzekera za mwambo wodzodza episkopi watsopano wa dayosizi ya Dedza sabata ya mawa pa 28 August akuti zikuyenda bwino ndipo zikuyandikira kufika ku mapeto. Wofalitsa nkhani mu dayosiziyo, bambo Joseph Biliati awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti anthu onse akonzekere mwambo wa ukuluwu. Akuyembekezeka kukhala episkopi-Bambo Chifukwa Iwo ati episkopi-yu si wa dayosizi ya Dedza yokha koma mpingo wonse wa Katolika kuno ku Malawi. Patapita zaka zitatu dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Dedza ili yopanda m’busa wa mkulu, sabata ya mawa loweruka dayosiziyi ikhala ndi m’busa wa mkulu. Loweruka sabata ya mawa bambo Peter Adrian Chifukwa adzakhala Ambuye Peter Adrian Chifukwa. Wolankhulira dayosizi ya Dedza, bambo Joseph Biliati ati zokonzekera za mwambowu zafika ku malecheleche ndipo iwo ati anthu akonzeke kudzasangalala bwino lomwe. Iwo ati nsalu yodzavala pa tsikuli ndi ya dayosizi ya Dedza yomwe ikupezeka m’madayosizi osiyana-siyana. Iwo akumbutsanso anthu za kufunika kodzadziteteza malinga ndi mliri wa coronavirus. Pa 8 May chaka chino Papa Francisco adasankha Bambo Peter Adrian Chifukwa a zaka 48 za kubadwa kukhala episkopi wa dayosizi ya Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Maiko, Mabungwe Athandize Dziko La Lebanon
news: Potsatira ngozi ya kuphulika kwa zinthu pa malo ena osungira katundu yomwe idachitika pa 4 August chaka chatha ndipo idapha anthu osachepera 200 ndi kuwononga katundu wa ndalama zosachepera 4 billion dollars, Papa Francisco wapempha maiko ndi mabungwe kuti athandize dziko la Lebanon lomwe likupitirira kuvutika. Ngoziyi isadachitike, dziko la Lebanon linali lili kale pa mavuto a za chuma ndi a ndale. Papa’yu wati sakuyiwala m’mapemphero ake mabanja omwe ngoziyi idawakhudza kaamba ka abale awo omwe adafa ndi kuvulala ndi mabanja onse omwe katundu wawo adasakazika. Iye wati ndi khumbo lake kuti akacheze m’dziko la Lebanon. Mwezi wathawu Papa Francisco adayitana ndi kuchita zokambirana komanso mapemphero ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican ndi atsogoleri a mipingo ya chikhristu ochokera m’dziko la Lebanon.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sukulu ya Maranatha Yakamang’ala ku Khothi pa Nkhani Yokhudza Malo Ake a Matindi
news: Posatira kutsekedwa kwa sukulu ya anyamata ya Maranatha yomwe ikupezeka pa malo a Matindi m’boma la Blantyre, mkulu oyendetsa sukuluyi Enerst Kaonga wauza olemba nkhani mu mzinda wa Blantyre, kuti akadandaula ku bwalo la milandu pa nkhaniyi. Masiku apitawa, olanda katundu wa ngongole omwe pa chingerezi amatchedwa kuti ma Sheriff anatseka sukuluyi ponena kuti ili ndi ngongole za nkhaninkhani. Kaonga: Ndinali odabwa Koma poyankhula ndi olemba nkhaniwa, Kaonga wati ndi odabwa ndi nkhaniyi kaamba koti ngongole yomwe anali nayo anatsiriza kale kupereka m’mwezi wa June chaka chino. “Ndinali odabwa kuti lachisanu ma sherifi anabwera ku sukuluyi kudzatseka ati kaamba ka ngongole chikhalirecho ine ndi mwini wa malowa omwe m’mbuyumu amatchedwa Matindi Academy, a Elvis Nserebo tinagwirizana zobwereka malowa kwa zaka khumi pa mtengo wa 240 milliyoni yomwe ndinapereka yonse mwezi wa June chaka chino,” anadandaula motero Kaonga. Iye anawonjezera kuti panalinso mgwirizano wina oti agule katundu monga mipando ndi zina za mu ofesi pa mtengo wa 40 milliyoni kwacha, koma ndalamayo idziperekedwa kwa wa ngongole wa a Nserebo. Asamutsiridwa ku lodge – Ophunzira ku Maranatha “Zodabwitsa zinawoneka pamene nditatsala ndi ngongole ya 6 milion kwacha kuti ndimalize, a Nserebo anakambirana mw nseri ndi mpingo wa CCAP Blantyre Synod kuti a agulitsane malowa osandiuza,” anatero a Kaonga. Bwalo la Milandu liyamba kumva za mpungwepungwe wa nkhaniyi kuyambira lolemba pa 16 August chaka chino. Padakali pano sukuluyi yatsamutsila ophunzira a makalasi a mayeso a folomu 4 ndinso 2 ku malo ogona alendo a White Village Lodge omwe ali ku Lunzu ndi cholinga choti zokonzekera mayeso a MANEB zisasokonekere. Koma sukuluyi yatsimikizira onse okhudzidwa ndi ophunzira omwe ali mmanja mwa sukuluyi kuti ku malo omwe akukhala kuli chisamaliro komanso chitetezo chokwanira kaamba koti oyendetsa sukuluyi akukhala ku malowa ndi kuwonetsetsa kuti zonse zikuyenda bwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mpingo Wa Katolika Ku Malawi Ukhala Ndi Dikoni Wa Ku Nthawi Zonse Woyamba
news: Dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Karonga yomwe epiksopi wake ndi Ambuye Martin Anwell Mtumbuka, ikhala yoyamba mdziko muno, kupezeka ndi dikoni wa ku nthawi zonse. Dayosizi yake ikhala yoyamba kudzodza dikoni waku nthawi zonse – Bishop Martin Mtumbuka Mlembi wa zofalitsa nkhani mu dayosiziyo, bambo Edward Kamanga atsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pamene imafuna kumva tsatanetsatane wa nkhaniyi pano pomwe dayosiziyo ikukonzekera kudzodza dikoni wa ku nthawi zonse. Iwo ati ngakhale kuti nkhaniyi ikuyamba kumene kuno ku Malawi, koma si yachilendo kaamba koti ili mu malamulo a mpingo wa katolika. “Malamulo a Episcopal Conference of Malawi, malamulo a Vatican Council II komanso mabukhu ambiri mbiri a mpingo nkhniyi ilimo chabe kuti kuno ku Malawi akaka ndi koyamba kuchitika zimenezi,” anatero bambo Kamanga. Dikoni wa ku nthawi zonse akhozna kukhala wokwatira kapena atha kusankhanso kusakwatira ndipo ntchito yake ndi kuthandiza ansembe pa nkhani zosiyana-siyana za utumiki. Dikoni ameneyu atha kulandiritsa Ukaristia, kulalika, kukayendera odwala ndi kukawalandiritsa Ukaristia odwalawo, kubatiza ana, kuyendetsa mwambo wa maliro woti si pakuchitika Misa, kuphunzitsa anthu mozama za chikhulupiriro cha mpingo wa katolika ndi ntchito zosiyana-siyana zomwe angatumidwe ndi episkopi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Achinyamata Ali Ndi Kuthekera Kothandiza Kubweretsa Chilungamo
news: 12 August chaka chilichonse ndi tsiku lokumbukira achinyamata pa dziko lonse la pansi, United Nations International Youth Day. Polankhula mu uthenga wake wa pa tsikuli, Papa Francisco wati achinyamata ali ndi kuthekera kothandiza kulimbikitsa chilungamo pa dziko la pansi. Iye wati samakayika za kuthekera komwe achinyamata ali nako pa ntchito yokhazikitsa chilungamo pa dziko la pansi makamaka kwa anthu osowa ndi osauka. “Ndi nzeru za achinyamata ndi zotheka kukhala ndi chakudya chokwanira, madzi a ukhondo ngakhale mankhwala otha kufikira anthu osaukitsitsa,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawo. Naye mlembi wa mkulu wa bungwe la United Nations, UN Secretary General, Antonio Guterres watsindika za kufunika kwa achinyamata pa ntchito yobweretsa kusintha m’miyoyo ya anthu. Chaka chino maiko akondwelera tsikuli pa mutu woti “Kubweretsa kusintha pa njira zopezera cha kudya.”   Mayiko adayamba kukondwerera tsikuli kuyambira m’chaka cha 2000.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Akusakasaka Yemwe Wapha Mzika Ya Mdziko La Burundi Ku Kasungu
news: Apolisi m’boma la Kasungu akusakasaka munthu wina yemwe akumuganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi kuphedwa kwa mzika ina ya m’dziko la Burundi a Samson Hamenyimana omwe anali ochita malonda m’mudzi mwa Mkanda mfumu yaikulu Wimbe m’bomalo. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’chigawo chapakati chakum’mawa Inspector Harry Namwaza, izi zachitika usiku wa pa 13 August 2021 pomwe thupi la malemuwa omwe ndi a zaka 36 lapezeka mu dzenje lina ku deralo koma lili ndi mabala okha okha. Malinga ndi a Namwaza, Chisomo Malaki yemwe anali wa ntchito wa malemuwa, ndi yemwe akumuganizira kuti akudziwapo kanthu pa za imfayi. Iwo ati izi zili chomwechi kaamba koti mnyamatayu wathawa ndipo sakuwoneka chichitikireni imfayi. Apolisiwa atachita chipikicheni m’nyumba mwa mnyamatayu akuti apeza katundu wina yemwe ndi wa malemuwa. Wantchitoyu yemwe amachita Kabaza wa njinga ya moto wathawa ndi njingayi ndipo sakudziwika komwe wapita. Zotsatira za ku chipatala zawonetsa kuti malemuwa afa kaamba kovulala kwambiri m’mutu. Pakadali pano apolisi m’bomalo apempha anthu omwe angadziwe kuli a Chisomo Malaki kuti awatsine khutu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Cardinal Yemwe Anagwirizirapo Udindo wa Papa Wamwalira
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya Cardinal Martinez Somalo. Papa wanena izi kudzera mu uthenga wopepesa omwe watumizira Monsignor Fernando Loza Martinez yemwe ndi m’modzi wa anamfedwa. Anagwirizirapo udindo wa u Papa – Malemu Cardinal Somalo Mu uthengawu iye wati wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya Cardinal’yu ndipo wati ali pafupi ndi anthu onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi imfayi. “Ndili nanu limodzi pa nthawi yovutayi ndipo pa nthawi yomweyi ndi kukumbukira bwino utumiki wosiririka womwe malemu Cardinal Martinez Somalo adauwonetsa,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawu. Iye wati Cardinal Somalo adatumikira kwa nthawi yaitali ndipo adali mtumiki wodalirika komanso wokhulupirika kudzera m’maudindo akuluakulu osiyana-siyana omwe adapatsidwa ndi likulu la mpingo. Papa Francisco wamaliza uthengawu ndi kupempha uneneri wa Amayi Maria kuti Mulungu alandire mzimu wa Cardinal Somalo mu ufumu wake. Cardinal Somalo adali Camerlengo kapena kuti mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za likulu la mpingo wa katolika atamwalira Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri m’chaka cha 2005 podikirira kuti Papa wina asankhidwe nthawi yomwe imadziwika m’chilatini kuti sede vacante. Cardinal Somalo wamwalira lachiwiri ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican ali ndi zaka 94 ndipo adayamba kugwira ntchito ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican m’chaka cha 1956. Misa yotsanzikana ndi malemu Cardinal Somalo ichitika lachisanu mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica ndipo Cardinal Giovanni Battista Re ndi yemwe adzatsogolere Misa’yi. Mzimu wa Cardinal Martinez Somalo uuse mu mtendere wosatha!
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mthunzi Funeral Services Yawonjezera Ntchito Zake
news: Kampani yoyendetsa dongosolo la maliro mdziko muno ya Mthunzi Funeral Services yati yawonjezera ntchito zomwe imapereka kwa anthu omwe agweredwa zovuta. Chatsika: Takhazikitsa ntchito zosiyanasiyana M’modzi mwa akuluakulu ku kampani ya Old Mutual yomwenso ikuyendetsa kampani ya Mthunzi, mayi Patience Chatsika ndi omwe alankhula izi mu mzinda wa Blantyre lachiwiri pamene kampaniyi imafotokozera olemba nkhani ntchito zomwe yakhazikitsa ngati njira imodzi yothandizira anthu akagweredwa zovuta. Iwo ati kampaniyi yaika ntchito zosiyanasiyana zomwe ati zithandizira kuyendetsa dongosolo la maliro pomwe akutha kupereka chithandizo chofunikira pa maliro. “Ifeyo ngati Mthunzi Funeral Services takhazikitsa ntchito zosiyanasiyana zomwe zingathandizire kuyendetsa dongosolo lonse la maliro ndipo anthu ali ndi ufulu wosankha chomwe angachitiridwe akagweredwa maliro monga kusungitsa, kukonza thupi kuti lisaonongeke pachingerezi timati embalming kaya kungogula bokosi kokha komanso ngakhale kuchita zonse mpaka kukaika maliro m’manda zonsezi tikuchita pofuna kuthandizana nawo omwe aferedwa,” anatero mayi Chatsika. Nyumba yochitiramo mapemphero ku Mthunzi Funeral Services Kupatula zimenezi iwo atinso ali ndi nyumba yochitiramo mapemphero (Chapel) yomwe imagwiritsidwa ntchito kuchitira miyambo ya maliro pomwepo ndi cholinga choti anthu asavutike kwambiri kusakasaka komwe angathe kukachitira mapemphero operekeza m’bale wawo. “Tilinso ndi Chapelo pano chomwe anzathu a zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana angathe kuchitiramo mapemphero operekeza yemwe watisiyayo zomwe zingapangitsenso mwina kukangofikira kumanda koyika mfumu yathu, kupatula apo timabwereketsanso ma tenti ndi mipando yomwe ingagwiritsidwe ntchito pa maliro zomwe zikutsimikizira kuti ndife okonzeka kutumikira a Malawi anzathu pomwe agweredwa zovuta kuti akhale opepukidwa kaamba koti zambiri zofunika ife timakhala kuti tagwapo,” anapitiriza motero mayi Chatsika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Milandu Ya Umbanda, Umbava Yakula M’boma La Chikwawa
news: Kuchepa kwa ofesi za apolisi ku Chikwawa akuti ndi komwe kukubwezera m’mbuyo chitetezo m’bomalo. Izi zadziwika pamene mkulu watsopano wa apolisi m’bomalo, Assistant Commissioner Alex Simenti amafotokozera atolankhani za momwe chitetezo chilili m’bomalo. Pamenepa, a Simenti ati atolankhani ali ndi udindo wolimbikitsa ubale wa pakati pa mzika za m’bomalo ndi apolisi pothana ndi m’chitidwe wa umbava ndi umbanda. Milandu yochuluka yomwe ofesi ya apolisi ku Chikwawa ikulandira ndi monga yakuba ziweto, umbanda ndi ina yolanga okha anthu opalamula milandu. Malingana ndi Assistant Commissioner Simenti, milandu ya umbanda ndi yolanga okha anthu opalamula milandu yakula kwambiri m’deral la mfumu yaikulu Makhwira. Iwo anati atolankhani ali ndi kuthekera kozindikiritsa anthu kuyipa kotengera lamulo m’manja mwawo, pomwe amalanga okha opalamula milandu. “Chitetezo kwathu kuno ku Chikwawa ndi chovutirapo. Chimene chikutivuta ndi choti anthu akagwira wakuba akufuna zolanga okha potengera lamulo m’manja mwawo, zomwe ndi zotsutsana ndi lamulo la boma,” adatero a Simenti. Poyankhulapo, khansala wa kuzambwe kwa dera la Makhwira, Alex Ziggy Mulonya anati kusowa kwa ofesi ya apolisi m’derali ndi komwe kukukolezera umbava ndi umbanda. Mulonya wati khalidweli lingathe pokhapokha ngati ku derali kutakhala achitetezo okwanira popeza derali lachita malire ndi boma la Thyolo ndi Nsanje. Ndipo mfumu yaikulu Makhwira yavomereza za kuchepa kwa chitetezo m’dera lake. Koma mfumuyi idachita changu ponena kuti ntchito ili mkati yobwezeretsa polisi yaing’ono yomwe idawonongedwa pa chipolowe zaka zisanu zapitazo. “Ndi zoonadi kuno ku Eastbank nkhani zopalamulamula milandu m’dera lino zikuchulukira kwambiri. Zimenezi zikuchitika chifukwa ku dera lino polisi kulibe, koma tikusonkherana ndalama kuti tikonzenso polisi yomwe idawonongedwa kuno,” idatero mfumu Maseya. Padakali pano, ofesi ya apolisi m’bomala la Chikwawa yalandira milandu yokwana 70, kufika mwezi wa July chaka chino chokha, yomwe ndi yochuluka ndi milandu 16 kusiyanitsa ndi milandu 54, chaka chatha m’nthawi ngati yomweyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Kuphedwa Kwa Wansembe Wina M’dziko La France
news: Polankhula lachitatu m’mawa kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana mu Hall ya Papa Paulo wa 6 komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti, Papa Francisco wati ndi wogwida ndi chisoni chachikulu potsatira imfa ya Bambo Olivier Maire omwe aphedwa ndi munthu wina lamulungu lapitali m’dziko la France. Aphedwa masiku apitawa – bambo Maire Iye wati akupepesa onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi kuphedwa kwa wansembeyu. “Ndine wogwidwa ndi chisoni chachikulu kumva kuti Bambo Olivier Maire aphedwa. Ndikupepesa ansembe anzao, achibale onse komanso akhristu eniake omwe Bambo’wa amawatumikira,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati ali pafupi ndi anthu onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi imfa’yi. Malipoti ati malemu bambo Maire ndi anzawo amasunga ndi kusamalira nzika ina ya m’dziko la Rwanda yomwe ikukhala m’dziko la France. Potsatira kuphedwa kwa bambowa, mzikayi yomwe ndi ya zaka 40, lolemba lapitali idakazipereka m’manja mwa apolisi komwe idakaulula kuti ndi yomwe idachita za upanduzi. Malinga ndi apolisi a m’dziko la France, kafukufuku wa nkhaniyi akupitirira. Lipoti la ku chipatala lasonyeza kuti bambo Maire adavulala kwambiri m’mutu potsatira kumenyedwa ndi munthu wa upanduyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Apha Mkazi Wake Kaamba ka 50 Kwacha
news: Bambo wina yemwe dzina lake ndi Innocent Chitosi, akusungidwa ndi apolisi m’boma la Mulanje kaamba kobaya ndi kupha mkazi wake chifukwa chomumana ndalama yokwana 50 Kwacha. Ngwira: Mkulu ameneyu tamumanga Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku Mulanje, Sub-Inspector Grecium Ngwira watsimikiza izi ndipo wati bamboyu anachita izi pomwe amachokera ku mowa, ndipo atafika kunyumba anawuza mkazi wake kuti amupatse 50 kwacha kuti akawonjezere mowa. Koma pamene mkazi wake anamuyankha kuti ndalamayo alibe, kusamvana kunayambika zomwe zinachititsa kuti bamboyu abaye mkazi wakeyu pachifuwa. Chitosi akuyembekezera kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa kuti akayankhe mlandu wa kupha. Woganiziridwayu amachokera m’mudzi mwa Sadzola mdera la mfumu yaikulu Mabuka m’boma la Mulanje.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu A Ntcheu Parishi Athandiza Agulupa Awo
news: Lamulungu pa 8 August 2021 ndi tsiku lomwe akhristu a parishi ya Ntcheu mju dayosizi ya Dedza anali ndi mwambo wapadera omwe cholinga chake chinali kupereka thandizo la ndalama kwa agulupa a m’parishiyi. Zonse zinayamba ndi mwambo wa Misa yomwe anatsogolera ndi bambo Atanazio Manyenga omwe ndi bambo mthandizi pa parishiyi. Poyankhulapo pambuyo pa mwambowu, wapampando wa tchalitchi la Ntcheu a Lytton Laurent Thumba anati akhristu akuyenera kuvala zilimbe pothandiza atumiki a mu mpingo ndi chuma chawo. Iwo anathokoza akhristu a m’parishiyi kaamba komvetsa bwino za udindo wawo pothandiza anthu atumikiwa. M’modzi mwa akhristu omwe anatenga gawo popereka thandizo lawo, a Luka Fabiano anati ndi udindo wa mkhristu aliyense kuthandiza atumikiwa ndi cholinga choti ntchito yawo yotumikira Mulungu idziyenda bwino. Iwo anati atumikiwa amasowa zinthu zambiri pa moyo wawo wa tsiku ndi tsiku ndipo kuti ndi koyenera kumawathandiza. M’mawu ake m’modzi mwa agulupawa, katikisiti Abel Chimphando anathokoza akhristuwa kaamba ka thandizoli lomwe akuti lafika mu nthawi yake. Parishi ya Ntcheu ili ndi makatikisiti okwana atatu omwe ndi a Molisiyo Felix Mologeni omwe amatumikira pa center ya Ntcheu, a Venasio Felix Bayani omwe amatumikira center ya Namitengo ndiponso katikisiti Abel Chimphando omwe amatumikira center ya Thanganyika (mlangeni). Patsikuli akhristuwa anathandiza atumiki atatuwa ndi ndalama yokwana 342, 900 kwacha yomwe anagawana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akacheza M’maiko A Hungary, Slovakia Mwezi Wa Mawa
news: Pa 12 September, Papa Francisco ayamba ulendo wokacheza m’maiko a Hungary ndi Slovakia. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, ulendo wokacheza m’maiko awiriwa, uyambira ku Hungary. Papa pa umodzi mwa maulendo ake a utumiki Ali m’dziko la Hungary, Papa Francisco akachita zokambirana ndi maepiskopi a mpingowu m’dzikolo, atsogoleri a mipingo ya chikhristu, akuluakulu a chipembedzo cha chi Yuda komanso kutsogolera Misa yotsekera msonkhano wa chaka cha Ukaristia wodziwika m’chingerezi kuti International Eucharistic Congress. Malinga ndi akuluakulu omwe akukonza za  msonkhano wa chaka cha Ukaristia’wu, anthu ambiri ndi otekeseka ndipo okonzeka kulandira Papa Francisco ndi manja awiri. Atacheza m’dziko la Hungary kwa ma ola ochepa, Papa Francisco adzapita m’dziko la Slovakia. Ali m’dzikolo adzakumana ndi mtsogoleri wa dzikolo, atsogoleri a ndale, maepiskopi, ansembe, asisitere ndi a bulazala osaiwala achinyamata. Ulendo wa Papa Francisco m’dziko la Slovakia udzafika ku mapeto ndi Misa ku malo ena oyera opezeka ku dera lotchedwa Sastin. Mwa zina ma ulendo a Papa opita m’maiko osiyana-siyana amalimbikitsa akhristu pa moyo wawo wa uzimu komanso kulimbikitsa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Membala Watsopano Wa Sukulu Ya Ukachenjede Ya Za Sayansi
news: Likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, lalengeza kuti Papa Francisco wasankha membala watsopano wa sukulu ya ukachenjede ya a Papa ya maphunziro a za Science yotchedwa Pontifical Academy of Sciences. Professor Charpentier Membala watsopanoyu ndi Professor Emmanuelle Marie Charpentier yemwe chaka chatha adalandira mphoto kaamba ka ntchito yake ya zofufuzafufuza pa maphunziro a za Science, recipient of the 2020 Nobel Prize in Chemistry. Professor Charpentier ndi muyambitsi komanso mkulu woyendetsa malo ena a ntchito za kafukufuku, founder and director of the Max Planck Unit for the Science of Pathogens ku Berlin m’dziko la Germany. Mayiyu yemwe anabadwa m’chaka cha 1968 ndi katakwe pa maphunziro a  Biology, Microbiology, Biochemistry ndi Genetics. Sukulu ya ukachenjedeyi, Pontifical Academy of Sciences ndi ya likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ndipo adayambitsa ndi Papa Pio wa 11 m’chaka cha 1936.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe La Kuchene Women’s Forum Lathandiza Sukulu 22 Ndi Zipangizo Zodzitetezera Ku COVID-19
news: Bungwe lina lomenyera ufulu wa amayi ndi ana m’boma la Nsanje lotchedwaa Kuchene Women’s Forum, lapereka zipangizo zodzitetezera ku mliri wa COVID-19 msukulu za pulayimale zokwana 22 za m’bomalo. Mkulu wa bungweli, mayi Alice Kathumba anati gawo limodzi la ntchito yawo ndi kuwonetsetsa kuti pali ufulu wa maphunziro ndipo ndi chifukwa chake apereka katunduyu m’sukuluzi. Mayi Kathumba kupereka katunduyo kwa a Mafunga Poyankhula atapereka katunduyu pa sukulu ya pulayimale ya Bangula, mayi Kathumba anati zomwe bungwe lawo lachita ndi njira imodzi yowonetsetsa kuti ufulu wa maphunziro ukuyenda bwino. “Tigawa katundu ameneyu m’sukulu zokwana 22 za m’madera a zamaphunziro atatu. Zimenezi tachita chifukwa mwana kuti akhale ndi ufulu wa maphunziro ayenera kuti akhale osadwaladwala,” anatero mayi Kathumba. Pamenepa mayi Kathumba anati ufulu wa maphunziro sungakhalepo ngati ana akujombajomba ku sukulu kaamba ka matenda. Ndipo m’mawu ake, wachiwiri kwa mphunzitsi wamkulu pa sukulu ya pulayimale ya Bangula, a Christopher Mafunga anathokoza bungweli ponena kuti sukuluyi pa yokha siyikanakwanitsa kugula katundu wotere. “Ndife anthu okondwa kwambiri ndi bungwe ili la Kuchene Women’s Forum limene latithandiza ndi katundu wochuluka amene patokha sitikanatha kumupeza,” anatero a Mafunga. Katundu yemwe amayiwa apereka pa sukuluyi ndi monga; mabigili, tinsalu totchinga pakamwa ndi pa mphuno, sopo wosambira ndi wochapira. Bungwe la Kuchene Women’s Forum lagawa katunduyu ku sukulu za pulayimale zokwana 22 za m’madera atatu a zamaphunziro a Mlonda, Nyamadzere ndi Mchere ndipo katunduyu ndi wa ndalama zokwana 4 miliyoni Kwacha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Amuyamikira Powonetsa Chidwi pa Zochitika M’maiko aku Africa
news: Bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika m’maiko a kumwera kwa Africa, Southern African Catholic Bishops’ Conference (SACBC) layamikira Papa Francisco kaamba kolankhulapo ndi kudzudzula m’chitidwe wa ziwawa komanso zipolowe m’maiko a South Africa ndi Eswatini. Ena mwa maepiskopi a mbungwe la SACBC Polankhula pa msonkhano wa bungwe la Southern African Catholic Bishops’ Conference momwe muli maiko a South Africa, Botswana ndi Eswatini, President wa bungweli, Ambuye Sithembele Anton Sipuka a dayosizi ya Umtata ati uthenga wa Papa Francisco wodzudzula ziwawa ndi zipolowe komanso kulimbikitsa kukambirana pofuna kuthetsa mavuto m’maiko a South Africa ndi Eswatini udali uthenga wopatsa chilimbikitso. Ambuye Sipuka alimbikitsa maepiskopi anzawo kuti adziwonetsetsa kuti anthu a ndale akuyima pa chilungamo nthawi zonse ndi kukwaniritsa zomwe adalonjeza anthu. Iwo anenanso kuti mpingo ukuyenera kukhala patsogolo powonetsetsa kuti atsogoleri a mpingo akuchita chilungamo mu mpingowu ndi kuchita zinthu poyera. Pa msonkhanowu ma episkopi’wa ayamikiranso ansembe, asisitere, a bulazala, a katekisiti ndi atumiki osiyana-siyana chifukwa chodzipereka pogwira ntchito maka pa nthawi ino yovuta ya mliri wa Coronavirus. Pomaliza ma episkopiwa ayamikira anthu a za luso omwe amwalira posachedwapa: Sibongile Khumalo, Jonas Gwangwa, Tsepo Tshola, Steve Kekana ndi Shona Ferguson omwe ati luso lawo lidathandiza anthu ambiri mu njira zosiyana-siyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: M’modzi Wafa, 11 Avulala pa Ngozi ku Ntcheu
news: Munthu m’modzi wafa ndipo ena khumi ndi m’modzi (11) avulala pa ngozi ya galimoto yomwe yachitika lachisanu pa Mlangeni m’boma la Ntcheu. Ngozi yomwe yachitika ku Ntcheu Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Hastings Chigalu, ngoziyi yachitika pafupi ndi Mlangeni mu nsewu waukulu wa M1 pomwe dalayivala wa galimoto ya mtundu wa Toyota rash nambala yake IT 8216 yomwe imachokera ku Dedza kupita ku Ntcheu amafuna kudutsa galimoto ina yomwe inali patsogolo pake zomwe zinachititsa kuti iwombane ndi minibus ya mtundu wa Toyota Hiace nambala yake EA 1470 yomwe imabwera mbali ya kutsogolo kwawo. Potsatira ngoziyi anthu omwe anali mu galimotoyi anavulala ndipo anawatengera pac hipatala cha Ntcheu komwe m’modzi wamwalira akulandira thandizo la mankhwala. Ngoziyi yachitika potsatira ina yomwenso inachitika pafupi ndi msika wa Lizulu sabata yatha, yomwe inaphetsa anthu okwana 21. Onsewa anali ochokera m’boma la Chikwawa omwe pa nthawiyo amachoka m’mudzi wina ku Ntcheu komwe anakachezera anzawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Anjata Achiwembu Awiri ku Chikwawa
news: Apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa akusunga m’chitokosi amuna awiri powaganizira pa mlandu wofuna kubera wa kabaza njinga yamoto. Mneneri wa apolisi m’bomali, Sergeant Dickson Matemba wati achifwambawa ndi a Peter Gama a zaka 48 zakubadwa ndi a Benson Makungwa a zaka 20 zakubadwa. A Matemba ati awiriwa adatengana ndi wakabaza pa malo ochitira malonda a Thabwa ponena kuti akukatenga mondokwa wogulitsa kumunda wao ku Mitiwi dera la ku Eastbank. Kumeneku ndi komwe adamuchita chiwembu wakabazayu kuti amulande njinga yake. Malingana ndi a Dickson Matemba, wakabazayu atafika pa mtsinje wa Nkuzi, apa ndi pomwe Gama ndi Makungwa adayamba kufwamba wakabazayu kuti amubere njinga yake ya moto. Pamenepa wakabazayu adakuwa kupempha chithandizo, ndipo anthu akufuna kwabwino adatulukira pa malopo ndi kum’pulumutsa. Ndipo amuna awiriwa atagwidwa, anthuwa adayamba kukonza zowatentha, koma achitetezo a kumudzi adafika msanga ndi kuwapulumutsa mu ng’anjo ya motoyo. Zitatha izi, oganiziridwa mlanduwa pamodzi ndi wakabazayu adawatengera ku chipatala cha boma cha Chikwawa kuti akalandire chithandizo cha mankhwala. Amuna awiri oganiziridwa mlanduwa, awatengera ku khoti kuti akayankhe mlandu omwe awatsekulira, wochita za uchifwamba. Padakali pano, apolisi a m’bomali akuyamikira achitetezo a kumudzi kaamba ka ntchito yolimbana ndi m’chitidwe wopalamula milandu. Peter Gama ndi wa zaka 48 zakubadwa ndipo amachokera m’mudzi wa Mlumbe, pamene Benson Makungwa ndi wa zaka 20 zakubadwa yemwe amachokera m’mudzi wa Lotoni, onsewa ndi a kwa mfumu yayikulu Chikowi, m’boma la Zomba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamikira Ansembe a Chipani cha Dominiko Woyera
news: Chaka chino, ansembe a chipani cha Dominiko Woyera akukondwerera kuti patha zaka 800 kuchokera pomwe muyambitsi wa chipanichi yemwe ndi Dominiko Woyera adamwalira. Papa Francisko pa mkumano wake ndi ansembe a chipani cha Dominiko Woyera Pa chifukwa ichi Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wa padera wopita kwa mkulu wa chipanichi, Master General of the Dominican Order. Kudzera mu uthengawu, iye wayamikira chipanichi pa ntchito yotamandika yolalikira uthenga wa chipulumutso yomwe chipanichi chakhala chikugwira. Mu uthengawu, iye wati Dominiko Woyera ndi chitsanzo kwa akhristu onse obatizidwa kuti nawonso akutumidwa kuti athandize pa ntchito yolalikira uthenga wa chipulumutso kuti ufikire konse komwe uthengawu sunafikebe. Papa Francisco wati Dominiko Woyera adalalikira uthenga wa chipulumutso potsindika za chifundo cha Mulungu komanso mphamvu ya uthenga wa chipulumutso potembenuza anthu kuti apulumuke. Dominiko Woyera yemwe adali wansembe ndi yemwe adayambitsa chipani cha ansembe odziwika kuti the Dominicans kapena kuti Order of Preachers ndipo adamwalira ku Bologna m’dziko la Italy pa 6 August m’chaka cha 1221.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Katemera Wa Johnson & Johnson Afika Mdziko Muno Loweruka
news: Unduna wa za umoyo mdziko muno loweruka likudzali, ulandira katemera wa mtundu wa Johnson & Johnson wokwanira 302, 400. Katemerayu ndi olandira kamodzi kokha ndipo aperekedwa kwa anthu okhawo amene sanalandirepo katemera wina aliyense wa nthendayi mdziko muno. Katemera wa Johnson & Johnson Kudzera mu chikalata chomwe undunawu watulutsa ndipo chasayinidwa ndi mlembi wamkulu mu undunawu Dr. Charles Mwansambo, katemerayu ali m’gulu la akatemera omwe dziko la Malawi lawavomereza kuti ndi abwino pothandiza kuteteza anthu ku nthendayi. Padakalipano katemera wa mtundu wa Astrazeneca yekha ndi amene anayamba kuperekedwa m’dziko muno ndipo ena mwa akatemera omwe avomerezedwa ndi dziko lino ndi monga a Johnson & Johnson, Pfizer, Sinofam komanso Moderna. Kudzera mu kalatayi undunawu wapempha anthu kuti asanyozere koma kukabayitsa katemerayu pofuna kuti adziteteze ku nthenda ya COVID-19, ndipo chalimbikitsa anthu kupitiriza kutsatira njira zonse zopewera nthendayi monga kuvala chotchingira kukamwa ndi mphuno, kusamba m’manja pafupipafupi ndi sopo, komanso kukhala motalikirana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wauza Akhristu Apemphelere Mpingo Kukhala Osinthika
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha akhristu kuti apemphere zolimba kuti mpingo ukhale wosinthika mogwirizana ndi Uthenga Wabwino wa chipulumutso. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi polingalira ndi kufotokozera cholinga cha mapemphero ake mwezi uno. Cholinga cha a Papa mwezi uno ndi choti mpingo ulandire chaulere kudzera mwa Mzimu Woyera chothandiza kuti mpingo ukhale wosinthika mowunikiridwa ndi Uthenga Wabwino wa chipulumutso. Koma pofotokozera cholingachi, iye wati kusinthika kwa mpingo kukuyenera kuyamba ndi mkhristu aliyense payekhapayekha. Papa Francisco wati mpingo ulipo kuti ulalikire za Uthenga wa Chipulumutso kwa anthu onse ndipo wawonjezeranso kuti mpingo umadziwika kudzera mu kufalitsa Uthenga wa Chipulumutso. Iye wati mavuto osiyana-siyana omwe mpingo ukukumana nao ndi chizindikiro cha mphamvu kuti mpingowu ndi wa moyo popeza ndi zosatheka kuti mpingo wa kufa uzikumana ndi mavuto. Papa Francisco watsiriza ndi kupempha akhristu onse kuti adzikonda kupempherera mpingo kuti upitirize kugwira ntchito yake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Njobvu Zavulaza Anthu Awiri M’boma La Ntcheu
news: Potsatira njovu zomwe zakhala zikusowetsa mtendere anthu a mder la mfumu yaikulu Ganya m’boma la Ntcheu, boma kudzera ku nthambi yowona za nyama zakutchire, yapirikitsa nyamazi ku derali kupita nazo ku nkhalango ya Thuma m’boma la Dedza komwe akuti zinathawa. Njovuzi zomwe zinalipo zokwana zisanu, zinayamba kuwoneka m’mawa wa lachiwiri m’mudzi mwa Kansapato m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Ganya m’bomalo kufikira lachitatu pomwe alenje anakazithamangitsa.
