Njovu zomwe zinavutitsa mderalo Poyankhulapo khansala wa ward ya Mphepozinayi komwe kunali nyamazi, Morris Maziya anathokoza boma kaamba kochita machawi atalandira uthengawu zomwe zathandizira kuti anthu a mderali amasuke ku ntchito zawo za tsiku ndi tsiku ponena kuti anthu ambiri samayenda kuwopa kuvulazidwa. Khansalayu wati padakalipano moyo wabwerera m’chimake mderalo ngakhale kuti njovuzizavulaza anthu awiri omwe anaziyandikira pa nthawi yomwe alenje a boma-wa amazitenga. Malinga ndi khansalayu, anthu ovulazidwawa anawatengera pa chipatala cha Ntcheu. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu pa chipatala cha Ntcheu, Dr. Emily Jenya anatsimikiza kuti anthuwadi awathandiza pa chipatalachi koma kuti sanavulale modetsa nkhawa. M’mawu ake mkulu wa nthambi yoyang’anira nyama zakutchire mdziko muno a Brighton Kumchedwa ati anthu akuyenera kumakhala kutali akawona nyamazi kuwopa kuvulazidwa komanso kutaya miyoyo kumene. M’mudzi mwa Kansapato, njovuzi zawononga mbewu zosiyanasiyana monga chimanga chachiwisi, nthochi ndi chinangwa. Alenje a bomawa akwanitsa kutenga njovuzi kuchoka ku Ntcheu komwe zinali, kukafika ku nkhalango ya Thuma m’boma la Dedza komwe zinathawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Khansala wa Ward ya Chimwalire M’boma la Balaka Wafa Pa Ngozi Yapansewu
news: Khansala wa ward ya Chimwalire m’dera la kumwera m’boma la Balaka, Joseph sandram Daniel wafa atawombedwa ndi galimoto mu nsewu wa Liwonde – Balaka. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Balaka Sergeant Precious Makuta, ngoziyi yachitika lachitatu pa malo ena otchedwa Mpilisi EPA pomwe a Sandram anali pa njinga yamoto ndipo anawombedwa ndi galimotoyi yomwe imachokera ku Liwonde kupita ku Balaka ndi itanyamula thankala ya mafuta. Galimotoyi yomwe nambala yake ZA 2438/ZA 3756 imayendetsedwa ndi a Hassan Piyasi a zaka 60. Atafika pa malo a ngoziwa, oyendetsayu analephera kuyiwongolera bwino zomwe zinachititsa kuti ilunjike kumbali kwa nsewu komwe inakawomba malemuwo ndikukagwa kumbali kwa nsewu. Potsatira kuvulala kwambiri m’mutu, malemuwa anamwalira pa malo omwewo. Padakalipano apolisi m’bomalo alangiza anthu kuti adzitsatira malangizo a pansewu omwe amayikidwa mu zikwangwani m’mbali mwa misewu powopa ngozi za mtunduwu. Malemu Joseph Sandram Daniel anali a m’mudzi mwa Kwitanda T/A Nsamala m’boma la Balaka ndipo amwalira ali ndi zaka 39 zakubadwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ADMARC Yati Yakhwimitsa Ndondomeko Zogulira Mbewu Kwa Alimi
news: Bungwe logula ndi kugulitsa mbewu mdziko muno la Agricultural Development and Marketing Corporation (ADMARC) latsimikizira alimi kuti lakhazikitsa ndondomeko zoyenera zothandizira kuti ligule chimanga chonse kuchokera kwa alimiwa. Dr. Chiyembekeza komanso a Chiphiko pa msonkhanowo M’modzi mwa akuluakulu mu komiti yoyang’anira ntchito za bungweli, Dr. Allan Chiyembekeza ndi omwe alankhula izi lolemba pa msonkhano wa atolankhani mu mzinda wa Blantyre, omwe unakonzedwa ndi bungweli pofuna kufokozera m’mene ntchito yogula chimanga kwa alimi ikuyendera bungweli litatseguliranso misika yake pa 28 July chaka chino mzigawo zapakati ndi kumpoto kwa dziko lino. Dr. Chiyembekeza ati bungweli lakhazikitsa makomiti opangidwa ndi anthu akumidzi pa msika uliwonse ndi cholinga choti athandizire alimi ang’onoang’ono kugulitsa chimanga chawo ku bungweli ndi kupindula ndi ulimi wao. Iwo ati ndondomeko zoterezi zithandizira kuti alimi enieni okha agulitse chimanga chawo ndi kuthetsa mchitidwe wogula chimangachi kwa ochita malonda omwe ati akhala akubera alimiwa pogula mbewu zawo. “Tikudziwa kuti mavenda anali oyambilira kugula chimanga kwa alimi ndi cholinga choti adzakhale oyambilira kugulitsa kuno ndi cholinga choti azapeze phindu koma ndinene pano kuti ulendo uno sizitheka chifukwa tayika makomiti pa msika wathu uliwonse ndipo chosangalasa ndi choti mu komitizi muli anthu a kudera komweko omwe aziwona anthu omwe akugulitsa chimanga chawo. Ngati ndi venda, tawauziratu kuti ameneyo asaloredwe kugulitsa chimanga chake ku ADMARC popeza tikufunitsitsa mlimi yekhayo yemwe anapindula mu ndondomeko ya zipangizo zaulimi zotsika mtengo kuti apindulenso pa ulimi wake pogulitsa mbewu zake kwa ife,” anatero Dr. Chiyembekeza. Iwo apitirizanso kuti malingaliro ogula chimanga chosachepera matani 1 million alipobe ndipo asonkhanitsa ndalama zochuluka zoti agulire chimanga chonse chomwe alimi ang’onoang’ono ndi akuluakulu omwe ali nacho. “Ifeyo takonzeka kugula chimanga chonse chomwe alimi ali nacho ndipo nditsimikizire a Malawi onse kuti ndalama zogulira chimangachi zilipo popeza ku boma talandira ndalama zokwana 12 billion Kwacha ndiponso zina tazipeza kuchokera ku mabanki athu mdziko muno zomwe ndi ndalama zochepera 50 billion kwacha ndipo zitakhala kuti izi zachepa ife tipezanso ndalama zowonjezera kuti tithe kugula chimanga chonse chomwe alimi akufuna kuti agulire,” anatero Dr. Chiyembekeza. Nayenso mkulu woyendetsa bungweli a Rhino Chiphiko ati bungweli lakhazikitsa nambala yapadera ya 3045 yomwe anthu mdziko muno azitha kuyimba mwaulere ngati akumana ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana monga mchitidwe wa chinyengo ndi zina ku misikayi. A Chiphiko atinso ku misikayi ndondomeko zothandizira kupewa mliri wa Corona zayikidwanso ndi cholinga choteteza alimiwa ku nthendayi pomwe akugulitsa mbewu zawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Jakobo’ Anali Mkhristu Wokhulupirika – Bambo Mkolombidzo
news: Bambo mfumu a parish ya Saint Louis Montfort (CI) mu archdiocese ya Blantyre, bambo Paul Mkolombidzo ati imfa ya a Eric Mabedi ndi imfa yodandaulitsa kwa akhristu a mu parishi’yi. Bambo Mkolombidzo alankhula izi lero ku CI Parish pa mwambo wa Misa yotsanzikana ndi malemuwa. Ansembe kutsogolera mwambo wotsanzikana ndi malemu Mabedi Iwo ati malemu Mabedi omwenso anali katsiwiri pa nkhani za zisudzo mdziko muno ndipo amadziwika kwambiri ndi dzina loti Jakobo, anali mkhristu weniweni wolimbika pa chikhristu chake. Iwo ati malemu Mabedi sanali mkhristu ndi pakamwa chabe koma kuti anali mkhristu weniweni wolimbika pa chikhristu chake. Bambo Mkolombidzo ati kudzera mu zisudzo, malemu Mabedi amatha kuphunzitsa anthu kuzindikira ndi kudziwa zambiri za mpingo wa katolika. Anamwalira lolemba – Mabedi “Akamachita zisudzo zija amachita kudziwika kuti uyu ndi mkatolika weniweni. Amapereka chithunzithunzi cha mpingo wathu. Amatha kukhala ngati wansembe komanso kukambamo za sacrament la kulapa ndi zina zambiri,” anatero bambo Mkolombidzo. M’malaliko awo bambo Francis Tambala anati aliyense afune kaya asafune, tsiku lina adzafa ndipo anthu akuyenera kukhala moyo wawo mozindikira kuti kunjaku kuli Mulungu yemwe ndi mwini wa zonse. Ena mwa akuluakulu omwe anafika kudzakhala nawo pa mwambowu ndi a Pastoral Secretary a Blantyre Archdiocese, Bambo Alfred Chaima omwe anayimira Archbishop Thomas Luke Msusa a Archdiocese ya Blantyre, nduna yowona za chikhalidwe a Michael Usi omwe anayimira mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera. Malemu Mabedi amwalira lolemba ku chipatala cha Mwayiwathu mu mzinda wa Blantyre.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Kutumikira Mulungu N’kokoma
news: Pano pomwe a chinyamata ochokera m’maiko osiyana-siyana akuchita msonkhano wao wa mapemphero ku Medjugorje m’dziko la Bosnia ndi Herzegovina, Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga kwa a chinyamatawa. Iye wauza achinyamatawa kuti kutumikira Mulungu ndi kokoma ndipo waonjezera kuti potumikira Mulungu akuyenera kukhala anthu olimba mtima ndi a chimwemwe. Papa Francisco wati pamene iwo akuchita msonkhano wa mapempherowu akuyenera kuzindikira kuti mapemphero ali ndi mphamvu yotengera anthu pafupi ndi Mulungu. Iye wati ndi kofunikanso kuti achinyamatawa azikonda anzao ndi anthu ena onse ndipo makamaka kuti azikonda anthu osauka. Papa Francisco wawalangiza kuti apewe kukondetsetsa chuma chomwe chili ndi kuthekera kowalekanitsa ndi Mulungu. Iye watsiriza ndi kuyikiza achinyamatawa m’manja mwa Amayi Maria omwe ndi chitsanzo kwa akhristu onse. Msonkhano wa mapempherowu, international prayer omwe unayamba pa 1 August ufika ku mapeto pa 6 August.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Njovu Zisanu Zikusowetsa Mtendere Anthu M’boma la Ntcheu
news: Anthu a mdera la mfumu yaikulu Ganya m’boma la Ntcheu ati ali ndi mantha aakulu potsatira njovu zomwe zafika mderali. Malinga ndi anthuwa, kufika kwa njovuzi kwapereka mantha kwa anthuwa kaamba koti akulephera kuyenda kuwopa zilombozi. Njovu zomwe zafika ku deralo Nyamazi zomwe zilipo zisanu zikuyendayenda m’mudzi mwa Kansapato mderali zomwe zachititsa kuti adindo osiyanasiyana ozungulira derali apemphe anthu kuti asayende kuwopa kuti angavulazidwe ndi nyamazo. Poyankhulapo khansala Morris Maziya yemwe ndi woyimira ward ya Mphepozinayi komwe kuli njovu-zi, wati adindo akuyenera kuthandizapo mwansanga pofuna kuteteza miyoyo komanso katundu wa anthu a mderalo. Iwo apempha nthambi yowona za nyama zakutchire kuti itumize alenje msanga kuti adzathandize pa vutoli. Mawu ake mkulu wa nthambi yowona za nyama zakutchire mdziko muno, a Brighton Kumchedwa ati ofesi yawo yatumiza kale alenje kuti akathamangitse nyamazo ku deralo. Iwo ati akukhulupira kuti njovu-zi zathawa ku malo osungirako nyama a Thuma m’boma la Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Asilikali, Apolisi Akhwimitsa Chitetezo ku Makanjira
news: Nthambi ya polisi komanso asilikali mdziko muno yayamba ntchito yokhwimitsa chitetezo ku malire a dziko lino ndi dziko la Mozambique ku Makanjira m’boma la Mangochi. Ntchitoyi ikutsogoleredwa ndi Superintendent Macdonald Kachaje yemwe ndi mkulu wa polisi ya Makanjira komanso Captain Norman Ngoleka yemwe ndi mkulu wa camp ya asilikali ya ku Makanjira. Polankhula lolemba pachiyambi pa ntchitoyi, nthambi ziwirizi zati zachita izi pofuna kuthana ndi mchitidwe wa uchigawenga komanso umbava omwe umachitika m’malire a maikowa. Pamenepa iwo apempha anthu okhala mderali komanso ochita business kuti agwirane manja ndi achitetezowa pofuna kuthana ndi milandu yomwe imachitika ku malire a dzikoli. Iwo apemphanso anthuwa kuti apewe mchitidwe wosunga komanso kubisa zigawenga ndipo adzikanena ku polisi akawona zochitika zilizonse zodabwitsa pomwenso atsindika kuti aliyense wopezeka akuphwanya malamulo a dziko lino, adzalandira chilango. Polankhulapo Group Village Headman Mkukula inayamikira nthambi ziwiri za chitetezozi kaamba ka ntchitoyi zomwe ati zichepetsa nkhawa za anthu a mderalo kutsatira mpungwepungwe omwe unalipo pakati pa anthu okhala mdziko muno ku derali ndi okhala mdziko la Mozambique chichitikireni ntchito yodulirana malire, ponena kuti pakhala pali kuwomberana, milandu yokhudza malo komanso zilango zina monga kumenyedwa kaamba ka nkhaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Eric “Jakobo” Mabedi Wamwalira
news: M’modzi mwa akatswiri pa nkhani za zisudzo mdziko muno Eric Mabedi yemwe amatchuka ndi dzina loti Jakobo wamwalira. Wamwalira-Mabedi Mabedi wamwalira lero m’mawa ku chipatala cha Mwaiwathu mu mzinda wa Blantyre, atadwala nthenda ya COVID-19. Polankhula pambuyo pa imfayi, nduna yowoana za chikhalidwe a Micheal Usi ati ndi okhudzidwa kwambiri kaamba ka imfayi yomwe ati yawadzidzimutsa. Dr. Usi: Mabedi anali mzanga “Kupatula unduna, Mabedi anali mzanga amene ndimachita naye zisudzo. Tataya munthu wa luso yemwe anali wodziwa kuphunzitsa anthu pa zinthu zosiyanasiyana kudzera mu luso lake,” anatero a Usi. Iwo ati adzamusowa Mabedi kaamba ka ukdaulo wake posayiwala uthenga umene akufuna kupereka pamene akuchita masewero ake ponena kuti amadziwa bwino kusiyanitsa pa kusangalatsa ndi kuphunzitsa anthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu Ayambepo Kusonkha Ndalama za Chibalalitso – Ambuye Musikuwa
news: Wapampando woyang’anira za utumiki ku bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi Ambuye Peter Musikuwa walangiza akhristu mdziko muno kuti ayambiretu kusonkha ndalama zothandizira chibalalitso ch mpingo ndi cholinga choti mpingo wa ku Malawi udzatolere zochuluka pa tsiku la chibalalitso cha chaka chino. Ambuye Musikuwa alankhula izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi pomwe madayosezi osiyanasiyana mdziko muno ayambapo kukonzekera chibalalitso cha mpingo cha chaka chino. Ambuye Musikuwa: Mkhristu aliyense atenge mbali Ambuye Musikuwa omwenso ndi episkopi wa dayosizi ya Chikwawa ati ndi kofunika akhristuwa ayambepo kusonkha kangachepe kudzera m’mabanja awo komanso m’miphakati yawo ndi cholinga choti zotolera pa lamulungu la chibalalitso m’mwezi wa October chaka chino zidzakhale zochuluka. “Chibalalitso cha mpingo ndi ntchito imene mkhristu aliyense ayenera kugwira ndi cholinga choti mpingo ubalalike pa dziko lonse lapansi choncho ndi kofunika kuti mkhristu aliyense pa banja ngakhale ku miphakati yawo ayambepo kusonkha chuma chothandizira chibalalitso cha chaka chino kuti tidzapeze zopereka zambiri zoposera za mbuyomu,” anatero Ambuye Musikuwa. Iwo ati malinga ndi nthenda ya COVID-19 yomwe yavuta kwambiri mdziko muno yomwe ikulepheretsa kusonkhana kwa akhristu ochuluka, ndi kofunika kuti akhristuwa ayambepo kupereka zopereka zawo ndi cholinga choti ntchito yofalitsa uthenga wabwino kudzera mu zopereka za patsikuli isajejemetsedwe. “Ndi mliri wa Corona womwe uli pakati pathu mkofunikadi tiyambiretu patali makamaka mmiyezi ya July mpaka October yomwenso timasinkhasinkha za Chibalalitso cha mpingo ndiye tiyambepo kuti ntchito yofalitsa uthenga wabwino isayime kamba ka mthendayi,” anapitiriza motero Ambuyewa Musikuwa. Zochitikachitika za chibalalitso cha mpingo cha chaka chino zikutsogoleredwa ndi parish ya Katamba mu dayosezi ya Zomba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Parishi Ya Mitengo Ikumbukira Ntchito Za Malemu Bambo Sijm
news: Akhristu a m’parish ya Mitengo mu arkidayosezi ya Blantyre awalangiza kuti asamalire ntchito zonse za chitukuko zomwe malemu bambo Jacob Sijm omwe adali wachipani cha mofolo adakhazikitsa. Malemu bambo Sijm Bambo Jonnie Chimwaza omwe ndi bambo mfumu a parishiyi alankhula izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi loweruka pambuyo pa mwambo wa nsembe ya Ukaristia yokondwelera moyo wa malemu bambo Sijm omwe adamwalira pa 25 October mchaka cha 2020 mdziko la Netherlands. Wamsembeyu ndiye amene adali bambo mfumu woyambilira wa parishiyi itangokhazikitsidwa pomwe idachoka ngati nthambi ya parish ya Addolorata. Bambo Chimwaza ati wamsembeyu anachita zazikulu m’parishiyi pa zauzimu komanso pa zachitukuko chathupi zomwe anati ndi kofunika kuzisamalira. “Tinachita msembe ya Ukaristia ndi cholinga choti tikondwelere moyo wa wansembeyu kaamba koti kuno kwa Mitengo anakhalako zaka zochuluka ndipo wathandizira anthu ochuluka pa moyo wawo wauzimu komanso wa thupi, kumbali ya uzimu; chikhristu mdera lino chafalikira ponseponse ndipo ku zathupi anamanga sukulu, matchalitchi ndi zina zotero zomwe ndi zofunika kuti akhristuwa azizisamalira kuti zipitilizebe kuwatumikira pa moyo wao wa tsiku ndi tsiku,” anatero bambo Chimwaza. Chimwaza: Pano chikhristu chafalikira Mmawu ake mmodzi mwa ansembe m’chipani cha Mofolo Woyera, bambo Blaise Jailosi anayamikira bambo Chimwaza ndi akhristu awo kaamba kokumbukira wansembeyu zomwe anati ndi zonyaditsa kwambiri. “Ndinene pano zomwe achita akhristuwa kuno ndi zotamandika kwambiri kaamba koti akukumbukira zomwe bambo Sijm anachita kuno. Ndikuyembekezeranso kuti zoterezi apitirizabe kuchitira ena omwe anachita zazikulu kuti parishiyi ifike pomwe ilipa awa ndi monga bambo Louis ndiponso akhristu ena omwe anachita zinthu zotamandika,” anatero bambo Jailosi. Pamwambowu panalinso ansembe ena monga bambo Paul Mkolombidzo ndiponso bambo Ignatius Gazani. Bambo Jacob Gerardus Sijm adabadwa pa 13 December 1928 ku Wevershoof mdziko la Netherlands. Adadzozedwa unsembe ndi Monsignor W. Mutsaets yemwe anali Episkopi waku Den-Bosch pa 16 March 1958. Bambo Sijm anabwera ku Malawi mchaka cha 1959 ndipo mchaka cha 1957, arkiepiskopi wa nthawiyo Ambuye John Baptist Theunissen mogwirizana ndi mthandizi wawo episkopi James Chiona adasankha wansembeyu kukhala bambo mfumu woyambilira wa parishiyi. Bambo Sijm adamwalira pa 25 October, 2020 ku Maastricht mdziko la Netherlands apa mkuti ali ndi zaka 91 zakubadwa ndiponso 68 zautumiki. Ena mwa Malo omwe bambowa anatumikira kuno ku Malawi ndi monga; Neno, Blantyre, Thyolo, Thunga ndiponso Namtipwiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Kukhala Pa Ubale Wabwino Ndi Mulungu Nkofunika Kwambiri
news: Polankhula lamulungu kwa akhristu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti, Papa Francisco wati chinthu chofunika pa moyo wa mkhristu ndiye kukhala pa ubale weniweni ndi Mulungu ndipo kuyetsetsa kupewa kumangoika maso pa zinthu zomwe Mulungu angathe kupereka. Iye walankhula izi malinga ndi Mau a Mulungu omwe awerengedwa pa tsiku lamulungu la 18 mu nyengo ya pa chaka makamaka Uthenga Wabwino womwe ukuwonetsa poyera kuti anthu ambiri omwe anali kutsatira Ambuye Yesu anali kuchita choncho pongoyang’anira zinthu zomwe anali kulandira monga chakudya. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wachenjeza akhristu alerofe kuti tikuyenera kusamalitsa ndi kupewa kumangomufuna Mulungu chifukwa tikufuna kulandira zinthu zina zake kuchokera kwa iye monga ankachitira anthu aja omwe amatsatira Ambuye Yesu pongofuna chakudya. Iye wati ndi kofunika kumadzifunsa kuti ndi chifukwa chiyani tikufuna Mulungu m’moyo wathu. Iye wadzudzulanso khalidwe lonyansa la anthu ena omwe amangowafuna anzao pomwe ali m’mavuto ndipo pamene apeza chomwe amafunacho amakhala kuti anzawowo athana nao. Papa Francisco wati ndi kofunika kuti anthufe tizikhala pa ma ubale abwino ndi anzathu nthawi zonse; pa zabwino angakhale pa mavuto. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti Amayi Maria omwe anakhala pa ubale wabwino ndi wonyaditsa ndi Mulungu akhale chitsanzo kwa akhristu onse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Watsutsa Zosankha Mwana Wake Kukhala Kazembe
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera watsutsa zoti wasankha mwana wake kuti akhale Kazembe wa dziko lino ku Brussels mdziko la Belgium. President Chakwera watsutsa izi lamulungu pa msonkhano wa atolankhani ku nyumba ya boma ku Lilongwe pofika m’dziko muno kuchokera m’dziko la United Kingdom. Chakwera: Mudzifufuza kaye Iye wati ndi kofunika kuti anthu azifufuza bwino pa nkhani zochitika m’dziko muno asanayambe kuzitumiza kwa anthu ena. Poyankhulapo pa nkhani yoti anthu akudandaula kuti zinthu zikuchedwa kuyenda m’dziko muno malinga ndi momwe anthu amayembekezera, President Chakwera wati ndi khumbo la munthu aliyense kuti zinthu zidziyenda mwachangu koma kuti anthu akuyenera kudekha komanso kukhala a chikhulupiriro kuti zinthu ziyendadi. Pa mwambowu iye walankhulapo pa za kufunika kuti dziko lino likonzekere bwino kulandira alendo ku osiyana-siyana ku msonkhano wa Sadc womwe uchitikire m’dziko muno mwezi uno. President Chakwera sadaiwale kulankhulaponso pa za ngozi yaikulu yomwe yachitika m’boma la Ntcheu yomwe yaphetsa anthu 21 ndipo potsatira ngoziyi iye walengeza kuti dziko lino likhala pa chisoni kwa masiku awiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Matupi A Anthu 21 Omwe Afa pa Ngozi Alowa M’manda
news: Matupi a anthu makumi awiri ndi m’modzi (21) omwe afa pa ngozi yomwe yachitika lamulungu m’boma la Ntcheu, ayikidwa m’manda kumudzi kwawo m’boma la Chikwawa. Matupi kunyamulidwa ulendo wa ku Chikwawa Ena mwa matupiwa ayikidwa m’manda usiku wathu ndipo ena ayikidwa m’manda m’mawa wa lero komwe akuluakulu a khonsolo ya boma la Chikwawa kuphatikizapo Paramount Chief Lundu ndi mfumu ena anafikanso. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Hastings Chigalu wati ngoziyi inachitika mu nsewu waukulu wa M1 pakati  pa Mlanda ndi Lizulu pa malo omwetsera mafuta galimoto otchedwa Bomba. Ngoziyi inachitika m’bandakucha wa lamulungu pomwe galimoto ya mtundu wa Toyota coaster yomwe imachokera mtunda wa Dedza kupita ku Ntcheu ili ndi anthu 28 inawombana ndi galimoto ya mtundu wa freightliner truck yomwe nambala yake ndi LA 5591/LA 5548 yomwe imayendetsedwa ndi a Alfred Kennedy a zaka 51 omwe kwawo ndi m’udzi mwa Mbozi mfumu yaikulu Kasumbu m’boma la Dedza. Pamalo pomwe pachitika ngoziyo Potsatira ngoziyi anthu 21 omwe ndi amayi 18 kuphatikizapo ana atatu, a chipatala anatsimikiza kuti amwalira potsatira kuvulala kwambiri m’mutu. Malinga ndi apolisiwa amayi 27 omwe anakwera mu galimoto ya coaster yi onsewa anali ochokera m’boma la Chikwawa ndipo anapita m’mudzi mwa Chindoole m’dera la Mlanda m’boma la Ntcheu ndipo uwu unali ulendo wawo wobwelera kumudzi kwao ku Chikwawa atacheza ndi anzawo ku derali. Boma kudzera ku nthambi yowona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi ya DODMA ndi yomwe inagula mabokosi omwe ayika matupi a omwalirawa kuphatikizapo kupereka chipepeso cha ndalama ku mabanja omwe ataya abale awo ndi omwe avulala. Anthu amene anavulala pa ngoziyi awatengera ku chipatala cha boma la Chikwawa komwe agonekedwa kuchokera ku chipatala cha boma la Dedza komwe anagonekedwa ngoziyi itangochitika. Boma la Ntcheu ndi limodzi mwa maboma omwe kumachitika ngozi pafupi pafupi. Mwachitsanzo chaka chino chokha kuyambira mwezi wa January kufika June ngozi zokwana 90 ndi zomwe zachitika zomwe zaphetsa anthu okwana 47. Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera walamula kuti dziko la Malawi likhudze malirowa kwa masiku awiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwini Munda Adula Manja Wakuba M’boma la Ntcheu
news: Bambo wina m’boma la Ntcheu ali mu ululu pa chipatala cha boma la Ntcheu atamudula manja onse awiri kaamba komuganizira kuti wakhala akuba nzimbe m’munda wa mkulu wina m’bomalo. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Hastings Chigalu, izi zachitika m’mudzi mwa Gumbu mdera la mfumu yaikulu Kwataine m’bomalo. Bambo omuganizirayu kuti wadula manja mzakeyu yemwe akungodziwika ndi dzina loti Molesi anakayikira mkuluyu kuti ndi yemwe akumubera nzimbe zake kumunda zomwe zinachititsa kuti apite kunyumba kwake ndi kukapeza nzimbe zofanana ndi zomwe zili m’mundawo. Pamenepa mwini munda uja anafunsa mkuluyu za komwe wakatenga nzimbeyo ndipo atalephera kufotokoza bwino, mwini mundayu yemwe akuti ndi msilikali wopuma anadula manja a wakubayu iye ndi kuthawa. Pakadali pano apolisi akusakasaka bamboyu yemwe wathawa atachita izi. Wovulazidwawa, a Wilson Zamayere omwe ndi a zaka makumi asanu amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kandota m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Kwataine m’boma lomwelo la Ntcheu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Wapolisi Anjatidwa Kaamba Kogwira Pakhosi Mwana Wachialbino
news: Apolisi m’boma la Phalombe amanga wapolisi mnzawo kaamba komuganizira kuti anagwira pakhosi mwana wa khungu la chi albino. Malingana ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku Phalombe Jimmy Katunga, patsikuli wapolisiyo amachokera ku mowa ataledzera ndipo anachita izi pomwe mwanayo anali kusewera ndi anzake. Katunga wati padakali pano kafukufuku akuwonetsa kuti wapolisiyo analibe maganizo achiwembu aliwonse ofuna kumuchita mwanayo. “Tinakayendera pamalopo ndipo palibe chilichonse chomwe chikuwonetsa kuti amafuna kumuchita chipongwe mwanayo. Unali mow abasi,” anatero Katunga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Focus for Development Liyamba Kupereka Maphunziro A Luso Kwa Achinyamata
news: Achinyamata omwe akusowa mwayi wa ntchito ku Chikwawa, tsopano ayamba kupindula ndi maphunziro a ntchito za manja ndi luso pansi pa bungwe la Focus for Development. Pofuna kukwaniritsa izi, bungweli lakonza maulendo a ndawala a masiku atatu kuti apeze ndalama zokwana 10 miliyoni kwacha zolipilira maphunziro a achinyamatawa. A Ngosi kulankhula pa mkumanowo Polankhula pa mkumano wa atolankhani ku Chikwawa, mkulu wa bungwe la Focus for Development, a Anganire Ngosi ati maphunzirowa adzathandiza achinyamatawa kupeza luso pa malonda ndi kudzidalira pa chuma. Gawo loyamba la ulendo wa ndawalawu lachitika loweruka pa 31 July, 2021, kuchokera ku Nchalo mpaka ku Dyeratu, ndipo achinyamata oposa 100 ndi amene anayenda nawo ulendowu. Malinga ndi mkulu wa bungwe la Focus for Development, a Anganire Ngosi, maulendo a ndawalawa awakonza kuti apeze ndalama zokwana 10 miliyoni Kwacha zothandizira kupereka maphunziro a maluso osiyanasiyana kwa achinyamata omwe akusowa ntchito. Pambali potolera ndalamazi, a Ngosi ati maulendo a ndawalawa athandiza kupereka mauthenga a chiyembekezo kwa achinyamata a m’boma la Chikwawa omwe akusowa mwayi wa ntchito. “Dongosololi talikonza ndi cholinga choti tipeze limodzilimodzi lothandizira achinyamata m’dera lathu lino kupeza maluso osiyanasiyana. Pali maluso ngati oyendetsa galimoto, kukonza lamya ndi makina a kompyuta ndi ena otere,” anatero a Ngosi. Maulendo ena awiri a ndawala adzachitika mwezi wa August, kuchokera ku Dyeratu mpaka ku Chikwawa boma, ndi wina kuchokera ku Chikwawa mpaka ku Blantyre, pa 9 August ndi pa 21 August, 2021 motsatizana. Gawo loyamba la maphunziro a ntchito zalusowa, likuyembekezereka kudzapindulira achinyamata okwana 100, kuchokera ku mafumu akulu a Kasisi, Mulilima ndi Katunga a m’boma la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati ndi Wokhudzidwa ndi Imfa ya Cardinal Vanhoye wa M’dziko la France
news: Potsatira imfa ya Cardinal Albert Vanhoye wa m’dziko la France, Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wopepesa kwa onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi imfayi mu njira zosiyana-siyana. Iye wati ndi wa chisoni chachikulu ndipo wati ali pafupi ndi anthu onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi imfayi. Malemu Cardinal Vanhoye “Potsatira imfayi ndati ndipepese onse omwe amakhala ndi Cardinal’yu, abale komanso abwenzi awo onse,” watero Papa Francisco. Cardinal Vanhoye yemwe anali wansembe wa chipani cha ma Jesuit, wamwalira lachinayi pa 29 July, 2021 ali ndi zaka 98 za kubadwa ndipo anali Cardinal wachikulire kwambiri pa dziko lonse la pansi kumbali ya zaka. Ndi imfayi zikutanthauza kuti mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse watsala tsopano ndi ma Cardinal 220. Mwa ma Cardinal amenewa 123 ndi osaposa zaka 80. Mzimu wa Cardinal Albert Vanhoye uuse mu mtendere wosatha!
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: QMAM Ilimbikitsa Anthu Kulandira Katemera wa COVID-19
news: Bungwe la chipembedzo cha chisilamu la Qadria Muslim Association of Malawi (QMAM) lalangiza atsogoleri a zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno kuti alimbikitse anthu awo kulandira katemera wa Covid-19 yemwe akuperekedwa mdziko muno Mneneri wa bungweli Sheikh Jafaa Kawinga alankhula izi lachinayi mu mzinda wa Blantyre pa mwambo wokhazikitsa buku lomwe lakonzedwa ndi mgwirizano wa zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana lomwe cholinga chake ndi kupereka njira zomwe zingasatidwe kwa odwala nthendayi zomwenso zawunikiridwa ndi mawu opezeka mu baibulo ndiponso mu Qur’an. Kawinga: Tayikamo ma vesi a mu Qur’an komanso m’baibulo Sheikh Kawinga ati zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana ziii ndi udindo waukulu wolangiza otsatira awo za ubwino wolandira katemerayu ndi cholinga choti anthu onse mdziko muno akhale ndi moyo wabwino kuti athenso kutumikira Mulungu mwamphamvu. “Kunoko timakhazikitsa bukhu lija lomwe cholinga chake ndikuwunikira zina zotsatira zomwe munthu amene wapezeka ndi kachilombo ka Corona komanso yemwe anapezeka nako koma anachira zomwe amadutsamo ndipo lapangidwa ndi ifeyo azipembedzo kuti anthu amve kuti tikuti chani pankhani ya Covid-19.  M’menemu tayikamo ma vesi a mu Qur’an komanso m’baibulo kufuna kuwakumbutsa asilamu komanso akhristu kuti ayenera kulandira katemerayu,” anatero Sheikh Kawinga. Pamenepa iwo achenjeza okhulupilira aliyense kuti azindikire kuti ali ndi udindo wolandira katemerayu kuti atetezedwe ku nthendayi kaamba koti kusatero kukupereka chiwopsezo kwa anthu ena. “Tawunikiranso kuti nthawi zambiri anthu amati tikukhulupilira mwa Mulungu ndiye sitilandira katemerayu chifukwa Mulungu atiteteza ndiye takamba kunena kuti izi ndi zosemphana ndi chipembedzo komanso chiphunzitso cha Mulungu  monga ngati ku chisilamu Mulungu amatiuza kuti tisawononge miyoyo yathu komanso ya anzathu, ngati pali chiwopsezo tikuyenera titeteze ndiye ngati wina sakulandira katemerayu ndiye kuti iyeyo apereka chiopsezo kwa ena omwe akufuna kulandira katemerayu,” anapitiriza motero Sheikh Kawinga. Iwo ati ngati anthu ochuluka alandira katemerayu zidzathandizira kuti ntchito za chuma ndi zotukula dziko lino ziyambirenso kupita patsogolo kaamba koti zambiri mwa izo zayima kaamba ka mliriwu zomwe zapangitsanso kuchuluka kwa ulova pakati pa anthu. Sheikh Kawinga alangiza boma kugwiritsa ntchito atsogoleri a zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana pomwe akupereka mauthenga a katemerayu kamba koti ati anthu amamvera atsogoleri azipembedzowa kusiyana ndi ena onse. Iwo aperekapo chitsanzo choti amatha kuona anthu akugula dothi lenileni lochuluka kuchokera kwa azipembedzowa pongokhala ndi chikhulupiliro chabe choti akaligwiritsa ntchito achira zomwe anati ndi umboni wokwanira woti azipembedzowa angathe kukopa anthu ochuluka olandira katemerayu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MRA Yalangiza Atolankhani Adziwe Ndondomeko Zatsopano Zotolera Msonkho
news: Bungwe lotolera msonkho mdziko muno la Malawi Revenue Authority (MRA) lawuza atolankhani kuti akuyenera kudziwa za ndondomeko zatsopano zomwe bungwe lotolera msonkho linayika mdziko muno. Mkulu owona za ubale wa bungweli ndi anthu, a Steven Kapoloma anena izi lero pa maphunziro a tsiku limodzi omwe bungweli linakonzera atolankhani mchigawo chapakati cha dziko lino. Kapoloma: Anthu akufalitsa mauthenga a bodza pa nkhani za msonkho Iwo ati imeneyi ndi njira imodzi yofuna kupewa kupereka uthenga omwe si olondola omwenso amapereka mantha ku mtundu wa Malawi. A Kapoloma ati ngati atolankhani angakhale ndi uthenga wokwanira wa momwe ndondomeko zatsopanozi zidzigwilira ntchito, zidzathandiza kuti mchitidwe wofalitsa nkhani zabodza omwe ukumafala m’masamba a mchezo okhudza ndondomekozi utheretu. Ndipo poyankhulapo pambuyo pa maphunzirowa mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la atolankhani mchigawo chapakati lotchedwa Bwaila Media Club a Andrew Masa anayamikira bungwe la MRA kaamba ka maphunzirowa ponena kuti athandiza atolankhaniwa kudziwa za momwe ndondomeko zatsopano zotolera msonkho zidzigwilira ntchito. Pamenepa a Masa anapempha atolankhaniwa kuti apewe mchitidwe wofalitsa nkhani zomwe iwo sanachite kafukufuku wokwanira. Bungwe lotolera msonkho mdziko muno linakhazikitsa ndondomeko zatsopano zotolera misonkho kuphatikizapo kutolera misonkho pa katundu yemwe wagulidwa m’maiko akunja akafika mzipata zolowera mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwana wa Sitandade 2 Wadzipha Podzimangilira M’boma la Ntcheu
news: Mnyamata wina wa zaka 14 zakubadwa wadzipha podzimangilira m’mudzi mwa Senzani mdera la Sub T/A Tsikulamowa m’boma la Ntcheu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Hastings Chigalu, izi zachitika lachiwiri pa 27 July 2021 pomwe mayi wa malemuyu anawuza mwanayu kuti apite ku sukulu zomwe sizinasangalatse mnyamatayu. Thupi la mnyamatayu linapezeka ku malo ena omwe ndi kutali ndi sukulu yomwe iye amaphunzira. Thupili atalitengera pa chipatala cha Manjawira, a chipatala anatsimikiza kuti malemuwa amwalira kaamba kobanika. Chimwemwe Khwinda yemwe amaphunzira mu kalasi yachiwiri pa sukulu ya pulayimale ina ku deralo anali wa mudzi mwa Lunguzi mdera lomwelo la Sub T/A Tsikulamowa m’boma la Ntcheu. Pakadali pano, imfa zodza kaamba kodzipha m’bomali zakwera kufika pa zisanu ndi zinayi (9) m’miyezi isanu ndi umodzi yapitayi poyerekeza ndi imfa ziwiri (2) zomwe zinachitika chaka chatha mu nthawi ngati yomweyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mlangizi wa Kwaya ku Ntcheu Apereka Ziweto Zothandizira Kwaya
news: Pofuna kupititsa patsogolo magulu a mu mpingo, mlangizi wa kwaya ya St. Cecilia yomwe ndi kwaya ya Amayi pa Ntcheu parishi mu dayosizi ya Dedza, a Elias Liphevere Kholomana apereka nkhumba zokwana zisanu (5) ku kwayayi ndi cholinga choti zithandizire kutukula ntchito za chuma m’bungweli. Polankhula popereka thandizoli iwo ati makwaya ambiri amalephera kutulutsa nyimbo zomvera kaamba kosowa ndalama, zomwe zimabwezeretsa m’mbuyo luso la mayimbidwe awo. A Kholomana anati kudzera mu ziwetozi kwayayi ikhala yodzidalira pa chuma zomwe zithandizire kukwaniritsa khumbo lawo lotulutsa chimbale. Poyankhulapo wapampando wa kwayayi mayi Hanna Rose Mtaukira anati  ndi okondwa kaamba ka thandizoli lomwe akuti labwera mu nthawi yake. Iwo anati ziwetozi zithandizira kuti luso lawo lipite patsogolo ndiponso kukwaniritsa masomphenya awo otulutsa chimbale cha nyimbo zomvera ndi zowonera. Ndipo a Lyton Lawrent Thumba omwe ndi wapampando wa tchalitchi la Ntcheu anagwirizana ndi anthuwa ponena kuti thandizoli lithandiza kukweza ntchito za kwayayi. Kwaya ya St. Cecilia ndi imodzi mwa makwaya anayi omwe akupezeka pa tchalitchi la Ntcheu ndipo ili ndi mamembala okwana makumi anayi (40).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Phungu waku Dedza Wamwalira ndi COVID-19
news: Phungu wa kunyumba ya malamulo mdera la pakati chakumvuma m’boma la Dedza, Macsten Mkomba wamwalira. Wamwalira-Mkomba Mneneri wa chipani cha Malawi Congress (MCP), a Maurice Munthali atsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo ati phunguyu wamwalira m’mawa wa lero ku chipatala cha Kamuzu Central mu mzinda wa Lilongwe atadwala nthenda ya Covid-19. Iwo ati chipani cha MCP chidzawakumbukira a Mkomba kaamba ka khalidwe lawo labwino lomwe linachititsanso anthu a mderali kuti awasankhe kukhala pa udindowu. “Tikusimikiza kuti talandira uthenga kum’mawa komwe kuno kuti a Mc Sten Mkomba amwalira atadwala nthenda ya Covid-19,” anatero a Munthali. Iwo ati chipani cha Malawi Congress chidzadandaula mpaka kale popeza kuti chataya munthu yemwe amathandiza chipanichi mu njira zosiyanasiyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Atolankhani Athandize Pobweretsa Mtendere, Umodzi
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha atolankhani a mpingo wa katolika m’dziko la Brazil kuti athandize pa ntchito yoyanjanitsa anthu m’dzikolo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi mu uthenga wake omwe watumizira atolankhaniwa omwe akuchita msonkhano wawo waukulu. Iye wati ngati anthu okhulupirira, atolankhaniwa akuyenera kuthandiza kubweretsa chiyembekezo ndi umodzi pakati pa anthu m’dzikolo omwe ndi ogawikana. Iye wati ntchito yolimbikitsa umodzi ndi chiyanjano ikufunikira kwambiri pa nthawi ino pomwe m’dzikolo muli mpungwepungwe pa nkani za ndale kuphatikizapo mavuto osiyana-siyana monga nthenda ya Covid-19. Papa’yu walimbikitsa atolankhaniwa kuti nthawi zonse aziwonetsetsa kuti pogwira ntchito yawo akuyima pa chilungamo ndi kumafalitsa nkhani zowona zokhazokha popewa mabodza omwe achuluka masiku ano pa intaneti. Msonkhanowu omwe ndi wa nambala 12 wachitika kudzera pa makina a intaneti ndipo atolankhani a chi Katolika pafupifupi 6000 achita nawo msonkhanowu. Bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika m’dziko la Brazil, bungwe la Catholic Radio Network m’dzikolo komanso bungwe la atolankhani a mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse lotchedwa Signis ndi omwe athandiza kukonza msonkhanowu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Munthu Aliyense Akuyenera Kukhala Ndi Chakudya Chokwanira
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kowonetsetsa kuti munthu aliyense ali ndi chakudya chokwanira. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi mu uthenga wake wopita kwa mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la United Nations, António Guterres. Papa watumiza uthengawu pano pomwe msonkhano wa bungwe la United Nations wokambirana za chakudya uli mkati ku Rome m’dziko la Italy. Iye wati nkhondo ina yaikulu pa dziko la pansi ndi yolimbana ndi njala pofuna kuwonetsetsa kuti anthu ali ndi chakudya chokwanira. Papa wati mliri wa Coronavirus wayika pa mbalambanda kusiyana komwe kulipo pakati pa anthu olemera ndi osauka komanso momwe umphawi wa anthu ambiri ukulimbikitsira kusakazika kwa chilengedwe. Iye wadandaula kuti ngakhale kuti tsopano pali njira za makono zothandiza kupeza chakudya chochuluka pali njira zina zomwe zikuwononganso chilengedwe ndipo wati ndi zosamveka kuti pomwe dziko la pansi liri ndi chakudya chosaneneka pa nthawi yomweyo anthu a nkhaninkhani ali pa njala yosaneneka. Pamenepa iye Papa wati pa kufunika kukhazikitsa njira zothandiza anthu kupeza chakudya mosavuta pomwe watsindika za kufunika kotukula miyoyo ya amayi ndi achinyamata komanso kuthandiza alimi aang’onoang’ono a ku midzi ngati njira yothanirana ndi njala pa nkhani ya chakudya. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti Mpingo wa Katolika upitirira kupereka upangiri wosiyanasiyana wothandiza kulimbana ndi njala. Msonkhanowu womwe wayamba pa 26 July ufika ku mapeto pa 28 July.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Gawo Lachiwiri Lopereka Katemera wa Covid-19 Layamba Ndi Chikoka
news: Lolemba pa 26 July, 2021 unduna wa zaumoyo unayamba gawo lachiwiri lopereka katemera wa nthenda ya COVID-19 ndi chiwerengero chochuluka cha anthu amene amabwera kudzabayitsa katemerayu. Pamene ntchito yogawayi yayambiranso m’boma la Chikwawa, anthu okhala ku madera akutali ndi zipatala m’bomali ayamba kuyitanitsa katemerayu ku madera awo. Malingana ndi mneneri wa zaumoyo m’bomali a Sethie Piriminta, ofesi ya zaumoyo m’bomali yakhala ikulandira mauthenga ochuluka oyitanitsa katemerayu kudzera kwa azaumoyo ogwira ntchito ku maderawa. Pamenepa a Piriminta atsimikizira anthu okhala m’bomali kuti ofesi yawo yayika dongosolo loyenera kuti katemerayu awafikire ku madera komwe ali. “Azaumoyo (HSAs) akhala akutiyimbira lamya kuti anthu akumufuna kwambiri katemerayu ngakhale katemerayu ndi wosakwanira, komabe ndiwatsimikizire kuti katemera siyekhayu abwera katemera wina,” adatero a Piriminta. Ofesi ya zaumuyo ya m’boma la Chikwawa yayamba kupereka katemerayu ku malo atatu omwe ndi chipatala chachikulu cha bomali ndi zipatala zazing’ono za Mfera ndi Mapelera. Padakali pano, bomali lalandira katemera wa Astrazeneca okwana 1, 700 yemwe ndi wochepa kwambiri kuyerekeza ndi katemera okwana 12, 000 yemwe bomali lidalandira m’gawo loyamba lopereka katemerayu. Pambali pa katemera wa Astrazeneca yemwe wafika kale, dziko la Malawi lidzalandira katemera winanso wa Pfizer ndi Johnson & Johnson kumapeto kwa mwezi wa mawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Zotheka Kukhala ndi Dziko la Mtendere
news: Kudzera mu bukhu la tsopano lomwe lili mu chilankhulo cha chitaliyana ndipo mutu wake ndi woti “Mtendere pa dziko la pansi. Ubale wabwino ndi wotheka,” Papa Francisco wati ndi zotheka kukhala ndi dziko la pansi lopanda nkhondo. Bukhuli lomwe ndi lopangidwa ndi mawu komanso zolankhulalankhula za Papa Francisco zokhudza mtendere ndi ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu, lakonzedwa ndi cholinga chofuna kukondwerera kalata ya Papa Yohane wa 23 Woyera yodziwika m’chilatini kuti “Pacem in Terris” kapena kuti “Mtendere pa dziko la pansi” yomwe Papa’yu adalemba m’chaka cha 1963. Bukhuli lakonzedwanso ngati mbali imodzi yolimbikitsira ubale wabwino pakati pa mipingo yosiyanasiyana ya chikhristu. Kudzera m’mawu ake omwe Papa Francisco walemba ku mapeto a bukhu’li akuti anthu ambiri amafuna mtendere koma mtendere umenewu uli pa chiopsezo kaamba ka nkhondo ndipo anthu ambiri amakakamizidwa kuthawa m’maiko mwawo kupita m’maiko ena. Iye wati maiko onse ali ndi udindo woyesetsa kuthandiza kubweretsa mtendere pa dziko lonse ponena kuti ngakhale maiko omwe sanakhalepo pa nkhondo, nkhondo zosiyana-siyana zochitika m’maiko ena zimawakhudzabe mwa njira ina kaaamba koti maikowa amalandira anthu othawa m’maiko ena. Papa Francisco watsiriza ndi kunena kuti monga unathera ukapolo, ndi zotheka kukhala ndi dziko la pansi lopanda nkhondo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akuyembekezeka Kutsogolera Misa Yokumbukira Anthu Okalamba
news: Kwa nthawi yoyamba, mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse ukumbukira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba lamulungu likudzali. Mtsogoleri wa mpingowu pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kutsogolera a Katolika pochita Misa yokumbukira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba. Papa kucheza ndi m’modzi mwa anthu achikulire Pa 31 January chaka chino, Papa adalengeza kuti wakhazikitsa tsiku loganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba lodziwika m’chingerezi kuti World Day for Grandparents and the Elderly. Pokhazikitsa za tsikuli iye anati mpingo wa katolika uziganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba lamulungu lachinayi la mwezi wa July chaka chilichonse ndipo chaka chino tsikuli lilipo pa 25 July. Papa Francisco adafotokoza kuti waganiza zokhazikitsa tsikuli kaamba koti kawiri-kawiri akuluakuluwa amayiwalidwa ngakhale kuti iwo ndi kasupe wa luntha. Iye amakhulupirira kuti ukalamba ndi madalitso aakulu ochokera kwa Mulungu kotero ndi koyenera kumakumbukira ndi kulemekeza anthu achikulire ndi okalamba. Lamulungu lachinayi la mwezi wa July lomwe mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse uziganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba ndi tsiku lomwe liri pafupi ndi chaka cha Joachim ndi Anna Oyera omwe ndi agogo ake a Yesu Khristu. Mpingo wa katolika ukumbukira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba pa mutu woti “Ndili Nanu Masiku Onse” kapena kuti “I am with you always” mawu opezeka mu Uthenga Wabwino monga adalembera Mateyu Woyera mutu 28 ndime ya 20. M’maiko ambiri kuphatikizapo dziko la Malawi anthu achikulire ndi okalamba amakumana ndi mavuto osiyana-siyana monga kusowa chakudya, zovala, malo ogona abwino komanso kuganiziridwa zinthu zosakhala bwino monga za ufiti ndi zomanga mvula.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kuchotsedwa Kwa Dr. Silungwe Sikodabwitsa-Mvula
news: M’modzi mwa anthu omwe amalankhulapo pa zinthu zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno a Humphreys Mvula ati sakuwona chodabwitsa pa kuchotsedwa kwa kwa mlangizi wa boma pa nkhani za malamulo Dr. Chikosa Silungwe. Wachotsedwa pa udindo – Silungwe A Mvula anena izi pomwe Radio Maria Malawi imafuna kumava ndemanga yawo pa za kuchotsedwa kwa Dr. Silungwe pa udindowu. Iwo ati ogwira ntchito aliyense amayenera kuchotsedwa ngati sakugwira bwino ntchito yomwe anamulembera ndipo kuchotsedwaku si zachilendo pa mbiri ya dziko lino. “Aliyense akakhala pa ntchito amayenera kusiya yekha kapena kuchotsedwa ndi abwana ake choncho ine sindikuwona chodabwitsa ndi kuchotsedwa kwa Dr. Silungwe chifukwa m’mbuyo monsemu boma lakhala likuchotsa alangizi a boma pa nkhani za malamulo ngati pali chinachake chomwe mtsogoleriyo akuwona kuti munthuyo sakuchiyendetsa bwino,” anatero a Mvula. Mvula: Sindikuwona chodabwitsa Ndipo polankhulapo katswiri pa nkhani za malamulo Professor Edge Kanyongolo wati malamulo a dziko lino amalora kuti Attorney General achotsedwe ngati sakugwira bwino ntchito yake ndipo akukhulupilira kuti mtsogoleri wa dziko lino wawunikira mbali zonse za malamulo asanachite chiganizochi. “Ndi zovuta kuyankhula zambiri chifukwa a president sananene zifukwa zomwe amuchotsera munthuyu pa udindo. Ndikungokhulupilira kuti mwina asanapange chiganizo chimenecho ayamba awunika mbali zonse za malamulo molingana ndi nkhaniyi chifukwa ngati sanatero, ochotsedwawa alinso ndi ufulu wokasuma ku bwalo la milandu,” anatero Professor Kanyongolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akagwira Ukayidi Wa Zaka 18 Kaamba Kogwililira Mwana wa Zaka Khumi
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Mangochi lalamula mamuna wina wa zaka 36 kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka 18 kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu wogwilirira mwana wa zaka khumi. Bwaloli linamva kudzera mwa woyimilira boma pa milandu Sub Inspector Blessings Madikhula kuti mamunayu King Afia anagwililira mwanayu pa 23 January chaka chino ndipo mayi ake a mwanayu ndi omwe anamuzindikira kaamba koti amalephera kuyenda. Mwanayu anaulura kuti mkuluyi wakhala akumugwilirira kwa maulendo okwana atatu ndipo mayiwa anakatula nkhaniyi ku polisi komwe angwira mkuluyi ndi kukamutsekera m’chitolokosi. Atawonekera ku bwalo la milandu, Afia anawukana mlanduwu ndipo bwaloli kudzera mwa mboni zinayi, linamupeza olakwa pa mlanduwu. Ndipo popereka chigamulo chake Senior Resident Magistrate Rodrick Michongwe anati wapereka chilango chokhwimachi kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. King Afia amachokera m’mudzi wa Kandulu mfumu yayikulu Jalasi m’boma la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Achinyamata M’boma La Ntcheu Apindula Ndi Pulojekiti ya N’zatonse
news: Nthambi ya zaumoyo mu mpingo wa katolika ya Catholic Health Commission kudzera mu pulojekiti ya Nzatonse, inakonza mkumano ndi achinyamata ozungulira parishi ya Sharpevalle mu dayosizi ya Dedza, ndi cholinga chofuna kudziwa ngati gwo lachitatu la ntchitoyi lathandiza  achinyamatawa. Mkumanowu unachitikira ku parishi ya Sharpevalle m’boma la Ntcheu, unasonkhanitsa achinyamata okwana 29 ozungulira derali. Kudzera mu pulojekitiyi, achinyamatawa akhala akuthandizidwa pa nkhani zokhudza kugonana, ubereki, uchembere wabwino kuphatikizanso kuwazindikiritsa za ufulu wawo. M’mawu awo bambo Gerald Bwemba omwe ndi m’modzi mwa ansembe pa parishiyi omwe anazamitsa achinyamatawa ndi maphunziro awo okhudza mchitidwe wozembetsa anthu (human trafficking) anati mchitidwewu wakula kwambiri ndipo anthu akuyenera kukhala tcheru kaamba koti vutoli likukhudza kwambiri achinyamata omwe ndi atsogoleri a mawa. Bambo Bwemba anati anthu omwe akuchita izi akumanyengelera achinyamata kuti apite maiko a kunja monga mdziko la South Africa, Zambia ndi maiko ena omwe ndi ozungulira dziko lino kuti akapeza ntchito yabwino kapena banja kuphatikizanso maphunziro, ndipo anati akapita uko akukumana ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa achinyamata omwe anali nawo pa mkumanowu, Gideon Andreya anati kufika kwa Nzatonse ku derali kwathandiza achinyamata kuti akhale ndi udindo polimbikitsana ku mbali ya maphunziro komanso kuwunikirana nkhani zosiyanasiyana zomwe zingapititse patsogolo moyo wawo. A God-knows Maseko ndi m’modzi mwa alangizi omwe anathandiza achinyamatawa ndi maphunziro osiyanasiyana a ubereki, uchembere wabwino komanso kuwazindikiritsa za ufulu wawo m’madera omwe akuchokera, ndipo anati achinyamata ndi tsogolo la dziko lino, choncho akuyenera kupatsidwa upangiri woyenera owathandizira kuti akhale ndi tsogolo labwino. Pothilirapo ndemanga a Halord Chilikutali omwe ndi mlangizi ku nthambi ya zaumoyo mu mpingo wa katolika dayosizi ya Dedza anati pulojekitiyi yathandiza kudziwitsa achinyamata momwe angachitire pa mavuto omwe amakumana nawo m’madera omwe amakhala. Bungwe la zaumoyo mu mpingo wakatolika la Catholic Health Commission kudzera mu pulojekiti ya Nzatonse lakhala likufikira achinyamata m’madera ena m’boma la Ntcheu monga  Sub T/A Tsikulamowa, Mpando, Chakhumbira, Kwataine, Makwangwala komanso Ganya ndi cholinga chowazindikiritsa  magawo osiyanasiyana okhuza moyo wawo kuti adzakhale adindo odalirika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Imfa ya Cardinal Pasinya wa Mdziko la DRC
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya Cardinal Laurent Monsengwo Pasinya wa m’dziko la Democratic Republic of Congo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi mu uthenga wake wopepesa kwa anthu a m’dzikolo potsatira imfayi. Malemu Cardinal Pasinya Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wopepesawu kudzera mwa Cardinal Fridolin Ambongo wa m’dzikolo. Iye wayamikira malemu Cardinal Monsengwo Pasinya ponena kuti anali munthu yemwe moyo wake wa uzimu unali wozama komanso wati Cardinal’yu anali munthu wokonzeka kutumikira pa ntchito zosiyana-siyana za mpingo. Papa Francisco wati Cardinal Monsengwo Pasinya anali munthu wa chilungamo ndi mtendere powonetsetsa kuti anthu osauka akuganiziridwa nthawi zonse. Iye wati Cardinal’yu anali munthu yemwe anachita khama kuwonetsetsa kuti Uthenga wa Chipulumutso ukhale wozikika m’moyo wa anthu wa tsiku ndi tsiku. Papa Francisco wati Cardinal Monsengwo Pasinya anali kupatsidwa ulemu osati ndi a Katolika okha koma angakhale anthu a mipingo ina kuphatikizapo anthu a ndale. Iye wamaliza uthengawu popereka madalitso ake a upositoli, kwa Archbishop wa Archdiocese ya Kinshasa, a episkopi othandizira, ansembe, asisitere ndi a bulazala, anamfedwa ndi akhristu eni ake ndi onse omwe atenge nawo mbali pa mwambo wa malirowu. Cardinal Laurent Monsengwo Pasinya yemwe anabadwa pa 7 October 1939 wamwalira pa 11 July 2021. Iye anadzodzedwa kukhala wansembe pa 21 December m’chaka cha 1963. Anasankhidwa kukhala episkopi ndi Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera pa 4 May m’chaka cha 1980 ndipo Papa Francisco anamusankha kukhala Cardinal pa 20 November m’chaka cha 2010. Mzimu wa Cardinal Laurent Monsengwo Pasinya uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dalaivala Wamangidwa Atapezeka ndi Matumba 60 a Makala
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa amanga dalaivala wa galimoto ina atapezeka ndi matumba a makala okwana 60. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha wati mkuluyu Nickson Jesnam wagwidwa m’mawa wa lero lachinayi pa msika wapa boma la Dowa. Galimoto yonyamula makala yomwe yalandidwayo Pa nthawiyi, mkulu wa polisi ya Dowa, Deputy Commissioner Rhoda Manjolo amayendera apolisi omwe amalondera malo osiyanasiyana m’bomalo ndipo ali pa ntchitoyi ndi pomwe anakumana ndi mkuluyu akuyendetsa galimoto ya mtundu wa lorry muli matumba a makalawa. Padakalipano galimoto komanso makalawo zalandidwa ndipo mkulu woganiziridwayu akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa kuti akayankhe mlandu wopezeka ndi zinthu za mu nkhalango popanda chilorezo. Nickson Jesnam amachokera m’mudzi wa Lungani mfumu yaikulu Chiwere m’boma la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mnyamata Alamulidwa Kukagwira Ukayidi wa Zaka 17 Kaamba Kothyola Nyumba, Kugwililira
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Mangochi lalamula mnyamata wina wa zaka 20 kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavulagaga kaamba kothyola nyumba ndi kugwililira mayi wina. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sergeant Anthony Namwera anawuza bwaloli kuti usiku pa pa 22 March chaka chino, mnyamatayu Joseph Razalo anathyola nyumba ya mayi wina wa zaka 21 pamene mwini nyumbayo anali mtulo. Pamene mkuluyu amafika mkati mwa nyumbayo anaponda nkhuku yomwe inalira ndi kumututumutsa mwini nyumbayo. Ngakhale mayiyo anakuwa, mkuluyo sanathawe ndipo anamugwira pakamwa kuti asakuwenso ndi kumugwililira. Zotsatira za chipatala cha Masuku m’bomalo zinatsimikiza kuti mayiyu wagwiliridwadi. Atawonekera ku bwalo la milandu Razalo anawukana mlanduwu ndipo mbali ya boma inabweretsa mboni zitatu zomwe zinachititsa kuti apezeke olakwa. Polankhula mu bwaloli iye anapempha kuti apatsidwe chilango chofewerako kaamba koti adakali wamng’ono ndipo sakuyenera kupita ku ndende. Popereka chigamulo chake Senior Resident Rodrick Michongwe anati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi khalidwe lomwe Razalo anawonetsa ndipo anamulamula kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka 9 pa mlandu wothyola nyumba komanso zaka 17 pa mlandu wogwililira koma anati chilango chonsechi chidziyendera limodzi. Joseph Razalo amachokera m’mudzi wa Mvero mfumu yaikulu Bwananyambi m’boma la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapereka Mafuno Abwino Kwa Mkulu Watsopano wa Chipani cha Francisan
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wa mafuno abwino kwa mkulu watsopano wa chipani cha ma Franciscan. Mkulu watsopano wa chipani cha Franciscan – Bambo Fusarelli Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wafunira zabwino zonse bambo Massimo Fusarelli posankhidwa kukhala mkulu wa chipani cha ma Franciscan pa dziko lonse. Lachiwiri chipanichi chasankha Bambo Fusarelli kuti akhale mkulu wa chipanichi kwa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi. Iye wati wayikiza m’mapemphero bambo Fusarelli kaamba kosankhidwa pa udindo wa ukuluwu. “Potsatira kusankhidwa kwanu ine ndikukufunirani zabwino zonse ndipo ndikulonjeza kuti ndizikupemphererani kuti choncho Mulungu azikutsogolerani pa utumiki wanu,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawo. Iye wati ndi pemphero lake kuti Bambo Fusarelli aziyang’ana kwa Francisco Woyera wa ku Assisi yemwe ndi muyambitsi wa chipanichi. Bambo Fusarelli omwe ndi a zaka 58 ndipo amachokera m’dziko la Italy asankhidwa pa udindowu dzana lachiwiri pa 13 July 2021 kuti atumikire pa udindowu kwa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wabwereza Kupempha Anthu a M’dziko La Haiti Kuti Athetse Mavuto a M’dzikolo Pochita Zokambirana
news: Polankhula lamulungu pambuyo pa pemphero la Uthenga wa Mnjelo kwa Amayi Maria, ku chipatala cha Agostino Gemelli ku Rome m’dziko la Italy, Papa Francisco wapempha magulu osiyanasiyana ndi zipani za ndale kuti ayiwale kusiyana kwawo ndi kubwera pamodzi pochita zokambirana pofuna kuthetsa mavuto a m’dzikolo. Pempho la Papa Francisco ladza potsatira pempho la ngati lomweli lomwe maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika m’dziko la Haiti apereka masiku apitawa. Iye wati maganizo ake ali pa anthu a m’dziko la Haiti ndipo wati wayikiza anthu a m’dzikolo m’mapemphero. “Mogwirizana ndi maepiskopi a m’dziko la Haiti ndikupempha kuti magulu onse omenyana komanso zipani za ndale zisankhe moyo pobwera pamodzi ndi kuchita zokambirana kuti bata ndi mtendere zibwererenso m’dzikolo,” watero Papa Francisco. Mavuto a za ndale m’dziko la Haiti awonjezereka ndi kuphedwa kwa mtsogoleri wa dzikolo Jovenel Moïse kunyumba kwake masiku apitawa. A polisi a m’dzikolo ati anthu anayi omwe akuwaganizira kuti anachita nawo chiwembuchi aphedwa ndipo ena awiri amangidwa. Iwo ati akusakabe anthu ena omwe akuwaganizira kuti adachita nawo chiwembuchi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsindika Za Kufunika Kosamala Nyanja
news: Dzulo pa 11 July ndi tsiku lomwe mipingo ya chikhristu imaganizira kufunika kosamalira nyanja ndipo tsikuli limadziwika m’chingerezi kuti Sea Sunday. Pambali poganizira za kufunika kosamalira Nyanja, mipingo ya chikhristu imakumbukiranso anthu omwe amagwira ntchito pa nyanja monga asodzi. M’mawu ake, mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kosamalira nyanja ndipo wapempha anthu kuti apewe kutaya zinyalala mu nyanja m’chitidwe womwe iye wati uli ndi kuthekera kowononga ndi kusokoneza chilengedwe cha m’madzi. Iye wati tsikuli ndi lofunika kwambiri popeza limazindikiritsa anthu za kufunika koganiziranso ntchito yotamandika yomwe anthu monga asodzi amagwira m’moyo wa anthu. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wati ndi kofunika kumapemphelera asodzi ndi ena onse omwe amagwira ntchito zosiyana-siyana pa nyanja. M’chitidwe wotaya zinyalala mu mitsinje ndi mu nyanja ndi vuto lalikulu ku Malawi lomwe likuwononga madzi komanso za moyo zomwe zimapezeka m’madzi’wa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Parish ya Mithungu Yakonzeka Kutsogolera Chibalalitso mu Arkdayosezi ya Blantyre
news: Parish ya Mithungu yomwe ili m’boma la Phalombe mu arkidayosezi ya Blantyre yati yakonzeka kutsogolera arkidayosiziyo pa zochitikachitika za chibalalitso cha mpingo cha chaka chino. Bambo mfumu a parishiyi bambo Lazarus Zulani atsimikizira izi Radio Maria Malawi pambuyo pa mkumano wa atsogoleri omwe  unakozedwa ndi ofesi yowona za utumiki wa a Papa ya Pontifical Missionary Societies (PMS) mu arkidayosiziyi ndi cholinga chowazindikiritsa zoyenera kuchita mu mwezi wa chibalalitso wa chaka chino. Ena mwa atsogoleri a parishi ya Mithungu Bambo Zulani ati ndi okondwa kuti arkiepiskopi wa arkidayoseziyo Ambuye Thomas Luke Msusa asankha parishiyi kuti itsogolere zochitika za chibalalitso cha mpingo mu arkidayosiziyo zomwe anati zithandizira akhristu a m’parishiyi kumvetsa bwino za mpingo wodzidalira potengera kuti parishiyi ndi yatsopano. “Poyamba tithokoze Ambuye Thomas Luke Msusa komanso onse aku Administration kaamba kosankha parish yathu ya Mithungu kuti itsogolere zochitikachitika za chibalalitso cha chaka chino. Titamva za uthenga umenewu tonse tinali okondwa kaamba koti chibalalitsochi chikugwirizana ndi zomwe ndakhala ndikunena kwa akhristuwa kufunika kwa mpingo wodzidalira pokhalanso kuti parish yathu ndi yatsopano yomwenso ikusoweka zambiri,” anatero bambo Zulani. Pamenepa iwo ati parishiyi yakonzeka kutsogolera zochitikazi ndipo anati akuyembekezera kudzachita zazikulu m’mweziwu pa chibalalitso cha mpingo. “Kudzera mu zomwe mkulu wa mu ofesi ya zimenezi bambo Thawani atifotokozera, ifeyo tikhala ndi zochitika zosiyanasiyana m’magawo angapo monga kuthandiza akhristu kuzama pa mapemphero, kugwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana zotumikira anthu ndi mpingo ngakhalenso kupereka molowa manja pa za mbale ndi zina zambiri zomwe ndikukhulupilira kuti zitha kuthandiza maparish a kuno ndi ena a kunja kuphatikizapo parish yathu yomwenso ikusowa zinthu zosiyanasiyana kufikiridwa ndi cholinga choti uthenga wa Ambuye Yesu Khristu ubalalike ponseponse,” anapitiriza motero bambo Zulani. Mmawu ake mkulu wa mu ofesi ya zautumiki wa a Papa ya Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) mu arkdayosiziyi bambo Mathias Thawani ayamikira chidwi chachikulu chomwe atsogoleri a m’parishiyi achiwonetsa povomera kutsogolera zochitika za chibalalitso cha mpingo cha chaka chino. “Mkumano wathu wa lero cholinga chake chinali chozakumana ndi atsogoleri a parish iyi ya Mithungu ndi kudzagawana nawo upangiri wa momwe angakonzekere chibalalitso cha chaka chino. Ndine wokondwa kuti bambo Zulani ndi akhristu awo anali ndi chidwi cha chachikulu pa za chibalalitso cha chaka chino cha 2021 ndipo ndinenso onyadira kuti avomera kuti atsogolere zochitikazi m’malo mwa arkidayosezi yathu. Uku kunali mkumano woyamba koma masiku akubwerawa tikhala ndi mikumano ingapo yomwe ithandizire akhristu kukonzekera bwino kuti zonse za chibalalitso cha chaka chino zidzayende bwino,” anawonjezera motero bambo Thawani. Mwazina, parish ya Katamba mu dayosezi ya Zomba ndi yomwe inasankhidwa ndi maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno kuti itsogolere zochitika za tsikuli mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Parishi ya Mofolo Woyera Ikusowa 5 Million Kwacha
news: Bambo mfumu a parishi ya Mofolo Woyera mu dayosizi ya Mangochi, bambo Clemence Pindulani ayamikira akhristu a parishiyo kaamba ka chidwi chomwe ali nacho polimbikitsa mpingo wodzidalira. Bambo Pindulani anena izi lamulungu lapitali pamene parishiyi inakonza Paper Sunday ndi cholinga chofuna kupeza ndalama zokwana 5-million-kwacha zomwe parishiyi ikusowa kuti igulire mipando ya mtchalitchi komanso zina zofunikira pa parishiyo. Iwo anati anthu a mderali ndi opeza zinthu zawo movutikira komabe akuyesetsa kudzithandiza okha kuti parishi yawo iyende bwino. “Akhristu a kuno amadalira ulimi kapena ana awo omwe anapita ku South Africa kuti pamene awathandiza nawonso amatengako pang’ono ndi kuthandiza mpingo. Ndi anthu oti akufunika kutukulidwa,” anatero bambo Pindulani. Polankhulapo a Enerst Kamuloni omwe anali mlendo wolemekezeka pa paper Sunday-yi alimbikitsa akhristu a parishiyo kuti apitirize kuthandiza parishiyo ndi cholinga choti ipite patsogolo. Pa tsikuli, parishiyi yomwe ndi yatsopano yomwe inachoka mu parishi ya Namandanje, yapeza ndalama zokwana 600 sauzande kwacha zoyambira ntchitoyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Anjata Anthu 14 Ophwanya Malamulo Opewera COVID-19
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa amanga anthu khumi ndi anayi (14) kaamba kolephera kutsatira ndondomeko zopewera kachilombo ka corona mdziko muno. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha, anthuwa omwe ndi a zaka za pakati pa 21 ndi 35 amangidwa usiku wa loweruka pa Dowa Turn Off, Dzaleka Refugee Camp komanso pa msika wa boma la Dowa pamene achitetezo amayendera maderawa powonetsetsa ngati anthu akutsatira ndondomeko zopewera kachilomboka. Iye wati anthu onsewa akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu ndi kukayankha milandu yokhudza kusavala chotchinga kukamwa ndi mphuno komanso kuchita malonda mu nthawi yosavomerezeka; komwe ndi kuphwanya malamulo omwe anakhazikitsidwa mdziko muno opewera mliriwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Atsogolera Mapemphero a Mawa Masana
news: Likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse lalengeza kuti lamulungu pa 11 July nthawi ya 12 koloko masana Papa Francisco atsogolera pemphero la Mthenga wa Mnjelo kwa Amayi Maria ndi kulankhula kwa anthu kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti kuchokera ku chipatala cha Agostino Gemelli ku Rome m’dziko la Italy. Papa’yu yemwe lamulungu lapitali pa 4 July adapita ku chipatalachi kuti akamuchite opareshoni ya m’mimba, akupitirirabe kulandira chisamaliro ku chipatalachi. Papa Francisco yemwe tsopano akupeza bwino, lachinayi adayamba kugwira ntchito zina ndi zina monga kuchita Misa ndi omwe ali naye ku chipatalachi. Aka si koyamba kuti Papa atsogolere mapemphero ndi kulankhula kwa anthu kuchokera m’chipatala. Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera adachitanso chimodzimodzi atagonekedwa ku chipatala chomwechi pomwe anawomberedwa ndi munthu wina pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square. Chipatala cha Agostino Gemelli ku Rome m’dziko la Italy chili ndi mbali ya padera yothandizira a Papa pamene akusowa thandizo la chipatala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dayosizi ya Dedza Yasintha Tsiku Lokhazikitsa Episkopi Watsopano
news: Dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Dedza, yasintha tsiku la mwambo wokhazikitsa bambo Peter Adrian Chifukwa kukhala episkopi wa dayosiziyo. Mkulu wofalitsa nkhani mu dayosiziyo bambo Joseph Billiat atimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi ndipo ati kusinthaku kwadza kaamba ka kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akupezeka ndi nthenda ya COVID-19 mdziko muno. Bishop watsopano wa dayosizi ya Dedza Iwo ati mwambowu omwe unakonzedwa kuti udzachitike pa 31 July wasinthidwa ndipo udzachitika pa 28 August chaka chino poganizira kuti pofika tsikuli, mliriwu udzakhala utachepa. “Tikuganiza kuti pofika tsiku limeneli chiwerengero cha anthu opezeka ndi kachilomboka chidzakhala chitachepa chifukwa kudzakhala kutayamba kutentha. Mukudziwanso kuti boma lakhazikitsa njira zopewera mliri wa COVID-19 mdziko muno zomwe zina zikuletsa mikumano ya anthu ochuluka choncho sitikufuna kuti tiphwanye malamulo amenewa,” anatero bambo Billiat. Iwo ati kusintha kwa tsikuli sikunasokoneze zokonzekera za mwambowu ndipo ati zithandiziranso kuti chikonzero cha komiti yomwe ikuyendetsa mwambowu chofuna kuti ku mwambowu kudzafike anthu ochuluka, chikwaniritsidwe. Pa 8 May chaka chino, mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko anasankha bambo Peter Adrian Chifukwa kuti akhale episkopi wa dayosizi ya Dedza, kulowa m’malo mwa Ambuye Emmanuel Kanyama omwe anamwalira pa 17 February mchaka cha 2018.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dambo Elephant Marsh Ndi Lotetezedwa Tsopano
news: Dambo la Elephant Marsh ku chigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire tsopano ndi malo otetezedwa pansi pa nthambi yowona za nkhalango ndi nyama zakutchire Izi zadziwika pamene ena mwa akuluakulu ogwira ntchito ku Shire Valley Transformation Project anakawonekera ku khonsolo ya boma la Chikwawa ndi kupereka ndondomeko za kasamalidwe ka damboli. Mkanthama: Dambo limeneli ndi lolemera kwambiri Mwa zina, nzika zokhala m’madera a dambo la Elephant Marsh ndi malo ozungulira zidzapatsidwa mphamvu yosamalira zachilengedwe zopezeka m’damboli komanso kulimbikitsa ntchito zokopa alendo. Katswiri owona za kasamalidwe ka madambo ndi ulimi wa nsomba pansi pa Shire Valley Transformation Project, a Clifford Mkanthama ati damboli litasamalidwa bwino, lidzathandiza kubweretsa chuma m’dziko. A Mkanthama anati damboli lomwe lili ndi zamoyo zochuluka monga nyama zakutchire ndi ziweto kuphatikizapo zomera ndi mbewu zakudimba, lili ndi kuthekera kotukula dziko lino pa chuma. Iwo anati malingana ndi malamulo oyendetsera madimba a mtunduwu, mphamvu zosamalira madimbawa zimaperekedwa kwa magulu a anthu a kumudzi. Gawo limodzi la Elephant Marsh Pamenepa a Mkanthama apempha mafumu ku chigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire kuti akhazikitse magulu akumudzi osamalira zachilengedwe ku madimba a Elephant Marsh ndi kulimbikitsa ntchito zokopa alendo. “Dambo limeneli ndi lolemera kwambiri chifukwa lili ndi ntchito zambiri zokopa alendo zomwe zingathandize kupititsa patsogolo chitukuko cha kumidzi,” anatero a Mkanthama. Ndipo m’mawu awo ovomereza kukhazikitsidwa kwa ntchitoyi, wapampando wa khonsolo ya boma la Chikwawa, a Gerald Bede anati ntchito yosamalira zachilengedwe m’damboli ikayamba idzathandiza kuthetsa mavuto odza kaamba ka kusintha kwa nyengo ku chigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire. “Kubwera kwa ntchito yobwezeretsa chilengedwe kwathu kuno ndi ntchito yomwe ithandize kubwezeretsa Chikwawa wathu wakale. Cholinga ndi chakuti mavuto omwe timakumana nawo a kusintha kwa nyengo amene amatikhuza akhale mbiri ya kale,” anatero a Bede. Ntchito yosamalira madimbawa ayigwira ndi chithandizo cha ndalama za dollar ya America zokwana 5.5 miliyoni kudzera ku bungwe la Global Environment Facility. Dambo la Elephant Marsh lidayambira kwa Kasisi m’boma la Chikwawa mpaka ku Makhanga m’boma la Nsanje ndipo lidalowa m’kawundula wa madimba otetezedwa pa dziko lonse m’chaka cha 2018.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mayi Wina Wafa pa Ngozi ya pa Nsewu mu Mzinda wa Lilongwe
news: Mayi wina wa zaka 27 zakubadwa wafa ndipo wina wavulala modetsa nkhawa njinga ya kapalasa yomwe anakwera itaowomba galimoto mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi pa polisi ya Lingadzi Sergeant Salome Zgambo wati ngoziyi yachitika lachisanu pomwe malemu Mary Frank pamodzi ndi mzake anakwera njinga ya kapalasa kuchokera ku Area 12 mu nsewu wa Mphungu ndipo amalowera ku City Center. Atafika mu nsewu omwe umakafika ku nyumba ya chifumu (state house) oyendetsa njingayu, Asiyatu Maulidi analephera kuyima zomwe zinachititsa kuti awombane ndi galimoto ya mtundu wa Fortuner nambala yake BU 185 yomwe imachokera ku Area 44 kulowera ku City Center. Potsatira ngoziyi anthu a pa njingayi anavulala kwambiri mutu ndipo anathamanga nawo ku chipatala cha Kamuzu Central komwe a chipatala anatsimikiza kuti a Mary Frank amwalira kamba kovula kwambiri. Pakadali pano yemwe amayendetsa njingayu wagonekedwa pa chipatalachi pomwe akulandira thandizo la mankhwala. Padakalipano apolisi alangiza anthu omwe akuyenda pa nsewu kuti adzitsatira malangizo a pa nsewu omwe amayikidwa kudzera mzikwangani pofuna kupewa ngozi za mtunduwu. Malemu Mary Frank anali ochokera m’mudzi mwa  Lunguzi mfumu yaikulu Lundu m’boma la Blantyre.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CMO Yakhazikitsidwa mu Dinale ya Molere ku Chikwawa
news: Abambo a mu dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Chikwawa awapempha kuti akhale olimbikira pogwira ntchito za mu mpingo. Wapampando wa bungwe la Catholic Men Organization (CMO) mu dayosiziyi, a Emmanuel Haglera anena izi lamulungu mu deanary ya Molere pa mwambo wokhazikitsa bungweli. Haglera: Atipatsa mangolomera Mkumanowu omwe unasonkhanitsa abambo ochokera ku maparishi atatu a mu dinale ya Molere, unali owazindikiritsa abambowa za kupezeka kwa bungwe la CMO mu dayosizi yawo komanso kuwafotokozera za kayendetsedwe ka bungweli. Pambuyo pa zokambirana zawo, abambowa anapatsidwa mwayi wosankha atsogoleri kuti athandize kuyendetsa bungweli mu dinale ya Molere kuyambira chaka chino cha 2021. Pamenepa a Haglera anati, ndi wokhutira ndi m’mene abambo alilandilira bungweli ponena kuti nthumwi ku mkumanowu zinali ndi mwayi wosankha atsogoleri a kumtima kwawo. Komabe iwo anati pamene kwatsala masiku ochepa kuti bungweli alikhazikitse mu dayosiziyo, abambo akuyenera kugwira ntchito modalirana. Abambo a bungwe la CMO mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa “Maparishi onse atatu atilandira bwino kwambiri, awoneka kuti ali ndi chidwi ndipo atipatsa mangolomera. Ndiye abambo nonse tikupempheni kuti mukhale olimbikira, odzipereka komanso tikhale anthu odalirika mu mpingo,” anatero a Haglera. Ndipo m’mawu ake, wapampando wongosankhidwa kumene mu dinale ya Njale, a Kinglsey Mulumpwa, anati abambo ku dinaleyi ndi okonzeka kugwira ntchito zotukula mpingo wa katolika. Iwo anati anali akulidikilira bungwe la abambo kwa nthawi yaitali, ndipo ndi chifukwa chake alilandira bungweli ndi manja awiri. “Kubwera kwa akuluakulu a dayosizi kudzakhazikitsa bungwe limeneli mu dinale yathu ya Molere, ife abambo tikhala tikuchita nawo ntchito zosiyanasiyana zotukula Mpingo wathu wa Chikatolika,” anatero a Kingsley Mulumpwa. Dinale ya Molere ndi yopangidwa ndi maparishi atatu okhawo opezeka m’boma la Thyolo omwe ndi a St. Simeon Njale, Our Lady of Mount Carmel Molere ndi The Good Shepherd Konzalendo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: “Papa Akupitirira Kupeza Bwino”
news: Pozindikira kuti anthu ambiri akufuna kuti azidziwa m’mene zinthu zikuyendera ku chipatala cha Agostino Gemelli m’dziko la Italy komwe Papa Francisco ali, potsatira opareshoni ya m’mimba yomwe yachitika lamulungu lapitali, mneneri wa likulu la mpingo wa katolika, Matteo Bruni lolemba wafotokoza kuti Papa Francisco akupitirira kupeza bwino. Bruni wati pali chiyembekezo kuti Papa Francisco akhala ali m’chipatalachi kwa sabata ya thunthu. “Papa Francisco akupeza bwino ndipo akutha kuchita zonse bwinobwino,” watero Bruni pofotokozera atolankhani dzulo. Malinga ndi pologalamu yoyikika, lamulungu Papa Francisco anapita ku chipatala cha Agostino Gemelli m’dziko la Italy komwe amuchita opareshoni yochotsa chotupa m’mimba. Madokotala asanu ndi anayi motsogoleredwa ndi Dr. Sergio Alfieri ndi omwe anagwira ntchitoyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe La Goal Malawi Lalimbikitsa Atsikana Omwe Anachitiridwa Nkhanza Kukhala Odzidalira
news: Atsikana amene analanditsidwa ku nkhanza zosiyanasiyana m’boma la Nsanje tsopano akhala ndi mwayi wochita malonda kuti akhale odzidalira pawokha. Mabungwe a Spotlight ndi Goal Malawi ndi omwe akugwira ntchito yolimbikitsa atsikana ndi amayi achichepere a m’bomali kukhala odzidalira pa chuma. M’modzi mwa alangizi a ku bungwe la Goal Malawi ku Nsanje a Khetiwe Gausi anati atsikanawa ayamba kubwerekana ndalama kudzera m’magulu awo popanda kupereka chiwongola dzanja. A Gausi ananena izi pambuyo pa maphunziro a sabata imodzi omwe anakonzera atsikana amene anachitiridwa nkhaza zosiyana siyana a momwe angachitire mabizinesi kudzera ku mabanki a kumudzi. Maphunzirowa omwe anachitikira ku Kalemba Pastoral Centre ku Bangula anasonkhanitsa atsikana okwana 200 kuchokera ku madera a mafumu a akulu anayi a m’bomali omwe anawalanditsa ku nkhanza. Zina mwa nkhanza zomwe atsikana ndi amayiwa anakumana nazo ndi monga; kukanidwa ndi makolo awo, kukakamizidwa kulowa m’banja, kukanizidwa mwayi wa maphunziro ndi kupatsidwa pathupi. “Atsikanawa tinawasonkhanitsa pamodzi chifukwa timafuna kuwalimbikitsa kukhala odzidalira pawokha,” anatero a Gausi. M’mawu ake, mmodzi wa atsikanawa yemwe kwawo ndi kwa Ntchenyera, Esinati Willard yemwe anachitiridwapo nkhanza ndi makolo ake pokana kumulipilira sukulu anati maphunzirowa amulimbikitsa kuwuza anzake ena kukhala odzidalira pa chuma. “Ine ndapindulapo chifukwa ndikapita kwathuko ndikawafotokozera anzanga amene ali kunyumbako kuti tiyambe banki ya m’mudzi kuti tikhale odzidalira patokha ife atsikana,” anatero Esinati. Koma Jenifa Simbi yemwe amachokera ku Phokera kwa mfumu yaikulu Mbenje, anali ndi maganizo osiyana ndi a Esnath kaamba koti Jenifa anati akufuna atabweleranso ku sukulu. “Ndinachimwitsidwa ndili sitandade 7. Anandikana ndithu, kundikanitsitsa ngati kuti mwina woti samandidziwa. Ineyo chimene ndingapemphe ndi chithandizo basi ngati cha ku sukulu,” anatero Jenifa. Mabungwe a Spotlight ndi Goal Malawi m’boma la Nsanje akugwira ntchito yothetsa nkhanza zomwe atsikana ndi amayi achichepere akuchitiridwa kwa mafumu aakulu anayi, omwe ndi Malemia, Tengani, Ndamera ndi Mbenje.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Ziwawa Za M’dziko La Eswatini
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi m’chitidwe wa ziwawa omwe anthu a m’dziko la Eswatini akuchita pofuna kuwonetsa kusakondwa kwawo. Polankhula laMulungu kwa akhristu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti iye wapempha akuluakulu oyendetsa dzikolo ndi onse omwe akufuna kukhala atsogoleri m’dzikolo kuti akhululukirane ndi kubwera pamodzi pochita zokambirana pofuna kuthetsa mavuto a m’dzikolo. Anthu a m’dziko la Eswatini lomwe kale limadziwika kuti Swaziland akhala akuchita ziwawa zosonyeza kusakondwa ndi ulamuliro wa Mfumu Mswati wachitatu ndipo m’malo mwake akufuna ulamuliro wa demokalase. Pa mwambowu Papa Francisco analengeza za ulendo wake wokacheza m’maiko a Budapest, Hungary komanso Slovakia kuyambira pa 12 mpaka pa 15 September chaka chino. Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Vatican lati lilengezabe ndondomeko yonse ya ulendo wa Papa Francisco m’maiko atatuwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alipira Chindapusa cha 950 Sauzande Kwacha Kaamba Kopezeka Ndi Mankhwala Opanda Chilorezo
news: Bwalo la mlandu la Chikwawa First Grade magistrate lalamula Layeni Genti kuti alipire chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 950, 000-kwacha chifukwa chopezeka ndi mankhwala a chipatala mwachinyengo. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi a m’bomalo, Sergeant Dickson Matemba wawuza Radio Maria kuti Genti anamangidwa pa 29 June, 2021 apolisiwa atamupeza ndi mankhwala a chipatala pa msika wa Dyeratu m’bomalo. Malingana ndi wapolisi woyimira boma pa mlanduwu, Emmanuel Namarwa, Genti anali atanyamula m’chikwama chake mankhwala monga; Amoxilline okwana 675, Bactrim okwana 340, Panado okwana 200, Abendazol okwana 45 ndi zipangizo zoyezera malungo zokwana 19 ndi mankhwala ena ambiri popanda kalata zachilorezo. Apa Matemba wati Genti atawonekera m’bwalo la mlandu, iye anawuvomera mlandu omwe anapatsidwa koma anapempha kuti khoti limufewetsere chilango popeza amasamalira banja lake. Ndipo woweruza mlanduwu, First Grade Magistrate Gladstone Chilundu analamula mkuluyu kuti apereke chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 950, 000-kwacha kapena akagwire ukayidi wa kalavulagaga kwa miyezi 18. Padakali pano Genti walephera kupereka ndalamazi ndipo akumusunga ku ndende ya Chikwawa. Layeni Genti ndi wa zaka 49 zakubadwa ndipo amachokera m’mudzi wa Pende kwa Mfumu yaikulu Kasisi m’boma la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akatswiri Ayamikira Boma Kaamba Kochepetsa Ndalama Za Chikondwelero Cha Ufulu Wodzilamulira
news: M’modzi mwa akatswiri pa nkhani za ndale m’dziko muno a Humphreys Mvula ati ino si nthawi yoti boma lidziwononga ndalama pamene zinthu zambiri m’dziko muno sizikuyenda bwino. Iwo anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pomwe wayilesi’yi imafuna kumva ndemanga yawo pa za chikonzero cha boma chofuna kugwiritsa ntchito ndalama zokwana K244 million pa chikondwelero cha ufulu wodzilamulira wa dziko lino pa 6 July ngakhale kuti tsopano boma lasintha ganizoli. Mvula: Ino si nthawi yowononga ndalama A Mvula ati anthu ambiri akuvutika m’dziko muno kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus ndi mavuto ena kotero si bwino kuti boma lidziwononga ndalama pa zinthu zosafunikira. Boma litalengeza kuti layika padera ndalama zokwana K244 million zoti zigwire ntchito pa chikondwerero cha ufulu wa dziko lino pa 6 July anthu ambiri anadzudzula boma kaamba ka chikonzerochi maka pa nthawi ino yomwe anthu m’dziko muno akukumana ndi mavuto osiyana-siyana monga kukwera kwa mitengo ya zinthu, mliri wa coronavirus pongotchula zochepa. Potsatira ndemanga zosonyeza kusakondwa ndi ganizoli, boma tsopano lasintha chikonzerochi ponena kuti ndi ndalama zokwana K50 million zomwe zigwire ntchito pa chikondwererochi. Pothilirapo ndemanga pa nkhaniyi a Humphreys Mvula omwe amalankhulapo pa nkhani za ndale m’dziko muno wayamikira ganizo lochepetsa ndalama zogwiritsa ntchito pa mwambowu. Iwo ati akanakonda boma likanangoyitana abusa kuti apemphelere dziko lino. Chaka chino dziko la Malawi likhala likukondwerera zaka 57 za ufulu wodzilamulira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Anthu A M’dziko La Lebanon Kuti Athetse Mavuto Omwe Ali M’dzikolo
news: Polankhula pa mwambo wa mapemphero opemphelera dziko la Lebanon womwe wachitika lachinayi pa 1 July ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican, Papa Francisco wapempha anthu a m’dziko la Lebanon kuti apeze njira zothetsera mavuto omwe ali m’dzikolo. Pa mwambo wa mapempherowu pomwe panalinso atsogoleri khumi a mipingo ya chikhristu ochokera ku Lebanon, iye wati ndi kofunika kuti anthu m’dzikolo ayang’ane m’mbuyo ndi kuyesa kupeza njira zomwe zingabweretse anthu pamodzi kuti choncho zinthu m’dzikolo zibwererenso mwakale. Iye wapempha a Katolika pa dziko lonse kuti asatope kupempherera anthu a m’dziko la Lebanon omwe akusowa kulimbitsidwa mtima, kukhala a chiyembekezo komanso kuti mtendere ubwerere m’dzikolo. Papa Francisco wati ndi kofunika kulimbikitsa kulolerana, kulimbikitsa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu komanso kuika patsogolo ubwino wa anthu onse. Dziko la Lebanon liri pa mavuto a akulu a za chuma komanso mpungwepungwe pa ndale.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akagwira Ukayidi wa Zaka 20 Kaamba Kogwililira Gogo wa Zaka 91
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Dowa lalamula mnyamata wina wa zaka 25 kukakhala ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga zaka 20 kaamba kogwirira gogo wa zaka 91. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Inspector Christopher Dulani, anauza bwaloli kuti mnyamatayu Thokozani Andrew anapalamula mlanduwu mwezi wa September chaka chatha pomwe anawapeza agogowa mu nkhalango ya Mkanganya akutola Makala ndipo anawazemberera mpaka kuwagona mokakamiza. Agogowa anadziwitsa abale awo za nkhaniyo ndipo apolisi ya kumudzi anagwira mnyamatayo ndi kukamupereka ku polisi. Atawonekera ku bwalo la milandu mnyamatayo anawukana mlanduwu koma pambuyo pake anapezeka olakwa bwaloli litabweretsa mboni zitatu. Popereka chigamulo chake, Senior Resident Magistrate Joana Kwatiwani anati wapereka chilango choterechi kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Thokozani Andrew amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kaziputa mfumu yaikulu Msakambewa m’boma la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alamulidwa Kukhakhala ku Ndende Kwa Zaka Khumi Kaamba Kogona Ndi Mnyamata Wina
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Lilongwe lalamula bambo wina wa zaka 52 kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavulagaga kwa zaka khumi kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu ogwirira mnyamata wina. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sergeant Sautso Kamoto anauza bwaloli kuti bamboyu Micheal Tembo anapempha mnyamatayo kuti amuphikire chakudya, ndipo mnyamatayo atalowa mnyumba kuti akatenge ufa, bamboyu anapezerapo mwayi omukakamiza mnyamatayu kuti agone naye. Atawonekera ku bwalo la milandu, bamboyo anaukana mlanduwu ndipo apa bwalo linabweretsa mboni zitatu zomwe zinachititsa kuti bamboyu apezeke olakwa pa mlanduwu. Popereka chigamulo chake Senior Resident Magistrate Shyreen Chirwa anati wapereka chilango choterechi kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Micheal Tembo amachokera m’mudzi mwa Tembo mfumu yaikulu Mponela m’boma la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Marriage Encounter Lafika mu Dayosizi ya Mangochi
news: Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi, Ambuye Montfort Stima ati mabanja abwino a chikhristu amathandiza ana awo kukula ndi makhalidwe abwino. Ambuye Stima amalankhula izi lero pa mwambo wokhazikitsa bungwe la Marriage Encounter ku parishi ya Balaka mu dayosizi ya Mangochi. Ambuye Stima kupereka satifiketi kwa mabanja awiri omwe abweretsa bungwelo mu dayosizi ya Mangochi Iyi ndi parishi yoyamba kulandira bungwe la Marriage Encounter mu dayosizi ya Mangochi. Pamenepa ambuye Stima apempha mabanja achikhristu mu dayosiziyo kuti alowe m’mabungwe osiyanasiyana a mabanja ndi cholinga chokometsa moyo wa mabanja awo. Polankhulapo bambo mfumu a parishi ya Balaka komwe bungweli lafikira mu dayosiziyi, bambo Joseph Kudzala ati ayesesetsa kugwiritsa ntchito chaka cha Yosefe Woyera komanso chaka cha mabanja chomwe mpingowu ukukondwelera chaka chino, pofotokozeranso zambiri zokhudza bungweli. Mamembala a bungwe la Marriage Encounter patsikulo Ndipo mlembi wa bungwe la Marriage Encounter mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre, banja la a Frank ndi Selefi Namangale anati ndi okondwa kuti bungweli lakhazikitsidwa ku parishiyi. Iwo anati cholinga cha bungwe lawo si kupha mabungwe ena a mabanja omwe ali mu mpingowu ponena kuti bungwe lililonse limakhala losiyana ndi limzake. Mwazina, kuti banja likhale membala wa bungweli limayenera kupita ku m’bindikiro wa uzimu kwa masiku atatu komanso bungweli limagwiritsa ntchito chiyankhulo cha chingerezi mu zochitika zake zosiyanasiyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Wayamikira Ogwira Ntchito Zaumoyo
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wayamikira anthu ogwira ntchito za chipatala kaamba kodzipereka pa ntchito yawo. Chakwera walankhula izi dzulo kunyumba ya boma ya Kamuzu pa mwambo wothokoza ena mwa anthu ogwira ntchito za chipatala omwe adzipereka kwathunthu pa ntchito yawo wodziwika kuti Zikomo Awards.
