Iye wati kudzipereka kwawo pogwira ntchito kwathandiza kuti dziko la Malawi likhale lotetezeka ku mliri wa coronavirus. Mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu wati kukadakhala kovuta kuti iye ndi wachiwiri wake athe kugwira ntchito yawo yotumikira a Malawi popanda anthu a za chipatala ogwira ntchito modzipereka. Padakalipano pomwe chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akupezeka ndi nthenda ya Covid-19 chayamba kukweranso, mtsogoleriyu wapempha anthu ogwira ntchito za chipatala kuti adzipereke kwathunthu pothana ndi mliriwu. Uwu unali mwambo woyamba wotchedwa Zikomo Awards, ndipo anthu 38 ndi omwe alandira Zikomo Awards.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Mapemphero a Padera
news: Pamene mpingo wa katolika ukukonzekera kuchita chaka cha Petulo ndi Paulo Oyera mawa pa 29 June, Papa Francisco wapempha kuti a Katolika pa dziko lonse achite mapemphero a padera omupemphelera. Papa: Ndikusowa mapemphero anu Iye wati akusowa mapemphero ndipo ali ndi chikhulupiriro kuti a Katolika pa dziko lonse amupemphereradi. “Mundipemphere. Ine Papa wanu ndikusowa mapemphero anu. Zikomo. Ndikukhulupirira kuti mutero ndithu,” watero Papa Francisco. Pempho la Papa Francisco labwera pano pomwenso madayosizi a pa dziko lonse amatolera ndalama zothandizira ntchito za a Papa. Ndalamazi zimadziwika kuti Peter’s Pence ndipo zimathandiza mpingo wa katolika m’maiko osiyanasiyana komanso ntchito za likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican. Pa 29 June chaka chilichonse Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse umachita chaka cha Petulo ndi Paulo Oyera. Malinga ndi mpingo wa katolika, Petulo Woyera ndiye Papa woyamba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bembeke Parishi Ikhazikitsa Tchalitchi Lake Laling’ono
news: Lamulungu pa 27 June 2021 ndi tsiku losayiwalika kwa anthu a kwa gulupu Mapira  mdera la mfumu yayikulu Chakhumbira m’boma la Ntcheu, pomwe mpingo wa katolika wakhazikitsa tchalitchi chake chaching’ono ku derali. Poyankhulapo bambo mthandizi wa parishi ya Bembeke omwe anatsogolera mwambo wa misayi, bambo Protazio Mantchichi anati akhristu akuyenera kuchilimika powonetsetsa kuti ntchito yotumikira mpingowu ikupita pa tsogolo. Bambowa alimbikitsa akhristuwa kuti agwirane manja ndi cholinga choti mpingo wa Mulungu uyende bwino. Poyankhulapo a mfumu a derali Group Village Headman Mapira anati ndi okondwa kaamba ka kukhazikitsidwa kwa tchalitchili ponena kuti ichi ndi chiyamba cha chitukuko ku dera lawo. Mfumuyi yati zimenezi zithandizira anthu ozungulira derali kukhala chifupi ndi Mulungu. M’mawu ake gulupa wa dera la Kachipeya yemwe adzifikira derali a Moses Elisa alimbikitsa anthuwa kuti akhale ogwirana manja kuti mpingowu uyende bwino. Naye wapampando wa tchalitchili wongogwirizira a Aron Kamiyoni Simango anati ayesetsa kuti agwirane manja ndi cholinga choti zinthu ziyende bwino. Kwanthawi yayitali anthu aku derali akhala akupita mdziko la Mozambique kukapemphera pa tchalitchi cha Nthawira yomwe ndi nthambi ya Mpenya mu dayosizi ya Tete kufikira pomwe mpingo wa katolika kuno ku Malawi wakhazikitsa tchalitchichi. Mwambo wokhazikitsa tchalitchi cha Mapira unasonkhanitsa anthu osiyanasiyana ozungulira derali kuphatikizapo mafumu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nduna Ilimbikitsa Anthu Kusamalira Chilengedwe
news: Nduna yowona za nkhalango ndi chilengedwe mdziko muno mayi Nancy Tembo ati aliyense akuyenera atengepo gawo powonetsetsa kuti chilengedwe chikusamalidwa mdziko muno. Mayi Tembo ayankhula izi lachinayi pokhazikitsa ntchito yosamalira nkhalango ndi chilengedwe yomwe ikutchedwa Large Scale Forest Landscape Restoration (FLR) ku Mpira Dam m’boma la Ntcheu. Tembo: Sitikufuna kukhala olephera Iwo athokoza mabungwe omwe atengapo gawo kuti project-yi iyende bwino ndipo apempha anthu ozungulira malowa kuti akhale ndi umwini osamalira mitengo yomwe idzalidweyo. “Poyamba ndiyamike boma la Germany lomwe litithandize ndi ndalama pa ntchito imeneyi. Tiwonetsetsa kuti ku dera kuno chilengedwe chisamalidwe. Ntchitoyi ikuchitika ku Malawi kuno, ku Kenya komanso ku Rwanda ndiye ife sitikufuna kuwonekera kukhala olephera tiyesetsa ndithu kuti ntchitoyi iyende bwino,” anatero mayi Tembo M’mawu ake wachiwiri kwa mkulu owona za chitukuko ku ofesi ya kazembe wa dziko la Germany mdziko muno a Knut Steffen Gummert anati boma lawo limadziwa za kufunika kwa chilengedwe ku dziko choncho anachiwona chofunika kuti athandizepo kuti chilengedwe ku derali chibwelere mchimake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Maepiskopi A M’dziko La Germany Pa Za Msonkhano Wawo Wa Sinodi
news: Lachinayi Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi wapampando wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika m’dziko la Germany, Ambuye Georg Bätzing ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican. Papa atakumana ndi Bishop Batzing Ambuye Bätzing afotokozera atolankhani kuti Papa Francisco walimbikitsa maepiskopi a m’dziko la Germany kuti apitirize ndi msonkhano wa Sinodi m’dzikolo ndipo kuti nthumwi ku msonkhano wa Sinodi’yo zikambirane mfundo zonse momasuka kuti ayale mfundo zomwe mpingo wonse wa katolika utha kuziganizira. Iwo awuzanso Papa Francisco kuti ndi bodza la mkunkhuniza kuti maepiskopi a m’dziko la Germany akukambirana nkhani zina zomwe ndi zotsutsana ndi ziphunzitso za mpingowu. Ambuye Bätzing ati Papa Francisco wapempha maepiskopi m’dziko la Germany kuti athandize pa zochitikachitika zokonzekera msonkhano wa Sinodi ya maepiskopi a pa dziko lonse yomwe idzakhalepo ku Rome m’chaka cha 2023. Iwo ati mwazina akambirana ndi Papa Francisco nkhani za atumiki ena m’dzikolo omwe akukhudzidwa ndi nkhani zochita zosayenera ndi ana. Aka ndi kachiwiri kuti Ambuye Bätzing achite zokambirana ndi Papa Francisco chiwasankhireni chaka chatha kukhala wapampando wa bungwe la ma episkopi a mpingo wa katolika m’dziko la Germany.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PMS ku Chikwawa Yakonza Msulo Wa Aphunzitsi A Akatukumeni
news: Ofesi yowona za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa ya Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa iyamba kusula aphunzitsi a kalasi za akatukumeni mu dayosiziyo. Mkulu woyang’anira ntchito za mu ofesi ya PMS mu dayosiziyo, bambo Ignasio Yohane, ati ofesi yawo iyamba kupereka maphunzirowa ku parishi ya Our Lady of the Poor-Ngabu loweruka pa 26 June, 2021. Bambo Yohane: Mpingo upindula Bambo Yohane ati msulowu awukonza pofuna kuwakonzekeretsa bwino aphunzitsiwa asanayambe ntchito yawo kuti akhale ndi nzeru zatsopano zophunzitsira mabuku atsopano amene maepiskopi a kuno ku Malawi atulutsa. Bambo Yohane ati ayitanitsa aphunzitsiwa kuti awakonzekeretse bwino asanayambe kuphunzitsa kuti athe kuwazolowera mabuku atsopanowa. “Kudzera pa msulowu, mpingo udzapindula poti udzakhala ndi aphunzitsi omwe adzakhale a nzeru zophunzitsira mwa ukadaulo akhristu amene ali ndi chilakolako cholowa mu mpingo wathu wa Eklezia Katolika,” anatero bambo Yohane Pa msulowu, aphunzitsi a akatukumeni a gulu 1, gulu 2 ndi gulu 3 ochokera ku matchalichi 21 mu ma centre anayi a parishiyi ndi omwe akuyembekezereka kudzasulidwa. Ndipo ansembe, asemino ndi agulupa a parishi ya Ngabu ndi omwe adzapereke msulowu pansi pa upangiri wa ofesi yowona za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa (PMS) mu dayosezi ya Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhristu Achenjere Ndi Alaliki Odzetsa Chisokonezo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachenjeza anthu kuti asamale ndi alaliki ena a mawu a Mulungu omwe cholinga chawo ndi kusokoneza anthu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi lachitatu ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Iye wanena izi polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la San Damaso komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Papa wati anthu akuyenera kusamalitsa ndi alaliki ena omwe akumathamangira pa masamba a mchezo a pa intaneti ndi kumapereka ziphunzitso za bodza zongofuna kusokoneza anthu.   Pamenepa iye wati anthu akuyenera kusamalitsa ndi alaliki oterewa omwe akumathamangira pa masamba a mchezo a pa intaneti ndi kumapereka ziphunzitso zao za bodza zongofuna kusokoneza maganizo a anthu. “Achulukirenji alaliki omwe akuthamangira kugwiritsa ntchito njira za makono zofalitsira ma uthenga ndi cholinga chobweretsa zipwirikiti pakati pa anthu. Achulukirenji alaliki omwe m’malo mowalalikira anthu za chikondi cha Mulungu ndi za Yesu Khristu wouka kwa akufa amayamba kudzitamandira ndi kumanena kuti chikhristu chenicheni ndi chomwe iwo amatsata,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati ndi kosavuta kuzindikira alaliki oterewa chifukwa amakhala ogwiritsitsa zinthu ndipo saafuna kuti asinthe pa kachitidwe kao ka zinthu. Papa Francisco wati makhalidwe awa ndi osemphana ndi Uthenga wa Chipulumutso wa Yesu Khristu womwe umasandutsa anthu kukhala afulu komanso achimwemwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Atolankhani Alimbikitse Anthu Kubayitsa Katemera Wa COVID-19
news: Bungwe la Development Communications Trust lapempha atolankhani m’dziko muno kuti athandize pa ntchito yofalitsa uthenga wolimbikitsa anthu kulandira katemera wa COVID-19. Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za bungweli, Tamara Nyirongo ndi yemwe wapereka pempholi ku chipatala cha boma la Chikwawa pa mkumano wawo ndi atolankhani. M’mawu ake, Nyirongo wati gawo loyamba lopereka ndi kulandira katemerayu silinayende bwino kaamba ka kusowa chidwi cha anthu m’maboma ena kuphatikizapo boma la Chikwawa. Iye wati, atolankhani ali ndi kuthekera kowuza anthu ochuluka za ubwino wolandira katemera gawo lina la katemerayu likadzafika m’dziko muno pogwiritsa ntchito njira zosiyanasiyana zofalitsira mauthenga. Pempholi ladza potsatira kafukufuku wa a zaumoyo yemwe akuwonetsa kuti ntchito yobayitsa katemera wa Astra-zeneca siyinayende bwino mu gawo loyamba lopereka ndi kulandira katemerayu m’maboma ena kaamba kosowa chidwi ndi mauthenga oyenera. “Monga tionawonera kuti mbuyomu pa nkhani ya katemera, ambiri tinalibe chidwi kwenikweni chobayitsa. Ifeyo tikachoka pano monga atolankhani komanso achipatala ndi a DCT tikalimbikitse anthu kuti katemera akapezeka tikalimbikitse anthu kulandira,” anatero Tamara Nyirongo. Padakali pano m’dziko muno mulibe katemerayu ndipo boma likuyembekeza kuyitanitsa katemera wina m’tsogolo muno. Ndipo popereka uthenga wa mmene ntchito yobayitsa katemera wa Astra-zeneca yayendera m’boma la Chikwawa, wofalitsa nkhani zaumoyo m’bomali, Settie Priminta anati ntchitoyi siyinayende bwino kwenikweni komabe komabe iye wapempha anthu kuti akuyenera kudzatuluka ochuluka ndi kudzabayitsa gawo lina la katemerayu likadzafika m’dziko muno. “Ambiri sanalindire katemera wachiwiriyu chifuka chakuti padakali pano watithera. Koma tikudikira boma kuti libweretse katemera wina kuti anthu amene sanalandire wachiwiriyo athe kulandira,” anatero Piriminta. Malingana ndi zotsatira za ntchitoyi m’dziko muno, boma la Chikwawa ndi limodzi mwa maboma omwe ali ndi chiwerengero cha anthu ochepa amene alandira katemera wa Astra Zaneca. Padakali pano anthu okwana 7, 825 ndi amene alandira kale katemerayu m’bomali mwa anthu 600, 200 okhala m’boma la Chikwawa chiyambireni cha ntchitoyi m’bomali pa 7 April 2021.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Asatayilire; COVID Yabweranso – Kandodo Chiponda
news: Unduna wa zaumoyo mdziko muno wapempha anthu kuti asatayilire potsatira ndondomeko zomwe a zaumoyo kudzera mu undunawu anakhazikitsa zopewera mliri wa Covid-19. Nduna ya zaumoyo mdziko muno mayi Khumbize Kandodo Chiponda ndi omwe anena izi lachinayi pa chipatala cha boma la Ntcheu pomwe ndunayi amalandira zipangizo zosiyanasiyana zothandiza kupewa mliriwu zomwe bungwe la Malawi Health Equity Network (MEHN) lapereka kuti zithandizire m’zipatala za maboma anayi omwe ndi a Ntcheu, Dedza, Blantyre, Lilongwe ndi Mzimba. Malinga ndi ndunayi, chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akupezeka ndi kachirombo ka Corona chayamba kukwera zomwe zikupereka chiwopsezo kwa mzika za dziko lino. Poyankhulapo wapampando wa bungwe la Malawi Health Equity Network (MEHN) Dr. Fred Mwathengere anati anachiona chofunika kuti athandizane ndi boma polimbana ndi mliri wa Covid-19 omwe wasokoneza ntchito za anthu ambiri mdziko muno. Polankhula atalandira zipangizozi, Dr. steve Macheso yemwe ndi mkulu wa zaumoyo m’boma la Ntcheu anayamikira bungwe la MEHN kaamba ka thandizoli lomwe ati lithandizira kupewa mliriwu. M’maola 24 apitawa, anthu khumi ndi awiri (12) ndi omwe apezeka ndi kachilombo ka Corona m’boma la Ntcheu ndipo munthu m’modzi wagonekedwa pa chipatalachi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha Nyumba Zofalitsa Nkhani Zithandizire Popereka Mauthenga Okhudza Katemera wa COVID-19
news: Unduna wa zaumoyo mdziko muno wati ukukhulupilira kuti nyumba zofalitsa nkhani zithandizira kupereka mauthenga owona okhudza katemera wa Covid-19 ndi cholinga choti anthu ochuluka alandire katemerayu. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu ku nthambi ya zophunzitsa anthu pa nkhani zaumoyo mu undunawu a Alvin Chidothi Phiri ndi omwe alankhula izi mu mzinda wa Blantyre pambuyo pa maphunziro a tsiku limodzi omwe anakonzera nthumwi zochokera m’nyumba zofalitsa nkhani mchigawo chakumwera ndi cholinga chowazindikiritsa mmene agathandizire pa ntchito yozindiritsa anthu za ubwino wolandira katemera wa covid-19. A Chidothi Phiri ati maphunzirowa ndi ofunika kwambiri kaamba koti athandiza nyumba zofalitsa nkhanizi kufotokozera bwino zowona zenizeni za katemerayu zomwe ati akukhulupilira kuti zichititsa anthu a m’madera awo kuzindikira ubwino wa katemerayu ndi kuchotsa nkhawa zomwe anali nazo. “Ifeyo ku unduna wathu tinawona kuti ndi kofunika kuti tiphunzitse anzathuwa omwe akuchokera m’mawayilesi osiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo a kanema makamaka a m’madera akumidzi kaamba koti tikudzindikira kufunika kwa wayilesizi poti zimamveredwa ndi anthu aku madera awo ndipo kupereka maphunziro oterewa kungathandizire kuti wayilesizi zitithandizire kupereka mauthenga oyenera okhudza katemera wa Covid-19 yemwe takhala tikupereka mdziko muno,” anatero a Chidothi Phiri. Pamenepa iwo ati ntchito za wayilesizi ndi zoti zikhala zikuwulutsa mapulogalamu ake a zaumoyo momwe muzikhala mauthenga oyenera omwe cholinga chake ndi kudzindikiritsa anthu za ubwino wolandira katemerayu Poyang’anira kuti kubwera kwa katemerayu kwabweretsa nkhani zabodza zomwe zikufala pakati pa anthu mwamsanga ndi kupereka mantha kwa iwo pa zakatemerayu pomwe undunawu mogwirizana ndi bungwe la WHO lalonjeza kuthandiza wayilesizi kuti zithe kugwira ntchitoyi mosavuta. Mwa zina, iwo atsimikiziranso anthu mdziko muno kuti asadere nkhawa pa kusowa kwa katemerayu kaamba koti undunawu mogwirizana ndi boma la Malawi akuchita chothekera kuti katemerayu ayambe kupezeka mdziko muno m’miyezi ya July kapena August chaka chino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Mamembala Atsopano A Bwalo La Milandu La Apilo ku Vatican
news: Lolemba Papa Francisco wasankha mamembala khumi ndi awiri atsopano a bwalo lalikulu la milandu la apilo la ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican lomwe limadziwika kuti the Supreme Tribunal of the Apostolic Signatura.  Mamembalawa akhala pa udindowu kwa zaka zisanu. Pambali pa mamembala khumi ndi awiri a bwalo lalikuluwa, Papa Francisco wasankha anthu ena asanu ndi awiri omwe ntchito yawo ikhala yopereka uphungu ku bwaloli. Mkulu wa bwalo la milandu la likululi ndi Cardinal Dominique Mamberti yemwe wakhala ali pa udindowu kuyambira m’chaka cha 2015 pomwe adalowa m’malo mwa Cardinal Raymond Burke. Likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse lili ndi ma bwalo atatu a milandu, awiri aang’ono ndipo la likulu limodzi. Bwalo la likulu la milandu la Supreme Tribunal of the Apostolic Signatura limandira milandu ya apilo kuchokera ku ma bwalo a milandu aang’ono awiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Wakhazikitsa Ntchito Yolimbana ndi Malungo
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wati ndi zotheka kugonjetsa malungo. Chakwera wayankhula izi lero ku Liwonde m’boma la Machinga pokhazikitsa ntchito yolimbana ndi malungo yomwe pachingerezi akuyitcha Zero Malaria Starts With Me. Chakwera pamodzi ndi nduna ya zaumoyo ndi wachiwiri wake patsikulo M’mawu ake pokhazikitsa ntchito yolimbana ndi malungo, Chakwera wati ndi zotheka kugonjetsa nthendayi ngati anthu onse atagwirana manja polimbana ndi malungo. Iye wati si zoona kuti dziko la Malawi lidziwononga ndalama za nkhaninkhani chaka ndi chaka zomwe ndi 19-billion-kwacha kaamba ka nthenda ya malungo yomwe ndi yotheka kuyigonjetsa. Pa mwambowu panali akuluakulu a boma monga nduna ya zaumoyo mayi Khumbidze Kandodo Chiponda komanso wachiwiri wake mayi Chrissie Kalamula Kanyasho. Chaka ndi chaka, anthu okwana 6 million amadwala nthenda ya malungo pomwe anthu osachepera 2500 amamwalira ndi nthendayi. Cholinga cha boma ndi choti nthendayi idzakhale itatha pofika m’chaka cha 2030.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MRA Ikhaulitsa Ozemba Msonkho
news: Ngati njira imodzi yowonetsetsa kuti ochita malonda akulipira msonkho woyenera, bungwe la Malawi Revenue Authority (MRA) latseka malo ogulitsa mowa a kampani ya Medical Aid Society MASM otchedwa PALACE omwe ali mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Mneneri wa bungweli a Steven Kapoloma ati bungweli linatsinidwa khutu ndi anthu akufuna kwabwino kudzera mu mpikisano wa Kuyiphula Ndi Lisiti Langa omwe anthu amaneneza a malonda ngati akugulitsa katundu opanda lisiti la bungweli. Malo awa atsekedwa Iwo ati malowa amagulitsa zakumwa kwa anthu koma mozemba msonkho wa bungweli zomwe zachititsa bungweli kuti litaye ndalama za nkhaninkhani. A Kapoloma ati kuyambira pamene bungweli linakhazikitsa mpikisano wa Kuyiphula Ndi Lisiti Langa, anthu ambiri akupereka umboni akapeza zachinyengo pa nkhani za misonkho. “Ngati bungwe lotolera msonkho, sitiyang’ana mawonekedwe a munthu kapena kampani timayesetsa kuti malamulo a msonkho agwire ntchito ndipo tikhala tikutseka malo onse ochitira malonda ngati apezeke akuzemba misonkho ya boma,” anatero a Kapoloma. Iwo ati poyamba sitoloyi analamula kuti ipereke chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 500 sauzande kwacha komanso inapalamula mlandu wamtunduwu kachiwiri zomwe zachulukitsa ndalama zoti sitoloyi ipereke ku bungweli. Padakali pano bungweli lati likhala likutseka malo osiyanasiyana ochitira malonda oposa khumi mu mzinda wa Blantyre.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Awiri Anjatidwa Kaamba Koba 22 Million Kwacha
news: Apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa akusunga m’chitokosi amuna awiri powaganizira kuti anaba ndalama zokwana 22 million Kwacha ku kampani yogula thonje ya Afrisian. Awiriwa ndi dalaivala wa galimoto ya kampaniyi, Lawrence Likaswe ndi Moses Steshy yemwe amagwira ntchito ya unamwino pa chipatala cha Montfort ku Nchalo m’boma la Chikwawa. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyo – Matemba Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa Dickson Matemba, awiriwa anawamanga pa 18 June 2021 anthu ena akufuna kwabwino atawatsina khutu. Iye anati apolisi analandira dandaulo kuchokera ku kampani yogula thonjeyi lakuti pa 10 June 2021 mbava zosadziwika zinabwera ndi zida ngati zikwanje ndi kuthyola pa kampaniyi ndi kuthawa ndi ndalama zokwana 22 million Kwacha. Anthuwa atafunsa mafunso ku polisi anatchula munthu wina wachitatu ponena kuti ndi yemwe akusunga ndalama zobedwazo. Padakali pano Matemba wati apolisi akhazikitsa ntchito yosakasaka munthu wachitatuyu mpaka amugwire. Oganiziridwa mlanduwa akawonekera ku bwalo la mlandu kuti akayankhe mlandu wa umbanda zomwe ndi zosemphana ndi ndime 300 ya buku loweruzira milandu. Lawrence Likaswe ndi wa zaka 36 zakubadwa ndipo amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mzambala kwa Mfumu yaikulu Mlumbe m’boma la Zomba ndipo Moses Steshy ndi wa zaka 32 zakubadwa yemwe amachokera m’mudzi mwa Bereu kwa Mfumu yaikulu Maseya m’boma la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wacheza Ndi Akayidi A Ndende Ina M’dziko La Italy
news: Lolemba m’mawa Papa Francisco wacheza ndi akaidi pafupi makumi awiri a ndende ya Rebibbia yopezeka mu mzinda wa Rome m’dziko la Italy ku nyumba yake ya Casa Santa Marta. Akayidiwa omwe ndi omwe anapalamula milandu ing’onoing’ono, anaperekezedwa ndi akuluakulu oyang’anira ndendeyi. Atatha kucheza ndi Papa Francisco, akayidiwa limodzi ndi owang’anira awo anakayendera malo osungira zinthu zambiri ya kale a Vatican Museums. Kwa nthawi yaitali, Papa Francisco wakhala wokhudzidwa ndi moyo wa akayidi. Izi zakhala zikuwoneka kudzera mu Misa zomwe Papa’yu wakhala akuchita zopempherera akayidiwa komanso wakhala akukayendera akayidiwa ku ndende. Iye wakhala akuwalimbikitsa kuti akhale anthu a chiyembekezo komanso odalira mphamvu ya chifundo cha Mulungu. Rebibbia ndi imodzi mwa ndende zikulu-zikulu za m’dziko la Italy.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wina Wafa Galimoto Yomwe Anakwera Itagwera Mu Mtsinje
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 44 zakubadwa wafa galimoto yomwe anakwera itaphonya nsewu ndi kugwera mu mtsinje wa Lingadzi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi pa polisi ya Lingadzi Sergeant Salome Zgambo, ngoziyi yachitika lolemba pomwe malemuwa a Madalitso Kanyama amayendetsa galimoto ya mtundu wa Suzuki Saloon yomwe ndi yopanda nambala kulowera mtunda wa Bwandiro. Atafika pa mlatho wa Lingadzi, analephera kuyiwongolera bwino zomwe zinachititsa kuti igwere mu mtsinje. Potsatira kuvulala kwambiri mutu, iwo anamwalira atangofika nawo pa chipatala cha Kamuzu Central. Iwo anali ochokera m’mudzi mwa Liti mfumu yayikulu Kumtumanje m’boma la Zomba. Padakalipano apolisi alangiza anthu oyendetsa galimoto kuti adzitsatira malangizo a pa nsewu omwe amayikidwa mzikwangwani zosiyanasiyana m’misewu ndi cholinga chopewa ngozi za mtunduwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Chikondi, Umodzi Zingathandize Kukometsa Dziko La Pansi
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Fransisco wati chikondi ndi umodzi pakati pa akhritsu zingathandize kusintha ndi kukometsa dziko la pansi. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, Papa wanena izi kudzera mu uthenga wake wa pa kanema kwa nthumwi za bungwe la mipingo ya chikhristu lotchedwa John 17 Movement. Iye wati chikondi ndi umodzi pakati pa akhristu zingathandize kusintha ndi kukometsa dziko la pansi. Papa watumiza uthengawu pano pomwe ma membala a bungweli akuchita m’bindikiro wa mapemphero ku seminale ya Saint Joseph ku New York m’dziko la United States of America. Iye wati zinthu zabwino zimafumira mu mgwirizano ndi ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu ndipo wati chikondi chili ndi kuthekera kosintha ndi kukometsa dziko la pansi. Papa’yu wati pakati pa akhristu chinthu chachikulu msinkhu ndi chakuti onse ndi ana a banja limodzi popeza ali ndi tate m’modzi ndipo walimbikitsa mamembala a bungweli kuti asatope kulimbikitsa ntchito za bungweli. Bungwe la John 17 Movement anayambitsa ndi m’busa wa mpingo wa chi Pentecost Joe Tosini m’chaka cha 2013 angakhale kuti iye si mkatolika analimbikitsa za kufunika kopempherera Papa Francisco atangosankhidwa kumene pa udindo wa u Papa. Dzina la bungweli likuchokera mu Uthenga Wabwino wa Yohane mutu 17 pamene Ambuye Yesu akupempherera za umodzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Archbishop Watsopano Wa Archdiocese Ya Durban M’dziko La South Africa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha archbishop watsopano wa arch-dayosizi ya Durban mdziko la South Africa. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, lachitatu pa 9 June 2021 Papa wasankha Ambuye Mandla Siegfried Jwara omwe ali ndi zaka 64 kukhala Archbishop watsopano wa arch-dayosiziyi. Archbishop Jwara anabadwa pa 1 February m’chaka cha 1957 m’dziko la South Africa ndipo anadzodzedwa unsembe pa 14 February m’chaka cha 1987. Archbishop Jwara akulowa m’malo mwa Cardinal Wilfrid Fox Napier yemwe wakhala archbishop wa arch-dayosizi ya Durban kuyambira m’chaka cha 1992. M’chaka cha 2016 Cardinal Napier analemba kalata kwa Papa yopempha kuti atule pansi udindo wake motsatira malamulo a mpingo wa katolika omwe amanena kuti episkopi akakwanitsa zaka 75 za kubadwa akuyenera kutula pansi udindo wake. Papa anapempha Cardinal Napier kuti apitirizebe kutumikira mpaka wolowa m’malo mwake atapezeka. Mpingo wa katolika ku Malawi ukudikirira modekha za yemwe Papa Francisco angamusankhe kukhala Archbishop wa Arch-dayosizi ya Lilongwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Tidziwamvetsetsa a Namwino’
news: M’modzi mwa akatswiri pa ntchito ya unamwino m’dziko muno mayi Margret Phiri ati anamwino angachite bwino pa ntchito yawo ngati atapatsidwa zodziyenereza zonse pa ntchitoyi. Anamwino akuyetsetsa-mayi Mankhamba Iwo alankhula izi lachitatu pa mkumano omwe bungwe lina la anamwino la National Organisation of Nurses and Midwives (NONM) linakonzera olemba nkhani mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Mayi Phiri ati nthawi zina anamwinowa amakhala otopa kaamba ka kuchuluka kwa ntchito zawo komanso kusowa zina zofunikira pa ntchito yawo zomwe zimawalepheretsa kugwira bwino ntchitoyi. “Anamwino amagwira ntchito 24 hours akuthandiza anthu ndiye nthawi zambiri amakhala mwina atopa nchifukwa chake pena amawoneka ngati sakufuna kuthandiza,” anatero mayi Phiri. Iwo anavomereza kuti malankhulidwe a anamwino ena sakhala abwino koma anachita changu kunena kuti izi zimachitika kaamba ka kusiyana kwa umunthu wawo komanso pena kumatha kuchitika kaamba kakutopaku. Mayi Phiri omwe adakhalapo namwino koma pano adapuma pa ntchito, anatinso kuchepa kwa zipangizo zina zogwilira ntchitoyi kukusokonezanso kaperekedwe kabwino ka chisamaliro pakati pa omwe akufuna thandizo la chipatala. “Monga mwatsopano ndi nthenda ya Covid yi, zipangizo tilibe zoti zizititeteza kuti tisakhale anthu owopa koma omasuka m’mene tikupeleka chithandizo kwa anthu,” Anatero mayi Phiri. Polankhulaponso, mkulu wa bungwe la NONM, mayi Regina Mankhamba ati akukhulupilira kuti kachitidwe ka zinthu ka anamwinowa kuthanso kusintha ngati anamwino ambiri atalowa nawo mu bungweli kuti azithandizana pafupi pafupi pa kagwiridwe kabwino ka ntchito zawo. Iwo anati ngati mbali imodzi yofunanso kuonetsetsa kuti ntchito zawo zikuyenda bwino amayesetsa kuchita zinthu moyima pawokha posatengera mbali monga pa ndale ndi zina. “Bungwe lathuli ndi loyima palokha si la boma, si lachipani, timayesetsa ndithu kuti tisamaphatikize nkhani za ndale mu kagwiridwe kathu ka ntchito, tikamatero ndekuti zonse ziyenda bwino chifukwa sipakhala kuti anthu ena akudandaula,” anatero mayi Mankhamba. Pakadali pano bungweli lili ndi mambembala okwana 3, 500 koma ati pali chiyembekezo kuti atha kufika pafupifupi 14, 000 ngati ambiri mwaiwo ataonetsa chidwi cholowa nalo mu bungweli. Kwa nthawi yaitali anthu ena mwa anthu omwe amapita kukafuna thandizo la chipatala mzipatala zosiyanasiyana akhala akudandaula pa zamomwe amathandizidwira maka pakayankhulidwe komanso chisamaliro chachipatala pomwe akumana ndi anamwino. M’mbuyomu, Radio Maria Malawi idachezapo ndi anthu ena omwe adadandaula ndi momwe anamwino amathandizira amayi oyembekezera zomwe zimawachititsa kuti asiye kukafuna thandizo la ku chipatala ndikusankha kuchilira kumudzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu 15 Amangidwa Kaamba Kosatsata Ndondomeko Zopewera COVID-19 M’boma la Ntcheu
news: Apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu akusunga mchitolokosi anthu 15 kaamba kopezeka akumwa mowa mosemphana ndi nthawi yomwe boma linakhazikitsa. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu Inspector Hastings Chigalu, anthuwa amangidwa usiku wa pa 8 June ndipo akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu kuti akayankhe milandu yosiyanasiyana yomwe apalamulayi. Pakadali pano apolisi m’bomali alangiza anthu kuti apitirize kutsatira ndondomeko zomwe boma linakhazikitsa zopewera mliri wa COVID-19 ponena kuti aliyense yemwe satero adzalandira chilango.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe La MERA Lati Mafuta Sasowa Mdziko Muno
news: Bungwe la Malawi Energy Regulatory Authority (MERA) latsimikizira anthu kuti asakhale ndi nkhawa ya kusowa kwa mafuta m’dziko muno. Mneneri wa bungweli mayi Fitina Khonje anena izi kutsatira kuyimitsidwa kwa kampani yoyang’anira nkhokwe za mafuta ya National Oil Company of Malawi (NOCMA) kuti isabweretsenso mafuta kuchokera kunja kwa dziko lino. Bungwe lothana ndi ziphuphu komanso katangale mdziko muno la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) ndi lomwe lapereka chiletsochi ku NOCMA poyiganizira kuti ikuchita za chinyengo pakaperekedwe ka ma kontalalikiti obweretsa mafuta m’dziko muno. Kudzera mu kalata yomwe bungwe la ACB latulutsa lachitatu, m’neneri wa bungweli mayi Egritta Ndala, lati lachita izi motsatira malamulo ake pofuna kupereka mpata wa kafukufuku pa madandaulo ochuluka omwe bungweli lalandira kuchokera kwa anthu pa za katangalezi. “Pofuna kuti kafukufuku asasokonekere tinaona kuti ndibwino kuti makontalikiti amenewa ayambe ayima kaye tifufufze ndipo tikafufuza tidzatha kuyiwuza NOCMA kuti kodi ikuyenera kuchita motani malinga ndi zimene tingapeze pa kafukufuku ameneyu,” anatero mayi Ndala. Wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa kampani ya NOCMA mayi Hellen Buluma anakana kulankhulapo pa nkhaniyi. Koma ofalitsa nkhani ku bungwe lowona za mphamvu la Malawi Energy Regulatory Authority-MERA, mayi Fitina Khonje ati anthu asadandaule kaamba koti ndondomeko zilipo kale zothandiza kuti mafuta asasowe m’dziko muno ndipo ati pakali pano mafuta alipo okwanira komanso ena akubwerabe. Iwo ati ngakhale izi zili chomwechi, bungweli liwunika ndondomeko zomwe zilipozi kuti apeze zoyenera kutsatira pakali pano. Mwazina, mayi Khonje ati atha kuwuza ma kampani a m’dziko muno omwe akubweretsa mafuta pakali pano kuti awonjezere mulingo wa mafuta omwe azibweretsa m’dziko muno. “Titha kuyilora mwina NOCMA kumene kunena kuti ma contract amene ali nawo kale osati awa amene akufuna kukhala nano pano, awonjezerepo ten percent ya zimene iwowo amaitanitsa kubwera kuno, kutanthauza kuti awonjezera mafuta olowa m’dziko muno kugwiritsa ma contract omwe alinawo kale,” anatero mayi Khonje. Chiletso chomwe bungwe la ACB’li lapeleka chikudza pomwenso pakhala kusamvana pakati pa kampani ya NOCMA ndi bungwe la MERA pa za yemwe akuyenera kupeza makampami oti aziitanitsa mafutawa. Kusamvanaku kunachititsa komiti ya kunyumba ya malamulo yoona za chilengedwe kuti ilowelerepo pa nkhaniyi ndipo pambuyo pake komitiyi idapereka mphamvu ku kampani ya NOCMA kuti ndiyo izibweretsa mafuta m’dziko muno osati bungwe la MERA. Wapampando wa komitiyi a Werani Chilenga ati sangalankhulepo kanthu pakali pani kufikira ACB itatsiliza kafukufuku wake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Gulu La MYP Layambanso Kukakamiza Boma Kuti Liwapatse Ndalama Zawo
news: Gulu la anthu omwe adali a Malawi Young Pioneer (MYP) lawuza boma kuti liwaganizire powapatsa mwansanga ndalama zomwe akhala akufuna. Polankhula pomwe amapereka kalata ya madandaulo awo ku khonsolo ya mzinda wa Lilongwe lachiwiri, mkhala pakati wa gululi a William Kanyoni ati iwo akufuna boma liwapatse ndalama zowachotsera pa ntchito ponena kuti adachotsedwa osawuzidwa komanso zina za chipepeso. Gulu la MYP popereka kalata yawo ku khonsolo ya mzinda wa Lilongwe Iwo ati ndi okhumudwa ndi kusowa chidwi kwa boma pa nkhani ya ndalamazi zomwe ati zawayika m’mavuto aakulu ponena kuti akulephera kuchita zinthu zina pa moyo wawo kaamba ka mavuto a zachuma. “Sikuti izi tangoziyamba lero ayi tidaziyamba kalekale. Kukambirana komwe kumakhalapo kumakhala kwa chinyengo,” anatero a Kanyoni. Iwo anawonjezera kunena kuti boma lakhala likuyika padera ndalama zoti apatsidwe koma m’malo mwake akhala akulandira zochepetsetsa zomwenso samadziwa cholinga chake. “Mwachitsanzo chabe, ena mwa omwe adalandira ndalama mu 2012 amalandira ma K1000 ena ma K2000. Kodi iyi ingakhale terminal benefit? Mu 2017 boma lidaperekanso ndalama ku gulu lathu ena adalandira ma K500, 000 koma sitikudziwa kuti zidali zachani,” anatero a Kanyoni. A Chimwendo Banda (kumanja) ndi omwe analandira kalatayo pamodzi ndi mkulu wa mzinda wa Lilongwe a John Chome (pakati) Apa a Kanyoni ati boma libwere poyera ndi kufotokoza ngati lidapereka ndalama zomwe akuzifunazi. Koma polankhulapo, nduna ya za m’dziko a Richard Chimwendo-Banda omwe analandira kalatayi m’malo mwa boma anatsimikizira anthuwa kuti boma liyesetsa kuwathandiza moyenera pa madandaulo awo. Iwo awuza anthuwa kuti atumize m’ndandanda wa mayina a anthu omwe akuyenera kulandira ndalamazi kuti boma liyambepo kulongosola. Gululi lakhala likukakamiza boma kuti liwapatse ndalamazi kwa nthawi yayitali ndipo m’mbuyomu adakhala pafupi-fupi chaka akuchita m’mbindikiro pafupi ndi ma ofesi a boma-Capital Hill ku Lilongwe pofuna kuti boma liwapatse ndalamazi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alangiza Atolankhani a Wayilesi ya Mpingo wa Katolika Kukhala Odzetsa Umodzi Pakati Pa Anthu
news: Mkulu wa nthambi ya zofalitsa mawu ndi ma uthenga ya Loyola Center for Media and Communications m’dziko la Kenya, Brother Dr Elias Mokua apempha atolankhani a nyumba zofalitsa mawu za mpingo wa kotolika kuti atenge udindo waukulu othandizira kudzetsa umodzi pakati pa anthu. Iwo alankhula izi lachiwiri potsekulira maphunziro omwe bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mchigawo cha kum’mawa kwa Africa la Association of Member Episcopal Conferences in Eastern Africa (AMECEA), lakonzera ena mwa atolankhani a nyumba zowulutsa mawu za mpingowu mchigawochi. Walangiza atolankhani – Brother Mukua Mu phunziro lawo, Brother Mokua anafotokozera atolankhaniwa kuti nyumba zofalitsa mawu za mpingo zikuyenera kukhala patsogolo powulutsa nkhani ndi ma program omwe angathandize anthu kupewa mikangano ndi kufotokozera momveka bwino momwe anthu angayidziwire mikanganoyi ponena kuti nthawi zina anthu amalephera kuzindikira izi. Pamenepa Brother Mokua anawonjezera kuti mu nthawi yomwe pali mikangano, ndi udindo wa atolankhaniwa kulemba zinthu zomwenso zingachepetse mikanganoyi osati kuwonjezera. M’mawu ake, mkulu owona za zofalitsa ma uthenga ku bungwe la AMECEA, bambo Andrew Kaufa alimbikitsa atolankhaniwa kuti adzipereke pa maphunzirowa ponena kuti awathandizira kwambiri pa ntchito yawo maka polimbikitsa umodzi pakati pa anthu zomwe mpingo umalimbikitsa nthawi zonse. Ena mwa omwe anachita nawo maphunzirowa ati ndi okondwa ndi maphunzirowa omwe ati awathandizira pa kawulutsidwe kabwino ka nkhani komanso ma program olimbikitsa umodzi pakati pa anthu. Kuno ku Malawi ena mwa atolankhani a nyumba zowulutsa mawu monga Radio Maria, Radio Alinafe komanso kanema wa Luntha ali mgulu lochita nawo maphunzirowa omwe akuyembekezeka kuchitika kwa sabata khumi kudzera pa makina a intaneti.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ECM Ikufuna Kudzutsanso Bungwe La YCS
news: Likulu la mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Comference of Mlawi (ECM) kudzera mu nthambi yake yowona za utumiki (pastoral) yati ikufunitsitsa kuti bungwe la ophunzira m’sukulu za sekondale la Young Christian Students (YCS) liyambenso kugwira ntchito zake monga kale. Mkulu wa mu ofesi yowona za utumiki mu mpingowu m’dziko muno bambo Henry Chinkanda ndi omwe anena izi lachiwiri pambuyo pa maphunziro omwe ofesiyi inakonzera ma Matron komanso ma Patron a bungweli ochokera msukulu za m’zigawo zonse za dziko lino. Ena mwa anthu omwe anatenga nawo mbali pa maphunzirowo Bambo Chinkanda ati ngati bungweli lingayambeso kugwira ntchito zake, zithandiza achinyamata omwe ali m’sukulu za sekondale zosiyanasiyana kukhala a chikhulupiliro cholimba. Polankhulapo bambo mlangizi wa bungwe la achinyamata mu mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno, bambo Valerian Mtseka anati bungweli lithandizanso achinyamata omwe ali m’sukulu za sekondale kuti asataye chikhalidwe chawo cha chikatolika. Wakisa Abgail Malongo kuchokera ku sukulu ya sekondale ya St. Ignatius of Loyola ku Nthalire m’boma la chitipa komanso Raphael Musopa kuchokera ku sukulu ya sekondale ya Divine Mercy m’boma la Chiradzulu ndi ena mwa anthu omwe anachita nawo maphunzirowa ndipo ati apindula kwambiri. Iwo ati ali ndi çhikhulupiliro kuti maphunzirowa athandiza kuti bungweli likhalenso la mphanvu m’sukulu zonse za sekondale m’dziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nyakwawa Ya M’boma La Chikwawa Yadzipha
news: Nyakwawa Lauji 2 ya mdera la mfumu yaikulu Katunga m’boma la Chikwawa yadzipha yokha podzimangilira ku denga la nyumba yake. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sergeant Dickson Matemba ati malemuwa omwe dzina lawo ndi White Million a zaka 56 zakubadwa adzimangilira lachiwiri pa 8 June, 2021 atakangana ndi mwana wawo womupeza. Zitachitika izi bambowo analowa m’nyumba yawo momwe anatenga chingwe ndi kudzikhwedza. Padakali pano apolisi akuti chomwe chadzetsa imfa ya a mfumuwa sichikudziwika. Koma achimwene awo a malemuwa, omwe ndi a Group Village Headman Lauji, awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti panali mkangano waukulu kwa nthawi yaitali pakati pa iwo ndi akazi awo awiri. “Chomwe ndikudziwa ine ndi chakuti amwalira chifukwa cha nkhawa popeza akazi awo anawasumira kwa Gogo Charo nkhani yawo italephereka kukambidwa ku polisi,” anatero gulupu Lauji 1. Nkhaniyi itafika kwa apolisi, iwo anathamangira ku maloku motsogozana ndi a chipatala cha boma la Chikwawa omwe anatsimikiza kuti malemuyu anamwalira kaamba kobanika kutsatira kudzimangilirako. Padakali pano apolisi a m’bomali adandaula ndi kukula kwa chiwerengero cha anthu amene akumadzipha okha ndipo ali pa kalikiliki kuphunzitsa anthu kudzera ku magulu a apolisi a m’madera za kuwopsa kodzipha. Iwo ati anthu akuyenera kutula nkhawa zawo kwa anthu oyenelera osati kudzipha okha. Malemuwa, a White Million amwalira ali ndi zaka 56 zakubadwa ndipo kufikira mu nthawi ya imfa yawo anali Nyakwawa Lauji 2 kwa Mfumu yaikulu Katunga m’boma la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi Mtsogoleri Wa Dziko La Austria
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dzoiko lonse, Papa Francisko wachita mkumano ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko la Austria, Alexander Van der Bellen ku nyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace. Papa Francisko ndi Van der Bellen Mu zokambirana zawo atsogoleriwa ati ndi okondwa ndi ubale wabwino omwe ulipo pakati pa likulu la mpingo wa katolika ndi dziko la Austria. Iwo akambirananso momwe ndale zikuyendera padakali pano ku ulaya komanso za udindo omwe mpingo uli nawo polimbikitsa mtendere, ubale wabwino komanso umodzi pakati pa anthu komanso za kufunika kosamalira za chilengedwe. Atatha mkumano wake ndi Papa Francisco, President Van der Bellen anachitanso zokambirana ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa katolika, Vatican Secretary of State Cardinal Pietro Parolin komanso mkulu wa ofesi yowona za ubale wa likulu la mpingo wa katolika ndi maiko ena, Vatican’s Secretary for Relations with States Archbishop Paul Gallagher.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akagwira Jere Zaka Khumi Kaamba Kogwililira Mwana Wompeza
news: Bwalo la milandu la Senior Resident Magistrate mu mzinda wa Lilongwe, lalamula bambo wa zaka 38 zakubadwa kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka khumi (10) kaamba kopezeka wolakwa pa mlandu ogwililira mwana wake womupeza wa zaka khumi (10). Malinga ndi woyimira boma pa mlanduwu, Sub Inspector Tisungane Makiyi bamboyu Noel Chiundira anapalamula mlanduwu pa 15 May 2021 chaka chino kunyumba kwake atagona ndi mwanayu zomwe zinakayikitsa mkazi wake malinga ndi momwe mwanayu analili. Mkazi wa mkuluyu anafotokozera apolisi za nkhaniyi zomwe zinachititsa kuti bamboyu amangidwe. Atawonekera ku bwalo la milandu, bamboyu anapempha bwaloli kuti limupatse chilango chofewa ponena kuti anachita izi kaamba ka mowa. Koma popereka chigamulo chake oweruza milandu Wanangwa Nyirenda analamula mkuluyu kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka khumi (10) ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kaamba koti zomwe anachitazo ndi zosowa umunthu. Noel Chiundira amachokera m’mudzi mwa Taipaizi mfumu yaikulu Msakambewa m’boma la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Kazembe Woyimira Likulu La Mpingo Wa Katolika M’dziko La Canada
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha Archbishop Ivan Jurkovič kukhala kazembe woyimira likulu la mpingo wa katolika, m’dziko la Canada. Papa limodzi ndi Archbishop Ivan Jurkovič Asanamusankhe pa udindo watsopanowu, Archbishop Jurkovič wakhala ali nthumwi yokhazikika ya likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku bungwe la United Nations, Permanent Observer of the Holy See to the Office of the United Nations and Specialized Institutions ku Geneva, ntchito yomwe wayigwira kuyambira m’chaka cha 2016. Archbishop Jurkovič yemwe ali ndi zaka 69 amachokera m’dziko la Slovania. Iye anadzodzedwa unsembe m’chaka cha 1977 ndipo ndi m’chaka cha 1984 pomwe anayamba ntchito ya ukazembe. Iye wagwira ntchito ya u kazembe m’maiko a South Korea, Colombia, Russia, Belarus, Ukraine ndi Uzbekistan. Likulu la mpingo wa katolika liri pa ubale wa ukazembe ndi mayiko 183 kuphatikizapo dziko la Malawi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Malipiro A President Sanakwere’
news: Mneneri wa kunyumba ya boma a Brian Banda watsutsa zomwe anthu ena akhala akufalitsa kuti boma lakweza malipiro a mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera. Watsutsa za nkhaniyo-Banda Banda watsutsa izi lero pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe unachitikira ku nyumba ya boma mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iye wati zoti malipiro a mtsogoleri wa dziko lino akwera ndi zabodza. Banda wati mtsogoleri wa dziko lino alibe mphamvu yozikwezera malipiro popeza udindo wokweza malipiro a president uli m’manja mwa nthambi yowona za chuma cha boma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu A Kwa Mfumu Yaikulu Maseya Adandaula Ndi Kulephereka Kwa Zitukuko
news: Anthu okhala ku dera la mfumu yaikulu Maseya m’boma la Chikwawa adandaula kaamba ka kulephereka kwa ntchito za chitukuko zomwe boma limayenera kupereka ku dera lawo. Izi zadziwika pa mkumano omwe anthu olandira ntchito za boma anayitanitsa adindo ogwira ntchito za boma ndi a ndale kuti ayitanitse zitukuko zomwe akuzifuna. Zina mwa ntchito za chitukuko zomwe anthu a kwa Maseya akuzifuna ndi monga, za maphunziro, za misewu yabwino, madzi a ukhondo ndi za chitetezo. Pa mkumanowu, mfumu yaikulu Maseya ya m’bomali inapezerapo mwayi wopereka madandaulo okhudzana ndi kuperewera kwa ntchito za chitetezo m’dera lake zomwe anati sizikuyenda bwino. Kumbali ya chitetezo, mfumu Maseya inati iyo ndi yodandaula ndi mchitidwe wa apolisi ena amene amanyalanyaza kupita ku malo komwe kukuchitika za umbanda. “Polisi yathu mbali ina sakutithandiza chifukwa akakhala kuti mwina munthu wina wagwidwa akumafuna kuti anthu omwewo awapititsire. Komanso pali madera ena omwe akumawaopa kuti apiteko,” inatero mfumu yaikulu Maseya. Koma poyankhapo pa madandaulowa, komishonala wa apolisi ku chigawo chakumwera – kumvuma kwa dziko lino, Chikondi Chingadza, anati zotere zikuchitika chifukwa ofesi yawo ikusowa mayendedwe. Pamenepa komishonala Chingadza watsimikizira anthu a ku Chikwawa kuti vutoli litha posachedwapa popeza boma layika kale padera chikonzero chogula galimoto zina zomwe zidzathandize kuchepetsa vutoli. “Mavuto amene timakumana nawo makamaka ndi mayendedwe. Timatha osawafikira anthu moyenerera, koma padakali pano tonse tikumva kuti boma ligula magalimoto ena. Ndikukhulupilira kuti magalimoto amenewa akabwera padzakhala kusintha,” anatero Chingadza. Mkumanowu anawukonza ndi upangiri wa mabungwe a Centre for Social Concern ndi Catholic Commission for Justice and Peace (CCJP) pansi pa diocese ya mpingo wa katolika ya Chikwawa. M’mawu ake, mkulu owona za mapulani a zachitukuko mu bungwe la Centre for Social Concern, a Kondwani Hara anati mkumanowu anawukonza ndi cholinga choti anthu amene anawaphunzitsa azitha kuyitanitsa adindo osiyansiyana ndi kuyankhapo ku mbali ya zitukuko zomwe akuzisowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Banki Zayambitsa Ubale Ndi Ma Banki a M’mudzi
news: Banki zina m’dziko muno zayambitsa ubale ndi ma banki a m’mudzi ati pofuna kuthandiza ma banki a m’mudziwa kuti atukuke. Mwa zina iwo afewetsako zina mwa mfundo zao zomwe munthu amayenera kutsata kuti atsegule account komanso kufewetsa chiwongola dzanja pofuna kwa ma Village Bank omwe angafune kubwereka ndalama. Magulu a banki mkhonde Imodzi mwa bankizi ndi ya National. Bank’yi kudzera mwa mkulu yemwe akuwona za ndondomekoyi a Oswin Kasunda yati kunali kofunika kuti awamvetse ma Village Bank makamaka pofwetsa zina mwa mfundo zomwe munthu amayenera kutsata pofuna kutsegula account. A Kasunda anati bank’yi yatsitsa chiwongola dzanja pa ndalama zomwe ma Village Bank angafune kubwereka. Koma polankhulapo pa nkhaniyi mayi Susan Kumwenda omwe ndi m’modzi mwa amayi ochita bizinesi kudzera mu ma banki a m’mudzi anati palibe phindu lopitanso ku banki padakali pano chifukwa poyambilira penipeni ma bank’wa adawakhumudwitsa chifukwa cha mfundo zokhwima zomwe ma bank amatsata kuti munthu atsegule account komanso kubwereka ndalama. “Sitikuwonanso phindu lochitira zimenezo panopa chifukwa achedwa kusintha ndondomeko zawo,” anatero mayi Kumwenda. Padakalipano anthu ambiri akupha ma Kwacha kudzera mu bizinesi ya ma banki a m’mudzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Imfa Ya Anthu Oposa 130 M’dziko La Burkina Faso
news: LaMulungu, Papa Francisco wafotokoza za chisoni chake potsatira imfa ya anthu oposa 130 mu tauni ina ya ku dera lotchedwa Yagha m’dziko la Burkina Faso. Iye wati wayikiza m’mapemphero mizimu ya anthu omwe aphedwa pa chiwembuchi. “Ndili pafupi ndi ma banja onse omwe abale awo aphedwa pa chiwembuchi komanso ndili pafupi ndi anthu onse a m’dziko la Burkina Faso pa nthawi yovutayi. Africa akusowa mtendere osati za chiwembu ngati zimenezi,” watero Papa Francisco. Malipoti ochokera m’dzikolo ati anthu oposa 130 aphedwa pa chiwembuchi chomwe chachitika pakati pa lachisanu ndi loweruka ndipo asanu ndi awiri mwa anthuwa ndi ana. Pambali pa anthu omwe afa pa chiwembuchi anthu ena makumi anayi avulala. Anthu a chiwembuwa aotchanso nyumba za anthu komanso msika. Boma la dziko la Burkina Faso lalengeza kuti anthu m’dzikolo akhala akukhudza malirowa kwa masiku atatu. Padakali pano palibe gulu lomwe lanena kuti ndilo lachita za chiwembuzi ngakhale kuti magulu a za uchifwamba otumikira gulu la al Qaeda ndi Islamic State akhala akuchita zinthu za mtunduwu m’maiko a Burkina Faso, Mali ndi Niger.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Abwenzi A Radio Maria Malawi Ndi Ofunika Mu Mpingo’
news: Pamene mpingo wa katolika chaka chino ukuchita zisankho za mabungwe ndi magulu mu mpingowu, nawo Abwenzi a Radio Maria Malawi akangalika kuchititsa chisankho cha maguluwa ku maparishi. Bambo mfumu a parishi ya Ngabu mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa, bambo Ignasio Yohane ayamikira abwenzi a Radio Maria Malawi kaamba ka ntchito imene akuyigwira yofalitsa Uthenga wa Mulungu. Bambo Yohane: Radio Maria imatithandiza Bambo Yohane ananena izi ku parishi yawo pa nthawi ino imene abwenzi a Radio Maria Malawi akukhazikitsa makomiti ndi kuchititsa chisankho cha abwenzi a wayilesiyi. Iwo ati magulu a abwenzi ndi ofunika mu mpingo chifukwa amalimbikitsa Radio Maria Malawi kuti ikhale ya mphamvu kupyolera mu ntchito yotolera chithandizo chopita ku wailesiyi podziwa kuti siyichita malonda. “Radio Maria imatithandiza ife kudziwa ndi kuphunzira mawu a Mulungu. Tsono magulu amenewa ndi ofunika pa parishi, pa tchalichi, pa dayosizi ngakhale mu dziko lonse,” anatero bambo Yohane. Ndipo poyankhulapo, gulupa Joseph Yohane amene amatumikira ku senta ya Goma mu parishi ya Ngabu anati iwo ndi wosangalala kuti tsopano ndi bwenzi wa Radio Maria Malawi. “Ifeyo ndi osangalala kwambiri chifukwa tinkangozimva mbalimu kuti kuli abwenzi, koma titamva kuti gululi lafika pano akhristu pamodzi ndi ineyo ngati gulupa wawo takhala osangalala kwambiri,” anatero gulupa Yonane. Kupatula kutumikira ntchito za wailesiyi, abwenzi a Radio Maria Malawi amathandizanso mpingo ndi mphatso zawo monga, kupereka mphatso za guwa, kusamalira pa tchalitchi ndi kugwira ntchito za chifundo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Kubwera Kwa Bungwe La Abambo Kulimbikitsa Bungwe La Amayi Achikatolika’
news: Bambo mlangizi wa bungwe la amayi a mpingo wa katolika mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa, bamboo Ignasio Yohane ati kubwera kwa bugwe abambo lotchedwa Catholic Men Organization (CMO) kuthandiza kulimbikitsa utumiki wa bungwe amayi mu mpingowu lotchedwa Catholic Women Organisation (CWO). Bambo Yohane: Azithandizana potumikira Mulungu Bambo Yohane ati nthawi yakwana tsopano yoti nawo abambo adzuke ndi kugwira ntchito molimbika potukula mpingo kupyolera mu mphatso zomwe ali nazo osati kungolekera amayi okha kujijirika ndi ntchito za mu mpingo. Pamenepa bambo Yohane apempha abambo ambiri kuti alowe mu bungweli kuti athe kumvetsa za udindo wawo wothandiza amayi pa ntchito yotumikira Mulungu. Iwo ati monga bambo mlangizi wa bungwe la amayi, adzipereka kulimbikitsa bungwe la amayi achikatolika kugwira ntchito limodzi ndi bungwe longoyamba kumeneli, la Umodzi wa abambo achikatolika. “Kubwera kwa bungwe ili la abambo, kulimbikitsa gulu la amayi chifukwa amayi ena amabwelera m’mbuyo chifukwa cha kusamvetsa kwa abambo a kwawo. Koma chifukwa choti abambowo akhalanso mu bungwe la abambo, adzatha kumvetsa udindo wawo ndipo sikudzakhala kovuta kuti athandize amayi akwawo kuti atumikire Mulungu kudzera mu bungwe la amayi,” anatero bambo Yohane. Komiti yogwirizira ya bungwe la CMO ku Chikwawa Izi zikudza pa nthawi imene mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse ukukondwelera chaka cha Yosefe Woyera ndipo abambo mu mpingowu ayamba kuvomera kuyitana pa mutu wakuti “Ndi mtima wa Atate” pokhazikitsa bungwe la Umodzi wa Abambo Achikatolika. Nawo abambo ku dayosizi ya Chikwawa avomera kuyitanaku pamene ali pa kalikiliki kulimbikitsa ntchito yokhazikitsa ku maprishi onse bungweli lomwe nkhoswe yake ndi Yosefe Woyera. Komiti yongogwirizira ya Catholic Men Organization ku dayosoziyi ndi yomwe ikugwira ntchito yozindikiritsa anthu ndi kukhazikitsa makomiti ku maparishi pamene akukonzekera mwambo waukulu wokhazikitsa bungweli mu dayosiziyo. Padakali pano bungweli alikhazikitsa kale ku maparishi a Nchalo, Chikwawa, Ngabu, Nkhate, Misomali, Changoima ndi Mitondo mwa maparishi khumi ndi anayi omwe ali mu dayosiziyi. Ma archdiocese a Lilongwe ndi Blantyre adakhazikitsa kale bungwe la Catholi Men Organization (CMO).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Atatu Amangidwa Powaganizira Kuti Alanga Okha ndi Kupha Munthu
news: Apolisi amanga anthu atatu omwe akuwaganizira kuti akukhuzidwa ndi imfa ya a Aaron Kaphaizi a zaka 38 a m’boma la Kasungu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Edna Mzingwitsa, izi zachitika usiku wa pa 1 June chaka chino pomwe malemuwa anatenga chikwama cha munthu wina chomwe munali ndalama zokwana 46 sauzande kwacha pa msika wa Linyangwa m’bomalo. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyo – Mzingwitsa Anthuwa omwe ndi a Dickson Katimbira a zaka 28, a Chisomo Boniface a zaka 21 ndi a Talandira Chisembe a zaka 17, anagwira bambo wakubayu ndi kumumenya modetsa nkhawa. Atamutengera ku chipatala a chipatala anatsimikiza kuti wamwalira kaamba kovulala kwambiri. Pakadali pano apolisi atsekulira anthuwa mlandu wakupha munthu ndipo posachedwapa akawonekera ku khothi. Apolisi apempha anthu m’bomali kuti apewe mchitidwe wolanga okha munthu amene akumuganizira kuti waphwanya malamulo. Malemu Aaron Kaphaizi anali ochokera m’mudzi mwa Kaphaizi mfumu yaikulu Kaphaizi m’boma lomwelo la Kasungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Waunika, Kusintha Malamulo Oyendetsera Mpingo Wa Katolika
news: Mowunikiridwa ndi kalata yotchedwa Pascite Gregem Dei m’chilatini kutanthauza “Weta Nkhosa”, Papa Francisco wawunika ndi kusintha malamulo a bukhu lachisanu ndi chimodzi a Mpingo wa Katolika, Book VI of the Code of Canon Law. Pochita izi, iye akungopitiriza ntchito yomwe Papa Benedicto wa 16 adayiyamba kale. “Polingalira mavuto osiyana-siyana omwe mpingo ukukumana nawo lero komanso poyang’anira zosowa za Mpingo kunali koyenera kuwunikanso malamulo omwe Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera adawakhazikitsa pa 25 January m’chaka cha 1983,” watero Papa Francisco. Papa Francisco wati tate wa chifundo komanso wa chikondi sakuyenera kuyiwala kuwongolera ngakhale kulanga kumene ana ake pofuna kukonza zinthu komanso kuti zinthu ziziyenda bwino. Iye wati pali zinthu zina zomwe zawonongeka kaamba komangoyang’anira ndipo izi zakhala zikukhumudwitsa akhristu. Papa Francisco wati kukhala chete kwa m’busa pamene zinthu zikulakwika ndi zongowonetsa poyera kuti m’busayo akulephera ntchito yake. Bukhu lachisanu ndi chimodzi la malamulo a mpingo wa katolika ndi lokhudza zilango zoperekedwa kwa anthu ophwanya malamulo ndipo ndi malamulo omwe sakusiyana ndi malamulo omwe maiko amagwiritsa ntchito kwa anthu ophwanya malamulo. Kalata ya Papa Francisco, the Apostolic Constitution “Pascite Gregem Dei” yatuluka pa 23 May 2021 pa tsiku la chaka cha Pentecosite.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Kofunika Kumapempherera Anthu Omwe Akukonzekera Moyo Wa Banja
news: Mwezi uliwonse Papa amakhala ndi cholinga cha mapemphero ake (prayer intention). Mwezi uno wa June, Papa Francisco akusinkhasinkha za kukoma kwa moyo wa banja. Iye wati ngakhale moyo wa banja uli ndi mavuto, pambali ina kukhala ndi mzako wa chikondi ndi chinthu chokoma. Papa Francisco wati pozindikira kuti moyo wa banja ndi moyo wovuta, ndi kofunika kumawapempherera anthu omwe akukonzekera moyo wa banja. Iye wati kwa omwe akukonzekera moyo wa banja, sakuyenera kudera nkhawa kapena kuchita mantha popeza ulendowu samayenda okha popeza Yesu Khristu amayenda nawo limodzi. Papa Francisco wati Sakramenti la Ukwati ndi lofunika kwambiri m’moyo wa mpingo ndipo wati ndi kofunika kuti anthu omwe akulowa m’banja azikhala ndi nthawi yokwanira yokonzekera moyo umenewu. Iye wati moyo wa banja ndi chiyitanidwe chofumira mu mtima ndipo choncho ndi kofunika kukonzekera mokwanira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ofesi Ya PMS ku Chikwawa Yakonza Msulo Wa Ansembe, Agulupa
news: Ofesi yoyang’anira mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa ya Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa, yayika ndondomeko zopereka maphunziro osula ansembe ndi agulupa ngati njira imodzi yolimbikitsa mabungwewa mu dayosiziyo. Mkulu woyang’anira ofesiyo mu dayosiziyo, bambo Ignasio Yohane anena izi pofotokozera Radio Maria Malawi pa ndondomeko zomwe akonza kuti ofesi yawo ichite m’chaka chino. Bambo Yohane: Aphunzitsi a Tilitonse akuchepa Bambo Yohane ati maphunzirowa adzapindulira ansembe, agulupa ndi aphunzitsi a Tilitonse kuti amvetsetse bwino za udindo wawo wodzindikiritsa akhristu za zochitika ndi mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa ku maparishi awo. Maphunzirowa awakonza kuti adzawapereke kwa ansembe mu mwezi wa September, agulupa mu mwezi wa November ndipo aphunzitsi a tilitonse mu mwezi wa December chaka chino ku maparishi onse a mu dayosiziyi. Kuchepa kwa aphunzitsi a ana a Tilitonse mu parishiyi ndi china mwa zifukwa zomwe zachititsa kuti ofesi ya PMS mu dayosiziyi idzachititse maphunziro osula maguluwa ndi cholinga choti akhristu adziwe kufunika kwake kwa mabungwewa mu mpingo. “Amene amatithandiza kuphunzitsa makamaka ana komanso kukumbutsa anthu kuti mwezi wakuti wakuti kapena tsiku lakuti lakuti kudzakhala chiyitanidwe akuchepa,” anatero bambo Yohane. Pamenepa bambo Yohane anati ofesi yawo yayika ndondomeko zapadera kuti aphunzitsi a Tilitonse adzasankhidwe mopikisana kuyambira ku malimana, ku matchalichi, ku maparishi mpakana pa dayosizi. Iwo ati potero ntchito yopereka mauthenga ku ofesi ya PMS idzakhala yosavuta kaamba koti magulu onsewa adzagwira ntchitoyi mogwirizana. Bungwe la Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) lili ndi mabungwe a mautumiki a mu mpingo okwana anayi omwe ndi bungwe la utumiki wa ana lomwe limayang’ana za maphunziro a ana, bungwe la Petro m’postoli lomwe limathandiza ku nyumba zosulira anyamata ofuna kudzakhala ansembe ndi ku nyumba zosulirako atsikana ofuna kudzakhala asisiteri, bungwe la chikhulupiliro ndipo lachinayi ndi bungwe la umodzi pakati pa ansembe ndi anthu a m’zipani za mu mpingo wa Mulungu.
author: AlinafeK

title: Papa Watsindika Kufunika Kwa Mwambo, Umodzi pa Masewero
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kwa mwambo komanso umodzi pochita masewero. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lolemba ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican pa nkumano wake ndi nthumwi za bungwe loyang’anira masewero a basketball m’dziko la Italy. Mkumanowu wachitika pano pomwe bungweli likukondwerera kuti latha zaka 100 chilikhazikitsireni. Pa mwambowu, Papa wawunikira kuti pali ubale pakati pa mpingo ndi masewero osiyana-siyana ponena kuti zonsezi zimayang’ana za moyo wathunthu wa munthu. Iye wanenanso kuti masewero amathandiza kubweretsa umodzi ndi  kuyanjanitsa anthu. Papa wati kulimbikira pofuna kupambana ndi kofunika osati kumbali ya masewero okha koma ngakhale kumbali ya moyo wa uzimu. Iye wakumbutsa nthumwizi za masewero a basketball m’chaka cha 1955 omwe adachitikira pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican omwe Papa Pio wa 12 adawonerera. Papa wamaliza ndi kulimbikitsa akuluakulu a bungwe loyang’anira masewero a basketball kuti azindikiritse achinyamata za kufunika kolimbikira pochita masewero komanso za kufunika kozindikira kuti pochita masewero pamakhala kupambana komanso kulephera. Bungwe loyang’anira masewero a basketball m’dziko la Italy lidakhazikitsidwa m’chaka cha 1921 ndipo ndi membala wa bungwe lalikulu lodziwika kuti International Basketball Federation (FIBA).
author: AlinafeK

title: Chakwera Wakhazikitsidwa Kukhala Mkulu Wa Maphunziro a Ukachenjede mu Africa
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera amukhazikitsa kukhala mkulu wa maphunziro a ukachenjede muno mu Africa (Champion of Higher Education in Africa). Chakwera: Ndikudzindikira kukula kwa udindowu Chakwera amukhazikitsa pa udindowu lero pa mwambo omwe wachitikira ku nyumba ya boma mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Polankhula atangomukhazikitsa pa udindowu, iye wati akuzindikira kukula kwa udindo omwe walandira pokhala mkulu wa maphunziro a ukachenjede. Iye wati sukulu za ukanjede zili ndi kuthekera kosintha miyoyo ya anthu a mu Africa. Chakwera wati agwiritsa ntchito udindowu ngati njira imodzi yotukulira dziko la Malawi komanso maiko onse a mu Africa. Bungwe lodziwika kuti Regional Universities Forum (RUFORUM) lopangidwa ndi sukulu za ukachenjede za mu Africa ndi lomwe lapereka udindowu.
author: AlinafeK

title: Papa Wathokoza Akatolika Omwe Anapemphera Kolona M’mwezi Wa May
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wayamikira a Katolika omwe anadzipereka kupemphera kolona mu mwezi wa May. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wanena izi lolemba pa mapemphero a kolona otsekera mwezi wa May omwe ndi mwezi wa Amayi Maria. Papa wati ndi kofunika kuti a Katolika onse apitirize kupemphera popempha chithandizo cha Mulungu pa mliri wa Coronavirus kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria maka kuti mliriwu utheretu. Pa mwambo wa mapemphero otsekera mwezi wa Amayi Maria-wu panali kupemphera kuti anthu omwe akusowa ntchito apeze, achinyamata apeze ma banja, akhristu eniake achilimike potumikira mpingo mwa toto moyo, kuti nkhanza zitheretu m’mabanja komanso kuti moyo wa anthu upitilire kutukuka. Pa 1 May Papa Francisco adatsogolera a Katolika pa dziko lonse pochita mapemphero a kolona ngati chiyambi cha mwezi wothamanga ndi Amayi Maria kudzera mu mapemphero a kolona. Iye adapempha a Katolika pa dziko lonse kuti apemphere zolimba mu mwezi wa May kupempha chithandizo cha Mulungu kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria kuti mliri wa Coronavirus utheretu kuti choncho moyo ubwererenso m’chimake. Mapempherowa a kolona’wa akhala akuchitikanso mu malo oyera akuluakulu makumi atatu m’maiko osiyana-siyana. Mu Mpingo wa Katolika May ndi October ndi miyezi ya Amayi Maria.
author: AlinafeK

title: Apolisi Amanga Bambo Wina Kaamba Kopha Agogo Ake
news: Apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa akusunga m’chitokosi bambo wina wa zaka 37 kaamba kopha agogo ake a zaka 80 zakubadwa. Malingana ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Dickson Matemba, bamboyu Paul Flyton anapha agogo akewo potentha nyumba atasemphana maganizo ndi abale ake usiku wa pa 21 May chaka chino ndipo gogoyo anafera momwemo. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyo – Matemba Kuyambira pa tsikuli, Flyton wakhala akubisala kufikira dzulo pomwe apolisi amugwira atatsinidwa khutu ndi anthu akufuna kwabwino. Flyton anatentha nyumba zokwana zinayi chifukwa chodzadzidwa ndi mkwiyo atasemphana maganizo ndi abale. Zitachitika izi, apolisi ndi a chipatala anafika pamalopo pomwe anatsimikiza kuti agogowo amwalira kaamba ka ululu wa mabala amoto. Paul Flyton yemwe amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mandele kwa mfumu yaikulu Ngabu m’boma la Chikwawa, akuyembekezeka kukayankha mlandu wotentha nyumba komanso wakupha munthu. Padakali pano apolisi m’bomali ayamikira ubale wabwino omwe ulipo pakati pa iwo ndi anthu.
author: AlinafeK

title: Ambuye Stima Ati Apitiriza Kuphunzitsa Akhristu Ubwino Wa Sakramenti La Ukwati
news:
Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi, ambuye Montfort Stima ati apitiriza kuphunzitsa akhritsu ndi adindo a m’maparishi osiyanasiyana mu dayosiziyo, za kufunika kolandira sakramenti la ukwati mu mpingo.
Ambuye Stima anena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pambuyo poyendera akhritsu ndi adindo a parish ya Mpiri m’boma la Machinga. Bishop Stima: Akhristu akungolowana Iwo ati pamene akupitiriza kuchita ulendo wawo oyendera akhritsu ndi adindo a m’ma parish mu dayosizi yawo, awonetsetsa kuti moyo wa sakramenti la ukwati ukutsatidwa kaamba koti limeneli ndi tsinde lenileni la masakramenti ena mu mpingo.
“Tiwonetsesa kuti adindo atengepo mbali pothandiza akhritsu kuti amange maukwati awo kaamba koti akhritsu ambiri tsopano akungolowana osamanga maukwati. Sakramenti la ukwati ndi tsinde leni leni la masakramenti ena chifukwa munthu akalandira sacramentili sikukhala kovuta kuti alandirenso ma Sacramenti ena,” anatero Ambuye Stima.
Kumbali ya mpingo wodzidalira, ambuye Stima anati akhritsu akuyenera kusintha maganizidwe awo a chikale ozolowera kulandira thandizo, ndipo azindikire kuti tsopano ayenera kukhala ndi udindo osamalira atumiki awo powapatsa zosowa pa moyo wawo wa tsiku ndi tsiku kaamba koti chikhritsu chimaoneka ndi ntchito zake.
Poyankhulapo bambo mfumu a parish ya Mpiri, bambo Lazarus Girevulo anati ulendo wa ambuye Stima ku parishiyi uthandizira kulimbikitsa moyo wa chikhritsu kudzera m’ma sakramenti kaamba koti iwo atambasula bwino za kufunika kwa masakramentiwa, ndipo ati awonetsetsa kuti uthengawu ufalikire ma tchalitchi ozungulira parishyo.
Padakali pano ambuye Stima akupitirza kuyendera akhritsu ndi adindo m’maparish osiyana siyana mu dayosiziyo powathandiza kumvetsa bwino za ubwino wolandira masakramenti mu mpingo komanso za mpingo wodzidalira.
author: AlinafeK

title: Papa Wati Utatu Woyera Wa Mulungu Umawulula Chikondi Cha Mulungu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wati Utatu Woyera wa Mulungu umawulula kuti Mulungu ndi chikondi. Papa wanena izi polankhula lamulungu kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti kuchokera pa zenera la nyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace. Iye wapitirizanso kunena kuti chaka cha Utatu Woyera chimathandiza akhristu kusinkhasinkha za chikondi cha Mulungu chomwe ndi chodabwitsa. “Chaka cha Utatu Woyera chimatithandiza kusinkhasinkha misiteri imeneyi ya chikondi komanso kuwala komwe tidachokera ndipo komwe ulendo wathu wa pansi pano udzakathere,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati Utatu Woyera wa Mulungu ndi misiteri yomwe ndi nzeru za umunthu ndi kovuta kumvetsa. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti ndi Yesu Khristu yemwe adawulula za Utatu Woyera ponena za Mulungu Atate ndipo asadakwere kumwamba adanena zotumiza mphatso ya Mzimu Woyera, nkhoswe komanso msangalatsi wa akhristu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Kuyiphula Ndi Lisiti Langa’ Yadzetsa Chikhulupiriro Pa Malonda
news: Pamene bungwe lotolera msonkho mdziko muno la Malawi Revenue Authority (MRA) linakhazikitsa ntchito yomemeza anthu kutsina khutu bungweli pa nkhani zozemba kupereka msonkho zomwe zimachitika pakati pa ogula ndinso ogulitsa malonda yotchedwa Kuyiphula ndi lisiti langa promotion, zadziwika kuti ntchitoyi yabereka zipatso. Mneneli wa bungweli Steven Kapoloma wati kwa nthawi yoyamba anawona anthu ochuluka akubwera poyera kuwulula ku bungweli a kamberembere omwe akhala akuzemba kupereka lisiti lomwe limawonetsa ndalama za msonkho omwe katundu ogulidwa wakhoma ku bungweli. Kapoloma: Ndalama zimenezi zikanatha kutayika Iye wati bungwe la MRA lakwanitsa kutolera ndalama zokwana 300 miliyoni pa nyengo yosaposera miyezi itatu ndipo ndalama zokwana 25 miliyoni ndi zomwe anthu osiyanasiyana alandira kudzera mu ndondomekoyi. “Izi zikutanthauza kuti ndalama tapezazi zikanatha kutayika ngati kampeniyi ikanapanda kukhalapo, komanso anthu ogula malonda sakanakhala ndi chidwi chodziwa udindo wao opereka nsonkho poulula zachinyengo zomwe zimachitika pa msonkho maka malo ogulitsira malonda,” anatero Kapoloma. Mkuluyu wati padakali pano bungweli likhala pansi ndi kuwunika za tsogolo la ntchitoyi kaamba koti yakwaniritsa chiyembekezo chawo. Koma poyankhula ndi anthu ena ogula malonda m’mizinda ya Blantyre, Lilongwe, Zomba ndi Mzuzu, ambiri mwa iwo apempha kuti bunweli liwonjezere nthawi ya mpikisanowu. Wayisoni Selemani wa mu mzinda wa Zomba, anati akanakondwa bungweli likanakhazikitsa ntchitoyi kuti ipitilire kaamba koti imathandiza mbali zonse pakati pa  bungweli komanso anthu ogula malonda. Naye wamalonda wina wa mu mzinda wa Lilongwe James Kameza anati kampeniyi yathandizanso a malonda akulu akulu kuti azipereka msonkho wa VAT omwe umathandiza chitukuko cha dziko lino. “Mpikisanowu watithandizanso ife kuti tizigulitsa katundu chifukwa mitengo yathu ife imakhala yocheperako kuyerekeza ndi a malonda akulu akuluwa kaamba koti iwowo ali ndi makina a VAT pamene ife tilibe koma iwowo akamazemba msonkhowu zimachititsa kuti tizifanana mitengo zomwe zimapweteka ifeyo maka pa makasitomala omwe amatisiya kupita mu sitolo zawozo,” anatero Kameza. Mpikisano wa Kuiphula Ndi Lisiti Langa, unayamba mwezi wa March ndipo ukuyenera kutha pa 31 May chaka chino ndipo anthu osachepera 600 ndi omwe anapereka umboni ku bungweli kudzera ku nammbala za foni zomwe zinakhazikitsidwa komanso ena amapita ku maofesi a Positi m’mizinda  ikulu ikulu inayi ya dziko lino komwe kunali ogwira ntchito a bungweli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamikira Sisitere Wa Ku America Pothandiza Anthu Othawa Kwawo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisko wayamikira sisiteri wina wa mdziko la United States of America kaamba ka chifundo chake pothandiza anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyanasiyana. Sister Pimentel Papa wanena izi kudzera mu uthenga wa pa kanema omwe watumiza kwa Sister Norma Pimentel a m’chipani chodziwika kuti Missionary of Jesus yemwenso ndi mkulu wa mabungwe a chifundo a mpingo wa Katolika. Mu uthengawu Papa wayamikira Sisitere’yu ndi onse ogwira nawo ntchito chifukwa cha ntchito yotamandika yothandiza anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana ku malire a dziko la United States of America ndi dziko la Mexico. “Zikomo kwambiri chifukwa cha zomwe mukuchita pothandiza anthu. Zikomo kwambiri polandira anthu amenewa. Ena akungofuna moyo wabwino kuti awonjezere pa zomwe ali nazo kale, pamene ena akuthawa mavuto osaneneka komwe akuchokera,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawu. Iye wafotokoza kuti anthu othawa kwawo akuyenera kulandiridwa bwino, kutetezedwa ndi kukhala nawo bwino. Papa Francisco wamaliza uthengawu popereka madalitso ake kwa Sisitere’yu ndi onse ogwira naye ntchito ndipo naye wapemphanso anthuwa kuti azimupempherera. Anthu oposa 23,000 omwe ambiri mwa iwo ndi ochokera ku maiko a ku Latin America ofuna kulowa m’dziko la United States of America akhala akuthandizidwa ku malire a dziko la United States of America ndi Mexico.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Amuna Anayi Anjatidwa Kaamba Koba Ng’ombe 7
news: Apolisi ku Chikwawa amanga amuna atatu powaganizira kuti aba ng’ombe zinayi za ndalama zokwana 1.2 Million Kwacha. Iwo amapita ndi ng’ombe ku Blantyre pogwiritsa ntchito galimoto yomwe nambala yake ndi DA6903, ndipo akawonekera ku bwalo la mlandu kuti akayankhe pa mlandu wakuba ziweto. Izi zikuchitika pamene adindo ndi anthu okhudzidwa ku chigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire akudandaula ndi kukula kwa mchitidwe wakuba ziweto. Apolisi amanga anthuwa zitadziwika kuti mlimi wina wa m’mudzi wa Gonda kwa mfumu yaikulu Ngabu ziweto zake zasowa m’mawa wa pa 24 May 2021. Iye anachita changu kudziwitsa apolisi a pa malo ochitira chipikisheni a Thabwa ndi Kamuzu Bridge. Pamenepa ndi pomwe apolisi amene anali pa ntchito pa Kamuzu Bridge anagwira galimoto yomwe nambala yake ndi DA 6903 itanyamula ng’ombe zinayi zomwe amalowera nazo ku Blantyre ndipo anamanga a Vito January wa zaka 48 zakubadwa, John Tenson wa zaka 22 zakubadwa ndi Harris Phiso wa zaka 37 zakubadwa. Apa ndi pamene mlimiyo anamuyitana ndipo anazindikira kuti ziwetozo ndi zake zomwe zinachititsa kuti woyendetsa galimotoyo amumange limodzi ndi anzake ena awiri. Vito January amachokera m’mudzi wa Saini ndipo John Tenson amachokera m’mudzi wa Masanduko onsewa kwa Mfumu yaikulu Ngabu m’boma la Chikwawa, pamene Harris Phiso wa zaka 37 zakubadwa amachokera m’mudzi wa Ngwaya kwa Mfumu yaikulu Chigalu m’Boma la Blantyre. Mu nkhani inanso ya ngati yomweyi, pa 25 May 2021 apolisi a bomali amanganso Henry Alexander wa zaka 45 zakubadwa wa m’mudzi wa Sande kwa mfumu yaikulu Maseya m’boma la Chikwawa. Alexander amumanga pa malo ochitirapo chipikisheni a Thabwa atanyamula ng’ombe zitatu zakupha kale mu galimoto ya Cienta yomwe nambala yake ndi CK 6471. Mkuluyu akawonekera ku khoti kuti akayankhe pa mlandu wonyamula nyama popanda makalata a chilolezo ndipo amuna ena atatu aja kuti nawo akayankhe pa mlandu wakuba zifuyo. Ngakhale mchitidwewu wakula chonchi m’bomali, apolisi akutsimikizira alimi kuti akhwimitsa chitetezo ku malo awo onse ochitirako chipikisheni kuti ateteze umbava wakuba ziweto.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alipira 1.4 Million Kaamba Kopha Nyama Ya Kaphulika Mu Nkhalango Ya Majete
news: Bwalo la mlandu lalamula mkulu wina kuti alipire chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 1.4 million kwacha chifukwa chakupha nyama m’nkhalango yotetezedwa ya Majete m’boma la Chikwawa. Bwalo la First Grade Magistrate m’bomali pa 25 May, 2021 lidamva kuti Patrick Faindani analowa m’nkhalango yotetezedwa ya Majete ndikuphamo nyama ya kaphulika. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa, Sergeant Dickson Matemba wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti Faindani anapalamula milanduyi pa 10 March, 2021 pomwe analowa mu nkhalangoyi ndi kuphamo nyama yotetezedwayi pogwiritsa ntchito mfuti ya namgogoda. Koma mu bwaloli Faindani anayikana milanduyi zomwe zinachititsa kuti khoti liyitanitse mboni zitatu kudzaperekera umboni wotsutsana naye. Pamenepa, wotengera mlandu ku khoti, Sub Inspector Danford Otala anapempha bwaloli kuti limupatse chilango chokhwima mkuluyu ponena kuti zomwe wachita ndi zopereka chiwopsezo ku zachilengedwe mu nkhalango ya Majete. Iye anawonjeza kuti mkuluyu amulange pakuti nkhalangoyi yataya ndalama zokwana 1.4 million kwacha zomwe ndi mtengo wa nyama yotetezedwayo. Komabe Faindani podandaula anapempha bwaloli kuti limufewetsere chilango popeza amasamalira amayi ake omwe ndi wokalamba, mkazi wake ndi ana ake awiri. Koma mu chigamulo chake, First Grade Magistrate Gladstone Chilundu anagwirizana ndi akumbali ya boma polamula Faindani kuti apereke chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana K50, 000 pa mlandu wolowa mu nkhalango yotetezedwa ndipo akalephera akagwire ukayidi wa miyezi 12 komanso kupereka chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 1.4 million kwacha chifukwa chakupha nyamayo ndipo akalephera akagwire ukayidi wa miyezi 24 mwakalavula gaga. Ngakhale izi zili chomwechi, wopalamula milanduyu walephera kupereka ndalamazi ndipo amutumiza ku ndende ya Chikwawa komwe wayamba kugwira ukayidi wake. Patrick Faindani ndi wa zaka 38 zakubadwa ndipo amachokera m’mudzi mwa Gawani kwa Mfumu yaikulu Chapananga boma la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bwalo la Milandu Lalamula Mzika Ya Dziko La Mozambique Ituluke Mdziko Muno Pasanathe Masiku 14
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Mangochi lalamula mzika ya mdziko la Mozambique Isekiel Mario kuti ipereke chindapusa cha ndalama yokwana 150 Thousand Kwacha kapena kukakhala ku ndende kwa chaka chimodzi kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu olowetsa munthu wina wa chilendo mdziko muno opanda chilorezo. Malinga ndi woyimira boma pa milandu Sub Inspector Regina Chikungwa, pa 24 mwezi uno Mario anatenga Maligalita Francisco a zaka 21 zakubadwa a m’mudzi wa Lichinga mdziko la Mozambique, kuti alowe nawo mdziko muno pa galimoto ya mtundu wa Scania yomwe nambala yake ndi SA 8500. Atafika pa msika wa Masuku apolisi anachita chipikisheni galimotoyi ndipo anapeza mayiyu ali mu galimotoyi koma alibe ziphatso zovomerezeka ndipo apolisiwa anagwira mkuluyi ndi kukamutsekera mu chitolokosi. Atakawonekera ku bwalo la milandu, mkuluyi anamupeza olakwa pa mlanduwu ndipo popereka chigamulo chake First Grade Magistrate Mthunduwantha Mpasu wati kupatula chigamulochi mkuluyi amulamulanso kuti atuluke mdziko muno masiku 14 asanathe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walangiza Akhristu Asamafooke Kuchita Mapemphero
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko walangiza akhristu kuti asamafooke kuchita mapemphero. Papa wanena izi lachitatu polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Damasus ku Vatican komanso ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Iye walankhula izi popitiriza maphunzitso ake pa mutu wa mapemphero, catechesis on christian prayer. “Ngati Mulungu ndi tate ndi chifukwa chiyani saamva mapemphero a anthu koma chonsecho adatitsimikizira kuti amapereka zinthu zabwino kwa ana ake. Ndi chifukwa chiyani sayankha zomwe timupempha,” Papa Francisco wati izi ndi zomwe anthu amalingalira mu mtima mwao. Iye waunikira akhristu kuti yankho labwino likupezeka mu Katekisimu wa Katolika. Papa Francisco wati Katekisimu wa Katolika akunena kuti mapemphero si ngati matsenga opereka mayankho pompopompo. Iye wati akhristu akuyenera kudzichepetsa pa maso pa Mulungu, kuchita mapemphero ofumira mu mtima ndi kupewa kumangolankhula ndi pakamwa chabe. Iye wati Mulungu atha kuyankha pompopompo pamene nthawi zina yankho limabwera pa nthawi yake yoikika ya Mulungu’yo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa wasankha Archbishop Roche Kukhala Mkulu Owona za Chipembedzo ndi Masakrament
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha Archbishop Arthur Roche kukhala mkulu watsopano wa bungwe lowona za chipembedzo ndi masakramenti. Malinga ndi ofesi yofalitsa mauthenga ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican, Archbishop Roche amusankha pa udindowu lachiwiri pa 25 May, 2021. Ofesiyi yapitilira kunena kuti Papa Francisco wasankhanso Archbishop Vittorio Francesco Viola kukhala mlembi wa bungweli pamene Bishop-elect Aurelio García Marcías amusankha kukhala wachiwiri kwa mlembi. Asadamusankhe kukhala pa udindo wa mkulu wa bungwe lowona za chipembedzo ndi masakramenti, Archbishop Roche adali mlembi wa bungweli. Archbishop Roche akulowa m’malo mwa Cardinal Robert Sarah yemwe adali mkulu wa bungwe loona za Chipembedzo ndi ma Sakramenti. Pa 20 February chaka chino Papa Francisco adavomera kuti Cardinal Sarah atule pansi udindo wake mogwirizana ndi malamulo a Mpingo wa Katolika, Code of Canon Law, omwe amanena kuti Bishop, Archbishop ngakhale Cardinal akuyenera kulemba kalata kwa Papa yopempha kuti atule pansi udindo wake pamene wakwanitsa zaka 75 za kubadwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha A Katolika Apemphere Limodzi Ndi Akhristu A M’dziko La China
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha a katolika pa dziko lonse kuti alumikizane ndi akhritsu a m’dziko la China pomwe lero akuchita chaka cha nkhoswe yawo amayi Maria aku Sheshan ku Shanghai. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, Papa walankhula izi lamulungu kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti kuchokera pa zenera la nyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace. Iye wauza a Katolika pa dziko lonse kuti a Katolika a m’dziko la China amalemekeza amayiwa popemphera kudzera mu uneneri wawo poyika m’manja mwa Mulungu mavuto awo angakhalenso chimwemwe chawo. “Ndi chinthu chabwino kuti ngati ana a banja limodzi la Mulungu tilumikizane nao anzathuwa monga akhristu oyamba aja anachitira pa tsiku lija la Pentekosite,” anatero Papa. Iye wati ndi pemphero lake kuti pamene a Katolika m’dzikolo akuchita chakachi Mzimu Woyera akhale nawo ndi kumawaunikira nthawi zonse kuti akhale zida zenizeni za chilungamo ndi mtendere. M’chaka cha 2007, Papa Benedicto wa 16 adalimbikitsa a Katolika pa dziko lonse kuchita nawo chaka chimenechi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi President Wa Bungwe La European Commission
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi mtsogoleri wa bungwe la European Commission Ursula Von Der Leyen. Papa ndi Der Leyen Malinga ndi malipoti awayilesi ya Vatican, zokambiranazi zinachitikira ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Ofesi yomwe imafalitsa ma uthenga ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ku Vatican, yati mu zokambirana zawo atsogoleri awiriwa akhutira ndi ubale wabwino pakati pa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ndi bungwe la European Commission. Atsogoleriwa ati chitsanzo cha ubale wabwino ndi chikonzero chomwe chili mkati cha chikondwerero kuti patha zaka makumi asanu (50) chikhazikitsireni ubalewu. Iwo akambirananso za mavuto omwe maiko a ku ulaya akukumana nawo, za mliri wa coronavirus, kusintha kwa nyengo, za anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana komanso za kusamvana pakati pa maiko a Israel ndi Palestina. Atatha nkumano wake ndi Papayu, Von der Leyen wachitanso zokambirana ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika Cardinal Pietro Parolin komanso mkulu wa ofesi yoona za ubale wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ndi maiko ena Archbishop Paul Gallagher.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: “A Malawi Asadere Nkhawa ndi Lipoti La Kagwiridwe Ntchito M’boma”
news: Mneneri wa ku nyumba ya boma a Brian Banda ati a Malawi asawone kuchedwa kutuluka kwa lipoti la wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino, yemwe amawunika ntchito zosiyana siyana za m’boma. A Banda amayankhula izi lero pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe umachitikira ku nyumba ya mtsogoleri wa dziko lino. Chilima anapereka lipotilo kwa Chakwera masiku apitawa Iwo amalankhula izi kutsatira nkhawa za anthu ena kuti wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Saulos Chilima wapereka lipotili mkachipinda komata kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu pamene m’mbuyomu anati adzalipereka poyera kuti anthu adziwe zomwe zilimo. A Banda ati ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko lino yemwe adalamula kuti izi zichitike choncho lipotili linayenera kuperekedwa kwa iye. “Chimene wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino anadzachita ndi kunena kuti awonane ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko lino ndi kufotokoza za momwe ntchitoyo inayendera,” anatero Banda. Iye wati palibe vuto lililonse pakati pa awiriwa kaamba koti mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu ndi yemwe apereke chiganizo pa nkhaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Msungwana Wa Standard 4 Wafa Kaamba Kochotsa Pathupi
news: Msungwana wina wa zaka 14 yemwe amaphunzira pa sukulu ya primary ya Makota m’boma la Dedza, wafa kamba kofuna kuchotsa pathupi pa ya miyezi isanu. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi m;bomali Sergeant Cassim Manda, msungwanayu Yamikani Sikiyo anachimwitsidwa mwezi wa January chaka chino ndipo wati sanafotokozere agogo ake omwe amakhala nawo za nkhaniyi  m’malo mwake anawauza amzake kuti mnyamata  wina wa zaka 16 yemwe anali naye pa ubwezi wa mseri ndipo amaphunzira naye limodzi ndi yemwe wamupatsa pathupipo. Manda wati patapita nthawi msungwanayu anaganiza zochotsa pathupipo kudzera kwa dotolo wa zitsamba ndipo atangomwa mankhwala omwe anapatsidwa ndi dotoloyu anayamba kuvutika m’thupi mwake kufikira pomwe wamwalira. Zotsatira za ku chipatala zasonyeza kuti msungwanayu wamwalira kaamba ka vuto la uchembere lomwe ladza pambuyo pomwa mankhwalawa. Pakadali pano apolisi m’bomali akusakasaka sing’anga yemwe anapereka mankhwala kwa msungwanayu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CHAKA CHA PENTEKOSITE : Mulole Mzimu Woyera kuti azikutsogolerani
