news: CHAKA CHA PENTEKOSITE Mulole Mzimu Woyera kuti azikutsogolerani  Chaka B Psalter Week IV  Liturgical Vestment: R 23 May 2021 Mzimu wa Ambuye wadzaza pa dziko lonse lapansi, umagwirizira zinthu zonse pamodzi. umadziwa zonse zimene anthu amalankhula, alleluia. PEMPHERO LOYAMBIRIRA Inu Mulungu, amene kudzera m’misteri ya chaka ichi cha Pentekoste, mukuyeretsa mpingo wanu wa pamalo ponse, mwa anthu ndi mafuko onse; tikukupemphani kuti mutsitse mphatso za Mzimu Woyera pa dziko lonse lapansi, ndipo ndi chaulere chanu chakumwamba chimene chidaagwira ntchito pamene Mthenga Wabwino udalalikidwa koyamba, mudzazenso lero mitima ya okhulupirira Inu. Mwa Yesu Khristu yemweyo, Ambuye ndi Mulungu wathu, amene ali ndi moyo ndi ufumu limodzi nanu ndi Mzimu Woyera, Mulungu mmodzi, tsopano ndi panthawi zosatha. Amen.   MAU OYAMBA                                               Ntchito 2:1-11 Mau a m’Buku la Ntchito za Atumwi  Onse aja adadzazidwa ndi Mzimu Woyera, ndipo adayamba  kulankhula zilankhulo zachilendo. Pamene tsiku la chikondwerero cha Pentekoste lidafika, iwo onse anali pamodzi m’nyumba imodzi. Mwadzidzidzi kudamveka kuchokera kumwamba mkokomo ngati wa mphepo yaukali, nudzaza nyumba yonse imene ankakhalamo. Ndipo adaona ngati timalawi ta moto tooneka ngati malilime tikugawikana nkukhala pa iwo, aliyense kakekake. Onse aja adadzazidwa ndi Mzimu Woyera, ndipo adayamba kulankhula zilankhulo zachilendo, monga Mzimuyo ankawalankhulitsira. Tsono, m’Yerusalemu muja munali Ayuda ena, anthu okonda Mulungu, ochokera ku maiko onse a pa dziko lapansi. Pamene mkokomo uja udamveka, anthu ambirimbiri adasonkhana. Onse adadodoma, chifukwa aliyense mwa iwo ankawamva akulankhula chilankhulo chake. Adadabwa, nathedwa nzeru ndipo adati, “Kodi onse akulankhulawa, si Agalileya? Nanga bwanji aliyense mwa ife akuwamva akulankhula chilankhulo chakwao? Ena mwa ife ndi Aparti ndi Amedi ndi Aelami, ena ndi okhala ku Mesopotamiya, ku Yudeya ndi ku Kapadokiya, ku Ponto ndi ku Asiya, ku Frijiya ndi ku Pamfiliya, ku Ejipito, ndi ku madera a Libiya kufupi ndi ku Kirene, ena ndi alendo ochokera ku Roma, ndiye kuti Ayuda ndi ena otsata za Chiyuda. Enanso ndi Akrete ndi Aarabu, komabe tonse tikuwamva anthuwa akulankhula m’zilankhulo zathu za ntchito zazikulu za Mulungu.”  Mau a Ambuye.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Tithokoze Mulungu.   Nyimbo ya Salimo                                       Salimo  104:1.24.29-31.34  Ch.    Tumizani Mzimu wanu, Ambuye, ndipo muwalitsenso dziko lonse lapansi.  Tamanda Chauta, iwe mtima wanga. Inu Chauta, Mulungu wanga, ndinu aakulu kwambiri. Mumavala ulemu ndi ufumu. Ch.    Tumizani Mzimu wanu, Ambuye, ndipo muwalitsenso dziko lonse lapansi. Inu Chauta ntchito zanu nzambiri, zonse mwazipanga mwanzeru, ndipo dziko lapansi ladzaza ndi zolengedwa zanu. Ch.    Tumizani Mzimu wanu, Ambuye, ndipo muwalitsenso dziko lonse lapansi. Mukazibisira nkhope yanu, zimachita mantha ndi kutaya mtima. Mukazichotsera mpweya, zimafa nkubwerera ku fumbi. Ch.    Tumizani Mzimu wanu, Ambuye, ndipo muwalitsenso dziko lonse lapansi. Mukatumiza mpweya wanu zimalengedwa, ndipo mumakonzanso maonekedwe a dziko lapansi. Ulemerero wa Chauta ukhalebe mpaka muyaya, Chauta akondwe nazo ntchito zakezo. Ch.    Tumizani Mzimu wanu, Ambuye, ndipo muwalitsenso dziko lonse lapansi. Mapemphero anga amkomere Chauta, popeza kuti ndimakondwa mwa Iye. Ch.    Tumizani Mzimu wanu, Ambuye, ndipo muwalitsenso dziko lonse lapansi. MAU ACHIWIRI                                                     Agalatia 5: 16-25 Mau a m’Kalata ya Paulo Woyera kwa Agalatia    Zipatso zimene Mzimu Woyera amabweretsa m’moyo wa munthu.  Chimene ndikufuna kunena ndi ichi: Mulole Mzimu Woyera kuti azikutsogolerani. Mukatero, pamenepo simudzachita zimene khalidwe lanu lokonda zoipa limalakalaka. Pakuti khalidwelo limalakalaka zotsutsana ndi zimene Mzimu Woyera afuna, ndipo zimene Mzimu Woyera afuna zimatsutsana ndi zimene khalidwe lokonda zoipalo limafuna. Ziwirizi zimadana, kotero kuti simungachite zimene mufuna kuchita. Koma ngati Mzimu Woyera akutsogolerani, ndiye kuti sindinunso akapolo a Malamulo a Mose. Zochita za khalidwe lokonda zoipa zimaonekera poyera. Ndi izi: Dama, kuchita zonyansa, kusadziletsa, kupembedza mafano, ufiti, chidani, kukangana, kaduka, kupsa mtima, kudzikonda, kusagwirizana, kuchita mipatuko, dumbo, kuledzera, kudakwa pa maphwando achipembedzo, ndi zina zotere. Ndikukuchenjezani tsopano, monga ndidaachitanso kale, kuti anthu amene amachita zotere, sadzalandirako Ufumu wa Mulungu. Koma zipatso zimene Mzimu Woyera amabweretsa m’moyo wa munthu ndi izi: Chikondi, chimwemwe, mtendere, kuleza mtima, chifundo, kukoma mtima, kukhulupirika, kufatsa ndiponso kudziletsa. Zimenezi palibe lamulo loziletsa. Amene ali ake a Khristu Yesu, adalipachika pa mtanda khalidwe lao lokonda zoipa, pamodzi ndi zokhumba zake ndi zilakolako zake. Ngati Mzimu Woyera adatipatsa moyo, tilolenso kuti Mzimu yemweyo azititsogolera. Mau a Ambuye.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Tithokoze Mulungu Nyimbo ya Mthenga Woyera Aleluya.      Bwerani Mzimu Woyera, mudzaze m’mitima ya anthu okhulupirira ndipo chikondi chanu chikhazikike mwa iwo. Aleluya. MTHENGA WOYERA                      Yohane 15:26-27. 16:12-15 Mau a Mthenga Woyera monga adalembera Yohane    Nkhosweyo ndi Mzimu wa choona wofumira mwa Atate.  Iyeyo akadzabwera, adzandichitira umboni. “Koma pali Nkhoswe imene ndidzakutumizireni kuchokera kwa Atate. Nkhosweyo ndi Mzimu wa choona wofumira mwa Atate. Iyeyo akadzabwera, adzandichitira umboni. Inunso mudzandichitira umboni, popeza kuti mwakhala nane kuyambira pa chiyambi.” “Ndili nawo mau ena ambiri oti ndikuuzeni, koma simungathe kuwamvetsa tsopano ai. Koma akadzafika Mzimu wodziwitsa zoona uja adzakuphunzitsani zoona zonse. Pakuti sadzalankhula zochokera kwa Iye yekha ai, koma zilizonse zimene Atate adzamuuze, ndizo zimene adzalankhula. Ndipo adzakudziwitsani zinthu zam’tsogolo. Adzandilemekeza, pakuti adzatenga zochokera kwa Ine nadzakudziwitsani. Zonse za Atate nzanga. Nchifukwa chake ndanena kuti adzatenga zochokera kwa Ine, nadzakudziwitsani inu.” Mthenga wa Ambuye.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Ulemu kwa Inu Ambuye Yesu Khristu. ULALIKI Abale ndi alongo okondedwa mwa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu. Lero tikuchita chaka cha Pentekosite. Pochita chakachi tikufuna kukumbukira tsiku limene Mulungu Mzimu Woyera adatsika pa ophunzira a Ambuye Yesu pamodzi ndi Mayi wake Maria. Pochita chakachi lero tiyeni tikumbukirenso tsiku limene ifenso tidalandira Mzimu Woyera makamaka pamene tidalandira Sakramenti la Ubatizo ndi la Ulimbitso. Mutu wa nsonkhano wathu wamapemphero tasankha mau awa: “Mulole Mzimu Woyera kuti azikutsogolerani” (Agalatia 5:16) amene tawerenga kuchokera m’mau achiwiri a lero.      Abale ndi alongo okondedwa, Pentekosite yoyamba ya akhristu imene idachitika masiku 50 atauka Ambuye Yesu kwa akufa, inali yopambana kwambiri mu mbiri ya Mpingo. Kuyambira tsiku limenelo, Mpingo udayamba, ndi mphamvu za Mzimu Woyera. Mzimu wa Mulungu, umene udaonekera pakati pa Apostoli m’chipinda cha pamwamba chija, ukupitirizabe kugwira ntchito yake mpaka lero. Mzimu Woyera ukutsogolera Mpingo pa dziko lonse lapansi. Izi zidatheka chifukwa iwo adalola kuti Mzimu Woyera uziwatsogolera. Mafunso athu lero akhale monga awa: Kodi ineyo Mzimu Woyerayo amanditsogolera m’zochita zanga? Kodi zochita za atsogoleri athu mu mpingo mwathu zimasonyeza kuti akutsogoleredwadi ndi Mzimu Woyera kapena za dziko lapansi pano? Nanga zomwe zimatilepheretsa kukhala otsogoleredwa ndi Mulungu Mzimu Woyera nchiyani? Poyamba tiyeni titambasule za mbiri ya chikondwerero cha Pentekosite ya Ayuda kuti timvetse kumene dzina lakuti “Pentekosite” likuchokera. Tawerenga posachedwapa m’mau oyamba ochokera m’buku la Ntchito za Atumwi kuti, “pamene tsiku la chikondwerero cha Pentekosite lidafika, ophunzira onse adali pamodzi m’nyumba imodzi” (Ntchito 2:1). Chikondwerero cha Pentekosite chinali chimodzi mwa zikondwerero zitatu zazikulu m’chipembedzo cha Chiyuda zimene ankachita chaka chilichonse. Ayuda ankachita chikondwerero cha Pentekosite pakutha pa masiku 50 pambuyo pa chikondwerero cha Pasaka. Pa chikondwerero cha Pentekosite, adali kukumbukira zinthu ziwiri: Poyamba adali kuchita chaka chothokoza Mulungu chifukwa cha dzinthu zimene adakolola ku munda kwao. Choncho, tinganene kuti chinali chaka cha masika. Kachiwiri adali kukumbukira tsiku limene Mose adalandira malamulo pa phiri lija la Sinai atasamuka kuchoka ku dziko la Ejipito ulendo wopita ku dziko la chilonjezo. Choncho, pa chaka cha Pentekosite Ayuda onse achimuna adali kupemphedwa kuti afike ku Yerusalemu ndi kupereka nsembe ku Tempile ngati angathe kutero. Ayuda oyandikira ku Yerusalemu ngakhalenso ku mayiko ena amene adabalalika, adali kuchita chotheka kupita ku Yerusalemu kuti akapemphere ku Tempile pa tsiku la chikondwerero cha Pentekosite. Nchifukwa chake tamva m’mau oyamba amene tawerenga akunena kuti, ku Yerusalemu patsiku la chikondwerero kunali anthu ochokera m’mayiko onse a dziko lapansi. Tsono patsiku lomwelo la chikondwerero cha Pentekosite, chaka chachikulu cha Ayuda ndi pamene Mulungu Mzimu Woyera adatsikira ophunzira ake a Ambuye Yesu. Motero nawonso akhristu adatchula chaka chokumbukira kutsika kwa Mzimu Woyera kuti chikhale chaka cha Pentekosite potengera dzina la chaka cha Chiyuda poti Mzimu Woyerayo adatsikira patsiku la chakacho. Koma kwa ife akhristu, Pentekosite ndi chaka chimene chili ndi tanthauzo lina. Poyamba monga tanena kale, ili ndi tsiku lokumbukira kubwera kwa Mzimu Woyera kwa ophunzira ake. Komanso kwa ife chaka cha Pentekosite chili ngati chaka chokumbukira tsiku lomwe Mpingo udabadwa ngakhale kuti maphunzitso odzama mu Mpingo amatiuza kuti Mpingo udabadwa kuchokera mu nthiti zobayidwa za Ambuye Yesu pa mtanda paja. Motero mwa njira ina titha kunena kuti pa tsiku la Pentekosite ndi pamene Mpingo udatuluka m’chikuta kukaonekera kunja ndikuyamba ntchito yake yopambana yolalika Mthenga Wabwino. Chifukwa cha nthawi, mfundo imeneyi sitingathe kuitambasula yonse lero lino. Pamene Ambuye Yesu adatsiriza ntchito imene Mulungu Atate adampatsa kuti ayigwire padziko lapansi pano, Mulungu Mzimu Woyera adatumizidwa kuti ayeretse Mpingo kuti poteropo onse amene adzakhulupirira apeze njira mwa Yesu Khristu yowalondolera kwa Atate. Mulungu Mzimu Woyera adatsikira gulu laling’ono la akhristu oyamba aja, adalidzaza ndi mphamvu ndi kulichotsa mantha onse amene gulu lija lidali nawo. Tamva kuti onse aja atadzazidwa ndi Mzimu Woyera, adayamba kulankhula zinenero za chilendo monga momwe Mzimuyo adawalankhulitsa. Chodabwitsa nchakuti, Petro yemwe uja wa mantha amene adakana kuti sadali kumudziwa Ambuye Yesu kubwalo la milandu lija, ndi amene adali woyambirira kuyimirira pakati pa ophunzira onse ndi kulalika pamaso pa anthu onse amene adasonkhana kunyumba kumene iwo adali kubisala kuja chifukwa cha mantha. Tikapitirira kuwerenga za moyo wa akhristu oyamba aja, tikuona kuti, kuyambira patsiku la Pentekosite pamene Mzimu Woyera adawatsikira, moyo wao wonse udasinthika ndi kusanduka watsopano. Motero adapita ponseponse motsogoleredwa ndi Mzimu Woyerayo ndi kulalika za chipulumutso cha Yesu Khristu ndi mau awo komanso zochita zawo. Anthu ambiri adali kudabwa ndi mphamvu ndiponso luntha zimene adali nazo akhristu oyamba aja pamene adali kulalika Mthenga Woyera ndi kuchitira umboni Yesu Khristu. Ifenso lero pochita chaka cha Pentekosite, tikumbukire kuti Mzimu Woyera amene adatsikira ophunzira a Ambuye Yesu pa tsiku la Pentekosite lija, amatsikiranso mwa ife nthawi zonse makamaka patsiku la Ubatizo ndi Ulimbitso. Mpingo ukutiphunzitsa kuti makamaka polandira Sakramenti la  Ulimbitso, Yesu Khristu amatipatsa Mzimu Woyera kuti atithandize kubalalitsa ndi kuteteza Mpingo ndi chikhristu chathu kuposa kale.  Patsikuli timachita ngati nafenso kulawako zazikulu zomwe zidachitika patsiku la Pentekosite lija. Ulimbitso ndiye ndithu Pentekosite yathu ife anthu a lero. Kudzera m’Sakramenti la Ulimbitso, timalandira mphatso zochokera kwa Mulungu Mzimu Woyera zisanu ndi ziwiri zimene ndi: Nzeru za kufuna Mulungu; Nzeru zomvetsa za Mulungu; Nzeru zosankhula ntchito zoyenera; Chamuna chachikhristu; Nzeru zomvetsa zinthu zapansi pano; chifundo chokonda Mulungu ndi chifundo cha kuopa Mulungu. Tsono monga momwe miyoyo ya akhristu aja idasinthikiratu atalandira Mzimu Woyera, ifenso miyoyo yathu iyenera kusinthika chifukwa tidalandira Mzimu Woyera wokhawokhawo pa Ulimbitso wathu. Leronso Mzimu Woyera amene adatsikira ophunzira aja, akugwira ntchito yake mu Mpingo pogawira akhristu mphatso zosiyanasiyana zowathandiza kutumikira Mpingo wake wonse. Lero lomwe Mzimu Woyera akukhala m’mitima ya omvera Mulungu ngati m’tempile lake. Mpakana lero Mzimu Woyera akutsogolera Mpingo m’njira ya choona ndipo akulunzanitsa Mpingo kuti anthu ake akhale amodzi. Ndipo mpakana tsiku lomaliza, Mzimu Woyera adzakhala otanganidwa kukumbutsa Mpingo wa Yesu Khristu ndi kuphunzitsa Mpingowo zonse zimene Iye adaphunzitsa. Tamva m’mau oyamba kuti atadzazidwa ndi Mzimu Woyera, pa tsiku la Pentekosite, Apostoli aja adalandira mphatso ya Mzimu Woyera, yolankhula zilankhulo zosiyanasiyana. Tsopano atha kulalika pa dziko lonse lapansi, ndipo aliyense atha kuwamva muzilankhulo zao. Tawerenga,  “Onse aja adadzazidwa ndi Mzimu Woyera, ndipo adayamba kulankhula zilankhulo zachilendo, monga Mzimuyo ankawalankhulitsira” (Ntchito 2: 4). Tiyeni tsono potsiriza aliyense mwa ife asunzumire mu mtima mwake ndi kudzifunsa ngatidi Mzimu Woyera amene adalandira pa Ubatizo ndi pa Ulimbitso akukhaladi mwa iye kapena ayi. Ngwazo wathu mlungu uno ukhale wofufuza mopanda chinyengo ngatidi Mzimu Woyera akunditsogolera kapena ayi? Mau amene angatithandize kufufuza ngatidi Mzimu Woyera akutitsogolera kapena ayi ndi amenenso Paulo Woyera akutiuza pa Agalatiya 5:22-23 kuti, “koma zipatso zimene Mzimu Woyera amabala mwa munthu ndi izi; chikondi, chimwemwe, mtendere, kuleza mtima, chifundo, kukoma mtima, kukhulupirika ndiponso kudziletsa.” Nanga ine ndili pano ndinganene kuti zipatso zimenezi zilipo mwa ine kapena ayi? Amen. Ine ndimvera Mulungu mmodzi yekha… Mapemphero a Akhristu Abale, Yesu adatiuza kuti, “Pemphani ndipo mudzalandira.” Lero tipemphe Ambuye kuti Mzimu Woyera atsike pa anthu onse okhala m’dziko lino lapansi. Tikupemphani, mutivomereze. Tikupemphani, mutivomereze. Tikupemphani, mutivomereze. Tikupemphani, mutivomereze. Mulungu wathu, tikupempha zimenezi mosakaika, osaopa kukutchulani Atate, chifukwa tidasanduka ana anu polandira Mzimu wanu Woyera. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu. Amen.    PEMPHERO LOPEREKERA             Inu Ambuye,             pokumbukira zimene Mwana wanu adalonjeza zija,             tikukupemphani mutitumizire Mzimu wanu Woyera,             kuti atiuululire choona chonse;             tizimvetsetsa nzeru zozama zokhudza             Misteri ya nsembeyi.             Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu.            Onse aja adadzazidwa ndi Mzimu Woyera,            ndipo adayamba kulankhula za ntchito zazikulu za Mulungu, alleluia. PEMPHERO LOTHOKOZERA              Inu Mulungu,            amene mumapereka mphatso zanu za kumwamba ku Mpingo wanu,            tikukupemphani kuti musungitse chaulerere chimene mwapereka,            kuti mphatso ya Mzimu Woyera imene mwatsitsira Mpingo wanu,            ikhale ndi mphamvu yake yonse,            ndipo chakudya ichi cha uzimu,            chiupindulire chipulumutso chodzaza ndi chosatha.            Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu. PEMPHERO LOTSIRIZA   (Pa msonkhano wa mapemphero)        Mulungu Atate athu, tikuyamika chifundo chanu, chifukwa potipatsa Mzimu          Woyera, mudatisandutsa ana anu ndi mboni za Yesu Khristu. Musaleke kuongolera nzeru ndi mitima yathu kuti mayendedwe athu akhale okomera Inu, ndipo ntchito zathu zonse zisonyeze anthu onse kuwala kwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu. title: Boma La Japan Lapereka Chipinda Chochitira Maopaleshoni Pa Chipatala Cha Montfort Ku Chikwawa
news: Boma la dziko la Japan lapereka nyumba yamakono yochitiramo ma opaleshoni osiyanasiyana pa chipatala cha Montfort ku Nchalo m’boma la Chikwawa. Wachiwiri kwa kazembe wa dziko la Japan kuno ku Malawi, Hirotsugu Ikeda ndi yemwe wapereka chipinda chochitiramo ma opaleshoni m’malo mwa boma la dzikolo. Ambuye Musikuwa (kumanzere) kulandira chipindacho kuchokera kwa Ikeda Nyumba yochitiramo ma opaleshoniyi yomwe ayimanga ndi thandizo la ndalama zokwana 60 million kwacha, ithandiza kutukula ntchito za umoyo m’maboma aku chigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire. Chipatalachi chakhala chikudalira zipatala zina monga cha boma ku Chikwawa ndi Queen Elizabeth Central ku Blantyre pa nkhani yochita ma opaleshoni popeza zipangizo ndi chipinda zomwe zinali pachipatalachi zinali zakutha zomwe tsopano zikutanthauza kuti moyo omwe unali owawitsa kwa anthu okhala mdera la pakati m’boma la Chikwawa poyenda mtunda wautali kuti akalandire ma opaleshoni ku chipatala, ndi mbiri yakale. Poyankhula pa mwambo wopereka chipindachi, a Ikeda ati boma la Japan lapereka thandizoli chifukwa mzika zokhala ku chigwa cha Shire zimakhudzidwa ndi ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi zochuluka. Chipatala cha Montfort chili pansi pa dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Chikwawa ndipo bishop wa dayosiziyi, Ambuye Peter Musikuwa ndi omwe alandira nyumbayi. M’mawu awo, bishop Musikuwa anati kubwera kwa chipinda chopangira maopaleshoni pa chipatala chawo kuthandiza kutukula ntchito za umoyo osati mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa yokha komanso ndi madera ena ozungulira. “Chipinda chimenechi chitithandiza kwambiri kupitsa patsogolo ntchito za umoyo popeza kuti tsopano tili ndi chipinda chatsopano momwe mulinso zida zatsopano kusiyana ndi chakale chomwe chinali chosowa zida zambiri,” anatero Ambuye Musikuwa. Naye mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za chipatalachi, a Montfort Chiwaya anagwirizana ndi Amnuye Musikuwa ponena kuti kubwera kwa anthu aku Japan ndi chithandizo cha nyumbayi kuthandiza kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe angawatumize ku zipatala zina. A Chiwaya anati ngati mpingo wa katolika wa dayosizi ya Chikwawa ndi okondwa chifukwa ntchito zonse za chipatala zofunika maopaleshoni azidzizgwira pa chipatala chawo. Chipatala cha Montfort chimathandiza anthu oposera 180 sauzande akuchigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire. Mabungwe a Dzukawala Women Group ndi Action Medeor ndi omwe athandiza kugula zida ndi zipangizo za m’zipinda za nyumbayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Zipani Zidziwulura Komwe Zikutenga Chuma Chawo
news: Katswiri pa nkhani ya ndale m’dziko muno Ernest Thindwa wati sakugwirizana ndi ganizo la bungwe la Centre for Democracy and Economic Development Initiatives (CDEDI) lofuna kuti registrar wa zipani za ndale m’dziko muno auze a Malawi momwe atsogoleri a zipani amapezera ndalama zoyendetsera zipani zawo. Thindwa: Si ntchito ya registrar Masiku apitawa bungwe la CDEDI lidatulutsa chikalata chopempha registrar wa zipani kuti anene momwe atsogoleri a zipanizi amapezera chuma choyendetsera zipani zawo. Koma polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi, Thindwa wati imeneyo si ntchito ya registrar wa zipani za ndale koma kuti malamulo akuyenera kugwira ntchito pa zipani zomwe sizikutsatira malamulo omwe alipo oti zipani zizitsatira. “Imeneyo si ntchito ya registrar ayi koma kuti zipani pa zokha zimayenera kumachita zimenezi pazokha. zikuyenera kumanena komwe zikutenga chuma choyendetsera ntchito zake,” anatero a Thindwa. Koma katswiriyu wanena kuti zipani zikuyenera kumanena komwe zimatenga ndalama pofuna kupewa chinyengo pakati pa anthu a bizinesi ndi anthu a ndale.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walandira A Kazembe Atsopano Ku Vatican
news: Lachisanu pa 21 May nthawi ya ku m’mawa, Papa Francisco walandira makalata oyambira ntchito kuchokera kwa a kazembe atsopano oyimira maiko awo ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican. Akazembewa ndi a maiko a Singapore, Zimbabwe, Bangladesh, Algeria, Sri Lanka, Barbados, Sweden, Finland ndi Nepal. Papa kulandira akazembewo “Ndine wokondwa kulandira ma kalata okuvomerezani kuyimira maiko anu kuno ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican,” watero Papa Francisco polandira a kazembe’wa. Iye wapempha akazembe’wa kuti apereke ku maiko awo uthenga wa chimwemwe chake powalandira ku Vatican pamene akuyamba ntchito yawo. Pa mwambowu, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika koti maiko azithandizana pa mavuto osiyana-siyana komanso wakumbutsa akazembe’wa za udindo omwe ali nawo wolimbikitsa umodzi wa maiko. Iye wati mliri wa coronavirus wakumbutsa maiko za kufunika kwa mgwirizano ndi kudalirana pakati pa maiko. Papa Francisco wakumbutsanso akazembe’wa za mavuto monga kusintha kwa nyengo kodza kaamba kosasamala chilengedwe, kuthawa kwa anthu m’maiko awo kupita ku maiko ena komanso ngongole zomwe zikusautsa maiko osauka, mavuto omwe iye wati akusowa umodzi ndi mgwirizano wa maiko kuti athe. Iye wati likulu la mpingo wa katolika ndi lodzipereka kuthandiza kuti mavuto amenewa achepe kapena kutheratu. Pomaliza iye wapempha maiko a Israel ndi Palestina kuti athetse kusamvana kwawo ndipo wapempha mapemphero kuti kusamvanaku kuthe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Anjata Anthu 50 Kaamba Kogula Zokolora Mwachinyengo
news: Apolisi mchigawo chapakati chakumvuma kwa dziko lino amanga anthu 50 m’maboma a Salima, Dowa, Kasungu ndi Nkhotakota, kaamba kogula zokolora kwa alimi pa mitengo yosavomerezeka ndi boma. Namwaza: Samatsatira ndondomeko za boma Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mchigawochi Inspector Harry Namwaza, anthuwa amangidwa pa ntchito yomwe apolisi a mchigawochi anakhazikitsa yofuna kuwona ngati anthu ochita bizinesi akutsatira mitengo yomwe boma linakhazikitsa pogula zokolora za alimi. Iye wati ena mwa anthuwa amagwiritsa ntchito masikelo oyezera mbewuzi omwe ndi osavomerezeka ndi bungwe la Malawi Bureau of Standards (MBS). “Apolisi a kuno ku chigawo chapakati chakumvuma lachitatu anayenda m’madera osiyanasiyana kuti awone zomwe anthu ochita bizinesi zogula mbewu akupanga potsatira ndondomeko zomwe boma linakhazikitsa ndipo kwapezeka kuti anthu 50 amenewa anamangidwa kaamba koti samatsatira zina mwa ndondomekozi,” anatero Inspector Namwaza. Pamenepa Inspector Namwaza wati anthuwa akusungidwa mchitolokosi cha apolisi ndipo posachedwapa akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu kuti akayankhe milandu yomwe apalamulayo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Anthu Ayenera Kumaganizirana Pochita Ndale
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati kuganizira ena ndi chinthu chofunika kwambiri pochita ndale. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lachinayi ku Rome m’dziko la Italy ku likulu la bungwe la lake lothandiza achinyamata a m’maiko osiyana-siyana. Polankhula kwa achinyamata omwe anafika ku likulu la bungwe la a Papa lodziwika kuti Scholas Occurrentes komanso polankhula kwa achinyamata a m’maiko a United States, Spain, Argentina ndi Australia kudzera pa makina a intaneti, Papa wati kuganizira ena ndiye chinthu chofunika kwambiri pochita ndale ndipo wati kusaganizira ubwino wa anthu ena ndi chiyambi cha zipwirikiti. Iye wauza achinyamatawa kuti ndale zikuvuta masiku ano kaamba koti anthu safuna kuwonetsa umodzi pochita zokambirana pothetsa mavuto osiyanasiyana. Papa wati nkhondo ndi mikangano zikuchitika m’maiko osiyanasiyana chifukwa cha kusowa kwa ukadaulo pa ndale. Iye wati anthu ogwira ntchito za boma akuyenera kutsogoza mgwirizano komanso kuyang’ana ubwino wa anthu ena m’malo momangoziganizira iwo eni. Scholas Occurrentes ndi bungwe la a Papa lothandiza achinyamata kukwaniritsa zomwe Mulungu amafuna kuti zizichitika pakati pa anthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Unduna wa Zaumoyo Watentha Katemera Wokutha Mphamvu
news: Unduna wa zaumoyo mdziko muno lero wawononga katemera wa nthenda ya COVID-19 wotchedwa Astrazeneca oposera 19,000. Malinga ndi akuluakulu a ku undunawu, katemerayu watha mphamvu ndipo palibe malipoti ochokera ku bungwe lowona zaumoyo pa dziko lonse, osonyeza ngati kuli koyenera kugwiritsabe ntchito katemerayu. Dziko lino lakhala loyamba mu Africa kuwononga katemera yemwe watha mphamvu. Akuluakuluwa ati ntchitoyi ichititsa mzika zambiri kulandira katemerayu akapezeka pomwe mbuyomu anthu ambiri samalandira katemerayu kaamba ka kufala kwa mauthenga olakwika okhudza katemerayu ndipo ati kugwiritsa ntchito katemera owongekayu kutha kubwezera m’mbuyo chikhulupiliro cha anthu pa katemerayu. Komabe boma lati likuyembekezeka kupita chitsogolo katemera wina akafikanso mdziko muno. Padakali pano a Malawi opitirira 330,000 ndi omwe alandira katemera wa nthenda ya COVID-19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu Atenge Nawo Mbali Pa Zisankho Za Mu Mpingo-ECM
news: Bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) lapempha akhristu a mpingowu kuti atenge nawo mbali posankha atsogoleri atsopano mu mpingowu. Mkulu wa mu ofesi yowona za moyo wa akhristu eniake ku bungweli, bambo Henry Chinkanda apereka pempholi lachitatu polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Chimkanda: Mulungu amalankhula kudzera mwa anthu Iwo ati ndi udindo wa mkhristu aliyense kutenga nawo mbali posankha komanso kuvomera kutumikira pa maudindo osiyana-siyana. “Mulungu amalankhula kudzera mwa anthu,” atero bambo Chinkanda polimbikitsa akhristu kuti avomere ma udindo osiyana-siyana omwe angapatsidwe. Iwo apitilira kunena kuti pamene anthu asankhidwa ndi akhristu anzawo kuti atumikire, ndi Mulungu amene wawasankha kuti amutumikire ndipo kuti asachite mantha. Bambo Chinkanda akumbutsa akhristu kuti uwu ndi utsogoleri wa mu mpingo kotero akhristu akuyenera kusankha anthu a zitsanzo zabwino monga opereka mtulo, osonkhana ndi anzawo ku tchalitchi koma koposaposa akhale anthu a makhalidwe ovomerezeka a chikhristu. A episkopi a mpingo wa katolika ku Malawi adagwirizana kuti zaka zitatu zilizonse mpingo uzichita zisankho za atsogoleri m’maudindo osiyana-siyana kuyambira ku mphakati kapena limana ndi kumakwera ku mtunda.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Akhristu Azipemphera Nthawi Zonse
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko walimbikitsa akhristu kuti adzichita khama lomapemphera nthawi zonse ngakhale iye wati si nthawi zonse chimakhala cha pafupi kupemphera. Papa wanena izi lachitatu polankhula kwa akhristu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la San Damaso ndipo wati nthawi zina mtima wofuna kupemphera umakumana ndi zovuta za moyo uno. Papa Francisco watchula za mavuto a tsiku ndi tsiku a moyo uno amene ali ndi kuthekera kolepheretsa munthu kupemphera, mavuto omwe iye wati amachotsa chidwi chofuna kupemphera. Iye wati si tchimo kumaganiza zina pamene munthu ukupemphera ponena kuti uwu ndiwo umunthu komabe iye wati ndi kofunika kumawathamangitsa maganizo osokoneza mapempherowa. Iye wati akhristu akuyenera kulimbikira kupemphera nthawi zonse posafooka ndi kumupatsa mpata satana. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti Mulungu amayankha mapemphero a akhristu munthawi yake ya Mulungu’yo koma chachikulu ndi kulimbikira kupemphera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Tigwirane Manja Potukula Maphunziro – Nsapato
news: Bungwe la Edukans Foundation lati boma komanso mabungwe omwe si a boma akuyenera kuyikapo chidwi chachikulu popititsa patsogolo maphunziro a msukulu za sekondale zoyendera. Mkulu wa bungweli m’dziko muno Dr. Limbani Nsapato anena izi lachitatu ku Lilongwe pomwe bungweli limapereka ma certificate kwa ena mwa aphunzitsi a msukulu za sekondale zoyendera omwe adatenga nawo gawo pa ntchito ya bungweli yowonjezera kuthekera kwa aphunzitsiwa msukuluzi pansi pa project yotchedwa Star School. Nsapato: Aphunzitsi ndi ochepa Malinga ndi Dr. Nsapato, mavuto omwe ali msukuluzi amasokoneza kwambiri pa kachitidwe ka ana pa mayeso zomwe zingachititse kuti asakhale mzika zodalirika za dziko lino ndipo ati boma komanso mabungwewa akuyenera kuthandizira kukonza ena mwa mavutowa. Iwo anati ndi okondwa kuwona momwe maphunziro asinthira kupita patsogolo msukulu zomwe akugwirako ntchitoyi ponena kuti ana pano akuchita bwino pa mayeso. Komabe Dr. Nsapato ati ndi zokhumudwitsa kuwona kuti maphunziro a msukulu zambiri za sekonale zoyendera akukhala osiyana ndi msukulu zina za sekondale zomwe ati ngati boma likuyenera kuganizirapo bwino pokonza mavuto omwe alipo. Iwo anati, “Aphunzitsi ndi ochepa komanso zipangizo ndizochepa nde pakufunika kuti aboma awonjezera ndalama komanso zipangizo kuti zithandizire kutukula maphunziro.” Dr. Nsapato anawonjezera ponena kuti, “Project’yi tayigwira ntchito m’maboma ochepa ndiye tikupempha kuti boma lilimbikitse mabungwe ena omwe si aboma komanso mabungwe omwe amathandiza dziko lino pa chuma kuti ayikepo dzanja, ntchito ngati imeneyi ifikire ku sukulu zambiri komanso ifikire kwa ana ambiri.” Polankhulapo moyimira unduna wa za maphunziro, mkulu wa za maphunziro m’chigawo cha zamaphunziro cha pakati chakuzambwe, a Joseph Nkhata anagwirizana ndi Dr. Nsapato kuti mavuto alipo ambiri omwe akuyenera kukonzedwa. Komabe iwo ati boma likuyesetsa kale kudzera mu ndondomeko zosiyanasiyana kuti zinthu msukuluzi zisinthe pofuna kuthandiza ana kuti azichita bwino. “Tili ndi project imene ikutchulidwa – Equals, pali project ina imene ikumanga masukulu mothandizidwa ndi boma la America imene tikuti – Secondary Education Expansion for Development, tilinso ndi project ina imene tikuti Improving Secondary Education in Malawi. Ma project onsewa boma lakhazikitsa ndithu ndicholinga chofuna kutukula maphunziro mmasukulu mwathu.” Anatero a Nkhata. M’mau ake, mmodzi mwa aphunzitsi omwe adatenga nawo mbali pa maphunzirowa a Sphiwe Mbeya kuchokera ku sukulu ya Embangweni CDSS m’boma la Mzimba anati project yi yathandizra kuchita bwino kwa ana ku sukulu yawo poyelekeza ndi m’mbuyomu. “Tikamaphunzitsa, ana aja timakhala ngati tikuwalowetsa m’mene maphunziro ayenera kukhalira iwonso amatenga nawo mbali. Mphunzitsi akakhala kuti akuphunzitsa iwowo amapanga nawo zotino m’mbuyomu sankatha kupanga.” Mwazina aphunzitsiwa athandizidwanso pa luso la utsogoleri komanso momwe angasamalire ndalama msukuluzi. Bungwe la Edukans Foundation likugwira ntchitoyi mothandizana ndi ma bungwe a Education Expertise Development Foundation (EEDF) komanso Mastercard Foundation msukulu za sekondale zoyendera zokwana khumi, zisanu ndi imodzi(16) m’maboma a Mzimba, Liongwe, Mangochi komanso Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwana Apha Bambo Wake M’boma la Ntchisi
news: Bambo wa zaka 59 wa m’boma la Ntchisi, wafa mwana wake atamupha potsatira kusamvana komwe kunabuka pa nkhani zokhudza malo. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mchigawo cha pakati chakum’mawa kwa dziko lino Inspector Harry Namwaza, izi zachitika lolemba pa 17 May pomwe oganiziridwayu, Chimwemwe Kambani wa zaka 24 anafika kumudziko kuchokera ku Rumphi komwe amagwira ntchito. Iye akuti anapeza bambo ake Kambani Maliko kuti agulitsa mbali ina ya malo awo zomwe sizinamusangalatse ndipo anatenga mtengo ndi kuyamba kumenya bambo akewo. Potsatira kuvulala kwambiri, iwo anamwalira akulandira thandizo la mankhwala pachipatala cha Kangolwa m’bomalo. Pakadali pano apolisi akufunafuna mnyamatayu chifukwa zitangochitika izi iye anathawa. Malemu Kambani Maliko amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mkonda mfumu yaikulu Kasakula m’boma lomwelo la Ntchisi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi Nduna Yowona Nkhani Za Kunja Kwa Dziko La Iran
news: Ofesi yofalitsa mauthenga ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican, yati lolemba Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi nduna yowona nkhani za kunja kwa dziko la Iran, Javad Zarif. Ofesiyi yanenanso kuti pa tsiku lomweli Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko la Turkey, Recep Tayyip Erdoğan kudzera pa lamya. Zarif wauza atolankhani kuti iye ndi Papa Francisco akambirana za nkhondo pakati maiko a Israel ndi Palestina, za mgwirizano omwe ukuyenera kukhalapo pakati pa zipembedzo zosiyana-siyana ndi nkhani zina. Atatha kukumana ndi Papa Francisco, Zarif wachitanso zokambirana ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa katolika, Cardinal Pietro Parolin komanso mkulu wa ofesi yowona za ubale wa likulu la mpingo wa katolika ndi maiko ena, Archbishop Paul Gallagher. Ofesi ya President wa dziko la Turkey yati President Erdoğan ndi Papa Francisco akambirana za nkhondo pakati pa maiko a Israel ndi Palestina koma likulu la mpingo wa katolika silidathirirepo ndemanga pa zokambiranazi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ndi Udindo Wa Aliyense Kusamalira Ana Nthawi Ya Tchuthi-Nsapato
news: M’modzi mwa akatswiri p a nkhani za maphunziro m’dziko muno, a Limbani Nsapato ati ndi udindo wa adindo onse kusamalira ana a sukulu pa nthawi ya tchuthi popewa mavuto osiyana-siyana monga makhalidwe oyipa. A Nsapato anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati kuwayang’anira anawa moyenera kuthandizanso kuti ana achitsikana apewe kutenga pathupi adakali achichepere kaamba koti ophunzira ambiri amatayilira akkhala pa tchuthi. “Kweni kweni asungwana amatengerapo mwayi kumapanga zibwezi komanso kumangoyenda yenda zomwe zingapangitse kuti atenge pathupi, makolo ayesetse kuti ana asayende yende akhale pakhomo ndi kumawerenga,” anatero Nsapato. Iye wati si makolo okha omwe alindi udindowu, a mpingo ngakhalenso boma akuyenera kutengapo mbali. Polankhulaponso mayi Clara Chinsewu omwe ndi kholo la ana anayi omwe ndi okhala ku Naperi mu mzinda wa Blantyre ati ndi kofunika kumalimbikitsa ana pa nkhani za uzimu pamene ali pa tchuthi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi m’boma la Mangochi akusakasaka mbava 12
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mangochi akhazikitsa ntchito yosaka mbava 12 zomwe akuziganizira kuti zimafuna kupha munthu wina pomuthira acid osakaniza ndi petulo. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi, izi zachitika usiku wa pa 10 May pomwe mbavazi zinafika kunyumba ya Asidi Mponda ndipo anamuthira acid osakaniza ndi petuloyu ndipo anamubera katundu wa ndalama zokwana 730,000,00. Daudi wati mkazi wa Mponda anakanena kupolisi za nkhaniyi ndipo apolisiwa atayendera malowa anapeza majumbo 8 ndi mabotolo awiri omwe anali ndi fungo la mafuta a petulo. “Ndizoonadi ife apolisi kuno ku Mangochi tikusakasaka mbava 12 zomwe sizikuziwika zomwe zamuvulaza Asidi Mponda yemwe amapanga bizinesi kwa Katuli,” anatero Daudi. Daudi wati padakali pano Mponda wagonekedwa pa Chipatala cha Mangochi komwe akulandira thandizo la Mankhwala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wakhazikitsa Utumiki Wa Ugulupa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wakhazikitsa utumiki wa ugulupa. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, papa wakhazikitsa utumikiwu kudzera mu kalata yomwe watulutsa lachiwiri ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Papa Francisco wakhazikitsa utumikiwu womwe ndi wa akhristu eniake ndi cholinga chofuna kuti uthandizire pa ntchito yofalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso m’masiku ano amakono. Iye wati kudzera mu utumiki umenewu ndi kofunika kulemekeza mwa njira ya padera amayi kapena a bambo omwe akumva mu mtima mwao kuti Mulungu akuwaitana kudzera mu Sakramenti la Ubatizo kuti athandize pophunzitsa ena zomwe mpingo umatsata ndi kuphunzitsa. Papa Francisco wapempha ansembe kuti athandize utumiki umenewu womwe wakhala ukugwira ntchito kwa nthawi yaitali ndipo wabereka zipatso zambirimbiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Bata Pakati P a Dziko La Israel Ndi Palestina
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha mtendere pakati pa dziko la Israel ndi Palestina. Malinga ndi malipoti awayilesi ya Vatican, Papa wapereka pempholi ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican kutsatira zipolowe zomwe zabuka pakati pa mayiko awiriwa. Iye wati akutsatira nkhaniyi bwino ndipo wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri ndi zomwe zikuchitikazi. “Ndi pemphero langa kuti bata libwererenso mu mzinda wa Yerusalemu kuti choncho mzindawu akhale malo omwe anthu angathe kuchita mapemphero awo ndipo ndikupempha kuti anthu onse abwere pamodzi ndi kupeza njira yothetsera mavutowa Kamba koti palibe chabwino chomwe anthu angapindule pa kumenyana ndi kuchita zipolowe,” watero Papa. Zipolowe pakati pa dziko la Israel ndi Palestina zabuka potsatira zomwe lachita dziko la Israel poletsa anthu aku Palestina kukumana m’malo ena omwe amakumanirana pomaliza posala zakudya tsiku lililonse mwezi uno wa Ramadan. Malipoti ati lolemba ma Palestina oposa 350 avulala pa zipolowezi ndipo ena pafupi 250 agonekedwa m’chipatala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ntchito Yogawa Katemera Wa Covid-19 ati Sikuyenda Bwino M’boma La Chikwawa
news: Akulu akulu a zaumoyo m’boma la Chikwawa ati ntchito yopereka katemera wa Covid-19 sikuyenda bwino. Mkulu wofalitsa nkhani zaumoyo m’boma la Chikwawa, Settie Priminta ndiye wayankhula izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi Priminta wati zili chomwechi kamba ka kusowa kwa mauthenga okwanira okhuza katemerayu m’madera ena a bomali. Iwo ati ngakhale gawo loyamba logawa katemerayu ikufika kumapeto, ndi zodandaulitsa kuwona kuti anthu ambiri sakutuluka kudzalandira katemerayu Kamba kakusowa kwa mauthanga oyenera okhuza katemerayu. “Ntchito imeneyi ikuyenda koma sikuyenda m’mene timafunira ife achipatala chifukwa tikuona kuti anthu akumabwera kuzabayitsa koma ochepa,” adatero Priminta. Pakadali pano anthu okwana 2,926 ndiomwe alandira katemerayu chiyambireni  ntchito yopereka katemerayu m’bomalo. Gawo lachiwiri lopereka katemerayu m’dziko muno likuyembekezeka kuyamba mkati kati mwa mwezi wa m’mawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Bambo Chifukwa Kukhala Episkopi wa Dayosizi ya Dedza
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha bambo Peter Adrian Chifukwa kukhala episkopi watsopano wa dayosizi ya Dedza. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, Papa walengeza za kusankhidwa kwa bambo Chifukwa masana a lero pa 8 May 2021 nthawi ya 12 koloko masana ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Bishop watsopano wa dayosizi ya Dedza Bambo Chifukwa asankhidwa pa udindowu potsatira imfa ya Ambuye Emmanuel Kanyama omwe anali episkopi wa dayosiziyi ndipo anamwalira pa 17 February m’chaka cha 2018. Pothilirapo ndemanga pa kusankhidwa kwa episkopi watsopanoyu, mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno, bambo Henry Saindi ati mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno ndi wokondwa kaamba ka kusankhidwa kwa bambo Chifukwa pa udindowu potengera kuti dayosisiyi yakhala ilibe episkopi kwa zaka zitatu. Bambo Chifukwa omwe amachokera m’mudzi mwa Msampha, mfumu yaikulu Kaphuka m’boma la Dedza adabadwa pa 27 August 1973. Iwo adadzodzedwa unsembe pa 12 June 2004 pambuyo pochita maphunziro a Philosophy komanso Theology. Ngati wansembe, iwo atumikira ku ma parish a Dedza, Ganya komanso anali mkulu wa seminale yaing’ono ya St. Kizito, pongotchula zochepa. M’chaka cha 2007 mpaka 2010, bambo Chifukwa adakachita maphunziro a malamulo a mpingo wa katolika, ndipo anali mkulu owona za malamulo mu dayosizi ya Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Ati Akupitilirabe Kumanga Anthu Amene Anaba Ndalama Za COVID-19
news: Apolisi mdziko muno ati akupitilirira kumanga anthu amene akuwaganizira kuti anawononga ndalama zokwana 6.2-billion-kwacha zomwe zinali zothandiza kulimbana ndi mliri wa Covid-19. Malinga ndi lipoti la National Audit Office, apolisi akhala akumanga anthu osiyanasiyana amene akuwaganizira kuti anatenga nawo gawo posakaza ndalamazi. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’dziko muno, James Kadzadzera ndi yemwe wanena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria pamene imafuna kudziwa tsogolo la kumangidwa kwa oganiziridwa-wa. Iye wati anthu amene awamanga kale mokhudzana ndi nkhaniyi akuwasunga pa alimande mu ndende za dziko lino podikira kuti akhale ndi nthawi yokwanira yochita kafukufuku wawo. “Anthu akumangidwa masiku osiyanasiyana, pa milandu yosiyanasiyana ndi malo osiyanasiyana ndipo sangatengeredwe ku bwalo lamilandu tsiku limodzi koma ena omwe anatengeredwa ku khoti anamangidwa kale ndipo akusungudwa pa alimande ku ndende,” anatero Kadadzera. A Kadadzera ati ntchito yomanga anthuwa ikuchedwa kaamba koti apolisi adapempha khoti kuti liwapatse nthawi yokwanira yochita kafukufuku wawo. Kutsatira kubedwa kwa ndalamazi, pa 18 April 2021 mtsogoleri wa dziko lino, Lazarus Chakwera adalamula kuti akuluakulu ena ogwira ntchito za boma kuti ayimitsidwe pa ntchito kuti pachitike kafukufuku oyenera. Ena mwa anthu amene amangidwa kale powaganizira kuti anasokoneza ndalamazi ndi ogwira ntchito ku ofesi ya pulezidenti ndi nduna.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Save The Children Lathandiza Achinyamata M’boma La Ntcheu
news: Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za bungwe la Save the Children m’boma la Ntcheu, a James Gausi ati cholinga cha bungweli ndi kutukula achinyamata powapatsa maphunziro osiyanasiyana kuti akhale ozidalira pa miyoyo yawo. A Gausi anena izi lachisanu pambuyo pamwambo wopereka njinga ndi katundu wina yemwe bungweli lagulira achinyamatawa potsatira maphunziro omwe anali nawo. Iwo ati ngati bungwe kunali kofunika kupereka maphunziro kwa achinyamatawa pofuna kuwazindikiritsa pa momwe angazisamalire ma moyo wawo. “Panachitika kafukufuku oyang’ana achinyamata omwe amayenda yenda mtauni ndipo titawafusa tinapeza kuti zonsezi zimachitika kaamba ka kusowa kwa mwayi ndipo apa ndipomwe tinaganiza zowabweretsera achinyamatawa njira zosiyana siyana zotukula moyo wawo,” anatero Gausi. Mawu ake mkulu wa zaumoyo m’boma la Ntcheu, Dr. Steve Macheso anathokoza bungwe la Save the Children pokonza maphunzirowa zomwe akuti zithandizira achinyamata a m’boma la Ntcheu kukhala odzidalira ndiponso kulimbikitsa maphunziro awo. “Uchembere pakati pa achinyamata ukuyesera kuchitako bwino ngakhale kuti nkhondo imeneyi pakatipa inayima chifukwa cha mliri wa Covid-19 komabe bungweli layesetsa pothandiza achinyamatawa powapatsa katundu osiyana siyana,” anatero Macheso. M’modzi mwa achinyamata omwe anali nawo pamaphunzirowa Ivy Mikuku ayamikira bungweli kamba kachikonzerochi ndipo alonjeza kuti iwo agwira ntchito yolangiza achinyamata anzawo ndi cholinga choti akhale ndi miyoyo yotukuka. Bungweli linakonza maphunzirowa kudzera mu pulojekiti ya Youth Economic Empowerment ndi thandizo la ndalama zochokera ku bungweli mdziko la Italy ndi cholinga chofuna kufikira  achinyamata ndi maupangiri osiyanasiyana okhuza ubereki kuphatikizanso kuwazindikiritsa zamomwe angachitire pothetsa mchitidwe wosalana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Okwiya Amenya Ndi Kupha Amuna Awiri ku Chikwawa
news: Anthu okwiya ku Nchalo boma la Chikwawa amenya ndi kupha mwamuna wina atamupeza ndi mbuzi zomwe akuganizira kuti ndizobedwa. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa, Dickson Matemba wauza Radio Maria kuti anthu a m’mudzi wa Sekeni ku Nchalo anagwira Semion Mola ndi Sailesi Kalidozo ndi kuwalanga okha mpaka kuvulala modetsa nkhawa. Atawatengera ku chipatala cha boma la Chikwawa, Mora anamwalira atangofika naye pa chipatalachi ndipo mnzakeyo ali mwakayakaya pa chipatala chomwechi. Padakali pano, apolisi m’bomali adzudzula m’chitidwewu ponena kuti anthu opezeka akulanga okha anthu okuba adzayimbidwa mlandu. Semion Mora amachokera m’mudzi wa Bereu ndipo Sailesi Kalidozo ndi amachokera m’mudzi wa Chambuluka onsewa kwa Mfumu yaikulu Maseya m’boma lomweli la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mtambo Wadzudzula Khalidwe la Kuba Pakati Pa Ogwira Ntchito M’boma
news: Nduna yoona za zophunzitsa anthu ndi kulimbikitsa umodzi m’dziko a Timothy Mtambo adzuzudzula mkhalidwe wakuba chuma cha boma pakati pa ogwira ntchito m’boma zomwe akuti zikubwezera dziko lino m’mbuyo. Ndunayi yanena izi lachinayi ku likulu la bungwe la Center for Social Concern ku St Francis Parish ku Area 25 ku Lilongwe, pomwe bungweli limakondwelera mwapadera tsiku loganizira anthu a pa ntchito, International Labour Day, lomwe limakumbukiridwa pa 3 May chaka chilichonse. A Mtambo anati kusalabadira mavuto a dziko komwe ogwira ntchito m’boma ambiri amachita kukuyenera kuthelatu kuti dziko lino lipite patsogoli. Ndunayi inawonjezera kunena kuti nthawi yakwana kuti a Malawi aziima ndikukana zachibwana pakati pa ogwira ntchito m’boma zomwe ati zikuwonongetsa misonkho yomwe anthu amapereka yomwe ikanatha kugwira ntchito zofunikira. “Wina aliyense amene akugwira pa mpando penapake adziwe kuti ndi servant ndipo ngati ukufuna kulemera kobwera si m’boma ayi chofunika ndi kupanga business, m’boma ndi Utumiki kwa anthu,” anatero Mtambo. A Mtambo anati motsutsana ndi momwe anthu ena amaganizira kuti andale ndiwo amaba ndalama za boma, ogwira ntchito mu nthambi za boma ndi omwe ali patsogolo kuba misonkho ya a Malawi yomwenso amayipereka movutikira. Ndunayi inati kudzera mu ntchito yosintha kagwiridwe ka ntchito m’boma, Public Service Reforms, boma liwonetsetsa kuti ogwira ntchito ake asintha kachitidwe kawo ka zinthu. Polankhulapo moyimira chipani cha Ansembe cha Missionaries of Africa, Bambo Joseph Kuppens anati mkhalidwe omalemekeza mopitirira muyeso pa ntchito ndiwo ukulepheretsa kukwanilitsa maloto ambiri a m’dziko lino. Bambo Kuppens omwenso anayambitsa bungwe la Center for Social Concern m’chaka cha 2002 anatsindika kuti sakufuna kudzetsa ka mzimu kosalemekezana pa ntchito koma kuti a Malawi akuyenera kuwona malire a ulemu omwe ayenera kupereka kwa akuluakulu awo a pantchito posafuna kudziika okha mu ukapolo. Iwo anati ngati anthu angazindikire ndikumvetsa kuti atsogoleri adziko ndi otumikira, anthu adzayamba kuzindikira kufunika kogwilira ntchito limodzi ndi atsogoleriwa pofuna kukwanilitsa zofuna za dziko lino. Kafukufuku akuti akuonetsa kuti a Malawi ambiri akugwira ntchito m’malo osakhala bwino ngakhale boma ndi mabungwe oti si aboma akuyesetsa kufuna kukonza zinthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi Mtsogoleri Wa Dziko La Switzerland
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi mtsogoleri wadziko la Switzerland. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, lachinayi Papa wachita zokambirana ndi president Guy Parmelin ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatica. Mzokambirana zawo, atsogoleri awiriwa ati akhutira ndi ubale wabwino omwe ulipo pakati pa likulu la mpingo wa katolika ndi dziko la Switzerland ndipo ati maiko awiriwa apitiriza kugwirizana pa nkhani zosiyana-siyana. Papa Francisco wayamikira dziko la Switzerland chifukwa chodzipereka kutumiza chaka ndi chaka asilikali, Swiss Guards, ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika. Ku mapeto kwa mkumano wawo, atsogoleri awiriwa anasinthana mphatso. Pambuyo pokumana ndi Papa Francisco, President Parmelin anachitanso zokambirana ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika, Cardinal Secretary of State Pietro Parolin komanso mkulu wa ofesi yoona za ubale wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ndi maiko ena, Vatican’s Secretary for Relations with States, Archbishop Paul Gallagher. Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika lidakhazikitsa ubale wa ukazembe ndi dziko la Switzerland m’chaka cha 1586.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Asilikali Aku Vatican Kukhala A Ulemu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha asilikali aku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican kuti akhale a ulemu komanso olandira bwino alendo. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, Papa wanena izi pa mwambo wolumbiritsa asilikali omwe angoyamba kumene ntchito yaw ku likulu la mpingowu. Papa ndi asilikali ake Iye wati makhalidwe abwino a asilikaliwa amapereka chithunzi chabwino cha mpingo wa katolikali kwa alendo ankhaninkhani omwe amafika ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika-li. Papa Francisco wauza asilikali atsopanowa za mbiri yabwino yomwe anzao m’mbuyomu akhala akudziwika nayo komanso za asilikaliwa anzawo omwe m’mbuyomu akhala akuyika miyoyo yawo pa chiswe poteteza a Papa osiyana-siyana. Iye wati kusankha kukhala msilikali ndi chiyitanidwe chapadera monga m’mene anthu amayitanidwira kukhala ansembe kapena kusankha moyo wa banja. Pamenepa Papa’yu wauza asilikali’wa za kufunika kodzipereka kwa thunthu m’manja the mwa Ambuye Yesu ndi kukhala anthu okhulupirika. Gulu la asilikali a nkhondowa lodziwika kuti Pontifical Swiss Guards lidayamba pa 22 January m’chaka cha 1506 ndi cholinga chofuna kuteteza Papa yemwe alipo pa nthawiyo komanso kupereka chitetezo ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ku Vatican. Asilikaliwa amachokera m’dziko la Switzerland n’chifukwa chake amatchulidwa kuti Swiss Guards ndipo amakhala atamaliza maphunziro a ntchito ya usilikali kwaoko. Amayenera kukhala m’nyamata yemwe ndi m’Katolika, wophunzira bwino ndipo wa zaka za pakati pa 19 ndi 30. Pambali poteteza Papa iwo amaperekanso ulemu wa chisilikali, guard of honour, kwa alendo olemekezeka ngati atsogoleri a maiko omwe amakacheza ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mafumu Atenge Gawo Posamala Zachilengedwe-Tembo
news: Nduna yowona za chilengedwe mayi Nancy Tembo apempha mafumu a mdera la mfumu yaikulu Mpando m’boma la Ntcheu kuti akhale ndi udindo wofotokozera anthu mderali za kufunika koteteza ndi kusamalira za chilengedwe. Mayi Tembo ayankhula izi lachinayi pambuyo poyendera nkhalango ya Dzonzi-Vayi komanso Mpira Dam, zomwe zili m’bomali. Iwo ati kuti chilengedwe chisamalidwe bwino, anthu akuyenera kupewa kudula mitengo komanso kuwotcha makala. “Pomwe tikuzakhazikitsa project-yi kunoko tikufuna chilengedwechi chibwelere mchimake. Tayankhula ndi mafumu ndipo takhazikitsa njira zomwe zithandize anthu kuti asapitire kudula mitengoyi,” anatero mayi Tembo. Poyankhulapo mkulu mu ofesi  yowona za nkhalango m’bomali a Donex Mtambo anati anthu oposa 600 analowerera malo ankhalangoyi pomwe amalima mbewu zawo komwe kumachokera madzi mu nkhalangoyi. mkulu mu ofesi  yowona za madzi a onances Luka Nyirenda anati Pali chiwopsezo choti vuto la kusowa kwa madzi litha kufalikira m’madera ambiri a bomali ngati mchitidwe wolima mu mtsinjewu ungapitilire. Izi zikudza potsatira ntchito yomwe ikuyembekezeka kukhazikitsidwa m’mboma la ntcheu kudzera mu undunawu ndi cholinga chofuna kuwonetsetsa kuti anthu akuteteza ndi kusamalira zachilengedwe. Nkhalango ya Dzonzi Vai inakhazikitsidwa mchaka cha 1924 ndipo ilindi ma hectares okwana 500, ma ekala 400 alowereredwa ndi anthu ndipo izi zazetsa vuto lakusowa kwa madzi a m’maboma a Ntcheu ndi Balaka.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akatswiri Alangiza Alimi Kusamala Zokolora Zawo
news: Akatswiri pa nkhani za ulimi mdziko alangiza alimi kuti asamale chimanga pochiwumitsa bwino asanachithire mankhwala. M’modzi mwa akatswiriwa a Tamani Nkhono Mvula ndi omwe anena izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo alangizanso alimiwa kuti asamale zokolora zawo pogulitsa zokolorazo pa mitengo yovomerezeka ndi boma. “Chinthu chofunika ndichokuti chimangachi chikhale chouma bwino chisanalowe m’matumba kapena kupita munkhokwe, tichotonore bwino ndikuchithira mankhwala,” anatero Mvula. A Nkhono alangizanso anthu kuphika mosamala zakudya makamaka pa zikondwelero zosiyanasiyana, popewa kuwononga zakudya.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chilima Wati Ndi Wokhutira Ndi Zitukuko Zomwe Zikuchitika M’boma La Chikwawa
news: Wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Saulos Chilima wati ndi wokhutira ndi ntchito zomangamanga zimene khonsolo ya boma la Chikwawa ikugwira. Iye wanena izi atayendera ntchito za kusintha kwa kagwiridwe ka ntchito m’boma ku khonsolo ya Chikwawa. Chilima anakonza ulendowu pofuna kuwona mmene makhonsolo a maboma a Chikwawa ndi Nsanje akugwilira ntchito zawo m’magawo a zaulimi, zamaphunziro zaumoyo ndi zomangamanga. Pa zomangamanga, Chilima wati ndi wokhutira ndi m’mene ntchito yomanga msika wa Dyeratu ku Chikwawa ikuyendera. Ngakhale izi zili chomwechi, wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleriyu wapempha amene akugwira ntchitoyi kuti awonetsetse kuti ayike zipangizo zokwanira zolimbikitsa ukhondo mu msikawu. Iye wati kudzera mu unduna wake, boma liwonenetsa kuti makhonsolo akuyaliratu mapulani a ntchito zachitukuko moganizira kukula kwa chiwerengero cha anthu mtsogolo. “Ndi khonsolo ya Chikwawa tagwirizana kuti mapulani a kuno apitilire aakhale patsologolo. Zimenezi tikonzekeretu ndi cholinga chakuti ndalama zikamapezeka, mapulani azikhala alipo kale” anatero Chilima. Zina mwa ntchito zomwe boma likugwira ku chigwa cha mtsinje Shire ndi monga; kumanga msewu wa Chikwawa-Chapananga-Mwanza, ulimi wa mthilira pansi pa Shire Valley Transformation Project, msika wa Dyeratu kungotchulapo mwa zina. Ntchito yomanga msika wa Dyeratu ikuyembekezereka kufika kumapeto mwezi wa October chaka chino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dayosizi Ya Dedza Yasintha Ena Mwa Maudindo Ake
news: Dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Dedza yasintha ena mwa maudindo ake. Malinga ndi kalata yomwe mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za dayosiziyo mosinyo John Chithonje alemba, maudindowa ndi a woyendetsa seminale yaying’ono ya St. Kizito ndi ena ochepa. Mwazina, bambo Mathews Chimtendere asankhidwa kukhala wogwirizira udindo wa mkulu wa seminale-yi pomwe bambo Paul Kunkumbira ndi wotsatira wawo. Alemba kalatayo-bambo Chithonje Bambo Joseph Kapalasa asankhidwa kukhala mphunzitsi ku seminale-yi ndipo bambo Peter Kosonkanji awatumiza ku seminaleyi kukhala mkulu owona za uzimu. Padakalipano bambo Peter Chifukwa awatumiza ku parishi ya St. Joseph Chiphwanya kukhala bambo mthandizi komanso mkulu owona za malamulo mu dayosiziyi ndipo bambo Joseph Billiat awasankha kukhala mlangizi wa bungwe la abwenzi a Radio Maria Malawi mu dayosiziyo. Pamenepa monsinyo Chithonje ati maudindowa ayamba kugwira ntchito pompano.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CAF Yasintha Masiku Oyambira Mpikisano wa FIFA
news: Bungwe lomwe limayendetsa masewero a mpira wa miyendo mu Africa la Confederation Africa Football (CAF), lasintha masiku omwe maiko amu Africa amayenera kuyamba masewero odzigulira malo mu mpikisano wa padziko lonse la pansi. Malinga ndi chikalata chomwe bungwe la CAF latulusa lero, kusinthaku kwadza bungweli litakambirana ndi bungwe lomwe limayang’anira masewerowa pa dziko lonse la FIFA ndipo ati izi zachitika kaamba ka mavuto ena omwe adza ndi mliri wa COVID-19. Masewerowa asinthidwa kuchoka mwezi wa June 2021 kufika miyezi ya September, October, November chaka chino ndi kuzatsiriza mwezi wa March 2022. Zimenezi zithanso kupereka mwayi ku bungwe lomwe limayendetsa masewero a mpira wa miyendo mdziko muno la Football Association of Malawi (FAM) kuti lisankhenso bwalo lina la zamasewero ndi kulikonza bwino kuti masewero a timu ya Flames adzathe kuchitikira ku Malawi, osati kunja kwa dziko lino momwe lidanenera bungwe la CAF kuti bwalo la Kamuzu mu mzinda wa Blantyre lomwe bungwe la FAM lidasankha kuti Flames izidzasewelerapo masewero ake,  ndi losayenera kuchitikira masewerowa malinga ndi malamulo a bungwe la CAF.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Komiti Yati A Malawi Asadere Nkhawa ndi Mliri wa COVID-19
news: Komiti yowona za mliri za mliri wa Covid-19 mdziko muno yati a Malawi asadere nkhawa pa za kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akupezeka ndi kachirombo ka Corona mdziko muno. Nkhoma: Anthuwo tawayika pa m’bindikiro M’modzi mwa apampando a komitiyi Dr. Chalamira Nkhoma ndi omwe anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi ndipo ati a Malawi asawope kaamba koti anthu omwe apezeka ndi kachiromboka ndi obwera komanso ali m’malo amodzi choncho akusungidwa m’malo opatulidwa ndi a unduna wa zaumoyo. Komabe iwo ati anthu akuyenera apitirize kutsatira njira zopewera mliriwu ndi cholinga choti usapitilire kufala. “Pakatipa chiwerengerocho chinazawoneka kuti chakwererapo kaamba ka gulu la ogwira ntchito pa kampani ya Salima shuga omwe achokera mdziko la India komanso akayidi ena ku ndende ya Chichiri, koma padakali pano ngati boma lawayika anthuwa pa m’bindikiro kuti asapatsire ena,” anatero Dr. Nkhoma. Ngakhale zili chomwechi Dr. Nkhoma apempha a Malawi kuti apitirize kutsatira njira zopewera mliriwu ponena kuti ichi ndi chidziwitso kuti mliriwu ulipobe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Atulutsa Kalata Yokhazikitsa Utumiki Wa Ugulupa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kutulutsa kalata yokhazikitsa utumiki wa u gulupa. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, kalatayi ikuyembekezeka kutulutsidwa lachiwiri sabata ya mawa. Ofesiyi yati kalatayi idzatulutsidwa pa msonkhano wa atolankhani ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican ndipo mtsogoleri wa bungwe la a Papa la Pontifical Council for the Promotion of the New Evangelization, Archbishop Rino Fisichella ndi amene adzatsogolere msonkhano wa atolankhaniwu. Mutu wa kalatayi ndi Antiquum ministerium ‘m’chilatini’, kutanthauza kuti utumiki wa kalekale. Kalatayi ikulimbikitsa mfundo za msonkhano wa Vatican Council II maka polimbikitsa udindo womwe akhristu eni ake ali nawo pofalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso. Mu mpingo wa katolika mgulupa ndi munthu yemwe amaphunzitsa anthu ena zomwe mpingowu umatsata ndi kukhulupirira. Kalekale a gulupa anali ansembe kapena anthu a m’zipani za mu mpingo, koma masiku ano a gulupa ndi akhristu eni ake omwe amadzipereka pa kutumikira akhristu anzawo mu njira zosiyana-siyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Mkulu Watsopano Olondoloza Chuma ku Vatican
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha Alessandro Cassinis Righini kukhala mkulu watsopano olondoloza momwe chuma chimagwilira ntchito ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Wasankhidwa pa udindowo-Righini Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, lachitatu Papa wavomereza Righini kukhala pa udindowu atagwira ntchito mogwirizira pa udindowu kuyambira m’chaka cha 2017 pomwe analowa m’malo mwa Libero Milone yemwe anali pa udindowu kwa zaka ziwiri kuyambira 2015 mpaka 2017. Righini ndi munthu wophunzira bwino komanso ndi katswiri pa nkhani za chuma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Misika Ya Zachuma Iganizire Anthu Wamba-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha anthu omwe amayendetsa za chuma kuti aziganizira anthu osauka. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, Papa wapereka pempholi pomwe amapereka cholinga cha mapemphero ake a mwezi uno wa May. Cholinga cha mapemphero a Papa mwezi uno ndi kupemphelera mabungwe ndi anthu omwe amayendetsa nkhani za chuma kuti pogwira ntchito yawo aziganizira anthu wamba omwe akukumana ndi mavuto osiyana-siyana tsiku ndi tsiku. Papa wadandaula kuti anthu ambiri ali mu umphawi wadzaoneni pamene misika ya za chuma ikupeza phindu losaneneka ndipo wati phindu lochulukali likuyenera kuthandiza anthu omwe akuvutika mu umphawi. Iye wati ndi kofunika kuti misika ya za chuma iziika umunthu mu bizinesi zawo ndipo wati ndi udindo wa boma m’maiko osiyana-siyana kuonetsetsa kuti misika ya za chumayi ikuchita choncho.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alipira Chindapusa Kaamba Kogula Katundu Wobedwa
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Dowa lalamula amuna awiri kuti apereke chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 40, sauzande kwacha aliyense, kulephera apo akakhale ku ndende kwa miyezi khumi atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu ogula katundu yemwe akuganiziridwa kuti ndi obedwa. Woyimira boma pa mlandu Joseph Banda anauza bwaloli kuti abambowa Emmanuel Siliya komanso Chifundo Chunga pa 25 January chaka chino anapezeka ndi batile la galimoto lomwe likuganiziridwa kuti linabedwa ndipo analephera kupereka zikalata zowayenereza kupezeka ndi katunduyo. Atawonekera ku bwalo la milandu, awiriwo anapezeka olakwa ndipo popereka chigamulo chake First Grade Magistrate Amran Phiri anati wapereka chilango choterechi kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. M’boma lomweli, bwalo la milandu lalamulanso mamuna wina wa zaka 26 kuti apereke chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 50 sauzande kwacha kulephera apo akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa miyezi khumi atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu ovulaza munthu. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Joseph Banda anati bamboyu Golden Jumbe pa 15 April chaka chino anavulaza m’nyamata wina wa zaka 14, Makaiko Kaunda pomwe anamupeza akudula mitengo pa malo omwe akuti ndi ake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Peter Banda a Lilongwe Archdiocese Amwalira
news: Likulu la mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno lalengeza za imfa ya bambo Peter Jester Banda omwe amataumikira mu archdiocese ya Lilongwe. Amwalira ndi COVID-19 – bambo Banda Malinga ndi kalata yomwe yasyinidwa ndi mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno bambo Henry Saindi, bambo Banda amwalira dzulo ku chipatala cha Kamuzu Central mu mzinda wa Lilongwe atadwala nthenda ya COVID-19. Misa yotsanzikana ndi malemuwa ichitika mawa ku Maula Cathedral mu archdiocese-yo nthawi ya 8 koloko m’mawa ndipo pambuyo pake thupi la malemuwa likayikidwa m’manda ku Likuni. Ndondomeko zonse zopewera nthenda ya COVID-19 zizatsatidwa ku mwambowu. Mzimu wa bambo Peter Jester Banda uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Adzachita Misa Yopemphelera Dziko La Myanmar
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco adzachita misa yopempherera dziko la Myanmar pa mavuto a za ndale omwe dzikoli likukumana nawo padakali pano. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, ofesi yomwe imawona zochitikachitika za a Papa za tsiku ndi tsiku, the Prefecture of the Papal Household, yati misayi ikuyembekezeka kudzachitika loweruka sabata ya mawa kuyambira nthawi ya 10 koloko m’mawa ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Masiku apitawa Papa anapempha akatolika kupemphelera dzikoli kupatula kupempha chithandizo cha Mulungu pa mliri wa Covid-19 kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria. Pa 1 February chaka chino asilikali analanda boma la dziko la Myanmar ati posakhutira ndi momwe chisankho chinayendera m’dzikolo mwezi wa November chaka chatha, ngakhale  bungwe loyendetsa chisankho m’dzikolo linati chisankhocho chinayenda mwa chilungamo Anthu m’dzikolo akhala akuchita zionetsero zosonyeza kusakondwa ndi zomwe anachita asilikaliwa ndipo malipoti ati anthu pafupi 1000 aphedwa ndipo ena amangidwa pa zionetserozi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Anjata Mzika Zinayi Za Mdziko La Mozambique
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mulanje akusunga mchitokosi mzika zinayi za mdziko la Mozambique kaamba kokhala mdziko muno opanda chilolezo. Malinga ndi wofalitsa za apolisi m’bomali Gresham Ngwira, anthu akufuna kwabwino ndi omwe anatsina khutu apolisiwa kuti anthu ena a mdziko la Mozambique akukhala m’madera ena m’bomalo. Ngwira: Tikuthokoza anthu aku Mulanje Ngwira wati padakali pano mzikazi azitsekulira mlandu wokhala mdziko muno opanda zikalata zowayenereza omwe ndi osemphana ndi malamulo a nthambi yowona zolowa ndi zotuluka mdziko muno. “Tikuthokoza anthu aku Mulanje omwe timagwira nawo bwino ntchito pa nkhani yothetsa milandu ndiponso makamaka anthu amene anatsina khutu pa nkhaniyi. Anthuwa awiri apezeka ku Mathambi pomwe awiri enanso apezeka ku Mloza komwe amakhala. Koma titawafunsa akanaika kupereka zikalata zowayenereza kukhala mdziko muno ndipo ndi chifukwa chake tawamanga,” anatero Ngwira. Padakalipano anthuwa akusungidwa pa ndende ya boma la Mulanje ndipo Ngwira wati apolisiwa akulumikizana ndi a nthambi yowona zolowa ndi kutuluka mdziko muno ndi cholinga choti anthuwa azengedwe mlandu mu nthawi yake ndi kulandira chilango choyenera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Asadere Nkhawa Ndi Kusintha Mtundu Kwa Madzi mu Nyanja ya Malawi-Unduna
news: Unduna owona za chilengedwe wati anthu mdziko muno asadere nkhawa kaamba ka madzi a mu nyanja ya Malawi omwe akusintha mtundu kukhala obiliwira ponena kuti padakalipano zilibe vuto kwenikweni ku miyoyo ya anthu. Mkulu wa nthambi yowona za ulimi wa nsomba mu undunawu, a Friday Njaya auza Radio Maria Malawi kuti vutoli limachitika mphepo ya mwera ikawomba kwa masiku ochuluka pa nyanja ndipo ati zimenezi zakhala zikuchitikaponso m’zaka za m’mbuyomu.  Madzi a mu nyanja ya Malawi akuwoneka motere m’madera ena Iwo ati padakalipano madziwa ayamba kubwelera mchimake koma pali chiyembekezeo kuti zitha kuchitikanso kaamba ka nyengo ya mphepo yomwe yayamba mdziko muno. “Izizi sizachilendo chifukwa mchaka cha 2013 zinachitikapo komanso mchaka cha 1999. Zimenezi zimachitika mphepo ya mwera ikawomba kwambiri pa nyanja ndiye ndere zonse za pansi zimafukuka ndi kupita pamwamba zomwe zimachititsa kuti madziwa akhale green. Monga tikudziwa kuti sabata zingapo zapitazi mphepo yawomba kwambiri ndiye kuti izi zinali zoyembekezereka ndipo poti miyezi ino ya May, June ndi July ndi ya mphepo zimenezi zitha kuchitikanso kutsogoloku koma padakalipano malipoti atisonyeza kuti madzi akubwelera mchimake,” anatero a Njaya. Pamenepa a Njaya ati vutoli si lalikulu kwenikweni chifukwa nsomba sizinayambe kufa zokha pa nyanjayi ngati momwe zimachitikira nthawi zina. “Madzi amenewa ndi owopsa kuti ukakasamba mu nyanjamo umamva kuyabwa mthupi koma pena zimafika nsomba kumafa zokha ndipo zikatero timawalangiza anthu kuti asadye nsomba zokufa zokha koma padakalipano anthu tingowauza kuti apewe kusamab mu nyanjamu,” anatero a Njaya.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Othandizira Misa M’dziko La Portugal Apitilire Kudzipereka Pa Utumiki Wawo
news: Papa Francisco walankhula ndi achinyamata othandizira Misa a m’dzikol la Portugal, kudzera mwa President wa bungwe la maepiskopi a Mpingo wa Katolika m’dzikolo lowona za chipembedzo ndi moyo wa uzimu, Ambuye José Manuel Garcia Cordeiro. Papa Francisco watumiza uthengawu mogwirizana ndi ulendo omwe achinyamata othandizira Misa a m’dzikolo anali nawo masiku apitawa wokapemphera ku malo oyera otchedwa Shrine of Our Lady of Fatima. Papa Francisko ndi anyamata othandizira Misa Mu uthengawu, iye wapempha othandizira Misa a m’dziko la Portugal kuti apitilire kudzipereka pa utumiki wawo ndipo wawalimbikitsa kuti apitirize kuonetsa mphatso zawo zosiyana-siyana pomwe akutumikira Mulungu ngati othandizira Misa. Papa Francisco wauza achinyamatawa kuti ndi anthu a mwayi popeza amakhala pafupi ndi guwa losandulitsira buledi ndi vinyo kukhala thupi ndi magazi a Ambuye Yesu ndipo pa chifukwa ichi iye wati ndi kofunika kuti azikhala anthu a makhalidwe abwino ogwirizana ndi zomwe achita pa guwa. Iye wati ndi kofunika kuti azitengera zitsanzo zabwino za anthu oyera omwe anali achinyamata monga Francisco Marto Woyera m’nyamata wa ku Fatima yemwe ndi nkhoswe yao. Papa Francisco wamaliza uthengawu ndi kudalitsa achinyamatawa komanso kuwaikiza m’manja mwa Yosefe Woyera nkhoswe ya Mpingo wonse wa Katolika kuti aziwateteza nthawi zonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi Nduna Yowona Za Ubale Wa Dziko La Iraq Ndi Maiko Ena
news: Mkulu wa ofesi yofalitsa mauthenga ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican, Matteo Bruni watsimikizira atolankhani za mkumano wa Papa Francisco lolemba ndi nduna yowona za ubale wa dziko la Iraq ndi maiko ena, Fuad Hussein ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Papa ndi Hussein (kumanja) pa mkumano wawo Bruni wati zokambirana pakati pa Papa Francisco ndi ndi nduna’yi zinatenga pafupi mphindi makumi atatu (30). Mwa zina Papa Francisco wauza ndunayi kuti akukumbukira bwino za ulendo wake wokacheza m’dzikolo posachedwapa komanso chimwemwe chosasimbika chomwe anthu adamuwonetsa pa ulendowu. Kudzera mwa nduna’yi, Papa Francisco wafunira anthu a m’dziko la Iraq zabwino zonse ndipo wati ali ndi chiyembekezo kuti anthu m’dzikolo apitilira kugwirizana komanso kusamalirana wina ndi mzake. Papa Francisco adakacheza m’dziko la Iraq kuyambira pa 5 mpaka pa 8 March chaka chonchino ndipo iye ndi Papa woyamba kukacheza m’dziko la Iraq.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Amayi Akhale Odzidalira pa Chuma-CADECOM
news: Bungwe la Catholic Development Commission in Malawi (CADECOM) mu dayosizi ya Mangochi latumiza amayi ndi atsikana omwe anakhudzidwapo ndi nkhanza zosinasiyana pa moyo wawo ku maphunziro a utelala. Amayi kuphunzira kusoka Malinga ndi mlangizi wa bungweli mayi Tapiwa Machinjiri Gama, amayi ndi atsikanawa alipo asanu ndi atatu ochokera m’madera a mafumu aakulu anayi a m’boma la Machinga ndipo awatumiza ku sukulu ya Andiamo Technical College m’boma la Balaka komwe ayamba kuphunzira kusoka zovala pogwirtsa ntchito makina osokera. Mayi Gama ati bungwe la CADECOM laganiza zothandiza amayiwa ndi lusoli ndi cholinga choti akabwelera azikatha kuchita bizinesi yosoka zovala kwinaku akudzidalira okha chuma komanso  akagawanana luso lomwe apezalo ndi amayi anzawo ku magulu omwe akuchokera. “Maphunzirowa abwera mu nthawi yake pomwe bungwe la CADECOM ku Mangochi lapeza kuti amayi ambiri amakumana ndi nkhanza zosiyanasiyana kaamba koti nthawi zambiri amakhala akusowa zochita choncho maphunzirowa athandiza kuteteza amayiwa ku nkhanza zosiyanasiyana zomwe amakumana nazo,” anatero mayi Gama. Amayi kuwonetsa zovala zomwe asoka Polankhula atakayendera maphunziro omwe amayiwa akuchita, mkulu mu ofesi yowona za kusasiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo m’boma la Machinga, mayi Erita Sukasuka athokoza bungwe la CADECOM kaamba kotumiza amayiwa ku sukulu ya luso la ntchito za manja kuti akaphunzire luso la utelala. “Inutu amayi mwadala chifukwa mupeza luso lapamwamba ndikupempheni kuti musabwelere m’mbuyo koma muwonetsetse kuti luso la utelala lomwe mupezelo likakufikitseni penapake,” anatero mayi Sukasuka. Pomaliza mayi Sukasuka apempha bungweli kuti lipitirizebe kuthandiza amayiwa m’paka atafika pa mulingo wabwino woti atha kudziyimira pawokha monga momwe bungweli likufunira. Bungwe la CADECOM mu dayosizi ya Mangochi kudzera mu project ya Spotlight Initiative ndi thandizo la ndalama zochokera ku bungwe la Europian Union (EU) linakhadzikitsa magulu a amayi ndi atsikana omwe anakhudzidwapo kale ndi nkhanza zosiyanasiyana m’madera asanu ndi anayi a mafumu akuluakulu a m’boma la Machinga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Atsekulira Mwezi wa Amayi Maria
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Fransisco akuyembekezeka kutsekulira mwezi wa Amayi Mariya loweruka pa 1 May. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, cholinga cha mweziwu ndi kupempha chithandizo cha Mulungu pa mliri wa Covid-19 kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria. Papa wapempha a katolika pa dziko lonse kuti apemphere zolimba mwezi umenewu ndi cholinga choti mliri wa Coronavirus utheretu kuti moyo ubwelerenso m’chimake. Malipoti ati Papa adzatsogolera mapemphero a kolona otsekulira mwezi wa Amayi Maria kuchokera mu tchalitchi chaching’ono cha Gregorian Chapel chopezeka mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica nthawi ya 6 koloko madzulo ndipo a katolika pa dziko lonse ali ndi mwayi wodzatsatira mapempherowa kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Pa mwambowu, Papa adzadalitsa makolona makumi atatu omwe atumizidwe ku malo oyera akuluakulu makumi atatu m’maiko osiyana-siyana momwe muzichitikira mapemphero a kolona tsiku ndi tsiku. Ntchito yolimbikitsa a katolika pa dziko lonse kupemphera mowirikiza mu mwezi wa May ikugwiridwa ndi bungwe la a Papa la Pontifical Council for Promoting the New Evangelization.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhuzidwa Ndi Imfa ya Cardinal wa Mdziko la South Korea
news: Papa Fransinco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ya Cardinal Nicholas Cheong Jin-Suk wa mdziko la South Korea. Malemu Cardinal Jin-Suk Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi mu uthenga wake wopepesa potsatira imfa ya Cardinal-yu. Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfayi kaamba ka ntchito yotamandika yomwe Cardinal Cheong Jin-suk wakhala akugwira kwa nthawi yaitali ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican komanso m’dziko la South Korea. “Ndine wa chisoni chachikulu kumva za imfa ya Cardinal Cheong Jin-suk ndipo pa chifukwa ichi ndi kupepesa inu Cardinal Andrew Yeom Soo-jung, ansembe, a sisitere a bulazala ndi akhristu eni ake ndipo ndi kukutsimikizirani za mapemphero anga pa nthawi yovutayi,” watero Papa mu uthengawu. Cardinal Cheong Jin-suk yemwe anali Archbishop wopuma wa archdiocese ya Seoul wamwalira lachiwiri pa 27 April, 2021 ali ndi zaka 89 atadwala matenda okhudzana ndi ukalamba. Mzimu wa Cardinal Nicholas Cheong Jin-suk uuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chilima Wati Ndi Wokhumudwa Ndi Kampani Ya Zomangamanga Ya Nangaunozge
news: Wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Saulos Chilima wapereka masiku khumi ndi anayi ku kampani ya zomangamanga ya Nangaunozge kuti ikhale itasamutsa ogwira ntchito ake amene akukhala mkalasi za sukulu zomwe kampaniyi imamanga m’boma la Machinga. Iye wanena izi pamene anayendera gawo lachiwiri la ntchito yomanga sukulu ya sekondale yogonera komweko ya Machinga, yomwe kampaniyi ikumanganso. Chilima ndi ena mwa akulu akulu a kampani ya Nangaunozge Polankhula pa mwambowu Paramount Chief Kawinga anayamba ndi kudandaula kuti kampani yomwe ikugwira ntchitoyi inapatsidwanso ntchito yomanga sukulu zisanu za pulaimale m’bomalo koma ngakhale anatsiriza kugwira ntchitoyi chaka chatha, ogwira ntchito ake akukhalabe mkalasizo zomwe zikuchititsa kuti ana alephere kugwiritsa ntchito kalasizo pa maphunziro. Poyankhapo pa dandauloli wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu walamula kampaniyi kuti ikhale itasamutsa ogwira ntchito akewa pasanathe sabata ziwiri ndi cholinga choti ana ayambe kuphunzira mkalasi zomwe zinamangidwazo. Polankhulapo pa za ntchito yomwe kampani yomweyi ikugwira yomanga sukulu ya sekondale ya Machinga, Dr. Chilima anati ndi osakhutira ndi ntchito yomwe kampaniyi ikugwira kaamba koti ikuchedwa komanso ndi yosalongosoka. Mwachitsanzo, iwo anati ndi zosamveka kuti kampaniyi imange kitchen yophikira chakudya opanda malo odyera ophunzira komanso anakambapo za kuchedwa kutsiriza ntchitoyi pamene ndalama zonse anapatsidwa. Malinga ndi mphunzitsi wamkulu pa sukuluyi, kaamba ka kuchedwa kutsiriza kumanga nyumba zogona ophunzira pa sukuluyi, anyamata a fomu 1 akugona mu holo pamene anyamata ena akugona ma hostel ena omwe ali gawo la atsikana zomwenso akuti zikukolezera mchitidwe wa zibwenzi pa sukulupa. Pamenepa Dr. Chilima anati ndi zosamveka kuti ophunzira aamuna ndi aakazi adzigona moyandikana chotere potengera chikhalidwe cha chiMalawi komanso malamulo a unduna wa zamaphunziro mdziko muno ndipo Dr. Chilima apereka miyezi iwiri ku kampaniyi kuti ikhale itatsiriza ntchito yonse pa malowa ndipo adzakayenderanso malowa pa 2 July chaka chino. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu ku kampani ya zomangamanga ya Nangaunozge anakana kuyankhulapo ndipo m’malo mwake anati tiyankhule ndi a ku unduna wa zamaphunziro. Koma polankhulapo wachiwiri kwa nduna ya zamaphunziro mdziko muno mayi Madalitso Kambauwa Wirima anati ndi osakondwa ndi zomwe zikuchitika pa malowa ndipo anati apezapo phunziro pa momwe akuyenera kumachitira asanatsekule sukulu. Sukulu ya sekondale ya Machinga ndi sukulu yoyamba ya sekondale yogonera komweko m’boma lonse la Machinga ndipo padakalipano ili ndi ophunzira okwana 352 komanso aphunzitsi okwana 18. Gawo loyamba lomanga sukuluyi lomwe limakhudza kumanga kalasi zophunzilira, laboratory, holo komanso nyumba za aphunzitsi linayamba mchaka cha 2013 ndipo imayembekezeka kutha mchaka cha 2014 koma kaamba ka mavuto ena inatha mchaka cha 2020. Ndipo gawo lachiwiri la ntchitoyi lomwe linali lomanga nyumba zogona ophunzira zokwana khumi ndi ziwiri, kitchini, chigayo komanso bwalo la zamasewero ndipo inali ya ndalama zokwana 1.4-billion-kwacha inayamba mwezi wa July mchaka cha 2018 ndipo imayembekezeka kutha mwezi wa June mchaka cha 2019, koma kufikira pano ntchitoyi siyinathe ndipo malinga ndi akuluakulu a kampaniyo 60% yokha ya ntchitoyi ndi yomwe yagwiridwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha Bungwe La Escom Kuti Lisakweze Mtengo wa Magetsi
news: Komiti ya ku nyumba ya malamulo yowona za chilengedwe yawuza bungwe logawa magetsi m’dziko muno la Electricity Supply Corporation of Malawi (ESCOM), kuti mavuto omwe bungweli likukumana nawo asakhudze nzika za dziko lino pokweza mitengo ya magetsi. Komitiyi yanena izi lachiwiri pomwe imakumana ndi akuluakulu a bungwe la ESCOM komanso a bungwe la Malawi Energy Regulatory Authority (MERA), ndi kukambirana pa za kukwera mtengo wa magetsi komwe bungwe la ESCOM lidachita. Bungwe la ESCOM lidakweza magetsi ndi 10-kwacha pa 100-kwacha iliyonse. Wogwirizira udindo wa mkulu wa bungwe la MERA Ishmael Chiwoko anati anauza bungwe la ESCOM kuti lisakweze kaye magetsiwa kufikira atakambirana ndi magulu ena okhudzidwa ndipo ogwirizira udindo wa mkulu wa bungwe la ESCOM Clement Kanyama anati panalibe uthenga uliwonse womwe bungwe la MERA linapereka ku bungweli kuti ayimitse kaye kukweza mtengo wa magetsiwa ndipo nchifukwa chake bungweli lidapitilira ndi ganizoli. “Patsiku limene limene a MERA adalengeza za kukwera kwa mitengo ya magetsi a MERA anakumana ndi a ESCOM kutsimikiza kuti mitengoyi iyeneradi kukwera kuti ipange address ma challenge amene alipo okhudza magetsi m’Malawi muno,” anatero Kanyama. Iwo udindo ndi mphamvu yokhudzana ndi magetsi ili m’manja mwa a MERA ndipo bungwe la ESCOM silingathe kukambapo kanthu zokhuzana ndi mitengoyi. Bungwe la ESCOM lati ngakhale izi zilichomwechi koma kukweza mtengo wa magetsiwa kuthandizira pakayendetsedwe ka ntchito zina ku bungweli. Izi sizidasangalatse komitiyi ponena kuti kukweza mtengoku chikhala chipsinjo pa a Malawi omwe akuvutika kale ndi mliri wa Covid-19 omwe ambiri akulemphera kupeza ndalama moyenera. Wapampando wa komitiyi a Werani Chilenga anati chapafupi chomwe bungwe la ESCOM likadachita ndikupempha boma kuti liganizire zoyika subsidy pa magetsiwa potengera mavuto omwe a Malawi ambiri akukumana nawo. A Chilenga anati kusagwilitsa bwino ntchito chuma komwe kwakhala kukuchitika ku ESCOM ndiko kukuchititsa kuti azikhala ndi maganizo monga awa. “Chimene chinachitika kuyambira mchaka cha 2015 kufikira chaka cha 2018 nchonena kuti kunali kuwononga ndalama mwakathithi nde a ESCOM, ngongole zimenezo akulephera kubweza kuti alipire EGENCO nde ali ndi njala ya ndalama nchifukwa chache akufuna kuti a Malawi ndi amene aziwalipira ngongole ngati zimenezo nde tikufuna kuti ku ESCOM kukakonzedwa, chilichonse chikakhala m’malo, aMalawi atha kuwamvetsetsa a ESCOM kuti ali ndi mavuto awa, magetsi  atha kukwera.”Anatero a Chilenga. Wapampando wa board ya bungwe la MERA anauza komitiyi kuti ganizo lofuna kuti mitengo yatsopanoyi iyambe kugwira ntchito lidadza potsatira zomwe nduna ya za magetsi idalankhula kunyumba ya malamulo zomwe ma membala akomitiyi anakana ponena kuti ndunayi siidalankhuleko m’nyumbayi pa nkhani yokhudza kukweza mtengoku. Pakadali pano, mabungwe awiriwa ati akhala pansi ndikuwona chitsogolo pa nkhaniyi motsatira zomwe komitiyi yawauza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Kusinkhasinkha Ndi Njira Yopemphelera Ndi Kukumana Ndi Mulungu
news: Popitiriza maphunzitso ake lachitatu pa mutu wa mapemphero, catechesis on prayer, Papa Francisco wati kusinkhasinkha ndi imodzi mwa njira yopemphelera ndi kukhala pafupi ndi Mulungu. Iye wapitirizanso kunena kuti imeneyi ndi njira yomwe anthu ambiri ngakhale omwe si akhristu akugwiritsa ntchito pofuna kupemphera. Papa Francisco wati posinkhasinkha akhristu amapeza danga lodziwa cholinga chenicheni cha moyo wao mounikiridwa ndi Mawu a Mulungu opezeka mu Baibulo. Pamenepa iye watsindika za kufunika koti akhristu azipeza mpata ndi kumasinkhasinkha popeza iyi ndi njira yomwe anthu angathe kukumanirana ndi Mulungu komanso kuzindikira cholinga cha Mulungu powalenga. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti kudzera mu kusinkhasinkha mounikiridwa ndi Mzimu Woyera akhristu amakumana ndi Yesu Khristu komanso kudzidziwa iwo eni.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamikira Asisisteri Achipani Cha Poor Clare
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wayamikira asisitere a chipani cha Poor Clares chifukwa cha mapemphero awo a tsiku ndi tsiku.
