Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa walankhula izi lolemba pa nkumano wake ndi gulu la asisiterewa omwe nyumba yawo idaonongeka ndi chivomerezi m’chaka cha 2009 m’dziko la Italy. Iye wayamikira asisitere’wa chifukwa cha mapemphero awo a tsiku ndi tsiku omupempherera iye ndipo wati kupezeka kwao pakati pa anthu ndi chizindikiro cha cha chiyembekezo chomwe akhristu akuyenera kukhala nacho. Papayu wayamikiranso asisitere’wa kaamba ka mphatso ya kandulo yokongola kwambiri ya Pasaka yomwe ili mu tchalitchi cha ching’ono cha Casa Santa Marta chomwe Papa’yu amachitiramo mapemphero tsiku ndi tsiku ndipon wati Kamba koti asister ena adapulumuka ku ngozi ya chivomereziyi chimenechi ndi chizindikiro cha chikondi cha Mulungu pakati pawo. Chivomerezi cha m’chaka cha 2009 mtauni ya Paganica m’dziko la Italy chidaononga nyumba ya asisitere’wa, kuvulaza asisitere ena komanso ena mwaiwo anamwalira kuphatikizapo amayi mfumu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Otsatira chipani cha MCP asadere nkhawa-Munthali
news: M’neneli wa chipani cha Malawi Congress (MCP) Mauris Munthali wapempha otsatira chipanichi kuti asadele nkhawa kaamba ka kupanda wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleli wa chipanichi kusatila  imfa ya yemwe adali wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa chipanichi a Sidik Mia. A Munthali amayankhula izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi pomwe wayilesiyi imafuna kumva za mbiri zokhuza udindowu. Iwo ati chipani chimakhala  ndi ndondomeko zomwe zimayenera kutsatidwa posankha adindo choncho onse otsatira chipanichi sakuyenera kudela nkhawa chifukwa sikuti ntchito za chipanichi zachita kuyimilatu kaamba kakusowa kwa wachiwili kwa wa pampandoyu ku chipanichi. “Imfa ya a Sidik Mia tizailira mpaka kale chifukwa anali munthu okonda chipani komanso okonda dziko lake choncho tikuyenela kupereka nthawi yokwanira yo walira,osati angomwalila nthawi yomweyonso nkusankha munthu wina paudindowu zikadaonetsa ngati tinali ncholinga,” anatero Munthali. Poyankhulapo m’modzi  mwa akastwiri pa nkhani za ndale mdziko muno a Hamphreys Mvula ati  agwirizana ndi zomwe Mneneli wachipanichi wanena kuti chipani sichikuyenela kukhala ndi mphuma kusankha munthu wina paudindowu Kamba koti ati izi zikhoza kupeleka chithuzi thuzi choyipa kwa anthu. “Ngati chipani pamene munthu yemwe anali paudindo wa mwalira sikuti amangothamangira kusankhanso munthu wina paudindowu ayi, amayenela kupeleka nthawi yokwanira yomulira munthuyo makanso kukumbukila zinchito zomwe adazigwila ali paudindowo kenako mumasatila ndondomeko zomwe chipani chidakhazikitsa zosankhira anthu ena pa udindo,”anatero a Mvula. Yemwe anali wachiwili kwa mstogoreli wa chipani cha MCP Sidik Mia anamwalira mwezi wa January pa chaka chomwechino atadwala nthenda ya Covid-19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Unsembe Si Ntchito
news: Tsiku lamulungu lachinayi mu nyengo ya Pasaka ndi lamulungu la m’busa wabwino, Good Shepherd Sunday komanso ndi lamulungu la chiyitanidwe, Vocations Sunday. Pa tsikuli Papa Francisco wadzodza anyamata asanu ndi anayi kukhala ansembe pa mwambo wa Misa mu tchalitchi lalikulu la Saint Peter’s Basilica ku Vatican. Papa Francisko kudzodza ansembe M’malaliko ake iye wauza achinyamatawa kuti unsembe si ntchito monga ziliri ntchito zina zomwe anthu amalembedwa ndi kumapatsidwa malipiro koma kuti ndi utumiki. Iye wati unsembe ndi mphatso yomwe Mulungu amapereka kwa achinyamata kuti amutumikire mwa njira ya padera ndipo wapempha ansembe atsopanowa kuti nthawi zonse maso awo azikhazikika pa Yesu Khristu. Papa Francisco wauza anyamatawa kuti podzodzedwa ngati ansembe ndiye kuti asanduka Yesu Khristu wina pokhala aphunzitsi, ansembe komanso abusa. Iye wati ansembe amagwira ntchito molumikizana ndi a episkopi awo pogawana unsembe wa Yesu Khristu ndipo wati ntchito yao ndi kulalikira, kuyang’anira akhristu komanso kutsogolera pa miyambo ya chipembedzo makamaka Nsembe ya Ukaristia. Iye wati ansembe akuyenera kukhala anthu a chifundo pa utumiki wao ndipo wamaliza ndi kuchenjeza ansembe ku khalidwe lokondetsetsa ndalama ponena kuti satana amadzera mu msampha wa ndalama pofuna kusokoneza atumiki a Mulungu. Ansembe asanu ndi anayi atsopanowa ndi a dayosizi ya Rome ndipo episkopi wa dayosizi-yi ndi Papa Francisco.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la PRISAM Layambiranso Kugwira Ntchito Zake Mdziko Muno
news: Bungwe loyendetsa sukulu zoyima pazokha mdziko muno la Private Schools Association of Malawi (PRISAM) lati layambiranso ntchito zake mdziko muno ndi cholinga choti zithandizire kukweza ntchito za maphunziro mdziko muno. Dr. Hastings Moloko omwe ndi m’modzi mwa akuluakulu oyendetsa ntchito za bungweli, ati bungweli layambiranso kugwira ntchito zake litayima kugwira ntchitozi kwa kanthawi ngakhale mdziko muno palinso bungwe la sukulu zoyima paokha la Independent Schools Association of Malawi (ISAMA) lomwe ati ndi mwana wa bungweli kaamba koti linatumphuka kuchokera m’bungweli. Iwo anati mabungwe awiriwa athandizana kupititsa patsogolo ntchito yopereka maphunziro apamwamba msukulu zoyima pazokhazi pomwe chiwerengero cha sukulu zoterezi chikukulirakulira mdziko muno. Dr. Moloko: Sukulu zoyima pazokha ndi zambiri “Chapangitsa kuti bungweli lidzukenso ndi choti ntchito ndi yaikulu koma antchito ngochepa, ndiye timafuna kuti ngakhale tikudziwa kuti kuli ISAMA tithandizane nawo anzathuwa kuti maphunziro msukulu zoyima pazokha apite patsogolo. M’mene PRISAM yoyambilira imkayamba mkuti sukulu zoyima pazokha zilipo zochepa ndipo mmene ISAMA imkayambanso mkuti sukuluzi ziliponso zochepa koma lero zilipo zochuluka mkutanthauza kuti ntchito ilipo yochuluka zedi yomwe ikusoweka kuti tithandizane pogwira ntchitoyi choncho ifeyo sitikuona kukhulanakhulana kapena kupikisana koma tonsefe kuthandizana ntchito kuti ipindulire dziko lino pa maphunziro,” anatero Dr. Moloko. Pamenepa iwo apempha sukulu zoyima pa zokha kuti zilowe m’bungweli ndi cholinga choti zipindule ndi mfundo ndiponso ndondomeko zomwe bungweli lakhazikitsa pofuna kuthandiza sukuluzi kuti zithe kupereka maphunziro apamwamba. Iwo atinso bungweli liziyendetsedwa ndi atsogoleri ongozipereka kutanthauza kuti sazilandira chilichonse pofuna kupewa mkhalidwe wa atsogoleri okakamira pa mipando komanso lidziwonetsetsa kuti zochitika zake zonse zikulamuliridwa ndi mamembala ake kwinakunso likusatira khalidwe lochita zinthu poyera. Mmawu ake mlembi wa bungwe la Independent Schools Association of Malawi (ISAMA) ku chigawo cha maphunziro chakummwera ndi kuzambwe (SouthWest Division) Coxley Kamange wati kuyambanso kwa bungweli  mdziko muno kuthandizira ntchito za maphunziro kuti zikhale zapamwamba pomwe mabungwe awiriwa  athandizane pogwira ntchitoyi. Iye wati ali ndi chiyembekedzo kuti bungweli lichitanso zothekera kuti maphunziro adziyenda bwino kwinaku akuthandizira aphunzitsi ake kulandira malipiro abwino nd ikuthandizira ntchito za sukuluzi kuti zizipeza phindu loyenera. “Bungwe limeneli talilandira kamba koti pamene pali kupikisana zinthu zimayenda bwino ndiye apanso ndili ndi chikhulupiliro kuti ziziyenda bwino zomwe ISAMA izilephera ndiye PRISAM izikwaniritsa chimodzimodzinso zomwe PRISAM izivutika nazo ndiye kuti ISAMA izikwanirtsa zomwe pambuyo pake maphunziro athu azapita patsogolo,” anatero Kamange.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Khumi Anjatidwa Kaamba Kogula Mbewu Pa Mitengo Yotsika
news: Apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu amanga anthu khumi (10) kaamba kowaganizira kuti amabera alimi powagula mbewu zawo pa mitengo yotsika. Galimoto ya chimanga chomwe chimagulidwa mwachinyengo Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Hastings Chigalu, izi zachitika lachisanu potsatira chipikisheni chomwe apolisiwa anachita mu msika wa Kampepuza m’bomalo. Anthuwa akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa ndi kukayankha mlandu wogula mbewu pa mtengo wotsika zomwe ndi zosemphana ndi malamulo a dziko lino omwe boma linakhazikitsa. Pakadali pano apolisiwa achenjeza amalonda onse m’bomalo kuti atsatire mitengo yomwe boma lakhazikitsa yogulira mbewu kwa alimi ponena kuti aliyense yemwe apezeke akuchita zosemphana  ndi izi lamulo ligwira ntchito pa iye.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dayosizi ya Chikwawa Yakhazikitsa Website Yake
news: Dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Chikwawa, lachisanu pa 23 April, 2021 inakhazikitsa tsamba lake la pa makina a intaneti (website). Episkopi wa dayosiziyi, Ambuye Peter Musikuwa ndi omwe anatsogolera mwambo wokhazikitsa tsamba la intanetili, omwe unachitikira ku maofesi owona za chisamaliro cha anthu mu dayosiziyo. Bishop Musikuwa: Ndine wosangalala Ambuye Musikuwa anati nthawi yakwana yoti akhristu ayambe ntchito yofalitsa mauthenga moyenera kudzera mu njira zamakono ndipo apempha magulu onse okhudzidwa kuti achilimike pa ntchito yolemba ndi kufalitsa mauthenga kudzera mu njira zamakonozi. Iwo anati kukhazikitsidwa kwa tsamba la intanetili kwakwaniritsa mfundo yofalitsira mauthenga m’njira zamakono zomwe maepiskopi adagwirizana pa msonkhano wa AMECEA wa m’chaka cha 2014. “Tili ndi chiyembekezo ndipo ndi pempho lathu kuti akhristu, ma parishi athu, ma komishoni athu azitha kugawana ndi anzawo zimene akuchita kuti potero anzawonso athe kuphunzirapo kanthu,” anatero Ambuye Musikuwa. Ndipo poyankhulapo, mkulu wa za kafukufuku ndi kufalitsa mauthenga mu dayosiziyi, bambo John Lockie anati dayosizi ya Chikwawa yayamba kukwaniritsa mfundo zomwe ma Episkopi a AMECEA anagwirizana. Iwo anati kuti izi zikhazikike, ofesi yake iwonetsetsa kuti pali ubale wabwino ndi magulu onse okhuzidwa pa nkhani zofalitsa mauthenga kudzera mu njira zamakonozi. “Ngati dayosizi, chimene tichite kwambiri kutsogoloku ndi kuwonetsetsa kuti ubale omwe takhala nawo pakatipa, pamene timapanga websiteyi upilirire makamaka ndi anthu onse amene atithandiza kuti zonse zitheke kuti azitipatsa nkhani kuti nafenso tifalitse kwa anthu,” anatero bambo Lockie. Kudzera pa tsamba la intanetili, anthu azitha kupeza nkhani zokhudza mbiri ya ansembe, maparishi, mabungwe a mu mpingo, zachitukuko, zamaphunziro, zaumoyo, maulaliki ndi zochitika zina za dayosiziyi pa www.chikwawadiocese.org
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alimbikitsa Achinyamata Kukonda Kupemphera
news: Bambo mlangizi wa achinyamata mu archdiocese ya Blantyre, bambo Francisco Hau apempha achinyamata mu arkidayosiziyi kuti adzikonda kupemphera kuti athe kudziwa chiyitanidwe chawo. Pamene mpingo wa katolika umasinkhasinkha lamulungu la chiyitanidwe pa mutu ovomera kuyitanidwa kudzera mu chitsanzo cha Yosefe Woyera, bambo Hau anatengerapo mwayi kupepha achinyamata mu arkidayosiziyi kuti adzikhala ndi nthawi yokwanira yopemphera chifukwa kudzera mu pemphero ndi momwe angapeze yankho la chiyitanidwe chawo. M’mawu awo iwo anati pemphero ndi chida champhamvu chomwe chingazindikirise achinyamata ngati ayitanidwa m’moyo wa banja, kutumikira Mulungu kudzela mu usisiteli, unsembe kapena m’moyo okhala okha. “Choyamba phata la zonse ndi pemphero chifukwa kudzela mu pemphero mzimu woyera umamuwongolera munthu mu chowonadi ndiye ngati achinyamatawa akonda kupemphera ndi kosavuta kuti adzindikire chiyitanidwe chawo”, anatero bambo Hau. Pothilirapo ndemanga wapampando wa achinyamata mu parish ya Limbe, Thomas Chitseko wapemphanso achinyamatawa kuti apewe kuchita makhalidwe oyipa monga kumwa mowa mwauchidankwa, chiwerewere ngakhalenso kuba chifukwa izinso zikhonza kuthandizira kuti munthu asadziwe chiyitanidwe chake. “Ndingopempha achinyamata anzanga kuti tipewe kuchita makhalidwe oyipa chifukwa tchimo ukamalichita limasangalatsa koma mapeto ake munthu umathera ku chiwonongeko zomwe zitha kusokoneza kuti tidziwe za chiyitanidwe chathu,” anatero Chitseko.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi Nduna ya Mdziko la Lebanon
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi nduna yayikulu ya dziko la Lebanon, Saadi Hariri.  Papa (kumanja) ndi Hariri (kumanzere) Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, pa nkumanowu Papa watsimikizira anthu a m’dziko la Lebanon kuti ali nawo limodzi makamaka pano pomwe akukumana ndi mavuto osiyana-siyana. Mkulu wa ofesi yofalitsa mauthenga ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican, Matteo Bruni watsimikizira atolankhani lachinayi kuti Papa anachiwona cha nzeru kuchita mkumanowu kuti kudzera mwa nduna yayikuluyi atsimikizire anthu a m’dziko la Lebanon kuti ali nawo limodzi pa nthawi ino yomwe anthu m’dzikolo akudutsa m’mavuto osiyana-siyana ndipo wati Papa Francisco wapempha akuluakulu a ndale m’dzikolo kuti achilimike pothana ndi mavuto m’dzikolo. Iye wati Papa akukhulupirira kuti athandiza mayiko ena kuti zinthu zibwelere m’chimake komanso kuti anthu a m’dzikolo akhala ololerana. Pomaliza Papa wabwereza kunena za khumbo lake lokacheza m’dziko la Lebanon atayendera dziko la Iraq mwezi wa march chaka chino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Abambo Awiri Omwe Sakudziwika Afa Pangozi Zapansewu Zosiyana
news: Bambo wina yemwe sakudziwika wafa atawombedwa ndi galimoto mu msewu wa Liwonde-Mangochi usiku wathawu. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Balaka Sergeant Precious Makuta, oyendetsa galimotoyu amachokera ku Liwonde kupita m’boma la Mangochi ndipo atafika pa malo ena otchedwa Ulongwe Mission anawomba munthu wina ndipo anafera pomwepo. Bambo yemwe wamwalirayu akuganiziridwa kuti anali ndi vuto la mu ubongo. “Ndizoonadi kuti munthu wina yemwe ndi wamamuna ndipo sakudziwika wagundidwa ndi galimoto ndipo waferatu pomwepo ndipo oyendetsayo sakudziwikanso,” anatero Makuta. Iye wati mkuluyu atatengeredwa ku chipatala zotsatira zaku chipatala zasonyeza kuti mkuluyu wamwalira kaamba kovulala kwambiri m’mutu. Nako ku Dedza, bambo wina yemwe sakudziwikanso wafa pangozi ya pa nsewu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Edward Kabango, bamboyu wagundidwa usiku wathawu ndi galimoto ina yomwe imachokera m’boma la Dedza kupita mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pa malo ena otchedwa Chimbiya. Atatengeredwa ku chipatala achipatala anatsimikiza kuti bamboyu wamwalira kaamba kovulala kwambiri m’mutu. Padakali pano apolisi a m’bomali apempha onse omwe ali ndi m’bale wawo koma wasowa kuti apite ku chipatala cha bomalo akafufuze.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mtsikana Wafa Atagwidwa ndi Nyetsi ya Magetsi
news: Mtsikana wina wa zaka 21 wafa atagwidwa ndi nyetsi ya magetsi pomwe amayanika zovala zake pa chingwe m’boma la Dedza. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi m’bomali Sergeant Cassim Manda, izi zachitika m’mudzi mwa Dambo mfumu yaikulu Kaphuka m’bomali pomwe mtsikanayu Tilankhulenji Latimoni anakanirira ku chingwe cha zovala potsatira kugwira chingwecho  pomwe amayanika zovala zake. Malinga ndi apolisi, mlamu wa mtsikanayu ndi yemwe anadziwitsa anthu za nkhaniyi atazindikira kuti malemuyu wakanilira pa chingwechi. Chingwe cha zovalachi chinamangidwa ku nyumba yayikulu ndi ku bafa ndipo kwa nthawi yayitali anthuwa akhala akugwiritsa ntchito popanda vuto lililonse kufikira pomwe izi zachitika. Mtsikanayu atathamangira naye ku chipatala, achipatala anatsimikiza kuti wamwalira. Pakadali pano apolisi ati a kampani ya Escom omwe amapereka magetsi mdziko muno ndi omwe angafotokoze bwino za momwe zimenezi zakhalira. Tilankhulenji Latimoni amachokera m’mudzi mwa Dambo mfumu yayikulu Kaphuka m’boma lomwe la Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nyumba ya Malamulo Yati Ithandiza Makampani a M’dziko Muno Kupita Patsogolo
news: Komiti ya kunyumba ya malamulo yowona za ulimi yalonjeza zogwirana manja ndi makampani aang’ono-ang’ono ochita ntchito za ulimi m’dziko muno pofuna kuthandiza kukweza ntchito zawo. Wapampando wa komitiyi a Sameer Suleman ndi omwe anena izi lachitatu ku nyumba ya malamulo mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pomwe komitiyi inakumana ndi kampani ya za ulimi ya Pindulani. Iwo anati kampaniyi pokhala ya chimalawi ili ndi kuthekera kosintha nawo zinthu pa chitukuko cha ulimi ngati itapatsidwa mpata okwanira kuti ntchito zawo ziyende bwino. A Suleman amayankhapo pa madandaulo omwe akuluakulu a kampaniyi anapereka kuti komitiyi iwunikirepo.  Suleman: Tiyeni tithandizane tokhatokha Mwazina, mkulu wakampaniyi a Benedicto Chambo sadabise mawu koma kuwuza komitiyi kuti boma limakondera kwambiri makampani a kunja ndi kusiya m’mbuyo ma kampani a m’dziko muno zomwe zikuchititsa kuti makampani ambiri achiMalawi adzilowa pansi ndi kubwezera m’mbuyo ntchito zina za ulimi. Iwo anati boma likuyenera kuchilimika potukula makampani a mdziko muno omwe zochita zawo kumbali ya za ulimi zimakhala zogwirizana ndi nyengo ya mdziko muno poyerekeza ndi makampani akunja omwe saganizira kwenikweni mbali ya nyengoyi. A Chambo anapemphanso unduna wa za malimidwe kudzera ku komitiyi kuti uganizire zowapatsa mpata kuti azipakila mbewu zina zomwe amagulitsa mtimatumba tolemera makilogalamu asanu osati asanu ndi awiri monga momwe zakhala zikuyendera kuti azipezako phindu polingalira za kuchuluka kwa zomwe amayenera kutsatira kufikira poti mbewu-zi zifike pa msika. Iwo anati, “Mbeu zathu zimachita bwino kwambiri. Mbeu zathu zonse zimalimidwa mom’muno komanso amalima ndi a Malawi. Pachifukwa ichi zimatipatsa ife mphamvu kunena kuti titha kupikisana ndi makampani obwera.” Apa a Suleman anatsimikizira kampaniyi kuti komitiyi ichitapo kanthu pofuna kukonza zinthu kuti kampaniyi komanso makampani ena a m’dziko muno apite patsogolo. Apa a Suleman anati ndi chidwi chawo kuwona aMalawi akupita patsogolo ndi ntchito za makampani zomwe ati zingathandizenso kulemba ntchito anthu ambiri mdziko muno. Iwo anati, “Tiyeni tithandizaneni tokhatokha. Ineyo ndimafunitsitsa nditaona m’Malawi m’modzi watengapo mbali yopanga feteleza m’Malawi mommuno. Ma program athu ku agriculture amakhala okwera mtengo chifukwa zinthu zathu zambiri ma raw materials timachit kuyitanitsa kumaiko akunja pamene kwathu kuno ziliko. Titati tapaza m’Malawi m’modzi timuthandize muona kuti feteleza wathu tizimugul motsika mtengo chifukwa azipangidwa mom’muno.” Kampani ya Pindulani yomwe ndi ili m’boma la Mangochi ikuchita ntchito za ulimi m’magawo a mbeu monga chimanga, soya ndi nyemba mwazina, komanso kutengapo gawo pogulitsa feteleza. Pakadali pano kampaniyi ili mzigawo zakummwera ndi pakati ndipo ati pali dongosolo lofuna kufikitsa ntchito zake mchigawo chakumpoto.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akatswiri Pa Nkhani Za Chuma Awuza Boma Likhwimitse Ndondomeko Zogulira Katundu
news: Akatswiri pa nkhani za chuma m’dziko muno awuza boma kuti likhwimitse ndondomeko zina zokhudza kagulidwe ka katundu pofuna kupewa kusakazika kwa chuma cha boma. Akatswiriwa anena izi lachinayi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pa mtsutso wokambirana za kufunika kochita zinthu mowonekera pa kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka ndalama zothandiza pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliri wa Coronavirus. Iwo ati ndi zodandaulitsa powona momwe anthu adasakazira ndalama zolimbana ndi mliriwu zokwana 6.2 billion Malawi Kwacha zomwe ati zikadatha kupewedwa ngati boma likadakhala ndi ndondomeko zokhwima za momwe ndalamazi zimatulukira mthambi za boma pofuna kugula katundu ndi ntchito zina. M’modzi mwa akatswiriwa a Benedicto Kananza anati anthu omwe amayang’anira zinthu zosiyanasiyana nthambi za boma, Controlling Officers pachingerezi, ali ndi gawo lalikulu lowonetsetsa kuti akuchita zinthu mu nthawi yabwino komanso akuwerengera chumachi moyenera posafuna kupereka mpata kwa anthu omwe angakhale ndi maganizo osokoneza chumachi. Iwo anati, “Ntchito yosamala chuma cha boma ikuyamba ndi kukhala ndi anthu odziwa bwino za kayendetsedwe ka chuma komanso okhulupirika pofuna kupewa kusakazika kwa ndalama.” A Kananza anawonjezera ponena kuti, “Ngakhale pali ena amene amadziwa zoyenera kuchita pakhalabe pakuchitika mchitidwewu nde mwina tikhoza kunena kuti mwina pali anthu amene akaona chuma cha boma achulukepo nzeru, koma kutsogoloku tiyeni tipange zoti mkhalidwe umenewu usakhaleponso m’Malawi muno.” Katswiri winanso a Milward Tobias anati ndi zodabwitsa kuti akuluakulu omwe amawerengera chuma m’thambi ndi maunduna a boma, Chief Accountants pa chingerezi, amawonetsa kusadziwa pa zomwe zidachitika pomwe ndalama zasokonekera ndipo iwo anadabwa pa za ntchito yomwe anthuwa amagwira m’malo mowonetsetsa kuti ndalama sizikutuluka mwachisawawa. Polankhulaponso Dr. Tiyesere Mercy Chikapa omwenso ndi mphunzitsi ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Chancellor anati pakuyenera kukhala ma bwalo a milandu apadera omwe aziyendetsa nkhani zokhudza anthu omwe asakaza chuma cha boma kuti iziyenda mwachangu pofuna kupereka phunziro kwa ena. Akatswiriwa anati kupitilira kwa kusakazika kwa chuma cha boma kuli ndi kuthekera kowonjezera kukula kwa ngongole zomwe ngati dziko lili nazo kale zomwenso zingakulitse umphawi pakati pa anthu. M’mawu ake, president wa bungwe la Economics Association of Malawi (ECAMA) a Lauryn Nyasulu anati boma likuyenera kuyesetsa kuyika ndondomeko zolimba kuti kusakaza chuma cha boma chikhale chinthu choti anthu azichiopa ponena kuti momwe ndalama za Covid-19 zayendera anthu adalibe mantha kuti akuchita zolakwika. Iwo anati, “Kaunikiridwe ka kagwiritsidwe ka ntchito kakhala kofunikirako kupita chitsogolo chifukwa ndalama ngati zikugwiritsidwa bwino ntchito m’dziko ndekuti chitukukonso chimakhala chikupita patsogolo.” Pa mtsutsowu panafika nthumwi za mabungwe osiyanasiyana owona za chuma komanso ufulu wa anthu, koma panalibe nthumwi yochokera ku boma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wina Walamulidwa Kugwira Ukayidi kwa Zaka 12 Kamba Kogwililira
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Chikwawa lalamula bambo wina wa zaka 22, kukhala ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka 12 kaamba kopereka pathupi kwa msungwana wa zaka 15. Woyimira boma pa mlandu Inspector Helix Kamkweche anawuza bwaloli kuti bamboyu Semu Patrick wakhala akugonana ndi mwanayu kuyambira m’chaka cha 2019 kufikira mwezi wa October chaka chatha pomwe mayi wa msungwanayu anadabwa kuwona kuti mwanayu akuwonetsa zizindikiro zodabwitsa ndipo anavomera kuti ali ndi pathupi pa miyezi itatu. Atawonekera ku bwaloli bamboyu anawukana mlanduwu zomwe zinachititsa bwaloli kubweretsa mboni zitatu zomwe zinachititsa kuti apezeke olakwa pa mlanduwu. Koma popereka chigamulo chake First Grade Magistrate Gladstone Chilundu anati wapereka chilango choterechi kuti ena ofuna kupalamula mlandu ngati omwewu atengerepo phunziro. Semu Patrick amachokera m’mudzi wa Chipula mfumu yayikulu Kasisi, m’boma la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Amanga Amuna Awiri Kaamba Koba Mizimbe ya Kampani ya Illovo
news: Apolisi ku Chikwawa akusunga m’chitokosi amuna awiri chifukwa chowaganizira kuti apalamula mlandu okuba mzimbe za kampani ya Illovo. Mneneri wa apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa, Sergeant Dickson Matemba wati amunawa Josam Richard wa zaka 32 ndi Justin Mikiloni wa zaka 18 amangidwa atapezeka akugulitsa mzimbezi pamene apolisi ndi achitetezo a kampani ya Illovo amayendera misika ya Mapelera, Nkhate, Livunzu ndi Mitondo. Sergeant Matemba wati apolisiwa analanda mzimbezo zomwe zinali zodzadza galimoto ya mtundu wa lorry yolemera matani khumi ndiponso ngolo ziwiri zomwe zikuganiziridwa kuti anthu enanso amagwiritsa ntchito ponyamula mzimbezo ndipo anathawa atawona apolisiwo. Amunawa akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la mlandu posachedwapa kuti akayankhe pa mlandu wakuba. Josamu Richard, amachokera m’mudzi mwa Malata kwa mfumu yayikulu Makhwira ndipo Justin Mikiloni, amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mitengo kwa mfumu yayikulu Makhwira komweko, onsewa m’boma la Chikwawa. Padakali pano, apolisi a m’bomali achenjeza anthu okhala mozungulira minda ya mzimbe ya kampani ya Illovo kuti apewe m’chitidwe wakuba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Chipembedzo cha Chisilamu Lapereka Thandizo Kwa Anthu Ovutika ku Nsanje
news: Bungwe la za chifundo, chisamaliro cha anthu ndi chitukuko pansi pa Muslim World League, lapereka matumba 1,000 a ufa wa chimanga kwa anthu osowa m’boma la Nsanje. Bungweli lapereka thandizoli kwa anthu okhala mdera la kum’mwera chakuzambwe kwa boma la Nsanje. Poyankhula atatha kupereka thandizoli, nthumwi ya bungweli kuno ku Malawi, a Neeroden Kaondo ati iwo anaganiza zopereka thandizolo kaamba ka ng’amba yomwe yakhudza madera ambiri m’maboma a Nsanje ndi Chikwawa. “Ndife okhudzidwa kwambiri chifukwa cha ng’amba komanso kusefukira kwa madzi zimene zawononga mbewu kuno ndipo tikudziwa kuti matumba a ufa okwana 1,000 ndi osakwanira, komabe athandiza mabanja ena pa vuto la njala,” anatero a Kaondo. Ngati njira imodzi yolimbikitsa umoyo wa nthanzi ndi ukhondo, bungweli lati liyamba ntchito yokumba mijigo ya madzi ku madera ena a m’maboma a Chikwawa ndi Nsanje. M’mawu ake, phungu wa kunyumba ya malamulo m’derali, mayi Urita Ntiza athokoza bungwe la Muslim World League kaamba ka thandizoli ponena kuti lafika mu nthawi yake yomwe anthu ambiri akukumana ndi mavuto a njala. Pamenepa, mayi Ntiza atsimikizira anthu okhala ku derali kuti agwira ntchito limodzi ndi mabungwe osiyanasiyana popereka thandizo losiyanasiyana kwa anthu amene akuvutika m’dera lake. “Ndithokoze a Muslim World League ndi boma chifukwa chobwera kuno ku Nsanje, makamaka ku dera langa kudzapereka thandizo la chakudya kwa anthu osowa,” anatero mayi Ntiza. Bungwe la Muslim World League limagwira ntchito zake m’maboma ambiri m’dziko lino kuphatikizapo Chikwawa ndi Nsanje.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapereka Zipangizo Za M’chipatala Ku Dziko La Colombia
news: Lachitatu pa 21 April likulu la mpingo wa katolika lalengeza kuti Papa Francisco wapereka thandizo la zipangizo za m’chipatala ku dziko la Colombia pofuna kusonyeza kukhudzidwa kwake ndi mavuto omwe dzikolo likukumana nawo pothandiza anthu omwe apezeka ndi nthenda ya Covid-19. Papa wapereka thandizoli kudzera mwa kazembe wake m’dziko la Colombia, Archbishop Luis Mariano Montemayor. Montemayor wati thandizoli alipereka kale ku madera omwe akhudzidwa kwambiri ndi mliriwi. Thandizo lomwe Papayu wapereka ndi zipangizo zothandiza anthu kupuma, zipangizo zogwiritsa ntchito pochita opareshoni, ma container angapo a zipangizo zotchingira kukamwa ndi mphuno pongotchula zochepa. Chiyambireni mliri wa coronavirus, Papa wakhala akupereka thandizo la zipangizo za m’chipatala ku mayiko monga Brazil, Italy, Spain, Romania, Zambia, Malawi ndi ena ambiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Achizimayi Mchigawo Chakumvuma Kwa Dziko Lino Adzala Mitengo
news: Apolisi achizimayi amchigawo chakumvuma kwa dziko lino adzala mitengo yokwanira 200, m’mbali mwa mtsinje wa Likangala m’boma la Zomba. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Mangochi Sub Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi, mitengoyi yadzalidwa kaamba kavuto la kusowa kwa madzi komwe kumayambitsidwa chifukwa cha kusintha kwa nyengo. Iwo ati anachiona chofunika kuchita izi kaamba koti mavuto a kusintha kwa nyengo akadza, amagwera aliyense. “Tadzala mitengo 200 m’mbali mwa mtsinje wa Likangala omwe uli m’boma la Zomba yomwe tinapatsidwa ngati thandizo kuchokera ku mabungwe a Forestry Research Institute of Malawi, National Herbrim komanso Botanical gardens,” anatero Sub Inspector Daudi. Iye wati apolisiwa apitiriza potenga nawo gawo pa nkhani za chitukuko mdziko muno komanso ati a Malawi atenge nawo gawo podzala mitengo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Khansala Wadandaula ndi Kuchuluka Kwa Nkhanza M’boma la Ntcheu
news: Khansala wa ward ya Kandeu m’boma la Ntcheu mayi Flanesi Kampeni ati ndi okhuzidwa ndi mchitidwe wa nkhaza omwe amayi ndi atsikana akukumana nawo m’madera ena m’boma la Ntcheu. Mayi Kampeni amayankhula izi pa mkumano omwe anakonzera anthu a mderali ndi cholinga chowazindikiritsa za kuyipa kwa mchitidwewu. Iwo ati aliyense akhale ndi udindo owonetsetsa kuti mchitidwewu utheretu m’deralo. “Kunotu nkhani ya nkhazayi ndi yaikulu pomwe azimayi akuchitirana nkhaza okha okha komanso ana akuchitiridwa nkhanza ndi abambo awo pomwe akumagonedwa,” anatero mayi Kampeni. Iwo adandaula kaamba ka khalidwe la amayi omwe akumatengera lamulo m’manja mwawo pomenya anzawo omwe awalakwira komanso khalidwe la abambo ena omwe akumagona ndi ana awo akapita kowotcha makala. Poyankhulapo mfumu ya ku derali Group Village Headman Dzole anati mchitidwe wogwilira wakula mdera mwawo kaamba ka kusadziwa ndipo anayamikira apolisi omwe anali pa mkumanowo ponena kuti awapatsa upangiri omwe uthandize kuti mchitidwewu utheretu mderali. Sub Inspector John Nyasosela yemwe ndi mkulu yemwe amawonetsetsa kuti anthu sakuchitirana nkhaza m’bomali apempha anthu a mderali kuti azikanena ku polisi akawona mchitidwe wa nkhaza uliwonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Imfa ya Cardinal Khoarai wa M’dziko la Lesotho
news: Potsatira imfa ya Cardinal Sebastian Koto Khoarai wa m’dziko la Lesotho, Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wopepesa mpingo wa katolika m’dzikolo. Mu uthenga omwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika latulutsa lachiwiri pa 20 April 2021, Papa wati ndi ndi wokudzidwa kaamba ka imfa ya Cardinal-yu yemwe anali episkopi wopuma wa dayosizi ya Mohale’s Hoek. Malemu Cardinal Khoarai Papa wati Cardinal Khoarai anali munthu wokonda mapemphero komanso yemwe anagwira ntchito yotamandika maka poyetsetsa kulimbikitsa moyo wa chiitanidwe komanso kutukula maphunziro m’dziko la Lesotho. Iye wamaliza uthengawu ponena kuti ndi pemphero lake kuti chifukwa cha ntchito yotamandika yomwe anagwira pansi pano Mulungu alandire mzimu wa Cardinal Khoarai mu ufumu wake. Cardinal Khoarai anabadwa pa 11 September 1929 ndipo wamwalira loweruka pa 17 April 2021 atadwala nthenda ya cancer ya pa khosi ali ndi zaka 91. Anadzodzedwa kukhala wansembe m’chaka cha 1956 ndipo m’chaka cha 1977 Papa Paulo wa 6 anamusankha kukhala episkopi wa Diocese ya Mohale’s Hoek. Kuyambira m’chaka cha 1982 mpaka 1987 iye anali wa pa mpando wa bungwe la ma episkopi a Mpingo wa Katolika m’dzikolo ndipo ndi m’chaka cha 2016 pamene Papa Francisco anamusankha kukhala Cardinal.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ntchito Yomanga Msewu Wa Chinyamula-Mphepozinayi M’boma La Ntcheu Yatha
news: Wapampando wa khonsolo ya boma la Ntcheu, khansala Jumbe Mambo wapempha anthu a m’bomali kuti akhale ndi udindo wosamalira msewu wa Chinyamula-Mpepozinayi omwe watha kumangidwa tsopano. Khansala Mambo amayankhula izi lachiwiri pomwe amatsekulira msewu-wu. Iye wati aliyense akhale mlonda wa mzake powonetsetsa kuti nsewuwu ukusamalidwa bwino. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa akuluakulu kuchokera ku ASWAP SP2, a Henry Msatilomo anati ndi okondwa kamba koti ntchitoyi yatha zomwe zakwaniritsa khumbo lawo lofuna kuthandiza alimi ozungulira derali kukhala ndi nsewu wabwino. Pa mwambowu panafika anthu osiyanasiyana monga mafumu, aphungu a kunyumba ya malamulo, makhansala, ogwira ntchito za boma kuphatikizapo akuluakulu ena kuchokera ku Roads Authority. Nsewuwu wamangidwa ndi thandizo la ndalama kuchokera ku unduna wa za malimidwe kudzera mu pulojekiti ya ASWAP SP2 ndipo ndi wa ndalama zokwana 1.1 Billion Malawi kwacha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sukulu Ya Ana Osamva Ya Malingunde Yati Ikukumana Ndi Mavuto Ochuluka
news: Sukulu ya ana omwe ali ndi vuto la kusamva ndi kusalankhula ya Malingunde m’boma la Lilongwe yapempha anthu akufuna kwabwino kuti ayithandize pomanga mpanda komanso nyumba zogona ophunzira ngati njira imodzi yolimbikitsa chitetezo pa sukuluyo. Mphunzitsi wamkulu pa sukuluyo a Haxley Tundulu awuza atolankhani a Malawi News Agency (MANA) kuti padakalipano, zinthu za ophunzira pa sukuluyo zimabedwa kaamba koti mbava zimatengera mwayi ulumali wa anawa. Iwo ati sukuluyi yomwe ili ndi ana okwana 45, imalandira thandizo la ndalama zokwana 293 sauzande kwacha pa mwezi kuchokera ku boma, yomwe anati ndi yosakwanira. A Tundulu ati kuchepa kwa malo ogona ophunzira kwachititsa kuti sukuluyo iyimitse ana ena omwe amafunika kuyamba maphunziro awo pa sukuluyo kuti adikire kaye ndipo adzabwere pokhapokha malo atapezeka zomwe anati zikuphwanya ufulu wa maphunziro wa ana. Malinga ndi mphunzitsi wamkuluyu, sukuluyi ili ndi aphunzitsi awiri okha omwe anachita maphunziro apadera okhudza ana a ulumali osamva ndi kulankhula poyerekeza ndi kalasi zonse zoyambira standade 1 mpaka 8 zomwe zili pa malopa ndipo anati zimakhala zovuta kuti athandize ophunzira onse mokwanira. Polankhulapo khansala wa ward ya Malingunde, Mandauka Macdonald anati sukuluyi yomwe inamangidwa mchaka cha 1971 ikufunika kukonzedwa kaamba koti papita zaka 50 chiyikhazikitsireni komanso osakonzedwa. Ndipo pothilirapo ndemanga phungu wa deralo Peter Dimba anagwirizana ndi mphunzitsi wamkulu pa sukuluyi ndipo anati ndi kofunika kuti magulu osiyanasiyana agwirane manja pa ntchito yokonzanso sukuluyi kuti ikhale malo abwino ophunzilira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mlimi Wa Fodya Akagwira Jere Kwa Zaka 19 Kaamba Kogwililira Mwana Wake Wompeza
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Mangochi lalamula mkulu wina yemwe ndi mlimi wa fodya kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka 19 kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu wogwililira mwana wake wompeza wa zaka 8 zakubadwa. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sub Inspector Skeva Munyapa anawuza bwaloli kuti mkuluyu Patrick Joseph, anapita kwa sing’anga pofuna thandizo kuti ulimi wake wa fodya upite patsogolo, komwe analamulidwa kuti agone ndi namwali ngati chizimba chake. M’mawa wapa 20 March, mkuluyu anagwililira msungwanayu pamene mayi ake analawilira ku munda ndipo masana a tsiku lomweli mayiyo anadabwa kuti mwanayo amavutika mayendedwe pamene amachoka ku sukulu ndipo atamufunsa ndi pomwe anafotokoza za nkhaniyi. Zotsatira za pa chipatala chaching’ono cha Chilipa zinasonyeza kuti msungwanayo anagwiliridwadi. Atawonekera ku bwaloli mkuluyu anawuvomera mlanduwu koma anapempha bwalolo kuti limpatse chilango chofewerako kaamba koti kanali koyamba kupalamula koma woyimira boma pa mlanduwu anati mkuluyu akuyenera kulandira chilango chokhwima ponena kuti nkhani za mtunduwu zikuchulukira m’bomalo zomwenso zikuyika miyoyo ya atsikana pa chiwopsezo. Popereka chigamulo chake Senior Resident Magistrate Joshua Nkhono anati wapereka chilango chokhwimachi ndi cholinga choti ena atengerepo phunziro. Joseph amachokera m’mudzi mwa Chipote mfumu yaikulu Kachenga m’boma la Balaka.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nthambi Yowona Zolowa Ndi Kutuluka Yakhwimitsa Chitetezo Mchigawo Chakumpoto
news: Nthambi yowona za anthu olowa ndi kutuluka mdziko muno mchigawo chakumpoto yatumiza anthu 16 ku malo ongoyembekezera osungira anthu othawa kwawo m’boma la Karonga kaamba kolephera kutsatira malamulo a anthu othawa kwawo mdziko muno. Malinga ndi malipoti a Malawi News Agency (MANA), wachiwiri kwa ofalitsa nkhani ku nthambiyi mchigawochi, Francis Chitambuli wati anthuwa anatumizidwa ku malowa pa 17 April chaka chino. Mwa anthuwa; asanu ndi mzika za mdziko la Burundi zomwe zinamangidwa pa msika wa Nkhatabay ndipo bwalo la milandu linalamula kuti akasungidwe ku malo osungira anthu othawa kwawo ongoyembekezera a Karonga. Apolisi a nthambi yowona zolowa ndi kutuluka pa ntchito yawo Anthu khumi ndi m’modzi enawo ndi mzika za mdziko la Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) zomwe zimachokera ku malo osungira anthu othawa kwawo a Dzaleka m’boma la Dowa ndipo anagwidwa ndi apolisi pa malo ochitira chipikisheni cha apolisi a Phwezi ndipo onsewa atumizidwa ku malo osungira anthu othawa kwawo ongoyembekezera a Karonga. Chitambuli wati boma kudzera ku bungwe la United Nations High Commission for Refugees (UNHCR) linapereka mwayi kwa anthu othawa kwawo kuti adzikhala ku malo osungira anthu othawa kwawo a Dzaleka, koma kutsatira kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akulowa mdziko muno mwachinyengo, iwo ati akhwimitsa chitetezo m’malo onse ochitira chipikisheni cha apolisi a Songwe, Khwawa, Phwezi komanso Mzimba. Iwo ati izi zikuchitika ngati njira imodzi yofuna kupewa kufala kwa kachirombo ka Corona, kubwezeretsa misonkho yomwe anthu ambiri akhala akuzemba kupereka komanso kulondoloza anthu omwe sakudziwika kochokera. Molumikizana ndi nkhani yomweyi mzika 19 za mdziko la Ethiopia komanso mzika imodzi ya dziko lino anjatidwa mdera la Mchenga m’boma la Rumphi. Apolisi komanso a nthambi yowona zolowa ndi kutuluka agwira anthuwa atatsinidwa khutu ndi anthu ena akufuna kwabwino kuti anthuwa akukhala mnyumba mwa mayi Ruth Mangesi m’bomalo. Malinga ndi a Chitambuli anthu othawa kwawo amayenera kuziwonetsera pomwe akulowa mdziko muno ndi cholinga choti apatsidwe chilorezo ngati ndi oyenera kukhala mdziko muno, koma m’malo mwake mzikazi zinaganiza zolowa mdziko muno kugwiritsa ntchito njira zosayenera. Pomaliza nthambiyi yapempha a Malawi kuti apewe kuthandizira mzika za mayiko ena kulowa mdziko muno mwachinyengo. Athuwa akuyembekezeka kukayankha milandu yomwe apalamulayi mogwirizana ndi gawo 21 loyendetsera malamulo owona za anthu olowa ndi kutuluka mdziko muno, pomwe mzika ya mdziko linoyi ikayankha mlandu wothandizira mzika za mayiko ena kulowa mdziko muno mwachinyengo. Mangesi amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mwandukuti mfumu yaikulu Mwalweni m’boma la Rumphi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Adzodza Adikoni 9 Kukhala Ansembe pa Tsiku la Chiyitanidwe
news: Lamulungu pa 25 April ndi tsiku la chaka cha chiyitanidwe mu mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse. Zadziwika kuti pa tsikuli Papa Francisco yemwenso ndi episkopi wa dayosizi ya Rome mdziko la Italy adzadzodza madikoni asanu ndi anayi kukhala ansembe pa mwambo wa Misa omwe Papa’yu adzatsogolere mu tchalitchi lalikulu la Saint Peter’s Basilica ku Vatican. A Katolika pa dziko lonse ali ndi mwayi wodzatsatira Misa’yi yomwe idzayambe 9 koloko m’mawa kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Mpingo wa Katolika chaka chino uchita chaka cha chiyitanidwe pa mutu woti: Kuvomera Kuyitanidwa ku moyo wa Utumiki potengera chitsanzo cha Yosefe Woyera, a call to service after the example of Saint Joseph m’chingerezi. Papa Paulo wa 6 ndi yemwe adakhazikitsa Vocations Day m’chaka cha 1963 ndi cholinga chofuna kupemphelera achinyamata kuti avomere ndipo asankhe bwino njira yotumikira Mulungu kaya ndi unsembe, usisitere, ubulazala kapena banja. Koma si pokhapo chakachi ndi mwayi wina wozindikiritsa ndi kuphunzitsa akhristu za udindo wawo othandiza nyumba zosulira atumiki a mu mpingo pongotchula zochepa. Ku Malawi, chaka chachikulu chidzachitikira ku Mtendere Parish mu dayosezi ya Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anjatidwa Kaamba Kovulaza Mkazi Wake
news: Apolisi m’boma la Ntchisi amanga bambo wina wa zaka 42 zakubadwa  kaamba komuganizira kuti wavulaza mkazi wake potsatira kusamvana komwe kunabuka pakati pawo. Malinga ndi wfalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomali Sub Inspector Richard Mwakayoka Kaponda, izi zachitika lamulungu, pomwe woganiziridwayu, Mando M’bobo anayamba kumenya mkazi wake Loveness Chilasa wa zaka 36 zakubadwa ati kaamba koti sanamupatse chakudya pa maliro, zomwe zinakwiitsa bamboyu. “Nkhani ndi yoti ku derali kunachitika maliro ndipo onse anali kumeneko nthawi ya chakudya itakwana, bamboyu akuti sanapeze mwayi wopatsidwa chakudya zomwe sizinasangalatse mkuluyu poganizira kuti amapereka chakudyacho anali mkazi wake. Woganiziridwayu atafika ku nyumba yake anatenga nkhwangwa ndipo anayamba kumenya nayo mkaziyo ndi kumuvulaza kwambiri pa mkono wake wakumanja. Pakadali pano apolisi achenjeza anthu a m’banja kuti apewe kumenyana akasemphana maganizo. Mkuluyu akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku khothi ndi kukayankha mlandu wovulaza munthu. A Mando M’bobo amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kanyamula mfumu yaikulu Chilooko m’boma lomwelo la Ntchisi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Misa Yotsanzikana Ndi Malemu Bambo Dimba Ichitika Lachiwiri ku Italy
news: Mwambo wa misa yosadzikana ndi malemu bambo John Dimba a chipani cha Spiritan, omwe anamwalira pa 24 March chaka chino, uchitika mawa ku tchalitchi laling’ono la chipanichi mu m’dzinda wa Rome m’dziko la Italy. Malinga ndi kalata yomwe a kulikulu la chipanichi latulutsa, misa-yi idzayamba 11 koloko m’mawa, ndipo tsiku loyika m’manda thupi la malemu bambo Dimba alilengezabe. Anamwalira pa 24 March-Bambo Dimba Kalatayi yatinso kutsatira kufala kwa mliri wa COVID-19, anthu ochepa okha ndi omwe adzaloredwe kukakhala nawo pa miyambo-yi, pomwe ena adzidzatsatira miyambo-yi kudzera pa makina a internet pa link iyi https://youtu.be/GIickizg4IE Chipanichi chati m’mbuyo-mu panali dongosolo loti thupili lidzayikidwe m’dziko muno kaamba koti ndi komwe atumikirako kwa nthawi yayitali, koma dongosololi linakanika kaamba ka njira zopewera kufala kwa mliri wa COVID-19 zomwe owona za maulendo a pa ndege anayika komanso ati kaamba koti bambo Dimba sanali mzika ya dziko lino. Mwazina aku likulu la chipanichi apepesa achibale ochokera mdziko la Mozambique, komwe bambo Dimba amachokera, pamene akulira maliro-wa. Mzimu wa bambo John Dimba uwuse ndi mtendere.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Mbali Zomwe Zikumenyana Ku Ukraine Zikhululukirane
news: Polankhula laMulungu kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square pambuyo pa pemphero la Virgo Maria Kondwani Alleluia, Papa Francisco wati zomwe zikuchitika ku Eastern Ukraine ndi zinthu zodetsa nkhawa chifukwa choti pangano la mtendere lomwe mbali ziwiri zomwe zakhala zikumenyana ku deralo zinasayinirana, likuyenda mwa pendapenda. Iye wati mbali ziwiri zomwe zakhala zikumenyana ku deralo zakhala zikuphwanya pangano losiya kuchita nkhondo ndipo pa chifukwa ichi kukayikirana kwakula. “Ndikukhulupirira kuti kukaikirana kumeneku kuchepa ndipo kuti mbali zonse ziyetsetsa kulemekeza pangano losiya kumenyana kuti choncho bata ndi mtendere komanso chiyanjano zikhazikike ku deralo,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wafotokozanso za mavuto a nkhaninkhani omwe anthu ku deralo akukumana nawo tsiku ndi tsiku ndipo wapempha mapemphero opemphelera anthu ku deralo. Kusakhulupirirana kwakula pakati pa mayiko a Russia ndi Ukraine chifukwa choti dziko la Russia lakhala likusonkhanitsa asilikali ake komanso zida za nkhondo ku malire ake ndi dera la Eastern Ukraine komanso Crimea. Pa chifukwa ichi nalo dziko la Britain likusonkhanitsa zida ndi asilikali ku deralo pofuna kuwonetsa umodzi ndi dziko la Ukraine. Pali nkhawa kuti nkhondo itha kubuka ku deralo pakati pa dziko la Ukraine ndi maiko ena awiri omwe ali pansi pa dziko la Russia. Mwazina, pa mwambowu Papa Francisco yemwe amakonda kucheza ndi anthu anafotokoza za chimwemwe chake kuti tsopano anthu ayambiranso kusonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square, dziko la Italy litafewetsa mfundo zokhwima zomwe lidakhazikitsa pofuna kupewa kufala kwa nthenda ya Covid-19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Wachotsa Kandodo pa Unduna
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wachotsa pa udindo nduna yowona za ntchito a Ken Kandodo kaamba kokhudzidwa ndi kusokonekera kwa ndalama zokwana 6.2-billion-kwacha zothandiza pa mliri wa COVID-19. Chakwera wanena izi usiku wa lamulungu pamene amalankhula ku mtundu wa a Malawi kuchokera ku nyumba ya president ya Mtunthama mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iye wati ngakhale ndunayi yabweza ndalamazi komabe ndi kofunika kuti iyime pa udindo wake chifukwa yapereka chithunzithunzi chosakhala bwino kwa anthu. Unduna wamuthera – Kandodo “Chifukwa a ndunawa achita kutchulidwa kuti anasokoneza ndalama zoposa 600 sauzande kwacha, ngakhale abwenza ndalamayo komabe ine ndawachotsa pa mndandanda wa nduna zanga. Sitikufuna kuti anthu aziwona ngati tikusekelera zinthu zachabechabe,” anakalipa motero Chakwera. Mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu wati walamula mlembi wamkulu wa boma a Zangazanga Chikhosi kuti ayimitse pa ntchito opanda malipiro akuluakulu onse a nthambi za boma omwe akutchulidwa mu lipoti lomwe latulukali kuti akukhudzidwa ndi kusokonekera kwa ndalamazi. Iye anati padakalipano anthu ena ayamba kale kumangidwa molumikizana ndi nkhaniyi. Pamenepa Chakwera anati boma lake sililekelera kuti mchitidwe wa katangale upitilire mdziko muno ndipo kuti aliyense wokhudzidwa adzilandira chilango choyenera. Iye wati kafukufukuyu ndi oyamba chabe mu ulamuliro wake koma akafukufuku enanso akhala akuchitika kutsogoloku okhudza zosakhala bwino zomwe zidzichitika komanso zomwe zinachitikapo m’mbuyomu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi Mkulu Wa Nthambi ya UNHCR
news: Polankhula kwa atolankhani atatha zokambirana ndi Papa Francisco, mkulu wa nthambi ya bungwe la United Nations yowona za anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-iyana ya United Nations High Commission for Refugees (UNHCR), Fillipo Grandi wayamikira Papa Francisco chifukwa cha upangiri wake pa nkhani yokhudza anthu omwe amathawa m’maiko awo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana. Papa (kumanja) pa mkumano wake ndi Grandi (kumanzere) Grandi wati kalata ya posachedwa ya Papa Francisco yotchedwa Fratelli tutti yomwe ikutsindika za kufunika kwa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu ndi yofunika kwambiri maka pa momwe anthu omwe amathawa m’maiko awo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana angasamaliridwe. “Papa Francisco ndi m’modzi mwa anthu odziwika bwino pa dziko lonse yemwe satopa kulankhula ndipo ndi liwu la anthu ovutika, osalabadiridwa komanso anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana ndipo wathandiza kusintha miyoyo ya anthu ambiri omwe amasowa chithandizo pomwe afika m’maiko ena,” watero Grandi poyamikira Papa Francisco. Pamenepa iye watsindika za kufunika koti nthambi ya bungwe la United Nations yowona za anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana ya UNHCR ilimbikitse mgwirizano wake ndi likulu la mpingo wa katolika, Vatican pothandiza anthuwa omwe mavuto awo akupitilira kuyipa kaamba ka mavuto omwe mliri wa coronavirus wabweretsa. Ndipo polankhula pa tsamba lake la mchezo la Facebook, Grandi wati mkumano wake ndi Papa Francisco ndi madalitso aakulu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bande Wayamikira Boma Povomera Kukonza Zitukuko za Mdera Lake
news: Phungu wa dera la kumvuma mu mzinda wa Blantyre, John Bande wayamikira boma la Tonse povomera kukonzanso zitukuko zomwe wati zithandizira kupititsa patsogolo miyoyo ya anthu a mderali. A Bande alankhula izi pambuyo mwambo wokhazikitsa ntchito yomanga mpanda wozungulira msika wa Kachere mderali ndi cholinga choti uthandizire kuteteza anthu ochita malonda mu msikawu. Bande: Boma lavomera kutithandiza Iwo ati ndi okondwa kuti boma lavomeranso kugwira ntchito za chitukuko zosiyanasiyana mderali zomwe anati zithandizira kukweza miyoyo ya anthu a mderali ku magawo osiyanasiyana monga maphunziro, zaumoyo ngakhalenso zachuma. “Nditalipempha boma ili lamgwirizano wa Tonse kuti litikonzere sukulu ya sekondale yoyendera ya St. Kizito lavomera kukonza chipinda chomwe malata adachoka ndi mphepo komanso lavomeranso kukonza ndi kupezera zipangizo zosowekera mchipinda choyesera zinthu za sayansi (Laboratory) pa sukuluyi, pomwe ine ndi ndalama zanga ndinamanga chipindachi ndikuyikira malata. Pamalowa tamangaponso mlatho omwe uzithandizira ophunzira pa sukuluyi ndiponso ya pulayimale, kwa ophunzira ochokera ku Makhetha. “Kupatula zimenezi, boma lavomeranso kumanga mpanda pa msika wa Kachere kusatira kukonzanso kwa msewu wa Zomba ndipo gawo lachiwiri likhudza kukonza magetsi omwe akhala akuvutavuta pa malowa ngakhalenso kupitiriza ntchito yomanga chipatala pa malowa yomwe tsopano yalowa mgawo lachiwiri la ntchitoyi yomwe igwiridwe ndi ndalama za mthumba la za chitukuko la Constituency Development Fund (CDF),” anatero a Bande. Pamenepa a Bande atsindikanso zoti boma lakonzeka kukonza mlatho ku Mzedi omwe unawonongeka kwinaku akukonzanso ina mwa misewu yomwe yawonongeka mderali ndipo ikufunika kupalidwa. Iwo apitirizanso kuti zokambirana zili mkati zomwe cholinga chake ndi choti akonze msewu wa Makhetha wopita ku Ndirande omwe anati uthandizira kwambiri anthu aku Makhetha, Machinjiri komanso Kachere kupita ku Ndirande mosavuta pomwe anthu aku Ndirande akhala ndi mwayinso wogwiritsa msewuwu omwe anati ndi wachidule popita ku Limbe ndi ku Chiradzulo ngakhalenso kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha galimoto zomwe zimagwiritsa ntchito msewu waukulu wochokera ku Ndirande omwe umadutsira ku Chichiri. Choncho iwo alangiza makomiti a chitukuko ndi anthu a mderali kuti agwirane manja ndi omwe azitsogolera ntchitozi ndi cholinga choti zigwiridwe pa nthawi yake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Arkidayosizi ya Blantyre Ichita Mwambo wa Chiyitanidwe M’maparishi
news: Arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yati siyikhala ndi mwambo waukulu okondwelera chaka cha chiyitanidwe chaka chino pofuna kupewa kufala kwa mliri wa Covid-19. Bambo mlangizi wa achinyamata mu arkidayosiziyo, bambo Francisko Hawu awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti ansembe onse adzatsogolera zochitika za tsikuli m’maparishi awo momwemo. Iwo apempha ansembe-wa kuti athandizire achinyamata kukonza zochitika zosiyanasiyana zomwe angathe kudzawonetsa patsikuli. “Kuyitanidwa ndiye kuti Mulungu watiyitana ku ntchito ina yake kuti tikamugwilire choncho zokonzekera zidakachitikabe popeza tinapempha ansembe kuti akonzekeretse achinyamata awo pa zochitika za pa tsikuli m’maparish momwemo kaamba koti achinyamatawa ndi ochuluka zedi moti sangathe kusonkhana pamodzi chifukwa cha nthenda ya Covid-19,” anatero bambo Hawu. Iwo apemphanso ansembewa kuti athandizire achinyamata kukonza zochitika zosiyanasiyana zomwe angathe kudzawonetsa patsikuli kupatula zolankhulalankhula zomwe atumiki a mayitanidwe osiyanasiyana adzafotokozere achinyamatawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alamulidwa Zaka 38 pa Mlandu Wogwililira Mayi Ake
news: Bwalo loyamba la milandu m’boma la Kasungu lalamula bambo wina wa zaka 38 kukakhala ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula-gaga kwa zaka khumi kaamba kofuna kugwililira mayi ake omubereka a zaka 62. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sub Inspector Thokozani Juziwell komanso Sergeant Emmanuel Lukasi, anawuza bwaloli kuti bamboyu Bessam Nyirenda, usiku wapa 4 November 2020 anagogodera mayi ake m’nyumba mwawo kuti akufuna madzi okumwa. Mayiyo atangotsegula chitsekocho bamboyo anafikira kumugwira ndi kumukankhira ku chipinda komwe anamukakamiza kuti achite naye zadama koma mayiyo anakuwa ndipo anthu ozungulira ndi omwe anamupulumutsa. Atawonekera ku bwalo la milandu, bamboyo anawukana mlanduwo ndipo bwalo linabweretsa mboni zinayi zomwe zinachititsa kuti bamboyo apezeke olakwa. Popereka chigamulo chake First Grade Magistrate Damiano Banda anati wapereka chilango chotere kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Bessam Nyirenda amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mkombe mfumu yaikulu Kaphaizi m’boma la Kasungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha Anthu aku Ntcheu Athandize Pothetsa Nkhanza kwa Amayi
news: Anthu ozungulira madera a mfumu yayikulu kwataine ndiponso Makwangwala awapempha kuti akhale ndi udindo othandiza boma pothana ndi mchitidwe wa nkhaza kwa amayi ndi atsikana. Khansala wa Dzunje ward mayi Stella Mpaso ndi omwe apereka pempholi pa mkumano omwe iwo anakonzera adindo ozungulira maderawa lachiwiri, zitadziwika kuti mchitidwewu wakula kwambiri mderali. Iwo anati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti mchitidwe ochitira nkhaza amayi ndi atsikana sukutha ngakhale mabungwe ambiri omenyera ufulu wa amayi ku derali akangalika kuzindikiritsa anthu za kuyipa kwa mchitidwewu. Khansala Mpaso anapereka chitsanzo cha msika wa Kampepuza pomwe anati pa tsiku lachisanu pamakhala ana achitsikana omwe amagona ndi abambo ochuluka pa nyumbu ya alendo yotchedwa Ndiyambandine zomwe zikuthandizira kuti atsikana ambiri atenge mimba zosakonzekera kuphatikizapo kulowa m’banja adakali achichepere. Iwo anati kuwonjezera pamenepa, miyambo ina monga chinamwali ndi zina mwa zomwe zikusokoneza ntchito yolimbana ndi mchitidwe wa nkhanza-wu ponena kuti panthawi ya mwambo wa chinamwali, atsikana ambiri amalandira mphatso za zitenje zambiri zomwe zimathandizira kuti anawa akhale ndi maganizo okwatiwa powona kuchuluka kwa nsaluzo. M’mawu ake wapampando wa komiti yowona za chitukuko mdera la mfumu yaikulu Kwataine a Clement Mwanza anagwirizana ndi mayi Mpaso ponena kuti mchitidwe wochitira nkhanza amayi ndi atsikana pa nkhani yogonana ndi waukulu ku derali. Poyankhulapo mlembi wa mfumu yayikulu Kwataine a MacDonald Kamenya anati ndi zoona kuti mchitidwewu wakhala ukuchitika, kufikira pano pomwe iwo akuwona kuti mabungwe kuphatikizapo ofesi yowona kuti pasakhale kusiyana pa kagwiridwe ka ntchito pakati pa abambo ndi amayi athandizira kuti nkhazazi zichepe. M’modzi mwa ogwira ntchito ku ofesi yowona zoti pasakhale kusiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo pakagwiridwe ka ntchito a Naomi Agabu anati aliyense akuyenera kukhala ndi udindo wothandizira kuti mchitidwe wa nkhaza-wu uthe ku derali. Mkumanowu unachitika ndi thandizo la ndalama kuchokera ku bungwe la NGO Gender Coodination Network.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lachotsa Makomishonala Awiri a Bungwe la MEC
news: Boma lachotsa pa ntchito makomishonala awiri a bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la Malawi Electoral Commission ati kamba kosayendetsa nawo bwino zisankho za m’chaka cha 2019. Kazako: President wakale sanatsate malamulo Makomishonalawa a Linda Kunje komanso Dr. Jean Mathanga akhala akugwirabe ntchito ku bungweli kuchokera pomwe adasankhidwanso ndi mtsogoleri wakale wa dziko lino Peter Mutharika chaka chatha. Kalata yomwe mlembi wamkulu wa boma a Zanga-Zanga Chikhosi adasayina pa 7 April yopita kwa makomishonalawa yati motsatira malamulo oyendetsera zisankho komanso chigamulo cha ku bwalo lalikulu la milandu la Supreme cha pa 8 May chaka chatha, kusankhidwanso kwa makomishonalawa komwe kudachitika ndi mtsogoleri wakaleyu sikudali koyenera ndipo nchifukwa chake boma lachotsa awiriwa pa ntchito. Polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi lachiwiri, m’neneri wa boma a Gospel Kazako ati kusankhidwa kwa makomishonala a bungwe loyendetsa zisankho la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) kumayenera kuchitika motsatira malamulo zomwe sizidatsatidwe pa nthawi yomwe awiriwa ankasankhidwanso. A Kazako anati, “Malamulo samalora kuti munthu amene sakugwira bwino ntchito apitilize kugwira ntchitoyo choncho ife ngati boma lotsata malamulo tatsatira zimene linanena bwalo la milandu la Supreme.” Mathanga: Ife sitidalakwitse Apa a Kazako ati motsatira ndondomeko, boma lisankhamso makomishonala ena olowa m’malo mwa awiri. Polankhulapo pa za kuchotsedwaku m’modzi mwa makomishonalawa Dr Jean Mathanga ati iwo sakuwona pomwe adalakwitsa komabe ati si odabwa ndi zomwe boma lachitazi. “Ife sitidalakwitse chifukwa kalatayo akukamba zonena kuti akutichotsa chifukwa chakuti a Supreme court adanena kuti ifeyo tinali osayenera kugwira ntchito komano chilungamo nchakuti kulibeko chigamulo chimene chidabwera ku Supreme court kunena kuti ifeyo ndi osayenera chifukwa olo atati afunsidwe a bomawo sangakupatseni chigamulocho,” anatero Dr. Mathanga. Awiriwa akhala ali makomishonala okhawo omwe adayendetsa nawo chisankho cha mchaka cha 2019 omwe amagwirabe ntchito ku bungwe la MEC kufikira pano. Bwalo la milandu la High Court lidagamula pa 3 February chaka chatha kuti chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa dziko chichitikenso kaamba koti sichidayendetsedwe bwino zomwe pambuyo pake bwalo la milandu la Supreme komanso nyumba ya malamulo adapeza kuti makomishonala a bungwe la MEC adalephera kuyendetsa bwino chisankhocho.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Tereza Woyera Wa Ku Avila Ndi Chitsanzo Chakufunika Kwa Amayi Mu Mpingo, Mdziko
news: Pokondwerera kuti tsopano papita zaka makumi asanu (50) kuchokera pomwe mpingo wa katolika udalengeza kuti Tereza Woyera wa ku Avila ndi dokotala wa mpingo, Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga kwa Archbishop Gil Tamayo wa ku Ávila m’dziko la Spain. Papa Francisco wayamba uthenga wake ndi kunena kuti Tereza Woyera wa ku Avila ndiye woyera woyamba kutchulidwa dokotala wa mpingo. Tereza waku Avila Iye wati potchulidwa kukhala dokotala wa mpingo zikutanthauza kuti zolembalemba za Tereza Woyerayu zili ndi maphunzitso ozama ophunzitsa anthu za Mulungu. Papa Francisco wanena kuti Tereza Woyera wa ku Avila sadali mayi wamba popeza adachita zinthu zolozeka m’moyo wake ndipo kuti nyali yomwe Yesu Khristu adayatsa m’moyo wake ikuyakabe mpaka lero. Iye wati Tereza Woyera adali mayi wolimba mtima, wa nzeru ndipo anali kulandira munthu aliyense yemwe anafika kwa iye. Papa’yu wamaliza ndi kunena kuti kwa anthu omwe akufuna kudziyeretsa pa maso pa Mulungu, Tereza Woyera ndiye chitsanzo. Pokondwerera chaka cha chikulu chimenechi sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Catholic University of Avila m’dziko la Spain yakonza msonkhano wa padera womwe ukuchitika padakali pano mpaka pa 15 April. Papa Paulo Woyera wa 6 adalengeza kuti Tereza Woyera wa ku Avila ndi dokotala wa Mpingo m’chaka cha 1970. Tereza Woyera adabadwa m’chaka cha 1515 ndipo anamwalira m’chaka cha 1582.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MHC Yati Iyamba Kugumula Nyumba Zakale M’mizinda
news: Bungwe la Malawi Housing Corporation (MHC), lati liyamba kugumula nyumba zonse zakale zomwe zili m’mizinda ikulu ikulu ya dziko lino ngati njira imodzi yolimbikitsa kumanga nyumba zatsopano komanso zamakono. Wapampando wa board ya bungweli a Justin Dzonzi ndi omwe anena izi dzulo pa msonkhano wa atolankhani ku Mount Soche Hotel mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Iwo ati nyumba zomwe zili m’madera a Nkolokosa, Old Naperi, Kanjedza, Ndola, Area 43, Falls komanso Chasefu zinamangidwa ngati zamakono mchaka cha 1970, koma ndi kubwera kwa chitukuko nyumbazi zikuyenera zigumulidwe kaamba koti sizoyeneranso kupezeka m’mizindayo. A Dzonzi anati anthu omwe padakalipano akukhala m’nyumbazi asamutsidwa ndi kupititsidwa ku malo ena atsopano pamene akhale akuyamba ntchito yomanga nyumba za makonozi m’maderawa. Polankhulapo mkulu wa bungwe la Malawi Housing Cooperation a Jordan Chipatala anati kumangidwa kwa nyumbazi kuthandiziranso kuti anthu ambiri akhale ndi mwayi wopeza nyumba za bungweli kuti adzikhalamo ponena kuti nyumba zatsopano zokwana 21 sauzande ndi zomwe zimafunika chaka ndi chaka. Iwo ati padakalipano bungweli lili ndi nyumba zokwana 6, 179 poyerekeza ndi anthu okwana 100 sauzande omwe anapempha kale kuti akufuna nyumba za bungweli ndipo akudikilira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Khumi aku Kasungu Anjatidwa
news: Apolisi khumi a pa polisi ya Kasungu amangidwa powaganizira kuti amathandizira mzika 15 za mdziko la Ethiopia komanso zitatu za mdziko la Somalia, kulowa mdziko muno opanda chilolezo. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mdziko muno James Kadadzera watsimikiza za nkhaniyi kudzera mu chikalata chomwe watulutsa lero. Chikalatachi chati apolisiwa akuganiziridwa kuti analandira ndalama kudzera mu njira yotumiza ndi kulandirira ndalama pa lamya za m’manja, kuti alore anthuwa kudutsa m’malo ochitira chipikisheni cha apolisi mdziko muno popanda chovuta. Padakali pano apolisiwa akusungidwa mchitolokosi cha polisi m’boma la Kasungu ndipo akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu ndi kukayankha mlandu wothandizira mzika za m’maiko ena kulowa mdziko muno popanda chilorezo, kugwiritsa ntchito udindo wawo molakwika komanso katangale. Kadadzera wati nthambi ya apolisi mdziko muno idzipereka pochotsa apolisi onse a katangale komanso ochita zosemphana ndi ntchito yawo ndi cholinga choti nthambiyi itumikire bwno a Malawi. Pamenepa iye wapempha anthu kuti adzikaneneza munthu aliyense kuphatikizapo apolisi omwe akuchita zinthu zosavomerezeka ku polisi yomwe ali nayo pafupi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MEC Yati Ichita Kafukufuku pa Mavoti Omwe Amawonongeka
news: Bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) lati likuchita kafukufuku wokhudza mavoti omwe samawerengedwa pa nthawi ya zisankho kuti lidziwe zomwe zimachititsa izi. Wapampando wa bungweli Justice Dr. Chifundo Kachale wanena izi lolemba ku nyumba ya malamulo mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pomwe bungweli limapereka zikalata zoponyera voti zomwe zidagwira ntchito pa chisankho chapadera chomwe chidachitika pa 30 March chaka chino. Kachale: Pakufunika tipeze njira Dr. Kachale ati ambiri mwa mavoti amakhala osachongedwa bwino ndipo kafukufukuyu awunikanso zomwe zimachititsa izi. Iwo ati mavuto okhudza mavoti owonongeka akuchulikirabe ku madera ena pa nthawi ya zisankho ngakhale kuti vutoli ndi laling’ono poyerekeza ndi m’maiko ena. Komabe iwo ati izi zikuyenera kuwunikidwa mozama ndi kupeza njira kuti zikonzedwe ponena kuti ndi udindo wa bungweli kuwonetsetsa kuti voti ya mzika iliyonse ikuwerengedwa pa nthawi ya zisankho. “Ifeyo ndi amene timapanga design ma ballot boxes, ma ballot paper, timapanga design kuti anthu akavota motani. Mwina pali zifukwa zomwe zikupangitsa kuti anthu azilephera kuchoka bwinobwino mwina chifukwa cha design ya ma ballot ndiye zinthu zimenezozo sitingoganiza tokha pafunika kuti tikambirane ndi anthuwo kuti tipeze njira,” anatero Dr. Kachale. Kumbali ya zikalata zoponyera voti zomwe bungweli lakapereka ku nyumba ya malamuloyi kuti zisungidwe, Dr. Kachale anati bungweli limachita izi potsatira malamulo oyendetsera zisankho pofunanso kuwonetsetsa kuti ndondomeko zonse za chisankho zikutsatidwa mowonekera komanso mwa chilungamo ngakhale pomwe chisankho chadutsa. Kachale (kumanzere) kupereka zikalatazo kwa Kachinjika (kumanja) Polankhulapo atalandira zikalatazi, wachiwiri kwa kalaliki wa nyumba ya malamulo a Chikondi Kachinjika anati nyumba ya malumuloyi iwonetsetsa kuti yasunga izi moyenelera. “Ma record-wa timawasunga pa chifukwa kwa chaka chimodzi. Chenicheni chimakhala kuti ngati pali zina zotsutsana ndi pomwe timatha kuzitulutsa,” anatero a Kachinjika. Izi ndi zikalata zomwe zidagwira ntchito pa chisankho chapadera chomwe chidachitika m’madera a aphungu asanu ndi awiri komanso ma ward awiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Ati Adzipereka Poteteza Anthu Othawa Kwawo
news: Apolisi mdziko muno ati adzipereka poteteza anthu othawa kwawo omwe akukhala mdziko muno. Wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa apolisi mdziko muno a Demester Chigwenembe ndi omwe anena izi lachinayi ku malo osungirako anthu othawa kwawo a Dzaleka m’boma la Dowa komwenso amakawona momwe chitetezo chilili ku deralo. Iwo anayamikira ntchito zomwe magulu osiyanasiyana akugwira pofuna kutukula miyoyo ya anthuwa. Chigwenembe: Titeteza anthu amenewa Komabe a Chigwenembe adandaula ndi kuchuluka kwa anthu othawa kwawo omwe akufika ku derali zomwe akuti zili ndi kuthekera kochulutsa chiwerengero cha anthu opezeka ndi nthenda ya COVID-19 mdziko muno kaamba koti anthuwa akamafika mdziko muno amadutsa njira zosavomerezeka ndipo samayezedwa ku nthendayi. Iwo ati awonjezera chiwerengero cha apolisi omwe adzipereka chitetezo ku derali ndi cholinga choti chitetezo cha ku derali chikhale chokhwima kwambiri. Polankhulapo, mkulu woyang’anira ku malowa a Hilary Namakhwa anati ndi okondwa ndi kufika kwa wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa apolisiyu ponena kuti kuthandiza kukhwimitsa chitetezo kwa anthu omwe amakhala ku malowa. Komabe a Namakhwa anati malowa akukumana ndi mavuto ambiri monga kuchepa kwa malo msukulu, kuchepa kwa aphunzitsi poyerekeza ndi kuchuluka kwa ana ophunzira, kuthithikana ku malo komwe anthuwa akukhala ndipo anati kutsatira kubwera kwa mliri wa COVID-19 ntchito zina zinayimitsidwa ku deralo pofuna kupewa kupatsirana kwa kachilomboka. M’mawu ake mkulu wa apolisi mchigawo chapakati kumvuma anati akugwira ntchito modzipereka powonetsetsa kuti anthu othawa kwawo akutetezedwa ku nkhanza za mtundu uliwonse, powonetsetsanso kuti miyoyo yawo komanso katundu wawo ndi zotetezeka. Malo osungirako anthu othawa kwawo a Dzaleka anakhazikitsidwa mwezi wa December mchaka cha 1994 ndipo pa nthawiyo kunali anthu okwana 1,200 omwe ambiri mwa iwo anali ochokera m’maiko a Somalia, Burundi komanso Rwanda. Ngakhale malowa anakhazikitsidwa kuti adzisunga anthu osapyola 12 sauzande, padakalipano ku malowa kuli anthu okwana 48, 824 omwe ambiri mwa iwo ndi ochokera m’maiko a Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC), Burundi komanso Rwanda.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Silinatenge Chiletso-Malimba
news: Bungwe la Teachers Union of Malawi (TUM) latsutsa zokuti boma latenga chiletso choyimitsa sitiraka ya aphunzitsi mdziko muno. Wapampando wa bungweli a Willy Malimba ndi omwe wanena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati bungwe lawo lalandira chidziwitso kuchokera ku khothi kuti boma likufuna kutenga chiletsochi ndipo lapereka masiku awiri ku bungweli kuti likhale litayankha chikalatachi. “Tati tikonze dzulo panamveka kuti a boma atenga chiletso koma sizili choncho ayi. M’malo mwake akuti akufuna atenge chiletsocho ndiye akutidziwitsa kuti tiyankhe pasanathe masiku awiri zomwe zalembedwa m’menemomo,” anatero a Malimba. Komabe a Malimba sanafotokoze zomwe zalembedwa kuti ayankhe mu kalatayi koma iwo anati ayankha kalatayi mu nthawi yake. Malinga ndi a Malimba, zimenezi zikutathauza kuti sitiraka ya aphunzitsiwa ikupitilirabe chifukwa palibe chiletso chilichonse chomwe chatengedwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Chembe Alimbikitsa Gulu la Proud Catholics mu Dayosizi ya Dedza
news: Gulu la Proud Catholics mu dayosizi ya Dedza alipempha kuti lipitirize ntchito yomwe likugwira yosamalira ansembe a mu dayosiziyi. Bambo Samson Chembe omwe amatumikira ku parish ya Nsipe mu dayosiziyi ndi omwe anena izi lolemba pa m’bindikiro omwe gululi linali nawo. Iwo anati gululi lakhala likugwira ntchito yopereka Katundu osiyanasiyana m’maparish a dayosiziyi zomwe zikuthandiza ansembe a maparishiwa kugwira ntchito yawo mosavuta. Pomaliza bambowa apempha akhristu a dayosiziyi kuti alowe mu gululi ndi cholinga choti ntchito zake zipitirire kuyenda bwino. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa mamembala a gululi, mayi Mary Matchowa kuchokera ku Salima anati m’bindikirowu omwe unachitikira ku Chipoka wawalimbitsa kuti azindikire za udindo wawo kuti ndi utumiki. Pamapeto pa zonse gulu la Proud Catholics mu dayosizi-yi linachititsa chisankho ma’mudindo osiyanasiyana potengera kuti adindo omwe amagwira ntchitoyi amayigwira mongogwirizira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Kuchitira Nkhanza Ana Ndi Koyipa
news: Tsiku la 8 April ndi loganizira nkhanza zosiyana-siyana zomwe ana amakumana nazo komanso kuganizira njira zothetsera m’chitidwewu; World Day for Child Sexual Abuse Prevention, Healing and Justice. Polankhula mu uthenga wake kwa nthumwi za ku msonkhano wokambirana za nkhanzazi ndi njira zothetsera m’chitidwewu, Papa Francisco wati kuchitira ana nkhanza kukuyenera kutheratu popeza ndi mchitidwe woyipa kwambiri. Iye wati akukhulupirira kuti njira zipezeka zothetsera m’chitidwe woyipawu kudzera mu msonkhanowu omwe wabweretsa pamodzi akatswiri osiyana-siyana komanso atsogoleri a mpingo. Ndipo polankhula ku msonkhanowu kuyimirira mpingo wa katolika, Cardinal Seán Patrick O’Malley yemwe ndi president wa bungwe la mu mpingo wa katolika lowona kuti ana sakuchitiridwa nkhanza, Pontifical Commission for the Protection of Minors wati mpingo wa katolika uli ndi udindo woteteza ndi kusamalira anthu ake monga anthu achikulire, achinyamata ndipo makamaka ana. Cardinal O’Malley wati pena ndi pena Mpingo sudathe kukwaniritsa udindo umenewu ndipo wati Mpingo wa Katolika uyetsetsa kuchita bwino ndi kukonza zofooka zake pa nkhani imeneyi. Msonkhano wa masiku atatuwu omwe wayamba pa 8 April wakonzedwa ndi sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Harvard University mogwirizana ndi Pontifical Commission for the Protection of Minors osaiwala sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Catholic University of America.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dayosizi ya Karonga Yati ndi Yokhudzidwa ndi Imfa ya Bishop Maluma aku Tanzania
news: Dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Karonga mdziko muno yati ndi yokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya Ambuye Alfred Leonard Maluma a dayosizi ya Njombe mdziko la Tanzania. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za dayosizi ya Karonga, bambo Edward Kamanga, Ambuye Maluma amwalira dzulo ku chipatala china mu mzinda wa Dar es Salaam kutsatira ngozi yomwe anachita pa 20 mwezi watha pamene anali akuchokera ku farm ina ya dayosizi yawo yomwe ili mu mzinda wa Morogoro mdzikolo. Malemu ambuye Maluma Bambo Kamanga ati dayosisiyi ndi yokhudzidwa ndi imfayi kaamba koti madayosizi awiriwa amathandizana mu njira zambiri komanso zitukuko zambiri zomwe Ambuye Martin Mtumbuka akuchita mu dayosizi ya Karonga ndi upangiri ochokera kwa malemu Ambuye Maluma. “Madayosizi athu awiriwa akhala ali pa ubale wabwino kuyambira pakanthawi. Asemino athu amasamalidwa ndi dayosizi ya Njombe pamene akuchita maphunziro awo komanso achinyamata awo amazaphunzira ku sukulu za dayosizi yathu kuno ifenso achinyamata athu akuphunzira ku ma technical college awo. Zitukuko zonse zomwe Ambuye Martin Mtumbuka akuchita mu dayosizi muno monga yofuna kupanga magetsi athu oti tizigulitsa ku boma, kampani yogaya ndi kupakila mpunga, ma farm zonsezi zikuchitika ndi upangiri omwe anapatsidwa ndi Ambuye Maluma aku Tanzania,” anatero bamboo Kamanga. Ambuye Alfred Leonard Maluma anabadwa pa 12 December 1955 mdera lotchedwa Lukami mu dayosizi ya Njombe mdziko la Tanzania. Iwo anadzodzedwa unsembe pa 17 November, 1975 ndipo anasankhidwa kukhala episkopi wa dayosisi ya Njombe pa 1 September mchaka cha 2002. Ambuye Maluma amwalira ali ndi zaka 65 zakubadwa komanso zaka 19 za u episkopi. Mzimu wa Ambuye Alfred Leonard Maluma uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe La UNDP Lati Likufuna Nyumba ya Malamulo Izichita Zinthu Mwamakono
news: Bungwe la United Nations Development Program (UNDP) lati likufuna nyumba ya malamulo iyambe kuchita zinthu zake monga zokambirana pogwiritsa ntchito njira za makono za pa intaneti. Mkulu wa bungweli kuno ku Malawi a Shigeki Komatsubara anena izi lachiwiri pamwambo wapadera wopereka zipangizo za makono za intaneti ku nyumba ya malamulo mu mzinda wa Lilongwe kuti zizithandizira pa nthawi ya zokambirana za aphungu. Zipangizozi zomwe zilipo zokwana 377 ndi monga ma computer, ma plasma screen, ma camera, komanso zida zolumikizira ku intanet kungotchulapo zochepa chabe zomwe akuti adayamba kupereka mkatimkati mwa chaka chatha. Mayi Gotani-Hara kulandira katunduyo kuchokera kwa a Komatsubara Malinga ndi a Komatsubara, zidazi ndi zoti zithandizire mikumano ya aphunguwa maka mu nthawi ino ya mliri wa Coronavirus komanso pa ntchito zina zomwe aphunguwa amayenera kugwira tsiku ndi tsiku. A Komatsubara anati, “Covid-19 adatitsekura maso kuti tifulumizitse thandizo loti tipereke ku nyumba ya malamuloyi. Tidayamba ndikuthandiza aphungu kuti atetezeke ndipo limodzi ndi utsogoleri wa nyumbayi tikhala tikupitilizabe kugwira ntchito kuti zochitika za m’nyumbayi ziziyenda bwino komanso kufikira anthu onse.” Iwo anapitiliza kunena kuti, “Ntchito yathu siithera pano, tiyesetsanso kuti zambiri zomwe zizichitika kuno zikhale zamakono kuti ntchito ya aphungu ikhale yofunikira komanso yosavuta.” M’mawu ake atalandira thandizoli, Sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo mayi Catherine Gottan-Hara anati kutsatira kukhudzidwa kwa nyumbayi ndi Coronavirus kufikiranso kuti aphunga ena adataya miyoyo yawo, zidazi zithandizira kuti aphungu apitilire kukumana potsatira njira za makonozi pofuna kuchepetsa chiwopsezo chopatsirana kachiromboka pakati pawo. Mayi Gottan-Hara anatinso kusintha zochitika za ku nyumbayi kuti zizichitika mwa makono kudzera pa intaneti kuthandizira kuti azipulumutsa nthawi yomwe imawonongeka pa zinthu zochepa. Iwo anati, “Mwina chachikulu chimene anthu angathe kuchiwona ndi nkhani ya kuvota. Panopa kuvota kumatitengera mwina ola limodzi ndi theka chifukwa choti timavota pa manja kuyitana munthu m’modzi kuti avote zimene ma parliament a anzathu ambiri samachedwa ndi zimenezo, munthu amavota pa tebulo pompanja kungotobwanya kabatani, zimatenga nthawi yochepa ndiye ifenso tikufuna titenge njira yoti tizivota potobwanya mabatani.” Polankhulaponso, mtsogoleri wa zokambirana ku nyumbayi a Richard Chimwendo Banda anati akuyembekezera kuti bugwe la Macra komanso unduna wa zofalitsa nkhani uchita chothekera posachedwa kukonza mavuto a network omwenso akhala akulepheretsa aphungu ena kutsatira nawo bwino zokambiranazi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha a Katolika Azipemphelera Magulu Omenyera Ufulu Wa Anthu
news: Mwezi uliwonse Papa amakhala ndi cholinga cha mapemphero ake (prayer intention). Mwezi uno wa April cholinga cha a Papa m’mapemphero awo ndi kupemphelera onse omwe amayika miyoyo yawo pa chiswe pomenyera ufulu wa anthu m’maiko momwe ulamuliro wake ndi wa nkhanza, wosamva za ena komanso ngakhale m’maiko momwe ulamuliro wa demokalase sukuyenda bwino. Ndipo m’mawu ake pofotokozera cholinga chimenechi mu uthenga wake wa pa kanema wopita ku dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wapempha a Katolika kuti azipemphelera anthu omwe amamenyera ndi kuteteza ufulu wa anthu m’maiko osiyana-siyana kuti ntchito yawo izibereka zipatso zochuluka. “Ndikutanthauza kupemphelera anthu omwe akuyetsetsa kuti anthu osauka avuwuke mu umphawi, kupemphelera anthu omwe akuyetsetsa kuti onse azilemekezedwa mofanana ndipo kuti pasakhale kusiyana pakati pa anthu, kupempherera omwe akumenyera ufulu wa anthu kuti apeze ntchito, kuti anthu akhale ndi malo awo awo okhalapo, omanga nyumba ndi kumalimapo ndipo kupempherera anthu omwe akumenyera ufulu wa anthu ogwira ntchito,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati akuzindikira kuti ntchito yomenyera ndi kuteteza ufulu wa anthu si ntchito ya pafupi koma ndiyosowa kulimba mtima komanso kuchita khama. Ndipo bambo Fréderic Fornos, wansembe wa chipani cha mu Mpingo wa Katolika cha the Society of Jesus omwe amayang’anira ntchito yopempherera cholinga cha mapemphero a Papa mwezi uliwonse ati Papa Francisco wakhala akulankhula mwa mphamvu za kusiyana komwe kulipo pakati pa anthu olemera omwe akukhala mu ulemerero wosaneneka wa chuma pamene anthu osauka ali mu umphawi wadzaoneni.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Amanga Anthu Enanso Awiri pa Mlandu Wa Kuba Mwana Wa Khungu La Chialubino
news: Pamene kafukufuku wa apolisi akupitilira ku Chikwawa pa nkhani ya kubedwa khanda la chialubino, anthu enanso awiri awanjata kaamba kowaganizira kuti akukhuzidwa ndi kubedwa kwa mwanayu. Apolisi m’bomali awuza Radio Maria kuti awiriwa ndi Caroline Stazio wa zaka 21 zakubadwa, yemwe ndi mayi wa mwana wobedwayo ndi Henderson Tulusida, wa zaka 60 zakubadwa, yemwe ndi gogo wa mwanayo. Awiriwa ndi ochokera m’mudzi mwa Tulusida, kwa mfumu yaikulu Ngabu m’boma lomwelo la Chikwawa. Padakali pano, anthu onse oganiziridwa kuti akukhudzidwa ndi kubedwa kwa mwana wa khungu la chialubinoyu akwana asanu. Apolisi ati ntchito yosakasaka anthu ena oganiziridwa pa mlanduwu ikupitilira. Sabata yatha, ofesi ya apolisi m’dziko muno idalengeza kuti yayika ndalama zokwana 1-million-kwacha kuti zithandizire kugwira anthu omwe adaba mwanayu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Woyendetsa Ngolo Wamwalira Atawombedwa Ndi Galimoto Ku Chikwawa
news: Bambo wina woyendetsa ngolo wamwalira pa ngozi ya pa msewu ngolo yomwe amayendetsa itagundidwa ndi galimoto m’boma la Chikwawa. Malinga ndi mneneri wa apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Dickson Matemba, ngoziyo yachitika lachiwiri nthawi ya 6 koloko chakumadzulo pafupi ndi chipata cha Nyala Park mu nsewu wa Chikwawa-Nsanje. Matemba wati ngoziyo yachitika pamene galimoto ya mtundu wa Toyota Hilux yomwe namabala yake ndi BLK 9123 yomwe dalayivala wake ndi Diston Makina wa za 58 zakubadwa, momwe munali anthu anayi, inawomba kumbuyo kwa ngolo yomwe amawongolera malemuyu, Donnick Binzi. Pa ngoziyo, Binzi anavulala m’mutu, pa chifuwa komanso mikono ndipo anamwalira atangofika ku chipatala cha boma la Chikwawa, ndipo munthu wina yemwe anali naye limodzi mu ngoloyo anavulala. Ngakhale zili choncho, woyendetsa galimotoyu wapulumuka pa ngoziyo osavulala paliponse. Padakali pano, apolisi m’bomalo achenjeza onse oyendetsa ngolo pa nsewu kuti apewe kuyenda nthawi ya usiku komanso azikhala ndi nyale ndi zinthu zina zonyezimira pa ngolo zawo. Malemuyu, Donnick Binzi wa zaka 32 zakubadwa, amachokera m’mudzi mwa Bereu kwa mfumu yaikulu Maseya m’boma la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhristu Asatope Kufunafuna Ambuye Yesu Wouka Kwa Akufa
news: Polankhula lolemba ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti asananene pemphero la Virgo Maria Kondwani Alleluia, Papa Francisco wati pokhala pafupi ndi Yesu Khristu owuka kwa akufa, akhristu amapeza mtendere weniweni wa mu mtima. Pa chifukwa ichi iye walimbikitsa akhristu kuti asatope kufunafuna Ambuye Yesu owuka kwa akufa popeza ndiye amapereka moyo ndi mtendere wokhalitsa. Papa Francisco wati Amayi aja atapita kumanda sanatsimikize kwenikweni kuti Ambuye Yesu waukadi koma kuti chomwe amayiwa adatha kutsimikiza ndi choti Ambuye Yesu munalibemo mmandamo. Iye wati ndi mnjelo wa Mulungu yemwe adatsimikizira amayiwa kuti Yesu waukadi. Pamenepa iye wakumbutsa akhristu kuti tsiku lolemba la pasaka limadziwika kuti Monday of the Angels mu chingerezi kapena kuti Lunedi dell’Angelo mu chitaliyana chifukwa cha nkumano wa amayi omwe anapita kumanda aja ndi mnjelo wa Mulungu monga Uthenga Wabwino wa pa tsikuli ufotokozera. Papa’yu wati akhristu akuyenera kuchilimika pofunafuna Ambuye Yesu wouka kwa akufa yemwe ndi gwero la moyo ndi mtendere wokhalitsa. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti ndi khumbo lake kuti munthu aliyense, banja lililonse lilandire ndi manja awiri Ambuye Yesu wouka kwa akufa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Aphunzitsi Ayambiranso Kunyanyala Ntchito
news: Aphunzitsi a sukulu za boma m’dziko muno ayambiranso kunyanyala ntchito potsatira kulephera kwa boma kuwapatsa ndalama zoti ziwathandize kudzitetezera ku mliri wa COVID-19. Poyankhulapo mtsogoleri wa bungwe la aphunzitsi a sukulu za boma la Teachers Union of Malawi (TUM), a Willie Malimba ati masiku asanu ndi awiri omwe anapereka ku boma kuti akwaniritse pempho lawo, atha popanda kuphulapo kanthu. A Malimba ati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti boma silikulabadira za umoyo wa aphunzitsi ndi ophunzira. Pa chifukwachi, bungwe la TUM lapempha mamembala ake kuti ayambirenso kunyanyala ntchito lachiwiri lino. Iwo anenetsa kuti apitiriza kunyanyala ntchito kufikira atalandira ndalama za ukadziwotche za miyezi itatu pakamodzi. Koma poyankhupo, katswiri woyankhulapo pa nkhani zosiyanasiya m’dziko muno, a Humphreys Mvula ati nthawi yomwe sukulu zakhala zikutsekedwa ndi kulanga ana osalakwa, nthawi yomwe idzakhala ikulatsa mitima yawo moyo wao onse. Akadaulo ndi anthu wamba akhala akudzudzula kuyimayima kwa ntchito za maphunziro m’dziko muno kuyambira mwezi wa March, 2020 kutsatira kupezeka kwa kachirombo ka corona m’dziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Imfa Ya Cardinal Tumi
news: Potsatira imfa ya Cardinal Christian Tumi wa m’dziko la Cameroon lachisanu lapitali, Papa Francisco lamulungu watumiza uthenga wopepesa kwa Archbishop Samuel Kleda wa archdiocese ya Douala m’dzikolo. Papa ndi Cardinal Tumi Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfayi kaamba koti Cardinal Tumi mwa zina anali wodziwika bwino kwambiri pa nkhani yolimbikitsa ulamuliro wa demokalase komanso ufulu wa anthu. “Ndine wokhudzidwa kwambiri pakumva za imfa ya m’bale wathu Cardinal Christian Tumi, pa chifukwa ichi ndi kupepesa komanso kuikiza m’mapemphero ma Cardinal onse, anamfedwa onse ndi anzao onse,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawo. Cardinal Tumi yemwe anapuma m’chaka cha 2009 anasankhidwa kukhala Cardinal ndi Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera m’chaka cha 1988. Ngati Cardinal iye anatumikira m’maudindo osiyanasiyana ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican. Cardinal Tumi wamwalira ali ndi zaka 91.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dalaivala Wanjatidwa Kaamba Kofuna Kuzembetsa Anthu
news: Apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa akusunga m’chitolokosi Felix Tembo wa zaka 32 zakubadwa, yemwe ndi ndi woyendetsa galimoto pomuganizira kuti amafuna kuzembetsa mzika za ku Ethiopia zokwana zisanu ndi ziwiri komanso mzika zina za dziko lino zokwana khumi ndi ziwiri. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sergeant Dickson Matemba wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti agwira ndi kutsekera m’chitokosi Felix Tembo pomuganizira kuti anatenga anthuwa kuti apite nawo kunja kwa dziko lino. Matemba wati Tembo yemwe amayendetsa galimoto ya mtundu wa minibus yomwe nambala yake ndi MHG 6400, wagwidwa pa malo ochitira chipikisheni a Kamuzu Bridge, anthu akufuna kwabwino atawatsina khutu apolisi a m’bomali. Panthawiyi, anthu omwe anali pa ulendowu analephera kupereka ziphaso zawo za pa ulendo, ndipo apolisi atumiza anthuwa ku ofesi yowona za anthu olowa ndi kutuka m’dziko muno ya m’bomali, komanso alanda minibasiyo. Pamenepa, Matemba wati apolisi atsekulira mlandu woyendetsa galimotoyu kaamba konyamula anthu mopyola muyezo, komanso onse okwera chifukwa chophwanya malamulo ozitetezera ku COVID-19 posavala tinsalu tophimba pakamwa ndi pa mphuno (face mask), ndipo akawonekera ku bwalo la mlandu posachedwapa.
