Apolisi ayamikira ubale wabwino omwe ulipo pakati pa iwo ndi mzika za Malawi pofuna kuthetsa m’chitidwe wozembetsa anthu omwe wakula kwambiri m’dziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Kuuka Kwa Ambuye Yesu Kukuyenera Kuchotsa Mantha M’moyo Wa Akhristu
news: Mu malaliko ake pa misa yotsegulira chikondwelero cha Pasaka, Papa Francisco wati kuwuka kwa Ambuye Yesu kwa akufa kukuyenera kuchotsa mantha m’mitima ya anthu ndipo m’malo mwake kubzalamo chiyembekezo. Iye wati mawu a mnjelo kwa amayi aja kumanda oti “Musaope” ndi uthenga omwe ukuyenera kufikira anthu ambiri lero omwe mitima yawo ndi yosweka ndipo yodzadzidwa ndi nkhawa kaamba ka mavuto osiyana-siyana kuphatikizapo mliri wa Coronavirus. Papa Francisco wawunikiranso za tanthauzo la mau oti “…kupita ku Galileya” omwe iye wati akutanthauza kuyambanso mwatsopano. Iye wati Mulungu ali ndi kuthekera konse kodzutsa anthu omwe apsinjika, kuthekera kotonthoza anthu olira, anthu omwe mitima yawo ndi yosweka ngakhalenso anthu omwe alibe chiyembekezo m’moyo wawo. Papa Francisco wati Pasaka ndi yoti anthu awuke m’manda a mitundumitundu ndi kuyambanso moyo wina watsopano. Ndipo mu uthenga wake wa padera wopita ku mzinda wa Rome komanso ku dziko lonse omwe amaupereka pa masiku akuluakulu wodziwika kuti Urbi et Orbi, wati Yesu Khristu ndiye chiyembekezo cha akhristu chomwe ndi chosakhumudwitsa. Papa Francisco wati kuwuka kwa Ambuye Yesu kwa akufa ndi uthenga wa mphamvu wa chiyembekezo pa nthawi ino ya mliri wa Coronavirus komanso ndi uthenga wa chiyembekezo kwa anthu omwe ali m’maiko momwe muli nkhondo, anthu omwe sali pa ntchito, anthu omwe ali m’mavuto a za chuma angakhalenso ana a sukulu omwe akulephera kuphunzira kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus. Mwa njira ya padera watchula dziko la Myanmar komwe asilikali adalanda boma ndipo wapemphelera achinyamata a m’dzikolo kaamba kolimba mtima kuteteza ulamuliro wa demokalase komanso maiko ena ngati Yemen, Syria, Ukraine, Nagorno-Karabakh, Nigeria, Mozambique ndi ena. Atamaliza uthengawu Papa Francisco wapereka madalitso ake a upositoli ku dziko lonse. Uthenga wa paderawu omwe amaupereka pa zenera la nyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace loyang’ana bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square lodzadza ndi anthu kwa zaka ziwiri tsopano izi sizinachitike malinga ndi mliri wa coronavirus ndipo m’malo mwake Papa Francisco wapereka uthengawu mu tchalitchi la likulu la Saint Peter’s Basilica itangotha Misa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Layamikira Bungwe la Action Aid Pokweza Ntchito Zaumoyo
news: Nduna yowona kuti pasakhale kusiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo, chitukuko cha m’madera ndi chisamaliro cha anthu, mayi Patricia Kaliati ati ntchito zomwe bungwe la Action Aid Malawi lakhala likugwira zathandizira kwambiri pa ntchito yolimbana ndi matenda a chifuwa chachikulu cha TB komanso HIV/AIDS m’madera ambiri m’dziko muno. Iwo amalankhula izi lachinayi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pa mwambo omwe bungweli limafotokoza momwe project yothandiza pa kulimbana ndi matendawa idayendera kuchokera pomwe idayamba m’mwezi wa January 2018 mpaka December 2020. Malinga ndi mayi Kaliati bungwe la Action Aid Malawi lakhala likufikira madera ambiri ndi uthenga wa momwe anthu angapewere matenda a HIV/AIDS komanso chifuwa chachikulu cha TB zomwe zathandizira kuchepetsa nkhani zokhudza matendawa m’madera ambiri a m’dziko muno. Kaliati: Abambo akuchuluka kukonderana Iwo anatsindika kuti ndondomeko zomwe bungweli lidakhazikitsa m’maderawa zathandizira anthu kuzindikira zomwe akuyenera kuchita pa nkhani zokhudza matendawa komanso za uchembere wabwino. Komabe ndunayi yati bungweli likuyenera kuchilimikanso ndi kuwonetsetsa kuti anthu aphunzitsidwa mokwanira kumbali yolimbana ndi nkhanza za m’banja. “Nkhani ya Gender based violence ili pena paliponse mmidzimu. Tiwapemphenso kuti m’midzimu tichite train azimayi, azibambo chifukwa nthawi zambiri azibambo amakonda kukonderana kuti safuna ayike azibambo anzawo pamavuto ngakhale akudziwa kuti apanga zoyipa koma tikakhala ndi makomiti m’midzimu azimayi azitha kuyima ndikunena kuti tatopa nazo ndi kumakalengezetsa kapena kukanena ku polisi,” anatero mayi Kaliati. M’mawu ake mkulu wa bungwe la Action Aid Malawi, a Assan Golowa ati akukhulupilira kuti pomwe ntchitoyi ikhale ikupitilira mu gawo lina, iwonjezera kuthandiza anthu mokwanira kuti nkhani zokhudza chifuwa cha TB ndi kufala kwa HIV zicheperetu. Maria kufotokozera mayi Kaliati zomwe adaphunzirapo Iwo ati project-yi siyidangoyang’ana pothandiza kupewa kufala kwa matenda okha komanso idathandiza anthuwa ndi luso losiyanasiyana lomwe ati liwathandiza kuti akhale odzidalira pa chuma. “Poti ntchito yathu timagwira kumadela kwenikweni ku midzi, ku midzi kumeneko anthu tawasiya ndi luso kubzolera mmagulu osiyanasiyana, anthu akutha kudziwa ubwino wakuyezetsa HIV, anthu akudziwa kudziteteza ku matenda ngati a TB komanso kuli magulu amene akuthandiza makamaka achitsikana ndi azimayi ang’onoang’ono amene adziwa kuti kodi angadziteteze bwanji ku nkhanza zomwe amakumana nazo,” anatero a Golowa. Polankhulaponso Maria Phiri wa ku Area 25 ku Lilongwe yemwe ndi m’modzi mwa atsikana omwe apindulako ndi upangiri wa luso lomwe bungweli lakhala likupereka m’maderawa wati wathandizika kwambiri pa umoyo wake. Iye anati kudzera mmagulu a bank mkhonde omwe adakhazikitsidwa amatha kubwerekana ndalama zomwe amachitira mabizinezi ang’onoang’ono. “Ndikuwalangiza atsikana anzanga kuti tikawona magulu ngati amenewa tizipita nawo mmagulu amenewa momwe mumakhala maluso osiyanasiyana monga ngati ife tidaphunzira luso la kusoka, za decoration, za salon zomwe zimatithandiza pa moyo wathu wa tsiku ndi tsiku,” anatero Maria. Bungweli lakhala likugwira ntchitozi ndi thandizo la ndalama kuchokera ku bungwe la Global Fund m’maboma okwana makumi awiri, asanu ndi awiri (27).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Atatu Anjatidwa Powaganizira Kuti Akukhudzidwa Ndi Kuzembetsedwa Kwa Mwana Wachialbino
news: Anthu wamba komanso adindo m’boma la Chikwawa avomereza kuti ali ndi nkhawa pa momwe mwana wa khungu la chialubino wasowera lachisanu sabata yatha. Mpakana pano, mwanayu sakupezeka. Mayi wa khandali, Caroline Stazio, wati wakhala akuvutika m’maganizo kuyambira pomwe anthu anamubera mwana wake iye ali mtulo. “Chodetsa nkhawa n’chakuti sindikudziwa momwe mwanayu aliri padakali pano,” watero mayi Stazio. Padakalipano apolisi ati akugwiritsa ntchito ukadaulo wosiyanasiyana pofuna kufika pa phata la nkhaniyi. Mkulu wa apolisi ku Chikwawa, Assistant Commissioner Donnie Chionda, wati apolisi akuyika chidwi poteteza maufulu a anthu posalabadira ulumali omwe ali nawo. Iye wati, ichi n’chifukwa chake ofesi ya apolisi m’dziko muno yayika padera ndalama zokwana 1-million-kwacha zoti apereke kwa yemwe angapereke uthenga wa komwe kuli mwanayu komanso kuthandiza kupeza omwe aba mwanayu. Chionda wati padakali pano anthu atatu awanjata kale powaganizira kuti akudziwapo kanthu pa kubedwa kwa mwanayu. Anthuwa akuwasunga m’chitolokosi cha ku ndende ya boma la Chikwawa pomwe kafukufuku akupitilira. Poyankhulapo mkulu wa bungwe lowona za maufulu a anthu la Centre for Human Rights and Rehabilitation (CHRR), Michael Kayiyatsa wati mothandizana ndi apolisi akulimbikitsa anthu kuopsa kochitirana nkhanza za mtunduwu, ndipo akuchita misonkhano yophunzitsa anthu za udindo wawo potetezana ku nkhanza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akakhala ku Ndende Zaka 12 Kaamba Kogwililira Mwana Womupeza
news: Bwalo la milandu la Chikwawa First Grade Magistrate, lachisanu lalamula a James Chalenga a zaka 64 zakubadwa kukagwira ukayidi kwa zaka khumi ndi ziwiri kaamba kogwilira mwana wake womupeza wa zaka khumi ndi zisanu (15) zakubadwa. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa, Sergeant Dickson Matemba, wati woyimira mlandu kumbali ya boma Sergeant Emmanuel Namarwa adauza bwaloli kuti Chalenga adapalamula mlanduwu pa 9 February, 2021 pomwe mayi wa msungwanayu anapita ku maliro a m’bale wake ku Thekerani ndi kusiya mwanayo ndi bambo akewo. Ndipo mkati mwa usiku bamboyu adapita ku chipinda kwa msungwanayu komwe adamuchita za chipongwezi. Pamenepa bamboyu adamutseka mwanayu pakamwa pomuwopseza kuti asawuze aliyense. Zitatha izi, msungwanayu adafotokozera mayi wake omwe adakatula nkhaniyi ku polisi, ndipo adamutengera ku chipatala kukatsimikiza. Mu bwalo la mlandu a Chalenga adawukana mlanduwu omwe ndi wotsutsana ndi gawo 138 la Malamulo a dziko lino, zomwe zidachititsa a mbali ya boma kubweretsa mboni zitatu. Pamenepa, a Chalenga adapempha bwaloli kuti liwapatse chilango chofewa popeza amasamalira banja lawo komanso ndi wokalamba. Koma woyimira mlanduwu ku mbali ya boma adati, Chalenga alandire chilango chokhwima popeza walephera udindo wake woteteza mwana wake wamkazi. Popereka chigamulo, oweruza milandu Gladstone Chilundu, adagwirizana ndi a mbali ya boma ndipo analamula mwamunayu kukagwira ukayidi kwa zaka khumi ndi ziwiri mwa kalavula gaga kuti amuna ena a m’chitidwewu atengerepo phunziro. Wopalamula mlanduyu, James Chalenga, amachokera m’mudzi mwa Matenje kwa mfumu yayikulu Maseya m’boma lomwelo la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Anthu Agwirane Manja Posamala Chilengedwe, Kulimbana ndi Umphawi
news: Mu uthenga wake wopita kwa nthumwi za ku msonkhano wokambirana za mavuto osiyana-siyana omwe anthu akukumana nawo kaamba ka kusakazika kwa chilengedwe, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kogwirana manja pa ntchito yoteteza chilengedwe. Uthenga wa Papa waunikira za mgwirizano omwe ulipo pakati pa kusintha kwa nyengo ndi umphawi. Iye wati ntchito yolimbana ndi kuwonongeka kwa chilengedwe ingakhale yovuta ngati anthu sakuthandizidwa kuvuwuka mu umphawi omwe kawiri-kawiri umawakakamiza kuwononga chilengedwe. Mu uthengawo Papa wati ndi kofunika kuphunzitsa achinyamata za kufunika kosamala chilengedwe ndi njira zabwino zogwiritsira ntchito chilengedwe. Iye watsiriza ndi kutsindika za kufunika kochita machawi pofuna kuteteza chilengedwe ndipo kuti anthu onse agwirane manja pa ntchitoyi. Uthengawu anawupereka ku msonkhanowu ndi Archbishop Francesco Follo, yemwe ndi nthumwi yokhazikika ya likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku nthambi ya bungwe la United Nations yowona za maphunziro, sayansi ndi chikhalidwe ya United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chikhalidwe Chikusokoneza Ntchito Yolimbana Ndi Katangale – ACB
news: Bungwe lothana ndi mchitidwe wa ziphuphu ndi katangale mdziko muno la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) ladandaula kuti chikhalidwe cha anthu chikuthandizira kuti mchitidwe wa katangale upitirire. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu a bungweli mayi Catherine Nkhoma anena izi  lachitatu pa mkumano omwe bungweli linakonzera atsogoleri a zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana m’boma la Ntcheu. Iwo ati atsogoleri a mipingo ali ndi kuthekera kothandiza polimbana ndi mchitidwewu kaamba koti ali ndi udindo wotanthauzira mawu a Mulungu posintha mitima ya anthu ku mchitidwewu.   Mayi Nkhoma anapitiriza kunena kuti mchitidwewu wakula pakati pa aMalawi ambiri kaamba kosazindikira kuti kuchita ziphuphu ndi katangale ndi tchimo pa maso pa Mulungu. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa atumiki a Mulungu-wa m’busa James Mandawala anagwirizana ndi mayi Nkhoma ponena kuti chikhalidwe cha anthu chikusokoneza ntchito yothana ndi ziphuphu ndi katangale. Iwo anati kudzera pa mkumanowu ukhala udindo wawo kuzindikiritsa anthu za kuyipa kwa mchitidwewu. M’busa Mandawala anati kudzera mu Mawu a Mulungu anthu akuyenera kudziwa kuti ziphuphu ndi katangale ndi tchimo pamaso pa Mulungu choncho iwo ngati abusa ukhala udindo wawo kufalitsa uthengawu kudzera mukuwafotokozera kugwiritsa ntchito Baibulo. Bungwe la ACB lakangalika kuzindikiritsa magulu a anthu zakufunika kogwirana manja pa ntchito yolimbana ndi kuthetsa mchitidwe wa ziphuphu ndi katangale. Ena mwa magulu omwe bungweli likukumana nawo ndi monga mafumu, akuluakulu ogwira ntchito zaboma, ogwira ntchito ku mabungwe omwe siaboma, magulu a achinyamata kuphatikizapo olemba nkhani, potsatira nsanamira khumi ndi ziwiri za mundondomeko zothana ndi ziphuphu ndi katangale zomwe zinakhazikitsidwa m’chaka cha 2019.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu Aku Nsipe Parishi Akondwera ndi Radio Maria Malawi
news: Pamene mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse umachita mwambo wa Kanjedza lamulungu pa 28 March 2021, akhristu a parishi ya St. Peter’s Nsipe mu dayosizi ya Dedza anachita mwambowu mwapadera. Mwazina akhristuwa patsikuli anayitanitsa Radio Maria Malawi ndi cholinga choti ijambule zochitika zawo ngati njira imodzi yofuna kugawana ndi anthu ena uthenga wa Mulungu, pa tsikuli. Poyankhulapo bambo Samson Chembe omwe anatsogolera mwambo wa Misayi anati atumiki a Mulungu akuyenera kukhala patsogolo kufotokozera anthu za kufunika kwa Radio Maria Malawi, ndipo njira ina yowuzira anthuwa ndi kuyitanitsa wailesiyi kuti ijambule zochitika zawo. Iwo anayamikiranso ogwira ntchito ku wailesiyi kaamba kojambula mwambowu ndi kuwulutsa pa wayilesiyi zomwe zinathandiza anthu ambiri kupemphera nawo limodzi. Bambo Chembe analimbikitsa akhristu a parishiyi kuti adzikonda kuthandiza Radio Maria Malawi kaamba koti ndi chida cha mphamvu chomwe chikuthandizira kuti anthu  ambiri amve mawu a Mulungu. M’mawu awo a Andrew Malota omwe ndi wapampando wa tchalitchi cha Nsipe anati kubwera kwa Radio Maria Malawi patsikuli kwathandiza kuti adziwe zambiri zomwe iwo ngati akhristu akuyenera kuchita pothandiza wayilesiyi. Iwo anati zimenezi zawalimbikitsa kuti akonze dongosolo lina loti  wailesiyi ibwerenso kudzajambula mapologalamu osiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo kuwulutsa misa ya m’mawa ya tsiku ndi tsiku kwa Mulungu wonse. Parishi ya Nspe inakhazikitsidwa m’chaka cha 1924 ndipo kufikira lero yatulutsa maparishi atatu omwe ndi Sharpevalle, Ntcheu komanso St. Francis Mikoke. Pakadali pano parishiyi ili ndi matchalitchi ang’ono ang’ono okwana 26. Bambo Peter Malupiya ndi omwe akutumikira parishiyi ngati bambo mfumu mothandizana ndi bambo  Peter Kasonkanji ndiponso bambo Samson Chembe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ndondomeko ya Mphamvu ku Wathu Siyikupindulira Mzika – CCJP
news: Bungwe la chilungamo ndi mtendere mu mpingo wa katolika la Catholic Commission for Justice and Peace (CCJP) ladandaula kuti ndondomeko ya mphamvu ku wanthu siyikupindulira nzika za dziko lino kuchoka pomwe idakhizikitsidwa. Mkulu wa bungweli a Boniface Chibwana alankhula izi lolemba ku Lilongwe pa mtsutso owunika momwe ndondomeko yopereka mphamvu ku wathu ikuyendera m’dziko muno. Iwo anati ndi zokhumudwitsa kuti pakadali kusalolerana pakagwiridwe ka ntchito m’makhonsolo pakati pa aphungu a nyumba ya malamulo ndi adindo ena kukupitilira, zomwe zikuchedwetsa kapena kulepheretsa zikukuko m’madela ambiri. A Chibwana anapereka chitsanzo cha kusapatsana mpata komwe kumakhalapo pakati pa aphungu a ku nyumba ya malamulo ndi atsogoleri ena a pa khonsolo ponena kuti aphungu ambiri amadziyenereza okha kuti ndiwo angachite chilichose posapatsa mpata ena zomwe mapeto ake zimabwezera m’mbuyo chitukuko. Iwo anadandaulanso kuti kusintha kwa ulamuliro m’dziko kumay ikanso pa chiwopsezo zitukuko zambiri kaamba koti pomwe boma lasintha zitukukozi zimayima ndipo apa pakuyenera kuwunikidwa bwino kuti pasamalowe ndale pa ntchito za chitukuko. M’mau ake ogwirizira udindo wa mkulu wa bungwe lowona za maboma aang’ono Malawi Local Government Association (MaLGA) a Hudrod Mkandawire anati vuto lalikulu lomwe likuchititsa kuti ndondomeko ya mphamvu ku wanthu isabale zipatso lagona pakuti boma limatenga gawo lalikulu pa zinthu zonse posapereka mpata weniweni ku makhonsolo. Iwo anati boma siliperekanso mokwanira zinthu monga ndalama zoti makhonsolowa atha kuchita zinthu pawokha ndipo kuti boma lomweli limatenganso gawo lalikulu la ndalama zomwe makhonsolowa amapeza kudzera m’misonkho zomwe ndi zovuta kuti makhonsolowa agwire ntchito mopindulira anthu. Polankhulaponso, mkulu owona za ma program a kayendetsedwe ka za chuma ku bungwe la Center for Social Concern a Benard Mphepo anati ndi khumbo lawo kuwona zinthu zikusitha kuti zizikomera aMalawi. Iwo anati adindo akuyenera kusintha kaganizdwe kawo kuti akhale okonzeka kugwira ntchito ndi wina aliyense kuti ntchito za chitukuko zizipita patsogolo   A Mphepo anati, “Adindo athu amafuna kuti atengerepo mwayi chifukwa chosowa chidwi kwa aMalawi kuti nkhani za chuma asamazipangire poyera. Zomwenso zachitika lero kuti adindo a ku ma unduna ena sadakhale nawo pa mtsutso umenewu ndi chitsimikizo kuti adindo athu kuno ku Malawi sakufuna kuti aMalawi azidziwa kuti chuma chawo chikuyenda bwanji.” Mtsutsowu unakonzedwa ndi bungwe la Centre for Social Concern ndi thandizo lochokera ku bungwe la GIZ. Iyi ndi mbal imodzi ya project yozindikilitsa mzika kufunsa adindo pa momwe chuma chikuyendera m’madera awo ndipo ndondomekoyi yafika kumapeto tsopano.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ntchito Yolalikira Uthenga Wa Chipulumutso Ndi Yovuta
news: M’mawa wa tsiku lachinayi loyera (Holy Thursday), Papa Francisco watsogolera Misa yodalitsa mafuta (Chrism Mass) mu tchalichi lalikulu la Saint Peter’s Basilica ku Vatican. Mu malaliko ake pa Misa’yi iye wati alaliki a Uthenga wa chipulumutso akuyenera kukhala okonzeka kukumana ndi mavuto pogwira ntchitoyi ponena kuti iyi ndi ntchito yomwe ikusowa kusenza mtanda ndi kupilira mavuto osiyana-siyana. Papa Francisco wati mawu a Mulungu opezeka mu Baibulo akuwonetsa poyera kuti ntchito yolalikira ndi kufalitsa Uthenga wa chipulumutso ndi yofuna kusenza mtanda ndipo pa nthawi yomweyo kupilira mavuto osiyana-siyana. Iye wati anthu ena amakhala okonzeka kulandira Uthenga wa chipulumutso pamene ena amakana ndipo wati ndi anthu omwe amakana kulandira Uthenga Wabwino-wu omwe amayambitsa zipwirikiti. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wanenetsa kuti palibe chipulumutso kapena chikhristu chophweka. Iye wati nthawi zonse pamene akhristu akumana ndi mavuto akuyenera kumalimbikitsidwa podziwa kuti ntchito yomwe akugwira si yao koma ya Mulungu. Pa Misa’yi Papa Francisco wadalitsa mafuta a mitundu itatu: poyamba mafuta a akatekumeni kapena mafuta a Ubatizo, kachiwiri mafuta odzodzera odwala ndipo pomaliza mafuta odzodzera anthu monga ansembe kuti akhale opatulika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CCJP Yapempha Opikisana pa Chisankho Chapadera Alimbikitse Bata ndi Mtendere
news: Anthu omwe akupikisana pa mpando wa phungu waku nyumba ya malamulo pa chisankho chapadera chomwe chichitike mawa lino mdera la Zomba changalume, awapempha kuti alimbikitse bata ndi mtendere pa tsiku loponya voti-li komanso zotsatira za chisankhochi zikadzalenegezedwa. Polankhula pa mkumanowu omwe unachitikira pa sukulu ya pulaimale ya Mswaswa, m’modzi mwa akuluakulu a bungwe la chilungamo ndi mtendere la Catholic Commission for Justice and Peace (CCJP) mu dayosizi ya Zomba, a Charles Alumando anati ndi kofunika kuti bata ndi mtendere zikhale zikupitilira mderali pa tsiku loponya voti ngakhalenso pambuyo polengeza zotsatira za chisankhochi. Iwo ati awonesetsa kuti chisankhochi chikhale cha bata ndi mtendere pomwe ati akuyembekezeka kuyendera malo onse oponyera voti pa tsikuli. Anthu ena omwe anali nawo pa mkumanowo “Anthu akuyenera kusunga mtendere pa nthawi imene zisankho sizinachitike, zikuchitika komanso zikatha. Ngati palibe mtendere zinthu zambiri zimawonongeka chifukwa anthu a mbali zonse samafuna kulolerana,” anatero a Alumando. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa omwe akupikisana nawo pa chisankhochi a Henry Kaseyama ati mkumano wawathandiza koposa kaamba koti amva mavuto omwe ali mderalo komanso anati ali okonzeka kuvomereza ngati  sadzapambana pa chisankhocho. “Ndalonjeza kuti tidzagwira ntchito limodzi ndi anthu owina kuti chitukuko chipitilire. Sitidzasiyira pomwepa chifukwa tagonja kapena tapambana, nkhondoyi ndi yopitilira,” anatero a Kaseyama. A Samuel Aaron omwe ndi wapampando wa mabungwe omwe si a boma m’boma la Zomba ati mkumanowu unali ofunika kwambiri kaamba koti wathandiza kumanga umodzi komanso mtendere pakati pa anthu opikisanawa. “Tikufuna kumanga umodzi. Sitikufuna kukhala ndi chisankho cha makangano, cha ndewu, koma tikhale ndi chisankho chopambana pomwe anthu adzalolerane, adzikamba mfundo osakhala kunyozana,” anatero a Aaron. Poyankhulapo mfumu yaikulu Mlumbe ya mdera lomwe kuchitike chisankholi inasonyeza kukhumudwa ndi kusapezeka kwa anthu asanu ndi anayi mwa anthu khumi amene akupikisana pa udindowu mderali zomwe anati zili ndi kuthekera kosokoneza Mfundo zomwe zamangidwa pa mkumanowu. “Zimene takambirana pano ndiye kuti anthu ena 9 otsalawo sanazidziwe. Zimenezi zandikhumudwitsa chifukwa sanawonetse ngati atsogoleri,” inatero mfumu Mlumbe. Mkumanowu unakonzedwa ndi bungwe la CCJP mu dayosizi ya Zomba ndi thandizo lochokera ku bungwe la Open Society Initiative for Southern Africa (OSISA).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapemphelera A Katolika Omwe Avulala Pa Chiwembu Cha Pa Cathedral Ina M’dziko La Indonesia
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco walankhulapo pa za chiwembu chomwe chachitika pa cathedral ya Sacred Heart of Jesus m’dziko la Indonesia. Cathedral yomwe yaphulitsidwa ndi bombayo Iye wamemeza akatolika pa dziko lonse kuti apemphelere anthu omwe avulala pa chiwembuchi chomwe chachitika m’mawa wa tsiku lamulungu la Kanjedza. “Tiyeni tipemphelere abale athu omwe avulala pa chiwembu cha pa cathedral m’dziko la Indonesia,” watero Papa Francisco. Malipoti ochokera m’dziko la Indonesia ati anthu ena omwe anthu akuwaganizira kuti ndi otumikira gulu la za uchifwamba la Islamic State anaphulitsa bomba la tinkenawo panja pa cathedral ya Sacred Heart of Jesus pa nthawi yomwe anthu anali pafupi kutuluka mu Cathedral’yi komanso ena akuti azilowa kukapemphera. Anthu pafupi makumi awiri ndi omwe avulala pa chiwembuchi. Kuyambira m’chaka cha 2002 pomwe anthu 202 anaphedwa pa chilumba cha Bali, dziko la Indonesia lakhala likuvutika ndi magulu a za uchifwamba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Awiri Afa Nyumba Itayaka Moto M’boma la Ntcheu
news: Bambo wa zaka 29 pamodzi ndi mwana wake wa zaka ziwiri afa, nyumbu yawo itayaka moto m’boma la Ntcheu. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi m’bomali Sub Inspector Rabecca Kwisongole, ngoziyi yachitika loweruka m’mudzi mwa Kakodwa mfumu yayikulu Phambala m’bomalo pomwe mkazi wa bamboyu, Sabina Mpindang’ombe anayatsa mbaula ndi kulowa nayo m’nyumba. Potsatira izi, moto unabuka mnyumba yonse chifukwa cha mafuta a galimoto a mtundu wa petrol omwe banjali limasunga m’nyumbayi. Izi zinachititsa kuti bamboyu pamodzi ndi mwana wake kuphatikizapo mkaziyu avulale kwambiri. Anthu ozungulira derali anafika ndi kudzapulumutsa anthuwa ndipo anathamangira nawo ku chipatala cha boma la Balaka komwe mwanayu Robert Mpindan’ombe anamwalira atangofika kumene. Makolowa anatumizidwa ku chipatala cha gulupu mu mzinda wa Blantyre komwe bamboyu Noel Mpindang’ombe wamwalira lamulungu. Pakadali pano mayiyu Sabina Mpindang’ombe wa zaka 22 zakubadwa, wagonekedwa pa chipatalachi komwe akulandira thandizo la mankhwala. Padakalipano, apolisi m’bomali achenjeza anthu kuti apewe mchitidwe wosunga mafuta a mtundu wa petrol m’nyumba zawo kuti apewe ngozi za mtunduwu ndipo apemphanso anthu ena kuti adzikanena ku polisi akawona ena akuchita izi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhristu Adzisinkhasinkha za Chikondi Chodabwitsa cha Mulungu
news: Lamulungu pa 28 March ndi lamulungu la kanjedza mu mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse ndipo ndi chiyambi cha Mulungu Woyera. Pa tsikuli Papa Francisco anatsogolera Misa ya Kanjedza mu tchalitchi lalikulu la Saint Peter’s Basilica ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Mu malaliko ake pa tsikuli, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika koti akhristu azisinkhasinkha za chikondi chodabwitsa cha Mulungu. Papa kutsogolera mwambo wa Kanjedza Iye wati chikondi chodabwitsa cha Mulungu chomwe adachiwonetsa kudzera mwa mwana wake Yesu Khristu kuti afere mtundu wonse wa anthu chikuyenera kuthandiza akhristu kusintha makhalidwe awo a kale ndi kuyambanso moyo watsopano. Papa Francisco wati Mawu a Mulungu owerengedwa pa tsikuli akufotokoza za chimwemwe cha anthu pomwe Ambuye Yesu anali kulowa mu mzinda wa Yerusalemu komanso pa nthawi yomweyo mawu a Mulungu akufotokoza za chisoni cha anthu pomwe Ambuye Yesu anazunzika ndi kufa pa mtanda. Iye wati kudzera mu mazunzo osaneneka, Ambuye Yesu adawombola ndi kupulumutsa mtundu wa anthu. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kusinthika ndi chikondi chodabwitsa chimenechi chomwe Mulungu adachiwonetsa kudzera mwa mwana wake Yesu Khristu. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti monga msilikali wa chi Roma uja nawo akhristu poyang’ana Yesu Khristu wopachikidwa pa mtanda akuyenera kuvomereza kuti zoonadi Yesu Khristu ndi mwana wa Mulungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Akusakasaka Anthu Amene Azembetsa Mwana wa Khungu lachi Alubino ku Chikwawa
news: Apolisi mdziko muno akhazikitsa ntchito yosakasaka anthu ena omwe aba ndi kuthawitsa mwana wina wa khungu la chi alubino m’boma la Chikwawa. Ntchitoyi yadza pamene anthu ena aupandu ataba ndi kusowetsa mwana wa chaka chimodzi ndi miyezi isanu ndi itatu wa khungu la chi alubino, yemwe anagona ndi mayi ake mu usiku wa lachisanu pa 26 March, 2021. Kadadzera: Anthu atithandize Zaupanduzi zachitikira m’mudzi mwa Tulusida kwa mfumu yaikulu Ngabu m’boma la Chikwawa. Padakali pano wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’dziko muno, James Kadadzera watsimikizira achibale a mwanayo ndi a Malawi onse kuti ntchito ili mkati yosakasaka anthu amene aba ndi kuthawitsa mwanayu mpaka agwidwe ndi kukayankha mlandu. Pamenepa Kadadzera wapempha onse amene angakhale ndi umboni wokhudzana ndi kubedwa kwa mwanayo kuti achite machawi podziwitsa apolisi. Kwa nthawi yayitali tsopano, anthu ena akhala akuchitira nkhanza anthu a khungu la chi alubino pokhulupilira nkhambakamwa yakuti ziwalo zawo zimathandizira kupezetsa mwayi; mchitidwe omwe wachititsa anthuwa kukhalira m’phathi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dongosolo la Maliro a Bambo Dimba Silinadziwike
news: Likulu la mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno latsimikiza za imfa ya bambo John Louis Dimba a chipani cha Mzimu Woyera. Mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno bambo Henry Saindi ati bambo Dimba anamwalira lachitatu ku Rome mdziko la Italy. Amwalira ali mdziko la Italy-Bambo Dimba Malipoti akusonyeza kuti bambo Dimba anangopezeka atamwalira mchipinda chomwe amagona. “Ife ngati a ECM dongosolo lathu ndi loti timalengeza maliro omwe achitika mdziko muno choncho chifukwa bambo Dimba sanamwalire mdziko muno ndi chifukwa chake sitinatulutse chikalata chilichonse. Koma ndi zoona kuti bambo Dimba amwalira,” anatero bambo Saindi. Mlembi wa maepiskopiyu wati padakalipano chipani cha Spiritan mdziko la Italy komwe bambo Dimba amagwira ntchito, sichinatulutsebe dongosolo la momwe mwambo wa maliro a bambowa ukhalire. “Potengera kalata yomwe anatulutsa akulu a chipani chawo anangoti dongosolo la maliro alilengezabe ndiye ifesno tikudikirabe kuti dongosololo likonzedwe,” anatero bambo Saindi. Padakalipano chipani cha Mzimu Woyera mdziko muno chikulira maliro a bambo Noel Gama omwe amwaliranso lachitatu lomwelo kaamba ka nthenda ya shuga ndipo ayikidwa m’manda mawa lino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Catholic University Yakhazikitsa Maphunziro a Aphunzitsi a Sukulu za Kwacha
news: Unduna owonetsetsa kuti pasakhale kusiyana pakati amayi ndi abambo komanso chitukuko cha m’madera akumidzi wayamikira sukulu ya ukachenjede ya mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno ya Catholic University kaamba kokhazikitsa maphunziro a aphunzitsi omwe adzipereka maphunziro kwa anthu akuluakulu. Nduna mu undunawu mayi Patricia Kaliati ndi omwe alankhula izi ku sukuluyi ku Nguludi m’boma la Chiradzulu pa mwambo wokhazikitsa maphunzirowa omwe ophunzira ake azilandira tsamba la Diploma amakamaliza maphunzirowa pa sukuluyi omwe aziwapereka mogwirizana ndi bungwe la DVV International lomwe limalandira thandizo lake ku boma la Germany. Kaliati: Zithandiza anthu achikulire ambiri kukhala ophunzira Mayi Kaliati ati kupereka ma diploma kwa ophunzira omwe aziphuzitsa anthu akuluakulu, kuthandizira kupereka chidwi kwa anthu akuluakuluwa kufuna kuphunzira kaamba koti kwa nthawi yayitali anthu ochepa ndi omwe akhala akuenga nawo mbali pa maphunziro akwacha kamba koti aphunzitsi ake omwe amaphunzitsa maphunziro oterewa analibe ukadaulo weniweni. “Maphunziro akuluakulu akhala akuvuta kaamba koti panalibe otinyengelera choncho kuyambika kwa Dipuloma ya aphunzitsi ophunzitsa akuluakuluwa kutha kuthandizira akuluakuluwa kukhala ndi chidwi pa maphunziro, ku Kenya tamva kuti mkulu wina anayamba kuphunzira ali ndi zaka 80 zakubadwa pamene kwathu kuno akuluakulu amachita manyazi,” anatero mayi Kaliati. Pamenepa iwo apemphanso sukulu zina za ukachenjede mdziko muno kuti zitengere chitsanzo cha sukuluyi poyambitsa maphunziro oterewa ndi cholinga choti pakhale aphunzitsi ambiri osulidwa bwino omwe athandizire kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha anthu osaphunzira makamaka kumadera aku midzi mdziko muno. Anthu ena omwe anali nawo pa mwambowo “Zimene Catholic University yayambazi ngati sukulu zina zaukachenjede zitayamba ndiye kuti tikhala ndi aphunzitsi ochuluka osulidwa bwino omwe tingathe kuwatumiza mmidzi kuti azikaphunzitsa, enanso atha kutsegula ma sukulu oyima paokha ophunzitsa akuluakuluwa zomwe zingathandizire anthu a mmidzi kukhala ndi chidwi cholandira maphunzirowa kamba koti ambiri mwa iwo amangoganiza kuti maphunziro oterewa ngozindikiritsa za banki mkhonde,” anapitiriza motero mayi Kaliati. M’mawu awo bambo Wilfred Sumani omwe ndi mkulu owona za maphunziro pa sukulu ya ukachenjede ya mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno ya Catholic University anati sukuluyi inachita kafukufuku yemwe anawonetsa kuti maphunziro operekedwa kwa akuluakuluwa akukumana ndi mavuto ochuluka omwe apangitsa sukuluyi kuti izipereka maphunziro kwa aphunzitsi omwe aziphuzitsa maphunziro oterewa. “Mapulogalamu athu pano pa Catholic University amakhazikitsidwa ndi cholinga choti aziyankha mafunso a Malawi pa zomwe akukumana nazo, choncho titakhala pansi mkupanga kafukufuku tinapeza kuti maphunziro a sukulu za kwacha akukumana ndi mavuto ochuluka monga kusamvetsa bwino tanthauzo la maphunzirowa,” anatero bambo Sumani. Nayenso mkulu wa bungwe loyima palokha loyang’anira maphunziro mdziko muno la Educans Limbani Nsapato wayamikiranso sukulu ya ukachenjedeyi komanso bungwe la DVV international kaamba kokhazikitsa maphunziro oterewa omwe anati athandizira kukwaniritsa masomphenya woonetsetsa kuti pofika mchaka cha 2030 dziko lino lizakhale ndi anthu ochuluka omwe ndi ophunzira komanso kukwaniritsa mulingo woti dziko lino pa chaka liziphunzitsa anthu akuluakulu ochuluka
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi Nduna Yaikulu Ya Dziko La Ukraine
news: Lachinayi pa 25 March 2021 Papa Francisco ndi nduna yaikulu ya dziko la Ukraine, Denys Shmyhal, achita zokambirana ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican. Malinga ndi ofesi yofalitsa mauthenga ku Vatican, mbali ziwirizi zikukhulupirira kuti mavuto a m’dziko la Ukraine makamaka ku m’mawa kwa dzikolo, atha pochita zokambirana. Papa Francisko ndi nduna yaikulu ya mdziko la Ukraine (pakati) Mbali ziwirizi zayamikiranso ubale wabwino womwe ulipo pakati pa likulu la mpingo wa katolika ndi dziko la Ukraine osaiwala ntchito yayikulu yomwe mpingo wa katolika ukugwira m’dziko la Ukraine. Pambali pochita zokambirana ndi Papa Francisco, nduna yaikulu’yi yachitanso zokambirana ndi mlembi wamkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa katolika, Cardinal Pietro Parolin komanso mkulu wa ofesi yowona za ubale wa likulu la mpingo wa katolika ndi maiko ena, Archbishop Paul Gallagher. Kuyambira m’chaka cha 2014 mbali ziwiri zomwe ndi Donetsk People’s Republic ndi Ukraine Armed Forces zakhala zikuchita nkhondo ku m’mawa kwa dziko la Ukraine. Nkhondoyi yaphetsa anthu oposa 10,000 ndi kuvulaza anthu 24,000 ndi kupangitsanso anthu 1.5 million kuthawa ku dera la kum’mawa kwa dziko la Ukraine.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu 8 Amangidwa Kaamba Kopha Munthu M’boma la Balaka
news: Anthu asanu ndi atatu (8) ali m’manja mwa apolisi powaganizira kuti akukhuzidwa ndi imfa ya munthu wina yemwe sakudziwika kwawo, m’boma la Balaka. Misomali: Awiri mwa iwo ndi anyamata achichepere Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Felix Misomali, izi zinachitika usiku wapa 30 January chaka chino pomwe woganiziridwayu yemwe ndi malemu pano, anathyola nyumba ya mkulu wina ndi kuba wayilesi ya kanema ya mtundu wa Sony m’mudzi mwa Ching’amba mfumu yayikulu Chanthunya m’bomalo. Koma mwini nyumbayo mothandizana ndi anthu akufuna kwabwino ozungulira derali anagwira wakubayu ndi kuyamba kumumenya mpaka kumuvulaza kwambiri. Apolisi atamutengera ku chipatala, madotolo anatsimikiza kuti anamwalira kaamba kovulala kwambiri m’mutu. Potsatira imfa ya bamboyu, apolisi anakhazikitsa kafukufuku wawo kuti apeze anthu omwe adatenga gawo pa imfayi, kufikira pomwe amanga anthu asanu ndi atatuwa. Anthuwa akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa ndi kukayankha mlandu wakupha munthu. Awiri mwa anthuwa ndi anyamata a zaka 16 ndi 17. Pamenepa apolisi akumbutsa anthu kuti ndi mlandu kulanga okha munthu pomuganizira kuti wapalamula mlandu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsitsa Malipiro A Akuluakulu Ena Ogwira Ntchito Ku Vatican
news: Kudzera m’kalata yake yomwe walemba lachitatu pa 24 March 2021, Papa Francisco walengeza kuti watsitsa ndi 10-kwacha pa 100-kwacha iliyonse malipiro a ma Cardinal omwe amagwira ntchito ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican pofuna kupulumutsa ndalama malinga ndi mliri wa Coronavirus omwe wakhudza nkhani ya chuma ku likulu la mpingo wa katolikali. Kalatayi yapitilira kunena kuti pambali pa ma Cardinal palinso akuluakulu ena omwe malipiro awo atsika ndi 8 percent komanso anthu ena monga ansembe, asisitere ndi a bulazala omwe malipiro awo atsika ndi 3 percent. Papa waonjezeranso kunena kuti malipiro a anthuwa omwe amakwera zaka ziwiri zilizonse sakwera mpaka pa 31 March 2023. Iye wati zinthu zikuyenera kukhala chonchi pofuna kuti ntchito zonse za ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika zisayime koma kuti zipitilire kuyenda ngakhale kuti ntchito zambiri zomwe zimathandiza kubweretsa chuma zakhudzidwa malinga ndi mliri wa coronavirus. Papa Francisco wafotokozanso kuti izi zili chomwechi pofuna kuti pasakhale kusiyana kwa kukulu pakati pa ndalama zolowa ndi zotuluka. Malinga ndi kalata ya Papa Francisco ndondomekozi ziyamba kugwira ntchito pa 1 April, 2021. Amodzi mwa malo omwe amathandiza kubweretsa chuma ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ndi malo ambiri ya kale otchedwa Vatican museums omwe akhala ali otseka malinga ndi mliri wa coronavirus zomwe zachititsa kuti ndalama zomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika limatolera zitsike. Papa Francisco wakhala akunena kuti sakufuna kuti ngakhale munthu m’modzi yemwe achotsedwe ntchito kaamba ka mavuto a za chuma omwe mliri wa coronavirus wabweretsa. Likulu la mpingo wa katolika liri ndi anthu pafupifupi 4000 omwe amagwira ntchito zosiyana-siyana. Mwezi wa February chaka chino Papa Francisco adavomereza dongosolo la ndalama pafupifupi 300 billion Kwacha zomwe likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ligwiritse ntchito chaka chino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wanjatidwa Kaamba Kodzetsa Chisokonezo pa Sukulu ku Balaka
news: Bambo wina m’boma la Balaka ali m’manja mwa apolisi pomuganizira kuti anayambitsa chisokonezo pa sukulu ya pulaimale ya Chitimbe zomwe zinachititsa kuti anthu ena kuphatikizapo aphunzitsi, avulale. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo Inspector Felix Misomali, bamboyu Joseph Mkwanda a zaka 37 anapalamula mlanduwu lachitatu pamene akuluakulu aku Malawi Institute of Education (MIE) kuchokera ku Domasi ku Zomba amadzayendera wophunzira wawo yemwe akuphunzira ntchito pa sukuluyi yomwe ikupezeka mdera la mfumu yaikulu Phalula m’bomalo. Ana a sukulu atawona akulu-akuluwa pa sukuluyi anathawa poganiza kuti abweretsa katemera wa Covid-19. Makolo a anawa atawona izi anakhamukira pa sukuluyi motsogozedwa ndi a Joseph Mkwanda ndipo anakamenya akuluakuluwa kuphatikizapo aphunzitsi. Apolisi anathamangira ku malowa  kukakhazikitsa bata ndi mtendere komwe anamanga a Joseph Mkwanda powaganiza kuti ndi omwe anayambitsa chisokonezochi. Padakalipano apolisiwa achenjeza anthu kuti apewe mchitidwe otengera malamulo  m’manja mwawo ponena kuti kutero ndi mlandu. Apolisiwa awuzanso anthu a m’bomali kuti sukulu zonse si malo olandilirako katemera wa  Covid-19 ndipo katemerayu akulandira ndi  anthu okhawo omwe anakwanitsa zaka 18 komanso mwa kufuna kwawo. A Mkwanda amachokera m’mudzi mwa Tsite mfumu yaikulu Phalula m’boma lomwelo la Balaka.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mbava Zaba ku Ofesi ya NRB m’boma la Ntcheu
news: Mbava zathyola ndi kuba katundu osiyanasiyana ku ofesi ya bungwe lopereka ziphaso mdziko muno ya National Registration Bureau (NRB) komanso ofesi ya bungwe la Malawi Red Cross Society (MRCS) m’boma la Ntcheu. Mneneri wa khonsolo ya boma la Ntcheu, a Mastone Kaiya sanayankhulepo kanthu pa nkhaniyi. Koma malinga ndi zomwe wailesi ino yapeza, akubawa anafika p amalowa usiku wa pa 24 March ndi kumanga alonda omwe amagwira ntchito pa nthawiyi. Akubawa akuti analowa m’maofesiwa momwe abamo makompyuta onse kuphatikizapo lamya zomwe zinali mu ofesiyi. Pakadali pano apolisi sanayankhulepo kanthu pa nkhaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Banja Lamangidwa Kaamba Kodzetsa Imfa Ya Mwana Wawo
news: Banja lina la m’boma la Balaka lili m’manja mwa apolisi powaganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi imfa ya mwana wawo kaamba koti sanamusamale pamene amadwala. Misomali: Samamupititsa mwana ku chipatala Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Felix Misomali wati banjali linali ndi mwana yemwe anayamba kudwala chaka chatha koma samamupititsa ku chipatala. Banjali lomwe ndi la m’mudzi mwa Moses mdera la Sub T/A Phalula akuti lakhala likukhulupirira kuti kudwala kwa mwanayu ndi kulodzedwa choncho iwo amakana kupita ndi naye ku chipatala m’malo mwake amapita naye kwa asing’anga. Pamenepa apolisi akuti amanga awiriwa omwe ndi a Alick Joseph a zaka30 ndiponso mkazi wawo Eliza Wilson wa zaka 32 ponena kuti zomwe anachitazi ndi zosephana ndi gawo 208 la malamulo a dziko lino. Anthuwa akuyembekezereka kukaonekera ku bwalo la milandu ndi kukayankha mlanduwu. Pakadali pano apolisi m’bomalo achenjeza makolo kuti aliyense opezeka akuchita mchitidwewu adzamangidwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la TUM Lati Aphunzitsi Ayambiranso Kunyanyala Ntchito
news: Bungwe la Teachers’ Union of Malawi (TUM) lawopseza kuti liyambiranso kunyanyala ntchito mu masiku asanu ndi awiri omwe akudzawa boma litalephera kukwaniritsa pempho lawo. Kudzera mu kalata yomwe bungweli latulutsa, kunyanyalaku kukudza kaamba koti komiti ya mtsogoleri wa dziko lino yowona za matenda a COVID-19 yati aphunzitsiwa siwoyenera kulandira ndalama zogulira zipangizo zodzitetezera ku mliri wa COVID-19 zomwe zikusemphana ndi momwe analonjezera aphunzitsiwa sabata zingapo zapitazo pomwe aphunzitsiwa amanyanyala ntchito pofuna kuti apatsidwe ndalama za ukadziwotche. Kalatayi yati wampampando wa komiti yowona za maphunziro ku nyumba ya malamulo a a Brainnex Kaise, alembera kalata bungwe la TUM kuti komiti ya mtsogoleri wa dziko lino yowona za COVID-19 yakana kupereka ndalamazi potengera ubale omwe ulipo pakati pa olemba ndi wolembedwa ntchito mwa zina. Malingana ndi mtsogoleri wa bungwe la TUM a Willie Malimba, izi zikusemphana ndi zomwe anagwirizana magulu onse okhudzidwa pa mkumano wawo wa pa 8 March, 2021 omwe unachitikira ku nyumba ya malamulo kuti aphunzitsiwa adzalandira ndalamazi zomwe ndi za miyezi itatu pakamodzi. Pa chifukwachi bungwe la TUM lapereka masiku asanu ndi awiri ku boma kuti liganizire pempho lawo ndipo lachenjeza kuti kunyanyala kwa ntchitoku kudzatha pokhapokha ngati ndalama za ukadziotche za miyezi itatu zitaperekedwa pakamodzi kwa aphunzitsiwa. Padakali pano Unduna wa zamaphunziro sudayankhulepo kanthu pa nkhaniyi. Kwa sabata ziwiri ndi theka kuyambira pa 22 February mpaka pa 9 March, 2021 sukulu zinali zili zotseka aphunzitsiwa atatemetsa nkhwangwa pa mwala kuti sabwelera ku ntchito pofuna kuwumiriza boma kuti liwapatse ndalama za ukadziotche.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Atsogolera Miyambo Ikuluikulu ya Mulungu Woyera
news: Pamene nyengo ya Lenti ikupita ku mapeto ndipo chikondwelero cha kuwuka kwa Ambuye Yesu kwa akufa chikuyandikira, likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse latulutsa ndondomeko ya miyambo ikuluikulu ya Mulungu Woyera yomwe Papa Francisco adzatsogolere. Papa Francisko pa mwambo wa kanjedza wa m’mbuyomu Kalata ya mkulu woyang’anira miyambo ya chipembedzo ya Papa Francisco (Master of Pontifical Liturgical Ceremonies) Monsignor Guido Marini, yafotokoza kuti lamulungu Papa Francisco adzatsogolera Misa ya Kanjedza mu tchalitchi la likulu la Saint Peter’s Basilica nthawi ya 10:30 m’mawa. Ndipo pa tsiku lachinayi loyera Papa’yu adzatsogolera Misa yodalitsa mafuta (Chrism Mass) nthawi ya 10 koloko m’mawa mu tchalitchi la likulu la Saint Peter’s Basilica pamene Misa ya madzulo a tsiku lomweli adzatsogolere ndi Cardinal Giovanni Battista Re yemwe ndi mkulu wa ma Cardinal (Dean of the College of Cardinals). Pa tsiku lachisanu loyera, Papa Francisco adzachita nawo Njira ya Mtanda pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square kuyambira 9 koloko usiku. Papa’yu adzatsogolera Misa ya tsiku loweruka madzulo (Easter Vigil) mu tchalitchi la likulu la Saint Peter’s Basilica kuyambira 7:30 komanso Misa ya lamulungu la Pasaka kuyambira 10 koloko m’mawa. 12 koloko masana pa tsiku laMulungu la Pasaka, Papa adzapereka uthenga wake wa padera ndi madalitso a upositoli ku dziko lonse zodziwika m’chilatini kuti Urbi et Orbi kutanthauza kuti uthenga ndi madalitso zopita ku mzinda wa Rome komanso ku dziko lonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi President Wa Dziko La France
news: Ofesi ya president wa dziko la France yalengeza kuti Papa Francisco ndi President Emmanuel Macron achita zokambirana kudzera pa lamya. Malinga ndi kalata yomwe ofesiyi yatulutsa, zokambirana za atsogoleri awiriwa zinatenga pafupifupi mphindi makumi anayi (40). Papa Francisko ndi President Macron pa mkumano wawo wa m’mbuyomu Kalatayi yapitilira kunena kuti mu zokambirana zao Papa Francisco ndi President Macron anakhazikika kwambiri pa za ulendo wa Papa Francisco m’dziko la Iraq komanso za mavuto osiyana-siyana kuphatikizapo mliri wa coronavirus. President Macron wauza Papa Francisco kuti anachita chidwi ndi ulendo wake wa ku Iraq wa posachedwa ndipo wati akukhulupirira kuti ulendowu uthandiza kubweretsa kusintha kwa anthu osati a m’dziko la Iraq lokha komanso ku maiko onse a ku dera limenero. Awiriwa akambirananso za mavuto osiyana-siyana omwe mayiko ambiri pa dziko la pansi akukumana nawo monga magulu a za nkhondo omwe abuka ku Africa omwe akuyika chitetezo cha maiko ambiri pa chiopsezo kuphatikizapo za mavuto odza kaamba ka mliri wa Coronavirus. Chimusankhireni pa udindo wa mtsogoleri wa dziko la France m’chaka cha 2017, President Macron wachita zokambirana ndi Papa Francisco kasanu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mabanja oposa 100 Akusowa Pokhala Kaamba ka Madzi Osefukira M’boma la Ntcheu
news: Anthu a dera la phanga kwa mfumu yayikulu Masasa m’boma la Ntcheu adandaula ndi momwe boma likuchitira posayankha nkhawa zawo zowamangira mgula pa mtsinje wina ozungulira ku malowa potsatira kusefukira kwa madzi komwe kukubweretsa mavuto ambiri pakati pa anthu okhala ku derali. Nyakwawa Dzimkambani awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti ngkhale mchaka cha2017 anasamuka malo ena ndi kukakhala ku mtunda ndi cholinga chopewa ngozi ya kusefukira kwa madzi, izi sizinathandize popeza madzi akhalanso akufika ku malo atsopanowa. Potsatira izi anthuwa akhala akupempha boma kuti liwakonzere mgula kuti vutoli lithe koma kufikira lero boma silinakonzebe malowa zomwe zikubweretsa vuto la kusefukira kwa madzi chaka ndi chaka ndiponso kukokoloka kwa nyumba kuphatikizapo katundu wawo. Koma poyankhapo pa za dandauloli, mlangizi wa ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi m’bomali a Jonathan Kapatsa anati dandauloli ndi lomveka ndipo chaka chino boma liyika ndalama mu ndondomeko ya zachuma zoti zigwiritsidwe ntchito pokonza mgulawo. Pakadali pano potsatira madzi osefukira omwe anakhudza derali mabanja oposa 116 akusowa pokhala nyumba kuphatikizapo katundu wawo atapita ndi madzi kumayambiliro a mwezi wa March chaka chino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Okhudzidwa Apempha Nyumba ya Malamulo Ilowelerepo pa Kuyima Kwa Ntchito Yomanga Msewu wa Chingale
news: Anthu okhudzidwa ndi kusapitilira kwa ntchito yomanga msewu wa Lirangwe-Chingale-Machinga apempha aphungu a kunyumba ya malamulo kuti alowelerepo ndi cholinga choti ntchotoyi ipitire. Anthuwa apereka pempholi kudzera mu kalata yawo ya madandaulo yomwe akapereka lachiwiri ku nyumbayi kutsatira kuyima kwa ntchitoyi yomwe inayamba pafupifupi zaka khumi ndi zisanu zapitazo. Iwo ati akudabwa kuti boma lakhala lisakufotokoza momveka bwino pa zomwe zikuchedwetsa ntchitoyi ngakhale kuti ndalama zokonzera msewuwu zakhala zikuperekedwa kudzera ku nyumba ya malamulo. Anthu okhudzidwawo pamene amakapereka madandaulo awo Wapampando wa komiti ya ntchito yokonza msewu wa Lirangwe-Chingale-Machinga a Francis Gondwa ati akukhulupilira kuti mavuto omwe anthu okhala m’maderawa amakumana nawo angachepe ngati msewuwu utakonzedwa. Iwo anati mwachitsanzo ogwira ntchito za boma ena monga apolisi komanso aphunzitsi amakana kukagwira ntchito ku madera omwe ali pafupi ndi msewuwu kaamba ka mavuto a mayendedwe zomwe zikuchititsa kuti derali likhalebe losatukuka. “Panopa tikuliwuza boma kuti litikonzere mseuwu koma ngati sachita izi pofika December chaka chino angotiwuza kuti anthu a ku Lirangwe, Chingale-Machinga siinu a Malawi atipezele kwina kokakhala chifukwa tatopa kochuluka,” anatero a Gondwa. Polankhula atalandira kalata ya madandauloyi, m’modzi mwa aphungu a ku nyumba ya malamulo a Yeremiya Chihana anati achita chothekera kuti nyumbayi ikambirane za nkhaniyi. “Petition-yi iyenera kulowa lachinayi, apapa tiwapatsilatu anduna a za mamtengatenga leroli kuti ayiwoneretu komanso ipita kwa a speaker kuti akonze zoti lachinayilo idzawoneke pa dongosolo la zokambirana ndipo anthuwa ayembekezere kuti ndizilankhula ineyo ngati m’modzi mwa a Malawi,” anatero a Chihana. Bungwe la Center for Social Concern ndi lomwe likugwira ntchito limodzi ndi anthuwa pansi pa project yozindikilitsa mzika kufunsa adindo momwe chuma cha boma chikugwilira ntchito. Mkulu oyang’anira ma program ku bungweli a Benard Mphepo ati ndi okhumudwa ndikulowetsedwapo kwa ndale pa ntchito yokonza mseuwu. A Mphepo anati, “Kamsewuka ndi kochepa kwambiri. Adindo athu alibe chidwi pa nkhani yomaliza nsewu umenewu. Pano ndikunena pano contactor palipebo pa site chonsecho ndalama zogwilira ntchito imeneyi zidavomelezedwa mu November chaka chathakomano palibe chimene chikupangika.” Mogwirizana ndi anthuwa bungwe la Centre for Social Concern lati likuyembekeza kuti boma limva madandaulowa ndikuchitapo kanthu msanga kuti miyoyo ya anthuwa isinthe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Udindo Wa Mkhristu Aliyense Kudziwitsa Ena Za Yesu Khristu
news: Polankhula lamulungu ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira ma buku ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican, Papa Francisco wati anthu ambiri amafunitsitsa atamva ndi kumudziwa Yesu Khristu. Iye wati ndi udindo wa mkhristu aliyense kudziwitsa ena za Yesu Khristu koma iye wati ntchito imeneyi ndi utumiki omwe ukufuna kudzipereka komanso chikondi. Papa Francisco wati pogwira ntchito imeneyi akhristu akuyenera kuphunzira kukhala pafupi ndi anthu omwe akufuna kumva ndi kudziwa za Yesu Khristu. Koma si pokhapo iye waonjezeranso kuti akhristu akuyenera kukhala a chifundo ndi wodekha. Iye wati pogwira ntchito yolalikira ndi kuzindikiritsa ena za Yesu, akhristu akuyenera kufa ku makhalidwe ndi zina zomwe amakonda kuti potero athe kubereka zipatso zambiri. Papa Francisco wati ntchito imeneyi ndi yovuta komabe iye wati cholimbitsa mtima ndi cha ulere chomwe Mulungu amapereka chothandiza pogwira ntchito imeneyi. Chizindikiro choti ntchito yolalikira ndi kuzindikiritsa ena za Yesu Khristu ndi yovuta ndiye mtanda omwe iye wati ndi chizindikiro cha mphamvu kwa akhristu. Papa Francisco wati kuvala mtanda pa khosi, kukoleka mtanda m’nyumba kapena mtchalichi ndi zabwino koma wati akhristu akuyenera kumazindikira chomwe mtandawo ukuimirira ndipo wati zochita za akhristu zikuyenera kumagwirizana ndi chomwe mtandawo umaimirira: chikondi ndi kutumikira ena mwa toto moyo. Pa mwambowu iye analankhulapo pa za tsiku lokumbukira anthu omwe akhala akuphedwa ndi zigawenga zodziwika kuti mafia, Day of Remembrance for the Innocent Victims of the Mafia, m’dziko la Italy. Monga Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera komanso Papa Benedicto wa 16 wopuma anali kulankhula mwa mphamvu podzudzula ma mafia, iye wachitanso chimodzimodzi. Papa Francisco wati anthu amenewa sanasiye malo popeza amapezeka mbali zonse za dziko la pansi ndipo amagwiritsa ntchito njira ina iliyonse monga katangale ndi ziphuphu pofuna kuzilemeretsa. Iye waonjezeranso kuti anthuwa atengerapo mwayi pa mliri wa coronavirus pomazilimeretsa zinthu zomwe Papa’yu wati ndi zosemphana ndi Uthenga wa Chipulumutso wa Yesu Khristu. Iye anakumbutsanso anthu kuti lolemba pa 22 March ndi tsiku lokumbukira kufunika kwa madzi pa dziko lonse, World Water Day. Iye wati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti mpaka lero anthu ambiri akusowa madzi a ukhondo. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wapempha maiko kuti athandize anthu awo kukhala ndi madzi okwanira komanso a ukhondo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wina Wapulumuka ku Imfa ya Petrol Ataba Dowe
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 27 wapulumutsidwa m’manja mwa anthu okwiya omwe anamutentha ndi mafuta a petrol pambuyo pomugwira akuba dowe m’munda wina m’boma la Ntcheu. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Rebecca Kwisongole, izi zachitika m’mudzi mwa Kaudza mfumu yaikulu Njolomole m’bomalo. Bambo wovulazidwayo Malinga ndi Sub Inspector Kwisongole, bamboyu Chifuniro Bulawo anagwidwa akuba chimanga chachiwisi m’munda wina zomwe zinakwiyitsa anthu ozungulira derali ponena kuti mchitidwe woberana chimanga wakula kwambiri mderalo. Anthuwa anatenga mafuta a mtundu wa petrol ndikuwaza thupi la mkuluyu ndi kumuyatsa. Amfumu ndi anthu ena anapulumutsa oganiziridwayu pomuwaza madzi koma pa nthawiyi ndi kuti atavulala kwambiri. Apolisi atafika pa malowa anakhazikitsa bata ndi kutenga bamboyu kuthamangira naye ku chipatala. Pakadali pano iye amugoneka p achipatala cha boma laNtcheu potsatira mabala omwe abwera kaamba ka motowo. Apolice m’bomali alangiza anthu kuti apewe kutengera malamulo m’manja mwawo. A Chifuniro Bulawo amachokera m’mudzi mwa Davide mfumu yaikulu Njolomole m’boma la Ntcheu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Umodzi wa Abambo Lakhazikitsidwa ku Parishi ya Bango
news: Parish ya Bango mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yati idzipereka powunikira abambo a mpingowu kuti alowe mu bungwe la Umodzi wa abambo ndi kuyamba kutumikira mpingo kudzera m’bungweli Bambo mfumu wa parishiyi bambo Edezio Namsalangwa ndi omwe alankhula izi lamulungu ku parishiyi pambuyo poyenderedwa ndi atsogoleri a bungwe la Umodzi wa abambo mu arkidayosiziyi la Catholic Men Organisation (CMO) omwe amafotokozera akhristu za ntchito komanso masomphenya a bungweli. Bambo Nansalangwa ndi komiti ya Umodzi wa abambo ku parishi ya Bango Bambo Namsalangwa anati kubwera kwa bungweli m’parishiyi kwathandizira kuyankha ena mwa mavuto awo, pomwe abambo ambiri akhala akusiyira amayi okha kutumikira ntchito zotukula parishiyi. Pamenepa iwo ati ayetsetsa kuyika njira zosiyanasiyana zothandizira kuti abambo ochuluka a m’parishiyi ayambe kutumikira mpingowu kudzera mu bungweli. “Ndili ndi chimwemwe kuti mapemphero athu ayankhidwa kaamba koti timafunitsitsa kuti bungwe la Umodzi wa abambo likhalepo pa parish yathu,  ndiwalimbikitsa komanso kuwadalitsa abambowa ndi cholinga choti ayambe kutumikira mpingo wathu kudzera m’bungweli,” anatero bambo Namsalangwa. Mmawu ake wapampando wa bungwe la Umodzi wa abambo la Catholic Men Organisation mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre a Martin Chiwaya anati ndi okondwa kuti khumbo lawo loyendera maparish omwe anasalira likukwaniritsidwa ndi cholinga choti pofika pa 1 May chaka chino pomwe lizakhazitsidwe mwapadera ku arkidayosiziyi lizakhale kuti m’maparish onse 43 amu arkdayosiziyi lilipo ndiponso ndi la mphamvu. “Ndakhala ndikulankhula mbuyomu kuti tinatsala ndi maparish atatu omwe sitinawayendere, komabe maparish awiri mwa atatuwa kuli makomiti ogwirizira a bungweli monga parish ya Mtepuwa komwe tinawayendera pa 14 March ndipo tabwera kuno kwa Bango lero pa 21 ndiye mu sabata ziwiri zikubwerazi tiyetsetsa tipitekonso ku parish ya Mulopwe ndi cholinga choti akhristu ndi abambo onse amve za bungweli komanso nsalu yatsopano yomwe tikugulitsa kuti pofika pa 1 May pomwe tikukhazikitsa pa dayosizi azakhale atakonzeka bwino,” anatero a Chiwaya. Iwo apitirizanso kuti abambo a m’maparish osiyanasiyana mu arkidayosiziyi akudzipereka pawokha kuchita zinthu zosiyanasiyana zothandizira kulimbikitsa utumiki wawo kudzera mu bungweli. “‘Kunena zoona pakatipa abambo akudzipereka pochita zosiyanasiyana zomwe zikuwonetsa kuti bungweli alilandiradi, mwachitsanzo pa 13 March abambo akwa Mendulo anali ndi m’bindikiro wawo komanso abambo akwa Bvumbwe achitanso chimodzimodzi, pa 19 March lomwe ndi tsiku lokondwelera chaka cha nkhoswe yathu Yosefe woyera abambonso akwa Mtepuwa anakondwelera tsikuli angakhalenso abambo a ku Mthawira analinso ndi misa patsiku losatira lake. Ndipo pomwe tili kuno kwa Bango, abambo aku St. Martin Chirimba akukhazikitsa bungweli pomwenso abambo aku Limbe Cathedral akuyendanso m’matchalichi awo kukonzekera kukhazikitsa bungweli ku parishiyi pa 18 April zomwe zikutsimikizira kuti abambowa alilandiradi bungweli,” anatero a Chiwaya.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: St. Vincent De Paul Yati Anthu Omwe Akhudzidwa Ndi Mliri Wa Covid-19 Akufunika Thandizo
news: Bungwe la zachifundo la mu mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Society of St. Vincent de Paul lapempha anthu akufuna kwabwino m’dziko muno kuti adzipereke pothandiza anthu osowa ndi ovutika omwe aphinjikanso kwambiri ndi mliri wa Covid-19 kuti azitha kupeza thandizo pa zosowa za moyo wawo wa tsiku ndi tsiku. Akuluakulu a bungweli alankhula izi pa mwambo wopereka nyumba zomwe bungweli lamangira anthu ovutika ku Ndirande mu mzinda wa Blantyre. A Kimu pa ntchito zina zachifundo zomwe akhala akuchita m’mbuyomu Polankhulapo mkulu wa bungweli a Charles Kimu ati nthenda ya Covid-19 yawonetsa kukula kwa umphawi umene uli m’dziko muno, kotero anthu akuyenera kugwirana manja pothetsa vutoli mwamsanga, makamaka kudzera mu kuthandiza osowa ndi ovutika. “Ife tinangoyerekeza kuti ife ngati bungwe la zachifundo tizamangira anthuwa nyumba koma kudzera mu chithandizo cha Mulungu takwaniritsa kuchita ndipo tikuyembekezeka kuchita izi m’madayosizi onse mdziko muno kwa anthu posatengera chipembedzo chawo,” anatero a Kimu. Polankhulanso m’modzi mwa anthu amene apindula ndi thandizoli a Annie Pindani anathokoza bungweli kaamba kowafikira ndi thandizoli. “Ineyo m’mene ndimkakhala mu nyumba yophwasuka denga ndimkangoti sindizapeza nyumba ya bwino koma pano ndikuthokoza bungweli kaamba ka nyumbayi ndipo pano ndizigona tulo labwino tsopano,” anatero mayi Pindani. Mwazina bungweli lati likuyembekezeka kumanga nyumba zoyambilira khumi ndi zisanu lisanafalikire m’madayosizi onse mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Stima Apempha Abambo Awonetse Chikondi Kwa Akazi Awo
news: Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi Ambuye Montfort Stima apempha abambo kuti azitenga gawo pa chipembedzo pofuna kutsatira mapazi a Yosefe woyera yemwe ndi nkhoswe ya mpingo. Stima: Abambo akhale achikondi Ambuye Stima amalankhula izi pa mwambo wotsekulira chaka cha Yosefe Woyera chomwe Papa Francisco anasankha kuti chikhale chaka chino. Iwo ati abambo ali ndi udindo waukulu pa chipembedzo monga kuyendetsa dongosolo la mwambo wa misa ndi zina. “Abambo akuyenera kukhala achikondi kwa akazi awo monga Yosefe Woyera anachitira powakonda Amayi Maria pa nthawi yonse ya moyo wawo,” anatero ambuye Stima. Mwazina Ambuye Stima anatinso abambo akuyenera kukhala achikondi potsata mmene moyo wa Yosefe Woyera unaliri yemwe anakonda Amayi Maria pa nthawi yomwe amayembekezera kubereka mwana yesu. Papa Francisco anakhazikitsa kuti chaka chino chikhale chokumbukira Yosefe Wayera mwamuna wake wa Maria Virigo amayi ake a Yesu ndipo mpingo wa katolika kuno ku Malawi watsekulira chakachi lamulungu pa 21 March 2021 m’madayosizi ake onse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lati Liyesetsa Potukula Madera a ku Midzi
news: Boma lati lichilimika pa ntchito yotukula madera a kumidzi kuti anthu adzipeza zinthu zofunikira pa moyo wawo wat siku ndi tsiku mosavuta. Izi zanenedwa ku nyumba ya malamulo lachisanu pomwe nduna zimayankhapo pa zomwe aphungu anafunsa zokhudza chitukuko cha ku madera awo. Unduna wa za maboma aang’ono ndi omwe unali oyamba kufunsidwa pomwe phungu wa dera la kum’mawa chakumadzulo kwa boma la Mangochi Shadrick Namalomba anafunsa undunawu kuti uganizire zomanga matawuni a kumidzi m’ma trading centre a Chilipa komanso Katema komwe anati malo aliko kale. Nyumba ya malamulo ya Malawi Poyankhapo yemwe anayimira nduna ya mu undunawu, a Kezzie Msukwa, omwenso ndi nduna ya za malo anati pakadali pano ndi zovuta kuti maderawa aganiziridwe kumbali ya chitukukochi kaamba ka kuchepa kwa ndalama koma anachita changu kunena kuti boma liyesetsa kuti pempholi lidzaganiziridwe mu ndondomeko ya za chuma ya m’chaka cha za chuma cha 2021-2022 kuphatikizaponso madera ena omwe apempha zitukuko ngati izi. Unduna wa za mtenga-mtenga ndi zomangamanga nawo unafunsidwa zomanga msewu wa Chamatwa kupita ku Chaoni kum’mwera kwa boma la Machinga, ndipo poyankhapo kuyimira nduna mu undunawu, a Richard Chimwendo-Banda omwenso ndi nduna ya za m’dziko anati unduna wa za mtengamtengawu ukudziwa za msewuwu ndipo adatumizako kale akatswiri kuti akawone momwe nsewuwu ulili ndipo pano ali mkati mosaka ndalama kuti posachedwa ayambe ntchito yomanga msewuwu. Phungu wa dera la pakati chakum’mawa kwa boma la Balaka a Chifundo Makande anapempha undunawu kuti uganizire zokonza misewu ya Ulongwe-Mvuu, Chikombola –Sawali, komanso Namanolo kukafika ku Chatama. Ndunayi inati misewu ina ndi yoyenera kukonzedwa ndi khonsolo ya bomali komabe ina, boma lichitapo kanthu kuti ikonzedwe kudzera ku undunawu poika ndalama mu ndondomeko ya za chuma yotsatira. Polankhulaponso phungu wa dera la pakati mu mzinda wa Lilongwe Alfred Jiya anathokoza unduna wa za mtengamtenga ndi zomangamanga kaamba koyamba ntchito yomanga mlatho wa pakati pa Kauma ndi nyumba ya boma ya Kamuzu Palace komanso chidwi chomwe undunawu wawonetsa chofuna kumanganso mlatho wapakati pa Area 18 ndi Senti mu mzindawu kuti ukhale mlatho waukulu. Jiya anati kubwera kwa milatho iwiriyi kuthandizira kuchepetsa mavuto a mayendedwe omwe akhala alipo m’maderawa ndipo akuyembekezera kuti boma lipitiriza kupereka zitukuko zina kuposera apa ku derali. Unduna wa zokopa anthu ndi chikhalidwe nawo unafunsidwa zokonza malo a Zoa Falls m’boma la Thyolo kuti akhale apamwamba kuti azikopa alendo. Nduna mu undunawu a Michael Usi anati akudziwa kale za malowa ndipo pano ali mkati moyika ndondomeko zina m’malo mwake kuti malowa akonzedwe. Apa a Usi anatengerapo mwayi kupempha anthu m’dziko muno kuti akhale ndi mtima okonda kusamala za chilengedwe zomwe ati zili ndi kuthekera kokweza chuma cha dziko lino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la MOAM ndi Lokhudzidwa ndi Kuchuluka kwa Ngozi Zapansewu
news: Bungwe la eni minibus m’dziko muno la Minibus Owners Association (MOAM) lalangiza madalayivala ake kuti azikhala tcheru powonetsetsa kuti akusatira malamulo a pansewu pofuna kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha ngozi za pansewu. Mlembi wa bungweli Coxley Kamange ndi yemwe walankhula izi ndi mtolankhani wathu mu mzinda wa Blantyre kusatira ngozi yomwe yachitika loweruka ku Namadzi m’boma la Zomba yomwe yokhudza minibus ina yomwe nambala yake ndi KK141 yomwe imachokera ku Mangochi kupita Blantyre. Kamange: Tikupepesa mabanja omwe aferedwa Kamange wati ndi okhuzidwa ndi ngoziyi komanso ngozi zomwe zakhala zikuchitika m’madera osiyanasiyana maka zokhuza minibus zawo zomwe anati zimakhudza anthu ochuluka kaamba koti zimanyamula anthu osiyanasiyana kupita m’madera osiyanasiyana. Pamenepa iye wapempha madalavilawa kuti aziwonenetsa kuti akuyenda mosamala pansewu makamaka minibus zomwe zimayenda maulendo ataliatali ndi cholinga choti ateteze miyoyo ya okwera minibasizi. Iye wati ndi kofunikanso madalayivalawa azionenetsa kuti asanayambe maulendo awo minibasizi zili ndi zonse zokwanira kuyenda pa nsewu. “Poyamba tipepese mabanja omwe aferedwa kamba ka ngoziyi koma mkofunika kuti madalayivala azionenetsa kuti galimoto lawo liri ndi zonse zoziyenereza monga matayala abwino komanso ngati mabuleki akugwira bwino lomwe, sipokhapo ayi akuyenda maulendo ataliatali azikhala tcheru pamsewu pozindikira kuti zochitika pa nsewu zimakhala zochuluka,” anatero a Kamange. Pamenepa iye walangizanso boma kuti liyike malo ochitira chipikisheni pafupipafupi ngakhale usiku ndi cholinga choti azitha kuwona m’mene minibasizi zikuyendera pa nsewu komanso kuwonetsetsa kuti malamulo a pamsewu akusatidwa nthawi zonse. “Mbuyomu ife ngati bungwe lathu timayika malo osiyanasiyana mogwirizana ndi apolisi apa msewu ndi cholinga chomaona momwe minibasi zathu zikuyendera komanso tinali ndi mabuku omwe oyendetsa minibasizi amalembamo zomwe zimathandizira apolisi apamsewu kuona mmene minibasizi zilili koma zimenezi zidasiyika; aliyense kupachira anthu payekha zomwe zikubweretsa mpikisano komanso mchitidwe wokhala ndi woyitanira utha kukolezera kuti ngozi zizichuluka pamsewu kamba koti madalayivala ena amakhala akuthamanga kwambiri kukatolera anthu ena,” anatero a Kamange.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Yosefe Woyera Ndi Chitsanzo Cha Utumiki Wokhulupirika
news: Mu uthenga wake wa chaka chino wa pa tsiku laMulungu lopempherera kuyitanidwa (World Vocations Day) omwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse latulutsa pa 19 March 2021 pa tsiku la chaka cha Yosefe Woyera mwamuna wa Amayi Maria, Papa Francisco wati Yosefe Woyera ndi chitsanzo cha utumiki wokhulupirika. Iye wakhazikika kwambiri mu uthenga wa m’kalata yake yotchedwa Patris Corde m’chilatini kapena kuti Ndi Mtima wa Utate yomwe idatuluka pa 8 December, 2020. Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika koti anthu omwe akumva kuyitanidwa ndi Mulungu ku ma utumiki osiyana-siyana aziyang’ana kwa Yosefe Woyera ngati chitsanzo chosilirika cha utumiki wokhulupirika. Iye wati Yosefe Woyera ndi munthu yemwe adakwaniritsa zomwe Mulungu anafuna kuti zichitike m’moyo wake ndipo wati Mulungu lero akufunanso anthu ngati Yosefe Woyera omwe angakwaniritse zofuna za Mulungu kudzera m’ma utumiki osiyana-siyana. Chaka chino Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse ukhala ukusinkhasinkha za uthenga wa Papa Francisco pa mutu woti, “Kuvomera Kuitanidwa ku moyo wa Utumiki potengera chitsanzo cha Yosefe Woyera.” World Vocations Day chaka chino ndi pa 25 April 2021 ndipo chaka chino ndi cha nambala 58 chiyambireni tsikuli.  Adakhazikitsa World Vocations Day ndi Papa Paulo wa 6 m’chaka cha 1963. Ku Malawi kuno chaka chachikulu chidzachitikira ku Mtendere Parish mu dayosizi ya Dedza. Ndipo pokonzekera tsiku laMulungu lopempherera kuyitanidwa, akhristu akhala akuphunzitsidwa za kufunika kwa atumiki a mu mpingo komanso kufunika kopemphelera achinyamata kuti avomere ndipo asankhe bwino njira yotumikira Mulungu kaya ndi unsembe, usistere, ubulazala kapena banja. Koma si pokhapo akhristu akhala akuphunzitsidwa za udindo wawo othandiza nyumba zosulira atumiki a mu Mpingo pongotchula zochepa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Musikuwa Apempha Akhristu Atukule Mabungwe Atsopano
news: Mabungwe a mpingo wa katolika mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa awapempha kuti adzipereke kugwira ntchito zotukula mabungwe amene angoyamba kumene mu mpingowu monga bungwe la Umodzi wa abambo achikatolika Catholic Men Organisationn (CMO). Wapereka pempholi ndi Ambuye Peter Musikuwa, bishop wa mpingo wa katolika mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa pa Lamulungu pa 21 March, 2021 ku St. Michael’s Cathedral mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa pa mwambo wotsekulira chaka cha Yosefe Woyera ndi cha Mabanja. Bishop Musikuwa: Tiyeni tilingalire za utumiki wathu Ambuye Musikuwa anati chaka cha Yosefe Woyera ndi Mabanja zithandize akhristu kutumikira bwino kudzera mu mabungwe osiyanasiyana amene akusowekera nzeru ndi upangiri wawo komanso mabanja a achinyamata kutumikira moyenera pa chikhristu chawo. Pamenepa Ambuye Musikuwa anatengerapo mwayi wolimbikitsa abambo a mu mpingowu kugwira ntchito zosamalira matchalitchi awo kuti apitilire kukhala aukhondo ngati njira imodzi yosamalira mpingo. Iwo anapitiriza kuwuza akhristu kuti apeze njira zolimbikitsa umodzi wa mabungwe ndi magulu osiyanasiyana. “Panthawi ya chaka cha Yosefe Woyera ndipo cha Mabanja, tiyeni tilingalire za mautumiki athu, kukhulupilika kwathu ndi kumvera kwathu Mulungu pamene tikutumikirana m’mabanja mwathu. Monga Apapa atipempha tiyeni pa chaka chimenechi, tipeze njira yofikira mabanja ambiri makamaka achinyamata,” anatero Ambuye Musikuwa. M’mawu ake wapampando wa akhristu eni ake mu dayosiziyi a George Mkutu analimbikitsa akhristu kutsanzira ntchito za Yosefe Woyera. Iwo anapitiriza kupempha abambo ambiri kuti alowe mu bungwe la Umodzi wa abambo achikatolika. “Kudzera mu mbiri ya Yosefe Woyera komanso mu uthenga umene Ambuye atipatsa lero, pali zinthu zingapo zimene tikuyenera kuphunzira kwa Yosefe Woyera. Yosefe Woyera ndi chitsanzo cha chikondi, ndi chitsanzo cha kumvera, chitsanzo cha kukhulupilira Mulungu, chitsanzo cha kudzipereka komanso kupilira. “Ndikufunanso ndipemphe inu abambo, bungwe lathu lathu ili limene layamba la CMO, wina aliyense amene akudziwa kuti ndine bambo, tiyenera kuti tilowe bungweli,” anatero a Mkutu. Papa Fransisko anakhazikitsa chaka cha Yosefe Woyera chomwe Mpingo ukondwelere kuyambira pa 8 December, 2020 mpaka pa 8 December, 2021 ndipo chaka cha Mabanja kuyambira pa 19 March, 2021 mpaka pa 26 June, 2022.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Stima Apempha Anthu Apewe Kumvera Mauthenga a Bodza Okhudza Katemera wa COVID-19
news: Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi, Ambuye Montfort Stima apempha anthu mdziko muno kuti apewe kumvera mauthenga a bodza omwe akufalitsidwa pa masamba amchezo a internet okhudza katemera wa nthenda ya COVID-19 yemwe wayamba kuperekedwa mdziko muno. Ambuye Stima anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pambuyo pobayitsa katemera wa nthendayi m’boma la Mangochi. Ambuye Stima kulandira katemera Iwo ati mauthenga olondola okhudza katemera ndi okhawo omwe amalengezedwa ndi a unduna wa zaumoyo kudzera m’ma wailesi osati m’masamba a mchezo, ndipo apempha anthu omwe akonzeka, kuti akabayitse katemerayu kuti adziteteze ku nthendayi. “Ndachita zimenezi osati ngati episkopi koma ngati mzika ya dziko lino. Pali nkhani zambiri zomwe zikumveka maka pa masamba a mchezo a internet anthu ena akufuna adzichuluka nzeru pa za katemerayu; nkhani yakula ndi ya ma side effects. Mauthenga olondola akuchokera kwa a zaumoyo ndipo amalengezedwa pa wayilesi osati pa masamba a mchezo. Uyu si katemera oyamba ifeyo kulandira ndipo katemera aliyense amakhala ndi mavuto ake ndipo chifukwa sizikhala zokakamiza, aliyense akuyenera kuchimva mu mtima mwake ndi kukalandira katemerayo. Mankhwala ena aliwonse amakhala ndi mavuto ake potengera ndi kusiyana kwa matupi athu,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Iwo ati ino ndi nthawi yoti anthu mdziko muno azichita mapemphero othokoza Mulungu kaamba komvera ndi kuyankha mapemphero awo kuti papezeke mankhwala olimbana ndi kachilombo ka Coronavirus kuti nthendayi igonjetsedwe. “A Papa anatipempha tonse kuti tipemphere zolimba. Ifenso maepiskopi m’maiko osiyanasiyana tinapempha akhristu kuti tizichita mapemphero ndipo mapemphero athuwo ayankhidwa tsopano kudzera mwa akatsiwiri ena a sayansi omwe apanga katemera ameneyu ndipo wabwera ndiye kuti tikuyenera timugwiritse ntchito,” anatero Ambuye Stima.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Red Cross Lapereka Ndalama Kwa Anthu Okhudzidwa ndi Kusefukira Kwa Madzi ku Ntcheu
news: Bungwe la Malawi Red Cross society (MRCS) ndi thandizo lan dalama kuchokera ku European Union (EU), lachitatu pa 17 March, 2021 lapeleka ndalama kwa anthu okwana 116 a m’boma la Ntcheu omwe anakhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya kusefukira kwa madzi zomwe zinachititsa kuti nyumba kuphatikizapo Katundu wawo akokoloke ndi madziwa. Anthuwa ndi a m’madera a Phanga kwa mfumu yaikulu Masasa ndiponso ena ozungulira sukulu ya Thokozani mdera la mfumu yaikulu Ganya m’bomalo. Washon: Ndi udindo wathu Poyankhula pambuyo popereka thandizoli, wofalitsa nkhani ku bungwe la Malawi Red Cross society a Felix Washoni anati bungweli lachita izi potsatira kafukufuku yemwe wawonetsa kuti anthuwa akufunika thandizo la msanga. Iwo anati ndi udindo wawo pamodzi ndi boma kuwonetsetsa kuti anthuwa ali ndi pokhala. M’mawu ake mlangizi owona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi m’bomali a Jonathan Kapatsa anayamikira bungweli kaamba ka thandizoli lomwe akuti lafika mu nthawi yake. Anthuwa alandira ndalama zapakati pa 25 sauzande kwacha ndi 65 sauzande kwacha potengera momwe ngoziyi yakhudzira mabanjawa. Ndalama zokwana MK 5,525,000.00 (five million five hundred and twenty-five thousand Kwacha) ndi zomwe zaperekedwa kwa anthu patsikuli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ntchito Yopereka Katemera Wa Covid-19 Yayamba M’boma La Ntcheu
news: Ntchito yopereka katemera wa nthenda ya Covid-19 ayikhazikitsa m’boma la Ntcheu lachitatu pa 17 March, 2021. Poyankhula pa mkumano omwe unasonkhanitsa akuluakulu a khonsoloyi, m’modzi mwa akuluakulu pa chipatala cha bomalo, Dr. William Chinsenga anati katemerayu ndi ofunika kwambiri kwa mzika za dziko lino ndipo kuti anthu akuyenera kulandira katemerayu mwayi oterewu ukawapeza. Katemera wa Astrazeneca Dr. Chinsenga anati katemerayu athandiza dziko la Malawi kulimbana ndi nthenda ya Covid1-9. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa ogwira ntchito ku bungwe la World Vision m’bomalo a Charles Gwengwe  anati bungwe lawo litenga udindo wofotokozera anthu za kufunika kolandira katemerayu. Pakadali pano anthu omwe akuyembekezeka kulandira katemerayu ndi monga ogwira ntchito zaumoyo, achitetezo, ndi magulu ena okhudzidwa kuphatikizapo olemba nkhani.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Yosefe Woyera Ndi Chitsanzo Kwa Ansembe Onse
news: Pa mkumano wake lachinayi ndi gulu la ansembe ochokera m’dziko la Belgium omwe padakali pano akuchita maphunziro awo ku Belgian Pontifical College ku Rome m’dziko la Italy, Papa Francisco wati Yosefe Woyera ndi chitsanzo kwa ansembe onse. Iye wati ansembe akuyenera kuphunzira utate weniweni kuchokera kwa Yosefe Woyera poyang’anira bwino akhristu awo. “Zikuchitirani ubwino ngati mutatenga Yosefe Woyera kukhala chitsanzo cha utumiki wanu kuti muphunzire utate weniweni omwe mukuwusowa ngati abusa a nkhosa za Ambuye,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati Yosefe Woyera anavomera kulandira ndi manja awiri Amayi Maria ndi mwana Yesu mwa chikhulupiriro. Pamenepa Papa’yu wati Yosefe Woyera ndi katswiri weniweni wa moyo wa uzimu komanso katswiri posinkhasinkha cholinga cha Mulungu. Iye walangiza ansembe kuti pamene afika pa parish chinthu chofunika kwambiri ndiye kukonda akhristu osati kuthamanga kulengeza zofuna zawo. Papa Francisco wati Yosefe Woyera anagwira ntchito yake modzichepetsa komanso mwa kachetechete makhalidwe omwe iye wati ndi ofunika kwa wansembe. Pa mkumanowu iye wakumbutsa gulu la ansembe omwe akuchita maphunziro awo ku Belgian Pontifical College ku Rome kuti Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera nayenso anachita maphunziro ake ku college yomweyi ali wansembe kuyambira m’chaka cha 1946 mpaka 1948. Pokondwerera kuti tsopano papita zaka 150 kuchokera pomwe Papa Pio wa 9 adalengeza kuti Yosefe Woyera ndi nkhoswe ya Mpingo wa Katolika m’chaka cha 1870, Papa Francisco chaka chatha adalemba kalata yotchedwa Patris Corde m’chilatini kapena kuti Ndi Mtima wa Utate. Iye adalengeza kuti Mpingo ukondwerere chaka cha Yosefe Woyera kuyambira pa 8 December 2020 mpaka pa 8 December 2021. Kalatayi ikufotokoza kuti Yosefe Woyera ndi tate wokondeka, ndi tate wa ntchito za chipulumutso zogwirika mwa kachetechete pongotchula zochepa. Ndipo lachisanu pa 19 March 2021 lomwe ndi chaka cha Yosefe Woyera mwamuna wa Amayi Maria, Papa Francisco watsekulira chaka cha ma banja cha Amoris Laetitia m’chilatini kapena kuti Ubwino wa Chikondi M’banja. Chakachi chidzatsekedwa pa 26 June 2022 ndi msonkhano wa mabanja pa dziko lonse ku Rome.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la TIPOLISO Lapempha Makolo Ateteze Ana Ku Covid-19
news: Bungwe la Tikondane Positive Living Support Organization (TIPOLISO) lati liwonetsetsa kuti sukulu zomwe zimayang’aniridwa ndi bungweli, zikutsatira njira zomwe boma linakhazikitsa zopewera nthenda ya Covid-19. Mkulu wa bungweli mayi Celina Bomani anena izi ku Chipini m’boma la Zomba, pomwe amakayendera sukuluzi. Iwo ati ndi udindo wa makolo kuphunzitsa ana za kapewedwe ka nthendayi kaamba koti ndi omwe amakhala ndi anawa asanapite ku sukulu. “Makolo tikugwira nawo ntchito yotamandika powonetsetsa kuti akuphunzitsa ana awo za kapewedwe ka nthendayi monga kuvala mask akamabwera ku sukulu,” anatero mayi Boman. Mwazina mayi Bomani ati kupatula kupereka maphunziro, bungwelinso likugwira ntchito zina monga kuteteza zachilengedwe, kuphunzitsa za ulimi wa mlera nthaka komanso kusamalira ana amasiye. Ntchitoyi ikugwiridwa m’madera Group Village Headman Mwangata, Kapalasa, Kalaliki, Balamanja komanso Mbulukutu m’boma la Zomba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Mzimayi Kukhala Mlembi Wa Bungwe Lowona Za Baibulo
news: Kwa nthawi yoyamba Papa Francisco wasankha mzimayi pa udindo wa mlembi wa bungwe la ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ku Vatican lowona za Baibulo lodziwika kuti Pontifical Biblical Commission. Iye wasankha pa udindo wa ukuluwu Sister Professor Nuria Calduch-Benages wa chipani cha a sisitere odziwika kuti Missionary Daughters of the Holy Family of Nazareth, yemwe ndi katswiri pa nkhani za Baibulo. Sister Professor Calduch-Benages omwe kwawo ndi ku Spain amaphunzitsa phunziro la Baibulo ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Gregorian Pontifical University ku Rome m’dziko la Italy. Iwo akhala membala wa Pontifical Biblical Commission kuyambira m’chaka cha 2014 ndipo posachedwapa asankhidwanso kukhala membala wa bungweli kwa zaka zina zisanu. M’chaka cha 2008, Sister Professor Calduch-Benages anachita nawo msonkhano wa Sinodi ya ma episkopi a Mpingo wa Katolika ku Rome ngati katswiri pa za kufunika kwa mawu a Mulungu m’moyo wa Mpingo (an expert in the General Assembly of the Synod of Bishops focusing on “The Word of God in the Life and Mission of the Church).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dziko la Tanzania Lakhazikitsa Masiku 14 Okhudza Maliro a President Magufuli
news: Dziko la Tanzania lakhazikitsa masiku khumi ndi anayi (14) kuti akhale okhudza maliro a president wa dzikolo John Pombe Joseph Magufuli yemwe wamwalira dzulo mu mzinda wa Dar Es Salaam mdzikolo. Wamwalira ndi nthenda ya mtima-Magufuli Malingana ndi wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleriyu Samia Suluhu Hassan, president Magufuli wamwalira madzulo lachitatu atadwala kwa nthawi yochepa nthenda ya mtima. Koma polankhulapo, mtsogoleri wa otsutsa boma mdzikolo Tundu Lisu wati uthenga wa imfa ya Magufuli si wa chilendo kwa iye ndipo wati presidenti-yu wakhala akudwala nthenda ya COVID-19 kwa nthawi yayitali, ngakhale boma lakhala likutsutsa izi ponena kuti presidentiyu ali bwino. President wa dziko la Kenya, Uhuru Kenyata wakhazikitsa mdziko lake masiku asanu ndi limodzi (6) okhudza malirowa ndipo atsogoleri a maiko ena apereka mauthenga awo a chipepeso ku dzikolo monga president wa dziko lino, Somalia, Venezuela, president wakale wa dziko la Nigeria Goodluck Jonathan ndi ena ambiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Mavuto A M’dziko La Paraguay
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi mavuto a zandale komanso zaumoyo mdziko la Paraguay. Papa wanena izi polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira ma buku. Pamenepa iye wapempherera dzikoli ndipo wapempha atsogoleri ake kuti achite zokambirana pofuna kuti mtendere ubwelerenso mchimake m’dzikolo. “Kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria a mirakuli a ku Caacupé nkhoswe ya dziko la Paraguay ndikupempha Ambuye Yesu Mfumu ya Mtendere kuti mtendere ubwelerenso m’dzikoli,” watero Papa Francisco. Anthu m’dzikoli akhala akuchita ziwonetsero zosonyeza kusakondwa kwawo kaamba ka mavuto a za chuma omwe anthu m’dzikolo akukumana nawo kuphatikizapo mavuto a za umoyo malinga ndi kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akugwidwa ndi nthenda ya Covid-19. Ndipo popitiriza kuphunzitsa akhristu pa mutu wa mapemphero Papa Francisco wati pochita mapemphero akhristu amakhala pa ubale weniweni ndi Utatu Woyera: Mulungu Atate, Mulungu Mwana ndi Mulungu Mzimu Woyera ndipo wati ndi Mulungu Mzimu Woyera yemwe amathandiza akhristu kupemphera bwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu a Dera la Zomba Chisi Apereka Madandaulo Kwa Phungu Wawo
news: Anthu a mdera la Zomba Chisi apereka kalata ya madandaulo awo kwa phungu wa dera lawo Mark Bottoman kuti akonze ena mwa mavuto omwe derali likukumana nawo. Botomani (kumanja) kulandira kalatayo Malinga ndi kalatayi, derali likukumana ndi mavuto monga kusowa kwa misewu komanso milatho yabwino komanso kuwonongeka kwa chilengedwe mwazina. Polankhulapo pambuyo popereka madandaulowa Group Village Headman Chaweza ati iwo pamodzi ndi anthu a mdera lawo akufunanso awone momwe ndalama ya chitukuko chakudera ya CDF imagwirira ntchito. Malinga ndi kalatayi yomwe yasayinidwa ndi ma gulupu anayi a mderali, ena mwa mavuto omwe kalatayi yapempha phunguyu kuti akonze ndi monga, kukonza nsewu wa Mamphanda kupita ku Naphali, kukonzanso tchingo lomwe lili mu mtsinje wa Phalombe, kuyika mlatho pa mtsinje wa Mtsukamatumbo, kungotchulapo zochepa chabe. Anthuwa adandaulanso kuti mavuto a kusintha kwa nyengo achititsa kuti derali liyambe kukhudzidwa ndi ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi nthawi ndi nthawi. Poyankhapo pa za madandaulowa phungu wa derali a Mark Bottoman ati awonetsetsa kuti ntchito zomwe zinayambika kale ziyende mu nthawi yake popeza ena mwa mavuto omwe anayimitsa ntchitozi ali mkati mokonzedwa.  Koma Group Village Headman Chaweza anati ngakhale apereka kalatayi, iwo sanakhutire ndi zomwe phunguyu wanena atalandira kalatayi ponena kuti sakudziwa momwe ndalama ya chitukuko cha kudera ya CDF imagwirira ntchito. Iwo ati zimenezi zikuwapatsa nkhawa ndipo ndi zokaikitsa ngati madandaulo omwe aperekawa akonzedwe mwachangu kaamba koti palibe kulumikizana kulikonse pakati pa phunguyu ndi anthu akudera kwake. Polankhulapo pa nkhaniyi, mkulu woyendetsa ntchito ku bungwe la zachitukuko mu mpingo wa katolika la Catholic Development Commision (CADECOM) lomwe likugwira ntchito zake mderali, a Aaron Kandiwo Mtaya ati ali ndi chikhulupiriro kuti mkumanowu ubala zipatso kaamba koti tsopano anthu a kudera akumana ndi phungu wawo ndi kumutulira nkhawa zawo. A Mtaya atinso bungwe lawo liyetsetsa kutsatira ntchito zomwe zizigwiridwa kuderali komanso kukonza mavuto omwe aziyimitsa ntchitozo. Bungwe la CADECOM likugwira ntchito yozindikiritsa anthu a m’maboma a Zomba, Balaka, Machinga ndi Chikwawa za udindo omwe ali nawo pa nkhani zosamalira za chilengedwe komanso chitukuko cha madera awo. Ntchitoyi akuyigwira ndi thandizo la ndalama zochokera ku boma la dziko la Scottland kudzera ku bungwe la Trocaire komanso SCAIF.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la MRA Ladandaula ndi Anthu Ozemba Msonkho
news: Bungwe lotolera msonkho mdziko muno la Malawi Revenue Authority (MRA) ladandaula ndi anthu komanso magulu omwe ali ndi khalidwe lozemba kapena kupanga zachinyengo polipira nsonkho.
