Mkulu owona za ubale wa bungweli ndi anthu yemwenso ndi mneneri wa bungweri Steven Kapoloma wanena izi potsatira kafukufuku yemwe Radio Maria Malawi inachita maka pa m’mene ntchito yolimbikitsa anthu kupereka msonkho mosakakamizidwa ikuyendera yomwe bungweli linakhazikitsa m’mbuyomu. Kapoloma: Akamberembere achuluka Kapoloma wati kudzera mu ndondomeko za makono zopezera uthenga komanso kulipira msonkho ku bungweli zomwe zinayamba kugwira ntchito, pali akamberembere ena omwe akuzemba ndi kuthawa kukhoma msonkho pa katundu ochokera kunja ndiponso ogulitsa mdziko muno. Iye anati izi ndi zinthu zina zomwe zikubwezera m’mbuyo ntchito yotolera ndalama za boma koma iye anati bungweli silikugona tulo ndipo likuchita chotheka kuthana ndi atambwali a mtunduwu. Koma malingana ndi anthu omwe amasatira bwino nkhani za msonkho anati kuchuluka kwa anthu ozemba kulipira msonkho kumatanthauza kuti pena pake pali vuto makamaka ngati anthu sakukhutisidwa ndi kufunika kolipira msonkho mosakakamizidwa. Katswiriyu Emanuel Kaluluma wa kapani yapereka upangiri wa msonkho ya EK Consultant ya mu mzinda wa Blantyre, analoza chala bungweli kuti nthawi yakwana yoti bungweri lizithanso kuwuza chilungamo boma lomwe limagwiritsa ntchito ndalama za msonkhozi kuti lizichita chitukuko chokwanira komanso kutumikira anthu mokwanira. Iye anati bungweli lili ndi kuthekera kolangiza boma kudzera ku nduna ya za chuma kuti limakumana ndi vuto lolephera kukwaniritsa mulingo wake wa ndalama zotolera ku msonkho kaamba ka kunyinyirika kwa anthu opereka msonkho kaamba ka kusakhutira pa kagwiridwe ntchito ka ndalamazi. Bungwe la MRA linakhazikitsa njira zamakono monga Msonkho Online yomwe imapereka mpata kwa anthu kupeza uthenga okhudza msonkho komanso kulipira kudzera pa makina a kompyuta. Padakali pano bungweri labweretsanso mpikisano kwa anthu ogula malonda kufunsa lisiti la bungweli pamene pamene agula katundu, omwe ukutchedwa Kuiphula Ndi Lisiti Langa Promotion omwe ufike mwezi wa May ndipo ukuchitikira m’mizinda ya Blantyre, Lilongwe, Mzuzu ndi Zomba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mpingo wa Katolika Sungadalitse Ukwati Wa Anthu Ofanana Ziwalo- Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati mpingowu sungathe kudalitsa maukwati a amuna kapena akazi okhaokha. Malinga ndi kalata yomwe bungwe lomwe limalimbikitsa ndi kuteteza chikhulupiriro cha mpingo wa Katolika, latulutsa lolemba pa 15 March 2021, yokhudza ma ukwati a anthu a amuna kapena akazi okha okha ndipo kalatayi yavomerezedwa ndi Papa Francisco, yati mpingo wa katolika sungathe kudalitsa maukwati a anthu a amuna kapena akazi okhaokha. Bungweli lati Mpingo wa Katolika ulibe mphamvu zochitira zimenezi ndipo latsindika kuti ndi zosaloredwa ndipo pa chifukwa ichi lati ansembe sakuloredwa mwa njira ina iliyonse kudalitsa ma ukwati a anthu a amuna kapena akazi okhaokha. Bungwe lolimbikitsa ndi kuteteza chikhulupiriro cha Mpingo wa Katolikali lati pamene Mpingo ukunena kuti sungathe kudalitsa ma ukwati oterewa poyamba sukuweruza anthu omwe nkhaniyi ikuwakhudza, kachiwiri Mpingo sukuchita tsankho lina lililonse ndipo kachitatu sukuwasala koma kuti nkhani yaikulu yagona pa ma ukwati awo. Yankho lomwe bungweli lapereka likutsatira funso kapena kuti dubium m’chilatini lomwe anthu ena akhala akufunsa pa nkhani ya ma ukwati a anthu a amuna kapena akazi okhaokha ngati ndi ovomerezeka. Mpingo wa Katolika umalola ndi kuvomereza ukwati pakati pa mamuna ndi mkazi omwe avomera mwa kufuna kwao kuti adzakhala limodzi mpaka imfa kuwalekanitsa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Maphunziro Asokonekera pa Sukulu ya Mpondasi ku Mangochi Kaamba ka Nkhani za Katemera wa COVID-19
news: Maphunziro anasokonekera ku m’mawaku pa sukulu ya pulaimale ya Mpondasi m’boma la Mangochi patafika anthu ena omwe ophunzira amaganiza ngati ndi opereka katemera wa nthenda ya Covid-19. Watsimikiza za chipolowecho-Maida Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Roderick Maida watsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo wati chipolowechi chinayamba pamene pa sukuluyi panafika anthu ogwira ntchito ku kampani ya Old Mutual Insurance omwe amaganiziridwa kuti ndi obaya katemera. Anthu ena a m’mudzi anatengerapo mwayi pa chipolowechi ndi kuthyola chipinda china chomwe amasungira ufa wa phala ndipo aba matumba okwana 1,185 olemera makilogalamu awiri lililonse komanso makatoni awiri a sopo wa U-Fresh. Padakalipano apolisi akusakasaka anthuwa aba katunduyu ndipo akapezeka amangidw andi kuyimbidwa mlandu. Padakalipano apolisiwa paempha ophunzira kuti asadere nkhawa za katemera chifukwa aliyense adzibayidwa mwa kufuna kwake ndipo apemphanso anthu a midzi yozungulira sukulu za m’bomali kuti apewe kuwononga katundu wapa sukulu ndipo m’malo mwake akhale patsogolo poteteza sukuluzo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Francisko Wakwanitsa Zaka Zisanu Ndi Zitatu Ali Papa
news: Zaka zisanu ndi zitatu zapitazo pa 13 March 2013, Cardinal Jorge Mario Bergoglio anamusankha kukhala m’lowam’malo wa Petulo Woyera yemwe ndi Papa woyamba. Iye anasankha kutchedwa kuti Papa Francisco pofuna kupereka ulemu wa padera kwa Francisco Woyera wa ku Assisi ndipo ndi Papa woyamba kusankha dzina la Francisco. Koma si pokhapo, iye ndi wansembe woyamba wa chipani cha ma Jesuit kapena kuti Society of Jesus m’chingerezi kukhala Papa ndiponso ndi wansembe woyamba wochokera ku Latin America kukhala Papa.  Pa udindo wake ngati Papa pali zambiri zomwe zachitika ndipo ndi Papa yemwe wabweretsa kusintha pa kachitidwe ka zinthu m’magawo osiyana-siyana zija m’chingerezi amati ma reforms pofuna kuti akhristu aziyendera limodzi polalikira za Uthenga wa Chipulumutso. Papa Francisco ali ndi ngodya zitatu zoyendetsera Mpingo. Poyamba kuti atsogoleri a Mpingo akhale pafupi ndi akhristu awo, kachiwiri kuti Mpingo uyendere limodzi ndipo pomaliza kuti umishonare wa Mpingo uwonekere. Ndi m’chaka cha 2013, Papa Francisco analemba kalata yake yotchedwa Evangelii gaudium yomwe ndi muuni wa u Papa wake. Mkalata’yi anafotokoza za kufunika kolalikira Uthenga wa Chipulumutso ndi chimwemwe komanso kuti pakhale kusintha pa m’mene ma udindo ndi mautumiki osiyanasiyana agwilira ntchito pofuna kuti Uthenga Wabwino ufikire anthu onse monga Yesu Khristu mwini afunira. Iye ndi Papa yemwe akutsindikanso za kufunika kwa moyo wa banja kudzera m’kalata yake yotchedwa Amoris Laetitia komanso ndi Papa yemwe akufuna kuonetsetsa kuti ana akutetezedwa mu Mpingo kudzera mu bungwe la Pontifical Commission for the Protection of Minors. Nkhani yosamala chilengedwe ndi nkhani ina ya pa mtima pake yomwe akufotokoza mkalata yake yotchedwa Laudato Si. Ndi Papa yemwe wabweretsa kusintha pa nkhani za chuma ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican pofuna kuwonetsetsa kuti chuma chikusamalidwa komanso kuti nkhani zokhudza chuma zikuchitika poyera, transparency and accountability m’chingerezi. Iye ndi Papa yemwe mtima wake uli pa anthu osauka, anthu othawa kwao pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana, anthu achikulire komanso iye wakhala akutsindika za kufunika kwa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu kuti anthu akuyenera kukhalitsana bwino ngati banja limodzi la Mulungu. Pomaliza ndi Papa yemwe akutsindika za chifundo cha Mulungu chomwe amachiwonetsa kwa anthu ake nthawi zonse ndipo amawakhudza anthuwo mu njira zosiyana-siyana kuti choncho pakhale ubale weniweni pakati pa iye ndi anthuwo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nduna Ya Za Malo Yalowelerapo Pa Mpungwepungwe Wokhudza Malo Ena Ku Lilongwe
news: Nduna yowona za malo, nyumba komanso chitukuko cha madera a mtawuni a Kezzie Msukwa ati anthu a ku dera la Chitipi kwa Njewa ku Lilongwe ali ndi ufulu onse wa umwini wa malo omwe akhala akulimbirana ndi mzika ina ya mdziko la Bangladesh. Iwo anena izi polankhula ndi nyumba ina yosindikiza nkhani pa makina a intaneti kutsatira chigamulo cha ku bwalo lalikulu la milandu la High Court pamene masiku apitawa Judge Kenyatta Nyirenda wagamula mokomera mzika ya ku Bangladesh-yi a Muhammad Manani kuti ndiye mwini malowa osati anthu a kuderali. Walowelerapo-Msukwa Ndunayi yawonetsa kukhumudwa ndi momwe nkhaniyi yayendera koma inakana kuyankhulapo pa zomwe boma lichite kuti malowa abwelere kwa anthuwa. Malowa omwe ndi okwana ma hekitala 166 akhala ali pa mpungwepungwe kwa nthawi yaitali pofuna kudziwa za mwini wake weniweni. Ndunayi yati mzika ya ku Bangladesh-yi idalephera kuwonetsa umboni wa malowa pomwe iwo adapita kukayendera malowa zomwe anati zidawachititsa kuti awuze mafumu a ku derali kuti agawe malowa kwa anthu. Iwo anawonjeranso kunena kuti mkuluyi ali ndi mapepala a malo ena omwe ali m’mbali mwa msewu omwe uli kufupi ndi komwe kuli malo akunenedwawa ndipo ndi odabwa pa za mapepala omwe adakapereka ku bwalo la milandu la High Court kuti oweruza agamule mokomelr mzika ya kunjayi. Apa a Msukwa anakana kulankhulapo zambiri pa zomwe unduna wawo uchite pofuna kuwathandiza anthu a ku derali kuti malowa abwelere m’manja mwawo. Pakadali pano anthu a kudelali ati achita chothekera kukamang’ala ku bwalo la milandu la Supreme pa za nkhaniyi kuti apeze chilungamo choyenera ponena kuti chigamulo cha Judge Kenyatta Nyirenda sichidayende mwachilungamo. Anthuwa anena izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe anachititsa lachisanu ku malowa motsogozedwa ndi a Alfonso Zudu Jamali komanso Group Village Headman Nakutepa komwe anati iwo sakusunthika ndi chigamulochi. Iwo akuti sadauzidwe kuti nkhani yokhudza maloyi ili ku bwalo la milandu ndipo adabwa ndi kubwera kwa chigamulochi. Apa anthuwa apempha anthu ena akufuna kwabwino kuti awathandize kuti apeze akatswiri a za malamulo omwe angawathandize ku bwalo la milandu la Supreme kuti ateteze malo omwe akuti adawasiyira ndi makolo awo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi Mtsogoleri Wa Dziko La Portugal
news: Ofesi yofalitsa mauthenga ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican, yalengeza za nkumano wa Papa Francisco ndi President Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa wa dziko la Portugal lachisanu ku likulu la Mpingowu ku Vatican. Mu zokambirana zawo atsogoleri awiriwa ati ndi okhutira ndi ubale wabwino omwe ulipo pakati pa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ndi dziko la Portugal. Sousa ndi Papa Francisko Koma si pokhapo, mbali zonse ziwiri ndi zokondwa ndi ntchito yotamandika yomwe Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la Portugal ukugwira maka pa nkhani ya za umoyo monga kuteteza moyo kuyambira pa chiyambi mpaka ku mapeto komanso pa za mliri wa coronavirus. Atsogoleriwa akambirananso za kufunika kwa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu m’dzikolo komanso za mgwirizano wa maiko a ku ulaya, European Union (EU) omwe ukutsogoleredwa ndi dziko la Portugal. Atatha kukumana ndi Papa Francisco President de Sousa anakumananso ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika, Cardinal Pietro Parolin komanso mkulu wa ofesi yoona za ubale wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ndi maiko ena, Archbishop Paul Gallagher. Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse liri pa ubale wa ukazembe ndi maiko 183.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akhazikitsa Knock Shrine Kukhala Malo a AMayi Maria, Ukaristia
news: Lachisanu sabata ya mawa pa 19 March ndi tsiku la chaka cha Yosefe Woyera, mwamuna wa Amayi Maria. Malo oyera a Knock mdziko la Ireland Pa tsikuli, Papa Francisco adzakhazikitsa kudzera pa uthenga wa pa kanema, malo ena oyera otchedwa Knock Shrine m’dziko la Ireland kukhala malo oyera a Amayi Maria komanso malo a Ukaristia komwe akhristu ochokera maiko osiyanasiyana atha kupita kukapemphera (International Marian and Eucharistic shrine). Polankhulapo pa nkhaniyi, Ambuye Michael Neary omwe ndi Archbishop wa Archdiocese ya Tuam m’dziko la Ireland ati ndi koyenera kupereka ulemuwu pa tsiku la chaka cha Yosefe Woyera kaamba koti Amayi Maria, Yosefe Woyera, Ambuye Yesu komanso Yohane Woyera mlembi wa Uthenga Wabwino m’Baibulo anawonekera pa malowa pa 21 August m’chaka cha 1879. Papa Francisko pa ulendo wake wa m’mbuyomu ku Knock Shrine Kafukufuku yemwe likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika linachita mchaka cha 1879 ndi 1936 anapeza kuti zomwe zinachitika pa malowa pa 21 August 1879 ndi zoonadi. Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera anafika pa malowa m’chaka cha 1979, Mother Teresa Woyera m’chaka cha 1993 ndipo Papa Francisco m’chaka cha 2018.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Atolankhani Ali ndi Udindo Waukulu Pothetsa Katangale – ACB
news: Bungwe lothana ndi katangale komanso ziphuphu m’dziko muno la Anti Corruption Bureau (ACB) lati atolankhani ali ndi udindo waukulu ozindikiritsa anthu za kuyipa kwa mchitidwe wa katangale ndi ziphuphu m’dziko muno. Mkulu wofalitsa nkhani ku bungweli mayi Egrita Ndala anena izi pa maphunziro a tsiku limodzi omwe bungweli linakonzera atolankhani a m’boma la Mangochi powazindikiritsa za udindo wawo pa ntchito yolimbana ndi katangale. Ndala: Atolankhani ndi gulu lofunikira kwambiri Iwo ati atolankhani ndi imodzi mwa nsanamira mu ndondomeko yachiwiri yolimbana ndi ziphuphu m’Malawi yomwe inakhazikitsidwa. Mayi Ndala ati pomwe atolankhani ali ndi kuthekera kofikira magulu osiyanasiyana a anthu, atolankhaniwa atha kuthandiza kusintha zinthu pozindikiritsa anthu za kuyipa kwa mchitidwe wa katangale ndi ziphuphu. “Tikufuna atolankhani azindikire  kuti iwowa ndi gulu lofunikira kwambiri kaamba koti pamene ali akhoza kuthandizira kusintha zinthu popeza amatha kufikira anthu ambiri,” anatero mayi Ndala. Iwo atinso kudzera mwa atolankhani, bungweli litha kufikira anthu osiyanasiyana omwe amamvera, kuwerenga kapena kuwonera zomwe atolankhaniwa amalemba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mabungwe Omenyera Ufulu wa Anthu Akufuna Amayi Adzipatsidwa Makontalikiti Ambiri
news: Mabungwe awiri omenyela ufulu wa anthu omwe ndi a Centre for Human Rights and Rehabilitation (CHRR) komanso bungwe lina la m’dziko la Uganda la African Freedom of Information Centre apempha boma kuti liyike chidwi popereka ma kontalakiti ochuluka kwa amayi omwe amachita ntchito za malonda. Mabungwewa apereka pempholi kudzera mu kalata yomwe atulutsa mogwirizana ngati mbali imodzi yokondwelera tsiku lokumbukira amayi pa dziko lonse International Women’s Day lomwe lakumbukiridwa pa 8 March. Wasayinira nawo kalatayo-Kaiyatsa Iwo ati kafukufuku wawo waposachedwa adawonetsa kuti amayi ngakhale ali ndi chiwerengero chachikulu m’dziko muno, akupitilirabe kukhala ndi mwayi wochepa okhala nawo m’maudindo akuluakulu kuphatikizapo mu ntchito za malonda. Mabungwewa ati ndi zokhumudwitsa kuti makontalakiti ochepetsetsa a boma amapita kwa amayi ngakhale ali ndi kuthekera kochita ntchito zambiri. Kafukufukuyu akuti adapezanso kuti ma kontalakitala achizimayiwa amakumana ndi nkhanza zosiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo kufunsidwa kuti agone nawo kuti akonderedwe popatsidwa ntchito zoti agwire. Zomwe kafukukufuyu adapeza zidagwirizana ndi zomwe bank ya pa dziko lonse ya World Bank idapezanso mukafukufuku wake yemwe adaonetsa kuti makontalakita achizimayi amafunsidwa zochuluka ngati zodziyenereza pa ntchito yawo komanso kuti pamakhala zotchinga zambiri pamene akufuna kulembetsa mu kaundula molingana ndi ntchito zomwe akugwira popereka chitsanzo cha ku nthambi yowona za misewu ya National Roads Authority. Mkulu wa bungwe la Centre for Human Rights and Rehabilitation (CHRR) a Micheal Kaiyatsa komanso mkulu wa bungwe African Freedom of Information Centre (AFIC) a Gilbert Sendugwa ati izi ndi zobwezera m’mbuyo kuchita bwino pakati pa amayiwa ponena kuti nawonso ali ndi ufulu wochita malonda mofanana ndi amuna. Iwo anapeleka chitsanzo cha gawo 20 ndime yoyamba ya malamulo aakulu a dziko lino lomwe limaletsa kutsekelezana pochita zinthu zina kamba koti munthu aliyense ali ndi ufulu ofanana ndi nzake posawerengera kusiyana kwa zinthu zina. Kalatayi yati mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera achite monga adalonjezera ku nyumba ya malamulo pomwe ankatsekulira mkumano wa aphungu m’mwezi wa September chaka chatha kuti adzatukula amayi ndi achinyamata powathandiza mu njira zosiyanasiyana. Iwo ati palibe lamulo lomwe limakamba zoti gulu lina la anthu litha kusankhidwa mwapadela kuti apatsidwe kontalakiliti ndipo amayiwa akuyenera azipindula nawo moyenelera. Dziko la pansi limakondwelera tsiku la amayi lodziwika mchingerezi kuti International Women’s Day pa 8 March chaka chilichonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wina Walamulidwa Kukakhala Ku Ndende Kwa Zaka 6 Pa Mlandu Wa Kuba
news: Bwalo la milandu la Makande First Grade Magistrate lachitatu lalamula Hassan Hussein kuti akagwire ukayidi wa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi litamupeza wolakwa pa milandu ya umbava ndi umbanda. Bwaloli lidamva kuchokera kwa woyimira milandu kumbali ya boma Sergeant Mwanyala Goche wa pa polisi yaying’ono ya Ngabu kuti Hussein adapalamula milanduyi usiku wa pa 26 ndi 27 January, 2021 pamene adathyola nyumba ya mphunzitsi wina wa pa sukulu ya pulayimale ya Chapomoka ndi kubamo katundu osiyanasiyana wa ndalama zokwana K147, 500. Mu bwalo la milandu, bamboyu adayikana milanduyi yomwe ndi yosemphana ndi gawo 309 ndime 2 ndi gawo 278 ya malamulo zomwe zidachititsa kuti woyimira milandu ku mbali ya boma abweretse mboni zitatu. Pamenepa Sergeant Goche adapempha bwaloli kuti lipereke chilango chokhwima kwa mkuluyu kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Iye adapitiriza kuwuza bwaloli kuti wopalamula milanduyu sakufuna kusintha khalidwe lake ngakhale adamangidwaponso m’chaka cha 2015 kaamba kopalamula milandu ngati yomweyi. Mu chidandaulo chake, Hussein adapempha bwaloli kuti limupatse chilango chofewa popeza amasamalira mkazi ndi ana. Popereka chigamulo chake First Grade Magistrate Chiyembekezo Phiri adagwirizana ndi a kumbali ya boma ndipo adalamula Hussein kuti akagwire ukayidi wa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi (6) mwa kalavula gaga pa mulandu wa umbanda ndi ukayidi wa zaka zisanu (5) mwa kalavula gaga pa mulandu wa kuba, pakamodzi. Wopalamula milanduyu Hassan Hussein wa zaka 34 zakubadwa amachokera m’mudzi mwa Masanduko Mfumu yayikulu Ngabu m’Boma la Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe La ADMARC Lati Lakonzeka Kubwezeretsa Ubale Wake Ndi Alimi
news: Bungwe logula ndikugulitsa mbewu mdziko muno la Agricultural Development Marketing Corporation (ADMARC) lati lakonza ndondomeko zosiyanasiyana zothandizira kubwezeretsa ubale wake ndi alimi mdziko muno. Wapampando wa komiti yoyendetsa bungweli a Alexander Kusamba Dzonzi ndi omwe alankhula izi mu mzinda wa Blantyre pa msonkhano wa atolankhani womwe bungweli linakonza pofuna kufotozera a Malawi za momwe bungweli lichitire pofuna kutukula miyoyo ya alimi mdziko muno. A Kusamba Dzonzi ati kwa zaka 27 zapitazi chiyambireni  ulamuliro wa zipani zambiri bungweli lakhala likulephera kuthandiza alimi mdziko muno kamba ka mfundo zosathandiza zomwe zimayendetsa bungweli zomwe ati zinapangidwa mwadala ndi andale ngati njira imodzi yochitira katangale. Iwo ati kudzera mu ndondomeko zomwe zakonzedwazi zithandizira kubwezeretsa mmene bungweli linkagwilira ntchito zake kale ndi cholinga choti alimi omwe akulima mbewu zosiyanasiyana apindule mochuluka pogulitsa zokolola zawo ku bungweli. Pamenepa a Dzonzi atsindika kuti bungweli ndilokonzeka kugula mbewu  zosiyanasiyana kwa alimi mdziko muno kuphatikizapo chimanga chomwe ati agula pa mulingo osachepera matani 1.1 million. “Alimi akhala akuberedwa kwa nthawi yaitali kamba koti analibe mwayi wogulitsa zokolola zawo ku ADMARC, pano ndiwuze alimi onse mdziko muno kuti bwenzi lenileni la mliri labwereranso kamba koti ndalama zilipo kale zoti tigule zokolola zawo mu nthawi yabwino kumadera awo komweko ndi cholinga choti mlimi apindule” anatero  Dzonzi. Iwo ati pofuna kufikira alimi ochuluka omwe akulima mbewu zosiyanasiyana bungwe lawo likhazikitsa nthambi zina zoti zithandizire kupanga katundu wosiyanasiyana yemwe azipangidwa kuchokera Ku mbewu zosiyanasiyana. A Dzonzi anati ,”Ife ngati bungwe tasaka kale ndalama zosachepera 548 million dollars ndi cholinga choti tiyambitse kampani zatsopano zomwe zikhale zikupanga nsalu, Kugaya Ufa, Mafuta ophikira komanso Chiponde zomwe zizipangidwa kuchokera Ku mbewu zosiyanasiyana monga thonje, chimanga, mtedza, soya, nandolo ndi mpendadzuwa zomwe alimiwa tiziwagula”. Iwo anatinso bungweli likuganizira zokhala ndi kampani yogulitsa zipangizo za ulimi monga feteleza, mathalakitale ndi zina ndipo ati makampaniwanso athandizira kulemba achinyamata ochuluka ntchito. A Dzonzi achenjezanso andale omwe akhala akubera a Malawi kudzera Ku bungweli popereka chimanga chawo pomwe china chimakhala chowola komanso kutenga ndalama Ku bungweli posapereka katundu aliyense kuti nthawi yawo yatha. Iwo ati mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr  Lazarus Chakwera ndi wachiwiri wake a Saulosi  Chilima akufunitsitsa bungweli likhale loyima palokha ndikuthandizira alimi okha kuti atukuke.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Atatu Afa Pa Ngozi Ya Pa Msewu M’boma La Chikwawa
news: Anthu atatu afa m’boma la Chikwawa pa ngozi yomwe inachitika mu msewu wa M1 wa Ngabu – Nchalo pa 22 February, 2021 m’mudzi mwa Kulima. Malingana ndi ofalitsa nkhani za a Polisi pa poilisi ya Chikwawa Sergeant Dickson Matemba, ngoziyi inakhuza minibus ya mtundu wa Toyota Hiace yomwe nambala yake ndi CK5741 yomwe imachokera kwa Ngabu kulowera ku Nchalo ndipo inatenga anthu 14. Matemba wati oyendetsa minibasiyo amatsogozana ndi galimoto ina yomwe inachepetsa liwiro mwadzidzidzi chifukwa cha ziweto zomwe zimawoloka nsewu pa nthawiyo ndipo izi zinachititsa kuti woyendetsa minibasiyo alephere kuwongolera bwino kaamba kothamangitsa kwambiri ndipo inasempha msewu ndi kugudubuzika kangapo. Kutsatira ngoziyi woyendetsa minibasiyo ndi anthu ena awiri anamwalira pamalo angoziwo ndipo ena avulala modetsa nkhawa ndipo akulandira thandizo la mankhwala pa chipatala chaching’ono cha Ngabu m’bomalo. Padakali pano apolisi m’bomali akuchenjeza oyendetsa galimoto omwe amagwiritsa ntchito msewu wa Chikwawa kuti azitsatira zikwangwani za pamsewu ndi kuchepetsa liwiro chifukwa ku delali kuli ziweto zochuluka zomwe zimawoloka msewu mwadzidzidzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mbava Zosadziwika Zaba Pa Tchalitchi Cha St Anthony Changoima Mu Dayosizi Ya Chikwawa
news: Mbava zomwe sizikudziwika zathyola ndi kuba katundu osiyanasiyana usiku wa pa 24 February, 2021 mu tchalichi cha mpingo wa katolika cha St Anthony – Changoima mu Dayosizi ya Chikwawa Malingana ndi gulupa watchalitchichi Stephano Tchapo mbavazi zinathyola chitseko cha chipinda chomwe amasungirako zipangizo zoyera (sacristy) pogwiritsa ntchito zida zakuthwa ndipo anabamo katundu yemwe ndi chikwama chomwe munali zipangizo zopangira nsembe ya misa, makalendala okwana 15, mtanda, nsalu zoyala  paguwa, lamya za m’manja komanso ma bulangete awiri. “Panthawi ya zaupanduyi alonda athu pamalowa anali akuyang’anira mbali ina popeza tili ndi malo aakulu omwe amayang’aniridwa ndi achitetezo athu.” Anatero gulupa Tchapo. Padakali pano apolisi pa polisi yaing’ono ya Changoima atsimikizira Radio Maria kuti palibe aliyense yemwe wamangidwa mokhuzana ndi kubedwaku. Sergeant Clifford Tebulo wati kafukufuku ali mkati kuti agwire akubawa ndipo akapezeka akazengedwe mlandu. Katundu yense yemwe wabedwa ndi wa ndalama zokwana pafupifupi K200, 000. Parishi ya St Anthony Changoima idachita malire ndi dziko la Mozambique ndipo umbava ngati omwewu udachitikanso m’chaka cha 1986 pa tchalichi lomweli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Dokotala Wake Watsopano
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika padziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha dokotala wake watsopano. Malinga malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican papa wasankha Roberto Bernabei kukhala dokotala wake watsopano kutsatira imfa ya Fabrizio Soccorsi yemwe anali dokotala wake wakale. Bernabei yemwe ndi wa zaka 69 ndipo amachokera ku Florence m’dziko la Italy ndi katswiri wa za chipatala pa nkhani za anthu achikulire. Kuwonjezera apa Bernabei ndi mphunzitsi komanso professor ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya madokotala yotchedwa Catholic University of the Sacred Heart yomwe ili mu mzinda wa Rome m’dziko la Italy. Pali chiyembekezo kuti dokotalayu  azikhala nawo pa ma ulendo a Papa  m’maiko osiyana-siyana. Papa akuyembekezeka kukacheza m’dziko la Iraq kwa masiku anayi kumayambiriro a mwezi wa m’mawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CWO Ya Yamikira Bungwe La Censorship Board Pochitapo Kanthu Padandaulo Lawo
news: MKulu wa bungwe la CWO mayi Lucy Vokhiwa Anganille Nthakomwa, oyang’anira ma luso ku bungwe la Cencorship Board Bungwe la Amayi achikatolika la Catholic Women Organisation (CWO) mdziko muno layamikira bungwe loyang’anira zinthu zaluso kuti zili ndi mauthenga oyenera la  Censorship board kamba kochitapo kanthu pa kalata yawo yomwe analembera bungweli pa 16 February, 2021 pokhuzidwa ndi zithunzi zakanema zomwe zakhala zikuyenda pa masamba a mchezo pomwe mwana wachichepere anagwiritsidwa ntchito polankhula zinthu zosayenera. Wapampando wa bungweli mdziko muno mayi Lucy Vokhiwa ndiwo alankhula izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi pambuyo polandira yankho la kalata yawo lomwe lagwirizana kwatunthu ndi zomwe amayiwa analemba mchikalatachi. Mayi Vokhiwa ati amayiwa anakhuzidwa kwambiri powona zomwe mwanayu yemwe amagwiritsa  ntchito dzina la aunt Nellie ndipo amakhala mu mzinda wa Lilongwe amalankhula zinthu zosagwirizana ndi msinkhu wake. Pamenepa iwo ati akuyembekezera kuti anthu omwe akhala akujambula zoterezi asatira zomwe bungwe la Censorshipli lapereka mu chikalata chake choyankha bungwe la amayiwa ndi cholinga choti ana azigwiritsidwa ntchito pofalitsa mmauthenga oyenera mzomwenso mzosaphwanya ufulu wawo komanso kusokoneza kakulidwe kawo. “Ife ngati gulu la amayi ndife othokoza kuti titawalembera anzathuwa kuti achitepo kanthu mwamsanga atifotokozera kuti ojambula zoterezi alankhula nawo ndipo amvetsetsa, Kachiwiri atisimikizira kuti alankhulanso kwa a Malawi onse pankhaniyi ndipo tikukhulupilira kuti zoterezi sizizachitikanso.” anatero Vokhiwa. Mayi Vokhiwa atinso ngakhale mwanayu woonetsa kuti ali ndi luso lapadera mkofunikabe kuti ojambulawa ndi ena onse amuthandize pomupatsa maphunziro oyenera kuti azathe kugwiritsa ntchito lusoli kutsogoloko. Mmau ake mayi Anganille Nthakomwa omwe mkulu woyang’anira ngati maluso osiyanasiyana ali ndi mauthenga oyenera la Censorship board wati akugwirizana kwatunthu ndi zomwe bungwe la amayiwa linadandaula kudzera mu kalata yake. Iwo ati atawonera kanemayo anawonadi kuti mwana wa chichepere wagwiritsidwa ntchito pa nkhani zokhuza akuluakulu zomwe anati sizoyenera. “Titalandira dandauloli, tinakhala pansi ndikumvera zonse ndipo tapezadi kuti mwana akulankhula zomwe siza sinkhu wake ndiye tinafufuza ndikupeza omwe akhala akujambula zoterezi ndipo avomeradi kuti amalakwitsa choncho tagwirizana kuti azifunsa kaye ofesi yathu ngati ajambula zinthu ngati mkoyenera kuti aziwulutsidwa,” anatero  Nthakomwa. Iwo apitilizanso kupempha anthu osiyanasiyana mdziko muno omwe ali ndi luso lopanga mafilimu kuti azipita ku bungweli ndikukafunsa upangiri ndi cholinga choti awaunikire kuti ma filimu otere azifikira magulu ati ndi ati. “Ife khomo lathu ndi lotsegula nthawi zonse choncho mkofunika opanga ma filimu azibweretsa Ku ma ofesi athu kuti tithe kuwunikira ndi kuwagawa mafilimuwa kuti oyenera kuwaonera ndi anthu a gulu liti kamba koti pali ena okhudza ana osachepera zaka 12 kaya 16 angakhalenso ena osayenera kuonera ana, zonsezi tizawathandizira ndife,” anateronso Nthakomwa. Iwo agwirizana ndi mayi Vokhiwa pa ganizo logwiritsa ntchito mwanayu pa zinthu moyenera makamaka pa mauthenga okhawo omwe angathandizire polimbikitsa ana okha okha mu zosowa zawo za tsiku ndi tsiku.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhristu Akuyenera Kufalitsa Ndi Kuwonetserana Chifundo Cha Mulungu
news: Nyumba ya malamulo yavomereza ndondomeko zatsopano zomwe nyumbayi ikhale ikutsatira pa nthawi ya zokambirana ngati njira imodzi yothandiza kupewa kufala kwa kachirombo ka corona. Kudzera m’kuponya voti lolemba pakuyamba pa mkumano wawo, aphunguwa agwirizana zopeleka mpata kwa aphungu ochepa okha kuti azikhala m’nyumbayi pomwe ena azitsatira zokambiranazi kudzera pa makina a intaneti. Mtsogoleri wa zokambirana m’nyumbayi a Richard Chimwendo-Banda ati aphunguwa ayilandira ndondomekoyi ndipo kuti aphungu omwe samakhala m’nyumbayi pa nthawi ya zokambiranayi aziwuzidwa zoyenera kuchita ngati pali kufunika koponya voti pa nkhani zina. “Chachikulu kwambiri ndi chakuti aphunguwa tiziwasinthasintha, ngati amene alowa lero mwina mawa salowa, komanso tsiku lomwelo malinga ndi zokambirana za m’nyumbayi ena azilowa m’mawa ena masana koma onse azitenga nawo ndithu mbali pa zokambiranazi,” anatero a Chimwendo-Banda. Iwo ayamikiranso momwe zokambiranazi zayambira lolemba ponena kuti zomwe zachitika kuti aphungu ambiri atenga nawo gawo poponya voti yokhudza kusintha kwa ndondomekozi n Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika koti akhritsu azifalitsa komanso kuwonetsa chifundo cha Mulungu. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilei ya Vatican, pokondwerera kuti papita zaka 90 chichitikireni zomwe adaona ndi kumva Maria Faustina Kowalska Woyera, Papa Francisco walembera kalata Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la Poland. M’kalatayi iye watsindika za kufunika koti akhristu azifalitsa ndi kuonetsana chifundo cha Mulungu. Papa wati ndi wokondwa kuti tsopano dziko lonse la pansi likudziwa za chifundo cha Mulungu kudzera mu zimene sisitereyu adamva ndi kuwona. Iye wati naye Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera yemwe amakonda kumutchula kuti “Mpositoli wa Chifundo” adafunitsitsa kuti dziko lonse la pansi lidziwe za chifundo cha Mulungu. Pa 22 February m’chaka cha 1931 Ambuye Yesu anaonekera koyamba kwa sisitere wina wotchedwa Maria Faustina Kowalska yemwe pano ndi Woyera. Pa nthawi yomwe anaonekeredwayi, Ambuye Yesu anauza sisitereyu kuti ajambule chithunzi cha zomwe anali kuona ndi mau oti, “Ambuye Yesu ndikhulupirira inu” kapena kuti “Jesus, I trust in you” m’chingerezi. Ambuye Yesu anapitiliza kuuza sisitereyu kuti chithunzi chimenecho chikuyenera kulemekezedwa pa dziko lonse. Pokondwerera kuti papita zaka 90 chichitikireni zomwe adaona ndi kumva Maria Faustina Kowalska Woyera, Papa Francisco walembera kalata Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la Poland. Mkalata’yi iye watsindika za kufunika koti akhristu azifalitsa ndi kuonetsana chifundo cha Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati ndi wokondwa kuti tsopano dziko lonse la pansi Yesu likudziwa za chifundo cha Mulungu kudzera mu zimene sisitere’yu adamva ndi kuona. Iye wati naye Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera yemwe amakonda kumutchula kuti “Mpositoli wa Chifundo” adafunitsitsa kuti dziko lonse la pansi lidziwe za chifundo cha Mulungu. Faustina adabadwa m’chaka cha 1905 ku Poland ndipo anamwalira m’chaka cha 1938. Iye adali kukhala ndi asisitere a chipani cha Amayi Maria a Chifundo (Sisters of Our Lady of Mercy). Faustina adali kusinkhasinkha za chifundo cha Mulungu chotumphuka kudzera mwa Ambuye Yesu. Mapemphero osiyana-siyana a Chifundo cha Mulungu komanso la Mulungu la Chifundo cha Mulungu (Divine Mercy Sunday) ndi zipatso za moyo wa Faustina Woyera yemwe anali Virgo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Unduna Wa Zaumoyo Wati Ndi Okonzeka Kulandira Katemela Wa COVID-19
news: Pomwe boma lili pa kalikiliki okonzekera kuyamba kupereka katemera wa Covid-19 yemwe afike m’dziko muno kumapeto amwezi uno wa Febrauary, unduna wa zaumoyo wati sudakhale chete pokonzekera ntchitoyi pomwe ukuwonetsetsa kuti zonse zili m’chimake kuti katemerayu adzafikire malo abwino. Nduna ya zaumoyo mayi Khumbize Kandodo-Chiponda ati pakali pano akuyesetsa kukonza malo oti adzasungiremo katemerayu monga ma fridge m’zipatala komanso kuwonetsetsa kuti ayika ndondomeko zabwino zoti katemerayu akafike mosavuta kwa anthu onse omwe ayambilire kulandira katemerayu. Iwo amalankhula izi lolemba ku Lilongwe pomwe komiti ya mtsogoleri wa dziko lino yowona za matenda a Covid-19 imalankhulapo pa momwe ntchito yolimbana ndi matendawa ikuyendera. Malinga ndi ndunayi, mwazina undunawu ukukonza malo omwe akhala asakugwira ntchito m’zipatala zosiyanasiyana kuti athandizire kusunga katemelayu kuti asaonongeke. Ndunayi yatinso akhala akukonza magetsi oyendera mphamvu ya dzuwa omwe adaonongeka m’zipatala zazing’onozing’ono kuti athandizire popeleka mphamvu ku ma fridge omwe azithandizira kusunga katemelayu. Apa ndunayi yati akhazikitsa malo okwana 861 komwe anthu azikalandilirako katemelayu zomwe ati zithandizanso kwakukulu anthu omwe ndi achikulire komanso omwe akudwala matenda ena kuphatikizapo a ulumali kuti  asamayende mitunda itali-itali kukafika kolandira katemelayu. “M’maboma mwathu monse 28 malo osungiramo katemela ameneyu alimo ndithu komanso kuno ku Lilongwe ku Chisu tawonjezeranso zipinda zina za ma lita oposa 20, 000 zoti tithe kusungamo katemela ameneyu ndipo tikuyembekeza kulandira katemela oposa mabotolo 8 miliyoni omwe ndi mabotolo ambiri ofunika chisamaliro posunga.” Anatero a Chiponda Polankhulanso mmodzi mwa ogwira ntchito ku bungwe la Medical Council of Malawi a Richard Ndovi  ati bungweli lakhala likulandira madandaulo kuti anthu ena akumazembetsa matupi achibale omwe amwalira kupita nawo ku zipatala zomwe si za boma ndi zolinga zosiyasiyana zomwe ati zikutsutsana ndi ndondomeko zothandiza kupewa kufala kwa kachiromboka. Iwo atsindika kuti mchitidwewu ukuyenera kutha ponena kuti ndondomekozi ndizothandiza poteteza anthu. Dziko lino likuyembekezeka kupeleka katemela wa Astrazeneca kwa anthu mdziko muno kuyambira ku mayambiliro a mwezi wa March.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Aphungu Avomereza Ndondomeko Zatsopano Zoyendetsera Zokambirana M’nyumba ya Malamulo
news: Nyumba ya malamulo yavomereza ndondomeko zatsopano zomwe nyumbayi ikhale ikutsatira pa nthawi ya zokambirana ngati njira imodzi yothandiza kupewa kufala kwa kachirombo ka corona. Kudzera m’kuponya voti lolemba pakuyamba pa mkumano wawo, aphunguwa agwirizana zopeleka mpata kwa aphungu ochepa okha kuti azikhala m’nyumbayi pomwe ena azitsatira zokambiranazi kudzera pa makina a intaneti. Mtsogoleri wa zokambirana m’nyumbayi a Richard Chimwendo-Banda ati aphunguwa ayilandira ndondomekoyi ndipo kuti aphungu omwe samakhala m’nyumbayi pa nthawi ya zokambiranayi aziwuzidwa zoyenera kuchita ngati pali kufunika koponya voti pa nkhani zina. “Chachikulu kwambiri ndi chakuti aphunguwa tiziwasinthasintha, ngati amene alowa lero mwina mawa salowa, komanso tsiku lomwelo malinga ndi zokambirana za m’nyumbayi ena azilowa m’mawa ena masana koma onse azitenga nawo ndithu mbali pa zokambiranazi,” anatero a Chimwendo-Banda. Iwo ayamikiranso momwe zokambiranazi zayambira lolemba ponena kuti zomwe zachitika kuti aphungu ambiri atenga nawo gawo poponya voti yokhudza kusintha kwa ndondomekozi ndizinthu zomwe zinafunika kuti zichitike kuti zikomere aliyense. Uwu ndi mkumano wachiwiri wa aphungu mu msonkhano wa namba 49 wa nyumba ya malamulo ya dziko lino. Aphunguwa akhala akukumana mpaka lachisanu pa 26 March chaka chino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Aphunzitsi M’sukulu Za Boma Apitilira Kunyanyala Ntchito
news: Bungwe loyang’anira aphunzitsi la Teachers Union of Malawi (TUM) lamenyetsa nkhwangwa pa mwala kuti aphunzitsi sayamba kugwira ntchito pokhapokha boma liyankhe kaye nkhawa zawo pa ndalama za ukadziwotche ku mliri wa COVID-19. Bungweli linakumana ndi akuluakulu a ku unduna wa za maphunziro lolemba mu mzinda wa Lilongwe komwe anakambirana koma alephera kumvana chimodzi pa nkhani yokhudza ndalama za ukadziwotche zomwe aphunzitsiwa akufuna. Unduna wa zamaphunzirowu akuti wakwanitsa kuyankhapo mfundo ziwiri zokha mwa mfundo zitatu zomwe bungwe la TUM linapeleka kuti undunawu uwunikire. Mfundozi ndi zofuna kuti boma lilembeletu ntchito aphunzitsi a IPTE 13 komanso IPTE 14 omwe lawalemba pano mwaganyu chabe kwa miyezi isanu, kuwapatsa aphunzitsiwa zipangizo zodzitetezera ku kachirombo ka corona, komanso kuwapatsa ndalama za ukadziwotche. Undunawu watsimikizila bungwe la aphunzitsili kuti uyesetsa kuchitapo kanthu powapatsa aphunzitsiwa zipangizo zodzitetezelazi komanso kulembelatu ntchito aphunzitsi omwe alembedwa mwaganyuwa. Mlembi wamkulu mu unduna wa zamphunziro a Kiswell Dakamau anati nkhani yokhudza ndalama za ukadziwotcheyi ikuyenera kuyankhapo ndi komiti ya mtsogoleri wa dziko lino yoona za matenda a Covid-19 osati undunawu. “Chokondweletsa ndi chakuti ndalankhula ndi wapampando wa komiti imeneyi ya Covid-19 Dr Nkhoma ndipo nkhaniyi ayivomeleza kuti ipite ku komiti yawo akayiwunike kuti tingapite bwanji chitsogolo”. Anatero Dakamau. Bungwe la TUM lamenyetsa nkhwangwa pamwala ponena kuti ngakhale kuti undunawu wawayankhapo zina mwa zmfundozo komabe iwo sayamba kugwira ntchito pokhapokha dandaulo lokhudza ndalama za ukadziwotcheli litayankhidwa. A Malimba anati, “Tilimbikitse aphunzitsi kuti kufikira pomwe boma litiyankhe za ndalama ya ukadziotche aphunzitsi apitilire kukhala kunyumba chifukwa sitikufuna kutti akakumane ndi ophunzira komanso aphunzitsi anzawo koma tidzapange izi tikudziwa kuti ndalama za ukadziotche tapatsidwa kuti tizigwilitsa ntchito”. Boma latsekulanso sukulu zonse lolemba zitakhala zotsekedwa kwa sabata zisanu kamba ka kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu opezeka ndi kachirombo ka corona virus. Aphunzitsiwa akhala akupempha boma kuti liwaganizire powapatsa ndalama za ukadziwotche kamba koti nawonso akhala pachiopsezo chotenga kachirombo ka corona pomwe akhale akugwira ntchito yawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Chikhulupiriro Chozama Chingathe Kugonjetsa Satana
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse papa Francisco wati chikhulupiriro chozama komanso mapemphero zingathandize akhritsu kugonjetsa satana. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, Papa amayankhula izi kwa anthu la Mulungu pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati motsogozedwa ndi mzimu wa Mulungu, ndi zotheka kugonjetsa satana monga adachitira Ambuye Yesu m’chipululu muja. Papa wati moyo wa chikhristu ndi moyo omwe ulira nkhondo yolimbana ndi kugonjetsa satana tsiku ndi tsiku ndipo wati ngakhale kuti nkhondoyi ndi yovuta koma ndi chithandizo cha Mulungu ndi yotheka. Iye watinso satana sakuyenera kupeza gawo lililonse m’moyo wa mkhristu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Abambo Atatu Alamulidwa Kupereka 200 sauzande Kaamba Kozembetsa Feteleza
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la   Chikwawa lalamula abambo ena atatu kupereka chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 200 sauzande kwacha aliyense kupanda kutero akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga chaka chimodzi kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu ozembetsa zipangizo zaulimi zotsika mtengo. Bwaloli linamva kuchokera kwa oyimira boma pa milandu Helix Kamkweche kuti abambowa a Luke Mjawa a zaka 39, a Kawaza Joe Dola a zaka 41 komanso a Patrick White a zaka 40 anapalamula mlanduwu pa 2 December chaka chatha pomwe anapezeka ndi matumba afeteleza okwana 913 omwe amachoka nawo m’boma la Chikwawa kupita mu mzinda wa Blantyre ndipo anagwidwa pa malo ochitira chipikisheni cha apolisi pa Kamuzu bridge m’bomalo. Inspector Kamkweche anauzanso bwaloli kuti abambowa amachotsa fetereza ochuluka ku malo komwe kulibe fakitale yopanga fetereza, ndipo anati m’chitidwewu unabwezera m’mbuyo ndondomeko ya boma ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo ndipo anapempha bwaloli kuti likapereke feterezayo ku unduna wa zamalimidwe popeza mwini feterezayo sadapezeke. Abambowa anaukana mlanduwu zomwe zinachititsa kuti bwalo libweretse mboni zinayi ndipo abambowa anapezeka olakwa pa mlanduwu. Popereka chigamulo chake First Grade Magistrate Gladstone Chilundu anati wapereka chilango choterechi kuti ena ofuna kupalamula mlandu ngati omwewu atengerepo phunziro. Luke Majawa amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mtinkhe mfumu yaikulu Nazombe m’boma la Phalombe, Kawaza Joe Dola amachokera m’mudzi mwa Chisangwi mfumu yaikulu Ndamera ndipo Patrick White amachokera m’mudzi mwa Thole mfumu yaikulu Malemia m’boma la Nsanje.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MPCC idandaula Ndi Kukula Kwa M’chitidwe Ozembetsa Makala
news: Gulu lolimbikitsa kusamala za chilengedwe la kunyumba ya malamulo lotchedwa Malawi Parliamentary Conservation Caucus(MPCC) lachenjeza kuti dziko lino litha kukhala m’mavuto a akulu a kusintha kwa nyengo ngati anthu apitilire kudula mitengo Kamba kootcha makala. Wapampando wa gululi a Welani Chilenga ndiwo anena izi pomwe amalankhulapo pa zakuvumbuluka kwa mchitidwe wa zakatangale omwe ati ukukolezera kupezeka kwa makala m’dziko muno. Pa 2 February chaka chino nyuzi pepala ya ya Nation inavumbulutsa nkhani yokhudza zaziphuphu zomwe ati zimachitika pofuna kuzembetsa makala kuchokera ku zalewa kupita mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Nkhaniyi inabweletsa poyera kukhudzidwa kwa anthu omwe amakhala m’malo ochitira chipikisheni  monga apolisi, a nthambi ya za nkhalango, komanso otolera misonkho a MRA. Malinga ndi a Chilenga, adindo akuyenera kuchitapo kanthu msanga maka poonetsetsa kuti zakatangale monga izi komanso zonse zomwe zikuthandizira kuwononga chilengedwe zithe kaamba koti ndi dziko lonse lomwe lingadzavutike ngati nkhalango zomwe akuotchamo makalazi zitatha. “Anthu amenewawa mukati muonetsetse ndi anthu ogwira ntchito m’boma momwe muli malamulo nde zikatsimikizika kuti anachitadi za katangale, ntchito zawo zithe komanso akalandire chilango choyenera ku ndende,”anatero Chilenga. Polankhulapo, mkulu wa nthambi ya zankhalango mu unduna wa zachilengedwe Dr Clement Chilima ati vuto lozembetsa makala ndilalikulu kwambiri ndipo ati kutuluka kwa nkhani zakatangalezi kuwathandiza kupeza poyambira kuti zinthu zisinthe. Iwo ati akhala akudabwa momwe makala akhala akulowera m’mzinda ya dziko lino ngakhale kuli malo ochitira chipikisheni zomwe ati zikupelekadi nkhawa kuti zachinyengo zimachitika. “Makala ena akumachoka mdziko la Mozambique koma tili ndi malo ochitira chipikisheni chonsecho malamulo salola makala kapena zina zilizonse za chilengedwe kulowa m’dziko opanda kulipira zomwe zikusonyeza kuti pali mavuto ndithu a zachinyengo,”anatero Dr Chilima. Pakadali pano nthambi ya za nkhalangoyi yati yauza bungwe lolimbana ndi katangale m’dziko muno la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) kuti lifufuze za nkhani yokhudza kuzembetsedwa kwa makalayi mpaka olakwa alandire chilango.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Aphungu ayamba mkumano ku nyumba yamalamulo Lolemba likudzali
news: Nyumba ya malamulo yalengeza kuti mkumano wa aphungu anyumbayi owunika theka la chaka cha ndondomeko ya za chuma uchitika kuyambira lolemba likudzali pa 22 February mpaka la chisanu pa 26 March chaka chino. Mkumanowu womwe umayenera kuyamba pa 8 February unaimitsidwa kamba kakukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu opezeka ndi kachirombo ka corona munthawiyi. nyumbayi inaimitsa mkumanowu ndicholinga chofuna kumbirana pa m’momwe angachitire pofuna kukhazikitsa ndondomeko zabwino zopewera mliriwu pakati pa magulu onse okhudzidwa ndi zochitika za kunyumbayi. Malinga ndi  kalata yomwe wasayina Sipikala wa nyumbayi Mayi Catherine Gotani-Hara, aphunguwa ayamba zokambiranazi zomwe zizichitika m’magawo awiri pomwe aphungu ena aziyenera kufika kunyumbayi ndipo ena azitsatira zokambiranazi kudzera pa makina a intaneti. “Aphunguwa adzakhala akusinthana mabweledwe akunyumbayi ndipo onse akuyenera kukhala ali mu m’zinda wa Lilongwe pa nthawi yonse ya zokambiranazi,”yatero kalatayi. Iwo ati kupatula kuunika ndondomeko ya zachumayi, aphunguwa adzakhala akukambirananso ma bilu ndikuwunika ma lipoti ochokera ku ma komiti anyumbayi. Pomaliza, Mayi Hara atsimikizira anthu kuti ofesi yawo ipitiliza kugwira ntchito zonse molingana ndi malamulo ngakhale pali mliri wa Covid-19 pofuna kuonetsetsa kuti ufulu wa demokalase ukuyendatsedwa bwino m’dziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa wavomereza dongosolo la za chuma la chaka chino
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse papa Francisco wavomereza dongosolo la za chuma lomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika ligwiritse ntchito chaka chino. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio lachinayi pa 18 February 2021 Papa wavomereza dongosolo la za chuma lomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika ligwiritse ntchito chaka chino. Malinga ndi dongosololi ndalama pafupifupi 292 billion kwacha ndi zomwe zigwire ntchito chaka chino. Ofesi yofalitsa ma uthenga ku Vatican, Holy See Press Office, yati monga maiko ena onse, mliri wa coronavirus wakhudza ntchito za chuma ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolikali. Komabe mavuto odza kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus pa nkhani ya chuma ali choncho, Papa wakhala akunenera kuti sakufuna kuti ngakhale munthu m’modzi yemwe achotsedwe ntchito kaamba ka mavuto’wa. Pa chifukwa ichi dongosolo la za chumali laika patsogolo antchito pafupifupi 4000 omwe amagwira ntchito zosiyana-siyana za likulu la mpingo wa katolikali komanso dongosololi laika patsogolo ntchito zosiyana-siyana za a Papa. Dongosolo la za chumali limakonzedwa ndi Secretariat for the Economy ndipo limaunikidwa ndi Council for the Economy lisanavomerezedwe ndi a Papa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Francisco Wati Mulungu Amasunga Malonjezo Ake
news: Polankhula mu uthenga wake wa pa kanema womwe watumizira nthumwi za ku msonkhano wokambirana za kufunika kosunga malonjezo womwe ukuchitika kudzera pa makina a intaneti ndipo wakonzedwa ndi Arki-dayosizi  ya Los Angeles m’dziko la America, Papa Francisco wati Mulungu amasunga malonjezo ake kwa anthu ake. Iye wati angakhale kuti dziko la pansi likudutsa mu nthawi yovuta kwambiri kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus, anthu akuyenera kukumbukira kuti Mulungu ndi wokhulupirika ndipo nthawi zonse amasunga malonjezo omwe amachita ndi anthu ake. Papa Francisco wati anthu akuyenera kuyang’ana kutsogolo ndi chiyembekezo kuti zinthu zomwe zasokonekera zibwereranso m’chimake posachedwa. Iye wati mu nthawi yovuta ngati imeneyi ndikofunika kuti anthu azimverana chifundo ndi kuthandizana. Msonkhanowu wodziwika mchingerezi kuti “Proclaim the Promise Congress” womwe unayamba pa 18 February ndipo ufika kumapeto pa 21 February ukufuna kulimbikitsa anthu kuti moyo wathu umalimbikitsidwa pozindikira kuti Mulungu amasunga malonjezo ake kwa anthu ake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: WHO Yati A Malawi  Asaope Katemela Wa Covid-19
news: Bungwe lowona za umoyo padziko lonse la World Health Organisation (WHO) latsimikizira anthu m’dziko muno kuti katemela wa Covid-19 yemwe dziko lino likufuna lipeleke kwa nzika zake ndi ovomerezeka ndi bungweli. Nthumwi ya bungweli kuno ku Malawi Dr Rose Nonhlanhla Dlamini ndiwo anena izi lachinayi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe komiti  yowona za mliri wa Covid-19 inachititsa mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Malinga ndi Dr Dlamini bungweli linakhala pansi ndi akatswiri a za sayansi osiyanasiyana kuunika katemela yemwe abwere m’dziko munoyu ndipo anapeza kuti alibe chiospezo chilichonse ma umoyo wa munthu. “Ngakhale katemelayu adzapelekedwe pali kufunikabe kopitilira kutsatira ndondomeko zonse zopewera corona virus kaamba koti katemelayu ndi ongothandiza kuchepetsa mphamvu ya kachiromboka,” atero Dr Dlamini. pazakuimitsa kupeleka katemelayu m’dziko la South Africa, Dr Dlamini anati dzikolo linachita kafukufuku wakatemelayu pa anthu ochepa okha omwenso sanali pachiopsezo kweni kweni zomwe zinachititsa kuti katemelayu awoneke ngati osakhala bwino koma ati atha kugwira bwino ntchito makamaka mwa anthu omwe akudwala. Katemela wa Astrazeneca akuyembekezeka kufika m’dziko muno kumapeto amwezi uno. Pakadali pano chiwerengero cha anthu omwe apezeka ndi corona virus m’maola 24 apitawo chinali pa 203 mwa anthu 1361 omwe anayezedwa ndipo anthu 337 ndiwomwe achira munthawiyi. Malinga ndi mlembi wamkulu mu unduna wa za umoyo  Dr Charles Mwansambo kutsika kwa chiwerengo cha anthu opezeka ndi corona virus chisaapangitse anthu kutayilira kutsatira ndondomeko zonse zopewera kufala kwa mliriwu. “Tikati tiwone manambala amenewa zikuonetsa kuti zinthu zikusintha ndithu manambala akutsika koma monga a Malawi tisafookele tichite zonse zothekera kuti tithane ndi nthenda imeneyi,  zotchinga kukamwa ndi mphuno  tizivala ndithu popita kugulu, m’manja tizisamba pafupi-pafupi ndinso tizitalikirana ndi mtunda oposa mita imodzi ,” anatero Dr Mwansambo. Katemela wa Covid-19 yu adzapelekedwa m’maulendo awiri osiyana kwa munthu aliyense.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsindika Za Kufunika Kwa Ubale Wabwino Pakati Pa Mipingo Ya Chikhristu
news: Pomwe bungwe la ma episkopi a Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la Brazil (National Conference of Bishops of Brazil) ndi bungwe la mipingo ya chikhristu m’dzikolo (National Council of Christian Churches) ayamba msonkhano wao, Papa Francisco wauza nthumwi ku msonkhanowo za kufunika kwa mgwirizano pakati pa mipingo ya chikhristu pofuna kulimbana ndi mliri wa coronavirus. Iye wati ndi kofunika kuti mipingo izilimbikitsa umodzi ndi kukambirana pofuna kuthetsa mavuto osiyana-siyana omwe angakhalepo pakati pa anthu. Papa Francisco wati mliri wa coronavirus ndi vuto la likulu lomwe likusowa kuti mipingo ibwere pamodzi ndi kugwirana manja. Iye walimbikitsa za kufunika koti anthu azisamalira miyoyo yao komanso miyoyo ya anthu ena makamaka nthawi ino ya mliri wa coronavirus monga momwe Ambuye Yesu anaphunzitsira kudzera mu fanizo la la msamariya wa chifundo. Papa Francisco wakhala akulankhula za kufunika kwa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu. Kudzera m’kalata yake ya posachedwapa yotchedwa Fratelli tutti iye adatsindika za kufunika kwa ubale wabwino womwe ukuyenera kukhalapo pakati pa anthu. Chaka chilichonse bungwe la ma episkopi a Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la Brazil limakhala ndi msonkhano kumayambiriro kwa nyengo ya Lenti wolimbikitsa umodzi pakati pa a Katolika m’dzikolo ndipo zaka zisanu zili zonse Mpingo wa Katolika umachita msonkhano ndi mipingo ina ya chikhristu m’dzikolo ndi cholinga chofuna kulimbikitsa umodzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la FOSEMA Lathandiza Chipatala cha Boma cha Mangochi ndi Katundu Othandiza Polimbana ndi Covid-19
news: Katundu yemwe waperekedwa pa chipatala cha Mangochi Bungwe la Forum for Social Economic Development of Mangochi (FOSEMA) lati lipitiliza kuthandiza boma la Mangochi pazitukuko zosiyana-siyana. Wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa bungweli m’busa Mc Donald Sembereka ndiomwe anena izi pa mwambo opereka katundu osiyana-siyana othandizira kulimbana ndi mliri wa Covid-19 pa chipatala cha boma cha Mangochi. A Sembereka apempha anthu omwe apindule ndi katunduyi kuti amusamale komanso kumugwiritsa ntchito moyenera. “Tinakhala pansi kusonkha kuti tithandize zaumoyo maka pogula zida zothandiza pachipatalachi, ndipo zina mwaizo ndi monga ma gown, zotchinga kukamwa ndi mphuno, Nebulisers, choyezera nthupi mukatentha ndi zina zambiri zomwe ndizandalama zokwanira 3.2million kwacha,” anatero a Sembereka. Iwo ati apitiriza kugwira ntchito ndi a chipatalawa kufikira mliriwu utafika kumapeto. Poyankhulapo atalandira katunduyi mkulu owona zaumoyo m’boma la Mangochi Dr. Henry Chibowa anati katundu yemwe waperekedwayu ndi ofunika ndipo agwira ntchito yaikulu yothandiza kulimbana ndi nthendayi. “Ndife othokoza kwambiri ndi thandizo lomwe talandira ku FOSEMA ndipo katunduyi athandizira pothandizira anzathu omwe akudwala nthenda ya Covid-19 kuno ku Mangochi,” anatero Dr. Chibowa. Mwazina iwo apempha mabungwe ena akufuna kwabwino kuti atengeponso gawo pothandiza chipatalachi ndi katundu osiyana siyana yemwe angakwanitse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Komiti Yowona za Mliri wa Covid-19 mu Mpingo wa Katolika Yathandiza Chipatala cha Nguludi
news: Wina mwakatundu yemwe waperekedwa Komiti yolimbana ndi matenda a Covid-19 ya mpingo wa katolika mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yepereka katundu othandiza kulimbana ndi nthenda ya Covid-19 ku chipatala cha Nguludi m’boma la Chiladzuru mu arkidayosiziyi. Polankhula atapereka thandizoli, Vicar General wa arkidayosiziyi mosinyo Boniface Tamani ati ali ndi chikhulupiliro kuti katunduyi agwira ntchito yoyenera pothandiza kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akumwalira ndi nthendayi. “Ife ndi okodwa kwambiri chifukwa cha thandizo limeneli mukuziwa inu tataya anthu ochuluka ena ndi kukhalaso ansembe, asisiteri ngakhaleso akuluakulu a boma choncho kupezeka kwa thandizo limeneli ndili ndi chikhulupiliro kuti chiwelengero cha anthu omwalira ndi nthendayi kaamba ka kuchepa kwa zipangizo zogwiritsira ntchito kuchepa,” anatero bambo Tamani. Iwo anathokoza ansembe a chipani cha Mortfort Fathers kuchokera mdziko la Holland komanso Friends of Chilomo chifukwa cha thandizo lomwe anawapatsa atapempha kudzera mwa arkiepiskopi wa arki-dayosiziyi ambuye Thomas Luke Msusa. Poyankhulapo pa mwambowu, mkulu woyang’anira chipatala cha Nguludi a Fabiano Makolija na katunduyi wafika mu nthawi yake pamene zipangizo zogwiritsira ntchito zimapelewera, choncho katunduyi agwira ntchito yopambana. “Timapezeka kuti tili ndi odwala ambiri koma zipangizo zogwiritsira ntchito ndi zochepa zimenenso zimasokoneza kagwiridwe kathu ka ntchito chifukwa timalephera kuthandiza anthu onsewa mu nthawi yake koma tsopano kubwera kwa thandizo limeneli kuthandiza kuti kagwiridwe kathu ka nchito kakhale kosinthika,” anatero a Makolija. Wina wakatundu yemwe waperekedwayu ndi Oxygen Flow Meters, Nebulizers, ICU bed, oxygen Concetrators, Oxygen cylinders with gas kungotchulapo zochepa chabe ndipo ndiwa ndalama zokwana 36 million kwacha. Wina mwa katunduyi athandiziranso mzipatala za St Montfort m’boma la Chikwawa komanso chipatala cha Holy Trinity chomwe chili m’boma la Phalombe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wina Wagwidwa Akuba Njinga pa Tchalitchi M’boma la Ntcheu
news: Bambo wina m’boma la Ntcheu wagwidwa akuba njinga ya moto pa tchalitchi cha Ntcheu mu dayosizi ya Dedza. Malinga ndi wapampando watchalitchichi a Laiton Lorent Thumba, izi zachitika lachitatu pa 17 February 2021 kumadzulo pomwe akhristuwa amapemphera pa mwambo wa nsembe ya misa ya Phulusa. A Thumba ati amayi omwe anali panja pa tchalitchichi ndi omwe anawona bamboyu akukoka njingayi ndipo apa iwo anakafotokozera ena mwa abambo omwe anali mkati mwa tchalitchichi ndipo posakhalitsa abambowa anatsatira mkuluyu ndi kumugwira. Atamufunsa za komwe amapita nayo njingayo iye anati amapita nayo kwa mwini wake ndipo atapanikizidwa ndi mafunso ndi pomwe anawulula kuti amafuna kuba ndipo apa anamutengera ku polisi. Padakali pano ofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo sanayankhulepo kanthu pa za nkhaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ISAMA Yayamikira Boma Potsekulanso Sukulu
news: Boma lalengeza kuti sukulu zonse zitsekulidwenso lolemba likudzali pa 22 February zitakhala zotseka kwa sabata zisanu. Nduna ya za umoyo Mayi Khumbize Kandodo Chiponda ndi omwe alengeza izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani wa komiti yowona za matenda a Covid-19 omwe unachitika lachitatu madzulo mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Malinga ndi mayi Chiponda omwenso ndi wapampando wa komitiyi, ganizoli ladza kutsatira kutsika kwa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe apezeka ndi kachirombo ka corona masiku apitawa komanso kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akuchira ku matenda a Covid-19 poyerekeza ndi nthawi yomwe boma lidalengeza koyamba za kutsekedwa kwa sukuluzi chaka chino. Pa 17 January chaka chino, mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera adalengeza kuti sukulu zitsekedwe kwa sabata zitatu kamba ka kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu opezeka ndi corona virus. Pomwe nthawiyi imayandikira kutha, boma lidalengezanso kuti sukuluzi zikhalebe zotseka kwa sabata zina ziwiri kaamba koti chiwopsezo chakufala kwa kachirombo ka corona chidali chokwerabe kufikira pano pomwe boma lalengeza zakutsekulidwaku. “Nditengelepo mwai kupempha makolo kuti tiyeni titenge udindo waukulu owayezetsa ana athu kuti mudziwe ngati ali ndi corona virus kapena ayi ngati sukulu zawo zitafunsa kuti mutero ndipo kwa omwe angapezeke ndi corona virus asadandaule popeza  akakhala bwino akakhalanso limodzi ndi anzake.” Polankhulanso nduna ya za maphunziro mayi Agness Nyalonje ati undunawu wawo waika ndondomeko zomwe zithandizire kuti zinthu msukuluzi zikhale bwino. Mwazina, iwo ati undunawu umanga zipinda zophunziliramo zoonjezera msukulu za ku madela a kumidzi komanso kuika ma tent okwana 266 msukulu zomwe zili m’matawuni. Ndunayi yatinso unduna wawo wapatsidwa ndalama zokwana 5-billion-kwacha zomwe zithandizire pogula zipangizo monga zosambira mmanja ndi zina zomwe zigawidwe msukulu zonse. Mayi Nyalonje atinso undunawu ukumba mijigo yokwana 640 msukulu momwe muli vuto la madzi pofuna kulimbikitsa ukhondo ndipo ati aphunzitsi apadera oposa 2000 alembedwa kale ntchito pofuna kuthandizira kupewa kuthithikana m’makalasi. Posachedwapa, eni sukulu zomwe sizaboma adalankhulapo kupempha boma kuti liwalole kuti atsekulu sukulu zawo ponena kuti adzayesetsa kutsatira ndondomeko zonse zopewera kufala kwa corona virus. President wa bungwe la eni sukulu zomwe si za boma la Independent Schools Association of Malawi (ISAMA) Joseph Patel anati kutsekula sukuluzi kuthandiza kupulumutsanso miyoyo ya ana ambiri omwe angayambe moyo olowelera pomwe akungokhala m’makomo. Pakadali pano unduna wa za maphunziro wati posachedwa utulutsa kalendala ya momwe chaka cha maphunziro chikhalire kamba ka kutsekatsekaku.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Lenti Ndi Nyengo Yoti Akhristu Abwerere Kwa Mulungu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati lenti ndi nyengo yoti akhritsu abwerere kwa Mulungu. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, Papa wanena izi m’malaliko ake tsiku lachitatu pa misa ya Phulusa yomwe anatsogolera mtchalichi lalikulu la Saint Peter’s Basilica ku Vatican. Iye wati kupatula kuti akhristu akuyenera kukonza ubale wao ndi Mulungu pa nthawiyi, Papayu wati imeneyinso ndi nthawi yoti akhristu akonze ndi kudzamitsa ubale komanso chikondi ndi anthu anzao. “Iyi ndi nthawi younika njira yomwe tikufuna kutsata ndipo makamaka kupeza njira yotitengera kwa Mulungu yemwe ndi kasupe wa zabwino zonse,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati poyetsetsa kukhala pa ubale wabwino ndi Mulungu, akhristu amakumana ndi manyengero osiyana-siyana ofuna kubwereranso ku moyo wa kale koma iye  wati chofunika ndi  kuzama ndi kumalimbikitsidwa nthawi zonse ndi Mau a Mulungu opezeka mu baibulo. Papa Francisco watsimikizira akhristu kuti Mulungu ndi wa chikondi ndipo nthawi zonse ndi wokonzeka kulandira ana ake omwe atembenuka mtima. Lenti ndi ulendo wa masiku makumi anayi (40) kufanizira zaka 40 zomwe ana a Israeli adayenda m’chipululu muja pochoka mu ukapolo wa ku Egipito kupita ku Kenani dziko la malonjezano.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wina Amangidwa M’boma La Dowa Kamba Kogona Ndi Mwana Obereka Yekha
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa amanga bambo wina wa zaka 40 kaamba kogona ndi mwana obereka yekha. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub-Inspector Gladson M’bumpha, bamboyu Likison Chadza m’mawa wapa 14 february anapita kukamwa mowa ndipo anabwelera kunyumba nthawi ya 8 koloko madzulo ndipo atafika kunyumbako anawuza mkazi wake Maloto Shawa kuti afuna awatengere ana ake ku mudzi kwawo ku Dowa koma pa nthawiyo anali ataledzera. M’bumpha wati bamboyo anawatenga ana awiriwo mwamakani, kunamizira ngati akupita nawo kumudziko ndipo ali mu njira mwana m’modzi yemwe ndi wa m’muna anathawa ndi kubwerera kunyumba kwawo komwe anakafotokozera mayi ake zomwe bamboyo amachita. Pamenepa, mayiyo pamodzi ndi anthu ena anathamangira ku maloko komwe anapeza mwana wamkaziyo akulira ndipo atamufusa anayankha kuti bambo ake amugwililira. Malipoti aku chipatala anasonyezadi kuti mwanayo wagwililiridwa zomwe zinachititsa kuti apolisi amange mkuluyu ndipo akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu kuti akayankhe mlandu omwe wapalamulawo. Likisoni Chadza amachokera m’mudzi mwa Siliya mfumu yaikulu Chiwere m’boma la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Flames Ikuyenera Kupambana Masewero Onse-Mwase
news: Mphunzitsi wamkulu wa mpira wa miyendo wa timu ya Flames Meke Mwase wati ndi okondwa chifukwa ayambapo zokonzekera za masewero ozigulira malo mu mpikisano wa African Cup of Nations. Izi zikudza pomwe timuyi ikuyembekeza kutsiriza masewero ake ozigulira malo ndi timu ya South Sudan pa 24 March 2021 pa masewero omwe adzachitikire mdziko la South Sudan komanso timu ya Uganda yomwe azasewere nayo mdziko lino pa bwalo la zamasewero la Kamuzu mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Padakali pano Mwase wayitanitsa osewera 29 omwe ndi ochokera m’matimu osiyanasiyana omwe amasewera mu ligi yayikulu mdziko muno ya TNM kuphatikizaponso osewera asanu omwe ndi koyamba kuyitanidwa kuti akasewere mu timuyi ponena kuti timuyi ndi ya wina aliyense. “Padakali pano ndine okondwa kuti tikuyamba zokonzekera ndipo anyamata omwe ndawayitana ndili ndi chikhulupiliro kuti ayikapo mtima kuti tichite bwino pa masewero omwe tikukonzekera kukhala nawo komanso tayitana anyamata omwe ndi koyamba kuwayitana,” anatero Mwase. Flames ikuyenera kuchita bwino pa masewero ake onse awiri omwe atsala kuti asewere ndi cholinga choti ikhale ndi mwayi opitilira mu mpikisanowu. Padakali pano timuyi ili pa nambala yachitatu ndi ma point anayi pomwe pa nambala yoyamba pali timu ya Burkina Faso ndipo timu ya Uganda ili pa nambala yachiwiri pomwe pamapeto pali timu ya South Sudan ndi ma point atatu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Msonkho Online Ikuthandiza mu Nyengo ya COVID-19
news: Njira yotolera msonkho Bungwe lotolera msonkho mdziko muno la Malawi Revenue Authority (MRA) lati njira ya makono yolipirira msonkho kudzera pa makina a kompyuta akuti ikuthandiza anthu ambiri maka pa nthawi ino yomwe ambiri akugwilira ntchito zawo pakhomo. Malinga ndi mkulu owona za ubale wa bungweli ndi anthu a Steven Kapoloma, padakali pano chiwerengero cha anthu omwe alembetsa kudzera ku njira ya makonoyi chikukwera tsiku ndi tsiku ndipo ati ali ndi chiyembekezo kuti pomafika kumapeto a mwezi uno akhala ndi makasitomala okwana 21000. Iwo ati njira ya msonkho online ikuthandiza anthu omwe amafuna kumvetsa bwino mmene nkhani za nsonkho zimayendera popita pa tsamba la makina a kompyuta a bungweli pomwe amapeza mayankho onse. “Anthu ambiri akuyikhulupirira njirayi kamba koti imapulumutsa ndalama zawo m’malo moyenda kudzafika kuma ofesi athu komanso kupulumutsa nthawi yomwe akanataya polowa m’maofesi osiyanasiyana a msonkho,” anatero a Kapoloma. Iwo apemphanso anthu omwe sakudziwa za njirayi kuti ayambe kuyigwiritsa ntchito ponena kuti ndi yophweka. “Msonkho online ndi njira yokhayo yomwe sungamve kuti mapepala asowa kapenanso anyowa ndi  mvula ayi,” anatero a Kapoloma. Padakali pano bungwe la MRA lalimbikitsa njira zamakono zotolera msonkho komanso kukhwimitsa chitetezo pa atambwali omwe amakhala akuzemba msonkho m’malo ochitira malonda komanso ku zipata zolowera mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Atolankhani Azifotokoza Momwe Ndondomeko ya za Chuma Ikuyendera-Ngwalangwa
news: Unduna wa zachuma wapempha olemba nkhani m’dziko muno kuti aziyesetsa kufotokozera anthu momwe ndondomeko ya za chuma ikuyendera. Wothandizira kwa mkulu owona za dongosolo la za chuma ku undunawu a Lawrence Ngwalangwa anena izi lachiwiri m’boma la Dowa pa maphunziro a tsiku limodzi othandiza olemba nkhani kumvetsa za kayendetsedwe ka chuma. Iwo ati nthawi zambiri anthu amangowuzidwa ndalama zomwe boma layika mu ndondomeko ya za chuma koma samapatsidwa tsatane-tsatane wa momwe ndalamazi zikugwilira ntchito zomwe zimapereka mpata wa za katangale pa kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka chumachi. A Ngwalangwa atinso atolankhani azikhala ndi chidwi pa ma gawo onse a ndondomeko ya za chuma, ndi kuwonetsetsa momwe ndalama zomwe zayikidwa mu ndondomeko ya za chumayi zikugwilira ntchito. “Chimene tinawona ndi chakuti anthu ambiri amangokhala ndi chidwi budget ikalowa ku nyumba ya malamulo basi koma palinso gawo lalikulu lokhudza m’mene budget ikuyendela zomwe ambiri samatsatira choncho tipemphe kuti anthu azitsatira zonsezi ndipo atolankhani azilemba nkhani zambiri za momwe ndalamazi zikugwilira ntchito,” anatero a Ngwalangwa. Iwo anatengeraponso mwayi kupempha mabungwe omwe si a boma kuti azikhala ndi nthawi yochita mikumano yapadera yofunsa maganizo a anthu pa zomwe akufuna kuti zikhale mu ndondomeko ya za chumayi. “Izizi zofunika kwambiri chifukwa choti ngati unduna wa za chuma tizitha kukonza ndondomeko ya za chuma yomwe anthu ambiri apelekapo maganizo pa zomwe akufuna zichitike ndipo itha kumakhala ndondomeko yokomera aliyense,” anatero a Ngwalangwa. M’mawu ake, mkulu wa bungwe la Center for Social Concern, bambo James Ngahy anagwirizana mawu ndi a Ngwalangwa ponena kuti katangale atha kuchepa m’dziko muno ngati nzika zitamadziwa momwe chuma chikuyendera kudzera mu zomwe atolankhaniwa akulemba pa nkhani za chitukuko ndi kukhala ndi mwayi ofunsa adindo kuti afotokoze bwino pomwe pakukayikitsa. Bambo Ngahy anati mwachitsanzo, kusayenda bwino kwa ndalama zokwana 6.2-billion-kwacha zothandizira pa ntchito yolimbana ndi Covid-19 ndi kusaganizira miyoyo ya anthu osauka omwe amayenera kuti ndiwo apindure kwambiri ndi ndalamayi. “Ndalama zilikuti? Wapindulapo ndan? Ndi anthu angati omwe akumwalira m’zipatala kapena m’makomo kumene kaamba kosowa thandizo loyenera? Vuto ndilakuti boma mwina litha kukhala ndi ndalama koma omwe amapindula ndi anthu owerengeka okha zomwe zikuthandziranso kuti osauka azingosaukilabe nde Covid-19’yu waonjezeranso kwambiri kusiyanaku,” anatero a Ngahy   Bungwe la Centre for Social Concern lati lili ndi chikhulupiliro kuti kudzera mu project yake yothandiza nzika kumvetsa ndikutengapo gawo pa kayendetsedwe kachuma ithandiza kuthetsa katangale m’dziko muno. Lipoti la chaka chatha la bungwe la Trasparency International lidawonetsa kuti dziko la Malawi lili pa nambala 129 mwa maiko 180 komwe za katangale zili patsogolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Atsogolera Akhristu Pa Misa Ya Tsiku La Phulusa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko mawa akuyembekezeka kutsogolera misa ya tsiku la Phulusa ku likulu a mpingowu ku Vatican. Lachitatu pa 17 February ndi tsiku la phulusa (Ash Wednesday), chiyambi cha nyengo ya Lenti mu Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse ndipo likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse lalengeza kuti pa tsikuli Papa Francisco atsogolera Misa mu tchalitchi lalikulu la Saint Peter’s Basilica. Malinga ndi ofesi yofalitsa ma uthenga ku Vatican, anthu ochepa ndi omwe awalore kukhala nawo pa Misa’yi malinga ndi ndondomeko zothandiza kupewa kufala kwa nthenda ya Covid-19. Ofesiyi yapitilira kunena kuti lachisanu lililonse kwa masabata anayi, Papa Francisco azikhala nawo pa m’bindikiro wa Lenti omwe azitsogolera ndi Cardinal Raniero Cantalamessa ndipo mutu wa mibindikiroyi ndi woti, “Nanga inu mumati ndine yani?” mawu ochokera mu Uthenga Wabwino monga adalembera Mateyo Woyera mutu 16 ndime ya 15. Bungwe lomwe limawona za chipembedzo mu Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse lodziwika m’chingerezi kuti the Congregation for Divine Worship and the Discipline of the Sacraments lalangiza ansembe onse pa momwe aziperekera phulusa chaka chino malinga ndi mliri wa coronavirus. Bungweli lati ansembe sakuyenera kuwakhudza anthu popereka phulusali monga zimakhalira nthawi zonse koma m’malo mwake kungotsira pang’ono phulusali pa mutu. Mu nyengo ya Lenti akhristu amapemphedwa kuchita zinthu zitatu izi: kusala zakudya komanso zina zomwe amazikonda, kupemphera kwambiri ndipo pomaliza kuchita ntchito za chifundo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lidzifunsa Maganizo a Zipembedzo pa Ntchito Yolimbana ndi COVID-19 – M’neneri Hara
news: Atsogoleri a zipembedzo apempha boma kuti liganizire zokhala pansi ndi atsogoleriwa ndi kukambirana pa momwe angagwilire ntchito limodzi polimbana ndi mliri wa COVID-19. M’modzi mwa atsogoleriwa, m’neneri Justice Hara ndi yemwe wanena izi lolemba ku Lilongwe pa msonkhano wa atolankhani wa komiti ya mtsogoleri wa dziko lino yoona za matenda a Covid-19. Malinga ndi Hara, ziganizo zambiri zomwe boma likumapanga pa nkhani yolimbana ndi mliriwu zikumapereka mafunso ochuluka komanso kupsinja mbali zina kamba koti sipakumakhala kuunikira kochokera kumbali zonse zokhudzidwa. M’neneriyu wakhala m’modzi mwa anthu omwe aperekapo maganizo pa momwe boma likuchitira pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliriwu. Hara: Anthu onse ali m’manja mwa atumikife Iye wati sikovuta kuti nawo mpingo utsatire ndondomeko zomwe zidayikidwa zopewera kufala kwa mliriwu koma zikanakhala bwino boma likanakhala pansi limodzi ndi atsogoleri  a zipembedzo ndi mipingo yosiyanasiyana ndi kuwunikira pa ndondomeko zabwino zomwe zingakomere mbali zonse. “Anthu a ku Malawi kuno ali m’manja mwa ma Bishop, mwa ma propheti, mwa atumiki a Mulungu’fe ndiye ife ndi a boma tikakhala pansi ndikuuzana kuti tiyeni tikalankhule A tisakalankhule C, chilungamo cha Covid ndi B nde anthu tikawafotokozera chenichenicho sipavuta ayi. Ndiye a boma asazichite pawokha zinthuzi ziwakanika,” anatero Hara. Pa za katemera wa Covid-19, Hara anati ganizo lobweretsa katemerayu m’dziko muno ndi labwino ponena kuti ndi njira imodzi yomwe ingateteze mzika za dziko lino ndipo wapempha anthu kuti asadzanyalanyaze kulandira katemelayu potsindikanso kuti katemerayu si zomwe anthu ena akhala akunena zokhudza kutha kwa dziko. Komabe iye wati anthu akuyenera kufotokozeledwa mokwanira pa momwe katemerayu angagwilire ntchito m’thupi mwa munthu asadaperekedwe. “History ya akatemela tilinayo koma katemela uyuyu achipatala atifokozere kuti katemela uyu unayamba chonchi mthupi mwathu umayenda chonchi, titenga uthenga umene uja ndipo tidzaalalika za uthenga umenewo koma kupanda kudziwapo kanthu simungandikakamize kuchita zomwe sindikuzidziwa,” anatero a Hara. Polankhulapo nduna ya za Umoyo Mayi Khumbize Kandodo Chiponda anavomereza kuti pakuyeneradi kukhala mgwirizano pakati pa mbali zonse ndipo anachita changu kunena kuti izi zili m’malingaliro a boma kuti zichitike. Pa za momwe mliriwu unaliri m’maola 24 apitawo, mwa anthu okwana 929 omwe anayezedwa corona virus, anthu 146 ndi omwe apezeka ndi kachiromboka koma ena atsopano okwana 588 achira ku Covid 19 pomwe anthu asanu ndi m’modzi 6 ndi omwe amwalira munthawiyi. Pakadali pano onse omwe akudwalabe Covid-19 ndi anthu okwana 13, 818 koma onse omwe achira kuchokera pachiyambi alipo 14,195.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu 9 Anjatidwa Kaamba Kochita Malonda mu Nthawi Yosavomerezeka
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa akusunga mchitokosi anthu 9 kaamba kopezeka akuchita malonda mu nthawi yosavomerezeka zomwe ndi zosutsana ndi malamulo opewera nthenda ya Covid-19 mdziko muno. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyo-M’bumpha Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha, anthuwa omwe ndi a zaka za pakati pa 15 ndi 35 amangidwa atapezeka akuchita malonda pakati pa 6 koloko komanso half past 7 madzulo. Iye wati anthu asanu amangidwa pa msika wa Nalunga ndipo anayi enawo amangidwa ku malo osungira anthu othawa kwawo a Dzaleka pomwe apolisi amachita ntchito yolondera m’bomalo. Padakalipano, anthuwa akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu kuti akayankhe mlandu omwe apalamulawu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamikira Dziko la Colombia Kaamba Kolandira Bwino Mzika za Dziko la Venezuela
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wayamikira dziko la Colombia kaamba kolandira bwino mzika za mdziko la Venezuela mdzikolo. Mu zolankhulalankhula zake pambuyo pa pemphero la Uthenga wa Mnjelo kwa Amayi Maria (Angelus), Papa wati wachita chidwi ndi zomwe lachita dziko la Colombia pokhazikitsa lamulo lomwe likuvomereza mzika za dziko la Venezuela kukhala nawo m’dzikolo kwa ka nthawi podikilira kuti mavuto a mdziko lawo athe. Iye wayamikira dziko la Colombia polandira bwino m’dzikolo mzika zoposa 1 million za dziko la Venezuela zomwe zathawa kwawo kaamba ka mavuto osiyanasiyana. “Ndikuthokoza chifukwa cha ntchito yotamandikayi. Dziko la Colombia si dziko lolemera kwambiri, ndi dziko lomwe liri pa umphawi ndi mavuto a za chuma koma onani zomwe lachita. Zikomo kwambiri Colombia,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wayamikira onse omwe akugwira ntchito yopereka chisamaliro kwa anthuwa. Kwa nthawi yayitali Papa Francisco wakhala akulankhula mwa mphamvu za kufunika kosamalira anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana. Mwezi wa April m’chaka cha 2016 Papa Francisco adakacheza pa chilumba cha Lesbos m’dziko la Greece pomwe pamafikira anthu ambiri othawa m’maiko awo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana ndipo ku mapeto a ulendowu Papa’yu adatenga mabanja atatu kupita nawo ku Rome. Mabanjawa ndi a anthu omwe adathawa kuchokera m’dziko Syria. Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika limasamalira ma banja’wa mothandizana ndi bungwe la Sant’Egidio.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Wachotsa Dr. Phuka mu Komiti Yowona za COVID-19
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus McCathy Chakwera wasintha udindo wa wapampando wa bungwe lowona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi la Department of Disater Management Affairs (DODMA) komanso wapampando wachiwiri wa komiti yolimbana ndi mliri wa Covid-19 mdziko muno. Mtsogoleriyu wanena izi madzulo a lamulungu pomwe amayankhula ku mtundu wa aMalawi ku nyumba yachifumu ya Kamuzu mu mzinda wa Lilongwe.  Wachotsedwa mu komitiyo – Phuka Iye wasankha Dr. Chalamira Nkhoma kulowa m’malo mwa Dr. John Phuka omwe anali pa udindo wa m’modzi mwa apampando a komiti yolimbana ndi mliri wa Covid-19 mdziko muno ndipo walonjeza zosankhanso wapampando wa bungwe la DODMA posachedwapa. Mukuyankhula kwake mtsogoleri wadziko linoyu wadandaula ndi mchitidwe wa katangale omwe akuti ukubwezeretsa m’mbuyo chitukuko cha dziko lino. Dr. Chakwera ati malipoti omwe alandira kuchokera ku nthambi za boma zosiyanasiyana zomwe zinalandira ndalama zothandizira kulimbana ndi mliri wa Covid-19 ndi okhumudwitsa kaamba koti ambiri alibe mapepala owachitira umboni kupatula lipoti limodzi lokha. A Chakwera ati atsogoleri a nthambi zimenezi akuyenera ayimitsidwe pa ntchito komanso ati aliyense yemwe sanagwiritse ntchito ndalamazi moyenera amangidwe. Mtsogoleriyu wapempha akatswiri a zofufuza nkhani za chuma kuti awunike mapepala a zachuma omwe akuluakuluwa amagwiritsa ntchito. Pakusintha maudindo ku bungwe la DODMA komanso m’modzi mwa apampando a komiti yowona za mliri wa Covid-19, a Chakwera ati udindo wawo ngati mtsogoleri ndi kuonetsetsa kuti komiti yolimbana ndi mliriwu ithandizike ndi nzeru za anthu ena komanso kuwonetsetsa kuti pasakhale kulekerera pa kayendetsedwe ka zinthu. Iwo ayamikira Dr. John Phuka omwe amagwira ntchito ngati m’modzi mwa apampando a komiti yowona za mliri wa Covid-19 komanso athokoza a James Chiusiwa omwe anali wapampando ku bungwe la DODMA. Pomaliza a Chakwera ati tsopano chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akuchira ku nthenda ya Covid-19 chikukwera zomwe zayamba kupereka chilimbikitso kuti tsopano ntchito zosiyanasiyana zomwe zayima kaamba ka mliriwu mdziko muno, zitha kuyambiraso kuyenda ngati kale.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MHRC Ikufuna Osokoneza Ndalama za COVID-19 Ayimbidwe Mlandu
news: Bungwe lowona za ufulu wachibadidwe wa anthu la Malawi Human Rights Commission (MHRC) lati likufuna kuti anthu omwe akuganiziridwa kuti adasokoneza ndalama zothandiza pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliri wa Covid-19 ayimbidwe mlandu. Mlembi wamkulu wa bungweli mayi Habiba Osman anena izi kudzera mu kalata yomwe bungweli latulutsa ndipo ati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti ndalama zokwana 6.2 billion kwacha zomwe unduna wa za chuma udatulutsa m‘mwezi wa August chaka chatha zoti zithandizire pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliriwu sizidagwire ntchitoyi moyenera. Mayi Osman ati ndalamazi zikuyenera kuti zifufuzidwe bwino komanso mowonekera ndi kupeza pomwe padalakwika pofuna kudzetsa chikhulupiliro kwa anthu pa momwe ndalama zomwe zilipo pano zigwilire ntchito yolimbana ndi mliriwu omwe watenga kale miyoyo ya anthu ochuluka. Bungweli lati ndi lokondwa kuti mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera posachedwa adalankhulapo pa za nkhaniyi polamula adindo okhudzidwa kuti afotokoze bwino za momwe ndalamazi zidagwilira ntchito. Komabe bungwelli lati boma lichite changu poyankhapo pa mafunso komanso nkhawa zomwe zakhala zilipo komanso zomwe zikudza pa nkhani yokhudza ndalamazi. Bungweli lati likuyang’ana mwachidwi kuti kafukufuku achitike mokwanira pa kusakazidwa kwa ndalamazi ndipo kuti onse omwe akukhudzidwa kuti adaikapo dzanja pa kusagwira bwino ntchito kwa ndalamazi ayimbidwe milandu molingana ndi malamulo a dziko lino. Pamenepa bungweli lati pakuyenera kukhala nthambi yomwe iziwona momwe adindo akugwiritsira ntchito ndalama zomwe cholinga chake ndi kuthandiza pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliri wa Coronavirus ponena kuti komiti yowona za Covid-19 yomwe mtsogoleri wa dziko lino adayikhazikitsa yalephera kuchita zomwe idauzidwa kuti ichite pa nkhani yokhudza ndalamazi m’masiku awiri. Bungweli latsindikanso pa mfundo yomwe lidaperekapo mu kalata yake ya pa 19 January chaka chino yowuza boma kuti liwonetsetse kuti likuchita zinthu mowonekera pa nkhani ya kayendetsedwe ka chuma chothandizira pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliriwu ndipo lati boma liphunzirepo ndi kuchitapo kanthu pa maganizo omwe anthu komanso magulu okhudzidwa adapelekapo pamomwe boma likuyenera kuchitila pa ndalamazi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Parishi ya Limbe Yayamikira Kwaya ya Bungwe la Umodzi wa Abambo
news: Parish ya Limbe mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yayamikira abambo a mpingowu kaamba kodzipereka pokhazikitsa kwaya yawo yomwe ati ikuthandiza akhristu kupemphera moyenera Wapampando wa Parishiyi a Andrew Simango ndi omwe alankhula izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi kwaya ya abambowa itayimbira koyamba pa mwambo wa misa ya Lamulungu pa 14 February, 2021. Kwaya ya bungwe la Umodzi wa Abambo A Simango ati ndi okondwa kuti abambo ambiri adzipereka kukhazikitsa kwayayi yomwe anati yathandiza akhristu patsikuli kupemphera bwino kaamba ka nyimbo zawo zachikale zomwe akhristu amatha kuyankha nawo mosavuta. “Pa nkhani ya mayimbidwe, abambowa lero ayamba bwino zedi chifukwa akhristu tonse timatha kuyimba nawo zomwe zathandizira kuti tipemphere bwino patsikuli kaamba koti nyimbo zake zinali zosavuta kuyankha,” anatero a Simango. Pamenepa iwo ati alimbikitsa abambowa kuyendera matchalitchi onse ali pansi pa parishiyi ndi cholinga choti athe kukopa abambo ena kuti alowe m’bungweli ndi cholinga choti nawonso akhale ndi mwayi wotumikira mpingo ndi mabanja awo kudzera m’bungweli pomwe kwa nthawi yayitali akhala akusiyira amayi okha ntchito zotere. Iwo atinso zimenezi zithandizira kuti podzakhazikitsa bungweli mu nyengo ya Pasaka adzakhale ndi chiwerengero chachikulu cha abambo odzatenga nawo mbali m’bungweli pa mayimbidwe ndi ntchito zina. A Simango apitirizanso kuti parishiyi ndi yokonzeka kuthandiza abambowa ndi cholinga choti maziko a bungweli akhale a mphamvu m’parishiyi. M’mawu ake wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa bungwe la abambo Ku Limbe Cathedral a Dickson Ching’anda athokoza Mulungu kaamba kowatsogolera kuti akhale ndi mwayi woyimbira m’tchalitchimu koyamba zomwe anatinso zawapatsa mangolomera oti ayende m’matchalichi onse a m’parishiyi ndi kukalalika za bungwe latsopanoli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la CWO Lalangiza Akhristu Apitirize Kutsatira Njira Zopewera COVID-19
news: Bungwe la amayi achikatolika mdziko muno la Catholic Women Organisation (CWO) lalangiza akhristu mdziko muno kuti apitirize kusatira njira zodzitetezera ku mliri wa Covid-19. Mayi Felicia Monjeza omwe ndi mkulu woyang’anira ntchito za bungweli ndi omwe alankhula izi mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre pambuyo popereka katundu wothandizira kudziteteza ku nthenda ya Covid-19 ku maparish a St. Mary’s Chemusa ndi Sacred Heart Lunzu mu arkidayosiziyi. Mayi Monjeza ndi mayi Vokhiwa kupereka wina mwa katunduyo kwa bambo Mtapara Mayi Monjeza ati ndi kofunika akhristu apitirize kutsatira njira zodzitetezera ndi cholinga choti nthendayi itheretu makamaka poyang’anira kuti nthendayi masiku apitawa inabweretsa mantha pakati pa a Malawi. “Zoonadi ife ngati bungwe la amayi achikatolika mdziko muno tayendera maparish awiri a St. Mary’s Chemusa komanso Lunzu komwe chachikulu kunali kulimbikitsa akhristu kupitiriza kutsatira njira zodzitetezera ku nthendayi yomwe ili pakati pathu. Kupatula apo taperekanso zipangizo zozitetezera ku nthendayi monga zotchingira kukamwa ndi mphuno ma Face Mask, Sopo ndi ma hand sanitizer kuti akhristu ammaparish awiriwa azigwiritsa ntchito,” anatero mayi Monjeza. Iwo atinso bungweli likhalanso likufikira akhristu aku maparish awiri amu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe komwe bungweli likugwirako ntchito yomweyi ndi cholinga choti uthenga oterewu ufikirenso anthu aku parishi-zo.
