Akhristu a tchalitchi cha Holy Family Chinyama pambuyo polandira katunduyo Pogwirizana ndi mayi Monjeza, wapampando wa bungweli mdziko muno mayi Lucy Vokhiwa ati bungweli linasankha kuchita izi pofuna kuthandizira akhristu a mpingowu kutetezeka Ku nthendayi  ndi kuchotsa mantha omwe akumabwera pakati pa anthu kamba ka mauthenga osiyanasiyana omwe akufalitsidwa molakwika pa masamba a mchezo. Mayi Vokhiwa ayamikiranso bungwe lomwe lawagwira zanja pankhaniyi la O’Neil Foundation kudzera Ku bungwe la Missio USA kamba kopereka chuma chothandizira ntchitoyi yomwe yafikira anthu ochuluka kudzera mauthenga osiyanasiyana osindikizidwa, apa wayilesi komanso mzofokozera zomwe bungweli lakhala likupereka misonkhano ya Mapemphero ndiponso zipangizo zosiyanasiyana zomwe lakhala likugawa zopewera nthendayi. Polandira katunduyi mmalo mwa parishi ya St. Marys Chemusa, bambo Alick Mtapara ayamikira amayiwa kamba kopereka katunduyi yemwe ati apereka kwa anthu omwe paokha sangathe kupeza zipangizozi. Nayenso wapampando wa tchalitchi la Banja loyera Chinyama yomwe ndi nthambi ya Lunzu a Charles Kaunjika ati thandizoli lafika pa nthawi yake kamba koti nawonso amavutika kupeza zinthuzi paokha kamba kakuchepekedwa kwa akhristu ozungulira tchalitchichi. Ena mwa matchalitchi a mparish ya Lunzu omwe apindula ndi zipangizozi ndi Namisu komanso Chikoja Makanani.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Akhristu Kuti Apewe Kukhala Ndi Maganizo Olakwika pa Anthu Ena
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wapempha akhristu kuti adzipewa kukhala ndi maganizo olakwika pa anthu ena. M’mawu ake kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti, Papa wati Ambuye Yesu anadza pansi pano kuti adzapulumutse anthufe posayang’anira kuchimwa kwathu. Iye wati Yesu Khristu adagonjetsa zonse zomwe zikadatha kumubweza m’mbuyo kuti adzapulumutse mtundu wa anthu pa dziko la pansi. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kutengera chitsanzo cha Yesu Khristu pogonjetsa maganizo olakwika komanso mantha pa za anthu ena zomwe zingawabwezere m’mbuyo pofuna kuthandiza anthuwo. Iye wati Mawu a mu Uthenga Wabwino omwe awerengedwa pa tsiku lamulungu la 6 mu nyengo ya pa chaka akufotokoza momveka bwino za mkumano wa Ambuye Yesu ndi munthu wa khate. Papa Francisco wati ngakhale kuti malamulo pa nthawi ya Ambuye Yesu sanali kulora kuti anthu a khate azikhala pafupi ndi anthu ena, Ambuye Yesu adalora munthu wa khate kumuyandikira mpaka Ambuye Yesu adamukhudza munthuyo. Iye wati nkhaniyi ikuonetseratu poyera kuti Ambuye Yesu adakwaniritsa uthenga wa chipulumutso womwe anali kulalika pofika pakati pa anthu ndi kukhudza miyoyo ya anthuwo m’njira zosiyana-siyana komanso kuwakokera anthuwo ku chipulumutso. Papa Francisco watsindika kuti Mulungu amakhala ndi anthu ake nthawi zonse ndipo amawakhudza anthuwo mu njira zosiyana-siyana kuti choncho pakhale ubale weniweni pakati pa iye ndi anthuwo. Iye wamaliza ndi kudzudzula anthu ena omwe amawasala anzawo pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana mwina chifukwa chosiyana kochokera ndi anthu enawo komanso chifukwa cha matenda omwe anthuwo akudwala kapena anadwalapo. Papa Francisco wati khalidwe la tsankho, dyera si khalidwe la Mulungu kotero akhristu akuyenera kugonjetsa khalidweli kuti azitha kutumikira anzao monga Ambuye Yesu anali kuchitira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Akhazikitsa Kafukufuku pa Kuphedwa kwa Asodzi Atatu Omwe Awomberedwa ndi Apolisi
news: Apolisi mdziko muno ati akhazikitsa kafukufuku wofuna kupeza chomwe chinachitika kuti apolisi ena awombere ndi kupha asodzi atatu pa nyanja ya Chilwa m’boma la Zomba. Wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mdziko muno Peter Kalaya ndi yemwe wanena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iye wati padakalipano apolisi awiriwa ali mchitolokosi cha apolisi podikira kafukufukuyu. Kalaya: Asodzi amakana kulandidwa manet Kalaya wati apolisiwa anatengedwa ndi a zachitetezo cha mdera kuti akawathandize kulondera nyanjayo yomwe inatsekedwa mwezi wa December chaka chatha, koma kuti panali kusamvana pakati pa apolisiwa ndi asodzi omwe anapezeka akupha nsomba pa nyanjayi “Apolisi athu a pa Kachulu anapemphedwa ndi a Mchenga BVC kuti akawathandize kuchita patrol pa nyanjayi ndipo atafika pa Lingali Fishing Dock anapeza asodziwa omwe anali ndi zikwanje. Kusamvana kunabuka kaamba koti amakaniza kuwalanda manet monga mmene zimafunikira zomwe zinachititsa kuti awombere m’mwamba ndipo pakuomberapa asodzi atatu anakatsimikizika ku chipatala kuti afa ndipo ena anavulala,” anatero Kalaya. Iye wati akukhulupilira kuti apolisiwa amafuna kudziteteza kwa asodziwa omwe pa nthawiyi anali atanyamula zikwanje. Komabe iwo ati apempha nthambi zina za boma komanso zomwe sizaboma kuti zithandire pa ntchito ya kafukufukuyu. “Tikuganiza kuti apolisi athu anagwiritsa force yochuluka ndiye mchifukwa chake tikufuna tifufuze kaye zambiri za nkhaniyi. Popeza kuti awa ndi apolisi anzathu tapempha a Malawi Human Rights Commission, Independent Police Complaints Commission kuti nawonso afufuze pofuna kuti chilungamo chiwonekere,” anatero Kalaya.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha a Katolika Awonetse Chifundo Posamalira Anthu Omwe Akhudzidwa ndi COVID-19
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wapempha akhristu a mpingowu kuti awonetse chifundo chawo posamalira anthu omwe akhudzidwa ndi mliri wa Coronavirus. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, Papa wanena izi kudzera mu uthenga wa nyengo ya Lenti chaka chino. Iye wati nyengo ya Lenti ndi nthawi ya mtengo wa patali yoti akhristu akule m’chikondi posamalira anzawo ovutika makamaka omwe akhudzidwa ndi mliri wa Coronavirus. Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kumalimbikitsidwa nthawi zonse ndi mawu opezeka m’buku la mneneri Isaiya Mutu 43 ndime yoyamba, “Musaope popeza ndakupulumutsani.” Iye wati popereka chisamaliro kwa anthu omwe akudwala ndi kuvutika mu njira zosiyana-siyana akhristu akuyenera kumapereka uthenga wa chilimbikitso komanso chiyembekezo. Papa Francisco wanenetsa kuti palibe mphatso yaing’ono ngati munthu woyiperekayo aperekadi ndi mtima wake wonse. Mutu wa uthenga wa nyengo ya Lenti chaka chino ndi woti, “Tikupita ku Yerusalemu. Lenti nyengo yodzamitsa Chikhulupiriro, Chiyembekezo ndi Chikondi,” kapena kuti “Behold, we are going up to Jerusalem. Lent: A Time for Renewing Faith, Hope, and Love,” m’chingerezi. Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse uyamba nyengo ya Lenti lachitatu likubwerali pa 17 February. Pa nthawiyi akhristu amalimbikitsidwa kusala zakudya kapena kusiya zinthu zina zomwe amazikonda (fasting), kupemphera kwambiri (prayers) komanso kugwira ntchito za chifundo (alms giving). Nyengo ya Lenti imadziwika m’chilatini kuti “Quadragesima” kutanthauza masiku 40 a nyengo’yi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwambo Wokhazikitsa bungwe la CMO ku Limbe Cathedral Wayimitsidwa
news: Mwambo wokhazikitsa bungwe la Umodzi wa abambo la Catholic Men Organisation (CMO) ku parish ya Limbe mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre omwe umayenera kuchitika lero lamulungu pa 14 February 2021 ati awuyimitsa kaye pofuna kugwirizana ndi ndondomeko zopewera Covid-19 zomwe boma linakhazikitsa mdziko muno. M’modzi mwa mamembala mu komiti yomwe ikuyendetsa zokonzekera za mwambowu, a Patrick Kombe atsimikiza izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Kombe: Abambo oposa 100 anasonkha A Kombe ati kuyimitsaku kwachitika potsatira kuti abambo ochuluka m’parishiyi anawonetsa chidwi chodzakhala nawo pa mwambowu zomwe anati zikhala zovuta kuti zigwirizane ndi mfundo zowonjezera zomwe boma linakhazikitsa pofuna kuthana ndi nthenda ya Covid-19 zomwe mpingo wonse ukusatira. ‘Ife tinangoyerekeza kuti tingokhazikitsa mwambowu ndi anthu ochepa koma titapereka nkhaniyi kwa abambo anzathu zawonetseratu kuti ambiri akufunitsitsa kuti azakhale nawo pa mwambowu. Izi zawonekera poyera pomwe abambo oposa 100 asonkha nawo kangachepe kuti azakhale nawo pa mwambowu zomwe zitsutsane ndi mfundo za boma zopewera nthendayi zomwe zikulora anthu kusonkhana osapitilira 50,” anatero a Kombe. Pamenepa iwo ati ngakhale izi zili chomwechi kwaya ya abambo okhaokha yomwe imakonzekera kudzayimbira pa misayi ndi yomwenso yayimbira pa Misa yomwe yachitika ku tchalitchili lero pa 14 February,2021 pa nthawi ya 9:30 m’mawa ndipo akhristu akhala ndi mwayi owona mmene abambowa akuchitira pa mayimbidwe awo. A Kombe apitirizanso kuti ali ndi chikhulupiliro kuti mwambo wokhazikitsa bungweli utha kudzachitika mu nyengo ya Pasaka pofuna kugwirizana ndi tsiku lokhazikitsa kwa bungwe lotereli mu arkidayosiziyi pomwe ndi 1 May, 2021. “Zokonzekera zonse zatha tingodikira kuti mu nyengo ya kuwuka kwa Ambuye Yesu Khristu tizakhazikitse bungweli ndi cholinga choti tizakhale tikhazikitsa kale pomwe bungweli lizidzakhazikitsidwa mu arkidayosiziyi pa 1 May,” anapitiriza motero a Kombe. Iwo ati mosakayikira kukhazikitsaku kuzachitika mu nthawiyi kaamba koti chiwerengero cha opezeka ndi nthenda ya Covid-19 chachepa kusiyana ndi sabata ziwiri zapitazo pomwenso anthu ochira ku nthendayi akuchulukirachulukirabe zomwe zikuwapatsa chiyembekedzo choti pofika mu nthawiyo zinthu zitha kuzakhala bwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Aku Chingale Akuyembekezera Kukhala ndi Zitukuko Zodalirika
news: Anthu a mdera la mfumu yaikulu Nkapita kuchingale m’boma la Zomba ati tsopano adzitha kukhala ndi zitukuko zodalilika komanso zogwirizana ndi ndalama zomwe zaperekedwa pachitukuko chakudera. Mnkhalapampando owona zachitukuko ku dera (ADC chair) a Redson Sumani, ndiyemwe wanena izi potsiriza pamaphunziro amasiku atatu omwe bungwe la Centre for Social Concern linachititsa mumzinda wa Zomba, owazindikilitsa mmene angachitire kalondolondo wa mmene chuma chikuyendera  komanso zitukuko mdera lawo. Iye anati maphunzirowa awathandiza muzambiri kuphatikizapo mmene angawafikire adindo pochita kalondolondo wachuma chomwe chikugwiritsidwa ntchito mdera mwao. Polankhula potsiriza pamaphunzirowa mnkhalapampando owona zachitukuko ku mdera la Sub T/A Nkapita a Redson Sumani anayamikira bungwe la Centre for Social Concern chifukwa cha maphunzirowa ponena kuti mbuyomu zinali zovuta kwa anthu a mdera la Nkapita kuzindikira udindo omwe ali nawo wochita kalondolondo pachuma, komanso kudziwa ndondomeko zomwe angatsatire pofuna kufunsa adindo za mmene zitukuko zikuyendera mdera mwao. Koma tsopano kubwera kwa ndondomekoyi ndimaphunzirowa akuti atsekuka mmaso ndikuzindikira udindo wao, zomwe akuti zithandiza derali kukhala ndizitukuko zodalilika. Mmau ake mmodzi mwa ma Khansala a Geofrey Mandala a mdera la Lithipe mu constituency ya Chingale,  anati maphunzirowa awathandizanso pantchito yawo ngati makhansala kamba koti tsopano adzitha kugwirana manja ndi anthu akudera potsatira zitukuko kwa adindo monga aphungu akudera. Polankhula mkulu oyang’anira ndondomeko yoona za chilungamo pazachuma (Economic Governance) ku bungwe la Centre for Social Concern a Bernard Mphepo   anati, cholinga cha ndondomekoyi ndikufuna kuonetsetsa kuti adindo akuchita zinthu poyera ndipo anthu akudera akutha kuchita kalondolondo wachuma komanso chitukuko mdera. Maphunzirowa anabweretsa pamodzi anthu a mmagulu osiyansiyana akudera monga achinyamata, makomiti achitukuko makhansala ndi ena. Mwazina pamaphunzirowa anaunika nkhani zokhudza matumba achitukuko chakudera monga CDF komanso LDF, za mphamvu kuwathu, ndizina zothandizira kuti ndondomekoyi iyende bwino. Ndondomekoyi ayikhazikitsa mmaboma a Mzimba Mangochi Zomba komanso Phalombe ndi thandizo lochokera kubungwe la GIZ.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kampani Ya Kokoliko Holdings Yati Ikufuna Kusintha Miyoyo ya Achinyamata
news: Kampani ya Kokoliko Holdings yati ili ndi malingaliro okhazikitsa magulu othandiza achinyamata pa ntchito zosiyana-siyana m’madela onse 193 aaphungu ndi ma ward onse a makhansala posawerengera chipani chomwe anthu amatsatira. Mkulu wa kampaniyi Daudi Sulemani ndiye wanena izi pambuyo pa maphunziro omwe anakonzela anthu omwe athandizire pa ntchito yokhazikitsa maguluwa. Iye anatii kudzera m’maguluwa achinyamata ambiri akhala ndi mwai odziimila pawokha pomachita ntchito za malonda ndi zina kaamba koti azipeza luso la momwe angachitire izi ndipo pamapeto pake azithandizanso pa chuma cha dziko lino. Sulemani anati pali magawo okwana khumi ndi atatu,13 omwe kampaniyi ikuyembekezeka kuti ikhazikitse kudzera m’maguluwa monga za umoyo, za ulimi ndi zofalitsa  mau kungotchulapo zochepa chabe zomwe ati zikhala zitachitika pofika m’mwezi wa December chaka chino. Iye anatsindikanso kuti ili si gulu la ndale ndipo chipani cha Malawi Congress sichili kumbuyo kwa izi koma cholinga cha zonsezi ndikufuna kuwona dziko lino likusintha pa chuma. M’mau ake, nduna ya achinyamata ndi za masewero  Ulemu Msungama yemwe anali mulendo olemekeza pa mwambowu anayamikira ganizo la achinyamatawa ponena kuti izi zithandiziranso kukwanilitsa maloto a boma la m’gwirizano wa Tonse lolemba ntchito achinyamata 1 million mu chaka choyamba cha utsogoleriwu. Ndunayi inati nthawi yakwana kuti achinyamata azipita patsogolo ngakhale zisankho zitadutsa ndikupewa kungomangogwilitsidwa ntchito ndi anthu andale. Kokoliko Holdings Limited idayamba ngati gulu la ndale pambuyo pa chigamulo cha mulandu okhudza chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa dziko chaka chatha pomwe zina mwa mboni zomwe zidaimila nawo pa mulanduwu zidabwera pamodzi ndkuyambitsa gululi koma chitatha chisankho chachibweleza gululi lidalembetsedwa ngati kampani yoima payokha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: A Zaumoyo Adandaula ndi Kuchepa Kwa Chiwerengero Cha Anthu Omwe Akuyezetsa Matenda Ena Mzipatala
news: Mkulu wa zophunzitsa anthu zaumoyo m’boma la Lilongwe a Richard Mvula adandaula ndi mphekesera zaboza zokhuza nthenda ya Corona zomwe zikumakambidwa m’madera kuti zasokoneza ntchito yolimbana ndi matenda omwe anayamba kugonjetsedwa kale. A Mvula amayankhula izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe komiti yolimbana ndi mliri wa Covid-19 mdziko muno imachititsa lachinayi madzulo mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iwo ati mphekeserazi zachititsa kuti chiwerengero cha anthu opita kuchipatala kukayezetsa matenda ena chichepe zomwenso zaika chiospyezo kuti matenda ena omwe anagonjetsedwa kale monga Chukuku, TB, Polio kungotchulapo ochepa chabe zitha kubwereranso. “Pakati pathu pakumamveka mphekesera zambiri komanso zokamba Kamba zomwe zingapangitse kubweretsa chiospezo kuti muliliwu tisathe kuugonjetsa,” anatero Mvula. Iwo ati alangizi azaumoyo omwe amapita m’midzi kukapereka katemera wa matenda ena omwe anayamba kugongetsedwa kale akulephera kutero choncho matendwa atha kuyambiranso.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Vatican Radio Kuti Iziyima Pa Chilungamo Pogwira Ntchito Yake
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walimbikitsa wayilesi ya Vatican kuti nthawi zonse iziyima pa chilungamo pogwira ntchito yake. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi mu uthenga wake wa mafuno abwino wopita ku wayilesi’yi pamene lero ikukondwerera kuti yakwanitsa zaka 90 chiikhazikitsireni. Iye wayamikira luso komanso kudzipereka kwa anthu ogwira ntchito ku wayilesi’yi. “Okondedwa abale ndi alongo, ndikukufunirani mafuno abwino,” umu ndi m’mene wayambira uthenga wa mafuno abwino wa Papa Francisco womwe walembera wayilesi ya Vatican pa chikondwerero choti wayilesi’yi yakwanitsa zaka 90 kuchokera pomwe adaikhazikitsa. Mu uthengawu iye wayamika onse omwe amagwira ntchito ku wayilesi’yi chifukwa cha luso ndi kudzipereka kwao pa ntchito komanso wachita chidwi ndi chida cha mphamvu’chi. “Ndikukuyamikani nonse chifukwa cha kudzipereka kwanu pa ntchito. Wayilesi ndi chida cha mphamvu komanso chochititsa chidwi chomwe chimaulutsa mawu kupita ku madera a kutali,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawu. Wayilesi’yi yodziwika mchingerezi kuti Vatican Radio kapena Radio Vaticana mu chitaliyana komanso Statio Radiophonica Vaticana mu chilatini ili ndi ogwira ntchito oposa 200 ochokera m’maiko 69 ndipo imaulutsa ma pologalamu ake mu zilankhulo 47. Adakhazikitsa wayilesi’yi ndi Papa Pio wa 11 pa 12 February m’chaka cha 1931 ndipo Papa’yu adapempha Guglielmo Marconi kuti athandize kuyambitsa ntchito za wayilesi’yi. Wayilesiyi adaikhazikitsa ndi cholinga choti ikhale liwu la a Papa pofalitsa Uthenga wa Chipulumutso ndi chifukwa chake imatchulidwanso kuti “the Pope’s Radio.” Ansembe a mu chipani cha mu Mpingo wa Katolika odziwika kuti ma Jesuit kapena kuti Society of Jesus m’chingerezi ndi omwe adapatsidwa udindo woyendetsa wayilesi’yi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe Loyang’anira Zomangamanga Mdziko Muno Lati Lidzipereka pa Ntchito Yolimbana ndi Matenda a Edzi
news: Asayinirana ndi Radio Maria Bungwe lomwe limayang’anira ntchito zomangamanga mdziko muno la National Construction Industry Council (NCIC) lati lidzipereka pa ntchito yolimbana ndi matenda a HIV/AIDS mdziko muno. Mkulu owona zachuma ku bungweli a Daniel Kampondeni ndi omwe anena izi lero m’boma la Mangochi pambuyo posayinirana mgwirizano wa pakati pa bungweli ndi Radio Maria Malawi, owulutsa mapologalamu komanso mauthenga okhudza nthendayi. Iwo ati anthu ambiri amene amagwira ntchito zomangamanga m’madera osiyanasiyana mdziko muno akumwalira komanso kukhudzidwa ndi nthenda ya Edzi kaamba koti amapita kukagwira ntchito ku madera a kutali ndi mabanja awo zomwe akuti zikuchititsa kuti nthambiyi itaye anthu ambiri a luso la zomangamanga. A Kampondeni omwe anayimira mkulu wa bungweli pa mwambowu anati bungwe lawo linasankha kuchita mgwirizano oterewu ndi Radio Maria potengera m’mene wailesiyi imachitira mapologalamu ake komanso potengera kuti imafikira madera ochuluka mdziko muno. “Radio Maria ndi imodzi mwa wailesi zitatu mdziko muno zomwe tasayinirana nazo mgwirizano pa ntchitoyi. Tinawunika bwino lomwe ndipo tinakhutitsidwa ndi momwe Radio Maria imachitira zinthu zake,” anatero a Kampondeni. Polankhulapo President wa Radio Maria Malawi, a Levi Phelani ati mgwirizanowu uthandiza kukumbutsa anthu mdziko muno kuti nthenda ya edzi idakalipobe ngakhale tsopano kwabwera matenda ena omwenso avuta kwambiri. Mwazina iwo apempha mabungwe ena omwe ali ndi mapologalamu ofunika kuti awulutsidwe kuti asachedwe koma kukumana ndi akuluakulu a wailesiyi ndi kukambirana momwe angachitire pothandizana kufalitsa mauthenga awo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ophunzira Okhudzidwa Ati Akakamiza Boma Litsekule Sukulu Msanga
news: Gulu lina la ophunzira a msukulu za mdziko omwe akuti ndi okhudzidwa apempha boma kuti lichite machawi potsegulanso sukulu zomwe zinatsekedwa kamba ka mliri wa Covid-19. Poyankhula pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe gululi linachititsa mu mzinda wa Blantyre, wapampando wa gululi Kelvin Kasanga wati apereka masiku awiri mpaka loweruka kuti boma kudzera ku komiyi ya president yolimbana ndi mliri wa Covid-19 ndiponso unduna wa zamaphunziro akhale atayankha madando awo ndipo ati ngati akuluakuluwa satero achita zinthu zomwe sanawulule. Ophunzira okhudzidwa pa msonkhano wa atolankhaniwo Kasanga wati ophunzirawa ali ndi nkhawa kaamba koti kuchedwa kutsegula sukuluzi kubweretsa mavuto ena kwa ophunzirawa monga kutenga mimba zosakonzekera kwa atsikana, kumwa makhwala ozunguza bongo ndi mowa komwe kwakula pamene ophunzira ali pakhomo. Iye watinso gulu lawo liri ndi chiyembekezo kuti sukulu zikatsegulidwa ophunzira apitilira kusatira njira zodzitetezera ku mliriwu zomwe amachita sukuluzi zisanatsekedwe. Presidential wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera anaonjezera sabata zina ziwiri zoti sukulu zikhale zotseka kaamba ka kupitilira kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akutenga kachirombo ka Corona mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mtambo Wati Unduna Wake Ukugwira Ntchito Yophunzitsa Anthu za Mliri wa Covid-19
news: Nduna ya zophunzitsa anthu zinthu zosiyanasiyana ndi kulimbikitsa umodzi mdziko muno a Timothy Mtambo ati unduna wawo mogwirizana ndi unduna wa zaumoyo komanso wa zofalitsa nkhani ukugwira ntchito yophunzitsa anthu za mliri wa Covid-19 m’madera osiyanasiyana mdziko muno. A Mtambo amayankhula izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe komiti yowona za mliri wa Covid-19 mdziko muno inachititsa lachitatu madzulo mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iwo ati pa ntchito yophunzitsa anthu m’maderamo, mzikanso zikuyenera zikhale ndi umwini pogwiritsa ntchito uthengawo komanso kuikapo mtima kuti ntchitoyi ibale zipatso Ndunayi yati pogwiritsa ntchito galimoto 34 zomwe ofesi ya mtsogoleri wa dziko lino yapereka limodzi ndi zimkuza mawu, ayendera madera osiyanasiyana kuphunzitsa anthu momwe angapewere kachilomboka. Iwo atinso a Malawi apewe kutengeka ndi mauthenga ozungulira m’masamba a mchezo m’malo mwake atsatire zomwe unduna wa zaumoyo ukuwapempha kuchita ndipo ati aliyense agwire ntchito yoteteza moyo wa mzake posagonjera kuvala  chothinga kukamwa ndi mphuno. Pankhani ya katemera yemwe akuyembekezeka kubwera mdziko muno kumapeto amwezi uno, a Mtambo ati boma silizakakamiza munthu kukalandira katemerayu koma aliyense atenge gawo polandira katemerayu kuti dziko lino likwanitse kugonjetsa nthendayi. Pomaliza iwo apempha mzika zadziko lino kukhulupirira boma pomwe likugwira ntchito yothana ndi mliriwu ponena kuti boma likufunira mzika zake moyo wathanzi. Polankhulapo Dr. John Phuka apempha adindo monga mafumu, azibusa ndi ena ambiri kuthandiza kuphunzitsa anthu kuti aziwe zoona zamatendwa. Padakali pano anthu omwe apezeka ndi nthendayi lero mdziko muno ndi 328 omwe achira ndi 518 pomwe amwarira ndi 17.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo “Wamisala” Wamangidwa Kaamba Kopha Mwana Wake
news: Apolisi m’boma la Kasunga amanga bambo wina wa zaka 30 kaamba komuganizira kuti wapha mwana wake. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Edna Mzingwitsa, bamboyu Emmanuel Shaba yemwe akumuganizira kuti amadwala matenda amisala, anapha mwana wake wamkazi wa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi (6) pambuyo pomugwilirira pomumenya ndi nyundo m’mutu. Malinga ndi Inspector Mzigwitsa, izi zimachitika mkazi wa bamboyu atapita kumunda. “Mayiyo atabwera ndi kufunsa za komwe kunali mwana, bamboyu akuti anayankha kuti wapha nkhuku ndipo ili m’nyumba. Mkazi wabamboyu atalowa mnyumbamo ndi pomwe anazindikira kuti wapha mwana,” anatero Inspector Mzingwitsa. Nkhaniyi atakayitula ku polisi, a polisi pamodzi ndi a chipatala anafika pamalopo ndipo zotsatira za kuchipata zasonyeza kuti mwanayu wafa kaamba kotaya magazi ochuluka. Pakadali pano apolisiwa akusunga bamboyu podikira kuti apite ku chipatala cha matenda a misala ndi kukamuwunika ngati mkuluyu wachita izi kaamba ka misala. A Emmanuel Shaba amachokera m’mudzi mwa Maswani mdera la mfumu yaikulu Wimbe m’boma la Kasungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa wati Ubale Wabwino ndi Ofunika Pakati pa Ogwira Ntchito Mchipatala ndi Odwala
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wati pakufunika ubale wabwino pakati pa ogwira ntchito mchipatala ndi odwala. Pa 11 February chaka chilichonse Mpingo wa Katolika umakumbukira odwala onse (World Day of the Sick). Ili ndi tsikunso la chaka cha Amayi Maria a ku Lourdes. Papa kucheza ndi odwala Mu uthenga wake wa pa tsikuli chaka chino, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kwa ubale wabwino womwe ukuyenera kukhalapo pakati pa anthu ogwira ntchito za chipatala ndi anthu odwala. Iye watsindikanso za kufunika kopereka chisamaliro chokwanira kwa anthu odwala ndipo pa nthawi yomweyo kumvetsera modekha zofuna zawo. Papa Francisco wati tsikuli ndi mwayi wa ukulu woti anthu aziganizira ntchito yaikulu komanso yotamandika yomwe anthu a za chipatala amagwira ndipo pa nthawi yomweyo kufunika koganizira anthu odwala. Mu uthengawu iye wati ali pafupi ndi anthu onse omwe apezeka ndi nthenda ya Covid-19 makamaka anthu osauka ndi awo omwe kawiri-kawiri salabadiridwa. Papa Francisco wadzudzula kotheratu khalidwe la anthu ena lomangoziganizira iwo eni ndi kusalabadira mavuto a anthu ena. Iye wakumbutsa anthu kuti Ambuye Yesu anali kudzudzula khalidwe la anthu ena la uchiphamaso longolankhula zinthu koma osazichita zinthuzo. Pamenepa Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kokhala a Samaria a chifundo. Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera ndi yemwe adakhazikitsa tsiku loganizira odwalali pa 13 May m’chaka cha 1992 ndipo Mpingo wa Katolika ukukumbukira odwala onse chaka chino pa mutu woti, “Nonse muli ndi mphunzitsi m’modzi choncho ndinu abale,” mau opezeka mu Uthenga Wabwino monga adalembera Mateyo Woyera mutu 23 ndime ya 8.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ECM Yapempha Mgwirizano pa Ntchito za Umoyo Mdziko Muno
news: Nthambi yowona za umoyo mu mpingo wa katolika m’dziko muno ya Catholic Health Commission yapempha yati pakuyenera kukhala mgwirizano wabwino pakati pa anthu pothandiza omwe akudwala kuti akhale ndi moyo wabwino. Wapampando wa nthambiyi Ambuye John Ryan anena izi kudzera mu kalata yomwe nthambiyi yatulutsa yofotokoza zambiri zokhudza tsiku lokumbukira odwala pa dziko lonse pa 11 February. Walemba kalatayo-Bishop Ryan Ambuye Ryan ati kubwera kwa mliri wa Coronavirus kwawulula kuti m’zipatala mukusowekera ukadaulo wapadera kuti odwala azithandizidwa moyenera ndipo ati izi zitha kutheka ngati pali mgwirizano. Iwo ati pomwe odwala wapatsidwa chisamaliro chonse choyenelera zimamuthandiza kuti achire mwansanga ndipo ogwira ntchito zaumoyo akuyenera kuyika izi patsogolo. Pamenepa Ambuye Ryan ati tsiku ili lokumbukira anthu omwe akudwala komanso omwe ananzunzikapo ndi matenda osiyanasiyana likumbutsenso adindo kuti kupereka zipangizo zothandizira odwala ndi chinthu choyambilira komanso chofunikira chomwe chikugwirizananso ndi lamulo loti moyo ndi mpamba. Iwo atinso tsiku ili lomwe ndi lokumbukiranso Amayi Maria a ku Ludzi lomwe lafika mkati mwa mliri wa Covid-19 lipereke chilimbikitso pakati pa akhristu ndi kupemphelera onse omwe akudwala matendawa ndi ena othandiza kusamala odwala monga a zaumoyo, m’mabanja ndi m’mizinda kumene kuti akhale ndi mphamvu zothandizira anthuwa. Kalatayi yafotokozanso kuti magulu ena a anthu omwe sawona mbali ina ya zinthu koma kuthandizapo pomwe pagwa vuto akuyenera kupatsidwa mangolomera kamba koti izi zimalimbikitsa odwala ndipo pakuyenera kukhala kugwirizana pakati pa akhristu mothandizidwa ndi chikondi chochokera kwa Yesu Khristu zomwe pambuyo pake zimabweretsa machilitso. Apa Ambuye Ryan ati mliri wa Covid 19 wabweretsa chisokonenezo chachikulu pa ntchito za umoyo makamaka kwa anthu okalamba ndi odwala kamba koti anthuwa amakhala ofooka komanso osatetezedwa zomwe zimapangitsa kuti asalandire chisamaliro chofanana ndi anthu ena. Iwo ati izi zimachitika kamba ka ziganizo zina za anthu a ndale, kasamalidwe ka zipangizo zothandizira pothana ndi mliriwu komanso kusaikapo mtima kwa omwe anapatsidwa ntchitoyi makamaka omwe ali ndi maudindo osiyanasiyana. Tsiku lokumbukira odwala pa dziko lonse adalikhazikitsa ndi Pope Yohane Paulo wachiwiri mu chaka cha 1992, ndi cholinga chowalimbikitsa akhristu onse kupemphelera komanso kuwasamalira onse omwe akudwala matenda osiyanasiyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mapemphero Amapereka Mpata Wokumana Ndi Mulungu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisko wati mapemphero amapereka mpata woti anthu akumane ndi Mulungu yemwe ndi tate wawo. Polankhula m’mawa wa tsiku lachitatu kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira mabuku, Vatican Apostolic Library, Papa Francisco wapitiriza kuphunzitsa a Katolika pa mutu wa mapemphero. Iye wati nthawi iliyonse komanso zochitika zosiyana-siyana za moyo wathu ndi mpata wina wotha kulankhula ndi kucheza ndi Mulungu kudzera m’mapemphero. Papa Francisco wafotokoza kuti polankhula ngakhalenso pokhala chete ndi kusinkhasinkha akhristu atha kucheza ndi Mulungu potula chimwemwe ngakhalenso mavuto awo kwa Mulungu. Iye wati kudzera m’mapemphero akhristu amakhala ndi chiyembekezo chakuti Mulungu angathe kusintha nyengo zowawitsa kukhala nyengo za chimwemwe ndi zokoma. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wati mapemphero ali ndi mphamvu yochotsa mkwiyo m’moyo wa munthu, kulimbitsa chikondi angakhale kuthandiza kubweretsa chiyanjano. Iye wapempha akhristu kuti asamangozipempherera iwo eni kapena okondedwa awo koma kuti azipempherera anthu onse monga adani awo ngakhale anthu omwe sakuwadziwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha Amayi a Parish ya Gambula Apitirize Kuthandiza Radio Maria
news: Pa nthawi ino yomwe dziko lapansi likuvutika ndi matenda a covid-19, nayo Radio Maria Malawi yakhuzidwa kwambiri, makamaka pa nkhani zokhudza njira zake zopezera thandizo loyendetsera wailesiyi. Padakalipano mikumano ya athu ambiri yayimitsidwa ngati njira imodzi yopewera kupatsirana kwa nthendayi zomwe zachititsa kuti wayilesiyi isathenso kupeza ndalama kudzela mu njira zake monga: Mariathona, Thandizani Radio Maria pompopomo komanso misa za promotion. Padakalipano wailesiyi ikulimbikitsa athu akufuna kwabwino kuyithandiza kudzera mu njira zamakono zotumizira ndalama monga kudzera ku Bank, Airtel Money komanso TNM Mpamba.  Mayi Jennipher Likupha omwe ndi wapampando wa bungwe la mayi la mpingo wa katolika la Catholic Women Organization mu parish ya St. Anne –Gambula mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre ndi m’modzi mwa anthu akufuna kwabwino omwe asonyeza chidwi chofuna kuthandiza wayilesiyi. Iwo ati matenda a Covid-19 chisakhale chifukwa cholepheretsa anthu kuthandiza wailesiyi koma imeneyi ikhale nthawi yosonyeza chikondi pothandiza wailesiyi kuti ipirize kugwira nchito yake yofalitsa uthenga wa Ambuye. “Pathawi ino pomwe wailesi yathu njila zake zopezelr ndalama zasokonekera chifukwa cha matenda a covid-19 tiyeni tigwirane manja ndi kusonyeza chikondi chathu poyithandiza wayilesiyi kuti isasiye kutitumikira chifukwa kutero nafe moyo wathu wauzimu ukhozanso kusokonekera,” anatero mayi Likupha. Mwazina iwo ati ayesetsa kulumikizana ndi amayi anzawo omwe alinawo m’ gulu la amayi komanso ndi ena akufuna kwabwino kuti atengepo mbali pothandiza   wailesiyi kuti isasiye kufalitsa mthenga wa Ambuye. Radio Maria Malawi ndi wayilesi yomwe sichita malonda koma kudalira anthu akufuna kwabwino kuti ayithandize kuti ntchito zake ziyende.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Apewe Kumvera Mauthenga M’masamba a Mmchezo pa Intaneti-Ngumuya
news: M’modzi mwa anthu omwe anadwalapo nthenda ya Covid-19 mdziko muno a Allan Ngumuya alangiza anthu kuti adzipita mwansanga ku chipatala akamva zizindikiro za nthendayi. A Ngumuya omwenso ndi phungu wakale wadera la kumwera mu mzinda wa Blantyre anena izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe komiti yowona za mliri wa Covid-19 mdziko muno inachititsa lachiwiri madzulo mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iwo apemphanso anthu kuti apewe kutengeka ndi mauthenga okhudza mliriwu omwe akunenedwa m’masamba a mchezo ponena kuti anthu ena amapanga mauthenga opanda umboni. “Anthu akumafuna kuoneka amzeru pofotokoza zamachitidwe komanso machilitsidwe a Covid-19 ndipo zimenezi ena akupeza nazo mavuto,” anatero a Ngumuya. A Ngumuya ati chofunika kuchita ndikupewa kumvera mauthenga amenewa m’malo mwake kuthamangira kuchipatala muthu ukamva zizindikiro. Poyankhulapo nduna ya zaumoyo mayi Khumbize Kandodo Chiponda omwenso ndi wapampando wa komiti yowona za mliri wa Covid-19 mdziko muno ati anthu ambiri akumapita ku chipatala mochedwa kaamba ka mantha omwe akumadza chifukwa cha mauthenga owopseza a pa masamba a mchezo ndipo ati izi zikuyenera zithe. “Anthu ambiri akumabwera kuchipatala mochedwa ndipo chachikulu ndi mantha omwe akuchokera pa masamba amchezo,” anatero mayi Chiponda. Iwo ati anthu akumatumizirana ma uthenga owospyezana omwe ndiochotsa chiyembekezo komanso chikhulupiriro.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Litilore Kuthandiza Anthu Polimbana ndi COVID-19: Hope Wonderful Drug
news: Akatswiri opanga makhwala azitsamba pa chipatala chomwe sicha boma cha Hope Wonderful Drug apempha boma kuti liwalore kugwira ntchito ndi unduna wa za umoyo polimbana ndi nthenda ya Covid -19. Mlangeni kuwonetsa mankhwala omwe akupanga Wapampando wa chipatalachi a Henry Mlangeni anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati potengera kafukufuku yemwe achita, zasonyeza kuti ali ndi kuthekera kopeza mankhwala ochizira anthu odwala nthendayi ndipo ati ndi kofunika kuti boma liwalore kuyamba kugwira ntchito limodzi ndi unduna wa zaumoyo pa ntchito polimbana ndi nthendayi m’dziko muno. Mankhwalawa akuti amakweza chitetezo cha mthupi “Ganizo lina lomwe tikufuna kuti tibweretse ku boma ndi lonena kuti boma litipatse mwayi tithandizepo, pomwe ifeyo kuno tapanga mankhwala chifukwa mliri wa Covid-19 ndipo mankhwalawo titawayesa tapeza kuti ali ndi kuthekela kochiza matenda amenewa,” anatero a Mlangeni. Iwo apempha boma kuti liwalore kubweretsa mankhwalawa poyera kuti athandize anthu osiyanasiyana omwe akuvutika ndi nthendayi. Padakali pano mankhwalawa sanavomerezedwe ndi boma koma a Mlangeni atsimikiza kuti alibe vuto lililonse pa moyo wa munthu choncho iwo apempha anthu omwe angafune mankhwalawa kuti apite mzipatala zawo zosiyanasiyana zomwe zinakhazikitsidwa mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ubale Wabwino Ungathandize Kuthana Ndi Mavuto Osiyanasiyana Pakati Pa Anthu
news: Kumayambiriro a chaka chilichonse Papa Francisco amakhala ndi mpata wokumana ndi kulankhula kwa a kazembe oyimira mayiko awo ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican pa nkhani zikuluzikulu zokhudza miyoyo ya anthu pa dziko lonse. M’mawu ake kwa a kazembe’wa lolemba, iye wati akukhulupilira kuti polimbikitsa ubale wabwino komanso kubzala chiyembekezo pakati pa anthu, zingathandize kuthana ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana omwe dziko la pansi likukumana nawo. Papa Francisco wati akukhulupirira kuti kusokonekera kwa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu ndi nthenda ina yaikulu yomwe yasautsa dziko la pansi. Pamenepa iye wauza akazembe-wa kuti ndi chifukwa chake waganiza zokacheza m’dziko la Iraq kumayambiliro a mwezi wa mawa pofuna kukalimbikitsa ubale wabwino. Pa nkhani ya mliri wa Coronavirus, Papa Francisco wati mwa njira ina mliriwu waonetsa kufunika kosamalira mphatso ya moyo kuyambira pa chiyambi mpaka kumathero ake mwakufuna kwa Mulungu. Koma iye wati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti ena akunyalanyaza dala posasamala mphatso ya moyo’yi. Papa Francisco wapempha maiko kuti ayetsetse kuti munthu aliyense akhale ndi mwayi wofikira chithandizo cha ku chipatala. Iye walankhulaponso pa za kufunika kosamala chilengedwe kuti mavuto odza kaamba kosasamala chilengedwe monga kusowa kwa chakudya, kusefukira kwa madzi achepe. Papa’yu wakambaponso za kufunika kosamalira anthu othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyanasiyana, za kufunika koti mayiko azitsata ndondomeko zabwino zoyendetsera chuma komanso za kufunika kolimbikitsa ulamuliro wa demokalase m’maiko osiyana-siyana. Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse lomwe ndi dziko loyima pa lokha liri pa ubale wa ukazembe ndi maiko 183 ndipo dziko la Malawi ndi limodzi mwa mayiko amenewa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mnyamata wa Zaka 20 Akumuganizira Kuti Wagwililira Gogo wa Zaka 66
news: Apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu akusunga mchitokosi bambo wa zaka 20 kaamba komuganizira kuti anagwililira gogo wa zaka 66 ku mtsinje wina m’bomalo. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Hastings Chigalu, bamboyu Chifundo Ndala anapalamula mlanduwu pa 28 January chaka chino pomwe gogoyu amachapa mu mtsinje wa Linthethe m’mudzi mwa Kaziputa mdera la mfumu yaikulu Njolomole m’bomalo. Malinga ndi Inspector Chigalu apa ndi pomwe mkuluyu anapezerapo mwayi okakamiza mayiyu kuti agone naye ndipo mwana wamkazi wa gogoyu ndi yemwe anapezelera bamboyu akuchita zadama ndi gogoyu zomwe zinakwiyitsa mwanayu. Mwana wa mayiyu anakanena ku polisi za nkhaniyi ndipo apolisi anadzamanga mkuluyu. Nkhaniyi inalowa mu bwalo la milandu lachisanu pa 5 February 2021 ndipo mkuluyu akuwukana mlanduwu ponena kuti iye sanagwililire gogoyu koma kuti linali pangano lomwe awiriwa anachita ndipo aka kanali kachiwiri kuti agonane. Bamboyu akuyimbidwa mlandu ogwililira omwe ndi osemphana ndi gawo 133 la bukhu loyendetsera milandu mdziko muno. Nkhaniyi ikuyembekezeka kulowanso m’bwalo la milandu pa 12 February 2021. Chifundo Ndala amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kaziputa mdera la mfumu yaikulu Njolomole m’boma lomweo la Ntcheu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Anjata Bambo Wina Kaamba Kofuna Kugwililira Mayi Ake
news: Apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu akusunga mchitokosi bambo wina wa zaka 39 kaamba komuganizira kuti amafuna kugwililira mayi ake omubereka. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Hastings Chigalu, mkuluyu Lisa Master anapalamula mlanduwu pa 9 January chaka chino. Iye wati pomwe gogoyu anapita kumunda mnyamatayu anapeza mayi ake ndi kuyamba kuwavula zovala. Potsatira kuvulidwa zovala-ku, gogoyu anakuwa ndipo anthu omwe amadutsa pa malowa ndi omwe anathandiza gogoyu kuti asachitidwe chipongwe. Apa gogoyu atapulumutsidwa ku chipongwechi, anakanena za nkhaniyi kwa apolisi akumudzi omwe anagwira mnyamatayu ndi kukamusiya ku polisi. Malinga ndi Inspector Chigalu, bamboyu ndi mwana weniweni wa mayiwa ndipo malipoti akusonyeza kuti mwa ana asanu omwe mayiwa ali nawo, ndi bambo yekhayu yemwe mpaka pano sanakwatire. Gogoyu wakhala akudandaula kuti mnyamatayu wakhala akufuna kugona nawo kwa nthawi yaitali koma kuti iwo akhala akukana. Nkhaniyi ikuyembekezeka kulowa mu bwalo la milandu pa 2 March chaka chino. Lisa Master amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kanjati mfumu yaikulu Njolomole m’boma lomwelo la Ntcheu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe La Catholic Christians Online Lathandiza Anthu Aulumali
news: katundu amane waperekedwa Bungwe lina la akhristu a mpingo wa katolika pa makina a intaneti lotchedwa Catholic Christian Online Blantyre Chapter lathandiza anthu a ulumali osiyanasiyana ku Ndirande mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Poyankhulapo pa mwambo wopereka thandizoli, wapampando wa gululi a Trust Nkhoma ati anawona kuti ndi kofunika kutengapo mbali pothandiza anthuwa chifukwa atakayenderako m’mbuyomu, anapeza kuti anthuwa amasowa zambiri pa moyo wawo wa ku thupi. Gulu la Catholic Chritsians Online Pamenepa iwo ati anasonkhanitsa zinthu zosiyanasiyana monga zakudya, sopo osambila ndi ochapila kuphatikizapo zovala ndi zinthu zina zambiri zomwe athandiza nazo anthuwa. “Ntchito zathu ndi zofalitsa uthenga wa uzimu komanso kuthandiza anzathu pa zosowa zawo za kuthupi. Choncho Tinabwera kuno ku Tidzalerana Shelter kuti tidzathandize anzathu a ulumali osiyanasiyana omwe amasamalidwa kuno,” anatero a Nkhoma. M’mawu ake mkulu woyang’anira malo osungirako anthu a ulumali-wa a Frank Overtone Banda anayamikira bungweli kaamba ka thandizoli ponena kuti lafika mu nthawi yake pomwe ali mu nyengo yovuta yosowa zambiri kaamba ka mliri wa COVID-19 omwe wasokoneza zinthu zambiri mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wafa Atawombedwa Ndi Galimoto ku Dedza
news: Bambo wina wafa atawombedwa ndi galimoto pomwe amafuna kuti awoloke nsewu m’boma la Dedza. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sub Inspector Edward Kabango wati bamboyu Elson Kambeta anawombedwa ndi galimotoyi yomwe imayendetsedwa ndi a Cedrick Nkozomba pa malo ena otchedwa Msambiro, madzulo a loweruka lapitali. Bamboyu anamwalira atangofika ku chipatala cha Dedza ndipo malipoti a zachipatala asonyeza kuti bamboyu wafa kaamba kovulala kwambiri m’mutu. Woyendetsa galimotoyi pamodzi ndi okwera anayi sanavulale paliponse. Elson Kambeta amachokera m’mudzi wa June m’dera la mfumu yayikulu M’chiramwera m’boma la Thyolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Gawo Loyamba la Katemera Lifikira Anthu 750 Sauzande
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Lazarus McCathty Chakwera wati gawo loyamba la katemera wa Astrazeneca okwanira 1.5 million yemwe afike mdziko muno kumapeto kwa mwezi uno, akwanira anthu 750,000. A Chakwera anena izi lamulungu usiku pomwe amayankhula ku mtundu wa a Malawi ku nyumba ya chifumu ya Kamuzu mu m’zinda wa Lilongwe. Iwo ati kupatula katemerayu yemwe akuyembekezeka kuteteza munthu ndi mphamvu yokwana 65%, chofunika kwambiri ndi kupewa komanso kutsata njira zonse zomwe unduna wa zaumoyo unakhazikitsa. Chakwera: Sukulu zipitiulirabe kukhala zotseka Iwo ati katemerayu azaperekedwa m’magawo awiri ndipo mphamvu yake ndi yokwanira kuteteza munthu ku kachirombo ka Corona komanso ndi otsika mtengo kuyerekeza ndi katemera wina 7 yemwe dziko lonse lapansi lakonza. A Chakwera ati pomwe sabata yapitayi chiwerengero cha anthu odwala nthendayi chafika pa 2,987 chomwe ndi chotsika kuposa chasabata sabata za m’buyomu, sukulu zikhalabe zotseka sabata zina ziwiri ngakhale kuti njira imeneyi ikupereka chiphinjo kwa mzika zina za dziko lino. Iwo apempha onse omwe sanapezeke ndi nthendayi kukhala mosamala kuti asatenge kachilomboka, komanso athokoza ogwira ntchito za chipatala omwe akugwira nthito yawo molimba mtima ndipo alonjeza kuti komiti yawo yowona za mliri wa Covid-19 ipitiriza ntchito yothandiza a zachipatalawa. Padakali pano chiwerengero cha mabedi m’malo othandizira anthu omwe apezeka ndi kachirombo ka Covid-19 chafika pa 1,100 komanso akweza chiwerengero cha anthu ogwira ntchito zachipatala kufika pa 1,200 ndinso kupereka chitetezo choyenera monga ma zotchinga kukamwa ndi mphuno komanso mankhawala ozitetezera m’manja. Pomaliza a Chakwera athokoza mabungwe onse omwe athandiza pomwe iwo analengeza za kuti dziko lino lili pa ngozi yoopsa masiku 26 apitawo ndipo thandizo lonse lakwana 2.2-billion-kwacha komanso apempha ena kupitiriza kuthandiza kulimbana ndi nkhondoyi. Mwazina achenjeza mabungwe komanso nthambi za boma zomwe zinalandira gawo la chuma chothandizira kulimbana ndi mliriwu chaka chatha zomwe sizinapereke malipoti a m’momwe anayendetsera chuma chawo kuti akapereke pasanaduse masiku awiri kwa komiti yawo yolimbana ndi mliriwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Mavuto a za Ndale M’dziko la Myanmar
news: Iye wanena izi lamulungu polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Papa: Ndili nanu limodzi m’mapemphero  Iye wapempha atsogoleri m’dzikolo kuti aganizire ubwino wa anthu onse ndipo watsimikizira anthu m’dzikolo kuti ali nawo limodzi pa nthawi yovutayi. “Ndili nanu limodzi pa nthawi yovutayi ndipo sindikukuiwalani m’mapemphero anga, ndikupempha kuti atsogoleri a ndale aganizire ubwino wa anthu onse pa nthawiyi polimbikitsa chilungamo ndi umodzi,” anatero Papa Francisco. Iye wawonjezeranso kuti akutsatira ndi chidwi zomwe zikuchitika m’dzikolo maka poganizira kuti adakacheza m’dzikolo m’chaka cha 2017. Pa 1 February 2021 asilikali adalanda boma m’dziko la Myanmar ati posakhutira ndi momwe chisankho chidayendera m’dzikolo mwezi wa November chaka chatha koma bungwe loyendetsa chisankho m’dzikolo lati chisankhocho chidayenda mwa chilungamo. Anthu oposa 160 amangidwa pa ziwonetsero zomwe anthu akhala akuchita zosonyeza kusakondwa kwao ndi zomwe achita asilikali m’dzikolo. Maiko ndi ma bungwe adzudzula zomwe asilikaliwa achita polanda boma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Kasungu Amanga Anthu 231 Kaamba Kophwanya Malamulo Opewera Covid-19
news: Apolisi mchigawo chapakati chakum’mawa kwa dziko lino, amanga anthu 231 powaganizira kuti aphwanya malamulo omwe boma linakhazikitsa opewera mliri wa Covid-19. Malinga ndi Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mchigawochi inspector Harry Namwaza, anthuwa apalamula milandu yosiyanasiyana, monga kuyenda opanda kuvala chotchingira kukamwa ndi mphuno komanso kugulitsa mowa nthawi yosavomerezeka. Inspector Namwaza wati apolisi ali ndi udindo owonetsetsa kuti munthu aliyense akutsatira ndondomeko zomwe boma kudzera ku unduna wa zaumoyo unakhazikitsa pofuna kupewa nthenda ya Covid-19. Iwo ati ntchito yomanga anthu omwe sakutsatira malamulowa akuti ikhala ikupitilira msabatayi ndi cholinga chofuna kuthana ndi onse onyozera lamuloli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Katswiri pa Zaulimi Walangiza Boma Lithane Ndi Njala Mwansanga
news: Sabata zingapo zapitazo mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Lazarus Chakwera adauza bungwe la ADMARC kuti litsitseko mtengo wa chimanga chomwe bungweli likugulitsa kuti anthu akhale ndi mwayi wopeza chakudya mu nthawi ino pomwe mliri wa Covid-19 wasautsa. Polankhulapo pa nkhaniyi m’modzi mwa akatswiri pa nkhani za ulimi mdziko muno Matias Bonongwe wati sakukhutira ndi kutsitsa mtengo wa chimangachi kaamba koti anthu ambiri pano alinso m’mavuto a zachuma omwe sangathenso kugula chimanga chotsika mtengochi. Bonongwe: Anthu ambiri alibe ndalama Bonongwe wati boma limayenera likhazikitse kuti anthu omwe akuzunzika ndi njala azipeza chimanga cha ulere kuti chiwathandize mu nyengoyi. Pa za ndondomeko ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo ya Affordable Input Subsidy Program (AIP), Bonongwe wati ndi zokhumudwitsa kuti ndondomekoyi yakumana ndi mavuto adzaoneni zomwe zasokonezanso ulimi pakati pa alimi ena omwe amadalira zipangizo zotsika mtengozi. “Mpakana panopa madera ambiri sadamalize kugula zipangizo zotsika mtengo ndiye boma likuyenera kuchita chotheka kuti nyengo ya ulimi ikubwerayi adzaike ndalama mwamsanga kuti ikamadzati January kapena February alimi adzakhale amaliza kugula zipangizozi,” anatero Bonongwe. Koma polankhula kwa atolankhani lachinayi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe, nduna ya za ulimi a Lobin Lowe anati pofika pa tsikuli alimi okwana 3, 391, 440 anali atagula zipangizo zawo mwa alimi onse aang’ono-ang’ono okwana 3, 788 105 omwe akuyembekezeka kupindula ndi ndondomekoyi. Pakadali pano, undunawu wati masiku akudzawa utulutsa mulingo wongoyerekeza wa momwe zokolora zikhalire chaka chino koma ati pali chiyembekezo kuti dziko lino likolora zochuluka kuposa chaka chatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kusamalira Odwala Ndi Udindo Wa Mpingo-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wati ndi udindo wa Mpingo kusamalaira anthu odwala onse. Papa wanena izi polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican komanso polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Iye wati udindowu ukudza chifukwa chakuti Yesu Khristu anali ndi chidwi chowonetsetsa kuti odwala achira ku nthenda zosiyana-siyana zomwe anali kuvutika nazo. Papa Francisco wati pamenepa palibenso kuchitira mwina koma kuti Mpingo ukuyenera kupitiriza zomwe Yesu Khristu’yo anali kuchita. Iye wati Uthenga Wabwino wa Yesu Khristu monga adalembera Marko Woyera womwe wawerengedwa pa tsikuli, laMulungu lachisanu mu nyengo ya pa chaka, ukufotokoza umo momwe Yesu Khristu adachizira mpongozi wake wa Simoni ku nthenda ya malungo. Papa Francisco wati monga Yesu Khristu adatumira ophunzira ake kukalalika uthenga wabwino komanso kukachiza anthu ku nthenda zosiyana-siyana, Mpingo lero ukuyenera kuchita chimodzimodzi. Pamenepa iye wakumbutsa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse za tsiku lokumbukira odwala (World Day of the Sick) lomwe ndi pa 11 February, tsiku lomwe adakhazikitsa ndi Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera. Papa Francisco wati udindo wa Mpingo posamalira anthu ndi wofunika kwambiri maka pano pomwe dziko la pansi lakhudzidwa ndi nthenda zosiyana-siyana kuphatikizapo Covid 19. Kameneka kanali koyamba m’sabata zisanu ndi imodzi kuti Papa Francisco alankhule kwa anthu pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican. Zimenezi zili chomwechi potsatira kufewetsedwa kwa mfundo zomwe adazikhazikitsa zothandiza kupewa kufala kwa nthenda ya Covid-19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Gulu la Ntcheu District Initiative Lati Lidzipereka Polimbana ndi COVID-19 M’bomalo
news: Gulu lotchedwa Ntcheu district initiative lapereka chipangizo chosungira mpweya pa chipatala cha boma la Ntcheu kuti chithandizire kwa odwala nthenda ya Covid-19 m’bomali. Poyankhulapo popereka chipangizochi chomwe chikutchedwa oxygen consentrator, m’modzi mwa akuluakulu kuchokera ku gululi a Kingsley Gwaza anati iwo ngati mbadwa zaku Ntcheu anachiona chofunika kuti athandizepo ndi makinawa poganizira ndi momwe nthendayi yakhudzira anthu mdziko muno. Mamembala a gulu la Ntcheu District Initiative kuwonetsa katundu amene apereka pa chipatalacho M’mawu ake mkulu wa zaumoyo m’bomali Dr. Steven Macheso anati ndi okondwa polandira katunduyu yemwe ndi wa mtengo wapatali ndipo anathokoza anthuwa kaamba ka thandizoli. Pomaliza Dr. Stevin Macheso adandaula ndi momwe anthu ena akuchitira pogenda ndi kunyoza ogwira ntchito a zaumoyo makamaka munthu wodwala Covid-19 akamwalira ponena kuti sanamwalire ndi nthendayi. Iwo anati izi zikubwezera m’mbuyo ogwira ntchitowa kaamba koti akumakhala ndi mantha pogwira ntchitoyi. Mlendo wolemekezeka pa mwambo wopereka katunduyu anali inkosi ya makosi Gomani 5 (Ngwenyama) ndipo poyankhulapo mfumuyi inati sibwino kuti ogwira ntchito ku chipatala adzitonzedwa kapena kulandidwa maliro pomwe akugwira ntchito yawo ndipo apempha anthu kuti akuyenera kusintha kaganizidwe ndi kuvomereza kuti mliri wa Covid-19 ulipodi. Kuyambira pomwe mliriwu unayamba mdziko muno, anthu oposa 316 ndi omwe apezeka ndi Coronavirus m’boma la Ntcheu ndipo 92 mwaiwo anachira pamene 218 akanadwalabe ndipo asanu (5) ndi omwe anamwalira Gulu la Ntcheu Initiative kuwonjezera pa kugula chipangizochi chomwe ndi cha ndalama zokwana 4.1 million kwacha, gululi lakwanitsanso kumanga ma ward ena ochilira amayi pa chipatalachi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Katsonga Walimbikitsa Ntchito Yobzala Mitengo Mdera Lake
news: Pamene ntchito yobzala mitengo inakhazikitsidwa ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera mwezi wa December chaka chatha, anthu komanso magulu osiyanasiyana ali kalikiliki kuwonetsetsa kuti madera onse makamaka omwe amatsogoleredwa ndi aphungu aku nyumba ya malamulo maboma onse a mdziko muno akudzalidwa mitengo. Nalo boma la Neno silikusala pa ntchitoyi, ndipo magulu osiyanasiyana mogwirizana ndi ofesi ya za nkhalango ali pa tsogolo ndi ntchitoyi. Poyankhula ndi mkulu owona za nkhalango m’bomali Emmanuel Ngwangwa anati padakali pano magulu onse a m’bomali komanso ena ochokera kunja kwa bomali akutenga nawo gawo lobzala mitengo mogwirizana ndi mafumu komanso atsogoleri aku dera. Katsonga (kumanja) kubzala mtengo wa chitsanzo ndi mkulu wa za nkhalango Gulu limodzi lomwe latenga nawo gawo pa ntchito yosonkhanitsa ndi kudzala mitengo ndi achinyamata omwe ali ndi luso losiyanasiyana mu chipembezo cha chisilamu (Muslim Arts Association) omwe anapereka mitengo ku derali kudzera kwa phungu wa derali Mark Katsonga Phiri pa mwambo omwe unachitika pa malo ochitira malonda a Zalewa mdera la mfumu yayikulu Symon lachisanu pa 5 February, 2021. Pamenepo Ngwangwa anathokoza achinyamatawa kaamba ka thandizoli lomwe akuti labwera pa nthawi yake. Motero Ngwangwa wati ali ndi chikhulupiliro choti madera onse a mafumu akhale ndi nkhalango zawo. “Ife ngati ofesi ya nkhalango tipitiliza kupereka upangiri maka okhudza kasamalidwe ka mitengo komanso kuonetsetsa kuti mitengoyi ikukula mmadera omwe yadzalidwa. “Tikudziwa kuti pali mavuto oti mitengo yambiri ikadzalidwa sipulumuka, imafa ndipo ndi pofunika kuyesetsa kuti tizisamalira mitengoyi,” anatero Ngwangwa.  Ndipo pogwirizana ndi mkulu owona za nkhalangoyi, Katsonga Phiri anati ali ndi chikhumbokhumbo choti derali libwererenso chikale komwe kunali nkhalango yayikulu komanso chilengedwe chabwino. Koma iye wati ali ndi nkhawa kamba ka kuchuluka kwa anthu ambiri omwe akukakamira mchitidwe odula mitengo ndi kuotcha makala kamba ka mavuto a umphawi. “Ndikanakondwa boma likanathandiza anthuwa kamba koti amachita izi chifukwa cha umphawi komanso palibe chinthu chomwe chingalowe m’malo mwa zomwe akuchitazi. Ngati atsogoleri timayetsetsa kupempha kuti aleke izi, koma kungotero kumawonekanso ngati nkhanza,” anadandaula motero Katsonga. Naye wapampando wa gulu la achinyamatawa Nordin Cassimu anati gulu lawo linali lokondwa kuthandiza anthu amderali ndi mbande za mitengozi kamba koti zithandiza achinyamata amderali kudziwa zakufunika kwa mitengo komanso kutenga nawo gawo lodzala mitengo mmadera awo. Padakali pano gululi lati likufuna lilimbikitse ntchito zomwe zingawapatse achinyamata zochita komanso kuphunzitsa anthu kuti chipembezo cha chisilamu chimalimbikitsa kusamala chilengedwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Aliyense Adzakhala Ndi Ufulu Wosankha Kubayidwa Katemera Kapena Ayi-Dr Chisema
news: Mkulu owona za katemera ku unduna wa za Umoyo Dr. Mike Chisema ati nkhani yolandira thandizo la chipatala monga katemera komanso mankhwala ena siyimakhala yokakamiza koma kuti munthu payekha amatha kuchita chiganizo molingana ndi momwe zinthu zilili. Polankhula lachisanu mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pa msonkhano wa atolankhani wa komiti ya mtsogoleri wa dziko yoona za Covid-19, Dr. Chisema anati katemelayu akabwera m’dziko muno aliyense adzachita chisankho yekha. Dr. Chisema ati alimbikitsa anthu kuti akhale ndi chidwi chovomera katemelayu kamba koti ndi njira yokhayo yomwe ingathandize koposa kuchepetsa chiwopsezo cha kachirombo ka corona m’dziko muno. “Mbuyo monse momwe takhala tikupereka katemera osiyanasiyana sitinayambe takuma ndi zolankhula zomwe tikukumana nazozi koma ife sizikutidetsa nkhawa pomwe aliyense ali ndi udindo olamulira thupi lake,” anatero Dr. Chisema. Iwo ati aliyense adzapatsidwa ufulu wosankha kubayidwa katemera kapena ayi kaamba koti achipatala amapereka ubwino wa chinthu asanamupatse munthu thandizo. Padakali pano maola 24 apitawo, anthu okwana 497 ndi omwe achira ku matenda a Covid-19 pomwe anthu atsopano okwana 476 ndi omwe apezeka ndi kachirombo ka corona mwa anthu 2649 omwe anayezedwa mu nthawiyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la MANEB Layamba Kulemba Ophunzira Olemba Mayeso a Boma pa Makina a Intaneti
news: Unduna wa zamaphunziro mogwirizana ndi bungwe la Malawi National Examination Board (MANEB), layamba ntchito yolemba ophunzira a kalasi za mayeso a boma mongoyeselera kudzera pa makina a internet. Bungweli lati liyamba kuyesera kulemba ophunzira a kalasi za mayeso a Pulayimale, Fomu 2 ndi Fomu 4 a chaka chino ndi sukulu zonse za boma la Zomba, ntchitoyi isanayambe m’sukulu za m’maboma ena onse m’dziko muno. Ndondomeko zonse zolemba mayina a omwe adzalembe nawo mayeso a PSLE, JCE ndi MSCE a chaka cha 2021 akuti zichitika kudzera pa makina omwewa a internet. Mneneri wa bungweli a Mayamiko Chiwaya ati kuyeseraku kuyambira ndi boma la Zomba kuti awunikire ndi kukonza zolakwika zimene ndondomekoyi ingakumane nazo. “Ife a bungwe la MANEB mogwirizana ndi Unduna wa Zamaphunziro tatulutsa chikalata chimene chikufotokoza kuti tikufuna tiyeselere njira yolemba ophunzira kudzera pa intaneti. Ophunzira amene amalemba mayeso a boma a pilayimale, JCE, ndi MSCE, ndipo njira imeneyi tikuyeselera koyamba m’chaka chino cha 2021, koma tiyesera boma limodzi kaye, Zomba, kuti tithe kuona zovuta zimene zingakhalepo tikaona kuti pali zovuta zina ndi zina zimenezo tidzathana nazo kuti mtsogolo muno njira imeneyi ifalikire dziko lonse,” anatero a Chiwaya. Pofuna kukwaniritsa ndondomekoyi, bungweli lati liwonetsetsa kuti lapereka upangiri ndi zonse zoyenera ku mbali zokhuzidwa ndi ntchitoyi ndipo ati aperekanso maphunziro a ndondomekoyi ku sukulu zonse za m’boma la Zomba. Padakali pano sukulu zina zonse zolemberako mayeso zipitiriza kulemba mayina a ophunzira omwe adzalembe nawo mayeso chaka chinowa kuyambira mwezi uno wa Februarypogwiritsa ntchito njira yomwe ilipo padakalipano.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walandira Gawo Lachiwiri la Katemera Wa Covid-19
news: Patapita masabata atatu kuchokera pomwe likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse (Vatican) lidatsimikiza kuti Papa Francisco limodzi ndi Papa wopuma Benedicto wa 16 adalandira gawo loyamba la katemera wa Covid-19, zadziwika kuti lachisanu pa 5 February 2021 awiriwa alandira gawo lachiwiri komanso lotsiriza la katemerayu. Polankhula ndi wayilesi ya kanema ya Canale 5 ya m’dziko la Italy kumayambiriro kwa mwezi wa January, Papa Francisco adati ndi chinthu chabwino kulandira katemerayu ndipo adati ndi chikhulupiliro chake kuti anthu ambiri alandira katemerayu pofuna kuteteza miyoyo yawo komanso miyoyo ya anthu ena. Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika lomwe ndi dziko loyima palokha lidayamba kupereka katemera wa Pfizer-BioNtech mu holo ya Papa Paulo wa 6 pa 13 January 2021 kwa nzika zake pafupi 800 komanso kwa ogwira ntchito ake pafupi 4000 ndi mabanja awo. Dziko la Malawi likuyembekeza kulandira katemera wa nthenda ya Covid-19 ku mapeto a mwezi uno wa February. Bungwe la ma Episcope’li lapedza kale zipangizo monga ma ventilators komanso ma oxygen concentrator zoti zigwiritsidwe ntchito mmalo osungira odwala matendawa komabe iwo akupempha zipangizo zina monga mankhwala, zipangizo zozitetezera pothandiza odwala (PPE) thandizo la zachuma kungotchulapo zochepa. Iwo ati thandizoli lidzagwiritsidwa ntchito moyenera kudzera ku nthambi yowona zaumoyo mu mpingowu la Catholic Health Commission.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Anthu a Luso la Mayimbidwe Aziwunikiridwa Ndi Mawu a Mulungu
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati anthu a luso lopeka komanso kuyimba nyimbo mu Mpingowu akuyenera kumawunikiridwa ndi mawu a Mulungu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wanena izi mu uthenga wake wa pa kanema wopita kwa nthumwi za ku msonkhano wa anthu a luso lopeka komanso kuyimba nyimbo mu Mpingo wa Katolika. Iye wati anthu opeka ndi kuyimba nyimbo akuyenera kumawunikiridwa ndi Mawu a Mulungu nthawi zonse ponena kuti luso la anthuwa ndi lothandiza anthu kupemphera bwino pa miyambo yosiyanasiyana ya mapemphero komanso iye wati nyimbo zimathandiza kufalitsa uthenga wabwino. Iye wati anthu opeka ndi kuyimba nyimbo lero akuyenera kumawunikiridwa ndi Mawu a Mulungu popeza kuyambira kalekale Mawu a Mulungu opezeka mu Baibulo akhala akuwunikira anthu opeka ndi kuyimba nyimbo mu Mpingowu. Papa Francisco wati kufunikira kwa nyimbozi ndikosachita kufuna kutambasula popeza kuyambira kalekale nyimbo za Mpingowu zakhala zikuyimbidwa pa miyambo ya chipembedzo, pa ma phwando a nyimbo (choir festivals), m’sukulu ngakhalenso pa nthawi ya ma maphunziro a Katikisimu. Mu uthengawu Papa Francisco wadandaula kuti luso la anthu opeka ndi kuyimba nyimbo lapsinjika chiyambireni mliri wa coronavirus komabe iye wati ali ndi chikhulupiriro kuti sikale kwambiri zinthu zibwererenso m’chimake monga kale. Msonkhano wa masiku awiriwu womwe ndi wa chinayi kuchitika wakonzedwa ndi bungwe la a Papa lowona za chikhalidwe (Pontifical Council for Culture) mogwirizana ndi Pontifical Institute of Sacred Music komanso Pontifical Liturgical Institute of Saint Anselm.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Eni Sukulu Zomwe si za Boma Adandaula Ndi Kupitilira Kutsekedwa Kwa Sukulu
news: Lachinayi sabata ino boma lalengeza kuti sukulu zonse zikhalabe zotseka kwa sabata zina ziwiri ati pofuna kuwonabe momwe chiwopsezo cha mliri wa Covid-19 chiliri m’dziko muno. Kutsekaku kukutsatira kutseka kwina komwe mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Lazarus Chakwera adalamula pa 17 January chaka chino kuti sukulu zonse zitsekedwe kwa sabata zitatu pofuna kupewa kufala kwa kachirombo ka Corona. Wapampando wa komiti ya mtsogoleri wa dziko lino yowona za mliri wa Covid-19, mayi Khumbize Kandodo Chiponda omwenso ndi nduna ya za umoyo anauza atolankhani lachinayi ku Lilongwe kuti pano pomwe chiwerengero cha anthu odwala Covid-19 chikukulabe mdziko muno sikoyenera kuti sukuluzi zitsekulidwe koma kudikira kaye mpaka atawona momwe chiwerengerochi chikhalire m’sabata ziwirizi zikudzazi. Zimenezi sizidasangalatse eni sukulu zomwe si zaboma ponena kuti boma likulephera kupanga ziganizo zoyenera pa momwe mliriwu uliri m’dziko muno. President wa bungwe la eni sukulu zomwe si za boma la Independent Schools Asssociation of Malawi (ISAMA) Joseph Patel wati ndi okhumudwa ndi ganizo la bomali ponena kuti zibwezera mmbuyo kwambiri ntchito za maphunziro mdziko muno. Iye wati akuona kuti ndio kotheka kupewa mliriwu msukuluzi maka potsatira ndondomeko zomwe zidayikidwa koma boma likuyang’ana mbali imodzi yokha pa izi. Naye katswiri pa za maphnziro Steve Shara wati boma lizibwera poyera pa momwe likuchitira popanga ziganizo monga izi ndipo wati ndi odabwa kuti boma layang’anira chani kuto lifike poonjezeranso nthawi yomwe sukuluzi zikhale zotseka. Chaka chatha sukulu zidakhalanso zotseka kuyambira mmwezi wa March mpaka September kamba ka chiopsezo cha kufala kwa mliri wa Covid 19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Migodi Ili Ndi Kuthekera Kokweza Chuma Cha Dziko Lino-MEJN
news: Bungwe la Malawi Economic Justice Network (MEJN) lati ntchito za migodi zili ndi kuthekera kokweza chuma cha dziko lino. Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za bungweli mchigawo chakumwera a Mike Marvin Banda ndi omwe anena izi m’boma la Mangochi pa mkumano wawo ndi mabungwe omwe ali pansi pa bungweli m’bomalo pamene amafotokozera za kuyimitsidwa kwa project ya zaka zisanu yomwe imayembekezeka kugwiridwa m’bomalo pa ntchito yolimbana ndi kusiyana komwe kulipo pakati pa anthu olemera ndi osauka. Iwo ati project-yi yatha mwadzidzidzi kutsatira kulumikizana kwa mabungwe a Norwegian Church Aid komanso Danish Church Aid omwe amathandiza bungweli ndipo tsopano ayamba project ina yomwe iyike chidwi chake kwambiri pa nkhani za migodi. “Poyamba timathandizidwa ndi bungwe la NCA ndiye kutsatira kuti bungweli lalumikizana ndi bungwe la DCA zochitikanso zasintha mu project yathu yomwe timapanga kuno ku Mangochi. Tasintha madera omwe ifikire komanso zinthu zomwe tikhale tikuyika chidwi chathu kwambiri chifukwa pano tikhala tikuwona kwambiri nkhani zokhudza migodi,” anatero a Banda. Iwo ati mu ndondomeko ya tsopanoyi yomwe ikhale ya zaka za pakati pa zitatu ndi zisanu, akhala akudziwitsa anthu maufulu awo pa nkhani za migodi, malamulo oyendetsera ntchito za migodi mdziko muno komanso nkhani zokhudza zitukuko zosiyansaiyana zomwe kampani za migodi zimayenera kuchita m’madera omwe zikugwira ntchito zawo. A Banda ati ngakhale ntchito za migodi zikuyamba kumene mdziko muno, zili ndi kuthekera kokweza chuma cha dziko lino ngati zitayendetsedwa bwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kampani Yopanga Cement Yapereka 5 Million Yothandizira Polimbana Ndi COVID-19 ku Mangochi
news: Kampani yopanga cement mdziko muno ya Cement Products Limited yapereka ndalama zokwana 5-million-kwacha ku khonsolo ya boma la Mangochi kuti ithandizire pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliri wa COVID-19 m’bomalo. Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za kampaniyi a Humphrey Mkalo ati achita izi pozindikira kuti kampaniyi yomwe ili m’boma la Mangochi, antchito akenso ambiri ndi okhala m’bomali choncho ndi kofunika kuteteza anthuwa pamodzi ndi mabanja awo ku mliriwu. Iwo ati akuyembekezera kuti ndalamayi igwira ntchito yoyenera poteteza anthu a m’bomali ku mliriwu. Piringu: Mabungwe akutisuntha “Antchito anthu alipo oposa 500 ndipo ambiri mwa iwo ndi okhala m’boma lino la Mangochi choncho tikukhulupilira kuti chithandizochi chifikira antchito athuwo ndi achibale awo. Ife tikukhulupilira kuti antchito a thanzi ndi amene angathandize kuti kampani yathunso itukuke ndi kumapeza phindu,” anatero a Mkalo. M’mawu ake, bwanamkubwa wa boma la Mangochi, Dr. Raphael Piringu ati thandizoli lafika mu nthawi yake pamene khonsoloyi ikukumana ndi mavuto a zachuma polimbana ndi mliriwu. “Boma likutithandiza koma chifukwa cha kuchuluka zochita pa mliriwu ndiye zikuvuta. Timafunika 600 million kuti tikwanitse kuthana ndi mliriwu koma ndalamayi siyikukwana. Choncho akamabwera mabungwe ndi makampani chonchi zikutisuntha kwambiri,” anatero Dr. Piringu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Anthu Akuyenera Kukhala Odekha
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati anthu oyitanidwa ndi kuperekedwa mwapadera ku Mpingo akuyenera kukhala anthu odekha. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, 2 February chaka chilichonse ndi chaka cha kuperekedwa kwa Ambuye Yesu ku tempile (Feast of the Presentation of the Lord) ndipo pa tsikuli Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse umakumbukira onse oyitanidwa ndi kuperekedwa mwapadera ku Mpingo (World Day of Consecrated Life). Polankhula pa Misa ya chakachi Papa Francisco wati anthu oyitanidwa ndi kuperekedwa mwapadera ku Mpingo akuyenera kukhala anthu odekha ndipo odziwa kupilira mu utumiki wawo. Iye wati Simeoni ndi chitsanzo cha munthu yemwe anadikirira modekha kubwera kwa Ambuye Yesu ndipo khumbo lake lidakwaniritsidwa pa tsiku lomwe adaona Ambuye Yesu mu tempile ndipo Papa’yu waonjezeranso kuti Simeoni adaona mwa Ambuye Yesu kuwala kowalira anthu omwe anali mu m’dima. Papa Francisco wati Mulungu ndi wodekha popeza nthawi zonse iye amadikilira ana ake kuti alape ndi kutembenuka mtima. Iye sadaiwale kupempha ansembe, asisitere ndi a bulazala kuti apewe miseche pakati pawo khalidwe lomwe iye wati limaononga ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu ndipo m’malo mwake Papa Francisco wapempha atumikiwa kuti aphunzire kucheza komanso kuseka ndi anzao. Tsiku lokumbukira onse oitanidwa ndi kuperekedwa mwa padera ku Mpingo (World Day of Consecrated Life) adayambitsa ndi Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera m’chaka cha 1997.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Kankhono a Dayosizi ya Zomba Amwalira
news: Likulu la mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno lalengeza za imfa ya bambo Mcdonald Kankhono omwe amatumikira mu dayosizi ya Zomba. Malemu bambo Kankhono Malinga ndi kalata yomwe yasayinidwa ndi mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (Ecm) bambo Henry Saindi, bambo Kankhono amwalira lero ku chipatala cha Zomba Central komwe angonekedwa dzulo atadwala nthenda ya Covid-19. Iwo amwalira akutumikira ngati bambo mfumu ku parish ya Thondwe mu dayosiziyo. Iwo anali lawyer wa dayosizi ya Zomba komanso mphunzitsi ku seminale ya St. Peters. M’mbuyomu bambo Kankhono anakhala po Vicar General wa dayosizi ya Zomba. Mwambo woyika m’manda thupi la malemu bambo Kankhono uchitika mawa ku manda a ansembe ku Zomba Cathedral ndipo mwambo onse udzayamba ndi nsembe ya misa nthawi ya half past 8 m’mawa yomwe idzayambe popanda thupi la malemuwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Thupi la Malemu Bambo Giuseppe Giannini Lalowa M’manda
news: Thupi la malemu bambo a Giuseppe Gianini chipani cha Comboni layikidwa m’manda lero ku manda a ansembe ku Limbe Cathedral mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre. Malemu bambo Giannini Vicar General wa arkidayosiziyi, monsignor Boniface Tamani ndi omwe atsogolera mwambo wotsanzikana ndi malemuwa. Bambo Giannini amwalira dzulo ku chipatala cha Nguludi m’boma la Chiradzulu komwe anagonekedwa lachisanu lapitali atadwala nthenda ya Covid-19. Kufikira nthawi ya imfa yawo iwo amatumikira ngati bambo mthandizi ku parishi ya Lisungwi mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre. Mzimu wa bambo Giuseppe Gianini uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la CADECOM Lapereka Zipangizo Zolimbana ndi COVID-19 ku Chipatala cha Boma la Mangochi
news: Bungwe la Catholic Development Comission of Malawi (CADECOM) mu dayosizi ya Mangochi, lapereka zipangizo zosiyanasiyana zothandizira polimbana ndi nthenda ya Covid-19 pa chipatala cha boma la Mangochi. Malinga ndi mkulu oyan’ganira ntchito za umoyo komanso chitukuko mu dayosizi ya Mangochi bambo Ted Chigamba, bungweli lapereka thandizoli ngati njira imodzi yofuna kuchepetsa kukula kwa chiwerengero cha anthu odwala nthenda ya Covid-19. Akuluakulu a bungwe la CADECOM kupereka katundu kwa bwanamkubwa wa boma la Mangochi Iwo ayamikira bungwe la Save the Children komanso Trocaire popereka thandizo la katunduyi ku bungweli ndipo apempha anthu osiyanasiyana omwe apindule ndi thandizoli kuti agwiritse ntchito moyenera. Katunduyu yemwe ndi zipangizo zoyezera nthendayi, mankhwala a chlorine, zotchinga kukamwa ndi mphuno, sopo ndi zina zambiri, ndi za ndalama zokwana 19 million kwacha. Polankhula pa mwambo opereka thandizoli mkulu oyang’anira nthambi zachitukuko mu dayosizi ya Mangochi bambo Ted Chigamba ati bungweli lapereka thandizoli poyang’anira kuti mpingo umathandiza anthu kuti akule ku uzimu komanso ku thupi ndipo ati akukhulupilira kuti katunduyu agwira ntchito yake moyenera. Wina mwa katundu yemwe waperekedwa Poyankhula atalandira thandizoli, bwanamkubwa wa boma la Mangochi a Raphael Piringu anayamikira bungweli kaamba kokhala ndi ganizo lopereka thandizoli m’malo omwe mumakumana anthu ambiri monga m’sukulu, m’misika komanso mzipatala kaamba koti ndi awa ndi malo omwe kachilomboka kakumafala kwambiri. Mkulu owona zachipatala m’boma la Mangochi a Chimwemwe Thambo ati thandizo lomwe laperekedwali ndi lofunika kwambiri polimbana ndi kachirombo ka Corona ndipo ati awonetsetsa kuti katunduyi agwire ntchito yake moyenera. Kudzera mu project yotchedwa kuthandiza maboma ndi madera omwe ali pa chiwopsezo m’Malawi kupewa, kuzindikira mwachangu ndi kuchitapo kanthu pa matenda a Covid-19, bungwe la CADECOM lapereka katunduyi ndi thandizo la ndalama zochokera ku European Union (EU) kudzera ku bungwe la Trocaire.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Giuseppe Giannini a Chipani cha Comboni Amwalira
news: Likulu la mpingo wa katolika lalengeza za imfa ya bambo Giuseppe Giannini a chipani cha Comboni. Malemu bambo Giannini Malinga ndi kalata yomwe yasayinidwa ndi mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) bambo Henry Saindi, bambo Giannini amwalira lero ku chipatala cha nguludi m’boma la Chiradzulu komwe anagonekedwa lachisanu lapitali atadwala nthenda ya COVID-19. Kufikira nthawi ya imfa yawo iwo amatumikira ngati bamboo mthandizi ku parishi ya Lisungwi mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre. Mwambo woyika m’manda thupi la bambo Giannini uchitika lachitatu pa 3 February ku manda a ansembe ku Limbe Cathedral mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre ndipo mwambo udzayamba nthawi ya 9 koloko m’mawa popanda thupilo. Mzimu wa bambo Giuseppe Giannini uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la CMO ku Blantyre Lakhazikitsa Nsalu
news: Nsalu yatsopano ya bungwe la CMO mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre Arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yati kupangidwa kwa nsalu yomwe abambo a mu mpingowu adzivala kuthandizira abambowa kuzindikira udindo wawo potumikira mabanja awo komanso Mpingo. Mkulu woyang’anira chuma mu arkidayosiziyi bambo Davison Salamba alankhula izi ku nyumba ya arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosiziyi ku CI pambuyo pa mwambo wodalitsa nsalu yomwe yakazikitsidwa ndi bungweli mu arkidayosiziyi kuti azigwiritsa ntchito ngati makaka awo. Bambo Salamba ati kugwiritsa ntchito kwa nsaluyi kuthandiza kuti abambowa azindikire udindo wawo posamalira mabanja awo komanso chitukuko cha mpingowu posatira nkhoswe yawo yemwe ndi Yosefe Woyera. Akulu akulu a bungwe la abambo mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yakuwonetsa nsalu yawo “Nsaluyi abambowa agula ndipo asoketsa zovala zosiyanasiyana koma monga tikudziwira nsalu za mpingo zimasiyana ndi zina zonse chifukwa zimenezi zimalalika uthenga wapadera choncho mkofunika kuti abambowa pomwe akugwiritsa ntchito Nsaluyi azindikire kuti tsopano akutumidwa kuti akhale zida zenizeni kuyambira Ku mabanja awo angakhalenso Ku mpingo kumene,” anatero bambo Salamba. Pamenepa iwo ati akuyembekezera kuti nsaluyi ipitiriza kupereka uthenga m’madayosizi osiyanasiyana zomwe zithandizire kubalalitsa uthenga wa Yesu Khristu ponseponse ndi cholinga choti abambo ambiri amutumikire koposa kale kudzera m’bungweli kwinaku akusamala mabanja awo moyenera. Bambowa atsindikanso kuti arkidayosiziyi ndi yokonzeka kuthandizira abambowa kuti bungweli likhale ndi mizu yolimba mu Mpingowu. Mmawu ake wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa bungweli mu arkidayosiziyi a Kelvin Chifunda ati ndi okondwa kuti loto lawo lofuna kukhala ndi nsalu yomwe abambowa azigwiritsa ntchito lakwaniritsidwa pomwe tsopano yadalitsidwa. “Tinayetsesa kupeza Ndalama ndikupangitsa nsaluyi ndipo pano pomwe yadalitsidwa tikupempha abambo onse ochokera Ku maparish onse 43 kuti agule nsaluyi ndi cholinga choti tithe kubweza ndalama yomwe tinabwereka kuti tipangire nsaluyi,” anatero a Chifunda. A Chifunda ati nsaluyi ndi yomwe idzagwiritsidwe pa mwambo wokhazikitsa bungweli mu arkidayosiziyi omwe ukuyembekezeka kudzachitika pa 1 May, 2021 pomwe pazakhalenso kukhazikitsa bukhu la malamulo oyendetsera bungweli (Constitution).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Thupi la Bambo Chipalamwazani Layikidwa M’manda
news: Mwambo oyika m’manda thupi la malemu bambo Cyprian Chipalamwazani wachitika lero ku manda a ansembe ku Likuni mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Malemu bambo Chipalamwazani anamwalira loweruka pa 30 January ku chipatala cha Bwaila mu mzinda wa Lilongwe atadwala kwa nthawi yaitali. Poyankhula pa mwambo woyika m’manda thupi la malemu bambo Chipalamwazani, mkulu oyendetsa ntchito za arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, Monsignor Patrick Thawale ati akhristu akuyenera kukhala ndi chikhulupiliro kuti imfa ndi chiyambi cha moyo wina ndipo akuyenera kumasinkhasinkha za moyo wa kumwamba omwe ndi wokhalitsa kuposa moyo wapansi pano. “Tasonkhana pano ngati anthu amene timakhulupilira kuti imfa ndi chiyambi cha moyo wina ndipo chikhulupiliro chimenechi ndi chimene chimatilimbitsa mtima,” anatero Monsingnor Thawale. Bambo Chipalamwazani anali ochoker mmudzi mwa Phereni m’boma la Lilongwe ndipo iwo anabadwa pa 26 July mchaka cha 1966. Iwo anadzodzedwa unsembe mchaka cha 1993. Kufikira nthawi ya imfa yawo, bambo Chipalamwazani amatumikira ku parishi ya St. Matias ku Lumbadzi mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe komanso anali mlangizi wa bungwe la amayi komanso mlangizi wa bungwe la mabanja mu arkidayosiziyo. Mzimu wa bambo Cyprian Chipalamwazani uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadzudzula Mchitidwe wa Nkhaza Kwa Amayi
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wadzudzula m’chitidwe wa nkhanza kwa amayi. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, mwezi uno wa February cholinga cha mapemphero a Papa ndi kupempherera amayi onse omwe akuchitiridwa nkhanza zosiyana-siyana kuti atetezedwe ku nkhanzazi ndipo kuti madandaulo awo azimveka kwa adindo osiyana-siyana. Mu uthenga wake wa pa kanema wopita ku dziko lonse mogwirizana ndi cholinga cha mapemphero ake mwezi uno, Papa Francisco wadzudzula kotheratu khalidwe lochitira nkhanza amayi ponena kuti uku ndi kunyazitsa ulemerero omwe amayi ali nawo ngati anthu. Pamenepa iye watsindika za kufunika koteteza amayi ku nkhanza zosiyana-siyana ndipo kuti adindo achitepo kanthu powonetsetsa kuti m’chitidwe oterewu utheretu. Kafukufuku wa chaka chatha wa United Nations Women anapeza kuti,  amayi 137 amaphedwa tsiku lililonse pa dziko lonse komanso amayi’wa amachitidwa nkhanza zina monga kugonedwa mokakamiza, kuzembetsedwa (human trafficking) pongotchula mavuto ochepa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: COVID-19 Wavumbulutsa Kulowa Pansi Kwa Ntchito Zaumoyo Mdziko Muno-Nduna
news: Boma lati mliri wa Covid-19 wavumbulutsa kusowekera kwa thandizo labwino la chipatala lomwe mzika za dziko lino zikuyenera kumalandira. Nduna ya za umoyo mayi Khumbize Kandodo Chiponda anena izi lolemba madzulo mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pa msonkhano wa atolankhani wa komiti yowona za Covid-19. Chiponda: Pakufunika chipatala chamakono Mayi Chiponda omwenso ndi wapampando wa komitiyi ati mliriwu wawatsekula maso ngati boma, kuti akhwimitse ntchito za umoyo zomwe ngakhale akuluakulu a boma atha kumapitako kukapeza thandizo, limodzi ndi anthu ena onse. “Pakufunika chipatala chachikulu komanso chabwino chakuti ngakhaale a president, nduna kapena aphungu akadwala azipita ku chipatala chomwecho,” anatero mayi Chiponda. Iwo ati ndi kofunika tsopano kuwunikira kuti ntchito zaumoyo ziyenda motani kutsogoloku ngakhale mliri wa COVID-19 utatha. Malinga ndi unduna wa za umoyo, anthu omwe apezeka ndi coronavirus m’maola 24 apitawo alipo 402 pomwe anthu 330 achira ku Covid-19 ndi anthu ena 10 amwalira. Pakadali pano anthu okwana 14, 498 ndi omwe akudwalabe nthendayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wakhazikitsa Tsiku Lokumbukira Anthu Achikulire
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wakhazikitsa tsiku loganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, masana a tsiku lamulungu lachinayi mu nyengo ya pa chaka Papa walengeza kuti wakhazikitsa tsiku loganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba lodziwika mchingerezi kuti World Day for Grandparents and the Elderly. Iye wati mpingo wa katolika uziganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba lamulungu lachinayi la mwezi wa July chaka chilichonse ndipo chaka chino tsikuli lilipo pa 25 July. Papa Francisco wati waganiza zokhazikitsa tsikuli kaamba koti kawiri-kawiri akuluakulu amayiwalidwa ngakhale kuti iwo ndi kasupe wa luntha. Iye waonjezeranso kuti ukalamba ndi madalitso aakulu ochokera kwa Mulungu kotero ndi koyenera kumakumbukira ndi kulemekeza anthu achikulire ndi okalamba. Lamulungu lachinayi la mwezi wa July lomwe mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse uziganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba ndi tsiku lomwe liri pafupi ndi chaka cha Joachim ndi Anna Oyera omwe ndi agogo ake a Yesu Khristu. Pa 25 July 2021 Papa Francisco adzatsogolera Misa yapadera ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican ngati chiyambi cha tsiku loganizira anthu achikulire ndi okalamba pa dziko lonse. M’maiko ambiri kuphatikizapo dziko la Malawi anthu achikulire ndi okalamba amakumana ndi mavuto osiyana-siyana monga kusowa chakudya, zovala, malo ogona abwino komanso kuganiziridwa zinthu zosakhala bwino pongotchula mavuto ochepa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Maepiskopi Akuchita Msonkhano Kudzera pa Makina a Internet
news: Maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika m’dziko muno lero ayamba msonkhano wawo woyamba m’chakachi ndipo udzatha lachitatu pa 3 mwezi uno. Malingana ndi chikalata chomwe bungwe la maepiskopi–wa la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) latulutsa ndip chasayinidwa ndi mlembi wa wamkulu wa bungwe-li bambo Henery Saindi, msonkhano-wu akuwuchita kudzera pa makina Internet kaamba ka mliri wa COVID-19. Nthumwi ya a Papa m’maiko a Malawi ndi Zambia komanso atsogoleri oyimira mabungwe ndi nthambi zina zopedzeka mu mpingo-wu atenga nawo mbari pa msonkhano-wu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Asisteri a Chipani cha Divine Providence Atsekulira Chipatala cha St. Mary’s M’boma la Mangochi
news: Ofesi yowona za umoyo m’boma la Mangochi yayamikira mpingo wa katolika kamba kotsekula chipatala china chomwe chilinso ndi chipinda chapadera chothandizra anthu omwe akusowa kuwachita Operation m’bomalo. Mkulu owona za chipatala m’bomalo a Chimwemwe Thambo anena izi pa mwambo wotsekulira chipatalachi chomwe chidziyendetsedwa ndi asisteri a chipani cha Divine Providence. Chipatalachi chamangidwa m’mudzi mwa Changamire m’dera la mfumu yayikulu Chimwala m’boma la Mangochi ndipo chikupezeka malo a kufupi ndi sukulu ya ukachenjede ya DMI m’bomalo. A Thambo ati ofesi yawo kudzera mu unduna wa za umoyo ndi yokondwa kwambiri ndi kutsekulidwa kwa chipatalachi, kaamba koti chikhala chipatala choyamba choyima pachokha kukhala ndi chipinda chochitira anthu ma operation m’bomalo. Polankhula m’malo mwa episkopi wa mpingo wa katolika mu dayosizi ya Mangochi, Vicar General wa dayosizi–yi bambo Frank Chingale anati mpingo upitiriza kudzipereka pa ntchito zopereka chisamaliro chabwino monga momwe Ambuye Yesu anali kuchitira. Polankhulanso m’modzi mwa akuluakulu mu chipani cha Divine Providence omwe aziyendetsa ntchito za pachipatalachi Sister Agness ayamikira onse omwe achitapo kanthu pa ntchito za chitukuko cha chipatalachi. Ena mwa akulu-akulu omwe anafika ku mwambo-wu ndi monga aku ofesi yowona za umoyo mu mpingo-wu, oyimira khonsolo ya boma la Mangochi, mafumu ndi ena ambiri. Chipatala chatsopano cha St. Mary’s chomwe chatsekulidwa mu dayosizi ya Mangochi chikhala cha nambala 20 kutsekulidwa mu dayosiziyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Katemera Afika Mdziko Muno Mwezi wa February-Chakwera
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera walengeza kuti katemera wa Covid-19 afika m’dziko muno kumapeto a mwezi uno. Dr. Chakwera anena izi lamulungu madzulo ku nyumba ya chifumu pomwe amalankhula kwa anthu m’dziko muno. Iwo ati katemerayu akuyembekezeka kudzaperekedwa kwa anthu m’mwezi wa March ndipo anthu achikulire komanso omwe ali ndi matenda ena ndi omwe adzakhale oyambilira kulandira katemerayu. Dr. Chakwera anati katemerayu yemwe akutchedwa Astra-Zeneca adzayamba kuperekedwa kwa anthu okwana 20 mwa100 aliwonse pa chiwerengeo cha anthu onse m’dziko muno.
