Iwo anati akatswiri odziwa za sayansi adzawunika mozama katemerayu akafika asadayambe kuperekedwa kwa anthu ndipo kuti uthenga okhudza zomwe adzapeze pambuyo pa kuwunikaku adzaupereka ku dziko. Dr. Chakwera anati cholinga chochitira izi ndi kufuna kuchotsa mantha komanso nkhawa zomwe anthu ena ali nazo pa katemerayu. Mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu wati ndi okhumudwa kuti m’madera ena anthu akumasonkhanabe monga kale kukachitika maliro mosatsatira ndondomeko zina zopewera kufala kwa Coronavirus monga kuvala ma mask komanso kukhala motalikirana zomwe ati zikuyikabe pachiwopsezo miyoyo ya anthu ambiri m’madera. Pamenepa iwo anati alamula unduna wa za maboma aang’ono kuti limodzi ndi makhonsolo ayike ndondomeko zina zatsopano zokhwima zofuna kuti makumanidwe osemphana ndi ndondomeko zopewera mliri wa covid-19 omwe akuchitika mmadera enawa, athe. Kumbali ya momwe dziko lino lachitira pakayezedwe ka anthu msabata yathayi, anthu okwana 17, 334 ndi omwe ayezedwa Coronavirus ndipo 29 mwa anthu 100 aliwonse anapezeka ndi kachiromboka. Pamenepa Dr. Chakwera anati chidwi cha boma ndi kuwonetsetsa kuti chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akupezeka ndi kachiromboka chitsike mpaka pa anthu 5 mwa 100 aliwonse kapenanso kuposera apo kuti zinthu monga za chuma komanso zochitika zosiyanasiyana zibwelerenso mchimake. Pothilirapo ndemanga pa za katemerayu, wapampando wa komiti yowona za Covid-19 Dr. John Phuka anati kuti katemera agwire bwino ntchito pamafunika kuti anthu pafupifupi 80 mwa 100 aliwonse pa chiwerengero chonse cha anthu mdziko alandire nawo katemerayu. Iwo anatsindikanso kuti dziko lino libweretsa katemera yekhayo yemwe angathandize mzika za dziko lino osati katemera yemwe angawapezetse mavuto.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana ndi Mkulu wa Bungwe Lowona za Chakudya pa Dziko Lonse
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi mkulu wa bungwe lowona za chakudya pa dziko lonse la World Food Programme. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio zokambirana za pakati pa Papa ndi mkulu wa bungwe lowona za chakudya pa dziko lonse (World Food Programme) David Beasley m’chipinda chosungira ma buku Vatican Apostolic Library zinatenga pafupi mphindi makumi anayi (40). Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse (Vatican) silidaulule zomwe awiriwa akambirana. Koma mkumanowu wachitika bungwe la World Food Programme litachenjeza kuti kaamba ka mliri wa Coronavirus ana oposa 300 million pa dziko lonse asowa chakudya. Kafukufuku wa pakati pa bungwe la World Food Programme ndi bungwe lomwe limapereka chisamaliro kwa ana la UNICEF wasonyeza kuti ana ambiri omwe amadalira chakudya chomwe amalandira m’sukulu zao akulephera kupeza chakudyachi chifukwa cha kutsekedwa kwa sukulu kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus. Polankhula kudzera pa makina a intaneti Beasley wadandaula kuti kupatula kuti ana ambiri akulephera kuphunzira kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus anawa akulepheranso kupeza mwayi wolandira chakudya m’sukulu zawo. Pamenepa Beasley wati ndi kofunika kuthandiza maiko kuti sukulu zitsegulidwenso posachedwa kuti ana apitirize maphunziro awo komanso kulandira chakudya. Kameneka si koyamba kuti Papa Francisco achite zokambirana ndi mkulu wa bungwe lowona za chakudya pa dziko lonse. Awiriwa adachitanso zokambirana m’chaka cha 2017 ndipo m’chaka cha 2016 Papa Francisco adakayendera likulu la bungwe la World Food Programme lomwe liri mu mzinda wa Rome.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Ambiri Akuchira ku Nthenda ya COVID-19-Nduna
news: Nduna ya za umoyo mdziko muno mayi Khumbize Kandodo-Chiponda ati padakalipano anthu ambiri akuchira ku nthenda ya Covid-19 zomwe zikupereka chiyembekezo kuti ndi zotheka kuthana ndi matendawa. Iwo alankhula izi lachinayi ku Lilongwe pa msonkhano wa atolankhani wa komiti ya mtsogoleri wa dziko lino yowona za matendawa. Ndunayi yati m’maola 24 apitawo, anthu 25 awatulutsa mchipatala pomwe anthu 289 omwe amadwala matendawa achira zomwe zikupereka chiyembekezo kuti anthu ambiri achira ku matendawa. Chiponda: Chiyembekezo chilipo Mayi Chiponda omwenso ndi wapampando wa komitiyi anafotokozanso momwe ndalama zokwana 17.5-billion-kwacha zomwe mtsogoleri wa dziko lino adalamula kuti zithandizire pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliriwu zagawidwira ku nthambi ndi maunduna osiyanasiyana. Mwa maunduna komanso nthambi zina zomwe zalandira ndalamazi ndi monga unduna wa zaumoyo omwe wapatsidwa 5 billion kwacha, unduna wa za maboma aang’ono wapatsidwa 1.2 billion kwacha, nthambi yowona zolowa ndi kutuluka m’dziko muno yapatsidwa 350-million-kwacha yoti apangitsire ma mask, ndipo nthambi ya asilikali a nkhondo ya MDF yapatsidwa ndalama zokwana 100-million-kwacha zopangitsiranso ma mask. Polankhulapo, wapampando wina wa komitiyi Dr. John Phuka anati malo omwe akhale akugwira ntchito yothandizirako anthu odwala COVID-19 akhala amodzi mwa malo otetezeka kwambiri ndipo kuti anthu sakuyenera kumafikako mwachisawawa. Iwo anaperekapo chitsanzo cha ku bwalo la za masewero la Bingu mu mzinda wa Lilongwe kuti malowa akawatsekula kuti ayambe kuthandizirako odwala, anthu sakuyeneranso kumachitako masewero olimbitsa thupi kapena zina za msangulutso kapena kugulitsa malonda mozungulira malowa, ndipo kuti alendo samawaloranso kulowa mkati. Iwo ati achita izi pofuna kuwonetsetsa kuti pasakhale kupatsirana matendawa kwa mtundu uliwonse mkati mwa malowa komanso anthu ozungulira malowa. Anthu atsopano omwe apezeka ndi kachirombo ka corona m’maola 24 apitawo ndi okwana 644 mwa anthu 2,522 omwe anayezedwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sukulu ya Box 2 Tsopano Ikhala Yoima Payokha
news: Dayosizi ya Zomba yayamba dongosolo losintha sukulu ya Zomba Catholic Secondary yomwenso imatchguka ndi dzina loti BOX 2, kuchoka kothandizidwa ndi boma kukhala yoyima payokha. Mkulu wa nthambi yowona za maphunziro ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno ku Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) brother Pascal Mtuwana atsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo ati ganizoli ladza potsatira ndondomeko ya kayendetsedwe ka zinthu ya zaka zisanu yomwe dayosiziyo inakhazikitsa mchaka cha 2017.  Zomba Catholic Secondary School Iwo ati sukuluyi ipitiriza kupereka maphunziro apamwamba kwa achinyamata onse mopanda tsankho koma kuti tsopano mpingo ukhala ndi mphamvu zambiri zomwe zithandizenso kuti sukuluyi iyendetsedwe motsata ziphunzitso za mpingo wa katolika. “Sukulu ya Zomba Catholic yomwe ili mu dayosizi ya Zomba takambirana kuti isinthe kuchoka pothandizidwa kukhala yoyima payokha ndipo dongosololi likuyenera kuyamba chaka chino pomwe boma silinasankhiremo ana,” anatero brother Mtuwana. Iwo ati pomwe sukuluyi imayendetsedwa ndi boma panalibe chovuta chilichonse ndipo pano akufuna kuti sukuluyi izame mu maphunzitso a mpingo wa katolika omwe ndi eni ake a sukuluyi. Brother Mtuwana ati panalibe vuto lililonse lomwe linachitika pakati pa mpingi ndi boma lomwe ladzetsa kusinthaku koma kuti akuchita izi motsatira strategic plan ya dayosiziyo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Ntchito Yogulitsa Zipangizo Zaulimi Zotsika Mtengo Yayenda Bwino’
news: Ntchito yogulitsa zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo akuti yayenda bwino m’madera ambiri a mdziko muno ngakhale inayamba movuta. Poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi, khansala wa ward ya Mikolongwe mdera la ku madzulo m’boma la Thyolo, a George Matiya ati ngakhale ndondomekoyi inayamba ndi mavuto a kuvuta kwa network komanso kusowa kwa fetereza m’madera ena, iwo pamodzi ndi atsogoleri ena a m’bomali akhutisidwa nayo kaamba kuti tsopano alimi ambiri apindula ndi ndondomekoyi. Mayi m’modzi kunyamula feteleza wake Pamenepa iwo apempha kuti chaka chikubwerachi boma lidzatsatirenso ndondomeko yomweyi kamba koti anthu ambiri athandizika nayo. “Ntchitoyi inayamba movuta kwambiri Kamba koti ma venda omwe anapatsidwa ntchito yopereka feteleza m’madera anakana kutero ndipo izi zinapangitsa kuti anthu azikanganirana msika umodzi,” anatero Matiya. Iwo ati zinatengera kulimbikira kwa adindo pomwe anapanga njira yotorera ma kuponi ndi ndalama m’midzi kuti akasiye ku boma pomwe feteleza anagulidwa pamodzi ndi kugawidwa m’midzimo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Ndi Udindo wa Aliyense Kuthandiza Anthu Odwala COVID-19’
news: Phungu wa nyumba ya malamulo mdera la pakati m’boma la Ntcheu, Dr. Albert Mbawala wati ndi udindo wa aliyense kuthandiza anthu odwala nthenda ya Covid-19 omwe akulandira thandizo mzipatala zosiyanasiyana za mdziko muno. Mbawala amalakhula izi lachitatu pachipatala cha Ntcheu pomwe amapereka ndalama zokwana 2-million-kwacha zoti zithandizire kugula zipangizo zogwiritsira ntchito pothandiza anthu omwe akudwala nthenda ya Covid-19 pa chipatalachi. Wapereka 2 million kwacha-Mbawala Iye wati anachiona chofunika kuti athandizepo poganizira kuti anthu ambiri a mdera lake amapeza thandizo la makhwala pa chipatalachi. M’mawu ake polandira thandizo la ndalamazi mkulu wa zaumoyo m’bomali Dr. Steven Macheso anayamikira phunguyu kamba ka thandizoli ndipo wapempha anthu ena kuti atengerepo chitsanzo chabwinochi. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu omwe anafika pamwambo opereka thandizoli  Inkosi ya makosi Gomani 5 anayamikira momwe ogwira ntchito pa chipatalachi akugwilira ntchito pothana ndi mliri wa COVID-19 ngakhale akukumana ndi mavuto  monga kugendedwa, kutonzedwa ndi zina zambiri maka pakagwa maliro a odwala nthendayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dalaivala Walamulidwa Kupereka 1.6 Million Kaamba Kopha Anthu Poyendetsa Galimoto Mosasamala
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Mangochi lalamula mamuna wina wa zaka 30 zakubadwa kuti apereke chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 1.6 Million kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu wopha anthu kaamba koyendetsa galimoto mosasamala. Bwaloli linamva kudzera kwa wapolisi woyimira boma pa mlandu mchigawo chakumvuma kwa dziko lino Assistant Superintendent Counsel Louis Makiyi kuti mamunayu Nathan Nyirenda usiku wa pa 1 January amayendetsa galimoto ya mtundu wa sienta yomwe nambala yeke ndi CA937 mu nsewu ochokera ku Monkeybay kupita ku boma la Mangochi. Makiyi anapitiriza kunena kuti galimotoyi imathanga kwambiri ndipo dalaivalayu analibe chiphaso chovomerezeka choyendera pa nsewu. Atafika pa malo omwera mowa a Zitherepano, Nyirenda analephera kuyiwongolera bwino ndipo inaphonya nsewu ndi kukaomba anthu khumi omwe amayenda m’mbali mwa nsewuwu. Kutsatira ngoziyi anthu anayi anavulala kwambiri m’mutu ndipo anakamwalira ku chipatala cha Koche akulandira thandizo la mankhwala pomwe enawo anavulala pang’ono ndipo anawatengera ku chipatala cha boma komwe anakalandira thandizo la mankhwala. Atakaonekera ku bwalo la milanduli, anakamupeza olakwa ndipo Nyirenda anapempha bwaloli kuti limupatse chigamulo chofewa kaamba koti ali ndi udindo waukulu pa banja lake zomwe zingayike pa mavuto miyoyo ya anthu ambiri osalakwa-wa. Komapopereka chigamulo chake Senior Resident Magistrate Joshua Nkhono anamulamula nyirenda kuti apereke 325 sauzande pa mulandu oyendetsa galimoto mosasamala, 100 thousand pa mulandu oyendetsa galimoto opanda nsonkho oyendera pa nsewu, komanso 200 thousand pa mulandu woyendesa galimoto opanda chiphaso choyendera license zonse pamodzi 1.6 million. Mamunayu wapereka kale ndalamayi ndipo ndalama yokwana 1.4 million ikhala chipukuta misonzi ku mawanja omwe abale awo anakhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi. Nathan Nyirenda amachokera m’mudzi mwa Chikaka mdera la mfumu yayikulu Mwalweni m’boma la Rumphi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Tipitirizabe Kuphunzitsa Anthu Kapewedwe ka Coronavirus – Mtambo
news: Unduna wa zophunzitsa anthu ndi kulimbikitsa umodzi mdziko muno wati wayamba ntchito yozindikiritsa anthu zambiri zokhudza mliri wa Covid-19. Nduna mu undunawu a Timothy Mtambo ndi omwe anena izi lachitatu ku Lilongwe pomwe komiti yowona za mliri wa Covid-19 imafotokozera atolankhani momwe zinthu zilili pa za mliriwu pofika tsikuli. Unduna wake utsogolera ntchitoyo- Mtambo A Mtambo ati akudziwa kuti pali madera ena omwe akusowekerabe uthenga wokhudza momwe angachitire kuti apewe kachirombo koyambitsa matendawa ndipo iwo akhala akuyenda m’maderawa kuti anthu adziwe zambiri za nthendayi. Iwo ati unduna wawo limodzi ndi ma unduna ena monga wa zofalitsa nkhani, ndi wa za umoyo akonza ndondomeko yofikira anthu m’madera osiyanasiyana ndi mauthenga okhudza mliriwu kuti anthu omwe alibe mwayi otsatira izi pa wayilesi amve momwe angachitire kuti apewe coronavirus. Iwo ati kudzera mu thandizo lochokera ku ofesi ya president ndi nduna apeza galimoto zoti zithandizire pa ntchito yofalitsa mauthengawa m’madera ndipo kuti lachiwiri ayamba ndi boma la Lilongwe ndipo akhala akupitiriza ndi maboma ena mpaka dziko lonse kudziwitsa anthu za ndondomeko zopewera kufala kwa mliriwu. Ndunayi inatsindikanso pa za kufunika kopewa maimva-imva kudzera m’masamba a mchezo pa intaneti pa nkhani zina zokhudza matendawa monga zina mwanjira zomwe anthu angachite pofuna kupewa kachirombo ka corona komanso zina zokhudza katemera wa Covid-19. A Mtambo anatenganso nthawi kudzudzula kulekelera komwe anthu ena akuchita pakatsatidwe ka ndondomeko zina zopewera kufala kwa mliriwu. M’mawu ake wapampando wa komiti ya mtsogoleri wa dziko yowona za Covid-19, Dr. John Phuka apempha anthu kuti azithamangira ku chipatala pomwe ayamba kumva zizindikiro za chilendo ponena kut ambiri mwa omwe akumwalira ndi Covid-19 ndi kaamba koti akuchedwa kupita ku chipatala kukalandira thandizo. M’maola 24 apitawo omwe ndikuyambira 12 koloko masana a lachiwiri kufikira 12 koloko masana a dzulo la lachitatu, anthu okwana 830 ndi omwe apezeka ndi kachirombo ka corona mwa anthu 2503 omwe adayezedwa munthawiyi. Mu nthawi yomweyi anthu okwana 244 achira ku matenda a Covid-19 pomwe anthu 15 amwalira. Pakadali pano anthu akulimbikitsidwa kuti atha kumakayezetsa corona virus mzipatala zina zazing’ono m’dziko muno kaamba koti awonjezera njira yatsopano yomwe ikugwilitsidwa ntchito poyeza anthu kti aziyeza anthu ochuluka. Anthu okwana 135, 066 ndi omwe ayezedwapo kufikira dzulo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Baibulo ndi Chida Cholumikizitsa Mulungu ndi Anthu Ake
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Mulungu amakumana ndi kulankhula ndi anthu ake kudzera mu Baibulo. Popitiriza maphunzitso ake pa mutu wa mapemphero kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira mabuku Vatican Apostolic Library, Papa watsindika za kufunika kowerenga mawu a Mulungu opezeka mu Baibulo. Iye watsindika za kufunika kowerenga mawu a Mulungu ponena kuti ndi kudzera mu Baibulo momwe Mulungu amakumana ndi kulankhula ndi anthu ke. Papa Francisco wati Baibulo silikuyenera kungokhala maluwa chabe koma kuti akhristu adzikonda kupemphera pogwiritsa ntchito mawu a Mulungu opezeka mu Baibulo. Iye wati mawu a Mulungu amabweretsa kuwala m’moyo wa akhristu kotero kuti ndi kofunika kumawawerenga komanso kumawamvetsera. Pomaliza iye wayerekeza Mau a Mulungu kukhala ngati galasi loonetsa umo momwe akhristu akuonekera pa maso pa Mulungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadandaula ndi Imfa ya Dotolo Wake
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya yemwe anali dokotala wake kwa zaka zisanu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, lachiwiri masana Papa Francisco anali nawo pa Misa yotsanzikana ndi malemu Fabrizio Soccorsi yemwe anali dokotala wake. Mwambo wa Misa yotsanzikana ndi malemuyu wachitika mu tchalitchi la Amayi Maria Mfumukazi ya mabanja (Santa Maria Regina della Famiglia) ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican ndipo anatsogolera Misa’yi ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa katolika (Secretary of Vatican State) Cardinal Pietro Parolin. Soccorsi yemwe anamwalira pa 9 January 2021 ali ndi zaka 78 anagonekedwa m’chipatala cha Gemelli ku Rome pa 26 December chaka chatha kaamba ka nthenda ya Cancer kenako anapezekanso ndi nthenda ya Covid-19. Papa Francisco anasankha dokotalayu kukhala dokotala wake (personal doctor) m’chaka cha 2015 ndipo iye amakhala nawo pa ma ulendo onse a Papa’yu ku maiko osiyanasiyana. Dokotala’yu amathandiziranso pa ntchito zina ku bungwe loona za anthu oyera mu Mpingo lodziwika mchingerezi kuti Congregation for the Causes of Saints. Mzimu wa Doctor Fabrizio Soccorsi uuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Oyendetsa Galimoto Ophwanya Malamulo Opewera COVID-19 Amangidwa – Nduna
news: Unduna wa za mtengatenga ndi zomangamanga wachezenjeza kuti udzapereka chilango kwa oyendetsa galimoto omwe azinyamula anthu mophwanya ndondomeko zomwe zidayikidwa kuti azitsatira pofuna kupewa kufala kwa mliri wa Covid-19. Mu kalata yomwe undunawu watulutsa lachiwiri, wachiwiri kwa nduna mu undawu Nancy Chaola Mdooko wati sizoona kuti boma labweza ganizo lake lochepetsa mlingo wa okwera galimotozi pogonjera zofuna za oyendetsa galimotozi. Iwo ati aliyense amene angaphwanye malamulo omwe alipowa adzapatsidwa chilango molingana ndi mlandu omwe wapalamulawo. Lachiwiri oyendetsa galimoto zonyamula anthu anachita ziwonetsero zokakamiza boma kuti mwazina litsitse mtengo wa mafuta komanso kuonjezera mlingo wa anthu omwe angakwere galimotozi kamba koti zinthu sizikuwayendera kamba ka mliri wa Covid-19. Mkati kati mwa ziwonetserozi zomwe zinachtika m’madera osiyanasiyana malipoti anamveka kuti boma lavomera zowonjezera mlingo wa anthu okwerawa ndipo ziwonetserozi zidayimitsidwa. Koma kalata yomwe unduna wa za.mtengatenga yatulutsa yati boma silidalamule za izi ndipo kuti malamulo onse omwe adayikidwa akadali m’malo mwake. Nduna mu undunawu Mai Nancy Chaola Mdoko ati mwachitsanzo ma minibus ayenera kunyamulabe anthu awiri awiri pampando ndipo kuti sipakuyenera kukhala munthu oyimilira pa galimoto iliyonse. Ndunayi yati onse okwera kuphatikizapo oyendetsa ndi makondakitala omwe ayenera kuvala ma mask komanso kukhala nd sanitiser nthaw zonse komanso kutsekula mazenela a galimoto zawo ngati mbali imodzi yothandiza kupewa kufala kwa coronavirus. Apa ndunayu yati onse olephera.kutsatira ndondomeko zomwe zilipozi adzayenera kulipira chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana K100, 000 kapena kukhala ku ndende kwa miyezi itatu komanso kuti ziphaso zawo zitha kulandidwa. Kalatayi yawonjezeranso kunena kuti galimoto zonyamula katundu sizikuyenera kunyamula anthu kupatula oyendetsa ndi.wina m’modzi kutsogolo. Miyezi yapitayo, boma lidatsitsa mitengo ya mafuta a galimoto ngati mbali imodzi yofuna kuthandiza anthu pa nthawi ya mliri wa covid-19 koma mafutawa adakwezadwa ati potsatira kukweranso kwa mitengo ya mafutawa pa dziko lonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu 6 Apereka Chindapusa Atapezeka Pa Malo Omwera Mowa Nthawi Yosavomerezeka
news: Bwalo lachiwiri la milandu m’boma la Ntcheu lalamula amuna 6 kuti apereke chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 15 sauzande kwacha aliyense kulephera apo akakhale ku ndende kwa mwezi umodzi kamba kopezeka pa malo omwera mowa mu nthawi yosavomerezeka. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sub Inspector James Luwani anawuza bwaloli kuti a Kefasi Kunduma, Israel Mswana, Josephy Kalengera, Yohane Nerson komanso Maxwell Sakwiya anamangidwa usiku wa pa 22 January 2021 pa malo ena omwera mowa otchedwa Evergreen nthawi ya 9 koloko madzulo pomwe apolisiwa amazungulira mu tauni ya bomalo pofuna kuwonetsetsa kuti anthu sakuphwanya malamulo ochepetsera kufala kwa mliri wa Covid-19 omwe unduna wa zaumoyo unakhazikitsa mdziko muno. Popereka chigamulo chake Second Grade Magistrate Peter Mkuzi anati wapereka chilango choterechi kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Padakalipano anthu onsewa apereka ndalamazi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Inkosi Ganya Yapempha Anthu Adzale Mitengo Yochuluka
news: Mfumu yaikulu Ganya ya m’boma la Ntcheu yapempha anthu a m’bomalo kuti akhale patsogolo kudzala komanso kusamalira mitengo mu nyengo ino ya mvula. Mfumu Ganya yanena izi pamwambo odzala mitengo omwe khonsolo ya boma la Ntcheu kudzera ku ofesi yowona za chilengedwe m’bomali inakonza. Inkosi Ganya yati anthu akuyenera kubwezeretsa chilengedwe podzala mitengo ndi kuwonetseka kuti ikutetezedwa. Poyankhulapo mkulu wa mu ofesi yowona za chilengedwe m’bomali a Donnex Mtambo   ati mchitidwe odula mitengo mwachisawawa wakula m’boma la Ntcheu ndipo kuti ndi kofunika kuchilimika podzala mitengo yambiri ndi cholinga choti chilengedwe chibwelere mchimake. Ntchito yodzala mitengo m’bomali ikuyembekezeka kufikira m’madera onse asanu ndi awiri a bomali. Pakadali pano khonsoloyi yakwanitsa kufikira ndi kudzala mitengoyi m’madera atatu omwe ndi  Ntcheu Central Consituency, Ntcheu Bwanje North ndiponso Ntcheu Bwanje South. Mlendo wolemekezeka pa mwambowu anali mayi Nancy Chaola Mdooko yemwe ndi wachiwiri kwa nduna ya zamtengatenga ndi zomangamanga yemwenso ndi phungu wa Ntcheu Bwanje North.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Timu ya Mighty Wanderers Ikufuna Kukhazikitsa Njira Zatsopano Zopezera Chuma
news: Timu ya Mighty Wanderers yati ikuyembekeza kukhazikitsanso njira zina zatsopano zopezera ndalama pofuna kuchepesa mavuto a zachuma omwe akukumana nawo. Wapampando wa timuyi a Symon Sikwese ndi omwe anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati timuyi ikukumana ndi mavuto azachuma zomwe zikuchititsa kuti timuyi isamachite bwino pa masewero ake mu mpikisano wa Tnm Super League. “Padakali pano pali ndondomeko zingapo zomwe takonza ndipo zikhala zikutuluka posachedwapa anthu akhala akuziona,” anatero a Sikwese. Iwo ati ina mwa ndondomeko yomwe inakhazikitsidwa inali monga Noma 10-10 yomwe ikuyembekezeka kuti  anthu aziyankha mafuso osiyana-siyana ndi kuapeza zinthu zosiyanasiyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhritsu Azikhala pa Ubale Weni Weni Ndi Yesu Khritsu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika koti akhristu azikhala pa ubale weniweni ndi Yesu Khristu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, sabata yopemphelera umodzi wa mipingo ya chikhristu (Week of Prayer for Christian Unity) yomwe inayamba lolemba pa 18 January yatha lolemba pa 25 January. M’mawu ake pa mapemphero a madzulo otsekera sabata ya mapempheroyi mu tchalitchi lalikulu lodziwika kuti Basilica of St. Paul’s Outside-the-Walls mu mzinda Rome pomwe panalinso atsogoleri a mipingo ya chikhristu, Papa Francisco wati ndi kofunika kuti akhristu aziphatana ndi Yesu Khristu kuti moyo wao uzibereka zipatso zochuluka. Iye wati mkhristu akuyenera kukhala munthu yemwe ali pa ubale weniweni ndi Yesu Khristu komanso yemwe zochita zake zikugwirizana ndi zomwe Yesu Khristu-yo anali kuphunzitsa. Papa Francisco analankhulaponso pa za kufunika kwa umodzi pakati pa mipingo ya chikhristu ponena kuti mipingo ili ngati nthambi za mtengo umodzi ndipo thunthu lake ndiye Yesu Khristu. Iye wamaliza ndi kutsindika za kufunika kwa chikondi komanso ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu onse omwe ndi banja limodzi la ana a Mulungu. Chaka chilichonse kuyambira pa 18 January mpaka pa 25 January akhristu pa dziko lonse amachita mapemphero opempherera umodzi wa mipingo ya chikhristu. Mapempherowa adayamba kuchitika mchaka cha 1908 ndipo chaka chino achitika pa mutu woti Munthu wokhala mwa ine ndi inenso mwa iye amabereka zipatso zambiri Uthenga Wabwino wa Yohane Woyera mutu 15 ndime ya 5.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kukhazikika kwa Zikhalidwe Kukusokoneza Ntchito Yolimbana ndi COVID-19
news: Komiti ya president yowona za mliri wa Covid-19 mdziko muno yadandaula kuti zikhalidwe zina zomwe zakhazikika pakati pa aMalawi zikukolezera kufala kwa mliriwu mdziko muno. Wapampando wa komitiyi Dr. John Phuka amalankhula izi lolemba madzulo pomwe amapereka tsatanetsane wa momwe ntchito yolimbana ndi mliriwu ikuyendera. Iye wati komitiyi ndi yokhumudwa kamba koti madera ena anthu akunyozerabe kutsatira ndondomeko zodzitetezera ku mliliwu maka maka pa misonkhano monga ku maliro, m`matchalitchi, malo omwera mowa komanso malo ochitira malonda. “Ntchito yolimbana ndi kufala kwa nthendayi ikhala yovuta kamba koti amalawi sakusiya zi zolowezi zomwe zikukolezela kufala kwa nthendayi,” anatero Dr. Phuka. Dr. Phuka anatinso m’Malawi aliyense ali ndi udindo osamala moyo wake komanso wa mzake potsatira njira zopewera kufala kwa nthendayi. Polankhulapo mkulu wa chipatala cha Kamuzu Central, Dr. Jonathan Ngoma wati anthu asakayike zokawonana ndi a zachipatala akawona zizindikiro za nthendayi. Padakali pano anthu 592 apezeka ndi nthendayi, anthu 10 amwalira ndipo anthu 81 achira ku nthendayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alamulidwa Kupereka 40 Sauzande Kamba Kogulitsa Malonda Nthawi Yosavomerezeka
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Dowa lalamula anthu asanu ndi awiri kuti apereke chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 40 sauzande kwacha aliyense kaamba kopezeka akuchita malonda mu nthawi yoletsedwa. Bwaloli linamva kuchokera kwa woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Inspector Christopher Daluni kuti anthu-wa a Manondo Chigwa, Timothy Notisi, Yohane Mwale, Zilotha Chodinda, Davison Kaluluma, Happy Mzokota komanso Levison Nguluwe anapezeka akuchita malonda mu nthawi yolakwika potengera malamulo othandiza kupewa kufala kwa mliri wa Covid-19 mdziko muno. Anthuwa anauvomera mlanduwu ndipo popereka chigamulo chake Third Grade Magistrate Harrison Stick analamula anthuwa kuti apereke 40 sauzande kwacha aliyense kapena akakhale ku ndende kwa miyezi iwiri. Iye anati wachita izi kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Bwalo lomweli lalamulanso anthu ena anayi kuti alipire chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 20 sauzande kwacha aliyense kaamba kopezeka akuyenda osavala mask komanso anthu ena awiri kulipiranso 20 sauzande kwacha kaamba kopezeka akuyenda mu nthawi yosayenera. Padakalipano anthu onsewa alipira ndalamazo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Baibulo ndi Kalata ya Chikondi Yochokera kwa Mulungu-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Baibulo ndi kalata ya chikondi yochokera kwa Mulungu yemwe amadziwa bwino anthu ake. Pa 24 January ndi lamulungu lachitatu mu nyengo ya pa chaka komanso laMulungu la Mau a Mulungu (Sunday of the Word of God). M’malaliko ake pa tsikuli Papa Francisco walimbikitsa akhristu kuti azipeza nthawi yowerenga ndi kusinkhasinkha Mau a Mulungu opezeka m’Baibulo popeza ndi mau othunzitsa mtima kwa anthu omwe mitima yao ndi yosweka. Koma si pokhapo iye waonjezeranso kuti Mau a Mulungu ndi othandiza anthu kusiya makhalidwe awo akale ndi kuyambanso moyo watsopano. Papa Francisco wati kuitanidwa kwa asodzi kukhala ophunzira a Ambuye Yesu anthu omwe pa nthawi imeneyo anali onyozeka komanso anthu wamba ndi umboni wa ukulu kuti palibe munthu wonyozeka pa maso pa Mulungu. Pomaliza iye wapempha akhristu kuti pozindikira kuti Baibulo ndi kalata ya chikondi azolowere kumayenda ndi Baibulo komanso kuti Baibulo likhale ndi malo a pa dera m’nyumba zawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Anayi Avulala Modetsa Nkhawa pa Ngozi Yapansewu ku Dowa
news: Anthu anayi avulala modetsa nkhawa galimoto yomwe anakwera itagudubuzika m’boma la Dowa. Watsimikiza za ngoziyo-M’bumpha Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha wati ngoziyi yachitika lero ndipo yakhudza galimoto ina nambala yake DA 7691 yomwe imachokera ku Mponela kulowera ku Lilongwe ndipo imayendetsedwa ndi a Snowden Chimenya. Iye wati dalaivalayu atafika pa Mount Meru Millers, amafuna apitilire galimoto ina yomwe inali patsogolo pake koma asanawone kutsogoloko zomwe zinachititsa kuti aphonye nsewu ndi kugudubuka kaamba koti amathamanga kwambiri. Kutsatira ngoziyi munthu m’modzi yemwe anali mu galimotoyi watumizidwa ku chipatala cha Kamuzu Central mu mzinda wa Lilongwe ndipo atatu enawo akulandira thandizo la mankhwala pa chipatala cha Lumbadzi ndipo galimotoyo yawonongeka kwambiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Khonsolo ya Chikwawa Ikufuna Kuthetsa Chinyengo Pogulitsa Chimanga ku ADMARC
news: Khonsolo ya boma la Chikwawa yapempha magulu onse okhuzidwa kuti agwirane manja kuti chimanga chimene bungwe la ADMARC layamba kugulitsa chisagulitsidwe kwa mavenda. Wapampando wa khonsoloyi Gerald Bede ndi yemwe wapereka pempholi pambuyo poyendera ina mwa misika ya ADMARC m’bomalo. Iye wayamikira boma poyamba kugulitsa chimangachi padakalipano ponena kuti ntchitoyi yayambika mu nthawi yake pamene anthu ambiri akuvutika ndi njala m’bomalo. “Tinakhazikitsa kuti ADMARC iliyonse ikhale ndi komiti yomwe idziwonetsetsa kuti anthu amene akugula ndi anthudi ovutika osati mavenda,” anatero a Bede. Iwo atinso ndondomeko zonse zothandiza anthu kupewa kupatsirana kachilombo ka Coronavirus m’misikayi zili mchimake. Padakalipano bungwe la ADMARC layamba kale kugulitsa chimangachi m’misika yake yonse pa mlingo wosapyola 30 kilogram munthu aliyense ndipo chikugulitsidwa pa mtengo wa 160-kwacha pa kilogalamu iliyonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Mthumba, Bambo Epulani Alowa M’manda
news: Mwambo woyika m’manda matupi a malemu bambo Vincent Epulani komanso bambo Martin Mthumba wachitika lero ku manda a ansembe ku Likuni mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Bambo Epulani omwe amatumikira ku St. Gabriel Namitete Parish anamwalira mwadzidzidzi m’mawa wa loweruka ku parishiyo pamene bambo Mthumba omwe amatumikira ku parish ya Holy Rosary Likuni mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, anamwaliranso tsiku lomweli ku chipatala cha Bwaila mu mzinda wa Lilongwe ku chipinda chosamalira anthu odwala nthenda ya COVID-19. Poyankhula pa mwambo wa malirowu, wapampando wa bungwe la ansembe achibadwiri mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe bamboo Innocent Mtapaonga anati ndi osweka mtima kamba ka imfa ya ansembe awiriwa Nayenso wapampando woyimira bungwe la akhristu eni ake Dr. John Paul ati mpingo wa katolika ndi wokhudzidwa kaamba ka imfayi yomwe ndi yosamvetsetseka. Malemu bambo Martin Mthumba anali ochokera ku Nambuma m’boma la Dowa. Iwo anabadwa pa 16 January 1945 ndipo analowa unsembe mchaka cha 1974. Mmalemu bambo Vincent Epulani anali ochokera m’boma la Mchinji. Iwo anabadwa pa 7 Dceember 1968 ndipo analowa unsembe mchaka cha 2000. Mizimu ya bambo Vincent Epulani komanso bambo Martin Mthumba iwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Khonsolo ya Dedza Ikuchita Bwino Poteteza Alubino-Kondowe
news: Mlangizi wa president pa nkhani za anthu a Ulumali osiyanisiyana mdziko muno a Overstone Kondowe ayamikira adindo a m’boma la Dedza polimbana ndi nkhaza kwa anthu a khungu la chi-alubino. A Kondowe awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti boma la Dedza likuchita bwino pa nkhani yolimbana ndi nkhaza zomwe anthu a khungu la chialbino amakuna nazo m’bomali. Kondowe: Boma la Dedza likuchita bwino kuposa ena Iwo anapitiriza kuyamikira komanso kulimbikitsa adindo a bomali komanso mabungwe, mafumu ndi ena onse oteteza maufulu a anthu kuti asafooke kugwira ntchitoyi koma kupita chitsongolo kuti mchitidwe oyipawu utheretu m’bomali. Pamenepa a Kondowe ati boma lili tcheru kuonetsetsa kuti anthu achialubino akutetezedwa, komanso akupatsidwa zowayenereza pa moyo wawo wa tsiku ndi tsiku. Padanakalipano boma la Dedza lili ndi chiwerengero cha anthu omwe anabadwa ndi khungu la chialubino okwana 108.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Phungu Wapereka Nyumba ku Polisi ya Masuku M’boma la Mangochi
news: Anthu a mdera la mfumu yayikulu Bwananyambi m’boma la Mangochi mogwirizana ndi phungu wa derali mayi Lilian Patel apereka nyumba yogona apolisi pa polisi yaying’ono ya Masuku. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Rodrick Maida wati nyumbayi yomwe ndi ya zipinda zogona zitatu, yamangidwa ndi thandizo lochokera ku thumba la chitukuko chakudera la Constituency Development Fund (CDF). Wamanga nyumbayo-Patel Malinga ndi phunguyu, ndalama zoposa 8 million ndi zomwe zagwiritsidw antchito pomanga nyumbayi. Anthu a m’mudziwu akuti athandizapo pa ntchitoyi powumba njerwa komanso kututa mchenga omangira nyumbayi. Polankhula pa mwambowu mayi Patel ayamikira anthu a m’mudziwu kaamba ka mgwirizano wawo potenga mbali pa ntchito yoamanga nyumbayi komanso kutenga mbali pothetsa maukwati a ana. M’mawu ake wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa apolisi mchigawo cha kunvuma kwa dziko lino Senior Deputy Commissioner Maximus Bakali wayamikira anthu a mderali kaamba ka mtima osamalira apolisi omwe amagwira ntchito mderali. Mwazina Bakali wati nyumbayi ilimbikitsa apolisiwa kumapita ku ntchito tsiku lililonse kaamba koti azikhalira pafupi. Deputy commissioner-yu anapitilira kupempha anthu a mderali kuti apewe mchitidwe owononga nyumba pomwe asemphana maganizo ndi apolisi kaamba koti palibe munthu yemwe salakwitsa chocho akuyenera kukhala pansi ndi kukambirana kuti akonze zinthu. Iye wapemphanso anthu mderari kuti agwirane manja ndi apoliswa pofuna kuthetsa milandu yogwilirira, kuzembetsa ana komanso kupha anthu a khungu lachialubino, kutengera lamulo mmanja, kuzipha komanso kubera anthu mogwiritsa ntchito nthenda ya COVID-19 ndi ina yambiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha President Biden Abweretse Mtendere, Chiyanjano
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha President watsopano wa dziko la America Joe Biden kuti athandize kubweretsa mtendere ndi chiyanjano m’dzikolo komanso pa dziko lonse la pansi. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, Papa walankhula izi lachitatu mu uthenga wake omwe watumizira President Biden. Papa m’kukumana kwake ndi Biden m’mbuyomu Mwazina iye wafunira zabwino zonse mtsogoleriyu ndipo wati ndi kofunika kuti nthawi zonse azitsogoleredwa ndi Mulungu pamene akugwira ntchito yake. “Pa tsiku ili la kulumbiritsidwa kwanu kukhala President wa nambala 46 wa dziko la America ndikukufunirani mafuno abwino komanso ndi kutsimikizireni za mapemphero anga kuti Mulungu azikutsogolerani nthawi zonse pa udindo wa ukulu umenewu,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawo. Iye wamaliza uthenga wake popereka madalitso ake kwa President’yu limodzi ndi banja lake komanso anthu onse a m’dziko la America. Lachitatu pa 20 January 2021 nthawi ikuyandikira 12 koloko masana ku America, President Joe Biden ndi wachiwiri wake mayi Kamala Harris awalumbiritsa pa udindo wa President wa dziko la America komanso wachiwiri kwa President wa dziko la America. Awiriwa akuyamba ntchito yawo pamene m’dzikolo muli mavuto osiyana-siyana monga mliri wa Coronavirus, tsankho pakati pa anthu a khungu loyera ndi lakuda komanso zipolowe zomwe masapota a President wakale wa dzikolo adakachita ku nyumba ya malamulo ati posakondwa ndi momwe chisankho cha President chidayendera mdzikolo. Biden ndi m’katollika wachiwiri kukhala President wa dziko la United States of America.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Chifundo cha Mulungu Lakonza Mapemphero Opempha Chifundo Cha Mulungu pa Mliri wa COVID-19
news: Bungwe la za utumiki wa chifundo cha Mulungu mu mpingo wa katolika la Divine Mercy Apostolate lakonza mapemphero apadera mawa lino, opempha Mulungu kuti athetse mliri wa COVID-19 umene ukupitiriza kutenga miyoyo ya anthu ambiri mdziko muno. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu a bungweli a Osward Bwemba awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti bungwe lawo limakhulupilira kuti mapemphero ndi chida cha mphamvu chogonjetsera zovuta zonse. Iwo ati kuyambira nthawi ya 9 koloko m’mawa wapa 22 January 2021, anthu akuyenera kupemphera pemphero la kolona wa chifundo cha Mulungu pa ola lililonse ndipo mapempherowa adzatha nthawi ya 5 koloko madzulo pochita Litaniya la Dzina Loyera la Ambuye Yesu. Iwo ati patsikuli apempheleranso anthu amene akudwala kuti alandire machiritso komanso kuti mizimu ya mupuligatorio ilandire chipulumutso msanga. A Bwemba apempha anthu kuti omwe angakwanitse asale zakudya kapena kudzilanga mwapadera molumikizana ndi tsikuli. Pamenepa iwo apempha akhristu a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno kuti atenge nawo mbali pa mapempherowa ndipo ati anthu omwe angakumane kuti achite mapempherowa, achite izi motsata ndondomeko zonse zomwe boma likulimbikitsa zopewera mliri wa COVID-19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mayi Wanjatidwa Kamba Kotaya Mwana Mchimbudzi
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa amanga mayi wina wa zaka 21 kaamba komuganizira kuti wataya mwana wobadwa kumene mchimbudzi. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Gladson M’bumpha wati mayiyu Kesta Andrew anali ndi pathupi ndipo anabereka masana wa lachiwiri pa 19 January 2021. Iye wati lachitatu, m’mudzi momwe mumakhala mayiyu munachitika maliro ndipo mayi wina yemwe anapita kuti akazithandize ndi yemwe anamva kulira kwa mwana m’chimbudzimo. Anthu omwe anali pa maliropo anathandizana kupulumutsa mwanayo mu dzenje la chimbudzicho ndipo mayi woganiziridwayo anavomera kuti ndi yemwe anaponyera mwanayo mchimbudzimo koma sanafotokoze zifukwa zomwe anachitira izi. Padakalipano mwanayu komanso mayi wakeyo awagoneka pa chipatala cha boma la Dowa komwe akulandira thandizo la mwankhwala. Kesta Andrew yemwe amachokera m’mudzi mwa Chiponda mfumu yaikulu Msakambewa m’boma la Dowa akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu ndi kukayankha mlandu wofuna kubisa kubadwa kwa mwana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Maiko Athetse Zida za Nyukiliya
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha mayiko kuti athetse zida za nyukiliya. Pamene kwangotsala masiku awiri kuti pangano lomwe mayiko anasayina loletsa kupanga, kusunga komanso kugwiritsa ntchito zida zoopsa za nyukiliya liyambe kugwira ntchito, Papa Francisco wapempha mayiko kuti athetse zida zowopsazi. Polankhula ku dziko lonse pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira mabuku chotchedwa Vatican Apostolic Library, iye wati mayiko akuyenera kuchita chotheka kuti zida za nyukiliya zisapezekenso pa dziko la pansi. Papa Francisco wati zidazi zimawonongeratu anthu ambiri komanso chilengedwe pa ka nthawi kochepa kotero sibwino kupanga, kusunga kapena kuzigwiritsa ntchito. Pamenepa iye walimbikitsa maiko kuti achilimike polimbikitsa mtendere. Pangano lodziwika mchingerezi kuti Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons kapena kuti Nuclear Weapons Ban Treaty lomwe maiko anasayinira loletsa kupanga, kusunga komanso kugwiritsa ntchito zida za nyukiliya liyamba kugwira ntchito lachisanu pa 22 January, 2021. Vatican linali dziko loyamba kusayinira panganoli pa 20 September 2017 ku likulu la bungwe la United Nations ku New York m’dziko la America.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Msusa Adandaula ndi Tsankho Pakati pa Ansembe Omwe Apezeka ndi COVID-19
news: Wapampando wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno Ambuye Thomas Luke Msusa apempha anthu kuti agwiritse ntchito moyenera masamba a mchezo pa internet mu nyengo ino ya mliri wa Coronavirus. Msusa: Amene tikutchuka ndife ansembe akatolika Ambuye Msusa omwenso ndi arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Blantyre anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi ndipo ati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti mu nyengo ino ya mliri wa Coronavirus, anthu ochuluka akufalitsa mauthenga a bodza omwe akupereka Chiopsezo kwa a Malawi ambiri. Pamenepa Ambuye Msusa ati nthawi yakwana kuti anthu agwiritse ntchito masamba a mchezo-wa moyenera pofalitsa mauthenga a chiyembekezo kwa anthu omwe akudwala komanso omwe ataya abale awo kaamba ka nthendayi. “Amene tikutchuka ndiye ndife ansembe a katolika kodi ndiye kuti azibusa a mipingo ina sakudwala kapena kufa ndi matendawa? Ofalitsa akenso ndiye akumakhala atsogoleri a tchalitchi kapena a mphakati mu mpingo wathu omwewu,” anadandaula motero AMbuye Msusa. Iwo adandaulanso ndi tsankho lomwe likumabwera pakati pa atumiki omwe achira ku matendawa choncho apempha akhristu kuti asakhale mbali imodzui yofalitsa nawo nkhani za mtunduwu. Mwazina ambuye Msusa apempha akhristu kuti apitilire kupemphera zolimba kuti mliriwu utheretu mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Awiri Anjatidwa Kaamba Kophwanya Malamulo Opewera COVID-19 M’boma la Dowa
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa amanga abambo awiri kaamba kophwanya malamulo opewera mliri wa COVID-19 mdziko muno. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyo-M’bumpha Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sergeant Gladson M’bumpha, awiriwa ndi Patience Bituta komanso Samuel Deleleyu omwe ndi ogulitsa mowa pa mabala ena omwe ali pa Dzaleka Refugee Camp. Awiriwa amangidwa mmawa wa lero lachiwiri pamene mkulu wa apolisi m’bomalo Deputy Commissioner Rhoda Manjolo amayendera malo omwera mowa a m’bomalo ngati akutsatira njira zopewera mliriwu. Awiriwa omwe anapezeka akugulitsa mowa pamalowa anjatidwa ndipo akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu ndi kukayankha mlandu wophwanya malamulo opewera mliri wa COVID-19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Mlembi Watsopano wa Bungwe Lowona za Anthu Oyera mu Mpingo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha mlembi watsopano wa bungwe lomwe limawona za anthu oyera mu mpingo Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse lalengeza kuti Papa wasankha Ambuye Fabio Fabene kukhala mlembi wa bungwe lomwe limawona za anthu oyera mu mpingo lodziwika mchingerezi kuti Congregation for the Causes of the Saints. Kuyambira mchaka cha 2014 Ambuye Fabene omwe kwawo ndi ku Italy akhala ali wachiwiri kwa mlembi wa Sinodi ya ma episkopi (Synod of Bishops). Ambuye Fabene omwe anabadwa pa 12 March 1959 ndipo anadzodzedwa unsembe m’chaka cha 1984 ndi katswiri pa nkhani ya malamulo a mpingo (Canon Law). Bungwe lowona za anthu oyera mu mpingo limachita kafukufuku wa moyo wa anthu pamene amwalira kuti awone ngati anthuwo ndi oyeneradi kutchulidwa oyera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Unduna wa Zaumoyo Wakhazikitsa Njira Zatsopano Zochepetsera Kufala Kwa Mliri wa COVID-19
news: Unduna wa za umoyo mdziko muno walengeza njira zatsopano zothandiza kuthana ndi mliri wa COVID-19. Nduna mu undunawu a Khumbize Kandodo Chiponda ndi omwe amayankhula izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe komiti yolimbana ndi mliri wa Coronavirus mdziko muno inachititsa mu lolemba mzinda wa Lilongwe. A Chiponda ati ena mwalamulo atsopanowa ndi monga kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha anthu okhala pa mwambo wa maliro kufika pa 50 komanso kuti mwambo wa malirowo uzichitika pasanathe ma ola 24, mikumano ya anthu isaposere anthu 50 komanso kuti aliyense adzivala chotchinga ku kamwa ndi mphuno komanso kukhala motalikirana. Poyankhulapo nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani mdziko muno a Gospel Kazako anati ngakhale mliriwu wakhudza mdziko lino, anthu ambiri akuchira ku nthendayi. Nduna yowona za mgwirizano wa mdziko a Timothy Mtambo ati boma likugwira ntchito yake koma mzikanso zili ndi udindo waukulu othana ndi nthendayi potsatira njira zonse zopewera nthendayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu 7 Afa pa Ngozi ya Pansewu M’boma la Ntcheu
news: Anthu 7 afa ndipo anayi avulula modetsa nkhawa pa ngozi ya pansewu yomwe yachitika m’boma la Ntcheu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Hastings Chigalu, ngoziyi yachitika mu nsewu waukulu wa M1 pafupi ndi bank ya Standard mu tauni ya Ntcheu. Chigalu: Dalaivala anaphonya nsewu Sub Inspector Chigalu wati galimoto ya mtundu wa Truck yomwe nambala yake ndi KK 8172 ndipo imayendetsedwa ndi a Matias Mitengo, inasempha nsewu ndi kuwomba anthu omwe amayenda m’mbali mwa nsewuwu pomwe iye amafuna kusemphana ndi galimoto ina yomwe imabwera kutsogolo kwake. Galimotoyi inagubuduzika pomwepo ndipo anthu 7 kuphatikizapo oyendetsatu amwalira atangofika ku chipatala cha Ntcheu pomwe anthu ena 4 agonekedwa pa chipatalapa ndipo akulandira thandizo la mankhwala. Padakalipano apolisi m’bomalo apempha anthu kuti azitsatira malamulo apansewu pofuna kupewa ngozi zapansewu zomwe akuti zimachuluklira kwambiri m’bomalo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: SULOM Yaimitsa Masewero a Mpira wa Miyendo
news: Bungwe loyendetsa ligi yaikulu ya mpira wa miyendo mdziko muno la Super League of Malawi (SULOM) layimitsa masewero a mu ligi yaikulu ya TNM kwa sabata zitatu. Malinga ndi kalata yomwe bungweli latulutsa lachiwiri, bungweli lachita izi pofuna kutsatira ndondomeko zatsopano zopewera mliri wa COVID-19 zomwe boma lakhazikitsa. Masewerowa ayimitsidwa Kalatayi yati ndondomeko ya boma yoletsa mikumano ya anthu oposa makumi asanu (50) ndi yomwe yachititsa kuti bungweli liyimitse masewero onse kamba koti anthu omwe amatenga nawo mbali pa masewerowa amaposa chiwerengerochi. Wapampando wa bungweli Tiya Somba Banda wati mu nyengoyi akhala akukambirana ndi komiti yomwe mtsogoleri wa dziko lino anakhazikitsa yowna za mliri wa COVID-19 kuti akambirane njira zomwe zikuyenera kutsatidwa masewerowa asanayambirenso. Komabe iye wapempha matimu onse amasewera mu ligiyi kuti apitirizebe kuchita zokonzekera zawo pofuna kulimbitsa matupi awo ponena kuti masewero olimbitsa thupi amathandiziranso thupi kulimbana ndi matendawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Chinkhoma Amu Arkidayosizi ya Blantyre amwalira
news: Bambo Frederich Chinkhoma otumikira mpingo wa katolika mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre, amwalira. Malinga ndi kalata yomwe yasainidwa ndi mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno bambo Henry Saindi, bambo Chinkhoma amwalira lero ku chipatala cha Nguludi m’boma la Chiradzulu komwe anagonekedwa lachiwiri sabata yatha kaamba ka vuto la kuthamanga kwa magazi komanso shuga. Ali ku chipatalacho, anayezedwa nthenda ya COVID-19 ndipo anapezeka nayo zomwe zinachititsa achipatala kuti awagonekebe pa chipatalacho. Bambo Chinkhoma amwalira akutumikira ngati bambo mthandizi pa parishi ya Nguludi mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre. Mzimu wa bambo Frederich Chinkhoma uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsindika za Kufunika kwa Umodzi wa Akhristu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kwa umodzi pakati pa akhristu. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, kwa sabata ya thunthu chaka chilichonse mu mwezi wa January akhristu pa dziko lonse amachita mapemphero omwe cholinga chake ndi kupemphelera umodzi wa mipingo ya chikhristu (Week of Prayer for Christian Unity). M’mawu ake potsegulira sabata ya mapempheroyi, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kwa umodzi pakati pa mipingo ya chikhristu ndipo walimbikitsa akhristu kuti msabatayi apemphere zolimba kuti pakhale ubale wabwino pakati pa mipingo yonse ya chikhristu monga Yesu Khristu afunira. Iye wati kuchita mikangano sikungapindule kanthu ndipo kuti ndi chinthu chofunikira kwambiri ndikulimbikitsa umodzi wa akhristu onse. Mapempherowa adayamba kuchitika mchaka cha 1908 ndipo chaka chino akuchitika pa mutu woti Munthu wokhala mwa ine ndi inenso mwa iye amabereka zipatso zambiri (Uthenga Wabwino wa Yohane Woyera mutu 15 ndime ya 5. Papa Francisco mogwirizana ndi atsogoleri a mipingo ina ya chikhristu adzatsekera sabata ya mapempheroyi lolemba pa 25 January pochita limodzi mapemphero a madzulo mu tchalitchi lalikulu lodziwika kuti Basilica of St Paul’s Outside-the-Walls mu mzinda Rome.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CCJP Yapempha Akhristu Atenge Mbali Pobwezeretsa Chilengedwe
news: Bungwe la Chilungamo ndi Mtendere mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe lalimbikitsa akhristu mu arkidayosiziyo kuti apitilire kutenga mbali pa ntchito yobwezeletsa chilengedwe. Mkulu oyendetsa ntchito za bungweli mu arkidayosiziyi a Patrick Chima anena izi loweruka pa mkumano omwe adali nawo ndi mavolontiya a bungweli a ku parish ya Chezi mu arkidayosiziyi. Chima (kumanja) kuyankhula kwa mavolontiya A Chima anati mpingo uli ndi udindo waukulu othandizana ndi boma pa ntchito yomwe boma lidakhazikitsa yobwezeretsa chilengedwe pobzala mitengo yochuluka m’malo osiyansiyana. Apa iwo analimbikitsa mavolontiyawa kuti akhale patsogolo kuthandizana ndi akhristu aku parish-yi kuyambira ku miphakati kuti ntchito yolimbana ndi kusintha kwa nyengo ikhale yotheka. M’mawu ake wapampando wa mavolontiya a bungwe la Chilungamo ndi Mtendere ku parish ya Chezi a Davide Foster anati ndi okonzeka kuchilimika pa ntchotoyi ndipo kuti pakali pano abzalapo kale mbande za mitengo zokwana 2,500. Iwo anati ali okonzeka kupitilira kuchita izi ngati angathandizidwe kamba koti akukumana ndi vuto la kusowa kwa mbandezi. Nduna ya za nkhalango ndi chilengedwe Nancy Tembo adalengeza m’mbuyomu kuti boma likufuna kubzala mbande za mitengo zokwana 60 million munyengo yobzala mitengo ya 2020/2021 ndipo adapempha nzika iliyonse kuti itengepo mbali pa ntchitoyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Kazingatchire Amwalira
news: Bambo Dominic Kazingatchire omwe amatumikira mpingo wa katolika mu dayosizi ya Dedza amwalira. Malemu bambo Kazingatchire Malingana ndi chikalata chomwe likulu la mpingo wakatolika mdziko watulutsa, chomwe chasayinidwa ndi mlembi wankulu ku bungwe la ma episkopi a mpingowu bambo Henry Saindi, bambo Kazingatchire amwalira m’mawa wa lero atadwala nthenda ya COVID-19 yomwe anapezeka nayo pa 9 mwezi uno ku chipatala cha Adventist mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Bambo Kazingatchire amwalira akugwira ntchito ngati mkulu owona za maphunziro ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Catholic ku Nguludi m’boma la Chiradzulu. Mwambo woika m’manda thupi la malemu bambo Dominic Kazingatchire uchitika lero lomwe nthawi ya 3 koloko madzulo kumanda a ansembe ku Bembeke Cathedral mu dayosizi ya Dedza. Mzimu wa bambo Dominic Kazingatchire uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mayeso Apitilira Ngakhale Sukulu Zatsekedwa-Unduna
news: Unduna wa zamaphunziro mdziko muno wati mayeso a fomu 4 komanso mayeso ena onse omwe akulembedwa msukulu za ukachenjede mdziko muno apitilira ngakhale mtsogoleri wa dziko lino walamula kuti sukulu zitsekedwe. Izi zikudza potsatira zomwe mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera walamula dzulo usiku kuti sukulu zonse zitsekedwe kwa sabata zitatu pofuna kuchepetsa kufala kwa mliri wa COVID-19. Wasaina chikalatacho-Mussa Malinga ndi chikalata chomwe undunawu watulutsa ndipo wasaina ndi mlembi mu undunawu a Chikondano Mussa mayesowa apitilira koma motsatira ndondomeko zokhwima zopewera mliri wa COVID-19. Sukuluzi akuti zikuyembekezeka kudzatsekulidwanso pa 8 February chaka chino. Malinga ndi zomwe mtsogoleri wa dziko lino anayankhula ku mtundu wa a Malawu dzulo usiku, ophunzira omwe ali ku sukulu zogonera komweko, akhalebe podikira kuti akuluakulu a sukulu agwire ntchito ndi a zaumoyo powonetsetsa ngati ngati sukulu zawo zakhudzidwa ndi kachilomboka komanso ngati kuli koyenera kuti ophunzirawa apite m’ma kwawo. Pakadali pano, Dr. Chakwera wati boma lipereka 17 billion yapadera yothandizira kuthana ndi mliriwu. Mwa zina, mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu wati malo ogulitsira mowa adzitsekedwa 8 koloko madzulo ndipo misika idzitsekedwa 5 koloko madzulo. Iye walamulanso kuti chiwerengero cha osonkhana pa miyambo iliyonse chisapose anthu 50 ndipo malo onse omwe kumasonkhana anthu adzipoperedwa mankhwala kawiri pa sabata. Iye waonjezeranso kuti komiti yomwe ikuyendetsa za Covid-19 isayinire malumulo ena othandizira kupewa matendawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Thupi la Sister Ndawala Liyikidwa M’manda Lolemba
news: Mwambo oyika m’manda thupi la malemu Sister Mary Magdalena Ndawala a chipani cha Terezian Sisters of the Child Jesus uchitika lolemba pa 18 January 2021 ku Mlale parish mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Malemu Sister Ndawala Malinga ndi m’modzi mwa akuluakulu a chipanichi Sister Agness Jonas, Sister Ndawala amwalira dzulo ku chipatala cha Kamuzu Central Hospital mu mzinda wa Lilongwe atadwala nthenda ya chibayo komanso shuga. Iwo anabadwa pa 28 July 1966 ndipo amwalira atatumikira chipanichi kwa zaka 30. Pa nthawi ya imfa yawo, Sister Ndawala anali mkulu owona zachuma mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Mzimu wa Sister Mary Magadalena Ndawala uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Ntcheu Alanda Njinga Zamoto 21
news: Apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu alanda njinga zamoto 21 kamba kophwanya malamulo a pansewu. Malinga ndi wachiwiri wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Rebecca Kwisongole, ntchitoyi inachitika ngati njira imodzi yothandiza kuchepetsa ngozi za pansewu zomwe zikuchulukira m’bomalo. Njinga zamoto zomwe zalandidwazo Sub Inspector Kwisongole ati ina mwa milandu yomwe oyendetsa njingazi apalamula ndi monga kuyendetsa njinga zopanda chiphaso, kuyendetsa njinga zosalembetsedwa komanso kuyendetsa njinga osavala chipewa chodzitetezera. Pakadali pano ena mwa oyendetsa njingazi akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu ndi kukayankha milandu yawo. Apolisiwa atinso ngati njira imodzi yofuna kuchepetsa kufala kwa mliri wa COVID-19 mdziko muno, akhazikitsa ntchito yozungulira m’bomali kukakamiza munthu aliyense kuvala chotchingira kukamwa ndi mphuno komanso kukhala motalikirana kuphatikizanso kusamba m’manja ndi sopo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati ndi Wokhuzidwa ndi Ngozi ya Chivomerezi Mdziko la Indonesia
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya chivomerezi yomwe yachitika mdziko la Indonesia. Polankhula kudzera mwa mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa katolika Cardinal Pietro Parolin, Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya chivomerezi yomwe yachitika pa chilumba cha Sulawesi mdziko la Indonesia. Iye wati ali pafupi ndi anthu onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi mu njira zosiyana-siyana ndipo wapepesa anthu onse omwe abale awo afa pa ngoziyi. Pomaliza iye wayikiza mizimu ya anthu onse omwe afa pa ngoziyi m’manja mwa Mulungu. Lachisanu chivomerezi cha mphamvu chagwedeza chilumba cha Sulawesi m’dziko la Indonesia ndi kupha anthu 42. Malipoti ochokera m’dzikolo ati anthu 637 avulala ndipo anthu 15,000 akusowa pokhala nyumba zao zitawonongeka. Anthu opulumutsa anzawo pa ngozi ati akhulupirira kuti anthu ambiri akwiririka ndi nyumba zawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Episkopi wa Mdziko la Zambia Wamwalira Atadwala COVID-19
news: Episkopi wa dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Monze mdziko la Zambia, ambuye Moses Hamungole amwalira atadwala nthenda ya COVID-19. Ambuye Hamungole amwalira usiku wa lachitatu ku chipatala cha Levi Mwanawasa chomwe chili mu mzinda wa Lusaka komwe anawagoneka atadwala nthendayi. Amwalira ndi COVID-19 -Ambuye Hamungole Ambuye Hamungole ndi m’modzi mwa maepiskopi a mdziko la Zambia omwe anafika mdziko muno mwezi watha kudzakhala nawo pa mwambo woyika m’manda thupi la malemu archbishop Tarcizio Ziyaye a arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Ambuye Hamungole anabadwa m’chaka cha 1967 mdera la Kafuwe mdziko la Zambia ndipo anachita maphunziro ku sukulu yosulira ansembe ya Mukasa Minor seminary. Atatsiriza maphunziro awo a sekondale anakachita maphunziro ozama ku sukulu ya St. Augustine Philosophical seminary komanso maphunziro a zauzimu ku St. Dominic Theological Seminary mdzikolo ndipo anadzodzedwa unsembe mchaka cha 1994. Iwo anakhalapo mkulu wa wayilesi ya Yatsani komanso mkulu oyan’nagira zofalitsa mauthenga mu ark-dayosizi ya Lusaka. Mchaka cha 2002 mpaka 2008 anagwira ntchito ngati mlembi ku nthambi yoona zofalitsa ma uthenga ku bungwe la ma episkopi a maiko akumvuma kwa Africa la AMECEA. Asanakhale episkopi iwo anali mkulu oyan’ganira ma pologalamu a chingerezi komanso Swahili ku wayilesi ya Vatican ndipo anasankhidwa pa udindowu mchaka cha 2010. Iwo anasankhidwa kukhala bishop mchaka cha 2014 ndipo kufikira thawi yomwe amwalira amatumikira mu dayosizi ya Monze mdziko la Zambia. Mzimu wa ambuye Moses Hamungole uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha Akazi a Mafumu Kuthandizira Pothetsa Nkhaza Kwa Amayi
news: Apolisi m’boma la Balaka apempha amayi omwe ali mu gulu la akazi a mafumu a mdera la Senior Chief Kalembo komanso Sub T/A Kachenga kuti agwirane manja ndi apolisiwa pofuna kuthetsa nkhanza kwa amayi ndi atsikana mderali. Malingana ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Felix Misomali, pempholi laperekedwa pa mkumano wa apolisi ndi amayiwa pofuna kulimbana ndi mavuto omwe amayi akukumana nawo. Iwo ati akazi a mafumu ali ndi udindo waukulu pothana ndi mchitidwewu potengera kuti Balaka ndi limodzi mwa maboma asanu ndi atatu omwe mchitidwewu wakula kwambiri chaka chathachi. Malinga ndi Inspector Misomali, padakali pano milandu yogwililira yakwera ndi 24 percent mchaka cha 2020 poyerekeza ndi m’mene inalili 2019. Pamenepa iwo alimbikitsa anthuwa kuti azikanena kwa adindo a m’mudzi ngati akumana ndi nkhanza zilizonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Apempha Anthu Apewe Kuwoloka Mitsinje Yodzadza
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mangochi apempha anthu kuti apewe kuwoloka mitsinje yodzadza pofuna kupewa ngozi zomira m’madzi. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani m’bomalo Sub Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi, pempholi ladza pomwe galimoto ina ya mtundu Mahindra pick-up yomwe nambala yake ndi BW 3428 ndipo imayendetsedwa ndi a Moses John yakokoloka ndi madzi pomwe amawoloka mtsinje wa Likoloma. Daudi: Galimoto yakokoloka Daudi wati galimotoyi imachokera ku Makanjira kulowera ku Mangochi boma ndipo inanyamula anthu komanso katundu. “Atafika pa mtsinjewu anapeza utadzadza kwambiri ndipo anaganiza zowoloka koma anthu ena omwe anali m’galimotomu anatsikamo kusiya oyendetsayu kuti awoloke yekha. Alimkati mowoloka mtsinjewu galimotoyi inakokoloka ndi madzi koma palibe yemwe wavulala pangoziyi m’malo mwake katundu wa anthu omwe anakwera galimotoyi wakokoloka ndi madzi,” anatero Daudi. Padakali pano apolisi apempha anthu kuti adzitsatira nkhani za nyengo kuti apewe ngozi zomira ndi madzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhritsu Aziyamika Mulungu Nthawi Zonse
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kumathokoza Mulungu pa mtendere ngakhalenso nthawi ya mavuto. Popitiriza kuphunzitsa anthu pa mutu wa mapemphero kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira ma buku Vatican Apostolic Library, Papa wati kuyamika Mulungu kudzera m’mapemphero sikukuyenera kuwona nyengo. Papa Francisco wati pamene akhristu sayiwala kuyamika Mulungu kudzera m’mapemphero mu nthawi yovuta mapeto ake amakhala okoma popeza akhristuwo amasinthika ndi kukhala anthu atsopano. Iye wati akhristu amaonetsa chikhulupiriro chao chosagwedezeka mwa Mulungu pamene apitirira kuyamika Mulungu ngakhale pa nthawi yomwe zinthu zafika pothina. Papa Francisco wati pali zitsanzo zambiri za akhristu komanso anthu oyera omwe kudzera m’mapemphero anali kuyamika Mulungu ngakhale anakumana ndi zokhoma m’moyo wawo. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti Mulungu ndi bwenzi losawona nyengo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Walamula Masiku Atatu Olira Nduna Za Boma
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Lazarus Chakwera walamula kuti pakhale masiku atatu olira maliro a nduna ziwiri komanso anthu omwe amwalira kamba ka nthenda ya COVID-19 mdziko muno. Mtsogoleriyu wanena izi mu kulankhula kwake ku mtundu wa Malawi ku Kamuzu Palace mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iye wati pomwe ndunazi zimayembekezeka kupatsidwa ulemu otsiriza ndi asilikali a dziko lino, izi sizichitika kamba kofuna kupewa kufala kwa nthendayi ndipo m’malo mwake mbendera zonse za dziko lino zikuyenera kutsika theka kwa masiku atatu pomwe dziko likhalenso pa chisoni. Popitiriza kuyankhula mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu anati anthu onse akufuna kwabwino akuyenera kuthandiza nthambi yowona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzi mdziko muno ndi thandizo lililonse ndi cholinga choti nthambiyo ithandize kuchepetsa kufala kwa nthendayi mdziko muno. Pomaliza mtsogoleriyu wapempha nthambi za boma kuti zibwere pamodzi kuti athandizane kukhazikitsa njira zatsopano zomwe zingathe kuyikidwa mu ndondomeko yothana ndi kufala kwa nthendayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mfumu Yaikulu Njolomole Yamwalira Itadwala COVID-19
news: Mfumu yaikulu Njolomole ya m’boma la Ntcheu yamwalira m’mawa wa lero itadwala nthenda ya COVID-19.  Mfumu yaikulu Njolomole Malinga ndi mneneri wa khonsolo ya bomali Mastone Kaiya mfumuyi yamwalira pachipatala chagulupu cha Queen Elizabeth Central mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Mwambo woyika m’manda thupi la malemuwa wachitika lero lomwe masanawa kumudzi kwawo. Polankhula pa mwambowo wapampando wa khonsolo ya boma la Ntcheu, khansala Jumbe Mambo wati boma la Ntcheu lataya mfumu imene inali ngati kholo la mafumu ena komanso yomwe inali yolimbikira ntchito yake. Iye wati mfumu yaikulu Njolomole inali yolimbikitsa bata ndi mtendere pakati pa anthu ake. Mwazina iye walimbikitsa anthu a m’bomalo kuti apitirize kutsatira ndondomeko zonse zothandiza kupewa mliri wa COVID-19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nduna Ziwiri Zamwalira ndi COVID-19
news: Nduna ziwiri za boma mdziko muno lero zamwalira kaamba ka nthenda ya COVID-19.  Nduna zomwalira ndi Covid-19 Mia (kumanzere), Berekayama (kumanja) Ndunazi, a Lingson Belekanyama omwe anali nduna yowona za maboma a ang’ono komanso a Muhamad Sidik Mia omwe anali nduna yowona za mtengatenga amwalilira ku chipatala komwe amalandira thandizo la mankhwala.   Padakalipano nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani mdziko muno a Gospel Kazako apempha anthu mdziko muno kuti agwirane manja polimbana ndi mliriwu. “Tili mu nyengo yovuta kufotokoza kwake komanso ngati dziko tapanikizika kwambiri ndipo tiyang’ane kutsogolo ndi chiyembekezo poyang’ana kwa chauta ndi kumukhulupilira. Tataya nduna ziwiri lero lokha. Lero ndi tsiku losayiwalika mdziko muno,” anatero a Kazako. Iye wati pomwe dziko likulimbana ndi kachilombo kosaoneka ndi maso anthu akuyenera kuyang’ana kutsogolo ndi chiyembekezo pokhulupilira Chauta kudzera m’mapemphero.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wavomereza Amayi Kuwerenga Mawu, Kuthandizira Misa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco walengeza kuti amayi atha tsopano kuwerenga mau a Mulungu komanso kuthandizira misa movomerezeka ndi malamulo a mpingo. – Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wati ngakhale kuti m’maiko ena amayi anayamba kale kuthandizira komanso kuwerenga mawu a Mulungu pa misa, iye wati izi tsopano zizichitika movemerezeka ndi malamulo a mpingo wa katolika. Zoti amayi ndi asungwana atha kuwerenga Mau a Mulungu komanso kuthandizira Misa si nkhani ya chilendo chifukwa zakhala zikuchitika m’ma parish ena pa dziko la pansi movomerezeka ndi a episkopi a ku madera amenewo. Koma zimenezi zakhala zikuchitika mopanda malamulo a mpingo (Canon Law) kuvomereza. Kudzera m’kalata yake Motu proprio Spiritus Domini, Papa Francisco wasintha ndime yoyamba ya lamulo nambala 230 m’buku la malamulo a mpingo kuvomereza za kusinthaku. Iye watsindika kuti utumikiwu ukudza kaamba ka unsembe wa chifumu (Royal Priesthood) wodza kudzera mu Sakramenti la Ubatizo ndipo kuti ndi zosiyana ndi unsembe wochita kudzodzedwa (Sacrament of Holy Orders). Pomaliza, Papa Francisko watsindika kuti mpingo wa katolika ulibe mphamvu yodzodza amayi kukhala ansembe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Katundu wa ku Malo Osungira Anthu Odwala COVID-19 ku Dedza Wabedwa
news: Anthu omwe sakudziwika athyola ndi kuba ku malo omwe osungira anthu odwala nthenda ya COVID-19 pa chipatala chachikulu cha boma la Dedza. Mneneri wa nthambi ya za umuyo m’bomalo, a Mwai Liabunya atsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti pomwe dziko lino lili pakalikiliki kulimbana ndi mliriwu, anthu ena osafunira zabwino dziko lawo akuba zipangizo zothandizira kuthana ndi nthendayi. “Anthu aba zinthu zosiyanasiyana monga zofunda, ziwiya za ku kitchini ndi katundu wina wambiri. Padakalipano chiwelengero cha anthu omwe apezeka ndi nthendayi m’boma lino la Dedza chikukwera tsiku ndi tsiku zomwe zikupereka chiwopsezo kwambiri,” anatero a Liabunya. A Liabunya ati padakalipano anthu omwe anagonekedwa ku malowa akulandilira thandizo la mankhwala m’makomo mwawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Mangochi Alanda Njinga Zamoto 10 Kamba Kophwanya Malamulo a Pansewu
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mangochi alanda njinga zamoto khumi pamene oyendetsa njingazi akuwaganizira kuti aphwanya malamulo osiyanasiyana a pansewu. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi, ntchitoyi yachitika lamulungu m’misewu ya Monkebay, Bakili Muluzi komanso Peter Mutharika ngati mbali imodzi yokhazikitsa njira zochepetsera ngozi za pansewu zomwe akuti zikuchulukira m’bomalo. Daudi wati pokhazikitsa ntchitoyi amafuna kuwona m’mene ogwiritsa ntchito misewuyi akutsatilira ndondomeko zodzitetezera ku ngozi. Iye wati mu nthawi ya zisangalalo pomwe chaka cha 2020 chimatha, anthu oyendetsa njinga okwana anayi anali mu gulu la anthu 8 omwe afa kaamba ka ngozi za pansewu zomwe zinachitika m’bomalo. Oyendetsa njinga zamotozi amangidwa pa milandu monga kuyendetsa njinga zosakhomera msonkho, kuyendetsa njinga zosalembetsedwa, kuyendetsa njinga opanda chiphaso choyendetsera komanso kusavala chipewa chodzitetezera poyendetsa ndipo akuyembekezeka ku kaonekera ku bwalo la milandu kuti akayankhe pa milandu yomwe apalamulayo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kusintha Kwa Nyengo Kwakhudza Miyoyo ya Anthu aku Machinga
news: Anthu okhala mdera la mfumu yaikulu Nkula m’boma la Machinga adandaula kamba ka mavuto osiyanasiyana omwe akukumana nawo chifukwa cha kausintha kwa nyengo. Anthuwa anena izi lachisanu pamene amapereka chikalata cha madandaulo okhudza nkhaniyi kwa phungu wa dera lawo, Bright Msaka. Malinga ndi kalata yomwe anthuwa apereka, ena mwa mavuto omwe akukumana nawo ndi monga kusabwera bwino kwa mvula, mbozi zowononga mbewu, mphepo ya mkuntho komanso kusowekera kwa madzi a ukhondo kungotchulapo zochepa chabe. Ngulinga (kumanzere) kupereka chikalatacho kwa a Msaka Popereka chikalatachi oyimira mfumu yaikulu Nkula, a Omar Ngulinga ati chilengedwe cha mderalo chinasintha kamba ka vuto la anthu ogwetsa mitengo omwe amawotcha Makala mu nkhalango ya mderalo. Poyankhapo pa madandaulowa phungu wa derali Bright Msaka anati mkumanowu unali ofunika kamba koti wathandiza kuti akambirane ndi anthu a mdera lake za mavuto omwe akukumana nawo kamba ka kusintha kwa nyengo ndipo anati iye ndi anthuwo athandizana podzala mitengo yochuluka kuti achepetse mavutowo. Poyankhulapo mkulu wa bungwe la Catholic Development Commission (CADECOM) a Aaron Kandiwo Mtaya ati kudzera mu project yomwe akugwira mderali ya Resource Rights and Use, akufuna kulimbikitsa a Malawi kuti akhale ndi njira zoyenera zothana ndi mavuto omwe amakumana nawo kamba ka ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi. Bungwe la CADECOM likugwira ntchitoyi m’maboma a Machinga, Chikwawa komanso Dedza ndi cholinga chofuna kukhala ndi mzika zodalirika mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhritsu Adzikondwelera Tsiku Lomwe Analandira Ubatizo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kumakondwelera tsiku lomwe adalandira Sakramenti la Ubatizo. Polankhula pambuyo pa pemphero la mthenga wa mnjelo kwa Amayi Maria (Angelus) kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira ma buku Vatican pa tsiku la chaka cha Ubatizo wa Ambuye Yesu, Papa wati akhristu akuyenera kumalemekeza ndi kukondwelera tsiku lomwe adalandira ubatizo. Iye wati tsikuli likuyenera kukhala chaka cha chikulu m’moyo wa mkhristu aliyense yemwe anabatizidwa popeza kudzera mu Sakramenti la Ubatizo akhristu amalandira Mzimu Woyera ndi kusanduka ana a Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati polandira Ubatizo akhristu amasanduka ana enieni a Mulungu ndipo mawu ochokera kumwamba omwe adamveka pa tsiku la Ubatizo wa Ambuye Yesu oti “uyu ndiye mwana wanga wokondeka ndipo mwa Iye ndikondwera” ndi mawu omwenso Mulungu amalankhula pamene mkhristu aliyense akubatizidwa. Iye wati Mulungu ndi wa chikondi komanso wa chifundo chifukwa zimenezi zimafikira aliyense ngakhale awo omwe sadabatizidwe popeza nawonso ndi ana a Mulungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Akhritsu Apemhelere Ubale Wabwino Pakati Pawo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha a Katolika onse kuti apemphelere ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu onse pa dziko la pansi. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, mwezi uliwonse Papa amakhala ndi cholinga cha mapemphero ake (Prayer Intention) ndipo mwezi uno wa January cholinga cha mapemphero ake ndi kupempherera ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu azipembedzo zosiyana-siyana kuti potero anthu athe kupewa mikangano komanso nkhondo zochitika kaamba ka zipembedzo. Posinkhasinkha za cholinga cha mapemphero ake mwezi uno Papa Francisco wati kupemphera monga Yesu Khristu anali kuchitira kumathandiza akhristu kukhala pa ubale wabwino ndi anthu a zipembedzo zina. Iye wati ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu umathandiza anthu kukhala ngati ana a banja limodzi poonetsana chikondi, kuthandizana komanso kudziwana. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti Mpingo wa Katolika umalemekeza zipembedzo zina koma pa nthawi yomweyo suiwala kuti Uthenga Wabwino wa Yesu Khristu ndiwo kasupe wa ulemerero wa munthu aliyense komanso kasupe wa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ECM ndi Yokhuzidwa ndi Kukwera Kwa Chiwerengero cha Anthu Opezeka ndi COVID-19
news: Bungwe la ma episkopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) lati ndi lokhuzidwa ndi kuchuluka kwa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akupezeka ndi nthenda ya COVID-19 mdziko muno. Bungweli lanena izi kudzera mu kalata yomwe bungweli latulutsa lachisanu ndipo yasainidwa ndi ma episkopi onse ampingo wa katolika mdziko muno komanso akulu akulu oyendetsa ntchito za dayosizi ya Dedza anakhazikitsa yowona za mliri wa COVID-19 mdziko muno, Lachitatu pa 6 January anthu omwe anapezeka ndi nthendayi ndi okwana 227 ndipo lachinayi pa 7 January anthu okwana 274 ndi omwe apezeka ndi kachilomboka chomwe ndi chiwerengero chokwera kwambiri kupezeka mu tsiku limodzi chiyambireni nthendayi mdziko muno. Kutsatira izi bungwe la maepiskopi-li lapempha atsogoleri a mpingowu komanso akhritsu ake kupitiriza kutsatira njira zopewera nthendayi zomwe unduna wa zaumoyo unakhazikitsa komanso zomwe bungweli linkhazikitsa. Zina mwa ndondomeko zomwe bungweli linakhazikitsa ndi monga kusamba m’manja ndi sopo, kuvala chotchinga kukamwa ndi mphuno, kupewa moni wapadzanja komanso kukhala motalikirana. Bungweli latinso chiwerengero cha anthu okumana m’mapemphero chisapose 100 komanso kuti nyumba zowulutsira mawu za mpingowu zizichita miyambo ya nsembe za ukaritsiya, kungotchulapo zochepa chabe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Unduna Wati Umanga Tent Powonjezera Kalasi Zophunzilira Msukulu
news: Unduna wa zamaphunziro wati umanga ma tent powonjezera makalasi msukulu zina za mdziko muno ndi cholinga chofuna kuwonetsetsa kuti ophunzira akukhala motalikirana popewa kupatsirana kachirombo koyambitsa nthenda ya Covid-19. Mneneri mu undunawu a Chikondi Chimala ndi omwe anena izi pamene Radio Maria Malawi imafuna kudziwa zomwe undunawu ukuchita pofuna kuteteza ophunzira padakalipano pomwe chiwerengero cha anthu opezeka ndi nthenda ya Covid-19 chikukwera mdziko muno. Iwo ati akudziwa kuti kalasi zikuyenera kuchepa kutsatira dongosolo loti ana adzikhala motalikirana mkalasi choncho ndi koyenera kupeza njira zina zoti ophunzira apitirizire maphunziro awo. A Chimala apempha makomiti onse omwe anakhazikitsidwa msukulu zonse za mdziko muno kuti akhale patsogolo kuthandizira ophunzirawa kutsatira ndondomeko zonse zomwe zinakhazikitsidwa msukulu zopewera nthendayi. “Sabata yomwe ino komiti ya Presidential Task Force inavomereza kuti unduna wa zamaphunziro upatsidwe ndalama zokwanira pafupifupi 1 billion-kwacha kuti zithandizire kugula ma tent ngati kuonjezera makalasi msukulu kuti ana azikhala motalikirana,” anatero Chimala. Komabe mneneriyu sananene ngati pali malingaliro otsekanso sukulu mdzik muno kutsatira kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu opezeka ndi nthendayi m’malo osiyanasiyana mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Zikhalidwe, Zipembedzo Zikukolezera Maukwati a Ana-Social Welfare
news: Nthambi ya boma yowona za chisamaliro cha anthu ya Social Welfare m’boma la Zomba yati chikhalidwe komanso zipembedzo ndi zina mwa zinthu zomwe zikukolezera mchitidwe wa maukwati a ana m’bomalo. Mkulu wa bungweli m’bomalo a Christopher Ndaona ndi omwe anena izi pa msonkhano ofotokozera mmene bungweli komanso mabungwe ena omwe siaboma agwilira ntchito yawo yoteteza ana m’miyezi ya October ndi November chaka chatha. Iwo ati zaonetsa kuti chaka chapitachi ana ambiri alowa m’mabanja choncho ndi kofunika kuti makolo agwire ntchito limodzi ndi bungweli pothetsa mchitidwewu. “Pali zifukwa zambiri koma chikhalidwe komanso zipembedzo ndi zomwe zikukoledzera mchitidwe umenewu kwambiri. Miyezi iwiri imeneyi ili ndi chiwerengero chokwera kwambiri ndipo tipempha makolo kuti tigwire nawo ntchito,” anatero a Ndaona. Pamenepa a Ndaona apempha mbali zonse zokhudzidwa kuti zibwere pamodzi ndi kugwirana manja polimbana ndi mchitidwewu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ansembe Awiri Apezeka ndi COVID-19, Tchalitchi Latsekedwa
news: Mapemphero ayimitsidwa kwa masiku awiri ku parishi ya St. Pius mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre, ansembe awiri apa parishiyo kuphatikizapo anthu ena atapezeka ndi kachilombo ka Coronavirus. Mkulu wa ofesi ya zofalitsa nkhani mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre, bambo Frank Mwinganyama atsimikiza kuti bambo mfumu a parishiyi bambo George Kaliati komanso bambo Grevazio Namba apezeka ndi kachilomboka ndipo ati mapemphero sachitika pa parishiyi lachinayi komanso lachisanu sabata ino kaamba koti mu tchalitchilo mwapoperedwa mankhwala. “Ndizoona ansembe onse awiri omwe amatumikira pa parishiyi apezeka ndi kachilombo ka Coronavirus ndiye tchalitchilo latsekedwa chifukwa apoperamo koma mapemphero ayambiranso pakatha masiku awiri,” anatero bambo Mwinganyama. Pamenepa iwo alangiza akhristu a m’parishiyi kuti asadere nkhawa koma apemphelere ansembe awo kuti apeze bwino msanga ndipo ati mapemphero ayambiranso pa parishiyo masiku awiriwa akatha koma motsatira njira zomwe maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno anakhazikitsa zothandiza popewa mliriwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Umodzi Mdziko la Central African Republic
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha mbali zonse zokhudzidwa kuti zibwere pamodzi ndi kuchita zokambirana pofuna kuti mtendere ubwelerenso m’dziko la Central African Republic. Polankhula ku dziko lonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira ma buku Vatican Apostolic Library atamaliza kutsogolera pemphero la uthenga wa mnjelo kwa Amayi Maria (Angelus), Papa wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi zipolowe zomwe zikuchitika m’dziko la Central African Republic kaamba kosagwirizana pa zotsatira za chisankho chomwe chinachitika m’dzikolo posachedwapa. Pamenepa iye wapempha mbali zonse zokhudzidwa kuti zibwere pamodzi ndi kuchita zokambirana kuti potero bata ndi mtendere zibwererenso m’dzikolo. Papa Francisco wati akutsatira ndi chidwi zomwe zikuchitika ku Central African Republic ndipo akudziwa kuti khumbo la anthu ambiri ndi loti mtendere ubwererenso m’dziko la m’dzikolo. Dziko la Central African Republic ndi limodzi mwa maiko osaukitsitsa pa dziko la pansi ngakhale kuti lili ndi miyala ya mtengo wa patali monga diamond. President wa dzikolo Faustin-Archange Touadéra anapambananso pa chisankho chomwe chinachitika m’dzikolo pa 27 December chaka chathachi koma zipani zotsutsa zikuti chisankhochi sichidayende mwa chilungamo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MRA Yachenjeza Anthu Ozemba Msonkho
news: Bungwe lotolera msonkho mdziko muno la Malawi Revenue Authority (MRA) lachenjeza ochita malonda omwe ali ndi mchitidwe ozemba msonkho kuti akapezeka adzalandira chilango komanso kutsekeredwa malo awo. Wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa bungweli Commissioner Henry Ngutwa wapereka chenjezoli pa msonkhano wa olemba nkhani omwe unachitika lachiwiri mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Iye wati kuzemba kupereka msonkho ndi kubera boma ndipo kumalepheretsa boma kupeza ndalama zogwilira ntchito za chitukuko choncho anthu otere akuyenera kulandira chilango chokhwima. Pamenepa iye wapempha anthu kuti azidziwitsa bungweli akapeza ochita malonda omwe akuzemba kutulutsa lisiti la VAT pa makina a bungweli msitolo zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno. Ntchitoyi yomwe akuitcha Kuiphula Ndi Lisiti Langa iyamba pa 11 January ndi kutha pa 31 March chaka chino ndipo ithandiza anthu omwe aulure amalonda ozemba kupereka nsonkho ndipo munthu owulurayo azilandira mphotho ya ndalama zokwana 40,000 kwacha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ntchito Yomanga Likulu la Radio Maria ku Lilongwe Yayambika
news: Ntchito yomanga likulu latsopano la Radio Maria Malawi ku Area 43 mu mzinda wa Lilongwe akuti ipitilira kuyenda bwino ngakhale yayamba kugwiridwa mu nyengo ya mvula. Izi zadziwika pomwe mtolankhani wathu anakayendera ndi kucheza ndi ena mwa akulu-akulu ochokera ku kampani ya Mangalasi construction yomwe ikugwira ntchito yomanga likululi pa malopa. Mtolankhani wathuyu wapeza kuti zipangizo zina zogwilira ntchito yomanga likululi zafika komanso ntchito zina zayamba kale kugwiridwa. Polankhulapo m’modzi mwa akuluakulu a kampaniyi a James Nkosi ati ntchitoyi ikuyenda bwino. “Tapanga excarvation yam panda tamaliza komanso excarvation ya main studio tamaliza. Cement, miyala yak wale komanso mchenga ibwera pofika mawa ndipo zonse zili bwino,” anatero a Nkosi. Katswiri owona zomangamanga ku kampani ya Mangalasi Construction a Augustine Macheso ati ayesetsa kuti ntchoyi ithe mu nthawi yake. Mwazina ntchitoyi ikuyembekezeka kutenga sabata 36 ndipo ndi ya ndalama zokwana 610 million kwacha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Gogo Waphedwa M’boma la Dedza Pomuganizira Kuti ndi Mfiti
news: Mayi wina wachikulire wa m’boma la Dedza waphedwa kamba komuganizira kuti akukhuzidwa ndi imfa ya mnyamata wina wa zaka 12, mu njira ya ufiti. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Cassim Manda, mayiyu Silvia Banda pamodzi ndi mamuna wake, amaganiziridwa kuti analodza Lazack Moses pomwe anayamba kudwala. Makolo a mnyamatayu anamutengera kwa asin’ganga komwe anakhalako masiku angapo koma tsiku lamulungu anaganiza zomutengera ku chipatala komwe wamwalira akulandira mankhwala a malungo. Sergeant Manda wati imfayi inadzetsa mkwiyo pakati pa abale a mnyamatayu komanso adzukulu okumba manda pomwe anawuza gogoyo kuti akakumbe manda yekha ndipo pambuyo pake anthwo anapha mayiyo komanso anthu ena awiri. Apolisi anathamangira ku maloko ndipo anatengera anthuwo ku chipatala komwe anatsimikiza kuti gogoyu wamwalira. Padakali pano apolisi akufuna-funa anthu omwe achita zimenezi ndipo adzudzula zomwe zachitikazo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu aku South Africa Akukweza Chiwerengero cha Anthu Opezeka ndi COVID-19 M’boma la Mangochi
news: Ofesi ya zaumoyo m’boma la Mangochi yati ndi yokhudzidwa ndi kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu opezeka ndi nthenda ya Covid-19 m’bomalo. Mkulu owona zoteteza anthu ku matenda m’bomalo Dr. Kondwani Mamba wauza atolankhani kuti mwezi wa November palibe aliyense amene amadwala nthendayi koma kuyambira kumapeto a mwezi wa December kufikira lero anthu okwana 24 ndi omwe apezeka ndi kachilomboka m’bomalo. Dr. Mamba wati chiwerengerochi chakwera kwambiri chifukwa cha anthu ochokera mdziko la South Africa omwe anabwera m’bomali mwezi wa December kudzachita tchuthi. “Kumapeto kwa November chaka chathachi ku Mangochi kunoko sikumapezeka anthu odwala Corona koma kumapeto kwa December achulukirapo kufika pa 24 pomwe ambiri mwaiwo ndi okuti achita kubwera kuchokera mdziko la South Africa,” anatero Dr. Mamba. Padakalipano anthu 181 ndi omwe anapezeka ndi kachilombo ka Coronavirus m’boma la Mangochi chiyambireni nthendayi mwezi wa May chaka chino ndipo anthu 155 anachira komanso anthu awiri anamwalira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: DPP Defenders Yapempha Kuti Aliyense Akhale ndi Mwayi Opikisana pa Mpando wa President
news: Gulu lomwe akulitcha DPP Defenders lomwe lili kumbuyo kwa chipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) lati likufuna kuti mchipanimu mukhale mpata oti aliyense athe kupikisana nawo pa udindo wa mtsogoleri wa chipanichi. Walowa chipani cha DPP posachedwapa-Kabambe M’khalapakati wa gululi Frederick Billy Malata wauza Radio Maria Malawi lachiwiri kuti ufulu wa democracy ukuyenera kuti ulemekezedwe ndipo kuti pasawoneke munthu yemwe angayikiridwe kumbuyo mwa mtundu uliwonse kuti zotsatira za chisankho cha ku convention zidzakhale zokomera aliyense. Malata amayankhapo pa mphekesera zomwe zilipo kuti m’modzi mwa omwe akufuna kudzapikisana nawo pa udindo wa mtsogoleri wachipanichi Dr. Dalitso Kabambe akupatsidwa mphamvu ndi mtsogoleri wa chipanichi Peter Mutharika. Apa iye wati ndi zosangalatsa kuti anthu ambiri akuonetsa chidwi chofuna kupikisana nawo pa udindowu zomwe zikuonetsa kuti chipanichi chikadali ndi mphamvu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wavomereza Cardinal Njue Kutula Pansi Udindo
