news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wavomera Cardinal John Njue kutula pansi udindo wake ngati archbishop wa archdiocese ya Nairobi mdziko la Kenya. Malinga ndi malipoti a waileis ya Vatican, malamulo a mpingo wa katolika (Canon Law) amalora episkopi kutula pansi udindo wake pamene wakwanitsa zaka 75 zakubadwa. Papa Francisko ndi Cardinal Njue Mogwirizana ndi malamulowa ofesi yofalitsa ma uthenga ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican (Holy See Press Office) yalengeza lolemba kuti Papa Francisco wavomera Cardinal John Njue kutula pansi udindo wake ngati Archbishop wa Archdiocese ya Nairobi m’dziko la Kenya. Cardinal Njue yemwe anabadwa m’chaka cha 1944 wakhala ali Archbishop wa Archdiocese ya Nairobi kuyambira m’chaka cha 2007. Iye anadzodzedwa ndi Papa Paulo wa 6 kukhala wansembe pa 6 January 1973. Pa 9 June 1986 anasankhidwa kukhala episkopi ndipo panali pa 6 October 2007 pomwe anasankhidwa kukhala Archbishop wa Archdiocese ya Nairobi. Cardinal Njue wakhala akutumikira mmaudindo osiyana-siyana kuphatikizapo kukhala wa pa mpando wa bungwe la ma episkopi a Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la Kenya kuyambira chaka 2006 mpaka 2015. Potsatira kupuma kwa Cardinal Njue pa udindo wa Archbishop wa Archdiocese ya Nairobi Papa Francisco wasankha Ambuye ongothandiza (Auxiliary Bishop) David Kamau kukhala Apostolic Administrator wa Archdiocese ya Nairobi. Mwazina ma Cardinal amalangiza ndi kuthandiza Papa kuyendetsa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse komanso ma Cardinal omwe sanapose zaka 80 amatenga nao mbali posankha Papa watsopano.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la MANEPO Lati Ndi Lokhudzidwa Ndi Kuchulukira kwa Nkhaza Kwa Achikulire
news: Bungwe loyang’anira mabungwe oteteza maufulu a anthu achikulire mdziko muno la Malawi Network for Older Persons Organisation (MANEPO) lati ndi lokhumudwa ndi kupitilira kwa mchitidwe wa nkhanza kwa anthu achikulire mdziko muno Mkulu wa bungweli a Andrew Kavala ndi omwe anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi kusatira kuphedwa kwa mayi wina wa zaka 67, a Esinala Mbowe a m’boma la Karonga powaganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi imfa ya mwana wawo Patrick Chitete yemwe anamwalira akulandira thandizo pa chipatala cha mishoni cha Atupele m`bomalo. Iwo ati ndi zodandaulitsa kuti achibale omwe amayenera kukhala patsogolo kuteteza anthu achikulirewa ndi omwenso akukhala patsogolo kuchita nkhanzazi ndipo apempha boma kuti liyike malamulo okhwima pofuna kuthana ndi mchitidwe wozunza ndi kupha anthu achikulire. “Ngati bungwe ndife okhuzidwa kwambiri kamba koti achikulire akukhala mwa mantha mdziko lawo lomwekomanso achibale ndi omwe akutsogolera kuzunza anthu achikulire.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Khansala Chavi Wamangidwa Pomuganizira Kuti Wapha Munthu
news: Apolisi m’boma la Nsanje amanga Khansala wa ward ya Matundu mdera la kum’mwera m’bomalo Robert Biliati Chavi pomuganizira kuti wapha wantchito wake. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sub Inspector Agnes Zalakoma, khansalayu yemwe ndi wa chipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) analemba ntchito a Gerald Mphende kuti aziweta mbuzi zawo ndipo pa 15 December chaka chino mbuzi zinayi zinasowa zomwe zinachititsa kuti khansalayu amenye wantchito wakeyo mpaka kukomoka. Apa khansalayu anamuponya munthuyu pa tchire lina powopa kuti wafa ndipo anatengeredwa ku chipatala ndi mkazi wake, komwe anamugoneka koma osadziwitsa apolisi za nkhaniyi. Pa 24 December ndi pomwe akuluakulu apa chipatalacho anafotokozera apolisi za nkhaniyi ndipo mkaziyu anawulula kuti mamuna wakeyo anamenyedwa ndi khansalayo ndipo pa 27 December ndi pomwe bamboyo wamwalira akulandira thandizo la mankhwala pa chipatala cha boma la Nsanje. Khansala Chavi yemwe wakadzipereka yekha ku polisi lachiwiri, akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu ndi kukayankha mlandu wakupha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Stima Akhudzidwa ndi Ngozi Yapa Msewu
news: Episkopi wa Dayosizi ya Mangochi ambuye Monfort Stima akhuzidwa ndi ngozi yapa msewu. Akulu akulu ampingo wakatolika mu dayosiziyi atsimikiza za Ngoziyi koma sanapereke tsatane tsatane wa m’mene yachitikira. Koma m’modzi mwa apolisi watitsina khutu kuti ngoziyi yachitika pa Chimwala mseu wa Liwonde-Mangochi. Episkopiyu sanavulale kwambiri ndipo akulandira thandizo lamankhwala ku chipatala cha Koche.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Maiko Athandize Dziko la Croatia
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha maiko ndi mabungwe kuti athandize dziko la Croatia potsatira ngozi ya zivomerezi m’dzikolo. Potsatira ngozi ya zivomerezi ziwiri zomwe zachitika tsiku lachiwiri motsatana m’dera la pakati la dziko la Croatia ndipo zapha anthu asanu ndi awiri, kuvulaza anthu osachepera 20 ndi kuononga katundu wosiyanasiyana Papa Francisco wapempha maiko ndi mabungwe kuti athandize anthu a m’dzikoli. Iye wati akupempherera onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi mu njira zosiyana-siyana. Ndili pafupi ndi onse omwe avulala komanso kukhudzidwa mwa njira iliyonse chifukwa cha ngoziyi ndipo ndikupempherera makamaka mizimu ya anthu omwe afa osaiwala ma banja awo watero Papa Francisco polankhula kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira ma buku Vatican Apostolic Library. Malipoti ati mphamvu ya zivomerezizi akuti yafikiranso likulu la dziko la Austria lomwe ndi mzinda wa Vienna. Madera omwe akhudzidwa kwambiri ndi ngoziyi m’dziko la Croatia ndi Petrinja, Glina, Sisak komanso Zazina. Ndipo nduna yaikulu ya dziko la Croatia Andrej Plenkovic walamula asilikali a nkhondo kuti athandize kupulumutsa anthu m’madera omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwana wa zaka 6 Wafa Atamira mu Mtsinje
news: Mnyamata wa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi (6) wafa atamira mumtsinje wa Kafisi m’boma la Balaka. Wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi m’bomalo, Segeant Precious Makuta wati patsikuli kunagwa mvula yambiri ndipo malemuyu Kondwani Kaiya pamodzi ndi anzake ena awiri anapita kumtsinjewu ndipo mwangozi anatelereka ndi kugwera mu mtsinjemo momwe munali madzi omwe amathamanga kwambiri. Anzakewo atawona ngoziyi anathamangira kunyumba kukauza makolo omwe mothandizana ndi anthu a mderalo anakwanitsa kupeza thupi la malemuyo tsiku lotsatira lake. “Myamata wina wa zaka 6 amene dzina lake ndi Kondwani Kaiya wamwalira  tamira mu mtsije wa Kafisi ku Balaka itangotha mvula kuvumba yomwe inali yochuluka kwambiri ndipo iye ndi amzake awiri anapita ku mtsinjewu komwe mwatsoka anaterereka ndikugwera mu mtsijemo,” anatero Makuta.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Global Fund Lawuza Achinyamata Adzilindoloza Ntchito za Mabungwe ku Madera Awo
news: Bungwe la Global Fund kudzera mu Project yowona za atsikana achisodzera komanso amayi achichepere ya Adolescent Girls and Young Women (AGYW) lalimbikitsa achinyamata kuti adzilondoloza ntchito zomwe mabungwe osiyana siyana akugwira m’madera mwawo. Mayi Cecelia Chivunga omwe ndi oyimira achinyamata ku bungwe la Country Coordination Mechanism (CCM) anena izi m’boma la Mangochi potsekulira mkumano wa masiku awiri omwe bungweli lakonzera atsogoleri achinyamata ochokera m’maboma osiyanasiyana mdziko muno omwe cholinga chake ndi kuwadziwitsa momwe bungwe la Global Fund limagwilira ntchito zake mdziko muno. Iwo ati achinyamatawa kudzera mu project-yi, akuyenera akuyenera kudziwitsa akuluakulu ngati akuwona chinyengo chilichonse pa momwe mabungwe akuyendetsera chuma cha zitukuko zosiyanasiyana “Cholinga cha mkumanowu chinali choitanitsa achinyamatawa kuti tiwadziwitse ntchito zomwe Global fund imagwira m’madera kuti azidziwa komanso pakhala vuto azidziwa kokanena,”anatero Chivunga. Polankhulapo m’modzi mwa achinyamata omwe anali nawo pa mkumanowu a Edward Chidombe Msiska omwenso ndi kazembe wa achinyamata pakati pa mayiko a Malawi ndi Scottland, ati mkumanowu wakhala opindulitsa kaamba koti afotokozapo za mavuto omwe amakuna nawo komanso wawathandiza kudziwa momwe bungwe la Global Fund limagwilira ntchito. “Mkumanowu uthandiza Kamba koti ukupereka mpata omwe tingathe kuyankhula momwe projectyi ingayendere komanso watipatsa mpata kupereka mavuto omwe timakumana nawo kuphatikiza aponso watiziwitsa zomwe mabungwe omwe amapatsidwa thandizo ndi global fund akuyenera kugwirira ntchito,” anatero Msiska.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwambo wa Epifania Wayimitsidwa
news: Mwambo waukulu wa chaka cha utumiki wa ana cha Epifania omwe umayembekezeka kuchitika pa 3 January 2021 mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa, wayimitsidwa. Mkulu wa mu ofesi yowona za utumiki ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno ku Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM), bambo Henry Chimkanda ndi omwe anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati kuyimitsidwaku kwadza kaamba ka kukweranso kwa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akupezeka ndi nthenda ya Covid-19 mdziko muno ndipo ati m’malo mwake chakachi chidzachitikira m’maparish. “Dongosolo la chaka cha epifaniya lichitika pa dziko lonse koma monga mukuziwa malinga ndi mliri wa Covid 19 kuti titezane aliyense wina ndi mzake chakachi chichitikira m’ma parish m’malo mochitikira ku dayosizi ya Chikwawa,” anatero Bambo Chimkanda.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Okhuzidwa Ndi Imfa ya Bambo Reginald Foster
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya Bambo Reginald Foster yemwe anali katswiri wa chilankhulo cha chi Latin. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi lolemba mu uthenga wake wopepesa potsatira imfayi. Iye wayamikira ntchito yabwino yomwe Bambo Foster agwira ngati wansembe maka potanthauzira mwa ukadaulo zolembalemba zosiyana-siyana za Mpingo kwa zaka 40 kuti zikhale mchilankhulo cha chi Latin. Polankhula mu uthenga wake wopepesa kwa Bambo Saverio Cannistrà yemwe ndi mkulu wa chipani cha ansembe a Carmelite (Order of Discalced Carmelite Friars) Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya Bambo Reginald Foster. Papa Francisco walankhula izi kudzera mwa mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika (Secretary of Vatican State) Cardinal Pietro Parolin. Iye wati ndi woyamika chifukwa utumiki wosiririka womwe Bambo Foster anawuwonetsa kwa nthawi yaitali ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika. Papa Francisco wati ndi pemphero lake kuti Mulungu alandire mzimu wa Bambo Foster mu ufumu wake. Bambo Foster adamwalira pa 25 December 2020 ku Milwaukee ku Wisconsin m’dziko la United States of America ali ndi zaka 81. Kwa zaka 40 Bambo Foster akhala akugwira ntchito ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ku Vatican kutanthauzira zolembalemba za a Papa komanso maphunzitso a Mpingo kukhala m’chilankhulo cha chi Latin chomwe Mpingo wa Katolika umagwiritsa ntchito ngati official language.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasintha Lamulo la Kayendetsedwe ka Chuma ku Vatican
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wakhazikitsa lamulo latsopano pa kayendetsedwe ka chuma ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, lolemba Papa walamula kuti kuyambira tsopano ntchito yonse yoyang’anira chuma chonse cha likulu la mpingo wa katolika ikhala  m’manja mwa ofesi yomwe imawona za chuma chonse cha likulu la mpingowu yodziwika kuti Administration of the Patrimony of the Apostolic See (APSA) m’malo mwa ofesi yomwe imayendetsa ntchito za likulu la mpingowu yodziwika kuti Vatican’s Secretariat of State. Lamulo la tsopanoli lagawidwa m’zigawo zinayi. Poyamba kuti ntchito yoyendetsa ndi kusamala chuma ichoke ku ofesi yomwe imayendetsa ntchito za likulu la mpingowu Secretariat of State kupita ku ofesi yodziwika kuti Administration of the Patrimony of the Apostolic See. Chigawo cha chiwiri chikukhudza ntchito yoyendetsa chuma cha ofesi ya a Papa. Chigawo cha chitatu chikukhudza ndondomeko zokhwima zomwe zizitsatidwa pofuna kusamala chuma ndipo chigawo cha chinayi komanso chomaliza chikukhudza ntchito za ofesi yodziwika kuti Secretariat of State. Malinga ndi lamulo la tsopanoli kuyambira pa 1 January 2021 ofesi yodziwika kuti Administration of the Patrimony of the Apostolic See (APSA) iziyang’anira ma account onse a ku bank komanso chuma china chonse chomwe chili mu zinthu zosiyana-siyana (investments). Papa Francisco adalengeza za maganizo ake ofuna kusinthaku kudzera m’kalata yake ya pa 25 August chaka chonchino yomwe adalembera mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika, Vatican’s Secretary of State Cardinal Pietro Parolin.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Wachinyamata wa Mpingo wa Anglican Wafa Atamira mu Nyanja
news: M’modzi mwa mamembala a gulu la achinyamata ku parish ya mpingo wa Anglican ya M’manga m’boma la Balaka wafa atamira mu nyanja ya Malawi. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Mangochi, Inspector Rodrick Maida wati mnyamatayu ndi Emmanuel Pangoleni wa zaka 28 zakubadwa ochokera m’mudzi mwa M’manga mfumu yaikulu Nsamala m’boma la Balaka ndipo ngoziyi yachitika lamulungu ku Malindi m’boma la Mangochi komwe achinyamatawa anapita kukasambira. Malinga ndi mkulu owona za achinyamata ku parishiyo Andrew Kumtumanje, mamembala a gululi lachisanu pa tsiku la khilisimasi anapita ku msonkhano wa achinyamata ku parishi ya Malindi koma lamulungu asananyamuke anaganiza zokasambira mu nyanja. Patadutsa maola asanu ndi limodzi anthuwa anazindikira kuti Pangoleni sakuwoneka ndipo atafufuza ndi pomwe anamupeza atamira komanso atafa kale. Zotsatira za chipatala cha St. Martin zatsimikiza kuti imfayi yadza kaamba kobanika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kwaya ya Ulongwe Parish Ithandiza Chipatala cha Balaka
news: Kwaya ya Mtima Woyera kuchokera ku parish ya Sacred Heart Ulongwe mu dayosizi ya Mangochi yathandiza ndi katundu osiyanasiyana ana omwe agonekedwa pa chipatala cha boma la Balaka. Polankhula lamulungu atapereka thandizoli, mkulu woyang’anira kwayayi a Kanyengo Dizilo, anati achita izi pofuna kukondwelera limodzi ndi anawa chikondwelero cha khilisimasi. Polankhulapo moyimira mkulu wa chipatalachi, dotolo wa mafupa mu ward ya ana a Timothy Mwenyedini anati zomwe yachita kwayayi ndi zopereka chiyembekezo kwa ana omwe agonekedwa pa chipatalachi. “Sabata yatha tinalandira uthenga okuti a kwaya imeneyi abwera ndipo tiwathokoze kuti lero akwaniritsa malonjezo awo. Zimene achitazi ndi zokondweretsa komanso zopatsa Chimwemwe anthu amene agonekedwa mchipatala muno makanso mu nyengo ino ya zisangalaro,” anatero a Mwenyedini. Mwapadera iwo apemphanso amgulu ena ndi anthunso ena akufuna kwabwino kuti adzikhala ndi nthawi yomakawona anthu amene akuvutika mzipatala. Wina mwa katundu amene kwayayi yapereka ndi monga sopo, sugar, mchere ndi zina zambiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: M’modzi Waphedwa Atawomberedwa ndi Apolisi kwa Bvumbwe
news: Munthu m’modzi wafa ndipo wina wavulala modetsa nkhawa kwa Bvumbwe m’boma la Thyolo pa kumenyana kwa apolisi ndi anthu a mderalo. Malinga ndi anthu omwe anawona izi zikuchitika, zimenezi zadza pamene apolisi ena akuti anapita kuti akamange munthu wina yemwe anayambana naye pa zifukwa zomwe sizikudziwika. “Munthuyo anayambana ndi wapolisi wina pa zifukwa zawo ku mowa mu February ndiye samawonekanso munthuyo. Lero atawoneka ndi pomwe apolisi anapita kuti akamumange koma chifukwa amakana ndi pomwe anamuombera ndi kufera pompo komanso wina amene amaleletsa anawomberedwa ndipo wavulala kwambiri,” anatero munthuyo. Apolisi anaphulitsa utsi wokhetsa msozi pofuna kubalalitsa anthu omwe anakwiya ndi kuwomberedwa kwa munthuyo. Bata linasokonekera mderali kwa maola pafupifupi asanu kuyambira masana mpaka madzulo pamene bata labweleranso. Padakalipano apolisi sanayankhulepo kanthu pa nkhaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Wapempha Anthu Asangalare Mosamala Popewa COVID-19
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wapempha anthu kuti asangalare mosamala mu nyengo ya zisangalalo ya chaka chino popewa kufalitsa kachilombo ka Coronavirus. Lachisanu pa 25 December lomwe ndi tsiku lomwe akhristu amachita chikondwelero cha kubadwa yesu khristu, mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera anali m’boma la Mangochi. Ngati mbali imodzi yokondwera ndi anthu ena pa tsikuli, iwo apereka mphatso zosiyanasiyana kwa amayi omwe angochira kumene komanso anapereka mphatso zina kwa odwala amene agonekedwa pa chipatala cha bomalo ndipo pambuyo pake anayendera chigawo chothandizira ana osapyola zaka zisanu chomwe chinapsa ndi moto mchaka cha 2018 ndipo padakalipano chinakonzedwa. Polankbula kwa atolankhani pambuyo pochita izi, a Chakwera omwe anali limodzi ndi akazi awo komanso nduna ya zaumoyo mayi Khumbidze Kandodo Chiponda anati ndi kofunika kuti anthu akhale atsatire njira zonse zopewera nthenda ya COVID-19 mzisangalaro za khilisimasi komanso chaka cha tsopano. Iwo anati boma lili ndi chidwi ndipo likudzipereka pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliriwu choncho sakufuna kuti anthu ena asokoneze ntchitoyi. Pamenepa a Chakwera ananena kuti boma lakhwimitsa chitetezo mzipata za dziko lino kuti pasapezeke olowa mwachisawawa komanso anthu onse omwe akufika mdziko muno kudzera ku bwalo la ndege adziyezedwa ndipo akapezeka ndi kachilomboka sadziloredwa kupita kwawo kuti adzikakhala modzipatula okha koma m’malo mwake adzikhala modzipatula ali m’manja mwa boma. Mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu anapezeraponso mwayi kuwauza aMalawi kuti agwiritse ntchito chikondwelero cha khilisimasichi ngati njira imodzi yobweretsera mtendere pakati pa iwo ndi ena. Pamenepa a Chakwera anati iwo alankhulana kale ndi atsogoleri onse opuma a mdziko muno kuphatikizapo Professor Peter Mutharika kuwafunira zabwino zonse komanso nyengo ya chisangalalo yopambana. Polankhulapo pa mwambowu mkulu owona zaumoyo m’boma la Mangochi Dr. Henry Chibowa anayamikira president Chakwera kaamba kogwiritsa ntchito tsiku lake la khilisimasi poyendera chipatalachi zomwe anati zathandiza kubweretsa chiyembekezo kwa odwala komanso zalimbikitsa ogwira ntchito pa malowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Monsinyo Thawale Asankhidwa Kukhala Mkulu Oyendetsa Ntchito za Arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe
news: Monsignor Patrick Thawale awasankha kukhala mkulu oyendetsa ntchito za arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Kusankhidwaku kwadza kutsatira imfa ya Ambuye Tarcisius Ziyaye omwe anali arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosiziyi omwe alowa m’manda masiku apitawo. Tsopano ndi mkulu wa arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe-Monsignor Thawale Malinga ndi kalata yomwe yasayinidwa ndi wapampando wa maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Comfrence of Malawi (ECM) Archbishop Thomas Luke Msusa, malamulo amapereka mpata kwa alangizi a epiksopi kusankha oyendetsa ntchito za dayosizi m’masiku asanu ndi atatu kufikira episkopi watsopano atasankhiwa, ndipo komitiyi yasankha monsinyo Patrick Thawale kukhala mkulu oyendetsa ntchito za dayosizi ya Lilongwe kudzera mu voti yachinsinsi yomwe akuluakuluwa anaponya. Polankhulapo Monsinyo Thawale ati agwira ntchito yomwe Mulungu wawatumayi modzipereka.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Yesu Amabadwa Pakati pa Anthu Kuti Akhale Ana a Mulungu-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Yesu Khristu amabwera pakati pa anthu ngati khanda pofuna kuti anthuwo akhale ana a Mulungu.  Polankhula pa Misa ya usiku (Christmas Vigil Mass) yomwe watsogolera lachinayi m’tchalichi lalikulu la Saint Peter’s Basilica Papa Francisco wati chikondwerero cha Christmas chimathandiza akhristu kukhala anthu atsopano komanso chikondwererochi chimapatsa akhristu mphamvu zothandiza kupirira mavuto osiyana-siyana. Papa Francisco wati Mulungu anapereka mwana wake m’modzi yekha kuti abadwe pakati pa anthu ndipo kuti choncho athandize anthuwo kukhala ana a Mulungu. Iye wati polola kuti zinthu zikhale choncho Mulungu anasonyeza chikondi chachikulu. Pamenepa iye wati ndi kofunika kofunika kuti anthu azimukonda Mulungu nthawi zonse komanso kuti azikonda anthu anzawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Two People Have Died in a Road Accident in Mangochi
news: While people are celebrating the birth of Jesus Christ (Christmas), two people have died after a motor vehicle hit the bicycle in course of overtaking it in Mangochi. According to Mangochi police deputy spokesperson Sub Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi, the first deceased was a pillion passenger and has been identified as Evarina Lakisi, 45, from Mpinganjira Village, Traditional Authority Mponda in Mangochi while the second one was a passenger in the motor vehicle and has not yet been identified by relatives. Sub inspector Daudi said that the tragedy happened during the morning of this Christmas day at Mpima Forest where the Toyota Isis hatchback registration number BLK5045 was being driven by Chifundo Uladi, 25, from the direction of Liwonde heading towards Mangochi Boma with two passengers on board. “ Upon arrival at the said forest, due to over speeding, the driver lost control of the motor vehicle and swerved to the near side of the road where he hit a pedal cyclist before hitting a tree the cyclist carried a pillion passenger was heading the same direction and Following the impact, the unknown passenger and the pillion passenger sustained severe head injuries and were both pronounced dead upon arrival at Mangochi District Hospital,” said Sub Inspector Daudi. In the meantime, the driver is admitted at the hospital where he is receiving treatment after sustaining head injuries. The dead body of the unidentified passenger is being kept at Mangochi mortuary waiting to be identified by relatives. Meanwhile, police are appealing to people to contact the nearest police or visit Mangochi District Hospital mortuary through Mangochi police if they are missing a relative. Additionally, police in the district are appealing to drivers to always follow road safety measures to avoid accidents.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Atsogoleri a South Sudan Alimbikitse Mtendere
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha atsogoleri a dziko la South Sudan kuti alimbikitse mtendere. Monga anachitira chaka chatha, Papa mogwirizana ndi mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Anglican pa dziko lonse Archbishop Justin Welby wa ku Canterbury komanso Moderator wa General Assembly ya Presbyterian Church of Scotland Reverend Martin Fair atumiza uthenga wopita kwa atsogoleri a dziko la South Sudan. Mu uthengawo atsogoleri atatuwa alimbikitsa atsogoleri m’dzikolo kuti asafooke polimbikitsa mtendere komanso kutumikira anthu bwino. Uthengawo wayamba ndi kufotokoza kudzichepetsa kwa Yesu Khristu yemwe anabwera kudzabadwa pakati pa anthu. Koma si pokhapo uthengawu ukufotokoza za kubadwa kwa Yesu Khristu mkhola la ng’ombe komanso kutumikira kwake anthu modziiwala. Pamenepa atsogoleri atatuwa alimbikitsa atsogoleri m’dzikolo kuti nao adziiwale potumikira ndi kulimbikitsa mtendere. Iwo alonjezanso kuti kutsogoloku adzapita kukacheza m’dzikolo pofuna kukachitira umboni kukhazikika kwa mtendere komanso pofuna kukalimbikitsa umodzi m’dzikolo. Atsogoleri atatuwa amaliza uthengawo ponena kuti ndi chikhulupiriro chao kuti atsogoleri a dziko la South Sudan apitiriza kulimbikitsa kukhulupirirana pamene akutumikira anthu awo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Wailesi ya Liranguka Ikodwelera Kuti Yakwanitsa Zaka Zitatu
news: Wayilesi ya Liranguka yomwe ili m’boma la Mangochi yayamikira omvera ake kamba koyithandiza wayilesiyi kuti ipite patsogolo. Mkulu oyendetsa wayilesi a Kondwani Franklin Chavula ndi omwe anena izi lachitatu pomwe wayilesiyi imachita chikondwelero chakuti yakwanitsa zaka zitatu tsopano chiyikhazikitsireni mdziko muno. Chavula: Cholinga chathu ndi kuwalitsa Mangochi Iwo ati omvera ndi omwe athandiza ntchito za wayilesi kuti zipite patsogolo ndipo kuchita chikondwelerochi ndi njira imodzi yowathokozera. “Radio Liranguka cholinga chake ndi kuwalitsa Mangochi yense. Tikuthokoza omvera athu chifukwa cha chikondi chawo pa wailesi yathu ndi zomwe zatithandiza kuti tifike zaka zitatu tikugwira ntchito zathu m’boma lino la Mangochi,” anatero Chavula. Polankhulapo a Ali Austin omwe ndi wapampando wa komiti yokhazikitsa magulu omvera wayilesiyi ati wayilesiyi ili ndiudindo waukulu owaziwitsa zinthu zomwe iwo sangathe kuzidziwa pawokha. Wailesiyi ndi yomwe yakhala pa nambala yoyamba pa wailesi zing’onozing’ono zomwe zili m’boma la Mangochi pa mndandanda wa wailesi zomwe zikumveredwa kwambiri omwe bungwe loyang’anira nyumba zowulutsa mawu mdizko muno la Malawi Communications Regulatory Authority (MACRA). M’boma la Mangochi muli wailsei zina zing’onozing’ono monga Dzimwe, Umoyo komanso Touc of Faith.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Red Cross Yapempha Anthu Apitirize Kupewa COVID-19
news: Bungwe la Malawi Red Cross Society lapempha anthu m’dziko muno kuti apitirize kutsatira njira zopewera mliri wa COVID-19 zomwe a zaumoyo anakhazikitsa. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu a bungwe-li a Leonard Maganga ndi omwe anena izi lachitatu pomwe bungweli ndi thandizo lochokera ku bungwe la GIZ limapereka katundu osiyanasiyana othandiza kupewa kachirombo ka Coronavirus pa chipatala cha boma la NTCHEU. Iwo ati munthu aliyense ali ndi udindo othandiza kuti nthendayi isapitirire kufala madera omwe anthu akukhala. M’mawu ake polandira zipangizozi m’malo mwa mkulu wa chipatalachi, Dr. Emily Jenya anati thandizoli lafika mu nthawi yake pomwe chiwerengero cha omwe akupezeka ndi kachiromboka chikukwera mdziko muno. Bungwe la Malawi Red Cross Society likugwira ntchito mogwirizana ndi a zaumoyo m’aboma anayi omwe ndi Mchinji, Lilongwe, Dedza ndi Ntcheu ndi cholinga chofikira anthu a m’mabomawa ndi upangiri pa matenda a COVID-19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mayi Chakwera Apempha Anthu Ateteze Achikulire
news: Mkazi wa m’tsogoleri wa dziko lino, mayi Monica Chakwera apempha anthu mdziko muno kuti adzipereke poteteza ndi kusamalira anthu okalamba. Mayi Chakwera anena izi ku nyumba ya chifumu ku Chikokobay m’boma la Mangochi pa phwando la khilisimasi lomwe anakonzera amayi okalamba omwe anachokera m’madera a mafumu akulu onse m’bomalo. Chakwera: Anthu aleke kunyoza okalamba Iwo ati anakonza phwandoli ngati njira imodzi yofuna kuwonetsa dziko kuti amayi achikulirewa ndi ofunika kwambiri chifukwa ndi amene ali ndi nzeru komanso malangizo abwino omwe angathandize pa ntchito zotukula dziko lino. Polankhula m’malo mwa amayi onse achikulire omwe anali nawo pa phwandoli, gogo Maggie Mkhwazi anathokoza mayi wa fuko linoyu kamba kowakumbukira ndi mphwando la khilisimasili. Iwo ati zimenezi zawonetsa chikondi chomwe mayi Chakwera ali nacho pakati pa amayi ndi anthu okalamba. Mwazina amayi okalamba omwe anakacheza ndi mayi Chakwera ku nyumba yawo yachifumu ku Chikokobay m’boma la Mangochi apatsidwanso phasulo ya mphatso ya khilimasi momwe munali mpunga, mafuta ophikira ndi zina zambiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mnyamata wa Zaka 15 Wadzipha Podzimangilira ku Nkhatabay
news: Mnyamata wa zaka 15 wafa atadzimangilira mu mtengo wa gwafa m’boma la Nkhatabay. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Kondwani James watsimikiza za ngoziyi ndipo wati malemuyi ndi Julius Mkandawire. Malinga ndi Sergeant James, izi zachitika usiku wa lolemba mdera lotchedwa Mpamba ndipo panthawiyi makolo anyamatayu kunalibe. Padakalipano zifukwa zomwe mnyamatayu wadziphera sizikudziwika. Atamutengera ku chipatala, madotolo atsimikiza kuti mnyamatayu wafa kaamba kobanika ndi chingwe. Pamenepa apolisi alangiza makolo kuti adzikhala bwino okhaokha komanso iwo ndi ana awo pofuna kupewa ngozi za mtunduwu ponena kuti pena ana amakhala okhudzidwa ndi zomwe zikuchitika pakhomo pawo ngakhale kuti nthawi zambiri samalankhulapo kanthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Christmas Imasonyeza Chikondi cha Mulungu pa Anthu Ake-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati chikondwelero cha Christmas chimatsimikizira akhristu kuti Mulungu samayiwala anthu ake. Polankhula kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira ma buku Vatican Apostolic Library Papa Francisco wati chikondwelero cha Christmas ndi chaka chachikulu chomwe chimaulula chikondi cha Mulungu ndipo chimatsimikizira akhristu kuti Mulungu sangathe kuiwala anthu ake. Iye wati Christmas ndi phwando la chikondi cha Mulungu pobweretsa kuwala pakati pa anthu ake kudzera mwa mwana wake Yesu Khristu. Papa Francisco wati pobwera kudzabadwa pakati pa anthu Yesu Khristu anabweretsa tanthauzo la ulemerero wa moyo wa anthu pansi pano pogawana ndi anthu uMulungu wake komanso naye polawako umunthu wa anthuwo kupatula tchimo. Iye wati limeneli ndiye tanthauzo leni-leni la Christmas lomwe akhristu akuyenera kulimvetsetsa. Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kumakhala okondwa ndi a chiyembekezo pozindikira kuti Mulungu amakhala ndi anthu ake nthawi zonse kudzera mwa mwana wake Yesu Khristu yemwe ndi Emmanuel Mulungu ali nafe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Atumiki a Zachifundo Athandiza Odwala ku Namitete Parish
news: Mamembela a bungwe la Atumiki a za Chifundo ku tchalitchi la Kamende yomwe nthambi ya Namitete Parish mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe apereka thandizo kwa odwala ndi okalamba kuphatikizapo omwe ali aulumali osiyanasiyana ozungulira dera lawo. Wapampando wa bungwe-li a Tobias Kalonga ati bungwe lawo lachita izi ngati njira imodzi yowonetsa chifundo kwa anthuwa omwe nthawi zambiri amakhala akusowa zambiri pa moyo wawo. Iwo ati mwazina amafunanso kuti akondwere limodzi ndi anthu-wa kubadwa kwa Ambuye Yesu Khristu. “Timachita zimenezi mu nyengo ino ya khilisimasi iliyonse pofuna kukondwera nawo limodzi nyengoyi,” anatero a Kalonga. Polankhulaponso m’modzi mwa omwe alandira nawo thandizoli a Prisca Ndeule anathokoza mamembala a bungweli kamba ka thandizolo. “Sindimayembekezera kuti ndilandira zimenezi ndipo zindithandiza kudyetsa ana pakhomo pano. Mulungu awadalitse onse omwe achita zimenezi kuti utumiki wawo upite patsogolo. Zina mwa zinthu zomwe bungweli lapereka kwa anthu odwala a mderali ndi monga zakumwa, ufa, mchere mpunga ndi zina.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Akonzeka Kuteteza Mzinda wa Mzuzu mu Nyengo ya Chisangalalo
news: Apolisi mu mzinda wa Mzuzu ati akonzeka kupereka chitetezo chokwanira mu nyengo ya Christmas ndi chaka chatsopano. Wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa apolisi ogwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana pa polisi ya Mzuzu Superintendent Benson Mtajiri we anena izi lero pa msonkhano wa atolankhani mu mzindawu.  Iwo ati pofuna kupewa ngozi za pa msewu komanso mchitidwe wogwilira omwe akuti wakula kwambiri mu miyezi itatu yapitayi, kudzanso Umbanda ndi umbava, apolisi-wa achulukitsa chiwerengero cha asilikali opezeka pa msewu, komanso mmadera momwe mumachuluka milandu mu nyengo ya zikondwelero. Pamenepa apolisi-wa achenjeza anthu kuti aonetsetse kuti nawoso atengepo gawo poteteza miyoyo yawo komanso katundu wawo. Mwazina apolisi-wa apereka nambala ya lamya yoti anthu azigwiritsa ntchito munyengo ya chisangalaloyi ngati aona zinthu zina zodabwitsa. Mmawu ake wapampando wagulu la olemba nkhani mchigawo cha kumpoto la Nyika Media Club, Joseph Mwale, anapempha kuti pakhale ubale wabwino pakati pa apolisi komanso olemba nkhani mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Muchitire Umboni Chikhulupiliro Chanu-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha anthu ogwira ntchito ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican kuti apitirize kuchitira umboni chikhulupiriro chawo. Polankhula mu hall ya Papa Paulo wa 6 Papa Francisco wathokoza ogwira ntchito onse ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican chifukwa chogwira ntchito modzipereka potumikira mpingo kudzera mu ntchito zawo zosiyana-siyana. Papa wauzanso anthuwa kuti udindo wawo wina wa ukulu ndi wolalikira anthu Uthenga Wabwino wa kubadwa kwa mpulumutsi wa dziko lonse la pansi Yesu Khristu. Pa za mliri wa Coronavirus iye wati mliriwu monga maiko ena onse wakhudzanso ntchito zambiri za likulu la Mpingowu komabe iye wati likulu la Mpingo wa Katolikali likuyetsetsa kuthana ndi mliriwu. Papa Francisco wati likulu la mpingo wa katolika likuchita zothekera zonse kuti antchito ake onse asamalidwe bwino monga mwa masiku onse ndipo kuti pasapezeke wina yemwe achotsedwe ntchito chifukwa cha mliriwu. Pamenepa iye watsindika za kufunika kogwirana manja ndi kulimbikitsa umodzi pa nthawi yovutayi. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kupempha onse ogwira ntchito ku Vatican kuti azisinkhasinkha za chikondi cha Mulungu potumiza mwana wake Yesu Khristu kuti adzabadwe pakati pa anthu ndi kuwapulumutsa anthuwo ku ukapolo wa machimo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Monsinyo Chithonje Apempha Boma Lithandize Sukulu za Ana Osamva
news: Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za dayosizi ya Dedza, monsinyo John Chithonje wapepha boma kuti lithandize sukulu ya ana a ulumali ya Mua yomwe ikukumana ndi mavuto a nkhaninkhani. Monsinyo Chithonje anena izi pa mwambo wokhazikitsa ntchito yomanga Hostel ndi chimbudzi cha makono komanso kupereka katundu osiyanasiyana kwa ophunzira pa sukuluyo. Chithonje: Boma silikulabadira ana olumala Iwo ati sukulu ya mpingo wa katolikayi yomwe ikupindulira anthu onse mdziko muno ikukumana ndi mavuto ambiri monga a Zakudya, Ukhondo, komanso malo ogona ophunzira. “Kafukufuku wathu tinapeza kuti palibe sukulu ya ana osamva yomwe inamangidwapo ndi boma mdziko muno zomwe zikutanthauza kuti anawa ndi osalidwabe mdziko muno boma lilibe nawo ntchito koma ife ngati mpingo tikutengapo gawo pa ntchito yowaphunzitsa ana amenewa chifukwa tili ndi sukulu zingapo zomwe timawaphunzitsira anawa,” anatero monsinyo Chithonje. Monsinyo Chithonje adzadzulanso boma polimbikitsa maphunziro ophatikiza ana olumala ndi ena a lungalunga ponena kuti ndi zosathandiza kwa ana olumalawo. Polakhulapo mphunzitsi wamkulu pa sukuluyi a Henry Chiwaya anati ndi okondwa ndi kubwera kwa ntchito yomanga malo ogonawa yomwe anati ithandiza kuchepetsa mavuto ena omwe analipo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Stima Apempha Akhristu Agwiritse Ntchito Moyenera Mphatso Zawo
news: Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi, ambuye Montfort Stima apempha akhristu a mpingowu kuti agwiritse ntchito moyenera mphatso zomwe mulungu anawapatsa, kudzera mu kutumikira mpingo. Stima: Osabisa mphatso zanu Ambuye Stima anena izi lamulungu ku parishi ya Mbera mu dayosiziyo pamene amapereka sacrament la ulimbitso kwa akhristu okwana 55 a m’parishi-yo. Iwo anati akhristu omwe alandira sacrament la ulimbitso ku parishiyi akhale moyo wa chitsanzo chabwino kwa ena. “M’mene ateremu ndiye kuti apatsidwa mphatso za mzimu oyera. Ndi kofunika kuti akhristu asamazibise mphatso zawo maka potumikira Mulungu kudzera mu mpingo,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Mwazina iwo apemphanso akhristu kuti agwiritse ntchito nyengo ya advent polapa ndi kutembenuka mtima.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kuchita Maphunziro Kumasonyeza Chiyembekezo Cha Akhristu-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati pochita maphunziro akhristu amasonyeza chiyembekezo chawo. Polankhula mu uthenga wake wa pa kanema pokhazikitsa ntchito yolimbikitsa maphunziro pakati pa achinyamata yomwe yakonzedwa ndi likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse mothandizidwa ndi bungwe lodziwika kuti Mission 4.7 komanso Global Compact on Education Papa Francisco wati pochita maphunziro akhristu amasonyeza chiyembekezo chawo pa za tsogolo labwino. Iye wathokoza nthumwi za ku msonkhanowu omwe wachitika kudzera pa makina a intaneti kaamba kolimbikitsa mwazina chilungamo komanso chikondi m’maphunziro. “Zikomo chifukwa chobwera pamodzi ndi maganizo amodzi komanso chiyembekezo chimodzi pa maphunziro olimbikitsa umodzi, kulolerana komanso chitukuko cha thunthu cha munthu,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawu. Iye wamaliza ndi kupempha ma bungwe omwe akuthandiza pa ntchito yolimbikitsa maphunziroyi kuti asaiwale akuluakulu omwe ndi kasupe wa nzeru komanso luntha. Msonkhanowu wabweretsa pamodzi atsogoleri a maiko, a katswiri pa nkhani ya maphunziro komanso anthu a ku mabungwe omwe si a boma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CCJP, PAC Adandaula Ndi Kuchepa Kwa Anthu Ovota pa Chisankho Chapadera
news: Mgwirizano wa mabungwe a Catholic Commission for Justice and Peace (CCJP) komanso Public Affairs Committee (PAC) ati ndi okhumudwa ndi kusowa chidwi kwa mzika zina za dziko lino zomwe sizitenga nawo gawo pa zisankho zapadera. Izi zadza kutsatira kuchepa kwa anthu omwe aponya nawo voti pa chisankho chapadera chomwe chachitika lachiwiri sabata ino m’madera atatu a aphungu. Chibwana: Anthu ambiri sanavote Maderawa ndi kumpoto cha kum’mawa kwa boma la Mangochi, kumadzulo kwa boma la Mangochi, komanso kumpoto kwa boma la Phalombe. Mkulu oyendetsa ntchito za bungwe la CCJP mdziko muno a Boniface Chibwana omwenso anaimila mgwirizanowu ndiwo anena izi lachinayi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iwo ati ngakhale pali zifukwa zina monga kupelewera kwa ma uthenga okhudza chisankho komabe anthu akuyenera kumaonetsa chidwi ndikutenga nawo gawo pa tsiku loponya voti. Apa iwo ati kusatenga nawo gawo pa chisankho chilichonse kumapeleka mpata kwa anthu osayenera kusankhidwa m’maudindo. Pa za chisankho chachibwerezachi, mgwirizano wa mabungwewu wati ndi okhumudwa ndi mchitidwe wa anthu ena omwe amakopabe anthu nthawi yake itatha ponena kuti izi zimasokoneza zotsatira za chisankho. Koma polankhulapo mosiyana wapampando wa bungwe la MEC Justice Dr. Chifundo Kachale wati ndi okhutira ndi kuchuluka kwa anthu omwe anatuluka kukaponya voti ku madera amene kunachitika chisankhochi. Justice Kachale walankhula izi lachitatu mchikalata chofotokoza tsatane-tsatane wa zotsatira zotsimikizika za zisankho zomwe zinachitika mmadera’wa. Iye wati pa chisankhochi anthu ambiri aponia voti yawo poyerekeza ndi momwe zakhala zikuyendera mu zisankho zina zapadera kuyambira mchaka cha 2015.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Ziyaye Ayikidwa M’manda ndi Ulemu wa Asilikali
news: Boma lalamula kuti thupi la ambuye Archbishop Tarcizius Ziyaye liyikidwe m’manda ndi ulemu wa asilikali. Malinga ndi chikalata chomwe chasainidwa ndi mlembi wamkulu wa president ndi nduna a Zangazanga Chikhosi, mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Lazarus Chakwera ndi yemwe walamula kuti zimenezi zichitike poyamikira ntchito yotamandika yomwe malemu Archbishop Ziyaye anagwira mdziko muno. Kudzera mu kalatayi, m’tsogoleri wa dziko linoyu waperekanso uthenga wopepesa ku mpingo wonse wa katolika padakalipano pamene ukulira kaamba kotaya m’busa wake. Thupi la malemu ambuye Archbishop Tarcisius Ziyaye lifika mdziko muno lero nthawi ya  9 koloko usiku uno kudzera pa bwalo la ndege la Kamuzu mu mzinda wa Lilongwe kuchokera ku Namibia komwe anamwalilira masiku paitawa akulandira thandizo la mankhwala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Commisioner Kunje, Tewesa Apatsidwa Belo
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Zomba lapereka belo kwa commissioner wa bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) mayi Linda Kunje komanso dalaivala wawo John Tewesa. Awiriwa akuyimbidwa mlandu wonyozera malamulo a pansewu pamene mdipiti wa galimoto za president Lazarus Chakwera zimapita mu mzinda wa Zomba. Watuluka mchitolokosi-Kunje Malinga ndi malamulo a beloyi, aliyense mwa awiriwa akuyenera kupereka ndalama yokwana 100,000 kwacha, kupereka ziphaso zawo zoyendera komanso kuti adzikawonekera ku polisi yaku Lilongwe sabata ziwiri zilizonse. Senior Resident Magistrate Hellen Chitsanzo Kachala wati wapereka beloyi kaamba koti mbali ya boma yakanika kupereka umboni okwanira oti awiriwa akatuluka akasokoneza umboni pa nkhaniyi ndipo wati nkhaniyi idzalowanso mu bwalo la milandu pa 29 January chaka cha mawa. Polankhula pambuyo pa chigamulochi yemwe akuyimira a Kunje komanso a Tewesa, a Chimwemwe Kalua anati ndi okondwa kuti anthu omwe akuwayimira atuluka mchitolokosi momwe amasungidwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Akhritsu Adzipemphelerana
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha akhristu kuti azikumbukira kupempherera anzao pamene akuchita mapemphero. Popitiriza maphunzitso ake pa mutu wa mapemphero kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira ma buku Vatican Apostolic Library Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kopempherera anthu ena (intercessory prayer). Iye wati anthu omwe amapemphera ndi mtima wao wonse sangathe kutero ndi kuiwala kupempherera zosowa za anthu ena ngakhale dziko limene. Papa Francisco wati mkhristu weniweni akuyenera kudalitsanso ena kudzera m’mapemphero opempha zosowa za anthuwo. Iye wati akhristu omwe amapemphera saiwala kupempherera anthu omwe sapemphera, sadziwa kupemphera komanso anthu osochera. Papa Francisco waonjezeranso kuti anthu omwe amapemphera moona mtima amaona nkhope ya Yesu Khristu mwa anthu osauka komanso amaona nkhope ya Yesu Khristu mwa anthu omwe ataya mtima ndipo saonanso phindu la moyo uno. Iye wati anthu omwe amapemphera ndi mtima wao wonse allibe nthawi yoweruza ena kuti ndi ochimwitsitsa popeza anthu onse ndi ochimwa pa maso pa Mulungu. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti ngakhale kuti anthufe sitikhulupirika kwa Mulungu komabe Mulungu’yo amakhulupirika kwa anthufe posayang’anira machimo athu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Thupi la Malemu Arkiepiskopi Ziyaye Lifika Mawa
news: Thupi la malemu arkiepiskopi Tarcizius Ziyaye wa arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe lifika mdziko m’mawa kuchokera mdziko la Namibia komwe anamwalira akulandira thandizo lankhwala. Thupili lifika nthawi ya 12 koloko masana kudzera pabwalo la ndege la Kamuzu mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Padakali pano Msonkhano wa bungwe la amayi achikatolika la Catholic Women Organisation (CWO) wa pa chaka umene umayenera kuti ukhalepo kuyambira pa 16 mpaka pa 20 December 2020 walephereka. Malinga ndi wapampando wa bungweli m’dziko muno mayi Lucy Vokhiwa, izi zachitika potsatira imfa ya Ambuye Tarsizius Grevazio Ziyaye omwe anali arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Mai Vokhiwa ati iyi ndi nthawi yowawitsa kwa amayi onse a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno kamba koti ataya mtsogoleri. Iwo ati msonkhanowu udzachitika mtsogolomu mwambo osanzikana ndi malemu Ambuye Ziyaye ukatha. Mzimu wa Ambuye Tarsizius Grevazio Ziyaye uwuse mmu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la SRWB Lati Liyamba Kumanga Malo Atsopano Opopera Madzi M’boma la Mangochi
news: Bungwe logawa madzi mchigawo chakumwera la Southern Region Water Board lati posachedwapa liyamba ntchito yomanga malo atsopano opopera madzi m’boma la Mangochi. Madziwa akuti adzipopedwa mu nyanja ya Malawi pa Nkhudzibay ndi kugawidwa m’madera ena ndipo akuti ntchito yomanga malowa iyamba mwezi wa January chaka cha mawa. Polankhula pambuyo popereka malo omwe pamangidwe zinthuzi ku kampani ya Plem Construction, membala wa board ya bungweli yemwenso ndi wapampando wa komiti yowona za chuma komanso ma project mu board yo engineer steve mwanza anati ntchitoyi ikatha ipindulira anthu a mdera la m’bali mwa nyanjayi omwe padakalipano akumwa madzi osalongosoka. Ntchitoyi akutinso ithandiza kukweza business za malo okopa alendo ambiri omwe ali m’bali mwa nyanja ya Malawi ponena kuti kampani zambiri zidzifuna kugwiritsa ntchito madzi omwe ali a ukhondo. Malinga ndi engineer mwanza, ntchitoyi ikatha ipindulira anthu oposa 92 thousand omwe akukhala kuyambira pa Mtakataka Turn off mpaka pamene pali nyumba ya Bishop wa dayosizi ya mangochi pafupi ndi pa boma. Polankhulapo mkulu wa kampani ya Plem Construction Mohan Khrishnan wati ntchitoyi siyikhala yovuta kuyigwira mu nthawi yomwe apatsidwa ponena kuti iwo ndi okonzeka bwino komanso agwirapo kale ntchito ya ngati yomweyi pomwe amanga malo ena a mtunduwu okwana 15 mdziko muno. Mwazina Ntchitoyi yomwe igwiridwe kwa miyezi 18 ndi yokhudza kumanga malo opopera madzi, malo osamalira madzi komanso malo ogawira madziwa kuphatikizapo nyumba za anthu ogwira ntchito pa malowo. Projectyi yomwe iyambe mwezi wa January 2021 ikuyembezeka kudzatha mwezi wa August mchaka cha 2022 ndipo ndi ya ndalama zokwana 5 million Kuwait dinnars zomwe ndi pafupifupi 12 billion Malawi kwacha yomwe ndi ngongole yochokera ku Kuwait fund kudzera ku Arab Economic Development. Padakalipano bungwe la Southern Region Water Board limapopa madzi mu mtsinje wa Shire ndipo madziwa amagawidwa madera ambiri omwe ndi ozungulira pa boma la Mangochi pokha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la DAPP Lathandiza Sukulu za mu Mzinda wa Blantyre ndi Mabuku
news: Ofesi ya zamaphunziro m’boma la Blantyre yayamikira ubale wabwino omwe ulipo pakati pa boma ndi mabungwe omwe si aboma. Mkulu owona za maphunziro ndi masewero m’bomali Paul Chimphanda wayankhula izi pa mwambo opereka mabukhu msukulu zina za m’bomalo. Lipipa: Tayamikira chithandizochi Chimphanda wati bungweli lathandiza kwambiri popeza ana ambiri akhala ndi mwayi owerenga mabukhu osiyana siyana. Polankhulapo Patrick Jafali yemwe animira bungwe la DAPP anati bungweli limathandiza sukulu ndi mabuku osiyansiyana ngati njira imodzi yolimbikitsa ana kuti aziwerenga. Ndipo polankhulaponso phungu wa derali Noel Lipipa anati ana asukulu za mdera mwake akhale ndi zipangizo zofunika pa maphunziro ndi cholinga choti azichita bwino mkalasi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MHRC Yati Ziphuphu Zikuchuluka Mzipata za Dziko Lino
news: Bungwe lowona za ma ufulu wa anthu mdziko muno la Malawi Human Rights Commission (MHRC) lati pafunika kukhazikitsa mfundo zokhwima zopewera ziphuphu ndi katangale mzipata zolowera m’dziko muno. Mlembi wa mkulu wa bungwe-li mayi Habiba Osman anena izi lolemba m’boma la Dowa potsekulira maphunziro a masiku atatu okhudza momwe adindo a ku malo okhala anthu othawa kwawo a Dzaleka angachitire polimbana ndi kuzembetsedwa kwa anthu omwe amalowa mdziko muno mwachinyengo. Osman: Malawi sikuchita bwino pa nkhaniyi Mayi Osman ati ngakhale malamulo okhudza kulimbana ndi m’chitidwewu alipo, dziko lino silikuchita bwino kumbali yolimbana ndi mchitidwe-wu kamba ka zovuta zina monga kuchepa kwa apolisi ophunzitsidwa bwino kuti azithandizira pa ntchito-yi, komanso kuchuluka kwa anthu othawa kwawo omwe ali ku Dzaleka zomwe zikuchititsa kuti asamazindikire za m’chitidwewu kamba kosowa maphunzirowa. Apa iwo ati kukhala ndi ogwira ntchito okhulupirika mzipata zolowera m’dziko muno kungathandize kuchepetsa m’chitidwe wa za chinyengo, zomwenso zingathandizire kuthana ndi m’chitidwe olowa m’dziko muno mozembera boma. Maphunziro-wa akonzedwa ndi nthambi ya bungwe la United Nations yoona za mankhwala ozunguza bongo ya United Nations Office On Drug Crime limodzi ndi unduna wa za chitetezo cha m’dziko.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera, Chilima Adandaula ndi Imfa ya Ambuye Ziyaye
news: M’tsogoleri wa dziko lino president Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, Ambuye Tarcizius Ziyaye ponena kuti chikhulipiliro chawo nhinali chozama mwa Mulungu. Chilima, Chakwera afotokoza za kukhumudwa kwawo ndi imfa ya Ambuye Ziyaye President Chakwera yemwenso anakhalapo mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Assemblies of God mdziko muno wanena izi kudzera mu uthenga wake pa makina a Internet, potsatira kulengedzedwa kwa imfa ya arkiepiskopiyu. Pamenepa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino-yu wati adzawakumbukira ambuye Ziyaye kamba ka mtima wokonda kulimbikitsa chilungamo ndi mtendere m’dziko muno. Naye wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Saulosi Chilima mu uthenga wake wa pa Facebook anati ambuye Ziyaye analidi m’busa wabwino wotumikira Mulungu. Pamene m’tsogoleri wa mbali yotsutsa boma ku nyumba ya malamulo a Kondwani Nankhumwa anati adzawakumbukira ambuye Ziyaye kamba kolimba mtima ndi kukhala m’gulu la ma episkopi omwe anathandizira kusintha zinthu, maka pomwe dziko lino limasintha kuchoka mu ulamuliro wa chipani chimodzi kupita ku ulamuliro wa zipani zambiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wakondwelera Zaka 51 za Unsembe Wake
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachita chaka chokondwerera kuti wakwanitsa zaka 51 ali wansembe. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, ulendo wa Papa Francisco kukhala wansembe udayamba pa tsiku lomwe mpingo wa katolika umachita chaka cha Mateyo Woyera pa 21 September ndipo umu munali m’chaka cha 1953. Wakwanitsa zaka 51 mu unsembe-Papa Francisko Pa tsikuli akudutsa pa tchalichi cha kwawo ku Buenos Aires adafunitsitsa kupita ku chivumbulo kuti akalandire Sakramenti la kulapa ndipo ndi tsiku limeneli lomwe moyo wake udasinthika atangochokera ku chivumbulo. Panali pa 11 March 1958 pamene adakayamba maphunziro a moyo wa ku chipani cha mu mpingo cha ansembe cha ma Jesuit (Society of Jesus) ndipo adachita malumbiro ake oyamba pa 22 April 1973. Papa Francisco adadzodzedwa unsembe pa 13 December 1969. M’moyo wake ngati wansembe wakhala akulalikira za chifundo cha Mulungu ndipo atasankhidwa kukhala Papa iye wakhala akulankhula ndi ansembe za kufunika kokhala pafupi ndi akhristu. Iye wakhala akunena kuti m’busa azimveka fungo la nkhosa zake pofuna kutsindika za kufunika koti wansembe akuyenera kukhala pafupi ndi nkhosa zake omwe ndi akhristu omwe akuwayang’anira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Episkopi Watsopano wa Dayosizi ya Dedza Alengezedwa Isanafike Pasaka -Nduna ya Papa
news: Nduna ya a Papa m’maiko a Malawi ndi Zambia Archbishop Gian Franco Gallone wapempha aKhristu a mu dayosizi ya Dedza kuti adekhe pomwe akudikira kupatsidwa episkopi watsopano. Ambuye Gallone alakhula izi ku Dedza pambuyo pa mwambo wa nsembe ya Misa yomwe anatsongolera ku St. Martin de Pores Dedza Parish. Gallone: Mupitilirebe kudekha Iwo ati dayosizi ya Dedza ndi imodzi mwa mwa madayosizi omwe amadziwika ndi chikhalidwe komanso kumvera pakati pa akhristu ake, choncho ndi kofunika kuti adekhe pomwe mpingo uli pakalikiliki kusankha episkopi watsopano oti alowe m’malo mwa malemu ambuye Emmanuel Kanyama omwe anamwalira zaka zingapo zapitazo. “Ena mumayembekeza kuti lero ndi tsiku lomwe tilengeze za episkopi watsopano koma ayi ndithu pepani mundikhululukire. Mupitilirebe kudikira musatope chifukwa episkopi wa dayosizi ino timusankha ndipo tilengeza isanafike nyengo ya pasaka,” anatero Archbishop Gallone. Mwapadera nduna ya a Papa-yi yayamikira monsinyo John Chithonje omwe akuyendetsa dayosizi ya Dedza padakali pano chifukwa cha lutha ndi ukadaulo wowo. Pa ulendowu, archbishop Gallone anali ndi mlembi wawo monsinyo Joseph Maramreddy.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Ziyaye Amwalira
news: Arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Lilongwe, Ambuye Tarcizio Ziyaye amwalira. Mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la ma episkopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno bambo Henry Saindi atsimikiza za imfayi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi ndipo ati Ambuye Ziyaye amwalira m’mawa wa lero pa 14 December 2020 mchipatala cha mdziko la Namibia komwe amalandira thandizo la mankhwala. Anali ndi vuto la m’mimba- Ambuye Ziyaye Bambo Saindi ati padakalipano akuluakulu a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno ali mkati mochita dongosolo lobweretsa thupi la Ambuye Ziyaye mdziko muno kuchokera m’dziko la Namibia. “Anapita kukacheza ndi aepiksopi anzawo aku Namibia sabata ziwiri zapitazo ndipo anapezerapo mwayi okalandiranso thandizo la mankhwala pa vuto la m’mimba lomwe anali nalo. Anawapanga operation koyamba koma inavuta chifukwanso bp yawo inakwera. Padakalipano tikukonza dongosolo kuti malirowo abwere mdziko muno kuchokera ku Namibia ko ndipo pambuyo pake ndi pomwe titalengeze za dongosolo la maliro,” anatero bambo Saindi. Bambo Saindi: Tikukonza dongosolo lobweretsa maliro kwathu kuno Ambuye Ziyaye anabadwa pa 19 May mchaka cha 1949 m’mudzi mwa Khombe ku parish ya Ludzi m’boma la Mchinji ndipo anadzodzedwa kukhala wansembe pa 14 August mchaka cha 1977. Iwo anasankhidwa kukhala episkopi wothandizira wa dayosizi ya Dedza pa 26 November 1991 ndipo anasankhidwa kukhala episkopi woyembekezera kulowa m’malo mwa episkopi wa dayosizi ya Lilongwe pa 4 May 1993 ndipo pambuyo pake anadzalowa m’malo mwa episkopi wa dayosizi ya Lilongwe pa 11 November 1994. Ambuye Ziyaye anasankhidwa kukhala arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Blantyre pa 23 January 2001 ndipo anadzasankhidwanso kukhala arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe pa 3 July 2013. Mzimu wa ambuye Ziyaye uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mfumu Chauma Yapempha Boma Likhwimitse Zilango za Milandu ya Nkhanza
news: Mfumu yaikulu Chauma ya m’boma la Dedza yapempha boma kuti likhwimitse malamulo olangira anthu akuchitira nkhanza amayi ndi atsikana. Mfumuyi imalankhula izi pa msonkhano umene bungwe la United Purpose linakonza mderalo pofuna kudziwitsa anthu za kuipa kochitira ena nkhaza ngati njira imodzi yokumbukira masiku 16 othetsa nkhaza mdziko muno. Iwo ati zilango zimene zikuperekedwa padakalipano, sizikupereka uthenga weniweni pa zakuopsa kwa nkhanza ndipo ndi chifukwa chake anthu ena akupitiriza kuchita khalidwe loipali. Kafwafwa: Tigwiritse kaye ntchito malamulo omwe alipo “Ineyo kumbali ya nkhaza m’mene zilili panopa ndine okhuzidwa kwambiri powona kuti kakhalidwe kathu ndi kale zikusiyana kwambiri ndipo ndi kofunika kuti anthu awuzidwe za kuipa kwa nkhaza,” inatero mfumu yaikulu Chauma. Poyankhapo pa nkhaniyi phungu wa derali yemwenso ndi wapampando wa komiti ya nyumba ya malamulo yowona za chisamaliro cha anthu, a Savel Kafwafwa achenjeza kuti mchitidwewu ukapitilira iwo atsogolela aphungu anzawo pokhwimitsa malamulo ndi cholinga chakuti mchitidwewu utheretu. “Choyamba pa malamulo omwe alipo kalewo chifukwa pali mwayi kale kuti anthu ogwirira azikhala kundende zaka 58 alipo ndipo ndi kofunika kuti tiwagwiritse ntchito mpaka pamathero pake pamene tikudikira malamulo ena omwe angabwere,” anatero Kafwafwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Khonsolo ya Boma la Mangochi Yaletsa Kugwiritsa Ntchito Mapepala a Plastic Opyapyala
news: Khonsolo ya boma la Mangochi yaletsa anthu a m’bomalo kugwiritsa ntchito mapepala opyapyala ponyamulira katundu osiyanasiyana. Mlangizi wa zachilengedwe ku khonsolo ya boma la Mangochi, Bruno Kamanga wati lamulo latsopano pa nkhaniyi likuletsa kupanga, kuyitanitsa, kugulitsa, kugawa komanso kugwiritsa ntchito mapepala a mtunduwu ndipo likulimbikitsa anthu kugwiritsa ntchito zinthu zina ponyamula katundu wawo. Kugwiritsa ntchito mapepala ngati awa kwaletsedwa “Tayambapo ntchito imeneyi ndi kuwaziwitsa anthu a ku Mangochi nkhani imeneyi ya kuletsa kugwiritsa ntchito tima plastic topyapyala,” anatero Kamanga. Iye wati aliyense yemwe angapezeke akuchita zosemphana ndi lamuloli adzamangidwa kwa miyezi itatu komanso kulandidwa mapepalawo. Lamuloli linakhazikitsidwa mchaka cha 2015 koma ziletso zomwe makampani ena akhala akutenga kangapo konse pa nkhaniyi ndi zomwe zachedwetsa kuti lamuloli liyambe kugwira ntchito.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Mangochi Ati Akhwimitsa Chitetezo mu Nyengo ya Chisangalalo
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mangochi ati akhwimitsa chitetezo mu nyengo ya zisangalaro pofuna kuti anthu ofika m’bomalo kudzasangalala akhale otetezeka. Wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi wati apolisi achita izi pofuna kuti chaka chino anthu asangalare bwino mu nyengoyi. Daudi: Anthu asamale “Nyengo yokondwerera khrisimasi komanso chaka chatsopano iyambika posachedwapa ndipo monga mwa mwambo anthu amabwera kuzasangalala ndipo ife apolisi takonzeka kupereka chitetezo chokwanira,” anatero Sub Inspector Daudi. Mwazina iye wapempha anthu onse omwe akhale akufika m’bomali mu nyengoyi kuti atsate njira zonse zodzitetezera ku ngozi zapansewu komanso zomira m’madzi zomwe zimachulukira mu nthawiyi. Apolisiwa ati eni malo a zisangalalo komanso okopa alendo atenge udindo owonetsetsa kuti anthu awo ndi otetezeka ku ngozi za m’madzi poyika anthu opulumutsa anthu akamira komanso kuletsa anthu oledzera kulowa m’madzi kuphatikizapo kuletsa anthu okaikitsa kugona pa malo awo. Mwazina apolisiwa afunira anthu onse omwe afike m’bomali kudzasangalala, chaka cha khilisimasi chabwino komanso nyuwere yopambana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Yohane M’batizi Ndi Chitsanzo Cha Alaliliki Abwino
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Yohane m’batizi ndi chitsanzo cha alaliki ndi atumiki mu mpingo. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, zolankhula za Papa pa lamulungu lachitatu mu nyengo ya Advent zinatsamira kwambiri pa mutu wa pa tsikuli omwe ndi chimwemwe. Iye wauza anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso dziko lonse la pansi kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti kuti nyengo ya Advent ndi nthawi ya chimwemwe chakudza pozindikira kuti kubadwa kwa Mpulumutsi wa dziko la pansi Yesu Khristu pakati pa anthu kwatsala pang’ono. Iye wati akhristu akuyenera kukhala a chimwemwe pozindikira kuti Mpulumutsi ali pafupi kufika pakati pawo monga mawu owerengedwa pa tsikuli makamaka mau a mkalata ya Paulo Woyera akunenera: Mukhale okondwa mwa Ambuye (Rejoice in the Lord always). Papa Francisco wakamba za Yohane M’batizi kuti ndiye chitsanzo cha pamwamba cha munthu yemwe anayembekezera kubadwa kwa Mpulumutsi Yesu Khristu ndi chimwemwe cha chikulu ndipo analalikira za kubwera kwa Yesu Khristu mwana wa Mulungu. Pamenepa iye wati atumiki komanso alaliki akuyenera kutengera chitsanzo cha Yohane M’batizi polalikira za Yesu Khristu osati kulalikira za iwo eni ndi kumazitamandira. Tsiku laMulungu lachitatu mu nyengo ya Advent limadziwika kuti Gaudete mchilatini kutanthauza kuti tsiku laMulungu la chimwemwe popeza Mpulumutsi ali pafupi kubadwa pakati pa anthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ACB Yati Omangidwa pa Mlandu wa Katangale Asakhulukiridwe
news: Bungwe lothana ndi katangale ndi ziphuphu mdziko muno la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) lapempha akuluakulu a ndende kuti aleke kukhululukira akayidi omwe anamangidwa kaamba ka milandu ya katangale ndi ziphuphu. Mkulu wotengera anthu ku bwalo la milandu ku bungweli m’boma la Zomba a Anafi Likwanya ndi omwe anena izi pamene bungweli limakapereka katundu wosiyanasiyana ku ndende ya Zomba pamenenso bungweli lili mkati momemeza anthu pa ntchito yolimbana ndi katangale ndi ziphuphu mdziko muno, ntchito yomwe ikuchitika pa mutu woti “Tichitepo Kanthu, Tithane Ndi Ziphuphu, Timange Malawi Wabwino”. Iwo ati kukhululukira anthu omwe apalamula milandu ya katangale kumakolezera kuti mchitidwewu upitilire kuchitika mdziko muno. “Chomwe tikufuna ndi chinthu chokuti ena akamvera azichita mantha, ndiye prison ndi chinthu chokhacho choncho ngati tingapeze anthu oti amangidwa ndi ifeyo anthu amenewowo asamakhulukidwenso,” anatero a Likwanya. M’mawu ake m’modzi mwa akuluakulu a ndende mdziko muno, Assistant Commissioner Thomson Mtute, anati apitiriza kuthandiza akayidi kuti akadzatuluka ku ndende adzikhala anthu osinthika ndi kuthandiza nawo pa chitukuko cha dziko. “Ife tipitiriza kuthandiza anthuwa kuti asinthike akamatuluka kuno chifukwa akabwera kuno aliyense timakhala naye pansi ndi kumulangiza mwapadera,” anatero Mtute. Mwazina iwo ayamikira bungwe la ACB kaamba kothandiza ndendeyi ndi katundu wosiyanasiyana yemwe akuti athandiza pochepetsa kufala kwa nthenda ya COVID-19 chifukwa agwira ntchito yolimbikitsa ukhondo pa ndendeyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Likufuna Anthu Aphunzire Kusunga Ndalama
news: Boma lati likufunitsitsa kuthandiza anthu kuti azikonda kusunga ndalama kuti ziziwathandiza moyenera. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu ku unduna wa za chuma mdziko muno a Alfred Kutengule ndi omwe anena izi lolemba ku Lilongwe potsekulira sabata yozindikilitsa anthu za kufunika kosunga ndalama, yomwe yakonzedwa ndi bank yaikulu m’dziko muno ya Reserve. Malinga ndi a Kutengule, anthu ambiri amakhala mu umphawi kamba kosagwilitsa bwino ntchito ndalama zomwe apeza koma kuwathandiza kuti azisunga moyenera zingathe kupindulira miyoyo yawo komanso dziko. Malinga ndi a Kutengule, boma lili pa ntchito yofuna kupereka mwayi kwa anthu kuti azitha kusunga ndalama zawo mosavuta kudzera mu kugula ma share mu ntchito za kampani zosiyanasiyana. Iwo ati akugwira ntchito limodzi ndi bank yaikulu ya Reserve kuti ndondomeko zomwe akufuna kuti zitsatidwe, zikhale zotheka. Kumbali ya kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka ndalama, a Kutengule anati boma lilinso mkati mokonza ndondomeko zabwino kuti ndalama zomwe zimabwerekedwa zidzigwira ntchito moyenelera. Polankhulapo, wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa bank yaikulu mdziko muno ya Reserve, Dr. Grant Kabango anati pali kusintha pa momwe anthu akuchitira pa kasungidwe ka ndalama zawo ndipo ati akuyembekezera kuti kudzera mu sabata yi anthu ambiri afikiridwa ndi uthenga okwanira wa momwe angachtire kuti azisunga bwino ndalama zawo makamaka kudzera mkugula ma share. M’mau ake mkulu wa msika wa ma share Malawi Stock Exchange a John Robson Kamanga anati kugula ma share si za anthu ophunizira okha monga momwe ena amaganizira ndipo kuti aliyense atha kutenga nawo gawo pa msikawu ndikupeza nawo phindu. Iwo ati ayesetsa kuyika ndondomeko zina kuti anthu ambiri afikiridwe ndi uthenga wa momwe angachitire pa msikawu pofuna kuwathandiza kusunga bwino ndalama zawo. Sabata yophunzitsa anthu za momwe angasungile ndalama zawo yayama lolemba pa 7 ndipo idzatha lachisanu pa 11 december 2020.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mayeso a MSCE Ayamba pa 5 January
news: Bungwe loyendetsa mayeso la MANEB lalengeza kuti mayeso a form 4 omwe adaimitsidwa adzalembedwanso kuyambira pa 5 mpaka pa 29 January 2021. Unduna wa za maphunziro limodzi ndi bungweli adalengeza za kuimitsa kwa mayesowa pa 4 November chaka chino kamba kakukula kwa zolakwika zomwe zidalipo panthawi ya mayesoyi. Dongosolo latsopano la kalembedwe ka mayesowo Malinga ndi chikalata chomwe bungwe loyendetsa mayeso la Malawi National Examinations Board (MANEB) latulutsa lachiwiri pa 8 December, chomwe chasayinidwa ndi mkulu wa bungweli ogwirizira Professor Dorothy Nampota, bungweli likuchita chilichonse chothekera pokonza zolakwika zomwe zidalipo pa mayeso omwe adayimitsidwawa. Mwachitsanzo, bungweli lati chitetezo pa nthawi ya mayesoyi chidzaperekedwa motsogozedwa ndi asilikali a nkhondo a MDF limodzi ndi apolisi. Chiwaya: Ophunzira ayambe kukonzekera Mneneri wa bungweli Mayamiko Chiwaya wati ntchito yotumiza dongosolo la momwe mayesowa adzalembedwele –time table pachingerezi, yayamba kale kuchitika ndipo itha m’masiku anayi pofuna kuthandiza ophunzira kuti akonzekere bwino. Polankhulapo pa izi, mkulu omenyera ufulu wa maphunziro Benedicto Kondowe wati bungwe la MANEB liphunzirepo mokwanira pa momwe zinthu zidayendera pa mayeso omwe adayimitsidwawa. Iye wati akuganiza kuti zina mwa zomwe zidachititsa kuti mayeso azikhala pa msika ndi kamba ka ndondomeko zina zomwe bungweli silidaziganizire bwino. Pakadali pano, bungwe la MANEB lati sukulu sizikuyenera kufunsanso ophunzira kuti alipire ndalama zolembera gawo lina la mayesowa, ma practical, kamba koti boma ndilo lipeleke ndalamayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wakhazikitsa Chaka cha Yosefe Woyera
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko walengeza kuti kuyambira lero mpaka pa 8 December 2021 ndi chaka cha Yosefe Woyera. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, Papa walengeza izi kudzera mu kalata yake yomwe walemba yotchedwa “Ndi mtima wa atate” momwe wafotokoza kuti Yosefe anali bambo wachikondi komanso wolimba mtima. Kalatayi yalembedwa pa chikondwelero chakuti patha zaka 150 kuchokera pomwe Papa Pius wa 9 anakhazikitsa Yosefe Woyera kukhala nkhoswe ya mpingo wa katolika. Chaka cha Yosefe Woyera-chi chayamba lero pa 8 December 2020 pamene mpingo wa katolika umachita chaka cha Maria Osayipa konse ndipo chidzathanso tsiku ngati lomweli chaka cha mawa. Papa walemba kalatayi molingananso ndi mliri wa COVID-19 ndipo wati mliriwu wathandiza anthu kuzindikira ubwino wa anthu wamba omwe nthawi zambiri amakhala odekha koma opereka chiyembekezo tsiku ndi tsiku. Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolikayu wati kudzera mu njirayi, anthuwa akufanafana ndi Yosefe Woyera yemwe nthawi zambiri sakumbukiridwa komanso sawoneka ngati wofunikira koma anagwira ntchito yaikulu mu mbiri ya chipulumutso cha anthu onse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Walamulidwa Zaka Zisanu Kamba Kogona ndi Anyamata Anayi
news: Bwalo loyamba la milandu m’boma la Dowa lalamula bambo wa zaka 21 kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavulagaga kwa zaka zisanu kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu ogona ndi anyamata anayi. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sub Inspector Ezra Bakili anauza bwaloli kuti mkuluyu Innocent Poita wakhala akugona ndi anyamatawa omwe ndi a zaka za pakati pa 10 ndi 17, kuyambira mchaka cha 2016 mmudzi mwa Mwawende mfumu yaikulu Chiwere m’boma la Dowa anyamatawa akapita kukawonera kanema pa lamya ya bamboyu. Mkuluyu anauvomera mlanduwu koma anapempha bwaloli kuti limupatse chilango chofewerako kaamba koti amayang’anira ana amasiye komanso banja lake. Koma oyimira boma pa mlanduwu anapempha bwalolo kuti limpatse mkuluyu chilango chokhwima kaamba koti mlanduwu ndi waukulu kwambiri. Ndipo popereka chigamulo chake First Grade Magistrate Amran Phiri anati wapereka chigamulochi kuti ena omwe ali ndi khalidwe la mtunduwu atengerepo phunziro. Poita amachokera m’mudzi mwa Ndalama mfumu yaikulu Chiwere m’boma lomwelo la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu ku Zomba Ali pa Chiopsezo ku Madzi Osefukira
news: Anthu a m’madera a Chaweza, Magoli komanso Kathebwe mdera la mfumu yaikulu mwambo m’boma la Zomba adandaula kuti miyoyo yawo ili pa chiwopsezo ku ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi kutsatira kusowa kwa mlambala mderalo. Mfumu Malinga yauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti tsogolo lomanga mlambalawu silikuwoneka kaamba koti boma silikuwonetsa chidwi chogwira ntchitoyi ponena kuti lilibe ndalama. Iwo ati kupatula miyoyo yawo, zitukuko zonse zomwe zibwere ku derali sizikhala za phindu kaamba ka madzi osefukira omwe amabwera ku derali chaka ndi chaka. Botomani: Tipanga zotheka “Chiphwasukireni dyke mchaka cha 2018 palibe chomwe chachitika. Tinakadandaula ku boma ndipo anati atithandiza koma mpaka pano kuli ziii. Tili pa chiopsezo chifukwa madzi akasefukira ife tisowa pokhala komanso minda yonse ikokoloka,” inatero mfumu Malinga. Pothilirapo ndemanga wapampando wa zachitukuko ku derali a Joseph Nazombe ati eni derali akhala akuyesetsa kuti akonze mlambalawu komabe iwo apempha boma kuti liwathandize pa ntchitoyi pofuna kuteteza miyoyo ya anthu a mderali. “Takhala tikuwayitana aku boma koma pano akuti alibe ndalama ndiye ife tikuwapempha a khonsolo kuti atithandize kuti zisativute kutsogoloku,” anatero a Nazombe. Polankhulapo phungu wa nyumba ya malamulo mderali, Mark Botomani wati ndi wokhumudwa kuti khonsolo ya boma la Zomba ikuchedwa ndi ntchitoyi komwbe iye awonetsetsa kuti anthu a mderali akhale otetezeka mu nyengo ya mvulayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la CRS Layamikira Anthu a M’boma la Mwanza Pokhala a Chidwi pa Chitukuko
news: Bungwe lomwe limathandiza mabungwe osiyanasiyana pa ntchito za Chitukuko mdziko muno la Catholic Relief Service (CRS) layamikira anthu a mmaboma a Mwanza komanso Neno kamba ka chidwi chawo pa ntchito zofuna kutukula madera awo. Mkulu wa bungweli mayi Julie Ide anena izi pambuyo poyendera ntchito zosiyanasiyana zomwe bungwe la zachitukuko mu mpingo wa katolika la Catholic Development Commission (CADECOM) mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre likugwira ndi thandizo la ndalama kuchokera ku bungweli. Iwo ati ngakhale bungwe lawo lapereka chithandizo ku magawo ochepa, koma anthu a m’mabomawa achita zambiri mu nthawi yochepa zomwe zithandizire kutukula madera awo. “Ndawona kuti pali umwini komanso kuthekera pa ndondomeko zomwe ayika. Anthu a m’maderawa ndi odzipereka komanso omasuka pofuna kuphunzira,” anagtero mayi Ide. M’mawu ake m’modzi mwa anthu omwe apindula ndi ndondomekoyi mayi Oliver Makande ochokera kwa Magaleta mdera la mfumu yaikulu Mlauli m’boma la Neno anati ndondomeko ya bungweli yawathandiza kuyamba kuchita ulimi wawo mogwirizana ndi kusintha kwa nyengo. “Atithandiza ndi mbewu anthu okwana 150, anthu 75 alandira mbuzi. Atipatsa maphunziro ifeyo ma lead farmer kuti tiphunzitse alimi anzathu mmene tingachitire pothamangitsana ndi kusintha kwa nyengo kuti tizipeza chakudya, ndalama zophunzitsira ana sukulu komanso kuthandizira pakhomo pathu,” anatero mayi Makande.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Aulumali Apatsidwe Mwayi Wolandira Masakrament-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati anthu a ulumali akuyenera kupatsidwa mwayi wolandira nawo ma Sakramenti mu mpingo monga akhristu ena onse. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lachinayi mu uthenga wa pa tsiku lokumbukira anthu a ulumali pa dziko lonse lomwe ndi pa 3 december chaka chilichonse. Mu uthenga wake wa pa tsikuli Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kopewa khalidwe lililonse losonyeza kusalana kaamba ka ulumali ponena kuti ndi kulakwa kutero chifukwa ulumali ndi mbali imodzi ya munthu wina aliyense kotero iye wati ndi kofunika kuti aliyense akhale ndi mwayi wotenga nawo mbali pa chitukuko cha mdziko mwake. Iye wati ali pafupi ndi anthu onse a ulumali wosiyanasiyana makamaka pa nthawi ino yomwe mavuto a anthuwa ankerankera kuipa kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus. Papa Francisco wati ngakhale kuti zina ndi zina zasintha pofuna kuchepetsa mavuto a anthu a ulumali ntchito idakalipobe pofuna kuthetsa mavuto omwe anthuwa akukumana nao m’moyo wao. Iye wati ndikofunika kuti anthu a ulumali azipatsidwa mwayi wolandira nao ma Sakramenti komanso mwayi wotenga nao mbali mu zochitika zosiyana-siyana mu mpingo wa Katolika monga akhristu ena onse achitira. Bungwe la United Nations lidakhazikitsa tsiku la 3 December kukhala lokumbukira anthu a ulumali pa dziko lonse m’chaka cha 1992 ndi cholinga chofuna kuthandiza anthu kumvetsetsa mavuto a anthu a ulumali komanso kuti ufulu wa anthuwa ukulemekezedwa pongotchula zina mwa zifukwa zochepa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa wati Mulungu Amadalitsa Anthu Posatengera Machimo Awo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wati Mulungu amadalitsa anthu ake nthawi zonse posatengera machimo awo. Popitiriza kuphunzitsa anthu pa mutu wa mapemphero kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira ma buku (Vatican Apostolic Library) Papa Francisco wati Mulungu amadalitsa anthu ake posayang’anira kuchimwa kwao. Iye wati pobwezera ubwino womwe Mulungu amaonetsera anthu ake kudzera mmadalitso osiyana-siyana akhristu akuyenera kumatamanda, kupembedza ndi kuthokoza Mulungu kudzera m’mapemphero. Papa Francisco wati madalitso a Mulungu amathandiza kutsekula mitima ya anthu ndi kubweretsa kuthekera koti anthuwo athe kutembenuka mtima. Iye wati ubwino womwe Mulungu adawuika mwa munthu aliyense pomulenga sufafanizika kapena kuchoka chifukwa cha tchimo popeza munthu aliyense ndi chifanizo cha Mulungu. Papa Francisco wapereka chitsanzo cha Zakeyo yemwe anali wokhometsa misonkho ndipo munthu wochimwa komabe iye wati Yesu Khristu adaona kuti mwa Zakeyo munali kuthekera koti atha kutembenuka mtima ndi kukhalanso munthu wabwino. Iye wati Yesu Khristu adaona mwa Zakeyo chifanizo chosafafanizika cha Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati kudzera m’mapemphero akhristu amapeza chimwemwe ndi kuzindikira kuchimwa kwao. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti mkhristu weniweni satemberera anzake koma kudalitsa ena basi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MEC Yapempha Opikisana pa Chisankho Chapadera Athandize Kuchepetsa Mavoti Owonongeka
news: Bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) lapempha anthu omwe akupikisana nawo pa chisankho chapadera chomwe chichitike m’maboma a Mangochi ndi Phalombe kuti akhale patsogolo kuphunzitsa anthu owatsatira momwe adzavotere. Mkulu wa zofalitsa nkhani ku bungweli a Sangwani Mwafulirwa ndi omwe anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pamene amayankhapo pa nkhawa zomwe zilipo kuti mwina mavoti ambiri atha kudzawonongeka kaamba koti anthu ena omwe akupikisana nawo pa chisankhochi pakatipa anasintha zipani zoyimira. “Inde tikudziwa kuti pakatipa anthu ena anasintha zipani koma ife tikuwauza kuti ndi udindo wawo kuwauza anthu omwe amawatsatira mmene akavotere kuti tisadzakhale ndi ma voti ambiri a null and voidchifukwa panopa aliyense akuyenera kudziwa kuti ayimira chipani chomwe anayimira mchaka cha 2019 ndiye awauze zonsezo anthuwo,” anatero a Mwafulirwa. Pamenepa iwo atsimikizira anthu a m’maboma awiriwa kuti chisankhochi chidzayenda bwino ndipo chikhala chosiyana ndi momwe chinayendera cha 2019 kaamba koti zigamulo za bwalo la milandu pa nkhani ya chisankho, zathandiza bungweli kusintha kagwiridwe ka ntchito zake. “Ena mwina lain di nkhawa kuti chisankho chisokonekera ngati cha 2019 chija komaakhale nafe chikhulupiliro chifukwa pakatipanso tapangitsa chisankho china chapadera ku Karonga Central, Lilongwe North West komanso ku Makhuwira South ward ku Chikwawa ndipo zonse zinayenda bwino,” anatero a Mwafulirwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Apulumutsa Mayi Ofuna Kuphedwa Pomuganizira Kuti Ndi Mfiti
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa apulumutsa mayi wina amene amafuna kuphedwa ndi anthu okwiya ati pomuganizira kuti ndi mfiti. Malingana ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha, anthu a m’mudzi mwa Mzikometsa ndi Mbalira m’dera la mfumu yayikulu Chiwere m’bomalo ndi omwe amafuna kupha mayiyo Annie Black wa zaka 38 ati pomuganizira kuti amaphunzitsa ana ufiti. Iye wati zimenezi zachitika m’masiku a pa 1 ndi 2 mwezi uno, ndipo apolisi anapita kukapulumutsa mayiyo atangolandira malipoti oti ali pa chiopsezo chakuti akhonza kuphedwa. Padakalipano galimoto ya apolisi yomwe inatenga apolisi omwe amakapulumutsa mayiyo yaphwayidwa ndi anthu olusawo. Sub Inspector M’bumpha wadzudzula zomwe zachitikazi ndipo wapempha anthu m’bomalo kuti asamatengere lamulo m’manja mwawo, koma kuwonetsetsa kuti aliyense amene akumuganizira kuti wapalamula mlandu amutumiza ku polisi kuti akayankhe mlandu wake. M’boma lomwe-li la Dowa, bambo wina wafa atawombedwa ndi mphezi. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson Mbumpha bambo-yu ndi Semu Mustafa wa zaka 72 zakubadwa ndipo anawombedwa ndi mphenziyo pamene anakhala pansi pa mtengo wina panja pa nyumba yake ndipo amapuma kaamba koti anali akuchokera kumunda. Bamboyu anatengeredwa ku chipatala cha Dzaleka komwe amdotolo anapeza kuti wafa kaamba nyetsi ya mphenzi. Malemu-yu amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kasangu m’dera la mfumu yayikulu Mkukula m’boma lomwelo la Dowa. Padakalipano apolisi apempha anthu m’bomalo kuti asamabisale pa mtengo mu nthawi ya mvula pofuna kupewa ngozi za mtunduwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bwalo la Milandu ku Ntcheu Lalamula Amuna Awiri Akagwire Ukayidi Zaka 19 pa Mlandu Wogwililira
news: Bwalo la milandu la Senior Resident Magistrate m’boma la Ntcheu lalamula bambo wina wazaka 33 kuti akakhale ku ndede zaka 19 kamba kogwililira msungwana wa zaka 15. Malinga ndi oyimira boma pa milandu Inspector Beatrice Kankhuni, bamboyu Laiden Kalowa, anapalamula mlanduwu pa 18 October chaka chino. Iye anati patsikuli msungwanayu anagona mnyumbayo ndi abale ake awiri pomwe mayi wake anapita kukadwazika matenda a m’bale wina ku chipata cha Mtonda. Kankhuni anapitiriza kuwuza bwalo kuti pomwe mayi a mwanayu kunalibe, bamboyu anapezerapo mwayi ndipo analowa mnyumbayi ndi kuyamba kugwirira msungwanayo pomwe anali mtulo ndipo posakhalisa msungwanayo anazindikira kuti akugwiriridwa ndipo anakuwa zomwe zinapangitsa kuti mchimwene wake adzuke kupita kukamuthandiza. Apa mchimweneyo anakumana ndi bamboyu pakhomo la chipinda cha msungwanayo ndipo atafusidwa anati amakayasa fodya koma kenaka bamboyo anathawa asanagwidwe ndi anthu a m’mudzi. Atawonekera ku bwaloli mkuluyu anawukana mlanduwu koma mbali ya boma inabweretsa mboni zisanu zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkuluyu apezeka olakwa pa mlanduwu. Bwalo lomweli la Senior Resident Magistrate m’boma la Ntcheu lalamulanso bambo wina wa zaka 28 kukakhala kundende zaka 18 kamba kogwirira mdzukulu wake wa zaka 8. Sub Inspector Beatrice Kankhuni anawuza bwaloli kuti bamboyu Salimoni Chitedze ndi mchimwene weni weni wa mayi ake amsungwanayo ndipo anati pa 27 september mayi wa mwanayo anauza bamboyo kuti awasamalire anawo pomwe iye amapita kumunda. Bamboyu akuti anaphika msima ndipo anawuza anawo kuti yemwe akufuna kudya avomere kugonedwa ndi iye akatha kudya msimayo. Pambuyo pake mkuluyu anatenga msungwanayu yemwe anali wamkulu pa onsewa, kumulowetsa mnyumba ndi kumugwililira. Popereka chigamulo Senior Resident Magistrate Yohane Munthali anati wapereka chigamulo cha mtunduwu kwa amuna awiriwa kuti ena atengerepo phunziro ponena kuti mchitidwewu ukuchulukira kwambiri m’bomalo. Malinga ndi malipoti ochokera ku polisi, kuyambira mwezi wa January mpaka October chaka chino chiweregero cha milandu yogwililira m’boma la Ntcheu chafika pa 57.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamikira Wailesi ya Cube Pokonza Dongosolo Labwino la Advent
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wayamikira wayilesi ya Cube mdziko la Italy kaamba ka chikonzero chake pofuna kuthandiza anthu kusinkhasinkha za nyengo ya Advent komanso chilengedwe. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, iye wayamikira wayilesiyi chifukwa cha chikonzero chake chofuna kuthandiza akhristu a mpingo’wu kusinkhasinkha tanthauzo leni-leni la nyengo ya Advent ndipo pa nthawi yomweyo kusinkhasinkhanso chilengedwe. “Ndikuthokoza sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Salesian chifukwa chokonza ntchito yotamandikayi mounikiridwa ndi Mau a Mulungu komanso kalata ya Laudato Si,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawo. Iye watsimikizira onse omwe agwire ntchitoyi mapemphero ake komanso monga mwa nthawi zonse wawapempha kuti naonso azimupempherera. Sukulu ya ukachenjede ya m’dziko la Italy yodziwika kuti Salesian University Institute yomwe ndi mbali imodzi ya wayilesi ya Cube izithandiza anthu kusinkhasinkha Mau a Mulungu mu nyengo ya Advent komanso pa nthawi yomweyo kusinkhasinkha za chilengedwe. Ma pologalamu’wa omwe mutu wake m’chingerezi ndi Advent Green Dream ayamba laMulungu pa 29 November mpaka pa 24 December, 2020. Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse uyamba nyengo ya Advent laMulungu likubwerali pokonzekera Christmas.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Reserve Bank Itulutsa 1000 Kwacha Yatsopano pa 1 February 2020
news: Bank yayikulu mdziko muno ya Reserve Bank yalengeza kuti idzatulutsa 1000-kwacha yatsopano kuyambira pa 1 February 2021. Gavala wa bankiyi Dr. Wilson Banda walengeza izi lero pa nsonkhano wa atolankhani mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Banda ati kusinthaku kwabwera pofuna kukhwimitsa chitetezo cha ndalama kwa akamberembere omwe amapanga ndalama zachinyengo. Ndalama yomwe ikusinthidwayo Dr. Banda ati kuchokera pomwe bank ya Reserve inatulutsa ndalama yapepala ya 1000 mwezi wa May chaka cha 2012, anthu ena akhala akupanga ndalamayi mwachinyengo, izi zachititsa kuti akatswiri osiyanasiyana kudzera mu kafukufuku wawo atulutsa zizindikiro zina zamakono zomwe ndi zothandiza kuti anthu ena alephere kupanga ndalamayi mwachinyengo. Ichi ndi ndi chifukwa chomwe chachititsa bank’yi kusintha zizindikiro zina za ndalama kuti ikhale yotetezeka kwathunthu. Iwo ati malipoti akuonetsa kuti ndalama zikuluzikulu mdzikolino zomwe ndi za 1000 ndi 2000 ndi zomwe anthu amakonda kuzipanga mwachinyengo komabe pakadali pano bank yawo isintha ndalama ya 1000 yokha chifukwa ndalama ya 2000 ili ndi ndi zizindikiro zokwanira zoiteteza kwa achinyengo. Iwo ati bank yawo idzipereka podziwitsa anthu pa zakusinthaku kuti pofuka mwezi wa February anthu adzakhale akudziwa kusiyana kwa ndalama yakale ndi yatsopanoyi. Komabe iwo ati ndalama yatsopanoyi ikadzayamba kugwira ntchito yakale idzagwirabe ntchito kwa chaka pofuna kupereka mpata kuti bank yawo itolerere ndalama zonse zakale. Pali chiyembekezo kuti ndalama yatsopanoyi idzayamba kugwiritsidwa ntchito pa 1 February chaka cha mawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wafa Atawombedwa ndi Galimoto pa Diamphwe M’boma la Dedza
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 23 wafa atawombedwa ndi galimoto pafupi ndi mlatho wa Diamphwi m’boma la Dedza. Malinga ndi othandizira kufalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Beatrice Jefita, bamboyu Patrick Ndiche yemwe pa nthawiyo amafuna kuwoloka mseu, galimoto ina yomwe imayendetseda ndi a Isaac Songeya yomwe nambala yake ndi DA 6774 inamuwomba mpaka kufera pomwepo. Seargent Jefita ati zotsatira za ku chipatala zasonyeza kuti Ndiche wamwalira kamba kovulala kwambiri m’mutu, ndipo padakali pano apolisi apempha oyendetsa galimoto kuti aziyendetsa mosamala. Ndiche amachokera m’mudzi mwa Khomani mfumu yaikulu Chiseka m’boma la Lilongwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MEJN Yadandaula ndi Kusowa kwa Kalondolondo pa Chitukuko M’boma la Mangochi
