news: Bungwe la Malawi Economic Justice Network (MEJN) ladandaula kusowa kwa kalondolondo wa zitukuko zomwe boma komanso mabungwe akuchita m’boma la Mangochi. Mkulu wa bungweli mchigawo chakumwera kwa dziko lino a Mike Marvin Banda ndi omwe anena izi lachinayi pambuyo pa maphunziro a akuluakulu a mabungwe omwe si aboma omwe ali pansi pa bungwe la MEJN m’boma la Mangochi. Banda kufotokozera adindo pa mkumanowo Iwo ati mkumanowu unali mbali imodzi ya zochitika za mu project yomwe bungweli likugwira m’boma la Mangochi polimbana ndi kusiyana komwe kulipo pakati pa anthu olemera ndi osauka mdziko muno. Pamenepa bungweli liyesetsa kudzindikiritsa adindo a m’madera kutsatira bwino zitukuko zomwe zikuchitika m’madera mwawo. Polankhulapo wapampando wa mabungwe omwe si aboma omwe ali pansi pa bungwe la MEJN m’boma la Mangochi, a Fredrick Makiyi ati maphunziro a tsikuli awathandiza pochita kalondolondo wa zitukuko zomwe zikuchitika m’bomalo. Bungwe la MEJN likhala likugwira ntchitoyi m’boma la Mangochi kwa zaka zisanu pomwe ndi kuyambaira mchaka cha 2020 mpaka 2025.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadandaula Kamba ka Imfa ya Diego Maradona
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wa chisoni kumva za imfa ya katswiri wa masewero a mpira wa miyendo Diego Maradona. Mkulu wa ofesi yofalitsa ma uthenga ku Vatican Matteo Bruni wati Papa Francisco akukumbukira bwino za mikumano yake ndi katswiriyu kangapo konse ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican. Maradona kupereka uniform ya mpira kwa Papa Francisko Bruni wati Papa’yu wachita mapemphero opemphelera mzimu wa Maradona kuti uuse mu mtendere wosatha komanso wati Papa Francisco wakhala akupemphelera katswiriyu pa nthawi yomwe amadwala. Papa Francisco yemwe amakonda masewero a mpira komanso ndi sapota wa team ya mpira wa miyendo ya m’dziko la kwao ku Argentina ya San Lorenzo adakumana koyamba ndi Diego Maradona ku Vatican m’chaka cha 2014 pa nkhani yofuna kupeza ndalama zothandizira anthu kudzera m’masewero a mpira wa miyendo. Pa mwambowu Maradona adapereka kwa Papa Francisco malaya ovala posewera mpira yolemba Francisco komanso number 10. Awiriwa adakumananso kachiwiri m’chaka cha 2015. Maradona wamwalira kwao ku Argentina lachitatu pa 25 November 2020 ndi vuto la nthenda ya mtima ndipo wamwalira ali ndi zaka 60.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wanjatidwa Kamba Kogonana Ndi Anyamata Anayi
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa akusunga mchitokosi bambo wina wa zaka 21 kamba komuganizira kuti wakhala akugona ndi anyamata anayi a zaka zapakati 10 ndi 17. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyo-M’bumpha Malinga ndi wofalisa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha, bamboyu Innocent Poita wakhala akuchita izi kuyambira mchaka cha 2016 kufikira mwezi wa November chaka chino pomwe wanjatidwa. M’bumpha wati bamboyu wakhala akuchita za chiwerewere ndi anyamatawa akapita kwawo kukaonera kanema pa lamya ya bamboyo. “Ndizoonadi kuti tamanga a Poita kamba koti amagona ndi ana a zaka zapakati pa 10 ndi 17 ndipo iwo akhala akuchita zimenezi anawa akapita kunyumba kwake kukawonera filimu,” anatero M’bumpha. M’bumpha wati Poita wamangidwa pomwe apolisi anachita kafukufuku ndipo ati akaonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Akukumba ‘Golide’ mu Nkhalango Yotetezedwa ya Nkhotakota
news: Nthambi yoyang’anira malo otetezedwa a Nkhotakota yadandaula ndi kukula kwa mchitidwe okumba miyala ya mtengo wapatali mosavomelezeka womwe anthu akuchita pafupi ndi malo osungira nyama a m’boma la Nkhotakota. Mkulu oyang’anira malowa a Samuel Kamoto ndi omwe anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Kamoto: Anthu akukhulupilira kuti mu nkhalangomu muli golide Iwo ati anthu a m’madera ozungulira malowa akulowelera malo osungira nyamawa zomwe zikusokoneza zosamalira nyama zotetezedwazi. “Anthu akukhulupilira kuti kuzungulira pa malowa pali miyala ya mtengo wapatali ya golide zomwe zachititsa kuti ayikepo chidwi chokumbachi,” anatero a Kamoto. A Kamoto ati pali kuthekera koti anthu okumba miyalawa atha kulowelera mkati mwa malowa zomwe zitha kuthawitsa nyamazi. Mwazina, a iwo atinso mchitidwewu wasokonezanso kwambiri ntchito za ulimi wa mthilira kumbali ina ya mitsinje yomwe ili m’mbali mwa malowa kamba koti madzi anawuma ndi kukumba komwe kukuchitikaku ndipo apempha magulu okhudzidwa kuti abwere pamodzi pofuna kulimbana ndi vutoli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Malawi Under 17 Yagonja ndi Timu ya Angola
news: Mphunzitsi wa timu ya Malawi ya anyamata osapyola zaka 17, Deklerk Msakakuona wati ali ndi nchito yayikulu yoti agwire kuti timuyi ichite bwino kutsogoloku Akuti ali ndi ntchito yaikulu-Msakakuona Iye wanena izi pomwe timuyi yagonjanso ndi timu ya Angola ndi zigoli zisanu ndi ziwili kwa chimodzi (7-1) mu mpikisano wa COSAFA Youth Championship omwe ukuchitika mdziko la South Africa. Malawi idagonjanso ndi timu ya Zambia ndi zigoli zisanu ndi chimodzi kwa ziwili (6-2) komanso inafanana mphamvu ndi timu ya South Africa pogoletsana zigoli ziwiri kwa ziwiri. Mmene zateremu Malawi ikumananso ndi timu ya Angola pa 29 November 2020 pokanganirana malo a panambala 4 ndi 3 pomwe Zambia isewere ndi South Africa pofuna kupeza yemwe akhare pa nambala 1 ndi 2.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chisankho Chachibwereza Chichitika pa 15 December
news: Bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) lalengeza kuti chisankho cha chibwereza chomwe bwalo la milandu linagamula kuti chichitikenso m’madera atatu a mdziko muno chichitika pa 15 December chaka chino. Kachale: Anthu opikisana sakusintha Wapampando wa bungweli Justice Dr. Chifundo Kachale ndi yemwe walengeza izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe bungweli linachititsa lero mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Zimenezi zikutanthauza kuti chisankhochi chichitika mdera la kuzambwe m’boma la Mangochi, kumpoto chakumvuma m’boma la Mangochi komanso kumpoto m’boma la Phalombe. Potengera kuti chisankhochi ndi chobwereza chifukwa bwalo la milandu linapeza mavuto ena ndi ena, Dr. Kachale ati onse omwe anagwira ntchito pa chisankho chomwe chinakanidwa ndi bwalo la milanduchi, padakalipano saloredwa kugwiranso ntchitoyi. Iwo ati omwe apikisane pa chisankhochi ndi okhawo omwe anapikisana nawo pa chisankho choyambacho komanso anthu amwe atavote ndi omwe anavota pa chisankho choyamba zomwe zikutanthawuza kuti sipakahalanso anthu atsopano olembetsa mkaundula wa voti pa chisankhochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Flames Under 17 Yafanana Mphamvu ndi Timu ya Botswana
news: Timu ya mpira wa miyendo ya dziko lino ya anyamata osapyola zaka 17, yafanana mphamvu ndi timu ya Botswana pogoletsana zigoli ziwiri – ziwiri mu mpikisano wa COSAFA Youth Championship omwe ukuchitikira mdziko la South Africa Akuti timu yake ipambana-Msakakuona Poyankhulapo masewerowa atatha, mphunzitsi wa timuyi Deklerk Msakauona wati anyamata ake asewera bwino ngakhale adalimo ochepa kaamba ka kutulutsidwa kwa m’modzi mwa anyamatawa pa mphindi zisanu zoyambilira zamasewerowa. Pamenepa Msakakuona wati ali ndi chikhulupiliro kuti anyamatawa achita bwino mu mpikisanowu. Timuyi ikuyembekezeka kukhala ndi masewero ena ndi timu ya dziko la Zambia pa 22 November ndipo idzatsiriza pa 25 November pomwe idzasewere ndi timu ya Comoros. Padakalipano malipoti akusonyeza kuti matimu a Botswana, Angola, Comoros komanso Eswatini awatulutsa mu mpikisanowu kaamba kogwiritsa ntchito anyamata omwe ndi a zaka zopyola 17.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Coronavirus Wavumbulutsa Mavuto Ochuluka a Anthu Osauka-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati mliri wa Coronavirus wawonetsa mavuto ochuluka omwe anthu osauka amakumana nawo. Mu uthenga wake wa pa kanema omwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse latulutsa lachinayi, Papa wayamba ndi kuthokoza omwe akonza msonkhano wokambirana za mavuto osiyana-siyana omwe mliri wa Coronavirus wabweretsa pakati pa anthu osauka ndipo wati ndi chikhulupiliro chake kuti msonkhanowu uyala mfundo zothandiza maka kuti ulemerero wa munthu aliyense ulemekezedwe. Iye wati mliri wa Coronavirus waika pa mbalambanda mavuto a nkhaninkhani omwe anthu osauka amakumana nawo tsiku ndi tsiku, kotero ndi kofunika kukhazikitsa mfundo zothyakuka zothandizira anthu osauka. Papa Francisco wati mpingo wa katolika ukuyenera kuyamba kusinkhasinkha ndi kupeza njira zothandizira anthu osauka omwe akukumana ndi mavuto osaneneka kaamba ka mliri wa Coronavirus. Papa Francisco watsindika kufunika kwa chikondi pakati pa anthu kuti choncho azitha kugawana mphatso zosiyana-siyana pakati pawo. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti umodzi ndi chilungamo ndi zofunika kwambiri pakati pa anthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Stima Apempha Atsogoleri A Zipembedzo Adzithandiza Ovutika Mosayang’ana Nkhope
news: Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi Ambuye Montfort Stima apempha atsogoleri a mipingo ndi zipembedzo kuti adzigwira ntchito yothandiza anthu ovutika mopanda tsankho. Ambuye Stima anena izi lachinayi m’mudzi mwa Bwanasenje mfumu yaikulu Kawinga m’boma la Machinga pamene anayendera a Mussa Paulo a chipembedzo cha chisilamu omwe amadwala nthenda ya misala. Ambuye Stima ndi Mussa (wavala malaya akuda) Iwo ati chikhristu chiziwonekera pochita zinthu zothandiza anthu ena omwe akusowa chithandizo osati pa kungolankhula ndi pakamwa pokha. Malinga ndi a Twaibu Aliseni omwe ndi amalume a Mussa Paulo, matenda a misalawa anayamba mchaka cha 2009 ndipo mchaka cha 2017 Mussa anasowa pakomopo kufikira mchaka cha 2019 pomwe anapezeka ali mdziko la Zambia. Ali ku Zambia episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mongu ambuye Evance Chinyama Chinyemba anamuwona akuyendayenda pa malo ena ndipo iwo anamutenga ndi kuyamba kumusamalira. Atayamba kupezako bwino, Mussa ndi pomwe anafotokozera ambuye chinyemba kuti iye kwawo ndi ku Malawi m’boma la Machinga. Kuyambira apa ambuye Chinyemba anafotokozera episkopi wa dayosizi ya Zomba ambuye George Desmond Tambala za nkhaniyi omwe anawalumikizitsa ndi ambuye Montfort Stima a dayosizi ya Mangochi komwe ndi mbali yomwe Mussa amachokera. Anamusamalira Mussa-Ambuye Chinyemba Pamenepa ambuye Stima komanso ambuye Chinyemba anayamba kukonza dongosolo loti Mussa abwere mdziko muno kuchokera mdziko la Zambia ndipo atafufuza njira za boma anawona kuti zitenga nthawi yaitali kwambiri kuti mussa afike mdziko muno ndipo m’malo mwake analumikizana ndi ma episkopi a madayosizi a Lusaka komanso Chipata kuti amuthandizire Mussa kuyenda bwino ndipo bungwe la chilungamo ndi mtendere Catholic Commission for Justice and Peace (CCJP) mu dayosizi ya Mangochi ndi lomwe linakamutenga Mussa pa chipata cha Mwami omwe ndi malire a dziko lino ndi dziko la Zambia ndi kukamusiya kumudzi kwawo ku Machinga. Pa 19 November ndi pomwe ambuye Montfort Stima anakamuyendera Mussa kumudzi kwao ndipo m’mawu awo ambuye Stima anayamikira ambuye Chinyemba a dayosizi ya Mongu mdziko la Zambia kaamba ka mtima wawo wa chifundo pomusamala Mussa ngakhale anali munthu osamudziwa komanso wa chipembedzo china. Pamenepa iwo apempha mipingo ndi zipembedzo zina kuti zitengerepo chitsanzo pa zomwe ambuye Chinyemba achita pokonda kuthandiza anthu mosayang’ana nkhope ponena kuti imeneyi ndiyo ntchito ya atumiki a Mulungu. Ambuye Stima pamodzi ndiabale ake a Mussa Polankhulapo Mussa yemwe anati tsopano akupezako bwino anayamikira ambuye Chinyemba a mdziko la Zambia kaamba komusamala bwino pa nthawi yomwe anali mdziko la Zambia kwa pafupifupi chaka chathunthu. Ndipo nawo malume ake a Mussa a Twaibu Aliseni anati ndi okondwa kwambiri pokumananso ndi m’bale wawo kaamba koti samaganiza kuti angazakumane nayenso. Iwo ayamikira ambuye Montfort stima komanso mpingo onse wa katolika omwe wathandizira kumuchotsa Mussa mdziko la Zambia ndi kubwera naye kumudzi. Padakalipano Mussa akupitilirabe kulandira thandizo la mankhwala ku matendawa ndipo pali chiyembekezo chakuti akhala bwino posachedwapa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhristu Akhale Ozama M’mapemphero
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kutsanzira Amayi Maria pokhala ozama m’mapemphero. Popitiriza kulankhulapo pa mutu wa mapemphero kuchokera m’chipinda chosungira ma buku (Vatican Apostolic Library) Papa Francisco wati Amayi Maria ndi munthu yemwe adakhulupirira mapemphero komanso kukhala womvera Mulungu. Pa chifukwa ichi iye wati Amayi’wa ndi chitsanzo cheni-cheni cha momwe m’khristu aliyense akuyenera kuyendetsera moyo wake pokhala womvera Mulungu komanso pokhala ndi njala yocheza ndi Mulungu kudzera m’mapemphero. Papa Francisco wati Amayi Maria adawonetsa kumvera kwawo, kukhulupilira kwawo komanso kukonda mapemphero. Iye wati monga Amayi Maria akhristu akuyenera kutsegula mitima yawo kwa Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati potsegula mitima yao kwa Mulungu akhristu amakhala okonzeka kukumana ndi zokhumudwitsa za moyo uno koma pa nthawi yomweyo osataya mpang’ono pomwe chikhulupiriro chao. Iye wamaliza potsindika kuti Amayi Maria ndi Amayi a Mulungu komanso a Mpingo (Mother of God and of the Church).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ndende ya Mikuyu Iyamba Kukhala Ndi Chakudya Chokwanira
news: M’modzi mwa akulu-akulu a nthambi za ndende mdziko muno Commissioner Clement Kainja wati akufunitsitsa kuti mndende za mdziko muno mudzikhala chakudya chokwanira. Commissioner Kainja yemwenso ndi mkulu woyang’anira za ulimi mndende za mdziko lino, amalankhura izi lachiwiri lapitali ku ndende yosungira ana opalamula milandu, ya Mikuyu m’boma la Zomba pomwe amalandira scheme ya zaulimi yogwiritsa ntchito magetsi a mphamvu ya dzuwa yomwe ndi ya ndalama zokwana 40 Million Kwacha kuchokera ku mabungwe a United Purpose, Save The Children komanso Concern World Wide. Ndende ya Mikuyu ku Zomba Iwo ati sikimu imeneyi ichititsa kuti adzilima kawiri kapena katatu pa chaka zomwe zithandize kuti adzikhala ndi chakudya chokwanira komanso kuti akakolora chimanga chambiri china adzitha kugulitsa kuti ndalama zake adziphunzitsira akayidi maluso osiyanasiyana kuti akatuluka ku ndende adzikatha kudziyimira pawokha. Polankhulanso pa mwambo-wo mkulu woyendetsa mapulogalamu ku bungwe la United Purpose komanso yemwe akutsogolera ndondomeko imeneyi mayi Esther Mweso anati akuyembekezera kuti sikimu imeneyi iwathandiza kulima chakudya chokwanira choti adzitha kuwadyetsa akayidi ku ndendeyi. M’mawu ake mkulu woyendetsa mapulogalamu ku bungwe la Save The Children a Frank Mwafulirwa ati bungwe lawo limayang’ana nkhani zokhudza ana choncho anawona kuti ndi chinthu cha nzeru kuti athandize ana omwe akupezeka ku ndende ya Mikuyu.  Mabungwe atatuwa, posachedwapa anaperekanso makina ophikira oyendera mphamvu ya dzuwa ku ndende ya m’boma la Mulanje.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la UJAMAA Lapempha Anthu Aleke Kuchitira Nkhanza Ana
news: Mkulu wa bungwe lolimbana ndi nkhanza kwa ana la UJAMAA Pamodzi m’boma la Machinga a Rahaman Perusi walangiza anthu kuti aleke kuchitira nkhanza ana ndi cholinga choti akwaniritse zolinga zawo. A Perusi alankhula izi lachitatu pa sukulu ya Namalasa m’bomali pamene amakhazikitsa project ya Spotlight Initiative yomwe cholinga chake ndi choti anawa adziwulula nkhanza zomwe amakumana nazo m’madera komanso m’makomo momwe amakhala. Mwapadera patsikuli anawa anaphunzitsidwanso njira zopewera mliri wa COVID-19. Polankhulanso m’modzi mwa ophunzira omwe anali nawo pa mwambo-wu ­­­­­­­­­­Suwema Wilesi wati ndi zoona kuti ana amachitilidwa nkhanza koma kuti samaulura za izi kamba ka mantha. Mwa zina mu projecti-yi, anawa ayikidwa m’magulu omwe mwa zina azithandizidwa njira za m’mene angawululire nkhanza zomwe azikumana nazo. Bungwe la UJAMAA Pamodzi limagwira ntchito m’madera a mfumu yaikulu Nsanama, Mlomba ndi Ngokwe m’boma la Machinga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Atolankhani Ndi Othandiza Pophunzitsa Achinyamata Kudziletsa Kugwiritsa Ntchito Mankhwala Ozunguza Ubongo’
news: Bungwe la Youth Net and Counselling (YONECO) lati atolankhani ndi ofunika kwambiri pophunzitsa achinyamata kudziletsa pa nkhani zogwiritsa ntchito mankhwala ozunguza bongo. Mkandawire: Atolankhani ndi ofunika pa ntchitoyi Mkulu wa bungweli a Macben Mkandawire ndi omwe anena izi pambuyo pa maphunziro a masiku awiri omwe bungweli linakonzera atolankhani ndi cholinga chowadzindikiritsa za project yomwe bungweli likuchita m’boma la Mangochi pa nkhani yolimbana ndi mchitidwe wogwiritsa ntchito mankhwala ozunguza ubongo pakati pa achinyamata a zaka za pakati pa 10 mpaka 24. Iwo ati achinyamata omwe amagwiritsa ntchito mankhwala ozunguza bongo, maganizidwe awo amakhala opelewera ndipo zimakolezera nkhanza pakati pawo. Pamenepa a Mkandawire apempha achinyamata kuti apewe kugwioritsa ntchito mankhwala ozunguza ubongo ponena kuti ali ndi kuthekera kosokoneza tsogolo lawo. Project-yi yomwe yomwe ndi yoyeselera, ndi ya miyezi inayi ndippo ikuyembekezeka kutha mu mwezi wa December.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anjatidwa Kamba Kolemba Anthu 95 Achinyengo Mu Ndondomeko Ya Zipangizo Za Ulimi Zotsika Mtengo
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dedza amanga mkulu wina ogwira ntchito m’boma pomuganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi kupezeka kwa mayina achinyengo okwana 95 pa ndondomeko ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo mdera la Mayani m’bomalo. Wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Cassim Manda wati mkuluyu Gerald Kayambanitsa wa zaka 43 yemwe amagwira ntchito ngati owona za ziweto pansi pa unduna wa zaulimi mdera la Mayani, anapatsidwa ntchito yolemba mayina a anthu oti apindule ndi ndondomekoyi ndipo iye anapanga mudzi wa bodza omwe unali ndi anthu 95 omwe sakudziwika. Padakalipano apolisi ayamikira mafumu poneneza mkuluyu ku polisi atazindikira kuti anthu omwe analembedwa si a mdera lawo ndipo achenjeza onse ogwira ntchito m’boma komanso omwe akugulitsa zipangizozi kuti agwire ntchito yawo moyenera ponena kuti akapanda kutero anjatidwa. Kayambanitsa yemwe amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mikuta mfumu yaikulu Tambala m’boma lomwelo la Dedza akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu ndi kukayankha mlandu wolemba zinthu za bodza, kusintha mayina oyenera komanso kugwiritsa ntchito ofesi yake molakwika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Awiri Afa pa Ngozi ya pa Nsewu M’boma la Nsanje
news: Anthu awiri afa galimoto ziwiri zitawombana mu nsewu wa Khulubvi m’boma la Nsanje. Malinga ndi mneneri wa apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Agness Zalakoma, ngoziyi yachitika m’mudzi mwa Magulugulu ndipo yakhudza galimoto ya mtundu wa minibus nambala yake NA 5143 yomwe imayendetsedwa ndi a Robert Godfly a zaka 33 omwe pa nthawiyi amachokera ku Bangula kupita ku Nsanje. Atafika pa malopa, dalaivalayu analephera kuwongolera bwino zomwe zinachititsa kuti aphonye nsewu ndi kukawomba njinga yamoto yomwe imabwera kutsogolo kwawo yomwe inanyamula anthu awiri. Kutsatira izi anthu onse awiri omwe anali pa njingayi omwe ndi a Mofati Bilinjala a zaka 22 ndi a Samuel Fote a zaka 24 onsewa a kwa mfumu yaikulu Tengani m’boma lomwelo la Nsanje anafera pomwepo kaamba koti anavulala kwambiri m’mutu. Pakadalipano apolisi amanga dalaivala wa galimoto-yi Robert Godfrey yemwe ndi wa m’mudzi mwa Thudzu mfumu yaikulu Maseya m’boma la Chikwawa ndipo akuyembekezera kukawonekera kuk bwalo la milandu ndi kukayankha mlandu opha anthu kamba koyendetsa galimoto mosasamala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chaka cha Baibulo Chazamitsa Miyoyo ya Akhristu mu Mpingo
news: Chaka cha baibulo akuti chathandiza kuzamitsa miyoyo ya akhristu ambiri mu mpingo wakatolika m’dziko muno. Mkulu wa kuofesi yowona za baibulo mu dayosizi ya Dedza bambo Anthony Kadyampakeni ndi omwe anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati alankhula izi potsatira malipoti omwe ofesi yawo yapeza okhudza momwe chakachi chayendera ngakhale kuti madayosizi ena mdziko muno ayamba kale kutsekera chakachi. “Anthu akhala akulimbikitsidwa kukhala akhristu okonda kuwerenga baibulo ndipo kuti aliyense akhale nalo. Takhala tikuchita mapologalamu osiyanasiyana m’mawailesi athu a mpingo wa katolika ndi cholinga choti azindikire za baibulo. Chaka cha baiubulo chinatsekedwa pa 4 October mchaka cha baibulo ndipo mwambowu unachitikira ku dayosizi ya Mzuzu. Malinga ndi bambo Kadyampakeni, ma dayosizi onse omwe sanatsekerebe chakacha, achita izi pa 22 November chaka chino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapepesa Dziko La Ecuador Pa Imfa Ya Cardinal Chiriboga
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wopepesa ku mpingo wa katolika m’dziko la Ecuador potsatira imfa ya Cardinal Vela Chiriboga. Cardinal Chiriboga Mu uthenga wake kwa Archbishop Alfredo José Espinoza Mateus wa ku Quito mdziko la Ecuador, Papa Francisco wati ndi wa chisoni chachikulu kumva za imfa ya Cardinal Raúl Eduardo Vela Chiriboga. Papa Francisco wati akukumbukira bwino ntchito zotamandika zomwe Cardinal Chiriboga adagwira potumikira Mpingo mwa toto moyo. Iye wapepesa mpingo wa klatolika mdziko la Ecuador komanso wati kudzera m’mapemphero ali pafupi ndi banja lofedwa pa nthawi yovutayi. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kupempherera mzimu wa Cardinal Chiriboga kuti uwuse mu mtendere wosatha ndipo wapereka madalitso ake (Apostolic Blessing) ku Mpingo wa Katolika m’dzikolo. Mwa zina m’chaka cha 2015 Cardinal Chiriboga adali nthumwi ya padera ya Papa Francisco ku chaka cha Ukaristia (10th National Eucharistic Congress) m’dziko la Peru. Cardinal Chiriboga yemwe adali Archbishop wa Archdiocese ya Quito m’dziko la Ecuador kuyambira 2003 mpaka 2010 wamwalira laMulungu pa 15 November 2020 ali ndi zaka 86 ndipo wamwalira ali Archbishop wopuma (Archbishop Emeritus) wa Archdiocese ya Quito.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chipani Cha Asisteri Cha Presentation Chili Ndi Malingaliro Ofikira Madayosizi Ena
news: Muyambitsi wa chipani cha asisteri cha Presentation mdziko muno, Sister Luwiza Dzikolidaya ati ndi okhutira ndi momwe ntchito za chipanichi zikuyendera. Chipanichi akuti chikukula Sister Dzikolidaya awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti kuchoka pomwe iwo anayambitsa chipanichi mchaka cha 1968 ndi upangiri wa malemu Ambuye Cornelius Chitsulo omwe anali episkopi wa dayosizi ya Dedza panthawiyo, maso-mphenya awo anaphelezera pomwe pano chipanichi chikukula tsiku ndi tsiku ndipo padakalipano ali m’malingaliro ofikira ku madayosizi ena Iwo ati chipanichi chomwe likulu lake lili ku St. Martin De Pores Parish ku Dedza ndipo padakalipano chikutsogoleredwa ndi Sister Agatha Ziyaye, cholinga chake ndi chofuna kufikira anthu ovutikitsitsa, amayi amasiye, anthu okalamba komaso othodwa. Pamenepa Sister Dzikolidaya apempha atsikana onse omwe ndi a mpingo wa katolika ndipo makolo awo ndi achikhristu kuti ngati akumva kuyitana alowe mchipanichi ndi cholinga choti chipitilire kukula.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Achinyamata Apempha Boma Liwathandize Kukhala Odzidalira
news: Mgwirizano wa mabungwe achinyamata wa Jalasi Youth Network (JAYNET) m’boma la Mangochi, wapempha boma kuti lithandize achinyamata a mdera la Sub T/A Mkata pa kuthekera komwe alinako kuti akhale mzika zodzidalira. Wapampando wa bungweli Zakaria Alisa ndi yemwe wanena izi pa msonkhano omwe bungweli linakonza ndi adindo osiyanasiyana a mdera lawo. Masamba: Azichita business yopindulira anthu akudera Iye wati achinyamata a mderali ali ndi kuthekera kochita zinthu zosiyanasiyana zomwe ndi zothandiza pa moyo wawo koma akungosowa opangiri wapadera ochokera ku boma komanso mabungwe. “Achinyamata a kuno tili ndi kuthekera chifukwa timapanga zinthu zosiyanasiyana pa tokha koma timafuna boma litatithandiza kuti tipite patsogolo kuti miyoyo yathu isnthe osati ingokhala momwe ililimu,” anatero Alisa. Polankhulapo yemwe anali mlendo wolemekezeka pa mwambowu phungu wa derali mayi Francesca Masamba anati ayesetsa kuthandiza achinyamatawa mu njira zosiyana siyana kuti athandizenso pa ntchito yotukula dziko lino. “Akamachita business asangochita chifukwa anthu enanso akuchita koma awone zinthu zomwe zikusweka ku dera. Akatero ndiye kuti achita business yomwe ikhale yopindulira anthu a dera lino ndipo pambuyo pakenso iyeyo monga wachinayamata apezapo phindu lokwanira,” anatero Masamba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alangiza Apolisi Adzidalira Mulungu pa Ntchito Yawo
news: Mkulu wa apolisi mdziko muno Dr. George Kainja wapempha apolisi kuti adzidalira Mulungu pogwira ntchito zawo, ndi kukhala okhulupilika nthawi zonse. Dr. Kainja anena izi pa mwambo wokumbukira apolisi khumi ndi anayi omwe anamwalira akugwira ntchito mzaka zitatu zadutsazi. Kainja: Dalirani Mulungu nthawi zonse Iwo ati munthu wodalira Mulungu, amagwira ntchito zake mokhulupilika pothana ndi anthu ophwanya malamulo. Polankhulapo mkulu owona za uzimu ku likulu la apolisi mdziko muno bamboo Steven Likhutcha anati mwambowu ndi ofunikira kwambiri pakati pa apolisi ndipo wapempha apolisi kuti adzikonda Mulungu pa ntchito yawo. Mkulu wa asilikali a nkhondo yapansi ku Malawi Defence Force (MDF) Major General Elias Mpaso anali nawo pa mwambowu ndipo anakayala nkhata pamodzi ndi wamkulu wa apolisiyu. Patsikuli mkazi wa wapolisi yemwe anaphedwa ndi anthu pa zipolowe kwa Nsundwe mu mzinda wa Lilongwe a Usumani Imedi anakayala nawonso nkhata patsikuli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati ndi Wokhudzidwa ndi Ngozi za ku Phillipines, Romania
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ngozi zomwe zachitika m’maiko a Phillipines ndi Romania. Poyamba iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa chifukwa cha mphepo yowopsa ndi mvula yambiri zomwe zachititsa kuti madzi asefukire ndi kuwononga miyoyo ndi katundu m’dziko la Philippines. Papa’yu wafotokozanso chisoni chake kaamba ka moto omwe waononga chipatala chomwe chimathandiza anthu odwala nthenda ya Covid-19 m’dziko la Romania. Iye watsimikizira anthu a m’maiko awiriwa kuti kudzera m’mapemphero ali nawo limodzi pa nthawi yovutayi. Malipoti ati anthu 67 afa potsatira mphepo yoopysa ndi mvula m’dziko la Philippines pamene ku Romania anthu khumi afa ndipo ena ambiri avulala pa ngozi ya moto womwe waononga chipatala chomwe chakhala chikuthandiza anthu odwala nthenda ya Covid-19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Atsogoleri a Dziko la Ivory Coast Akambirane
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha atsogoleri a mdziko la Ivory Coast kuti athetse mavuto omwe ali mdzikolo pochita zokambirana. Polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi zipolowe zomwe zikuchitika m’dziko la Ivory Coast zomwe zachititsa kuti anthu ena afe ndipo ena kuthawa m’dzikolo. Iye wati mavuto a m’dzikolo angathe pokhapokha ngati atsogoleri atabwera pamodzi ndi kuchita zokambirana. Pamenepa iye wapempha mapemphero opempherera anthu a m’dzikolo maka kuti pakhale umodzi pakati pa anthu kudzera mu njira yokhululukirana ndi kukhalitsana bwino ngati ana a banja limodzi. Bungwe loona za chisankho m’dziko la Ivory Coast lidalengeza kuti President Alassane Quattara ndi yemwe adapambana pa chisankho cha m’dzikolo koma anthu ena akutsutsa izi ponena kuti President Quattara sanayenere kuima nao pa chisankhocho ponena kuti walamulira kale zaka kkhumi kotero kusankhidwa kwake ndi kuphwanya malamulo a dzikolo. Anthu oposa 16 aphedwa ndipo anthu oposa 8000 athawa m’dzikolo kaamba ka zipolowezi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha a Katekisti Adzilandira Sacrament la Kulapa
news: Akatekisti a mu dayosizi ya Mangochi awapempha kuti akhale okonda kupemphera komanso kulandira sacrament la kulapa. Bambo Enerst Mwinganyama ndi omwe anena izi pa m’bindikiro wa sabata imodzi omwe dayosiziyi inakonzera atumikiwa ku St. Mary’s Pastoral Centre mu dinale ya Mpiri. A katekisti omwe achita m’bindikirowo Bambo Mwinganyama anati ngati atumiki a mpingo akatekistiwa akuyenera kumawonetsa zitsanzo zabwino kwa akhristu awo pokhala m’moyo wodziyeretsa nthawi zonse. “Ndimafuna kuti iwowo adzindikire kuti ndi anthu ndi munthu aliyense amachimwa. Koma ngati atsogoleri akuyenera kupereka chitsanzo chabwino kwa anthu omwe akuwatsogolera pokonda sacrament la kulapa komanso kukonda kupemphera kwambiri,” anatero bambo Mwinganyama. Polankhulanso m’modzi mwa akatekisti omwe anali nawo pa m’bindikiro-wu a Ellias Adriano a parish ya Kapire anati m’bindikirowo wawathandiza kuzamitsa moyo wawo wa uzimu ndipo akabwelera m’malo omwe amatumikira, akatumikira bwino akhristu awo. M’bindikirowu unachitika pa mutu woti ‘Kubatizidwa Ndi Kutumidwa’.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CFM Yati Ndi Yokhudzidwa Ndi Nkhanza Kwa Amayi
news: Bungwe la mabanja mu mpingo wa katolika la Christian Family Movement (CFM) lati ndi lokhudzidwa ndi kuchuluka kwa nkhani zogwililira ana m’dziko muno. Wapampando wa bungwe-li a Kelvin Chifunda awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti pakufunika kuti abambo m’dziko muno aphunzitsidwe ndi kumvetsa bwino za udindo wawo pa chisamaliro cha ana. Bungwe la mabanja mu mpingo wa katolika Iwo ati m’chitidwe ogwililira ana uli ndi kuthekera kosokoneza tsogolo la msungwana, mpingo ngakhalenso dziko, choncho ndi kofunika kuti boma libwere ndi malamulo okhwima omwe athandizire kuteteza ana ku m’chitidwe oyipawu. “Ife zikutipatsa mantha ndipo sitikudziwa kuti tsogolo la ana amenewa ndi lotani. Nkhanza zimenezi zitha kukhudza tsogolo lawo, chitukuko mdziko sichingayende komanso mpingo sungapite patsogolo nagti amayi asakutenga gawo. Tiyeni anawa tiwatenge ngati ana athu chifukwa ndikukhulupilira kuti munthu wina agwililire mwana wathu sitingakondwere nazo,” anatero a Chifunda. Pamenepa iwo apemphanso mabungwe omwe amawona za ufulu wa amayi ndi ana kuti adziyika abambo m’mabungwewa ndi cholinga choti abambo asamawone ngati akusalidwa pa zinthu zina zomwe zingachititse kuti adzichitira nkhanza amayi. A Chifunda apempha abambo kuti adzikonda kupemphera poleka kusiyira mapemphero amayi okha ndipo apemphanso atsogoleri a mipingo kuti apemphelere dziko lino kuti chiwanda choyipachi chichoke pakati pa abambo a mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Stima Apempha Atolankhani Afufuze Gwero la Nkhanza Kwa Amayi
news: Atolankhani achikatolika awapempha kuti athandize adindo pofufuza ndi kubweretsa poyera nkhani zokhudza nkhanza zomwe amayi ndi atsikana akukumana nazo mdziko muno. Wapampando owona za zofalitsa nkhani komanso kafukufuku ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno ku Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) Ambuye Montfort Stima anena izi loweruka ku Lilongwe pa msonkhano wa bungwe la atolankhani achikatolika la Association of Catholic Journalists m’chigawo chapakati. Ambuye Stima omwenso ndi episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi ati nkhanza kwa amayi, komanso atsikana zikuchuluka kwambiri ndipo mpingo ukuyesetsa kulankhulapo kwa akhristu ake komabe ati uthengawu si okwanira kamba koti umafikira anthu ochepa okha poyelekeza ndi momwe atolankhani angachitire pa ntchito yawo yolemba nkhani. “Chikhalidwe chathu chikuyenera kusintha posiya kupereka udindo onse kwa abambo. Zimenezi zimachititsa kuti anyamata akamakula adzikhala ndi maganizo owaonera pansi atsikana ndi kumawachitira nkhanza powaona ngati ndi opanda ntchito,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Iwo apemphanso atolankhaniwa kuti athandize pofalitsa utenga wa kapewedwe ka nthenda ya COVID-19 ponena kuti anthu ambiri atayilira pa nkhaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mulungu Amamva Mapemphero a Anthu Odzichepetsa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Mulungu amamva komanso kuyankha mapemphero a anthu odzichepetsa. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, Papa walankhula izi lachitatu ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati anthu akuyenera kupemphera nthawi zonse koma modzichepetsa pamaso pake. “Tikuyenera kupemphera nthawi zonse ngakhale pa nthawi yomwe kupemphera kukuvuta, tikuyenera kupemphera nthawi zonse ngakhale pamene zioneka ngati Mulungu saamva ndi kuyankha mapemphero athu,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati anthu omwe amapemphera nthawi zonse ndi mtima wao wonse ndipo mosatopa amalandira zomwe apempha kwa Mulungu. Iye wati kuchokera mu fanizo la Ambuye Yesu lofotokoza za mfarisi ndi munthu wokhometsa misonkho zikuonetseratu kuti Mulungu amamva mapemphero a anthu odzichepetsa kotero akhristu akuyenera kukhala anthu odzichepetsa. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti munthu yemwe amakonda kupemphera satekeseka ndipo sachita mantha koma kuti nthawi zonse amaika zonse m’manja mwa Mulungu
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dziko la Japan Kalasi 6 pa Sukulu ya Kapalamula M’boma la Dedza
news: Wachiwiri kwa nduna ya zamaphunziro a Madalitso Kambauwa Wirima ayamikira ubale wabwino omwe ulipo pakati pa dziko lino ndi la Japan pa ntchito yotukula maphunziro mdziko muno. Mayi Wirima anena izi lero pa mwambo wopereka kalasi zisanu ndi imodzi (6) zomwe dziko la Japan lamanga pa sukulu ya pulaimale ya Kapalamula m’boma la Dedza. Kalasizi komanso kuphatikizapo tank ya madzi zomwe bungweli lapereka ndi zandalama zoposa 66 million kwacha. Pamenepa mayi Wirima ati dziko la japan ndi limodiz mwa mayiko omwe amathandiza kwambiri dziko lino m’magawo enanso monga a zaulimi komanso zaumoyo ndipo apempha dzikoli kuti lipitirize kuthandiza dziko lino pamene lachepekedwa. “Ngati unduna wamaphunziro ndofe osangalala kwambiri Kamba ka anzathu aku Japan potipasa ma kalasi 6,” anatero a Wirima. Iwo apempha ana apasukuluwa kusamala makalasiwo komanso apempha anthu akufuna kwabwino kuti azithandiza masukulu ndi zinthu zosiyana-siyana. Polankhulapo wachiwiri kwa mphunzitsi wamkulu pa sukuluyi a Tabitha Sukasuka ati kumangidwa kwa kalasizi kuchepetsa mavuto a malo ophunzilira omwe anali pa sukuluyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alimi Adandaula Ndi Kusayenda Bwino Kwa Ntchito Yogulitsa Zipangizo Zaulimi Zotsika Mtengo
news: Ntchito yogulitsa zipangizo za ulimi za boma zotsika mtengo akuti ikupitilira kukumana ndi mavuto ambiri m’boma la Ntcheu. Malinga ndi malipoti omwe Radio Maria Malawi yapeza zikusonyeza kuti alimi ambiri ndi okhumudwa ndi momwe akugulira zipangizozi kamba ka chinyengo chomwe chikuchitika m’malo ogulitsira zipangizozi. Anthu ena adandaula kuti ogulitsa ena na akumaitanitsa ndalama kuchokera kwa ogula kuti agule zipangizozi mwachangu. Padakali pano apolisi m’boma la Kasungu amanga a Kelson Chimphala a zaka 26 zakubadwa kamba kowaganizira kuti amachita zachinyengo pogulitsa zipangizo za ulimi za boma zotsika mtengo. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Harry Namwaza watsimikiza za nkhaniyi. Namwaza wati apolisi akwanitsa kugwira mkuluyi potsatira chipikisheni chomwe akhala akuchita limodzi ndi khonsolo ya bomalo, pa nkhani zokhudza momwe zinthu zikuyendera m’misika yogulitsira zipangizo za boma za ulimi zotsika mtengozi. “M’mene program yogula feteleza otsika mtengo yayamba pali anthu omwe akumayenda maka a chitetezo komanso ochokera kwa a DC kuti aziwonesetsa kuti zonse zikuyenda bwino,”anatero Namwaza. Iye wati ogwira ntchitowa lero anakayendera pa depoti ya Chamama pomwe anatenga skelo yapadela ndipo anapeza kuti matumba ena anali operewera ma kilogalamu zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkuluyu yemwe anali oyang’anira ogwira ntchito onse pa malopa amangidwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Madotolo Achizimayi Achita Ziwonetsero Lolemba Lino
news: Bungwe la madotolo achizimayi la Women Doctors Association lati lakonza ziwonetsero lolemba lino pofuna kukakamiza magulu okhudzidwa kuti achitepo kanthu msanga pa mchitidwe ogwililira omwe wakula kwambiri mdziko muno. Polankhula kwa atolankhani lachinayi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe, membala wa bungweli Dr. Bridget Nsolomba ati nthawi yakwana yoti anthu mdziko muno agwirane manja pothana ndi mchitidwewu. Iwo apempha makolo komanso mafumu kuti azichita changu poneneza anthu oganizilidwa kuti agwililira ndi cholinga choti adzipatsidwa chilango chokhwima. “Kafuku-fuku wina akuwonesa kuti 20% ya atsikana anagwiliridwa asanafike zaka 18, ndipo zimenezi zitikhuze mu mtima mwathu,” anatero Dr. Nsolomba. Iwo ati vutoli ndi lalikulu ndipo akufuna kuwona kusintha kuchokera kwa adindo osiyana siyana omwenso akukhudzidwa ndi nkhaniyi mu njira zosiyanasiyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chipani cha MCP Chadya Wani pa Chisankho Chapadera
news: Aphungu omwe amayimira chipani cha Malawi Congress (MCP) ndi omwe atsogola pa chisankho chapadera chomwe chachitika dzulo mdera la pakati m‘boma la Karonga komanso mdera la kumpoto chakumvuma m’boma la Lilongwe. Mwachitsanzo mdera la kumpoto chakumadzulo kwa boma la Lilongwe, amene watsogola ndi Dr. Mphatso Jones Boti omwe apeza mavoti okwana 12, 269 ndipo atsatidwa ndi a Goodwell Banda oyima pawokha omwe apeza mavoti 9,282. Anthu omwe analembetsa kuti adzaponya voti mderali ndi okwana 56, 575 koma amene apoyia voti ndi okwana 27, 801 ndipo mavoti okwana 179 sanawerengeredwe kaamba koti anali olakwika. Chikondwelero cha otsatira chipani cha MCP Mdera la pakati m’boma la Karonga yemwenso amayimira chipanichi a Leonard Mwalwanda ndi amene atsogola ndi mavoti okwana 6,703 yemwe anapikisana kwambiri ndi a Frank Tumpale Mwenifumbo amene apeza mavoti okwana 6,173. Ku ward ya Makhuwira South m’boma la Chikwawa, watsogola ndi khansala wa chipani cha United Democratic Front (UDF), a Isaac Sten Ojesi omwe apeza mavoti okwana 2,514 ndipo pambuyo pawo pali a Henry Tambo a chipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) omwe apeza mavoti 1,939. Chisankhochi chachitika kutsatira imfa ya yemwe anali khansala ku derali a Maneti Ganeti. Anthu okwana 20, 779 ndi omwe analembetsa kuti adzaponya voti mu a=ward-yi koma anthu okwana 7,040 ndi omwe aponia voti yawo patsikuli. Izi ndi malinga ndi zotsatira zosatsimikizika zomwe atolankhani athu omwe ali m’maderawa apeza ndipo zotsatira zotsimikizika zilengezedwa ndi bungwe la MEC.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wakondwera Nawo Zaka 500 za Misa Yoyamba Mdziko la Chile
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wa mafuno abwino kwa episkopi wa dayosizi ina m’dziko la Chile pa chikondwelero cha zaka 500 chichitikireni Misa yoyamba m’dzikolo. Papa’yu watumiza uthengawu kwa Ambuye Bernardo Bastres Florence episkopi wa Diocese Punta Arenas. Iye wati ichi ndi chaka chachikulu osati ku dayosizi ya Punta Arenas yokha komwe Misa yoyambayi idachitikira zaka 500 zapitazo koma ndi chaka chachikulu ku mpingo wonse wa katolika m’dzikolo. Papa Francisco wapitiriza kunena kuti kudzera mu Ukaristia akhristu amalandira za ulere zochuluka komanso zoyeretsa monga msonkhano wachiwiri wa Vatican (Vatican Council II) ukunenera. Papa Francisco wati ngakhale kuti mliri wa coronavirus wasokoneza kapempheredwe ka anthu iye wati ndi wokondwa kuti akhristu ambiri akuyetsetsa kulandira ndi kulemekeza Ambuye Yesu wokhala mu Ukaristia. Pamenepa iye walimbikitsa akhristu m’dziko la Chile kuti apitirize kulandira komanso kupembedza Ambuye Yesu wokhala mu Ukaristia. Bambo Fray Pedro de Valderrama ndiye adachita Misa yoyambirira m’dziko la Chile zaka 500 zapitazo pa 11 November 1520.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la UNC Project Lapeza Katemera wa HIV
news: Kafukufuku yemwe mabungwe a UNC project komanso John Hopkins Research Project adachita, wapeza kuti amayi omwe ali pa chiwopsezo chotenga kachirombo ka HIV atha kukhala otetezedwa kudzera mkuwapatsa katemera. Izi zawululika pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe bungwe la UNC project linachititsa lero mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pofuna kufotokozera mtundu wa a Malawi pa momwe kafukufukuyu adayendera. Malinga ndi m’modzi mwa omwe adatsogolera kafukufukuyu ku bungweli Dr. Thandi Lungu Mabedi, cholinga cha kafukufukuyu chinali chofuna kupeza njira yapafupi yowathandizira amayi omwe alibe kachirombo ka HIV koma ali pa chiwopsezo chotenga kachiromboka. “Tabweretsa jackson chifukwa ambiri sangakwanitse kuma mapilisi tsiku ndi tsiku pamene kafukufukuyu azidzibaya kamodzi pa miyezi iwiri ndipo akatero adzikhala kuti atetezeka ku matendawa,” anatero mayi Lungu. Iwo ati mapilisi omwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito padakalipano akugwirabe ntchito koma jakiseniyu ndi yemwe akugwira bwino ntchito. Pamenepa mayi Lungu ati jakiseniyu atumizidwa ku kampani, unduna wa zaumoyo komanso nyumba ya malamulo kuti nthambizi zithandizire kuti jakiseniyu awafikire anthu m’malo onse mdziko muno komanso mosavuta.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mfumu Yaikulu Chakhumbira Ikukhudzidwa ndi Imfa ya Msungwana Wina Mdera Lake
news: Anthu okwiya apha bambo wina kamba komuganiza kuti wapha mtsikana wina ndi kumuchotsa ziwalo zobisika mdera Masasa mfumu yaikulu Chakhumbira m’boma la Ntcheu. Malinga ndi m’modzi mwa anthu omwe tinayankhula nawo pa malowa omwe anati tisawatchule dzina, anthu ozungulira derali anagwira anthu ena atatu omwe akuwaganizira kuti atenga gawo pa kuphedwa kwa mtsikanayu kuphatikizapo mfumu yaikulu ya deralo, T/A Chakhumbira. Chigalu: Tamangako anthu angapo Mayiyu wati anthu okwiyawa aphwanya nyumba ya mfumu yaikulu Chakhumbira ndi kubamo katundu yense. Polankhulapo mneneri wa apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu, Sub Inspector Hestings Chigalu watsimikiza kuti apolisi anafika ku deralo kukakhazikitsa bata kutsatira chipolowechi ndipo padakalipano mfumu yaikulu Chakhumbira ikusungidwa ndi apolisiwa kuti itetezeke kwa anthu okwiyawa. Padakalipano apolisiwa akuti amanga anthu ena omwe akuwaganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi chiwawachi ndipo iwo adzudzula khalidwe lotengera malamulo m’manja mwawo pa anthu omwe akuwaganizira kuti alakwira malamulo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Avota pa Chisankho Chapadera
news: Ntchito yowerengera mavoti pa chisankho chapadera chomwe chachitika m’madera ena a mdziko muno ili mkati. Votiyi yachitika potsatira imfa ya yemwe anali phungu wa dera la pakati m’boma la Karonga a Cornelius Mwalwanda komanso imfa ya yemwe anali khansala wa dera la Makhuwira South m’boma la Chikwawa a Maneti Ganeti komanso kutula pansi udindo kwa a Lazarus Chakwera omwe anali phungu wa dera la kumpoto chakumadzulo kwa boma la Lilongwe kaamba koti tsopano ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko lino. Malinga ndi atolankhani athu omwe ali m’maderawa, ntchito yoponya voti yayenda bwino popanda malipoti aliwonse a ziwawa. Anthu omwe analembetsa kuti aponye nawo votiyi m’madera atatu onsewa ndi okwana 93, 534 omwe ndi kuphatikizapo anthu 2,756 atsopano. Poyamba chisankhochi chimayenera kuchitika m’madera asanu ndi ward imodzi koma kutsatira chigamulo cha khothi, madera atatu omwe ndi a kumpoto chakumvuma kwa boma la Mangochi, kumadzulo kwa boma la Mangochi komanso kumpoto kwa boma la Phalombe chisankhochi chinayimitsidwa kaye kuti zipani zikonze mavuto ena Kamba koti zina mwa izo zinali zitasintha kale anthu owayimilira pa chisankhochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Ena Amangidwa Pokhudzidwa ndi Zachinyengo pa Kagulitsidwe ka Zipangizo Zaulimi Zotsika Mtengo
news: Apolisi amanga abambo awiri m’boma la Dowa kamba kowaganizira kuti amachita zachinyengo pa kagulitsidwe ka zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Insepector Gladson M’bumpha, abambowa ndi a John Mgombe a zaka 31 omwe ndi a manejala a sitolo yogulitsa feteleza ya SFFRFM yomwe ili pa Chankhungu m’bomalo, komanso a Osward Foster a zaka 41 omwe ndi mlonda pa malowa. M’bumpha wati awiriwa anagwidwa pa malo a ntchitowa pomwe apolisi anabwera kuzachita chipikisheni ndipo anawapeza abambowa ali ndi ziphaso za unzika zoposera 100. Lolemba pa 9 Nov 2020 apolisi omwe amachita chipikisheni pamalo ena ogulisila feteleza pa chankhungu m’boma la Dowa anamanga abambo awiri powaganizira kuti amachita zachinyengo mokhuzana ndi kagulitsidwe ka zipangizo zaulimi zotsika mtengo. Abambowa apezeka ndi ziphaso za umzika zoposera 100 ndipo atafusidwa anati ndi za anthu omwe anakanika kugula zipangizo masiku apitawo ndipo anati amawathandiza kuti agule. Koma apolisiwa atafufuza apeza kuti ziphaso zina zinali limodzi ndi ndalama ndipo abambowa atafusidwa anakanika kufotokoza bwino ndipo padakali pano akusungidwa m’chitokosi pomwe apolisiwa akupitiliza kafukufuku wawo. Ku Dowa komweko apolisi amanga amuna awiri powaganizira kuti amapanga mbewu ya chimanga yachinyengo yomwe ili ndi zizindikiro za kampani zosiyanasiyana zopanga mbewu. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku mponela kaitano lubrino wati amunawa ndi govati mkoko, macloyd chilunjika komanso billy yolamu. Padakalipano apolisiwa akuti apeza makina omwe anthuwa amapangira chimangachi komanso matumba 30 a chimangachi. Apolisi amanga ogwira ntchito asanu ku kampani ya Export Traders m’boma la Kasungu kaamba kopezeka ndi ziphaso za unzika za anthu 25 ndi cholinga choti awagulire zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo mwachinyengo. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Harry Namwaza wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti anthuwa ndi a Stella Chapo, Chimwemwe Mwale, Mercy Gondwe, Felezina Kazokota Komanso Georgina Sambira. Iye wati apolisi anatsinidwa khutu kuti pa malopwa, anthu ena amathandizidwa mwachinyengo kusiya ena omwe anali pa mzere komanso kuti anthu ena amagula matumba a fetereza oposa awiri monga mwa dongosolo la boma. Ndipo akuluakulu apolisi atafika pa malopa anachita chipikisheni ogwira ntchito pa malowa omwe anapezeka ndi ziphaso za unzikazi, komanso ndalama yokwana 81 sauzande kwacha. Padakalipano apolisi awopseza kuti aliyense amene apezeke akuchita zinthu zosemphana ndi cholinga cha ndondomeko ya boma ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengoyi anjatidwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi Wansembe Yemwe Anazembetsedwa Zaka Ziwiri Zapitazo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi wansembe wina wa mdziko la Italy yemwe achifwamba adamugwira ndi kumusunga kwa zaka ziwiri. Usiku wa pa 17 September mchaka cha 2018 anthu ena omwe akuwaganizira kuti ndi otumikira gulu la za uchifwamba la Al Qaeda adagwira wansembe wa m’dziko la Italy Bambo Pierluigi Maccalli ku parish yake mdziko la Niger pafupi ndi dziko la Burkina Faso. Zadziwika kuti lolemba pa 9 November 2020 Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi wansembeyu yemwe achifwambawa adamumasula mwezi wathawu mdziko la Mali. M’mawu ake bambo Maccalli wati ndi wokondwa kuti adali ndi mwayi wocheza ndi Papa Francisco yemwe wati adali wachidwi kumvetsera nkhani zonse ndipo wathokoza Papa Francisco chifukwa cha mapemphero ake komanso wathokoza anthu osiyana-siyana omwe adali kumupempherera pa nthawi yomwe amasungidwa ndi anthu a za uchifwambawa. Ndipo pobenthulako zina zomwe adakumana nazo pomwe amasungidwa mokakamiza, wansembeyu wati anali kugwetsa misonzi yomwe inali mapemphero ake kwa Mulungu. M’mawu ake Papa Francisco wauza wansembeyu kuti kudzera mu zomwe wakumana nazo Mpingo wa Katolika wapeza nyonga zina zofalitsira Uthenga wa Chipulumutso.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Stima Adzudzula za Mtopola Zomwe Zikuchitika Msukulu za Dayosizi Yawo
news: Dayosizi ya Mangochi yadzudzula za mtopola zomwe anthu eana akhala akuchita msukulu zake m’maboma a Machinga, Mangochi ndi Balaka. Episkopi wa dayosiziyi ambuye Montfort stima anena izi mu kalata yomwe alembera unduna wa zamaphunziro kuti uchitepo kanthu msanga za nkhaniyi. Iwo adzudzula kuthamangitsidwa kwa mlangizi wa zamaphunziro wa mpingo wa katolika mu zoni ya Namwera m’boma la Mangochi komwe kunachitika zaka za m’buyomu, kutenthedwa kwa ofesi ya mphunzitsi wamkulu pa sukulu ya Mpiri m’boma la Machinga mwezi watha komanso kuyimitsidwa kwa maphunziro msukulu za Mgwiriza, Madzi Anjuchi, Wataka, Nsanama, Maweha komanso St. Marys Cdss zomwe akuganiza kuti zonsezi zikuchitika kaamba ka nkhani ya zipembedzo. “Talemba kalata imeneyi potsatira za mtopola zomwe zakhala zikuchitika m’masukulu achikatolika monga ku Mpiri komwe ofesi ya Head Master inawotchedwa ndipo padakali pano sukuluyi inatsekedwa,”anatero ambuye Stima. Pamenepa iwo apemphanso nthambi ya apolisi kuti ipereke chitetezo chokwanira msukulu za mpingowu komanso kumanga anthu onse omwe akukhudzidwa ndi nkhaniyi. Mneneri wa unduna wa zamaphunziro Chikondano Mussa sanayankhe lamya yake kuti ayakehepo pa nkhaniyi. Koma polankhulapo mneneri wa apolisi mchigawo chakumvuma kwa dziko lino Inspector Joseph Sauka wati apolisi akuchita chotheka kuti apeze anthu omwe akukhudzidwa ndi ziwawa zomwe zakhala zikuchitika msukuluzi. “Ndi zowona kuti sukulu za katolika m’madera ena mchigawo chakum’mawa mawakhala mukuchitika ziwawa ndipo ifeyo apolisi tikuyesetsa kukhazikitsa chitetezo,” anatero Inspector Sauka. Iwo ati padakali pano nkhani zomwe zachitika ku Mpiri palibe munthu yemwe amumanga koma ku Balaka anthu ena anagwidwa ndipo anatulutsidwa pa belo pamene kafukufuku akupitilira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Maiko a Ethiopia, Libya Athetse Mavuto Awo Pokambirana
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha maiko a Ethiopia ndi Libya kuti athetse mavuto a m’maiko awo pochita zokambirana. M’mawu ake, Papa wati ndi wokhudzidwa kumva za zipolowe mdziko la Ethiopia ndipo wapempha atsogoleri m’dzikolo kuti achitepo kanthu pothetsa mavutowo mwa mtendere. Pempho la Papa Francisco ladza bungwe la United Nations litachenjeza kuti anthu pafupi 9 million ali pa chiopsezo chothawa kudera la Tigray m’dziko la Ethiopia kaamba ka mavuto a za ndalewa. Papa wathiriraponso ndemanga pa za msonkhano wothandiza kubweretsa mtendere m’dziko la Libya omwe uchitike mu mzinda wa Tunis mdziko la Tunisia. Iye wati akukhulupirira kuti zokambiranazi zikhala za phindu kwa anthu a m’dziko la Libya omwe avutika kwa nthawi yaitali komanso wati ndi chikhulupiriro chake kuti pangano loti magulu osiyana-siyana m’dzikolo asiye kumenyana litsatidwa ndi mbali zonse zokhudzidwa. Msonkhanowu wakonzedwa ndi bungwe lomwe akulitchula kuti Libyan Political Dialogue Forum (LPDF) mothandizidwa ndi bungwe la United Nations.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wadzipha Kamba ka Fetereza Wotsika Mtengo
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 32 wa m’boma la Dowa wadzipha podzimangilira atakangana ndi mkazi wake pa nkhani yokhudza feteleza wotsika mtengo. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha wati bamboyu Weruzani Sapedzeka amafuna kugulitsa thumba limodzi la fetereza yemwe agula kudzera mu ndondomeko ya boma ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo kuti ndalamayo akamwere mowa. Mkazi wake atamuletsa, iye ananyanyala pakhomopo ndi kupita kwawo komwe anayamba kumwa mowa pa malo ena ndipo masana ake ndipo pomwe anthu ena anapeza thupi la mkuluyu likulendewera mu mtengo ku dambo lina m’mudziwo. Apolisi atadziwitsidwa za nkhaniyi, anatengera thupilo ku chipatala cha Chankhungu komwe anakatsimikiza kuti mkuluyo wamwalira kaamba kobanika komwe kwadza kaamba ka kupotoka kwa khosi lake ndi chingwecho. Weruzani Sapedzeka amachokera m’mudzi mwa Bokosi mfumu yaikulu Chiwere m’boma lomwelo la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Flames Yakonzeka Kugonjetsa Burkina Faso
news: Timu yayikulu ya mpira wa miyendo mdziko muno ya Flames yati ndi yokonzeka kuchita bwino pa masewero ake ndi timu ya Burkina Faso lachinayi likudzali mu mpikisano wa African Cup of Nations. Akuti timu yake yakonzeka-Mwase Mphunzisi wamkulu wa timuyi Meke Mwase ndi yemwe wanena izi lero pamene timuyi imanyamuka kupita mdziko la Bukina Faso komwe ikakhale ndi masewero ake oyamba ndipo pambuyo pake Flames idzaseweranso ndi Burkina Faso pa 16 November 2020 ku Malawi kuno pa bwalo la Kamuzu mu mzinda wa Blantyre mu mpikisano omwewu. Mwase watenga anyamata 8 omwe amasewera m’mayiko a kunja kupatulapo Gabadinho Mhango yemwe ndi ovulala, ndi ena 15 omwe amasewera mu ligi yayikulu mdziko muno ndipo iye wati ali ndi chikhulupiliro kuti anyamatawa apereka zosatira zabwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Maphunziro a Mpopera Athera Panjira Kamba ka Chipolowe
news: Maphunziro okhudza kupopera mankhwala a udzudzu m’boma la Mangochi omwe amayenera kuchitika pa sukulu ya pulaimale ya Chimwala m’bomalo akanika kutsatira mpungwepungwe omwe unalipo pakati pa olemba ntchitoyi ndi achinyamata a mdera lozungulira. Ntchito iyi iyambika posachedwapa Malinga ndi mkulu yemwe akuyang’anira ntchitoyi mdera la Chimwala a Stanely Rashid, achinyamatawa sanakondwe ndi momwe ntchito yolemba anthuwa yayendera ponena kuti atenga anthu ambiri omwe ndi obwera ndi kusiya mzika za deralo. Komabe a Rashid ati akukambirana ndi atsogoleri a mderali kuti maphunzirowa apitilire monga mwa chikonzero ndi cholinga choti ntchito yopopera mankhwalawa mnyumba za anthu iyambe pa 17 November monga mwa chikonzero. Polankhulapo khansala wa derali Martin Phillip Milanzi wadzudzula zomwe achita achinyamata a mderali posokoneza maphunzirowo ponena kuti achedwa kupereka madandaulo awo kwa adindo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe Yatsekera Chaka cha Baibulo
news: Arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, Ambuye Tarcisio Ziyaye apempha akhristu mdziko muno kuti adzikonda kuwerenga baibulo nthawi zonse. Ambuye Ziyaye anena izi lero pa mwambo wotsekera chaka cha baibulo omwe ukuchitikira ku Banja Loyera Chilinde Parish mu arkidayosiziyo. Iwo awuza akhristu kuti baibulo ndi chida chokhacho chomwe chimayanjanitsa akhristu ndi Mulungu. Ambuye Ziyaye ati pomwe arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe yatsekera chaka cha baibulo sizikutanthauza kuti akhristu asiye kuwerenga bible koma apitirize ntchito yofalitsa m’thenga wabwino pa dziko lonse. Poyankhulapo mkulu owona za baibulo mu arkidayosiziyi bambo Henry Zulu, ati chaka cha baibulo inali nthawi ya mtengo wapatali yomwe akhristu akhala akucheza ndi Mulungu kudzera mu kuwerenga mawu. “Tinatsekurira chaka cha baibulo pa 31 November ndipo ife a komiti yoyendetsa za baibulo tinakhala pansi ndi kupanga program za m’mene tiyendetsere chaka chimenechi koma mliri wa Coronavirus ndi omwe unatisokoneza,” anatero bambo Zulu. M’mawu ake yemwe anayimira wapampando wa bungwe la Akhristu eniake a Josephy Gumbo Yona anati chaka cha baibulo chathandiza Akhristu kuzamitsa moyo wawo wa Uzimu maka pa kuwerenga baibulo. “Mukudziwa ife ngati akhritsu achikatolika mawu achilimbikitso timawapeza m’baibulo choncho mpingo unakonza mwambo wapadera osinkha sinkha za baibulo ndipo pofika pani mkhristu aliyense akuziwa tsopano kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka baibulo,” anatero a Yona.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ECM Yati Chibalalitso cha Mpingo Chayenda Bwino
news: Bungwe la maepiskopi mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) layamikira ansembe ndi akhristu onse kamba kodzipereka pa ntchito ya chibalalitso ya chaka chino. Msusa: Akhristu anayesetsa Wapampando wa bungweli Ambuye Thomas Luke Msusa anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi mu uthenga wawo wapadera wofotokozera m’mene chaka cha chibalalitso chayendera mdziko muno. Ambuye Msusa omwenso ndi arkepiskopi wa arkdayosizi ya Blantyre ati ndi okondwa kuti ansembe ndi akhristu m’madayosizi onse mdziko muno anadzipereka kwambiri popemphera komanso kusonkhetsa ndalama zothandizira ntchito zobalalitsa mpingo pa dziko lonse lapansi ngakhale anali m’mavuto aakulu kamba ka nthenda ya Covid-19. “Chaka chino nkhani imeneyi ya chibalalitso yayenda bwino. Inde panali mavuto ambiri ndipo vuto lalikulu ndi mliri wa Covid-19 ndipo ngakhale zinali chomwechi akhritsu anayesetsa kuti ntchitoyi iyende bwino,”anatero ambuye Msusa. Iwo ayamikiranso magulu onse a za chibalalitso cha mpingo komanso a PMS m’madayosizi onse a mpingowu mdziko muno omwe analinso patsogolo kulimbikitsa akhristu anzawo kuti apereke molowa manja mu nyengo ya chibalalitso cha mpingoyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sister Ng’oma a Chipani cha SBVM Amwalira
news: Akulikulu la chipani cha asisitere mu mpingo wa Katolika cha Atumiki a Maria Virgo Odala/ Servants of the Blessed Virgin Mary (SBVM) alengeza za infa ya Sr. Regina Ng’oma a chipanichi. Mlembi wamkulu wa chipanichi Sister Georgina Sapangwa atsimikiza za imfayi. Iwo ati Sister Ng’oma amwalira lero laMulungu pa 8 November 2020 ku nyumba yosungira asisitere achikulire komanso odwala a ku Maryview Nursing Home ku Nguludi mu archdiocese ya Blantyre. Sister ati dongosolo la mwambo wa maliro a malemu Sister Ng’oma alilengezabe. Mzimu wa Sister Regina Ng’oma uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhritsu Akuyenera Kukhala Moyo Okomera Mulungu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati moyo wokomera Mulungu umakonzekeretsa akhristu kulandira mphoto yopambana ya moyo wosatha. M’mawu ake pa tsiku lamulungu la 32 mu nyengo ya pa chaka kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican komanso polankhula kwa a Katolika pa dziko lonse la pansi kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti, Papa wati moyo wa tsiku ndi tsiku wa akhristu womwe umaunikiridwa ndi chikondi cha Yesu Khristu ndiye moyo wokomera Mulungu. Iye wati moyo woterowu omwe ndi wokondweretsa Mulungu umakonzekeretsa akhristu kudzalandira mphoto yopambana yomwe ndi moyo wosatha pakutha pa moyo wa pansi pano. Papa Francisco walankhula izi mogwirizana ndi Uthenga Wabwino womwe wawerengedwa pa tsikuli omwe ukukamba fanizo la anamwali khumi, asanu ochenjera ndipo ena opusa. Iye wafotokoza kuti pakati pa ayuda mu nthawi ya Ambuye Yesu ukwati unali kuchitika usiku kotero kuti kunali kosowekera kuti anthu akhale ndi nyale. Papa Francisco wati anamwali ochenjera ananyamuliratu mafuta a padera a nyale zao pomwe opusa sadatero ndipo atapita kukasaka mafuta mkwati anafika ndipo zitseko za chipinda cha phwandoli zinatsekedwa. Iye wati fanizoli ndi phunziro kuti akhristu akuyenera kukhala okonzekera za kubwera kwachiwiri kwa Yesu Khristu. Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kukonzekera kubwera kwa Yesu Khristu pochita ntchito zabwino zokondweretsa Mulungu. Iye wati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti kawiri-kawiri anthu amaiwala kuti pa dziko la pansi ndi pa msasa chifukwa chokomedwa ndi za m’dziko. Papa Francisco wati pa chifukwa ichi anthu ambiri amakhala otangwanika kudzikundikira chuma chosakhalitsa. Iye wamaliza ndi kutsindika za kufunika kokonzekera kutha kwa moyo uno pakuchita ntchito zokhazo zomwe ndi zokomera Mulungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MANEB Yadandaula ndi Kupezeka Kwa Mayeso pa Masamba a Mchezo
news: Bungwe loyendetsa mayeso mdziko muno la Malawi National Examinations Board (MANEB) lati ndi lokhudzidwa ndi mapepala a mayeso omwe anthu akugawana pa masamba a mchezo pa internet pamene ophunzira a form 4 akupitilira kulemba mayesowa. Chiwaya: Zapereka chithunzithunzi choyipa Mneneri wa bungwe la MANEB a Mayamiko Chiwaya auza Radio Maria Malawi kuti kupezeka kwa mayesowa kwayipitsa mbiri ya dziko lino pa kayendetsedwe ka mayeso. “Mayeso amenewa si a MANEB, koma ndi a boma dziko lonse. Ndalama komanso chilichonse chimene chagwiritsidwa ntchito pa mayesowa ndi cha boma ndiye pamenepa takhala ngati tangowononga ndalama za misonkho ya anthu pachabe. Zomwe zikuchitikazi zikupereka chithunzithunzi chosakhala bwino cha dziko lino pa nkhani za mayeso,” anatero a Chiwaya. Padakalipano iwo ati akufufuza kuti adziwe chomwe chachititsa kuti mayesowa awoneredwe ndipo pambuyo pake apanga chiganizo pa nkhaniyi. Padakalipano tsogolo la zotsatira za mayesowa silikudziwika kaamba koti mneneriyu wati bungwe la MANEB lipanga chiganizo chake likatsiriza kafukufuku wake pa nkhaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Atolankhani Achizimayi Apempha Boma Likhwimitse Zilango za Ogwililira
news: Bungwe la atolankhani achizimayi la Association of Women in Media (AWOSE) lapempha boma kuti likhwimitse zilango zomwe zimaperekedwa kwa anthu opezeka olakwa pa milandu yogwilira kuti mchitidwewu utheretu mdziko muno. Atolankhaniwa anena izi lachiwiri pamene amachita ziwonetsero m’mizinda ya dziko lino posakondwa ndi kukula kwa mchitidwewu. Mbali imodzi ya ziwonetserozo Mu mzinda wa Lilongwe, atolankhaniwa anakapereka chikalata cha madandaulo awo ku ma ofesi a khonsolo ya mzindawo ndipo polankhula atapereka chikalata cha madandaulo chawo wapampando wa bungweli Josophine Phumisa wati amayi si anthu othetsera zilakolako za anthu choncho abambo apewe kugwiriotsa ntchito molakwika amayiwa. Iye wati makolo akuyeneranso kukhala patsogolo kuneneza za mchitidwewu ponena kuti sakuyenera kubisa aliyense ochita khalidwe lonyasali. “Makolo tikhale patsogolo kukanena ku polisi osamubisa munthu chifukwa ndi mamuna wathu kapena m’bale wathu. Amuna oterewa azitsekeredwe kuti mchitidwe umenewu utheretu,” anatero Phumisa. Patsikuli sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo mayi Catherine Gotani Hara komanso Dr. Jessy Kabwira anali nawo pa ziwonetserozi. Mayor wa mzinda wa Lilongwe mayi Juliana Kaduya ndi omwe analandira chilakata cha madandaulochi pamodzi ndi mlembi wamkulu mu unduna owona za kusasiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo, chitukuko cha madera akumidzi komanso chisamaliro cha anthu mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kukhala Mkhritsu Wachiyembekezo Ndi Mphatso Yochokera Kwa Mulungu-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati kukhala m’khristu wa chiyembekezo ndi mphatso yochokera kwa Mulungu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lolemba ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican pa Misa yokumbukira mizimu ya anthu omwe adamwalira. Iye wati akhristu akuyenera kumapempha kwa Mulungu mphatso ya mtengo wa patali ya chiyembekezo cha moyo wina wopambana pa mbuyo pa moyo uno. Pa 2 November chaka chilichonse mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse umakumbukira mizimu ya akhristu omwe adamwalira ndipo m’malaliko ake pa mwambo wa Misa ya pa tsikuli Papa Francisco wati chiyembekezo ndi mphatso ya mtengo wa patali yomwe akhristu akuyenera kumapempha kwa Mulungu tsiku ndi tsiku. Iye wati chiyembekezo ndi mphatso ya ulere yomwe Mulungu amapereka. Papa Francisco waonjezera kuti mphatso ya chiyembekezo ndi yomwe imalimbitsa akhristu pa moyo wao wa chikhristu pamene akudikirira moyo wina wopambana pa kutha pa moyo uno. Papa Francisco wati ngakhale Yobu anakumana ndi masautso osiyana-siyana m’moyo wake pali chinthu chimodzi chomwe sichidamupulumuke. Chinthu chimenechi ndiye chiyembekezo. Iye wati Yobu adakhulupirira kuti pakutha pa moyo wake akakumana ndi Mulungu maso ndi maso. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wati m’khristu aliyense akuyenera kumapempha Mulungu mphatso imeneyi ya chiyembekezo. Misa’yi inachitikira mu tchalitchi loyandikana ndi manda omwe a Papa osiyana-siyana adaikidwa. Pambali pochita Misa Papa Francisco adapemphera pa mandawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PAC Yakhazikitsa Makomiti Owunika Nkhani Yovala Hijab Msukulu
news: Bungwe la Public Affairs Committee (PAC) lati lili mkati mochita zokambirana ndi magulu okhudzidwa pofuna kuthetsa kusamvana komwe kulipo pakati pa chipembedzo cha chisilamu komanso mipingo ya chikhristu pa nkhani yokhudza kavalidwe m’sukulu. Monsignor Thawale:Tapeza nthumwi 7 ku mbali zonse zokhudzidwa Polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi, wapampando wa bungweli Monsignor Dr. Patrick Thawale wati kusamvanaku ndi kofunika kuthetsedwe mwansanga ndipo akhazikitsa kale komiti yomwe ikuwunika za nkhaniyi kufikira zonse zitayenda bwino. Masiku apitawa, pakhala pali mpungwepungwe m’sukulu za mpingo wa katolika komanso Anglican m’maboma a Balaka ndi Machinga pomwe akuluakulu a sukuluzi akhala akuletsa ophunzira omwe ndi a chipembedzo cha chisilamu kuvala zovala zotchinga kumutu zotchedwa Hijab pa nthawi ya maphunziro zomwe sizinakondweretse makolo a ophunzirawa. “Ngati a PAC pa stage yomwe tafika tapeza nthumwi 7 ku mbali zokhuzidwa, ndipo anthu amenewa mkumano oyamba anachita okha ndipo ife tili ndi chikhulupiriro kuti pakhala kumvana,” anatero Monsignor Thawale. Iwo ati ali ndi chikhulupiriro kuti anthuwa amvana chimodzi ngati m’mene zinakhalira pa nkhani yokhudza za billboard kamba koti anatsata njira yomwe akugwiritsa ntchito padakalipanoyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Maiko a Armenia, Azerbaijan Athetse Nkhondo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha maiko a Armenia ndi Azerbaijan kuti athetse nkhondo pakati pawo pochita zokambirana. Polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican, Papa wati ndi wokhumudwa ndi zomwe zikuchitika pakati pa maiko a Armenia ndi Azerbaijan makamaka kuti pangano la mtendere lokhudza dera la Nagorno-Karabakh silikugwira ntchito monga zinayenera kukhalira. Pamenepa iye wati ndi kofunika kuti maiko awiriwa achite zokambirana popewa kuphetsa anthu osalakwa. “Ndikupempha ndi mtima wanga wonse mbali zonse zokhudzidwa kuti zikambirane ndi kupewa kuphetsa anthu osalakwa,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wapempha maiko ndi mabungwe kuti athandize kubweretsa mtendere ku dera la Nagorno-Karabakh. Mwezi wathawu maiko a Azerbaijan ndi Armenia adasaina pangano la mtendere lokhudza dera la Nagorno-Karabakh komwe maiko awiriwa akhala akumenyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwambo Woyika M’manda Sister Chule Uchitika Lachiwiri
news: Thupi la Sister Prisca Chule a chipani cha Carmelite liyikidwa m’manda lachiwiri ku Namitete parish mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Malingana ndi m’modzi mwa akuluakulu a chipanichi, Sister Christina Chagunda, thupi la malemu Sister Chule litengeredwa kwa Ganya parishi lero komwe amagwira ntchito ngati mphunzitsi wa ku sukulu ya pulaimale. Lachiwiri ndi pomwe thupili alitengere ku Namitete Parishi komwe kukakhale mwambo otsanzikana ndi malemuwa. Sister Chule anabadwa pa 20 July mchaka cha 1976 ku Kapiri m’boma la Mchinji. Malumbiro awo oyamba anachita mchaka cha 1999 ndipo pa nthawi imene akutisiya anali akutumikira ku parishi ya Ganya mu dayosizi ya Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wadzipha Kamba ka Ngongole ya 3 Sauzande Kwacha
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 61 zakubadwa wa m’boma la Dowa wazipha pozimangilira kaamba kolephera kubweza ngongole ya Banki Nkhonde. Malingana ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo Sub-Inspector Gladson Mbupmpha, bamboyu Lingson Maseko anakongola ndalama yokwana 3 Sauzande Kwacha ku banki ya m’mudziyi yomwe amayenera kuyibweza lamulungu lapitali. Loweruka lapitali mkuluyi akuti anayamba kufunafuna munthu oti amubwereke ndalamayi ndi cholinga choti akasiye ku bankiyi ndipo sanapezeke. M’mawa wa lamulungu bamboyu anapezeka mu mtengo wina atazimangilira ndipo atafa. Zotsatira za ku chipatala zasonyeza kuti mkuluyu wafa kamba kobanika ndi chingwecho. Padakalipano apolisi alangiza anthu kuti apewe kudzipha pamene ali ndi nkhawa ya zinthu zina ndipo m’malo mwake azipempha malangizo kwa akuluakulu kapenanso ku polisi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PMS Yakhutira ndi Chibalalitso cha Mpingo cha Chaka Chino
news: Ofesi yoona za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa ya Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) mdziko muno yati yakhutira ndi momwe mwezi wa chibalalitso cha mpingo wayendera chaka chino. Mwakhwawa: Akhristu apereka molowa manja Mkulu wa ku ofesi-yi ku likulu la mpingo wakatolika mdziko muno ku Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) bambo Vincent Mwakhwawa anena izi pothilirapo ndemanga pa za momwe mweziwu wayendera. Iwo ayamika madayosizi komanso nyumba zowulutsira mawu za mpingowu kaamba kolimbikitsa akhristu kuti apereke chopereka cha chakachi molowa manja ngakhale kuli mliri wa COVID-19. “Akhristu apereka molowa manja mu mwezi umeneuwu wa chibalalitso ndipo nyumba zathu zowulutsira mawu zinatithandizira kuti mauthenga a chibalalitso apite patali ndi kufikira anthu ambiri,” anatero bambo Mwakhwawa. Mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse lapansi unasankha mwezi wa October kuti ukhale wa kolona komanso wa chibalalitso cha mpingowu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PMS Yapempha Akhritsu Akhale Ndi Mtima Othandiza Osowa
news: Bungwe lowona za utumiki wa apapa a Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) lapepha akhristu m’dziko muno kuti adzikhala ndi mtima othandiza anthu osowa. Mwakhwawa: Tiyeni tithandize osowa Mkulu wa bungweli mdziko muno bambo Vincent Mwakhwawa ndi omwe anena izi lachitatu pambuyo pa mwambo opereka katundu osiyanasiyana kwa anthu olumala ndi okalamba a m’mudzi mwa Senior Group Village Headman Kanjedza mdera la mfumu yaikulu Chadza m’boma la Lilongwe. Iwo ati kuthandiza anthu osowa ndi chida chokhacho chomwe chimathandiza ena kuzindikira chikondi chomwe Mulungu ali nacho pa iwo. “Pempho monga tonse tikudziwa kuti ndife ovutika koma tiyeni tithandize onse amene ndi ovutika ndipo pakutero ndiye kufalitsa uthenga wa Mulunguwo,” anatero bamboo Mwakhwawa. Iwo ati m’masiku ochepa akudzawa akhalanso akufikira anthu ena ovutika a m’madera osiyanasiyana mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Okwiya Ku Mangochi Apha Bambo Wina Atampeza Akuba
news: Anthu okwiya m’boma la Mangochi amenya ndi kupha bambo wina wa zaka 35 kaamba komuganizira kuti anathyola ndi kuba katundu m’nyumba ya mkulu wina m’bomalo. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub-Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi, mamunayu Mwayiwawo Kwitanda anathyola nyumba ya Witness Ndaona ndi kubamo katundu komanso ndalama zokwana 80 Thousand Kwacha. Anthu okwiyawa anagwira mkuluyu ndi kumumenya kolapitsa ndipo apolisi anathamangira kumaloku ndi kumutengera mkuluyu ku chipatala komwe anamwalira atangofika. “Ndi zoonadi Mwayiwawo Kwitanda waphedwa ndi anthu olusa atapezeka akuba mnyumba ina, malinga ndi kaundula wathu iye wakhala akugwira ukaidi kwa maulendo awiri mosiyana,” anatero Sub Inspector Daudi. Iye wati mkuluyu anatuluka ku ndendeku atakhululukidwa posachedwapa. Pamenepa Daudi wapempha anthu kuti aleke kulanga okha anthu omwe apalamula milandu yosiyanasiyana kaamba koti ati zimenezi zimasokoneza umboni.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Zipangizo za Ulimi Zotsika Mtengo Ziyamba Kupezeka pa Msika Lachisanu
news: Unduna wa ulimi, mthilira ndi chitukuko chamadzi wati pofika mawa, ukhala utatsegula malo onse omwe ogulitsira zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo mchigawo chakumwera. Mayi m’modzi kunyamula feteleza wake Mkulu oyang’anira ntchito ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo a Justin Kagona ndi omwe anena izi ndi Radio Maria Malawi pamene wailesiyi imafuna kudziwa momwe ntchitoyi yayambira. Mwazina iwo atsutsa malipoti oti mayina a anthu ena atuluka kawiri mu kawundula wa anthu omwe apindule ndi ndondomekoyi. “Ntchito imeneyi taiyamba bwino kutsatira program imene mstogoleri wadziko lino anakhazikitsa pa 17 mwezi uno ndipo tayambapo maboma angapo kumwera kuno,” anatero a Kagona. Iwo atsimikiza kuti pofika lachisanu likudzali moboma onse akhala kuti ayiyamba ntchitoyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadzudzula Chiwembu Chomwe Chachitika Mdziko La Cameroon
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wadzudzula anthu omwe achita za chiwembu pa sukulu ina m’dziko la Cameroon. Polankhula lachitatu mu hall ya Papa Paulo wa 6 Papa Francisco wati ndi wa chisoni kwambiri komanso wokhudzidwa potsatira chiwembu chomwe chachitika pa sukulu ina m’dziko la Cameroon komwe ana asanu ndi m’modzi aphedwa. Iye wati ndi wa chisoni kwambiri maka akaganizira mabanja a ana a sukulu omwe aphedwawa ndipo wati ali nawo limodzi pa nthawi yovutayi. Papa Francisco wati ndi pemphero lake kuti Mulungu akhudze mitima ya anthu onse a m’dziko la Cameroon kuti zoterezi zisadzachitikenso komanso kuti mavuto a za ndale omwe alipo m’madera ena m’dzikolo athe pochita zokambirana. Pa 24 October 2020 anthu ena omwe sakudziwika adafika pa sukulu ina m’dera lotchedwa Kumba ana ali m’kalasi pomwe adachita za chiwembuzi kupha ana asanu ndi m’modzi. Potsatira chiwembuchi episkopi wa Diocese ya Kumba m’dziko la Cameroon Ambuye Agapitus Nfon wapempha akhristu mu Diocese’yi kuti achite mapemphero opempherera mizimu ya ana a sukulu omwe aphedwawa komanso anthu omwe achita za chiwembuzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la MERCK Foundation Lasankha Mayi Chakwera Kukhala Kazembe Wake
news: Bungwe la MERCK Foundation lasankha mayi wafuko wa dziko lino Monica Chakwera kukhala kazembe wa bugweli kuno ku Malawi. Mkulu wa bungwe la MERCK, Foundation Dr. Rasha Kelej anati asankha mayi Chakwera pofuna kuwonetsa chidwi chomwe bungwe lawo lili nacho chothandiza dziko lino popititsa patsogolo ntchito za umoyo, kulimbikitsa atsikana pa maphunziro, komanso kuletsa kusalana pakati pa anthu omwe ali ndi vuto la ubeleki mdziko muno. Dr. Kelej yemwenso ndi president wa bungwe la Merck More Than a Mother anati bungwe lawo likhala likugwira ntchito limodzi ndi mayi wa fuko linoyu komanso boma pophunzitsa akatswiri a za umoyo m’magawo osiyanasiyana ngati mbali imodzi yopititsa patsogolo ntchito za umoyo kuno ku Malawi. M’mawu ake pambuyo pa kusankhidwaku, mayi wa fuko lino Monica Chakwera anati ndi okondwa kuti apatsidwa mpata ogwira ntchito yolimbikitsa ufulu wa amayi omwe ali ndi vuto la ubereki yomwenso yakhala ili kumtima kwawo kuti afikire anthu ambiri. Iwo anati limodzi ndi maunduna osiyanasiyana achilimika pa ntchito yozindikiritsa anthu makamaka a m’madera akumidzi kuti amvetsetse ndi kuleka kuwasala anthu omwe ali ndi vuto la ubereki. Pamenepa, mayi Chakwera ati akhalanso ali pa ntchito yowalimbikitsa amayi omwe ali ndi vuto la ubelekiwa kumbali yopeza ma uthenga mosavuta, kapezedwe ka maphunziro pa zinthu zosiyanasiyana, thandizo la za umoyo, komanso za kusintha kwa kaganizidwe kuti miyoyo yawo ikhale yosinthika. Mwazina, bungwe la Merck Foundation lati lipitilira ndi program yake yolimbikitsa maphunziro aatsikana yotchedwa Educating Linda yomwe ikuthandiza atsikana okwana makumi awiri omwe akuchita bwino pa maphunziro awo a kusekondale kufikira atamalizaa pofuna kuwalimbikitsa kuti adzakhale odzidalira. Bungwe la Merck Foundation lomwe ndi la mdziko la Germany likugwira ntchito ndi maiko osiyanasiyana kuno ku Africa pozindikilitsa anthu kuti aleke kusala amai omwe ali ndi vuto la ubeleki komanso kuthandiza maikowa pa nkhani za umoyo. Akazi atsogoleri a maiko okwana khumi ndi atatu 13 ndi omwe anachita nawo msonkhanowu. Madam Monica Chakwera alowa mmalo mwa mai wafuko lino wakale Madam Getrude Mutharika omwe adali pa udindowu mmbuyomu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Akhritsu Azipemphera Nthawi Zonse
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walimbikitsa akhristu kuti azilimbikira kupemphera nthawi zonse ngakhale m’mavuto. Popitiriza kuphunzitsa anthu pa nkhani ya mapemphero Papa wauza anthu omwe anasonkhana mu hall ya Papa Paulo wa 6 komanso a katolika onse pa dziko la pansi kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti za kufunika kolimbikira kuchita mapemphero. Iye wati ndi kofunika kumapemphera nthawi zonse popeza kudzera m’mapemphero akhristu amacheza ndi Mulungu komanso amalimbikitsidwa kuti asataye mtima ngakhale mu nyengo zovuta. Papa Francisco waonjezeranso kuti pochita mapemphero akhristu sakhala okha popeza Yesu Khristu amakhala nawo limodzi. Iye wati Yesu Khristu adabwelera munthu aliyense pansi pano kotero munthu aliyense wochimwa kaya wolungama akuyenera kulimbikira kupemphera popeza anthu onse ndi abale a Yesu Khristu kudzera mu Sakramenti la Ubatizo. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kulimbikitsa akhristu kuti mu nyengo zovutitsitsa zomwe sizipereka chikoka chopemphera ndiye nthawi yoyenera kuima njiii m’mapemphero. Asanayambe kulankhula kwa anthu pa nkhani ya mapemphero anayamba ndi kupepesa malinga ndi kuti pa nthawi ino ya mliri wa coronavirus sangathe kuchita zomwe amakonda kuchita nthawi zonse monga kucheza ndi akhristu omwe amabwera kudzakhala nao ndi kumvetsera maphunzitso ake osiyana-siyana, kupereka moni komanso kunyamula ti makanda komabe iye watsimikizira anthuwa kuti nthawi zonse amakhala mu mtima mwake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Ena Atentha Ofesi ya Mphunzitsi Wamkulu pa Sukulu ya Mpiri
news: Anthu ena omwe akuwaganizira kuti ndi a chipembedzo cha chisilamu atentha ofesi ya m’phunzitsi wa mkulu pa sukulu ya pulaimale ya mipingo wa katolika ya Mpiri m’boma la Machinga. Ofesi yomwe yatenthedwayo Mkulu owona za maphunziro mu dayosizi ya Mangochi a Felix Masamba watsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi ndipo ati katundu yense yemwe anali mu ofesiyi wapseratu. “Ndizoona kuti ofesi ya ahead ku Mpiri yaotchedwa kucha kwa tsiku la lero ndipo monga mukuziwa kuti panali mkangano okhuza kuvala Hijab ku mpiriku pamene asilamu akufuna kuti ana awo adzivala hijab ndiye tikuganiza kuti iwowo ndi amene awotcha ofesi imeneyi,” anatero a Masamba. Pamenepa a Masamba ati ofesi yawo ilembera kalata boma kulidziwitsa za ganizo lawo lofuna kutseka sukulu zonse za mpingowu mu dayosizi-yi ngati mpungwepungwewu upitilire.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bande Wati Athana Ndi Mafumu a Katangale
news: Phungu wa dera la kumvuma mu mzinda wa Blantyre, John Bande waopseza kuti athana ndi mafumu omwe akumagulitsa malo mwachinyengo m’dera lake. Bande wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti pali mafumu ena omwe anagulitsa malo ena omwe ophunzira pa sukulu ya pulaimale ya Nkolokoti amagwiritsa ntchito ngati njira yachidule. Pamenepa a Bande achenjeza mafumu kuti apewe m’chitidwe ogulitsa malo omwe amagwilitsidwa ntchito ndi anthu pa moyo wawo wa tsiku ndi tsiku , ndipo ati lamulo lidzagwira ntchito pa mafumu oterewa. “Ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti mafumu anagulitsa malo omwe ana amagwiritsa ntchito ngati njira popita m’makwawo ndipo nkhani imeneyi ndikayisiya ku Anti-Corruption Bureau,” anatero a Bande. Iwo ati nthawi yakwana tsopano kuti mafumu aleke kutengera malamulo m’manja mwawo ndi kupewa kugulitsa malo omwe si awo komanso omwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito ndi anthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Okhudzidwa Ndi Ziwawa Mdziko La Nigeria
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi m’chitidwe wa ziwawa womwe ukuchitika m’dziko la Nigeria. Polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican, Papa wakambapo kwenikweni za kusamvana komwe kulipo pakati pa apolisi a dzikolo ndi achinyamata ochuluka omwe akhala akuchita ziwonetsero zosonyeza kusakondwa. “Tiyeni tipemphere kuti ziwawa zomwe zikuchitika m’dzikoli zithe pochita zokambirana,” watero Papa Francisco. Anthu m’dziko la Nigeria makamaka a chinyamata akhala akuchita ziwonetsero zosonyeza kusakondwa ndi nkhanza zomwe akuti apolisi akuchitira anthu m’dzikolo. Maiko ndi mabungwe adzudzula zipolowezi komanso kuphedwa kwa anthu pafupifupi 70. Anthu akhala akuchita zipolowe m’dziko la Nigeria posakondwa ndi gulu lina la a police lothana ndi umbava lodziwika kuti Special Anti-Robbery Squad (SARS) lomwe akuti lakhala likuchitira anthu nkhanza. Pa chifukwa ichi President wa dziko la Nigeria Muhammadu Buhari anathetsa gulu la police’li pa 7 October 2020.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mkayidi Wafa Pofuna Kuthawa ku Ndende ya Ntcheu
news: Zotsatira za ku chipatala zasonyeza kuti mkayidi wina yemwe anapezeka atafa panja pa ndende ya Ntcheu masiku apitawa, anafa kaamba kotaya magazi ambiri. Malingana ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub-Inspector Hastings Chigalu, mkayidiyu Herbert Maloni wa zaka 33 zakubadwa lamulungu lapitali anapezeka atafa panja pa ndendeyi pomwe amayesera kuthawa kudzera pa denga la ndendeyi usiku. Thupi la mkayidiyu analitengera ku chipatala cha Ntcheu komwe atalipima apeza kuti anaduka msempha, zomwe zinachititsa kuti ataye magazi ochuluka. “Ndizoona kuti masiku apitawa a Herbert Maloni atisiya ndipo amayimbidwa mlandu kamba kopha munthu wachi albino mu 2016,” anatero Chigalu. Iwo ati mchipinda momwe amagona mkuluyu munapezeka mpeni ndipo atafufuza anapeza kuti mkuluyu anagwiritsa ntchito powopsezera anzake pamene amafuna kuthawa mu ndendeyi. Iye amasungidwa pa ndendeyi atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu wopha munthu wina wa khungu la chi alubino m’bomalo mchaka cha 2016.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mpingo wa Anglican Waopseza Kuti Utseka Sukulu Zake
news: Mpingo wa Anglican waopseza kuti utseka sukulu zake ngati mpungwe pungwe upitilire msukuluzi pa nkhani yokhudza kuvala hijab pa nthawi ya maphunziro. Episkopi wa mpingowu mu dayosizi ya Uppershire, Ambuye Brighton Vitta Malasa ndi omwe anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati mpingowu sulora kuti anthu ake azikhala mowopsezedwa kamba ka nkhaniyi. “Kwa m’manga anthu anayambanako mpaka anamenyana ndipo padakali pano nkhaniyi ili ku khothi koma kupatula izi dayosizi ili ndi sukulu zina ozmwe anthu athu akumaospezedwa ndi gulu lina lotchedwa Hijab Task Force. Ndiye ife tikunena kuti sitolora kuti anthu athu adziwopsezedwa zikapitilira titangotseka sukuluzo zikhale zolipira kapena tiwone zina zochita,” anatero Ambuye Malasa. Iwo auzanso boma ndi bungwe la PAC kuti achite machawi pothetsa nkhaniyi ponena kuti palibe munthu amene ali ndi mphamvu yomawopseza munthu mzake mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha
