title: Belekanyama Wati Boma La Tonse Alliance Silingavomereze Lamulo Lochotsa Pathupi
news: Nduna yowona za maboma a ang’ono a Lingson Belekanyama ati boma la Tonse Alliance silingavomereze zoti lamulo lochotsa pathupi likhazikitsidwe mdziko muno. A Belekanyama anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi mu mzinda wa Blantyre pomwe wailesiyi imafuna kumva mbali yawo pa nkhaniyi. Iwo ati mu ulamuliro wa Tonse Alliance, lamuloli silingakhazikitsidwe kaamba koti atsogoleri ake ndi owopa Mulungu ndipo kutero ndi kutsutsana ndi lamulo lomwe Mulungu ananena lomwe limaletsa kupha. “Tafuna tisimikizire mtundu wa a Malawi kuti boma lilibe ganizo lililonse lozakhazikitsa bilu ya mtunduwu,” anatero a Belekanyama. Iwo ati anaganiza zoyankhapo pa nkhaniyi kutsatira mpungwe pungwe omwe wabuka pakati pa mipingo ndi zipembedzo potsutsana ndi nkhaniyi ndipo ati lamuloli silizakhazikitsidwa mu ulamuliro wa Tonse Alliance.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mafumu ku Zomba Akufuna Chingale Likhale Boma Loyima Palokha
news: Mafumu ozungulira dera la Chingale m’boma la Zomba akapereka madandaulo awo kwa bwanamkubwa wa boma la Zomba ati pofuna kkuti dera la Chingale likhale Sub district ponena kuti delari limasalidwa mu zitukuko zosiyanasiyana. Poyankhulanso ndi Radio Maria Malawi mafumuwa atakapereka madandaulo–wo, Sub T/A Nkapita anati apereka madandaulo-wo chifukwa dera lawo limasalidwa pa zitukuko zosiyanasiyana. Mfumu-yi yati dera la Chingale likusowekera zinthu zambiri monga misewu,  zipatala, sukulu za sekondale,  misika ponenanso kuti apolisi omwe akupezeka m’delari ndi ochepanso. Choncho apempha boma kuti likhazikitse dera-li kukhala Sub District kuti adzitha ndondomeko ya chuma yokhudza zitukuko zomwe akuzifuka mdelaro mwa iwo okha. Poyankhula atalandira chikalata cha madandaulocho bwanamkubwa wa boma la Zomba, Dr. Smart Gwedemula wayamikira mafumuwa chifukwa chomasuka ndi kukapereka nkhawa zawo ku boma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Msusa Alimbikitsa Achinyamata Azikonda Kutumikira Mulungu
news: Arkiepiskopi Thomas Luke Msusa wa arkidayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Blantyre wapempha achinyamata mu mpingowu kuti akhale okonda kutumikira Mulungu komanso kulimbika pa maphunziro ndi cholinga choti adzakhale atsogoleri odalirika mu mpingo-wu. Ambuye Msusa anena izi poyakhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Iwo ati achinyamatawa akuyenera kulimbikira pa maphunziro awo komanso kupemphera kuti asankhe moyenera mbali yomwe Mulungu akuwayitanira monga kukhala ansembe, asisitere kapena kulowa m`banja mwa ndondomeko yabwino yomwe mpingo umaphunzitsa. “Inde liwu la Mulungu silimveka ngati mawu ena choncho limasoweka kuti tizipemphera kawiri kawiri kuti tizilimvetsa,” anatero Ambuye Msusa. Iwo ati achinyamata omwe ali ndi maganizo atumikira Mulungu akhale ndi chidwi pa kuwerenga mawu a Mulungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Stima Apempha Akhritsu Apitirize Kuwerenga Baibulo
news: Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi ambuye Montfort Sitima apempha akhristu mu dayosizi-yi kuti apitirize kuwerenga buku loyera ngakhale chaka cha baibulo chikupita kumapeto. Ambuye Stima amalankhula izi ku parishi ya Namandanje mu dinale ya Mpiri pa mwambo wa misa yotsekera chaka cha baibulo omwe ukuchitika m’madinale a mu dayosiziyi. Iwo ati zipatso za chaka cha baibulo zikhale zikupitilirabe kuwoneka pakati pa akhristu ngakhale chakachi chikutha mwezi wa m’mawa. “Chaka chimenechi chayenda bwino ndipo zikuoneka kuti kuno anthu akonzeka, choncho kamba ka mliri wa Covid-19 chakachi kuno sitinathe kukasekera ku Cathedral koma m’malo mwake tinakonza tsiku la lero kuno ku Mpiri,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Polankhulapo bambo mlangizi wa chaka cha baibulo mu dayosiziyi bambo Samuel Malamulo anagwirizana ndi Ambuye Stima ponena kuti anthu apitilire kuwerenga baibulo ngati mbali imodzi yopititsa patsogolo moyo wawo wa uzimu. “Ngati tikukamba za chaka chotsekera baibulo, sizikutanthauza kuti ntchito ya baibulo yatha ayi, tiyeni tipiti\rize kugwiritsa ntchito buku loyera,” anatero bambo Malamulo. Chaka cha baibulo chidzatsekedwa pa chaka cha Yesu Khristu Mfumu koma malinga ndi mliri wa Covid-19 dayosizi ya Mangochi yayamba kuchita mwambo wotsekera chakachi kudzera m’madinale ake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha ma Cardinal 13 Atsopano, M’modzi wa ku Africa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha ma Cardinal atsopano a mpingowu. Atamaliza kulankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican komanso ku dziko lonse kudzera pa kanema ndi makina a intaneti, Papa Francisco walengeza kuti wasankha ma Cardinal atsopano khumi ndi atatu (13). Papa Francisko ndi ma Cardinal Iye wati ma Cardinal atsopanowa adzawakhazikitsa pa udindowu pa 28 November, 2020 ndipo pa tsikuli adzalowa mu gulu la ma Cardinal lodziwika m’chingerezi kuti College of Cardinals. Zadziwika kuti mwa Cardinal khumi ndi atatu atsopanowa, asanu ndi anayi (9) ndi osaposera zaka 80 zomwe zikutanthauza kuti malamulo akuwalora kusankha nawo Papa watsopano kutakhala kosowekera kutero. Ma Cardinal atsopanowa akuchokera mbali zonse za dziko la pansi kuwonetsa kuti mpingo wa katolika ndi mpingo wa pa malo ponse. Mwa chitsanzo Papa Francisco wasankha Archbishop Antoine Kambanda wa ku Kigali ku Rwanda kuyimilira chigawo cha Africa. Ntchito yaikulu ya ma Cardinal ndi kusankha Papa watsopano pamene yemwe analipoyo wamwalira kapena kutula pansi udindo. Ma Cardinal amadziwika ndi mikanjo yawo yofiira komanso ka chipewa kofiira kutanthauza kuti Cardinal ndi munthu yemwe ali wokonzeka kufera chikhulupiro chake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Chikondi Ndi Maziko Eni Eni Achikristu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati kukonda Mulungu komanso anthu ena ndi maziko enieni a moyo wa chikhristu. Polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican, Papa Francisco wathilira ndemanga pa Uthenga Wabwino omwe wawerengedwa pa tsikuli lomwe ndi lamulungu la 30 mu nyengo ya pa chaka. Iye wafotokoza kuti yankho lomwe Yesu Khristu adapereka pamene mphunzitsi wina wa malamulo adamufunsa za lamulo lopambana mwa malamulo onse a Mulungu ndi yankho lofunika komanso lomwe ndi maziko enieni a moyo wa chikhristu. Papa Francisco wati chikondi chikuyenera kutsogolera akhristu mu zonse zomwe amachita potumikira Mulungu komanso anthu anzawo. Iye wati nkhani yaikulu yomwe malamulo onse a Mulungu akutsindika ndiye chikondi, kukonda Mulungu komanso anthu ena. Papa’yu wati akhristu amaonetsa chikondi chao pa Mulungu pamene akonda kupemphera makamaka popembedza Mulungu (adoration) ndipo wati akhristu amaonetsanso chikondi kwa anthu anzao kudzera mu ntchito za chifundo, kukhala pafupi ndi anthu anzao ndi kumvetsera nkhawa zao angakhale chimwemwe chao pongotchula zochepa. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti chifundo cha Mulungu chikuyenera kulimbikitsa akhristu nthawi zonse kuti ngakhale ataphunthwa atha kuyambiranso mwa tsopano kaamba ka chifundo cha Mulungu chomwe nchopanda malire.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: M’busa Kamuyambeni Walowa Mchipani cha UTM
news: Yemwe anali mkulu oyendetsa zinthu zosiyanasiyana mchipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) m’busa Mwayi Kamuyambeni walowa m’chipani cha UTM. M’busa Kamuyambeni M’busa Kamuyambeni yemwenso anali phungu wa chipani cha DPP mdera la kumadzulo m’boma la Ntcheu, miyezi yapitayi analengeza kuti atula pansi udindo wawo komanso umembala wa chipanichi ndipo (dzulo) loweruka ndi pomwe alengeza za kulowa kwawo mchipani cha UTM. Polankhula pa msonkhano owalandira omwe chipani cha UTM chinakonza, a Kamuyambeni ati UTM ndi chipani chokhacho chomwe akuwona kuti chikhonza kusintha zinthu m’dziko muno. “Ndasankha chipani cha UTM chifukwa ndimayang’ana mfundo zomwe zilipo kamba koti Professor Peter Mutharika anandiphunzitsa tsopano yakwana nthawi yoti ndipange practice choncho UTM ndi yomwe ndaganiza kuti ndigwireko ntchito,” anatero m’busa Kamuyambeni. Polankhulapo wachiwiri kwa mkulu owona za chisankho ku chipani cha UTM, a Bright Kawaga anati masomphenya awo ndi ofuna kuti chipani chawo chikule choncho aliyense ndi olandilidwa ku chipanichi. “Ifeyo ngati chipani cha UTM tili ndi malingaliro oti chipanichi chikule ndiye kukula kwa chipani timalandira aliyense monga momwe mwaonera lero talandira anthu ochuluka zedi,” anatero a Kawaga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Aphungu Adandaula Ndi Ndondomeko Zolipiritsa Ana Msukulu Za Pulayimale Za Boma
news: Phungu wa nyumba ya malamulo mdera la pakati m’boma la Salima, Gerald Kapisani Phiri wadandaula kamba ka ndondomeko zina zomwe zinakhazikitsidwa msukulu zina za pulayimale za boma kuti ana azilipira ndalama pa zinthu zina zofunika msukuluzi. Phiri wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti izi zikuchitika ngakhale boma linanena kuti sukulu zonse za pulaimale za boma ndi zaulere. Iye wati ana a msukulu zambiri sakumaloredwa kuphunzira ngati salipira ndalama, zomwe zikupchititsa kuti anawa azivutika kupeza mwayi wa maphunziro. “Masukulu ambiri m’ma constituency momwe tikuchokera maka maka ku Salima central ana ambiri saloredwa kulowa mkalasi pokha pokha atalipira ndalama ndiye mukuziwa kale kuno ku Malawi maphunziro ndi aulele makamaka msukulu za pulayimale,” anatero a Phiri. Koma poyankhapo pa zadandauloli, nduna mu undunawu mayi Agness Nyalonje ati undunawu uwunika mwachidwi zifukwa zomwe sukulu zina za pulayimale zimapemphera ophunzira kuti azipeleka ndalama pa ntchito zina za msukuluzi. “M’mene zikuwonekera ndiye ngati masukulu osiyana siyana amatsatira ndondomeko zosiyana-siyana kutengera m’mene thandizo la sukuluyo limabwelera koma panopo ngati unduna sitinganene kuti chifukwa chake ndi icho koma m’malo mwake tiunika kuti tione m’mene tingachitire,” anatero mayi Nyalonje.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mkayidi Wina Yemwe Anapha Munthu Wachi Alubino Wapezeka Atafa
news: Mkayidi   wina yemwe bwalo linamupeza olakwa pa mlandu opha munthu wa khungu la chialubino wapezeka atafa kunja kwa ndende ya Ntcheu kucha kwa lamulungu pa 25 October 2020. Malemuyu yemwe ndi Herbert Maloni amasungidwa pa ndendeyi atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu wopha a Fretcha Masina omwe anali akhungu lachiabino mchaka cha 2016 m’bomalo. Imfa ya mkaidiyu yadzetsa mafunso ochuluka kwa anthu ambiri mdziko muno makamaka okhala m’boma la Ntcheu. Thupi la malemuyu lapezeka kunja kwa ndende ya Ntcheu kucha kwa lamulungu pa 25 October 2020 lili ndi magazi okhaokha. Ena mwa ogwira Ntchito pa ndendeyi awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti akuganiza kuti mwina nkutheka kuti malemu Maloni amafuna kuthawa pogwiritsa ntchito denga la chipinda china pa ndendeyi. Pomwe mtolankhani wathu amafika pamalowa ndi kuti thupi lawo atalichotsapo ndi kulitengera pa chipatala cha Ntcheu kuti akalipime. Radio Maria Malawi inafuna kumva kuchokera kwa mneneri wa ndende ya Ntcheu a Jordan Manganda koma anakana kuyankhulapo ndipo anati yemwe angayankhulepo bwino za nkhaniyi ndi mneneri wa ndende mdziko muno a Chimwemwe Mike Shawa koma nawonso anakana kutero m’malo mwake anapempha kupatsidwa nthawi ndi cholinga choti afufuzebe. A Herbert Maloni ndi m’modzi mwa anthu asanu omwe khothi linawapeza olakwa pa mlandu opha a Fretcha Masina omwe adali ndi khungu lachiabino mchaka cha 2016 m’mudzi mwa Zimtambira m’boma la Ntcheu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walangiza Akhristu Azizindikira Chomwe Akuchita Popemphera
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kumazindikira zomwe akuchita pa mapemphero. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, lachitatu Papa wapitiriza kuphunzitsa anthu pa za mapemphero ndipo walankhula za kufunika koti anthu azizindikira zomwe akuchita nthawi ya mapemphero ndi kupewa kumangobwebweta. Iye wati ndi kofunika kuti anthu azizindikira zomwe achita ndi kulankhula pa nthawi ya mapemphero. Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kochita mapemphero ofumira mu mtima ndi kupewa kuchita mapemphero pongofuna kukwaniritsa pologalamu ya mapempherowo zomwe iye wati ndi kungotaya nthawi chabe. Iye wati mapemphero ndi ofunika m’moyo wa mkhristu aliyense popeza mapemphero owona mtima amathandiza munthu kupewa makhalidwe oyipa. Papa Francisco wati munthu amene apemphera moona mtima alibe nthawi ya miseche, munthu amene apemphera moona mtima alibe nthawi yosunga mangawa mu mtima. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti ndi tchimo lalikulu kusamaona munthu mzako ngati wofunika pa maso pa Mulungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Uladi Mussa Walamulidwa Kukakhala ku Ndende Kwa Zaka Zisanu
news: Bwalo lalikulu la milandu mu mzinda wa Lilongwe lalamula nduna yakale ya za mdziko a Uladi Mussa kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka zisanu kaamba kogwiritsa ntchito udindo wawo molakwika. Akukalowa ku ndende ya Maula-Mussa A Mussa limodzi ndi mzawo wina a David Kwanjana omwe adali m’modzi mwa akuluakulu a kunthambi yowona zolowa ndi kutuluka mdziko muno, onse awapatsa chilangochi pa mlanduwu komanso chaka china chimodzi pa mlandu wotayilira pa ntchito. Awiriwa amayimbidwa milanduyi powaganizira kuti anatengapo gawo lothandiza mzika zina za mdziko la Rwanda kupeza ziphaso zokhalira mdziko muno mwachinyengo. Popereka chigamulo chake lachinayi, oweruza milandu Justice Dr. Chifundo Kachale anati zilango ziwirizi ziyendera limodz zomwe zikutanthauza kut awiriwa akhala ku ndende kwa zaka zisanu. Judge Kachale watinso awiriwa aletsedwa kukhala ndi udindo uliwonse wokhudza dziko kwa zaka zisanu ndi ziwiri (7) zomwe zikudzazi. Padakalipano yemwe akuyimira a Mussa pa mlanduwu, a Paul Maulidi ati akachita apilo chigamulochi ku bwalo la Supreme sabata ya mawa. A Mussa omwe akhala ali wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa chipani cha DPP mchigawo chapakati adawamanga mchaka cha 2017 pomwe bungwe la ACB linkawaganizra kuti akukhudzidwa ndi milanduyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chipatala cha St. Lukes Malosa Chakwanitsa Zaka 56
news: Bishop wa mpingo wa Anglican mu dayosizi ya Upper Shire ambuye Brighton Vitta Malasa wati chipatala cha mpingowu cha St. Luke chathandiza boma populumutsa miyoyo ya anthu ambiri mdziko muno. Bishop Malasa ndi a Boma (kumanzere) Ambuye Malasa amayankhula izi lachitatu pa chaka cha nkhoswe ya chipatalachi ku Malosa m’boma la Zomba pomwenso amakondwelera kuti patha zaka 56 chipatalachi chiyambireni kugwira ntchito. Iwo ati Luka Woyera anali dokotala, komanso olemba ndipo amathandiza miyoyo ya anthu ambiri mu uzimu komanso ku thupi. Mwazina pa mwambo-wu, ambuye Malasa atsekuliranso nyumba ya chisoni (mortuary) ndi chipinda china chochitira operation (Theater) pa chipatalachi. Polankhulanso mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za chipatalachi komanso zipatala zonse za mpingowu mu dayosizi ya Uppershire a Winas Boma ati kubwera kwa zipinda ziwirizi pa chipatalachi kuthandiza kukweza ntchito za umoyo pa chipatalacho. Iwo ayamikiranso ubale ndi thandizo lomwe chipatalachi chimalandira kuchokera ku boma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lati Ndi Lokhudzidwa ndi Kukwera kwa Milandu Yogwililira
news: Boma lati ndi lokhudzidwa ndi kuchuluka kwa mchitidwe ogwilira ana omwe wakula kwambiri mdziko muno. Nduna yowona za kusasiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo, chitukuko cha m’madera komanso chisamaliro cha anthu, mayi Patricia Kaliati ndi omwe anena izi potsatira kanema wina yemwe wakhala akuwoneka pa masamba a mchezo a internet yemwe akuwonetsa mtsikana wina wachichepere akutuluka magazi ku malo obisika yemwe akuti anagwiliridwa ndi bambo wina wachikulire m’boma la Chikwawa. Kaliati: Bambo ameneyu ambuye amulange Mayi Kaliati ati zomwe anachita bamboyu ndi zosonyeza kusowa umunthu ndipo apempha makolo kuti adziwonetsetsa mayendedwe a ana awo. “Chiwanda chomwe chalowa mdziko muno komanso mwa azibambo ndi choyipa kwambiri ndipo bambo ameneyu ambuye amulange moyo wake onse pa zomwe wamuchita mwana amene uja. Mdziko muno muli akazi ambiri amene akusowa amuna ngakhale ongocheza nawo okha,” anatero mayi Kaliati. Pamenepa iwo ati akukonzabe malamulo okhwima omwe athandizire kuti abambo ambiri apewe kuchita za dama ndi ana, zomwe ndi kuphatikizapo kuletsa kupereka belo kwa abambo omwe apalamula milandu ya ngati imeneyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MAM Ikutsutsana ndi Lamulo Lochotsa Mimba
news: Bungwe lalikulu loyendetsa chipembedzo cha chisilamu mdziko muno la Muslim Association of Malawi lati lipitilira kutsutsana ndi ganizo loti aphungu aku nyumba ya malamulo akambirane za lamulo loloreza amayi ndi atsikana kuchotsa pathupi. Chabulika: Zikutsutsana ndi chiphunzitso cha chisilamu Mneneri wa bungweli Sheikh Dinala Chabulika ndi yemwe wanena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Iye wati kuchotsa pathupi ndi kotsutsana ndi chiphunzitso cha chipembedzo cha chisilamu chomwe chimanena kuti anthu akuyenera kusunga komanso kuteteza moyo wa munthu. “Nkhaniyi titayiwona tinawona kuti ikutsutsana ndi chiphunzitso cha Chisilamu ndipo ifeyo sitikumvetsa chifukwa chimene akufuna kusinthira lamulo,” anatero Sheikh Chabulika. Pamenepa iwo atsindika kuti salora kuti lamulo lotereli likhazikitsidwe mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi M’boma la Mangochi Atentha Chamba Cholemera 300 Kilogram
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mangochi mogwirizana ndi nthambi ya mabwalo a milandu m’bomali, atentha chamba cholemera ma kilogramu 300 chomwe chinalandidwa kwa anthu osiyanasiyana omwe anamangidwa m’bomalo.  Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sub Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi, ntchitoyi yachitika pa 20 October mu nkhalango ya Mpima. Sub Inspector Daudi wati ganizo lowotcha chambachi linachokera ku bwalo loweruza milandu ati kamba koti chinasungidwa kwa nthawi yaitali. Sub Inspector Daudi akufotokoza. “Ndi zoonadi ife apolisi pamodzi ndi anzathu anthambi ya bwalo loweruza milandu tawotcha chamba chokwanira makilogalamu 300 chomwe tinalanda kwa anthu omwe anapalamula milandu,” anatero Daudi. Sub Inspector Daudi anati mwa chambachi, cholemera ma kilogram 150 chinalandidwa kuchokera kwa munthu m’modzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Mkulu Watsopano Owona za Anthu Oyera mu Mpingo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha mkulu watsopano woyang’anira bungwe lomwe limawona za anthu oyera mu mpingo. Likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse (Vatican) lalengeza za kusankhidwa kwa Ambuye Marcello Semeraro kukhala mkulu (Prefect) wa bungwe lomwe limawona za anthu oyera mu Mpingo lodziwika kuti Congregation for the Causes of Saints. Bishop Semeraro ndi Papa Francisko Malinga ndi malipoti Papa Francisco wasankha Ambuye Semeraro kukhala m’lowa m’malo wa Cardinal Angelo Becciu yemwe adatula pansi udindowu. Asadasankhidwe pa udindowu Ambuye Semeraro akhala ali pa udindo wa mlembi wa bungwe la alangizi a Papa Francisco lodziwika kuti Council of Cardinal Advisors kuyambira m’chaka cha 2013. Ambuye Semeraro omwe adabadwa pa 22 December 1947 adadzodzedwa unsembe m’chaka cha 1971 ndipo m’chaka cha 1998 adasankhidwa kukhala episkopi wa diocese ya Oria mdziko la Italy. Bungwe lowona za anthu oyera mu mpingo lidakhazikitsidwa m’chaka cha 1588 ndi cholinga chounika ndi kuchita kafukufuku wa moyo wa anthu pamene amwalira kuti apeze ngati ali oyenera kutchulidwa oyera kuti kudzera m’moyo wao akhalenso zitsanzo za moyo weniweni wa chikhristu kwa ena.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana ndi Mkulu wa Bungwe la Red Cross
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi mkulu wa bungwe la Red Cross pa dziko lonse. Zokambirana pakati pa Papa Francisco ndi mkulu wa bungwe la Red Cross pa dziko lonse Peter Maurer zakhudza ntchito yomwe bungwe la Red Cross likugwira maka pano pomwe maiko ambiri akhudzidwa ndi mliri wa Coronavirus. Papa pa mkumano wake ndi Maurer Iwo akambirananso momwe bungwe la Red Cross lingathandizire anthu a nkhaninkhani m’maiko momwe muli nkhondo. M’mawu ake Maurer wati ndi zochititsa chidwi kuti zomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika likufuna pa momwe anthu angathandizidwire anthu omwe ali m’mavuto osiyana-siyana ndi momwenso bungwe la Red Cross likufunira litamagwilira ntchito zake. Maurer wati ndi cholinga cha bungwe la Red Cross kuti anthu omwe ali m’mavuto osiyana-siyana azithandizidwa bwino, mofanana ndipo mopanda kuwonetsa kukondera kulikonse. Atatha nkumano wake ndi Papa Francisco, Maurer wakumananso ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika (Secretary of Vatican State), Cardinal Pietro Parolin. Bungwe la Red Cross kapena kuti International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) limagwira ntchito yothandiza anthu omwe ali m’mavuto osiyana-siyana monga ngozi za chilengedwe ndi nkhondo. Bungweli linayamba m’chaka cha 1863 ku Geneva m’dziko la Switzerland.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Oyezetsa TB Akuchepa-Unduna
news: Nthambi yowona za matenda a chifuwa chachikulu cha TB yadandaula kamba ka kutsika kwa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akupita mzipatala kuti akathandizidwe pa matendawa. Dambe: Tili ndi ma HSA amene akutithandiza Wachiwiri kwa mkulu oyendetsa ntchito za nthambiyi mu unduna wa za umoyo Dr. Isaiah Dambe alankhula izi pa ulendo wa atolankhani woona zomwe zikuchitika m’boma la Mangochi polimbana ndi nthendayi. Iye wati izi zili chomwechi kamba koti anthu ambiri akumakhala ndi mantha kukayezetsa nthendayi powopa kukayezedwa kachirombo ka coronavirus m’malo mwa TB. “Mdziko lino la Malawi tili ndi ma HSA omwe ali m’midzi ndipo iwo aphunzitsidwa kusiyana kwa zizindikiro za pakati pa chifuwa cha TB ndi nthenda ya Covid-19 choncho tikamva zizindikiro tizikawapeza iwowa kuti atithandize,” anatero a Dambe. Iwo ati zimenezi zithandiza kuti matendawa aziwapeza msanga munthu asanadwale nawo kwambiri ndipo ati akufunitsitsa kuti akamafika chaka cha 2030 chiwerengero cha anthu odwala chifuwa cha TB chikhale chochepa
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: YODEP Yati Iwonetsetsa Kuti Ana pa Chilumba cha Chisi Akulandira Maphunziro Okwanira
news: Bungwe la Youth for Development and Productivity (YODEP) lati liwonetsetsa kuti ana omwe akupezeka pa chilumba cha Chisi pa nyanja ya Chilwa m’boma la Zomba, akulandira maphunziro a msukulu za mkomba phala. Mkulu owona za mapulogalamu ku bungweli a Joe Mwandama ndi omwe anena izi pa chilumbachi lomwe ndi dera la Group Village Headman Tchuka pomwe amaphunzitsa alezi a msukuluzi momwe angasamalire ana mu nyengo ino ya mliri wa Covid19. A Mwandama ati anapita pa chilumbachi ndi cholinga chofuna kuteteza ana komanso kuwalimbikitsa pa maphunziro awo potengera mavuto omwe anawa akukumana nawo. “Vuto lomwe lili pa Chisi Island nthawi zambiri ana amene ndi achichepere amakhala ayamba kupita ku nyanja kumapeza ndalama choncho sukulu samayitenga ngati yofunika,” anatero a Mwandama. Iwo ati awonetsetsa kuti apereke maphunziro a mkombaphala okwanira kuti anawa azichita bwino ndi sukulu yawo. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa alezi pa chilumbachi mayi Mary Chipatala ati kubwera kwa sukuluzi pa chilumbachi kuchepetsa ntchito kwa aphunzitsi a msukulu za pulaimale. “Nthawi imeneyo anawo amangokula osapita ku nazale kufikira ku pulaimale ndipo pa chifukwa choti pulayimale ili kutali anawa amakula mpaka zaka 10 asanayambe sukulu choncho sukulu za mkomba phalazi zithandiza,” anatero mayi Chipatala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Mulanje Adandaula Ndi Kukula Kwa Mchitidwe Ophana
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mulanje ati ndi okhudzidwa kaamba ka kuchuluka kwa milandu yopha anthu omwe akuganiziridwa kuti apalamula mlandu. Wofalitsa nkhani ku polisi ya Mulanje, Sub Inspector Gresham Ngwira wanena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iye wati anthu alekeretu mchitidwe olanga okha anthu omwe akuwaganizira kuti alakwa ndipo anthu omwe akhala akuchita mchitidwe otengera malamulo m’manja mwawo adzimangidwa ndi kuyimbidwa mlandu. “Nkhani zimenezi zophana sizikuchita bwino chifukwa mmene mwezi wa September umatha tinali titalandira milandu 10 yokhudzana ndi kuphedwa kwa anthu pamene chaka chatha inali milandu 4 yokha mu mwezi ngati omwewo wa September,” anatero Ngwira. Iye wati zomwe zikuchitikazi ndi zokhumudwitsa ndipo wati ngati achitetezo ayesetsa kuti anthu omwe akuchita mchitidwe oterewu amangidwe ndi kuyimbidwa mlandu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nthambi ya Zanyengo Yalangiza Anthu Adzimwa Madzi Pafupipafupi
news: Nthambi yowona za nyengo mdziko muno yapempha anthu kuti adzimwa madzi pafupi-pafupi kaamba koti kutentha kwambiri sabata ino. Mkulu ku nthambiyi a Jolamu Nkhokwe auza Radio Maria Malawi kuti kutenthaku kwadza kaamba ka mkumano wa mphepo kuchokera mbali zonse za dziko lino. Iwo ati pambuyo pa kutenthaku m’madera ena mudzagwa mvula ya mabingu ndipo apempha anthu kuti apewe kukhala pansi pa mitengo pomwe mvula ikugwa powopa kuombedwa ndi mphenzi. “Ife a department ya zanyengo mu unduna wa nkhalango ndi zachilengedwe tikuwuza mtundu wa a Malawi kuti kuyambira pa 18 mpaka pa 25 October madera ambiri akhala akutentha mdziko muno mzigawo zonse,” anatero a Nkhokwe. Iwo alangiza anthu kumwa madzi pafupi pafupi komanso ati anthu azimvetsera za nyengo nthawi zonse pofuna kuti apewe mavuto omwe angadze kaamba ka nyengo zosiyanasiyana ngati madzi osefukira, mphezi ndi zina.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Matumba 432 a Chimanga Ayaka Moto M’boma la Dowa
news: Matumba 432 a chimanga awonongeka galimoto yomwe inanyamula chimangachi itayaka moto m’boma la Dowa. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha, ngoziyi yachitika m’bandakucha wa lero (lolemba) pa mlatho otchedwa Chingondo m’bomalo. “Galimotoyi yomwe nambala yake ndi NU 8719 imayendetsedwa ndi a Lucius Kamukwa a zaka 50 inayamba kuyaka moto itafika pa mlatho wa Chingondo zomwe zachititsa kuti matumba onse okwana 432 omwe galimotoyi inanyamula awonongeke ndi motowo,” anatero Sub Inspector M’bumpha. M’bumpha wati mwini wake wa chimangachi ndi Elias Tennis ochokera mdera la mfumu yaikulu Mkanda m’boma la Mchinji ndipo ndi mkulu ochita malonda m’bomalo. Padakali pano apolisi ati akufufuzabe kuti apeze chenicheni chomwe chinayambitsa motowu. Ku Dowa komweko, anthu awiri avulala pa ngozi zosiyana zomwe zachitika pa malo amodzi m’bomalo usiku wa lamulungu lapitali. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson Mbumpha wati anthuwa ndi a Bole Kapalamula a zaka 47 komanso a Humphrey Charles a zaka 27 ndipo agonekedwa pa chipatala cha pa boma pa Dowa. Ngozi yoyambayi yachitikira pa mlatho wa Tatolonga pomwe oyendetsa njinga yamoto anaomba ngolo yomwe imayendetsedwa ndi a Kapalamula ndi kuwavulaza pamodzi ndi a Bulu omwe amakoka ngoloyi. Ngozi ina yachitika pamalo omwewanso pomwe ambulance yomwe imayenetsedwa ndi a Masautso Felison inaomba a Humphrey Charles omwe amakonza nsewu pochotsa Ngolo yomwe inachita ngoziyi. A Charles anavulala kwambiri mwendo komanso kukalika ku nkhope ndipo woyendetsa ambulance yu sanavulale. Bole Kapalamula amachokera m’mudzi wa Mitembo pomwe Humphrey Charles amachokera m’mudzi wa Chawiya ndipo onse ndi a mdera la mfumu yayikulu Mkukula m’boma lomweli la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sheikh Abasi Wapempha PAC Ichite Machawi Pothetsa Mikangano Yokhudza Hijab M’sukulu
news: Wachiwiri kwa mlangizi wa president pa nkhani za chipembedzo Sheikh Hashim Abasi wapempha bungwe la Public Affairs Committee (PAC) kuti lichite machawi pothetsa kusamvana komwe kulipo pakati pa chipembedzo cha chisilamu ndi mipingo yachikhristu pa nkhani yovala ma hijab ku sukulu. Sheikh Abasi amalankhula izi pothilirapo ndemanga pa nkhani yokhudza kusamvana komwe kukupitilira pa sukulu ya pulaimale ya mpingo wa katolika ya Mpiri m’boma la machinga komwe kwachititsa kuti sukuluyi itsekedwe kachiwiri sabata yatha zomwenso akuti zayamba kupereka chiwopsezo kwa akatolika mderalo. Iwo ati ndi kofunika kuti mbali ziwirizi zimvane chimodzi ndi kuyambanso kukhalirana mwa mtendere mdziko muno. “A PAC ndiomwe asove nkhani imeneyo ndipo akuyenera atero msanga kuti mkanganowu usakhalepo chifukwa anthu omwe akukanganawo amakhalira limodzi,” anatero Sheikh Abasi. Koma polankhulapo mneneri wa bungwe la PAC, bishop Gilford Matonga wati nkhaniyi siyofunika kuikambirana mwachidule ndipo akuluakulu a bungweli akupitilirabe kuwunika njira yabwino yomwe angathetsere kusamvanaku. “Iyiyi sinkhani yachidule yongoti takambirana zatha ndipo PAC inakhazikitsa task force imene anthu amene ali m’menemo ndi ochokera mzipembezo zonse ndipo anthu amanewa akhale akuyamba kukambirana nkhani imeneyi posachedwapa,” anatero m’busa Matonga. Iwo ati nkhaniyi siyofunika kuyendetsa mwansanga koma ati ndi kofunikira kuiwunikira mokuya kuti awone mmene angathetsere mikanganoyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhala Nawo Pa Mapemphero a Mtendere Pa Dziko Lonse
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco akhala nawo pa mapemphero opemphelera mtendere. Mapempherowa omwe mutu wake ndi woti No One Is Saved Alone – Peace and Fraternity achitika lachiwiri pa 20 October 2020 ndipo atsogoleriwa akhala m’malo atatu osiyana mu mzinda wa Rome ndipo alumikizana kudzera pa makina a intaneti. Malo atatuwa ndi: tchalichi lalikulu la Basilica of Saint Mary ku Aracoeli mu mzinda wa Rome, Sunagoge ya ku Rome komanso malo osungira zinthu za mbiri ya kale otchedwa Capitoline Museums mu mzinda womwewu wa Rome. Ofesi yofalitsa ma uthenga Vatican Press Office yati pambuyo pa mapempherowa pakhalanso mwambo wina wa a atsogoleri a Mipingo yosiyanasiyana pa bwalo la Michelangelo Square. Bungwe la Saint Egidio lati lakonza mapempherowa molimbikitsidwa ndi zomwe adachita Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera yemwe adakonza mapemphero a mipingo yosiyanasiyana ku Assisi m’dziko la Italy pa 27 October 1986 komanso bungwe la Saint Egidio lati lalimbikitsidwa ndi kalata ya Papa Francisco ya posachedwa yotchedwa Fratelli tutti yomwe ikulimbikitsa zoti anthu akuyenera kukhalitsana bwino. Mapempherowa achitika motsata ndondomeko zothandiza kupewa kufalitsa nthenda ya Covid 19. Pambali popempherera mtendere pakhalanso mapemphero opempha chithandizo cha Mulungu pa mliri wa coronavirus. Pa mapempherowa atsogoleriwa akhala chete mphindi imodzi kupempherera anthu onse omwe akuvutika kaamba ka Covid 19 komanso nkhondo. Akhristu, asilamu, ayuda, achipembedzo cha Buddha pongotchula ochepa akhala nao pa mapempherowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PMS Yapempha Ana Akonzekere Bwino Kolona wa Ana 1 Million pa Dziko Lonse
news: Bungwe lowona za Utumiki wa a Papa mdziko muno lapempha makolo kuti akonzekeretse bwino ana awo pa kolona wa ana 1 million pa dziko lonse yemwe apempheredwe loweruka likudzali. Rappozo: Kolonayu ndi ofunika kwambiri Polankhula m’malo mwa mkulu wa bungweli mdziko muno bambo Paul Rappozo omwe ndi mkulu wa bungweli mu dayosizi ya Mangochi ati ana a mdziko muno akuyenera kudzatenga nawo mbali pa kolonayu yemwe adzayamba nthawi ya 9 koloko m’mawa ndipo adzapempheredwa kudzera m’malimana komanso m’matchalitchi. Iwo ati kolonayu cholinga chake ndi choti anawa apemphelere mtendere pa dziko lonse komanso chitetezo ku mliri wa COVID-19. “Kolonayu ndi ofunika kwambiri ndiye tipemphe kuti ana adzasonkhane m’maparishi ndi m’malimana kudzapemphera limodzi kolonayi koma pa nthawiyi atsatire njira zonse zodzitetezera ku mliri wa COVID-19,” anatero bambo Rappozo. Polankhulaponso ena mwa ana omwe adzatenge nawo mbali pa tsikuli omwe ndi Tatiana komanso Orama Phiri ochokera mu dayosizi ya Mangochi, alimbikitsa ana anzawo kuti adzatenge nawo gawo pa tsikuli. Iwo anati mapempherowa athandiza kwambiri kuti anawa apemphelere anzawo omwe akuvutika mu njira zosiyanasiyana, kubweretsa mtendere mdziko komanso m’mabanja.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sukulu ya Pulaimale ya Mpiri Yatsekedwanso
news: Sukulu ya pulaimale ya mpingo wa katolika ya Mpiri m’boma la Machinga yatsekedwanso kutsatira kusamvana komwe kukupitilira pakati pa asilamu ndi akhristu pa nkhani zoti ophunzira achisilamu azivala chovala chotchedwa hijab pa nthawi ya maphunziro. Asilamu akuti akufuna adzivala motere M’modzi mwa anthu omwe awona izi zikuchitika wati chipolowe chinayamba pomwe ophunzira ena achisilamu anapita sukuluyi lolemba lapitali atavala hijab komwe anawabweza kuti akavale bwino. Izi zidakwiyitsa anthu otsatira chipembedzo cha chisilamu ndipo anakachita chisokonezo pa sukuluyi zomwe zinachititsa kuti apolisi afike pa sukuluyi kudzakhazikitsa bata. “Panali chisokonezo kwambiri. Anthuwo anakaphwanya katundu ochuluka kunyumba ya ahedi komanso amapanga target kwambiri anthu omwe ndi a katolika kuti athane nawo moti ena anamenyedwa kwambiri ndipo avulala agonekedwa ku chipatala,” anatero mkuluyo. Mkulu woyang’anira maphunziro atafika pa sukuluyi analamula kuti sukuluyi itsekedwe kaye kufikira mbali ziwirizi zitakambirana ndi kumanga mfundo imodzi. Padakalipano anthu awiri ndi amene avulala pa chipolowechi ndipo agonekedwa pa chipatala cha Liwonde m’boma lomwelo la machinga atatumizidwa kuchokera pa chipatala cha Mpiri Mission.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ECM Yalengeza za Kuyambanso Kwa Sacrament la Ulimbitso
news: Bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) lalengeza za kuyambiranso kwa kupereka Sakramenti la Ulimbitso. Izi zadziwika potsatira kalata yomwe ma episkopi’wa atulutsa yodziwitsa anthu za nkhaniyi. Maepiskopi’wa adalengeza za kuyimitsa kupereka Sacramenti la Ulimbitso mu mwezi wa May chaka chino kamba ka mliri wa Coronavirus. Potsatira msonkhano wawo wapadera omwe maepiskopiwa achita ku likulu la mpingowu ku Lilongwe kuyambira pa 12 mpaka pa 13 October 2020, ma episkopi’wa atawunikanso ndi m’mene zinthu ziliri pa nkhani ya mliri wa coronavirus kwathu kuno agwirizana kuti tsopano mpingo utha kuyamba kupereka Sacramenti la Ulimbitso lomwe anayamba aliyimitsa kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus potsatira kalata yao ya pa 8 May 2020 yokamba za nkhaniyi. Maepiskopiwa ati bungwe la ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ku Vatican loona za Chipembedzo ndi ma Sakramenti (Congregation for Divine Worship and the Discipline of Sacraments) lati malamulo a Mpingo (Canon Law) amanena kuti Sacrament la Ulimbitso liperekedwe popaka mafuta pa mphumi ndi episkopi kapena wansembe yemwe amuvomereza pogwiritsa ntchito mau ake oyenerera. Malamulo akunena kuti kuvala zozitetezera m’manja monga ma glove kapena kupaka mafuta pa mphumi pogwiritsa ntchito thonje sizisintha mwa njira iliyonse mphamvu ya Sakramentili. Koma iwo atsindika kuti kugwiritsa ntchito zinthu ngati ma glove kapena thonje popereka Sakramentili ndi za ka nthawi kameneka ka mliri wa coronavirus basi. Maepiskopiwa atsindikanso kuti pa miyambo ya Ulimbitso zonse zikuyenera kuchitika motsata ndondomeko zomwe zidakhazikitsidwa monga kukhala motalikirana ndi zina. Kalata’yi yasainidwa ndi ma piskopi asanu ndi awiri (7) komanso mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za Diocese ya Dedza – Bambo John Chithonje.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ndi Udindo wa Aliyense Kufalitsa Uthenga wa Chipulumutso-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi udindo wa mkhristu aliyense kufalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso. Kudzera mu bukhu la tsopano la Ambuye Fabio Fabene episkopi wa mdziko la Italy lotchedwa Symphony of Ministries: A renewed presence of laity in the Church, Papa Francisco wati ndi udindo wa mkhristu aliyense wa katolika kutengapo mbali pothandiza kufalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso kuti ufikire anthu onse komanso magawo onse a moyo wa anthu. Kudzera mu buku’li iye wati ndi zolakwika kumaganiza kuti ntchito yofalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso ili m’manja mwa anthu ochepa monga ansembe. Papa Francisco wati m’khristu aliyense akuyenera kuchilimika ndi kudzipereka mwa toto moyo pa ntchito yofalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso. Iye wati m’khristu aliyense akuyenera kugwira ntchitoyi ndi chimwemwe chodzadza tsaya komanso pochilimika m’mapemphero monga inenera kalata ya Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera ya m’chaka cha 1988 yotchedwa Christifideles laici yokamba za udindo womwe mkhristu aliyense ali nao mu Mpingo komanso m’dziko. Mlembi wa buku’li Ambuye Fabene agwirapo ntchito m’ma udindo akuluakulu ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mulungu Akufuna Aliyense Alandire Chipulumutso-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi cholinga cha Mulungu kuti anthu onse alandire chipulumutso. Pa tsiku laMulungu la 28 mu nyengo ya pa chaka, Papa Francisco wathilira ndemanga pa Uthenga Wabwino wa pa tsikuli omwe ukufotokoza za phwando la ukwati lomwe mfumu ina idakonzera mwana wake wa mamuna. Iye wauza anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican komanso anthu omwe amatsatira mwambowu pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti kuti phwando la ukwatili likuyimira chikondi chosasimbika cha Mulungu komanso kufewa manja komwe Mulungu amawonetsa anthu ake. Papa’yu wati ndi zokhumudwitsa komanso zomvetsa chisoni kuti anthu omwe anayitanidwa koyambilira ku phwando la ukwati adalephera pa zifukwa zawo ndipo mapeto ake mfumu yomwe idakonza phwandoli idangoganiza zoyitana aliyense yemwe adali wokonzeka kubwera ku phwandoli. Iye wati umu ndi m’mene anthu achitira maka posalabadira ndi kuika mtima pa za Mulungu ndipo m’malo mwake anthu amaika mtima pa zinthu za pansi pano zomwe ndi zosakhalitsa. Papa Francisco wati monga m’mene Mulungu achitira poitanira anthu ku chipulumutso Mpingo ukuyenera kuchita chimodzimodzi pofunafuna ndi kuitanira anthu ku moyo wosatha mopanda tsankho. Iye wati chipulumutso sichiyang’ana nkhope, sichiona komwe munthu achokera, maphunziro, khungu la munthu kaya chilankhulo cha munthu, anthu ochimwa kaya olungama. Papa Francisco watsindika kuti Mulungu akuitana aliyense mosasankha ku chipulumutso. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti chinthu chofunika ndicho kuvala chovala choyenera chomwe ndi kutembenuka mtima (conversion).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PMS Yapempha Mafumu Achikatolika Akhale Patsogolo Kutumikira Mpingo
news: Mafumu achikatolika mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe awapempha kuti akhale patsogolo potumikira mpingo mu njira zosiyanasiyana. Polankhula pambuyo pa msulo wa mafumu komanso a bambo ndi amayi onse a mpingowu ku Kaphatika parish ku Ntchisi mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, mkulu owona ntchito za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa (Pontifical Mission Society) mu arkidayisiziyi bambo Francis Lekaleka, ati mafumu ali ndi udindo waukulu wokokera anthu awo ku chipulumutso pokhala a chitsanzo chabwino. Bambo Lekaleka ati mafumuwa ayenera kukhala anthu owopa Mulungu, a chilungamo ndipo akuyenera kutekeseka pa ntchito za mpingo. “Timadera nkhawa kuti mwina mafumu ambiri sabwera ku msulo umenewu koma tadzidzimuka kuti abwera ochuluka kwambiri ndipo tiwayamikire chifukwa cha zimenezi ndipo tikuwapempha kuti padakalipano pamene ntchito ya Ambuye yakula, iwo akhalenso patsogolo kutsogolera anthu awo ku chipulumutso,” anatero bamboo Lekaleka. Polankhulapo m’modzi mwa mafumu omwe anatenga nawo mbali pa maphunzirowa Group Village Headman Chikowa inati mafumu akuyenera kutsatira chitsanzo cha mfumu solomoni yomwe inali ya luntha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Zokonzekera za Malumbiro a Asisteri a Chipani Cha Daughters of Wisdom Zili Mchimake
news: Zokonzekera za mwambo wa malumbiro oyamba a asisteri awiri a chipani cha Daughters of Wisdom omwe udzachitike loweruka likudzali mu dayosizi ya Zomba akuti zili mchimake. Mkulu wa chipanichi kuno ku Malawi, Sister Mary Chimalizeni ati mwambo olumbilitsa Sister Catherine Kaluwa komanso Sister Annie Solomon udzayamba ndi nsembe ya Misa yomwe adzatsogolere ndi ambuye George Desmond Tambala omwe ndi episkopi wa dayosizi ya Zomba. Asisteri a chipani cha Daughters of Wisdom “Mwambowu uchitika loweruka likudzali ndipo udzachitikira ku St. Mary’s Secondary School ndipo amene adzatsogolere mwambowo ndi ambuye Tambala,” anatero Sister Chimalizeni. Iwo ati chipani chawo ndi chokondwa polandira asisiteri awiriwa omwe asankha kutumikira Mulungu moyo wawo onse kudzera mchipanichi. Malinga ndi mliri wa COVID-19, Sister Chimalizeni ati anthu onse omwe ayitanidwa ku mwambowu awuzidwa zonse zoyenera kudzachita pofuna kupewa kufala kwa nthendayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sheikh Abasi Wapempha Asilamu, Akhristu Agwire Ntchito Limodzi
news: Wachiwiri kwa mlangizi wa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino pa nkhani za chipembedzo Sheikh Hashimu Abasi wapempha asilamu ndi akhristu kuti adzigwilira ntchito limodzi. Sheikh Abasi amayankhula izi lachiwiri mdera la mfumu yaikulu Chikweo m’boma la Machinga pomwe amakumana ndi atsogoleri a chipembedzo cha chisilamu komanso mafumu a m’deralo. Iye wati anthu a mbali ziwirizi apewe tsankho ponena kuti zimabwezeretsa m’buyo chitukuko cha dziko. “Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera ananena atangosankhidwa kumene nhgakhalenso mu manifesto ake pa nthawi yokopa anthu kuti akufunitsitsa kuthetsa mchitidwe wa tsankho pa mitundu, zipembedzo komanso zigawo ndipo zomwezonso ndi zomwe ndikunena ine pano,” anatero Sheikh Abasi. Poyankhulapo mfumu yayikulu Chikweo ya m’boma la Machinga yati siyidzalola kuti anthu a m’dera lake azigawana mitundu kapenanso kudana chifukwa cha zipembedzo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: EU Yapempha Maiko Athane ndi Katangale pa Mchitidwe Ozembetsa Anthu
news: Bungwe la European Union (EU) lalangiza maiko a padziko lonse kuti akhale tcheru powonetsetsa mchitidwe wa katangale wokhudza anthu ochita mchitidwe ozembetsa anthu. Mkhala pakati pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mchitidwe ozembetsa anthu ku bungweli, Olivier Onidi wanena izi lachiwiri pa msonkhano omwe wachitikira pa makina a internet okumbukira kuti padutsa zaka makumi awiri chikhazikitsireni mfundo zothandiza kupewa, kuchepetsa komanso kulanga anthu pa nkhani zokhudza kuzembetsa anthu padziko lonse. Onidi: Ndi ntchito yaikulu Iwo ati bungweli lapeza kuti anthu omwe apezeka kuti apalamula milanduyi amathamangira kupereka ziphuphu kwa a zamalamulo kuti milandu iwakomere ndipo pakuyenera kukhala kalondolondo okwanira wa momwe nkhani monga izi zingayendere kufikira olakwa atalandira chilango chokhwima. “Ntchito yolimbana ndi mchitidwe ozembetsa anthu ndi ntchito yaikulu kwambiri yofunuka kuthandizana  ndipo boma la Malawi la khazikitsa thumba la ndalama zothandiza kuti anthu athane ndi mchitidwe umenewu,” anatero Onidi. Polankhulapo, John Brandolino yemwe ndi m’modzi mwa akuluakulu ku nthambi ya bungwe la United Nations yowona za mankhwala ozunguza bongo ndi milandu, ati mgwirizano wa pakati pa mabungwe osiyanasiyana utha kuthandiza kuchepetsa nkhani zozembetsa anthu m’maiko ndipo wapempha maiko kuti akhazikitse ndondomeko zolimba zofuna kuthandiza kulimbana ndi mchitidwewu. Mmawu ake, nduna ya chitetezo cha mdziko a Richard Chimwendo-Banda ati msonkhanowu upindulira kwambiri dziko la Malawi powunikanso ndi kuwonjezera ndondomeko zina zothandiza kulimbana ndi mchitidwewu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Achinyamata Kuti Ayike Mulungu Patsogolo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wauza achinyamata kuti chimwemwe cheni-cheni chagona poyika Mulungu patsogolo m’moyo wawo. Pothilira ndemanga pa mwambo womwe wachitika ku mathero a sabata yangothayi wokhazikitsa Carlo Acutis mnyamata wa mdziko la Italy kuti tsopano ndi wodala, Papa Francisco wauza achinyamata pa dziko lonse kuti moyo wa mnyamata mzawoyu ndi umboni wa ukulu kuti chimwemwe cheni-cheni chagona potsogoza Mulungu mu zonse komanso potumikira ena. Kotero iye wati moyo wa mnyamata’yu ndi chitsanzo cha moyo wonyaditsa chomwe achinyamata pa dziko lonse akuyenera kusilira. Papa Francisco wati ndi zopatsa chidwi kuti mnyamata wachichepere ngati ameneyu – zaka 15 zokha basi – adali kukonda kulandira Ukaristia komanso kulemba nkhani zochititsa chidwi za Sakramenti la Ukaristia. Papa’yu adalemba m’kalata yake yotchedwa Christus Vivit ya m’chaka cha 2018 yolembera a chinyamata a Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse kuti Acutis ndi chitsanzo kwa achinyamata kuti naonso atha kufalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso kudzera pa computer monga m’mene adali kuchitira mzawoyu yemwe adali katakwe pa nkhani za computer komanso yemwe anali wodziwika kwambiri pofalitsa uthenga okhudza Sakramenti la Ukaristia pa computer othandiza anthu pa moyo wao wa uzimu M’chaka cha 2006 zidadziwika koyamba kuti Acutis anali kuvutika ndi nthenda ya kutha magazi (leukemia) ndipo iye adavomera kusauka ndi nthendayi chifukwa cha chikondi chodabwitsa chomwe anali nacho kwa Ambuye Yesu kudzera mu Sakramenti la Ukaristia. Acutis yemwe adabadwa m’chaka cha 1991 adamwalira m’chaka cha 2006 ndipo mwambo wa Misa womukhazikitsa kuti ndi wodala wachitika loweruka lapitali m’dziko la Italy.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Mangochi Ati Akhwimitsa Chitetezo Mzipata
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mangochi alonjeza zothana ndi mchitidwe ozembetsa anthu komanso kuba pokhwimitsa chitetezo cha m’zipata zonse za bomali. Daudi: Tiyesetsa Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Mangochi Sub Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi, apolisiwa alonjezanso zopereka chitetezo chokwanira kwa anthu omwe amakhala m’malire a dziko lino. Daudi wati kafukufuku wawo wawonetsa kuti m’miyezi 9 ya chaka chino kwachitika milandu yokwana 6 yokhudza kuzembetsedwa kwa anthu kusiyana ndi chaka chatha pomwe panali mlandu umodzi mu nthawi ya ngati yomweyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kwelepeta Wati Anthu Apewe Kunyoza Achikulire
news: Phungu wa dera la Zomba Malosa, Grace Kwelepeta walangiza anthu mdziko muno kuti apewe kunyoza anthu achikulire powanena kuti ndi afiti. Kwelepeta amayankhula m’boma la Zomba pomwe amakachezera agogo omwe amasamalidwa ndi mpingo wa Songani Baptist ndi kukawapatsa mphatso yokondwelera tsiku la anakubala. Kwelepeta: Tiwalemekeze Iye wati kupereka ulemu kwa anthu achikulire ndi chinthu chofunika kwambiri ndipo wapempha anthu kuti adzikonda komanso kusamalira anthu achikulire kaamba koti ndi anakubala. “Sindikukhulupilira kuti ndi chikhalidwe cha ku Malawi kuno kuti munthu akakalamba tizimutchula kuti mfiti, nde anali mawu anga kuwalangiza anthuwa kuti azilemekeza anthu achikulire,” anatero mayi Kwelepeta. Polankhulapo m’busa Dickson Maliro wa mpingo wa Songani Baptist wayamikira phunguyu kaamba ka thandizoli lomwe wati lithandiza agogowa pa nkhani ya chakudya ndi zina zosoweka pa moyo wawo. “Anthu okwanira 10 amenewa ntchito yawo kwambiri ndi kusamala azigogowa powakonzera makomo awo monga kusesa komanso kukumba zimbudzi,” anatero m’busa Maliro.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: YODEP Yati Ithandiza Sukulu za Mkombaphala Popewa COVID-19
news: Bungwe la Youth for Development and Productivity (YODEP) lati liyesetsa kuthandiza ana powapatsa zipangizo zodzitetezera ku nthenda ya COVID-19 pomwe atsekulira sukulu.  Mkulu wa bungweli a Joy Mwandama amalankhula izi kwa mfumu yayikulu Mwambo m’boma la Zomba pomwe amapereka zipangizo zodzitetezera ku matendawa komanso wailesi kwa ana msukulu za mkombaphala za mderali. Iwo apempha aphunzitsi kuti aziyika anawa motalikana pomwe akuphunzira ngati mbali imodzi yopewera kufala kwa nthendayi. “Ndife okonzeka kwambiri monga mwaonera kuti tayamba kugawa sopo, mabucket komanso ma wayilesi omwe athandizire maphunziro a alezi momwe angakhalire ndi anawa,” anatero a Mwandama. Katunduyu wagawidwa m’sukulu za mkomba phala za m’mudzi mwa Group Village Headman Mwambo m’boma la Zomba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati ndi Wokhuzidwa Ndi Moto Olusa Omwe Waononga Madera Ena a America
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya moto wolusa omwe wakhudza madera ena mdziko la America. Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa kaamba ka mavuto omwe anthu ku madera ena ku America monga Carlifonia komanso Pantanal akukumana nawo.  Iye wafotokoza za moto olusa womwe waononga maderawa komanso vuto la ng’amba ku madera’wa mavuto omwe iye wati akhudza kwambiri miyoyo ya anthu ambiri ku madera’wa. “Mudziwe kuti ndili nanu pafupi maka kudzera m’mapemphero. Sindikuiwalanso onse omwe akugwira ntchito yothandiza anthu komanso kudzimitsa moto,” watero Papa Francisco. Pa mwambo omwewo Papa Francisco wafotokoza za chimwemwe chake kaamba ka pangano la mtendere lomwe lachitika loweruka lapitali pakati pa dziko la Azerbaijan ndi Armenia ku dera la Nagorno-Karabakh. Iye wati ndi pemphero lake kuti pangano la mtendereli likhala lokhalitsa kuti choncho lithandize anthu ku derali omwe avutika kwa nthawi yaitali. Papa Francisco wati ndi wa chisoni kwambiri chifukwa cha anthu ambiri omwe aphedwa komanso katundu ndi zinthu zosiyana-siyana zomwe zasakazidwa ku derali. Pamenepa iye wapempha mapemphero opempherera anthu ku dera la Nagorno-Karabakh.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bwanamkubwa Alangiza Aphungu Agwiritse Ntchito CDF Moyenera
news: Bwanamkubwa wa boma la Zomba, Dr. Smart Gwedemula walangiza anthu omwe amapatsidwa ntchito zomanga midadada ya sukulu kuti adzimanga zipupa zolimba pofuna kupewa ngozi zogwa mwadzidzi. Dr. Gwedemula amayankhula izi loweruka pa Kanjedza Primary School mdera la Zomba Malosa pomwe amatsekulira mdadada wa kalasi omwe phungu wa kunyumba ya malamulo wa delari Grace Kwelepeta wamanga. Mdadada wa kalasi omwe wamangidwawo Iwo ati kutsekulira kwa mdadada umenewu kuchititsa kuti ana aphunzire m’malo abwino mu nyengo ya mvula ikubwerayi. Pamenepa bwanamkubwayu wapempha Aphungu aku nyumba ya malamulo kuti azigwiritsa ntchito bwino ndalama yopangira chitukuko ya Constituency Development Fund (CDF) m’madera mwawo monga wachitira phungu wa dera la Zomba Malosa-yu. M’awu ake phungu wa kunyumba ya malamulo mdera la Zomba Malosa, Grace Kwelepeta wati adaganiza zomanga mdadada wa kalasi pa sukuluyi pogwiritsa ntchito ndalama za CDF chifukwa mdadada omwe unalipo poyamba unagwa ndi mvula. Polankhulapo mlangizi wa za maphunziro mu zoni ya Nsondole m’boma la Zomba mayi Agatha Ndojime  Kalawa ayamika phunguyu chifukwa chomanga mdadadawu imeneyi ponena kuti ana adziphunzira popanda nkhawa iliyonse mu nyengo ya mvula. Mdadadawu omwe ndi wa kalasi zitatu, wamangidwa ndi ndalama zokwanira pafupifupi 20 million kwacha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mkulu wa Zaumoyo Wafa Kamba Komwa Kachasu Osadya
news: Mkulu owona za umoyo mdera la malombe m’boma la mangochi wafa atamwa mowa wa kachasu osadya kanthu. Wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Amina Tepani Daudi wati mkuluyu ndi Biziweki Chapokosa wa zaka 44 ndipo ndi ochokera m’mudzi wa Mwalimu mdera la mfumu yaikulu Kaluluma m’boma la Kasungu. “Ndi zoonadi malemuyu amagwira ntchito ngati HSA pa chipatala cha Malombe, pa 9 October anachoka ku Malombe kubwera mtauni ya Mangochi komwe anakhalako tsiku lonse ndipo anabwelera kwawo tsiku lotsatira koma anali ataledzera kwambiri,” anatero Daudi. Daudi wati malemuyu anatangofika kwawo anagwa zomwe zinapangitsa kuti anthu amutengere ku chipatala komwe wamwalira akulandira thandizo la mankhwala ndipo malipoti achipatala ati mkuluyu wamwalira kamba koti anali ndi glucose ochepa mthupi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhritsu Akhale Olimba Mtima Podzudzula Zolakwika
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kukhala anthu olimba mtima kudzudzula zinthu zolakwika. Polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana mu Hall ya Papa Paul wa VI, Papa Francisco watsindika kukoma kwa chikhulupiliro chozama komanso kukoma kwa moyo wokonda mapemphero. Iye watchula mneneri Eliya the kuti ndi chitsanzo cha moyo wa mphamvu wa chikhristu. Papa Francisco wati moyo wa mneneri Eliya ndi wochititsa chidwi chifukwa anali munthu yemwe anadalira mapemphero nthawi zonse. Iye wafotokoza kuti mneneriyu anadalira mapemphero pa nthawi yomwe zinthu zinali kuyenda bwino komanso pa nthawi ya mavuto ndipo zimenezi zidamuthandiza kukhala wopambana nthawi zonse maka pa nkhani ya ubale wake ndi Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kutengera chitsanzo chokomachi cha mneneri Eliya pokhala anthu a chikhulupiriro chosatekeseka pa nthawi ya mavuto komanso pa mtendere. Iye wati akhristu akuyenera kudalira mapemphero kuti athe kuima njiii pa moyo wao wa chikhristu. Papa Francisco wati kudzera m’mapemphero mneneri Eliya adakwanitsa kulimba mtima ndi kudzudzula kusowa kwa chilungamo pakati pa anthu mu nthawi yake. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti mapemphero akuyenera kukhala chida cha mkhristu aliyense tsiku ndi tsiku.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chipatala Cha Pilimiti Chalandira Makina Othandizira Anthu Kupuma
news: Chipatala cha Pirimiti chayamikira bungwe la Save the Children kamba ka thandizo la makina othandizira kupuma omwe aperekedwa pa chipatalachi kuti athandizire anthu omwe akudwala nthenda ya Covid 19. Dotolo wa pa chipatalachi a Chifuniro M’gunda ndi omwe anena izi lachiwiri pa mwambo opereka makinawa omwe ali ndi mulingo wa mpweya okwana ma lita asanu omwe agulidwa ndi ndalama zokwana 950,000 kwacha. Iye wati chipatalachi chinalibe kuthekera kopeza makina a mtunduwu, kamba koti padakali pano chipinda chapadera chosungiramo anthu omwe akudwala nthenda ya Covid-19 chomwe bungweli linawamangira chikusoweka zinthu zambiri kuphatikizapo mabedi. “Ndife osangalala kamba ka zinthu zomwe atipangira a Save the Children, chifukwa choti kuthekerako tinalibe ndipo zimenezi zitithandiza kuti tithandize omwe akudwala nthenda ya Covid-19,” anatero a Mgunda. Polankhulapo mlangizi wa ndondomeko ya Resillient Economic Development (RED) ku bungwe la Save the Children a Mcpherson Kapalamula ati ndi chiyembekezo cha bungweli kuti makinawa asamalidwa kuti athandize anthu ozungulira derali. “Pamene timapereka zipangizo zina anatipempha kuti tizawathandize ndi katundu otereyu, nde kudzera mu project ya Save the Children Italy takwanitsa kugula katunduyu,” anatero a Kapalamula.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: GCN Ichita Ziwonetsero Pokwiya Ndi Kusasankhidwa Kwa Amayi M’maudindo a M’boma
news: Mabungwe omenyera ufulu wa amayi motsogodzedwa ndi bungwe la Gender Coordination Network (GCN) komanso anthu okhudzidwa, akonza ziwonetsero mawa lino m’mizinda ikuluikulu ya dziko lino ati kamba kokwiya ndi kusasankhidwa kwa amayi m’maudindo ochuluka m’boma. Amayi kuchita ziwonetsero nthawi ya m’mbuyomu Poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi m’modzi mwa amayi omwe akonza ziwonetserozi, mayi Mphatso Jumbe wati sakukondwanso ndi mawu omwe anayankhula mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera oti sakuwona amayi omwe ali ndi zowayenereza kugwira ntchito m’maudindo akuluakulu m’boma. Jumbe wati mdziko muno muli amayi ambiri omwe ndi ophunzira ndipo atha kugwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana mu nthambi komanso ma board a boma. “Ifeso tikuona ma board omwe sanayikepo mzimayi ndi m’modzi yemwe nde ananena kuti ma board amanewa sanaikepo kamba koti palibe azimayi omwe alibe zowayenereza,” anatero mayi Jumbe. A Jumbe ati sakugwirizana ndi mfundo yomwe ananena president Chakwera ponena kuti mdziko muno muli amayi ambiri ophunzira omwenso atha kukwanitsa kugwira ntchito zomwe abambo akugwira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lati Anthu Aleke Kumanga Nyumba Mphepete Mwa Mitsinje
news: Boma lapempha akuluakulu oyang’anira makhonsolo a mizinda kuti asamalore anthu kumanga nyumba m’mbali mwa mitsinje ndi cholinga choti akumbe ngalande mbali mwa mitsinjeyi pofuna kupewa madzi osefukira Belekanyama: Tiyeni tidzale mitengo Nduna ya maboma ang’ono ndi chitukuko cha madera akumidzi a Lingson Belekanyama ndi omwe anena izi lachitatu pa bwalo la Gymkhana mu mzinda wa Zomba pa mwambo omwe bungwe la OXFAM limayambitsa ntchito yokonza mizinda pokonzekera ngozi zogwa kaamba ka kusintha kwa nyengo yomwe ikutchedwa Building Urban Climate Resilience in South-Eastern Africa. A Belekanyama ati chaka cha 2015 mu mzinda wa Zomba munali madzi otsefukira choncho aganiza zoyambitsa ntchitoyi mu tawuniyi pofuna kuwunikira anthu za mavuto omwe amabwera chifukwa chomanga nyumba mphepete mwa mtsinje. “Cholinga cha ntchito imene takhazikitsa leroyi tikufuna tidzale mitengo yomwe imathandiza kwambiri kubwezeretsa chilengedwe komanso tifuna tikumbe ngalande m’bali mwa mitsinje kuno ku zomba kamba koti madzi asamafike komwe kumakhala anthu,” anatero a Belekanyama. M’mawu ake mkulu wa bungwe la OXFAM kuno ku Malawi, mayi Lingalireni Mihowa ati bungwe lawo layambitsa ntchitoyi mu mzinda wa Zomba powona kuti nyumba za anthu ambiri zinamangidwa pafupi ndi mitsinje komanso ndi mzinda omwe unakhudzidwa kwambiri ndi madzi osefukira. “Zomba inasankhidwa kamba koti ndi town imene anthu ambiri amavutika kamba koti anamanga kwambiri m’bali mwa mitsinje komanso projectyi imafuna mzinda waung’ono,” anatero mayi Mihowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mbava Zaba ku Nyumba kwa Asisiteri ku Parish ya Nsanama
news:
Mbava zina zomwe sizikudziwika zaba ndalama komanso katundu osiyanasiyana ku nyumba kwa asisiteri a chipani cha Canosa ku parish ya Nsanama mu dayosizi ya Mangochi.
Malinga ndi bambo mfumu wa parishyi bambo Mathews Likambale, usiku wathawu akubawa anakwanitsa kulowa mnyumbayi pomwe anamenya ndi chikwanje komanso kumanga ndi zingwe mlonda wa pa malopa.
Iwo ati akubawa anatsekula mu Tebenako momwe anatulutsa ukalistia ndipo aba ndalama zoposa 300 thousand kwacha, laptop komanso lamya za m’manja za asisteriwo.
“Chimene chachitika ndi chonena kuti usiku watha m’ma past 12 kunabwera akuba ndipo analowa kwa asisteri komwe anamumenya mlonda ndi chikwanje ndipo anamumanga ndi zingwe kenaka analowa mnyumbamo momwe anayamba kulowa mzipinda kufunafuna ndalama,” anatero bamboo Likambale.
Iwo ati akubawa anafunsanso za nyumba yomwe amakhala bambo mfumu wa parishiyi kuti apiteko koma asisteriwa anabisa ponena kuti samakhala pa malopo.
Bambo Likambale ati apolisi anayesetsa kufika msanga pa malowo koma anapeza akubawa atapita.
Padakalipano asisteriwa komasno anthu okhala pa parishiyi akukhala mwa mantha kaamba ka zomwe zachitikazi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Anthu aku Mangochi Atayilira pa Nkhani Yopewa COVID-19’
news:
Anthu a m’boma la Mangochi awapempha kuti apitirize kudzitetedza povala ma mask komanso kutsata njira zonse zomwe a zaumoyo akulimbikitsa zopewera kutenga ndi kufalitsira nthenda ya COVID-19.
M’modzi mwa akuluakulu a ku ofesi yowona zoteteza anthu ku matenda m’bomalo, a Stanley Rashid anena izi pofotokozera atolankhani momwe ntchito yolimbana ndi mliri wa COVID-19 ikuyendera m’bomalo.
Iwo ati ofesi ya za umoyo ndi yokhudzidwanso kamba ka malipoti aanthu ena omwe apezekanso ndi nthenda-yi, zomwe zadzidzimutsanso ofesi yawo, kamba koti kwa sabata ziwiri zapitazi panalibe munthu amene anamupeza ndi nthenda-yi m’bomalo. Inde zoonadi mukati muonetsetse anthu ambiri akulekelera maka maka posiya kusamba m’manja, kuvala ma mask komanso kukhala motalikirana,” anatero a Rashid.
Pamenepa iwo ati kutsatira kuyambanso kwa sukulu mdziko muno, ofesi yawo yakonza ndondomeko yabwino yoti ana komanso aphunzitsi akhale otetezeka maka popopera mankhwala m’makalasi a msukulu zonse za bomali.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhritsu Akuyenera Amvetse Bwino za Udindo Wawo mu Mpingo
news: Mkulu wa mu ofesi yowona ntchito za utumiki mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, bambo Innocent Mtapaonga apempha akhristu kuti amvetse udindo wawo mu mpingo. Bambo Mtapaonga anena izi lolemba potsekulira maphunziro a masiku anayi a chibalalitso cha mpingo omwe akuchitikira ku St. Vincent Kaphatika parish mu arkidayosiziyo. Iwo apempha akhristu kuti akhale ozama pa ziphunzitso za mpingo ponena kuti ziwathandiza kuti akhale akazembe enieni ofalitsa Uthenga Wabwino. “Maphunziro omwe tapanga lerowa ndi olimbikitsa akhritsu kuti amvetse bwino za chibalalitso cha mpingo, chibalalitso cha mpingo chimangofunika kuti akhritsu amvetse udindo wawo,” Anatero Mtapaonga. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa anthu omwe anachita nawo maphunzirowa a Emanuel Dzimbiri anathokoza ofesi ya PMS kamba ka maphunzirowa ponena kuti azamitsa moyo wawo wa chikhritsu.w
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Mamembala Atsopano a Bungwe Lowunikira Kaperekedwe ka Makontilakiti ku Vatican
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha president ndi ma membala a bungwe lowunika kaperekedwe ka ma contract ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican lodziwika kuti Commission for Confidential Matters. Papa Francisco wasankha Cardinal Kevin Farrell kukhala President wa bungweli pamene mlembi ndi Archbishop Filippo Iannone. Ma membala ndi Bishop Fernando Vérgez Alzaga, Bishop Nunzio Galantino, ndi Bambo Juan Antonio Guerrero a chipani cha ma Jesuit (Society of Jesus). Malinga ndi likulu la mpingo wa katolika, anthuwa adayamba kugwira ntchito yawo pa 29 September, 2020. Bungweli lizichita kawuniwuni komanso kupereka uphungu pa ma contract osiyana-siyana ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika. Bungweli ndi chimodzi mwa zipatso za ndondomeko zomwe Papa Francisco wakhazikitsa pofuna kubweretsa kusintha pa momwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika ligwilira ntchito zake pa nkhani za chuma kuti zonse zizichitika poyera popewa chinyengo chilichonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Sijo Ayamikira Mgwirizano wa Akhritsu pa Parish ya Mikoke
news: Bambo mfumu wa St. Francis Mikoke parish mu dayosizi ya Dedza, bambo Palathukudi Sijo ayamikira m’gwirizano omwe ulipo pakati pa akhristu mu parishiyo pothandiza atumiki awo. Bambo Sijo alankhula izi lamulungu pomwe akhristu a ku parishiyi amapereka njinga zamoto kwa agulupa a mu parishiyi kuti azigwiritsira ntchito poyendera matchalitchi ang’ono-ang’ono a mu parishiyi. Iwo ayamikiranso wachiwiri kwa mtsogolero wa dziko lino Dr. Saulos Chilima pothandiza ndi ndalama yokwana 500-thousand-kwacha pa ntchitoyi. “Tikukondwelera nkhoswe yathu yomwe ndi St. Francis of Asisi ndiponso tili okondwa kamba koti masomphenya athu akwaniritsidwa pogulira abusa athu njinga zamoto zitatu,” antero bambo Sijo. Polankhulapo mayi Elina Tcheza omwe ndi wachiwiri kwa wapampando owona zochitika mu parishiyi anati ndi okondwa kamba koti masomphenya awo omwe anapanga akwaniritsidwa. Akhristu a parishiyi anakwanitsa kusonkha ndala zokwan 1.9 million kwacha zomwe agulira njinga zamoto zinayi. Njinga zitatu zaperekedwa kwa a catechist atatu a parishiyo ndipo imodzi yaperekedwa kwa kalaliki wa parishiyo kuti adzigwiritsa ntchito.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chibangiri Chothandiza Amayi Kupewa Edzi Chifika Mdziko Muno Chaka cha Mawa
news: Bungwe la SRH Africa Trust-SAT Malawi lati pali chiyembekezo chakuti chibangili chothandiza amayi komanso atsikana kupewa kutenga kachirombo ka HIV chitha kuyamba kupezeka mdziko muno chaka cha mawa. Bamusi: Ndife osangalala Mkulu oyendetsa ntchito zosiyanasiyana za bungweli kuno ku Malawi a Novice Bamusi anena izi lachiwiri ku Lilongwe pomwe amafotokozera atolankhani momwe kafukufuku okhudza nkhaniyi wakhala akuyendera ndipo ati chibangilichi chidzathandiza kwambiri amayi komanso asungwana omwe agwiliridwa kuti asatenge ka chirombo ka HIV. Iwo ati kafukufuku wa chibangilichi, Dapivirine Ring pa chingerezi, adachitika kwa pafupi-fupi zaka ziwiri ndipo adawonetsa kuti chili ndi kuthekera koteteza amayi ku kachirombo ka HIV panthawi yomwe akhala malo amodzi ndi abambo. “Panopa ndife osangalala kamba koti bungwe la padziko lonse lomwe limayan’ganira zakafuku-fuku lavomereza chibangiri chomwe azimayi angavare ngati njira imodzi yodzitetezera ku matenda a HIV kuti chitha kuyamba kugwira ntchito,” anatero a Bamusi. Iwo ati ali ndi chikhulupiliro kuti kuyambira mchaka cha 2021 chibangirichi chitha kudzakhala pa nsika ndipo zimenezi zidzapereka mwayi okwanira kwa amayi kuti adziziteteza mokwanira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Ziyaye Ayamikira Asisiteri a Chipani cha Terezian
news: Arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe ambuye Tarsiziyo Ziyaye ayamikira ntchito zomwe asisitere a chipani cha Teleza Wa Mwana Yesu akugwira m’dziko muno. Ambuye Ziyaye: Mukugwira ntchito yotamandika Ambuye Ziyaye anena izi loweruka pa mwambo omwe asisitere a chipanichi okwana 8 amachita malumbiro awo a mpaka kufa. Iwo ati asisitere a chipani cha Teleza Mwana Yesu akugwira ntchito zotamandika mdziko muno kuphatikizapo kutukula ntchito za maphunziro komanso za umoyo. “Mpingo onse, makolo, ansembe, abrazala komanso asisiteli tili pano kukulimbikitsani kuti mutumikire mpingo ndi mtima wanu onse mosabwerera m’buyo ndipo ndikuthokozeni inu a Terezian sisters amene mukugwira ntchito yotamandika mu mpingo,” anatero Ambuye Ziyaye. Polankhulapo mkulu wa chipani cha Teleza mwana Yesu, Sister Agness Jonasi anayamikira asisteri omwe analumbira ku nthawi zonse pa tsikuli Kamba kochita chisankho chabwino padakalipano pamene pali zambiri zosokoneza mitima ya atsikana. “Ndikuthokoza Mulungu amene watipatsa ma vocations mpaka kuti tsiku la lero azimayi 8 alumbira malumbiro mpaka kufa,” anatero Sister Jonas.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Akuluakulu a Banki Achite Malonda Mwachilungamo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walangiza akuluakulu a bank ina mdziko la Italy kuti akuyenera kuchita bizinesi yawo mwa chilungamo. Lolemba, Papa Francisco wakumana ndi akuluakulu a bank ya mdziko la Italy yobwereketsa ndalama yodziwika kuti Cassa Depositi e Prestiti. Iye wauza akuluakuluwa kuti pochita bizinesi yawo akuyenera kuchita zonse mwachilungamo, motsata malamulo komanso kuti akuyenera kuganizira anthu maka pano pomwe anthu ali m’mavuto aakulu kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus. Papa Francisco wati bank ngati imeneyi ndi yofunika kwambiri chifukwa ndi yothandiza pa chitukuko cha dziko angakhalenso pa chitukuko cha miyoyo ya anthu omwe amabwereka ndalama ku bank’yi. Iye wapempha akuluakuluwa kuti aonetsetse kuti sakungothandiza anthu okhaokhawo koma kuti anthu osiyana-siyana akuyenera kupindulanso kuti nao athe kutukula miyoyo yao. Papa Francisco wati pochita bizinesiyi bank’yi imafuna kupeza phindu koma iye wati ızi zikuyenera kuchitika moganizira anthu. Iye waonjezeranso kuti pogwira ntchito yao akuyenera kupewa m’chitidwe wa ziphuphu womwe Iye wati ndi woipa kwambiri. Banki ya Cassa Depositi e Prestiti idayamba kugwira ntchito zake zaka 170 zapitazo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Udindo Amapereka Ndi Mulungu-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati Mulungu ndi yemwe amapereka ma udindo osiyana-siyana. Polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican, Papa wati Mulungu akuyembekeza zazikulu kuchokera kwa anthu ake. Iye walankhula izi pothilira ndemanga pa mawu omwe anawerengedwa pa tsiku lamulungu la 27 mu nyengo ya pa chaka. Papa Francisco wati Mulungu yemwe ndi wabwino ndipo amakonda anthu ake nthawi zonse akuyembekezera moyo wabwino, moyo wodzadza ndi zipatso zokoma kuchokera kwa munthu aliyense. Koma iye wati m’malo mokondweretsa Mulungu anthu kawirikawiri amachita zinthu zomwe zitsutsana ndi Mulungu. Papa Francisco wachenjeza kuti zotsatira zake pogalukira Mulungu ndi chilango. Iye wamaliza ndi kuchenjeza anthu omwe ali m’ma udindo osiyana-siyana kuti azikumbukira kuti mphamvu zao ndi zobwerekera ndipo kuti akuyenera kuchita zokhazo zomwe Mulungu afuna. Papa’yu wati kawiri-kawiri pamene anthu all m’ma udindo amaiwala kuchita zomwe Mulungu afuna ndi kuyamba kuchita zomwe iwowo afuna. Iye wati utsogoleri ukuyenera kutumikira zosowa za anthu nthawi zonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Awiri Omwe Sakudziwika Afa pa Ngozi M’boma la Mangochi
news: Anthu awiri afa pa ngozi yomwe yachitika mu nsewu wa Bakili Muluzi Highway m’boma la Mangochi. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi, ngoziyi yachitika pa malo ena omwetsera mafuta omwe ali pa M’baluku ndipo yakhudza galimoto ya mtundu wa ambulance komanso njinga ya kapalasa. Watsimikiza za ngoziyo – Daudi Galimoto yomwe nambala yake ndi MG 529 AK yomwe ndi ya mtundu wa ambulance yomwe imayendetsedwa ndi a Felix Phiri imachokera ku Namwera kupita ku boma la Mangochi ndipo itafika pa filling station yi inaphonya nsewu ndi kukawomba munthu wina yemwe amapalasa njinga yemwenso ananyamula mzake pa kaliyala. Kutsatira izi awiri onsewa anavulala kwambiri m’mutu ndi kuthyoka mikono yakumanzere ndipo anatsimikizika kuti amwalira atafika nawo ku chipatala cha boma la Mangochi. Sub Inspector Daudi wati anthu awiri omwe afa pangoziyi omwe akuganiziridwa kuti ndi a zaka za pakati pa 40 ndi 45, achibale awo sanapezekebe. Padakalipano matupi a anthu awiriwa akusungidwa ku nyumba ya chisoni ya chipatala chachikulu cha bomalo ndipo apolisi apempha kuti ngati pali anthu ena omwe akusowa mdera lawo adziwitse polisi yomwe ali nayo pafupi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PMS Yalimbikitsa Ana mu Mpingo Kutenga Mbali pa Mkumano Wawo Wapa Intaneti
news: Mkulu wa mu ofesi yowona za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa, bambo Vincent Mwakhwawa apempha makolo kuti alimbikitse ana awo kuti adzatenge nawo mbali pa mkumano wapa intaneti wa anawa ndi mkulu wa nthambi ya utumiki wa ana pa dziko lonse. Mwakhwawa: Ana akonzekere bwino msonkhanowu Bambo Mwakhwawa amalankhula izi pambuyo pa maphunziro apa intaneti omwe ofesiyi inakonzera anawa ngati mbali imodzi yokonzekerera tsikuli. Mwazina iwo apempha ana onse omwe amamva komanso kulankhula chingerezi kuti adzakhale m’madera omwe amakhala pogwiritsa ntchito ma phone awo kuti adzachite nawo mkumanowu. Mkumanowu udzachitika pa 11 October lomwe ndi lamulungu likudzali. Polankhulapo m’modzi mwa ana omwe anachita nawo maphunziro okonzekera mkumanowu Tatiana Phiri ochokera ku Koche Parish mu dayosizi ya Mangochi wayamikira ofesi ya PMS kaamba ka maphunzirowa ponena kuti awathandiza kukonzekera bwino msonkhano waukuluwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alimbikitsa Akhristu Akonde Kupemphera Kolona
news: Bungwe lomwe limalimbikitsa mapemphero a kolona mdziko muno lapempha akhristu kuti adzipereke pa mapemphero a kolona mu mwezi uno omwe mpingo unasankha kuti ukhale wopemphera kolona. Kolona Mkulu wa bungweli mdziko muno a Graciano Mukunuwa anena izi lamulungu ku parish ya Thunga mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre. Mwazina iwo ati kolona ndi ofunika kwambiri ndipo ndi koyenera kuti akhristu azilimbikitsana kupemphera kolonayi. Iwo ati ngakhale dziko lino lili mu nyengo yovuta ya COVID-19, akhristu alemekeze koposa mapemphero ndipo ati kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria, Mulungu achitira chifundo dziko lonse lapansi ndi kuthetsa mliriwu. Pamenepa a Mukunuwa apempha mabungwe a kolona yoyera kudzera mu upangiri wa atumiki wawo ku tchalitchi kuti agawane magulu opemphera kolonayu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Aphungu a DPP Asankha Nankhumwa Kukhala Mtsogoleri Wawo ku Nyumba ya Malamulo
news: Aphungu a chipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) asankha a Kondwani Nankhumwa kukhala mtsogoleri wawo mu nyumba ya malamulo. Nankhumwa: Kufuna kwa aphungu kwachitika Chisankhochi chachitika kutsatira kukanidwa kwa a Francis Kasaila pa udindowu dzulo pamene mtsogoleri wa chipanichi Peter Mutharika analembera kalata speaker wa nyumbayi kuti alengeze kuti a Kasaila ndi omwe akhale mtsogoleri wa otsutsa boma mnyumbayo. Pa chisankhochi chomwe chachitikira ku nyumba ya malamulo, anatsogolera ndi mlembi wamkulu wa chipanichi mayi Grezelder Jeffrey. Pa chisankhochi, a Nankhumwa apeza mavoti 38, a Francis Kasaila anapeza mavoti anayi ndipo a Bright Msaka anapeza voti imodzi. Polankhula pambuyo pa chisankhochi a Nankhumwa ati awulandira udindowu ndi manja awiri ndipo ati ndi okondwa kuti kufuna kwa aphungu a chipanichi kwachitika. Pamenepa iwo ati adikira tsiku lomwe mlembi wa chipani chawo alembere kalata speaker wa nyumba ya malamulo kumudziwitsa za nkhaniyi kutinso alengeze mu nyumbayi. Zimenezi zikutanthauza kuti a Nankhumwa apitilirabe kukhala mtsogoleri wa zipani zotsutsa boma mnyumba ya malamulo ya dziko lino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Dowa Apempha Mafumu Alowelerepo pa Kuchuluka kwa Milandu Yophana
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa apempha mafumu kuti apeze njira zabwino zothetsera milandu ya kupha yomwe yakula kwambiri m’bomalo. M’bumpha: Milandu yophana ikuchulukira Kutsatira kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha milanduyi, apolisiwa lachitatu anakumana ndi mafumu a m’dera la mfumu yayikulu Mkukula ndi cholinga chofuna kukambirana m’mene angathesere m’chitidwe ophana, mimba za atsikana achichepere, maukwati a ana ndi zina zambiri. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha, m’dera la mfumu yayikulu Mkukula ndi komwe kwapezeka milanduyi yochuluka kuyerekeza ndi madera ena m’bomalo. Polankhulapo Senior Group Village Headman Mkukula ya m’derali yati mkumanowu watsekula m’maso mafumuwa ndipo alonjeza kuti agwira ntchito ndi apolisi kuti mchitidwewu utheretu mderalo. Lipoti lomwe komiti ya apolisi yatulutsa zasonyeza kuti boma la Dowa lalandira milandu yophana isanu ndi itatu mu miyezi ya January mpaka August chaka chino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walemba Kalata Yokondwelera Moyo wa Jerome Woyera
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walemba kalata yatsopano yokondwelera moyo wa Jerome Woyera. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, lachitatu likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse lalengeza kuti Papa Francisco walemba kalata (Apostolic Letter) yokondwelera kuti patha zaka 1600 chimwalilireni Jerome Woyera. Jerome Woyera Kalatayi yodziwika m’chilatini kuti Scripturae Sacrae Affectus kapena kuti Devotion to Sacred Scripture yatuluka pa 30 September tsiku lomwe mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse umachita chaka cha Jerome Woyera. Papa Francisco wafotokoza m’kalata’yi kuti Jerome Woyera adayika chidwi chake pa Mawu a Mulungu ndipo adafunitsitsa kuti anthu ena nawonso akhale ndi chidwi chowerenga ndi kumvetsetsa mawu a Mulungu. Iye wati Jerome Woyera ndi wodziwika chifukwa cha ukadaulo wake potanthawuzira mawu a Mulungu komanso khama lake kuti mawu a Mulungu afikire anthu onse. Papa Francisco wayamikira Jerome Woyera kuti ngakhale adali wozama potanthauzira mawu a Mulungu maka chifukwa cha chikondi chake pa Mulungu, adachita izi mogwirizana ndi zosiyiranasiyirana za mpingo (tradition). Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti Jerome Woyera akhale chitsanzo cha akhristu maka pokonda kuwerenga Baibulo. Jerome Woyera adadziwika kwambiri chifukwa chotanthauzira Baibulo kuti likhale mchiyankhulo cha chi Latin ndipo Baibulo la chi Latin’li limadziwika kuti Vulgate. Msonkhano wa ku Trent 1545–1563 ndi umene udavomereza kuti Vulgate ndi Baibulo lovomerezeka mu Mpingo wa Katolika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nyumba ya Malamulo Yakana Kasaila
news: Nyumba ya malamulo yakana kuvomereza a Francis Kasaila kukhala mtsogoleri wa mbali yotsutsa boma kutsatira kalata yomwe mtsogoleri wachipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) Peter Mutharika analembera speaker wa nyumba ya malamulo kuti nyumbayi ilengeze za udindowu. Aphungu amukana-Kasaila A Kasaila amayembekezeka kulowa m’malo mwa a Kondwani Nankhumwa omwe akhala ali pa udindowu kuchokera pomwe chipani cha DPP chidagonja pa chisankho cha mtsogoleri wadziko pa 23 June chaka chino. Wachiwiri kwa speaker wa nyumba ya malamulo Madalitso Kazombo analengeza za kusinthaku koma phungu wina wa chipani cha DPP anadzuka ndi kutsutsana ndi ganizoli ponena kuti ndondomeko za masankhidwe a maudindo m’nyumbayi zimapatsa mphamvu aphungu a chipani m’nyumbayi kusankha maudindowa osati president wa chipani yemwenso si phungu wa nyumba ya malamulo. Pakadali pano, a Nankhumwa akhalabe mtsogoleri wa mbali yotsutsa boma m’nyumbayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CAMA Ikufuna Ndondomeko ya Zipangizo za Ulimi Zotsika Mtengo Ithe
news: Bungwe lomwe limawona za ufulu wa anthu ogula mdziko muno la Consumers Association of Malawi (CAMA) lati likadakonda boma litasiya ndondomeko ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo ponena kuti siyikupinduliira anthu. Kapito: Ndondomekoyi siyinapindulire anthu Mkulu wa bungweli a John Kapito ndi omwe anena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi ndipo ati ngakhale anthu akugula zipangizo zotsika mtengozi koma m’makomo mwawo mukupitilira kukhala njala. Iwo padakalipano alimi aang’ono adakadalirabe ulimi wa khasu omwe ndi osapindulitsa kwenikweni. “Kwa zaka 15 zapitazi ndondomekoyi siyinapindulire aliyense. Anthuwo padakalipano ali pa njala yowopsa kwambiri,” anatero a Kapito. Pamenepa iwo ati ndi bwino kuti ndalama zomwe zimayikidwa ku ndondomekoyi zidzipita ku magawo ena omwe amathandiza kuti chuma chikwere monga zokopa alendo ndi zina zomwenso akuti zingathandizire kulemba ntchito anthu ochuluka. “Ndalama kapena zipangizo ziperekedwe ku nthambi ngati za ILLOVO kapena ADMARC omwe ali ndi kuthekera kolima ndi kukolora zochuluka zomwe boma litha kugulitsa pa mtengo wotsika komanso kwa chaka chonse,” anatero a Kapito.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lati Limanga Makolo Otuma Ana Kukapemphetsa M’misewu
news: Boma lachenjeza kuti lithana ndi makolo onse omwe amatuma ana awo kumakapemphetsa m’misewu ya m’mizinda ya dziko lino. Kaliati: Ku Blantyre tapanga kale Nduna yowona kuti pasakhale kusiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo, chisamaliro cha anthu komanso chitukuko cha m’madera mayi Patricia Kaliati anena izi pomwe amalankhulapo pa momwe ntchito yosamutsa ana opempa-pempha m’misewu ya m’dziko muno ikuyendera. Iwo ati akufuna kuti mwana aliyense akhale ndi nthawi yopita ku sukulu kuti adzakhale nzika zodalirika osati kumapezeka akupempha-pempha m’misewuyi ndipo makolo omwe akukolezera izi adzalandira chilango chokhwima akapezeka. “Ku Blantyre tapanga kale ndipo pano tikuyamba ku Lilongwe kenako tiwona ku Mzuzu ndi madera ena. Ana aja atachotsedwa kupita ku polisi makolo anapita kukatenga ana awo kusonyeza kuti ana onse omwe amayenda mu nsewu makolo awo ali nawo. Makolo onse omwe akulora ana awo kumapita ku nsewu kuti tiwamanga iwowo,” anatero mayi Kaliati. Pamenepa iwo ati ntchito yosamutsa anawa ikuyenda bwino ndipo posachedwa akhala akufikanso ku madela ena omwe atsalira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walengeza Mutu wa Tsiku Lofalitsa Mauthenga wa Chaka cha Mawa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walengeza mutu wa tsiku loganizira njira zofalitsira ma uthenga mu mpingowu chaka cha mawa. Tsikuli limadziwika mchingerezi kuti World Day of Social Communications. Padakalipano zadziwika kuti mutu wa tsikuli chaka chikubwerachi ndi woti “Bwerani Mudzaone” (Come and See) omwe ndi mawu a Phillipo mpositoli opezeka mu Uthenga Wabwino monga adalembera Yohane mutu 1 ndime 46. Malinga ndi malipoti, Papa’yu wasankha mutuwu pozindikira kuti kufalitsa ma uthenga kumasowa kulumikizana ndi anthu kuti anthu omwe akusoweka kumva uthengawo awumve bwinobwino. Papa Francisco wati malinga ndi mliri wa Coronavirus womwe wachititsa kuti anthu asiye kukhala m’magulu njira yabwino yoti anthu nkulumikizana bwino pa nthawiyi ndikudzera mu ma uthenga osiyana-siyana kudzera mu njira za makono zofalitsira ma uthenga. Papa Paulo wa 6 ndi yemwe adakhazikitsa tsikuli m’chaka cha 1967 ndi cholinga chofuna kuti Mpingo uziganizira njira za makono zofalitsira uthenga wa chipulumutso monga kalata yotchedwa Gaudium et Spes ya Vatican Council II inenera za Mpingo mu nyengo ya makono (the Church in the modern world).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mpingo wa Katolika Wati Upitilira Kudzudzula Anthu Ophwanya Malamulo a Mulungu
news: Mpingo wa katolika watsindika kuti upitilira kudzudzula mchitidwe ophwanya malamulo a Mulungu kudzera mu dzina la ufulu wa anthu. Msusa: Sititopa kulimbana ndi malamulo osakomera Mulungu Archbishop wa archdiocese ya Blantyre yemwenso ndi wapampando wa bungwe la maepisikopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) Ambuye Thomas Luke Msusa ati mpingo wa katolika umatenga chiphunzitso chake chonse mu Buku Loyera choncho upitilira kutsutsa ziphunzitso za chikunja zomwe ena akulimbikitsa chifukwa chofuna kusangalatsa anthu akumaiko a kunja. Iwo amayankhula izi kwa Bvumbwe m’boma la Thyolo pa nsembe ya Misa yotsanzikana ndi malemu Sister Margarita Kamangira a chipani cha asisitere cha Daughters of Wisdom omwe anamwalira lamulungu lapitali pa 27 September atadwala nthenda ya kuthamanga kwa magazi. Poyankhulanso, mkulu wa chipani cha Daughters of Wisdom mdziko muno Sister Mary Chimalizeni ati imfa ya malemu Sister Kamangira ikhudza kwambiri chipani chawo kaamba ka kudzipereka kwawo ku mpingo ndi moyo wa chipani. Malemu Sister Margarita Kamangira anali mphunzitsi wa sukulu ya secondary, anabadwa pa 4 October 1963 m’mudzi mwa Mkotamu mfumu yayikulu Malemia m’boma la Nsanje.
