Mu utumiki wawo atumikira ku malo osiyanasiyana kuphatikiza ku Nguludi, Lunzu, Montfort Formation House ku Zomba ndipo amwalira akugwira ntchito ngati mphunzitsi wamkulu pa Sukulu ya sekondale ya Luntha kwa Sitima m’boma la Zomba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: DPP Yadzudzula Boma Pochulutsa Ndalama Zobwereka
news: Chipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) chadzudzula boma kamba kokweza mlingo wa ndalama zomwe libweleke mu ndondomeko ya za chuma ya 2020 mpaka 2021. Mwanamvekha: Ngongole yachuluka Popereka ndondomekoyi ku nyumba ya malamulo pa 11 September 2020, nduna ya za chuma a Felix Mlusu adati boma libwereka ndalama zokwana 754.8 billion-kwacha pofuna kukwaniritsa ndondomekoyi. Koma polankhula lolemba kunyumba ya malamulo, mneneri wa chipani cha DPP pa nkhani za chuma a Joseph Mwanamvekha anati izi ndi zowopsa ku dziko ponena kuti zidzayika m’mavuto m’badwo ukubwerawo kamba koti ndi omwe udzabweze ngongoleyi. Apa a Mwanamvekha omwenso adakhalapo nduna ya za chuma mu ulamuliro wa chipani cha DPP alangiza boma kuti lichepetse ngongolezi pochepetsanso zina mwa zomwe lati lichita mu ndondomekoyi. Komabe a Mwanamvekha ati boma la Tonse Alliance lalephera kukwaniritsa zomwe lidalonjeza a Malawi kuti lidzachita ponena kuti zambiri mwa zomwe zinayenera kuti zikhalemo mu ndondomekoyi, boma silidayikemo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘ADMARC Iwonjezeredwe Ndalama Zogulira Chimanga’
news: Komiti ya kunyumba ya malamulo yowona za malimidwe komanso chilengedwe yati kupereka ndalama zokwanira ku bungwe la ADMARC kungathandize kuchepetsa mavuto a njala omwe amadza kamba ka kusowa kapena kukwera mtengo kwa chimanga. Chilenga: Ndalama zachepa M’modzi mwa apampando a komitiyi a Welani Chilenga ati bungweli litha kukhala lokonzeka kugula chimanga chambiri chomwe chingadzathandize anthu mu nthawi ya mavuto a njala. Mu ndondomeko ya za chuma ya 2020 mpaka 2021, bungwe la ADMARC lapatsidwa ndalama zokwana 10 billion-kwacha zoti ligulire chimanga mu nyengo ya zokolora ikudzayi. Apa a Chilenga  ati ndalamazi ziwonjezeredwe kufika pa 20 billion kwacha kuti bungweli lithe kugula chimanga chokwanira kuti ma venda asakhale ndi mwayi owabera alimi. Iwo atinso bungwe la National Food Reserve Agency (NFRA) silikuyenera kugula nawo chimangachi kamba koti silimafikira ku madera a kumidzi poyerekeza ndi bungwe la ADMARC.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamikira Apolisi aku Vatican
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wayamikira ntchito yabwino yomwe apolisi amagwira ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika.  Polankhula kwa apolisi omwe amapereka chitetezo ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican, Papa Francisko wati ndi wokhutira ndi ntchito yomwe apolisi a mdziko la Italy amagwira yopereka chitetezo ku likulu la mpingo yomwe iye wati amayigwira mwa ukadaulo. Iye wati ntchito yomwe apolisiwa amagwira siyophweka poganizira kuti likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican limalandira alendo tsiku ndi tsiku omwe amachokera mayiko osiyanasiyana. Papa Francisko wati ndiwokhutira ndipo woyamika pa ntchito yomwe a apolisiwa amagwira. Pomaliza Papa Francisko wafunira mafuno abwino apolisiwa pamodzi ndi mabanja awo. Apolisiwa mwa zina amapereka chitetezo ku likulu la mpingo komanso kuperekeza Papa Francisko akamanyamuka ku Rome kupita maiko a kunja. Chaka chino papita zaka 75 apolisi a dziko la Italy akuthandiza kupereka chitetezo ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ku Vatican malinga ndi mgwirizano womwe dziko la Italy lidachita ndi likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika (Vatican).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Munthu Aliyense Ndi Okongola-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati munthu aliyense ndi okongola pa maso pa Mulungu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lolemba ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican kwa gulu la makolo omwe ali ndi ana obadwa ndi ulumali wa mu ubongo. Papa Francisko: Tikuyenera kumuthokoza Mulungu Iye wati Mulungu amakonda munthu aliyense monga m’mene munthuyo aliri kotero ndi kofunika kumathokoza Mulungu nthawi zonse. Makolo ndi anawa omwe ndi a m’dziko la Austria anaperekezedwa ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican ndi akuluakulu ena a m’dziko la Austria. “Polenga dziko la pansi Mulungu analenganso maluwa a mitundu yosiyanasiyana ndipo mtundu wa maluwa uliwonse ndi wokongola mwa njira ya padera. Chimodzimodzi anthufe aliyense ngokongola pa maso pa Mulungu mwa njira ya padera ndipo tikuyenera kumamuthokoza Mulungu,” walankhula motero Papa Francisco. Iye wauza anawa kuti azipempherera makolo awo, agogo awo komanso azimupempherera iye kuti athe kutsogolera bwino Mpingo. Pa mwambowo Papa Francisco wathokoza makolo ndi anthu onse omwe akusamalira anawa chifukwa cha ntchito yotamandika yomwe iye wati sakungochitira ana okhawa komanso Yesu Khristu yemwe adanena kuti chilichonse chomwe muchitira m’modzi mwa abale angawa mwachitiranso ine ndemwe. Anawa omwe amabadwa ndi vuto la mu ubongo – autism – amasamalidwa ku malo ena otchedwa Ambulatorium Sonnenschein kapena kuti Sunshine Outpatient Clinic m’dziko la Austria. Malowa adayamba kugwira ntchito m’chaka cha 1995 ndipo kufikira lero athandiza ana oposa 7000 omwe amabadwa ndi vuto la autism lomwe limachititsa mwa zina kuti azivutika polankhula. Aka sikoyamba kuti Papa Francisco akumane ndi ana a vuto lotere. M’chaka cha 2014 adakumananso ndi ana a vutoli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ADMARC Yasayinirana Mgwirizano Ndi Bungwe la FUM
news: Bungwe logula ndi kugulitsa mbewu ndi zipangizo za ulimi mdziko muno la Agricultural Development and Marketing Corporation (ADMARC), lasayinirana mgwirizano ndi bungwe la alimi la Farmers Union of Malawi pofuna kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za ulimi mdziko muno. Jumbe: Tiyamba kugwira ntchito limodzi Polankhula pa mwambo wosayinirana mgwirizanowu lolemba mu mzinda wa Lilongwe, mkulu wa bungwe la ADMARC a Felix Jumbe, ati mgwirizanowu uthandiza kuti alimi apeze misika yopindulitsa. Iwo atinso bungweli likhala ndi mndandanda wa alimi komanso kachulukidwe ka mbewu zomwe adzagulitse ku msika wawo. “Kusintha komwe kungakhalepo chifukwa cha kusainira mgwirizano ndi a Farmers Union of Malawi, ndi kwakuti tiyamba kugwira ntchito limodzi ndipo atithandiza kuti tizitha kupangiratu budget potiuziratu mbewu zomwe alimi angalime,” anatero a Jumbe. Poyankhulapo mkulu wa bungwe la Famers Union of Malawi a Jacob Nyirongo, ati ali ndi chiyembekezo kuti alimi ang’ono-ang’ono apindula koposa ndi mgwirizanowu. “Kusintha kweni kweni komwe tikufuna tione ndi m’mene alimi ang’ono ang’ono amapezera misika muno m’Malawi ndipo tikukhulupirira kuti boma likapereka ndalama zokwanira ku ADMARC alimi savutika kugulitsa mbewu zawo,” anatero a Nyirongo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sheikh Abasi Walangiza Mafumu Apewe Tsankho
news: Wachiwiri kwa mlangizi wa president wa dziko lino pa nkhani za chipembedzo Sheikh Hashimu Abasi wapempha mafumu kuti apewe mchitidwe wa tsankho pofuna kuti azigwilira ntchito limodzi. Sheikh Abas amalankhula izi m’mudzi wa Buleya mdera la Sub T/A Chimbalanga m’boma la Zomba pomwe amakondwelera pamodzi ndi mafumuwa kusankhidwa kwawo pa udindowu. Iwo apempha mafumuwa kuti apewe mchitidwe osankhana pa ndale chipembedzo kapena mtundu potengera chitsanzo cha president wa dziko lino yemwe akuti amatsogoza Mulungu nthawi zonse. “Zimene ayankhula mafumu apa, choyambilira ndiwathokoze a president pondisankha pa udindo umenewu ndigwira ntchito limodzi ndi mafumu komanso ma MP,” anatero Sheikh Abasi. Polankhulapo Sub T/A Chimbalanga yati ndi yokondwa ndi kusankhidwa kwa Sheikh Abasi omwe ndi mwana ochokera m’mudzi wawo ndipo apempha president Chakwera kuti athandize anthu a derali ndi chakudya kaamba koti akuvutika ndi njala. “Monga ndafotokozera paja kuti tamuyitana mwana wathu Abasi kuzamuthokoza kamba koti wasankhidwa kukhala mlangizi wa a president ndipo chinanso tikufuna atithandize kutinenera kwa apresident kuti atithandize chitukuko kuno,” anatero Sub T/A Chimbalanga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mzika yaku DRC Yanjatidwa Kamba Kogwililira
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa amanga mzika ina ya mdziko la Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) kaamba komuganizira kuti wagwililira mayi wa zaka 27 zakubadwa. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyo-M’bumpha Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub-Inspector Gladson M’bumpha izi zachitika masana a lolemba ku malo osungira anthu othawa kwawo a Dzaleka ndipo mamunayu Abubaka Sidiki wa zaka 30 anathyola nyumba ya mayiyu ndi kumugwirira pomwe amagona ku chipinda kwake. M’bumpha wati mayiyu amachokeranso m’dziko la DRC ndipo mamuna wake akukhala ku South Africa pamene mamunayu yemwe ndi wosakwatira amakhala moyandikana ndi nyumba ya mayiyu. “Ndingathedi kutsimikiza kuti apolisi kuno ku Dowa tamanga mzika ina ya mdziko la Congo pomuganizira kuti anagwililira mayi wina wa mdziko la Congo lomwelo ku malo osungira anthu othawa kwawo ku Dzaleka,” anatero M’bumpha. Iwo ati bamboyu akusungidwa mchitolokosi poyembekezera kuti akayankhe mlandu wake wogwililira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mpingo Ukuyenera Kuyitanira Anthu ku Chipulumutso
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi udindo wa mpingo kuyitanira anthu ku chipulumutso. Polankhula lamulungu kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican, Papa wati mpingo uli ndi udindo wofunafuna ndi kuyitanira anthu ku chipulumutso. Iye walankhula izi pothilira ndemanga pa Uthenga Wabwino wa pa tsiku laMulungu la 25 mu nyengo ya pa chaka (the 25th Sunday in Ordinary Time). Papa Francisco wati mwini munda mu Uthenga Wabwino wa pa tsikuli ndi Mulungu amene satopa kuyitanira anthu mu ufumu wake. Ndipo iye wapitilira kunena kuti monga Mulungu achitira, mpingo ukuyenera kuchita chimodzimodzi kunka kuyitanira anthu mu ufumu wa Mulungu. Iye wati Mpingo ukuyenera kupereka chiyembekezo kwa omwe ataya chiyembekezo ndipo sawona chabwino chilichonse m’moyo uno. Mpingo ukuyenera kupita kwa awo omwe ataya chikhulupiriro ndi kuyesa kucheza nao kuti nawonso abwerere kwa Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati pochita izi Mpingo ukungochita zomwe Mulungu achita nthawi zonse poitana anthu kuti alandire chipulumutso monga mwini munda uja mu Uthenga Wabwino. Iye wati Mpingo wopanda chidwi ndi anthu ake, Mpingo wosayendera anthu ake, Mpingo umene sufunafuna anthu ake ndi Mpingo wakufa. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti chilungamo cha Mulungu sichilungamo cha anthufe. Iye wati polipira anthu ake pakutha pa moyo uno Mulungu sadzayang’anira kutalika kapena kufupika kwa nthawi yomwe munthu anakhala mkhristu koma m’mene adadziperekera potumikira ngati mkhristu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mafumu Ena ku Zomba Achita Ziwonetsero Posakondwa ndi Utsogoleri wa Gulupu Jali
news: Mafumu a mdera la mfumu yayikulu Mwambo m’boma la Zomba lero achita ziwonetsero zofuna kukakamiza bwanamkubwa wa bomalo kuti achotse ufumu Group Village Headman Jali ati kamba ka mchitidwe wa katangale. Mafumu kuchita ziwonetsero zawo ku Zomba Poyankhula moyimilira mafumu-wa nyakwawa George Masangano yati Gulupu Jali ikukhudzidwa ndi kusowa kwa chigayo cha ana amasiye chomwe bungwe lina lidapereka, galimoto ya Jali Water Users Association komanso kulandira ziphuphu. Nyakwawa Masangano yati Gulupu Jali akumamapondereza zitukuko za madera a mafumu omwe ali pansi pawo. “Chifukwa cha makhalidwe a agulupu athu amene ndi osakhala a utsogoleri, tikuyenda kudzasiya kalata kwa a DC kuti atithandize monga ku likulu kwathu kuti amenewa achoke paudindo,” anatero Village Headman Masangano. Poyankhula atalandira chikalata cha madandaulo kuchokera kwa mafumuwo, bwanamkubwa wa boma la Zomba Dr. Smart Gwedemula walonjeza kuti afufuza zonse zomwe mafumuwo adandaula. “Ndalandira madandaulo awo aja, ndiye ngati ofesi tiyenera kuti tifufuze tisanapange chiganizo. Chifukwa zomwe alemba umu akungowaganizira ndiye tiwayitana a gulupuwo kuti timvenso mbali yawo,” anatero Dr. Gwedemula. Bwanamkubwayu wati nkhaniyi ayisiya m’manja mwa komiti ya mafumu a m’boma la Zomba kuti ayiwunikire.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CDEDI Yati Chakwera Ayambe Kukwaniritsa Malonjezo Ake
news: Bungwe lomwe limamenyera ma ufulu a anthu pa ulamuliro wabwino pa chuma ndi chitukuko la Centre for Democracy and Economic Development Initiatives (CDEDI), lapempha mtsogoleri wa dziko lino kuti ayambe kukwaniritsa malonjezo omwe analonjeza pa misonkhano yokopa anthu. Namiwa: Awonetseratu kuti ndi osasunga pangano Mkulu wa bungweli a Sylvester Namiwa amalankhula izi lolemba pa msonkhano wa atolankhani mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iye wati mtsogoleri wa dziko lino ndi wachiwiri wake analonjeza a Malawi zochuluka zomwe zinakomera anthu kuwaika pa mpando ndipo akuyenera kuti azikwaniritse. “Sitingalore kuti a President azipanga zomwe akufuna m’mene amatilonjeza amapanga mgwirizano ndi ife. A president ndi wachiwiri wawo awonetseratu kuti ndi anthu osasunga pangano,” anatero a Namiwa. Iwo ati akufunitsitsa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino ndi wachiwiri wake abwere poyera ndi kufotokozera mzika za dziko lino tsiku lomwe fetereza wotsika mtengo, ntchito 1 million komanso ndalama zoperekedwa kwa anthu achikulire ziyambe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Balaka Adandaula Ndi Mchitidwe Wopha Anthu Olakwira Lamulo
news: Apolisi m’boma la Balaka adandaula ndi mchitidwe wopha anthu omwe alakwira lamulo omwe ukumachitika m’bomali. Mneneri wa polisi ya Balaka, Inspector Felix Misomali wati anthuwa akagwira munthu m’malo momutengera ku polisi akumalanga okha zomwe ndi kuphwanya malamulo a dziko lino. Iwo alankhula izi kutsatira kuphedwa kwa mkulu wina yemwe akuti anthuwa amamuganizira kuti waba nkhuku khumi (10). “Tikudzudzula mchitidwe wa anthu ena omwe akumatengera lamulo kumanja akagwira munthu yemwe akumuganizira kuti wapalamula mlandu, kuchita zimenezi ndi mlandu waukulu,” anatero Inspector Misomali. Pamenepa iwo achenjeza kuti aliyense wopezeka akutengera lamulo m’manja mwake adzamangidwa ndi kukayimbidwa mlandu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Wonetsani Chikondi Kwa Ansembe Okalamba, Odwala-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wayamikira ma episkopi a ku dera la Lombardy mdziko la Italy. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayamikira ma episkopi’wa kaamba kokonza mapemphero opemphelera ansembe okalamba komanso omwe akudwala. Kwa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi (6) ma episkopi a kpingo wa Katolika ku dera la Lombardy mdziko la Italy akhala akukonza mapemphero opemphelera ansembe okalamba ndi odwala. Papa Francisco wati ndi wokondwa komanso woyamika kaamba ka chilinganizo cha mapemphero chomwe ma episkopi a mpingo’wu ku dera la Lombardy mdziko la Italy akhala akukonza chaka ndi chaka odziwika kuti Day of Prayer and Fraternity for elderly and sick priests. Kwa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi tsopano iwo akhala akukonza mapemphero opempherera ansembe omwe ndi okalamba komanso omwe akudwala. Zimenezi ndi zinthu zabwino ndipo zokoma kwambiri maka chikondi chomwe mukuonetsa kwa ansembe anzanu omwe ndi okalamba komanso odwala, watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawu. Iye wayamikiranso ansembe omwe ndi okalamba komanso odwala chifukwa choyetsetsa kuchita nao mapempherowa omwe amachitikira ku malo ena oyera ku dera lomwelo la Lombardy otchedwa kuti Sanctuary of Our Lady of Caravaggio. Iye wati ndi chinthu cha pamwamba kuti ansembe omwe ndi okalamba komanso odwala anali ndi ansembe anzao pochita limodzi mapempherowa. Papa Francisco wamaliza uthenga wake poyikiza ansembe onse okalamba ndi odwala m’manja mwa Amayi Maria komanso kuti mizimu ya ansembe onse omwe amwalira kaamba ka nthenda ya Covid 19 iwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PMS Yalimbikitsa Ogwira Ntchito M’madayosizi
news: Ofesi yowona ntchito za mabungwe a utumiki wa apapa m’dziko muno ya Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS), yalimbikitsa ogwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana m’madayosizi a mpingowu mdziko muno kuti adzidzipereka pa ntchito zawo. Mkulu wa ku ofesiyi bambo Vincent Mwakhwawa anena izi lachisanu pa mkumano wa ogwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, womwe anawuchita ndi cholinga chofuna kuwafotokozera za udindo umene ali nawo pofalitsa mthenga wabwino pomwe akutumikira mu mpingowu m’magawo osiyanasiyana. Mwazina bambo Mwakhwawa anati ogwira ntchito-wa, akuyenera kumalumikizana bwino komaso kumathandizira ofesi yawo ya PMS ndi cholinga choti ntchito zofalitsa uthenga wabwino zipitilire kuyenda bwino. “Msonkhanowu unakonzedwa kuti ogwira ntchito kuno amvetse bwino kuti ali mbali iti pothandiza mpingo maka mu nyengo ino ya chibalalitso,” anatero bamboMwakhwawa. Polankhulannso moyimilira ogwira ntchito mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, Innocent Nyanga anati mkumanowo unali wa phindu pakati pawo chifukwa adzindikira mmene iwonso angapititsire patsogolo chiphunzitso cha mpingo wa katolika kudzera ku bungwe la PMS.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anjatidwa Kamba Kotsatsa Malonda M’bale Wake
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa amanga mamuna wina wa zaka 24 kaamba komuganizira kuti anasowetsa m’chimwene wake wa zaka 19 ndi cholinga chofuna kumupha. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub-Inspector Gladson M’bumpha, woganiziridwayu ndi Titani Chikumbutso ndipo m’bale wakeyu ndi Lemon Chikumbutso. M’bumpha wati mamunayu lachitatu lapitali anafika pa msika wa pa boma la Dowa kwa mkulu wina yemwe ali ndi chigayo pomwe anayamba kumutsatsa malonda m’bale wakeyu pa mtengo wa 250 Thousand Kwacha. Awiriwa anagwirizana kuti mnyamatayu amulemba ntchito yogayitsa mu chigayo chakechi koma pambuyo pake wotsatsidwa malondayo anakatula nkhaniyi ku polisi. Nthawi yomwe anagwirizana kuti achite malondawa itakwana apolisi analumikizana ndi mwini chigayoyu ndipo m’modzi mwa apolisiwa anaziyerekeza ngati m’modzi mwa ogula m’nyamatayu pambuyo pake anamugwira woganiziridwayu. Mkuluyu akaonekera ku bwalo la milandu kuti akayankhe mlandu wosowetsa munthu ndi cholinga chofuna kumupha. Titani komanso Lemoni chikumbutso amachokera m’mudzi wa Nsomba mfumu yayikulu Mkukula m’boma lomweli la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PAC Yayamba Kumva Nkhani Yokhudza Hijab
news: Bungwe la mgwirizano wa mipingo ndi zipembedzo la Public Affairs Committee (PAC) layamba kumva maganizo pa nkhani yokhudza kusamvana komwe kunalipo pakati pa sukulu za chikhristu ndi chipembedzo cha chisilamu pa kavalidwe ka ophunzira. Akutsogolera zokambiranazo-Monsignor Thawale Pa mkumanowu omwe ndi wa masiku awiri, bungweli likumana ndi atsogoleri a mipingo ya chikhristu ndi asilamu pofuna kuti apeze mayankho potsatira nkhawa zomwe mbali ziwirizi zinapereka. Polankhula lachinayi pa mwambo wotsekulira mkumanowu, wapampando wa bungweli Monsignor Dr. Patrick Thawale ati ali ndi chikhulupiliro kuti nkhaniyi itha ndi kubweretsa umodzi pakati pa mbali ziwirizi. Polankhulaponso mlembi wamkulu wa chipembedzo cha chisilamu mdziko muno Sheikh Twaibu Lawi wati nkhaniyi inasokoneza maphunziro a ana a chipembedzochi kaamba koti makolo analetsa ana awo kupita ku sukulu powopa kuphwanya malamulo a chipembedzo chawo. Komabe iwo ati ali ndi chikhulupiliro kuti nkhaniyi itha bwino kaamba koti akhristu ndi asilamu amakhulupilira mtendere ndi chikondi. Nkhani yokhudza kavalidwe inayamba ndi zipolowe pa sukulu ya M’manga m’boma la Balaka yomwe ndi ya mpingo wa Anglican mu dayosizi ya Uppershire komanso inakhudza sukulu za mpingo wa katolika mu dayosizi ya Mangochi. Zitachitika izi boma linapempha bungwe la PAC kuti lilowererepo pa nkhaniyi ndi kuthetsa kusamvana pakati pa zipembedzo ziwirizi pa nkhani ya kavalidwe msukulu kuphatikizapo mipingo ya Mboni za Yehova komanso Rastafarian.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Moyo Umayamba Pamene Mayi Wayembekezera-Mzika Zokhudzidwa
news: Anthu ena omwe akudzitcha mzika zokhudzidwa, awopseza kuti akachita m’bindikiro ndi mapemphero ku nyumba ya malamulo ndi cholinga chopempha aphungu kuti asavomereze bill yolora amayi kuchotsa mimba kukhala lamulo. M’modzi mwa anthu okhudzidwawa yemwenso ndi mkulu wa bungwe lomwe limamenyera ufulu wokhala ndi moyo la Pro-Life a Kizito James Kaunjika awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti pali mabungwe a mdziko muno komanso aphungu ena omwe apatsidwa ndalama ndi mabungwe a kunja kuti ayikire kumbuyo lamuloli. Ena akuti amayi ngati awa ali ndi ufulu ochotsa pathupi Iwo ati kuvomereza biluyi kukhala lamulo, kutha kukhudza chuma cha dziko lino komanso amayi ambiri adzapeza mavuto osiyanasiyana kaamba kochotsa pathupi mwachisawawa. “Pali aphungu ena omwe akumvetsetsa pomwe ena sakumvetsetsa ndipo ena akuchita mwa kufuna kwawo pomwe ena atumidwa. Ife ngati mzika zokhudzidwa sitilora kuti bilu imeneyi ikhazikitsidwe chifukwa amene akuchitawo akunena ngati ndi yopindulitsa kwa amayi koma kuyiwonetsetsa ndi yobweretsa mavuto ochuluka ku dziko komanso kwa azimayi athu. Ife tipita ku nyumba ya malamulo kuti tikawawunikire aphungu athu kuti ayimvetse biluyi ndi kuyikanachifukwa kumbali ya sayansi, chipembedzo komasno chikhalidwe sizimalora kuchotsa pakati chifukwa moyo umayamba pamene mayi wayima,” anatero a Kaunjika. Pamenepa iwo ati adzakasonkhana ku nyumba ya malamulo pa 29 ndi 30 September ndi cholinga choti aphungu amve madandaulo awo ndi kuyikana biluyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PMS Yayamikira Akatswiri Omwe Ayimba Nyimbo za Chibalalitso
news: Ofesi yowona ntchito za mabungwe a Utumiki wa a Papa ya Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) yayamikira akatswiri ena oyimba, kaamba ka chidwi chomwe awonetsa pa nthawi yomwe mpingo wa katolika ukukonzekera chibalalitso. Bambo Mwakhwawa: Nyimbozi ndi mphatso yaikulu ku mpingo Mkulu mu ofesiyi mdziko muno bambo Vincent Mwakhwawa anena izi pambuyo pa kukhazikitsidwa kwa nyimbo ziwiri zomwe zayimbidwa ngati njira imodzi yofuna kupereka uthenga wa chibalalitso cha m’pingo wa chaka chino. Iwo ati uthenga omwe uli mu nyimbozi uthandiza kwambiri akhristu kusinkhasinkha Utumiki wawo mu nyengo ino yomwe mpingo ukukonzekera chibalalitso m’mwezi wa October. “Nyimbo zimenezi ndi mphatso yaikulu ku mpingo chifukwa zikutithandiza kufalitsa uthenga wa chibalalitso. Tonsefe ndi atumiki obweretsa uthenga wabwino ndiye nyimbozi zipititsa patali uthenga wa chibalalitso,” anatero bambo Mwakhwawa. Bambo Marie: Sitingasunge mawu amene Mulungu watituma Polankhulapo bambo Jean Marie omwe ndi mkulu wa gulu la Ephata Africa lomwe layimba nyimbo ya Chibalalitso ati achita izi ngati njira imodzi yopereka uthenga wa chibalalitso cha mpingo kwa akhristu. “Munthu amayamba kudzitumikira yekha ndi kukatumikira ena. Ife monga a luso sitingasunge mawu amene Mulungu watituma kuti tipereke kwa anthu,” anatero bambo Marie. Polankhulaponso Evarista Mbewe yemwe ndi m’modzi mwa achinyamata omwe ayimba nyimbo ya chingerezi yokhudza chibalalitso cha mpingo wapempha achinyamata kuti agwiritse ntchito luso lawo potumikira Mulungu. “Ndikulimbikitsa achinyamata anzanga kuti musabise mphatso zanu muwapemphe ambuye kuti akudzindikiritseni mphatso yanu ndi kuyigwiritsa ntchito moyenera,” anatero Evarista. Mpingo wa katolika uchita mwambo wa chibalalitso cha mpingo pa 18 October chaka chino pa mutu oti Ndilipo Ambuye, Tumeni.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Mlembi Watsopano Wa Sinodi Ya Maepiskopi
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wasankha mlembi wa mkulu wa Sinodi ya maepiskopi. Lachitatu pa 16 September, 2020 likulu la mpingo wa katolika lalengeza kuti Papa Francisco wasankha mlembi wa mkulu watsopano wa Sinodi ya ma episkopi (Synod of Bishops). Mlembi watsopano wa Sinodi ya Maepiskopi-Ambuye Grech Bishop Mario Grech wa ku Malta ndiye mlembi wa mkulu watsopano wa Sinodi ya ma episkopi kulowa m’malo mwa Cardinal Lorenzo Baldisseri wa ku Italy yemwe wapuma pa udindowu atatumikira kuyambira m’chaka cha 2013. Ntchito yaikulu ya Bishop Grech padakali pano ndi yokonzekera msonkhano wa Sinodi ya ma episkopi a mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse omwe udzachitike mwezi wa October m’chaka cha 2022. Pali chiyembekezo chakuti ntchito yokonzekera msonkhano wa Sinodi ya ma episkopi m’chaka cha 2022 sikhala yovuta kwenikweni chifukwa Bishop Grech adali m’modzi wa anthu omwe adagwira ntchito yaikulu pa Sinodi ya ku Amazon chaka chatha. Sinodi ya ma episkopi adakhazikitsa ndi Papa Paulo wa 6 m’chaka cha 1965. Cholinga cha Sinodi ya ma episkopi nkubweretsa umodzi pakati pa ma episkopi a Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse ndi Papa yemwe alipo pa nthawiyo. Msonkhano wa Sinodi ya ma episkopi womwe amautchula kuti Ordinary Synod umachitika zaka zitatu zilizonse koma palinso misonkhano ina yomwe amaitchula kuti Extraordinary Synod komanso Special Synod. Mwa chitsanzo msonkhano wa Sinodi ya ku Amazon chaka chathachi mwezi wa October udali Special Synod.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Alankhula pa Msonkhano wa Pachaka wa UNGA
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kulankhula ku msonkhano wa ukulu wa pa chaka wa bungwe la United Nations. Pamene msonkhano waukulu wa pa chaka (United Nations General Assembly) wayamba lachiwiri pa 15 September, 2020 zadziwika kuti Papa Francisco alankhula pa msonkhanowu lolemba sabata ya mawa pa 21 September, 2020 kudzera pa uthenga wa pa kanema (video message). Monga iye wakhala akuyankhulira m’mbuyomu pali chiyembekezo chachikulu kuti alankhulapo pa za mliri wa Coronavirus ngati mwayi owunikanso nkhani za chuma, ndale, komanso za chilengedwe (care for our common home). Chiyambireni mliri wa Coronavirus kumayambiriro kwa mwezi wa March chaka chino, Papa Francisco wakhala akupempha anthu, mabungwe komanso maiko kuti awonetsetse kusiyana komwe kulipo pakati pa anthu pa nkhani za chuma, maphunziro, za umoyo osaiwala momwe mliriwu wakhudzira chilengedwe. Kuyambira mwezi watha iye wakhala akuphunzitsa zomwe dziko la pansi lingachite polimbana ndi mliri wa coronavirus komanso kuyang’ana chitsogolo momwe maiko angathandizire anthu awo osaiwala kupulumutsa chilengedwe. Papa’yu wakhala akunena kuti pambali pa Covid 19 dziko la pansi likudwala matenda aakulu omwe akuika miyoyo ya anthu komanso chilengedwe pa chiopysezo. Likulu ła Mpingo wa Katolika, Vatican, lomwe ndi dziko loima pa lokha monga maiko ena onse lili ndi kazembe wake ku bungwe la United Nations ku New York yemwe ndi Archbishop Gabriele Giordano Caccia. Msonkhano wa chaka chino wa bungwe la United Nations ndi wa nambala 75 ndipo msonkhanowu uchitika mosiyaniranapo ndi momwe zimakhalira nthawi zonse kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus popeza zambiri zichitika kudzera pa makina a intaneti.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: HRDC Yadzudzula Bungwe la ACB Pochedwetsa Milandu
news: Bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa anthu mdziko muno la Human Rights Defenders Coalition (HRDC) ladzudzula bungwe lothana ndi katangale ndi ziphuphu mdziko muno la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) kuti limachedwa kuthana ndi milandu yokhudza katangale. Wapampando wa bungweli Gift Trapence wauza atolankhani kum’mawaku mu mzinda wa Lilongwe kuti bungweli likulephera kuchita machawi kuthana ndi milanduyi pa zifukwa zomwe zina ndi zosamveka. Akuti ACB ikukayikitsa-Trapence Trapence wati milandu monga yokhudza kugula za kudya ku nthambi ya apolisi, milandu yokhudza cement ndi ina siyikuwoneka tsogolo lake leni leni zomwe zikupereka mafunso ochuluka pa kuthekera kwa bungwe la ACB polimbana ndi mchitidwe wa katangale mdziko muno. Bungwe la HRDC lati lalandira milandu yambiri yokhudza za katangale yomwe akufuna bungwe la ACB lichite changu pofufuza milanduyi. Padakali pano, HRDC yauza ACB kuti igwiritse bwino ndalama zomwe unduna wa zachuma wapereka ku bungweli mu ndondomeko ya zachuma ya 2020/2021 zoti zithandize polimbana ndi nkhanizi. Tinayesa kuti tilankhule ndi mneneri wa bungwe la ACB, Egrita Ndala koma samayankha lamya yake ya m’manja.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akufuna Malo Ochitira Malonda Atsopano pa Msika wa Bwanje
news: Anthu ochita malonda mu msika wa Bwanje m’boma la Ntcheu, apempha akuluakulu a khonsolo ya bomalo kuti awapezere malo abwino oti adzichitirapo malonda, ponena kuti msika omwe ulipo pano uli ndi malo ochepa. Wapampando wa msikawu, Douglas Chaima wanena izi kutsatira ngozi yomwe inachitika pa 2 September pomwe nthambi ya mtengo inagwa ndi kuvulaza anthu 10 mu msikawu. “Anthu anabwera ndi malonda awo ndipo mphepo ikumenya mtengo unagwa ndi kuvulaza azimayi ndipo ife tikupempha boma kuti litikonzere malo abwino oti tizichitirako malonda,” anatero a Chaima. Poyankhulapo mneneri wa khonsolo ya boma la Ntcheu, a Mastone Kaiya ati ntchito yokonzekera kugwetsa mitengoyi ili mkati ndipo iyamba posachedwapa. “Ngozi imeneyi inachitikadi ndipo ngati khonsolo tikukonza mapulani kuti tigwese mitengo ikulu ikulu m’masukulu ndi m’misika monse,” anatero a Kaiya. Pakadali pano mwa anthu khumi omwe anavulala pa ngoziyi, 8 achira ndipo awiri adakali m’chipatala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Agwira Ntchito Mosatenga Mbali-Kainja
news: Mkulu wa apolisi mdziko muno, Dr. George Kainja wati awonetsetsa kuti apolisi sakutenga nawo mbali pa nkhani za ndale. Kainja: Tikupanga zinthuzi mwatokha Dr. Kainja awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti apolisi akamatenga mbali pa nkhani za ndale kapena kuwuzidwa chochita ndi chipani cha ndale zimasonyeza kuti ukadaulo wawo sulibwino. Iwo ati boma lomwe likulamula padakali pano silinawauze chochita pa ntchito yomwe akugwira kuphatikizapo kumangidwa kwa anthu ena ponena kuti iwo akuyigwira ntchitoyi pawokha mosatumidwa ndi aliyense. “Apolisi akawoneka kuti akutenga mbali professionalism yawo silibwino ndipo apolisi ameyenera kukhala opanda mbali ndipo chosangalatsa chomwe chilipo mchakuti boma lomwe lilipo panoli silikutikakamiza ife kutenga mbali tikupanga zinthu mwatokha,” anatero Dr. Kainja.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sukulu za Mkomba Phala Zidzatsekulidwabe
news: Ofesi yowona za chisamaliro cha anthu m’boma la Zomba yapempha makolo omwe ana awo amaphunzira mu sukulu za mkomba phala kuti apitirizebe kudikira tsiku lomwe boma lilengeze kuti sukuluzi zitsekulidwe. Mkulu mu ofesiyi a Christopher Ndawona amayankhula izi lachiwiri ku Zomba pa mkumano wmwe amakambirana ndi adindo komanso nthambi ya apolisi ya Victim Support Unit. Iwo apempha akuluakulu omwe amayendetsa sukulu za mkomba phala kuti akonze malo oti ana adzafikirepo komanso adziwe momwe angatsatire njira zopewera matenda a Covid19. “Apitilize kudikira pamene tikuyembekeza kuti boma likhazikitse ndondomeko zabwino za m’mene tiyenera kutsatira ku sukulu,” anatero a Ndawona. Pamenepa a Ndawona apempha makolo kuti awalimbikitse ana awo kuti adzimvetsera ma program a aphunzitsi apa wayilesi pa nthawi ino yomwe akuyembekezera kuti boma lilengeze tsiku lotsekulira sukulu za mkomba phala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mvula Igwa Bwino Chaka Chino-MET
news: Nthambi yowona zanyengo ndi kusintha kwa nyengo yalosera kuti mvula igwa bwino chaka chino. Mkulu wa nthambiyi Jolam Nkhokwe wayankhula izi dzulo pomwe nthambiyi imalengeza ulosi wake pa momwe mvula igwere mu chaka chino cha 2020 komanso kumayambiliro a chaka cha mawa. Nkhokwe: Mvula iyamba mwezi wa October Malinga ndi a Nkhokwe dziko lino likuyembekeza kuyamba kulandira mvula mwezi wa mawa. Iye wachenjezanso anthu kuti akhale tchelu ndi kutsatira malangizo onse a zanyengo omwe nthambiyi imalengeza. “Ife a nthambi ya zanyengo tikunena kuti kuyambira October mpaka December madera ambiri a kummwera ndi pakati akhala akulandira mvula yochuluka, koma madera a kumpoto alandira mvula yochepa koma mwezi wa January dziko lonse lizakhala likulandira mvula yochuluka,” anatero a Nkhokwe. Iwo ati kutsatira mphepo ya Elnino yomwe ikhale ikuwomba pa nyanja yaikulu ya Pacific, dziko lino likhala likukhuzidwa ndi kusefukira kwa madzi choncho iwo ati anthu akuyenera kukhala mosamala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Okhuzidwa ndi Ngozi ya Moto pa Chilumba cha Lesbos
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya moto yomwe yawononga nyumba za anthu pa chilumba cha Lesbos mdziko la Greece. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri chifukwa cha ngozi yowopsayi yomwe yasiyanso anthu ambiri othawa kwawo pa zifukwa zosiyanasiyana opanda malo okhala. Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndipo ali pafupi ndi anthu onse omwe nyumba zawo zapsa pa chilumbachi. “Ndili pafupi nanu ndipo ndili nanu pa nthawi yovutayi,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati akukumbukira bwino za ulendo wake wa pa chilumbachi m’chaka cha 2016 komanso pempho lake lomwe adachita pa nthawiyo ndi akuluakulu ena a mipingo m’dziko la Greece kuti anthu othawa kwao pa zifukwa zosiyana-siyana omwe amafikira pa chilumbachi azilandiridwa ndi kusamalidwa bwino. Malo otchedwa Moria pa chilumba cha Lesbos m’dziko la Greece amasungira anthu pafupi 13000. Malipoti akuti anthuwa amakhala mothinana komanso opanda zipangizo zofunikira pa moyo wao wa tsiku ndi tsiku zinthu zomwe zimaikanso miyoyo yao pa chiopysezo malinga ndi mliri wa coronavirus. Papa Francisco adakacheza pa chilumbachi mwezi wa April m’chaka cha 2016 ndipo ku mapeto a ulendowu Papa’yu adatenga ma banja atatu kupita nao ku Rome. Ma banjawa ndi a anthu omwe adathawa kuchokera m’dziko Syria. Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika limasamalira ma banjawa mothandizana ndi bungwe la Sant’Egidio.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la CMO Lagawa Katundu Othandiza Kupewa COVID-19 ku Parish ya Neno
news: Parish ya Neno mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yati katundu yemwe yalandira kuchokera ku bungwe la Umodzi wa abambo la Catholic Men Organization mu arkidayosiziyi, awathandiza kwambiri pochepetsa kufala kwa nthenda ya Covid-19 pakati pawo. Bambo mfumu a parishiyi bambo christopher nakhate ndi omwe alankhula izi loweruka pa mwambo wolandira katunduyu. Iwo ati parish yawo yakhala ili ndi chiwerengero chochuluka cha anthu odwala nthendayi sabata zapitazo kamba ka anthu omwe amagwiritsa ntchito njira za chidule kuchokera mdziko la South Africa ndi mayiko ena ozungulira. “Zowonadi katundu ameneyu ndi osowekera ndi ofunikira kwambiri kamba koti parishiyi ili m’malire ndi dziko la Mozambique ndipo athandiza kuti nthendayi isafale kwambiri monga momwe imachitira m’buyomu,” anatero bambo Nakhate. Polankhulapo mlembi wa komiti yogwirizira ya bungwe la Umodzi wa abambo mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre, a Anthony Mkweteza anati ndi okondwa kuti zomwe anazikonza zakwaniritsidwa. “Tili okondwa kuti tazasiya katundu yemwe abambo anasonkha kuno ku Neno ndipo athandiza kwambiri kuno ndipo tasangalala kuti abambo ali ndi kuthekera kotenga gawo potumikira mpingo,” anatero a Mkweteza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Munthu M’modzi Wafa, 15 Avulala pa Ngozi ya Galimoto ku Chikwawa
news: Munthu m’modzi wafa ndipo ena 15 avulala galimoto yomwe anakwera itaphulika teyala ndi kugubuduka mu nsewu wa Ngabu-Nchalo m’boma la Chikwawa. Malinga ndi mneneri wa apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Dickson Matemba galimoto ya mtundu wa Nissan Caravan yomwe nambala ndi MN 8021 inaphulika tayala ndipo kamba koti minibus-yi inali pa liwiro, oyendetsayo yemwe ndi Alex Milisi wazaka 32 analephera kuwongolera zomwe zinachititsa kuti igubuduke. Sergeant Matemba ati pa ngoziyi mayi wina yemwe ndi Enala Andilede wa zaka 40 anavulala kwambiri ndipo anamwalira atangofika ku chipatala, iwo atinso anthu ena 15 anavulala ndipo ali pa chipatala cha boma cha Chikwawa komwe akulandira thandizo la mankhwala. Pakadali pano apolisi a m’bomali akusakasaka oyendetsa galimotoyi yemwe anathawa ngoziyi itangochitika ndipo akulangiza oyendetsa galimoto onse kuti azitsatira malamulo apansewu kuti apewe ngozi za mtunduwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Okhuzidwa Ndi Ziwonetsero Zomwe Zikuchitika M’maiko Ambiri
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ziwonetsero zosonyeza kusakondwa zomwe anthu akuchita m’maiko osiyanasiyana pa dziko lapansi. Pozindikira kuti udindo wa mpingo si kungowalalikira anthu za mawu a Mulungu komanso kulankhulapo pa zinthu zomwe anthuwo zikuwakhudza, Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi kuchuluka kwa ziwonetsero zosonyeza kusakondwa m’maiko osiyana-siyana. Iye wati ziwonetserozi ndi chizindikiro chakuti m’maiko ambiri anthu ndi osakhutira ndi momwe zinthu zikuyendera. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wapempha anthu ochita ziwonetserowa kuti atero mosunga bata ndi mtendere ndi kupewa kuwononga zinthu komanso kuyika miyoyo ya anzawo pa chiopsezo. Iye wapemphanso atsogoleri m’maiko osiyana-siyana momwe muli ziwonetsero zosonyeza kusakondwa kuti adzimvetsera zomwe anthu awo akudandaula ndi kuyetsetsa kuchitapo kanthu pa madandaulo a anthuwo. Papa’yu wamaliza ndi kupempha atsogoleri a mipingo mmaikowa kuti athandize kubweretsa pamodzi mbali zonse zokhudzidwa ndi kuthetsa kusamvana kulikonse pochita zokambirana komanso kuthandiza kubweretsa chimvano ndi kukhululukirana. Masiku apitawa Papa Francisco adadzudzula zipolowe zomwe zikuchitika m’dziko la Belarus. Pa 9 August 2020 zipolowe zidabuka mu mzinda wa Minsk, likulu la dziko la Belarus bungwe loyendetsa chisankho litalengeza za kupambana kwa Alexander Lukashenko yemwe wakhala akulamulira dzikolo kuyambira m’chaka cha 1994.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ogwira Ntchito Pa Chipatala Cha Zomba Akunyanyala Ntchito
news: Ena mwa ogwira ntchito ku chipatala chachikulu cha Zomba akunyanyala ntchito pofuna kukakamiza akulu akulu a pa chipatalachi kuti awapatse ndalama zomwe adagwililira kale ntchito (arrears). M’modzi mwa anamwinowa yemwe anati titsamutchule dzina, wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti apitilira kunyanyala ntchito pokhapokha atalandira ndalama zawo. Iye wati akulu akulu a pa chipatalachi akhala akuwalonjeza kuti awapatsa ndalama zawo koma mpaka pano sakuwapatsa choncho aganiza zoyamba kunyanyala ntchito. “Zowonadi lero mwaona a chipatala amene tikunyanyala ntchito kamba koti pali nkhani ya ndalama yomwe management ikukanika kutipatsa ndiye nkhani imeneyi inayambika kale ndipo zomwe amatiyankha nzosapatsa chilimbikitso zomwe zatipangitsa kuti tiyambe kunyanyala ntchitoyi,” anatero namwinoyo. Koma poyankhapo, wofalitsa nkhani pa chipatala chachikulu cha Zomba, Antonio Kamanga walonjeza kuti anthuwa alandira ndalama zawo posachedwapa ndipo padakali pano ntchito yolondoloza ma file awo ili mkati. “Ifeyo ngati management zinthuzi zikuyenda kwambiri ndipo zambiri zasala pang’ono kutha koma kumbali ya malipiroyi zitengera funding kuti apanga allocate bwanji,” anatero a Kamanga. Anamwino opitilira 150 pa chipatala cha Zomba ndi omwe akunyanyala ntchito zawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sukulu za Kwacha Zili ndi Kuthekera Kotukula Dziko
news: Nduna yowona za kusasiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo, chitukuko cha m’madera ndi chisamaliro cha anthu, mayi Patricia Kaliati ati sukulu za kwacha zili ndi kuthekera kopititsa patsogolo chitukuko cha dziko lino. Mayi Kaliati anena izi pa mwambo wa chaka chino wokumbukira kuwerenga ndi kuwerengera m’dziko muno. Kaliati: Maphunziro amathandiza Mwambowu umachitika pa 8 September chaka chili chonse koma malinga ndi msonkhano wa aphungu wa ku nyumba ya malamulo, dziko la Malawi linachita mwambowu loweruka pa 12 September pa bwalo la sukulu ya Namphungo m’boma la Mulanje ndipo unachitika pa mutu oti “Kuphunzitsa ndi kuphunzira kuwerenga ndi kuwerengetsera mu nyengo ino ya mliri wa Covid-19: undindo wa aphunzitsi kupeza njira zomwe angatsate pophunzitsa”. “Maphunziro amathandiza, ambiri amene akumapanga sukulu za kwacha amakhala ozidalira ndipo akuthandizira kukhala zitsanzo za ana a mnyumba mwawo,” anatero mayi Kaliati. Iwo ati sukuluzi zikuthandiza kwambiri pa chitukuko mdziko muno. Pothilirapo ndemanga, ena mwa anthu omwe apindula ndi sukulu za kwacha m’bomali ati sukuluzi zawathandiza kuti akhale ozidalira pawokha monga kuchita mabizinesi osiyana-siyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wina Wadzipha Kamba Koyimitsidwa pa Ntchito
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 52 wa m’boma la Kasungu wadzipha podzimangilira kaamba koyimitsidwa pa ntchito. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Harry Namwaza, mkuluyu Simplex Phiri anayimitsidwa pa ntchito atasemphana maganizo ndi mzake ku malo komwe amagwira ntchito ngati mlonda ku Mwimba College of Agriculture. Zimenezi zakhumudwitsa apolisi m’bomalo omwe ati mchitidwe wodzipha ukuchulukira m’bomalo ponena kuti anthu atatu ndi omwe adzipha msabata imodzi yomwe yapitayi. “Ngati apolisi ifeyo ndi okhuzidwa kuwona mchitidwewu m’mene ukuchitikira m’boma lino la Kasungu. Munthu amene wamwalirayu ndi wachitatu mu sabata imodzi yokha,” anatero Inspector Namwaza. Pamenepa iwo apempha anthu kuti akakhala ndi chosautsa aziuza anthu kuti awathandize maganizo kupewa kukhala ndi maganizo odzipha ponena kuti kudzipha sikuthetsa mavuto a munthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Amuna Awiri Amangidwa Kamba Kopezeka ndi Ngaka
news: Apolisi m’boma la Balaka amanga amuna awiri powaganizira kuti apezeka ndi Ngaka yomwe ndi nyama yotetezedwa. Ndi nyama yotetezedwa-Ngaka Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Inspector Felix Misomali wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti apolisi anatsinidwa khutu kuti anthu ena atatu akugulitsa nyamayi mkatikati mwa tauni ya Balaka pa mtengo wa 7 million kwacha. Apolisiwa atafika ku maloko anakwanitsa kugwira anthu awiri omwe ndi a Yusuf Sadik komanso a Pempho Sydney ndipo m’modzi winayo anathawa ndipo apolisi akumusakasakabe. Anthuwa akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa ndi kukayankha mlandu wopezeka ndi nyama yotetezedwa. A Yusuf Sadik amachokera m’mudzi mwa Nakapa mfumu yaikulu Bwananyambi m’boma la Mangochi pomwe a Pempho Sydney amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kandengwe mfumu yaikulu Nsamala m’boma la Balaka.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kukhululukirana Kungathetse Mavuto apa Dziko Lapansi-Papa
news: mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati mavuto pa dziko la pansi angachepe ngati anthu ataphunzira kukhululukirana. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lamulungu kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican. Iye wati ma udani, mikangano ngakhale nkhondo zilipo pa dziko lapansi chifukwa chosafuna kukhululukirana. Iye walankhula izi pothilira ndemanga pa mawu a Mulungu omwe awerengedwa pa 13 September, 2020 lomwe ndi la lamulungu la 24 mu nyengo ya chaka. Papa Francisco wati mavuto ambiri pa dziko la pansi alipo chifukwa choti anthu amawumirana mtima osafuna kukhululukirana. Pamenepa iye wati akhristu akuyenera kukhala ndi makhalidwe a uMulungu pokhala a chifundo ndi okhululuka msanga. “Kodi ndi mavuto ochuluka bwanji omwe akanapewedwa, ndi mabala ochuluka bwanji akanachizidwa, ndi nkhondo zingati zomwe sizikanachitika ngati kukhululukirana ndi kumverana chifundo zikanakhazikika m’mitima ya wanthu?” wafunsa motero Papa Francisco pothilira ndemanga pa khalidwe la wa ntchito yemwe adakhululukidwa ngongole ndi mbuye wake koma wa ntchito yemweyo sadathe kukhululukira mzake monga Uthenga Wabwino wa pa tsikuli ukufotokozera. Pamenepa iye watsindika za kufunika kokhululukirana nthawi zonse kwa awo omwe ali pa banja, kukhululukirana mmiphakati ndi magulu osiyana-siyana angakhale kukhululukirana pa ndale. Papa’yu wamaliza ndi kunena kuti zomwe akhristu amanena mu pemphero la Atate athu kuti: mutikhululukire ife zochimwa zathu monga ifenso tiakhululukira adani athu zisangokhala za pakamwa chabe. Iye wati anthu okhawo omwe amadziwa kukhululukira anzao ndi omwe angathenso kupempha chikhululukiro cha Mulungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ndondomeko ya Zachuma Yosakomera aMalawi-CAMA
news: Bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa anthu ogula mdziko muno la Consumers Association of Malawi (CAMA) lati ndondomeko ya zachuma yomwe nduna ya zachuma a Felix Mlusu apereka ku nyumba ya malamulo, ndi yosakomera aMalawi. Kapito: Sitikunena kuti zonse zichitike nthawi imodzi Mkulu wa bungweli John Kapito wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti mu ndondomekoyi, anthu amayembekezeramo zinthu zingapo zomwe boma la Tonse Alliance lidalonjedza pa misonkhano yawo yokopa anthu monga kulumikizitsa madzi ndi magetsi kwaulere, chiphaso choyendetsera galimoto komanso chiphaso chotulukira kunja kwa dziko lino zotsika mtengo mwazina zomwe ndondomekoyi siyinawonetse. “Sitikunena kuti zonsezi zichitike chaka chimodzi ayi koma ndondomeko ya chumayo ikanawonetsa kuti tikulowera uku ndipo tikachita izi ntchito 1 million anatilonjeza zija zipezeka. Nkhani ya ma passport ndi ma driving license zikanayikidwa m’menemu tsono ngati sanayikemo budget mmene yachulukiramu ndiye adzayikamo liti?” anadabwa motero Kapito. Iye wati kuyika msonkho pa mafuta ophikira ndi zinthu zina, kuperekanso chipsinjo kwa anthu mdziko muno. Iye wapitiriza kunena kuti pali achinyamata ambiri omwe akusowa ntchito ndipo m’malo mwake amakachita Bet choncho kuchotsa msonkho pa zimenezi kuchititsa kuti achinyamata ambiri avutike mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Episkopi Watsopano Mdziko la Zimbabwe
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wasankha episkopi watsopano wa dayosizi ya Gweru mdziko la Zimbabwe. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco lachisanu wasankha Ambuye Rudolf Nyandoro omwe anali episkopi wa dayosizi ya Gokwe kukhala episkopi watsopano wa dayosizi ya Gweru mdziko la Zimbabwe. Tsopano ndi episkopi wa dayosizi ya Gweru-Ambuye Nyandoro Nthawi ya 12 koloko masana tsiku la chisanu pa 11 September 2020 ndi pomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse lalengeza za kusankhidwa kwa episkopi watsopanoyu. Uthengawu wati, “Papa Francisco wasankha Ambuye Rudolf Nyandoro omwe anali episkopi wa dayosizi ya Gokwe kukhala episkopi watsopano wa dayosizi ya Gweru mdziko la Zimbabwe.” Uthengawu wapitirira kunena kuti Papa’yu wasankhanso maepiskopi atatu othandizira a Archdiocese ya Chicago Ku United States of America. Ambuye Nyandoro omwe anabadwa ku Gweru m’chaka cha 1968 adadzodzedwa unsembe m’chaka cha 1998. Kuyambira m’chaka cha 1991 mpaka 1994 adachita maphunziro a Philosophy ku Seminary yaikulu ya St. Charles Lwanga ku Chimanimani ku Mutare ndipo adachita maphunziro a Theology ku Chishawasha ku Harare. M’chaka 2015 adapeza PhD mu phunziro la Pastoral Counselling ku University of South Africa. Iwo akhala akutumikira mpingo m’maudindo osiyanasiyana mu dayosizi ya Masvingo m’dziko la Zimbabwe ndipo m’chaka cha 2017 adasankhidwa ndi Papa Francisco kukhala episkopi wa Diocese ya Gokwe kulowa m’malo mwa Ambuye Angel Floro Martínez. Ndipo ndi pano pomwe Papa Francisco wawasankha kukhala episkopi watsopano wa Diocese ya Gweru. Mpingo wa Katolika ku Malawi udakadikilirabe za kusankhidwa kwa yemwe akhale episkopi wa Diocese ya Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: “Kusamuka kwa Radio Maria Kuchepetsa Mavuto Ena”
news: Kusamuka kwa likulu la Radio Maria Malawi kupita mu mzinda wa Lilongwe akuti kungachepetse mavuto ena omwe wayilesiyi imakumana nawo pa ntchito zake. A Director akale a wailesiyi mdziko la Zambia, bambo Matiyasi Mtchona anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Likulu la Radio Maria Malawi likusamuka m’boma la Mangochi Iwo ati ntchito zambiri zomwe wayilesiyi imayenera kugwira kuphatikizapo kufikira m’ma Sub-Studio ake kuzikhala kosavuta pomwe likululi likhale lili pakati pa dziko. Padakali pano bambo Mtchona akutumikira ku parish ya St. Anne’s mu dayosizi ya Chipata mdziko la Zambia. “Poyamba zikulingana chabe ndi ukulu wa dziko. Kuyika pakati ndi kwabwino kuti zinthu zizimwazika kumapita kumusi ndi kumtunda chikhala chapafupi,” anatero bambo Mtchona. Iwo ati ku Mangochi ndi kutali choncho pamene wailesiyi isamukire ku Lilongwe chikhala chinthu chapafupi kamba koti kupeza ndalama zoyendetsera wailesiyi mtawuni kukhala kosavuta.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kainja Akufunitsitsa Kubwezeretsa Ubale wa Apolisi ndi Anthu
news: Mkulu wa apolisi mdziko muno Dr. George Kainja wati ntchito yake yoyamba kugwira ngati mkulu wa apolisi ndi kukonzanso ubale omwe unasokonekera pakati pa apolisi ndi anthu. Kainja: Ubale wathu sunali bwino Dr. Kainja yemwe aphungu akunyumba ya malamulo angomuvomereza kumene kukhala mkulu wa apolisi mdziko muno wanena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iye wati ubale wa apolisi ndi anthu kuyambira chaka chapitachi sunali bwino choncho ndi wofunika kuwukonza. “Ubale pakati pa apolisi ndi anthu unasokonekera mchaka chapitachi nde choyambilira nd kuwonetsetsa kuti ubalewu wakonzedwa,” anatero a Kainja. Iye watinso mu utsogoleri wake awonetsetsa kuti khalidwe pakati pa asilikaliwa likhalepo ndipo apolisi omwe atalephere kutero azipitisidwa kusukulu kuti akasulidwenso.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akagwira Ukayidi Zaka 12 Kamba Kozembetsa Ana
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Mangochi lalamula bambo wina wa zaka 28 kukakhala ku ndende kwa zaka 12 atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu ozembetsa anthu, zomwe zosemphana ndi gawo 15 ya malamulo a dziko lino. Woyimira boma pa milandu Superintendent Josophine Chigawa anauza bwaloli kuti bamboyu Jafali Pedro anagwidwa ndi apolisi kwa Katuli pamene amafuna kutuluka mdziko muno kupita mdziko la Mozambique ali ndi anyamata anayi a zaka za pakati pa 16 ndi 17. Chigawa anati bamboyu atafunsidwa ananamiza apolisiwo kuti akuperekeza anawo kwa abale awo omwe ali mdziko la Mozambique, koma m’modzi mwa ana otengedwawo atafunsidwa anaulura kuti bamboyo anawatenga kuti azikamugwirira ntchito ku munda wake omwe uli ku Mozambique. Popereka chigamulo Resident Magistrate Joshua Nkhono anati wapereka chilango chotere kuti ena omwe ali ndi mchitidewu atengerepo phunziro. Jafali Pedro amachokera m’mudzi mwa Chitanda mfumu yaikulu Masangulu m’boma la Ngauma mdziko la Mozambique.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Kabvina Apempha Boma Kuti Lifotokoze Momveka za Kutsika Kwa Chiwerengero cha Odwala COVID-19
news: Komiti yolimbana ndi mliri wa COVID-19 mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yapempha boma kuti libwere poyera ndi kufotokoza ngati chiwerengero cha anthu odwala nthendayi mdziko muno chikuchepa mwa chilungamo. Wapampando wa komitiyi bambo Denis Kabvina ndi omwe anena izi lachitatu pa mwambo wopereka thandizo la chimanga komanso zipangizo zodzitetezera ku nthenda ya Covid-19   kwa akhristu a m’parish ya Lisungwi m’boma la Neno mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre. “Tinene poyera kuti aboma kudzera mu unduna wa zaumoyo abwere poyera azafotokozere anthu zoona kuti asatayilire kamba koti nthenda ya COVID-19 siyinathe mdziko muno,” anatero bambo Kabvina. Iwo ati pamene zipangizo zoyezera mliriwu ndi zochepa mdziko muno anthu omwe sakudwala nthendayi asatayilire koma ayesetse kutsatira njira zopewera nthendayi. Iwo apempha anthu kuti apitirize kutsatira ndondomeko zopewera nthendayi ngakhale malipoti akusonyeza kuti chiwelengero cha anthu opezeka ndi nthendayi chikutsika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Marie Apempha Akhritsu Adzikonda Kuwerenga Mawu a Mulungu
news: Mkulu wa gulu loyimba nyimbo za uzimu la Efata Africa bambo Jean Marie apempha akhristu m’dziko muno kuti adzikonda kuwerenga mawu a Mulungu kuti akhale zida zeni-zeni zofalitsa Uthenga Wabwino. Bambo Marie: Munthu amayamba kudzitumikira yekha Bambo Marie anena izi Lachitatu usiku, pa program yapadera pa Radio Maria Malawi yomwe cholinga chake chinali kukhazikitsa nyimbo yatsopano ya chibalalitso cha mpingo yomwe yayimbidwa ndi gululi. Iwo ati ngati akhristu sakonda kuwerenga mawu a Mulungu ndi povuta kuti atumikire anzawo komanso kuti amvetse udindo wawo mu nyengo ino yomwe mpingo wa katolika ukukonzekera chibalalitso. “Ndizoona kuti koyamba munthu amayamba kuzitumikira yekha ndipo munthu amene wadzadzidwa ndi mawu a Mulungu amayamba kulalika,” anatero bambo Marie. Iwo ati chipulumutso kuti chifikire anthu, njira ndi mphatso zosiyanasiyana zimagwiritsidwa ntchito.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Anthu Athetse Khalidwe Lodzikonda
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wapempha anthu kuti achilimike pothana ndi khalidwe lodzikonda. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, Papa walankhula izi lachitatu ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati zinthu zingamayende bwino m’maiko ambiri, ngati anthu atachilimika polimbikitsa chikondi komanso ubwino wa munthu aliyense. Mu zolankhulalankhula zake zokhudza moyo wa anthu mogwirizana ndi maphunzitso a mpingo, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kolimbikitsa chikondi poganizira ubwino wa munthu aliyense. Iye wati pofuna kuchiza dziko la pansi lomwe likudwala nthenda zosiyana-siyana kuphatikizapo Covid 19 nkofunika kulimbikitsa chikondi ndi kudana ndi khalidwe lina lililonse lodzikonda poyang’ana ubwino wa anthu onse. Papa Francisco wati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti anthu ena odzikonda atengerapo mwayi pa mliri wa coronavirus powabera anthu osauka pofuna kuzilemeretsa khalidwe lomwe iye wati ndilonyansa kwambiri, losalabada za ena komanso losaganizira ubwino wa anthu onse. Pamenepa iye wati akhristu akuyenera kulimbikitsa khalidwe la chikondi pakati pa anthu pokonda anthu onse angakhale adani omwe maka poganizira chikondi cha Mulungu chomwe amachionetsa kwa anthu ake. Papa Francisco wati angakhale kuti nkovuta kukonda adani komabe ili ndi khalidwe lomwe aliyense akuyenera kuliphunzira pang’onopang’ono. Pobwerekera mawu a Papa Paulo wa VI komanso Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri, Papa Francisco wakamba za chitukuko cha chikondi. Iye wati pomwe pali chikondi zinthu zambiri monga ubale, chikhalidwe cha anthu, chuma zimayenda bwino. Iye wamaliza ndi kunena kuti pofuna kugonjetsa mliri wa Coronavirus chikondi chikuyenera kukhala patsogolo pa zonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Watsutsa Kuti Boma Likumanga Anthu pa Zifukwa za Ndale
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera watsutsa zoti boma lake likumanga anthu pa zifukwa zandale. Chakwera wanena izi lero pomwe anali kunyumba ya malamulo komwe amayankha mafunso kuchokera kwa aphungu pa zomwe iye adalankhula mu uthenga wake otsekulira mkumano wa aphungu. Dr. Chakwera anafika kunyumba ya malamuloyi ndi wachiwiri wawo Dr. Saulos Chilima potsatira lonjezo lomwe adachita panthawi yokopa anthu kuti azidzaonekera ku nyumbayi ndikuyankha mafunso kuchokera kwa aphunguwa. Pomwe ankatsekulira mkumano wa aphunguwu, mtsogoleri wadziko linoyu adabwerezanso kunena kuti ali okonzeka kufika kunyumba ya malamuloyi ndi kuyankha mafunso omwe aphungu angakhale nawo pa nkhani zokhudza dziko lino. Dr. Chakwera anatengelapo mwayi oyankhulapo pa zomwe mtsogoleri wa mbali yotsutsa boma a Kondwani Nankhumwa adanena pomwe ankayankhapo pa uthenga omwe a Chakwera adapereka ku nyumbayi. Mwazina a Nankhumwa adadzudzula boma la a Chakwera ati pomanga anthu omwe ndi otsatira chipani DPP popanda zifukwa zenizeni, komanso kusamutsa ena mwa ogwira ntchito m’boma kuchoka ku nthambi zomwe akhala akugwirako ntchito kupita ku nthambi zina m’boma ponena kuti izi zikuchtikira okhao otsatira DPP. Apa a Chakwera anati sizoona kuti otsatira chipani cha DPP okha akumangidwa pofuna kulimbana ndi chipanichi koma kuti pano nthambi za malamulo zikugwira ntchito mosawona nkhope ndi moyima pazokha zomwe zinkakanika m’mbuyomu. Dr. Chakwera anatinso anthu omwe akunenedwa kuti ndi otsatira chipani cha dpp omwe akusinthidwa ma udindo, akuphwanya mfundo zogwilira ntchito m’boma zomwe zimawaletsa kuphatikiza ntchto zawo nd za ndale. Mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu anawonjera kunena kuti zina mwa zomwe a Nankhumwa adapempha kuti boma la Tonse liyambepo kuchita ndzomwenso boma la DPP linkalonjeza pomwe chipanichi chibkalamulira koma szdachtike choncho ati anthu adekhe ponena kuti boma likwanilitsa izi. Aphungu angapo adafunsa mafunso awo kutsatira zomwe a Dr. Chakwera adalankhula, pa nkhani monga zokhuza malo, za ulimi, za umoyo, za chitetezo ndi zina. Mwazina mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu wati ndondomeko ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo ikhala yosiyana kwambiri ndi momwe idalili ndndomeko ya FISP popeleka hcitsanzo kut ndondomekoyi anthu azigwilitsa ntchito ziphanso za unzika pogula zipangizoz osat ma kuponi ndipo kuti za hcinyengo zonse zomwe zngakhale zikuchitika panthawi yogulitsa zipangizozi malamulo oyenera adzagwira ntchito kwa onse olakwa. Pa za umooyo, Dr. Chakwera anati chipatala cha cancer chomwe chikumangidwa mumzinda wa lilongwe chachedwa kamba kakusintha kwa zinthu zina mkatikati mwantchitoyi ndipo watsikizila anthu mdziko muno kut zonse zitha posachedwa. Apa mtsogoleriyu wati pali chikonzero kuti ambiri mwa ogwira nthcito ku chipatalachi akhale anthu a mdziko mom’muno. mkati kati mwa nthawi ya mufunsoyi mtsogoleri wa mbali yotsutsa boma kondwan nankhumwa anafunsanso Dr. Chakwera ngati zomwe akuchita pakali pano ndi zolingana ndi zomwe zili mu manifesto ya mwgirizano wa zipani 9 wa Tonse, kapena manifestoya MCP yokha. Apa a Chakwera anati mfundo zisanu zomwe chipani cha MCP chili nazo zotchedwa HI 5 ndi manthu wa mfundo zonse zomwe zipanizi zilinazo popeleka chitsanzo cha utsogoleri otumikra anthu, kulimbana ndi katangale, kutsatira malamulo ndi zina ponena kuti zonsezi ndi msanamira za utsogoleri wokomera onse. Zokambirana za aphunguwa zikupitilira lachisanu lino pomwe nduna ya za chuma a Felix Mlusu idzapereke dongosolo la za chuma lomwe boma ligwiritse ntchtio kuyambira mwezi wa October.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Phungu Wakhazikitsa Ntchito Yogawa Ng’ombe za Mkaka ku Dera Lake
news: Phungu wa dera la kum’mawa kwa boma la Chiradzulu, Joseph Nomale wati wakhazikitsa ntchito yogawa ng’ombe za mkaka kwa anthu a mdera lake. Nomale wanena izi lolemba m’mudzi mwa Masanjala kwa mfumu yayikulu Kadewere m’bomalo komwe wagawa ng’ombe za mkaka zokwana 25. Nomale: Anthu akuvutika Iye wati wachita izi pofuna kuchepetsa mavuto a zachuma omwe anthu a ku derali akukumana nawo. “Mavuto a kwathu kuno amachokera mu kuchulukana kwathu pomwe malo athu olima ndi ochepa ndipo anthuwa amatenga zokolora ndi kugulitsa kuti apeze ndalama ya kuchigayo, ndiye iyi ndi njira imodzi yoti anthu azipeza tindalama tozithandizira tsiku ndi tsiku,” anatero Nomale. Iwo ati imeneyi ndi project yomwe izikhaka ikupitirira ngakhale iwo atachoka pa mpando choncho alimbikitsa anthu kuti azisamalira ziwetozi. Mfumu Masanjala yomwe anthu a m’dera lake apindula mu gawo loyamba la ntchitoyi yati ziwetozi zisintha miyoyo ya anthu pa chuma. “Ine mawu anga ndi othokoza kamba koti a MP akuganizira ku dera kwanga kuno kamba kogawa ng’ombe,” anatero mfumu Masanjala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Amangidwa Kamba Kopezeka ndi Ndalama Zachinyengo
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 35 m’boma la Kasungu ali m’manja mwa apolisi atapezeka ndi ndalama zachinyengo zokwana 320 thousand kwacha. Goodson ndi ndalama zake zachinyengo Malinga ndi mneneri wa a polisi m’bomalo Inspector Harry Namwaza, mkuluyu Filodi Goodson wamangidwa lachiwiri pa 8 September 2020, anthu akufuna kwabwino atatsina khutu apolisi za mkuluyu. Apolisi anamugwira mkuluyu ali pa malo ena ogona alendo otchedwa Midima Rest House ndpo anamupeza ndi ma 2000 kwacha omwe anali ndi nambala yofanana. “Akulu amenewa a Filodi Goodson tikhoza kutsikimiza kuti ali m’manja mwa apolisi kamba kopezeka ndi mapepala ofanana ndi ndalama ma 2000-kwacha ndipo agwidwa lero m’mudzi mwa Vijumo apolisi atatsinidwa khutu,” anatero Inspector Namwaza. Iwo ati padakalipano ndalamazi zatumizidwa ku banki yaikulu ya dziko lino ya Reserve kuti akazipime ndi kutsimikiza ngati zili zachinyengodi ndipo pambuyo pake ndi pomwe mkuluyu akawonekere ku bwalo la milandu ndi kukayankha mlandu wake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la MCTU Ladandaula ndi Nkhaza Zomwe Amayi Akukumana Nazo M’malo Ogwilira Ntchito
news: Bungwe loyang’anira anthu apantchito la Malawi Congress of Trade Union ladandaula ndi nkhanza zomwe amayi amakumana nazo m’malo a ntchito. Wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa bungweli mayi Jessy Ng’oma alankhula izi usiku wapitawu ku Lilongwe pa mkumano omwe bungwe la Center for Social Concern linakonza pofuna kuwunika zotsamwitsa zomwe amayi amakumana nazo m’malo antchito. A Ng’oma anati mwachitsanzo, amayi ambiri amavutika kuti apeze antchito ndipo nthawi zina mabwana amatengerapo mwayi kuti awagone powalonjeza mwayi wa ntchito zomwe ati zikuyenera kuwunikidwa ndi kuthetsedwa. “Amayi amenewa akuyenera kuti ufulu wawo utetezedwe ndiponso amayi amenewa achotsedwe pa umphawi popatsidwa ntchito zonyaditsa,” anatero mayi N’goma. Pa mkumanowu panalinso aphungu a kunyumba ya malamulo omwe alonjeza kuti ayesetsa kuti pakhazikitsidwe malamulo okhwima othandiza kuteteza amaiwa ku nkhanza zosiyanasiyana zomwe amakumana nazo m’malo a ntchitowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadandaula ndi Imfa ya Cardinal Jaworski
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya Cardinal Marian Jaworski. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa  walankhula izi lolemba mu uthenga wake wopita ku mpingo wa katolika mdziko la Poland. Iye wati Cardinal Marian Jaworski anali munthu wa chilungamo, wolimba mtima ndipo wokonda mpingo wake. Wamwalira ali ndi zaka 94 – Cardinal Jaworski Kudzera mu uthenga wake womwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika latulutsa lolemba pa 7 September 2020, Papa Francisco wati ndi wa chisoni chachikulu kaamba ka imfa ya Cardinal Marian Jaworski. Mu uthengawu iye wati Cardinal Jaworski sanali munthu wamba popeza anali kukonda chilungamo, analibe mantha ndipo anali kukonda Mpingo kotheratu. Cardinal Jaworski ndi chitsanzo cheni-cheni cha utumiki wa unsembe, kukhulupirika kwenikweni ku Mau a Mulungu komanso chitsanzo cha m’busa woyang’anira bwino mbumba ya Mulungu, watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawu. Cardinal Jaworski adamwalira pa 5 September atangokwanitsa kumene zaka 94. Iye anali Bambo Mfumu woyamba wa sukulu ya ukachenjede yotchedwa Pontifical Academy of Theology Ku Kraków m’dziko la Poland. Koma si pokhapo Cardinal’yu adathandiza kubwezeretsa Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la Ukraine potsatira kutha kwa ulamuliro wa chi communist. Cardinal Jaworsk adali bwenzi la ponda apa nane mpondepo la Papa Yonane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera ndipo ndi iye adapereka Sacramenti la kudzodza kwa Papa Yonane Paulo Wachiwiri pa nthawi yomaliza ya moyo wake pansi pano.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Thyolo Apulumutsa Amayi Atatu Omwe Amaganiziridwa Kuti Apha Munthu M’matsenga
news: Apolisi m’boma la Thyolo apulumutsa amayi atatu kwa anthu okwiya omwe amafuna kuwapha powaganizira kuti asowetsa mnyamata wina m’matsenga. Mkulu wa apolisi m’bomalo Davie Chingwalu watsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo wati mnyamatayu amene dzina lake silinadziwike anamira pa damu la Estate ya Mchima lamulungu lapitali. Anthu akuderalo akuganiza kuti amayi ena ndi omwe anasowetsa mnyamatayu m’matsenga zomwe zinachititsa kuti anthu okwiyawa ayambe kuwamenya komanso kuwawonongera katundu wawo. “Zoonadi panali kugendana komanso panali kusamvana komwe kunabuka m’mudzi mwa Kalilombe pomwe anyamata angapo anapita kukapha nsomba pa damu la Mchima ndipo myamata wina analephera kusambira zomwe zinapangitsa kuti amire,” anatero a Chingwalu. Iwo ati zimenezi zitadziwika anthu a m’mudzi anayamba kuganizira gogo wina ndi amayi awiri kuti ndi amnene achita zimenezi. Kutsatira chipolowe chomwe chinabuka ku maloko pomwe anthu amafuna kulanga amayiwa kuti awulule komwe amusiya munthu osowayu, apolisi a boma la Thyolo mothandizana ndi a ku Limbe anathamangira ku malowa kukawapulumutsa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Masewero Olimbitsa Thupi Amabweretsa Umodzi-Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati masewero olimbitsa thupi amathandiza kubweretsa umodzi pakati pa anthu. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, Papa walankhula izi ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican pa mkumano wake ndi gulu la achinyamata omwe amachita masewero olimbitsa thupi mdziko la Italy. Iye wati masewero olimbitsa thupi amathandiza mwazina kubweretsa umodzi komanso kulimbikitsa ubale weniweni pakati pa anthu. Papa Francisco wayamikira achinyamata omwe amachita masewero othamanga (athletics) ponena kuti masewerowa amathandiza kubweretsa umodzi, kulimbikitsa ubale weniweni komanso kubweretsa chimwemwe kwa anthu ambiri omwe amawonelera masewero awo. Iye wayamikiranso anthu ogwira ntchito za chipatala omwe anali nawo pa mwambowu omwe apindula ndi thandizo la ndalama zomwe achinyamatawa apeza potolera zithandizo zosiyanasiyana kudzera pa makina a intaneti. Zipatala ziwiri za m’dziko la Italy zomwe zakhala zikuthandiza anthu odwala nthenda ya Covid 19 ndi zomwe zapindula ndi thandizoli. Papa Francisco wayamikira ogwira ntchito za chipatala m’dziko la Italy chifukwa chodzipereka pothandiza ndi kupulumutsa miyoyo ya anthu ndipo sadaiwalenso kuthokoza onse ogwira ntchito za chipatala m’maiko osiyana-siyana ndipo wati Mulungu yekha ndi yemwe angadziwe kuwathokoza pa ntchito yaikulu yomwe akuigwira. Masewero omwe achinyamatawa amachita amakonzedwa ndi bungwe lomwe limaona za masewerowa ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican lotchedwa Vatican Athletic Association komanso bungwe la m’dziko la Italy la masewerowa lodziwika kuti Yellow Flames osaiwala bungwe lotchedwa Italian Federation of Light Athletics.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nankhumwa wapempha Chakwera Akwaniritse Malonjezo Ake
news: Mtsogoleri wa mbali yotsutsa boma ku nyumba ya malamulo Kondwani Nankhumwa wapempha boma kuti liyike chidwi chake pokwaniritsa malonjezo omwe adapereka pa nthawi ya misonkhano yokopa anthu pa chisankho chomwe chinachitika pa 23 June chaka chino. Nankhumwa: M’madera akumidzi anthu akuvutika A Nankhumwa alankhula izi dzulo mu uthenga wawo oyankhapo pa zomwe mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera adalankhula lachisanu pomwe amatsekulira mkumano wa aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iwo ati zambiri zomwe a Chakwera adalankhula sizikupeleka tsogolo lodziwika ndipo ati kukanakhala bwino akadafotokozera tsatane-tsatane pa momwe achitire pokwaniritsa malonjezo omwe adapanga pa nthawi ya kampeni. “Kumadera akumidzi anthu akuvutika mosiyanasiyana koma zimene zija sanafotokoze ndiye timapempha kuti afotokoze zimene analonjeza pa 23 June kamba koti aMalawi ambiri anawavotera kamba ka mfundo zawo-zo,” anatero a Nankhumwa. Pamenepa a Nankhumwa anati anthu mdziko muno akudikirabe ntchito 1 million kwa achinyamata, kudya katatu patsiku, kuchotsa kwa ndalama yolipira poyitanitsa madzi ndimagetsi, kutsitsa mtengo wa chiphaso choyendera ndi zina zambiri zomwe Tonse Alliance inalonjeza mu nthawi yokopa anthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Tamani Alimbikitsa Akhritsu Kuti Apitirize Kuthandiza Anthu Ovutika
news: Arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yapempha akhristu ndi anthu ena akufuna kwabwino kuti apitirize kuthandiza anthu omwe akuvutika mu njira zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno. Tamani: Anthu ambiri ndi okalamba Vicar General wa arkidayosiziyi bambo Boniface Tamani ndi omwe anena izi dzulo ku parish ya Nyungwi mu arkdayosiziyi pamene anatsogolera ntchito yopereka chakudya kwa akhristu a m’mparishiyi ndi cholinga choti chiwathandizire pamene akukumana ndi mavuto osowa chakudya kamba ka mliri wa Covid-19. Iwo ati kupereka chakudyachi ndi njira yoyambilira yomwe maepiskopi a mpingowu mdziko muno awonetsa ndi cholinga choti akhristu ndi anthu ena akufuna kwabwino azindikire kufunika kothandiza anthu omwe akuvutika m’madera awo. “Anthu amene takumana nawo kuno ku Nyungwe ndi okalamba kwambiri kuti sangakwanitse kulima komanso ena ndi ovutika ndiye ndi bwino kuti titsekule maso athu kugawana kangachepe komwe tingapeze,”anatero  bambo Tamani. Mayi Mariana Moses ochokera ku tchalitchi la Kapeya la mu parishi ya Nyungwe ndi m’modzi mwa akhristu osachepera 180 m`parishiyi omwe apindula ndi thandizoli patsikuli nsipo ayamikira mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko amene wapereka thandizoli ku dziko lino kudzera ku mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadzudzula Miseche Pakati pa Akhristu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wadzudzula khalidwe la miseche pakati pa akhristu. Iye wati ngati wina wachita chinthu chosayenera, ndi bwino kumuyitanira pambali munthuyo ndi kumulankhula m’malo mochita miseche. Papa Francisco wati khalidwe la miseche ndi loipa chifukwa limawononga umodzi ndipo limabweretsa kugawikana pakati pa akhristu Pamenepa iye wadzudzula kotheratu khalidwe loyipali kuti silikuyenera kumera mizu pakati pa akhristu. “Pamene mzathu wachita chinthu cholakwika ambirife mpamene timapita kukachita manong’onong’o. Miseche ndi ntchito za satana. Chonde pewani miseche chifukwa imabweretsa kugawikana pakati pa akhristu,” watero Papa Francisco podzudzula khalidwe la miseche. Iye wati pamene wina wachita cholakwika chinthu choyenera kuchita ndi zomwe Yesu Khristu akuphunzitsa mu Uthenga wabwino wa pa tsiku laMulungu la 23 munyengo ya chaka. Papa Francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kutsatira zimene Yesu Khristu akuphunzitsa pomuitana munthuyo kumbali kwa awiri ndi kumuuza munthuyo cholakwikacho. Ngati izi zalephereka ndi bwino kumuitanirapo munthu wina m’modzi kapena awiri kuti athandizirepo. Ngati wakanika munthuyo ndi bwino kumuitanira ku Mpingo. Ngati munthuyo wakanika njira zonsezi ndi bwino kumuyesa wa kunja kapena wokhometsa misonkho. Iye wati angakhale munthu atakanika ndi bwino kumamupemphererabe kuti Mulungu alowererepo. Papa Francisco wati maphunzitso a Yesu Khristu ndi njira yabwino pofuna kumanga Mpingo m’malo mochita miseche, kuweruzana, kuyalutsana zomwe ndi zopasula.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Stima Apempha Akhristu Apemphere Novena Kutsatira Kubedwa Kwa Ukaristia
news: Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi ambuye Montfort Stima wapempha akhristu mu dayosiziyi kuti agwirane manja popemphera mapemphero apadera ndi cholinga choti anthu amene aba ukaristia ku Kankao Parish apezeke. Ambuye Stima awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti masiku apitawa anthu ena omwe sakudziwika aba ukaristia ku nyumba ya asisteri a chipani cha Poverelle ku Kankao parish ndipo enanso aba ku parish ya Utale 1 posachedwapa. Bishop Stima: Ukaristia ndi tsinde la chipembedzo chathu Iwo ati zimenezi ndi zofunika mapemphero apadera ndipo ati mapemphero a Novena-wa achitika kwa masiku 9 kuyambira 14 mpaka pa 22 September m’maparishi onse a dayosiziyi. “Ukalistiya kwa ifeyo akatolika ndi tsinde leni leni la chipembedzo chathu ndiye anthu akuba amene aba kwa Kankao kupatula kuwabera ma sisteli zinthu, abanso ukalistiya ndipo sitikuziwa kuti akutani nawo ndipo ngati mpingo tiyenera kutsatira kuti tidziwe,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Ambuye Stima ati anthu enanso omwe sakudziwika usiku wathawu athyola nyumba ya ansembe ku Utale 1 parish komwe anamangilira wansembe wina ndi kuba zinthu zosiyanasiyana pambuyo pake anakabanso mtchalitchi. Iwo ati apempha boma kuti lichitepo kanthu pogwiritsa ntchito apolisi kuti awasake anthu achita zaupanduzi ndipo ati akuganiza kuti anthu omwe achita zaupandsu m’malo awiriwa ndi amodzi omwewo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Katswiri pa Ndale Wadzudzula Harry Mkandawire
news: M’modzi mwa akatswiri pa nkhani zandale mdziko muno George Phiri wadzudzula zomwe anayankhula wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa chipani cha Malawi Congress (MCP) mchigawo chaku mpoto a Harry Mkandawire pa msonkhano wa ndale m’boma la Karonga. Wadzudzulidwa-Mkandawire Masiku apitawa, a Mkandawire analankhula kuti otsatira chipani cha MCP ndi omwe ayambilire kupindula pa ndondomeko ya ndalama za ngongole zomwe boma lipereke mdziko muno kaamba koti yemwe adapambana pa chisankho chapitachi ndi Lazarus Chakwera yemwe anali pa pepala loponyera voti. Phiri yemwenso ndi m’phunzitsi wa phunziro la zandale ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Livingstonia wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti zomwe anayankhula a Mkandawire ndi zofuna kusokoneza mgwirizano wa zipani zomwe zili mu Tonse Alliance yomwe ikulamula padakalipano ndipo wapempha mtsogoleri wa dziko lino kuti apereke mwambo kwa mkuluyu. “Tikufuna tinenenso pano kuti nkhani yomwe akunena Mkandawire ndi yosavomerezeka chifukwa dziko lino a Malawi akufuna atakhala pa ufulu osati moyo wa mpanipani. Chakwera wayima kangapo konse ngati mtsogoleri wa MCP koma amaluza ndipo mgwirizano omwe wapanga ndi UTM ndi omwe wamupambanitsa akhala ali kotsutsa kwa zaka 26 ndiye sibwino kuti ayambe kunyoza anzawo omwe awapambanitsa,” anatero a Phiri. Iwo ati Tonse Alliance ikufuna kupanga Malawi watsopano wokomera aliyense pomwe a Mkandawire akufuna kusokoneza zimenezi zomwe ati ndi zosayenera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Awiri Afa pa Ngozi ya Pansewu ku Ntcheu
news: Anthu awiri afa ndipo ena awiri avulala modetsa nkhawa pa ngozi ya galimoto m’boma la Ntcheu. Malinga ndi mneneri wa apolisi m’bomali Sub Inspector Hastings Chigalu, izi zachitika m’bandakucha pa 7 September 2020, pomwe galimoto ya mtundu wa lorry nambala yake BX 8528 yomwe inanyamula matumba 32 a anyenzi, inaphonya nsewu ndi kukawomba shop ya Mapeto Whitex. Chigalu: Driver anakanika kuwongolera Amayi awiri omwe anali pa malowa amwalilira pompo ndipo ena awiri kuphatikizapo oyendetsa galimotoyi avulala modetsa nkhawa. “Ndizoona kuti chakum’mawaku cha m’ma 3 am kucha kwa lero lolemba kwachitika ngozi yomwe yakhuza lorry yomwe amayendetsa a James Mlore a zaka 34, pofika mu trading centre driver anakanika kuwongolera bwino galimoto zomwe zinapangitsa kuti ikawombe shop,” anatero Sub Inspector Chigalu. Iwo ati anthu atatu omwe ananyamulidwa mu galimotoyi omwe awiri anali amayi amwalira kamba kovulala kwambiri m’mutu. Amayiwa ndi a Stelia Louise Frank zaka 32 komanso Magret Manuelo a zaka 21 ndipo yemwe wavulala ndi Chifuniro Gonthi wa zaka 23.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Banda Wayamikira Atolankhani Poyambitsa Bungwe Lothana Ndi Mchitidwe Wozembetsa Anthu
news: Nduna yoona za chitetezo cha mdziko a Richard Chimwendo-Banda yayamikira atolankhani mdziko muno kaamba kokhazikitsa bungwe lawo lolimbana ndi mchitidwe ozembetsa anthu. Chimwendo Banda: Aliyense atangepo mbali Ndunayi yalankhula izi lachiwiri ku Lilongwe pomwe inakumana ndi atsogoleri a bungweli ndi cholinga chofuna kuwafotokozera masomphenya a bungwe lawo. A Banda ati pomwe mchitidwe wozembetsa anthu ukumanga nthenje, ndi koyenera kuti aliyense atengepo mbali polimbana ndi mchitidwewu. Polankhulapo wapampando wa bungweli a Memory Chisenga ati aganiza zogwira ntchito ndi undunawu kamba koti ndi omwe ukugwira ntchito imeneyi. “Chinthu choyamba chomwe tachiona kuti ndi chofunikira ndi chopanga ma programs m’ma radio ndi m’ma TV kuti anthu adziwe za mchitidwe ozembetsa anawu ndipo pali zambiri zomwe undunawu wakonza ndipo tikhalanso pa ntchito yodziwitsa anthu za zilango zomwe zimaperekedwa pakachitika mchitidwewu,” anatero Chisenga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kaliati Alimbikitsa Maphunziro a Atsikana Achichepere
news: Nduna yowona kuti pasakhale kusiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo komanso chitukuko cha madera a akumidzi ndi chisamaliro cha anthu, mayi Patricia Kaliati apempha mafumu mdziko muno kuti akhale patsogolo kulimbana ndi mchitidwe wokwatiwitsa atsikana achichepere. Kaliati: Tilimbikitse maphunziro Ndunayi yanena izi pa mkumano wake ndi mafumu aakulu a m’boma la Mangochi pomwe yauza mafumuwa kuti unduna wawo ukufuna ugwire ntchito limodzi ndi mafumu pothetsa maukwati a ana ndi cholinga choti abwelere ku sukulu. Iwo apempha mafumuwa kuti akhalenso patsogolo kulimbikitsa maphunziro pakati pa ana m’madera mwawo ndipo alimbikitse ana ena omwe atenga pathupi kuti akachira abwelerenso ku sukulu. “Sitinganene za umoyo wabwino opanda maphunziro, mavuto onse omwe tikukumana nawo kuti athe tikuyenera kuti tilimbikitse maphunziro ndipo tili ndi udindo oti ana onse apite kusukulu pothesa maukwati,” anatero mayi Kaliati. Polankhulapo mfumu yaikulu Jalasi yati mafumu onse a mderali anakhazikitsa kale malamulo apadera olimbana ndi maukwati a ana ndipo akhala akugwira ntchitoyi ndi apolisi komanso khonsolo ya bomalo. “M’buyomu tinapanga ma by-laws kwa a DC oti mwana ngati sakupita ku sukulu timamuyitana ndi kumupatsa chilango,” inatero mfumu Jalasi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chanthunya Walamulidwa Kukakhala ku Ndende Moyo Wake Onse
news: Bwalo lalikulu la milandu mu mzinda wa Zomba lalamula kuti a Misozi Chanthunya akakhale ku ndede moyo wawo onse atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu okupha bwenzi lawo Linda Gasa mchaka cha 2010. Popereka chigamulo chake, Judge Ruth Chinangwa wati pa milandu itatu yomwe a Chamthunya amayankha, anayenera kulandira chilango chokhwima. Akakhala ku ndende moyo wake onse-Chanthunya Pamenepa Judge Chinangwa analamula kuti a Chanthunya akakhale ku ndende moyo wawo onse pa mlandu wakupha, zaka ziwiri pa mlandu wolepheretsa maliro kuyikidwa mwaulemu komanso zaka zina ziwiri pa mlandu wonamiza bwalo koma anati zilango zonsezi ziyendera limodzi. Poyankhula chigamulochi chitangoperekedwa lawyer yemwe amayimira boma pa mlanduwu, Dr. Steve Kayuni wati wakhutitsidwa ndi chigamulochi. “Ndi m’mene malamulo a dziko lino alili tinali ndi ufulu kuti tipange choncho ngati m’mene timapangira ndi ma case ena ndipo malamulo ophedwa alipobe koma ndi mphamvu zomwe khothi lilinazo linangoyenera kuti ligamule chonchi,” anatero Dr. Kayuni. Koma yemwe amayimira a Misozi Chanthunya pa mlanduwu a Micheal Goba Chipeta ati sanakhutitsidwe ndi chigamulochi chifukwa khothi lagwiritsa umboni womwe sudaperekedwe ku bwaloli ndipo wati akachita apiloku bwalo la Supreme.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ali Limodzi M’mapemphero Ndi Anthu a Mdziko la Zimbabwe
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ali limodzi ndi anthu a mdziko la Zimbabwe m’mavuto omwe dzikolo likukumana nawo. Kazembe wa likulu la mpingo wa katolika kapena kuti Apostolic Nuncio m’dziko la Zimbabwe Archbishop Paolo Rudelli wati Papa Francisco ali limodzi ndi anthu a m’dziko la Zimbabwe pa nthawi ino yomwe dzikolo lili m’mavuto aakulu a za chuma ndipo wati ndi cholinga cha Papa’yu kuti mfundo za chuma m’dzikolo zikhale zokomera anthu onse makamaka anthu osauka. Polankhula kwa atolankhani, Archbishop Rudelli wati pofuna kusonyeza kukhudzidwa kwake pa mavuto a m’dzikolo omwe awonjezekeranso kaamba ka mliri wa Coronavirus Papa Francisco wasonyeza kukhudzidwa kwake kudzera m’mapemphero opempherera anthu komanso zithandizo zosiyana-siyana zopita kwa anthu mdzikolo. Archbishop Rudelli wati kudzera m’mapemphero Papa Francisco wakhala akuyenda limodzi ndi anthu onse omwe ali m’mavuto. Iye wakamba zomwe Papa Francisco adachita pa 27 March pamene anachita mapemphero pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square yekhayekha kupempherera dziko lonse la pansi maka kaamba ka mavuto osaneneka omwe mliri wa coronavirus wabweretsa m’maiko ambiri. Kuonjezera apa Papa Francisco posachedwapa wapereka thandizo la ndalama ku dziko la Zimbabwe zokwana USD100,000 osaiwalabnso thandizo la zipangizo za m’chipatala. Pomaliza Archbishop Rudelli wati Papa Francisco wakhala akulankhula mwa mphamvu za kufunika koti maiko akhazikitse ndondomeko zabwino pa chuma zokomera anthu onse. Iye wati Papa’yu wakhala akudzudzulanso mtima wa dyera pakati pa anthu, m’chitidwe womwe ukuika anthu osauka m’mavuto osaneneka. Pa 19 August 2020 ma episkopi a Mpingo wa Katolika ku Malawi adatulutsa kalata yao yotsimikizira Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la Zimbabwe ndi anthu onse kuti ali nao limodzi pano pomwe zinthu sizikuyenda pa ndale ndi chuma m’dzikolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Umodzi pa Nthawi ya Mliri wa Coronavirus
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsindika kufunika kolimbikitsa umodzi pa nthawi ya mliri wa Coronavirus. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi lachitatu ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati ngati anthu atagwirana manja ndi zotheka kuti moyo ubwererenso m’chimake monga kale. Patapita miyezi isanu ndi umodzi Papa Francisco akulankhula kwa anthu kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti basi malinga ndi ndondomeko zomwe adazikhazikitsa zopewera kufala kwa nthenda ya Covid 19, lachitatu pa 2 September 2020 Papa’yu walankhula kwa anthu omwe anafika ku likulu la Mpingo’wu pa tsikuli. Akufika pa bwalo la nyumba ya San Damaso kangapo konse anayima ndi kulankhula ndi anthu osiyana-siyana omwe anavala chotchingira pa kamwa ndi mphuno (face mask) ndipo asadakhale pansi kuti ayambe kulankhula anapereka moni wa pa dzanja kwa ma episkopi ndi ma Cardinal ena omwe anali nao pamwambowu. Pa tsikuli Papa Francisco wapitiriza kulankhulapo pa mutu woti kuchiza dziko.
