Iye watsindika za kufunika kolimbikitsa umodzi kuti dziko lichire ku nthenda ya Covid 19 ndipo kuti moyo ubwerere m’chimake monga kale. Papa Francisco wati ngati ana a banja limodzi ndiponso olumikizana kudzera mchikhulupiriro chao mwa Yesu Khristu akhristu akuyenera kulimbikitsa umodzi. Iye wati umodzi umaoneka pamene anthu athandizana komanso alimbikitsa chilungamo. Pomaliza iye wati nkofunika kuti aliyense azidzifunsa ngati amaganizira ena m’moyo wake kapena kungoziganizira iye yekha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ndigwira Ntchito Mokomera M’malawi Aliyense-Nundwe
news: General Vincent Nundwe yemwe wabwezeretsedwa pa udindo wake ngati mkulu wa asilikali a nkhondo mdziko muno wati agwira ntchito yake modzipereka. Nundwe: Ndine osangalala Nundwe yemwe anachotsedwa pa udindo-wu ndi mtsogoleri wakale wa dziko lino Peter Mutharika wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti agwira ntchito limodzi ndi General Namathanga kamba koti pakati pawo palibe udani. Iye wayamikiranso mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera kamba kobwera ndi ganizo loti iye abwelerenso pa udindowu. “Ineyo ndine osangalala kamba koti andipatsa mpata wina oti ndigwilire ntchito a Malawi ndipo ndikaonetsetsa kuti ndikutsatira zonse zomwe zili mu Constitution,” anatero a Nundwe. Pothilirapo ndemanga pa zakubwezedwa pa udindo kwa a Nundwe ngati mkulu wa asilikali a gulu la khondo la Malawi Defence Force, katswiri pa nkhani za chitetedzo yemwenso ndi m’phunzitsi wa ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Mzuzu Eugene Njoloma wayamikira chiganizo chomwe mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu wachita powezeranso mkulu-yu pa udindo-wu. “Chiganizo chomwe a president apanga chowabwezeretsa a Nundwe ndic habwino kwambiri kamba koti aMalawi ambiri akondwera nacho,” anatero a Njoloma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nduna Yachenjeza Eni Cottage Kuti Aleke Kulandira Alendo a Kunja
news: Nduna yowona zokopa alendo Dr. Michael Usi achenjeza eni ma cottage mdziko muno kuti asiye mchitidwe olandira alendo a mayiko a kunja kaamba koti msonkho wawo sukuwalora kulandira alendo a mtunduwu. Dr. Usi: Msonkho wawo sukuwalora Dr. Usi alankhula izi lachiwiri ku Lake Malawi National Park m’boma la Mangochi pomwe amakayendera malowa komanso kupereka bwato kwa apolisi a pamadzi ku malo otetezera nyama-wa. Iwo ati ma cottage sakuyenera kulandira ndalama zakunja kaamba koti msonkho omwe amapereka sumawalora kuchita malondawa ndipo opezeka akuchita izi, lamulo lidzagwira ntchito pa iye. “Tili ndi ma cottage ndipo amenewa si malo oti azilandirira alendo ochokera kunja kapena kuno nkumalipira chifukwa iwowo salipira msonkho ku boma,” anatero Dr. Usi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lapempha Aphunzitsi Adekhe
news: Unduna wa za maphunziro wapempha aphunzitsi omwe akukakamiza boma kuti liwapatse ndalama za ukadziwotche kuti adekhe pomwe magulu okhudzidwa akukambirana za nkhani-yi.  Masiku apitawa aphunzitsi a msukulu za boma akhala akukakamiza boma kuti liwatsimikizire zowapatsa ndalamayi pomwe akuyambanso kuphunzitsa sabata likudzali ponena kuti nawo akhala pa chiopsezo cha mliri wa Covid-19 pomwe akhale akukumana ndi ana a sukulu. Kudzera ku gulu lotchedwa aphunzitsi okhudzidwa, wapampando wa guluri wauza atolankhani kuti aphunzitsiwa sayamba kuphunzitsa lolemba likubwerali kamba koti boma silinayike ndondomeko zokwanira poganizira ntchito yomwe iwo akhale akuyigwira. “Kuti mphunzitsi aphunzitse mwana kuti amve kuli njira zosiyana siyana zomwe zimagwiritsidwa ntchito zomwe zina mawa izo ndi zokhuza kugundana ndi anawo,” anatero a Chitukuta. Koma mneneri wa unduna wa za maphunziro Chikondi Chimala wati nkhani-yi ikuwunikidwa ndipo zonse zikatha aphunzitsidwa awuzidwa. “Nkhani imeneyi ikukambidwa ndipo boma likuyiwunika. Aphunzitsiwa akuyenera adekhe pomwe akudikira kuti boma liwayankhe,” anatero a Chimala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alamulidwa Kukagwira Ukayidi Zaka Zinayi pa Mlandu Wakuba
news: Bwalo loyamba la milandu m’boma la Mangochi lalamula mnyamata wa zaka 21 kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavulagaga kwa zaka zinayi atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu wothyola nyumba ndi kuba katundu. Bwaloli linamva kuchoka kwa woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sub Inspector Magret Chibulire kuti usiku wapa 19 August chaka chino a Manuel Sauka anachoka kunyumba kwawo 7 koloko ya madzulo kupita kwa bwenzi lawo ndipo pobwelera kumeneko nthawi ya 12 koloko usiku anapeza chitseko cha nyumba yawo chitathyoledwa ndipo mutabedwa katundu yemwe ndi wa ndalama zokwana 150 sauzande kwacha. Pa 20 August ndi pomwe mnyamatayu Molesi Mtobwa anagwidwa ndi anthu a m’mudzi omwe anamupititsa ku polisi ya Koche ndipo apolisiwo atafufuza anapeza katundu yense wobedwayo. Iye anauvomera mlanduwu ndipo oyimira boma pa mlanduwu anapempha bwalolo kuti limupatse mnyamatayu chilango chokhwima kaamba koti sakusintha khalidwe potengera kuti wangotulukanso ku ndende posachedwapa pa mlandu wa ngati omwewu. Popereka chigamulo chake First Grade Magistrate Roy Kakutu analamula mnyamatayu kuti akagwire ukayidi kwa zaka zinayi pa mlandu wothyola nyumba komanso miyezi 6 pa mlandu wakuba koma anati chilango chonsechi chidziyendera limodzi. Molesi Mtobwa amachokera m’mudzi wa Michesi mfumu yaikulu Mponda m’boma lomwelo la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la MOAM Ladzudzula Ziwonetsero za Madalaivala
news: Bungwe la eni minibus mdziko muno, ladzudzula madalaivala omwe achita ziwonetsero lero mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Kamange: Inde mavuto awo ndi omveka Mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la Minibus Owners Association of Malawi (MOAM), Coxley Kamange wati ngakhale akudziwa madandaulo a oyendetsa minibus-wa, koma sanayembekezere kuti achita ziwonetsero chifukwa zokambirana zofuna kuthetsa mavutowa zili mkati pakati pa bungwe la MOAM, boma komanso nthambi ya polisi. “Mavuto awo inde ndi omveka chifukwa akukamba kuti pali tsankho lalikulu, apolisi akumagwira a minibus okha akanyamula mopyola muyeso pomwe a sienta sakumawagwira ndiye iwo akufuna kuti aliyense adzilandira chilango pasakhale tsankho,” anatero a Kamange. Mwazina, oyendetsa minibus akudandaula kuti apolisi akumawatchaja ndalama zochuluka pa milandu ya pansewu, zomwe zikuchititsa kuti adzipeza ndalama yochepa. Koma a Kamange mavuto omwe akudandaula madalaivalawa ndi a kale ndipo bungwe lawo linapereka kale nkhawazi ku boma kudzera ku ofesi ya wachiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino choncho madalaivalawa amayenera kudekha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsogolera Mapemphero a Tsiku Lokumbukira za Chilengedwe
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco watsogolera a katolika m’mapemphero a tsiku loganizira kufunika kosamala chilengedwe. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, lachiwiri pa 1 September Papa watsogolera a katolika pa dziko lonse la pansi m’mapemphero pa tsiku lomwe mpingo wa katolika mogwirizana ndi mipingo ina ya chikhristu imaganizira kufunika kosamala chilengedwe. M’chaka cha 2015 Papa Francisco adakhazikitsa tsiku la 1 September kuti mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse uziganizira kufunika kosamala chilengedwe. Malinga ndi Papa Francisco tsikuli ndi lothandiza akhristu kuganizira za udindo omwe ali nawo pothandiza kukometsa dziko la pansi kudzera mu kusamalira chilengedwe komanso pa nthawi yomweyo kuthokoza Mulungu chifukwa cha mphatso yaikulu ya chilengedwe. Kuwonjezera pa zimenezi malinga ndi Papa Francisco, tsikuli ndi mwayi wina wopepesa Mulungu pa zinthu zosakhala bwino zomwe anthu akuchita posakaza chilengedwe. Mogwirizana ndi tsikuli Papa Francisco laMulungu lapitali adapempherera dziko la Mauritius potsatira ngozi ya sitima ya pa madzi yonyamula mafuta yomwe idataya mafuta osachepera matani 1000 kulemera kwake ndipo mafutawa awononga za chilengedwe zambiri m’madzi a dzikolo. Kwa nthawi yaitali Papa Francisco wakhala akutsindika mzolankhulalankhula zake pa za kufunika kosamala chilengedwe kuphatikizapo kalata yake yomwe adalemba yokhudza chilengedwe (On the Care of Our Common Home) yotchedwa Laudato Si ya m’chaka cha 2015. Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse ukuchita mapemphero pa tsikuli mogwirizana ndi mipingo ina ya chikhristu monga Orthodox Church.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Wabwezeretsa General Nundwe Pa Udindo Wake
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wabwezeretsa pa udindo yemwe adali mkulu wa gulu la asilikali a nkhondo mdziko muno m’mbuyomu a Vincent Nundwe kukhalanso mkulu wagululi. Wabwezeretsedwanso paudindo-Nundwe Polankhula lachiwiri masana, Dr. Chakwera anati achita izi kamba koti mtsogoleri wakale wa dziko lino a Peter Mutharika sadatsate ndondomeko yoyenera pochotsa a Nundwe pa udindowu. Iwo ati General Nundwe ayamba kugwira ntchito pano ndipo ati izi zithandiza kubwezeretsa chilungamo chomwe chidasowa pakuchotsedwa kwa a Nundwe komanso kuliyika gulu la asilikali a MDF kuti likhale lotsata malamulo nthawi zonse. Pamenepa Dr. Chakwera ati posachedwa ayitanitsa mkumano ndi akuluakulu a gulu la MDF kuti akambirane za yemwe angakhale wachiwiri kwa a Nundwe. General Vincent Nundwe adachotsedwa ngati mkulu wa gulu la asilikali la MDF m’mwezi wa March chaka chino ndipo m’malo mwawo mudalowa a Peter Lapken Namathanga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alamulidwa Kukhala Ku Ndende Zaka 5 Kamba Kothyola Nyumba ndi Kuba
news: Bwalo loyamba la milandu m’boma la Mangochi, lagamula bambo wina wa zaka 50 kukakhala ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa  zaka 5 kamba kothyola ndi kuba mnyumba zomwe nzotsutsana ndi gawo 309 ya malamulo a dziko lino. Kumva kwa khothi kuchokera kwa oyimira boma pa milandu Sub-Inspector Maston Chitsonga anati bamboyu yemwe ndi Davie Zaipa, usiku wapa18 May chaka chino anathyola nyumba ya Melida Gwembe momwe anabamo katundu wa ndalama zokwanira 181,000-kwacha zomwe zinali nsapato za mitundu 6, lamya za m’manja zitatu komanso ndalama zokwanira 21,000 kwacha. Apolisi ataziwitsidwa za nkhaniyi anachita kafuku-fuku ndipo pambuyo pake anamanga mkuluyu. Popereka chigamulo chake, First Grade Magistrate Mtunduwatha Mpasu anati wapereka chigamulo cha mtunduwu kuti ena omwe ali ndi khalidwe lotere atengerepo phunziro. Zaipa amachokera m’mudzi wa Mgundaphiri mfumu yaikulu Mponda m’boma lomwelo la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alangiza Alimi Adzichita Mthilira Pogwiritsa Ntchito Madzi a pa Mjigo
news: Mlangizi wamkulu wa chitukuko cha madzi ndi ukhondo m’boma la Zomba, Davis Bonga walangiza anthu a mdera la mfumu yayikulu Ngwelero m’boma la Zomba kuti adzichita ulimi wamthilira pogwiritsa ntchito madzi apa mjigo. A Bonga alankhula izi lachinayi pa mwambo wopereka mijigo inayi kwa anthu a mdera la Group Village Headman Taulo m’boma la Zomba, yomwe yaperekedwa ndi bungwe la Future Vision Ministries International. Iwo ati kutsatira vuto la madzi lomwe derali limakumana nalo, anthuwa awapempha kuti adzigwiritsa ntchito mijigoyi pothilira mbewu za kudimba kuti azikhala ndi moyo wathanzi ndi kupeza phindu akagulitsa mbewuzi. Anthu amdera la Mdera la mfumu yayikulu ngwelero mboma la zomba akusimba lokoma tsopano kaamba ka bungwe la Future Vision Ministries International lomwe lazika mjigo inayi mderali ndi cholinga chofuna kuthandiza anthu mderali pankhani za madzi a ukhondo. A Bonga anati mijigoyi ithandizanso kuti anthu mderali azichita ulimi pogwiritsa ntchito madzi otayika komanso ena ochokera pa mjigowu kuti azikhala ndi mbewu za kudimba m’makomo awo. Polanmkhulapo mkulu wa bungwe la Future Vision Ministries International a Newton Sande Sindo anati ngakhale bungwe lawo limasamalira ana komabe anaona cha nzeru kuti asamalirenso malo omwe anawa akuchokera powapatsa madzi a ukhondo zomwe zingachititse kuti anawa azichita bwino mkalasi komanso kukhala osadwaladwala. Nayo mfumu yayikulu Ngwelero ya m’boma la Zomba yayamikira bungwe la Future Vision Ministries International pothandiza kwambiri dera lawo ponena kuti linali lotsalira mu zitukuko zambiri. Iwo anati bungweli lamanga sukulu za mkomba phala, kulipilira ana sukulu, kumanga mijigo ndi zina zambiri zomwe anthu a mderali amazivutikira kudzipeza. Bungwe la Future Vision Ministries International linasankha dera la mfumu yayikulu Ngwelero kuti azithandizako ana pa nkhani za maphunziro powamangira sukulu zabwino komanso kuwalipilira sukulu mpaka atafika pa msinkhu oziyimira pawokha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la Village X Lalonjeza Kuthandiza Anthu Akumidzi Pa Zofuna Zawo
news: Bungwe lina lomwe si laboma lotchedwa Village X m’boma la Zomba lati lidzipereka pa ntchito yothandiza anthu akumidzi kupeza zofuna zawo. Mayi m’modzi kunyamula feteleza wake Mkulu wa bungwe-li a Maison Jambo ndi amene anena izi pomwe bungweli limapereka zipangizo za ulimi monga feteleza kwa anthu a m’mudzi wa Group Village Headman Lambulira m’boma la Zomba. Iwo ati apitiriza kuthandiza anthu akumudzi ndi zinthu zosiyanasiyana kuti anthuwa akwaniritse maso mphenya awo. “Tili kuno kwa Lambulira chomwe chikuchitika pa tsiku lalero, ndi chakutiu ife a bungwe la Village X tikuzagawa feteleza yemwe anthu a m’mudziwa anatipempha kuti tiwathandize naye,” anatero a Jambo. Polankhulapo m’modzi mwa anthu omwe analandira fetelezayu mayi Grace Chitseko, ayamikira bungweli kamba kowathandiza ndi fetelezayi ponena kuti atukula miyoyo yawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Mapemphero mu Tchalitchi la Augustino Woyera
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wachita mapemphero mu tchalitchi lalikulu la Augustino Woyera. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, lachinayi Papa wachita mapemphero mu tchalitchi lalikulu la Augustino Woyera lopezeka mu mzinda wa Rome mdziko la Italy. Augustino Woyera Ali mu tchalitchi lalikululi Papa anachita mapemphero kwa ka nthawi pa manda a Monica Woyera. Pa 27 August chaka chilichonse mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse umachita chaka cha Monica Woyera. Mkulu wa ofesi yofalitsa mauthenga ku Vatican yotchedwa Holy See Press Office, Matteo Bruni wati Papa’yu wachita mapempherowa lachinayi masana. Bruni wati Papa’yu anachita mapemphero kwa ka nthawi mtchalitchi laling’ono la Monica Woyera makamaka pa manda a Monica Woyera opezeka mu tchalitchi lalikulu la Augustino Woyera. Aka sikoyamba kuti Papa Francisco apite ku tchalichi lalikulu la Augustino Woyera ndi kukapemphera pa manda a Monica Woyera. Zaka ziwiri zapitazo akuchokera ku ulendo wake wokacheza m’dziko la Ireland Papa’yu adapita kukapemphera mtchalichi la Augustino Woyera komanso pa manda a Monica Woyera apa nkuti atachitanso mapemphero mtchalichi lalikulu la Amayi Maria lotchedwa Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore. Monica Woyera ndi mayi wa Augustino Woyera amene Mpingo wa Katolika umachita chaka chake pa 28 August. Mwazina Monica Woyera ndi nkhoswe ya amayi a pa banja komanso ana ovuta.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: DPP Yasintha Maudindo Ena Mchipani
news: Chipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) chati palibe chodabwitsa chilichonse pa kusintha komwe kwachitika m’maudindo ena mchipanichi. Mneneri watsopano wa chipanichi Brown Mpinganjira wanena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pambuyo pa mkumano wa akuluakulu a chipanichi omwe unachitika dzulo kunyumba ya mtsogoleri wa chipanichi Peter Mutharika, m’boma la Mangochi. Mpinganjira: Palibe kusintha kododometsa Iwo ati chipanichi chasankha a Andrew Matemba kukhala mkulu owona za chisankho kulowa m’malo mwa a Ben Phiri omwe atula pansi udindo wawo, Sheikh Imran Mtenje kukhala governor wa chipanichi mchigawo chakumvuma kulowa m’malo mwa a Julius Pipe omwe anatuluka mchipanichi komanso chasankha a Brown Mpinganjira kukhala mneneri wa chipanichi ndi wachiwiri wawo a Henry Mussa ndipo akuti awiriwa adzithandizana ntchito ndi a Nicholas Dausi omwe ndi mlembi wofalitsa nkhani za chipanichi. “Palibe kusintha kulikonse kododometsa chifukwa choti olemekezeka Dr. Ben Phiri atula pansi udindo ngati Director of Elections ndipo Central Committee itakumana dzulo yasankha a Henry Matemba kukhala ogwilizira udindo umenewu,” anatero a Mpinganjira. A Mpinganjira ati akuluakuluwa sanakambiraneko za kusintha kwa mtsogoleri wa chipanichi monga ena akhala akufunira koma atsimikizira a Malawi kuti msonkhano waukulu wa chipanichi uchitika posachedwapa. Mneneri watsopanoyu wauzanso Radio Maria Malawi kuti mlembi wa chipanichi mayi Grezelder Jeffrey yemwe chipanichi chinamuchotsa masiku apitawa, waitanitsidwa ku komiti yosungitsa mwambo mchipanichi kuti akamve mbali yawo pa nkhaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chiwerengero cha Ana Onyentchera Chikuyembekezeka Kukwera
news: Akatswiri pa nkhani za madyedwe abwino mdziko muno ati pali chiyembekezo chakuti chiwerengero cha ana onyentchera kaamba kosowa zakudya za magulu, chitha kukwera mdziko muno potsatira kutsekedwa kwa sukulu. Shawa: Ana amathandizika ndi phala ku sukulu M’modzi mwa akatswiriwa, Dr. Mary Shawa anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iwo apempha boma kuti liwunikire bwino pa nkhaniyi maka pophunzitsa ena mwa aphuzitsi a m’sukulu za primary zomwe zili madera akumidzi kuti athandizane ndi alangizi a zaulimi polimbikitsa kadyedwe kabwino ka zakudya za magulu. “Ana amakamwa phala mamawa akafika ku sukulu, tsopano kutseka kwa sukulu kwapangitsa kuti kubwere mavuto ambiri maka kwa ana ena omwe ndi ovutika amati akamwa phala limene lija amakhala athandizika kwambiri,” anatero Dr. Shawa. Iwo apempha boma kuti libwezeretse pa ntchito aphunzitsi omwe analipo kale omwe adziyenda ndi alangizi a zaulimi m’makomo ndi kumawauza makolo nkhani ya zakudya zomwe zimafunika pakhomo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ayambiranso Kukumana ndi Anthu Lachitatu Lililonse
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walengeza kuti  ayambiranso kukumana ndi kulankhula kwa anthu lachitatu lililonse. Papa Francisco anasiya kukumana ndi kulankhula kwa anthu lachitatu lililonse miyezi isanu ndi umodzi yapitayo kaamba ka ndondomeko zomwe zinayikidwa zothandiza kupewa kufala kwa nthenda ya COVID-19. Papa kulankhula ndi anthu masiku a m’mbuyomu Lachitatu pa 26 August likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, ku Vatican, lalengeza kuti kuyambira sabata ya mawa pa 2 September akhristu ndi olandiridwa kukhala nawo pa zolankhulalankhula zomwe Papa Francisco amachita lachitatu lililonse. Polengeza izi ofesi yomwe imawona zochitikachitika za a Papa tsiku ndi tsiku yotchedwa kuti Prefecture of the Papal Household yati mwezi wonse wa September Papa’yu azikumana ndi kulankhula kwa anthu lachitatu lililonse pa bwalo la nyumba ya San Damaso ku likulu la Mpingowu m’malo mwa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso Hall ya Papa Paul Wa VI potsatira malangizo a anthu a za umoyo malinga ndi mliri wa coronavirus. Uthengawu wapitirira kunena kuti mwambowu mwezi wonse wa September uziyamba 9:30 m’mawa ndipo kuti onse ofuna kukhala nao pa mwambowu sazisowa kudula tikiti monga zimakhalira nthawi zonse. Lachitatu lililonse Papa amakumana ndi kulankhula kwa anthu pa maphunzitso a Mpingo osiyana-siyana. Kuyambira pa 11 March Papa Francisco wakhala akulankhula kwa anthu lachitatu lililonse kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti basi osakumana ndi anthu monga zimakhalira nthawi zonse malinga ndi ndondomeko zomwe adazikhazikitsa zopewera kufala kwa nthenda ya Covid 19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Mchipani cha DPP Mulibe Democracy’
news: M’modzi mwa a mkhalakale pa nkhani za ndale mdziko muno John Chikalimba wati kuchotsedwa kwa mlembi wamkulu wa chipani cha DPP mayi Grezelder Jeffrey kwawonetsa poyera kuti m’chipanicho mulibe democracy. Salinso m’maudindo awo -Jeffrey (kumanzere) ndi Phiri  Chikalimba yemwenso ndi phungu wa kunyumba ya malamulo mdera la Zomba Changalume wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti zomwe anayankhula mayi Jeffrey kuti President wa chipanichi Peter Mutharika atule pansi udindo wake, anali maganizo awo choncho panalibe chifukwa chowachotsera pa udindo wawo mchipanichi. Mwapadera Chikalimba wayamikira Dr. Ben Phiri chifukwa chotula pansi udindo wawo ngati mkulu owona za chisankho mchipani cha DPP ponena kuti kumeneku ndi kukhwima pa ndale kaamba koti munthu akawona kuti sanachite bwino paudindo wake amayenera kutula pansi udindowo. “Tikhoza kunena kuti akulowelera koma sanalowerere. Mwina pali zomwe ayambana iwowo ndi azinzawo ndipo aganiza kuti awachotse koma mu democracy chipani cholamula chikaluza chimakhala chikuya’ngana kuti wasokoneza ndi ndani ndipo apa ndi pamene tinganene kuti democracy yayenda bwino,” anatero a Chikalimba. Iwo ati mayi Jeffrey sanalakwitse polankhula za kukhosi koma achita zomwe democracy imafuna.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sukulu Zitsekulidwa Pa 7 September
news: Boma lalengeza kuti sukulu mdziko muno zitsekulidwa pa 7 September kutsatira kutsekedwa kwa sukuluzi pa 20 March chaka chino kamba ka mliri wa COVID-19. Walengeza za nkhaniyo-Nyalonje Polankhula pa msonkhano wa atolankhani mu mzinda wa Lilongwe, nduna yowona za maphunziro mdziko muno mayi Agness Nyalonje yati ophunzira a kalasi za mayeso okha zomwe ndi standade 8 komanso fomu 4 kuphatikizapo ophunzira omwe anali kalasi yotsiriza msukulu za ukachenjede ndi omwe ayambe maphunziro awo pa tsikuli ndipo ophunzira ena onse adzapita ku sukulu mkatikati mwa mwezi omwewo wa September. Ophunzira enanso omwe anali mchaka chotsiriza ku sukulu zosulira aphunzitsi akuti nawonso akayamba maphunziro awo pa tsikuli. Mayi Nyalonje ati apereka kale ndalama ku sukulu zonse mdziko muno zogulira zipangizo zopewera nthendayi monga ndowa za plastic, sopo, sanitaiza ndi zina ndipo aphunzitsi ayamba kale kuphunzitsidwa m’mene angachitire pophunzitsa anawa omwe bongo wawo wachita bwazi kamba kokhalitsa pakhomo. Aphunzitisiwa akuti aphunzitsidwanso momwe angasokere ma mask ndi cholinga choti ma mask-wa asamatheretu msukulu zawo. Ndunayi yati a unduna wa zamaphunziro komanso magulu ena okhudzidwa akukambiranabe ngati ndi koyenera kuti aphunzitsi adzipatsidwa ndalama za ukadziwotche mu nthawiyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Oyendetsa Sukulu mu Zone za Koche, Nkope Adandaula Ndi Kuchuluka Kwa Atsikana Otenga Pathupi
news: Akuluakulu oyendetsa sukulu mu zone za Nkope komanso Koche, adandaula ndi kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha atsikana a msukuluzi omwe akutenga mimba padakalipano pomwe ali pakhomo, kutsatira kutsekedwa kwa sukulu kaamba ka mliri wa Covid-19. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu oyendetsa sukulu ya Nkhudzibay m’bomali a Grey Nyasulu, awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti ana oposa khumi ndi omwe akumatenga pathupi pa mwezi umodzi. Iwo ati asodzi ndi omwe akukolezera mchitidwewu kaamba koti akumanyengelera atsikanawa ndi ndalama. “Pali mavuto angapo maka kwa ana omwe amasiyira sukulu panjira. Tikafuna kukambirana ndi makolo timakumana ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana ndipo adindo ena amakolezera mchititdwewu. Kuno ndi kunyanja ndipo kumabwera alendo osiyana-siyana omwe amakhala ndi ndalama zomwe amagwiritsa ntchito powanyengelera anawa,” anatero a Nyasulu. Polankhulapo m’modzi mwa akuluakulu ku ofesi yowona za maphunziro m’boma la Mangochi mayi Joyce Kululunga apempha makomiti onse a msukulu kuti apitilire kugwira ntchito zawo ngakhale sukuluzi zidakali zotseka popitiriza kudziwitsa ana achitsikana za ubwino wa maphunziro ndi kuyipa kolekera sukulu panjira. “Kutsekedwa kwa sukulu kusakhale kuti ndi mathero a ntchito za makomiti koma apititirizebe kugwira ntchito zawo komanso pasakhale kusankhana pakati pa makomiti kuti  ntchitozi zipite patsogolo,” anatero mayi Kululanga. Pamenepa mayi Kululanga alangiza atsikana omwe atenga pathupi mu nyengo ya mliriri wa COVID-19 kuti adzabwelere ku sukulu akadzachira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Unduna Wati Udzipereka Potukula Ntchito Zokopa Alendo Mdziko Muno
news: Unduna owona zokopa alendo, chikhalidwe ndi nyama zakutchire wati maphunziro a adindo okhudzidwa ndi nkhani zokopa alendo omwe akuchitika m’boma la Mangochi, athandiza kwambiri pa ntchito zokopa alendo mdziko muno. Mlembi wamkulu mu undunawu a Isaac Katopola anena izi lolemba potsekulira maphunzirowa omwe akhale akuchitika kwa masiku khumi. Iwo ati bizinesi zokopa alendo pakati pa a Malawi eni ake, zakhala zikubwelera m’buyo kamba kosowa ukadaulo woyenera woyendetsera bizinesi-zi. Polankhulapo woyimira kampani Howarth yomwe inachita m’gwirizano ndi unduna wa zokopa alendo pa nkhani za kafukufuku wokhudza njira zabwino zothandizira kutukulira ma bizinesi ang’onoang’ono a zokopa alendo mdziko muno, Dr. Peter Jere ati maphunzirowa ndi ofunika mu mbiri ya zokopa alendo mdziko muno, kamba koti adindo omwe akulandira maphunzirowa atumidwanso ndi undunawu, kuti akaphunzitse magulu a anthu osiyanasiyana ochita bizinesi zing’ono-zing’ono za okopa alendowa mdziko muno. Maphunziro-wa omwe akutchedwa Trainning of Trainers Capacity Bulding And Skills Development For Micro Small Medium Enterprises Youth And Women In Tourism Industry In Malawi akuchitika ndi thandizo lochokera ku boma la Malawi ndi bungwe la African Development Bank
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akatswiri Ati Tonse Alliance Siyingagwiritse Ntchito Section 65
news: M’modzi mwa akatswiri pa ndale mdziko muno, George Phiri wati ndi povuta kuti boma la Tonse Alliance liyambe kugwiritsa ntchito gawo 65 ya malamulo a dziko lino kaamba ka msamuko pa ndale omwe wayamba kale. Phiri wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti padakalipano pomwe aphungu ena otsutsa ayamba kale kulowa mzipani zomwe zili mu mgwirizano wa Tonse omwe ukulamula padalipano, ndi kovuta kuti lamuloli lomwe limaletsa aphungu kusintha zipani, liyambe kugwira ntchito. Iye wati mwazina lamulolinso likukanika kuyamba kugwira ntchito kutsatira kuchotsedwa kwa gawo 64 m’malamulo a dziko lino, ponena kuti malamulo awiriwa amayendera limodzi. “Section 64 ndi imene imawapatsa mphamvu anthu kuti achotse phungu wawo ngati wachita zomwe iwo samafuna ndipo kuchotsedwa kwa section imeneyi kwapangitsa kuti section 65 isiye kugwira ntchito bwino kamba koti ma section-wa amagwira ntchito bwino limodzi,” anatero Phiri. Iye wati zikhala zovuta kuti Tonse Alliance iyambe kugwiritsa ntchito lamuloli Kamba koti ngati lingayambe kugwira ntchito zitanthauza kuti anthu onse amene alowa kumene mzipani zomwe zili mu mgwirizano wa Tonse, achotsedwe maudindo awo. Chisinthireni ulamuliro wa dziko lino pa 23 June chaka chino, anthu ochuluka akutuluka zipani zotsutsa ndi kulowa zipani zomwe zili mbali yolamula ndipo ambiri mwa aiwo akulowa mzipani za MCP ndi UTM.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Akhritsu Kuti Apemphelere Anthu Omwe Ali M’mavuto Osiyanasiyana
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati ndi kofunika kumakumbukira anthu omwe ali m’mavuto osiyanasiyana ndi kumawapempherera. Polankhula kwa akhristu a mpingo wa katolika ochokera ku Bergamo m’dziko la Italy omwe anali nawo pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square lamulungu, Papa Francisco wati ndi chinthu chotamandika kumawapempherera anthu omwe ali m’mavuto osiyana-siyana. Iye wati ngozi za chilengedwe komanso mliri wa Coronavirus ndi ena mwa mavuto omwe akusowa mapemphero. Iye walankhula izi kwa akhristuwa omwe afika mu mzinda wa Rome ndi cholinga chofuna kupemphelera onse omwe akhudzidwa mu njira zosiyana-siyana ndi mliri wa Coronavirus. Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa kumva za nkhani ya banja lina lomwe lataya agogo awiri tsiku limodzi chifukwa cha mliri wa Coronavirus. Iye wati ndi wa chisoni chifukwa cha anthu ambiri omwe akuvutika chifukwa cha mavuto osiyanasiyana omwe akukumana nawo pa nthawi imeneyi ya mliri wa Coronavirus komanso ndi wa chisoni chifukwa cha anthu ambiri monga ansembe, ma dokotala, a namwino omwe amwalira kotero chinthu choyenera kuchita ndi kulimbikira kupemphera pa nthawi imeneyi. Papa Francisco wakumbutsa anthu mzolankhulalankhula zake kuti tsopano papita zaka zinayi chichitikireni ngozi ya chivomerezi m’dziko la Italy yomwe idapha anthu pafupi 300 ku madera a Umbria, Lazio, Abruzzo komanso Marche. M’mapemphero ake pa tsikuli kwa anthu omwe ali m’mavuto osiyana-siyana iye sadaiwalenso kupempherera anthu a m’dziko la Mozambique maka a m’chigawo cha ku mpoto kwa dzikolo cha Cabo Delgado chifukwa cha magulu a za uchifwamba omwe akuvutitsa anthu ku deralo ndipo wati pamene akupempherera anthu m’dzikolo sakuiwala za ulendo wake wokacheza m’dzikolo chaka chatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chipani cha DPP Chachotsa Mlembi Wake
news: Chipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP), chachotsa mlembi wake wamkulu mayi Grezelder Jeffrey, pa udindowu. Jeffrey: Kodi kunena kuti tikufuna mtsogoleri wina n’kulakwa? Mayi Jeffrey atsimikiza za nkhanyi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi koma iwo ati sanalandire kalata yowauza za nkhaniyi ndipo m’malo mwake angolandira lamya kuchokera kwa a Francis Mphepo omwe ndi mlangizi wamkulu wa mtsogoleri wakale wa dziko lino Peter Mutharika pa nkhani za ndale. Iwo ati akuganiza kuti kuchotsedwa kwawo kukulumikizana ndi nkhani yomwe iwo ananena kuti ayitanitsa msonkhano waukulu wa chipanichi kuti asankhe mtsogoleri wawo watsopano kndipo uti a Mutharika achoke pa udindowu. “Kodi kunena kuti munthu achoke pa udindo tiyitaniktse convention anthu asankhe mtsogoleri wina ndi kulakwa? Ubwino wake udindo wanga ndi wosankhidwa ku convention,” anatero mayi Jeffrey. Tinafuna kumva kuchoka kwa a Francis Mphepo koma samayankha lamya yawo pamene mneneri wa chipani cha DPP a Nicholas Dausi anati tilankhule nawo nthawi ina kamba koti pa nthawiyi anali pa msonkhano.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akusowa Mapemphero Ochuluka
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati akusowa mapemphero ochuluka. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wanena izi kwa gulu lina la akhristu a mpingo wa katolika a mdziko la Italy lomwe lapita kukapemphera ku malo oyera a Ludzi mdziko la France. Iye wauza gululi kuti akusowa mapemphero a iye mwini komanso mapemphero pa zinthu zina kuti ziyende bwino. Lolemba pa 24 August Papa Francisco analankhula kudzera pa lamya ndi Cardinal Angelo De Donatis yemwe ndi Vicar General wa diocese ya Rome asadanyamuke ndi gulu la akhristu ena pa ulendo wopita ku malo oyera a Lourdes mdziko la France. Cardinal De Donatis wauza atolankhani komanso gulu la akhristu mu ndenge za lamya yomwe walandira kuchokera kwa Papa Francisco yopempha gululi mapemphero a iye mwini komanso mapemphero pa zinthu zina kuti ziyende bwino. “Papa Francisco wandipempha kuti ndikudalitseni nonsenu komanso akuti mumupempherere ndi kumuikiza m’manja mwa Amayi Maria,” watero Cardinal De Donatis powuza gulu la akhristu komanso atolankhani mu ndege pa ulendo wa ku malo oyera ku Lourdes mdziko la France. Cardinal De Donatis akutsogolera gulu la akhristu okwana 185 kuchokera mu diocese ya Rome pa ulendo wokapemphera ku malo oyera’wa atachira ku nthenda ya Covid 19. Mu gululi muli akhristu eni ake, ansembe makumi anayi (40), ma episkopi anayi, atolankhani komanso ogwira ntchito za chipatala omwe adathandiza Cardinal’yu pamene amadwala nthenda ya Covid 19. M’mawu ake kwa atolankhani pa za ulendowu Cardinal De Donatis wati ulendowu ndi wopereka chiyembekezo pa nthawi ino ya mliri wa coronavirus. Ku mapeto a mwezi wa March chaka chonchino Cardinal’yu adagwidwa ndi nthenda ya Covid 19 ndipo adakhala m’chipatala masiku 11 kenaka adatuluka kupita kunyumba kukamalizitsa kuchita zina ndi zina kuti achire bwinobwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Asilamu, Akhristu Ati Apitilira Kukhalirana mwa Mtendere
news: Zipembedzo za chisilamu ndi chikhristu zati zipitilira kukhalirana mwa mtendere mdziko muno. Anatsogolera zokambiranazo-bambo Saindi Atsogoleri a Muslim Association of Malawi komanso Evangelical Association of Malawi ndi omwe anena izi pambuyo pa kutha kwa kusamvana komwe kunalipo pa nkhani yokhudza chikwangwani chomwe a chipembedzo cha chisilamu anayika mu nsewu wa Masauko Chipembere mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Chabulika: Tipitilira kukhalirana mwa mtendere Poyankhulapo wapampando yemwe anatsogolera zokambirana za mbali ziwirizi kuchokera ku bungwe la PAC, bambo Henry Saindi ati magulu onse okhudzidwa akonzeka kukhalira limodzi pofuna kulemekeza ufulu wa chipembedzo mdziko muno. Msonkhano wa atolankhaniwu wachitika pambuyo pa mkumano wa bungweli ndi magulu onse okhudzidwa omwe ndi a Muslim Association of Malawi komanso Evangelical Association of Malawi omwe anayamba amvana chimodzi kaye asanauze mtundu wa Malawi mfundo zomwe agwirizanazi. M’mawu ake mneneri wa Muslim Association of Malawi Sheikh Dinala Chabulika anati cholinga cholemba chikwangwanichi sichinali chonyozetsa mabuku a zipembedzo zina koma kuyitanira anthu kuti aziwerenga Q’uaran choncho abweleranso kwa omwe analemba chikwangwanichi a Islamic Information Bureau kuti akonze mawu olakwikawo. Naye mlembi wa Evangelical Association of Malawi m’busa Francis Mkandawire wati adziwitsanso otsatira ake za kutha kwa kusemphana maganizoku.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la CDEDI Lapempha Boma Kuti Likwaniritse Malonjezo Ake
news: Bungwe la Centre for Democracy and Economic Development Initiative (CDEDI) lapempha boma kuti liyambe kukwaniritsa mfundo zomwe analonjeza pa nthawi yokopa anthu. Namiwa: AMalawi akuyembekezera Mkulu wa bungweli a Sylvester Namiwa ndi omwe anena izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe bungweli linachititsa lero mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iwo ati mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera komanso wachiwiri wake Dr. Saulosi Chilima, ayike ndondomeko zogwira mtima pomwe nyumba ya malamulo ikumane koyamba mu ulamuliro wawo. “Pamene nyumba ya malamulo ikukumana aMalawi akuyembekezera zinthu zimene Tonse Alliance inalonjeza ndipo zina mwaizo ndi feteleza wotsika mtengo komanso kuchepetsa  msonkho ndi zina zambiri,” anatero a Namiwa. Mvula: Ndi zosatheka kuti zonsezi zichitike pakamodzi Polankhulapo m’modzi mwa a katswiri pa nkhani za ndale mdziko muno a Humphreys Mvula ati sizingatheke kuti boma likwaniritse malonjezo ake onse omwe analonjeza nthawi imodzi koma m’malo mwake iwo apempha mtsogoleri wa dziko lino kuti azimasuka powuza mtundu wa a Malawi ma plan omwe akhazikitsidwa ndi cholinga choti anthu azikhala ndi chiyembekezo cha momwe ntchito za chitukuko zidziyendera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MOAM Yati ndi Yokhumudwa ndi Mpungwepungwe pa Nkhani ya ‘Migodi’ mu Limbe
news: Bungwe la eni minibus mdziko muno la Minibus Owners Association (MOAM) lati ndi lokhumudwa ndi mpungwempungwe omwe oyitanira minibus akhala akuchita mu tawuni ya Limbe mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Mlembi wa bungwe-li a Coxley Kamange anena izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe bungweli lachititsa mu mzinda wa Blantyre. A Kamange ati ndi zokhumudwitsa kuwona kuti oyitanira minibus okhaokha akumenyana kamba ka kusintha kwa ulamuliro wa dziko lino zomwe anati zikusokoneza ntchito zonyamula anthu kupita nawo ku madera osiyanasiyana. “Ife ngati a Minibus Owners Association ndife okhumudwa ndi ziwawa zomwe zikuchitika zomwenso zayambitsa mpungwempungwe makamaka ma members athu, choncho ife timalimbikitsa mtendere ndipo paili anthu omwe akuyambitsa zimenezi maka-maka oyitanira omwe akuziwa kuti lamulo limaletsa kuyitanira minibus,” anatero a Kamange. Iwo ati malamulo a bungwe lawo samalora kuti pakhale oyitanira minibus choncho ndi kofunika kuti khonsolo ya mzinda-wu ndi apolisi achitepo kanthu msanga pofuna kukonza dongosolo labwino logwilira ntchito zonyamula anthu mu mzinda-wu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mliri wa Coronavirus Waonetsa Poyera Kusiyana Kwa Pakati Pa Olemera Ndi Osauka
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati mliri wa Coronavirus wawulula matenda ena aakulu pakati pa anthu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lachitatu ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Pali kusiyana kwakukulu-Papa Iye wati pano pomwe anthu akusakasaka mankhwala a nthenda ya COVID-19, akuyenera kupezanso njira zothetsera matenda ena aakulu monga kusiyana kwakukulu komwe kulipo pakati pa anthu osauka ndi olemera komanso kusowa kwa chilungamo. Popitiriza maphunzitso ake okhudza moyo wa anthu mogwirizana ndi maphunzitso a mpingo (Social Doctrine of the Church), Papa Francisco wati pambali posakasaka mankhwala othanirana ndi mliri wa Coronavirus akhristu ali pa ntchito ina yochiza dziko la pansi ku matenda ena aakulu. Iye wati matenda ena aakulu osowa kuwachiza ndi kusowa kwa chilungamo pa dziko, kusiyana kwakukulu komwe kulipo pakati pa anthu olemera ndi osauka, kuponderezana komanso kusalabada za anthu osauka. Papa Francisco wati mliri wa Coronavirus sudangobweretsa pa mbalambanda mavuto omwe anthu osauka amakumana nao tsiku ndi tsiku komanso waonetsa kusiyana komwe kulipo pakati pa anthu mmagawo osiyana-siyana a moyo. Papa Francisco wati potsanzira zomwe Yesu Khristu anali kuchita ndi kuphunzitsa, mkhristu weniweni amadziwika pokhala wachidwi ndi moyo wa anthu osauka, odwala ndi a ku ndende. Iye watsindika kuti mkhristu aliyense payekhapayekha komanso Mpingo ukuyenera kukhala kumbali ya anthu osauka monga momwe Mau a Mulungu anenera. Pomaliza pa za mabungwe osiyana-siyana omwe akulandira chithandizo cha ndalama nthawi imeneyi m’dzina la anthu osauka Papa Francisco wati chithandizochi chikuyenera kuperekedwa kwa ma bungwe okhawo omwe amalabadira za anthu osauka.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la CDEDI Lauza Chakwera Achite Machawi Posankha Akuluakulu a Nthambi za Boma
news: Bungwe la Center for Democracy and Economic Development Initiatives (CDEDI) lati kuchedwa kusankhidwa kwa akuluakulu a nthambi za boma zosiyanasiyana kungakolezere mchitidwe wosakaza chuma cha boma kudzera mu nthambizi. Namiwa: Pali manong’onong’o ochuluka Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za bungweli Sylvester Namiwa wanena izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iye wati bungweli likudabwa kuti boma likuchedwa kusankha adindo a mu nthambizi pa zifukwa zosadziwika bwino. Banda: A Malawi adekhe “Pali manong’onong’o kuti zipani zija zinachuluka ndiye akukanganirana maudindo pomwe ena akuti akuchedwa dala chifukwa akufuna asololeko kuti adzipepese kuti adzizanena kuti ndalamazo zinabedwa nthawi ya ulamuliro wapiti uja,” anatero Namiwa. Koma poyankhapo pa nkhaniyi, mneneri wa mtsogoleri wa dizko lino, Brian Banda wati anthu asawone kuchedwa chifukwa mtsogoleriyu asankha maudindowa posachedwapa. Mvula: Ndalama sizingabedwe “A president analonjeza sabata yatha kuti pasanathe masiku 40 akhala atasankha ndipo masiku amenewo sanathe chifukwa kwatsala masabata awiri ndiye amalawi adekhe,” anatero Banda. Koma m’modzi mwa akatswiri omwe amalankhulapo pa nkhani zosiyanasiyana Humphreys Mvula wati palibe chiwopsezo kuti kusowa kwa akuluakulu a nthambizi kungachititse kuti ndalama zibedwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mnyamata Wachichepere Akagwira Ukayidi Zaka 5 Pa Mlandu Wakuba
news: Bwalo loyamba la milandu m’boma la Mangochi lalamula mnyamata wina wa zaka 19 kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka zisanu atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu wakuba. Woyimira boma pa mlandu Sergeant Augustine Kagwira anauza bwalolo kuti mnyamatayu Thom Kachikho ndi anzake ena awiri omwe akusakidwabe ndi apolisi, analanda chikwama mayi wina yemwe anali pa njinga ya kabaza pa msika wa Mpondasi ndipo m’chikwamacho munali ndalama yokwana 250 thousand kwacha. Mayiyu akuti anakuwa ndipo anthu a midzi yozungulira ndi omwe anathandiza pogwira mnyamatayu. Polankhula mu bwaloli, Kachikho anapempha bwalolo kuti limupatse chilango chofewerako kaamba koti ndi wamng’ono ndipo sakuyenera kupita ku ndende. Koma mkulu woyimira boma pa mlanduwu anati mnyamatayu akuyenera akakhale ku ndende kaamba koti anthu a mderali akhala akudandaula kwa nthawi yaitali kuti amachitidwa chiwembu pa malowa. Pamenepa First Grade Magistrate Roy Kakutu anagwirizana ndi oyimira boma pa mlanduyu ndi kulamulu mnyamatayu kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka zisanu kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Thom Kachikho amachokera m’mudzi mwa Saiti-Kadzuwa mfumu yaikulu Mponda m’boma lomwelo la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapereka Zipangizo za Mchipatala ku Dziko la Brazil
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wapereka thandizo la zipangizo za mchipatala ku dziko la Brazil. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wapereka thandizoli pofuna kusonyeza chikondi komanso kukhudzidwa kwake pa nthawi ino ya mliri wa Coronavirus. Chiyambireni mliri wa Coronavirus, Papa Francisco wakhala akuthandiza maiko osiyana-siyana ndi zipangizo za m’chipatalazi. Malinga ndi ofesi yofalitsa mauthenga osiyanasiyana ku Vatican, yotchedwa Holy See Press Office kudzera m’kalata yomwe yatulutsa lolemba pa 17 August 2020, yati Papa Francisco wapereka thandizo la zipangizo za m’chipatala ku dziko la Brazil. Kalata’yi yagwira mau a Cardinal Konrad Krajewski yemwe ndi mkulu wa Ofesi yomwe imaona ntchito za chifundo za a Papa yotchedwa Office of Papal Charities onena kuti Papa’yu wapereka thandizo la makina otchedwa ventilators okwana 8 othandiza anthu omwe akuvutika kupuma bwino kuti athe kupuma mosavutika ndi zipangizo zina 6 zopima momwe m’thupi muliri zotchedwa ultra sound scanners. Cardinal Krajewski wati thandizoli latheka kudzera mu bungwe lina la m’dziko la Italy lomwe limagwiranso ntchito za chifundo lotchedwa Hope Association lomwe limathandiza ana ndi magulu a anthu osiyana-siyana maka pa ntchito za umoyo ndi maphunziro. Katunduyu amutumiza ku zipatala za m’dziko la Brazil kudzera mu ofesi ya nduna kapena kuti kazembe wa a Papa (Apostolic Nuncio) m’dzikolo. Dziko la Brazil liri pa nambala 2 pa mndandanda wa maiko omwe mliri wa Coronavirus wavuta kwambiri pa dziko lonse la pansi komwe anthu oposa 3.3 million agwidwa ndi nthenda ya Covid 19 ndipo anthu pafupi 108,000 amwalira chifukwa cha nthendayi. Lachisanu lapitali Papa Francisco adaperekanso thandizo la zipangizo za m’chipatala ku dziko la Malawi kudzera mwa nduna yake (Apostolic Nuncio) Archbishop Giafranco Gallone.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dayozisi ya Dedza Yapempha Mipingo Ithandize Anthu Okhuzidwa Ndi Mliri wa COVID-19
news: Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za dayosizi ya Dedza, bambo John Chithonje ati ndi ndi kofunika kuti mipingo itengepo mbali pothandiza anthu omwe akhudzidwa ndi mavuto osiyana-siyana kamba ka mliri wa Covid-19. Chithonje: Mliriwu wakhudza mabanja ambiri Bambo Chithonje anena izi loweluka pa mwambo wopereka thandizo la chimanga chomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) kudzera mu bungwe la zaumoyo mu mpingowu la Catholic Heath Commission lapereka ku parish ya Ntcheu mu dayosiziyi. Thandizoli lagawidwa kwa anthu omwe akhudzidwa ndi mliri wa Covid-19 mu njira zosiyanasiyana mu parishi-yo. “Tikudziwa tonsefe ku mliriwu wapangitsa anthu ena omwe amachita mabizinesi ang’ono ang’ono kuthandiza makolo awo kuti alephere kamba koti mliriwu wakhudza ma bizinesi osiyanasiyana,” anatero bamboo Chithonje. Ndipo polankhulapo m’modzi mwa anthu omwe analandira thandizoli Mayi Lucia Windo, ayamikira mpingo wa katolika kamba kathandizoli ponena kuti athandizika kumbali ya chakudya.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Ntcheu Adandaula Ndi Kuchuluka Kwa Milandu Yogwililira, Atsikana Otenga Mimba
news: Apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu ati ndi okhumudwa ndi kukula kwa milandu yogwililira komanso kuchuluka kwa atsikana omwe atenga mimba m’bomalo, pa nthawi ino yomwe anawa ali pakhomo. Chigalu: Atsikana akukumana ndi nkhanza Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub-Inspector Hastings Chigalu wanena izi lolemba pamene apolisiwa amaphunzitsa adindo osiyanasiyana pofuna kuteteza ana kutenga mimba komanso kulowa m’banja msanga pomwe ali pakhomo kutsatira kutsekedwa kwa sukulu kaamba ka mliri wa Covid-19.  Iye wati maphunzirowa adza kutsatira kuchuluka kwa chiwerengero cha atsikana omwe atenga mimba mu miyezi isanu yapitayi m’bomalo. “Kupatula mliri wa Covid-19 omwe wakhudza dziko lino, ana achitsikana atha kupitilira kukumana ndi nkhaza zosiyana-siyana ngati satetezedwa mokwanira ndipo ofesi ya apolisi ndi yokhumdwa ndi kukula kwa mchitidwe ogwililira,” anatero Sub Inspector Chigalu. Mwapadera, iwo apempha adindo mdziko muno kuti athandize apolisi poteteza anawa ku nkhaza zosiyanasiyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Ziyaye Apempha Akhritsu Alimbike Kupemphera
news: Arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, Ambuye Tarcizio Ziyaye apempha akhristu mdziko muno kuti achilimike m’mapemphero awo kuti mliri wa Covid-19 utheretu. Ziyaye: Tiyenera kumapemphera Ambuye Ziyaye anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Mwazina iwo ati akhristu akuyenera kuyika patsogolo Mulungu, komanso kutsatira malangizo omwe anakhazikitsidwa ndi boma, opewera kupatsirana kwa kachilomboka. “Tiyenera kumapemphera, inde ndi matenda owopsa koma sitiyenera kutaya mtima tiyenera kulimbikira mapemphero komanso tizitsatira njira zozitetezera zomwe mpingo ngakhalenso a chipatala akutipempha kuti titsatire,” anatero ambuye Ziyaye.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadzudzula Zipolowe Zomwe Zachitika Mdziko la Belarus
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wadzudzula zipolowe zomwe zakhala zikuchitika mdziko la Belarus. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wadzudzula za zipolowezi lamulungu ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati mavuto a mdziko la Belarus angathe pochita zokambirana komanso powonetsetsa kuti chilungamo chiwoneke poyera pa zomwe anthu akudandaula kuti chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa dzikolo sichinayende bwino. Potsatira zipolowe zomwe zakhala zikuchitika mdziko la Belarus kwa sabata ya tunthu, Papa Francisco lamulungu wapemphelera anthu mdzikolo kuti choncho ndi chithandizo cha Mulungu chilungamo chiyende ngati madzi komanso kuti awone kufunika kothetsa mavuto pochita zokambirana. Iye wati akutsatira bwino zomwe zikuchitika m’dzikolo maka zipolowe zomwe zakhala zikuchitika kaamba koti anthu sakukhutira ndi momwe chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa dziko chayendera mdzikolo. “Ndikutsatira bwino za mavuto omwe agwa m’dziko la Belarus ndipo ndi kupempha kuti anthu akane kuchita zipolowe ndipo m’malo mwake atsate njira yokhayo yomwe ndi yolemekeza malamulo potsatira ndondomeko zovomerezeka zothetsera mavuto m’dzikolo ndipo ndi kuikiza dzikoli m’manja mwa Amai Maria mfumukazi ya mtendere,” watero Papa Francisco. Pa 9 August 2020 zipolowe zidabuka mu mzinda wa Minsk, likulu la dziko la Belarus bungwe loyendetsa chisankho litalengeza za kupambana kwa Alexander Lukashenko yemwe wakhala akulamulira dzikolo kuyambira chaka cha 1994. Bungwe la European Union lati chisankho m’dzikolo sichidayende mwachilungamo ndipo ladzudzula boma chifukwa chopondereza ufulu wa anthu m’dzikolo. Ndipo nalo bungwe la United Nations lati zomwe zikuchitika m’dzikolo ndi kuphwanya ma ufulu a anthu. Anthu pafupi 7000 amangidwa pa zipolowe zomwe zakhala zikuchitika zoonetsa kusakondwa ndi momwe chisankho chayendera mdzikolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Wapempha Maiko a mu SADC Alumikizane pa Malonda
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Mc-Cathy Chakwera wapempha   maiko a mchigawo cha SADC kulimbikitsa ubale wabwino pa nkhani za malonda. Mtsogoleriyu walankhula izi lolemba pa mkumano wa number 40 wa atsogoleri a maiko mu SADC. Mkumanowu omwe umayenera kuchitikira mdziko la Mozambique koma kamba ka matenda a Covid-19, wachitika kudzera pa makina a internet pomwe anatsogolera ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko la Mozambique a Phillip Nyusi. Chakwera walimbikitsa za ubale wabwino pakati pa maiko amu SADC maka pa nkhani za malonda ndipo wapempha atsogoleri a maiko a SADC kuti akwaniritse maloto a mtsogoleri wakale wa dziko la Tanzania malemu Benjamin Mkapa ngati njira imodzi yomupatsira ulemu pa ntchito yotamandika yomwe anagwira. Patsikuli president wa dziko la Tanzania, John Pombe Joseph Magufuli yemwe anali wapampando wa bungweli, wapereka udindowu kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko la Mozambique Fillipe Nyusi. Malipoti akusonyeza kuti mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Lazarus Chakwera wasankhidwa kuti ndi amene adzakhale wapampando wa bungweli chaka cha mawa zomwenso zikutanthauza kuti msonkhanoi wa mtunduwu udzachitikira mdziko la Malawi chaka cha mawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Catholic University Yati Ikukhutira Ndi Momwe Yaperekera Maphunziro a pa Intaneti
news: Sukulu ya ukachenjede ya mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno (Catholic University) yati ndi yokhutira ndi maphunziro omwe yakhala ikupereka kwa ophunzira ake kudzera pa makina a internet. M’modzi wa akuluakulu oyendetsa sukuluyi a Francis Nkhoma anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi mu mzinda wa Blantyre. A Nkhoma ati kudzera pa makinawa, sukuluyi yakwanitsa kuphunzitsa komanso kulembetsa mayeso kwa ophunzirawa ngakhale panali zovuta zina. “Ntchito yamaphunziro ya ophunzitra pa intaneti yaenda bwino ndipo ngati chithu chatsopano chayenda bwino ngakhale panali zovuta zina,” anatero Nkhoma. Iwo atinso sukuluyi ndi yokonzeka kuyambanso kupereka maphunziro ngati sukulu zingatsekulidwe mwezi wa September potengera lonjezo la mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu Ayamikira Maepiskopi Pomenya Nkhondo Kuti Mapemphero Apitilire
news: M’modzi mwa akristu a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno a Patrick Kombe ayamikira ma episkopi a mpingowu kamba kochitapo kanthu kuti akhristu ake ayambirenso kusonkhana m’matchalitchi mdziko muno. A Kombe omwe amapemphera ku parish ya Limbe mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre alankhula izi patangodutsa masiku ochepa maepiskopi a mpingowu atalengeza kuti mapemphero ayambirenso kuchitika m’matchalitchi a mpingowu mdziko muno. Iwo apempha adindo mdziko muno kuti adziwonetsetsa kaye zinthu momwe zikuyendera asanapange ziganizo zawo. “Ndi zoonadi kuti lamulungu sabata yatha pamene komiti yoyan’ganira za Covid-19 italengeza kuti anthu 10 azibwera ku tchalitchi, tiyamike ma episkopi athu kamba koti anachitapo kanthu potulutsa chikalata chotsutsana ndi ganizoli mwansanga,” anatero a Kombe. Iwo ati ngakhale anthu opezeka ndi kachilomboka akupitilira kupezeka mdziko muno, ndi kofunikanso kuwona kuti anthu ochira akuchulukira choncho palibe chifukwa chenicheni chotsekera matchalitchi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Magulu Okhudzidwa Akambirane Pa Nkhani Ya Mtsinje Wa Nile
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco walimbikitsa zokambirana pakati pa mbali zonse zokhudzidwa pa mpungwepungwe omwe ulipo pa nkhani yokhudza mtsinje wa Nile. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi loweruka ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati ndi kofunika kuti maiko a Egypt, Ethiopia ndi Sudan asankhe njira yokambirana kuti mtsinje wa Nile upitirize kubweretsa umodzi ndi ubale pakati pa maiko’wa osati kugawikana. Iye wati akutsatira ndi chidwi zokambirana zonse zomwe zikuchitika zokhudza mtsinjewu ndi zovuta zomwe zilipo pakati pa maiko atatu okhudzidwawa. Pitirizani zokambirana za bata kuti choncho mtsinjewu upitirire kubweretsa umodzi ndi ubale osati chidani ndi kukangana, watero Papa Francisco. Ntchito yomanga damu pa mtsinje wa Nile yodziwika mchingerezi kuti the Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam (GERD) inayamba mwezi wa April m’chaka cha 2011 kudera lina m’dziko la Ethiopia pafupi ndi dziko la Sudan. Malowa omwe akhale aakulu mu Africa monse pa nkhani yopanga magetsi ndi tchito yomwe ikuyembekezeka kudya ndalama zosachepera 4.5 billion za ma dollar a ku America. Nkhani yomanga damu pa mtsinjewu yautsa mapiri pa chigwa pakati pa maiko a Egypt, Ethiopia ndi Sudan kaamba koti pali nkhawa yoti ntchitoyi itha kuchepetsa mphamvu ya madzi mu mtsinjewu ku maiko omwe amadalira mtsinjewu pa ntchito zina. Zokambirana zakhala zikuchitika zofuna kubweretsa chimvano pakati pa maiko atatuwa mothandizidwa ndi maiko ena komanso ma bungwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Eni Sukulu Zoyima Pazokha Ayamikira Ganizo Lotsekulanso Sukulu
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino, Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wati boma layamba kukonza ndondomeko zowonetsetsa kuti moyo wa anthu mdziko muno ubwerenso mchimake mu nyengo ino ya mliri wa COVID-19. Walengeza zotsekulanso sukulu-Chakwera Mtsogoleriyu wayankhula izi loweruka mu program ya Malawi watsopano pa wailesi ya MBC pomwe wati akufunitsitsa kuti nkhani zachuma ziyambe kuyendanso bwino mdziko muno. Iye wati zina mwa ndondomekozi ndi zokhudza maphunziro komanso zamayendedwe, zomwe wati zikuyembekezeka kuyambiranso kumayambiliro a mwezi wa mawa. Padakalipano eni sukulu zoyima pazokha ayamikira mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera kamba kobwera ndi ganizo loti maphunziro ayambenso mdziko muno mwezi wa mawa. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu a gulu lokhuzidwa lopangidwa ndi eni sukulu zoyima pazokha la Concerned Directors of Independent schools a Coxley Kamange ndi omwe anena izi pothilirapo ndemanga pa zomwe president wa dziko linoyu walankhula usiku wa loweruka. Iwo ati ndi okondwa kuti mu uthenga wake kwa a Malawi, Pulesidentiyu wanenapo zakuyambanso kwa maphunziro mdziko muno mwezi wa September 2020 ngakhale nthenda ya COVID-19 ikupitilirabe kukhudza dziko lino. Pamenepa iwo ati awonetsetsa kuti sukulu zawo zikusatira ndondomeko zonse zothandizira kuchepetsa kufala kwa nthendayi pakati pa aphunzitsi ndi ophunzira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akagwira Ukayidi Zaka Zitatu Kamba Kopezeka Ndi Mano A Mvuu
news: Bwalo la milandu m’boma la Mangochi, lalamula bambo wina, kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka zitatu, kamba kopezeka ndi mano a mvuu, zomwe ndi zotsutsana ndi malamulo oteteza nyama zakuthengo. Woyimira boma pa milandu m’bomalo Superidendent Josophine Chigawa anauza bwalolo kuti bamboyu Matola Ishmael wa zaka 41, anamangidwa pa 2 August atapezeka akugulitsa mano 9 a mvuu, ndipo anthu akufuna kwabwino anakatsina khutu apolisi za nkhaniyi. Superidendent Chigawa anati bamboyu anakachotsa mano a mvuu yomwe inaphedwa ndi oyan’ganira nyama za mnkhalango atawuzidwa ndi anthu a m’mudziwo kuti nyamayo imawononga mbewu. Mkuluyu anauvomera mlanduwu koma anapempha bwalolo kuti limpatse chilango chofewerako kaamba koti ali ndi banja lomwe amasamalira. Koma popereka chigamulo, Senior Resident Magistrate Joshua Nkhono anati bamboyu akuyenera akakhale ku ndende zaka zitatu ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula-gaga, kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Matola Ishmael amachokera m’mudzi mwa Dimu mfumu yaikulu Chowe m’boma lomwelo la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ofesi ya PMS Ikukumana Ndi Atsogoleri Amu Mpingo Pokonzekera Chibalalitso
news: Ofesi yowona ntchito za mabungwe a utumiki wa a Papa mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe yayamba kukumana ndi atsogoleri komanso magulu osiyanasiyana a mu mpingo, pofuna kukonzekera bwino chibalalitso cha mpingo. Mkulu wa mu ofesiyi, bambo Francis Lekaleka ndi omwe anena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati pakadali pano ofesi yawo yayamba kale kukumana ndi atsogoleri owona ntchito za utumiki mu arkidayosiziyo omwe atathandize kubweretsa pamodzi mabungwe onse a mu mpingo. “Ife talumikizana ndi a pastoral ofesi department ya zautumiki kuti tikhale pansi ndi mabungwe onse amu mpingo kuti tibweretse chidwi chatsopano kwa atnhu kuti asafooke,” anatero bambo Lekaleka. Pamenpa iwo alimbikitsa akhristu a mpingo wa katolika kuti atsate njira zatsopano zofalitsira uthenga mu nyengo ya chibalalitsoyi potengera kuti nyengo yasintha kaamba ka mliri wa COVID-19.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Phiri Walangiza Adindo a M’boma Kuti Apewe Katangale
news: Katswiri pa nkhani za ndale walangiza adindo a m’boma kuti azigwiritsa bwino ntchito udindo omwe alinawo komanso kupewa kuchita nawo za katangale. Katswiriyu George Phiri yemwenso ndi mphunzitsi ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Livingstonia amalankhulapo pa mpungwepungwe omwe ulipo pakati pa yemwe adakhalapo wachiwiri wa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Everton Chimulirenji ndi mkulu wina ochita malonda Matiyasi Bonongwe. Malipoti ati a Chimulirenji adafunsa a Bonongwe kudzera ku kampani yawo ya Agrizone kuti akagulitse chimanga ku bungwe la Admarc chaka chatha koma malondawa adafera mmazira. “Ndi chomvetsa chisoni kuti nkhani tikunena apayi ndi yokhuza wachiwiri wakale kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino ndipo ndi udindo waukulu kwambiri zomwe zikupereka chithunzithunzi choyipa kuti wachiwiri kwa mtsogoloeri angachite chinyengo chotelechi,” anatero a Phiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Waonjezera Nthawi Ya Chikondwelero Cha Amayi Maria Aku Loreto
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco waonjezera nthawi ya chikondwelero ya chaka cha Amayi Maria a ku Loreto mdziko la Italy. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio nthumwi ya a Papa ku chikondwerero cha malo oyerawa ndi yomwe yalengeza izi. Nthumwiyi yati Papa Francisco walamula kuti chikondwerero cha zaka 100 cha malo oyera a ku Loreto chidzathe mwezi wa December chaka cha mawa. Loweruka pa 15 August Archbishop Fabio dal Cin nthumwi ya Papa ku chikondwelero choti malo oyera a ku Loreto mdziko la Italy atha zaka 100, walengeza kuti chikondwererochi chipitilira mpaka pa 10 December 2021. Uthengawu womwe nthumwiyi yatula kuchokera kwa Papa Francisco wasangalatsa kwambiri akhristu ku chikondwerero cha malo oyerawa. M’mawu ake Archbishop Cin wayamika Papa Francisco popereka mpata umenewu kuti anthu apitilire kulandira zaulere ndi madalitso ku malo oyerawa maka pa nthawi ino ya mliri wa Coronavirus. Iye wati Mpingo wapereka mwayi kuti anthu apitirire kuyenda ndi Amai Maria a ku Loreto mchikhulupiriro maka pa nthawi yovutayi. Mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika Cardinal Pietro Parolin ndi yemwe anatsegulira chakachi pa 8 December 2019. Papa Benedict wa 15 ndi yemwe adakhazikitsa malo oyera a ku Loreto m’manja mwa Amai Maria nkhoswe ya anthu onse ochita ma ulendo a pa ndege pa 24 March 1920. Chaka chatha Papa Francisco adakhazikitsa tsiku la 10 December pa kalendala ya Mpingo wa Katolika kukhala chaka cha Amai Maria a ku Loreto.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chigodola cha Ng’ombe Chabuka ku Chikwawa
news: Matenda a chigodola cha ng’ombe abuka m’boma la Chikwawa. Mlembi wamkulu mu Unduna wa za malimidwe a Erica Maganga ndi omwe alengeza izi kudzera mu kalata yomwe ayitulutsa lachisanu yomwe yati matendawa atsikimizika pa 7 August ku dera la zamalimidwe la Luvunzu m’bomalo. Polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi, mkulu owona za ulimi wa ziweto ku unduna wa zamalimidwe, Dr. Patrick Chikungwa ati pakadali pano undunawu waletsa malonda aliwonse a ziweto zomwe zimagwidwa ndi matendawa ku derali. “Matendawa abukadi maboma a kunsi kwa mtsinje wa Shire m’madera angapo. Kuti tilimbane ndi nthendayi tayamba tayimitsa malonda aliwonse a nyama zomwe zimagwidwa ndi nthendayi monga ng’ombe, mbuzi, nkhosa komanso nkhumba,” anatero Dr. Chikungwa. Iwo ati undunawu wayimitsanso kupereka ziphaso zothandizira anthu kuyenda kapena kutumiza chiweto kuchoka m’bomali kupita maboma ena. Dr. Chikungwa ati undunawu ndi okonzeka kwambiri kuthana ndi nthendayi yomwe imabwera chaka ndi chaka ponena kuti chaka chino undunawu unayikonzekera bwino nthendayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mayi ndi Mwana Wake Amangidwa Kamba Kopha Bambo Wina ku Balaka
news: Mayi wina wa zaka 45 pamodzi ndi mwana wake wamkazi wa zaka 28 ali mchitolokosi cha apolisi ku Balaka kaamba kowaganizira kuti apha bambo wa zaka 39 atasemphana maganizo pa nkhani za m’banja. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa m’neneri wa apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Precious Makuta, m’modzi mwa oganiziridwawa a Anny Bamusi anali pa banja ndi bamboyu ndipo iwowa pamodzi ndi mayi awo a Catherine John ndi omwe akuganiziridwa kuti apha bamboyu yemwe ndi Charles Makawa. Sergeant Makuta ati bamboyu anasowa m’mudzimo pa 31 July chaka chino kufikira pa 9 August pomwe thupi lawo linapezeka litakwiliridwa mu mtsinje wa Ntalikachawo m’bomalo. “Ife kuno ku Balaka police station tikusunga amayi awiri powaganizira kuti iwowa anapha bambo yemwe anakwatira mwana wawo wa mayiwa zaka zapitazo ndipo m’banja mwawo munali makangano osiyana-siyana,” anatero Sergeant Makuta. Apolisiwa achenjeza anthu kuti asamachotse moyo wa munthu pakakhala mavuto osiyanasiyana m’malo mwake azikanena ku polisi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lati Malo Osungira Mbiri Angathandize Kuthetsa Mikangano Ndi Mayiko Ena
news: Boma lati malo osungira mbiri ya makedzana ndi ofunika pothetsa mikangano ya malo ndi mayiko ena. Nduna ya zokopa alendo Dr. Micheal Usi ndi omwe anena izi lachinayi pomwe anakayendera maofesi omwe amasungirako mbiri ya makedzana a National Records and Archive Services mu mzinda wa Zomba. Dr. Usi: Imeneyi ndi mbiri yofunika Dr. Usi wati malo osungira mbiri-wa ndi ofunikanso kwambiri chifukwa ndi omwe amasunga za chikhalidwe cha anthu a mdziko muno. “Ine ndinene kuti ndakhala odzidzimuka kwambiri kamba koti mbiri imeneyi yakhala yofunika kwambiri kuchokela nthawi yomwe azungu anali mdziko muno kamba koti malo ano ndi mbiri ya Malawi,”anatero Dr. Usi. Poyankhulapo mkulu wa National Records and Archive (Akayivi) Services kuno ku Malawi, Dr. Paul Lihoma ati afikira anthu osiyanasiyana mdziko kuwadziwitsa momwe malo osungira mbiri-wa amagwilira ntchito ndi cholinga choti adziwagwiritsa ntchito. “Talimbikitsika kwambiri ndi chilimbikitso chomwe anduna atipatsa kamba koti malo ano ndi chuma cha dziko ndipo tifikira anthu ambiri kuti athe kugwiritsa ntchito chuma chimenechi,” anatero a Lihoma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapereka Chipangizo Chothandizira Kupuma ku Chipatala cha Likuni
news: Nthumwi ya a Papa m’maiko a Malawi ndi Zambia, Archbishop Gian Franco Galone, wapereka chipangizo chothandizira kupuma (Ventilation Machine) ku chipatala cha Likuni mu archidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Polankhula pa mwambo wopereka chipangizochi arkiepiskopi wa archidayosiziyi, Ambuye Tarcizio Ziyaye ayamikira nthumwiyi kaamba ka mtima wofuna kuthandiza dziko lino pa nkhani za umoyo. Ambuye Ziyaye ati chipangizochi chithandiza kupulumutsa miyoyo ya anthu ambiri omwe akudwala Covid-19 ndi matenda ena ovutika kupuma. “Pano tinali ndi mwambo uno kulandira chipangizo chopumira kuchokera ku ofesi ya a nuncio kazembe wa a Papa  tsono iwo ngati oyimirira a Papa ndi ntchito yawo yoimilira mpingo kuwona zosowa zake ndipo tikuthokoza kwambiri kuti athandiza dziko la Malawi,” anatero ambuye Ziyaye. Polankhulapo m’modzi mwa akuluakulu pa chipatala cha Likuni, Sister Agness Lungu ati chipangizochi chabwera mu nthawi yake pomwe chipatalachi chinali ndi vuto lolephera kusunga ndi kuthandiza anthu omwe akuvutika mapumidwe komanso odwala nthenda ya Covid-19. “Ineyo ndili osangalala kwambiri kamba koti talandira chithandizo chimenechi kuchokera ku ofesi ya a nuncio kamba koti chithandiza athu omwe akuvutika kupuma chifukwa cha Covid-19,” anatero Sister Lungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akatswiri pa Malamulo Ayamikira Boma Pogonjera Zipembedzo
news: Katswiri pa malamulo ndi ulamuliro wabwino wayamikira boma pogonjera zipembedzo pa nkhani ya malamulo opewera COVID-19. Komabe katswiriyu Makhumbo Munthali wachenjeza boma kuti lipewe kuchita zinthu mwa phuma popewa zinthu monga izi mtsogolo. Iye amathilira ndemanga pa zomwe boma lalengeza kuti labwezeretsa malamulo ena opewera kufala kwa matenda a COVID-19. “Boma limayenera kuti likamapanga malamulo kapena ndondomeko zoyendetsera dziko limayenera kufutsa mbali zokhuzidwa kuti lamuloli liyende bwino,” anatero a Munthali. Iwo ati palibe kulakwika kulikonse komwe boma lachita posintha malamulowa chifukwa malamulo omwe anayikawo sanakagwira ntchito ndi komwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamikira Bungwe la Knigts of Columbus Pofalitsa Uthenga wa Chipulumutso
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wayamikira bungwe la Knights of Columbus pa ntchito yomwe likugwira. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayamikira bungweli kudzera mu kalata yomwe walembera mkulu wa bungweli. Iye wati ndi wokondwa ndi ntchito zotamandika zomwe bungweli likugwira mu mpingo wa Katolika maka pothandiza kufalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso. Kudzera mu uthengawo Papa’yu wafunira mafuno abwino Carl Anderson yemwe ndi mkulu wa bungweli komanso wayamika pa ntchito yothandiza kufalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso yomwe bungweli likugwira. Kalatayo yati Papa Francisco ndi oyamika bungwe la Knights of Columbus chifukwa cha ntchito yotamandika yomwe bungweli lakhala likugwira kwa zaka zambiri motsata zomwe mpingo uphunzitsa. Mwanjira ya padera iye akuyamika chifukwa cha chithandizo chomwe bungweli likupereka kwa anthu omwe akuzunzudwa chifukwa cha chikhulupiriro chao mwa Yesu Khristu. Mogwirizana ndi zomwe Papa Francisco adalankhula pa mwambo wa mapemphero a padera pa 27 March chaka chonchino, Cardinal Parolin wati pa nthawi ino ya mliri wa Coronavirus nkofunika kuti anthu aonetse chikondi komanso ubale weniweni maka ndi awo omwe akudutsa mu nyengo zosautsa kaamba ka mliriwu monga momwe bungwe la Knights of Columbus lichitira. Kalata ya Papa Francisco ikutsatira msonkhano wa ukulu wa bungwe la Knights of Columbus masiku apitawa. Bungwe la Knights of Columbus ndi la azibambo a chikatolika lomwe linayamba pa 29 March m’chaka cha 1882 ndipo anayambitsa ndi Michael McGivney m’dziko la United States of America.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Apepese Kwa a Malawi- CDEDI
news: Bungwe la Centre for Democracy and Economic Development Initiatives (CDEDI) lawuza mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera kuti apepese kwa aMalawi kaamba kosatsata malamulo omwe boma lake lakhazikitsa opewera nthenda ya COVID-19. Namiwa: Takhumudwa ndi a Chakwera Mkulu wa bungweli Sylvester Namiwa ndi yemwe wanena izi pa msokhano wa atolankhani womwe bungweli linachitsa lachinayi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Iye wati zomwe wachita mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu pokhala nawo pa mwambo wa maliro a m’modzi mwa mkhalakale pa ndale mchipani cha Malawi Congress komwe kunali anthu ochuluka, zikutsutsana ndi ndondomeko zomwe boma lake lomwe lakhazikitsa kuti athu atsatile pofuna kupewa kufala kwa mliriwu. “Tikupempha mtsogoleri wa dziko lino kuti apepese ku mtundu wa a Malawi komanso achotse mu Gazette malamulo amene ayika olimbana ndi mliri wa Covid 19. Ife takhumudwa kamba koti a Chakwera anakhala nawo pa maliro omwe kunali anthu oposa mulingo omwe wayikidwa,” anatero Namiwa. Poyankhulapo mneneri wa mtsogoleri wadziko lino Sean Kampondeni ati a Chakwera sangapepese kamba koti palibe chomwe alakwitsa. “A President sanapange china chilichonse cholakwika kamba koti anatsatira njira zonse zopewera mliri wa COVID-19 pamene anali ku tchalitchi ku mwambo wa malirowo,” anatero a Kampondeni.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Amayi Maria Ali Ndi Mphamvu Yogonjetsa COVID-19
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi zotheka kugonjetsa mliri wa Coronavirus kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati pano pomwe mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse ukuyembekeza kuchita chaka cha kukwera kwa Amayi Maria kumwamba, ndi kofunika kuwonjeza mapemphero kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria kuti mliri wa Coronavirus uthe. Akuti ali ndi mphamvu yothetsa Coronavirus-Maria Woyera Pamenepa iye walimbikitsa a katolika onse kuti akonzekere bwino chaka chimenechi kuti ikhale nthawi ya mtengo wapatali ndi madalitso ochuluka. Papa’yu wati ndi pemphero lake kuti chaka cha kukwera kwa Amai Maria kumwamba ikhalenso nthawi yogonjetsa khalidwe lodzikonda ndi losabadira ena. Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse umachita chaka cha kukwera kwa Amai Maria kumwamba (feast of the assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary into heaven) pa 15 August chaka chilichonse. Malinga ndi maphunzitso a Mpingo wa Katolika Amai Maria anakwera kumwamba ndi thupi lao komanso mzimu wao. Papa Pio wa 12 ndi yemwe adakhazikitsa maphunzitso amenewa otchedwa dogma pa 1 November 1950 kudzera mkalata yotchedwa Munificentissimus Deus. Dogma ndi maphunzitso amene m’Katolika aliyense ayenera kuvomereza ndi kukhulupirira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bwalo La Milandu Lalamula Boma Lipereke Chipepeso Kwa Amayi Omwe Anagwiliridwa Kwa Msundwe
news: Bwalo la High Court mu mzinda wa Lilongwe lalamula boma kuti lipereke chipepeso cha ndalama kwa amayi ndi atsikana 18 omwe anagwiliridwa ndi apolisi kwa Msundwe ndi M’bwatalika m’boma la Lilongwe. Bwaloli lalamula kuti ndalamazi ziperekedwe kwa amayiwa pakatha masiku 21. Chimkwezule: Takondwa ndi chigamulo chimenechi Mwazina bwaloli lalamulanso apolisi kuti apereke lipoti la kafukufuku wawo pa nkhaniyi pasanathe masiku 30 kuchokera pa tsiku lomwe chigamulochi chaperekedwa komanso kuti apolisi onse omwe akukhudzidwa ndi nkhaniyi amangidwe. Poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi, Judge Kenyatta Nyirenda atapereka chigamulochi, President wa bungwe lama Lawyer achizimayi mdziko muno la Women Lawyers Association (WLA) mayi Tadala Chimkwezule omwe bungwe lawo linayimira amayi ogwiliridwawa pa mlanduwu, ati ndi okondwa ndi chigamulochi kaamba koti amayiwa adutsa mu nyengo yovuta kwambiri mu miyezi khumi yapitayi ndipo ndi koyenera kuti apolisi akalakwira anthu nawonso adzilandira chilango. “Ndife osangalala kwambiri kamba ka chigamulo chimenechi, tikunena izi kamba koti apolisi akalakwira anthu ndi koyenera koti pazitsatidwa njira zolondola kuti apolisiwa awapepese anthuwo,” anatero mayi Chimkwezule. Pamenepa iwo ati posachedwapa akhala akubwelera ku bwalo la milandu kuti akakhale pansi ndi mlembi wa mabwalo a milandu ndi kuwunika ndalama zomwe mayi aliyense akuyenera kulandira ngati chipepeso.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lasintha Ganizo Lake Pa Nambala ya Anthu Osonkhana M’matchalitchi
news: Boma lasintha ganizo lake pa nkhani yochepetsa chiwerengero cha anthu osonkhana m’malo a mapemphero. Izi zadziwika pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe komitiya boma yowona za mliri wa COVID-19 mdziko muno yachititsa lero madzulo ku BICC mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Pamenepa boma lati tsopano lasintha ganizo lake loti anthu khumi okha ndi omwe azikumana ku malo opemphelera ndipo m’malo mwake labwezeretsa kuti anthu okumana ku malowa asamapyole 100 komanso azitsatira njira zonse zomwe a zaumoyo akulimbikitsa pofuna kupewa mliriwu. Kulengezaku kwachitika patadutsa maola ochepa akuluakulu a boma atakumana ndi oyimilira zipembedzo mdziko muno kukambirana za nkhaniyi. Nduna ya zaumoyo a Khumbidze Kandodo Chiponda, nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani a Gospel Kazako, m’modzi mwa apampando a komitiyi Dr. John Phuka komanso mlembi wamkulu mu unduna wa zaumoyo Dr. Charles Mwansambo ndi ena mwa akuluakulu omwe anali nawo pa msonkhanowu polengeza izi. Magulu osiyanasiyana anadzudzula boma pokhazikitsa ndondomeko zatsopanozi popanda kufunsa maganizo a mbalio zokhudzidwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhristu Apewe Zinthu Zonyozetsa Ulemelero Wa Ena
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati polimbana ndi mliri wa Coronavirus akhristu akuyenera kulimbananso ndi zonse zonyazitsa ulemelero wa anthu ena. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati mliri wa Coronavirus wabweretsa poyera kufunika kolemekeza ulemelero wa anthu ena komanso kufunika kosamala chilengedwe. Popitiriza maphunzitso ake pa za chikhalidwe cha anthu mogwirizana ndi maphunzitso a mpingo kapena kuti Social Doctrine of the Church, Papa Francisco wati pambali polimbana ndi mliri wa Coronavirus akhristu akuyenera kukumbukira kuti ali pa nkhondo inanso yolimbana ndi machitidwe omwe anyazitsa ulemerero wa anthu komanso kuti ntchito ina ndiyo yoonetsetsa kuti chilengedwe chikusamalilika. Iye wati mliri wa Coronavirus wakhudza aliyense kotero akhristu akuyenera kukumbukiranso udindo womwe ali nawo pa zinthu zinanso zomwe zikukhudza munthu aliyense monga nkhani ya ulemerero womwe munthu aliyense ali nawo komanso chilengedwe. “Ngati anthu salabadira kusamalira miyoyo ya anzao nkovuta kuti alemekeze chilengedwe,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wayamikira onse omwe akuyetsetsa kusamalira miyoyo ya anthu anzao mpaka pofika kuika miyoyo yao yomwe pa chiswe. Papa Francisco wati nthenda ya Covid 19 si nthenda yokhayo pa dziko la pansi koma kuti mliriwu wabweretsa pa mbalambanda zinthu zambiri zolakwika zomwe zikuyenera kukonzedwa m’moyo wa anthu. Iye wati pali anthu omwe amangoonedwa ngati osafunikira oti angogwiritsidwa ntchito nkutaidwa uko. Papa’yu wati koma ngati anthu okhulupirira Mulungu zinthu sizikuyenera kukhala choncho popeza aliyense ngofunika pa maso pa Mulungu. Iye wati maphunzitso a msonkhano wachiwiri wa Vatican akunena momveka bwino ndi mosakuluwika za ulemerero womwe munthu aliyense ali nao kotero akhristu akuyenera kutsatira maphunzitso amenewa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mkhalakale mu MCP; Mayi Dinala Alowa M’manda
news: Mwambo woyika m’manda m’modzi mwa a mkhalakale mu chipani cha Malawi Congress (MCP) malemu mayi Roseby Dinala wachitika lero mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Walowa m’manda- Mayi Dinala Mayi Dinala omwe anali wodziwika pa ndale amwalira lachiwiri pa 11 August 2020 ali ndi zaka 82 zakubadwa. Khwimbi la anthu linafika kudzakhala nawo pa mwambo wotsanzikana ndi Mayi Roseby Dinala omwe anali mkhalakale pa ndale mdziko muno. M’mawu ake ku mwambo wa malirowu, President wa dziko lino Lazarus Chakwera wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri ndi imfayi komabe iye wati ndi wokondwa chifukwa mayi Dinala anali wokhulupirika pa ndale. Pambali pa President Chakwera kumwambowu kunafikanso akuluakulu a zipani zosiyana-siyana mdziko muno kuphatikizapo Mama Celicia Tamanda Kadzamira omwe anali m’modzi wa anthu omwe anayala nawo nkhata. Anthu ambiri adzawakumbukira mayiwa chifukwa anali munthu wosasunthika pa ndale za chipani cha Malawi Congress zomwe anayamba m’chaka cha 1959. Iwo anali mgulu la mbumba zoyambirira za President woyamba wa dziko lino Dr. Hastings Kamuzu Banda. Pambali pa ndale kuyambira m’chaka cha 1992 iwo analinso mayi wa mvano ku tchalitchi cha CCAP cha Saint Columbus mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Mayi Dinala anabadwa pa 8 August 1938 m’boma la Chiradzulu. Iwo anali mdzukulu wa a mfumu Mpama komanso mdzukulu wa a Lali Lubani.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Khonsolo ya Boma la Dedza yati Ichilimika Pothana ndi Katangale
news: Khonsolo ya boma la Dedza yati ichilimika pothana ndi katangale kudzera mu ndondomeko ya mphamvu ku wanthu. Bwanamkubwa wa boma la Dedza, Emmanuel Bulukutu ndi yemwe wanena izi pamene bomalo limakumbukira tsiku la mphamvu ku wanthu muno mu Africa (African Decentralization Day) limene limakumbulidwa pa 10 August chaka chili chonse. Bulukutu: Zathandiza kubweretsa chitukuko Iwo ati khonsolo ya Dedza ikugwira ntchito ndi mabungwe osiyanasiyana a boma komanso oyima pawokha kuti apititse patsogolo ntchito za mphamvu ku wanthu komanso kuchepetsa mchitidwe wa katangale mu ofesi za boma. “Nkhani ya mphamvu ku wathu ndi chida chimodzi chomwe chingatithesere katangale m’boma la Dedza lino ngakhalenso makhonsolo ena ndipo mphamvu ku wathu ndi njira yomwe imagwiritsa ntchito anthu eniake mothandizidwa ndi atsogoleri omwe anasankhidwa,” anatero a Bulukutu. Khonsolo ya boma la Dedza Pothilirapo ndemanga m’modzi mwa akuluakulu a bungwe lophunzitsa anthu zinthu zosiyanasiyana la NICE, a Patrick Siwinda ati kuphunzitsa anthu za mphamvu ku wanthu komanso kuyipa kwa katangale kwathandiza kuti anthu ayambe kulandira zitukuko zimene anapempha komanso kuchita kalondolondo pa zifukwa zimene zikuchititsa kuti zitukuko ziyime kapena kuchedwa kutha. “Kuchokera ku bungwe la NICE ndimafuna ndingosindika kuti zimene zikunenedwa ndi bwanamkubwa ndi m’mmene ntchito zakhala zikuyendera muno mu khonsolo ya Dedza ndipo takhala tikhuphunzitsa athu kuti mphamvu ku wathu ikutanthauza chiyani,” anatero a Siwinda.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Lilongwe Alanda Njinga za Moto 35
news: Apolisi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe alanda njinga za moto makumi atatu ndi zisanu (35) kaamba koyenda pansewu popanda zoziyenereza. Benjamin: Eni njingazo samatsatira malamulo Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Lilongwe, Sergeant Foster Benjamin, apolisi achita izi pofuna kuchepetsa ngozi zomwe zingadze chifukwa cha mchitidwewu. Iwo ati eni njingazo samatsata malamulo a pansewu zomwe zimapereka chiwopsezo choyambitsa ngozi zapansewu m’bomalo. “Eni ake a njingawo samatsatira malamulo a pansewu ndiye titawona kuti ngozi zikuchuluka kwambiri tinapita ku nsewu ndi kukalanda njinga zokwana 35,” anatero Benjamin. Iwo ati eni njinga zina zokwana khumi apereka chindapusa ndipo azitenga komabe alangiza anthuwa kuti azitsatira malamaulo a pa nsewu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wabatiza Ana Awiri Omwe Anabadwa Mophatikana
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapereka Sakramenti la Ubatizo kwa ana awiri omwe anabadwa mophatikana mitu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wabatiza anawa ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Mayi ndi ana ake pambuyo pa opareshoni yowalekanitsa Papa Francisco wabatiza anawa chipatala cha ana cha likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Rome, mdziko la Italy chitakwanitsa kupanga opareshoni yowasiyanitsa. Atsikana awiri Ervina ndi Prefina anabadwa mophatikana mitu zaka ziwiri zapitazo mdziko la Central African Republic. Malipoti ati mkulu woyendetsa chipatala cha ana cha Bambino Gesu chomwe ndi cha likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Rome mdziko la Italy Mariella Enoc anali ku Bangui mdziko la Central African Republic komwe kulinso chipatala cha ana chomwe chimalandira thandizo kuchokera ku Vatican ndipo Papa Francisco adayendera chipatalachi pomwe anakacheza mdzikolo mchaka cha 2015. Atawaona anawa Enoc anaganiza zowatumza ku Rome moperekezedwa ndi mayi awo. Kwa chaka chathunthu madokotala akhala akuwapima atsikanawa kuti apeze njira yabwino yoti ndi kuwathandizira kuti choncho aliyense athe kukhala payekha osadalira ziwalo za thupi la mzake. Posachedwapa madokotala apanga opareshoni yowasiyanitsa mitu anawa yomwe malipoti akuti inayenda bwino. Ndipo ndi masiku apitawa omwewa pomwe Papa Francisco wabatiza anawa Ervina ndi Prefina kunyumba yake yomwe amakhala yotchedwa Casa Santa Marta ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. M’mawu ake mayi wa anayu wati akuthokoza anthu osiyana-siyana omwe agwira ntchito yotamandikayi ndipo mwa njira ya padera wathokoza Papa Francisco chifukwa cha chithandizo chomwe akupereka kwa ana osiyana-siyana. Iye wati akufuna kuti nao anawa adzakhale madokotala kuti adzathandize anthu ena. Opareshoni ya anawa akuti inali ya maola 18 ndipo madokotala ndi anamwino opitirira 30 ndi omwe anagwira ntchitoyi. Elvina ndi Prefina anabadwa pa 29 June m’chaka cha 2018 pa tsiku lomwe Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse umachita chaka cha Petulo ndi Paulo Oyera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akatswiri pa Zamalamulo Ati Madandaulo a Mipingo ndi Omveka
news: Akatswiri pa nkhani za malamulo mdziko muno ati atsogoleri a mipingo sakulakwitsa podandaulira boma kuti sanafunsidwe maganizo pa nkhani yoti anthu opitilira khumi asamasonkhane malo amodzi pofuna kupewa kufala kwa mliri wa Covid-19. Kanyongolo: Lamulo limayenda bwino mukamva maganizo a mbali zokhudzidwa M’modzi mwa akatswiriwa Professor Ngeyi Kanyongolo yemwenso ndi mphunzitsi wa zamalamulo ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Chancellor, wayankhula izi potsatira kutsamvetsetsana komwe kulipo pakati pa atsogoleri a mipingo ndi boma, kutsatira kukhazikitsidwa kwa lamulo lochepetsa chiwerengero cha anthu akamachita mikumano ikulu-ikulu komwe boma linalengeza pa msonkhano wa atolankhani lamulungu lapitali. Iye wapempha nduna yaza umoyo kuti ikambirane ndi a mipingo mwamsanga pofuna kuthetsa mpungwepungwe womwe ulipo padakali panowu. Pamenepa Professor Kanyongolo ayamikira maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika povomereza kuti atsatira lamulo lomwe lakhadzikitsidwa podikilira zokambirana zomwe zikhalepo pakati pa mbali ziwirizi. “Boma latulutsa malamulo okhuza kupewa kwa Covid-19 ndipo lamulo lina likunena kuti anthu asasonkhane opitirira 10, ndipo tawonadi atsogoleri a mipingo ambiri akudandaula kunena kuti sanawachite consult. Palibe alamulo limanena kuti anthu afunsidwe maganizo awo koma nthawi zonse zimayenera kutero chifukwanso zikatero lamulo lija limagwira bwino ntchito yake,” anatero Kanyongolo. Madise: Boma ligwire ntchito ndi mipingo Polankhulapo katswiri winanso wa zamalamulo Dr. Sunduzwayo Madise wapempha boma kuti ligwire ntchito zake ndi atsogoleri a mipingo kuti zinthu ziyende bwino mdziko muno. Dr. Madise akufotokoza. “Choyamaba malamulo amene apangidwa pano akusiyana ndi malamulo omwe anapangidwa mwezi wa April ndipo pa nkhani ya matchalitchiyi tingopempha a matchalitchi agwire ntchito ndi boma kuti zinthu ziyende bwino,” anatero Madise.
author: Izahaki Mwacha
