title: Khonsolo ya Lilongwe Yalimbikitsa Anthu Kutsatira Ndondomeko Zatsopano Zopewera COVID-19
news: Khonsolo ya mzinda wa Lilongwe yati ndi udindo wa mzika iliyonse kuwonetsetsa kuti akutsata njira zoyenera zopewera matenda a Covid-19. Mkulu wa mzindawu a John Chome ndi omwe anena izi lolemba ku Lilongwe pa zokambirana zokhudza momwe ntchito yolimbana ndi matendawa iziyendera mu mzindawu. Ku msonkhanowu kunafikanso nthumwi zochokera ku nthambi za chitetezo monga apolisi komanso asilikali a MDF, aphungu akunyumba ya malamulo oyimira madera a mumzinda wa Lilongwe, bwana mkubwa wa boma la Lilongwe komanso anthu ochita malonda A Chome ati khonsoloyi, iyesetsa kufikira mzika zake ndi uthenga okhudza ndondomekozi pofuna kuwathandiza mokwanira kuti atsatire ndondomekozi. Jiya: Ngati sitisamala apolisi alemera nazo “Aliyense mu mzinda uno wa Lilongwe pali lamulo lonena kuti tidzivala zotchinga kumaso ku ma public places ndipo capacity yama minibus ichepetsedwa ndi 60%,” anatero a Chome. M’mau ake, Alfred Jiya yemwe ndi phungu woyimira dera la pakati mu mzindawu anadandaula ndi chiganizo chomwe boma lachita pokhazikitsa ndondomekozi asadafunse magulu okhudzidwa ndipo wati sakukhulupilira kuti ndondomekozi zibala zipatso zoyenera. “Nkhawa ilipo ndi yonena kuti apolisi alemera ngati sizichita bwino kamba koti aziwumiriza anthu kupereka ndalama pamene alibe,” anatero Jiya. Iwo ati boma ngakhalenso khonsolo ikuyenera kuthandiza anthu ovutika powagulira chotchinga kukamwa osati kuwagwira ndi kumawasekera ku ndende.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mkulu Wina Wamangidwa Kamba Koba 6.5 milion kwacha za kampani ya Agora
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mangochi amanga mkulu wa sitolo yogulitsa zipangizo za ulimi ya Agora, Patrick Nachuma pomuganizira kuti wasowetsa ndalama zokwana 6.5 Milion Kwacha za sitoloyo. Daudi: Mkuluyo anali Manager wa Agora Malingana ndi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub-Inspector Amina Tepani Daudi, izi zadziwika pa 31 July 2020 ku malo a sitoloyi ku Maldeco m’bomalo. Akadaulo ofufuza momwe kampani yagwiritsira ntchito ndalama zake, akuti anapeza kuti mkuluyi amasowetsa ndalamazi zomwe zimasungidwa ku ma account a Bank komanso a Mpamba a sitoloyi. “Ndi zoonadi Nachuma wakhala akugwira ntchito pa Madelco Agora ngati Manager kwa zaka ziwiri ndipo iye anasowa pomwe gulu lolondoloza chuma cha kampaniyi linafika pa malowa kuzagwira ntchito,” anatero Daudi. Iye wati mkuluyu anagwidwa kwa Jali m’boma la Zomba ndipo wapezeka ndi ndalama zokwanira 5.4million kwacha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mapemphero Ndi Ofunika Pokhazikitsa Chikondi
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati mapemphero ali ndi kuthekera kokhazikitsa chikondi pakati pa anthu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi mu uthenga wake wopita ku chipani cha mu mpingo’wu cha Francisco Woyera wa Mtima Woyerayera wa Ambuye Yesu. Iye wati m’mapemphero muli mphamvu yobweretsa moyo watsopano ndi kukhazikitsa chikondi pakati pa anthu. Padakalipano papita zaka 100 chimwalilireni yemwe anayambitsa chipani cha Francisco Woyera wa Mtima Woyerayera wa Ambuye Yesu (Franciscan Minims of the Sacred Heart) yemwe ndi Maria Margherita Caiani Wodala. Pa chifukwa ichi Papa Francisco loweruka lapitali watumiza uthenga ku chipanichi. Mu uthengawo iye wati m’mapemphero muli mphamvu komanso kuthekera kokhazikitsa chikondi komanso moyo watsopano pakati pa anthu pa dziko lonse. Papa Francisco walimbikitsa masisitere a chipanichi kuti apitirize kugwira ntchito yolimbikitsa kubyzala mbewu ya chikondi pakati pa anthu kuti choncho anthu omwe akuwatumikira athe kukondanso Mulungu. Iye wakumbutsa asisitere’wa za kufunika kotumikira Mulungu modzichepetsa monga m’mene muyambitsi wa chipanichi anafunira potsanzira Yesu Khristu amene ngakhale anali Mulungu anadzichepetsa mpaka imfa ya pa mtanda. Kalata ya Papa Francisco yomwe walembera chipanichi loweruka lapitali pa 8 August ikutsegulira zochitikachitika zokondwerera moyo wa Maria Margherita Caiani Wodala. Zochitikachitikazi zidzafika pa chimake peni-peni chaka cha mawa pa 8 August. Chipani cha ma sisitere chotchedwa Franciscan Minims of the Sacred Heart anayambitsa ndi Maria Margherita Caiani m’chaka cha 1902 m’dziko la Italy. Iye anabadwa pa 2 November 1863 ndipo anamwalira pa 8 August 1921. Chipanichi chomwe chimayang’ana kwambiri moyo a ana ndi a chinyamata chikupezeka mmaiko a Italy, Brazil, Egypt, Sri Lanka ndi Israel.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dr. Shawa Alimbikitsa Amayi Apakati Kuti Adzidya Zakudya Za Magulu
news: Katswiri owona zakudya za magulu komanso ubereki wabwino pakati pa amayi mdziko muno Dr. Mary Shawa walimbikitsa amayi omwe ali ndi pakati kuti adzidya zakudya za magulu komanso kumayamwitsa ana awo mwakathithi pomwe angochira kumene. Shawa: Kuyamwitsa mwakathithi nkofunika Iye analakhula izi pofotokozera Radio Maria Malawi pomwe imafuna kudziwa za ubwino wakudya zakudya za magulu, maka kwa amayi omwe ali ndi pakati komanso omwe angochira kumene. Mwazina iye walimbikitsa amayi omwe angochira kumene kuti adziyamwitsa ana awo mwakathithi ndi kumadya zakudya za magulu ndi cholinga choti thanzi lawo komaso la mwana wawo likhale la bwino komaso la mphamvu. “Kuyamwitsa mwana mwakathithi ndi kofunika kwambiri ndipo tonse timadziwa kuti pa 1,000 days pamene mayi amatenga pathupi amayenera kuti akhale wathanzi mpaka kufikira ayambe kuyamwitsa mwana mwakathithi,” anatero Dr. Shawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lati Likambirana ndi Mipingo pa Nkhani Yoyimitsa Mikumano ya Anthu Mtchalitchi
news: Mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno wati ndi odabwa ndi momwe boma lakhadzikitsira ndondomeko zatsopano zothandiza kupewa kufala kwa mliri wa Covid-19. Lamulungu, boma kudzera mwa nduna ya za umoyo limodzi ndi mkulu wa za malamulo Attorney General anafotokozera mtundu wa a Malawi ndondomeko zatsopano zomwe zayikidwa kuti anthu atsatire ngati mbali imodzi yothandiza kuti matenda a Covid-19 asapitilire kufala m’dziko muno. Ati ndi okhumudwa-Maepiskopi aku Malawi Imodzi mwa ndondomekozi ndi yoletsa mikumano ya anthu oposa khumi zomwe zadabwitsa ma episkopi a mpingowu mdziko muno ponena kuti boma limayenera kukambirana ndi mbali zokhudzidwa asanalengeze za lamulo latsopanoli. “Ndi zodandaulitsa kamba koti akhritsu amalimbikitsidwa kutsatira njira zonse zopewera matenda a covid-19 m’malo opempherera ndipo boma silinatidziwitse komanso kutifusa maganizo pa izi,” inatero kalatayo. Kalatayo yati kamba kolemekeza malamulo a dziko lino, mikumano yonse ya mapemphero iyime kufikira mtsogolo ndipo akhristu azikumana m’makomo ndi kumapemphera akudikira kuti maepiskopiwa akambirane ndi boma za kufunika kwa mapemphero. Padakalipano nduna yowona za umoyo mdziko muno mayi Khumbidze Kandodo Chiponda ati amva madandaulo onse ndipo posachedwapa akhala akukambirana ndi a mipingo ndi zipembedzo pa nkhaniyi. Ndunayi yanena izi kudzera mu kalata yomwe undunawu watulutsa patangopita maola ochepa maepiskopiwa atatulutsa kalata yawo ndipo kalatayi yasayinidwa ndi ndunayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alamulidwa Kuti Apereke Chindapusa Kamba Kopezeka ndi Makhwala a Chipatala Popanda Chilolezo
news: Bwalo loyamba la milandu la Nkhunga m’boma la Nkhotakota lalamula bambo wina kukakhala ku ndende kwa chaka chimodzi kapena kupereka ndalama yokwana 150 Thousand Kwacha atapezeka ndi mankhwala a chipatala popanda chilolezo. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sub Inspector Ignatius Esau watsimikiza za nkhaniyi. Malinga ndi Essau, bambo-yu ndi Wiskesi Chikweya wa zaka 36 ndipo anamangidwa pa 30 July chaka chino atapezeka ndi mankhwala monga LA, Indosen ndi ena ambiri. Padakali pano mkuluyu akuti wapereka ndalamayo. “Ndi zoonadi kuti khothi la magistrate kuno ku Dwangwa lagamula kuti a Wiskesi Chikweya apereke chindapusa cha 150 thousand-kwacha kapena akakhale ku ndende chaka chimodzi kamba kopezeka ndi mnkhwala a chipatala osiyana-siyana,” anatero Sub Inspector Esau. Iwo ati bamboyu atafufuzidwa zikuwonetsa kuti makhwalawa amawapeza molumikizana ndi anthu ena omwe ndi a zachipatala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi ku Balaka Amanga Madalaivala Osatsata Malamulo a Kanyamulidwe ka Anthu
news: Apolisi m’boma la Balaka, ati ayamba kumanga madalaivala omwe sakutsata malamulo a kanyamulidwe ka anthu mu galimoto zawo, ngati njira imodzi yopewera kufala kwa mliri wa Covid-19. Ena akunyamulabe anthu ochuluka pa mpando Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa m’neneri wa apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Precious Makuta, apolisiwa azikatsekera mchitolokosi dalaivala aliyense amene akunyamula anthu oposera awiri pa mpando. Iwo atinso agwira ntchito yofalitsa uthenga wa kapewedwe ka nthenda ya Covid-19 ku madera akumidzi, pogwiritsa ntchito galimoto ya chimkweza mawu. “Pozindikira kuti cholinga cha Malawi Police Service ndi kuteteza miyoyo komanso katundu wa anthu, ife kuno ku Balaka tikutengapo gawo kwambiri pofalitsa uthenga wa COVID-19 kuti tingayipewe bwanji pogwiritsa ntchito mchimkuza mawu,” anatero Sergeant Makuta. Iwo ati chidwi chawo kwambiri chili pa achinyamata kamba koti akuyenda-yenda chifukwa cha kutsekedwa kwa sukulu choncho ati apitiriza pofalitsa uthenga wa kapewedwe ka matendawa pogwiritsa ntchito njirayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Mamembala 13 a Bungwe Lowona za Chuma ku Vatican
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wasankha mamembala atsopano a bungwe lowona momwe chuma chimayendera ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa lachinayi wasankha mamembala atsopano khumi ndi atatu (13) a bungweli lomwe limatchedwa Vatican’s Council for the Economy. Mwa mamembala onse a bungweli omwe alipo khumi ndi asanu (15), asanu ndi atatu (8) ndi ma Cardinal ndi ma episkopi pamene asanu ndi awiri (7) ndi akhristu eniake ndipo mwa akhristu eniake asanu ndi awiriwa asanu ndi m’modzi ndi amayi omwe ndi akatswiri pa nkhani za momwe chuma chimayendera. Papa Francisco anakhazikitsa bungweli pa 24 February mchaka cha 2014 kudzera m’kalata yake yotchedwa Fidelis dispensator et prudens. Iye anachita izi pofuna kubweretsa kusintha pa momwe chuma chimagwiritsidwira ntchito,makamaka kuti ntchito zonse zokhudza chuma zizichitika poyera popewa chinyengo chosiyanasiyana. Cholinga cha bungweli ndi kupereka ulangizi pa nkhani za chuma ku ma ofesi, ma dipatimenti a likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika komanso kupereka ulangizi pa nkhani za chuma ku ma bungwe omwe amagwira ntchito ndi Vatican. Vatican ngati dziko loima pa lokha monga mmene aliri maiko ena onse limatsata mfundo zovomerezeka pa dziko lonse la pansi za kayendetsedwe ka chuma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kumangidwa Kwa Msika, Malo Okwelera Bus Akuti Kukweza Chuma Cha Khonsolo ya Zomba
news: Boma lati kumangidwa kwa msika wa Songani komanso malo okwelera bus pa Thondwe, zithandiza kuti khonsolo ya boma la Zomba izitolera ndalama zochuluka zogwilira ntchito za chitukuko. Nduna yowona za maboma aang’ono ndi chitukuko cha madera akumidzi a Lingson Belekanyama ndi omwe anena izi pamene anayendera ntchito yomanga zitukuko ziwirizi m’boma la Zomba. Iwo ati ndi okondwanso kuti makampani omwe akugwira ntchitoyi ndi achiMalawi komanso anthu ambiri alembedwa ntchito. “Tawona malo onse ndipo ife takhutira kwambiri. Malo okwelera bus awa athandiza kuti galimoto zisamachulukane komanso mkati mwa depot mukhala masitolo omwe anthu adzigulamo katundu,” anatero a Belekanyama. M’mawu ake, wapampando wa khonsolo ya boma la Zomba, khansala Baster Chirwa wati zitukukozi zipindulira anthu ochita malonda m’maderawa komanso khonsoloyo ipindula pa chuma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Amuna Awiri Alamulidwa Zaka 7 pa Mlandu Wakuba Ku Lilongwe
news: Bwalo la milandu mu mzinda wa Lilongwe lalamula amuna awiri kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka 7 kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu wakuba mu mzindawu. Bwaloli linamva kudzera kwa wapolisi woyimira boma pa mlanduwu, Sergeant Chimwemwe Chinseu kuti amunawa Aspello Msonthi wa zaka 31 komanso Rodwell Phiri wa zaka 32 akhala akunamiza anthu powabwereka njinga zamoto zomwe pambuyo pake amangoziba osabweza kwa eni akewa. Apolisi atamva izi anayamba ntchito yofunafuna amunawa ndipo anawagwira pamodzi ndi njinga zomwe akhala akubazi zomwe pa nthawiyo zinalipo zisanu. Atakawonekera ku bwaloli amunawa anapezeka olakwa pa mlanduwu. Popereka chigamulo chake First Grade Magistrate Robert Botha anati wapereka chigamulochi kaamba koti milandu ngati iyi ikuchulukira kwambiri mu mzindawu ndipo ngati pali ena omwe ali ndi khalidweli atengerepo phunziro. Aspello Msonthi amachokera m’mudzi M’biya mfumu yayikulu Chakhaza mboma la Dowa pomwe Rodwel Phiri amachokera m’mudzi wa Makiyoni mfumu yayikulu Mwanza m’boma la Salima.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lati Liyesetsa Kuteteza Anthu a Ulumali
news: Unduna owona kuti pasakhale kusiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo komanso chisamaliro cha anthu, wati uyesetsa kuteteza maufulu a anthu a ulumali mdziko muno. Nduna mu undunawu mayi Patricia Kaliati awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti mwazina anthu omwe ali ndi ulumali akuyenera kupatsidwa zoyenelera zowathandiza kupeza zosowa kuti miyoyo yawo ikhale yabwino. Iwo alankhula izi pomwenso pakhala pali milandu yochuluka yokhudza kuphwanyiridwa ufulu kwa anthu omwe ali ndi khungu la chialubino. “Milandu ilipo 169 ndipo takamba ndi unduna wa za malamulo komanso ma judge kuti atithandize kukamba milandu imeneyi ithe chifukwa milanduyi inayamba kalekale,” anatero mayi Kaliati. Polankhulapo mkulu wa bungwe lowona za anthu a khungu la chialbino la Association of People with Albinism in Malawi (APAM) Ian Simbota wati nkhaniyi ndi yosangalatsa kamba koti lakhala lili khumbo lawo kuti milanduyi idziyenda mwa chilungamo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadzudzula Mchitidwe Wogwiritsa Ntchito Zida za Nuclear
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wadzudzula mchitidwe wogwiritsa ntchito zida zowopsa za nyukiliya. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi mu uthenga wake wopita kwa gavanala wa dera la Hiroshima mdziko la Japan pomwe anthu mdzikolo akukumbukira za mabomba owopsa kwambiri omwe adaponyedwa ku deralo. Iye wati m’chitidwe wosunga komanso kugwiritsa ntchito zida zoopysa za nyukiliya ndi woipa kwambiri ndipo ukuyenera kutha. 6 August chaka chilichonse ndi tsiku losaiwalika kwa anthu a mdziko la Japan kamba koti pa tsikuli zaka 75 zapitazo m’chaka cha 1945 asilikali a nkhondo a dziko la America adaponya mabomba owopsa kwambiri a nyukiliya ndi kupha anthu pafupi 140,000. Pa chifukwa ichi Papa Francisco wadzudzula m’chitidwe wogwiritsa ntchito zida zoopysa za nyukiliya. “Mchitidwe wosunga komanso wogwiritsa ntchito zida zoopysa za nyukiliya ndi woipa ndipo ukuyenera kutheratu,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthenga wake pa tsikuli kwa Hidehiko Yusaki yemwe ndi gavanala wa dera la Hiroshima m’dziko la Japan. Iye wati ali pafupi ndi anthu onse mdzikolo ndipo wati akufunira mafuno abwino onse omwe akonza zochitika pa tsikuli ndi onse omwe akutenga nao mbali mmagawo osiyana-siyana koma osaiwalanso awo omwe adapulumuka ndipo adakalipo mpaka lero. Mu uthengawo Papa’yu wati akukumbukira za ulendo wake wokacheza m’dzikolo chaka chatha makamaka mikumano yomwe adachita ndi achinyamata omwe iye wati amafunitsitsa mtendere nthawi zonse. Iye wati sakuiwalanso anthu osowa a mdzikolo omwe iye wati ndi anthu omwe amavutika kwambiri ngati m’dziko muli nkhondo. Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kwa mtendere ponena kuti mtendere sungakhalepo pa dziko ngati anthu adalira zida makamaka zida zake zoopysa ngati za nyukiliya.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kwelepeta Wati Anthu Ochoka ku South Africa Akupereka Chiopsezo ku Dera Lake
news: Phungu wa nyumba ya malamulo mdera la Zomba Malosa, Grace Kwelepeta wadandaula kuti khalidwe la anthu omwe akuchoka mdziko la South Africa kaamba ka mliri wa Covid-19 ndipo akufikira ku Domasi Teachers Training College, likuyika pa chiwopsezo miyoyo ya anthu a mderalo. Kwelepeta: Akafika akungoyendayenda Kwelepeta wauza Radio Maria Malawi kuti anthuwa akumangoyenda mwachisawawa kupita m’midzi yozungulira malowa komwe akumakagulitsa katundu yemwe abwera naye. Pemenepa iye wapempha boma kuti lipeze njira zabwino zosamalira anthuwa kuti asamatuluke mu mpandawu mwachisawawa kutinso anthu okhala madera ozungulira malowa akhale otetezeka ku nthendayi. “Azibale athuwa akabwera kuti akhale kuma hostel sizikutheka kamba koti akumayendayenda m’misewu zomwe zikuyika pa chiopsezo cha anthu a m’midzi chifukwa choti ena mwa iwo akumagulitsa katundu m’midzi  kuti apeze transport yopita kwawo,” anatero Kwelepeta. Pamenepa iye wapempha boma kuti lipeze njira zapadera zotetezera anthuwa komanso anthu a mdera lake ku kachilomboka komwe kasautsa kwambiri pa dziko lonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wina Amangidwa Kamba Konamizira Kukhala Wapolisi
news: Apolisi aku Lingadzi m’boma la Lilongwe akusunga mchitokosi bambo wina wa zaka 29 kamba konamizira kukhala wapolisi. James atavala ngati wapolisi Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani ku polisiyi Sergeant Salome Zgambo, mkuluyu Chikumbutso Jimmy James wakhala akunamiza anthu kuti iye amagwira ntchito ku polisi ya Kanengo ndipo anthu ena ndi omwe anatsina khutu apolisi atadabwa naye kaamba koti njinga zamoto komanso zakapalasa zomwe amalanda kwa anthu amapita nazo kunyumba kwake osati ku polisi. Apolisiwa anapita kunyumba kwa mkuluyu kwa Senti komwe anamupeza ndi uniform ya apolisi ya mtundu wa kamofuleji yomwe ndi mathalauza awiri, malaya, jombo, chipewa komanso ndodo ya apolisi. Apolisiwa anamupezanso mkuluyu ndi katundu wina yemwe ndi njinga yakapalasa komanso kanema wa mtundu wa Plasma. Atamufunsa, mkuluyu akuti analephera kufotokoza komwe anatenga katunduyu ndipo apolisiwa ati akufufuzabe za nkhaniyi. Chikumbutso Jimmy James amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kaphale mfumu yaikulu Tambala m’boma la Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Asisiteri Obindikira Ati Athandiza Popemphelera Chibalalitso cha Mpingo
news: Chipani cha asisitere obindikira mdziko muno cha Poor Clares, chati chithandiza mpingo kukonzekera bwino chibalalitso pochulutsa mapemphero. Mkulu wa chipanichi mdziko muno Sister Mary Monica Phiri ndi omwe anena izi pambuyo pa maphunziro a chibalalitso cha mpingo omwe ofesi yowona za utumiki wa a Papa inakonzera asisteriwa. Mwakhwawa: Tawapempha kuti apemphere mowirikiza Iwo ati maphunziro omwe alandira pa tsikuli awathandiza kwambiri kaamba koti iwo ngati mbali imodzi ya mpingo, athandiza pochita mapemphero kawiri-kawiri kuti chibalalitso cha chaka chino chiyende bwino. “Maphunziro ife tawalandira ndi manja awiri mosangalala maka-maka zakhuza kwambri udindo wathu opemphelera mpingo ndiye ife mbali imodzi yomwe titapange ndi kupemphera mowirikiza kuti tibalalitse mawu a Mulungu ponseponse,” anatero Sister Monica. Poyankhulapo mkulu wa mu ofesi yowona za utumuki wa a Papa kuno ku Malawi, bambo Vincent Mwakhwawa ati ofesi yawo ili ndi ntchito yayikulu yophunzitsa akhristu onse kuti amvetse bwino zachibalalitso cha mpingo. “Timadzapereka uthenga umene a Papa anatituma kuti tipereke ku nyumba zobindikira zonse, a Papa akufunitsitsa kuti mu nyengo ino ya COVID utumiki upite patsogolo ndipo anatipempha kuti tiwapemphe kuti apemphere mowirikiza,” anatero Bambo Mwakhwawa. Iwo ati aphunzitsanso asisiteriwa za momwe ofesi yawo ikugwilira ntchito pophunzitsa akhritsu za chibalalaliso cha mpingo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Dziko la Lebanon Likufunika Mapemphero Apadera
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi ngozi yowopsa yomwe yachitika mdzikolo la Lebanon. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lachitatu ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican. Iye wapempha anthu kuti achite mapemphero opempherera anthu mdzikolo ndipo wati ndi wokhudzidwa kamba koti ngoziyi yaononga kwambiri. “Tiyeni tipempherere mabanja onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi komanso onse omwe akupereka chithandizo chosiyanasiyana pa nthawi imeneyi kuti ntchito yawo iyende bwino,” watero Papa Francisco. Ngozi yoopsa yachitika lachiwiri ku Beirut m’dziko la Lebanon. Malipoti akuti ngoziyi yachitika potsatira kuphulika kwa katundu wina yemwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito popanga feteleza komanso mabomba ndipo katunduyu anamulanda mu sitima ina yonyamula katundu mchaka cha 2014 ndipo amamusunga pa doko lina la nyanja ya Mediterranean mdzikolo. Mphamvu ya kuphulika kwa katunduyu yomwe akuti inamveka ngati chivomerezi inafika ku madera akutali kwambiri pa mtunda wa ma kilometre 150. Malinga ndi bungwe la Red Cross anthu 100 afa ndipo ena 4000 avulala ndipo pali chiyembekezo kuti chiwerengerochi chikwera kaamba koti anthu ambiri akusowabe. Kuphatikiza apo nyumba zambiri zagwa ndipo anthu osaneneka akusowa pokhala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la St. Vincent De Paul Lati Lidzipereka Poteteza Akhritsu A Katolika Ku Mliri wa COVID-19
news: Bungwe la Society of St. Vincent De Paul lati liwonetsetsa kuti akhristu a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno ndi otetezeka ku mliri wa COVID-19. Mkulu wa bungweli mdziko muno a Charles Kimu anena izi loweruka pamene amagawa zipangizo zodzitetezera ku kachilombo ka Coronavirus kwa akhristu amu parishi ya Nchalo mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa ndipo katunduyu ndi wa ndalama zokwana 481 sauzande kwacha. Iwo ati akuyembekezera kupereka katundu wa mtunduwu m’madayosizi onse asanu ndi atatu a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno ndi cholinga choti akhristu akhale otetezeka ku kachilomboka pamene akuchita miyambo yosiyanasiyana ya mapemphero. “Cholinga chathu ndi choti tithe kufikira akhritsu anzathu kuti tiwagawire zipangizo kuti ziwathandize kudziteteza ku mliri wa COVID-19,” anatero a Kimu. Polandira katunduyu m’malo mwa akhristu a dayosizi ya Chikwawa, wapampando wa bungwe la St. Vincent De Paul mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa a Christopher Sande anati ndi okondwa chifukwa thandizoli lafika mu nthawi yake pamene mpingo wayamba kulimbikitsa akhristu kuvala tinsalu totchinga pakamwa ndi mphuno ku miyambo yonse ya mapemphero. “ndife osangalala ndi onyadira chifukwa bungweli latithandiza ndi katundu odzitetezera ku nthenda ya COVID-19 ndipo tikamugwiritsa ntchito pamene tukuchita mikumano yathu,” anatero a Sande.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la White Ribbon Lati Amayi Ambiri Akupitilira Kufa Kamba Ka Ubereki
news: Bungwe la White Ribbon Alliance lapempha kuti pakhale mgwirizano pakati pa mabungwe omwe si a boma omwe amagwira ntchito za umoyo komanso anthu omwe amagwira ntchito modzipereka m’madera akumidzi, pa ntchito yolimbana ndi imfa za amayi pobereka. Mkulu wa bungweli mdziko muno a Hester Nyasulu anena izi m’boma la Zomba pa mkumano wawo ndi mabungwe omwe amagwira ntchito za umoyo m’bomalo komanso anthu omwe amgwira ntchito modzipereka m’madera akumidzi a bomalo. Iwo ati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti amayi akupitilirabe kukukumana ndi mavuto monga kusapatsidwa ulemu komanso kusowa malo a chinsinsi pa nthawi yobereka. “Zina zomwe akhala akunena ndi kusalandira ulemu weni weni komanso privacy pobereka ngakahalenso ukhondo ndiye izi ndi zomwe takambirana lero kuti mavuto amenewa tingawathetse bwanji,” anatero a Nyasulu. M’mawu ake mlembi wa mabungwe omwe si a boma omwe amagwira ntchito m’boma la Zomba a Oscar Lihoma ayamikira ntchito yochepetsa imfa za uchembere yomwe bungwe la White Ribbon Alliance likugwira mdera la Zomba Likangala. “Tiyamikire kwambiri bungwe limeneli kamba koti likuthandiza kuti ntchito z aumoyo m’boma lino ziyende bwino,” anatero a Lihoma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Ambiri Odwala COVID-19 M’boma La Mangochi Akuchira
news: Mkulu owona zoteteza anthu ku matenda osiyanasiyana m’boma la Mangochi, Kondwani Mamba wati ndi okhutira ndi momwe ntchito yolimbana ndi nthenda ya COVID-19 ikuyendera m’bomalo. Mamba amalankhula izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani pomwe amafotokozera m’mene ntchitoyi ikuyendera m’bomalo. Iye wati potengera m’mene chiwerengero cha anthu opezeka komanso ochira ku nthendayi sabata yapitayi chilili, zasonyeza kuti anthu ambiri akutsatira njira zozitetezera kutenga kachilomboka m’bomali.  Sabata yathayi anthu anayi ndi omwe apezeka ndi nthendayi ndipo anthu 11 achira ku nthendayi. “Chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akudwala matenda a Corona chafika pa 128 ndipo tikawonesetsa anthu omwe akudwala matendawa akuchepera-cheperabe komanso anthu 90 mwa anthuwa achira,” anatero Mamba. Iwo ati ofesi yowona za umoyo yachita mgwirizano ndi anthu m’bomali kuti kachilomboka kasapitirire kufala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadzudzula Chiwembu Chomwe Chakhuza Cathedral ya Mdziko la Nicaragua
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wadzudzula za uchifwamba zomwe zachitika mu Cathedral ina ya mpingowu mdziko la Nicaragua. Polankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso ku dziko lonse la pansi kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti, Papa Francisco wadzudzula za uchifwamba zomwe munthu wina wachita poponya bomba mu Cathedral ya mpingo wa katolika yotchedwa Immaculate Conception mu mzinda wa Managua omwe ndi likulu la dziko la Nicaragua. Bombalo akuti lawononga zinthu zosiyanasiyana mu Cathedral-yo kuphatikizapo mtanda womwe anthu mdzikolo amaulemekeza kwambiri womwe unapangidwa zaka zoposa 300 zapitazo. “Ndikulingalira za anthu a m’dziko la Nicaragua omwe ali pa chisoni kaamba ka za uchifwamba zomwe zachitika mu Cathedral ya Immaculate Conception. Abale ndi alongo a m’dziko la Nicaragua ndili nanu limodzi m’mapemphero,” watero Papa Francisco. M’mawu ake Cardinal Leopoldo José Brenes yemwe ndi Archbishop wa Archdiocese ya Managua wadzudzula zomwe zachitikazi ponena kuti ndi uchifwamba weniweni ndipo iye wati akukhulupirira kuti izi zachitika pofuna kuopseza mpingo wa katolika kuti ukhale chete pa nkhani zosiyanasiyana zomwe zikuchitika mdzikolo. Za uchifwambazi zachitika lachisanu lapitali pa nthawi yomwe pali kusamvana pakati pa mpingo wa katolika ndi boma m’dziko la Nicaragua.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lati Silisekera Anthu Kukhala Mdziko Muno Opanda Chilolezo
news: Boma lati sililekelera kuti anthu omwe si mzika za dziko lino adzikhala mdziko muno popanda chilolezo. Chimwendo Banda: Sitilekelera zimenezi Nduna yowona za chitetezo cha mdziko a Richard Chimwendo Banda ndi omwe anena izi pamene anayendera ofesi yowona zolowa ndi kutuluka ya mchigawo chakumvuma kwa dziko lino m’boma la Mangochi. Pamenepa a Banda alangiza ogwira ntchito ku nthambi-yi kuti agwire ntchito modzipereka powonetsetsa kuti palibe akuhala kapena kugwira ntchito mdziko muno popanda chilorezo. “Ndi udindo wathu ngati boma kugwirizana nawo ndi kuwathangatira monga mowe mukuziwa kuti dera linoli layandikana ndi dziko la Mozambique ndiye kuti pamakhala kulowa ndi kutuluka mdziko muno popanda chilolezo kotero izi nzosayenera,” anatero a Banda. Polankhulapo mkulu wa nthambi yowona zaolowa ndi kutuluka mchigawo chakumvuma kwa dziko lino a Vivian Kasambo kubwera kwa ndunayi kuthandizira kuti ntchito zina za ofesiyi ziyambe kuyenda bwino. “Kholo likabwera pakhomo timasangalala ndipo kubwera kwawo kwatithandiza kuti tidziwa ma policies amene boma lakhazikitsa ndipo pakutero tigwira ntchito m’mene a President komanso a Vice awo akufunira,” anatero a Kasambo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Moto Watentha Mbali Ina ya Chipatala cha Balaka
news: Moto watentha mbali ina ya chipatala cha boma la Balaka. Malinga ndi mkulu owona za umoyo m’bomalo Dr. Eugine Katenga Kaunda, chomwe chayambitsa motowu sichikudziwika ndipo motowu watentha ku kitchen, kolembetsera, kosungira katundu wa chipatalachi komanso kochapira. Chipatala cha Balaka chikupsa Padakali pano palibe yemwe wavulala pa ngoziyi ndipo odwala omwe anagonekedwa pa chipatalachi atumizidwa mzipatala za Machinga ndi Ntcheu kuti akapitirize kulandira thandizo la mankhwala. “Ku chipatalaku kwapsadi koma chomwe chayambitsa motowu sichikudziwika kwenikweni ndipo tikufufuzabe,” anatero a Kaunda. Iwo ati padakali pano kuchuluka kwa katundu amene wawonongeka ndi motowu sanadziwike.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwambo Otsekera Mariatona Uchitika Mawa
news: Mwambo waukulu wotsekera Mariatona yemwe wakhala akuchitika pa Radio Maria Malawi kuyambira mwezi wa May kufikira pano uchitika mawa ku likulu la wailesiyi ku Mangochi. Malinga ndi mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za wailesiyi mdziko muno a Louis Phiri wati padakalipano zonse zokonzekera mwambowu zatha. Phiri: Coronavirus wasokoneza Mariatonayu Iwo ati mwambowu udzayamba ndi mwambo wa nsembe ya ukaristia yomwe adzatsogolere ndi bambo Joseph Kimu omwe ndi a Director a wailesiyi ndipo apempha omwe akonzeka zofika ku mwambowu kuti akuyenera kudzavala zotchingira kukamwa ndi mphuno, pofuna kudzadzitetedza ndi kutetedza ena ku nthenda ya COVID-19. “Zokonzekera zonse zotsekera Mariatona amene anatsekulidwa mwezi wa May zili mchimake motero anthu omwe akufuna kudzakhala nawo pa mwambowu akuyenera kuzavala chotchingira kukamwa ndi mphuno,” anatero a Phiri. Iwo ati munthawi ya mariatonayi akumana ndi zovuta zosiyana siyana monga kusayenda m’maparish kukachita Mariatona pompo pompo motero sanakwanitse kufikira ndalama yomwe amafuna kupeza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamba Kulemba Bukhu Lokhudza Mliri wa Coronavirus
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wayamba kulemba bukhu lomwe likhale ndi mfundo zokhudza momwe muliri wa Coronavirus wakhudzira miyoyo ya anthu anthu pa dziko lonse. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, gawo loyamba la ntchito yolemba bukhuli layamba, ndipo mwazina likhala ndi mfundo zomwe zifotokoze bwino momwe nthenda-yi yakhudzira miyoyo ya anthu mu uzimu ndi m’magawo ena a zochitika pa dzikoli. Ena mwa akuluakulu a mpingowu omwe akuthandizira pa ntchito yolemba bukhuli ndi monga Cardinal Walter Kasper, ndi bambo George Austine a ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PAC Yati Iwunika za Dandaulo la Chikwangwani Chomwe Asilamu Ayika mu Mzinda wa Blantyre
news: Bungwe la Public Affairs Committee (PAC) lati likumana posachedwapa kuti likambirane za madandaulo okhudza chikwangwani chomwe a chipembedzo cha chisilamu anayika mu nsewu wa Masauko Chipembere, mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Matonga: Tithetsa kusamvanako Mneneri wa bungweli m’busa Dr. Gilford Matonga auza Radio Maria Malawi kuti bungweli lamva madandaulo okhudza nkhaniyi kuchoka m’magawo osiyanasiyana omwe awonetsa kusakhutira ndi chikwangwanichi chomwe ena akuganiza kuti chikuyipitsa chikhristu. Bishop Matonga ati akudziwa bwino za kufunika kowunika nkhaniyi msanga ndi cholinga choti pakhale umodzi komanso kubweretsa mtendere pakati pa zipembedzo mdziko muno. “Mu Public Affairs Committee tili ndi magulu onse; tili ndi asilamau komanso akhristu nde tikhala pansi kuti tiyiwunike nkhaniyi. Palibe wazadandaula koma ena mwa mamembala athu ndi amene atenga nkhaniyi kupita nayo ku Blantyre City Council ndipo nkhaniyi ili ponseponse choncho ndi ntchito yathu yoti tiyikambirane ndi kuthetsa kusamvana komwe kulipo,” anatero Matonga. Iwo ati bungwe lawo limakambirana nkhani zomwe ndi zodziwika bwino ndipo ati tsiku loiwunika nkhaniyi sanalikhazikitse koma koma lidziwika posachedwapa ndipo ati awonetsetsa kuti bata ndi mtendere pakati pa zipembedzo ndi mipingo zipitilire.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ken Ndanga Wamangidwa Kamba Kokhuzidwa Ndi Kuotchedwa Kwa Ofesi ya UTM
news: Apolisi amanga mlembi wamkulu wa chipani cha United Democratic Front (UDF) a Ken Ndanga powaganizira kuti akukhudziwa ndi kuwotchedwa kwa ofesi ya chipani cha UTM ku Area 24 mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Wanjatidwa-Ndanga Wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mdziko muno Thomeck Nyaude watsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iye wati padakalipano anthu okwana asanu ndi omwe amangidwa powaganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi nkhaniyi ndipo onsewa adakali m’manja mwa apolisi poyembekeza kuti ayambe kuyankha mlandu wawo. “Tikukayikira kuti a Ken Ndanga akukhuzidwa ndikuotchedwa kwa ofesi ya UTM ku Area 24 mu mzinda wa Lilongwe ndipo padakali pano chiwerengero cha anthu omwe tawamanga powaganizira kuti akukhuzidwa ndi nkhaniyi chafika pa asanu ndipo akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa,” anatero Nyaude. Nyaude anati anthu ena anayiwo omwe ndi kupahtikizapo mkulu wa achinyamata mchipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) Dyton Mussa, adakali mchitolokosi podikira tisku lomwe ayambe kuyimbidwa mlandu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la MNAT Ladandaula Ndi Kusowa Kwa Zipangizo Zozitetezera ku COVID-19 Pakati Pa Antchito Ake
news: Bungwe lolimbana ndi mchitidwe wozembetsa anthu mdziko muno la MNAT ladandaula kuti kusowa kwa zipangizo zodzitetezera pakati pa ogwira ntchito ambiri kukusokoneza ntchito yolimbana ndi mchitidwewu mu nthawi ino ya mliri wa COVID-19. Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za bungweli a Caleb Thole anena izi lachinayi pa 30 July tsiku lomwe dziko lapansi limakumbukira ntchito yolimbana ndi mchitidwe ozembetsa anthu. A Thole anati anthu ogwira ntchito monga apolisi, mzipatala, komanso mzipata zolowera mdziko muno akuyenera kupatsidwa zonse zodziyeneleza maka zodzitetezera ku matenda a COVID 19 kuti azigwira ntchitoyi momasuka. “Anzathu a polisi, a Immigration komanso a Labour akatenga anthu olakwira malamulo amangowasiya osawazenga milandu ndiye zimenezi zikupereka chiwopsezo makamaka kwa ntchito imeneyi komanso thumba la ndalama. Tadandaula kuti ndalama zomwe zilipo ndi zochepa ndipo tikupempha kuti boma liwonjezere,” anatero a Thole.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wathandiza Anthu 1million A Mdziko La Ukraine
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wathandiza anthu pafupifupi 1 million a mdziko la Ukraine kudzera mu ntchito zake za chifundo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wakhala akuthandiza anthuwa kuyambira mchaka cha 2016 pomwe ntchito za chifundozi adazikhazikitsa mdzikolo. Kaamba ka mavuto osiyana-siyana odza kaamba ka nkhondo yomwe yakhala ikuchitika m’dziko la Ukraine Papa Francisco wakhala akuthandiza anthu m’dzikolo kudzera mu ntchito zake za chifundo. Malinga ndi malipoti Papa’yu wakhala akuthandiza anthu okalamba, odwala komanso osauka ndipo zadziwika kuti ntchitoyi yadya kale ndalama zosachepera 1.2 billion Kwacha. Bishop Eduard Kava wauza Vatican Radio kuti ntchito yothandiza anthu omwe ali mmavuto osiyana-siyanayi yodziwika mchingerezi kuti “the Pope for Ukraine” inayamba mwezi wa June m’chaka cha 2016 ndipo wati ntchitoyi tsopano ikupita ku mapeto koma iye wati ntchito yomaliza ndiyogula zipangizo za mchipatala chomwe akuchimanga padakali pano. LaMulungu lapitali Papa Francisco analandira ndi manja awiri nkhani yoti mbali ziwiri zomwe zakhala zikumenyana ku m’mawa kwa dziko la Ukraine zasaina pangano losiya kuchitankhondo lomwe iye anati lithandiza kubweretsa bata ndi mtendere ku deralo. Kuyambira m’chaka cha 2014 mbali ziwiri zomwe ndi Donetsk People’s Republic ndi Ukrain Armed Forces zakhala zikuchita nkhondo m’dzikolo. Nkhondoyi yaphetsa anthu oposa 10,000 ndi kuvulaza anthu 24,000 ndikupangitsanso anthu 1.5 million kuthawa ku dera la kum’mawa kwa dziko la Ukraine.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Amangidwa Kamba Kogwilliira Mwana Wake Omupeza
news: Apolisi m’boma la Zomba akusunga mchitokosi bambo wina wa zaka 20 zakubadwa pomuganizira kuti wagwililira mwana wake wamkazi womupeza. Wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sergeant Patrick Maseko watsimikiza za nkhaniyi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Sergeant Maseko wati bamboyu ndi Stafford Chipoya ndipo adapalamula mlanduwu usiku wapa 23 July pomwe mayi ake a mwanayu anapita kukagula makandulo ndipo apa ndi pomwe bamboyu adapezerapo mwayi omugwililira mwana wake omupezayu. “Ndi zoona ife apolisi kuno ku Zomba tikusunga mchitokosi Stanford Chipoya pomugona mwana wake omupeza ndipo akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa,” anatero Sergeant Maseko. Pamenepa Sergeant Maseko achenjeza anthu onse omwe ali ndi mchitidwe otere kuti akazapezeka azamangidwa ndi kuyimbidwa mlandu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dayosizi ya Dedza Ikukonza Malo Osamalira Anthu Odwala Nthenda ya COVID-19
news: Komiti yapadera yowona za nthenda ya COVID-19 mu dayosizi ya Dedza yati ili mkati mokonza malo apadera osamalira anthu odwala nthendayi. Wapampando wa komitiyi a Robin Ngalande anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pa momwe ntchito zolimbana ndi nthendayi zikuyendera mu dayosiziyi. Iwo ati padakalipano apeza kale malo atatu omwe azigwilirako ntchitoyi omwe ati akungosowa kukonzedwa komanso kuwonjezera zipangizo zina zogwilira ntchito. “Kuyambira pachiyambi pamene tinakhazikitsidwa ngati task-force tachitapo zinthu zingapo ndithu ndipo tayendera zipatala zathu zonse komanso malo ena okhudzana ndi mpingo, komanso tapereka zipangizo zoyenelera zozitetezera ku matendawa ku maparish onse,” anatero a Ngalande. Iwo anati, “Ndife okhumudwa pomva kuti ansembe ena akukhuzidwa ndi nthendayi ndipo takonza malo omwe tizisungirako anthu opezeka ndi nthendayi mu dayosizi ino monga ku Mua, ku Mtendere komanso chipatala cha Sister Tereza ku Mikoke Parish.”
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PACAM Yadandaula Ndi Kusalidwa Kwa Anthu Omwe Apezeka Ndi Nthenda ya COVID-19
news: Bungwe lopereka chisamaliro kwa anthu odwala nthenda za mgonagona la Palliative Care Association of Malawi (PACAM) lati ndi lokhumudwa kuti anthu omwe akupezeka ndi nthenda ya COVID-19 akusalidwa m’madera momwe akukhala. Thambo: Pasakhale kusalana Wapampando wa bungweli mdziko muno a Lameck Thambo auza Radio Maria Malawi kuti anthu omwe akupezeka ndi nthenda ya Covid-19 komanso omwe achira ku nthendayi akusalidwa. Iwo ati mchitidwewu ukudzetsa nkhawa komanso mantha pakati pa anthuwa ndipo ati ukupereka chiwopsezo ku ntchito yolimbana ndi mliriwu. “Ifeyonso a Palliative Care tikufuna tipemphe kwa mabanja amene kuli anthu amene  akhudzidwa ndi nthenda ya COVID-19 kuti kusakhale kusalana kamba koti tamva kuti pali anthu ena ayamba kale kusalidwa. Anthu omwe akusalidwawa ndi omwe apezeka ndi kachilomboka kapenanso amene achira,” anatero a Thambo. Iwo apempha anthu kuti azitsatira njira zomwe boma lakhazikitsa pofuna kupewa nthendayi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamikira Bungwe Lomwe Likulimbana Ndi Njala Mdziko la Brazil
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wayamikira bungwe lina lomwe likugwira ntchito yolimbana ndi njala mdziko la Brazil. Bungweli akuti likuthandiza anthu ovutikitsitsa powagawira chakudya. Kudzera mwa Cardinal Michael Czerny, Papa watumiza uthenga woyamikira bungwe lotchedwa Sem Terra Movement mdziko la Brazil chifukwa cha ntchito yotamandika yomwe bungweli likugwira pothandiza kuchepetsa mavuto pakati pa anthu ovutikitsitsa mdzikolo pa nthawi ino ya mliri wa Coronavirus. Mu uthenga wake kwa Cardinal Czerny yemwe ndi m’modzi mwa akuluakulu a mu ofesi ya ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican yowona za chitukuko cha thunthu cha munthu yotchedwa Dicastery for the Promotion of Integral Human Development, Papa Francisco wati ndi woyamika bungwe la Sem Terra Movement chifukwa chowonetsa umodzi ndi ubale popereka chakudya kwa anthu ovutikitsitsa maka pa nthawi ino pomwe anthu ambiri ali m’mavuto osaneneka kamba ka mliri wa Coronavirus. “Kugawira chakudya anthu ovutikitsitsa ndi chizindikiro cha kukhazikika kwa ufumu wa Mulungu pakati pa anthu,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawo. Iye wati ali ndi chikhulupiriro kuti ntchito yotamandikayi ithandizanso magulu ndi mabungwe ena kudzidzimuka ndi kuyamba kuthandiza anthu ovutika m’dzikolo. Bungwe la Sem Terra Movement linayamba ntchito zake m’dzikolo m’chaka cha 1980 pofuna kumenyera ufulu wa anthu opanda malo kuti akhale ndi malo awoawo. Malipoti akuti ntchito za bungweli zafikira kale madera 24 mwa madera 26 a m’dzikolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Makhansala a Boma La Thyolo Akana Bwanamkubwa Watsopano
news: Makhansala a m’boma la Thyolo alembera kalata boma kuti lisapitilire ndi ganizo lake lotumiza Dr. Medson Matchaya kuti akhale bwanamkubwa watsopano wa bomalo. Polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi, wapampando wa khonsolo ya boma ya Thyolo, Sandram Maulana wati iwo amvetsedwa kuti Dr. Matchaya akuchotsedwa m’boma la Nkhotakota kaamba koti sanayendetse bwino zinthu kumeneko, zomwe akuti zikuperekanso chiwopsezo kuti atha kudzawononganso m’bomalo. Wakanidwa ku Thyolo-Matchaya Maulana wati makhansalawa sakutsutsana ndi kuchoka kwa bwanamkubwa wa bomalo yemwe alipo padakalipano, koma iwo akufuna kuti munthu amene akubwera watsopanoyo akhale wina osati Dr. Matchaya komanso yemwe ali ndi mbiri zabwino. “Sabata yatha panamveka kuti a Matchaya akubwera ku Thyolo ndipo potsatira mphekesera zomwe anthu amanena zokhuza iwo zomwe amachita ku Nkhotakota-ko ife tinawakana kamba ka mbiri zawo zoyipa zomwe amachita zomwe tikuona kuti kunonso atha kuzawonongako,” anatero Maulana. Atafunsidwa, mneneri mu unduna wa maboma aang’ono ndi chitukuko cha madera akumidzi a Muhlabase Mughogho anavomera kuti alandira kalatayi koma anapempha nthawi kuti ayankhepo kanthu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ana Awiri a Pachibale Afa pa Ngozi ya Moto ku Balaka
news: Ana awiri apachibale m’boma la Balaka, afa pa ngozi ya moto, nyumba yomwe amagona itapsa. Wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mchigawo chaku m’mawa Sergeant Tionge Kayenda wati ngoziyi inachitika usiku wa lamulungu pomwe bambo wa nyumbayi anachoka ku nyumbayi usiku, kupita ku msika wa Liwonde kukayang’ana mkazi wawo yemwe anali kogulitsa chimanga. Sergeant Kayenda wati ana omwe akhudzidwa pa ngoziyi ndi wa zaka zisanu komanso wina wa chaka chimodzi. “Chomwe chinachitika ndi chakuti abambowa anapita ku Liwonde Road Block kukasaka akazi awo omwe amagulitsa chimanga ndipo anawasiya anawa myumba akugona koma kandulo akuyaka ndipo pobwelera anapeza kuti nyumba yawo ikuyaka moto,” anatero Sergeant Kayenda. Iwo ati bambowa anayesa kuyitana anthu ozungulira kuti awathandize kuzimitsa motowu koma zinakanika. Pamenepa Sergeant Kayenda apempha anthu kuti adzikhala osamala pamene akuchoka pakhomo pawo kusiya ana okha pofuna kupewa Ngozi za mtunduwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mliri wa Coronavirus Wawonetsa Kufunika kwa Mgwirizano Pakati Pa Mayiko
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati mliri wa Coronavirus wawonetsa kufunika kwa umodzi komanso kudalirana pakati pa anthu ndi mayiko. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wanena izi m’mawu otsogolera a buku latsopano lomwe likulu la mpingowu latulutsa. Bukhuli lomwe alemba ndi ansembe awiri ndipo mutu wake ndi “Umodzi ndi Chikhulupiliro”, likupereka malingaliro a uzimu pa mliri wa Coronavirus. Papa Francisco wati umodzi pakati pa anthu ngakhale maiko maka pa nthawi ya mavuto ngati pa nthawi ino yomwe dziko lonse la pansi lakhudzidwa ndi mliri wa Coronavirus ndi wofunika kwambiri. Kudzera m’mawu oyambilirawa, Papa Francisco akupereka malingaliro ake makamaka iye akuwunikira maphunzitso a chikhristu omwe anthu angatole pa mliri wa Coronavirus. Iye wati mliri wa Coronavirus unadzidzimutsa dziko lonse la pansi komanso kusintha umo mmene anthu achitira zinthu zao. Anthu ambiri ataya abale awo, ambiri ntchito zao zatha ndipo ambiri alinso mmavuto a za chuma, watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati kudzera mu mliri wa Coronavirus phunziro lalikulu ndi loti zinthu zina zonse nzachabe ndipo kuti anthu akuyenera kudalira Mulungu basi. Iye wati anthu sakuyenera kuchita mantha popeza kuuka kwa Ambuye Yesu m’manda kukuyenera kubweretsa chimwemwe komanso chiyembekezo kwa anthu pakati pa mavuto ngati mliri wa Coronavirus. Umodzi ndi Chikhulupiriro ndi bukhu lomwe Cardinal Walter Kasper ndi Bambo George Augustin alemba ndipo m’bukuli muli malingaliro osiyana-siyana a uzimu pa mliri wa Coronavirus. Bukhuli lasindikizidwa ndi nyumba yosindikiza ma buku ya likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ya Vatican Publishing House. Cardinal Walter Kasper ndi President wopuma wa bungwe lomwe limalimbikitsa umodzi pakati pa mipingo (President emeritus of the Pontifical Council for Promoting Christian Unity) pamene Bambo Augustin ndi omwe adayambitsa Walter Kasper Institute m’chaka cha 2005.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bonongwe Wasumira Chimulirenji Kamba Komuwonongetsa Ndalama
news: Mkulu wa kampani yochita malonda a mbewu ya AgriZone International Trading (AZIT) Mathius Bonongwe wasumira yemwe adakhalapo wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino a Everton Chimulirenji kamba kokhumudwa ndi momwe iwo adachitira pa malonda a chimanga pakati pa kampaniyi ndi bungwe la ADMARC. A Bonongwe awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti chaka chatha adapemphedwa ndi a Chimulirenji kuti akagulitse chimanga ku bungwe la ADMARC koma m’malo mwake chidakabwezedwa. Wati sakudziwapo kanthu – Chimulirenji Malinga ndi a Bonongwe, kampani yawo ya AZIT idapemphedwa kuti ikagulitse chimanga ku bungwe la Admarc chomwe chimayenera kuti chipite mmisika ya bungweli mu mzinda wa Blantyre komanso m’boma la Balaka. Iwo ati Dr. Hetherwick Ntaba ndi omwe adatumidwa kuti akachite zokambirana ndi akuluakulu a board ya kampaniyi pa momwe malondawa amayenera kuyendera. A Bonongwe ati adali odabwa chimanga chawochi chitakakanidwa ku bungweli koma m’malo mwake bungweli lidagula chimanga cha kampani ya KU Distributors pa mtengo wa K330 pomwe iwo ankayembekezeka kuti agulitse chimangachi pa mtengo wa K250 pa kilogalamu. iwo ati adali okhumudwa pa izi kamba koti adawononga ndalama pafupifupi 96 million-kwacha kuti chimangachi chikafike mmalowa ndipo adayesa kukambirana ndi a Chimulirenji pa dandauloli. Atafunsidwa paizi, a Chimulirenji anati sakudziwapo kanthu pankhaniyi ndipo sakukumbukira kalikonse kuti padali malonda amtunduwu ndi kampani ya AZIT. Polankhula ndi wayilesi ino kudzera pa WhatsApp, iwo anenetsa kuti ili ndi bodza la mkunkhuniza ndipo kuti a Bonongwe akudziwanso kuti akunama pai zi ndipo anauza mtolankhaniyu kuti chilungamo chidziwika mu nthawi yake. Kumbali yawo, Dr Hetherwick Ntaba anati adalankhula ndi bungwe la admarc komanso kampani ya AZIT pomwe chimanga chinali chitatha mkhokwe za boma zosungila chimanga poganiza kuti kampaniyi ilinacho chimanga chokwanila koma malondawa adavuta kamba koti kampaniyi idali ndi chimanga chochepa cpoyelekeza ndi mlingo omwe ankaufuna. Koma titafunsanso mwapadera, m’modzi mwa akuluakulu aboard ya kampani ya AZIT ssta Anne GAnthu anati akuluakuluwa chiliungamo cha nkhaniyi akuchidziwa bwino. Pakadali pano, a Bonongwe ati asumilanso mkulu oyimira boma pa milandu Attorney General, kufunsa boma kuti liwalipile chindapusa kamba koti boma lidawamanga pomwe ankafunitsitsa kuti a Chimulirenji achitepo kanthu pa madandaulowa panthawi yomwe iwo adali wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino mu ulamuliro wa chipani cha DPP.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ufumu Wa Mulungu Ndi Chuma Cha Mtengo Wapatali
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati ufumu wa Mulungu ndi chuma chenicheni cha mtengo wa patali. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walankhula izi lamulungu ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican pamene amalankhula kwa anthu omwe anasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso ku dziko lonse la pansi kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti. Iye wati Mulungu amayitana anthu ake nthawi zonse kuti apeze chuma chenicheni komanso cha mtengo wa patali chomwe ndi ufumu wake. Papa’yu walankhula izi pothirira ndemanga pa Uthenga wabwino womwe unawerengedwa pa tsikuli lomwe ndi laMulungu la 17 mu nyengo ya pa chaka. Iye wati ndi cholinga cha Yesu Khristu kuti munthu aliyense athandizire pokhazikitsa ufumu wa Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati koma pofunafuna chuma cha mtengo wa patalichi nkofunika kusiya zinthu zina zopanda ntchito zomwe ndi zoiwalitsa komanso zotayitsa chuma chimenechi. Iye wati anthu ambiri lero ali mmavuto osaneneka chifukwa chotaya nthawi kusaka chuma chosakhalitsa. Pamenepa iye wati anthu akuyenera kutangwanika pofunafuna chuma chenicheni komanso cha mtengo wa patali. Chuma chimenechi ndicho ufumu wa Mulungu. Iye wati Yesu Khristu ndiye chuma cha mtengo wa patali, chuma chokhalitsa komanso chuma chosakhumudwitsa. Papa Francisco wati Amayi Maria athandize anthu onse kufunafuna chuma cheni chomwe ndi mwana wake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apha Munthu Kamba Kogona ndi Mkazi Wake
news: Apolisi m’boma la Ntcheu akusunga mchitokosi bambo wina wa zaka 44 kamba komuganizira kuti wapha mzake atamupeza akugonana ndi mkazi wake. Chigalu: Osatengera lamulo kumanja Malinga ndi mneneri wa apolisi m’bomali Sub Inspector Hastings Chigalu, izi zachitika usiku wa pa 24 July m’mudzi mwa Masunda 1 pomwe oganiziridwawa a Gabriel Yonasi omwe amakhala mu mzinda wa Blantyre komwe amagwirako ntchito, pa tsikuli anapita kunyumba kwa mkazi wawoyo ku Ntcheu komwe anapeza mkaziyo ali ndi mwamuna wina ndipo izi zinachititsa oganiziridwawa kubaya mzawoyo ndi mpeni. Anthu ozungulira ku malowa ndi omwe anatengera mkuluyu ku chipatala komwe anatsimikiza kuti wamwalira. “Ndi zoona kuti kuno ku Ntcheu Police tikusunga a Gabriel Yonasi powaganizira kuti anabaya komanso kupha a Justin Dziko chifukwa choti anawapeza ali myumba mwawo ndi akazi awo,” anateroSub Inspector Chigalu. Iwo ati a Yonasi akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu kuti akayankhe mlandu wa kupha. Pamenepa Sub Inspector Chigalu alangiza anthu kuti asamachite zachisembwere ndi akazi a eni ake komanso asamatengere lamulo m’manja mwawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dayosizi ya Chikwawa Yakhazikitsa Njira Zatsopano Zopewera COVID-19
news: Mpingo wa katolika mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa wakhazikitsa njira zatsopano zopewera kupatsirana kwa kachilombo ka Coronavirus pa nthawi ya mapemphero. Walemba kalatayo-Bishop Musikuwa Mkulu owona za chisamaliro cha anthu mu dayosiziyi, bambo Mathews Semba apereka uthengawu kwa atolankhani pomwe dayosiziyi yatulutsa kalata yofotokozera akhristu ake njira zatsopano zopewera kachilomboka. Mwazina dayosiziyi yapempha akhristu ake kuti azivala chotchinga kukamwa ndi mphuno pomwe akupita ku malo a mapemphero. “Nkhani yaikulu imene atolankhani tinawayitanitsira pano ndi yokhudza kalata yomwe ambuye atulutsa imene akufuna kuti iwerengedwe m’maparishi onse kuti akhristu amve za matenda amenewa ndiponso adziwe m’mene angazitetezere,” anatero bambo Semba. Pothilirapo ndemanga mlembi owona za umoyo mu dayosizizyi a Louis N’goma ati ndi okhuzidwa ndi kukula kwa muliliwu kamba koti anthu ambiri atayilira ndipo dayosizi yati iphunzitsa matelala awiri pa parishi iliyonse kusoka zotchingira kukamwa zomwe zizigulitsidwa pa mtengo wotsika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kusowa Kwa Nsomba Kwadzetsa Mavuto Pa Chuma
news: Nthambi yomwe imawona za ulimi wa nsomba ya Fisheries yati kusowa kwa nsomba mu nyanja za dziko lino, kukuchititsa kuti anthu azigula nsomba pa mitengo yokwera. Mkulu wa nthambiyi mchigawo chakum’mmawa a Riyadi John Kandapo ndi omwe anena izi ku Zomba pomwe amadziwitsa anthu za ntchito yomwe nthambiyi izigwira m’boma la Zomba yotchedwa Sustainable Fisheries and Aquiculture Development. Iwo ati padakalipano anthu akuvutika kuti agule nsomba kaamba koti zikumakhala pa mtengo okwera zomwe ati zikukhudzanso miyoyo ya mabanja osiyanasiyana. A Kandapo ati project imeneyi ithandiza asodzi ndi onse ogulitsa nsomba kunyanja kukhala ndi mwayi ochita nawo maphunziro apadera a momwe angapindulire ndi malonda a nsomba mdziko muno. A Kandapo ati cholinga cha ndondomekoyi ndi chofuna kutukula ulimi wa nsomba ndipo ati maboma omwe apindule ndi onse omwe ali m’mbali mwa Nyanja.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamikira Mnyamata wa Ulumali Popita ku Malo Oyera
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wayamikira mnyamata wina wa ulumali chifukwa chochita ulendo wa ku malo ena oyera mdziko la Spain. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wanena izi kudzera mu kalata ya chilimbikitso yomwe walembera mnyamatayu. Mnyamatayu Alvaro Calvente wa zaka khumi ndi zisanu (15) yemwe ali ndi ulumali wa m’mutu, sabata yatha adachita ulendo wa ku malo oyera mdziko la Spain otchedwa Yakobe Woyera Mpositoli moperekezedwa ndi mzake komanso bambo ake. Kudzera mkalata’yi Papa’yu wayamikira, kuchita chidwi komanso walimbikitsa mnyamatayu chifukwa cha zimene wachita kuyenda ulendo wa utali kupita ku malo ena oyera m’dzikolo kukapemphera moperekezedwa ndi mzake komanso bambo ake. Ulendo wa kumalo oyerawu womwe umatchedwa Camino de Santiago umakathera ku malo a Yakobe Woyera Mpositoli (Apostle Saint James the Great). Mkalata yake kwa mnyamatayu, Papa Francisco wauza mnyamatayu kuti iye wachita chidwi kuti popita ku malo oyerawa sadangotenga mapemphero ake okha mchikwama mwake koma kuti adatenganso mapemphero a anthu ambirimbiri. Papa’yu wati ndi wokondwa kuti kudzera mu ulendo wa ku malo oyerawu mnyamatayu wabweretsa chimwemwe m’moyo wa anthu ambiri omwe adakumana nao komanso ngakhale kwa anthu ena kudzera pa masamba a mchezo a pa intaneti. Iye walimbikitsa mnyamatayu pa moyo wake wa uzimu maka kuti azikumbukira kuti Mulungu amayenda nthawi zonse ndi anthu ake osawaiwala mpang’ono pomwe. Monga Papa Francisco achitira kawiri-kawiri pamene alankhula kapena kucheza ndi anthu, iye wamaliza kalata yake popempha mnyamatayu mapemphero. Moni kwa makolo ako, achimwene ndi alongo ako. Chonde osaiwala kundipempherera, watero Papa Francisco ku mapeto a kalatayi. Malinga ndi malipoti mnyamatayu Álvaro Calvente akuchita maphunziro a Katikisimu ndipo khumbo lake nkuti tsiku lina adzakumane ndi Papa Francisco maso ndi maso.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sister Renata Laisi a Chipani cha SBVM Amwalira
news: Chipani cha atumiki Atumiki a Maria Virgo Woyera chalengeza za imfa ya Sister Renata Euphrazia Laisi omwe amwalira m’mawa wa lero. Malinga ndi kalata yomwe yasayinidwa ndi mlembi wamkulu wa chipanichi Sister Georgina Sapangwa, mwambo woyika m’manda thupi la Sister Renata udzachitika lolemba likudzali ndipo udzayamba ndi nsembe ya misa nthawi ya 10 koloko m’mawa. Kalatayi yati mainga ndi mliri wa COVID-19, anthu onse opita ku mwambowu akuyenera adzavale chotchingira kukamwa ndi mphuno. Sister Laisi anabadwa pa 13 November 1934 m’mudzi mwa Baluwa mfumu yaikulu Kapeni m’boma la Blantyre ndipo amachokera mu parish ya Lunzu mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre. Malumbiro awo oyamba anachita pa 8 September 1958 ndipo atumikira m’ma parish a Mulanje, Namulenga, St. Maria Goretti, Neno, Masanjala, Mwanza, Pirimiti, Thondwe, Tsangano komanso Maryview Nursing Home komwe amwalilira. Sister Laisi amwalira ali ndi zaka 86 zakubadwa, ndipo akhala zaka 62 za moyo wa utumiki kudzera mchipanichi. Mzimu wa Sister Renata Euphrazia Laisi, uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mgwirizano wa Mafumu, Atsogoleri a Zipembedzo ndi Ofunika Polimbana ndi COVID-19
news: Ofesi ya zaumoyo m’boma la Blantyre yati ikukhupilira kuti ubale wake ndi mafumu komanso atsogoleri a zipembedzo ungathandizire pa ntchito yothana ndi nthenda ya COVID 19. M’neneri wa ofesi-yi Chrissy Banda walankhula izi msabatayi pa chipatala chaching’ono cha Ndirande mu mzinda wa Blantyre pambuyo pa mkumano wa tsiku limodzi omwe ofesiyi mogwirizana ndi bungwe la za chitukuko mu mpingo wa katolika la CADECOM mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre linakonzera atsogoleri osiyanasiyana monga mafumu, a zipembedzo ndi ena a m’derali, ndi cholinga chokambirana momwe angachitire pofuna kuthana ndi nthenda-yi m’dera-li. Mayi Banda ati mkumanowu wathandiza atsogoleriwa kulimbikitsa ubale wawo ndi a zaumoyo, zomwe anati zithandizira magulu onse okhuzidwa kuchitapo kanthu pamene ofesiyi ikuyetsetsa kufotokozera anthu njira zosiyanasiyana zopewera nthendayi. Mayi Mandinda Zungu omwe ndi mlembi wa bungwe la zachitukuko la CADECOM mu arkidayosiziyi anati bungwe lawo linapeza kuti pakusowekera mauthenga okwanira kuchokera kwa atsogoleri a m’madera pa nkhani ya m’mene anthu angadzitetezere ku mliriwu ndi chifukwa chake anabwera ndi mkumanowu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yayamikira Ntchito za anthu aku Mwanza Polimbana ndi COVID-19
news: Arkidayosizi ya Blantyre yati ndi yokhutira ndi momwe anthu a m’boma la Mwanza akuchitira pa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliri wa COVID 19. Mkulu woyang’anira mabungwe a zachitukuko mu arkidayosiziyi bambo Denis Kabvina alankhula izi mdera la mfumu yayikulu Kanduku m’bomalo pambuyo pa mkumano wawo ndi adindo osiyanasiyana pomwe amakamva m’mene anthu akuchitira pa ntchito yolimbana ndi nthendayi. Bambo Kabvina ati ntchito yolimbana ndi mliri wa COVID-19 si yamunthu m’modzi choncho ndi kofunika kuti maguru onse mdziko muno atengepo mbali. Polankhulapo mfumu Tulonkhondo ya m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Kanduku m’boma la Mwanza inayamikira bungwe la CADECOM kaamba ka zipangizo zomwe bungweli linapereka kwa anthuwa ndipo anati ngati mafumu ayesetsa kulimbikitsa kuti anthu azitsatira njira zopewera mliriwu mu zochcitika zosiyanasiyana ku madera kwawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la SRWB Latseka Ofesi Zake Chifukwa cha Coronavirus
news: Bungwe lomwe limagawa madzi mchigawo chakum’mwera la Southern Region Water Board (SRWB) latseka ofesi zake kuyambira lero mpaka pa 4 August kamba ka mliri wa Coronavirus. Zatsekedwa-imodzi mwa ofesi za SRWB Wofalitsa nkhani za bungweli a Rita Makwangwala watsimikidza za nkhaniyi ndipo wati zimenezi zikutanthauza kuti akhala sabata ziwiri asakugwira ntchito. Kudzera mu chikalata chomwe bungweli latulutsa, ganizoli ladza kaamba koti m’modzi mwa ogwira ntchito ku bungweli wapezeka ndi kachilombo ka Coronavirus ndipo imeneyi ndi njira yopewera kufala kwa kachilomboka pakati pa ogwira ntchito ena. Chikalatachi chatinso anthu onse ofuna kugula madzi adzigwiritsa ntchito njira yogulira madzi kudzera pa lamya ya m’manja yomwe ndi Airtel Money kapena Tnm Mpamba kapenanso kudzera ku Bank.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Thupi la Bambo Joachim Mwale Lalowa M’manda
news: Mwambo woyika m’manda thupi la malemu bambo Joachim Msekanawose Morocco Mwale a mu dayosizi ya Karonga, wachitika lero ku Likuni mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Alowa m’manda-bambo Mwale Malinga ndi kalata yomwe mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) bambo Henry Saindi asayina, bambo Mwale amwalira lachiwiri, atadwala nthenda ya Covid-19. Mwambo woyika m’manda thupi lawo wachitika motsatira ndondomeko zonse zopewera mliri wa Coronavirus. Lachiwiri pa 14 July, bambo Mwale akuti anapezeka ndi kachilombo ka Coronavirus pamene anali mu mzinda wa Lilongwe ndipo lachisanu madzulo anawatengera ku malo osamalira anthu odwala nthendayi ku chipatala cha Kamuzu Central komwe amwalira m’mawa wa lachiwiri pa 21 July 2020. Bambo Joachim Mwale anabadwa pa 26 January mchaka cha 1961 m’mudzi mwa Kawiya ku Nkhamenya m’boma la Kasungu. Maphunziro awo a pulayimale anachitira ku sukulu ya pulayimale ya Chigoneka ndipo secondary yawo anachitira ku Likuni Boys asanayambe kuchitita maphunziro awo a philosophy mchaka cha 1986 ku seminary yaikulu ya Kachebere. Iwo anakachitanso maphunziro awo a Theology ku seminale yaikulu ya St. Peters mchaka cha 1989 ndipo anazozedwa kukhala dikoni pa 16 January mchaka cha 1993 ndipo pambuyo pake anadzodzedwanso kukhala wansembe pa 8 August mchaka chomwecho. Bambo Mwale anatumikira m’ma parishi ambiri mu dayosizi ya Mzuzu ndipo nthawi yomwe dayosizi ya Karonga inakhazikitsidwa mchaka cha 2010 iwo anasankha kukatumikira mu dayosizi ya Karonga kwa kanthawi asanabwerere kukatumikira ku dayosizi ya Mzuzu. Pa nthawi ya imfa yawo iwo anali bambo mthandizi ku parishi ya St. Micheals komanso anali mkulu owona za chiyitanidwe mu dayosizi ya Karonga. Mzimu wa bambo Joachim Mwale uwuse mu mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhristu Aphunzire Kukonda Anzawo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wadzudzula khalidwe lodzikonda pakati pa anthu. Malinga ndi malipoti a wayilesi ya Vatican, Papa walankhula izi lachiwiri pomwe amakumana ndi ana omwe akuchita masewero osiyanasiyana komanso mapemphero ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wauza anawa kuti moyo umakoma ngati munthu ali ndi abwenzi ndipo ndi kofunika kuti iwo akhazikitse ma ubwenzi abwino ndi anzawo Atatha kulankhula kwa anawa, Papa’yu anachezanso ndi omwe akuyang’anira anawa komanso kuthandizira pa zina ndi zina asanabwerere kunyumba yake yomwe amakhala ya Casa Santa Marta kapena kuti Nyumba ya Marita Woyera. Zochitikachitika za anawa zinayamba kumayambiriro a mwezi uno ndipo pali masewero osiyana-siyana, kuphunzira zina nzina komanso kuchita mapemphero. Ena mwa masewero omwe akuchitika ndi masewero a mpira wa miyendo (football), tennis, basketball, kusambira (swimming) pongotchula ochepa. Zonse zikuchitika motsata ndondomeko zoyikika pofuna kupewa nthenda ya Covid 19. Anawa omwe alipo pafupi 100 ndipo a zaka zoyambira zisanu (5) mpaka zaka khumi ndi zinayi (14) ndi ana a anthu omwe amagwira ntchito zosiyana-siyana ku Vatican.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chilima Wati Akuluakulu a Nthambi Zomwe Zachedwa Kupereka Malipoti Alandire Chilango
news: Wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino, Dr. Saulos Chilima wati akuluakulu a nthambi za boma zomwe zakanika kupereka malipoti a ntchito zawo kufikira pa 17 July chaka chino, akuyenera apatsidwe chilango. Chilima yemwenso ndi nduna yowona za chitukuko cha dziko komanso kagwiridwe ntchito ka nthambi za boma, pa 7 ndi pa 9 July anakumana ndi akuluakulu a nthambi za boma mchigawo chapakati komanso chakumwera komwe anawauza kuti pasanafike pa 17 July, akhale atapereka malipoti a momwe agwilira ntchito zawo. Walamula kuti akuluakulu a nthambi alandire chilango Kudzera mu kalata yomwe mneneri wa wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleriyu Pilirani Phiri walemba, mwa nthambi 66 zomwe zimayenera kupereka malipoti awo, 56 ndi zomwe zinapereka malipotiwo mu nthawi yake pomwe 9 zapereka mochedwa ndipo nthambi imodzi yomwe ndi ya Malawi Institute of Management (MIM) siyinaperekebe. Polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi wofalitsa nkhani ku nthambi ya kagwiridwe ntchito ka nthambi za boma a Mccarthy Mwalwimba ati wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu ndi wokhumudwa ndi khalidwe lomwe akuluakulu a nthambi khumi-zi awonetsa ndipo walamula kuti akuluakuluwa alandire chilango. “Kalatayi ndi yoona yachokeradi ku ofesi ya Vice President ndipo padakali pano nthambi zomwe zalephera kupereka malipotiwa zapemphedwa kudzudzulidwa ndi akuluakulu kuchokera ku nthambi zimenezi,” anatero Mwalwimba. Iwo ati padakali pano chilangochi sichinaziwike ndipo zitengera kuti mkulu oyen’ganira mabungweyu awadzuzula motani.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MSE Ipereka Maphunziro apa Intaneti kwa Atolankhani
news: Kampani yogulitsa ma share, ya Malawi Stock Exchange yati kudzera mwa atolankhani ndi kwapafupi kuti anthu amvetse momwe msika wa ma share umakhalira. Kanyangala: Atolankhani ndi ofunika kwambiri M’modzi mwa akuluakulu a kampaniyi a Kelini Kanyangala awuza Radio Maria Malawi lolemba pakuyamba kwa maphunziro a sabata imodzi a pa internet, omwe kampaniyi yakonzera atolankhani ochokera m’nyumba zofalitsa nkhani zosiyansiyana za mdziko muno. A Kanyangala ati maphunzirowa athandiza kwambiri kuzindikiritsa anthu ambiri za momwe angachitire ngati akufuna kugula ma share kamba koti atolankhaniwa adzatha kufotokozera bwino pambuyo pa maphunzirowa, zomwe ati ndi zothandiza kwambiri pa chitukuko cha dziko lino. “Ife monga Malawi Stock Exchange (MSE) timazindikira gawo lofunikira lomwe atolankhani amatengapo maka potenga gawo pofalitsa nkhani zapa msika wama share ndipo talimbikitsa ubale umenewu pochita maphunziro apa intaneti,” anatero a Kanyangala. Iwo ati maphunzirowa athandiza atolankhaniwa kumvetsa nkhani za malonda komanso anthu kuti akakhala ndi mafunso azidziwa kokafusa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akhristu Akhale Opilira pa Mavuto
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati kukhala odekha popilira zovuta za moyo uno ndiye moyo weniweni wa chikhristu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi lamulungu ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati akhristu akuyenera kukhala odekha monga m’mene Mulungu achitira popereka mpata kwa anthu ake kuti alape ndi kutembenuka mtima. Papa Francisco wati Yesu Khristu amawululira akhristu kuti Mulungu ndi wodekha chinthu chomwe iye wati ndi chosangalatsa komanso chobweretsa chiyembekezo. Papa’yu walankhula izi pothilira ndemanga pa Uthenga Wabwino womwe unawerengedwa laMulungu la 16 mu nyengo ya pa chaka womwe ndi fanizo la mbewu zabwino ndi nansongole. Iye wati mu fanizoli antchito anafunsa mbuye wao kuti awalole azule nansongole yemwe anali kukula limodzi ndi mbewu m’munda koma mwini munda anati ayi ndi bwino azisiye zonse zikulire limodzi poopa kuti angazule ndi mbewu zabwino zomwe ndipo kuti nthawi yokolola ndi yomwe idzasiyanitse nansongoleyu ndi mbewu zabwino. Papa Francisco wati Mulungu yemwe ndi mwini munda amabzyala mbewu zabwino zokhazokha koma kuti satana amapeza mpata maka mu nthawi ya mavuto osiyana-siyana a moyo uno posokoneza anthu omwe mu fanizoli ndi mbewu. Iye wati pali anthu ena a phuma ofuna kuthana ndi tchimo komanso onse ochimwa. Pamenepa iye wati akhristu akuyenera kukhala odekha monga mmene Mulungu achitira popereka mpata kwa anthu ake kuti alape ndi kutembenuka mtima. Papa Francisco wati kukhala odekha popirira zovuta za moyo uno ndiye moyo weniweni wa chikhristu. Iye wati akhristu akuyenera kumabweza maganizo ofuna kuweruza ndipo m’malo mwake azikumbukira kuti Yesu Khristu anadza kudzapulumutsa anthu ochimwa
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Amangidwa Kamba Kogwilira Msungwana Ozelezeka
news: Apolisi m’boma la Chikwawa akusunga m’chitokosi bambo wina wa zaka 35 zakubadwa Charles Mikeyasi kamba komuganizira kuti wagwilira mtsikana wa zaka 18 zakubadwa yemwe ndi wozelezeka. Malinga ndi wachiwiri kwa m’neneri wa apolisi m’bomali Sergeant Dickson Matemba, izi zachitika pa 18 mwezi uno, pomwe bamboyu yemwe amachokera ku mowa anakumana ndi msungwanayu pomwe anamukokera pa tchire lina la kufupi ndi komwe mtsikanayu amachokera ndi kumugwilira. Anthu ozungulira ndi omwe anagwira bamboyu ndi kukamutula m’manja mwa apolisi. “Ndizoonadi kuti apolisi kuno ku Chikwawa tamanga bambo wina yemwe wagwirira mzimayi wa zaka 18 yemwe ali ndi ulumali wa mu ubongo pamene amachokera ku mowa,” anatero Sergeant Matemba. Iwo ati bamboyu akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwa ndipo pakadali pano apolisi achenjeza anthu ku derali kuti adzisamalira ana awo omwe ali ndi ma ulumali onga awa pomayenda nawo limodzi. A Charles Mikeyasi amachokera m’mudzi mwa bwalo mfumu yaikulu Kasisi m’boma la  Chikwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Abwezi a Radio alimbikitsidwa kupemphera kolona nthawi zonse
news: Abwenzi a Radio Maria Malawi mu dinale ya Mpiri mu dayosizi ya Mangochi awalimbikitsa za ubwino wokonda kupemphera kolona komanso kuchita mibindikiro pofuna kuzamitsa moyo wawo wa uzimu. Bambo Clemence Pindulani omwe ndi bambo mfumu wa parish ya St. Mofolo mu dinale-yi ndi omwe alankhula izi pamene abwenzi a Radio Maria mu dinale-yi amakawalandira. Iwo ati kupatula kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za Radio Maria, abwenziwa akuyeneranso kumapemphera kuti mzimu woyera uziwatsogolera nthawi zonse. “Ndiyambe ndi kuthokoza abwezi apa dinale ku Mpiri amene anawalimbikitsa akhristu omwe parish yawo yangoyamba kumene kuti atenge nawo gawo koposa,” anatero bambo Pindulani. Polankhulapo wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa abwenzi mu dinaleyi a John Soko anati bungwe lawo lakonza kale malingaliro ochita maphunziro osiyanasiyana a uzimu pakati pawo. “Ife tachilandira ngati chinthu chamtengo wapatali popeza mukulimbikitsana kwathu timaphunzira zambiri ndipo lero taphunzira kuti tizipemphera kolona kudzera mu mawu omwe bambo mfumu alankhula,” anatero a Soko.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wabwereza Kupempha Magulu Ochita Nkhondo Kuti Ayambe Ayima
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wabwerezanso kupempha magulu onse omwe akuchita nkhondo kuti ayambe ayima kaye. Polankhula lamulungu pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square komanso ku dziko lonse la pansi kudzera pa wayilesi ya kanema ndi makina a intaneti, Papa wati ndi wokhumudwa kuti kumenyana kwabukanso pakati pa maiko a Azerbaijan ndi Armenia. Malinga ndi malipoti kumenyana pakati pa maiko awiriwa kwaphetsa asilikali khumi ndi awiri ndi munthu wamba m’modzi a dziko la Azerbaijan ndipo asilikali anayi a dziko la Armenia afa ndipo ena ambiri avulala. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wabwereza kupempha mbali zonse zochita nkhondo kuti ziyambe zaima kaye pofuna kupereka mpata kuti anthu othandiza anzawo pa nthawi ino ya mliri wa Coronavirus athe kugwira ntchito popanda chovuta chilichonse ndipo kuti ntchito yolimbana ndi mliri wa Coronavirus iyende bwino. M’mawu ake iye watsimikiziranso odwala onse za mapemphero ake. Pempho la Papa Francisco loti magulu onse omwe akuchita nkhondo ayambe ayima kaye likutsatira mgwirizano womwe mayiko omwe amaona za chitetezo (Security Council) pansi pa bungwe la United Nations adachita pa 1 July 2020 wopempha bata ku magulu onse omwe akuchita nkhondo pofuna kuti anthu omwe akusowa chithandizo chosiyanasiyana m’nyengo iyi ya mliri wa Coronavirus athandizidwe bwino. mlembi wa mkulu wa bungwe la United Nations Antonio Gutterez ndi yemwe adabweretsa koyamba ganizo loti magulu onse ochita nkhondo ayambe aima kaye pa 23 March 2020 ndipo Papa Francisco adayamikira za ganizoli koyamba mzolankhulalankhula zake za pa 29 March 2020.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Afisi Apha Mayi Woledzera ndi Mowa ku Ntcheu
news: Afisi olusa apha ndi kuchotsa ziwalo za mayi wina wa kwa Doviko, m’mudzi mwa Layiti mfumu yaikulu Mpando m’boma la Ntcheu. M’modzi mwa anthu a mderali a Elizara Cornelius Chiwaula auza Radio Maria Malawi kuti izi zachitika kucha kwa tsiku lamulungu pa 19 July 2020.  Iwo ati mayiyu Elenita Zemberani analedzera kwambiri atamwa mowa zomwe zinamuchititsa kuti agone pansewu pomwe afisiwa anamupeza. “Ndi zowonadi kuti a Elenita Zemberani apezekadi atagwidwa ndi fisi komanso atadyedwa ziwalo zina ndi zina pamene amachokera ku mowa. Zimenezi zachitika cha m’ma 3 koloko m’bandakucha wa lero,” anatero a Chiwaula. Padakalipano apolisi m’bomalo ati akufufuzabe za nkhaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Lamulo Lothandiza Anthu Kupeza Mauthenga Mosavuta Liyamba Kugwira Ntchito Posachedwa-Kazako
news: Unduna wa zofalitsa nkhani watsimikizira aMalawi kuti lamulo lothandiza anthu kupeza mauthenga mosavuta la Access to Information (ATI) liyamba kugwira ntchito posachedwapa. Kazako: Anthu anavota kuti zinthu zisinthe Nduna mu undunawu a Gospel Kazako ndi omwe anena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati mtsogoleri w adziko lino anasayinira kale lamuloli koma anthu ena mu ulamuliro wa chipani cha DPP ndi omwe amalepheretsa kuti lamulori liyambe kugwira ntchito yake. “Vuto la dziko lomwe limayendetsedwa ndi mabanja awiri kapena atatu kapena anayi limakhala limeneli ndipo umboni wake ndiwa lamulo limeneli la Acces to Information. Nyumba ya malamulo inavomereza komanso a president anasayinira koma mabanja ena ake ochepa anangoganiza kuti lisayambe kugwira ntchito zomwe ndi zoyipa kwambiri,” anatero a Kazako. Pamenepa a Kazako ati mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Lazarus Chakwera waonetsa kale chidwi choti lamuloli liyambirenso kugwira ntchito ndipo wati boma lomwe lilipo padakalipano lilibe chilichonse choti libise choncho lamuloli liyamba kugwira ntchito.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dayosizi ya Mangochi Yapereka Ndondomeko Zatsopano Zopewera COVID-19
news: Mpingo wa katolika mu dayosizi ya Mangochi walangiza akhristu ake ndi njira zatsopano zomwe akuyenera kutsatira pochita mapemphero, potsatira kupitilira kufala kwa mliri wa Coronavirus mdziko muno. Walemba kalatayo-Bishop Stima Kalata yomwe yalembedwa ndipo yasayinidwa ndi episkopi wa dayosiziyi ambuye Montfort Stima, yapempha akhritsu kutsatira njira zina zowonjezera pamene akupitilira kutsatira njira zomwe mpingo komanso boma linakhazikitsa kale. Zina mwa njira zatsopanozi ndi monga kuvala chotchingira kukamwa ndi mphuno pamene akuchita mwambo wa nsembe za misa. Zina ndi monganso kukhala malo odutsa mpweya pamene akuchita mwambo wa mapemphero komanso kupewa kugwiritsa ntchito ma fan; kugwiritsa ntchito sopo komanso kulolini pamene akukonza mmalo opempherera, kukhala motarikirana ma mita awiri komanso kusamba m’manja ndi sopo. Ambuye stima kudzera mu kalatayi yomwe alembera ansembe, asiteri komanso akhristu eni ake, ati miyambo ya nsembe ya misa idzichitika kosapitirira ola limodzi ndipo akhristu apewe kupereka mphatso pamanja, kulandilira ukalistiya m’manja komanso ati pakuyenera kukhala ndondomeko yabwino komanso yokhazikika pamene akhritsu akutuluka mu tchalitchi kuti apewe kugundana-gundana. Pomaliza kalatayi yaimitsa ena mwa masakramenti monga sakrameneti la ubatizo, zinamwali za mpingo komanso maphunziro akatikisimu wa ana. Ngakhale izi zili chomwechi, episkopiyu wapereka chilorezo kwa masakramenti ena koma motsatira ndondomeko zopewera mliriwu. Ma sacramentiwa ndi monga la kulapa, kudzodza komanso ukwati pomwe akuti opereka komanso olandira ma sacramentiwa onse adzivala chotchingira kukamwa ndi mphuno komanso azitsatira ndondomeko zonse zomwe mpingo komanso boma lakhazikitsa. Pomaliza ambuye stima apempha akhristu kuti akonde kutsatira njira zozitetezerazi kulikonse ngakhale kumalo oti si kutchalitchi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Mkulu wa Zaumoyo ku Vatican
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco, wasankha mkulu wa bungwe lowona za umoyo ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, loweruka pa 18 July 2020 Papa wasankha Doctor Giovanni Battista Doglietto kukhala mkulu kapena kuti Director wa bungwe lomwe limawona za umoyo ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican lomwe limadziwika kuti Vatican Healthcare Services, Fondo Assistenza Sanitaria (FAS) mchiyankhulo chachitaliyana. Doctor Doglietto walowa m’malo mwa Doctor Stefano Loreti yemwe anali mkulu wa bungweli. Bungwe lowona za umoyo’li la Vatican Healthcare Services limaona kuti onse amene amagwira ntchito kulikulu la Mpingo ku Vatican akulandira chisamaliro chabwino cha kuchipatala kukakhala kosoweka kutero pozindikira kuti ntchito zomwe agwira ndi zofunika kwambiri kotero akuyeneranso kusamalidwa bwino polandira chithandizo cha chipatala mu nthawi yake, watero Monsignor Luigi Misto yemwe ndi President wa bungweli pofotokozera Vatican Radio. Monsignor Misto wati likulu la mpingo wa katolika likuyenera kukhala chitsanzo chabwino pa maphunzitso a Mpingo wa Katolika otchedwa Social Teaching of the Church maka pa za ubale ndi umodzi (solidarity) ndi awo omwe akudwala ndipo akusowa chisamaliro ndipo iye wati izi zikuyenera kuyambira kulikuluko ku Vatican. Pali ena omwe sadwala nkomwe koma sasiyabe kupereka ndalama kuthumbali, umenewu ndiye ubale ndi umodzi (solidarity) ndi awo omwe amasowa chisamaliro cha kuchipatala pafupi-pafupi watero Monsignor Misto. Mwezi ndi mwezi aliyense wogwira ntchito ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican amapereka ndalama ku thumba la bungwe lowona za umoyo’li la Vatican Healthcare Services kapena kuti Fondo Assistenza Sanitaria zomuthandizira atakhala kuti wadwala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ayamikira Boma Kamba Komanga Opalamula Mu Ulamuliro wa DPP
news: Anthu komanso mabungwe osiyanasiyana ati sakuona vuto lililonse pamene anthu ena omwe anali m’boma lapitali akumangidwa ndi apolisi kamba kowaganizira kuti anapalamula milandu yosiyanasiyana mu mthawi ya ulamuliro wa chipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) chomwe padakalipano chinatuluka m’boma. M’modzi mwa anthu omwe amangidwa-Chisale M’modzi mwa anthu omwe anapikisana nawo pa mpando wa uphungu wa nyumba ya malamulo m’dera la kumpoto chakumadzulo kwa boma la Phalombe Kelvin Jumbe wanena izi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Iye wati pakufunika anthu omwe ali m’maudindo osiyanasiyana m’boma azilemekeza malamulo komanso kuchepetsa m’chitidwe owononga chuma cha dziko maka pa nthawi yomwe ali m’maudindo osiyanasiyana othandiza pa ntchito zotukula dziko lino Izi zikuza pamenenso magulu ena akudzudzula boma ati kamba komanga anthu ena omwe anali m’boma la chipani cha DPP zomwe akuganiza kuti ndi zikuchitika pa zifukwa za ndale.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Ziyaye Apempha Ansembe Akhale Odzipereka
news: Arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, Ambuye Tarcizio Ziyaye wapempha ansembe mdziko muno kuti akhale odzipereka pa ntchito yotumikira Mulungu monga momwe Ambuye Yesu Khristu anali kuchitira pa utumiki wake. Ziyaye: Unsembe ndi mphatso Ambuye Ziyaye anena izi ku tchalitchi la Padre Pio Woyera yomwe ndi nthambi ya St. Andrea Kaggwa Parishi mu arkidayosiziyi, pa mwambo wodzodza dikoni Benard Mwayi Ligomeka kukhala wamsembe. Iwo ati unsembe ndi mphatso ndipo ansembewa akuyenera kutumikira monga amachitira Yesu Khritsu. “Unsembe ndi mphatso ndiponso mitseri yodabwitsa kwambiri ndipo ife ngati anthu opatulika Mulungu anatigawirako mphatso ina ndipo wansembe akadzodzedwa amasanduka wansembe wina,” anatero Ambuye Ziyaye. Polankhulapo bambo Ligomeka anati ndi okondwa kuti maloto awo ofuna kutumikira Mulungu mu njira ya usembe, akwaniritsidwa. “Ine chimwemwe changa ndi chopambana chifukwa choti Mulungu wandigawira sacramenti la ukulu,” anatero bambo Ligomeka. Wansembe wa tsopanoyu akatumikira mdziko la Tanzania ku sukulu ya achinyamata ya Capuchin Boys komwe akakhale bambo mlangizi pa za uzimu pa sukuluyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Save the Children Yadzudzula Nkhondo ya m’dziko la Yemen
news: Bungwe lomwe limayang’ana nkhani za ana la Save the Children ladzudzula nkhondo yomwe ikupitirira kuchitika m’dziko la Yemen ndi kuphetsa ana osalakwa. Bungweli ladzudzula mbali zonse zomwe zikuchita nkhondo m’dzikolo potsatira kuphedwa kwa ana khumi msabata yomwe ikungothayi. Kudzera m’chikalata chomwe mkulu wa bungwe la Save the Children m’dzikolo Xavier Joubert walemba wati ndi wokhumudwa kuti pa nthawi yomwe dzikolo linakakhala lotangwanika ndi ntchito yofuna kugonjetsa mliri wa Coronavirus nkhondo ikupitirirabe m’dzikolo ndi kuphetsa anthu osalakwa. Ndife ogwidwa ndi mantha kuti ambiri mwa anthu omwe a kuphedwa ndi ana, watero Joubert m’chikalatacho. Iye wati ndi zomvetsa chisoni ndipo zokhumudwitsa kuti ana ambiri akuphwedwa pa nkhondo yomwe sikuwakhudza ndipo wati nkhondoyi ikulepheretsa ntchito yopereka thandizo kwa anthu m’dzikolo komanso kuti nkhondoyi ikulepheretsa ntchito yolimbana ndi mliri wa Coronavirus. Joubert wapempha mbali zonse zokhudzidwa komanso maiko ndi mabungwe kuti athandize kuthetsa nkhondoyi yomwe yaphetsa anthu ambiri osalakwa. M’dziko la Yemen mwakhala mukuchitika nkhondo kuyambira m’chaka cha 2014 ndipo anthu oposa 100,000 aphedwa ndipo anthu oposa 3 million adathawa m’dzikolo kaamba ka nkhondoyi. Poonjezera pa nkhondoyi malipoti akuti anthu 1,526 agwidwa ndi nthenda ya Covid 19 ndipo anthu 400 amwalira ndi nthendayi m’dzikolo. Posachedwapa mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco adapempha magulu osiyana-siyana ochita nkhondo pa dziko lonse la pansi kuti ayambe aima kaye pofuna kupereka mpata kuti ntchito yolimbana ndi mliri wa Coronavirus iyende bwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu a M’boma la Likoma Akufuna Bwanamkubwa Wawo Achoke
news: Anthu ena omwe akuti ndi okhudzidwa m’boma la Likoma alembera kalata boma kuti lichotse bwanamkubwa wa bomalo komanso mkulu owona za umoyo m’bomalo. Anthuwa achita ziwonetsero ati posakondwa ndi momwe awiriwa akugwilira ntchito zawo m’bomalo. Anthu okhudzidwa aku Likoma kuwerenga kalata ya madandaulo awo M’modzi mwa anthu okudzidwawa a Mathews Manyuka awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti bwanamkubwayu sakufotokoza bwino momwe agwiritsira ntchito ndalama zokwana 30 million-kwacha zomwe zimayenera kuthandiza polimbana ndi mliri wa Covid-19 komanso kuphatikizapo ndalama zina zochuluka zomwe zimayenera kugwira ntchito ya chitukuko m’bomalo. “Ziwonetserozi zikuchitika pa zifukwa ziwiri chomwe china ndi kusowa kwa bwana DHO mu ofesi yawo kuchokera pamene anatumizidwa kuti azizagwira ntchito m’boma lino, komanso bwana DC alephera kutipasa malipoti ochulukwa okhuza chitukuko ndipo ngati m’boma lino muli chitukuko ndi chomangidwa ndi a mission basi,” anatero a Manyuka.
