Mmodzi mwa akuluakulu oyendetsa ntchito za sukulu-yi, bambo Christopher Sichinga anena izi pa msonkhano wa makolo ndi adindo oyendetsa ntchito za pasukuluyi. Iwo ati kuti ana adzichita bwino pa maphunziro awo zikufunika kuti makoko a mdelaro apitilize kudzipereka pokweza ntchito za maphunziro a wana pa sukuluyi. Pamenepa bambo-wa anati mpingo wakatolika upitiriza kugwira ntchito zake ndi boma ndi kuonetsetsa kuti ntchito zokweza maphunziro m’dziko muno zikuyenda bwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: REACH Trust Ichita Kafukufuku wa Zaumoyo
news:
Wolemba: Sylvester Kasitomu Bungwe lomwe limachita kafukufuku pa nkhani za umoyo mdziko muno la Reach Trust lati liphunzitsa akuluakulu a zachipatala  m’boma la Zomba, upangiri wa zaumoyo. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu ku bungwe-li m’dziko muno a Cassim Kwalamasa anena izi m’boma la Zomba pomwe amafotokozera khonsolo ya bomalo za momwe agwilire ntchito yawo. Iwo ati pali akuluakulu ena omwe sanaphunzire za chipatala koma anapatsidwa ntchito yoyang’anira zipatala choncho bungwe lawo lipereka upangiri woti anthuwa azitha kutsogolera bwino ntchito yomwe amagwira.
“Nkhani yayikulu ndi yoti pali anthu ambiri amene amagwira ntchito za chipatala monga ma dokotala muzipatala za m’maboma mdziko muno iwowa akafika pamalopa m’malo mogwira ntchito yawo amapatsidwanso ntchito monga adminstration zomwe sanaphunzire. Ndondomeko imeneyi iwathandiza kuti pamene apatsidwa maudindo osiyanasiyana azitha kuwagwira mosavuta,” anatero Kwalamasa. Dongosololi linayamba mu chaka cha 2017 m’boma la Dowa ndipo maboma a Zomba, Machinga ndi Mangochi azichitira pamodzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha Achitetezo Asamalowelere Ndale
news: Wolemba: Sylvester Kasitomu Mkulu wa apolisi m’boma la Zomba, Deputy Commissioner Happy Mkandawire wapempha achitetezo mdziko muno kuti asamalowetse ndale mu ntchito yawo. Mkandawire amalankhula izi ku Police College mu mzindawo pa msonkhano omwe amafotokozera akuluakulu oyang’anira chitetezo chakumudzi za momwe apolisi agwilira ntchito yawo miyezi isanu ndi umodzi yapitayi. Iwo ati chiwerengero cha milandu chatsika m’bomalo kusiyana ndi milandu ya ngozi za pansewu yomwe ati yakwera kwambiri chifukwa oyendetsa galimoto ambiri amakhala ataledzera. Mwazina iye wati apolisi akuyesetsa kugwira ntchito modzipereka pofuna kuchepetsa umbava ndi umbanda m’bomalo. “Nkhani yayikulu ndi yoti tikufuna kuchepetsa milandu ya pa nsewu kaamba koti mu miyezi 6 yapitayi milandu ya umbanda ndi ina yabwera yochepa ku ofesi kwathu kuyerekeza ndi milandu ya pansewu izi zikuchitika kaamba koti madalaivala ena akumayendetsa galimoto kapena njinga zamoto ataledzera. Ndi khumbo lathu kuti miyezi ikubwerayi tichepetse milanduyi,” anatero Mkandawire. Ndipo Polankhulapo bwanamkubwa wa bomalo Emmanuel Bambe walangiza akuluakulu a chitetezo cha kumudziwa kuti apewe kulanga okha munthu amene akumuganizira kuti wapalamula mlandu ponena kuti udindo umenewu ndi wa apolisi kapena akuluakulu odziwa za malamulo. “Chachikulu ndi choti tiwazindikiritse anthu kuti akagwira mumnthu oti wapalamula mulandu azibwera naye kupolisi kuti lamulo ligwire ntchito,” anatero Bambe. Iwo anapitiriza kupempha magulu a polisi ya kumudzi ndi mafumu kuti apewe mchitidwe okambirana kumudzi milandu monga yogwiririra kudzembetsa ana ndi ina ikuluikulu poopa kubweretsa chisokonezo zomwe zingachititse kuti opalamula mulandu avulazidwe kapena kuphedwa kumene.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Malawi Ikumbukira Anthu Otaya Miyoyo Mmalo Osungiramo Nyama
news: Wolemba: Sylvester Kasitomu Dziko la Malawi lagwirizana ndi maiko pa dziko lonse lero pokumbukira anthu omwe adataya miyoyo yawo akugwira ntchito m’malo osungilamo nyama za ku tchile. Dziko la pansi limakumbikira tsikuli pa 31 July chaka chili chonse pofuna kupereka ulemu wapadera kwa anthu-wa. A Brighton Kumchedwa yemwe ndi mkulu wa nthambi yooona za malo osungilamo nyama zachilengedwe m’dziko muno ndipo anati tsikuli ndilofunika kwambiri kaamba koti asirikali omwe amagwira ntchito mmalo osungiramo zachilengedwe amagwira ntchito yoatamandika kwambiri maka posamalira zachilengedwezi zomwe ndi zothandiza mu mbiri komanso chuma cha dziko lino. “Tsiku limeli ndi lofunika kwambiri kuti tidzilikumbukuira kaamba koti akuthandiza pantchito zopititsa patsogolo zinthu zachilengedwezi zomwe ndi zofunika mdziko,” anatero a Kumchedwa. Iwo anpitilira kunena nkhani za chitetezo cha anthuwa kuti pomwe akugwira ntchito zosamalira nyamazi amayenera kuwapatsa zida zozitetezera monga mfuti komanso nsapato maka kwa nyama zolusa zomwe angamakumane nazo mu khalango zomwe zikusungidwirako.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: SECAM Yapempha Maiko Alimbane Ndi Mchitidwe Wozembetsa Anthu
news: Wolemba: Sylvester Kasitomu Mpingo wakatolika m’mayiko a mu Africa wapempha mayiko kuti adzipereke pa ntchito zolimbana ndi m’chitidwe wozembetsa anthu ndi kulemba ntchito ana aang’ono. Wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mchigawo cha kumvuma kwa Africa  ndi Madagascar la Symposium of Episcopal Comferences of Africa And Madagascar (SECAM), ambuye Thomas Luka Msusa anena izi mu zolankhula zawo ku msonkhano umene ma episkopi a mchigawochi analinawo mdziko la Uganda. Msonkhano-wu unayamba pa 21 ndipo watha pa 28 July 2019. Pamenepa Ambuye Msusa afotokozera atolankhani a Vatican  Radio kuti mchitidwe wozembetsa anthu ndi kugwilitsa ntchito ana ang’ono ndi nkhanza zina zomwe akukomana nazo, wakula kwambiri m’mayikowa kotero mayiko sakuyenera kungokhala chete koma kuonetsetsa kuti akuyika mfundo zabwino zotetedza anthu ku m’chitidweu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Okhudzidwa Achita Ziwonetsero ku Makanjira
news: Wolemba: Thokozani Chapola Gulu lina la anthu lomwe likudzitchula kuti anthu okhudzidwa a mdera la Makanjira lomwe ndi dera la kumpoto kwa boma la Mangochi anachita ziwonetsero pofuna kukakamiza phungu wa deralo Benedicto Chambo kuti afotokoze bwino momwe ndalama zina za deralo zinayendera. Gululi lati Chambo yemwe ndi wa chipani cha DPP anasokoneza ndalama zina zomwe zimayenera kugwiritsidwa ntchito pomanga milatho iwiri, scheme ya za ulimi komanso police unit mderalo. Padakali pano gululi kudzera mwa mtsogoleri wawo Selli Muhammad, lawopseza kuti ngati phunguyu safotokoza bwino pa nkhaniyi, amuletsa kufikanso kuderali kwa zaka zonse zisanu zomwe akhale ali pa udindowu. “Panali ndalama za CDF zoti amangire ma bridge awiri ndi ma scheme 4. Tinawapeza kuti tilankhule nawo koma anatiuza kuti ife sizikutikhudza ndipo si mbali yathu. Akapanda kufotokoza bwino timuuza kuti azikhala ku tawuni komwe amakhala komwe mpaka teremu yake izathe koma asazaonekenso kuno. Akazachita makani tizagwiritsa ntchito umunthu wathu pa iyeyo,” anatero Muhammad. Koma polankhulapo Chambo anati ziwonetserozi zikuchitika pa zifukwa za ndale ndipo wati yemwe amapikisana naye kwambiri pa chisankho chapitachi ku deralo ndi amene akukolezera ziwonetserozi. “Ine sindimagwira ndalama za CDF, nnazisiya mmanja mwa a ADC kuti aziyendetsa. Choncho akanakhala kuti ndi a ADC akunena zimenezi ndikanavomereza. Iwowo apite ku khonsolo akafufuze kaye bwino abwere ndi nkhani yomwe ali nayo umboni chifukwa nditha kukawasumira pondiyipitsira mbiri yanga. Amene akukolezera zimenezi ndi yemwe ndimapikisana naye pa chisankho chapitachi. Akanakhala kuti anthu samandikonda ku dera kwanga sibwenzi atandivoteranso teremu yachiwiri ndipo ndinapambana ndi mavoti ochuluka kwambiri,” anatero Chambo. Iye wati sali okonzeka kukumana ndi gululi kuti alifotokozere momwe ndalamazi zinayendera kaamba koti gululi lafulumira kuchita ziwonetsero lisanakambirane naye ndipo wapempha gululi kuti likumane ndi akuluakulu a khonsolo ya bomalo kuti akafufuze bwino nkhaniyi. Pa chisankho chapitachi Chambo anapambana ndi mavoti okwana 12, 277  ndipo wachiwiri wake anali Ibrahim Matola wa chipani cha PP amene anapeza mavoti okwana 5188.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kwaya ya Gambula Parishi Iyendera Magomero Parishi
news: Wolemba: Sylvester Kasitomu Kuyenderana pakati pa makwaya a mpingo wakatolika ati ndi komwe kungathandize pa ntchito yopititsa patsogolo chipembedzo mumpingowu. Wapampando wa kwaya ya St. Josephy kuchokera kwa Gambula Parish mu Archidayosizi ya Blantyre a Harry Nthala ndi omwe anena izi pa ulendo wawo wokachedzerana ndi kwaya ya St. Patricks ku Magomelo Parish mu Dayosizi ya Zomba. Mwazina iwo ati makwaya ali ndi udindo waukulu maka pokometsa komanso kupititsa patsogolo chipembedzo cha mpingowu. Mwazina anthala anati ulendo wawo aphunzira zambiri monga njira za mmene angaeyendetsere kwaya yyawo monga kukonga komiti ya padera ya akhristu yotchedwa trustees comitee. “Pamene tikuchezerana sitimakhala tingoimba kokhakomanso timakhala tikudziwana komanso kuphunzitsana mfundo za memene tingapititsile patsogolo chipembezo kudzera mukuimba ndi zina,” anatero Nthala. Ndipo polankhulapo mlembi wa kwaya ya st. joseph yochokera ku magomelo mu dayosizi ya Zomba mayi Olive Matola William anati kubwera kwa anzawowa aphunzira zambili monga mmene angapititsile chipembedzo patsogolo kudzera mukuimba ndi zina. “Tikamayenderana sitimangophunzitsana kuimba kokha komanso timapezerapo mwayi odziwa madera komanso zikhalidwe za anzathu,” anatero mayi Matola. kwaya ya St. Josephy ndi yomwe inatsogolera ndi nyimbo pa nsembe ya ukaristiya ya patsikuli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Matenda Osapatsirana Akuchuluka-Boma
news: Wolemba: Sylvester Kasitomu Boma kudzera muunduna wa zaumoyo lati pofika mchaka cha 2025 anthu ambiri mdziko muno azakhala atakhudzidwa ndi matenda monga kuthamanga kwa magazi ndi shuga kuposa matenda opatsirana monga a Edzi. Mkulu othandizira kuyendetsa zipatala ku matenda asapatsirana mdziko muno ku undunawu a Hestings Chigalu Chiumia ndiwo ayankhula izi mboma la zomba pomwe amafotokozera akuluakulu aboma la zomba za matenda amgonagona osapatsirana-wa. Mwazina a Chiumia alangiza anthu kuti apewe kusuta fodya ndi kuledzara alimbikitse kudya zakudya zamagulu komanso kuchita masewera olimbitsa thupi zomwe ndizothandiza kuti asadwale matendawa. Mwazina iwo anati anthu ambiri ngati sasata njira zoyenera pakayendetsedwe kwa moyo wawo azadwala matendawa kuposa amene azapezeke ndi matenda opatsilana monga edzi malungo ndi zina. “Tikamafika mu chaka cha 2025 anthu ambili azakhala atadwala matendawa kaamba koti anthu masiku ano akukonda kudya zakudya za nyama chipisi cha pachiwaya ndi zina zomwe zingapangitse kuti chiwerengero cha mafuta amthupi chikwere ndikuamba kudwala matendawa,” anatero a Chiumia. Mwazina iye wapepha anthu kuti apewe kudya zakudya zomwe zingakoledzere kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha mafuta mthupi komanso kukonda kuchita masewera  kafukufuku anasonyeza kuti muchaka cha 2009 anthu odwala matendawa anali 33 pa hundred aliwonse odwala matenda a bp ndipo 6 pa hundred aliwonse odwala matensda a shuga ndipo mu chaka cha 2016 chinafika kufika pa 19 pa hundred aliwonse odwala bp ndipo atatu pa hundred aliwonse odwala shuga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Paramount Chief Ngolongoliwa Amwalira, Ayikidwa Lachitatu
news: Wolemba: Thokozani Chapola Mfumu yaikulu ya Alhomwe-Ngolongoliwa Mfumu yaikulu ya mtundu wa alhomwe, Paramount Chief Ngolongoliwa yamwalira. Wofalitsa nkhani ku unduna woona za maboma aang’ono ndi chitukuko cha madera akumudzi Mulhabase Mughogho watsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iye wati mfumuyi yamwalira lamulungu pa 28 July 2019 ku chipatala cha Mwayiwathu mu mzinda wa Blantyre atadwala kwa nthawi yaitali. Mwambo woyika mmanda thjupi la malemu Ngolongoliwauchitika lachitatu pa 31 July 2019 ku likulu la ufumuwu ku Mtundawosema m’boma la Thyolo kuyambira nthawi ya 12 koloko masana. Thupi la malemu Paramount Chief Ngolongoliwa lili mu bokosi Padakali pano mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Peter Mutharika walamula kuti mwambowu udzakhale mwambo wa boma ndi udzalandire ulemu wa asilikali a nkhondo a dziko lino. Malinga ndi a Mughogho, mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu akakhala nawo pa mwambowu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Abwenzi  Ayamikira Dongosolo la Mariatona
news: Wolemba Richard Makombe Abwenzi a Radio Maria Malawi ati ndi okhutira ndi momwe  nyengo ya Mariatona yayendera chaka chino. Mariatona ndi nyengo imene Radio Maria imakonza chaka chilichonse pofuna kupeza thandizo loyendetsera ntchito za wayilesiyi komanso kubwenza ngongole zomwe wayilesiyi ili nazo. Ena mwa abwenzi a wailesiyi ku mwambo wotsekera Mariatona ku Dedza Wapampando wa Abwenzi a Radio Maria mu dayosizi ya Blantyre a James Ngombe awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti kuyambira pomwe Mariatona inayamba mwezi wa May akhala akutsatira bwino mwa chidwi ndipo ndi osangalala kuti zinthu zayenda bwino mpaka kufikira kumapeto pomwe nyengo ya Mariatona yatsekedwa. A Ngomba ati ngakhale panali zovuta zina monga kusowa kwa mabuku olembapo mmene munthu waperekera thandizo lake anthu ambiri ayesetsa kuthandiza wayilesiyi. “Ndipemphe kwa akuluakulu kuti ayesetse kuti mabuku olemberapo maina a anthu omwe apereka thandizo lawo ku wayilesiyi azifikira anthu aku midzi komwe nawo azithandiza wayilesiyi,” anatero a Ngomba. A Ngomba apempha akhristu komanso antu kuti apitilize kuthandiza wayilesiyi ngakhale Mariatona yatsekedwa pa 27 July 2019. Poyankhulapo wapa mpando wa Abwenzi a Radio Maria mu dayosizi ya Dedza mayi Elina Tcheza wati iwo ndiokondwa kuti zomwe anakonza kuti zichitike potsekera Mariatona zachitika ndipo zayenda bwino. “Ndithokoze onse omwe anatengapo mbali poonesetsa kuti Mariatona wa chaka chino akhale wapamwamba”anatero a Tcheza. A Tcheza ati ngakhale panali zovuta zina komabe zambiri zayenda bwino Kamba koti anthu ambiri athandiza ndi katundu osiyansiyana. Mariatona inatsegulidwa pa 4 May ku Zomba Cathedral ndipo yatskedwa ku Mtendere Parish mu dayosizi ya Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Parishi ya Kausi Ichita Chaka cha Nkhoswe Yake
news: Wolemba: Sylvester Kasitomu Akhristu a muparish ya kausi mu dayosizi ya mangochi awapempha kuti akhale achikondi monga nkhoswe zawo Anna ndi Joakimu woyera amaonetsa ali pansi pano. Vicar general wa dayosiziyi bambo Frank Chingale ndi omwe anena izi pambuyo pa mwambo wamisa yokumbukura nkhoswe za parishiyi zomwe ndi Ana ndi Joakimu woyera. Iwo ati Anna ndi Joackim woyera anali banja la chikondi ndi loopa mulungu kotero akhristu mu parishiyi nawonso akuyenera kuonetsa chikondi pakati pawo. “Monga nkhoswe za parishi yanu zinali zachikondi inunso muonetse chikondi pakati panu pokonda kuthandizana komanso kupephererana. Mwapadera ndithokoze akhristu nonse amene mwatenga nawo gawo pamwambowu kuti uchitike ena mwaika ndalama ena mapemphero amene ndipempha mulungu odziwa kupereka awonjezere pomwe mwachotsa,” anatero bambo Chingale. Mwazina bambowa anati pamene akkhristu asonkhana pa miyambo ngati iyi zimasonyeza umodzi ndi ubale omwe ulipo pakati pawo. Mpingo wakatolika umakondwererea Anna ndi Joakimu woyera pa 26 july chaka chilichonse lomwe chaka linali lachisanu lapitali ndipo parishiyi yachita chakachi la mulungu pa 28 July 2019.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sukulu ya Mkombaphala Ikufewetsa Ntchito ya Aphunzitsi
news: Wolemba: Sylvster Kasitomu Kutumiza ana ku sukulu za mkombapahala ati kukuchepetsa ntchito ya aphunzitsi pomwe apita ku sukulu za primary. Mlangizi wa aphunzitsi amsukulu za primary mu zone ya Chimwala mboma la Mangochi mayi Nancy Ndazamo ndi omwe anena izi powuza mtolankhani wathu. Iwo ati ndi khumbo lawo kuti sukulu iliyonse ya pulaimale ikhale ndi sukulu ya mkombaphala komwe ana angaphunzireko mmene angulumikizirane ndi aphunzitsi zomwe zikuchititsa anawa kuti akapita ku primary azikachita bwino. Mwazina mayi Ndazamo  apempha makolo kuti azipititsa ana awo ku sukulu za mkomba phala kuti azakhale ana anzeru pomwe apita ku primary. “Ana omwe akuchokera ku sukulu za mkombaphala akuthandiza kwambiri pa tchito yophunzitsa maka ife aphunzitsi a ku primale kaamba koti amakhala kuti pamene akukayamba sukulu akudziwa kupinda chilembo zomwe zimachititsa kuti aphunzitsiwa asakhale ndi ntchito yomudziwitsa kugwira kwa pensulo,” anatero mayi Ndazamo. Malinga ndi mkulu wa zamaphunziroyu, madera ambiri mdziko muno amkumana ndi vuto la kusowa kwa sukulu za mkomba phala kaamba kosowa thandizo loti athe kusamalira anawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Radio Maria Itsekera Nyengo ya Mariatona
news: Wolemba: Richard Makombe A Director a Radio Maria Malawi  Bambo Joseph Kimu ati wayilesiyi ikukwanitsa kufalitsa uthenga wabwino wa yesu khristu ngakhale ili ndi ngongole zoposa 50 million kwacha. Bambo Joseph Kimu amayankhula izi pa mwambo wa nsembe ya ukaristia otsekera nyengo ya Mariatona omwe unachitikira ku Mtendere Parish mu dayosizi ya Dedza. Bambo Kimu ati ndiokondwa kuti anthu ambiri amamvera wayilesiyi kuphatikizapo anthu omwe si a mpingo wa katolika zomwe anati ndi chisonyezo kuti zikulimbikitsa anthu kukonda kupemphera. Anali mlendo wolemekezeka pa mwambowo- a Bonga ndi akazi awo “Pali anthu ena ambiri omwe amathandiza wayilesiyi omwe ndi a mipingo ina ndipo izi zapangitsa kuti Radio Maria ikhale ikufalitsa uthenga wabwino wa yesu khristu kuyambira pomwe inatsegulidwa zaka 20 zapitazo”anatero Bambo Kimu. Bambo Kimu anapitiliza kupemph anthu onse akufuna kwabwino komanso akhristu kuti apitilize kuthandiza  komanso kuyikonda wayilesiyi kuti izikwaniritsa  cholinga chake chofalitsa uthenga wabwino kwa anthu ambiri. “Ndikupempheni kuti mupitilize kupemphelera Radio Maria komanso muzikonda kugwiritsa ntchito wayilesiyi mu zochitika zanu kuti uthenga wa mulungu upilire kufalikira ponseponse”anapitiliza motero Bambo Kimu. Bambo Kimu anati “Ndikudziwa kuti muli ndi mavuto a zachuma pano pa Parish komanso mmanyumba mwanu koma munaona kuti nkofunika kuti muthandize Radio Maria ndithokoze kuti mwaonetsa chikondi chomwe muli nacho ku wayilesiyi” Mmawu awo Monsignor John Chithonje anati akuthokoza a Director a wayilesiyi kamba kosankha kudzachitira mwambo otsekera Mariatona ku dayosizi ya Dedza zomwe ati zikusonyeza ubale wabwino omwe ulipo pakati pa dayosiyi yi ndi Radio Maria Malawi. “Dayosizi ino ndiyokonzeka kuthandiza Radio Maria nthawi ina iliyonse ndipo timayesetsa kuthandiza kuti ntchito zake zipitilire kupita patsogolo” anateroMonsignor Chithonje. Monsignor Chithonje anathokoza kwambiri akhristu a Parishi yi kamba kotenga gawo pothandiza wayilesiyi zomwe anati zaonetsa ubale omwe ulipo ndi wayilesiyi komanso kuti amayikonda Radio Maria. “Ntchito yomwe Radio Maria ikugwira yathandiziranso kuti ubale wathu ndi akhristu a mdziko la Mozambique ukhale opambana komanso wamphamvundipo zaonetseratu kuti akhristuwa amakonda kumvera wayilesiyi”anatero Monsignor Chithonje Nyengo ya Mariatona inatsegulidwa ku Sacred Heart Zomba Cathedral ku Zomba dayosizi pa 4 May ndipo yatsekedwa pa 27 July 2019 ku Mtendere Parish mu dayosizi ya Dedza. Pa mwambowu ndalama zokwana 1 million six hundred and fifty  9 hundred forty kwacha ndi zomwe zinapezeka ndipo mlendo olemekezeka pa mwambowu anali a Mike Bonga omwe  anapereka cheke cha ndalama zokwana 5 hundred thousad kwacha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MEC Ikupitilira Kutolera Maumboni Ake
news: Wolemba: Glory Kondowe Bungwe loyang’anira zisakho m’ziko muno la  Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) lati likupitilirabe ndi ntchito yake yotolera maumboni ku madera komwe maumboniwa sanateledwe potsatira chigamulo cha khoti chomwe chinaperekedwa lachinayi lapitali ku Lilongwe. Mwafulirwa: Ikamatha nthawi yomwe atipatasa tikhala titamaliza kutolera maumboni athu M’neneli wa bungwe-li a Sangwani Mwafulira anena izi pofotokozera Radio Maria Malawi.  Mwazina  a Mwafulirwa ati khoti linapereka masiku asanu oti bugweli litolele maumboni ake, choncho pasapezeke zina zosokoneza bungweli pa ntchitoyi. Iwo anatiso abungwe la MEC layamba kale tchito yoyendera madera ndi kukumana ndima officers  a maboma omwe anatsala ndipo ati ena awayimbira telephone kuti azakumane ndi ma lawyer m’malo ena ndipo ati pasapezeke wina wozasokoneza kaamba koti aliyense wochita izi azapalamula mlandu ndipo iwo atsimikiza kuti kutha kwa masiku asanu akhara atatsiriza ntchito yawo yotolera maumboniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akaidi  Awiri Athawa Kundende ya Zomba
news: Wolemba: Glory Kondowe Akaidi awiri omwe anapalamula mulandu othyola mnyumba athawa usiku wa lachitatu kundende ya Zomba. Wofalitsa nkhani za ndende mdziko muno Assistant Superintendent Chimwemwe Shawa watsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Shawa wati akaidiwa ndi Jones Chikweza komanso Bright Mterera onsewa anapalamula mulandu wakuba pothyola nyumba. Mwazina A Shawa apempha anthu omwe angawone akayidiwa kuti akanene ku polisi yomwe ali nayo pafupi. Poyankhulapo a Shawa ati sakudziwa chomwe chinachititsa kuti  akaidiwa athawe. Iwo ati Chikweza anapalamulako mlandu wakuba mowopseza komanso a Bright Mterera womwe anapalamula mlandu wakuswa nyumba zomwe zimapeleka chiwopsezo kwa anthu ena ndipo iwo ati akupempha ngati angawone anthuwa akapeleke lipoti ku polisi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Alamula Mabishop Akumane ndi President wa Syria
news: Wolemba: Thokozani Chapola M’tsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse wapempha atsogoleri a mpingowu m’dziko la Syria kuti akumane ndi mtsogoleri wa dzikolo ndi kukambirana naye kuti athandize pothetsa nkhondo ya pachiweniweni yomwe ikupitilira kusokoneza bata ndi mtendere umene anthu akhala ali nawo mdzikomo. Papa wanena izi potsatira kukula kwa za mtopola zomwe anthu akupitilira kuchitirana potsatira zipolowe za ndale zomwe zikupitilira kuchitika m’dzikomo ati pofuna kukakamiza m’tsogoleri wa dzikolo Bashar kuti atule pansi udindo wawo. Anthu ndi magulu osakondwa ndi ulamuliro wa m’tsogoleri-yu anayamba kuchita izi kuyambira mchaka cha 2011 zomwe zachititsa kuti anthu ambiri ataye miyoyo yawo ndipo ena anathawa mdzikomo kamba ka nkhondo yapachiwenweni yomwe inabuka m’dzikomo. Malingana ndi malipoti, ambiri mwa anthu omwe akhudzidwa kwambiri ndi khondo-yi ndi akhristu omwe chiwerengero chawo ndi chochepa kwambiri poyerekeza ndi momwe anthu otsatira chipembedzo cha chisilamu alili mdzikomo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwambo wa Tsiku Lofalitsa Mauthenga mu Mpingo Ukachitikira ku Chikwawa
news: Wolemba: Glory Kondowe Mpingo wakatolika m’dziko muno wati ndi wokhutira ndi mutu umene mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wapereka kuti mpingo-wu ugwilitse ntchito pa tsiku lokumbukira za kufalitsa mawu ndi mauthenga(Communication Sunday) chaka chino. Mkulu wa kuofesi yoona zofalitsa mauthenga ku likulu la mpingo wakatolika m’dziko muno ku Episcopal Comference of Malawi (ECM), bambo Godino Phokoso anena izi pofotokozera mtolankhani wathu za momwe mpingo-wu wakonzekelera tsikuli chaka chino. Iwo ati chaka chino mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse, wakonza zoti akhristu a mpingowu azindikire za udindo wawo wogwilitsa ntchito njira zolumikizilana za makono monga lamya za m’manja, ndi cholinga choti zisakhale zida zothetsera maubale abwino omwe akhala alipo njirazi zisanafike. Mwachizolowezi chaka ndi chaka kumakhala mwambo woganizira tsiku lozafalitsa mauthenga lomwe limatchedwa Communication Sunday mu mpingo wakatolika udzachitika lamulungu pa 28 July 2019. Malingana ndi Phokoso chaka chino mwambuwu ukachitika mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa ku parish ya Nchalo  ndipo misayi akatsogolere ndi Ambuye Peter Musikuwa wochokera mu dayosizi yomweyo ya Chikwawa  komweso kukakhare ma communication officers onse, ma director ama wailesi achikatolika ndi atolankhani onse a chikatolika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: St. Tereza Nursery School Iyendera Radio Maria Malawi
news: Wolemba Richard Makombe Mkulu oyendetsa ntchito za sukulu ya mkombaphala ya St. Tereza m’boma la Ntcheu wati akhristu mdziko muno akuyenera kutengapo mbali pothandiza Radio Maria Malawi kuti idzigwira bwino ntchito zake zofalitsa uthenga wabwino wa Yesu Khristu. Sister Mphatso Raphael amayankhula izi pomwe anatsogolera gulu la ana ophunzira ku sukulu ya mkombaphala ya St. Tereza kuchokera ku Ganya Parish kudzayendera ku likulu la wayilesi ku Mangochi. Sister Raphael anati ndi okhutira ndi momwe wayilesiyi ikugwilira ntchito zake ndipo wati ali ndi chiyembekezo kuti ana omwe anabwera nawo kudzaona wayilesiyi aphunzira zambiri za momwe wayilesiyi imagwilira ntchito zake. “Chidwi chathu chinali chodzawaonetsa ana wa momwe wayilesiyi imagwilira ntchito zake kuti akamakula akhale ndi chidwi chodzagwira ntchito monga ya utolankhani kapena aulutsi mwazina,”anatero Sister Raphael. Iwo anati ndibwino kuphunzitsa anawa kuti akamakula athe kusankha luso lomwe lingadzawathandize mtsogolo kuti adzakhale atsogoleri odalilika. “Ndipezerepo mwayi opempha anthu kuti azithandiza Radio Maria poti imadalira thandizo kuti ipitilize kufalitsa uthenga wabwino ndi kusintha miyoyo ya anthu ambiri omwe amamvera wayilesiyi,”anatero Sister Raphael. Sister Raphael analimbikitsa onse omwe amathandiza wayilesiyi kuti apitilize kutero kamba koti wayilesiyi imasowa zambiri pogwira ntchito zake za tsiku ndi tsiku. Sukuluyi yathandiza Radio Maria Malawi ndi ndalama zokwana15, 000 kwacha kuti zithandize kuyendetsa ntchito za wayilesiyi. Sukulu ya St. Tereza imapezeka ku St. Anne church ku Ganya Parish mu dayosizi ya Dedza ndipo inayamba mchaka cha 2001.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sukulu za Mkombaphala Zikukweza Maphunziro-Social Welfare
news: Wolemba Sylvester kasitomu Kutumiza ana ku sukulu za mkombaphala ati ndi kofunika kwambiri kaamba koti kumathandiza ana kuti akhale ndi nzeru pamene akupita ku sukulu za pulaimale. Mmodzi mwa akulu akulu mu office ya zosamalira anthu mboma la zomba ya Zomba District Social Welfare  a Stellah Kunje ndi omwe anena izi pa mwambo wotsekera sukulu za mkombaphala zisanu ndi zitatu 8 zomwe zimayang’aniridwa ndi bungwe la Partners In Action For Development PASD kwa group village headman Mtogolo mdera la mfumu yayikulu Malemia mboma la Zomba. A Kunje apempha mabungwe omwe akufuna kuyambitsa school za mkombaphala mbomali kuti afike ku Offesiyi kuti akalandile maphunziro ammene angaphunzitsire anawa. “Tipemphe anthu akufuna kwabwino omwe akufuna kuyambitsa masukuluwa mboma lino kuti abwere ku maofesi athu kuti azalandile maphunzoro ammene angaphunzitsire anawa koposa posa tithokoze bungwe la pasd kaamba kokhala patsogolo kuthandiza sukulu za mmera mpoyamba,” anatero a Kunje. Polankhulapo mkulu wa bungwe la Partners Action For Sustainable Development Amos  Chiyenda anati ndi wokhutiora ndi momwe ntchito yophunzitsira anawa yayendera mu chakachi mderali. Mwazina iwo apempha makolo kuti apititse ku sukulu za pulaimale ana omwe amaliza mapunziro awo mmasukulu amkomba pahala wa kuti akapilize maphunziro awo ana omwe alandila ma satificate ndipo akuyembekezeka kukayamaba sukulu za pulaimale mu teremu yoyamba yomwe ikudzayi ndi 130 ochokera msukuluzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kingstone AlonjezaKusinthaMiyoyoyaAnthu aMdera Lake
news: Wolemba Richard Makombe Alonjeza kutukula dera lake- Kingstone Phungu wadera la pakati m’boma la Mangochi , Victoria Kingstone wati ali ndi chidwi chotukula boma la Mangochi komanso kupititsa patsogolo miyoyo ya anthu a m’derali. MayiKingstoneamayankhulaizi pa bwalo la sukuluyaMilambem’bomali pa msonkhanoomweanachititsalamulunguwomwecholingachakechinalikuthokozaanthupowavotera pa udindowu. Mwazina a KingstoneatiayesetsakukonzamisewumongawaMangochiKatemakomansokukonzasukuluzam’deralipofunakuonesetsakutiwakwaniritsalonjezo lake lomweanalonjezaanthu a m’dera-li pa nthawiyomweamachititsamisonkhanoyokopawanthu. “Ndiyesetsa kuthana ndi vuto la njala lomwe anthu am’derali akukumana nalo”.anatero a Kingstone. A Kingstone anati cholinga cha msonkhano ndikufuna kucheza ndi anthu a mderali ndipo aalonjeza kuti ayendera madera onse pofuna kuwathokoza powasankha  pa udindo wawo ngati phungu wa derali. “Ndikufuna kuti nditukule miyoyo ya amayi a mdera lino ndipo kuyambira mwezi uno ndiyamba kuwapatsa theka la ndalama zomwe ndimalandira pa mwezi kuti ayambe kuchita bizinsi”anatero a Kingstone. Pa msonkhano panali mafumu komanso phungu wa ku mwera chaku mmawa kwa Mangochi Mayi Francisca Masamba anali nawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: RAC Iphunzitsa Mafumu Ntchito Yolimbana ndi Nkhanza
news: Wolemba Richard Makombe Bungwe lomenyera ufulu  wa anthu  mdziko muno la Rights Advice Center (RAC) m’boma la Mangochi lapempha mafumu ndi adindo a zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana  kuti adzipereke pa ntchito yolimbana ndi nkhanza zomwe anthu akupitilira kukomana nazo m’bomalo. Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za bungweli a Madalitso Masache anati anachiona chanzeru kuti aphunzitse ma fumuwa chifukwa ndi amene amakhala ndi anthu choncho ndi amene amakumana ndi nkhani zokhudza nkhanza kwambiri. “Tili ndi chidwi kuonesetsa kuti mafumuwa aphunzitsidwa bwino nkhani zokhudza khanza kuti azitha kuthana ndi mavuto okhudza nkhanza pamene zachitika ku  adera kwawo. Maphunzirowa omwe anali a tsiku limodzi  anabwereta pamodzi mafumu ochokera mmadera amene bungweli likugwiramo ntchito zake omwe ndi a Chimwala, Mponda , Jalasi ndi Nankumba. Cholinga cha maphunziro-wo chinali kuwazindikilitsa luso la momwe angathandizire pa ntchito zolimbana ndi nkhanza zochitika m’madera mwawo. Mwa zina adindowa anawazindikilisanso za mchitidwe wozembetsa anthu wotchedwa Trafficking In Person (TIP) ndi njira zothanilana ndi mchitidweu. Mmmawu ake mmodzi mwa mafumu omwe anachita nawo maphunzirowo  Group Village Headman Changamire a mdera la mfumu yayikulu Chimwala mbomalo, anathokoza bungwe-li kamba kowakonzera maphunzirowo. “Tiyamike kambiri poti taphunzirazi  zitithandiza kuti tizitha kuweluza bwino milandu yokhudza nkhana zomwe zimakonda kuchitika pakati pa amayi ndi ana ku madela komwe tikuchokera.”anatero Group Village Changamile. Maphunzirowo anachitika ndi thandizo lochokera ku bungwe la Norwegian Church Aid (NCA).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Wachitetezo wa Nkhalango ya Dzalanyama Waphedwa
news: Wolemba Sylvester Kasitomu Apolisi ku Dedza akusakasaka munthu wina amene wapha mmodzi mwa otetedza nyama ndi nkhalango ya ku malo a boma la Dzalanyama m’bomalo. Mbali imodzi ya nkhalango ya Dzalanyama Ofalitsa nkhani za a polisi m’bomalo Cassim Manda watsikimiza za nkhani-yi ndipo wati izi zinachitika pa 20 mwezi uno pomwe malemu-yi Widson Samuel ndi otumikira ena mu nkhalango-yi amagwira ntchito zawo potetedza zachilengedwe zopezeka mu nkhalango-yi. A Manda ati malemuyi anafera mu nkhalango-yi pa nthawi imene amalimbana ndi anthu omwe anakumana nawo akuotcha makala mu nkhalango yotetezedwa-yi. Padakalipano apolisi akhadzikitsa ntchito yosakasaka anthu omwe anachitira zaupandu povulaza ndi kupha malemu-yi. A Widson Samuel anali ochokera m’mudzi mwa Lodzani m’dera la mfumu yayikulu Chilikumwendo m’boma lomwelo la Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nankhumwa Apempha Mipingo Ipemphelere Bata
news: Wolemba Sylvester Kasitomu Nankhumwa: Mipingo ithandize kupemphelera mtendere mdziko muno Nduna yowona za ulimi, m’thilira ndi chitukuko cha madzi yemwenso ndi wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa chipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) mchigawo cha kumwera, Kondwani Nankhumwa wapempha atsogoleri a mipingo kuti apemphelere bata mdziko muno. Nankhumwa amalankhula izi m’boma la Chikwawa pa mwambo womwe dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya Chikwawa imadzodza dikoni yohane nzondola kukhala wansembe komanso chaka cha ansembe asanu ndi m’modzi omwe akwanitsa zaka 50 komanso 25 mu utumiki. Mawu-wa akudza patangopita masiku ochepa iye atalankhulanso pa msonkhano womwe anachititsa ku Ndirande mu mzinda wa Blantyre kuti atha kutsogolera zokambirana zodzetsa mtendere pa mpungwepungwe wa ndale omwe ukuchitika mdziko muno pomwe ena akuchita ziwonetsero zosonyeza kusakondwa ndi momwe chisankho chapitachi chinayendera. “Ndipezerepo mwai wopepha atsogoleri amipingo uno komanso azipembezo zina kuti tigwirane manja popempherera dziko la malawi kuti bata ndi mtendere zipitilire monga mukudziwa kuti kuchokera pomwe bungwe loona za chisankho mdziko muno linaulutsa zotsatira za chisankho mu mwezi wamay anthu akhala akuchita zionetsero zoonetsa kusakodwa ndi ganizoli zomwe zikusokoneza ma busines ndi zina mdziko muno,” anatero Nankhumwa. Bambo Yohane Mzondola omwe ndi wansembe watsopanoyu akuyembekezeka kuyamba ntchito yake ku Chikwawa Cathedral mu dayosiziyo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kwelepeta Alimbikitsa Achinyamata pa Maphunziro
news: Wolemba Sylvester Kasitomu  Boma lalimbikitsa achinyamata a m’dera la Zomba Malosa kuti abwelerenso ku sukulu ngati adasiyira panjira ndi cholinga choti adzakhale achinyamata odalilika mziko muno Wachiwiri kwa nduna yowona zoti palibe kusiyana pakati pa amai ndi abambo, ana komanso ulumali osiyanasiyana Grace Kwelepeta wayankhula izi ku Domasi m’boma la Zomba kwa ma magulu a achinyamata omwe amagwira ntchito zawo m’dera la Zomba Malosa. Mai Kwelepeta omwenso ndi phungu waku nyumba ya malamulo mdera la Zomba Malosa ati maguluwa amagwira ntchito yabwino monga kusamala zachilengedwe, kusamalira okalamba choncho anaona kuti ndibwino akumane nawo ndi kuwalimbikitsa pa ntchito zawo. “Zambiri zomwe achinyamatawa apempha pa mwambo uno ziri kale mmanifesito achipani chathu cha DPP koposaposa ndi thokoze achinyamatawa kaamba kogwira ntchito yotamandika posamalira zachilenge poletsa anthu kuotcha makala mu derali,” anatero Kwelepeta. Achinyamata a mu derali anakhazikitsa dongosolo loyambanso kubzala mitengo ndi cholinga chofuna kusamalira chilengedwe komanso kufuna kuthana ndi mavuto omwe amadza kaamba kakusintha kwa nyengo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Gogo Gundaphiri ayamikira Radio Maria Malawi
news: Wolemba Richard Makombe Azigogo awiri omwe anayenda nawo ulendo wa ndawala omwe Radio Maria Malawi inakonza ngati njira imodzi yofuna kupeza ndalama pa 20 July chaka chino ayamikira wayilesiyi chifukwa chofalitsa uthenga wa bwino wa Yesu Khristu kwa anthu ochuluka mdziko muno. Mmodzi mwa agogowa a Winondo Gundaphiri amayankhula izi pa mbuyo pa ulendo wa makilomita 28 pa ulendo omwe wayilesiyi inakonza ochoka ku Koche Parish kufika ku St Augustine Cathedrala loweruka pa 20 July. Agogowa anayenda nawo ulendo wa ndawalawu Iwo anati ndiokondwa ndi momwe dongosolo lonse lokhudza  ulendo linakonzedwera choncho ndiwoyamika kwa anthu onse omwe anachita po kanthu kuti znse ziyende bwino. “Ndimakonda kumvera kwambiri wayilesi yi choncho nditamva kuti yakonza ulendowu ndinachiona chanzeru kuti ndikhale nawo ndikuyithandiza kupeza ndalama kuti ipitire kugwira ntchito yake yofalitsa uthenga wabwino wa yesu khristu”anatero a Gundaphiri. A Gundaphiri anati nthawi zonse akamamvera wayilesiyi amakhala osangalala chifukwa mapologalamu ake ndiosangalatsa ku moyo wa uzimu makamaka pologalamu ya ulaliki imawasuntha kwambiri. Poyankhulapo ku mbali yawo a Eric Zulu omwe anali nawo pa ulendowu pamodzindi akazi awo mayi Mary Zulu anati  ndiokondwa kuti akwanitsa kuyenda ulendo onse ndipo anati akwaniritsa zomwe mtima wawo umafguna kutenga nawo mbali pothandiza Radio Maria. “Linali khumbo langa kuti ndizitenga nawo mbali pothandiza Radio Maria pomwe ikufuna kupeza thandizo la ndalama zothandizira kuyendetsa ntchito zake.” A Zulu anati, “Ulendo unali osangalatsa chifukwa timavina komanso pomwe anthu amapereka ndalama zimaonetsa kuti cholinga cha ulendowu chikukwaniritsidwa.” Kingstone kupereka cheke kwa a Levi Pherani Ndalama zokwana 4 hundred and five ,five kwacha ndi zomwe zinatoleledwa pa ulendo kuphatikiza  cheque cha ndalama zokwana 100 thousand kwacha chomwe anapereka ndi mlendo olemekeza pa mwambowu mayi Victoria Kingstone.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: BomaLayamba Project YomangaMilathoM’boma la Mangochi
news: By Glory Kondowe Ngati njira imodzi yofuna kutukula dziko lino boma layamba ntchito zake zachitukuko yomanga milatho ya mmisewu yomwe sili mu kaundula wa boma, tchito yomwe ndi ya ndalama zosachepera 3 billion kwacha. Jooma: Taika ndalama zokwana 3 billion kwacha zogwilira ntchitoyi Ndunayoonazamtengatengandizomangamanga Ralph Joomawanenaizim’boma la Mangochipomweneamatsegulirantchitoyomangamilathoitatum’bomalomaderaawiriosiyana; umodzikuChilipamdera la kumwerachakuzambwekwaboma la MangochikomansomilathoinaiwirikuNamweramdera la MangochiMasongola. Malingandi A Joomaunduna wake wapeza kale milathumakumiatatuyotiikonzedwem’mabomaonse a dzikolinondipontchitoikhalaitathapakutha pa miyeziinayiikudzayi. “Tachionachanzerukutitikonzeminseuyomweinawonongekapakadalipanomamidziosiyanasiyanaifewongatiawudunayazamtengatengandizomangamangatatengandalamazapaderazotizitithandizirakumangaminsewukutitisamadikirekutiiwonongekeayizomwemabungweang’onoang’onomonga a CDF zikanalepherakukwanitsa. Pakadalipanotikumangamilathoyatsopanoyolimbayomangidwandisimentimamidziomweakuvutikamayendedweawoosatikumangoganizilaminseuikuluikuliyokhaayi. Tatengandalamazopitilila 3 billion  zomwetikufunakutizitithandizirekukodzaminseuyakumudzi. Bomalawonetsachidwimaderaamidziomweanthuakuvutikamayendedweawokutitsopanoaziyendamosavutikapakalipanotikodzamilathoyokwana 30 maderaonseadzikomunozomwezititengerendalamazambirikutitiyikodzemwalusondimolimba,” anatero a Jooma. M’mawuakephungu wad era la MangochiMasongola Ishmael Grant wayamikirabomakaambakachitukukochizomwewatizakwaniritsaenamwamalonjezoakeomweamkachitanthawiyokopaanthukutiamuvotere pa udindowu. Iyewatindiwokondwandikuzachitiraumboni pa chitukukochomweundunawazomangamangandizamtengatengayawachitirapowamangiramilathoitatumudera lake mudziwansombazomwezichititsekupititsamaphunziropatsogolo Kamba kotianasazivitikakupitakusululunyemgoyadzinja.Iwopowonjezerapoatimlathowusupinduliraderalawolokhaayikomasomidziinayoyandikirananayondipoatiiwondiwokondwandimwayiomwewawagwera mu deralawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MRA Yakhazikitsa Nambala Yaulere Yolumikizana ndi Makasitomala Ake
news: Wolemba Richard Makombe Bungwe lotolera misonkho la Malawi Revenue Authority (MRA) lakhazikitsa  nambala yaulere yomwe cholinga chake ndi kufuna kulumikizana ndi makasitomala ake pa nkhani zokhudza misonkho. Kapoloma: Makasitomala athu samavutika tsopano Mkulu oyanganira zofalitsa nkhani a Steven Kapoloma amayankhula izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe bungweli linachititsa lolemba ku likulu la ofesi zawo mu mzinda wa Blantyre. “Cholinga ndikuti anthu azifunsa nkhani zonse zokhudza misonkho komanso mafunso ena omwe anthu angakhale nawo okhudza bungwe la MRA,” anatero a Kapoloma. A Kapoloma ati kukhazikitsidwa ka nambalayi kuchepetsa ena mwa mavuto omwe anthu akhala akukumana nawo pa nthawi yomwe amafuna kupereka msonkho komanso pomwe amafuna kudziwa zambiri zokhudza bungweli. A Kapoloma ati anthu akuyenera kuyimba nambala ya 672 mwaulere ndipo azitha kufunsa mafunso ena alionse okhudza misonkho  kuyambira nthawi ya 7:30 m’mawa mpaka 5 koloko madzulo. ‘’Kubwera kwa nambala imeneyi kuthandiza kudziwitsa anthu nkhani yokhudza misonkho mwachangu komanso molondola,” anatero a Kapoloma. A Kapoloma ati izi zichepetsa kuti anthu asamayende kutsatira komwe kuli ma ofesi awo koma atha kungoyimba nambala imeneyi kuti afunse zomwe akufuna kudziwa zokhudza msonkho.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: A Chiwembu Abera Munthu 2 Million Kwacha
news: Wolemba Richard Makombe Apolisi m’boma la Nsanje ati akusakasaka anthu ena omwe achita chiwembu povulaza bambo wina wa zaka 60 ndi kumubera ndalama zokwana 2 milliopn kwacha m’bomalo. Malinga ndi ofalitsa nkhani za polisi m’bomali Sergeant Pilirani Kondwani, bamboyu ndi Dominic Nyabenda ochokera mdziko la Rwanda ndipo amachita malonda m’bomali. A Kondwani ati anthu a chiwembuwa anamanga a Nyabenda ndi zingwe komanso kuwavulaza ndi mpeni kenako anawalanda chikwama chomwe munali ndalama zokwana 2 million kwacha, ndi kuthawa. Malinga ndi Sergeant Kondwani padakali pano anthu achiwembuwa  sakudziwika komwe athawira. “A Dominic anachitidwa chiwembu ndi anthu omwe anayimitsa galimoto lomwe iwo amayendetsa pamodzi ndi owathandizira wawo a Kingstone Bello pomwe amapita mu mzinda wa Blantyre kukagula katundu yemwe amagulitsa,” anatero Sergeant Kondwani. Sergeant Kondwani ati izi zachitika pafupi ndi mudzi wina otchedwa  Nyamula pa njira pomwe amapita ku Blantyre Padakali pano a Nyabenda awagoneka ku chipatala cha boma la Nsanje komwe akulandira thandizo la mankhwala. Sergeant Kondwani achenjeza anthu onse mdziko muno kuti apewe kutenga anthu osawadziwa omwe amayimitsa galimoto zawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kwaya ya St Charles Lwanga Ithandiza Radio Maria Malawi
news: Wolemba Richard Makombe Kwaya ya  St Charles Lwanga yochokera mu dayosizi ya Zomba yati ndi udindo wa akhristu onse kuti azithandiza Radio Maria kuti ithe kugwira bwino ntchito zake zofalitsa uthenga wabwino wa Yesu Khristu. Wa pa mpando wa choir yi a Dominic Chimseu ndi amene amayankhula izi la mulungu pomwe  anabwera kudzayendera wayilesi. A Chinsewu anati anachiona chanzru kuti adzathandiz wayilesiyi poona kuti simapanga malonda ndipo imadalira thandizo lochokera kwa anthu akufun kwabiwno. Apa a Chinsewu anati apitiliza kuyithandiza wayilesiyi ndi cholinga chokuti idzigwira bwino ntchito zake zofalitsa uthenga wabino wa yesu khristu. Pa ulendo wu kwayayi y apereka katundu osiyanasiyanasiya monga mchere soap mwa zina komanso athandiza ndi ndalama zokwana 10 thousand kwacha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu a Koche Parish Awalimbikitsa Kuthandiza Radio Maria
news: Wolemba Richard Makombe. Bambo mfumu a Parish ya St. Magdalena Canosa, Koche mu dayosizi ya Mangochi, bambo Clemence Pindulani alimbikitsa akhristu awo kuti adzitenga mbali pothandiza Radio Maria Malawi. Bambo Pindulani amayankhula  izi kwa akhristu omwe anasonkhana pa mwambo wa nsembe ya Ukaristiya omwe unachitika ku Parish yi lamulungu omwe cholinga chake ndikuthandiza Radio Maria. “ Radio Maria ndi chida chopambana chomwe chikuthandiza mpingo pa ntchito zofalitsa uthenga wabwino ponse ponse kotero ikuyenera kumalandira thandizo lochuluka ndi kuti ntchito zake zipitilire kuyenda bwino”anatero Bambo Pindulani. Mmawu ake   mmodzi mwa yemwe anayimilira Radio Maria Richard Doctor omwe anayimira wailesi-yi ku mwambo-wu anathokoza atsogoleri a m’pingo ku parishi-yi kamba kodzipereka polimbikitsa akhristu awo za ubwino wokonda kuthandiza wailesi-yi. “Tiyamike onse amene atengapo mbali pothandiza wayilesi wayilesi ndipo tiyesesa kuti ndalama yiigwire ntchito yake yoyenera”anatero Doctor Ndalama zoposa 188, 7 hundred thousand kwacha ndi zomwe zinapezeka pa mwambowu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Amemeza Mabanja Alowe mu CFM
news: By Sylvester Kasitomu Ofesi yoona za utumiki wa mabanja mu mpingo wakatolika mu Arch-Diocese ya Lilongwe yalimbikitsa maanja achikatolika m’dziko muno kuti alowe nawo m’mabungwe omwe amalimbikitsa za moyo wabwino wa chikhristu kudzera m’maanja. Mkulu mu ofesi-yi bambo Sipliyeni Chipalamwazani anena izi pa m’buyo pa mkumano wa pachaka wa bungwe la mabanja la Christian Family Movement (CFM) omwe unachitikira ku Maula Cathendral mu Arch-Diyosezi-yi. Mu mawu awo bambo chipalamwazani analimbikitsa mawanja amu mpingowu kuti azitangalika potenga nawo gawo mu ntchito zochitika za m’mabungwe a za mabanja mu mpingowu ponena kuti izi zimathandiza kupeza maupangiri a m’mene angapititsile patsogolo mawanja awo. “Ngati mpingo mu archdayosizi ya Lilongwe unakhazikitsa ofesi yangayi ndi cholinga chofuna kuyanganira mabungwe owona za mabanja mumpingowu ndi cholinga chofuna kuwalimbikitsa kuti azikhala ndi moyo owona komanso kudziwa kusamalira ana awo, tikulimbikitsa mabanja onse kuti azitenga nawo gawo m’mikumano yomwe archidayosizi yakonza ndipo azindikire kuti kukhala pa banja ndi utumiki wa mu mpingo ndiye ayenera kulemekeza utumiki wawo,” anatero bambo Chipalamwaza. Ndipo polankhulapo wapampando wa bungwe la Christian Family Movement (CFM) mu archidayosiziyi bambo ndi mayi namulu apempha mawanja omwe ali achikatolika kuti azikhala achitsanzo kwa wena pofuna kuonetsa ulemerero wa banja “Banja la chikhristu liwonetse chitsanzo kwa ana awo komanso ngakhale anthu omwe akukhala nawo mmadera mwawo,” linatero banja la Namulu. Ofesi yoona za mabanja mu archidayosizi ya Lilongwe anayikhazikitsa ndi cholinga choti iziyanganira mabungwe amabanja monga Christian Family Movement (CFM), Marriage Encounter, Couples For Christ komanso The Faithful House mkumanowu unayamba ndi msembe ya misa yomwe anatsogolera ndi bambo Sipiliyeni Chipalamwazani ndipo mutu wa msonkhanowu unali “Chikondi Ngati Tsinde Lenileni La Banja”
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa ndi Okhudzidwa ndi Imfa ya Cardinal Sardi
news: By Thokozani Chapola Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisko wati ndi okhudzidwa kwambiri ndi imfa ya Cardinal Paolo Angelo Sardi. Papa wanena izi kudzera mu uthenga wake wa chithunzi cha kanema womwe watumiza kwa mchimwene wake wa kadinalayu. Iye wayamikira ntchito zabwino zomwe Cardinal Sardi anazigwira, zokweza mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse. Iye wati Cardinal Sardi yemwe amagwiritsa ntchito mawu oti “Mukhale Tcheru” pa utumuki wake, anali mtumiki wabwino, wamphamvu komanso okhulupirika ku mawu ake. Cardinal Paolo Angelo Sardi wamwalira ali ndi zaka 84 zakubadwa. Iye anabadwa pa 1 september mchaka cha 1934 mdera lina lomwe lili kumpoto kwa dayosizi ya Acqui mdziko la Italy. Iye anadzodzedwa kukhala wansembe mchaka cha 1958 ndipo anasankhidwa kukhala Cardinal mchaka cha 2010. Patangotha zaka zitatu, mchaka cha 2013 iye anatenga nawo mbali posankha Papa Francisko kukhala mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Ena Awopseza Kukachita M’bindikiro ku Nyumba Kwa Phungu Wawo
news: By Thokozani Chapola Anthu ena omwe akudzitcha kuti ndi okhudzidwa a m’boma la Mangochi apereka ma ola 24 kwa apolisi kuti atuluse anthu awiri a chipani cha Malawi Congress omwe anamangidwa ndi usiku wa lachiwiri lapitali. Woyimilira gululi Oliver Tayub  wanena izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe anthuwa anachititsa m’boma la Mangochi. Anthu omangidwawo ndi  a Hassan Anusa omwe anapikisana nawo pa mpando wa phungu wa kunyumba ya malamulo pa chisankho cha patatu chomwe chinachitika mwezi wa May ndinso Awilo Mkuwu  omwe ndi mkulu woona za achinyamata mu chipani cha MCP  m’bomalo powaganizira kuti ananyoza phungu wakunyumba ya malamulo  wa mdera la  pakati m’boma la Mangochi, Victoria  Kingstone. Awiriwa anatengeredwa ku polisi ya Zomba usiku omwewo komwe akusungidwa mpakana pano podikira mlanduwu. Gululi lati ngati apolisi satulusa anthuwa, iwo akachita m’bindikiro kunyumba kwa mayi Kingstone. “Ife ndi okhumudwa kwambiri kuti apolisi ochoka ku zomba akubwera kuno kuzamanga munthu usiku ngati ndi chigawenga komanso chonsecho kuno polisi tili nayo. Zimenezi sitikuzifuna ku Mangochi kuno,” anatero Tayub. Padakali pano apolisi sanayankhulepo kanthu pa khaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ndipo Amusankhanso Kukhala Mfumu ya Blantyre
news: By Thokozani Chapola Khansala Wild Ndipo amusankhanso kukhala mfumu ya mzinda wa wa Blantyre. Ndipo yemwe ndi wa chipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) wapambana ndi mavoti 20 ndipo wagonjetsa a Gertrude Chirambo ndi Erick Mofolo omwe anapeza mavoti 5 komanso 4 motsatizana. Aka mkachiwiri kuti a Ndipo awasankhe pa mpandowu atagwira ntchitoyi kwa zaka ziwiri ndi miyezi 6. Khansala Joseph Makwinja amusankha kukhala wachiwiri kwa mfumu ya mzindawu atapeza mavoti 12 kugonjetsa  yemwe amapikisana naye kwambiri Isaac Jomo Osman yemwe anapeza mavoti 10. Ena omwenso amapikisana nawo pa udindowu ndi thokozani phekani komanso Fanny Kalonjelera. Poyankhula atangomusankha pa udindowu Ndipo wati apitiriza ntchito zosiyanasiyana zotukula mzinda wa Blantyre. Iye walonjezanso zogwira ntchito limodzi ndi makhansala ena onse ndi cholinga chopititsa patsogolo chitukuko mu mzindawu. Anthu omwe asankhidwawa akuyembekezera kukhala pa maudindowa ka zaka ziwiri ndi theka.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: UP Ikhazikitsa Project ya PROSPPR
news: By Sylvester Kasitomu Bungwe la United Purpose (UP) lati lipitilira kugwira ntchito ndi anthu akumudzi ndi cholinga chofuna kuthana ndi mavuto omwe anthuwa amakumana nawo. Mkulu woona ntchito za bungweli Lancen Chikopa wanena izi pambuyo pa mkumano ndi adindo akunthambi za boma yowona nkhani za chitukuko chakumidzi komanso atsogoleri a zipembedzo opezeka mdera la group Village Changamile kwa mfumu yayikulu Chimwala m’boma la Mangochi pomwe amakhazikitsa puloject yotchedwa Promoting Sustainable Partnership For Powered Resiliency (PROSPPR). Iye wati bungwe lawo lakhazikitsa pulojectiyi ndi cholinga chofuna kupeza njira zothanirana ndi mavuto omwe anthu a mderali akukumana nawo pa nkhani za ulimi ndi zina. “Tabwera kuno ndi cholinga chofuna kudzakhazikitsa project yatsopano yotchedwa PROSPPR yomwe ithandize anthu akumidzi kuti tiwafikire mosavuta pamene tikuyamba ploject ya bungwe lathu, pali ma puloject ambiri amene tikhale tikugwira ndi anthuwa monga njira zothanirana ndi mavuto odza kaamba kakusitha kwa nyengo, zaulimi ndi zina,” anatero a Chikopa. Bungwe la UP likugwira ntchitoyi kudzera mu pulojecti ya PROSPPR m’madera amafumu aakulu Chimwala ndi Mponda m’boma la Mangochi komanso m’boma la Balaka ndi thandizo la ndalama lochokera ku bungwe la DFID.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Chifundo Pakati pa Akhristu
news: By Sylvester Kasitomu Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse papa Fransisco wapitiriza kulimbikitsa akhristu pa dziko lonse kuti adzionetsa mtima wachifundo nthawi zonse. Papa amalankhula izi kudzera mmalaliko ake pa mwambo wa nsembe ya misa yomwe anachititsa ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolikayu wati nkhope yoonetsa chifundo imadzetsa chikondi komanso mtendere mu mdziko ngakhaleso mmadera. Pamenepa Papa anapereka chitsanzo cha msamaria wachifundo zomwe anati chimenechi ndiye chikhristu chenicheni chomwe anthu akuyenera kumachionetsa. “Zimakhala zomvetsa chisoni anthu amene amakhala patsogolo kuchita zosayenera amakhala amene amakonda mapemphero kapena atsogoleri ampingo amene” anatero papa Francisco. Pamenepa iye iye wapepha akhristu ampingowu kuti akhale achifundo monga yesu khristu analili pa nthawi yake ya ulendo yolalika mthenga wabwino pa dziko lonse lapansi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CWO ku Zomba Ikufuna 5 Million
news:
Bungwe la amai a chikatolika (CWO) ku parish ya St. Charles Lwangwa mu dayosizi ya Zomba lakonza mwambo womwe akuwutcha Ladies Night ndi cholinga chofuna kupeza ndalama zoyendetsera bungweli.
Wofalitsa nkhani za bungweli mayi Hilda Samu awuza Radio Maria Malawi kuti mwambowu udzachitikira ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Chancellor lachisanu pa 19 July 2019. Iwo ati bungwe lawo lakhonza mwambowu ndi cholinga chofuna kupeza ndalama zokwana 5 million kwacha zoti zithandizire ena mwa mapulani omwe bungweli liri nawo. Mayi Samu ati ku mwambowu mlendo wolemekezeka akakhala a Yunusi Napolo omwe ndi mkulu woyang’anira za nyumba m’boma la Zomba.
“Ife ngati azimayi a kuno ku St. Charles Lwangwa tinakonza kuti mu chaka chino cha 2019 tikhale ndi zochitikachitika zitatu ndipo yoyamba tinaichita pa Easter Sunday imeneyi inali Ladies Easter Party ndipo yotsatira ndi imene tikukonzekerayi Ladies Night yomwe tikhale nayo pa 19 July cholinga cha zochitika-chitikazi tikufuna titsekule sukulu ya nkomba phala (Nursery School) pa parish pathupa ngati njira imodzi yolimbikitsira mpingo wozidalira mu dayosizi mwathu,” anatero Mayi Samu.
Pokonzekera tsikuli amayiwa akudulitsa ma kadi kwa anthu ena aliwonse posatengera chipembedzo chawo pa mtengo wa 15 thousand.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kudalira Thandizo Lapadera Kukulowetsa Pansi Ntchito za Umoyo – Reach Trust
news: By Thokozani Chapola Bungwe la Research for Equity and Community Health (REACH) Trust lati kudalira kwambiri pa chithandizo chapadera ndi kumene kukulowetsa pansi ntchito za umoyo m’boma la Mangochi. Mkulu wochita kafukufuku ku bungweli Cassim Kwalamasa wanena izi pamene amafotokozera akuluakulu a khonsolo ya boma la Mangochi za project yomwe bungweli likufuna kuyambitsa m’bomalo. Kwalamasa wati pakufunika kuti komiti yowona za umoyo m’bomalo ipatsidwe upangiri  wapadera woti izikwanitsa kugwira ntchito zake ndi thandizo lomwe amapeza mosadalira thandizo lowonjezera ndi cholinga choti ntchito za umoyo zikhale zopitilira ngakhale ena atasiya kuthandiza. Iye wati kuchita zimenezi kuthandiza kuti anthu ovutika azilandira thandzio la za umoyo mosavuta komanso mopitilira. “Tigwira ntchito ndi komiti ya zachipatala. Azitha kupeza mavuto omwe akuwakhudza ndi kuthana nawo mosadalira thandizo lililonse lowonjezera koma pogwiritsa ntchito ndalama zomwe ali nazo kale,” anatero a Kwalamasa. Iwo  ati project yi ndi ya zaka zitatu ‘boma la mangochi ndipo ndi ya ndalama zokwana 400, 000 Euros.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ntchito Yomanga Hotela, Airport M’boma la Mangochi Izayamba 2022
news: By Thokozani Chapola Zokonzekera ntchito yomanga hotela yapamwamba komanso bwalo la ndege zayambika m’boma la Mangochi. Wachiwiri kwa mkulu woona zokopa alendo mu unduna wa zamalonda ndi zokopa alendo, Noah Nansongole wauza mkumano wa makhansala komanso aphungu a m’bomalo kuti ntchitoyi yomwe ikuyembekezeka kuzayamba mchaka cha 2022, padakali pano akuchita kaye zokambirana ndi magulu onse okhudzidwa. Malinga ndi Nansongole, boma lili kale ndi malo ku Namiasi komwe amangeko bwalo la ndegeli komanso ku Cape Maclear komwe kumangidwe hotela yapamwambayi ndipo iye wati ndalama zogwilira ntchitoyi zapezeka kale ndipo zichokera ku bank ya African Export and Import (AFREXIM) yomwe ili ku Cairo mdziko la Egypt. “Boma likufuna kumanga hotela ku Cape Maclear komanso bwalo la ndege ku Namiasi. Malo anapezeka kale ndipo padakali pano tikuchita mikumano ndi anthu onse okhudzidwa kuti timve maganizo awo,” anatero a Nansongole. Mmawu ake phungu wa ku nyumba ya malamulo mdera la Mangochi Monkeybay komwe kumangidwe hotela yapamwambayi yemwenso ndi nduna ya za mtengatenga ndi zomangamanga Ralph Jooma wayamikira boma kaamba ka project-yi yomwe wati ithandiza kukweza ntchito za mtengatenga komanso zokopa alendo mdziko muno. “Mmalo mwa anthu a kudera kwanga ndalandira chitukukochi ndi manja awiri chifukwa ndikudziwa anthu a mdera langa apindulanso nacho. Apeza ntchito, ma bizinesi awo a matola komanso a nsomba apita patsogolo chifukwa makasitomala azipezeka mosavuta,” anatero Jooma. Iye wati monga nduna ya za mtengatenga ndi zomangamanga awonetsetsa kuti ntchito yomanga hotela komanso bwalo la ndege iyende msanga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la St. Vincent De Paul Lipitiliza Kuthandiza Anthu Okhudzidwa ndi Kusefukira kwa Madzi
news: By Richard Makombe Bungwe lomwe limagwira ntchito zachifundo la mu mpingo wa katolika la St. Vincent De Paul lati lipitiliza kuthandiza anthu omwe anakhuzidwa ndi vuto la kusefukira kwa madzi mdziko muno. Mkulu wa bungweli a Charles Kimu amalankhula izi m’boma la Phalombe pomwe bungwe-li limapeleka matumba a chimanga komanso zovala kwa anthu omwe anakhudzidwa ndi vutoli. A Kimu ati anachiona cha nzeru kuti athandize anthuwa kamba koti anthuwa akusowa thandizolo siyanasiyana. “Monga mukudziwa kuti kuno ku Phalombe ndi boma limodzi lomwe limakuma ndi vuto la kusefukira kwa madzi tinawona chanzeru kuti tithandize anh okhudzidwawo,” anatero a Kimu. Poyankhulapo pomwe amalandila thandizoli, Bambo mfumu wa Parish ya Muwanga Bambo Clement Mulole anati thandizoli lafika mu nthawi yake ndipo liwathandiza pomwe mtengo wa thumba la chimanga ndi okwera. ‘’Ku dera lino anthu ambiri amavutika chifukwa chakudya chimavuta komanso ndi chokwera mtengo choncho izi zawalimbikitsa kuti akatolika ndi amodzi ndipo samalekana ngakhale pa mavuto,” anatero Bambo Mulole. Bungwe la St Vincent De Paul lagwiritsa ntchito ndalama zokwana 4 million kwacha pogulira katundu yemwe lapereka kwa anthuwa. Bungweli limapezeka m’maiko onse pa dziko lonse lapansi ndipo kuno ku Malawi linayamba mchaka cha 1974.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Jooma wati Mangochi Ikutsalira pa Chitukuko
news: By Thokozani Chapola Jooma: Dera la Katuli ndi lotsalira kwambiri pa chitukuko Jooma Nduna yowona za mtengatenga ndi zomangamanga Ralph Jooma wati Mangochi ndi limodzi mwa maboma amene akutsalira m’mbuyo kwambiri pa nkhani za chitukuko. Jooma amalankhula izi pa sukulu ya pulamimale ya Katuli mdera la kumvuma kwa boma la Mangochi komwe phungu wa kunyumba ya malamulo watsopano wa derail Francesca Masamba Theula amachititsa msonkhano wothokoza anthu pomuvotera, yemwe watenga udindowu kuchoka kwa Abubakar M’baya wa chipani cha UDF yemwe wakhala phungu wa derali kwa zaka 25. Pamenepa Jooma walonjeza kuti boma limanga nsewu wa Mangochi-Katuli ndi cholinga chofewetsa vuto la mayendedwe  lomwe anthu a mderali amakumana nalo. “Dera lino lili ndi sukulu imodzi yokha ya sekondale, kuli mavuto a madzi komanso nsewuwu suli bwino. Ngati boma nsewu umenewu tawuyika kale mu maplan athu kuti tiyike phula,” anatero a Jooma. Mmawu ake phungu wa derali Francesca Masamba Theula anati anawona kuti ndi kofunikira kwambiri kuti apitenso ku derali ndi kukathokoza anthu amene anamusankha pa udindowu. “Kuti ineyo ndikhale pa udindowu ndi chifukwa cha voti yawo. Panali ena achikulire oti anavutikira kuyenda mpaka kuzandivotera choncho ndinawona kuti ndi kofunika kuti ndizawathokoze mapadera; tidye, timwe ndi kusangalala limodzi,” anatero Masamba. Mu zokambirana za nyumba ya malamulo zomwe zapitazi Masamba analankhulapo kuti yemwe anali phungu ku dera lake palibe chomwe anachitako ku mbali ya chitukluko zomwe zinakwiyitsa a mbali yotsutsa boma maka a chipani cha UDF pomwe phungu wadera la Mangochi Malombe a Misolo Mussa Kapichira anayimilira ndi kudzudzula zomwe zinayankhulidwazi. Ena mwa mwe anali nawo pa mwambo wothokozawu ndi phungu wad era la pakati m’boma la mangochi Victoria Kingstone komanso phungu wa dera la Mangochi Masongola Ishmael Grant yemwe anapambana ngati woyima payekha koma tsopano walowa chipani cha DPP. Pa tsiku lomwelo Masamba anachititsanso misonkhano ya mtunduwu ku Iba komanso Makanjira mderalo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CSONA Ipempha Boma Liyike Chidwi pa Nkhani za Kadyedwe Kabwino
news: By Thokozani Chapola Bungwe la Civil Society Organisations Nutrition Alliance (CSONA) m’dziko muno lati boma likuyenera kuwonjezera ndalama ku nthambi yoona zakadyedwe kabwino. M’modzi wa akulu-akulu ku bungwe-li a Mike Khunga amalankhula izi m’boma la Dedza pa mkumano omwe anali nawo ndi akuluakulu amabungwe omwe si aboma. A Khunga ati ndalama zimene zimaperekedwa kuti zithandizire ku nkhani za kadyedwe kabwino ndi zochepa poyelekeza ndivuto momwe vutoli lilili m’dziko muno. “Ndondomeko imakhala yakuti boma lizipereka 3 percent ya chuma chake ku nkhani za kadyedwe kabwino koma padakalipano akupereka 0.9 percent. Ndiye tikufuna kuti boma lipange zinthu motsata ndondomeko,” anatero a Khunga. Padakalipano achinyamata komanso anthu omwe anapezeka ndi kachilombo koyambitsa matenda a Edzi ka HIV ati ali ndi udindo opititsa patsogolo madyedwe abwino m’boma la Dedza. M’khala pakati wa mabungwe omwe amaona za kadyedwe kabwino m’bomalo a Philimon Kabvala amalankhula izi pamene kafukufuku akuonetsa kuti achinyamata ambiri komaso anthu omwe anapezeka ndi kachirombo ka HIV sakumatenga nawo gawo pa nkhani za kadyedwe kabwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ambuye Ziyaye Apempha Akhristu Azipemphelera Atumiki
news: By Thokozani Chapola Akhristu a mpingo wakatolika mu arch-diocese ya Lilongwe awapempha kuti adzikonda kulimbikitsa mapemphero opemphelera atumiki awo kuti adzigwira bwino ntchito zawo moyenera. Ambuye Ziyaye: Muzipemphelera atumiki Episikopi wa mpingo wakatolika mu arch-diocese ya Lilongwe ambuye Tasiziyo Ziyaye apeleka pempholi  loweruka ku Ludzi Parish  m’boma la Mchinji, pamwambo wodzoza Dikoni Steven Chikhasu kukhala wansembe. Ambuye Ziyaye ati ndizomvetsa chisoni kuti akhristu amawona kwambiri pomwe atumiki a mulungu akulephera kenako nkuyamba kuwanyoza munjira zosiyanasiyana m’malo mowathandiza powapemphelera. Polankhulapo wapampando woyimira akhristu anathokoza Mulungu chifukwa cha mphatso ya ansembe yomwe mpingowu walandira ndipo walonjeza kugwira limodzi ntchito ndi wansembe watsopanoyu pofuna kupititsa patsogolo mpingo wa katolika mu archdiocese yo. Wachiwiri wakale wa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino yemwenso ndi mtsogoleri wa chipani cha UTM, Dr. Saulos Klaus Chilima anali nawo pa mwambowu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Msungwana wa Zaka 5 Afa Atamira mu Nyanja ya Malombe
news: By Thokozani Chapola Mwana wina wamkazi wa zaka zisanu wapezeka atafa pa doko lina mu nyanja ya Malombe m’boma la Mangochi. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Mangochi, Rodrick Maida watsimikiza za ngoziyi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Malinga ndi Maida, msungwanayu yemwe dzina lake ndi Hilda Alfred anasowa pa 11 July ndipo wapezeka atafa pa 12 July ndipo zotsatira za kuchipatala zasonyeza kuti wafa kaamba kobanika. “Mwanayu ndi mayi ake anachoka komwe amakhala mmudzi wa Kafucheche kupita kwa agogo ake mmudzi wa Njingama. Kenako anazindikira kuti mwanayo wasowa ndipo mamawa wake ndi pomwe wapezeka akuyandama pa doko la Njingama pa nyanja ya Malombe,” anatero Maida. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisiyu wati sakukayikira kuti pali chiwembu chilichonse chomwe chachitika ndipo wapempha makolo kuti azikhala tcheru ndi ana awo nthawi zonse. “Sitikuganiza kuti mwanayu anasowetsedwa koma chabe kuti mayi ake sanamusamale,” anatero Maida. Hilda Alfred amachokera mmudzi mwa kafucheche kwa mfumu yaikulu Chimwala mboma lomwelo la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chimulirenji apempha nduna zipewe katangale
news: By Thokozani Chapola Wachenjeza nduna za boma – Chimulirenji Wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Everton Chimulirenji walangiza nduna komanso achiwiri kwa nduna za boma kuti apewe katangale ndi ziphuphu. Chimulirenji walankhula izi pamene amatsegulira maphunziro a nduna za boma ku Sunbird Nkopola Lodge m’boma la Mangochi. Iye walangizanso ndunazi kuti zikhale ndi chidwi pa maphunzirowa kaamba koti ndi omwe awathandize kugwira ntchito yawo moyenera. “Ngati nduna mugwire ntchito yanu modzipereka komanso mupewe kuchita katangale mu ntchito yanu chifukwa katangale ndi mdani wa chitukuko,” anatero Chimulirenji. Polankhulapo nduna yowona za maboma aang’ono ndi chitukuko cha kumudzi Ben Phiri wati aliyense amene apezeke kuti akukhudzidwa ndi katangale, lamulo ligwira ntchito pa iye. “Nkhani yothetsa katangale si president yekha ayi koma ifeyo amene iye watikhulupilira kuti tiyendetse naye limodzi dziko lino. Amene apezeke akukhudzidwa ndi katangale lamulo ligwire ntchito pa iye ndipo panopa pakufunika munthu akakhudzidwa ndi katangale azichotsedwa ntchito osati kungomusintha malo ogwira ntchito,” anatero a Phiri. Kumbali yake nduna yoona za ntchito mayi Martha Lunji Mhone Chanjo wati maphunzirowa awathandiza kudzindikira bwino ntchito yawo. “ngati nduna timakhala patsogolo kupanga ziganizo mmalo mwa anthu choncho maphunzirowa atithandiza kuzama mmaganizidwe, kudziwa bwino ntchito yathu kuti titumikire anthu moyenera,” anatero mayi Chanjo. Maphunzirowa omwe ndi a masiku awiri anayamba lolemba pa 15 July ndipo anatha lachiwiri pa 16 July, 2019.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MCP, UTM Sizikugwirizana ndi Ganizo la Zokambirana
news: By Thokozani Chapola  Anthu otsatira MCP ndi UTM akuchita ziwonetsero posagwirizana ndi zotsatira za chisankho cha pa 21 May 2019 Zipani za Malawi Congress (MCP) komanso UTM, zati ganizo la DPP lofuna kuthesa kusamvana komwe kwadza potsatila chisankho chomwe chinachitika mdziko muno pa 21 MAY 2019 kudzera mu njira ya zokambirana ndi ndilosamveka. Aneneri a zipani, atiuza kuti chipani cha DPP chachedwa kupereka ganizoli ponena kuti ndi khoti lokha lomwe libweretse choona pa nkhani-yi. Wachiwiri kwa m’tsogoleri wa chipani cha DPP kuchigawo cha kum’mwera, a Kondwani Nankhumwa anauza msonkhano ku Ndirande la mulungu kuti  pakufunika kukambirana pakati pa atsogoleli a zipani pofuna kubweretsa bata m’dziko muno. Polankhulapo mneneri wa chipani cha UTM Dr. Joseph Chidanti Malunga ati ganizoli ndi labwino koma labwera mochedwa. “Anali kuti nthawi yonseyi pomwe amakanika kubwera ndi maganizo amenewa,” anadabwa motero Dr. Malunga. Ndipo polankhulapo mneneri wa chipani cha MCP M’BUSA Maurice Munthali wati khoti lokha ndi lomwe lipereke chilungamo pa nkhaniyi. “Nkhaniyi ili ku bwalo la milandu ndiye tidikire a khothi chifukwa ndi omwe angatipatse yankho la zonse,” anatero a Munthali. Padakali pano bwalo la la za malamulo likuyembekezeka kuyamba kumva mlandu wa za chisankho pa 29 July 2019 mu mzinda wa Lilongwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Apempha Chimvano cha a Ndale ku Venezuella
news: By Thokozani Chapola M’tsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha atsogoleri a ndale a m’dziko la Venezuela kuti amvane chimodzi ndi kuthetsa zipolowe za ndale zomwe zikupitilira kuchitika m’dzikomo. Papa Francisko Papa Francisco wapereka uthengawu kamba kokhudzidwa ndi mavuto omwe anthu akupitilira kukomana nawo kamba ka zipolowezi. Dziko la Venezuela zinthu sizilibwino kamba ka zionetsero zomwe zikuchitika pofuna kukakamiza mtsogoleri wa dzikolo a Nichorus Maduro kuti atule pansi udindo wawo. Anthu m’dziko akuti akupitiliza kuchita izi kamba kosakhutitsidwa ndi ulamuliro wa mtsogoleriyu mdzikomo. Padakalipano katundu nyumba ndi zina zasakazika kamba ka chipwilikiti cha ndale chomwe chabuka m’dziko-mo moti anthu okhala m’madera ena ayamba kuthawa m’dzikomo kamba ka zipolowe zomwe zikupitilira kuchitika ndi anthu okwiya ndi ulamuliro wa dzikolo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apempha Achinyamata Kuti Azitenga Gawo mu Mpingo
news: By Sylvester Kasitomu Achinyamata achikatolika ku dinale ya Maula mu Archdiocese ya Lilongwe awapempha kuti azitenga mbali mu zochitika zosiyanasiyana za mu mpingo. Bambo Henry Zulu anena  izi lamulungu lapitali ku tchalichi cha St. Anthony yomwe ndi nthambi ya Kagwa parish, pa mwambo wokhazikitsa bungwe la Young Christian Workers (YCW). Iwo ati mpingo wa uli ndi dongosolo limene limalora msinkhu wina uliwonse kulowa mu magulu osiyanasiyana amu mpingo. M’mawu ake wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa bungweli mu dinaleyi Dr. Lumbizayi Mwira wati bungwe lawo lili ndi magawo ambiri omwe limachita mumpingo wa katolika monga  kuchita ntchito zachifundo komanso kutenga nawo mbali pa miyambo ina ya mapephero monga mibindikirio ndi zina. “Bungwe limeneli ntchito zathu ndi zambiri mwazina timafuna achinyamata omwe akugwira ntchito ndi omwe akungokhala azikula mu chikhristu pofuna kulondolera anthu achichepere mu njira ya chikhristu ndi zina,” anatero Dr. Mwira. Ndipo polankhulapo m’modzi mwa achinyamata a bungweli mu dinaleyi Chiyanjano Mtiratira anati, “Bungweli lomwe takhala tikulidikira kwa nthawi yayitali m’mbuyomu talilandila ndi manja awiri kaamba koti limangopezeka ku  parish kokha ndipo pomwe pano lafika kuno outstation tiri onyadira kwambiri, tikuwalonjeza a ku dinale kuti stizawakhumudwitsa koma kugwira nawo ntchito limozi pofuna kutukula ntchito za bungweli kuno ku dianle ya maula.” Bungwe la YCW linayamba mchaka cha 1924 mdziko la Germany ndipo anayambitsa ndi Cardinal Joseph Padjim ndipo linafika mdziko muno mchaka cha 1955 ndipo linafikira mu dayosizi ya Dedza mu parish ya Mua.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chiwerengero cha Milandu ya Upandu Chatsika Mchigawo Cha Kummawa
news: Wolemba Richard Makombe Apolisi m’chigawo cha ku m’mawa kwa dziko lino ati kuyambira mwezi wa January mpaka wa June chaka chino akwanitsa kuchepetsa milandu ya upandu kuyelekeza ndi nthawi ngati yomweyi chaka chatha. Sergeant Tiwonge Kayenda wati kuyambira mwezi wa January mpaka mwezi wa June m’chigawochi alandira milandu 3,136 pomwe chiwerengerochi chinali chokwera nthawi ngati yomweyi chaka chatha. “Ku mbali ya ngozi zapamsewu talandira milandu ya ngozi zokwana 393 ndipo anthu 111 ndi omwe adamwalira zomwe ndi zochuluka kuyelekeza ndi chaka chatha,” anatero Sergent Kayenda. Mneneri wa apolisiyu wati ngozi za pa mseu zikuchuluka chifukwa choti madalaivala ambiri sakumasamala poyendetsa galimoto zawo pa msewu pomwe ena akumayendetsa galimoto zawo ataledzera. Sergeant Kayenda wati ofesi yawo yalandira milandu yokwana 173 yomwe ati ndi yochuluka poyerekeza ndi yomwe analandira nthawi ngati yomweyi chaka chatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nyumba ya Malamulo Yatsiriza Zokambirana Zake
news: By Richard Makombe Nyumba ya malamulo ya Malawi Nyumba ya malamulo lero yatsiliza mkumano wake womwe aphungu akhala akukambirana zinthu zosiyanasiyana zokhudza dziko lino. Mtsogeri wa dziko lino Professor Peter Mutharia ndi yemwe anatsegulira zokambiranazi pa 21 June chaka chino  pomwe mwazina aphunguwa anakambirana za ndondomeko yoyendetsera dziko lino kwa miyezi inayi kuyambira mwezi uno kufikira mwezi wa October. Mmawu ake potsiliza zokambiranazi, mtsogoleri wa mbali yotsutsa boma a Robin Lowe anathokoza aphunguwa kamba kodzipereka pa zokambirana ngakhale kuti ena samakhalanawo pa zokambiranazi. ‘’Komabe ndili okhumudwa kamba koti aphungu ena samaikapo chidwi pa zokambirana zina zomwe zimachitika mnyumbayi,” anatero a Lowe. Mtsogoleri wa nyumbayi kumbali ya boma a Kondwani Nankhumwa poyankhulapo anati ndiokhudzidwa ndi momwe aphungu otsutsa amayankhulira m’nyumbayi pomwe anati nthawi zambiri amanyoza mtsogoleri wa dziko lino a Peter Mutharika. Kumayambiliro a mkumanowu, aphungu otsatira chipani cha Malawi Congress (MCP) anatuluka mnyumbayi pomwe mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Professor Peter Mutharika amayankhula potsegulira msonkhano wa aphunguwa kunyumba ya Malamulo mu mzinda wa Lilongwe, kamba koti sakuvomereza kuti ndi mtsgoleri wa dziko lino koma iwo anapita kunyumbayi kukakambirana za ndondomeko ya chuma yoyendetsera dziko lino. Mwazina kwa nthawi yoyamba mu mbiri ya dziko lino aphunguwa anasankha a Catherine Gotani Hara kukhala sipikala wanyumba ya malamulo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: YONECO Yati Ichilimika pa Nkhani za Uchembere Wabwino
news: By Glory Kondowe Bungwe la Youth Net and Counscelling YONECO lati lichilimika pa ntchito yake yowonetsetsa kuti achinyamata m’dziko muno akukhala moyo wabwino powathandiza mu njira zosiyanasiyana. Mkulu oyang’anira ma program ku bungweli a Wezzie Kamphale, anena izi lachitatu mu mzindawa Lilongwe, pa mwambo okhazikitsa project yomwe cholinga chake ndi chofuna kudziwitsa achinyamata nkhani zokhudza uchembere wabwino, ubereki komanso kuwalikmbikitsa achinyamata omwe adapezeka ndi kachirombo koyambitsa matenda a Edzikutiadzilandirathandizomoyenelera ngati njira imodzi yowathandiza achinyamatawa kukhala ndi moyo wabwino. Pakuyankhura pa mwambuwu a Kamphale anati ndondomekoyi iwathandiza achinyamatawa pamoyo wawo wa tsiku ndi tsiku kuphatikizaponso kuwalimbikitsa pa nkhani za maphunziro awo kuti asamakumane ndi zovuta zosiyanasiyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chiwerengero Chamatenda Opatsirana Chakwera Kwambiri M’maiko a mu Africa-WHO
news: By Glory Kondowe  Bungwe lowona za umoyo pa dziko lonse la World Health Organisation (WHO) lati chiwerengero cha anthu omwe akugwidwa ndi matenda a chikuku ndinso matenda ena opatsirana chakwera kwambiri chaka chino m’maiko  ambiri a  mu Africa. Malinga ndi malipoti a news24, bungwe la WHO lati chiwerengero cha anthu opezeka ndi matendawa, chakwera ndi 700% mchaka chino chokha cha 2019. Bungweri lati izi zikuchitika chifukwa maikowa sakupereka katemera wa matendawa  mokwanira kwa anthu awo kuti chiwerengero chamatendawa chitsike.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ogwira Ntchito M’boma Mdziko La Zimbabwe Achita Ziwonetsero
news: By Glory Kondowe. Anthu ogwira ntchito za m’boma mdziko la Zimbabwe ati achita zionetsero zosonyeza kusakondwara ndi malipiro omwe amalandira kumapeto kwa mwezi uliwonse. Ali pa mpanipani-Mnangagwa Anthuwa ati achita zionetserozi kumapeto kwa mwezi uno wa July ngati mtsogoleri wa dzikolo  A Emmerson Mnangagwa sayankha ena  mwa madandaulo omwe anthuwa akhala akupereka ku ofesi ya mtsogoleriyu. Malinga ndi malipoti a BBC, mu mwezi wa April chaka chino, anthu ogwira ntchito za m’boma mdzikolo anawakwezera malipiro awo ndi 25 percent, zomwe malinga ndi anthuwa ndalamayi ndiyochepabe. Mwa zina anthuwa akuti malipiro anthu ogwira ntchito monga za a mphunzitsi mdzikolo ndi ochepetsetsa kwambiri zomwe akuti zikuchititsaso kuti maphunziro adzilowa pansi M’dzikolo. Dziko la zimbabwe lakharalikukumana ndi mavuto a za chuma  kuyambira mchaka cha 2009 pomwe ndalama yake idagwa kufika pa 100 percent.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Aphungu aku nyumba ya Malamulo apitilira kupempha zitukuko
news: By Richard Makombe  Aphungu a nyumba ya malamulo ya Malawi Aphungu a kunyumba ya malamulo lachitatu sabata ino anapitilira kupempha zitukuko zosiyanasiyana zomwe akufuna kuti boma liwachitire  ku madera awo. Ambiri mwa aphunguwa apempha boma kuti liganizire zomanga misewu, zipatala komanso sukulu pofuna kuthandiza kuti anthu adzipeza thandizo losiyanasiyana mosavuta. Mmodzi mwa aphungu yemwe akuyimira dela la Dowa Ngala a Arthur Sungitsa, apempha boma kupyolera ku unduna wa zaumoyo kuti limange chipatala ku derali, pofuna kuthandiza anthu kuti adzipeza thandizo la zaumoyo mosavuta. “Ku dera komwe ndikuimira kwakhala kulibe chipatala cha boma kwa nthawi yaitali, zomwe  zimaika pachiwopsezo miyoyo ya anthu ambiri” anatero a Sungitsa. A Sungitsa ati anthu aku derali akuvutika kulipira ndalama zambiri kuchitala chomwe sichaboma choncho ali ndi chiyembekezo kuti boma limanga chipatala pofuna kuthetsa vutoli. “Mavuto akula kwambiri chifukwa anthu ena amwalira kuchapatala cholipilitsacho eni ake amakaniza kumasula mtembo,zomwe zili zosakhala bwino,nchifukwa chake ndikuyesetsa kuchitapo kanthu kuti boma limange chipatala”anatero a Sungitsa. Poyankhulapo phungu wa dera la Mangochi Malombe  Misolo Mussa Kapichira ati akufuna kuti boma likonze zipatala ku dera kwawo komwe padakali pano zinthu sizili bwino. Mmawu awo a Mussa adandaula ndi kusowa chidwi kwa nduna zina za boma,  zomwe ati sizimamvetsera bwino zomwe aphunguwa amafotokoza zokhudza madera awo. A Kapichira, anapitilira kudandaula ndi khalidwe la nduna zina zomwe zimango-yenda-yenda pomwe aphungu amayankhula mnyumbayi, zomwe akuti zimapereka nkhawa pa zatsogolo la zomwe aphunguwa akupempha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwambo odzodza ansembe uchitika ku Blantyre, Zomba
news: By Richard Makombe Mwambo wa malumbiro ngati umenewu uchitika ku Zomba komanso Blantyre Mwambo odzodza madikoni anayi kukhala ansembe mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre uchitika loweruka ku Limbe Cathedral mu akidayosizi ya Blantyre. Malinga ndi Bambo Alfred Chaima omwe ndi mkulu wa muofesi yoona za utumiki mu arkidayosiziyi ati zonse zokonzekera kudzodza  adikoni atatu achibadwiri komanso mmodzi wa chipani cha mzimu woyera tsopano zafika kumapeto. Bambo Chaima ati Ambuye Thomas Luke Msusa ndi omwe adzatsogolere mwambowu. Padakalipano nawo akhristu eni ake ati zokonzekera zizafika kumapeto pomwe magulu omwe akutsogolera miyambo yosiyanasiyana alimbikitsa kukonzekera zochitikazi ngati njira imodzi yokometsa mwambowu. Mmodzi mwa omwe ali mu komiti ya zochitika chitika pa tsikuli Patrick Kombe wati ali ndi chiyembekezo choti akhristu komanso alendo omwe ayitanidwa pa tsikuli azasangalala komanso kuthandiza archdiocese yao pamene ikulandira atumiki atsopanowa. ‘Zonse zili mchimake ndipo pofika tsiku loweruka aliyense yemwe waitanidwa  kuti adzabwere mwaunyinji chifukwa mmodzi wa ana awo mu dayosiziyi adzadzodwa pa tsikuli,”anatero a Kombe. A Kombe anati ndi kofunika kuti akhristu wa adzaonetse umodzi wawo potenga nawo gawo pa zochitika pa tsikuli pomwe nso dayosizi tsopano yakula ndipo ili ma ma Parish 43. Mu dayosizi ya  Zomba mwambo odzodza ma deacon  atatu kukhala ansembe uchitikanso loweruka pa pomwenso kukakhale chikondwelero choti ansembe atatu akwanitsa zaka 25  akutumikira  mulungu mu diocese ya Zomba. Malinga ndi Bambo Innocent Chiwanda yemwe ndi Pastoral Secretary wa Diocese ya Zomba, Ambuye George Desmond Tambala ndi omwe akatsogolere mwambowu. Ma Deacon atatu wa ndi a Peter Chiopsa, Petro Chilumpha ndi Fortune Gondwe, ndipo ansembe atatu omwe akukondwelera kuti atha zaka 25 akutumikira Mulungu ndi Bambo Daniel Beneti, Bambo Ignancio Bokosi ndi Bambo Charles Namalitha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ana a Tilitonse Alimbikitsidwa Kutenga Gawo pa Festival
news: Ofesi yoona za mabungwe a utumiki wa apapa kuna ku Malawi ya Pontifical Mission Societies PMS mu archidayosizi ya Lilongwe yalimbikitsa ana atilitonse kuti azitenga nawo gawo mu Choir Festival yomwe ikuputilirabe kuchitika m’madinale onse mu Archidayosiziyi. Mmodzi mwa akuluakulu ku bungweli mdziko muno Rose Tsoka Banda ndi omwe anena izi kwa mtolankhani wathu. Iye wati makolo akuyenera kulimbikitsa ana atilitonse omwe ali mmadera awo mu archidayosiziyi kuti azikatenga nawo gawo pa festival-yi. “Poyamba tithokoze makwaya amene atenga kale gawo pa festivalyi m’madinale onse amuno mu archidayosizi ya lilongwe, tipemphe makolo onse kuti azitumiza ana awo ku miyambo ngati iyi kuti azikaphunzira makhalidwe abwino kuchokera kwa anzawo,” anatero a Banda. Makwaya aomwe achita bwino pa festivayi atatu oyambilila m’madinale onse seven opezeka mu archidayosiziyi akuyenera kuzapikitsana ndi anzawo pa dayosiziyi womwe ndi mpikisano otsiriza wa festival ya ana a tilitonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kumangidwa Kwa Trapence Ndale Zenizeni-Thindwa
news: Mmodzi mwa  a katswiri pa nkhani za ndale mdziko  muno  Ernest Thindwa ati kumangidwa kwa a Gift Trapence, ndi nkhani za ndale chabe. A Thindwa auza Radio Maria Malawi, kuti pali anthu ambiri omwe akukhudzidwa ndi milandu ikuluikulu mdziko muno koma sakumangidwa ndi boma. Iwo ati kumangidwa kwa wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa bungwe la Human Rights Defenders Coalition HRDC ndi boma, kukungofuna kutseka pakamwa anthu omwe amafunira zabwino dziko lino. “Ndale zalowererapo ndithu ndipo ndikukhulupilira kuti boma lapezerapo mwayi ofuna kuyipitsa mbiri ya a Trapence komanso kuwatseka pakamwa kuti asalankhulepo pa nkhani zofuna kudzudzula boma kaamba koti pali nkhani zambiri zikuluzukulu zomwe zikudikira boma kuti azitsate monga nkhani ya Buleya yemwe anafera muchitolokosi cha apolisi akudikira kuyankha mulandu ndi zina, ineyo sindikuyikila kumbuyo a Trapence ndi anzawowa kuti sanalakwe komabe nthawi yomwe amangidwa siyoyenera chifukwa lamulo likuyenera kugwira ntchito pa wina aliyense posatengera chipani kapena mtundu wa munthu,” anatero a Thindwa. Iwo anapilira kunena kuti boma likuyesetsa kuthana ndi aliyense yemwe akulidzudzula ndipo amalawi ayembekezere kumangidwa mwachisawawa kwa anthu ofuna chilungamo ngati awa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mtumiki Ayiweni wa Mpingo wa Anglican Akwanitsa Zaka 20 mu Utumiki
news: By Thokozani Chapola Professsor Paul  Kishindo ayamikira mtumiki Robert Yahaya Ayiweni kaamba kotumikira Mulungu kwa zaka makumi awiri (20). Professor Kishindo ndi omwe anali mlendo wolemekezeka  pa mwambo okondwerera kuti mtumiki Ayiweni wakwanitsa zaka makumi awiri akutukira ngati mlaliki komanso kuti tsopano walemba buku lomwe lithandize anthu kumvetsa mau a Mulungu omwe unachitika lamulungu pa tchalitchi la St. Georges Anglican mu mzinda wa Zomba yomwe ili mu  Diocese ya Upper Shire. Malinga ndi Professor Kishindo, ndi chinthu cha mtengo wapatali kukwanitsa zaka makumi awiri akutumikira Mulungu ngati mlaliki. Mtumiki Yahaya Ayiweni kulankhula kwa anthu pa tsikulo Mtumiki Yahaya Ayiweni wati bukuli lomwe mutui wake ndi “Njira ya Chipulumutso” lili mchiyankhulo cha chichewa kuti anthu ambiri amvetse bwino uthenga wa Mulungu ndipo liwathandiza akhristu kuti adziwe Mulungu kwathunthu. “Ndikufuna kuwadziwitsa akhristu amzanga kuti chipulumutso sichongokhala malo amodzi komanso ndichenjeze ena omwe amangodzuka kuti alota kapena aona maso mphenya oti ayambe utumiki pomwe Mulungu yo sanawatume ndi komwe. Zimenezo zimabweretsa chisokonezo chachikulu,” anatero mtumiki Ayiweni. Iye wati ndi khumbo lake kuti anthu ambiri amve mawu a Mulungu ndi kuwatsatira ndipo wapempha anthu kuti akhulupilire zomwe zalembedwa mu bukhuli lomwe lili ndi magawo  asanu. Mtumiki Yahaya anabwana m’banja la chisilamu m’boma la Mangochi ndipo anayamba kutsatira chikhristu mchaka cha 1983 kaamba koti amkacheza ndi ana a abusa.
