Atamva mawu a Mulungu iye wati mtima wake unachita chisankho chotumikira Mulungu kudzera mu utumiki ndipo mchaka cha 1996 anasiya kugwira ntchito ku Dwangwa Sugar Cooperation ndi kukhazikika pa ntchito  ya utumiki m’maboma osiyanasiyana mdziko muno komanso mdziko la Mozambique.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Festival, Chiphunzitso cha Moyo wa Uzimu Kwa Ana-Bambo Julio
news: By Sylvester Kasitomu Bambo mlangizi wa dinale ya Maula mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, bambo Felio Julio ati ndi okhutira ndi momwe Choir Festival ya ana a Tilitonse yayendera mu dinaleyo. Bambo Julio anena izi pambuyo pa Choir Festival ya ana-yi yomwe inachitikira ku parishi ya St. Dennis kwa Chinsapo mu archidayosizi ya Lilongwe. Mwazina iwo alimbikitsa makolo onse a mpingo wa katolika ochokera mu archidayosiziyi kuti azitumiza ana awo ku miyambo ngati iyi ndi cholinga choti anawa aphunzire makhalidwe abwino komanso kudzamitsa moyo wa mapemphero pakati pawo. Ndipo polankhulapo m’modzi mwa mamembala a kwaya ya St. dennis yomwe yapambana pampikisanowu Atittude Gawamadzi anati chikonzero ngati ichi ndi chothandiza kwambiri kwa iwo kaamba koti chiwathandiza kukula ndi moyo owopa Mulungu komanso okonda kupemphera. “Makolo akuyenera kulimbikitsa ana kuti azipita ku Tililitonse chifukwa anawa amakapezako maphunziro a m’mene angakulire m’moyo wawo wa uzimu komanso wa thupi,” anatero Attitude. Ena  mwamakwaya omwe achita bwino pa chikondwelerochi ndi monga choir ya ana ya St. Ignasius ya ku area 30 yomwe yapeza nambala 2 kenako St. Andrea kuchokera ku parish ya Kagwa yomwe yapeza nambala 3 ndipo makwaya omwe achita bwino-wa azapikitsana ndi anzawo ochokekera m’madinale onse 7 omwe akupezeka mu archidayosizi ya Lilongwe pa 10 august 2019.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: COMSIP Ilumikizitsa Bank Nkhonde ndi Bank Zikuluzikulu
news: By Sylvester Kasitomu Bungwe la Community Savings Improved Programe (COMSIP) lati lilumikizanitsa magulu akumudzi a Bank Nkhonde komanso village bank ndi mabank akuluakulu kuti azitha kusunga ndi kubwereka ndalama ku mabankiwa. Mkulu wa bungwe la COMSIP mdziko muno Tenson Gondwe ayankhula izi ku khonsolo ya Zomba pomwe amafotokozera akuluakulu a Zomba District Excutive Committee (DEC) za ntchito yomwe bungweli likufuna kuyambitsa m’bomali. A Gomwe ati kupatula kulimbikitsa ma bank nkhonde kuti azitha kubweleka ndalama kuchokera ku bank anatinso akhazikitsa magulu ena a bank nkhonde kuti apindule nawo mu pologalamu imeneyi. Iwo anati ntchitoyi ayigwira m’madera a mafumu aakulu Mwambo, Mulumbe komanso Malemia. Mmau ake mkulu owona za mapulani ndi chitukuko ku khonsolo ya Zomba a Water Chikuni anati pologalamu yomwe bungwe la COMSIP layambitsa lofuna kuti anthu akumudzi azitha kupindula ndi ma bank oti azitha kupeza ndalama ithandiza kukweza busines zawo. “Ife ngati a khonsolo tiri okondwa kwambiri chifukwa choti mapulani athu akukwaniritsidwa ndipo puloject imeneyi tayilandila kwambiri kaamba koti anthu ambiri amalephera kupititsa ma business awo patsogolo kaamba kosowa ngongole zokuzila ma businesi-wa,” anatero a Chikuni. iwo anapitilira kunena kuti izi ziri mu mapulani awo omwe boma la Zomba layika kuchokera chaka chino kufika chaka cha 2022 kuti akhazikitse magulu omwe alumikizidwe ndi ma banki akuluakulu mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: “Wosamutsa Dzina la Chilima” Afa pa Ngozi ya Pansewu
news:
By Thokozani Chapola Munthu m’modzi wafa galimoto yomwe anakwera itawomba truck pa Linthipe 1 m’boma la Dedza. Ngozi yomwe yapha mnyamatayo Mneneri wa apolisi mboma la Dedza, Cassim Manda watsimikiza za ngoziyi polankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi ndipo wati amene wafayu ndi Sailas Kampango wa zaka 26 zakubadwa.
Iye wati galimotoli lomwe nambala yake ndi RU 6494 limayendetsedwa ndi a Kalipo Mhango imachokera ku Lilongwe kulowera ku dedza ndipo itafika pa Linthipe 1 inawomba kumbuyo kwa truck yomwe inali itangoyima yomwe nambala yake ndi CK 4754 ndipo ngolo yake ndi CK 3075.
Kutsatira izi a Sailasi Kampango anafera pa malo pomwepo kaamba koti anavulala kwambiri m’mutu.
Malipoti ena akusonyeza kuti omwalirayu ndi amene amamuganizira kuti anasamutsa dzina la a Saulosi Chilima kuchoka ku Lilongwe kupita ku Chizumulu Island pa chisankho chomwe changothachi.
Sailas Kampango amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kasinje mfumu yaikulu Ganya m’boma la Ntcheu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Amayi Okhudzidwa Akuyembekezeka Kuchita Ziwonetsero Poteteza Ansah
news: By Thokozani Chapola Amayi omwe akuti ndi okudzidwa ndi ziwonetsero zokakamiza wapampando wa bungwe la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) mayi Jane Ansah kuti atule pansi udindo wake, alengeza kuti achita ziwonetsero mu mzinda wa Blantyre mawa lino. White kulira pa msonkhano wa atolankhani pomwe amalengeza za ziwonetserozi Iwo alengeza izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani womwe anachititsa lolemba mu mzinda wa Blantyre. M’modzi mwa amayiwa yemwenso ndi wapampando wa bungwe lomwe akulitcha  Concerned Women a Seodi White wati ndi zokhumudwitsa kuti mayi Jane Ansah akutonzedwa ndi kunyazitsidwa mu njira zosiyanasiyana kaamba koti anali wapampando wa bungwe lomwe limayendetsa chisankho chapatatu. Iye wati akukhulupilira kuti anthu akuchita izi powona kuti mayi Ansah ndi munthu wamayi. “Kuyenda kumeneku tikufuna kusonyeza kuti ife tili pambuyo pa mayi Ansah. Chisankho cha 2014 munthu mpaka anafa koma anthu sanapange ziwonetsero chifukwa anali munthu wammuna pano ndiye palibe munthu amene wafapo pa chisankhochi koma ena akupanga ziwonetsero. Ife tikuwona kuti anthu akupanga zimenezi chifukwa ndi mzimayi,” anatero mayi White. Padakali pano nduna yowona za kusasiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo mayi Mary Navitcha ati akachita nawo ziwonetserozi Koma polankhulapo m’modzi mwa akatswiri pa nkhani za ndale mdziko muno a Enerst Thindwa ati ndi zodabwitsa kuti anthu omwe ali patsogolo kuchita izi ndi a chipani cha DPP komanso ena ali ndi maudindo mu nthambi za boma komanso ena ndi omwe anali patsogolo kunyoza ulamuliro wa mtsogoleri wakale wa dziko lino mayi Joyce Banda yemwenso ndi munthu wa mayi zomwe ati zikusonyezeratu kuti anthuwa akupanga zofuna zawo osati za a Malawi. “Gulu limeneli ambiri ndi achipani cha DPP ndiye zikudabwitsa kuti dpp ndi nkhani ya chisankho zikugwirizana bwanji. Enanso mwa amenewa ndi amene amakhala patsogolo kunyoza amayi anzawo. Kumbukirani nthawi ya Joyce Banda m’modzi mwa amayi amenewa ndi amene anali patsogolo kunyoza mayi Banda ndiye lero zikudabwitsa kuti abwera ndi ganizoli,” anatero a Thindwa Komabe a Thindwa ati ndi koyenera kuti amayiwa apatsidwe mpata wochita ziwonetserozo kaamba koti ndi ufulu wawo kutero malinga ndi malamulo a dziko lino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mavolontiya Akale a Radio Maria Malawi Ayendera Wayilesiyi
news: By Richard Makombe Bambo Steven Kamanga (kumanja) kupereka katundu kwa a National Coordinator a Louis Phiri (kumanzere) Gulu  la mavolontiya omwe anatumikirapo ku  Radio Maria Malawi masiku a mbuyomu atsindika zakufunika kolimbikitsa ubale wabwino pakati pawo ndi anthu omwe akutumikira ku wayisiyi padakali pano. Mlangizi wa mavolontiya akalewa Bambo Steven Kamanga ayankhula izi pomwe gulu lawo linabwera kudzayendera ku likulu la Radio Maria Malawi ku Mangochi. Mwa zina Gululi linachita mkumano wawo wa pa chaka. Poyankhulapo pambuyo  pa ulendowu bambo Kamanga ati iwo apitiriza kudzipereka powonesetsa kuti Radio Maria ikugwira ntchito zake mopindulira anthu onse omwe amavera wayilesiyi. Bambo Kamanga ati apitiriza kuthandiza wayilesi ndi luso lawo lapadera kuti ipitilize kufalitsa uthenga wa mulungu mwa luso ndi ukadaulo. ‘Pali zambiri zomwe tikufuna kuthandiza Radio Maria kuti ipitilize kutumikira akhristu komanso anthu onse omwe amakonda kumvera wayilesiyi kuti ikwaniritse kufalitsa uthenga wa mulungu pa dziko lonse lapansi”anatero Bambo Kamanga. Bambo Kamanga anati ayesetsa kuti pakhalae ubale wabwino pakati pa gulu lawo lomwe linatumikirapo mmbuyomu komanso achinyamata omwe akutumikira padakali pano. Mmawu ake mmodzi mwa omwe anatumikirapo ku wayilesiyi yemwe padakalipno akugwira ntchito ku bungwe loyang’anira nyumba zowulutsa mawu la Malawi Communications Regulatory Authority (MACRA) Lucy Chimwaza wati ndi okonzeka kuthandizira kuti ntchito za wayilesiyi zipitilire kuyenda bwino. “Ndi khumbo langa kugawana nawo achinyamata omwe akutumikira panopa luso lomwe ndili nalo kuti ziwathandizire pomwe akugwira ntchito yawo yofalitsa uthenga wa mulungu pa wayilesiyi”anatero Chimwaza. Ena mwa omwe anatumikirapo mmbuyomu ndipo anali nawo pa ulendowu ndi monga Enock Thokole, Martin Chiwanda, Dyless Ngondo, Prince Hendreson kungotchulapo ochepa chabe. Mwazina gululi lapereka katundu osiyansiyana kwa achinyamata omwe akutumikira monga ufa, mafuta ophikira, sugar ndi katundu wina kuti athandize pogwiritsa ntchito ku wayilesiyi ndipo katunduyu ndi wa ndalama zoposa 5 hundred thousand kwacha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dayosizi ya Mangochi Iphunzitsa Atsogoleri a M’maparishi
news: By Sylvester Kasitomu Ntchito za chitukuko mu mpingo akuti zingapitilire kuyenda bwino ngati atsogoleri a mpingo-wu m’maparish akuthandiza bwino akhristu awo ndi njira zabwino zokometsera miyoyo yawo ya uzimu. Mkulu wa kuofesi yoona za utumiki mu dayosizi ya mpingo wakatolika ya Mangochi  bambo Medrick Mlava ndi omwe anena izi pambuyo pa msonkhano wa atsogoleri-wa mu dayosizi-yi. Iwo ati atsogoleri a mpingo-wu m’ma Parish akuyenera kumalimbikitsa akhristu awo za moyo wa uzimu osati kumangowazindikiritsa za udindo umene ali nawo pa ntchito zotukula mpingo-wu. Polankhulanso a James Antonio omwe  anachita nawo msonkhano-wu kuyimira parish ya Kausi ayamikira dayosizi-yo kamba kowakonzera mkumanowu omwe iwo ati ndi opindulitsa kwambiri pakayendetsedwe ka mpingowu mmaparish a mu dayosiziyi. “Mkumano umenewu watidzindilikiritsa kuti ifeyo ngati ma moderator a mpingo tikuyenera kuti tizitumikira akhristu athu mu njira zonse ziwiri, mu moyo wa uzimu komanso wathupi  ndi cholinga choti akhristu azikhala ndi mtima opereka molowa manja zoperekapereka za mu pingowu monga mitulo ndi zina,” anatero a Antonio. Mkumanowu unasonkhanitsa adindo ochokera m’maparishi onse amudayosizi ya Mangochi kuphatikizapo ansembe ndi ena okhudzidwa pa ntchito za chitukuko cha dayosiziyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dayosizi ya Chikwawa Ili ndi Komiti Yatsopano ya Abwenzi a Radio Maria
news: By Richard Makombe Abwenzi a Radio Maria Malawi mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa asankha komiti yatsopano yomwe cholinga chake ndikuthandiza kuyendetsa ntchito za Radio  Maria. Komitiyi yasankhidwa  pambuyo pa chisankho chomwe abwenzi a wayilesiyi anakonza chomwe chinachitikira loweruka ku St. Michaels Cathedral mboma la Chikwawa. Poyankhula pa mbuyo pa masankhowa, a National Coordinator a Radio Maria a Louis Phiri ayamikira abwenzi a wayilesiyi mu dayosiziyi kamba kotuluka mwaunyinji ndi kusankha atsogoleri a ku mtima kwawo. A Phiri alimbikitsa abwenzi onse amene asankhidwa kukhala mu komiti yatsopano ya dayosizi ya Chikwawa kuti asabwelere mbuyo pogwira ntchito yawo. “Ndithokoze kwambiri nonse amene munatenga nawo mbali powonesetsa kuti chisankhochi chiyende bwino komanso mwa bata ndi mtendere”anatero a Phiri. A Phiri anatengerapo mwayi ndikupempha atsogoleri atsopanowa kuti akonzekere bwino ndikuadzatenga nawo mbali pa chikondwelero chokumbukira kuti Radio Maria Malawi yakwanitsa zaka 20 ikufalitsa uthenga wabwino mdziko muno chomwe chidzachitike mwezi wa September chaka chino.. Pothilirapo ndemanga wapa mpando wa Laity Council mu dayosizi ya Chikwawa a George Mkutu anayamikira abwenzi a Radio Maria  mdziko muno kamba kotenga gawo pa ntchito zothandiza  Radio Maria mdziko muno. “Ndikofunika kuti abwenzi a Radio Maria akhale patsogolo kuthandiza wayilesiyi kaamba koti thandizo kwa akhristu ndi anthu onse mdziko muno choncho ngati abwenzi a wayilesiyi akuyenera kutsogolera pa ntchito yothandiza wayilesiyi,” anatero a Mkutu. Mmawu ake wachiwiri kwa wapampando yemwe wasankhidwa kumene a Clement Majawa ati ndiokondwa kuti komiti yomwe amayiyembekezera tsopano yasankhidwa. Ena omwe asankhidwa m’maudindo ndi monga  a Mathews Chimota omwe ndi wapampando, Clement Mjawa asankhidwa kukhala wachiwiri kwa wapampando, ndipo a Zachariah Malunga awasankha kukhala mlembi ndipo wachiwiri wawo ndi a Cecelia Jeke komanso a Enifa Mwale awasankha kukhala msungichuma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kawangi CDSS Iyendera ndi Kuthandiza Radio Maria Malawi
news: By Richard Makombe Akhristu mdziko muno awalimbikitsa kuti azitenga nawo mbali pothandiza Radio Maria Malawi kamba koti imasowa thandizo pa ntchito yake yofalitsa uthenga wa Mulungu. Patron wa achinyamata a gulu la Young Catholic Students (YCS)  pa sukulu ya Kawangi CDSS m’boma la Dowa a Emmanuel Maseko ayankhula izi pomwe anadzayendera ku Radio Maria Malawi. A Maseko ati ndiokhutira ndi momwe Radio Maria imagwilira ntchito zake choncho nkoyenera kuti akhristu aziyithandiza kuti ipitilize kugwira ntchito zake. “Ndife okhutira ndi kagwiridwe  ntchito ka wayilesiyi ndipo tikuona kuti wayilesiyi imadzipereka pogwira ntchito zake choncho ndikoyenera kuyithandiza kuti ipitirize ntchito yabwino yomwe ikugwira,” anatero a Maseko. Mmawu ake  m’modzi mwa achinyamatawa  Ezara Lazaro wati waphunzira zambiri paulendo wake ku Radio Maria, ndipo wati wadziwa zambiri za momwe wayilesiyi imagwilira ntchito zake. “Ndikufuna ndipemphe achinyamata anzanga kuti nawonso tsiku lina adzabwere kuno kudzaona momwe wayilesiyi imagwilira ntchito zake komanso kudzaithandiza  chifukwa ikusowekra thandizo la wina aliyense,” anatero Lazaro. Achinyamatawa apereka  ndalama zokwana 10 thousand kwacha kuti zithandize kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za wayilesiyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Lengwe National Park Idzetsa Mavuto a Malo Olima
news: By Thokozani Chapola Mbali imodzi ya Lengwe National Park Anthu a m’midzi ya Mtambawatherere komanso Njobvuyalema kwa mfumu yaikulu Ngabu m’boma la Chikwawa  ayamba kuthawira mdziko la Mozambique kaamba kosowa malo olima. Malinga ndi anthu a mderali lomwe ndi loyandikana ndi nkhalango yosungirako nyama zakutchire ya Lengwe, anthu amaletsedwa kulima mu nkhalangoyi momwe ndi mokhamo momwe muli malo olima ati kaamba koti ndi nkhalango yotetezedwa. Mfumu ya derali yati anthuwa kwa nthawi yaitali akhala akulima mu nkhalangoyi kufikira zaka ziwiri zapitazo pomwe oyang’anira  nkhalangoyi anayamba kugwira ndi kumanga aliyense wopezeka akulima mu nkhalangoyi. Malinga ndi mfumuyi anthuwa akagwidwa akumalipilitsidwa ndalama za nkhaninkhani akapezeka akulima m’malowa zopmwe ati zakwiyitsa kwambiri anthu a mdera lake. “Abusa anapita kukadyetsa ng’ombe koma anagwidwako pomwe mbuyo monsemu timapitako bwinobwino. Abusa wa alipiritsidwa 80 sauzande aliyense kuti atuluke ku polisi. Zimenezi ndi zomwe zakwiyitsa anthu ndi kuyamba kupita mdziko la Mozambique kuti mwina mkukapezako malo olima ndi kudyesera ziweto,” inatero mfumu Chagaka. Iwo apempha mabungwe omenyera ufulu wa anthu kuti athandize anthu a mderali kuti apezeko mtendere. Trapence: Boma lichitepo kanthu Polankhulapo wachiri kwa wapampando wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe omwenyera ufulu wa anthu mdziko muno Human Rights Defenders Coalition a Gift Trapence ati boma likuyenera kukambirana ndi anthuwa ndi kuwapezera malo olima. “Ngati anthu akusowa polima ndiye kuti pali vuto ndiye bomalo liyenera kuti liyesetse kuti likambirane ndi anthu komanso mafumu a derali, kuti nawonso apeze malo okhala ndi kulimapo,” anatero Trapence. Koma polankhulapo mneneri mu unduna wa zachilengedwe, mphamvu za magetsi ndi migodi a Sangwani Phiri ati anthu sayenera kulima ku malowa kaamba koti malowa ndi otetezedwa ndi boma kuti azisungirako nyama basi. “Malo aliwonse omwe ndi otetezedwa aliyense akapezekamo ndi kulakwira malamulo a boma. Nyama zikawavulaza adzabweranso ku boma kuti liwapepese ngati kuti ifeyo tikulephera kusamalira nkhalangoyo choncho ife tikuteteza nyama komanso kuteteza miyoyo ya anthuwo,” anatero a Phiri. Lengwe National Park inakhazikitsidwa mchaka cha 1970 ndipo kwa nthawi yaitali anthu akhala akulima mu nkhalangoyi yomwe ili ndi nyama zochuluka kuphatikizapo yotchuka kwambiri ya Nyala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Apepherera Mizimu ya Othawa Nkhondo ku Libya
news: By Sylvester Kasitomu Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapereka uthenga wachipepeso kwa anthu omwe anaphedwa pa chiwembu chomwe chinachitika pa malo ena osungirapo anthu othawa kwawo mdziko la Libya. Wapereka uthenga wa chipepeso – Papa Papa wapereka uthengawu pambuyo pa nsembe ya ukalistia yomwe anatsogolera ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati ndi okhudzidwa ndi imfa ya anthuwa kaamba koti ena mwa anthu anafa pa chiwembuchi ndi ana omwe sakudziwa chilichonse. Pamenepa Papa wapempha akhristu a mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse kuti athandize ndi mapemphero komanso zinthu zina kwa anthu omwe akhudzidwa ndi zamtopolazi monga kuvulala ndi zina. Anthu 53 ndi omwe afa pa chiwembuchi pomwe 6 mwa iwo ndi ana ndipo 130 ndi omwe avulala modetsa nkhawa ndipo akulandira thandizo la mankhwala pa chipatala china mdzikomo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Dziko la Malawi Silimayenera Kuchita Chikondwelero Cha Zaka 55 – Mvula
news: By Richard Makombe Mmodzi wa akatswiri pa nkhani za ndale mdziko muno wati  sanagwirizane ndi ganizo la boma lochita chikondwelero chokumbukira kuti dziko lino lakwanitsa zaka 55 lili pa ufulu wodzilamulira pomwe boma likusowa ndalama zogwiritsira ntchito poyendetsera zina mwa ntchito zake. Mvula: Ndalama za chikondwelero akanatha kugwiritsa ntchito zina zofunikira kwambiri Katswiriyu a Humphreys Mvula wauza Radio Maria Malawi pomwe dziko lino loweruka limachita chikondwelero kuti lakwanitsa zaka 55 za ufulu odzilamulira. A Mvula ati ndi momwe zinthu zilili padakali pano boma limayenera kuganiza mozama potenga ndalama za chikondwelerochi ndikugwiritsa ntchito kugula mankhwala mzipatala komanso mavuto ena omwe achuluka mdziko muo. “Dziko lino likukumana ndi mavuto a zachuma padakali pano komanso mpungwepungwe pa nkhani za ndale choncho kunali koyenera kukonza kaye mavuto amenewa,osati kuononga ndalama kuchita chikondwelero pomwe atsogoleri ena a ndale sakukondwa ndi momwe zinthu zikuyendera mdziko muno,” anatero a Mvula. A Mvula apempha mtsogoleri wa dziko lino kuti apeze njira ndikukambirana ndi atsogoleri otsutsa kuti athetse mpungwepungwe omwe ukuchitika mdziko muno pa nkhani za ndale. Padakali Pano bungwe la Human Rights Defenders Coalition lakhala likukonza ziwonetsero zosagwirizana ndi momwe zisankho zinayendera pa 21 May chaka chino komanso mwa zina likufuna kuti wapampando wa bungwe la Malawi Electoral Commission Justice Dr. Jane Ansah atule pansi udindo wake. Pa ziwonetserozi zomwe zakhala zikuchitika mmizinda ikuluikulu yonse ya dziko lino, anthu ena akhala akuononga katundu wa anthu ena ochita malonda kuphatikizapo akuluakulu a ndale ena. Dziko la Malawi linalandira ufulu odzilamulira pa 6 July mchaka cha 1964 ndipo chaka chilichonse dziko la Malawi limachita chikondwelerochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CADECOM Ipindulira Anthu a M’boma la Mwanza
news: By Glory Kondowe Mpingo wakatolika m’dziko muno wati ndi wokhutira ndi mmene anthu a m’boma la Mwanza  akupindulira ndi ntchito zake zomwe zikugwiridwa ndi bungwe lake la zachitukuko la Catholic Development Commission in Malawi (CADECOM). Mlembi wamkulu ku bungwe la ma episikopi a mpingo wakatolika m’dziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM), bambo Henry  Saindi alankhula izi pambuyo poyendera ntchito zosiyanasiyana zomwe bungwe la CADECOM likugwira m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Kanduku m’boma la Mwanza mu archdayosizi ya Blantyre. Bambo Saindi ati kudzera mu ntchitozi zawonetsa poyera kuti anthu a m’derali akuthandizika mu njira zosiyanasiyana kamba koti akutha kuzipezera okha zosowa za moyo wawo wa tsiku ndi tsiku. Ayamikira bungwe la CADECOM – bambo Saindi Pamenepa Iwo ati mpingo-wu upitiliza kugwira ntchito ndi boma pothandizira ntchito zotukula dziko lino. ”Ntchito zomwe bungwe la CADECOM  ikuwathandiza anthu amudzi mwa Ulemu  ndi monga kuwathandiza kufetsa ndikuwokera  mitengo okha komaso azimayi akuwaphunzitsa bizinesi yophika mowa wa wine womwe ukupangitsa kuti njira yopenzera chuma isamasowe,” anatero bambo Saindi. Iwo ati ndi okhutira ndi bungwe la CADECOM lomwe limathandizidwa ndi abwenzi ochokera mdziko la Australia lomwe cholinga chake ndikuona zomwe anthu akuchita kale ndi kuwathandiza pomwe sangathe kufikilapo monga ulimi osiyanasiyana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mutharika Alalika za Mtendere pa Zaka 55 Zodzilamulira
news: By Thokozani Chapola President wa dziko lino Peter Mutharika wapempha anthu mdziko muno kuti asunge bata ndi mtendere. Mutharika amalankhula izi pa bwalo la zamasewero la Kamuzu mu mzinda wa blantyre pa mwambo wokondwelera kuti dziko lino lakwanitsa zaka 55 lili pa ufulu wodzilamulira. Iye wati anthu akuyenera kukhala okonda dziko lawo podzipereka potukula dziko lino. Wapempha anthu asunge bata – Mutharika Polankhula pa mwambowo Mutharika wadandaula kaamba ka anthu ena omwe akuchita ziwonetsero zomwe ati zalowa chipolowe tsopano. “Anthu ena akuchita ziwonetsero koma akuwononga nazo zitukuko zina zomwe boma linakonza zomwe zichititse kuti boma liwonongenso ndalama kukonzetsera katunduyo,” anatero Mutharika. Mutharika wati dziko la Malawi limadziwika kwambiri ndi mtendere choncho boma lake sililora kuti  anthu ena awononge mtenderewu pa zifukwa za ndale. “Zinthu zina zomwe zinakonzedwa mmbuyomu pano zikuwonongedwa ati chifukwa cha ziwonetsero zomwe zikubwezera mbuyo chitukuko,” anatero Mutharika. Mutharika wayamikira apolisi komanso asilikali a gulu la nkhondo mdziko muno kaamba kogwira ntchito yawo mwa ukadaulo ndipon wadzudzula anthu ena omwe wati akumaika mawu mkamwa asilikaliwa ponena kuti ali mbali ya andale ena. Chikondwelerochi chadza patangodutsa maola ochepa kutachitika ziwonetsero komanso mbindikiro mmizinda yonse ya dziko lino komanso maboma ena omwe cholinga chake ndi kufuna kukakamiza wapampando wa bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) kuti atule pansi udindo wake ati pomuganizira kuti sanayendetse bwino chisankho cha pa 21 May 2019.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Radio Maria DRP Ipanga Ubale ndi Mother Group ya St. John Primary
news: By Richard Makombe Achinyamata ophunzira pa sukulu ya St. John m’bomma la Mangochi awapempha kuti alimbikire maphunziro kamba koti ndilo tsogolo lawo lomwe lingawathandize. Mmodzi wa akuluakulu omwe amayendetsa ntchito za bungwe la Developing Radio Programs (DRP) ku Radio Maria Malawi a Daflen Jailosi alankhula izi pa sukulu-yi pa mwambo okhazikitsa ubale ndi gulu la achinyamata la DRP . Bungwe la DRP limagwira ntchito yojambula mapologalamu okhudza achinyamata pomwe bungwe la Mothers Group Support limagwira ntchito yolimbikitsa  achinyamata pa sukuluyi kuti alimbikire maphunziro komanso kuwalangiza pa nkhani zokhudza umoyo wawo. Poyankhula pa mwambo, a Jailosi anati ndi okondwa ndi ubalewu ndipo anati ayesetsa kuti achinyamata ambiri asasiyire sukulu pa njira. ‘’Tiwonesetsa kuti achinyamata sakusiya sukulu ndipo tigwira limodzi ntchito ndi gulu limeneli la Mothers Group kuti cholinga chathu chikwaniritsidwe,” anatero a Jailosi. A Jailosi anati chidwi chawo chikhala kuthandiza kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha achinyamata omwe amasiyira sukulu panjira. A Jailosi (avala jekete) ndi mamembala ena a DRP kujambulitsa ndi Mother Group ya St. John Primary School Wapampando wa Mothers Group  pa nsukuluyi Elizabeth Lodzani anati ayesetsa kuthana ndi vuto la kusiyira sukulu pa njira kwa achinyamata lomwe lakula pa sukuluyi. “Ndife okhuzidwa ndi mchitidwe osiyira pakati sukulu kwa achinyamata omwe ukuchepetsa chiwerengero cha ophunzira” anatero a Lodzani. Mmawu ake wachiwiri kwa mphunzitsi wa mkulu pasukuluyi Louis Kwalinga anati ndiokondwa ndi kukhazikitsidwa kwa ubale wa magulu awiriwa omwe wati uthandiza kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha ana omwe amasiyira sukulu pa njira. Gulu la Mothers Group Support pa sukulu ya Primary ya St. John linayamba mchka cha 2016 ndipo chaka chino layendera midzi inayi yomwe ndi ya Steven, Chiwaula, Changamile 1 komanso 2 ndipo padakalipano lakwanitsa kubwezeretsa pa sukulu ana okwana 29.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Britain Itumiza MISA Malawi ku London
news: By Slyvester Kasitomu Ofesi ya kazembe wa dziko la Britain kuno ku Malawi yatumiza wapampando wa bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa atolankhani mdziko muno la MISA Malawi Tereza Temweka Ndanga kuti akakhale nawo pa msonkhano wa olemba nkhani pa dziko lonse womwe ukachitikire mu mzinda wa London m’dziko la United Kingdom. Akupita ku London – Ndanga Msonkhanowu womwe ukayambe pa 10 ndi kutha pa 11 July waitanitsa akulu-akulu a olemba nkhani pa dziko lonse kuti akakambirane mfundo zofuna kukweza ufulu wa anthuwa padziko lonse.  Malinga ndi chikalata chomwe kazembe wa dziko la Britain kuno ku Malawi Gary Lesile watulutsa chati dziko la Malawi likuchita bwino pa nkhani yoteteza komanso kulemekeza ufulu wa olemba nkhani kudzera mubungwe lomenyera ufulu wa olemba nkhani la MISA Malawi. “Dziko la Malawi lawonetsa chitsanzo chabwino pa nkhani yolemekeza ufulu wa olemba nkhani mu dera lino la Africa kwa zaka khumi ndi zisanu zapitazo. Dzikoli liri ndi dongosolo labwino mu constitution mwake lomwe limapereka mwayi kwa anthu olankhula zakukhosi,” chatero chikalatacho. Polankhulapo Ndanga wati ngakhale dziko lino likuchita bwino pa nkhani yolemekeza ufulu wa olemba komabe atolankhani akukumana ndi mavuto ena monga kunyozedwa ndi zina. “Inde tikuchita bwino kuno ku Africa pa nkhani yolemekeza ufulu wa olemba nkhani komabe anthufe tikukumana ndi mavuto monga kunyozedwa ndi zina mdziko muno zomwe zikubwezeretsa mbuyo ntchito ya utolankhani kuno kwathu,” anatero Ndanga. Msonkhanowu wa akuluakulu a olemba nkhaniwu wakonzedwa ndi dziko la United Kingdom mogwirizana ndi Canada omwe qgwirana manja patchito yolimbikitsa komanso kuteteza ufulu wa olemba nkhani padziko lonse lapansi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chilima Adzudzula Ochita Ziwawa pa Ziwonetsero
news: By Thokozani Chapola M‘tsogoleri wa chipani cha UTM, Dr. Saulos Chilima wapempha apolisi ndi owona za malamulo m‘dziko muno kuti athane ndi onse amene akuononga katundu wa anthu ena pomwe akuchita zionetsero ponena kuti zionetsero zonwe zikuchitikazi ndi za bata ndi mtendere. Chilima akuyenda nawo pa ziwonetserozo Dr. Chilima amayakhula izi ku Mzuzu komwe anatenga nawo mbali pa zionetserozi zomwe cholinga chake ndi kufuna kukamiza wapampando wa bungwe la MEC, Justice Dr. Jane Ansah kuti atule pansi udindo wake. Pamenepa Iwo apempha onse omwe akuchita zionetserozi kuti apitilize kupereka madando awo mwa bata ndi mtendere. “Sitikuyikira kumbuyo aliyense amene akupanga zowononga katundu wa anzawo. Aliyense amene akupanga zosokoneza tipemphe achitetezo agwire ntchito pa iye,“ anatero Chilima. Iwo ati ndi okhutira ndi momwe ziwonetserozi zayendera padakalipano ndipo achitetezo apitirize kuteteza anthu amene akuchita ziwonetserozi mwa bata ndi mtendere
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mtakataka Parish Ili Ndi Goloto la Tsopano
news: Wolemba: Richard Makombe Mpingo wa katolika mu diocese ya Dedza wati akhristu ali ndi udindo wothandiza maparish awo pofuna kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za diocese yo. Mkulu oyendetsa ntchito za mu diocese yi Monsignor John Chithonje, amayankhula izi ku parishi ya Mtakataka mu dayosiziyo, pa mwambo olandira Goloto imene yamangidwa ndi akhristu akuparishiyo omwe akukhala m’madera osiyanasiyana mdziko muno komanso maiko akunja. Monsignor Chithonje ati kumangidwa kwa Goloto-yi kuthandiza kwambiri dioceseyi yomwe ikanatulutsa ndalama kuti zigwilire ntchitoyi. “Ndife okondwa chifukwa akhristu omwe anachoka pa parish pano koma atikumbukira potimangira Goloto ndipo tiwauze akhristu ena kuti atengerepo chitsanzo pa zomwe akhristu anzawo atichitira,”anatero Monsignor Chithonje. Goloto latsopano la Mtakataka parishi Poyankhulapo pa mwambowu, wapampando wa abwenzi a parishiyi a John Baluti, ati ndi udindo wa mkhristu aliyense kuthandiza mpingo komanso parish ya komwe amachokera, kuti ntchito za mpingo zidzipita patsogolo. “Tinaganiza zothandiza Parishiyi chifukwa tinaona mavuto osaiyanasiyana omwe Parish ino ikukumana nawo,” anatero a Baluti.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Kimu Alimbikitsa Akhristu Ku Monkeybay Pothandiza Radio Maria
news: Wolemba: Richard Makombe Bambo Kimu nthawi ya perekani-perekani ku St. Louis Monkeybay parish Akhristu a ku St. Louis Monkebay mu diocese ya Mangochi awapempha kuti apitilize kuthandiza Radio Maria kuti ipitilire kufalitsa uthenga wabwino wa Yesu Khristu. A Director a Radio Maria Bambo Joseph Kimu ayankhula izi  pa mwambo wa nsembe ya Ukaristiya yomwe unachitikira ku tchalitchi cha St. Louis MonkeyBay mu dayosizi ya Mangochi yomwe cholinga chake chinali kuthandiza wayilesiyi. Bambo Kimu anati amayamika kwambiri thandizo lomwe anthu amathandiza nalo wayilesiyi. Iwo ati ndi cholinga cha wayilesiyi kuti izitha kufikira anthu ambiri kudzera mu kufalitsa uthenga wa Mulungu. “Ndikudziwa kuti muli ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana pa Parish pano koma munachiona chanzeru kuti muyithandize wayilesiyi kuti ipitilize kufalitsa uthenga wabwino pa dziko lonse,” anatero bamboo Kimu. Pamenepa iwo apempha akhristu onse mdziko muno kuti azigawana ndi mpingo zochepa zomwe ali nazo makamaka pothandiza Radio Maria. bambo Kimu anati, “Kuthandiza sikuyenera kuti ukhale ndi zambiri koma kangachepe komwe muli nako ndizokwanira kugawana ndi anzanu.” Poyankhulapo a Moderator a parishi ya St. Louis MonkeyBay a Wyson Chiondo anati anachiona chanzeru kuti athandize Radio Maria  kuti ntchito za wayilesiyi zipite patsogolo. A Chiondo anati Radio Maria imawathandiza kukulitsa moyo wauzimu choncho ndi koyenera kuithandiza kuti ikwaniritse cholinga chake. Pa mwambowu akhristuwa anapereka ndalama zokwana 3 hundred and 9 thousand ten kwacha. Mwambo wa thandizani Radio Maria wu wachitika pomwe wayilesiyi ili mkati mofunafuna thandizo loyendetsera ntchito za wayilesiyi yotchedwa Mariatona.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la DRP lipereka ma Computer ku Radio Maria Malawi
news: Wolemba: Richard Makombe A Rice (achinayi kuchoka kumanja) kupereka katundu ku Radio Maria Malawi Bungwe lothandiza pa ntchito za chitukuko cha zoulutsa mawu   la Developing Radio Partners (DRP) lapereka makina a Computer ndi zipangizo zina zojambulira ma pologalamu ku wailesi ya mpingo wakatolika ya Radio Maria Malawi. Mkulu woyendetsa ntchito za bungwe la Developing Radio Partners (DRP) m’dziko muno a Charles Rice wati ndi wokhutira ndi momwe ntchito yopititsa patsogolo mapologalamu a chinyamata ikuyendera ku Radio Maria Malawi. A Rice amayankhula izi pomwe bungwe lawo limapereka  katunduyi lamulungu ku likulu la wayilesi yi ku Mangochi. “Bungwe lathu ndilokondwa ndi momwe ntchito yothandiza achinyamata kujambula mapologalamu osiyanasiyana okhudza umoyo wawo ikuyendera” anatero a Rice. Bungwe-li ndi limodzi mwa mabungwe omwe anakhadzikitsidwa ndi cholingachothandiza pa ntchito yotukula miyoyo ya achinyamata, kudzera pa wailesiyi. M’modzi mwa omwe  amatsogolera ntchito zojambula ma pologalamu a bungwe-li ndi achinyamata ku wailesi-yi a Daflen Jailosi anayamikira bungwe-li kamba ka thandizolo ndipo anati liwathandiza kuti ntchito yojambula ma pologalamu ikhale yapamwamba komanso izichitika mwachanga. “Tikukhuluilira kuti kuyambira pano kupita mtsogolo muno,tipitiliza kujambula mapologalamu mwaluso ndi mwa ukadaulo ndipo thandizo limeneli lafika mu nthawi yoyenera” anatero Jailosi. Bungwe La USAID ndi lomwe limapereka thandizo la ndalama ku bungwe la DRP.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ADUS Idzodza Ansembe 7 Atsopano-Episkopi Alimbikitsa Mtendere
news:
By Thokozani Chapola Ansembe atsopano a Anglican kuchita malumbiro awo Episkopi wa mpingo wa Anglican mu dayosizi ya uppershire, Ambuye Brighton Vitta Malasa wapempha anthu mdziko muno kuti alimbikitse mtendere ndi cholinga choti chitukuko chipite patsogolo.
Ambuye Malasa amalankhula m’boma la Mangochi pa mwambo wodza ansembe komanso madikoni omwe unachitikira ku St. Thomas Complex. Iwo ati nthawi yakwana yoti anthu ayiwale za chisankho ndi kupita chitsogolo.
“Nthawi yakwana yoti tikhululukirane wina ndi mzake ndi kuyang’ana patsogolo kuti titukule dzikoli pamodzi. Mchitidwe wa ziwawa omwe ukuchitika mdziko muno ukuwononga zinthu zambiri,” anatero Ambuye Malasa.
Mmau ake mlendo yemwe anali mlendo wolemekezeka pa mwambowu yemwe ndi wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino a Everton Chimulirenji anati boma ndi lodzipereka kugwira ntchito ndi mipingo popititsa patsogolo ntchito zachitukuko monga za maphunziro komanso za umoyo. Iye anapempha miingo kuti ipitirize kupemphelera mtendere komanso chitukuko mdziko muno. Chimulirenji: Mipingo ndi zipembezo zipitirize kupemphelera mtendere mdziko muno Polankhulapo bambo Joseph Kimu omwe ndi a Director a Radio maria Malawi otumikira mpingo wa katolika mu dayosizi ya Mangochi omwe analalikira pa mwambowu anapempha ansembe komanso ma dikoni a mpingo wa Anglican omwe adzodzedwa kumene mu dayosizi ya mpingowu ya Uppershire kuti alimbikire kupemphera komanso kuthandiza anthu osauka.
Iwo ati ndi kofunika kuti ansembewa komanso ma dikoniwa amudziweYesu Khristu kuti athe kulalika bwino za uthenga wa AmbuyeYesu.
“Ndikupempheni kuti muyambe kumudziwa komanso kumukonda Yesu khristu kuti muthe kulalika bwino za ufumu wake”anatero bambo Kimu.
Bambo Kimu anati ngati atumiki a Mulungu ndi kofunika kuti ansembewa akuyenera kukhalao khwima pa chikhulupilirochawo komanso kudziwa yemwe iwo akumutumikira kuti ntchito yawo yotumikira ikhale yopindulitsa kwa akhristu omwe azikawatumikira.
Bambo Kimu anati,”Ndikupempheni kuti mukhale ansembe komanso ma dikoni okonda kupemphera komanso mudziwe cholinga chomwe mwasankhira kutumikira Mulungu’’.
Patsikuli, adikoni asanu ndi awiri omwe omwe ndi David Chilowoza, Tendai Mdutu, Edington Matendeu, Frank Saulo, Isaac Phiri, Kenneth Wisiki komanso Shame Banda adzodzedwa kukhala ansembe ndipo atumiki ena atatu omwe ndi Austin Lwanda, Charles Lezile komanso Peter Kumwima adzodzedwa kukhala ma dikoni. Mwapadera Vicar general wa dayosiziyi bambo Edward Mtendere Kawinga apatsidwa ulemu wokhala Kenani womwe ndi ulemu otsiriza womwe bishop mu mpingo wa Anglican angapereke kwa wansembe potengera ntchito zake zabwino zomwe akugwira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ECM Idzudzula Ziwawa pa Ndale
news: By Thokozani Chapola Alemba kalata yodzudzula ziwawa-Aepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika Bungwe la ma bishop a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la Epicopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) ladzudzula mchitidwe wa ziwawa womwe wakhala ukuchitika mdziko muno chichitikireni chisankho chapatatu pa 21 May. Bungweli lanena izi kudzera mu chikalata chomwe latulutsa Lachisanu, 28 June 2019 pambuyo pa mkumano wake wa masiku asanu omwe unachitikira ku likulu la bungweli mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Ma episkopi-wa ati  ataona, kumvetsera, kusinkhasinkha ndiponso kupemphera pa zinthu zimene zakhala zikuchitika ndipo zikupitirira kuchitika pambuyo pa chisankho chapatatu cha pa 21 May 2019, aona kuti ndikofunika kuti adzudzule mwamphamvu mkhalidwe wochita ziwawa ndi nkhanza zosiyanasiyana zimene zakhala zikuchitika m’madera ena a dziko lino. Iwo ati sakugwirizana ndi mkhalidwe wovutitsa anthu osalakwa ndi kuwaonongera katundu wao chifukwa cha ndale, kusiyana mitundu kapena zigawo zimene anthu amachokera. Iwo ati khanza ndi kuzunza anthu ena ndi tchimo ndipo ndi chinthu chosavomerezeka; kuvutitsa anthu ena ndi mkhalidwenso  wotsutsana ndi ufulu umene a Malawi ankafunapamene adasankha kukhala ndi boma la demokalase ndi matipate. Pamenepa iwo apempha Akhristu onse Akatolika kuti akhale zida zodzetsa umodzi ndi mtendere mdziko muno ndipo apempha akhristu wa kuti lamulo la chikondi pa wina ndi mzake likhale mmitima mwawo. Ma bishop wa apempha Akatolika onse kuti akane  kugwiritsidwa ntchito ngati zida zochitira nkhanza anthu ena  ndipo apewe mkhalidwe wofalitsa udani ndi mauthenga abodza pogwiritsa ntchito njira zamakono zofalitsira nkhani – social media. Pa nkhani ya ziwonetsero, mabishop wa ati nzika zonse za dziko lino, komanso magulu monga mabungwe, kapena munthu aliyense payekha, ali ndi ufulu wochita ziwonetsero mwabata potengera mu buku la malamulo a dziko lino choncho iwo ati  anthu amene  akuchita ziwonetseo movomerezeka akuyenera kutetezedwa mokwanira ndi a zachitetezo. Atsogoleri a mpoingo wa katolikawa ati aona kuti sichinthu cha nzeru kuti atsire ndemanga pa za mmene zinthu zokhudza chisankho zidayendera podziwa kuti nkhaniyi ili ku Bwalo la Milandu. Ma bishop wa kudzera mu kalatayi yomwe yalembedwa pa mutu woti ngodala anthu odzetsa mtendere omwe ndi mawu ochokera pa mateyu 5 ndime ya 9 apempha nzika zonse za dziko lino kuti zisunge bata ndi mtendere ndiponso umodzi pamene anthu onse mdziko muno akudikira chiweruzo cha Bwalo la Milandu pa nkhani ya chisankhoyi ndipo ati ali ndi  chiyembekezo kuti chilungamo ndi choonadi ziwonekera poyera pankhaniyi. Maepiskopi wa ati apitiriza kupemphera kuti m’dziko muno  mukhale mtendere, umodzi ndi kukhululukirana ndipo apemphanso akhristu onse Akatolika kuti apitirire kupempherera dziko la Malawi. Pa mkumanowu panali ma bishop onse a mpingo wa katolika m’ma dayosizi 7 komanso woyendetsa ntchito za dayosizi ya Dedza kuphatikizapo yemwe wangosankhidwa kumene kukhala nthumwi ya Papa m’maiko a Malawi ndi Zambia Gian Franko Gallone.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma la Dedza Layamba Kugawa Zipangizo Zotetezera Anthu Akhungu la Chialubino
news: By Glory Kondowe Anthu akhungu ngati ili akusowa chitetezo Ntchito yogawa zipangizo zotetezera anthu omwe ali ndi khungu la chialubino(pachingerezi security alarms) yayamba m’boma la Dedza. Pokhazikitsa ntchito-yi wachiwiri kwa mkulu woyang’anira ntchito za apolisi m’bomalo Assistant Supritendent Paul Zitha anati ntchito yobweretsa chitetezo kwa anthu omwe ndi akhungu la chialubino komanso kuteteza munthu aliyese ndi ya wina aliyese osati apolisi okha. Assistant Supritendent Zitha anapitiriza kupempha anthu kuti adzikhala a umodzi ponena kuti umodzi umabweretsa mtendere ku dera ngakhalenso ku dziko. Mwambo wokhazikitsa kugawa kwa zipangizozi unachitikira m’mudzi mwa Nambirika kwa mfumu yayikulu Kachere m’boma lomwelo la Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Archdiocece ya Blantyre Yawonjezera ma Parishi Awiri
news: By Glory Kondowe Wasankha ma parishi awiri atsopano – Msusa Archdiocese ya mpingo wa katolika ya Blantyre yawonjezera chiwerengero cha ma parish ake kuchoka 41, kufika pa ma parish 43. Izi zachitika kutsatira kukwezedwa kwa tchalitchi la Namame lomwe linali pansi pa parish ya Our Lady Queen of All Hearts-Limbe Cathedral komanso tchalitchi la Mithungu lomwe linali pansi pa parish ya Phalombe kukhala ma parish oyima pawokha. Malinga ndi chikalata chomwe archdiocese-yi yalemba kupita kwa atsogoleri ndi akhristu eni ake, archepiskopi wa archdiocese ya Blantyre Ambuye Thomas Luke Msusa ati kuchuluka kwa akhristu mu nthambi zonse za archdiocese-yi ndi zomwe zachititsa kuti awonjezere ma parish-wa ndi cholinga chofuna kuthandiza akhristuwa kuti azifikiridwa mosavuta ndi ansembe kuti aziwathandiza pa zosowa za moyo wawo wa chikhristu pofuna kukulitsa chikhulupiliro chawo. Pakadalipano, arch-episkopi Msusa asankha bambo James Khembo kukhala bambo mfumu ku parish ya Namame komanso bambo Lazarus Zulani kukhala bambo mfumu ku parish ya Mithungu. Pamenepa, Ambuye Msusa apempha mgwirizano olimba pakati pa akhristu a mu arch-diocese-yi ndi cholinga chofuna kuzamitsa chikhulupiliro chawo mwa Yesu Khristu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Apempherera Mzimu wa Bambo Osowa Pokhala
news: By Sylvester Kasitomu Mtsogoleri wampingo wakatolika padziko lonse Papa Fracisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya anthu awiri omwe anamira mu mtsinje wapamalire a dziko la Mexico ndi America. Wapereka uthenga wa chipepeso – Papa Papa wapereka uthengawu kudzera kwa mlembi wake wamkulu ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican, Alessandro Gissoti pomwe anawona zithunzi pa tsamba la Internet zomwe zikuwonetsa anthuwa omwe ndi bambo yemwe ndi Oscar Alberto komanso mwana wake wankazi Valeria, akuyandama mbali mwa mtsinjewu. Mwazina Papa wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfayi yomwe yachitika kaamba koti anthuwa amasowa pokhala ndipo wapempherera mizimu yawo kuti iwuse mumtendere wosatha. Malipoti ati mkuluyi yemwe ndi m‘modzi mwa anthu osowa pokhala mdziko la Mexico amafuna kuwolokera mdziko la amerika ndipo anabereka mwana wakeyu ndikuyamaba kusambira mu mtsinjewu ndipo atafika pakati pa nsinjewu anatopa ndi kuyamba kumira, ndipo anapezeka mamawa a lolemba pa 24 June 2019 atafa pamodzi ndi mwana wakeyu m‘mbali mwa mtsinjewu. Anthu ambiri maka ana akupezeka atafa mdzikoli kaamba kosowa pokhala pomwe lamulungu lapitali ana ena awiri ndi mayi m’modzi anapezeka atafa kaamba kakutentha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MEC  Ilowa Pansika
news: By Slyvester Kasitomu Bungwe lowona za chisankho m’dziko muno la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) lalengeza likhala likugulitsa wina mwa katundu wa bungweli yemwe wakhala asakugwira ntchito kwa nthawi yaitali. Bungweli lalengeza izi kudzera mu chikalata chomwe latulutsa. Mneneri wa bungwe-li Sangwani Mwafuliwa wati a Malawi asakhale ndi nkhawa yoti katundu yemwe akugulitsayu ndi yemwe angwiritsidwa ntchito pa chisankho chomwe chinachitika mdziko muno mwezi watha ponena. Mwafulirwa: Tatsata dongosolo loyenera “Katundu yemwe tikugulitsayu ndi yekhayo yemwe samagwira ntchito komanso anagwiritsidwa ntchito mu zisankho zomwe zinachitika mdziko muno zaka zapitazi,” anatero a Mwafulirwa. Mwazina iwo ati pogulitsa katunduyi atsata njira zoyenera zakagulitsidwe ka katundu wa boma. A Mwafulirwa anati, “Kuti tigulitse katunduyi tatsata dongosolo loyenera ndipo tiwatsimikizire a Malawi onse kuti tikudziwa za chigamulo cha khothi ndipo ife a bungwe la MEC timalemekeza malamulo a dziko lino choncho pa katundu amene akugulitsidwayu palibe amene akukhudzidwa ndi milandu yomwe ili kukhothi kapena anthandiizira pa ntchito yokonzera chisankho cha pa 21 May.” A Mwafulirwa amemeza mabungwe omwe si aboma komanso atsogoleri a zipani zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno kuti adzafike pa tsiku la malondali kuti adzaone katundu yemwe akugulitsidwayu. Bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno ati lakonza zogulitsa katunduyi yemwe sakugwira ntchito ndipo amangowonongeka ku malo osungira katundu wa bungweli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Apempha Akhristu Alimbike pa Ntchito Zachifundo
news: By Thokozani Chapola M’tsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walimbikitsa akhristu a mpingo-wu kuti adzipereke pogwira ntchito zachifundo. Papa: Atumiki akhale achifundo Papa Francisco walankhula izi pa umodzi mwa miyambo imene watsogolera ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican.  Iye wati mulungu amakondwera ndi anthu omwe amadzipereka pogwira ntchito zachifundo mosalira kuyembekezea malipiro aliwonse. Kumbali ya utumiki m’tsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika-yu papa Francisco anati kwa onse omwe amadzipereka pa ntchito za utumiki akuyenera kumaonetsetsa kuti akugwiradi ntchito-yi moona mtima ngakhale kuti azikumana ndi zovuta zosiyanasiyana zomwe zimapezeka pogwira ntchito-yi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akakhala ku Ndende Zaka 7 Kamba ka M’memo
news: By Thokozani Chapola Bwalo lachiwiri la milandu ku Limbe mu mzinda wa Blantyre lalamula bambo wina wa zaka 22 Chikondi Lester kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavulagaga kwa zaka zisanu ndi ziwiri kamba komu peza olakwa pa mulandu wovulaza mzake kamba ka  m’memo. Malinga ndi wapolisi wotengera milandu ku khoti pa polisi ya Limbe, Ian Ntaba anauza bwalo la milandu  kuti  pa 8 June, gulu la anthuwa linkagwira ganyu pa nsika wa Machinjiri ndipo nthawi ya nkhomaliro itakwana adagwilizana kuti asonkhe koma Briton Mchetsera wa zaka 24 zakubadwa sanakwanitse kusonkha koma kuti analoledwa kuti adye nawo chakudyacho zomwe zinakwiyitsa a Lester ndipo anafika pokankha ndi kuvulaza mzawoyi pomugenda ndi duka. Anthu akufuna kwa bwino ndi omwe anatengera bamboyu kuchipatala cha Queen Elizabeth komwe anakathandiza mkulu-yi. Yemwe wapereka chigamulochi ndi Second Grade Magistrate George Chimombo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu mu Dayosezi ya Blantyre Awapempha Kuthandiza Radio Maria
news: By Richard Makombe Akhristu komanso anthu omwe amakonda kumvera Radio Maria mu mzinda wa Blantyre ndi madera ozungulira awapempha kuti alimbikitse kuthandiza wayilesi yi pa nthawi ino yomwe ikuchita nsonkhasonkha wa ndalama kudzera ku program ya Mariatona. Wapampando wa bungwe la chipembezo pa Limbe Cathedral Patrick Kombe amayankhula izi kwa mtolankhani wa Radio Maria Malawi mu mzinda wa Blantyre.  “Ndikofunika kuti tidzutsenso bungwe la abwenzi a wayilesiyi kuti ligwire ntchito yokonza ndondomeko monga kuchita Fund Raising pofuna kupeza ndalama zothandizira wayilesiyi,” anatero a Kombe. A Kombe omwenso ndi m’modzi mwa abwenzi a wayilesiyi ati akufuna kulimbikitsa bungwe la abwenzi a wayilesiyi pa Limbe Cathedral ndi cholinga choti ntchito za wayilesiyi zipite patsogolo. “Ndikufuna anthu onse akufuna kwabwino kuti tigwirane manja ndipo tisonkhanitse ndalama zomwe zingathandize kupititsa ntchito za wayilesiiyi patsogolo monga kugula ma units a magetsi mu transmitter yaku Mpingwe,” anatero a  Kombe.  Mariatona  ndi njira yomwe imathandiza wayilesiyi kutolera ndalama zoyendetsera ntchito za wayilesiyi  yomwe imachitika chaka ndi chaka ndipo chaka chino inatsegulidwa pa 4 May ndipo ikuyembekezeka kudzatha  mwezi wa July.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: I am a Catholic and am Proud Ithandiza Chipatala cha Milepa
news:
By Richard Makombe and Luke Chimwaza Mamembala a bungwe la I am a Catholic am Proud Ngati njira imodzi yogwira ntchito ntchito za chifundo, akhristu a mpingo wakatolika m’bungwe la I am a Catholic And Am Proud mu archdayosizi ya Blantyre athandiza odwala pa chipatala cha Milepa m’boma la Chiradzulu.
M’modzi mwa akuluakulu a bungwe-li a James Kholomana wati thandizoli ndi lina mwa gawo la ntchito zomwe bungweli limagwira.
Poyankhula atapereka katunduyi, a Kholomana ati anachiona chanzeru kuti athandize akhristu omwe ali ku dera la kunja kwa Blantyre kamba koti nthawi zonse amathandiza anthu a mdera la Blantyre.
“Tinachiona cha nzeru kuti tithandize anthu a kuno ku Milepa chifukwa naonso amasowa thandizo,” anatero a Kholomana.
Poyankhulapo atalandira katunduyi m’modzi wa akulu-akulu pa chipatalapo mai Rosetta Mugawa anati ndi othokoza ndi thandizo losiyanasiyana lomwe gululi lawathandiza.
Mayi Mugawa anati kupatula katundu yemwe alandirayo, pa chipatalapo amasowa zinthu zambiri zomwe zimafunikira kuti agwire bwino nchito yawo yothandiza anthu odwala monga mankhwala komanso makina oyezera matenda othamanga magazi ndi ena ambiri.
Katundu yemwe bungweli linapereka ndi monga ndi zitenje, ndipo wina ndi wa zikolopa ndi ndowa zotungira madzi ndi zina zambiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Ena Atulutsa Nsalu ya CWO Yachinyengo
news: By Richard Makombe Apanga nsalu yofanana ndi imeneyi yachinyengo Bungwe la amayi a chikatolika la Catholic Women Organisation (CWO), mu archdiocese ya Lilongwe lati ndilokhudzidwa ndi mchitidwe umene anthu ena achita popanga nsalu ya bungwe-li mwachinyengo. Wapampando wa bungwe-li mu archdiocese-yi, mayi Prudence Kadiwa amayankhula izi  pa mwambo wa macheza omwe  bungwe-li linakonza  ku Maula Podium. Iwo ati kupezeka kwa nsalu-yi kulowetsa pansi ntchito bungwe-li m’dziko muno. ‘Ndichenjeze onse amene atulutsa nsaluyi mwachinyengo kuti ndi zinthu zosakhala bwino ndipo zibwezeretsa pansi ntchito za bungweli,” anatero mayi Kadiwa. Pamenepa iwo apempha amayi onse kuti asagule nsaluyi kuti anthu omwe omwe akugulitsa nsaluyi asowe msika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Archbishop Msusa Wapempha Akhristu Asunge Bata Podikira Mlandu wa Chisankho
news: Arkiepisikopi wa archdiocese ya Blantyre ya mpingo wa katolika wapempha anthu mdziko muno kuti apitilize kusunga bata ndi mtendere pamene mdziko muno muli mpungwe pungwe pa nkhani zokhudza ndale.  Archbishop Thomas Luke Msusa amayankhula izi ku Limbe cathedral pa mwambo wa chaka cha Pentekosti omwe wachitika lamulungu pa 9 June 2019. Mwambowu unachitika limodzi ndi mwambo wa  ulimbitso. Poyankhula mwa mwambowu, Ambuye Msusa anati akhristu omwe amakhulupirira mphamvu za mzimu woyera akuyenera kuyenda ndi yesu khristu, komanso kulalika chilungamo ndi mtendere kamba koti izi ndi mphatso za mzimu woyera. “Ife tonse amene talandira mphatso ya mzimu woyera tikhale olimba mtima pakufalitsa uthenga wa mulungu osachita mantha,” anatero archbishop Msusa. Iwo anapemphanso andale kuti apewe kuyankhula mawu onyoza komanso kuchita ziwawa pomwe nkhani yokhudza chisankho ili ku mabwalo a milandu. Arckibishop Msusa anati, “Tiyeni akhristu tiyende ndi mzimu woyera ndipo tikhale anthu odzetsa mtendere ndipo tionetse mtendere pakati pathu.” Pa mwambowu akhristu okwana 294 ochokera mu nthambi zozungulira parish ya Limbe Cathedral analandira sakramenti la ulimbitso.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sister Adora Magaleta Likwethu Alowa M’manda
news: By Glory Kondowe Thupi la Sister Adora Magaleta Likwethu a chipani cha atumiki a Maria Virgo Oyera cha Servants of the Blessed Virgin Mary (SBVM)  lalowa m’manda ku Mary-View ku Nguludi m’boma la Chiradzulu. Amwalira ali ndi zaka 95-Sister Adora Likwethu Malingana ndi mlembi wa mkulu mu chipanichi Sister Georgina Kapangwa wati Sister Adora anamwalira loweruka pa 15th June 2019 ku nyumba yosungira asisitere achikulire ndi odwala ya Mary View ku Nguludi m’bomalo. Malemu sister Adora anabadwa pa 5 June m’chaka cha 1924, m’mudzi mwa  Nachamba m’dera la mfumu yayikulu  Machinjiri m’boma la Blantyre. Iwo amwalira ali ndi zaka 95 zakubadwa komanso 75 zotumikira mu chipani cha asistere cha  SBVM. Pa mwambo woyika malemuwa, ambuye Thomas Luke Msusa a mu arkidayoyosizi ya Blantyre omwe anatsogolera mwambowu apempha akhristu ndi abale a atumiki a mu mpingo kuti azikhala ndi chidwi chothandiza atumikiwa adakali moyo komanso kusamalira manda awo akamwalira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: St. Luke Kandaya Mphakati Uyendera Radio Maria
news: By Glory Kondowe Akhristu ampingo wakatolika m’dziko muno awapempha kuti apitilize kuthandiza Radio Maria Malawi ndi kuti ntchito zake zipitilire kuyenda bwino. Wapampando wa m’phakati wa St. Luke-Kandaya ku Guilime  parishi mu arch-dayosizi ya Lilongwe a Charles Weruzani ndi omwe anena izi pomwe akhristu a m’phakati-wu anafika kudzayendera likulu la wailesi-yi ku Mangochi. Iwo anati wailesi-yi imawathandiza kumvetsa bwino za moyo wa chikhristu kotero ikuyenera kulandira thandizo ndi kuti ntchito zake zipitilire kuyenda bwino. Mwa zina akhristu-wa anafika limodzi ndi ana otumikira mpingowu a m’gulu la Tilitonse omwe anapatsidwanso mwayi wofalitsa uthenga wabwino kudzera mu ma program osiyanasiyana omwe ajambulitsa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu a St. Francis Chidzanja Parish Athandiza Radio Maria
news: Akhristu a mpingo wakatolika ku Parish ya St. Francis of Assis – Chidzanja mu dayosizi ya Mangochi awayamikira kamba kothandiza Radio Maria Malawi molowa manja. A Director a wailesi-yi, bambo Joseph Kimu amayankhula izi pa mbuyo pa mwambo wa nsembe ya ukaristia omwe unachitikira ku parish-yi omwe cholinga  chake ndikuthandiza wailesi-yi. Iwo anati potengera ndi  momwe akhristu-wa achitira pothandiza wailesi-yi, zasonyezeratu kuti nawo amadziwa kufunika kothandiza wailesi-yi. Bambo Kimu anati ndi okondwa kuti bambo mfumu komanso akhristu a parish yi anavomera kuti Radio Maria ikachite misa yopempha thandizo ngakhale kuti parishiyi ikukumana ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana pa nkhani ya chuma. “Ndalama yomwe mwapereka simunataye ndipo ndikudziwa kuti mwapereka ndi ndi chikhulupiliro komanso chifukwa chokonda wayilesi ya Radio Maria” anatero Bambo Kimu. Pa mwambowu akhristuwa anathandiza wailesiyi ndi ndalama zokwana 1 hundred and 18 thousand kwacha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu a Ulumali Sanachite Bwino pa Chisankho-MUB
news: Bungwe lomenyera maufulu a wanthu osaona mdziko muno la Malawi Union of the Blind (MUB) lati anthu ambiri osaona omwe anapikitsana nawo pa chisankho chapitachi sanachite bwino kamba koti anthu ambiri m’dziko muno adakalibe maganizo oti anthu osaona sangathe kuwathandiza pa ntchito zotukula dziko lino. Mkulu wa wabungwe-li m’dziko muno a Ezekiel Kumwenda amayankhula izi kwa mtolankhani wathu amene amafuna kudziwa nambala ya anthu osaona omwe anapambana pa mipando yosiyanasiyana yomwe amapikitsana nawo pa chisankhochi. Kumwenda: Anthu ambiri sanawakhulupilire anthu osawona A Kumwenda ati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti mwa anthu asanu ndi m’modzi (6) omwe amapikisana nawo pachisankhochi  m’modzi yekha ndi amene wapambana pa   mpando wa ukhansala mdera lina m’boma la Machinga. “Anthu ambiri sanawakhulupilire anthu osaona kuti angawatsogolere pa mipando yosiyanasiyana,” anatero a Kumwenda. Iwo anaonjezera kuti vuto la kusowa kwa ndalama zochititsira misonkhano yokopa anthu ndi lomwe lawonjezeranso kuti anthu wa asachite bwino pa zisankhozi. A Kumwenda ati ali ndi chiyembekezo kuti chiwerengero cha anthu osaona omwe adzapikisane nawo pa chisankhochi mchaka cha 2024 chidzakhala chokwera kamba koti chimenechi chinali chiyambi chabe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Achinyamata a YCW Ayendera Ndende ya Ana ya Bvumbwe
news:
Akayidi achichepere ngati awa akusowa chithandizo Mlangizi wa achinyamata mu dinale ya Thyolo mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre Bambo John Luwani apempha mabungwe a mpingowu kuti adzilimbikira kudzipereka poyendera anthu omwe akusungidwa mu ndende zosiyanasiyana m’dziko muno.
Bambo Luwani amayankhula izi la mulungu pomwe achinyamata a bungwe la Young Christian Workers (YCW) mu dinale-yi anakayendera ndi kukapereka thandizo lawo pa ndende ya ana ya Bvumbwe m’boma la thyolo .
Bambo Luwani anati ndi kofunika kuti akhristu atengerepo chitsanzo cha gulu YCW pogwira ntchito za chifundo monga kuyendera anthu omwe ali mu ndende.
“Tiyeni titengere chitsanzo cha Yesu Khristu chomwe ananena kuti pomwe ndinali ku chipatala munabwera kudzandiona, pomwe ndinali ku ndende munadzandiyendera,” anatero bambo Luwani.
Iwo anawonjezera kuti pamene achinyamata akuyendera anthu aku ndende amayika chiyembekezo mwa akayidi-wa.
Poyankhulapo mkulu oyendetsa ntchito za chipembezo pa ndende-yi a Steven Chikolosa anati ndi okondwa ndi kubwera kwa bungweli kamba koti katundu yemwe alandirayu awathandiza powapatsa anthu omwe ali mu ndende.
“Pali zinthu zambiri zomwe timazisowa monga sopo choncho kubwera kwa gululi ndi chinthu chonyaditsa kwambiri makamaka podzawalalikira uthenga wa Yesu Khristu. Iwo amasowa zinthu zambiri monga ku mbali ya ku sukulu choncho kubwera kwa gululi zaonetsa kuti anthu ena amawakumbukira,” anatero a Chikolosa.
Katundu yemwe achinyamatawa anapereka ku ndendeyi ndi monga sopo, mafuta odzola, zakudya ndi zina zambiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsiriza Ulendo Wake Wa Mdziko la Romania
news: M’tsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wamaliza ulendo wake wocheza m’dziko la Romania. Papa ali mdziko la Romania Polankhula pakutha pa ulendowu Papa Francisco walimbikitsa akhristuwo za ubwino wolimbikitsa moyo wokhululuka. Papa Francis  wati ngati akhristuwo atalimbikira kuchita izi ndiye kuti adzathandiza pa ntchito zolimbikitsa umodzi ndi chiyanjano pakati pawo. Papa Francis wakhala ali mdziko la Romania kuyambira kumapeto a mwezi wa May ndipo wamaliza ulendo wake pa 3 June.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ZAP Ipereka Mipando ku Polisi ya Zomba
news:
Mkulu wa a polisi m’boma la Zomba, Deputy Commissioner Happy Mkandawire wathokodza bungwe la Zomba Action Project (ZAP) chifukwa chopereka mipando ndi zipangizo zina za mu ofesi ku nthambi ya apolisi yoona nkhani zokhudza nkhanza zosiyanasiyana ya Victim Support Unit ku polisi station ya Zomba. A Mkandawire amayankhula idzi Lachitatu ku Zomba Police Station pomwe bungwe la Zomba Action Project limapereka katundu-yi. Iwo ati thandidzoli lafika mu nthawi yabwino pomwe ofesiyi yakhala li pa umphawi wosowa thandizoli. Poyankhulanso popereka zipangozio za mu ofesizi m’modzi mwa akulu akulu a Bungwe la Zomba Action Project, mai Eddie Sekeleza anati bungwe lawo linaganiza zopereka thandizolo  litalandira mavuto osowa zipangizo za mu ofesizi pa ku ofesiyi. Pamenepa Iwo alonjedza kuti bungwe la ZAP lipitilidza kuthandidza polisiyi ndi katundu zosiyanasiyana.
Mipando yomwe bungwe la Zomba Action Project lapereka ku Zomba Police Station ndi ya ndalama zokwanira 175 000 Kwacha. Bungwe la ZAP lidaperekaponso katunduyi ku ofesi yoona nkhani zokhudza nkhanza  zomwe anthu amachitilidwa ku polisi ya Zomba ya Victim Support Unit chaka cha 2009.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akagwira Jere Zaka 7 Kaamba ka Kuba
news: Bwalo lachiwiri lamilandu m’boma la Mangochi lalamula mamuna wina kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka zisanu ndi ziwiri 7 kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu  wa kuba.  Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, mamunayu John Uladi wa zaka 35 zakubadwa anapalamula mlanduwu usiku wapa 3 May 2019 pomwe anathyola mnyumba ya mayi Esnarth Amadu ndi kuba katundu wa ndalama zokwana 90 thousanda kwacha. Mayiyu anakatula nkhaniyi ku Police ya Makokola pomwe anayamba kumufunafuna mkuluyi ndipo ali nkati mwakafukufukuyi ndi komwe anapeza kuti nkuluyu wakhala akuba katundu pothyola nyumba za anthu a m’midzi ya Kera, Makawa, Chipoka, Mpemba, Michesi ndi Matuwi kuyambira mwezi wa October 2018 mpaka mwezi wa May 2019. Popereka chigamulo chake Second Grade Magistrate Augustine Mizaya anati mkuluyi akuyenera kulandila chilango chokhwimachi kamba koti wakhala akudzetsa mantha kwa anthu ozungulira deralo. John Uladi amachokera m’mudzi mwa Sanyira mdera la mfumu yayikulu Mponda m’boma la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Sakugwirizana ndi Zotsatira za Chisankho, Alonjeza Kukagwada ku Bwalo la Milandu
news: Mtsogoleri wa chipani cha Malawi Congress (MCP) Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wati atengera ku bwalo la milandu bungwe la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) kamba kolengeza kuti Proffessor Peter Mutharika ndi yemwe wapambana pa chisankho chomwe chinachitika mdziko muno pa 21 mwezi uno Chakwera: Dziko kuti lidzuke, Mutharika akuyenera agwe . Dr. Chakwera amalankhula izi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pa msonkhano wa atolankhani womwe chipanichi chinakonza. Iye wati atengera nkhaniyi kukhothi ndi cholinga choti amalawi adziwe chilungamo chenicheni cha mmene chisankhochi chinayendera kuti pamapeto pake Muthalika atule pansi udindo ngati mtsogoleri wa dziko lino. “Ine Lazarus Chakwera ndikunena pano kuti sindikugwirizana ndi zotsatira zomwe bungwe la MEC linalengeza. Ife tikasuma ku high court kuti chilungamo chiwoneke pa nkhniyi, khothi lilamule kuti zotsatirazi ndi zosavomerezeka ndipo agamule kuti zotsatirazi ndi zosavomerezeka, chisankho chichitikenso,” anatero Chakwera. Chakwera anati, “dziko lathuli kuti lidzuke, Mutharika akuyenera agwe.” Pamenepa Dr. Chakwera anapezerapo mwayi otsutsa malipoti omwe akhala akufala pa tsamba la internert oti iwo ndi aphungu atsopano omwe asankhidwa mu chipanichi sakugwirizana ndipo amulamula kuti atule pansi udindo ngati mtsogoleri wa chipanichi ponena kuti ili ndi bodza. “Ena mwayamba kutipekera bodza kuti mchipani mwathu simuli bwino cholinga tisagwirane manja pomenya nkhondoyi koma zimenezo sizitheka,” anatero Chakwera. Izi zikudza patangopita tsiku limodzi bungwe la mgwirizano wa mipingo la Public Affairs Committe (PAC) litawuzanso atolankhani mu mzinda wa Blantyre kuti silikukhutira ndi zotsatira za chisankhochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mutharika Amukhazikitsa, Akatswiri Amudzudzula Pochita Miyambo Itatu
news: President wa dziko lino Professor Peter Mutharika wati zipani zonse zomwe zalamulira dziko lino zathandiza kwambiri patchito yokweza chitukuko cha dziko lino. Mutharika amalankhula izi pa bwalo la za masewero la Kamuzu mu mzinda wa Blantyre pa mwambo womukhazikitsa pa udindo ngati mtsogoleri wa dziko lino. Amukhazikitsa ngati president wa dziko lino: Mutharika Iye wati zipani za ndale zotsutsa boma zikuyenera kuvomereza kuti iye ndiye mtsogoleri wa dziko lino. Masiku apitawa akatswiri pa ndale adzudzula boma kaamba kochita miyambo ingapo yosiyana kutsatira kupambana kwa Mutharika. Malinga ndi dongosolo lochokera ku nyumba ya boma likusonyeza kuti pambuyo pa kumulumbiritsa Mutharika komwe kunachitika lachiwiri, boma linakonzanso mwambo womukhazikitsa pa udindowu komanso mwambo wa chipani cha DPP chikhale chikukondwelera kupambana kwake pa chisankhochi womwe uchitike pa Njamba Freedom Park. Mkamanga: Sizimayenera kukhala choncho Malinga ndi Emily Mkamanga, ndi zosabisa kuti boma ligwiritsa ntchito ndalama za nkhaninkhani pa miyambo itatu yonseyi. “Sizimayenera kukhala choncho. Miyambo yonseyi imayenera kuchitika tsiku limodzi chifukwa zonsezo ndi zokhudza chisangalalo. Zomwe akupangazi awononga ndalama zambiri,” anatero Mkamanga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: UTM Yalonjeza Kukhazikitsa Ulamuliro Wokomera Aliyense
news: Chipani UTM chatsindika kuti chikadzapambana pa chisankho chomwe chikudzachi chidzayesetsa kukhadzikitsa ulamuliro wokomera wina aliyense pa ntchito zotukula dziko lino. Mtsogoleri wa chipanichi Saulos Klaus Chilima amayankhula izi lamulungu pa msonkhano wokopa anthu umene anachititsa pa bwalo la Mponda Freedom Park mu mzinda wa Zomba. Iwo ati chipani cha UTM chikadzapambana chidzaonetsetsa kuti anthu onse achikulire oyambira zaka 65 akulandira ndalama yokwanira 15,000 kwacha mwezi uliwonse yowathandizira pa miyoyo yawo. A Chilima ati boma lawo lidzachotsa ndalama yomwe anthu amalipira akafuna kuyitanitsa madzi ndi magetsi yotchedwa ‘connection fee’ m’chingerezi. Mtsogoleriyu wati adzayambitsa ulimi wa mthilira komanso adzatsitsa mtengo wagulira feteleza kuti anthu adzathe kukolola chakudya chokwanira. Poyankhulapo pa msonkhanowu, mlembi wa mkulu wa chipanichi Patricia Kaliati, anati nthawi yakwana tsopano kuti zinthu zisinthe mdziko muno povotera  a Chilima. “Boma la UTM lidzachotsa katangale komanso kuonetsetsa kuti misewu ya mdziko muno ndiyolimba” anatero mayi Kaliati. Iwo anatinso boma lawo lidzatsitsa mtengo wa cement komanso malata. Iwo anati, “Tidzalipilira mwana aliyense osowa sukulu kuyambira ku pulaimale mpaka ku sekondale.” Naye mkulu owona za achinyamata mchipanichi a Bon Kalindo anati boma lawo lidzapereka ukadaulo kwa achinyamata kuti adzitha kuyambitsa ntchito za malonda. “Tidzayesetsa kuti  achinyamata apatsidwa ndalama zoyambitsira ntchito  za malonda komansokuwaphunzitsa ntchito za manja posayanganira chipani chomwe iwo akutsatira,” anatero a Kalindo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Blantyre Arkidayosizi Ipempha Akhristu Apemphelere Chisankho
news: Mpingo wa katolika mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre wapempha akhristu ake kuti awonjezere mapemphero opempherera chisankho cha bata ndi mtendere komanso kuzipempherera iwo eni kuti adzasankhe moyenera pa chisankho chapatatu chomwe chichitike pa 21 May chaka chino. Arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi-yi, Ambuye Thomas Luke Msusa ayankhula izi mu uthenga wapadera omwe apereka kudzera mu ofesi yoona zautumiki ya arkidayosiziyo. Iwo apempha atsogoleri a mpingo monga ansembe, asisitere, abulazala komanso atsogoleri a ma parish ndi ma tchalitchi kuti alimbikitse anthu awo kuti akavote ndikusankha atsogoleri omwe adzatukule dziko lino. Chikalatachi chasainidwa ndi mkulu woona za utumiki mu arkidayosiziyo bambo Alfred Chaima ndipopolankhulapo iye wati mpingo ukuyenera kulimbikira mapemmphero kuti Mulungu ayankhe zomwe anthu akufuna kudzera pa chisankho. “Aliyense awonjezere mapemphero mu nthawi ino kuti athe kumvetsera zomwe mzimu woyera akutiyankhula kuti tikasankhe mwanzeru,” anatero bambo Chaima. Iwo ati ndikoyenera kuti anthu akasankhe mwanzeru posatengera zomwe atsogoleri a ndale awapatsa monga ndalama, njinga komanso nsalu mwa zina. Uthengawu wadza malingana ndi momwe nkhani za ziwawa zikumvekera pomwe patsala masiku asanu ndi awiri kuti anthu aponye voti ndi kusankha ma khansala, a phungu a ku nyumba ya malamulo komanso mtsogoleri wa dziko.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa wasankha nduna yake yoyimilira mpingo wakatolika ku Malawi
news: M’tsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse PAPA FRANCISCO wasankha ARCH-BISHOP GIANFRANCO GALLONE kukhala nduna yake yoyimilila likulu la mpingowu kuno ku MALAWI. Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolikayu walengeza za kusankhidwa kwa nduna-yi masana a pa 8 MAY 2019 ku likulu la mpingowu ku VATICAN. ARCH-BISHOP GALLONE anabadwa m’chaka cha 1963 m’dziko la ITALY ndipo anadzodzedwa unsembe m’chaka cha 1988, anasakhadzikitsidwa kukhala bishop pa m’chaka cha 1999. kuchokera pomwe anadzodzedwa umsembe wakhala akutumikira m’mayiko osiyanasiyana monga   MOZAMBIQUE, ISRAEL, SLOVAKIA, INDIA, SWEDDEN, komanso ku likulu la mpingowu ku VATICAN. Padakalipano likulu la mpingo wakatolika mdziko muno EPISCOPAL CONFERENCE OF MALAWI ECM lafuniranso zabwino ARCH-BISHOP GALLONE pa udindo-wu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akagwira Jere Zaka 6 Atapezeka ndi Chamba
news: Bwalo lalikulu loweruza milandu m’boma la Dedza lalamula amuna ena awiri kuti akakhale ku ndende ndi kukagwira ntchito yakalavula gaga kwa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi (6) kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu ozembetsa chamba. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Edward Kabango wati amuna awiriwa Emmanuel Geofrey wa zaka 24 zakubadwa komanso Fiskani William wa zaka 19 zakubadwa anapezeka ndi chambachi mu basi yomwe imachokera ku Mzuzu kupita ku Blantyre pa 11 March chaka chino. Apolisi omwe amachita chipikisheni mu bus-yi anapeza  kuti amunawa anabisa chambachi mkati mwa zovala zomwe anavala ndipo anawagwira ndi kukawatsekera ku polisi ya Dedza. Amunawa anapezeka olakwa pa mlanduwu ndipo Emmanuel Geofrey anapepha bwaloli kuti limupatse chigamulo chofewa kaamba koti ali ndi mkazi komanso ana awiri pomwe Fiskani William anati ndi mwana wa sukulu. Koma popeka chigamulo chake Magistrate Clemence Derricks Chamwenda anati bwaloli lapereka chigamulo chokhwimachi kwa amunawa kaamba koti anapezeka ndi mulingo wa chamba wochuluka kwambiri ndipo akuyenera kulandila chilango chokhwima kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Amuna awiriwa amachokera m’mudzi wa Zanyeka kwa mfumu yayikulu Chikulamayembe m’boma la Rumphi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu oposa 20 afa pa ngozi ya Galimoto ku Ntcheu
news: Anthu 20 afa ndipo ena 31 avulala galimoto yayikulu yonyamula katundu itawagunda pa m’sika wa  Kampepuza m’boma la Ntcheu. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomali Sub-Inspector Hastings Chigalu wati galimotoyi nambala yake ndi 1152 ndipo imachokera ku Lilongwe kupita ku Balaka ndipo itafika pa msikapa dalaivala wa galimoto-yi analephera kuyiongolera bwino ndipo inaphonya m’sewu ndi kukagunda anthu-wo. Pali chiyembekezo choti chiwerengero cha anthu omwe afa chitha kukwera kaamba koti anthu ena agonekedwa ku chipatala cha boma la Balaka komanso ku Kamuzu Central Hospital. Padakalipano boma lati lichita chilichonse chotheka kuthandiza anthu omwe avulalawa komanso liyendetsa mwambo wonse wa maliro a anthu omwe afa pa ngoziyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa ndi Okhudzidwa ndi imfa ya anthu ku Malawi, Mozambique ndi Zimbabwe
news:
Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi okhudzidwa ndi imfa ya anthu ochuluka m’maiko a Malawi, Zimbabwe ndi Mozambique amene afa kaamba ka mphepo ya mphanvu yomwe inawomba m’maikowa.
Papa amalankhula izi pa zonkhula-lankhula zomwe amakhala nazo lachitatu lililonse kulikulu la mpingowu ku Vatican.
Iye wati ndi okhuzidwa ndi anthu omwe afa m’maikowa komanso ena omwe akuvutika ndi njala komanso kusowa kwa malo okhala kaamba kavutoli.
Pamenepa Papa Francisko wapempha akhristu mu mpingowu kuti akhale patsogolo kuthandiza anthuwa kudzera m’mapemphero komanso zinthu za kuthupi monga chakudya ndi zina.
Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolikayu wapempherera mwapadera anthu omwe akhuzidwa ndi vutoli ndipo wapempherera mizimu ya anthu omwe afa pa ngoziyi kuti iwuse ndi mtendere wosatha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Radio Maria African Congress Conference Starts in Kigali
news: A two-day Radio Maria African congress conference has started in Kigali Rwanda. The meeting has drawn together Radio Maria Directors and Presidents who among other things will deliberate on the preparations for Mariathon 2019, an annual  event which aims at intensifying the Maria Project. The conference will run from 06th – 08th February, 2019.
author: AlinafeK

title: President wa Ethiopia Apepesa Kwa Anthu Olumala
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko la Ethiopia wapepesa anthu mdzikolo kamba kolankhula mawu onyonza kwa anthu olumala. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya BBC, mtsogoleriyo Nana Akufo Addo wapeleka uthengawu kudzera patsamba la mchezo la Facebook. President Addo yemwe ndi wachipani cha New Patriotic (NPP) analankhula mawu onyoza kwa anthu wolumala pamsonkhano wokopa anthu womwe anachititsa sabata latha. Pamsonkhanowo mtsogoleriyo anati boma lake layesetsa kukwanilitsa zitukuko pafupifupi makumi anayi zomwe anawalonjeza anthu mdzikolo pamenepa iye anati yemwe sakuwona zitukuko zomwe iye wachita ndi munthu wakhungu komanso wosamva. Atalankhula izi, bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa anthu wolumala mdzikolo linakwiya zedi kamba ka mauwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MMD Yakonzeka Kusintha Zinthu-Kuwani
news: Bungwe loyendetsa zisankho m’dziko muno la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) likupitilira kulandira zikalata za atsogoleri azipani zosiyanasiyana omwe akufuna kudzapikisana nawo pa udindo wa utsogoleri wa dziko lino. Cha-ku-m’mawa-ku yemwe wapereka zikatata zake ndi mtsogoleri wa chipani cha Mbakuwaku Movement For Democracy (MMD) a Peter Dominico Sinosi Driver Kuwani. Polankhula ku Comesa Hall mu mdzinda wa Blantyre komwe kukuchitikira mwambowu. A Kuwani ati ndiwokonzeka kudzathana ndi mavuto a nkhani-nkhani omwe a Malawi akupitilira kukomana nawo m’dziko muno. M’mau ake wapampando wa bungwe la MEC, Justice Dr. Jean Ansah Sc wapempha atsogoleri azipani kuti apewe ndale zonyonzana, koma achite ndale zokhudzana ndi mfundo zachitukuko cha dziko lino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: JB Wapereka Zikalata Zake ku MEC
news: Mtsogoleri wachipani cha Peoples (PP), Dr. Joyce Banda naye wapereka  zikalata zake zomuyenereza kudzapikisana nawo pa chisankho cha pulezidenti chomwe chichitike mmwezi wa May chaka chino. Wapereka zikalata zake: Joyce Banda Polankhula atapereka zikalazi  mai Banda wati apitiliza ntchito yake yolimbikitsa kuthandiza osowa komanso kuthetsa umphawi mdziko muno. Iye wati ali ndi kuthekera kolamulira dziko lino ndi luntha kaamba koti wakhala mmaudindo ngati nduna ya boma, wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri komanso pulezidenti wa dziko lino. Mayi Banda ayima pa chisankhochi ndi Dr. Jellie Jana yemwe ndi mkulu wakale wa bungwe la ADMARC. Mayi Banda apereka zikalatazi ku bungwe la chisankholi patangopita maola ochepa atalengeza kuti achoka mu mgwirizano wa chisankho womwe anapanga ndi chipani cha UTM, Tikonze Dziko Lathu komanso Alliance for Democracy (AFORD).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Asainirana Pangano la Mtendere ndi Chipembedzo cha Chisilamu
news: Mtsogoleri wampingo wakatolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati mipingo ili ndi udindo wolimbikitsa mtendere komanso chikondi pa dziko lonse posatengera kusiyana pa zikhulupiliro. Papa: Mpingo wa katolika umakhulupilira mtendere PAPA amalankhula izi mu mzinda wa Abu Dhabi mdziko la United Arab Emirates pambuyo posainilana mgwirizano wa mtendere ndi mtsogoleri wachisilamu mdzikolo Grand Imam. PAPA wati akhristu a mpingo wakatolika, achipembedzo cha chisilamu komanso mipingo yonse yomwe imakhulupilira mulungu akuyenera kugwilira ntchito limodzi polimbikitsa chikondi,mtendere komanso ufulu wachibadwidwe wa anthu. Pali chiyembekezo chakuti kufika kwa Papa mdziko la United Arab Emirates kuthandiza kupititsa patsogolo ubale wabwino wapakati pa akhristu akatolika komanso achipembedzo cha chisilamu. Anthu ambiri mdziko la United Arab Emirates ndi achipembedzo cha chisilamu, anthu 12 pa anthu 100 aliwonse ndi akatolika. Papa Francisco ndi mtsogoleri woyamba wampingo wa katolika kufika mdziko la United Arab Emirates.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bishop Tambala appeals for concerted efforts for unity by all pastoral agents.
news: By: Judith Sonkho Bishop of Zomba Diocese, Rt. Rev. George Desmond Tambala, has urged all groups discharging pastoral duties in the diocese, to be united in all areas for the benefit of the church. Rt. Rev. Tambala was speaking at Zomba Cathedral during the feast of Presentation of the Lord and the commemoration of World Day of Consecrated Life. Bishop Tambala said, among others, unity brings in effectiveness in all missions of the church. Rt. Rev. George Desmond Tambala – Bishop of Zomba Diocese “There is strength in unity, it contributes in the effectiveness of all missions of the church by bringing together your resources, talents and gifts, the church benefits a lot.”   Bishop Tambala said. Commenting on what the Bishop said, Fr. Harvey Chikumbu of the Capuchin, echoed that unity was brought by Jesus Christ himself during the time he was leaving his disciples, he advised them to be one, meaning unity, therefore, the church has to emulate it. “Unity was brought by Jesus Christ himself during the time he was leaving his disciples, he advised them to be one, meaning unity, therefore in the Catholic church we have different charisms that have to be shown in different areas. There are different orders in the church, some are working in hospital, schools and some are working hand in hand with the people in the field, therefore all these have different works in the church and at the end all these become one which is the body of Christ.” Concluded Fr Chikumbu The eucharist celebration mass brought together all the pastoral agents in the diocese and celebrates their unity. World Day of the Consecrated Life was set aside by Pontifical Missionary Societies – PMS as one way of promoting universality of the church. eucharistic celebration mass brought together all the groups of the church
author: AlinafeK

title: Zomba District Health Office launches its strategic plan.
news: By : Judith Sonkho Formulation and implementation of a Strategic Plan (SP) is said to be one of the key ways and interventions for addressing a number of Health issues gripping the country. Acting Director of Health and Social Services in Zomba district, Dr. Raphael Piringu was speaking at a media briefing organized by Zomba District Health Office with an aim of updating journalists on the progress of their Strategic Plan implementation in the district. Dr. Piringu, said for the first time in the history of the Ministry of Health in the country, Zomba District Health Office launched its first-ever Strategic Plan to address a number of challenges affecting delivery of quality Health Care Services in the district. “We are intensifying the fight against maternal mortality rate, infant mortality rate and fertility rate, among other thematic areas of this Strategic Plan”, said Dr. Piringu. Acting Director of Health and Social Services in Zomba district, – Dr. Raphael Piringu The Acting Director of Health and Social Services said maternal mortality rate is on the increase in the district, thereby fueling maternal deaths, and their target is to reduce the vice by 20 percent by the year 2022. According to Dr. Piringu, the SP will also be looking into a global problem of HIV/AIDS and Tuberculosis, but at district level. He also said his office will strengthen partner collaboration and community ownership of the Strategic Plan to ensure effective implementation of the same to achieve desired goals. “As one way of strengthening this, we have formed the SP together with the community and the stakeholders and we are planning to implement and review it together”, continued Dr. Piringu. The Strategic Plan has a lifespan of five years, from 2017 to 2022 and will be drawing its inspiration from the Ministry of Health’s Strategic Plan which is currently being implemented at a national level.
author: AlinafeK

title: Ziwawa pa Ndale ndi Kubera Chisankho-Chilima
news: Wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino yemwenso ndi mtsogoleri wa chipani cha UTM, Dr. Saulos Klaus Chilima wadzudzula mchitidwe wa ziwawa pa ndale ponena kuti kutero ndi kubera chisankho. Dr. Chilima wanena izi pa msonkhano wa atolankhani womwe chipanichi chinachititsa  mu mzinda wa Lilongwe kutsatira ziwawa pa ndale zomwe anthu ena omwe akuganiziridwa kuti ndi a chipani cholamula cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) akhala akuchitira zipani zotsutsa boma mdziko muno. Iye wati kuwopsezana pa ndale kumachititsa kuti anthu ena alephere kuchita kampeni komanso kuvota momasuka zomwe wati ndi njira imodzi yobera chisankho. Dr. Chilima wadzudzula mtsogoeri wa dziko lino poyang’anira mchitidwe wa ziwawa mdziko muno ndipo wamupempha kuti achitepo kanthu msanga.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: No more cholera cases in Zomba district.
news:
By :Judith Sonkho Embarking into different healthy activities is said to be one way of preventing cholera in Malawi. This was disclosed by the Acting Director of Health and Social Services for Zomba District Council, Doctor Raphael Piringu during a media briefing organized by Zomba District Health office on Tuesday where among other things he said his office is doing a lot to a free cholera district. Dr. Raphael Piringu- Acting Director of Health and Social Services for Zomba District Council. “As a district Council Healthy Sector, we are well prepared to maintain a free cholera district. We started this exercise last year in June by mobilizing our resources, identifying the gaps, communicating with the communities and aligning all the items with our Strategic Plan 2017 to 2022 with the Ministry of Health among others.” Said Piringu.
Dr. Piringu added that, apart from healthy messages, the office has also delivered all the medical suppliers in all health facilities in the district and to champion this the health office has trained several healthy workers to assist in the process where the only gap the office has is to increase awareness.
“As of now we have sent letters to be read in all churches, mosques, schools and to all community leaders in the district as one way of disseminating cholera prevention messages.” He concluded.
Since 2015 Zomba district has recorded zero cholera cases until now. Zomba has been said to be a cholera hot spot due to Lake Chilwa.
Currently the nation has recorded two cases of cholera in December 2018. One in Ndirande, Blantyre and the other one in Chikwawa district respectively.
author: AlinafeK
